Ingredients: ['Grapes Red', '1 part(s) Pernod Absinthe', '1 dash(es) Sweet Vermouth', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 dash(es) Simple Syrup', 'Orange Juice']
Making:
Muddle six or seven grapes. Add ice, lime, syrup and spirits. Shake and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Top with orange juice, and garnish with fresh grapes.
Marko Knezevic
Grass Restaurant & Lounge
Miami
Muse – Ernest Hemingway
Pernod Absinthe has partnered with noted mixologists around the country to create specialty cocktails inspired by artists and writers who were influenced by absinthe.

Name: $2 Fish
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka Orange Twist', '1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'Tang Drink Mix']
Making: Combine vodka and tequilla in a highball glass. Fill to a half inch from top with tang. Swirl grenadine.

Name: '57 Chevy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice and pour in the liqueurs. Fill the rest of the glass with equal parts of the juices and top off with a splash of grenadine. Cover the glass with a shaker and shake well. Remove shaker from glass and serve.

Name: '57 Chevy #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix over ice in a hurricane glass. No girl can turn this one down.

Name: '57 Chevy #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Pineapple Juice']

Name: 'Blou' Piniella
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '3/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '7-Up']
Making: Pour liquors over ice in a pint glass. Add a splash of sweet and sour and top off with 7-Up.

Ingredients: ['2 oz. Smirnoff Orange Twist Vodka', '3 oz. Smirnoff Ice', '3 oz. Orange Juice']

Name: 100% Extascy

Making: Mix with lots of ice.

Ingredients: ['1 oz. Ice 101', '12 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix in a highball glass.

Name: 104 Per Cent
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', 'Sour Mix']

Name: 117 Cherry

Making: Pour Banana liquer and rum over ice in an 8 oz. glass. Fill the glass with orange juice. Add a splash of grenadine and stir for a wonderful taste and color.

Name: 118 Brown

Ingredients: ['Champagne', 'Cognac']
Making: Foundin the memoirs of Gen. George S. Patton Jr.. Mix half and half in a Champagne glass. It was named after a German artillery piece.

Name: 1st Degree Burn

Name: 2 Kumquats
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Honey Syrup', '2 Kumquat', '2 sprig(s) Sage', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Passion Fruit Tea']
Making:
Muddle the first four ingredients then add gin, tea and ice, shake and double strain with a hawthorn and then with a chinois strainer. Pour into a highball glass over ice. Garnish with a kumquat floret.
Times have changed and so have tastes. This original cocktail satisfies any palate and its combination of natural ingredients makes it irresistible in any season

Name: 276 St. George

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Shoot it down.

Name: 2nd Period

Name: 40 Volume Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Sour Apple Schnapps', '2 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '2 1/2 oz. 7-Up', '1 tbsp. Sugar']
Making: Muddle the Bacardi Limon, the amaretto and the sour apple. Add 3 to 5 lemon wedges and 1 or 2 tbsp. of sugar. Muddle well without ice. Add the sour mix and the 7-Up. Shake and strain into a 16oz. glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry.

Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice', 'Sour Mix', '7-Up']
Making: Pour into a shaker with equal parts of the juice, sour mix and 7-Up. Shake and serve in a tall glass over ice.

Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Peach', '7-Up', 'dash(es) Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Cola']
Making: Pour all the ingredients (except cola) in a shaker with ice. Shake once and pour in a highball glass Add a dash of cola and do not add any garnish.

Making: Mix all the ingredients (except for the 7-Up) in a shaker with ice. Pour into a hurricane glass and top off with 7-Up. This is a Penn State University specialty.

Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Wildberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a small rocks glass.

Name: 57 Chevy #3

Name: 901 and Nectar

Making:
Dip the rim in honey and then in salt. Pour all the ingredients in shaker, add ice, shake and pour into margarita glass. Garnish with a twist of orange.
Honey Syrup Process:
6 oz of Honey Blossom
2 oz of hot water
Stir and make sure that the cocktail is well integrated and then let it cool and use.

Name: 901 Baja Panties
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. 901 Silver Tequila', '3 oz. Apple Cider (frozen in cubes)', '1/2 oz. Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 pinch(es) Salt', '1 pinch(es) Cinnamon']
Making:
Freeze apple cider in ice cube trays. Mix other ingredients and shake with 3 1 oz frozen apple cider cubes until cubes dissolve. Served in chilled glass.
Courtesy of Nils Noren and Dave Arnold - The French Culinary Institute - NYC

Name: 901 Bloody Maria
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 901 Silver Tequila', '10 oz. Bloody Maria Mix']
Making:
Fill four 14 oz glasses with ice and pour 2 oz of 901 Silver Tequila in each glass. Pour bloody mix into each glass. Stir and garnish with a lime wheel and a celery stalk. Serve a raw oyster with each drink (optional).
Courtesy of Ed McFarland - Ed’s Lobster Bar - NYC

Name: 901 Bloody Rita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 901 Silver Tequila', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice (Blood Orange)', '3/4 oz. Agave Nectar']
Making:
In a tall rocks glass, pour all ingredients over ice. Shake. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with a blood orange slice.
Courtesy of Alain Allegretti – Allegretti, NYC

Name: 901 Chili Flake Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 901 Silver Tequila', '2 oz. Chili Syrup', '2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making:
Put cube ice in a shaker. Add 2 oz 901 Silver Tequila, 2 oz chili syrup and 2 oz lime juice. Cover and shake well. Strain into a martini glass filled with crushed ice. Repeat 3 more times.
Courtesy of Ed McFarland - Ed’s Lobster Bar - NYC

Name: 901 Cider with 901 Caramel Apple
Ingredients: ['10 oz. 901 Silver Tequila', '36 oz. Apple Cider', '4 slice(s) 901 Caramel Apples']
Making:
Pour tequila over full pitcher of ice. Add apple cider and mix well. Pour into 12 oz glasses with the ice. Do not strain. Garnish each glass with 1 slice of caramel apple and drizzle a tsp. of caramel sauce. Serves 4.
Courtesy of Ed McFarland - Ed’s Lobster Bar - NYC

Name: 901 Mia Margarita
Ingredients: ['3 oz. 901 Silver Tequila', 'Passion Fruit (puree)', 'Lime Juice', '1 oz. Honey (cinnamon flavored)']
Making:
Shake with ice and strain into a margarita glass filled with ice. Garnish with a pinch of Shichimi spice.
Nobu Las Vegas has created the Mia Margarita.

Name: 901 PM
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 901 Silver Tequila', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Serve over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: 901-derful
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 901 Silver Tequila', '7 Mint Leaves', '8 Raspberries', '1/2 oz. Partida Agave Nectar', '1 Lime', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making:
Muddle the mint and raspberries in a mixing glass. Add agave nectar using a citrus squeezer. Squeeze in the juice of one medium lime. Add 2 oz 901 Silver Tequila, and a 1/2 cup of ice. Shake vigorously. Fill a 14 oz pilsner glass with ice. Strain drink into glass with ice. Top with 1/4 oz fresh squeezed OJ. Garnish with a lime wheel and a sprig of mint.
The award winning 901-derful was created by Southern Hospitality Mixologist.

Name: 99 Banana Daquari
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 tbsp. Sugar', '1/2 Banana Sliced']
Making: Combine 99 Bananas, sour mix, sugar and the banana in a blender. Blend well and add ice to get desired consistancy.

Name: 99 Bananas And Red Bull
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Add the 99 Bananas to the Red Bull over ice.

Name: 99 Bananas Mix
Ingredients: ['1/4 cup(s) 99 Bananas Schnapps', '16 oz. Mountain Dew (Or 7-Up or Sprite)']
Making: Buy a 20 oz. bottle of any of the above and drink or pour out until it is down until about 16 oz. Then pour in 99 Bananas and put the bottle cap on the Mountain Dew or whatever. Gently turn the bottle upside down a few times and enjoy.

Name: 99 Fuzzy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake the alcohol and the orange juice with ice and strain over ice cubes in a highball glass. Add a splash of cranberry juice.

Name: 99 Tropical
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake the alcohol with ice and strain over ice cubes into a highball glass. Top with orange juice.

Name: ‘Ti Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rhum Clement Premier Canne White Rum', '1/2 oz. Sugar Cane Syrup', '1 piece(s) Lime (Disc, 50/50 ratio of pulp to zest.']
Making:
In a rocks or old-fashioned glass, squeeze the lime slice and pour the Sugar Syrup over the lime, which has been cut from the side of the fruit so that the aromatic oils from the peel will flavor the drink. Add the rum and use a Bois Lele (i.e. pronged wooden swizzle stick usually plucked from a tree native to Martinique) or a simple bar spoon to stir the drink until the syrup is dissolved; add a tablespoon of crushed ice and briefly stir again to chill the drink.
The History of The Little Punch that Could…From Rhum Clément
‘Ti Punch (pronounced Teee Pauncchh!) is without debate the “national” cocktail of Martinique and Guadeloupe. "Ti" is the short Créole version for "petite” however there is nothing small about this drink. It is a simple drink to make as it has only a few ingredients (Rhum Agricole, lime and sugarcane syrup or raw sugar) but it must be made precisely without cutting corners or it is not an authentic ‘Ti Punch. In this potent tippler, the dry and grassy vegetal flavors and grilled fruit aromas from Martinique’s illustrious Rhum Agricole are elegantly showcased in the cocktail. ‘Ti Punch is a cousin to the Daiquiri or the Caipirinha, but please don’t confuse these drinks. ‘Ti Punch is like no other rum cocktail. The recipe for ‘Ti Punch varies based on where you are in French West Indies and even which home you are visiting. The Clément family has a longstanding and fundamental tradition of making ‘Ti Punch for all guests who visit Habitation Clément in Martinique or at any one of their fabulous events around the world. As Rhum Clément is now available in all 50 US states, it is the ideal time to enlighten the American imbiber to the subtle complexities of the ‘Ti Punch.
Wherever this cocktail is made, and more specifically, how it is created aside; what goes unchallenged is that this cocktail can only be made properly with a true Rhum Agricole such as Rhum Clément. If you dare substitute industrial rum (which is made from Molasses – a by-product of processed sugarcane rather than from freshly-pressed sugarcane juice) or a Cachaca (which is made from any variety of sugarcane, has a sharper more industrial flavor and can contain additives such as corn meal, corn flour or rice bran), you might as well be drinking fortified lime/sugar water. As Rhum Agricole is the primary component to the drink, its classic dry and grassy flavor profile is what forms the cocktail’s base, creating the unparalleled flavor profile of the drink. The sugarcane syrup (which can be prepared in advance, or can be substituted with a high-quality sugar-in-the-raw) and the squeezed lime disk are play as complimentary ingredient to enhance the fine characters of Clément’s Rhum Agricole.
“I have been making ‘Ti Punch for my mother (originally from Martinique) since I was about 6 years old,” says Benjamin Melin-Jones, a fourth generation member of the Clément family as well as the Managing Director of Rhum Clément in the US. “It was almost a ritual when she came home from work and took a 20 minute rest before she prepared the evening’s meal. However I will never forget when I made a ‘Ti Punch in Martinique for my uncle and he almost spit it out on my shoes. My recipe had not varied from the one I always made. He asked for my method of preparation and I responded with fresh cut lime, rhum blanc, syrup and crushed ice. He exclaimed: ‘Ice! Were you raised in Guadeloupe?’ This is the perfect example of how the debate over how to create a ‘Ti Punch ignites passionate response even amongst family.”
As everyone has their own preference of how to enjoy ‘Ti Punch, most restaurants in Martinique, upon order of the cocktail, will deliver to the table a bottle of Rhum Blanc or Rhum Vieux (upon request), a small bowl of cut limes, a tray of sugar in the raw and/or a small bottle of Sirop de Canne to allow each patron to make their own according to personal preference. More and more restaurants will also accompany the ‘Ti Punch tray with a small bowl of ice cubes as it is becoming more common for people to have one ice cube in the drink.
When made properly, the drink brings to life the natural flavors and aromas showcasing the terroir of Rhum Agricole. The lime’s tartness brings out the vibrant sugarcane character of the Rhum Agricole, the citrus oils play harmoniously with the dry grassy body of the spirit and the sweet cane syrup awakens the grilled tropical fruit flavors and works to tie it all together. This cocktail is a joy on a hot day and ideal to serve at parties with rum loving friends. When catering at home, a traditional way to serve ‘Ti Punch to present in a way as: “chacun prépare sa propre mort” (each prepares their own death). On a serving tray with a bottle of Rhum Agricole, place a small bowl of cut limes, a bottle of sugarcane syrup (can also use a spiced simple syrup at home as illustrated in our recipe above) and a small dish of ice cubes. As the day turns into night, Ti Punch is excellent when made with aged rhum. The correct pronunciation, of course, is essential. Just like the islanders on Martinique, say it loud and say it in French, “Teee Pauncchh!”
Enjoy ‘Ti Punch for breakfast, lunch, mid afternoon, as an aperitif before dinner or with a cigar, but always enjoy responsibly. While there are several versions of ‘Ti Punch, this is the official Rhum Clément ‘Ti Punch.

Name: ‘Tis the Singin’ Sangria
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Cabo Wabo Blanco Tequila', '1 bottle(s) White Wine', '1/2 can(s) Cranberry Juice (frozen concentrate)', '1 cup(s) Raspberries', '1/2 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1/4 cup(s) Lime Juice', '1/4 cup(s) Sugar', '1/4 cup(s) Orange Liqueur', '2 Lemons (cut into slices for garnish)']
Making: Add the white wine, tequila, orange liqueur, cranberry concentrate, orange juice and lime juice to a large glass pitcher or bowl. Stir in the sugar until dissolved. Place raspberries in a small bowl and mash with spoon. Stir in the mashed raspberries. Refrigerate overnight, to let the flavors soak into the Sangria. Serve over ice. Serves 4.

Name: A and J Smoothie
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Vodka', '3 scoop(s) Ice Cream Chocolate']
Making: Blend Ice Cream until smooth. Add the vodka and the Baileys while blending. Pour into a large wine glass with whip cream and grated choclate as garnishes.

Name: A Bedrock #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Milk']
Making: Pour the Sambuca and the Kahlua in a cocktail glass, add 3 or 4 ice cubes and top up with milk.

Name: A Brisk Walk Through The Redlight District

Making: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: A Day At The Beach

Name: A. J.

Name: A1

Name: Aberdeen Angus

Making: Stir all but Drambuie in a coffee mug. Warm Drambuie, ignite it and pour the burning liqueur into the mug. Stir rapidly and drink.

Name: Aberdeen Flip
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Chivas Regal 18 Year Old Scotch Whisky', '1 oz. Sherry (Oloroso)', '1 Egg', '1/4 oz. Spice Syrup', '1 dash(es) Fee Brothers Aztec Chocolate Bitters', '1 tsp. Blackberry (ies) (Jam)', 'Nutmeg']
Making: Dry shake all ingredients hard, add ice, shake hard again and strain into a sherry glass. Dust with grated nutmeg.

Name: Abilene
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Peach Nectar', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Name: Abortion #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: It's a layered shot. First pour the creme de cacao. Then the amaretto and then the Bailey's. Insert a toothpick to the bottom of the shot glass and dribble some grenadine so it floats in the bottom of the glass. Tastes like a chocolate covered cherry!

Name: Abortion #5
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Cider']
Making: Pour in order (Dubonnet at the bottom) in a cocktail glass.

Name: Abram's Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Pink Lemonade (Frozen concentrate)', 'Vodka']
Making: Pour pink lemonade into a blender and fill the now empty can with vodka and add to the blender. Fill the remaining space in the blender with ice. Blend and serve.

Name: Absinthe
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Vodka', '2 tsp. Wormwood (Crumbled)', '2 tsp. Anise (Crumbled)', '1/2 tsp. Fennel Seed', '4 Cardamom Pods', '1/2 tsp. Coriander (Ground)', '2 tsp. Angelica Root (Chopped)']
Making: Steep Wormwood in vodka for 48 hours. Remove and add the rest of the ingredients. Steep for one week. Note that this drink may be bad for your health.

Name: Absinthe Special Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Anisette', '1 oz. Water', '1/4 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Absinthe Suissesse
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '3 drop(s) Anisette', '3 drop(s) Orange Flower Water', '1 tsp. White Creme de Menthe', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Absolut Alpine Summit
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 part(s) Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 part(s) Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '2 part(s) Simple Syrup']
Making:
Shake all ingredients with ice and pour on the rocks in a tall glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.
Being served this holiday season exclusively at Pre:Post
Pre:Post

Manhattan

Garnish with an orange slice and lime peel.

Name: Absolut Life’s Apeach
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 part(s) Absolut Apeach Vodka', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Peachtree Schnapps', '1 part(s) Lemonade', '1 dash(es) Peach Puree']
Making:
Enjoy the irresistible juicy sweetness of an Atlanta peach now being served at Ashton Kutcher and Danny Masterson’s famed Ten Pin Alley.
Combine all ingredients over ice. Shake and strain into a high ball glass. Garnish with several peach and lemon slivers.
Atlanta peaches peak late June through July. Ripe peaches should smell sweet and have just a little give when gently pressed.

Name: Absolut Lightness
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 part(s) Strega', '1 part(s) Creme de Banane', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice']
Making:
The hottest trend this season is to stay cool. ICEBARS are popping up in Milan, London and Sweden and their icy cocktails bring a whole new meaning to "chilling out." Break the ice at your next party and bring the ICEBAR to life.
Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a well- chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon peel and a cherry.
Now being served at the ABSOLUT ICEBAR in London

Name: Absolut Love Machine
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Ruby Red Vodka', '1 oz. Dekuyper Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 oz. Orange Juice']

Serve in tall glass and garnish with a lime wheel/
Drink available at *Thirsty Scholar* - 70 Beacon Street, Somerville, Massachusetts

Making: Fill a shaker with ice cubes. Add all ingredients. Shake and strain into a chilled highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with raspberry and pineapple.

Name: Absolut Mang-ito
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Absolut Pears Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1/2 part(s) Iced Tea Sweetened', '3 dash(es) Ginger Syrup', '6 Mint Leaves', '6 piece(s) Mango Cubes']
Making:
Muddle mint and mango cubes in a mixing glass. Add vodka and ginger juice, then shake. Pour into highball, and top with pineapple juice and sweetened iced tea.
Florida mangoes mature in June and July. Look for a mango with a smooth skin that has no holes or signs of bruising to ensure a sweet, orange flesh – perfect for fruit salads and delicious cocktails.
Miami mangoes hit the spot at Setai, the Miami Beach condo-hotel hotspot founded by celebrities including Sheryl Crow, Heidi Klum, and Lenny Kravitz.

Making: Stir lime juice and superfine sugar in a chilled highball glass. Add mint leaf. Muddle. Fill with crushed ice. Add ABSOLUT Mango. Stir. Fill with crushed ice. Topup with soda water. Garnish with a mint leaf and a slice of mango.

Making:
Chicago raspberries are all the rage at Reserve, the West Loop nightclub noted for its celebrity guest DJs including DJ AM and frequent celebrity attendees including Vince Vaughn and Jennifer Aniston.
Combine all ingredients over ice. Shake and strain into a tulip wine glass. Sink 3 raspberries for a last-sip treat. Garnish with 1 fresh raspberry.
Peaking during the summer months, Chicago is the most northerly zone for raspberry growing. Choose bright colored plump berries to avoid tartness.

Garnish with a lime peel, a mint leaf and an orange slice.

Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Milk', '1 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Adam Suprise
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Zima (Citrus)', '6 oz. Watermelon Pucker (Or your favourite Pucker)', '4 oz. Citrus Vodka']
Making: Combine over ice in a pitcher and serve in collins glasses.

Name: Adams Apple
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', 'Apple Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a collins glass.

Name: Addiction
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 tsp. Condensed Milk', '1/2 cup(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Blend all indredients together. Pour over ice into a highball glass.

Name: Addington Highball
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vermouth (French)', '1 1/2 oz. Vermouth (Italian)', 'Club Soda']
Making: Stir well in ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and fill with club soda. May twist orange peel on top.

Name: Adios Mother F**ker #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Club Soda (Chilled)']
Making: Pour all the ingredients except the Club Soda into chilled glass filled with ice cubes. Top with soda. Stir gently.

Name: Admiral
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rye Whiskey', '2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Admiral Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Cherry Cordial', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Admiral's Punch
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Admiral Nelson's Spiced Rum", '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 tsp. Sugar Superfine', '1 dash(es) Orange Bitters', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and pour into a chilled Collins glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, a slice of banana, a maraschino cherry and sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Admiral's Quencher
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Serve over ice, garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Adonis
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dry Sherry', '1 oz. Italian Sweet Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Adonis Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Dry Sherry', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Adult Chocolate Milk
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'splash(es) Cream', 'splash(es) Cola', 'squirt(s) Chocolate Syrup', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Add Ice and shake until frothy. Pour into a highball glass. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Advanced Healing Potion
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Vodka', '1/2 cup(s) Strawberry Hill', '1 cup(s) Raspberry Crystal Light']
Making: Make up Raspberry Crystal as per package instructions. Mix all ingredients with 1/2 cup ice in blender until desired consistency. Pour into a highball glass. Garnish with fruit.

Name: Affair
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with Club Soda.

Name: Affinity Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Scotch', '3 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass over ice..

Name: Affinity Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/4 oz. Creme de Violette']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Afghan Monkey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Midori', '3/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Cream', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice, shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

Name: Afrodiciaco
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Passoa Passion Fruit', '1 part(s) Don Q Gold Rum', '1 part(s) Limoncello', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 part(s) Sour Mix', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix and serve in a tall glass over ice.

Name: After Dinner Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: After Dinner Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Prunella Brandy', '1 oz. Cherry Brandy', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: After Five
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: After Supper Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Afterbirth
Ingredients: ['4/5 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '2/5 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Black Currant Juice', 'Sloe Gin']
Making: Pour into a glass over large amounts of ice and fill fresh orange juice. Add a dash of blackcurrant juice and Sloe gin to taste. Drink through a straw.

Name: Agate's Afterwork Special
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Pink Lemonade', "2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum"]
Making: Mix pink lemonade and Captain Morgan"s Spiced Rum over ice in highball glasses.

Name: Agent Orange #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Mix in a lowball glass.

Name: Agent Orange #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '1 1/2 oz. Apple Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '3 oz. Grenadine', '9 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a pitcher.

Name: Agent Orange #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', "1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '8 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in a tall glass. Add more or less orange juice to suit taste.

Name: Agent Orange #4
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', "1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '8 oz. Orange Soda']
Making: Mix in a tall glass. Add more or less orange soda to suit taste. The soda's carbonation gives this version more of a kick!

Name: Aggravation
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Scotch', '1/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Agua Luca Carioca
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Agua Luca Cachaca', '1 oz. Cointreau', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a margarita glass.

Name: Agua Luca Festa
Ingredients: ['7 1/2 oz. Agua Luca Cachaca', '4 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Soda Water', '2 oz. 7-Up', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', '20 Raspberries']
Making:
Muddle raspberries with the simple syrup. Add the remaining ingredients and mix. Add ice and a swizzle.
This recipe is designed for a 1 litre caraf and makes about 5 drinks.

Name: Agua Luca Smash
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Agua Luca Cachaca', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 Sugar Cube', '1/2 Lemon Cut into quarters', '15 Mint Leaves']
Making: Muddle lemons, sugar cube and mint in a shaker. Add Agua Luca and simple syrup. Stir briefly to dissolve sugar then shake and strain over cracked ice in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Agua Luca Strawberry Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Agua Luca Cachaca', '5 Strawberries', '1 splash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Muddle strawberries with sour mix and simple syrup. Add Agua Luca and ice. Shake and pour into a lowball glass. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Agwa Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Agwa Coca Leaf Liqueur', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making:
Pour a can of Redbull into a tall glass and stir in Agwa.
Once described as,if red bull "gives you wings", then agwa and redbull, is like a jetpack to another stratosphere.

Name: Agwacadabra
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1 oz. Agwa Coca Leaf Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Cointreau', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '3 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Build into a 14oz Collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Air Gunner
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 tbsp. Sugar', 'drop(s) Blue Curacao']
Making: Build in a collins glass.

Name: Airhead
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Mix triple sec, coconut rum, white rum, amaretto, razzmatazz and peach schnapps over ice in a tall glass. Add pineapple juice and cranberry juice. Top up with a splash of sprite.

Name: AJ's Slush
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Vodka', '8 oz. Pineapple Juice', '8 piece(s) Pineapple chunks', '6 Cherries pitted', '6 Grapes', '2 1/2 tbsp. Grenadine']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend. Pour into a 12 oz. glass.

Name: AK47
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Brandy', '1/3 oz. Whiskey', '1/3 oz. Gin', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Rum', '1/3 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/3 oz. Cointreau', '1/3 oz. Lime (Fresh)', 'Soda Water']
Making: Shake the alcohol with ice and pour into a highball glass. Top up with soda.

Name: AL. B. Pucker Smucker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '2 oz. Sprite', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass. Stir. Drink! Very Fruity!

Name: Alabama Fizz
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. Gin', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with Club Soda and garnish with two sprigs of fresh mint.

Name: Alabama Riot
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', '8 oz. Fruit Punch', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Pour Fruit Punch into a large glass filled with ice. Add Southern Comfort, peppermint schnapps and vodka. Stir and top with lime juice.

Name: Alabama Slammer
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '3/4 oz. Sloe Gin', 'Grenadine', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Shake and strain over ice into a highball glass.

Name: Alabama Slammer #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and stir. Add the lemon juice.

Name: Alabama Slammer #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Alabama Slammer #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Alabama Slammer #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '7-Up (or Sprite)']
Making: Take the 7-up and pour it into a glass of your choice. Add the Southern Comfort. Place your hand over the top of the glass and shake, drink while still fizzy.

Name: Alabama Slammer #5
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Orange Juice (Or pineapple juice)']
Making: Pour the orange juice over ice, then add Amaretto and Southern Comfort.

Name: Alabama Slammer #6
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Amaretto', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the Southern Comfort and the Jack Daniel's over ice then add the orange juice, Amaretto and grenadine.

Name: Alabama Slammer #9 (From A Real Southerner)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Sloe Gin', 'Orange Juice (To taste)']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass.

Name: Alabama Slammer Ultimate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Mix all ingredients and serve over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Alamo Splash
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Stir and strain into a collins glass filled with cracked ice.

Name: Alaska Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['2 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Yellow Chartreuse']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: Alaska Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. London Dry Gin', '1/2 oz. Green Chartreuse', '1/2 oz. Dry Sherry']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: Alaskan Polar Bear By Lisa
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Cocoa Cream', '1 oz. Chocolate Syrup', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream (Vanilla or chocolate)']
Making: Blend until it has the consistance of a milkshake. Serve in a highball and garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Albemarle Fizz
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Raspberry Syrup', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with Club Soda.

Name: Albysjon
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Fanta', '1/2 oz. Sprite', '1/2 oz. Kiwi Juice (Concentrate)']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and stir.

Name: Alcoholic Roomate
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1 oz. Light Rum', '6 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Alcoholic Sherbert Delight
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '5 oz. Orange Juice', '2 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine the ingredients, starting with the orange juice, in a highball glass. Drink.......and enjoy the wonderful flavour of liquid Sherbert Delight.

Name: Alcudla
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dry Gin', '1 oz. Galliano', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of grapefruit peel.

Name: Alex's Drink
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Vodka', '3 cup(s) Apple Juice']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: Alex's Secretions
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '7-Up', 'splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix Midori and Peach Schnapps in a highball glass. Fill with 7-up over ice and serve with a splash of cranberry juice.

Name: Alexander
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Alexander Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Alexander The Great
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Alexander's Big Brother
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Alexander's Sister
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Alexandra
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Tia Maria', '1/4 oz. Cream', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Cocoa Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Alexi's Spicy Bloody Mary
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '4 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '4 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '2 dash(es) Pickle Juice', '2 dash(es) Olive Brine', 'Tomato Juice', 'Pepper (To taste)', 'Celery Salt (To taste)', 'Salt (To taste)']
Making: Fill a mug with ice and pour back and fourth between two glasses to mix it well. Garnish with olives, a pickle and a slice of lime.

Name: Alfie Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Lemon Vodka', 'dash(es) Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Alfonso
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Champagne (Iced)']
Making: In a wine glass, add the bitters to the sugar. Then add the Dubonnet and a tsp. of ice. Fill the glass with champagne, stir gently and garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

Name: Alfonso Special
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '3/4 oz. Dry Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Algonquin
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Algonquin Bloody Mary
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Tomato Juice', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce', '6 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', 'Salt (To taste)', 'Pepper (To taste and preferably freshly ground)']
Making: Shake rapidly over ice. Strain over ice cubes into a highball glass and add a lime wedge.

Name: Alhambra Royale
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cognac', '1 cup(s) Hot Chocolate', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Fill a mug with hot chocolate almost to the brim. Twist an orange peel over the mug and add it to the chocolate. Using a ladle, warm the cognac over hot water, ignite and while still flaming, pour into the mug. Garnish with whipped cream. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Alhoa Bubbly
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dry White Wine', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Club Soda (And some more to top up)', '1/2 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Pour the last 3 ingredients in a tall glass and stir well. Add crushed ice and the white wine. Add some more Club Soda and stir again. Garnish with a whole strawberry.

Name: Alien
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sour Mix', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients. Strain and pour into a cocktail glass. Serve with a fruit garnish.

Name: Alien Secretion #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Rum', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix and serve over ice.

Name: Alien Secretion #4
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into a hurricane glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Alien Urine Sample
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Midori', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Club Soda', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass. Float the Curacao.

Name: Alize Emerald
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Alize Blue', '2 oz. Alizé Cognac VS']
Making: Serve on the rocks.

Name: All American
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Pour into a lowball glass over two ice cubes.

Name: All Nighter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Galliano', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', 'Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Combine in a collins glass over a little bit of crushed ice.

Name: All White Frappe
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Anisette', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: All-Irish Black and Tan
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Guinness', "1/2 pint(s) Ale Smithwick's Irish"]
Making: From a chilled bottle, fill a clean pint glass just over halfway with Smithwick's Ale. Open a chilled can of Guinness Draught. The head will rise. Prepare to pour. Place your Black & Tan spoon (regular spoon will also work) face down on the rim of the glass and slowly pouryour newly opened Guinness Draught over it. When the Guinness has risen to just proud of the rim, you're ready to enjoy the distinct pleasures of The All-Irish Black and Tan.

Name: Allaura
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', "2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", 'splash(es) Pineapple Juice', 'splash(es) Sprite', '2 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Shake Absolut Mandarin, Parrot's Bay and pineapple juice together with ice. Pour into a chilled glass Add sprite and stir. Top with Grenadine. Serve with a twist of lime.

Name: Allegheny
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 1/2 tsp. Blackberry Brandy', '1 1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Allen Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Allen Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Allen Squirrel
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Grenadine', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Addr vodka and grenadine to a cocktail glass. Top up with orange juice and serve.

Name: Allies Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. Kummel']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Allies Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Jagermeister']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Alligator
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Orange Juice (Non Pulp) **Sunny Delight works well also**', '1 oz. Sprite', '1 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Build over ice and pour in orange juice, Sprite and Sour Mix. Stir and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Alma Alexander
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Alma De Agave Anejo Tequila', '2 oz. Kahlua', '3 oz. Milk (low fat)']
Making: Mix on ice in a high ball glass. Add cinnamon powder on to rim and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Alma Aphrodisia
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Alma De Agave Silver Tequila', '4 Raspberries', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Sparkling Wine', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake, strain into a flute, fill up with champagne and garnish with a red petal.

Name: Alma Breeze
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Alma De Agave Reposado Tequila', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Soda Water']
Making: Combine tequila and orange Juice together, pour into a salted rim highball glass filled with ice. Splash of soda and garnish with a lime.

Name: Alma Melon Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Alma De Agave Silver Tequila', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 chunk(s) Watermelon', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake, strain into a tall glass. Garnish with a slice of watermelon and a lemon wheel.

Name: Alma Nina Fresa
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Alma De Agave Reposado Tequila', '2 Strawberries', '1 sprig(s) Basil', '1/2 oz. Guava Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Agave Nectar']
Making: Muddle strawberries with 4 or 5 leaves of basil, add all other ingredients, shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with basil studded strawberry.

Name: Almeria
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Almond Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Peach Brandy', '1 tsp. Kirsch', '1/2 oz. Sugar Syrup']
Making: Warm the gin up in a mixing glass and add the brandy, the sugar syrup and 6 almond slivers. Chill. When needed, pour the chilled mixture over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Stir in the remaining ingredients.

Name: Almond Delight
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sambuca', '3 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Almond Grove
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Creme de Coconut', 'dash(es) Cocoa Powder']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

Name: Almond Hot Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Puerto Rican Rum', '1 tbsp. Orgeat Syrup', '6 oz. Hot Chocolate']
Making: Mix in pousse cafe glass.

Name: Almond Joy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Aloe
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake Parrot's Bay, vodka, banana liqueur, Blue Curacao, and peach schnapps together. Strain and pour over ice in highball glass. Fill with 1/2 orange juice and 1/2 pineapple juice.

Name: Aloha
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 oz. Cognac', '1/4 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Soda Water']
Making: Shake with ice cubes and strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Aloha Kentucky Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Alpine Holiday
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '4 oz. Eggnog']
Making: Mix in a lowball glass.

Name: Alternate Bubblegum
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Butterscotch Ripple Schnapps', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour the Blue Curacao over two ice cubes in an old fashioned glass. Follow with the Butterscotch Ripple Schnapps, finally adding the Bailey's Irish Cream. Simple yet very effective.

Name: Alternatini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 tsp. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sweetened cocoa powder and garnish with a Hershey's Kiss.

Name: Altos Lolita
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Olmeca Altos Plata Tequila', '1/4 part(s) Lime Juice', '2 part(s) Pomegranate Juice', '3 part(s) Lemonade', '1 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Build in highball over ice, and stir. Garnish over a lemon wedge.

Name: Altos Reposado Romance
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Olmeca Altos Reposado Tequila', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 part(s) Agave Nectar', '4 chunk(s) Pineapple', '3 Raspberries']
Making: Muddle and build up. Garnish with a lime wedge and a raspberry.

Name: Alzheimers
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Canadian Club 6 Year Old', '2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Combine over ice in a collins glass.

Name: Amanaconda
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '3/4 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', 'Tonic Water', 'splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Fill cocktail glass with ice. Add both vodkas. Fill with tonic water and add a splash of Sprite. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Amaretto and Cream
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass

Name: Amaretto Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '2 part(s) Orange Juice', '3 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a 12 oz. Collins glass over ice. Refreshing and simple!

Name: Amaretto Heartwarmer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Amaretto', '2 Almonds (Unsalted)', '1 Peach Kernel (Crushed)', '1/2 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Warm the Southern Comfort and add the almonds, peach and sugar. Stir. Allow to cool and add the vermouth and Amaretto. Stir again and strain over ice into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Amaretto Jack
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 splash(es) Cherry Syrup', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake amaretto and Jack Daniel's with ice and strain into an iced highball glass. Add equal parts pineapple and orange juice, then splash with cherry syrup for colour. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry. Enjoy!

Name: Amaretto Mist
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Pour Amaretto in an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Amaretto Root Beer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', 'Root Beer']
Making: Pour into a rocks glass and top with root beer. Some people think it tastes like ice cream.

Name: Amaretto Rose
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Pour Amaretto and lime juice over ice in a collins glass. Fill with Club Soda.

Name: Amaretto Sombrero
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '4 oz. Cream']
Making: Mix in lowball glass.

Name: Amaretto Sour #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass. garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Amaretto Sour #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Amaretto Sour #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Mix with ice in a double old fashioned glass.

Name: Amaretto Stinger
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Amaretto Stone Sour #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', 'Orange Juice', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Fill a cocktail glass with ice and add the Amaretto. Then almost fill with orange juice and top up with Sour Mix.

Name: Amaretto Stone Sour #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a cherry

Name: Amaretto Tea
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Tea (Hot)', '2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Pour hot tea into a pousse-cafe glass, using a spoon in the glass to prevent cracking. Add Amaretto, but do not stir. Top with whipped cream.

Name: Amaretto Twist
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Pepsi Twist']
Making: Pour amaretto into a cocktail glass over ice. Fill with Pepsi Cola Twist.

Name: Amarretto Cherry Sours
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '5 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Cherry juice', '2 Cherries']
Making: Fill Collins glass with ice. Pour in Amaretto, sour mix and cherry juice. Stir will and garnish with cherries.

Name: Amatitan Monk
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Partida Reposado Tequila', '3/4 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Benedictine', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making:
Shake and strain into cocktail glass.
"I like this recipe because it lets the Tequila shine while taking advantage of the natural acidity in Tequila and St. Germain. The Benedictine adds complexity as a third or fourth note." - John Kinder, MK Restaurant, Chicago

Name: Ambassador
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 tsp. Sugar Syrup', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir and serve in a collins glass over ice. garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Amber Amour
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', 'Club Soda']
Making: Pour over ice into a collins glass. Top with Club Soda and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Amber Dream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '10 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour whiskey and peppermint schnapps over ice in a Highball glass. Fill with ginger ale. (Chilling ingredients first makes for a great summer drink.)

Name: Amber's Revenge
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Scotch', '2 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Tequila', "Root Beer (Preferably A&W's)"]
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass, then fill with root beer.

Name: Ambrosia
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Applejack', '1 oz. Brandy', 'dash(es) Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Champagne (Chilled)']
Making: Shake all ingredients except champagne with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with champagne and stir gently.

Name: Ambrosia Supreme
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Cola diet', '1 wedge(s) Lemon']
Making: Mis amaretto and diet cola over ice in Rocks glass. Squeeze in lemon wedge.

Name: Amer Biere
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amer Picon', '1/3 oz. Lemon Syrup', 'Beer']
Making: Pour Amer Picon and lemon syrup into a beer mug. Fill the mug with beer and stir.

Name: Amer Picon
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amer Picon', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Amer Picon Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amer Picon', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Amer Picon Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Amer Picon', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: American Beauty
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. White Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Tawny Port']
Making: Shake brandy, vermouth, creme de menthe, orange juice, and grenadine and strain into a cocktail glass. Float the port.

Name: American Beauty Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 tbsp. Orange Juice', '1 tbsp. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/4 tsp. White Creme de Cacao', 'dash(es) Port']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Float port.

Name: American Champagne
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '3 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour over ice into a Rocks glass.

Name: American Children
Ingredients: ['2 oz. YooHoo', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Mix and serve over ice.

Name: American Flag Cordial
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine (Red)', '1/3 oz. Maraschino Liqueur (White)', '1/3 oz. Creme Yvette (Blue)']
Making: Layer in a cordial glass.

Name: American Flag Pousse Cafe
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Parfait Amour', '1 oz. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Layer in order in a pousse cafe glass.

Name: American Flyer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Sugar Syrup', 'Champagne (Or sparkling wine)']
Making: Shake the rum, the juice and the syrup with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled white wine glass and fill with sparkling wine.

Name: American Grog
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rum', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Water (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with hot water. Stir.

Name: American Leroy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Mix in a blender and pour into a highball glass.

Name: American Pie
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Woodford Reserve Bourbon', "2 oz. Travis Hasse's Apple Pie Liqueur"]
Making: In a shaker with ice, add ingredients and shake gently. Pour into a rocks glass and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: American Rose
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Pernod Absinthe', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1/2 Peach (Fresh, peeled and mashed)', 'Champagne (Or sparkling wine)']
Making: Shake ingredients (except Champagne) and strain into a chilled white wine glass. Fill with Champagne and garnish with a peach slice.

Name: Americana
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Tennessee Whiskey', '1/2 tsp. Sugar', 'dash(es) Bitters', 'Champagne (Chilled)']
Making: Stir the whiskey, the bitters and the sugar in a collins glass until the sugar is dissolved. Fill up with champagne and garnish with a slice of peach.

Name: Americano
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Campari', '1 oz. Cinzano Bianco']
Making: Prepare directly in a highball glass on the rocks. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Americano Highball
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Campari', '2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'Seltzer Water']
Making: Build in highball glass and fill with seltzer. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: AMneSiA
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Alize Gold Passion', '1 oz. Paul Masson Grande Amber VS Brandy']
Making: Combine ingredients and pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Amogo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Sour Apple Pucker', 'splash(es) Grenadine', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients except juices in a shaker. Shake vigourously. Pour over ice into a Highball glass. Top with equal parts pineapple juice, cranberry juice and orange juice. Stir and serve with a straw.

Name: Amore Ade
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Amaretto Di Amore', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Mix in an oversized red wine glass. Add ice and garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Amy E's Lemonade Tree
Ingredients: ['Lemonade', '99 Bananas Schnapps']
Making: Simple as that. Add a little (or a lot) of 99 Bananas to the lemonade in a Highball glass.

Name: Amy's I.Q Test
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka (Or to taste)', '2 oz. Bacardi Limon (Or to taste)', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Amy's Tattoo
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass.

Name: Anal Sex #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Malibu Rum (Spiced)', '4 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '2 oz. Milk']
Making: Blend until smooth, adding the ice cream progressively, as needed to thicken. Then look over at the nearest lady and motion her to bend over....'cause its time for some Anal Sex.

Name: Anal Sex #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Everclear', '1/2 oz. YooHoo', '2 oz. Lemonade', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice and use the orange juice to dilute the drink.

Name: Anal Violation
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Canadian Whisky', '2 oz. Spiced Rum (Preferably Puerto-Rican)', '8 oz. Citrus Juice (Or citrus punch)']
Making: Serve over ice in a highball glass and stir.

Name: Anarchy in the UK - Megadeth
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1 1/2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1 oz. Iced Tea (unsweetened)', '1 Sugar Cube', '3 slice(s) Lemon']
Making:
Muddle the lemon and sugar, add the iced tea and spirits and add ice. Stir and garnish with a lemon wheel.
In honor of the Big 4 (Metallica, Slayer, Anthrax and Megadeth) playing Yankee Stadium, Jagermeister, a brand known for rocking the music scene, has come up with some metal cocktails….

Name: Anatole Coffee
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cognac', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '6 oz. Coffee (Iced)']
Making: Blend with a little cracked ice and pour in a chilled white wine glass. Garnish with whipped cream and sprinkle with chocolate shavings.

Name: Ancho Cerveza
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Anchos Reyes Chile Liqueur', '1 can(s) Tecate Light']
Making: Serve Ancho Reyes chilled with a can of Mexican beer topped with a lime wedge.

Name: Ancho Jicama
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Anchos Reyes Chile Liqueur']
Making: Serve chilled with a jicama spear lightly coated in ancho chile powder and lime juice.

Name: Ancho Margarita
Ingredients: ['3/4 part(s) Anchos Reyes Chile Liqueur', '1 1/2 part(s) Milagro Silver Tequila', '1 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 part(s) Agave Nectar']
Making: Using a lime wedge, wet the rim of an old fashioned glass, salt it, and set aside. Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Add ice, shake, and double strain over fresh ice into the glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Ancho Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Anchos Reyes Chile Liqueur', '1 part(s) Milagro Reposado Tequila', '1/4 part(s) Simple Syrup', '3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '2 dash(es) Angostura Orange Bitters']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a mixing beaker. Add regular ice and stir for 30 seconds. Strain into a double old fashioned glass over large hand cut ice block. Using a vegetable peeler, remove long orange and lemon peels. Express each over the top of the cocktail and rub them together around the rim of the glass. Roll peels together into a rosette and place atop the cocktail.

Name: Ancho Paloma
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Anchos Reyes Chile Liqueur', '3 part(s) Grapefruit Soda', '1 squirt(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Using a lime wedge, wet the rim of the glass and salt half the rim. Add ice, Ancho Reyes, and grapefruit soda. Squeeze a wedge of lime and discard. Garnish with a thin grapefruit wheel.

Name: Anchors Aweigh
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '2 tsp. Triple Sec', '2 tsp. Peach Brandy', '2 tsp. Cherry Brandy', '2 tbsp. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake or blend with ice and strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

Name: Andalusia
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Dry Sherry', '1/2 oz. Brandy']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Andees Candees Magical Mix
Ingredients: ['4 oz. TGI Fridays Mudslide', '2 oz. Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps', 'Milk']
Making: Mix in blender and top with milk. Pour into a tall glass.

Name: Andes Candies
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', 'Milk']
Making: Mix vodka, kahlua and Rumple Minze over ice. Add milk to fill glass.

Name: Andes Ratt
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', 'Ovaltine']
Making: Stir well. Consume while listening to "Anyway you want it" by Journey. Tastes like an Andes mint.

Name: Andrew's Bum Leg
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jagermeister', "4 part(s) Welch's Mountain Berry Juice"]
Making: Pour Jagermeister into glass. Fill with Welch's Berry Juice.

Name: Andy's Chocolate Orange
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mirage', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix and pour over ice into a tall glass. Garnish with a slice of orange

Name: Andy's Surprise
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Everclear', '5 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Mix together, add ice if desired.

Name: Anesthetic
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. French Vermouth', '1 oz. Italian Vermouth', '1 oz. Cognac', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters', 'Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into collins glass. Add sugar to taste and garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: Angel Face
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Apple Brandy', '1 oz. Gin']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Angel of Death - Slayer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Old Overholt Straight Rye Whiskey', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Averna Bitters - Amaro', '3 dash(es) The Bitter Truth Jerry Thomas Own Decanter Bitters', 'Cherries (Brandied)']
Making:
Build, stir with ice and garnish with a cherry.
In honor of the Big 4 (Metallica, Slayer, Anthrax and Megadeth) playing Yankee Stadium, Jagermeister, a brand known for rocking the music scene, has come up with some metal cocktails….

Name: Angel Rita
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Blue Angel Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: In a shaker combine all ingredients with crushed ice. Shake vigorously and serve in a salt-rimmed margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Angel's Delight
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '1 1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 tsp. Sloe Gin', '1 1/2 tsp. Light Cream']
Making: Layer in a cordial glass.

Name: Angel's Fall
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Beefeater Dry Gin', '3/4 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', "1/4 oz. Myer's Rum", "1/4 oz. Dark Rum (Preferably Captain Morgan's)", '1/4 oz. Light Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grapefruit Juice']
Making: You can choose two methods to make this drink: 1. Build in a collins glass with ice. 2. Blend with ice to make a frozen drink.

Name: Angel's Kiss #1
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/4 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/4 oz. Brandy', '1/4 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Layer in a pousse-cafe glass.

Name: Angel's Lips
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Benedictine', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Stir in lowball glass.

Name: Angel's Tit
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', 'Cream']
Making: Layer in a cordial glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Angel's Wing #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 tbsp. Light Cream']
Making: Layer in a pousse-cafe glass.

Name: Angelle's Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', 'splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix ingredients in cocktail glass. May also be enjoyed as a shooter.

Name: Angels' Heaven
Ingredients: ['Milk', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Coffee Flavouring Syrup Nescafe Ice Coffee']
Making: Chill a tall glass. Mix milk and coffee syrup together untill the right taste for you. It should be strong tasting. Leave enough room in the glass for the shot of Kahlua. Pour in the Kahula and mix with very well with a spoon.

Name: Angler's Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) Grenadine', '2 dash(es) Bitters', '3 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes.

Name: Angry Granny
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '3 oz. Gatorade (Red)']
Making: Combine with 4 to 8 ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: Anima Bella
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Averna Bitters - Amaro', '1/2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1 oz. Citrus Juice Mineola', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '5 Raspberries', '3 piece(s) Blackberry (ies)']
Making:
In a Boston shaker add Berries and fresh citrus. Muddle. Add Averna and gin. Shake with ice. Double strain into a chilled 8 oz. cocktail glass.
Garnish: Using a wooden pick horizontally, place 2 citrus leaves vertically through the pick, then in a fan shape add thin slices of half moon lime wheels and then a raspberry. On the lime slices, add the peel of the Minneola on top on the outside of the lime. Place on the edge of a cocktail glass.
Debbi Peek, The Drawing Room at Le Passage in Chicago

Name: Anjorska
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Bacardi Limon', '2/3 oz. Passoa Passion Fruit', '1 2/3 oz. Sour Mix', '1 2/3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2/3 oz. Grape Juice']
Making: Serve over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Ankle Breaker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar Syrup (Optional)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

Name: Ann Sheridan Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/3 oz. Orange Curacao', '2/3 oz. Bacardi White Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Anna's Banana
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Honey (Or almond syrup)', '1/2 Banana (Peeled and sliced)']
Making: Blend with cracked ice on medium speed for 15 seconds and pour into a chilled white wine glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Anna's Wish
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice into a highball glass and stir.

Name: Annabel Lee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Blue Curacao', 'Sour Mix', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a cocktail glass with ice, add peach and vodka, then pineapple and sour. You can either add the curacao and let it sink to the bottom artfully, or you can add it then shake. Garnish with a flag of pineapple, a slice of orange and a cherry.

Name: Annabelle Special
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Benedictine', '1/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Annie's Belfast Mill No. 1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Sambuca', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail shaker, shake until cold and pour into a cocktail glass. Annie's Belfast Mill No. 1 is a lovely blend of tastes whereas the Annie's Belfast Mill No. 2 is an equally tasty longer drink that can be sipped or drunk with relish.

Name: Annie's Belfast Mill No. 2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Sambuca', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail shaker, shake until cold and pour into a highball glass. Decorate with fruit and other trimmings. Annie's Belfast Mill No. 1 is a lovely blend of tastes whereas the Annie's Belfast Mill No. 2 is an equally tasty longer drink that can be sipped or drunk with relish.

Name: Ant On The Beach / Ant Hill
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Captain Morgan's Silver Spiced Rum", '4 oz. Pineapple Juice or Pineapple orange juice', '3 oz. Powerade', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Layer ingredients in order in Highball Glass. Top with a pineapple slice and serve with a straw. Do not mix - let colours blend on their own.

Name: Ante
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Brandy', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Aperol Spritz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Prosecco', '1 1/2 Aperol Orange Liqueur', '1 dash(es) Soda or Seltz']
Making:
The perfect Spritz is prepared in a wine glass, or rock. Add ice, Prosecco, dash of seltz and top with Aperol. This is to avoid that the Aperol settles on the bottom. Garnish with a slice of orange.
The origins of this drink are not known but it is widely believed that the Spritz was born during the 19th century Austrian occupation of Italy. Its name, in fact, may derive from the German verb spritzen meaning “to spray” or might be linked to the name of specific Austrian wines of the western region of Wachau. German soldiers soon got used to drinking local Venetian wines at the many taverns, but the alcohol content, so much higher than the beer they would drink back home, made them dilute it with water. Thus was born the “straight” Spritz that is still found in some bars of Trieste and Udine.
With time the Aperitivo ritual of northern Italy spread to the rest of the country, and with it the variants of the original Spritz. Many Venetian towns had their own specific variant, and many interpretations of each kind. However, in the last decade the Aperol Spritz with Prosecco has become the most popular one; fresh, sparkling and light- the ideal early evening drink.
But the Spritz isn’t only an Italian phenomenon. Recently, both the Spritz and Aperol are starting to take hold in many different countries, including the US. For example, in the smash hit “Meet the Parents” starring Robert de Niro, Barbra Streisand, and Dustin Hoffman, the latter offers De Niro an Italian Spritz instead of his usual Tom Collins.

For the scariest holiday of the year – Halloween – Tim Laird and Herradura recommend the AppleDura, an easy-to-make recipe for party planners wanting to create a festive atmosphere at home. Think of Snow White’s poisoned apples with a twist, minus the poison, of course, as this cocktail will surely enchant guests with its delicious and unusual taste.
