Name: Army Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange peel.

Name: Arnie Palmer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ketel One Vodka', 'Lemonade', 'splash(es) Iced Tea']
Making: Pour Ketel One Vodka over ice in a Collins glass. Fill with lemonade and finish with a splash of iced tea.

Name: Arnie's Drink
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Mango Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build over cracked ice in an old fashioned glass.

Name: Arnold Schwarzenegger
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '3/4 oz. Calvados', "2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Blend with ice and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with lime and lemon.

Name: Around The World
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Cognac', '1 1/4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Creme de Noyeaux']
Making: Blend with 8 oz. of crushed ice until smooth and pour into a goblet.

Name: Around the World #2
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '1 oz. Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '6 slice(s) Cucumber Peeled', '1/2 oz. Yuzu Juice', '1/2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Partida Agave Nectar']
Making:
Muddle cucumber in the glass part of a Boston shaker, add ingredients shake with ice and strain in a chilled 9oz cocktail glass. Garnish with cucumber slice, edible orchid and pomegranate seeds dusted with easy leaf edible silver.
“This is a special cocktail recipe that I created which is wonderfully refreshing, clean and crisp with a very unique flavor.” – Anthony Alba, Mixologist, Liquidity Global, Las Vegas

Name: Arthur Tompkins
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Artillery
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Artillery Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Aruba
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. White Curacao', '1/2 Egg White', '1 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Orgeat Syrup']
Making: Shake well with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Aruba Rum Punch
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Myer's Rum", '1 oz. Mount Gay Barbados Rum', '1 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Pour into a hurricane glass with ice. Stir well. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Aruba Smash
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 oz. 7-Up', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Mix in a highball and serve over ice

Name: Asian Iced Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. White Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Blend with a cup of ice and pour into a cocktial glass. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Assassin
Ingredients: ["1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Mix and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Asterix
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Finlandia Vodka', '2/3 oz. Pisang Ambon', 'Sprite', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix with two ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: Asti Au Naturel
Ingredients: ['3 Mint Leaves', '1 piece(s) Brown Sugar', 'Cinzano Asti']
Making: Mix the mint leaves, sugar and lime together in a white wine glass. Pour over Cinzano Asti. Decorate with a sprig of mint and a lime wedge.

Name: Atlantic Sun
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Vodka', '2/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '2/3 oz. Monin Passion Fruit', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'dash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Shake ingredients and pour into a highball glass. Float the soda and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Atomic 7-7
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", 'Zima (Blue)', '1 splash(es) Seltzer Water']
Making: Pour Seagram's 7 in a shot glass and pour the Zima and the seltzer water into a highball glass. Light Seagram's 7 on fire and drop the flaming shot into the highball. Stir and enjoy. Tastes just like a 7-7 with more kick. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Atomic Cherries
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Everclear', '1 bottle(s) Maraschino Cherries']
Making: Drain the liquid from the bottle of cherries. Refill the bottle with Everclear and let soak for a month. Use the cherries to garnish drinks.

Name: Atomic Lokade
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Lemonade', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Add sugar to taste

Name: Attitude Adjuster
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Light Rum', '2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix together and serve in a highball glass.

Name: Attitude Adjustment
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Mix well with ice. Strain into a shot glass and shoot!

Name: Aunt Agatha
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '3 drop(s) Bitters']
Making: Pour into a rocks glass over ice cubes. Float Bitters and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Auntie
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Chivas Regal Scotch', '1/2 part(s) Amaretto']
Making: Mix together and serve in old fashioned glass.

Name: Aurum
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Aurum', '1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Aussie Mozzie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the orange juice over ice into a highball glass and carefully sink the creme de menthe. Lay back and let the mozzie bite ya!

Name: Austin's Love Juice
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Build all ingredients in order. Float the Chambord. Tell the lady not to swallow Austin's Love Juice too fast. It's sweet but it'll mess people up.

Name: Austrian Hussar
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Apricot Brandy', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with tonic water. Garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: Authentic Pina Colada
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Light Rum', '2 oz. Coco Lopez', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend with a cup of ice until smooth. Pour into a collins glass and garnish with a pineapple slice and a cherry.

Name: Autodafe
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Lime Juice', 'Soda Water']
Making: Mix vodka and lime juice in collins glass and fill with soda water.

Name: Autumn Gold
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vermont Gold Vodka', '2 oz. Irish Mist', 'Honey']
Making: In a rocks glass filled with crushed ice, add Vermont Gold and Irish Mist Liqueur. Drizzle a drop of honey on the top.

Name: Autumn In New York
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Zima (12 oz.)', '1 oz. Cognac (Preferably Remy Red)']
Making: Mix Remy and Zima. Gently shake and pour into a highball glass. Ice is optional

Name: Autumn's Bottoms Up
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Goldschlager', '2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake all ingredients except ginger ale in an ice filled shaker. Shake well then pour over ice in a pint glass. Top with ginger ale and stir. The ginger ale can be shaken upiwith the other igredients for those who prefer a more homogenous drink. Garnish with cherries.

Name: Aviation
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Bulldog Gin', '1/4 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '5 pinch(es) Sugar']
Making: Shake lemon juice with ice. Add sugar, Bulldog Gin and maraschino liqueur. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Aviation Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '4 dash(es) Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Avion Bloody Maria
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Avion Silver Tequila', '2 oz. Tomato Juice', '2 tsp. Horseradish', '1/2 oz. Worcestershire Sauce', '2 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice', '1 squirt(s) Lime Juice', 'Salt', 'Pepper']
Making: Combine Avion Tequila, tomato juice, lemon juice, Tabasco sauce and celery salt in a tall glass with ice. Stir. Garnish with a celery stalk and olives.

Name: Avion Caliente Viejo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Avion Anejo Tequila', '3/4 oz. Agave Nectar (Hot pepper infused)', '3 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Start by adding Avion Anejo, and hot pepper infused agave nectar syrup to a mixing glass filled with ice. Finish it off with a dash of orange bitters. Gently stir the cocktail. You don’t want to break up the spirit or add any chipped ice to it. Strain your cocktail into a glass filled with ice. Finish it off with an orange twist. And, there you have it! A variation on the Old Fashioned with a little bit of Mexican flair!

Name: Avion Chipotle Cocao Margarita
Ingredients: ['3 slice(s) Orange', '1 slice(s) Lemon', '1/4 oz. Agave Nectar', '2 oz. Avion Anejo Tequila', 'Cocoa Powder (unsweetened)', 'Chipotles Peppers (powder)', 'Granulated Sugar']
Making: In your mixing glass, add 3 orange slices, cut into moon shapes, and one lemon slice to up the acidity. Muddle the fruit to work out all of the natural juices and oils. Add a little bit of agave nectar to bring out the sweetness, and 2 hearty ounces of Avion Anejo. Fill the glass with ice and shake. To create the rim, mix equal parts cocoa and pearl or granular sugar. Then add a tiny bit of chipotle powder. Make sure you don’t over do it with the chipotle powder, or your mouth will be on fire! Rim the edge of the glass with a lemon and set it down in the chipotle cocoa mixture. Strain your margarita over ice.

Name: Avion El Humo de Mexico
Ingredients: ['2 tsp. Averna Bitters - Amaro', '1/2 oz. Noilly Prat Dry', '1/2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '2 oz. Avion Anejo Tequila', 'Mezcal']
Making: Pour two barspoons of Averna Italian Amaro over ice in your mixing glass. Next add Noilly Prat Dry Vermouth, St. Germain Elderflower Liqueur, and finish with Avinn Anejo. Stir to balance the cocktail without bruising it. Pour a bit of mezcal into your cocktail glass, swirl it around, and dump it out. Pour your cocktail into the glass, using a jeweled strainer. Take a grapefruit peel and flame it to blend all of the flavors. Rim the glass with the peel, and serve.

Name: Avion Elevated Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Avion Reposado Tequila', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass with a salted rim over fresh ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Avion Flying Pomegranate Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Avion Silver Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '3/4 oz. Orange Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Avion Kiwi Margarita
Ingredients: ['Kiwi', '1 tsp. Brown Sugar', '1 oz. Cointreau', 'Lime Juice', '2 oz. Avion Anejo Tequila']
Making: Muddle a handful of fresh kiwi in a pint glass to bring out the juices and flavor. Add brown sugar, Cointreau and fresh lime. Then, finish it off with Avion Anejo. Shake and strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. Garnish with a kiwi wheel.

Name: Avion La Tercera
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Vermouth (Bianco)', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Avion Reposado Tequila', 'Mezcal']
Making: Add lemon juice, Bianco Vermouth, Cointreau and Avion Reposado to your mixing glass. Add ice, and give it a good hard shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Using an atomizer, top your cocktail off with a spritz of mezcal.

Name: Avion Lemonade
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Avion Silver Tequila', '4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

Name: Avion Papaya Smash
Ingredients: ['Papaya', '1/4 oz. Agave Nectar', '1 1/2 oz. Avion Anejo Tequila', '1/2 oz. Aperol Orange Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Add a slice of fresh papaya and agave nectar to your mixing glass. The amount of nectar you add depends on how sweet you like your cocktails, but usually about a teaspoon will do the trick. Muddle to release the papaya flavor. Add remaining ingredients and shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a fresh slice of papaya.

Name: Avion Paradiso
Ingredients: ['3 wedge(s) Cucumber', '9 leaf(leaves) Mint', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Aloe Vera Juice', '2 oz. Avion Silver Tequila', '1 pinch(es) Salt']
Making: Add cucumber wedges, mint leaves, agave nectar and lime juice to your mixing glass, and muddle. Make sure to use a wooden muddler and a downward twisting force to get all of the flavors out of the cucumber and mint. Add Aloe Vera juice, Avion Silver, and a pinch of salt. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Avion Red Campana Margarita
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Avion Silver Tequila', '1 Red Pepper']
Making: Place a red bell pepper ring in your mixing glass, and gently press your muddler to the bottom of the glass. Don’t overly muddle. Pressing is enough to release the natural oils and flavors. Add remaining ingredients and shake with ice. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with a red pepper ring.

Name: Avion Rita Rioja
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 1/2 oz. Avion Reposado Tequila', 'Red Pepper', 'Cilantro Leaves']
Making: Rub the rim of a glass with a wedge of fresh lime and dip into some salt. Add some spice to your margarita by muddling a piece of red pepper and a little bit of cilantro to bring out their natural flavors. Add your key ingredient: Avion Reposado, and fresh lime juice and simple syrup. Then fill your mixing glass with ice. Give your cocktail a good shake to chill, and strain it into your salted glass. Then, garnish with a piece of red pepper and cilantro. Enjoy!

Name: Avion Watermelon Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Avion Silver Tequila', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '4 piece(s) Watermelon', '1 tsp. Agave Nectar']
Making: Muddle watermelon and agave in a mixing glass. Add remaining ingredients and shake with ice. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with a fresh watermelon wedge.

Name: Avispon Verde - "Green Hornet"
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

Name: Awesom Chandler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Orange Juice (To taste)', 'Cranberry Juice (To taste)']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: B and B
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Benedictine']
Making: Float brandy on top of Benedictine in a cordial glass.

Name: B M W
Ingredients: ['1/3 part(s) Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1/3 part(s) Irish Whiskey']
Making: Shake over ice and pour into a cocktail glass to serve.

Name: B S On The Rocks
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps (or Pear Schnapps)']
Making: Build in a rocks glass.

Name: B V D Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Applejack', '1 oz. Italian Vermouth']
Making: Stir in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: B-28
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps']
Making: Layer in order in a lowball glass.

Name: B-51 #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', '3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: B-55
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Tuaca']
Making: Layer in a shot glass (Kahlua at the bottom).

Name: B-M-W
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Whiskey']
Making: Pour over an ice filled old fashioned glass.

Name: B-Town Highball
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Silver Rum (Preferably Captain Morgan's Silver Rum)", '11 oz. Canada Dry']
Making: Put ice in a highball glass and squeeze in a wedge of lime. Drop in the glass and add the rum and the Canada Dry.

Name: B.A.G.
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey (Black Label)', '1 splash(es) Anisette', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Stir over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: B.C.B (Butter Chocolate Bliss)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Butterscotch Ripple Schnapps', 'Milk (Or cream)']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass.

Name: B.M.W.
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Layer in order in a highball.

Name: B.V.R.
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 can(s) Beer']
Making: Stir well with ice. Also known as Beast Vodka on the Rocks.

Name: Babbie's Special Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 tsp. Gin', '1 tbsp. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Baby Aspirin #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Baby Aspirine of Humbolt
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '5 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', "dash(es) Lime Juice (Preferably Rose's Lime Juice)"]
Making: Serve over ice in a chilled pint glass.

Name: Baby Fingers Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Gin', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Baby Guiness
Ingredients: ['4/5 oz. Kahlua', '1/5 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Pour the Kahlua in a shot glass and float the Irish cream with a spoon. It looks like a "baby" Guiness.

Name: Baby Jane
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Butter Shots', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', "2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream (Cookies 'n Cream flavour)"]
Making: Blend with ice and serve with a cherry on top.

Name: Baby Mama Drama
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Seagram's Gin", '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '2 oz. Alize Red Passion', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix and pour over crushed ice in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Baby V.O.X.
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tanqueray Gin', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix over ice and serve in a highball glass.

Name: Baby's Bottom
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Whiskey', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bacardi Beach
Ingredients: ['Bacardi Limon', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Putice in a cup and mix in Bacardi Limon tot 3/4 of the cup. Add Orange Juice. Mix and Drink.

Name: Bacardi Breeze
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: In a 16 oz. glass, mix two shots of Bacardi Limon, fill the glass 3/4 of the way with Mountain Dew and top off with orange juice. Serve with ice.

Name: Bacardi Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bacardi Coconut French Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Coconut Rum', '2 part(s) Vanilla Liqueur']
Making: Combine all cocktail ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and frothy. Pour into a chilled daiquiri glass with a shredded coconut rim.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry and Citrus - Flying Dragon
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '2 part(s) Lemonade', '2 part(s) Sprite']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice in a tall glass and garnish with a lime or kiwi wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry and Club Soda
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '3 part(s) Club Soda']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry and Ginger - Enter the Dragon
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1 part(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry and Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '3 part(s) Iced Tea']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry and Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '3 part(s) Lemonade']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry and Sparkling Water
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '3 part(s) Sparkling Water Citrus Flavoured']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry and Sprite
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '3 part(s) Sprite']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry and Tonic
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '3 part(s) Tonic Water']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Berry Burst
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1/2 part(s) Di Saronno Oringinale Amaretto', '3 part(s) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 part(s) Grenadine', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients into a shaker filled halfway with ice. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. Garnish with an orange wedge and raspberries.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Dragon Bite
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1/2 part(s) Monin Lychee Syrup', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '2 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients into a shaker filled halfway with ice. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon wedge and 3 fresh raspberries speared.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Dragon Serum
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1 1/2 part(s) Orange Juice', '1 1/2 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice in a tall glass and garnish with an orange wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Dragons Breath
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1 part(s) Monin Mango Syrup', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 part(s) Orange Juice', 'Sprite']
Making: Combine all ingredients (except SPRITE) into a shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Dreaming Dragon
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1/2 Monin Pomegranate Syrup', '1 part(s) Lime Juice', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup']
Making: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Shake well and strain into a martini cocktail glass with a sugar rim. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Green Dragon
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '3 part(s) Lychee Juice', '1 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice in a tall glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Lime Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1 1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Combine all ingredients (except club soda) into a shaker filled halfway with ice. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with club soda. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Limeade
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1 1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 part(s) Grenadine', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Combine all ingredients (except lemon-lime soda) into a shaker filled halfway with ice. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with lime wedge and cherry.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Long Island
Ingredients: ['3/4 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '3/4 part(s) Vodka', '3/4 part(s) Bombay Sapphire Gin', '3/4 part(s) Triple Sec', '3/4 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup', 'Cola']
Making: Shake all ingredients except coke with ice. Strain into a tall glass filled with fresh ice, then top with coke. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Madras
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '2 wedge(s) Lime', '2 slice(s) Orange', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Muddle fruit in a highball glass. Add rum, cranberry, and ice. Stir before serving.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Mojito
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup', '4 wedge(s) Lime', '8 Mint Leaves', '3 Strawberries Hulled and Sliced', 'Club Soda']
Making: In a shaker, muddle 3 lime wedges, simple syrup, mint leaves and 2 strawberries. Fill glass with ice and add BACARDI DRAGON BERRY. Shake and pour back into glass, top off with additional ice and fill with club soda. Garnish with a mint sprig, lime wedge and a fresh strawberry.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Nectar
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1/2 part(s) Bacardi Coconut Rum', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1 part(s) Lime Juice', '4 Blackberry (ies)', '4 wedge(s) Lime', '4 Raspberries']
Making: Muddle (3 of each) raspberries, blackberries and lime wedges with simple syrup in a shaker. Add BACARDI DRAGON BERRY, BACARDI COCONUT, fresh lime juice and ice. Shake and strain into a glass of crushed ice. Garnish with 1 lime wedge and 3 berries speared.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Pacific Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1 part(s) Bacardi Razz Rum', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 part(s) Orange Juice', '1 part(s) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/4 part(s) Grenadine']
Making: Combine all ingredients (except grenadine) into a shaker filled halfway with ice. Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. Pour grenadine in and let settle to the bottom of drink. Garnish with a pineapple and lime wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Palmer
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1 1/2 part(s) Lemonade', '1 1/2 part(s) Iced Tea']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice in a tall glass and garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Poolside Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '2 part(s) Iced Tea', '1 1/2 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1/2 part(s) Peach Schnapps', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 part(s) Grenadine']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a shaker filled halfway with ice. Shake well and strain into a glass with ice. Garnish with lemon wedge and mint sprig.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Shanghai Shake
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '2 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1/4 part(s) Almond Extract', '3/4 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 part(s) Orange Curacao']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a tall glass filled with fresh ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Sparkle
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1/2 part(s) Monin Lychee Syrup', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice', 'Martini and Rossi Prosecco']
Making: Fill shaker 2/3 of ice and pour in all ingredients Shake well and strain into a glass filled with ice. Top with M&R Prosrosecco. Garnish with a lemon wedge and sugar cane stick.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Spicy Lime
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '2 wedge(s) Lime', 'Ginger Beer']
Making: Muddle lime wedges in a tall glass. Fill with ice. Add BACARDI DRAGON BERRY. Top with ginger beer.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Strawberry Basil Lemonade
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup', '3 piece(s) Basil', '3 Strawberries Hulled and Sliced', 'Sprite']
Making: In a shaker, muddle 2 basil leaves, fresh lime juice, simple syrup and 2 strawberries. Fill with ice. Add BACARDI DRAGON BERRY and lemonade. Shake well then strain into a glass filled with ice. Garnish with a strawberry, lemon wedge and basil leaf.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Wako Pirate
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1 part(s) Fee Brothers Falernum', '1 part(s) Pink Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 part(s) Strawberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass.Garnish with a slice of pink grapefruit.

Name: Bacardi Felas
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '2 part(s) Apple Juice', '1 part(s) Soda']
Making: Mix with ice in a tall glass.

Name: Bacardi Fizz
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bacardi Lemon', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '7-Up']
Making: Shake and strain into a highball glass. Watch it fizz.

Name: Bacardi Gold
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Gold', '4 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix in a tall glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Bacardi Grand Melon Bubbly Love
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Melon Rum', '3 part(s) Martini and Rossi Dry Vermouth', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a chilled flute glass. Garnish with a watermelon slice.

Name: Bacardi O And Sprite
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi O', 'Sprite or Tonic']
Making: Pour Bacardi O into a lowball glass. Fill with Sprite and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Bacardi Pina Colada
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coconut Cream', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice (Unsweetened)', '1 1/2 oz. Bacardi White Rum']
Making: Frappe and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bacardi Rum Runner
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake over ice. Strain and serve in a highball glass. (If you are really daring - float 151 on top after shaking)

Name: Bacardi Special
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'dash(es) Grenadine', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake all but rum with ice until cold. Add rum and shake again. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bacardi Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Limon', '1 part(s) Orange Juice', '2 part(s) Mountain Dew Game Fuel']
Making: Mix together in a cocktail glass. It has a very nice tropical taste, and a nice neon orange color.

Name: Bacardi Tea
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Bacardi Limon', '1/2 cup(s) Iced Tea lime flaver']
Making: Mix and pour into a highball glass - over ice or just straight.

Name: Bachelor's Bait
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '3 dash(es) Orange Bitters', 'dash(es) Grenadine', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Back in the Saddle
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup * infused with Lapsang Souchong tea', '1/10 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making:
In a mixing glass add all ingredients with ice and shake hard for ten seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist or candied lemon peel.
* Lapsang souchong tea is an Asian tea that is super smoky with notes of leather and tobacco, reminding me of the smell of a new saddle. This tea can be found at specialty food stores and Asian markets. In a sauce pan on the stove add 2 cups sugar to two cups water to a boil. Add 8 tea bags or one cup of loose leaf lapsang souchong tea, reduce heat and let simmer for twenty minutes. After sugar has dissolved, remove from heat and let steep until mixture is cool. Remove tea bags expressing liquid or strain tea leaves out, bottle and place in a cooler. Should keep for two weeks.
Mixologist, Mindy Kucan note:"This cocktail has global inspiration with local application. It has only three ingredients, but a complex range of scents and flavors emerge once they are combined."

Name: Back Street Banger
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Backfire On The Freeway
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '6 oz. Guinness']
Making: Drop a double shot of 151 into a beer mug of Guinness and chug immediately.

Name: Backyard Dawg
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '5 oz. Ginger Ale', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Add all liquors and grenadine to a shaker with crushed ice and shake for 30 seconds. Strain into a tall glass with cubed ice. Add the Ginger Ale and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Bad Attitude
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients together with equal parts of each juice and pour into a tall glass.

Name: Bad Habit
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Baha Fog
Ingredients: ['1 Beer (Corona)', '1/4 Lime', 'Tequila']
Making: Open a Corona and fill it to the top with tequila. Squeeze a 1/4 lime on top (optional). Do NOT mix or shake beer before drinking!!! Just guzzle it down in one drink. Fun to race an friend.

Name: Bahama Basil Smash
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 part(s) Tommy Bahama White Sand Rum', '2 part(s) Sour Mix', '3 piece(s) Blackberry (ies)', '4 sprig(s) Basil', '4 slice(s) Ginger', '1/4 part(s) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Muddle blackberries, basil and ginger in a mixing glass. Add remaining ingredients, shake well and strain into a mixing glass. Top with a splash of lemon-lime soda. Garnish with an orchid.

Name: Bahama Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Banana Creme Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Apricot Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1/4 oz. Honey', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend well with a couple of ice cubes . Pour over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with orange, cherry etc.

Name: Bahama Mama
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake all ingredients and strain over ice in an old fashioned glass.

Name: Bahama Mama #1
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Coconut Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 Lemon Juice', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over cracked ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a strawberry or a cherry.

Name: Bahama Mama #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Nassau Orange', '1 1/4 oz. Ronrico White Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Bahama Mama #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Cherry Heering Liqueur']
Making: Shake and strain into a large glass or mug. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a cherry.

Name: Bahama Mama #4
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Rum (Preferably Don Lorenzo Bahama's rum)", '1 1/2 oz. Coconut Rum (Preferably Don Lorenzo Coconut Rum)', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', "1/2 oz. Grenadine (Preferably Todhunter's)"]
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of lemon.

Name: Bahama Mama #5
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grenadine', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Banana Creme Liqueur', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Add ingredents in a highball glass and fill with pineapple juice.

Name: Bahama Mamas #2
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", "1 oz. Myer's Rum", '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '3/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. This is the recipe served at Red Lobster restaurants.

Name: Bahama Sunrise
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Don Lorenzo Coconut Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix well with ice and serve in a festive glass. Add a pineapple and cherry garnish.

Name: Bahamas Highball
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. French Vermouth', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with tonic water. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Bahamas Rum Punch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 splash(es) Campari', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into a large glass and add equal parts orange and pineapple juice. Colour it red with Campari.

Name: Bahamas Sunshine
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Nassau Royale Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass or serve on the rocks.

Name: Bahia Cooler
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '2 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Shake and strain into a collins glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Bailey's and Amaretto
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Bailey's Banana Colada (bbc)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Rum (Preferably Dark Rum)', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 Banana', '3 oz. Pina Colada Mix']
Making: Put banana and liqueur into blender until it is a thick paste. Add Bailey's Irish cream, pina colada mix and rum. Blend well then add 1 cup of ice and blend again until smooth.

Name: Bailey's On The Rocks (fancy?)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Orange', 'Cocoa Powder']
Making: Coat the rim of a cocktail glass with the fresh orange. Apply powdered cocoa. Add the Bailey's over an ice cube.

Name: Bailey's Shake
Ingredients: ['Ice Cream', '3 part(s) Milk', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur (Or Cointreau)', '1 Banana (Optional)', 'Banana Milk Shake Mix']
Making: Put the ice cream, milk, banana milkshake mix and banana in a blender and mix. Add the Bailey's Irish Cream and Drambuie or Cointreau and mix until smooth yet leave it with a thick consistency.

Name: Baileys And Coke
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Pour over ice in a lowball glass (pour the Bailey's in first or it gets too foamy). Tastes just like a coke float.

Name: Baileys Espresso Chill
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Espresso (Double, cooled)', '1 2/3 oz. Milk']
Making: Place all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously. Strain into a tall slim glass. Garnish with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

Name: Baileys Fiddlers Elbow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. White Cacao', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '2 tsp. Chocolate powder', 'scoop(s) Ice Cream']
Making: Shake all ingredients vigorously. Strain into a cocktail glass and sink a single cherry to the bottom. Garnish with chocolate powder and real chocolate shavings.

Name: Baileys Iced Latte
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Coffee', '1 oz. Milk', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Cream']
Making: Mix the ice, Baileys, coffee, milk and sugar. Stir it well and pour into a tall highball glass. Add cream on top of the cocktail and sprinkle with chocolate shavings. Garnish with a wafer.

Name: Baileys Irish Ice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys with a hint of Mint Chocolate', '1 oz. Coffee (Iced)', '1 tbsp. Espresso', '2 scoop(s) Ice Cream (Guinness Gelato or a Coffee Ice Cream)']
Making: Add Baileys with a hint of Mint Chocolate, iced coffee and Guinness gelato to a blender. Blend on high with 1 cup of chip ice until smooth. Top with espresso, a mint sprig and whipped cream.

Name: Bairn
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Balalaika
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bald Taco
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Everclear', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass.

Name: Bali Hai
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Aguardiente', '2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Orgeat Syrup', '1 tsp. Grenadine', 'Champagne (Or sparkling wine)']
Making: Shake ingredients (except champagne) with cracked ice and pour into a collins glass. Fill with champagne.

Name: Ball Banger
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Ouzo', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Ball Or Head
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. French Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Italian Vermouth', 'dash(es) Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Ballet Russe Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis', '4 dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Ballroom Ditz
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Kool-Aid grape', '1 oz. Seltzer Water', 'Strawberry Syrup']
Making: Build in the order listed. Mix well and add a cherry for garnish.

Name: Ballylickey Bait
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Irish Whiskey', 'Sparkling Water (Cold)', 'Honey']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the honey and a little water until it dissolves. Add ice cubes and whiskey and fill with sparkling water. Stir gently and garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: Balmoral
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Balmoral Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Rouge)', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Blanc)', '3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir well with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Baltimore Bracer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Anisette', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Baltimore Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jamaica Rum', '1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Madeira', '1 Egg', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '3/4 cup(s) Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

Name: Baltimore Zoo #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Beer']
Making: Build over ice in a large glass or mug.

Name: Baltimore Zoo #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Rum', '3/4 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', "3/4 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '3/4 oz. Grenadine', '3/4 oz. Sour Mix', '3/4 oz. Root Beer', '3/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Build in a large glass or mug and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Baltimore Zoo #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Beer']
Making: Mix and serve in a highball glass over ice.

Name: Bam-Bam
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a hurricane glass. Fill with milk, stir and serve with a fruit garnish.

Name: Bamboo Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Sherry', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters (Optional)']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

Name: Banana Banshee
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Banana Bird
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '2 tsp. Creme de Banane', '2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Double Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Banana Bliss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Banana Colada
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 Banana', '8 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend together and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Banana Cow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 1/2 oz. Cream', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a banana slice and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

Name: Banana Cream Pie #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '4 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1/2 Banana']
Making: Blend until smooth and serve in a collins glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a banana slice.

Name: Banana Daiquiri #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 tbsp. Triple Sec', '1 Banana', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice at a low speed for five seconds and then at a high speed until firm. Pour into a champagne flute. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Banana Daiquiri #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '3 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Banana Daiquiri #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1/4 Banana (Sliced)']
Making: Blend with cracked ice until smooth and pour into a chilled wine glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Banana Daquiri #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 Banana', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Blend with ice and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Banana Di Amore
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto Di Amore', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a red wine glass. Garnish with orange and banana slices.

Name: Banana Dream #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream (Chilled)', '1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1 tbsp. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 Banana (Diced)']
Making: Blend with 1/2 cup crushed ice at maximum speed until smooth. Serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Banana Foster
Ingredients: ['2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 Banana']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a large brandy snifter. Sprinkle cinnamon on top.

Name: Banana Frosty Snowman
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Banana Rum', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 tbsp. Coconut Cream', '1/2 cup(s) Pineapple chunks', '1 Banana sliced', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Blend with ice in blender until smooth. Serve in a highball glass with a fruit garnish.

Name: Banana Italiano
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Galliano', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Blend with cracked ice until smooth and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Banana Kow
Ingredients: ['1 Banana', '1 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Coconut Cream', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Blend with ice in a blender and pour in a 10 oz highball glass. Garnish with a slice of banana and a cherry.

Name: Banana Mudslide
Ingredients: ['1/4 part(s) Kahlua', '1/4 part(s) Carolans Irish Cream Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Hiram Walker Creme de Banana', '1/2 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '1 part(s) Milk']
Making: Add ice and blend.

Name: Banana Nut Bread
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Banana Creme Liqueur', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Mix ingredients in shaker over ice. Shake well. Strain in rocks glass over ice.

Name: Banana Nut Patty
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Banana Creme Liqueur', '2 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Pour into highball glass filled with ice. Shake and strain into cocktail glass. This is more like a dessert drink. Garnish it with a cookie with you like.

Name: Banana Nuts
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '12 oz. Pepsi Cola']
Making: Pour the Seagram's 7 in a shot glass and the Pepsi in a highball glass. Shoot the Seagram's 7, then drink the Pepsi.

Name: Banana O'Riley
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '2 oz. Banana Creme Liqueur', '4 oz. Cream', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with slice of orange. Maxim Magazine pg. 92 #63 March 2003

Name: Banana Pepper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '6 oz. Cola (Your favourite)']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass, and slowly mix with the cola. Makes a Dr Pepper type taste with a hint of banana.

Name: Banana Popsicle #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a shaker adding equal parts of orange juice and pineapple juice to the spirits. Shake and strain over ice cubes into a collins glass.

Name: Banana Punch #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 tsp. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Pour into a collins glass over crushed ice and fill with carbonated water. Stir and garnish with banana slices and mint sprigs.

Name: Banana Republic
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice Freshly Squeezed', 'Soda Banana']
Making: Put the lime juice into a highball glass. Add rum and fill with banana soda. This drink was born out of necessity one evening on the Honduran island of Utila when we wanted Cuba Libres but had only banana soda rather than cola. It was such a hit that it ended up on the menu of at least one bar in town. Honduran banana soda tastes a little like cream soda. In the United States banana soda can be found at some Caribbean and Latin American grocery stores though some of it is artifically flavored and tastes terrible. If banana soda is not available or if the only banana soda available tastes bad, banana liqueur combined with cream soda or 7-Up might work. In Honduras we used Flor de Cana a light brown rum but variety of rum will do.

Name: Banana Rum Cream
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Banana Rum Frappe
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Blend with cracked ice until smooth and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Banana Sandwich
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/6 oz. Rum Cream Liqueur']
Making: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Banana Slip
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 1/2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a cordial glass.

Name: Banana Slushee
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Bar Mix']
Making: Blend with 16 oz. of ice until the mixture is slushy.

Name: Banana Split
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Banana Creme Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream']
Making: Combine ingredients in a blender and mix to milkshake consistency. Pour into a cocktail glass as an after dinner/dessert drink. Top with whipped cream and a cherry…also good with a bit of chocolate liqueur drizzled over the top of the whipped cream.

Name: Banana Split #3
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Cream', '1/4 oz. Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Layer the first three ingredients in a shot glass (Banana liqueur at the bottom). Then add the chocolate liqueur: it should sink to the bottom.

Name: Banana Split #5
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Vanilla Schnapps']
Making: Mix together over ice, strain into a pony glass or a shot glass. Garnish with a stemless cherry.

Name: Banana-Berry
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '2 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Milk']
Making: Pour creme de banane over ice in a high ball glass. Fill to the top with milk and add grenadine.

Name: Banana-berry-bash
Ingredients: ['1/2 Banana', '4 Strawberries', '8 Pineapple chunks', "1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Crème de Strawberry', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Blend all ingredients with ice to desired thinkness and serve in a highball glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.

Name: Bananalyzer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Milk', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour liquor, ice and Coke to 3/4 full into a collins glass and fill to the top with milk.

Name: Banff Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Kirsch', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Bang Your Head On The Bedpost
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour all alcohol into highball glass over ice and add juice. Stir.

Name: Bangkok
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Benedictine']
Making: Pour Mekhong and the rest of the ingredients into a mixing glass. Add ice and stir for 35-40 revolutions. Strain into a chilled martini-cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist. Based on the Manhattan.

Name: Bangkok Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '2 part(s) Tequila Reposado', '2 part(s) Pineapple Juice', 'Pineapple foam', '1 pinch(es) Salt Maldon', '1 pinch(es) Pepper Aleppo']
Making: Shake and serve up in a margarita glass and garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Bangled Tiger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Bannana Split
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butterscotch Ripple Schnapps', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Light Cream', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao dark', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake all ingredients except dark crème de cacao and grenadine until foamy. Pour into a hurrican glass. Drizzle the crème de cacao down one side of the glass and the grenedine down the opposite and serve.

Name: Bannockburn
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', 'dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', 'Tomato Juice']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Banshee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Barbados Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend the pineapple juice with a cup of ice. Pour into a cocktail glass, add the rest of the ingredients and stir.

Name: Barbados Planter's Punch
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gold Rum', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and pour into a chilled collins glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, a slice of banana, a maraschino cherry and sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Barbados Punch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a lime slice and a pineapple wedge.

Name: Barbados Sunrise
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix Bacardi Rum and Blue Curacao together. Set aside. Pour the grenadine into a Collins glass and fill with ice. Add the orange juice leaving room at the top. Pour the Bacardi Rum and Blue curacao mixture slowly over the top giving it a layered look. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry.

Name: Barbara
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Barbarella
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Sambuca (White)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

Name: Barbarosa
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Coca Cola']
Making: Mix and serve chilled in a old fashioned glass. Do not use ice but a drop of lemon juice or a slice of lemon may be added.

Name: Barbary Coast #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Barbary Coast #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. White Rum', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Barbed Wire #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Pernod Absinthe', '1/2 tsp. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Barbican
Ingredients: ['3 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1 oz. Passion Fruit Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Barbie Doll
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Pour over ice. Stir and enjoy!

Name: Bare Back
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '1/2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '2 dash(es) Orange Flower Water']
Making:
Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and shake with a Boston shaker. Strain into a cocktail or martini glass and garnish with an edible flower or orange zest.
Mixologist, Mindy Kucan note:"Like all great drinks this one has a top, middle and bottom note. Deceptively simple, it satisfies with aroma and taste and is pleasant on the eye."

Name: Barefoot Tom
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jefferson's Bourbon", '6 Grapes Concord', '1 dash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Muddle concord grapes in a rocks glass. Add ice, Jefferson's & simple syrup. Serve on the rocks or strain and serve up.

Name: Barely Legal
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 Coca Cola', '1/2 Sprite']
Making: Fill highball glass with ice. Add the Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Rum then the grenadine. Fill glass with equal parts Coca Cola and Sprite. Stir and serve with a lime wedge garnish if desired.

Name: Barking Spider
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila (Preferably Tarantula Azul Tequila)', '1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '3/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'dash(es) Triple Sec', 'dash(es) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Serve over ice in a collins glass, or blend for a frozen version of this drink. This drink has been brought to you by: Ben of the Holiday Inn Tanglewood Lounge.

Name: Barlely Legal
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Glenlivet Scotch Whisky', '2 oz. Perrier']
Making: Mix and serve over cubed ice in old fashioned glass. Garnish with a twist of lime.

Name: Barn Door #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with pineapple juice. Float the cranberry juice.

Name: Barn Door #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Cointreau', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Barney Snatch
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients except pineapple juice together over ice in a highball glass. Add pineapple juice, stir and serve. Use a fruit garnish, if desired.

Name: Barnum
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '4 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '4 dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Baron Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Baron Saturday
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Sugar Syrup', 'Soda Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients except soda water with ice. Strain and pour into a large old-fashioned glass half filled with crushed ice Fill with soda water. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Baronial
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Lillet', '3/4 oz. Gin', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '2 dash(es) Cointreau']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

Name: Barricade Cocktail
Ingredients: ["2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Sugar Syrup', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1 tsp. Vinegar (Balsamic)', '1 pinch(es) Salt', '1/2 Egg White', '8 Raspberries', 'Champagne']
Making: Crush the raspberries in an empty shaker. Add the gin, lime juice, sugar syrup, raspberry liqueur and vinegar.Shake without ice, then shake with ice. Fine-strain into a Classic martin-cocktail glass glass. Top with champagne.

Name: Barrier Breaker
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '2 tsp. Brown Creme de Cacao', '4 oz. Coffee (Cold)']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug filled with crushed ice. Stir.

Name: Barstow
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sour Mix', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Mix alcohol and sour mix together in a shaker. Pour over ice in a highball glass. Top with coca cola and serve with a lime twist.

Name: Bartender
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sherry', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', 'dash(es) Grand Marnier']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bartender's Rootbeer
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '3 oz. Soda Water', '1 oz. Cola']
Making: Build in a highball glass and stir well.

Name: Barton Special
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Applejack', '1/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Scotch']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes.

Name: Basic Bill
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Rouge)', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Basil
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. 4 Copas Blanco', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. 4 Copas Organic Agave Nectar', '4 Basil Leaves']
Making: Muddle shake and strain into a short glass.

Name: Basil Hayden Wish
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Basil Hayden Bourbon', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Strawberry Passion Schnapps', '1/2 part(s) Sour Mix', '2 part(s) Champagne']
Making:
Shake all but champagne and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Top with champagne and serve with a small fresh strawberry on the rim.
You may have seen what the most elite trendsetters are wearing at NYC Fashion Week, but did you see what luxury cocktails they were sipping at the bar? At the Cynthia Rowley show on Feb. 16, a sexy crowd of guests, stylists and models sipped the Basil Hayden Wish - a tangy, passion-colored cocktail inspired by the rich red hues and wishbone shape featured in Rowley's Fall 2009 collection.
Tailored specifically for Rowley, the Basil Hayden Wish embodies her assertive, whimsical spirit. The cocktail is a refreshing twist on the typical Fashion Week beverage staples - champagne or vodka - and is sure to become the choice cocktail for the 'It' crowd...starting a few trends of its own.

Name: Basil Hayden's Bubbly
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Basil Hayden Bourbon', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour Basil Hayden into a champagne glass and fill the rest with champagne. Garnish with an Orange Twist or a Cherry.

Name: Basil Hayden's Refund Spice
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Basil Hayden Bourbon', '1 tsp. Honey Syrup', '1 tsp. Vinegar (Raspberry)', 'Grapefruit Soda']
Making: Add Basil Hayden's Bourbon, honey syrup and raspberry vinegar over ice in a Collins glass and stir. Top with grapefruit soda. Garnish with a grapefruit peel. The cocktail combines the spicy, trademark finish of Basil Hayden’s Bourbon with sweet honey syrup, tangy raspberry vinegar and tart grapefruit juice to make the perfect cocktail to end tax season.

Name: Basin Street
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bastardized Lychee Chu-hi
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Lychee Liqueur', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Bastardo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '2 dash(es) Bitters', 'Club Soda']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with Club Soda.

Name: Bat Bite
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Batida Abaci
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cachaca', '4 oz. Pineapple (Chunks)', '1/2 tsp. Granulated Sugar']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a wine glass.

Name: Batida de Pina
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Light Rum', '2/3 cup(s) Pineapple (crushed and preferably fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Blend with cracked ice until smooth and pour into a chilled double old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Batida Mango
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cachaca', '4 oz. Mango (Fresh and Chopped)', '2 tsp. Granulated Sugar']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of crushed ice until smooth and pour into a wine glass.

Name: Batida Morango
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cachaca', '5 Strawberries (Very Ripe)', '1/2 tsp. Granulated Sugar']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of crushed ice until smooth and pour into a wine glass.

Name: Batshit
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Put one scoop of ice cream into a chilled collins glass (softer ice cream works better) and pour the rum over it. Top up the glass with orange juice and give it a stir until it turns milkshakey in consistency... ENJOY!!

Name: Battery Operated Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', 'Orange Juice', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Fill highball glass with ice. Add the alcohol and finish with splash of orange juice and grapefruit juice.

Name: Bay Blue
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao', '2 oz. 7-Up', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour the vodka, the schnapps and the 7-up in a highball glass. Then add in slowly the cranberry juice. Float the blue buracao on top. If done right you'll have a nice multi-coloured drink.

Name: Bay Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with pineapple juice. Add a splash of cranberry juice.

Name: Bay Breeze #2
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Coconut Rum", '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients thoroughly in a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with fruit (pineapple, orange, or lime). Add a cherry sip stick and serve.

Name: Bay City Bomber
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Blend all except 151 rum with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Float 151 rum and garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Bay Horse
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Bayard Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Raspberry Syrup', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with sparkling water and garnish with fresh raspberries.

Name: Bayberry
Ingredients: ['1/2 Malibu Rum', '1/2 Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill cocktail glass with ice. Add Malibu to half-way mark. Finish off with cranberry juice.

Name: Bayou Self
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix Captain Morgan's, butterscotch schnapps and 4 oz pineapple juice with ice. Pour into glass and top with grenadine. Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple slice.

Name: Bayou Slime
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Cruzan Black Strap Rum', '6 Mint Leaves', "1/2 part(s) Syrup Fee Brother's Spiced Cordial", '1 Egg White']
Making: Muddle mint leaves and syrup together, making sure to crush the mint leaves. Place all ingredients into a shaker and shake until well-chilled and frothy. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with additional crushed mint leaves. If you can’t make it to the bayou, this will be the next best thing.

Name: Bazooka Bomber
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Banana Creme Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine over ice in a tumbler.

Name: BB Gun
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime Cordial', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Pour into a frosted collins glass and enjoy!

Name: BBC
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2/3 oz. Banana Creme Liqueur', 'Pina Colada Mix']
Making: Blend with crushed ice and serve into a cocktail glass.

Name: BDAZZZLER
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake vodka, peach schnapps and grenadine. Pour into a chilled collins glass half filled with ginger ale.

Name: Bea Arthur's Underpants
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Surge Energy Drink (or Mountain Dew)', '2 oz. Vodka', '1 can(s) Beer (Preferably Pat Blue Ribbin Beer)', 'dash(es) Honey']
Making: Stir in a glass and chug.

Name: Beach Blanket Blen
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Midori', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix together and serve on ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Beach Blanket Blen NY Style
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Midori', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix all together and serve on the rocks in a cocktail glass.

Name: Beach Bum
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix over ice, fill the glass with sweet and sour and add splash of cranberry.

Name: Beach Bum's Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Pina Colada Mix', '3/4 oz. White Rum', '1/4 Banana', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 splash(es) Cream']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a paper umbrella.

Name: Beach Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Papaya Nectar (or 1/4 Cup Papayas)']
Making: Frappe and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Beach Cruiser
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Beach Haus
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix the spirits in a cocktail glass and top up with pineapple juice.

Name: Beach Peach
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '2 oz. Riunite Natural Peach Wine', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Beach Pleasures
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix alcohol ingredients over ice in a tall glass. Top with pineapple juice.

Name: Beach Roaming Buffalo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 dash(es) Grenadine', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Stir over ice in a tall glass. Fill with lemon-lime soda and add a dash of grenadine. Garnish with an orange wedge.

Name: Beachbum
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass rimmed with sugar and lime.

Name: Beachcomber #1
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. White Rum', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass.

Name: Beachcomber #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '6 Strawberries', '1 Banana', '1/2 oz. Coconut Milk', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Frappe and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with cinnamon.

Name: Beachcomber #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Beachcomber Bay Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beachcomber Spiced Rum', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Serve over ice.

Name: Beachcomber Classic
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beachcomber Spiced Rum', '3 oz. Cola']
Making: Serve over ice. Garnish with lime.

Name: Beachcomber Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beachcomber Coconut Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Serve over ice in a hurricane glass.

Name: Beachcomber Daiquiri #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beachcomber Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Serve over ice in a hurricane glass.

Name: Beachcomber Hurricane
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Amaretto Di Amore', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Beachcomber Spiced Rum']

Name: Beachcomber Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beachcomber Coconut Rum', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']

Name: Beachcomber's Gold

Name: Beachomber Batida

Name: Beadlestone Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Scotch']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Beal's Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Scotch']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Beam And 7
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '4 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Combine over ice into a highball glass.

Name: Beam Me Up Scotty
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Scotch']
Making: Layer over the back of a spoon in a stemmed glass.

Name: Beam'N Squirt

Name: Beapper
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '12 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Pour Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey and Dr. Pepper over ice into a tall glass.

Name: Bearded Clam

Name: Bearnakid

Name: Beast Vodka on the Rocks

Name: Beauty On The Beach
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 tbsp. Grand Marnier', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']

Name: Beauty Spot Cocktail

Name: Beckalishus

Making: Mix vodka, sweet and sour mix and Sprite in a highball glass. Add preferred amount of Bacardi Limon. Add a splash of lemon juice to taste. Garnish with lemon and lime slices. DRINK UP and enjoy with the best of friends!!! :)

Name: Bed and Breakfast
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '6 oz. Milk', 'Breakfast Cereal (Preferably Cheerios)']
Making: Add vodka and Kahlua to a nice bowl of Cheerios. You got co-co puffs with a kick and have a nice day!

Name: Bed of Roses

Making: Soak honeycomb in a champagne flute with Buffalo Trace and muddle. Fill rest of glass with champagne.

Name: Bee Stinger

Name: Bee's Kiss

Name: Bee's Knees Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Honey']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Beeaauu's Rum and Coke
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mount Gay Barbados Rum', "2 oz. Myer's Rum", '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '6 oz. Coca Cola', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]

Name: Beer -n- Limon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 bottle(s) Beer (Corona is the best for this one)']
Making: Pour the beer into a fozen glass mug and stir in the rum. Enjoy!

Name: Beer And Tea
Ingredients: ['1/2 can(s) Beer', '1/2 can(s) Iced Tea (Nestea)']
Making: Pour the beer in a highball glass, fill with the tea.

Name: Beer Buster
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka (100 Proof)', '1 bottle(s) Beer (Ice cold)', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce (Or to taste)']

Name: Beer Wolf

Name: Beetlejuice

Name: Before Dawn
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Honey Buckwheat', '1 1/2 oz. Partida Anejo Tequila', '1/2 oz. Cherry Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Pink Grapefruit Juice']
Making:
Pour all the ingredients in a mixing glass and stir until the honey dissolves completely. Add ice and shake. Serve in a Margarita glass and garnish with an orange twist and a spiced cherry.
Sweetness, tanginess, fruit and tequila along with a flavorful honey coexist in perfect harmony in this fabulous creation

Name: Beggars Tea
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Vodka', '2 quart(s) Iced Tea']
Making: Mix well and pour over ice into collins glasses. Garnish with lemon.

Name: Begola
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Smirnoff Raspberry Vodka', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Gatorade blue']
Making: Pour Smirnoff Raspberry Vodka, then Blue Gatorade, then orange juice into a highball glass. Use a fruit garnish, if desired.

Name: Beige Russian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tia Maria', 'Chocolate Milk']

Name: Bela Vaca The Cute Cow

Making: Stir Cachaça and Coffee Liqueur together in a rocks glass, add ice, and then float the cream on top.

Name: Belfast Carbomb #2

Making: Pour Kahlua into a shot glass and top with Bailey's and Jameson (a little more Bailey's Irish Cream than Jameson whiskey). Drop the full shot glass (torpedo) into the Guinness. Chug, chug, chug immediately. Tastes like Yoo-Hoo.

Name: Bellamy Scotch Sour
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Lemon Juice', '6 oz. Scotch', '1 tsp. Honey', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Frappe and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with ginger.

Name: Belles Of St. Mary's
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bellini
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Champagne', '1 part(s) Peach Schnapps', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a champagne glass.

Name: Bellinski
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Peach Vodka', '3 oz. Peaches (In puree or mashed)', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', 'Champagne (Brut)']

Name: Belmont Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Raspberry Syrup', '3/4 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Belmont Stakes
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gold Rum', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Grenadine']

Making: Shake and serve over cubed ice into a highball. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Belvedere St Clements Punch

Making: Mix in a punch glass and garnish with an orange peel and a lemon wedge.

Name: Bend Me Over

Name: Bend Me Over Slammer

Making: Chill and strain into small rocks glass. Top with club soda. Place bev-nap on top. Give it one good hard slam (it'll fizz) and shoot. YUM!!! I sell TONS of these!!

Making: Put the alcohol in first, then the half bottle of Hooch and then the half can of Red Bull. Top up with cranberry juice to about 1cm (1/2 inch) below the top of the glass. Enjoy the Benelyn tasting goodness.

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes.

Name: Bermuda Cocktail

Name: Bermuda Rose
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 tsp. Apricot Brandy', '1 1/2 tsp. Grenadine']

Name: Bermuda Rum Swizzle
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Gosling's Black Seal Rum", "1 oz. Gosling's Gold Rum", '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
