Name: Bermuda Torch
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Gosling's Gold Rum", '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making:
Once every four years something amazing happens in the world of sports. For a few short weeks, over 10,000 athletes from 202 nations unite to compete in the greatest, most honorable sporting event in the world. Castle Brands invites you to get into the Olympic spirit with a few of their spirits. Enjoy their "international" cocktails inspired by the 2008 Summer Olympic Games.
Build ingredients in a tall glass with ice.

Name: Bermuda Triangle
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Bermuda Triangle #2
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Vanilla Rum", '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Add ingredients over ice, stir gently and garnish with a fresh orange slice.

Name: Bernardo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Berries 'N' Cream
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '3/4 oz. Wildberry Schnapps', '3 oz. Strawberry Mix', '2 tbsp. Raspberries ( or Strawberries in Syrup)', '2 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Blend with 16 oz. ice until smooth and creamy and pour into a specialty glass. Garnish with strawberries, blueberries or raspberries.

Name: Berries and Cream
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Raspberry Rum", '3 oz. Strawberry Daiquiri Mix', '2 tbsp. Raspberries', '2 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Blend with 16 ounces of ice until smooth and creamy and pour into a specialty glass for a unique look. Garnish with strawberries, blueberries or raspberries.

Making: Pour HPNOTIQ and vodka over ice in a rocks glass. Slowly add splash of Chambord. Garnish with cherries.

Ingredients: ['1 Kiwi', '1 Peach', '1/3 pound(s) Blueberries', '6 2/3 oz. Dark Rum', '1 Zinc Tablet']
Making: Blend until smooth and frappe in an exotic glass.

Name: Berrytini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Black Currant Vodka', '1/2 oz. Framboise']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with raspberries.

Name: Berta's Special
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 tsp. Honey', '6 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1 Egg White', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Shake vigorously with ice and pour into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with sparkling water and garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Bessemer
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Mix and pour over ice in a lowball glass.

Name: Bessito
Ingredients: ['1 oz. X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', 'Champagne']
Making:
Top with Champagne, serve in a flute.
Originally served at Asia De Cuba, New York

Name: Best Black Russian
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Coca Cola', '2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '3 oz. Red Cordial']
Making: Mix in a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Betsy Ross
Ingredients: ['1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Tawny Port']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Better Cinco

Making: Muddle Jalepeno with fresh lemon juice. Add all other ingredients to mixing glass except champagne. Shake well with ice and strain into an ice filled highball. Top with Zipang. Garnish with a wheel of jalepeno and slice of mango.

Name: Better Than Sex
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Haagen Dazs Cream Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice. Float the cream.

Name: Between The Cheeks
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Dark Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Triple Sec', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice (Or 1 1/2 oz.)"]
Making: Stir over ice into a collins glass. Serve up with two cherries. Enjoy!

Name: Between The Sheets #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Between The Sheets #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cognac', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Cream', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon peel

Name: Bevakasha (You're Welcome)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Russian Standard Vodka', '1 splash(es) Dry Vermouth (Kedem)', '3 Olive(s) (Osem Medditerranean Cracked)']
Making:
Shake ingredients gently over ice. Strain and serve in a chilled martini glass. Garnish with olives.
As Hanukkah begins at sunset on December 20th, many preparations and traditions will unfold for the next 8 days. Dreidels will be spun, Menorahs will be lit and latkes will be consumed. So what is the modern Jew going to cheers their family and friends with? How about some kosher cocktails that are easily accessible to everyone! With Russian Standard Vodka being 100% Kosher, there are endless possibilities to the cocktails that can be created.

Name: Bianca Slamer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '2 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake well with ice then strain into a highball glass over 3 ice cubes.

Name: Biffy Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Swedish Punch', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Big Apple
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Apple Brandy', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Apple Juice', '1 tbsp. Apple Sauce']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with ground cinnamon.

Name: Big Bird
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour banana schnapps into a highball glass and fill the rest with pineapple and orange juice.

Name: Big Chill #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']

Name: Big Chill #2

Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with vanilla ice cream.

Name: Big Dipper

Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice. Fill with Club Soda.

Name: Big Dog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Milk', 'Pepsi Cola']
Making: Mix Kahlua and vodka in a highball glass over ice. Add milk almost to brim and fill the rest with Pepsi. Stir and serve.

Name: Big Dumb Russian
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 splash(es) Sprite', 'dash(es) Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add the vodka and fill the glass about 3/4 of the way with pineapple juice. Then add just a splash of Sprite. Finally, add the Blue Maui until you get a faint (almost sky-blue) colour. Stir.

Name: Big Easy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Build into a highball glass over ice. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Big Fa
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Chocolate Milk']
Making: Mix and serve in an old fashioned glass over ice.

Name: Big Hug

Making: Build in an Irish coffee glass, garnish with whipped cream and shaved chocolate.

Name: Big John's Strawberry Mango Margarita
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Triple Sec (Preferably Dubouchett)', '4 oz. Tequila (Premium)', "12 1/2 oz. Mango Juice (Preferably Jumex or Kern's canned mango juice)", '1 1/2 cup(s) Strawberries (Fresh or frozen but NOT in sugar or juice)']

Making: Mix in a highball glass over ice. Pour grenadine around side of glass for effect.

Making: Build over ice in a collins glass and fill with pineapple juice. Add grenadine and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Big Squeeze
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 can(s) Berry Punch (Preferably Berry B. Squeeze It)']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Bijou
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Chartreuse', '3/4 oz. Italian Vermouth']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry and a lemon peel.

Name: Bijou Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Green Chartreuse', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Bikini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Milk', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1/2 Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

Making: Shake with crushed ice and pour over a cherry in a cocktail glass.

Name: Billy Hamilton
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Orange Curacao', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Billy Taylor
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Build in a collins glass and fill with carbonated water. Stir.

Name: BILLYBOB
Ingredients: ['20 oz. Vanilla Cola', "4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Mix Jack Daniels and vanilla cola in a tall glass.

Name: Biminique
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '10 can(s) Dr Pepper']
Making: Mix in a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry if desired.

Name: Bingo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hammer Vodka', '2 oz. Mandarine Napoleon', '2 oz. Monin Apricot Syrup', 'Mineral water']
Making: Build in collins glass and fill with mineral water. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cocktail cherry.

Name: Bird of Paradise Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1 Egg White', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Shake vigorously with cracked ice and strain over ice cubes into a highball glass. Fill with sparkling water and stir.

Name: Bird's Nest
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Coca Cola']
Making: Combine ingredents and top with Coca Cola in a highball glass. Add 2 straws. Customers (preferably male and female) each drink from the straw at the same time.

Name: Birky's Bubblegum
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Blue Curacao', '3 oz. Banana Liqueur', '3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 pint(s) Cream']
Making: Mix all the ingredients together, and serve with ice in cocktail glasses. It really does taste like bubble gum!

Name: Birth Control
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Biscayne Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Forbidden Fruit Liqueur', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Bishop
Ingredients: ['1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/4 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Burgundy Wine']
Making: Shake all except wine with ice and strain into a highball glass. Add two ice cubes and fill with burgundy. Stir.

Name: Bison Tonic
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Zubrowka Vodka', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Stir over ice into a collins glass.

Name: Bit O' Honey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Honey Vodka', '1 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bitai Avon (Bon Appetite)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Russian Standard Vodka', '3 1/2 oz. Apple Juice', '1 stick(s) Cinnamon', '1 slice(s) Apple']
Making:
Combine Russian Standard Vodka, apple juice and ice in a highball glass. Stir well and garnish with the apple slice and cinnamon stick.
As Hanukkah begins at sunset on December 20th, many preparations and traditions will unfold for the next 8 days. Dreidels will be spun, Menorahs will be lit and latkes will be consumed. So what is the modern Jew going to cheers their family and friends with? How about some kosher cocktails that are easily accessible to everyone! With Russian Standard Vodka being 100% Kosher, there are endless possibilities to the cocktails that can be created.

Name: Bitch Candy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '2 oz. Amaretto', '1 tbsp. Lemonade Mix powder', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Combine in a highball glass starting with the lemonade mix. Mix slightly so the lemonade mix settles on the bottom to give extra punch to the last drink.

Name: Bitch-On-Wheels
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '1 tsp. Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bitches Ain't Shit
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Pepsi Cola']
Making: Mix in a highball glass. It tastes like Dr Pepper soda.

Name: Bite Me
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Root Beer (A&W)', '1 oz. Orange Soda (Orange Crush Soda)']
Making: Mix with ice and pour into a highball.

Name: Bitter Bisom
Ingredients: ['3/8 oz. Vodka (Premium and unflavoured)', '1/2 oz. Zubrowka Vodka', '1/8 oz. Sweet Vermouth (Preferably Cinzano)', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Stir over ice cubes into a collins glass.

Name: Bitter Bubbles
Ingredients: ['1 oz. X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Skyy Infusions Passion Fruit Vodka', '1/4 oz. Campari', 'Champagne']
Making: Top with Champagne, serve in a flute.

Name: Bitter Evan
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Campari', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Fill a rocks glass with ice and pour in vodka. Fill the glass with ruby-red grapefruit juice and splash with Campari. Jay's comment: Drink named after Evan Dando from the Lemonheads. He sat at my bar drinking these all day and seemed rather bitter about not having a career anymore. He kept playing Gloria Gaynor's _I will survive_ on the jukebox. Nice guy though.

Name: Bitter Hitter
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 cup(s) Water (Chilled)', '1 Orange (Large)', '1 Grapefruit (Large)', '1 Tamarillo']
Making: Put the fruits in a blender and puree, add blue curacao and Cointreau then pulse until combined. Add water and ice and pulse until combined. Serve in tall glass with rim dipped in sugar and lemon juice and a slice of orange on side.

Name: Bitter Sweet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Ketel One Citroen', '1/4 oz. Campari', '1/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Honey Syrup', '1 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously, and then strain into a martini glass. Top with orange zest.
Some go with chocolates others with flowers, but the one thing you can never go wrong with is a cocktail. This Valentine’s Day, Ketel One Vodka and Baileys Original Irish Cream are honoring the day of romance by encouraging couples to sip on delectable aphrodisiac cocktails.
This recipe uses honey as an aphrodisiac ingredient.

Name: Bitter X
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Campari', '3 part(s) Lemon Juice', 'Fee Brothers Grapefruit Bitters']
Making: Build cocktail in a low-ball glass, top with ice.

Name: Bitters Highball
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bitters', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Stir with ice cubes in a highball glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

Name: Bittersweet Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel.

Name: Bittersweet Steve On The Rocks
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sauza Tres Generaciones Anejo Tequila', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Jagermeister', 'Crangrape Juice (Preferably Langers 100% cranberry grape juice)']
Making: Fill a highball glass halfway with ice and add the ingredients. Stir and drink.

Name: Bizmark
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Vodka McCormick's", '12 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix with ice.

Name: Bizzarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Powerade']
Making: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Fill wilh Powerade..

Name: Black & Tan
Ingredients: ['Ale (Preferably Bass Pale Ale)', 'Guinness']
Making: Fill a beer stein half full with Bass. Next pour Guinness over a spoon slowly until glass is full. If done correctly they will layer.

Name: Black 'N Blue
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Combine the Black Haus and Blue Curacao. Top with sour mix. Can be made as a standard drink on the rocks (collins glass), as a martini style cocktail (has a beautiful bright blue color that many find intriging) or as a shooter. A great fruity drink for someone who wants a drink with some kick but not the bite of the harder liquors.

Name: Black and Black
Ingredients: ['1 oz. The Black Grouse Scotch', '1 wedge(s) Orange']
Making:
Fill a glass with ice, squeeze a wedge of orange and drop into the glass. Add a measure of The Black Grouse.
Created by Andy Gemmell in 2008

Name: Black and Blue #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. 7-Up', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake well over ice and strain into a rocks glass.

Name: Black Baltimore
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Sambuca (Black)', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Black Bird
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '3 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Combine over ice in an old fashioned glass.

Name: Black Bison
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Zubrowka Vodka', 'Cola']
Making: Stir over ice into a collins glass.

Name: Black Bitch
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Combine and serve over ice in an old fashioned glass.

Name: Black Blood
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Squirt (Preferably Ruby Red Squirt)']
Making: Mix thoroughly and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Black Bottom
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Brandy', '1/4 oz. Cointreau', '1/4 oz. Blackberry Brandy', 'dash(es) Dry Gin', '1/4 Lemon Juice', '1/4 Orange (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Black Bull
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink', '2 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps']
Making: Pour Red Bull Energy Drink into an ice filled highball glass. Top with the Black Haus.

Name: Black Cat #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Black Cat #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kirsch', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Cola (To taste)']
Making: Mix ingredients in a highball glass and add cola to taste.

Name: Black Cherry
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. Black Velvet Canadian Whisky', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix together in a shaker with ice. Strain into a glass over ice. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Black Cherry #2
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon', '1 part(s) Cruzan Black Cherry Rum', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour over ice and fill rocks glass with soda. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Black Death
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Curacao', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain (or not) in a collins glass. The colder, the better.

Name: Black Death Wish
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps']
Making: Pour in a shaker over ice. Shake 20 for seconds and strain into a rocks glass.

Name: Black Devil
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 oz. White Rum']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a black olive.

Name: Black Dog
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir well over cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a pitted black olive.

Name: Black Eye
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients over ice in a cocktail glass. Stir and serve.

Name: Black Friday
Ingredients: ["3 part(s) Broker's London Dry Gin", '5 Blackberry (ies)', '3 Grapes Red Seedless', '1 splash(es) Passion Fruit Syrup', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Muddle the syrups and fruit together in a shaker. Add ice and the gin, shake and pour into a rocks glass.

Name: Black Hawk
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 1/4 oz. Sloe Gin']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Black Ice
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Smirnoff Ice', 'Guinness']
Making: Pour Smirnoff Ice into a beer glass until half full. Add the Guinness to fill using spoon (a la 'Black and Tan')When you drink it it looks like a lava lamp!

Name: Black Irish
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola', 'Guinness']
Making: Mix the vodka and kahlua in a pint glass. Add the splash of Coca Cola. Fill up the glass with Guiness. Maxim Magazine pg. 88 #63 March 2003

Name: Black Jack #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Black Jack #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Kirsch', '1 oz. Coffee']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Black Jew
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into a lowball glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Black Licorice #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sambuca', '4 oz. Pepsi Cola']
Making: Stir over ice into a cocktail glass.

Name: Black Magic #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Stir and serve in an old-fashioned glass over ice. Garnish with a twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Black Magic #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '3/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur (Preferably Caffé Sport Espresso Liqueur)', '4 dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake or blend over cracked ice and pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

Name: Black Maria
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Coffee Brandy', '2 oz. White Rum', '4 oz. Coffee (Strong and Black)', '2 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Stir in a brandy snifter and add cracked ice.

Name: Black Mexican
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Black Monday
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Sambuca (Black)', '1 tsp. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Black Opal #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a tumbler, stir and garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Black Opal #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Partida Reposado Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Guinness', '1/2 oz. Tawny Port', '1/4 oz. Partida Agave Nectar', '1/4 oz. Water', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making:
Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled wine glass or small pint glass without ice. Garnish with some grated or ground cinnamon powder.
Guinness Note: I take a pint of Guinness before hand and use a bar spoon to stir it up for about 30 secs. This removes some of the Co2.
Created by: Jacques Bezuidenhout

Name: Black Orchid
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sambuca (Black)', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Pour into a champagne flute.

Name: Black Out #1
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 package(s) Tang Drink Mix']
Making: Mix Vodka and Tang in a pitcher and top with water. Pour over ice and be ready to get rocked! Designed to get you messed up in a hurry!

Name: Black Pagoda
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 tsp. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Black Rose
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Parfait Amour', '2/3 oz. Gin (Or vodka)', '2/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '2/3 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Soda Water']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and pour into a collins glass with cracked ice. Top with soda water and garnish with a cherry and mint sprig.

Name: Black Russian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice in a rocks glass and serve. May be garnished with a cherry.

Name: Black Russian #1
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Build in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Black Russian #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '3/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur (Preferably Caffé Sport Espresso Liqueur)']
Making: Shake or blend over cracked ice and pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

Name: Black Russian (Irish)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Coca Cola', 'Guinness']
Making: Mix in a tall glass with ice and top with the Guiness.

Name: Black Stripe
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Dark Rum', '2 tsp. Molasses', '4 oz. Water (Boiling)', '1 Cinnamon Stick']
Making: Dissolve the molasses in a mug with some boiling water. Add the cinnamon, a lemon twist and the remaining water. Float rum on top and ignite. Let the flame burn for a few seconds then stir to extinguish it and sprinkle some nutmeg on top to garnish. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Black Stuff #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch (Black Label)', '1 oz. Creme de Menthe', 'Tea (Dark)']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Black Stuff #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Scotch (Black Label)', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Tea (Not too dark)']
Making: Mix with ice in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Black Suede
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tia Maria', '1 pint(s) Guinness']
Making: Drop the double Tia Maria in the pint of Guinness and enjoy!

Name: Black Sunday
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1 oz. Everclear', 'IBC Black Cherry']
Making: Pour Wild Turkey and Ever Clear into a cocktail glass. Fill with IBC Black Cherry.

Name: Black Thorn - Irish
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3 dash(es) Pernod Absinthe', '3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice.

Name: Black Ukrainian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '3 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix over ice.

Name: Black Velvet #1
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Stout (Chilled)', '5 oz. Champagne (Chilled)']
Making: Pour stout into a champagne flute. Layer champagne.

Name: Black Velvet #2
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Lager', '1 oz. Dark Rum']
Making: Pour into a beer mug.

Name: Black Velvet #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 tsp. Chocolate Syrup (Or chocolate sauce)', '1 can(s) Coca Cola']
Making: Combine the Tia Maria and the chocolate sauce in a shaker with some ice cubes. Add 1/4 can of Coca-Cola and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Tie a knot with a maraschino cherry stem and ease it into the whipped cream a little off centre. Make sure the cherry is well surrounded by whipped cream, but the top and the stem are still visible. Slide in a long stemmed tablespoon for the whipped cream.

Name: Black Widow
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice cubes and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Black Widow #2
Ingredients: ['12 oz. DNA Alcoholic Spring Water', '1/2 oz. Black Sambuca']
Making: Pour DNA and Black Sambucca over ice in a cocktail glass. Stir and serve.

Name: Black Windowless Van
Ingredients: ['1/3 pound(s) Black Raspberries', '2/5 pound(s) Vitamin C', '2 tbsp. Brown Sugar', '2 oz. Johnnie Walker Black Label Scotch', '8 oz. Dark Rum']
Making: Frappe in a large glass or mug.

Name: Black-Eyed Susan
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 part(s) Orange Liqueur', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1 part(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 part(s) Raspberry Liqueur']
Making:
Mix all ingredients except raspberry liquor with ice in mixing glass. Place raspberry liquor in chilled martini glass, float contents of mixing glass into martini glass. Garnish with a blackberry and a twist of orange.
Jim Hewes, Barman, Round Robin & Scotch Bar. These are from his Triple Crown series for you horse racing fans...

Name: Blackberry and Pineapple Smash
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Blackberry Vodka', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '5 Blackberry (ies)', '4 leaf(leaves) Mint', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Muddle blackberries (or use 1 oz. blackberry puree) add other ingredients and shake well. Strain up into a martini glass. Garnish with a pineapple leaf and a single blackberry.

Name: Blackberry Punch
Ingredients: ['1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. Blackberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with fruit.

Name: Blackberry Smoothy
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '2 oz. Blackberry Brandy']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a tall glass.

Name: Blackberry Tequila
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Blackbull
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blavod', '1/2 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Drink with a straw.

Name: Blackout
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blackthorn #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blackthorn #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

Name: Blame it on Rio
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Absolut Vodka', "1/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Soda Water']
Making: Shake and pour into a tall glass. Top with soda and garnish with lime squeeze. Chad's comment: Variations: top with Chambord or Midori.

Name: Blanche
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Anisette', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Curacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blarney Stone Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1/2 tsp. Anis', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/4 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel and an olive.

Name: BLC
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Beefeater Dry Gin', '1 oz. Lime', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Blend in a tall glass, add ice and top up with Coca Cola.

Name: Bleeding Heart
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Aalborg Akvavit', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Bleeding Ninja
Ingredients: ['2 tbsp. Fruit Punch frozen', '1 tbsp. Vodka']
Making: Mix in a blender and serve in a lowball glass.

Name: Bleeding Weasel
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Beer (Preferably Pilsner)', '8 oz. Orange Juice', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix well and serve over ice. Makes two 12 oz. cocktails.

Name: Blended Comfort
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '2 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1/4 Peach']
Making: Skin the peach quarter and mix all the ingredients in a blender on low for 10 to 15 seconds. Strain into a collins glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a peach slice and an orange slice.

Name: Blenheim
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tia Maria', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blessed Event
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'dash(es) Curacao', '2 oz. Benedictine', '2 oz. Applejack']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blimey
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blind Russian
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', 'Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur in a cocktail glass and fill with Baily's Irish Cream..

Name: Blinder
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '5 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pour the grenadine into the centre.

Name: Bling Bling
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka (Preferably Kamatchka vodka)', '2 oz. Grape Juice (White)', '2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Blinker Cocktail
Ingredients: ['dash(es) Grenadine', '3/4 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Rye Whiskey']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blizzard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 oz. White Rum', '2 scoop(s) Ice Cream', '1 splash(es) Light Cream']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a large brandy snifter. Garnish with a sprinkle of nutmeg.

Name: Bloddy Ceasar
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'Clamato Juice', '2 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', 'Tabasco Sauce (To taste)', 'Pepper (To taste)', 'Salt (To taste)']
Making: Combine in a lowball glass rimmed with lemon juice and celery salt. Stir. Garnish with a celery stick.

Name: Bloddy Matador
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '2 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '3 oz. Limeade (Frozen)', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Blend with ice until slushy and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Blonde Bombshell
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '3 dash(es) Apple Schnapps (Dekuyper)', '3 dash(es) Pear Schnapps (Dekuyper)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Blonde Russian
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '8 oz. Milk']
Making: Combine ingredients in a highball glass with ice. Stir well and serve.

Name: Blood and Sand
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cherry Heering Liqueur', '2 part(s) Scotch', '1 part(s) Sweet Vermouth', '1 part(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Add ingredients in a shaker. Shake with ice and strain into a stemmed cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel or a cherry.

Name: Blood and Sand Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 tbsp. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blood Clot #2
Ingredients: ['12 oz. DNA Alcoholic Spring Water', '1/2 oz. Cherry Advocaat']
Making: Pour DNA and Cherry Advocaat over ice in a cocktail glass. Stir and serve.

Name: Blood On The Rocks
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', 'Lemon Lime Soda', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake tequila and Triple Sec over ice. Strain into a highball glass and fill with lemon line soda. Splash in the grenadine and stir. Good summer refresher.

Name: Blood Orange Collins
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Cranberi Vodka', '1/2 oz. Monin Blood Orange Syrup', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Build ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Stir before serving, garnish with a blood orange slice. If blood oranges are not in season then use a regular orange slice.

Name: Blood Test
Ingredients: ['12 oz. DNA Alcoholic Spring Water', '1/2 oz. Finlandia Cranberry Vodka']
Making: Pour DNA and Finlandia Vodka over ice in a cocktail glass. Stir and serve.

Name: Bloodhound
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3 Strawberries (Fresh)']
Making: Blend well and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a fresh strawberry.

Name: Bloodhound Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with crushed strawberries.

Name: Bloodriver
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stroh Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix in a tumbler with 2 ice cubes.

Name: Bloodshot Eye
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 Egg raw', '1 tsp. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix the first 4 ingredients in a chilled old fashioned glass. Crack the raw egg over top so that the yolk does not break. Drizzle the tabasco sauce over the yolk. It should look like a bloodshot eye.

Name: Bloody Bitch
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a collins glass and stir.

Name: Bloody Brain #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: It's a layered shot. First pour the creme de cacao. Then the amaretto and then the Bailey's. Insert a toothpick to the bottom of the shot glass and dribble some grenadine so it floats in the bottom of the glass. Tastes like a chocolate covered cherry!

Name: Bloody Brew
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Beer', '4 oz. Tomato Juice', 'Salt (To taste)']
Making: Mix with ice in a highball glass and garnish with a dill pickle spear.

Name: Bloody Bull
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Tomato Juice', '6 oz. Beef Bouillon']
Making: Build in a highball glass and stir. Garnish with a slice of lime and wedge of lemon.

Name: Bloody Bull Lager
Ingredients: ['2 tsp. Lime Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Tomato Juice Spicy', '2 tbsp. Vodka', '12 oz. Tecate Light']
Making: A new take on the Bloody Mary, this savory mix features the expected ingredients and more! Mix lime juice, spicy tomato juice and vodka (optional) in a glass. Pour ice-cold Tecate Light and stir with a crisp celery stalk.

Name: Bloody Caesar
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Salt', 'dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', 'dash(es) Pepper', 'Clamato Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass that has a celery salted rim. Fill with Clamato juice and garnish with a celery stick, a straw and a lime wedge.

Name: Bloody Carrie
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'V 8 Juice', '1/2 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce']
Making: Fill highball glass with ice and V8 Juice. Mix in vodka and Worcestershire Sauce. Garnish with celery, olives or pickle.

Name: Bloody Ceasar
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Tabasco Sauce to taste', 'Worcestershire Sauce to taste', 'Horseradish to taste', '1 dash(es) Kosher salt', '1 dash(es) Black Pepper', '4 1/2 oz. Clamato Juice']
Making: Rim old fashioned glass with celery salt. Combine ingredients over ice in order given. Garnish with lime wedge.

Name: Bloody Clam
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 tsp. Horseradish', 'Clamato Juice', '1 dash(es) Lemon Juice', '1 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '1 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce optional', 'Celery Salt to taste', '1 dash(es) Black Pepper']
Making: Add vodka, horseradish, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce and Tabasco sauce to an 8 - 10 oz. glass. Fill to three quarters with Clamato juice. Add celery salt and black pepper. Shake - don't stir. Add ice and a celery stalk and lemon wedge for garnish.

Name: Bloody Douche Bag
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", 'V 8 Juice', '2 splash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bloody Geisha
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Tomato Juice', '1 1/2 oz. TY KU Sake', '1 dash(es) Soy Sauce', '1 squirt(s) Lime Juice', '1 pinch(es) Wasabi']
Making:
Mix in a cocktail glass and garnish with celery sticks and a lime wheel.
True Blood’s fourth season premieres June 26th and it’s bound to be absolutely sinful –Thankfully the calorie counts of your cocktails don’t have to be! TY KU, the Premier Sake & Asian Spirits company, is shaking up smarter cocktail options with all natural premium ingredients, with no added sugars or preservatives and is gluten and sulfite free.
Soak in the drama of True Blood and indulge in TY KU’S mouthwatering Bloody Geisha. A perfect combination of heat and zest, this TY KU cocktail is sure to tantalize your taste buds. And with its all-natural ingredients, low-calorie count, and refined flavor profile, TY KU’s Bloody Geisha is the perfect cocktail to satisfy your True Blood obsession while you kick off the new season. A drink of choice for every Vampire, TY KU can even be seen on the set of True Blood at Merlotte's Bar and Grill.
Drink up True Blood fans. It’s about to get juicy.

Name: Bloody Hurricane
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 can(s) 7-Up (Or Storm)', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Pour tequila over ice in a highball glass. Add Storm to the top and flavour with grenadine. Allow to chill for a few seconds.

Name: Bloody IS Caesar
Ingredients: ['2 oz. IS Vodka', 'Clamato Juice', '3 drop(s) Worcestershire Sauce', '4 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Season the rim of a highball glass with celery salt and sea salt. Fill the glass with ice. Add ÍS VODKA, Worcestershire and Tabasco; top with Clamato Juice. Stir with a celery stalk; garnish with lemon & one luscious king prawn. Hail Caesar!

Name: Bloody Jager
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jagermeister', 'Bloody Mary Mix']
Making: Pour Jager into a tall glass. Fill with Bloody Mary mix. Add pepper to taste and garnish with a celery stalk.

Name: Bloody Mammy
Ingredients: ['4 leaf(leaves) Basil', '1 1/2 oz. Irish Whiskey *', '3 oz. Tomato Juice', '1/3 oz. Lime Juice', '2 dash(es) The Bitter Truth Celery Bitters', '2 dash(es) Tabasco Brand Garlic Pepper Sauce', '1 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '1 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '1 pinch(es) Black Pepper', '1 sprig(s) Basil']
Making:
Muddle basil leaves in base of mixing glass. Add all other ingredients with ice; hard shake, and strain over ice in serving glass. Garnish with sprig of basil.
*Substitute with Poitín for a more authentic taste.
Ireland in recent years has become a metropolis for amazing food and fresh ingredients, and this is what has inspired the Bloody Mammy, a mix of strong Irish spirit, spice and flavor base, mixed with the freshness and goodness of lime. The basil and tomato juice will help get you started after the night before: it’s comforting with a gourmet twist.
Created By Darren Geraghty
Darren Geraghty is the head mixologist at Dublin’s Exchequer Pub and winner of the first-ever Irish Open Cocktail Competition. A lifetime Dubliner, Darren’s creations are contemporary with an Irish twist.

Name: Bloody Maria
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Tomato Juice', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', 'dash(es) Celery Salt']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Bloody Mariana
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. V 8 Juice', '1 tsp. Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', 'dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', 'dash(es) White Pepper', 'dash(es) Celery Salt', 'dash(es) Oregano']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Bloody Maru
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sake', '4 drop(s) Worcestershire Sauce', '2 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce', 'dash(es) Horseradish', 'dash(es) Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Salt', 'dash(es) Pepper', 'Tomato Juice']
Making: Build in a pilsner glass and fill with tomato juice. Garnish with a celery stick.

Name: Bloody Mary #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Tomato Juice', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce', '2 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Add salt and pepper to taste. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Bloody Mary #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Sherry', 'dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', 'dash(es) Salt', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', 'dash(es) Pepper', 'Tomato Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with tomato juice. Garnish with a celery stick and lime wedge.

Name: Bloody Molly
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '4 oz. Tomato Juice', "1 dash(es) Rose's Lime Juice", '1 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '1 dash(es) Bitters', '1 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '1/4 tsp. Horseradish optional', '1/4 tsp. Celery Salt', '1 dash(es) Salt', '1 dash(es) Pepper']
Making: Mix all ingredients in tall exotic glass. Garnish with a lime wedge or celery heart if available.

Name: Bloody Nightmare
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Lime Juice', '7 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Bloody Roadrunner
Ingredients: ['1/3 part(s) Southern Comfort', '1/3 part(s) Gatorade fierce berry/melon', '1/3 part(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Make sure all three are cold and mix parts in a highball glass. Drink up! Can get you messed up quick so drink with caution.

Name: Bloody Shitty
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 tsp. Hot Sauce (1 packet of Taco Bell "Fire" Taco Sauce works nicely!)', 'Bloody Mary Mix (To taste)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with lime. Gil says this drink is named after one of his friend named "Shitty".

Name: Bloody Stool
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua', '6 oz. Bloody Mary Mix']
Making: Fill a highball glass 1/2 to 3/4 with ice. Pour Bloody Mary Mix over ice then add Kahlua. This, in my opinion, looks as bad as it tastes!

Name: Bloody Sunday
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Pepper Vodka', '3 oz. Tomato Juice', '1 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '1 dash(es) Tequila Gold']
Making: Wet the rim of a Tom Collins glass, then dip it in salt and black pepper. Build ingredients in the glass and stir. Add slice of orange and a red chili pepper.

Name: Bloody Tampon #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Gin', '8 oz. Tomato Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a 10 oz. glass. Garnish with a straw.

Name: Bloody Walter Matthau
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sourpuss Raspberry Liqueur', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour in a shot of Sourpuss and top up with Champagne. After a few minutes the sourpuss settles to the bottom and once the champagne has been consumed you have shot of sourpuss at the bottom of the glass to chug down!

Name: Blow Job #5
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/6 oz. Vodka', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Layer Kahlua then vodka in a shot glass. Top up with whipped cream. Shoot using no hands.

Name: Blow Me On The Beach
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Sour Apple Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine vodka and Sour Apple Schnapps in a highball glass filled with ice. Add one half orange juice and one half cranberry juice to fill. Shake and serve.

Name: Blue 10:16
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Lemonade', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blue Angel #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Vanilla Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Blue Angel #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Parfait Amour', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Sprite']
Making: Shake the Parfait Amour and the vodka and pour over ice cubes in a lowball glass. Top up with Sprite.

Name: Blue Angel #3
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Champagne (Or sparkling wine)']
Making: Build over two ice cubes in a champagne glass.

Name: Blue Balls
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with 2 cherries.

Name: Blue BAM for Hanukkah
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Blue Angel Vodka', '1 dash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making:
In a shaker combine vodka and curacao together with several ice cubes. Shake vigorously, then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a sheet of edible silver foil.
To get extra creative garnish with edible Silver Foil; serve on silver cocktail napkin. For a variation, add a little lemon-lime soda.

Name: Blue Bananas
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', 'Pepsi Cola Blue']
Making: Mix together over ice in a tall glass and serve.

Name: Blue Bay
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour kahlua into a highball glass. Shake the pineapple juice and blue curacao with ice and strain on top of kahlua. Top with the vodka

Name: Blue Bird
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice cubes and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel and a cherry.

Name: Blue Bull
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Shake alcohol and sweet and sour mix. Pour into a highball glass filled with ice. Top up with Red Bull. Garnish with an orange wheel and a cherry.

Name: Blue Canary
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Gin', '3 tbsp. Grapefruit Juice', '1 tbsp. Blue Curacao']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Blue Cloud Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a brandy snifter. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

Name: Blue Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Vodka', '2/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '2/3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/3 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with crushed ice until the shaker is frosted. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Blue Cowboy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blue Cuban
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pineapple Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Mix ingredients and serve over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Blue Devil
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Frappe in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Blue Devil Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tbsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 tsp. Blue Curacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blue Dolphin
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Lemonade']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with lemonade. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Blue Dragon
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Soho Lychee Liqueur', '2 oz. Blue Curacao', '5 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Blue Dragon Piss
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Grapefruit Juice (White)']
Making: Mix in a collins glass and enjoy.

Name: Blue Frog
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Stir with ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Blue Grass Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Blue Hawaiian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Syrup']
Making: Pour into blender along with 1 cup ice. Blend and serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange wheel and cherry.

Name: Blue Hawaiian #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice at high speed until smooth and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry.

Name: Blue Hawaiian #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '3/4 oz. Creme de Banane', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour in given order over crushed ice and fill with pineapple juice.

Name: Blue Hawaiian #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Blue Hawaiian (strong)
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Rum", "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour liquors together and fill shaker with pineapple juice. Shake, strain and serve in a hurricane glass.

Name: Blue Hawiian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice (or to taste)']
Making: Mix and serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with fruit.

Name: Blue Horizon
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '3/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Fill a collins glass with the liquors then top up with orange juice. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Blue Iguana
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. 7-Up', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Everclear', '1/2 oz. Tang Drink Mix']
Making: Bend until smooth and pour into a frosted beer mug.

Name: Blue Jacket
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Mix vigorously with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blue Kamikazi
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Blue Curacao', '1 part(s) Blueberry Schnapps', '1 part(s) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix all ingredients except 7-up. Top up with a splash of 7-up.

Name: Blue Lady #1
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Blue Lady #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blue Lagoon
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Lime Juice', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour Blue Curacao and vodka into a cocktail glass. Add lime juice and fill with Sprite. Garnish with a twist of lime.

Name: Blue Lagoon #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Lemonade']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with lemonade. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Blue Lagoon #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour the blueberry schnapps and the Curacao in a cocktail glass and top up with pineapple juice. Chris's comment: It tastes like Blueberry Kool-Aid.

Name: Blue Lagoon #6
Ingredients: ['1/4 part(s) Hiram Walker Blue Curacao', '1 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend with ice and serve.

Name: Blue Lagoon Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', "1 splash(es) Rose's Lime Juice", 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake vigorously with ice and strain over rocks.

Name: Blue Lambourgini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Banana Creme Liqueur', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'sprinkle(s) Cinnamon']
Making: Pour the Bacardi 151 and Sambuca in a cocktail glass. Line up 3 shot glasses beside it and fill one with the Blue Curacao, one with the Banana Liqueur and one with the Bailey's. Give the drinker a straw. Light the Bacardi 151 and Sambuca on fire and sprinkle some cimmamon on it. Then pour the first 2 shots in the cocktail glass and beign to drink. Pour the last shot in while drinking. Sit down for 10 minutes and enjoy.

Name: Blue Latvian
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", 'Raspberry Juice (Blue)', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour the Jack first in a mixing glass, then add the blue raspberry juice until it is more blue than brown, and finish with the lemon-lime soda until it starts fizzing. Serve in a collins glass.

Name: Blue Lesbian
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Berry Vodka (Regular vodka is okay too)', 'Fruitopia (Blue)', 'dash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Fill a highball glass with crushed ice and pour Fruitopia over it. Then add the vodka (put as much as you want, depending on how 'loopsey' you want to get). Add just a dash of Blue Curacao. Garnish with a twist of lime and swizler stick.

Name: Blue Lightning
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', 'Lime Mix']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Blue Long Island
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Tequila (Gold)', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '5 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Typical long island with a kick. Pour into a Collins glass on ice. Add the liquors first, then the sour mix and blue curacao. Garnish with a straw and a lemon wheel.

Name: Blue Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass.

Name: Blue Memphis
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum (Or to taste)', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice (Or to taste)', '2 oz. Milk (Or to taste)', 'dash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Blend ingredients (except curacao). Add blue curacao and give a final whiz. Pour into a tall glass, stick on your shades and sit back and enjoy the ultimate holiday cocktail experience.

Name: Blue Monday
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Lemonade']
Making: Shake with ice and strain in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade and garnish with a lemon slice, an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Blue Monday Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', 'dash(es) Food Colouring (Blue)']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass over ice.

Name: Blue Moon #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '3 oz. Orange Juice (Or to taste)', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice (Or to taste)']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Blue Moon Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass over ice. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Blue Mother F**ker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Aristrocrat London Dry Gin', '1 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1 oz. Beefeater Dry Gin', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '3 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in an old fashioned glass.

Name: Blue Motorcycle
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sprite']
Making: Fill Tom Collins glass with ice. Add rum, 151, and Blue Curacao. Fill with Sprite.

Name: Blue Motorcycle #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Club Soda']
Making: Build ingredients in a highball glass and fill with Club Soda.

Name: Blue Motorcycle #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Combine all the ingredients in order into a tall glass with ice. Serve with a straw.

Name: Blue Mountain
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Tia Maria', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

Name: Blue New Yorker
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into an ups-glass. Serve glass with a sugar rim and an orange twist garnish.

Name: Blue Nuke
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Blueberry Liqueur', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Mix liquor in a collins glass with ice and fill with Sour Mix.

Name: Blue Parrot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix the Blue Maui and the Parrot Bay on ice in a cocktail glass. Top off with pineapple juice.

Name: Blue Passion
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '5 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake ice and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a pineapple flag.

Name: Blue Riband
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. White Curacao', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blue Rocco
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Grey Goose Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cointreau']
Making:
A rhapsody of flavour with a theatrical flair
Shake vigorously with crushed ice. Serve with a Blue Rock Candy Swizzle Stick.

Name: Blue Sapphire
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine in a collins glass filled with ice.

Name: Blue Sea
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix Malibu Rum and Blue Curacao in a cocktail glass over crushed ice. Top up with pineapple juice.

Name: Blue Sex
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blue Shark
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. White Tequila', '4 dash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

Name: Blue Skittles
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour Blue Hawaiian Mau Schnapps over crushed ice in high ball glass. Fill with Mountain Dew.

Name: Blue Sky #1
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Milk', '1 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice.

Name: Blue Sky #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Canadian Mist', '3/4 oz. Light Rum', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '8 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and serve in a hurricane glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and an umbrella.

Name: Blue Sky #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'Sprite', 'dash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Build in a cocktail glass.

Name: Blue Sky #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Milk or cream']
Making: Blend milk (cream) and Malibu rum over ice. Mixture should be fairly thick. Pour mxture into a rocks glass. Pour Blue Curacao along the edge of the glass. As the blue curacao runs through the puffy mixture, it should look like white clouds in a blue sky!

Name: Blue Slushie
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Vanilla Vodka', 'Sprite 7-Up']
Making: Pour Blue Curacao, melon liqueur, and vanilla vodka over ice in a rocks glass. Fill up with Sprite or 7-Up.

Name: Blue Spooge
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Mount Gay Barbados Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', "1 oz. Myer's Rum", '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 oz. Coco Lopez']
Making: Pour ingredients into a blender with crushed ice. Blend until smooth and serve in a highballl glass.

Name: Blue Squid
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Light Rum', '2 tbsp. White Creme de Cacao', '1 tsp. Cream']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain over ice cubes into an old fashioned glass.

Name: Blue Star
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Lillet', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Blue Steel
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Pear Cider', '1 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Island Blue Schnapps']
Making: Combine in a pint glass. Drink it down!

Name: Blue Temptation
Ingredients: ['4/5 oz. Blue Curacao', '2/3 oz. Pisang Ambon', '1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/6 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cream (Fresh)']
Making: Shake and serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel, a cherry and a spring of mint. World Champion in ICC Competition Lisbon 98

Name: Blue Velvet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '4 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Blue Curacao', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Blend all except Curacao and whipped cream with crushed ice until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and top with whipped cream. Pour Curacao over and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Blue Watch
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '4 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Build in an old-fashioned glass and stir lightly.

Name: Blue Whale
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Blend and pour into an exotic glass.

Name: Blue Zoo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', '1 oz. Triple Sec', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Pour liqueurs over crushed in a cocktail glass. Fill with sour mix. Top with gummy bears.

Name: Blueberry Blue Lagoon
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Blueberry Schnapps', '2 part(s) Lemonade', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Fill a blender with ice. Add schnapps and lemonade and finish with a splash of Blue Curacoa. Blend then pour into tall glass. A very refreshing drink for the summertime!

Name: Blueberry Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1/2 pound(s) Blueberries', '1 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '2 oz. White Rum', 'Sugar (To Taste)']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into an exotic glass.

Name: Blueberry Sweetheart
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '8 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour into highball glass over ice and stir. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Blueberry Tea
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Tea (Orange Pekoe)']
Making: Mix amaretto and Grand Marnier in a brandy snifter or glass. Add hot tea to taste and garnish with two orange wheels.

Name: Bluebird
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a cherry.

Name: Bluegrass Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1/4 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '4 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of green apple.

Name: Bluesberry Woo Woo Juice
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice, shake and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Bluetail Fly
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 tbsp. White Creme de Cacao', '1 tbsp. Light Cream']
Making: Shake vigorously with cracked ice and strain over ice cubes.

Name: Blushin' Russian #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Vodka', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '4 Strawberries (Large)']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a chocolate covered strawberry.

Name: Blushin' Russian #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Cola', '1 oz. 7-Up', '6 Grapes']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass and eat the grapes.

Name: BMW
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Brandy (VSOP)', '2/3 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2/3 oz. Rye Whiskey']
Making: Build in a rocks glass. Drink quickly, tastes nasty but it is guaranteed to F**K you up.

Name: BMW ( The Real One You Fookin' Wankers !! )
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Whiskey']
Making: Mix in a long-drink glass in given order. Add ice and have a nitro boost!!

Name: Bo's Specialty
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Bacardi Limon', '1 cup(s) Mountain Dew Code Red']
Making: Mix Bacardi Limon and Code Red Mountain Dew in a pint glass.

Name: Boardwalk
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Boat Drink
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill remaining space with 2/3 pineapple juice and 1/3 orange juice. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Bob
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix as listed and top with orange juice.

Name: Bob And Dans Messy Diaper
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Daquiri Mix (Raspberry)']
Making: Pour the raspberry daiquiri mix first then add the vodka, coconut rum, and Irish cream. Then add the ice to the glass. It creates a funky texture to look like a messy diaper.

Name: Bob Dandy
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Rouge)', '1 1/2 oz. Brandy']
Making: Stir with ice cubes and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Bob Dylan Recipe
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Surge Energy Drink', '4 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Combine all ingredients with 16 oz. ice in a blender and mix until smooth.

Name: Bob's Bad Day
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Blueberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Wildberry Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Cranberry Juice or pineapple juice']
Making: Mix vodka, blueberry liqueur, wildberry schnapps, razzmatazz, and blue curacao. Splash with grenadine and fill glass with either cranberry or pineapple juice.

Name: Bob's Moscow Mule
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '8 oz. Ginger Beer (or Ginger Ale)']
Making: Pour into a chilled beer mug. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Bobbing On The Beach
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Cherry Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients except orange juice over ice in an old fashioned glass. Fill with orange juice. (For an extra kick use maraschino cherry liqueur instead of maraschino cherry juice). Garnish with a cherry and an orange wheel.

Name: Bobby Burns Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 1/4 tsp. Benedictine']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Bobby Six Killer
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Sugar', '1 oz. The Famous Grouse Scotch Whisky', "1 oz. Gordon's Dry Gin", '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Mount Gay Barbados Rum', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Add ice to a cocktail glass. Layer the ingredients on top of each other (they separate out). Have a glass of orange juice on the side for a chaser.

Name: Boble Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Casa Noble Crystal', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Orange Juice', 'Grenadine']
Making: Shake all ingredients except grenadine. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Pour grenadine slowly to make a layer.

Name: Bocce Ball Jiggle Shots
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 package(s) JELLO (Orange flavour)', '1 cup(s) Water (Boiling)']
Making: Mix the ingredients, pour in 2 oz. shot glasses and refrigerate.

Name: Boccie Ball
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Rum", '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Pepsi Cola']
Making: Combine alcohol in a 12 oz. glass over ice. Fill up with Pepsi Cola. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Boccie Ball #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with Club Soda.

Name: Boccie Ball #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 oz. Coffee']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Bohiemian Bad Ass
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Whiskey', '2 oz. Beer (Preferably Red, White and Bue beer)']
Making: Mix in a collins glass.

Name: Boilermaker #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Whiskey', '10 oz. Beer']
Making: Fill shot glass with whiskey. Drop the full shot glass into the mug of beer. Drink immediately.

Name: BOILING SUNRISE
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Grenadine', '6 oz. Beer']
Making: Shake orange juice, tequila and grenadine in a pitcher. Stir in beer.

Name: Bois de Rose
Ingredients: ['3/4 part(s) St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '1/4 part(s) Aperol Orange Liqueur', '1 part(s) Gin', '1/4 part(s) Lemon Juice', 'Champagne (Brut Rose)']
Making: Shake first four ingredients with ice and strain into a Champagne flute. Top with Brut Rosé Sparking Wine, and garnish with an orange peel or twist.

Name: Bolero
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Apple Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/4 tsp. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bolli Stoli
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bollinger Champagne', '1 oz. Vodka (Stolichnaya)']
Making: Pour champagne into flute, then pour in Stoli. Drink up! Made popular by characters played by Jennifer Saunders and Joanne Lumley in _Absolutely Fabulous_. For whatever reason, this potent little cocktail does NOT cause the hangover that sparkling wine by itself imparts. Be warned: Drinking this will increase your sex drive a hundred-fold. Avoid heavy machinery, ugly people and farm animals! And beware: The kick sneaks up on you VERY quickly!

Name: Bollywood Diva
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Feni - The Spirit of india', '2 oz. Mango Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Build in a mixing glass with ice. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Bolo
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Bolshoi Punch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Creme de Cassis']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

Name: Bomb Ass Drink
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Zima', '2 Candies (Cherry Life Savers)']
Making: Put the Cherry Life Savers in a bottle of Zima (break them in half to fit in it) and put your hand over it till it stops fizzing, and chug-a-lug-lug!

Name: Bombay Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/4 tsp. Anis']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bombay Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Italian Vermouth', '3/4 oz. French Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Curacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain in a cocktail glass.

Name: Bombay Sapphire Cupid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1/4 oz. Elderflower Syrup', '3 drop(s) Rose Water', 'Champagne Rose']
Making: In a martini glass add 1/4 oz elderflower syrup, 3 drops rose water, and a dash of bitters. Add 1 oz chilled Bombay Sapphire and top off with chilled rose champagne. Over the top sprinkle edible gold leaf flakes.

Name: Bombay Sling
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '4 oz. Lemon Juice', '4 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'dash(es) Cherry Brandy']
Making: Build in a zombie glass filled with ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

Name: Bon Bini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Curacao', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple.

Name: Bonbon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour in a lowball glass.

Name: Bone Crusher
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Champagne', '2 oz. Gold Rum', '6 oz. 7-Up (Or equivalent)', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Fill a chimney glass with ice and add the rum, the champagne and the 7-Up. Add a splash of Grenadine for colour and stir lightly. It tastes like a light champagne punch but kicks like a mule!

Name: Bonehead Slammer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Orange Juice', 'Lemonade']
Making: Mix all in tall glass then fill rest with lemonade. Enjoy!!!!!

Name: Bong Water
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Sprite (Or Mountain Dew)']
Making: Mix in a tall glass.

Name: Bongo Cola
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gold Rum', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', 'dash(es) Kirsch', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice (Fresh)', 'Cola']
Making: Shake with ice and pour over ice cubes into a collins glass. Fill with cola and stir gently. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: BongWater
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Peach', '7-Up', 'dash(es) Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Cola']
Making: Pour all the ingredients (except cola) in a shaker with ice. Shake once and pour in a highball glass Add a dash of cola and do not add any garnish.

Name: Bonk's Bacardi and Coke
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Bacardi Spice Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '8 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass with ice and garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Bonk's Canisius Crabbie Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients in a cocktail glass, stir well, garnish with a lemon wedge and serve over ice or in a chilled glass.

Name: Bonnie Prince
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. White Wine', '1/4 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

Name: Bonny Doon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '2 tsp. Benedictine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Boo Punch
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1 1/4 oz. Vodka', 'Kool-Aid (Orange)']
Making: Combine orange Kool-Aid and vodka. Add Jagermeister and it will look and taste scary.

Name: Boo-ru
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Boru Vodka', '1 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Pour Boru Vodka and Celtic Crossing Liqueur into a tall iced-filled glass. Fill nearly to the top with orange juice. Add a splash of club soda and garnish with an orange.

Name: Booga Booga
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka (80 proof cheap stuff)', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Apple Cider (Do not use apple juice)', '1/2 oz. Snapple (Raspberry Iced Tea)']
Making: Mix in a highball glass over two ice cubes. Should come out a lovely brown color if mixed properly.

Name: Booger's Booze
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Vodka (100 Proof)', '12 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Combine over ice in a pitcher, stir well and serve in collins glasses.

Name: Bookmaker's Luck
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', 'Orange Juice', 'Lime', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake the vodka and rum with ice, lime and orange juice. Pour into a highball glass filled with 1/3 ice. Fill up with Ginger Ale and then pour the creme de banane on top. Give it one stir and drink it.

Name: Boom Boom
Ingredients: ['1/4 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '3/4 part(s) Sprite', '1 Pineapple chunk']
Making: Mix vodka and Sprite, then add pineapple chunk. The pineapple will make it fizz…

Name: Boomerang #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Bitters', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Boomerang #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rye Whiskey', '3/4 oz. French Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Swedish Punch', '2 dash(es) Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir in a wine glass.

Name: Bootleg
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Stir in a lowball glass.

Name: Bootlegger
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Stir in a lowball glass.

Name: Booty Drop
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Pink Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients together in a cocktail glass and enjoy.

Name: Boozy Maria
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '7-Up']
Making: Fill glass with 7-Up, add peach schnapps and stir.

Name: Bor'Kaan Volshool Ivanova
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Sparkling Water', '6 oz. Lemon Juice', '3 1/2 oz. Sugar', "3 oz. Bor'Kaan (1part bourbon 1part light rum)", '1 1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Combine the sparkling wate, lemon juice and sugar in a small pitche. Stir well. Add the remaining ingredients then chill. Pour into sugar-rimmed glasses filled with ice. Garnish with mint sprigs.

Name: Border Crossing
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '2 tsp. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '4 oz. Cola']
Making: Build in a highball glass and stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Borinquen #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Passion Fruit Syrup', 'dash(es) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Blend and serve in a lowball glass with a straw.

Name: Borinquen #2
