Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 tbsp. Passion Fruit Syrup', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tsp. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Frappe in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Boriqua Power and Ecuadorian Pride Shot
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1 oz. Orange Syrup (Sweet)', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Tropico Liqueur']
Making: Shaken not stirred. Serve in a large bubble cup with 7 ice cubes.

Name: Bosom Caresser #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Madeira']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bosom Caresser #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Orange Curacao', '1 Egg Yolk', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a brandy snifter.

Name: Bosom's Caress
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec (or Curacao)', '1 Egg Yolk', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain in a highball glass.

Name: Bossa Nova
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/4 oz. Galliano', '5 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into an ice cube filled specialty glass. Garnish with a pineapple fruit flag.

Name: Bossier City Icie (Thruth Serum)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Blend with ice and add more grenadine if needed. The finished drink should have the colour of a Cherry Slurpee.

Name: Boston Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Boston Cooler
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. White Rum', 'Club Soda']
Making: Stir lemon juice, sugar, and 2 oz. Club Soda in a collins glass. Fill the glass with cracked ice and add rum. Top with Club Soda and stir. Garnish with a spiral of orange or a lemon peel.

Name: Boston Freeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Mix with 8 oz. of ice until smooth and pour into a wine glass. Garnish with 3 cranberries on a toothpick or a maraschino cherry.

Name: Boston Gold
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Boston Iced Coffee
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Coffee (Cooled)', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Brandy']
Making: Build in a highball glass and stir. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Boston Sidecar
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. White Rum', '3/4 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Boston Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry.

Name: Boston Tea Hardy
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Iced Tea']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a mint sprig.

Name: Boston Tea Party
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Tequila', 'Orange Juice', 'Coca Cola', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Mix alcohol and Sour Mix in a highball glass. Fill the rest of the glass with a 50/50 mix of orange juice and Coca-Cola.

Name: Bottle Cap
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '1 oz. Raspberry Liqueur (Preferably Chambord)', '6 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '2 oz. Cola']
Making: Fill a tulip glass with ice, add the ingredients, mix and serve. Chris comments: It tastes just like Willy Wonkas bottle caps candies.

Name: Bounty Hunter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '2 slice(s) Lemon']
Making: Mix ingredients over ice in a rocks glass. Squeeze in the lemon slices.

Name: Bourble
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bourbon A La Creme
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1 Vanilla Bean']
Making: Stir with ice and chill for a least one hour. Shake well and serve in a white wine glass.

Name: Bourbon A La Kris
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '3 oz. Snapple (Mango Madness flavour)']
Making: Shkae with ice and strain over ice cubes into a lowball glass.

Name: Bourbon and Branch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '4 oz. Water']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Bourbon and Water
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '4 oz. Water']
Making: Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Stir and garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

Name: Bourbon Ball
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Makers Mark Bourbon', '1/2 part(s) Dekuyper Light Creme de Cacao', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Hazelnut Liqueur', '1 part(s) Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a martini glass. Top with cream and garnish with chocolate shavings.

Name: Bourbon Black Hawk #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Sloe Gin']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Bourbon Black Hawk #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Bourbon Cobbler #1
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3 oz. Club Soda', '1 1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the Club Soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full and pour in the Bourbon whiskey. Stir well and garnish with a cherry and orange and lemon slices.

Name: Bourbon Cobbler #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3 oz. Club Soda', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In a large wine glass, dissolve the sugar in the Club Soda. Fill the glass with crushed ice and pour in the Bourbon whiskey. Garnish with strawberry, lime and pineapple wedges.

Name: Bourbon Collins
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into a collins glass. Fill with sparkling water and garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Bourbon Cooler #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '4 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour the Bourbon whiskey and the soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Bourbon Cooler #2
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Grapefruit Juice', '1 1/2 tsp. Almond Extract']
Making: Mix over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a peach slice.

Name: Bourbon County Cowboy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bourbon Daisy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Bourbon Fix
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Water', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake and strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a cherry and a lemon slice.

Name: Bourbon Flip
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 Egg', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Bourbon Highball #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with carbonated water. Stir and garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Bourbon Highball #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour the Bourbon over ice in a highball glass and fill up with Ginger Ale. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

Name: Bourbon Milk Punch #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1/4 tsp. Vanilla Extract']
Making: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Bourbon Milk Punch #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '5 oz. Milk', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In a highball glass dissolve the sugar in the Bourbon whiskey. Add 6 ice cubes and the milk. Stir well. Garnish with cinnamon.

Name: Bourbon Milk Punch #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '5 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Bourbon Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: ['3 dash(es) Bitters', '1 tsp. Water', '1 Sugar Cube', '3 oz. Bourbon Whiskey']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the Bitters and water into the sugar cube. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add the Bourbon whiskey. Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Bourbon On The Rocks
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey']
Making: Stir over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Bourbon Satin
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Bourbon Sidecar
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Bourbon Sling
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Water', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Bourbon Sloe Gin Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Pour over some cracked ice into a chilled collins glass and stir gently. Add 3 ice cubes and top off with sparkling water. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a lemon slice.

Name: Bourbon Society
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey']
Making: Build in a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Bourbon Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Bourbon Street Lemonade
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Absolut New Orleans', '1 part(s) Mango Napa Valley Puree', '4 part(s) Lemonade']
Making:
Combine ingredients and shake vigorously. Pour into a cocktail glass over ice and serve with fresh diced mango.
Being served now through the winter exclusively at Josie's - NYC's innovator in healthier New American cuisine.

Name: Bourbon Street Nightmare
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Knob Creek 100 Proof Bourbon', '3 part(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 part(s) Orange Syrup Blood Orange']
Making: Place all ingredients in a hurricane glass over ice and mix well. Drizzle blood orange syrup over top and garnish with a black licorice stick. Sip and let the nightmares begin.

Name: Bourbon Sunset
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Triple Sec', '1/2 part(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) DeKuyper Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Sloe Gin']
Making: Mix all ingredients and serve tall over ice with a dusting of grated nutmeg, a cherry and a splash of sloe gin on top.

Name: Bourbon Swizzle
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', 'dash(es) Bitters', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Shake all except the Club Soda and strain into a frosted collins glass. Add the Club Soda.

Name: Bourbon Toddy
Ingredients: ['1 Sugar Cube', '2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Water', '1/8 oz. Bitters']
Making: Soak the sugar cube with Bitters and put in a highball glass. Build over ice and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Bourbonella
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Orange Curacao', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bowl Hugger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila (White)', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', "dash(es) Rose's Lime Juice", 'Orange Juice', 'Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill large cup with ice. Pour ingredients in one by one and fill with equal parts of juices and Sweet and Sour Mix. Stir with straw.

Name: Boxcar
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake and strain into a sour glass.

Name: Boy Band (aka NSync)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Mix Midori, Stolichnaya Vanilla Vodka, Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum over ice in a rocks glass. Fill with pineapple juice and add a splash of Sprite. Decorate with a pineapple and cherry.

Name: Boy Toy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cabana Boy Vanilla Spice Rum', '1/2 oz. Cabana Boy Raspberry Rum', '1/2 oz. Cabana Boy Citrus Rum', '1/4 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour liquors into a pint glass. Fill with equal parts cranberry juice and orange juice. Shake. Garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

Name: Bradfords Revenge
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', 'Coca Cola', 'Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Take a tall glass, add the rum, 1/4 a glass of coke, then add Bailey's little by little, mixing constantly. The mixture will fizz very vigorously and may curdle slightly. When well frothed, and creamy, eat with a spoon. Its so fizzy you'll see why you need a spoon! If anyone has heard of this, maybe under a different name, please e-mail Bradley and let him know.

Name: Brain
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps (Strawberry or Butterscotch will also do)', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour schnapps into a highball glass and add Irish Cream into the center of it. Top with grenadine.

Name: Brain Buster
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Beer', '1 oz. Brandy']
Making: Float the brandy in a pint of beer.

Name: Brain Candy
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '6 oz. Mountain Dew', '2 oz. Vodka (Optional)']
Making: Chill and serve.

Name: Brain Damage
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 tsp. Irish Cream']
Making: Pour Irish Cream into middle of the rum and Amaretto in a highball glass.

Name: Brain Pain Killer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Jose Cuervo (Preferably the Jose Cuervo Especial)', '1 oz. Mezcal', '1 oz. Creme de Banane (Optional)']
Making: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass. (You can shake with ice if you want).

Name: Brain Tumor
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 tbsp. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making:
Pour the schnapps into a shot glass and slowly pour the Bailey's into the shot over the back of a table spoon.
Comments and pictures from The Raven
I found that deeply chilled Bailey’s contributed an interesting separation in the shot. It’s really a visual thing. The flavor is pretty close to mint chocolate chip ice cream, or even Thin Mint cookies from the Girl Scouts. This is of course in addition to the fact that it can burn going all the way down.

Name: Brainstorm #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Benedictine', '1 tsp. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Brancusi
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '4 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour over crushed ice in an old fashioned glass and stir.

Name: Brandie's Summer Tea
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Iced Tea']
Making: Fill Tom Collins glass with ice. Add the Bacardi Limon and Amaretto. Fill with iced tea. Garnish with lemon. Can also be made as a slush …same directions.

Name: Brandied Apricot
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh apricot.

Name: Brandied Egg Sour
Ingredients: ['1 Egg', '2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Brandied Ginger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Ginger Brandy', '1 tsp. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a piece of preserved ginger and grated chocolate.

Name: Brandied Madeira
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Madeira']
Making: Stir and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Brandied Port
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Tawny Port', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain in an old-fashioned glass with ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Brandon's Cabana Boy Delight
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grain Alcohol (PGA)', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix grain alcohol and coconut rum over ice in a hurricane glass. Fill up with orange juice. Garnish with a slice of lemon or lime.

Name: Brandy Alexander #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1/4 tsp. Nutmeg (Grated)']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, creme de cacao, and half-and-half. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg. Note from George: Brandy Alexander was John Lennon's favourite drink.

Name: Brandy Alexander #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Heavy Cream', '1/4 tsp. Nutmeg (Grated)']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, creme de cacao, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

Name: Brandy Alexander #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Brandy Alexander (Frozen)
Ingredients: ['2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao dark']
Making: In a blender blend ice cream , brandy and Crème de Cacao until it reaches the consistency of a thick milk shake. Pour into a large stemmed glass and sprinkle with nutmeg . (For chocolate lovers substitute chocolate sprinkles or 'Jimmies' instead of nutmeg.)

Name: Brandy and Soda
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '5 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Pour the brandy and Club Soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Name: Brandy Blazer
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Sugar', '2 oz. Brandy', '1 slice(s) Orange']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in brandy. Add the orange slice. Tilt the glass and carefully ignite the drink with a match. Stir with a long spoon until the flame is extinguished. Strain into a punch cup and garnish with the lemon twist. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Brandy Buck
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and pour into a highball glass. Fill with sparkling water and garnish with seedless grapes.

Name: Brandy Cassis
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Creme de Cassis']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Brandy Cobbler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '3 oz. Club Soda', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the Club Soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the brandy. Stir well. Garnish with a cherry and orange and lemon slices.

Name: Brandy Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/4 tsp. Sugar Syrup', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Brandy Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Orange Curacao', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Brandy Cocktail #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Brandy Collins
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '2 oz. Brandy', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake juice of lemon, brandy, and powdered sugar with cracked ice and strain into a collins glass. Add ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and top with a cherry. Serve with a straw.

Name: Brandy Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '4 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour the brandy and the soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Brandy Crusta Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Use the lemon and sugar to decorate the rim of a cocktail glass. Stir in the ingredients and pour into the cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Brandy Daisy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Brandy Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['1 Egg', '2 oz. Brandy', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain in a tall highball glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Brandy Fix
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Water']
Making: Combine juice of lemon, powdered sugar, and water in a highball glass. Stir, fill with shaved ice, and add brandy. Stir again, garnish with a lemon slice and serve with a straw.

Name: Brandy Fizz #1
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '4 oz. Club Soda']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the Club Soda. Stir well.

Name: Brandy Fizz #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Combine over ice in a lowball glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Brandy Flip
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1 Egg', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the brandy, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Brandy Gump Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Brandy Highball
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', 'Club Soda']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Brandy Julep
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '5 Mint Leaves']
Making: Put sugar, mint leaves, and brandy into a collins glass and fill with finely shaved ice. Stir until mint rises to top, being careful not to bruise leaves. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, orange, or lemon and a cherry.

Name: Brandy Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Brandy Melba
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Peach Brandy', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '4 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a peach slice.

Name: Brandy Milk Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1 cup(s) Milk', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Nutmeg']
Making: Shake brandy, milk, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Name: Brandy Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Brandy', '4 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1 Sugar Cube', 'dash(es) Water']
Making: Muddle the sugar with the bitters and the water in an old-fashioned glass. Add the brandy and some ice cubes. Stir and garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: Brandy Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'dash(es) Maraschino Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Seltzer Water']
Making: Stir in a highball glass. Garnish with mint leaves and a goblet of fruit.

Name: Brandy Rickey
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Seltzer Water']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with seltzer. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Brandy Sangaree
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Water', '1 tbsp. Port', 'Carbonated Water', 'Nutmeg']
Making: Dissolve powdered sugar in 1 Tsp. water. Add brandy and pour into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Float port on top, sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, and serve.

Name: Brandy Sling
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Water', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and brandy. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Brandy Smash #1
Ingredients: ['4 sprig(s) Mint (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1 oz. Club Soda', '2 1/2 oz. Brandy']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the mint sprigs lightly with the sugar and Club Soda. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Add the brandy. Stir well and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Brandy Smash #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 tsp. Sugar', '1 splash(es) Seltzer Water', '4 Mint Leaves (Crushed)', '4 oz. Brandy']
Making: Stir in a champagne flute. Garnish with berries or fruit

Name: Brandy Sour #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Brandy Sour #2
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Brandy', '2/3 oz. Lemon Syrup (Or lemon squash)', 'Soda Water', '5 drop(s) Angostura Bitters']
Making: In a highball glass filled with ice, pour a few drops of angostura, the lemon squash, then the brandy and top up with soda water. Stir well and decorate with a slice of lemon. Serve with two straws. A summer refresher.

Name: Brandy Squirt
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 tbsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Grenadine', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with a stick of pineapple and strawberries.

Name: Brandy Swizzle
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', 'dash(es) Bitters', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, brandy, and Bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice and stir until glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the Club Soda.

Name: Brandy Toddy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Water']
Making: Dissolve powdered sugar in water in an old-fashioned glass. Add brandy and one ice cube and stir. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Brandy Vermouth Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '2 oz. Brandy', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Brandy Water Press
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Tonic Water', 'Water']
Making: Pour the brandy over ice in a collins glass and fill almost to the top with water. Top off with the tonic water.

Name: Brandy-O
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chemineaud Fine Brandy', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Serve in a cocktail glass with ice cubes. Garnish with an orange slice and serve with a stirrer.

Name: Brantini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', 'dash(es) Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin']
Making: Stir all ingredients with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Brasileirinha
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Cachaca', '1 oz. Lemon Juice or lime', '2 tbsp. Brown Sugar', '1 Banana', '1 dash(es) Cinnamon optional']
Making: Fill a glass 2/3 full of ice cubes. Blend all ingredients well and pour over ice. If desired, the ice could be blended along with the ingredients.

Name: Brass Buck
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Red Stag Kentucky Bourbon', '1 1/2 oz. Cruzan Estate Light Rum Two Years', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Fill a highball glass 3/4 full of ice. Pour Red Stag, Light Rum and Orange Juice. Give a good stir.

Name: Brass Fiddle
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Whiskey', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Blend first four ingredients with ice until smooth. Swirl grenadine in a Parfait glass and pour in mixture. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a cherry.

Name: Brass Monkey #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into an 8 oz. glass and fill with orange juice and ice. Stir and serve.

Name: Brass Monkey (ghetto)
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Olde English 800 (1 - 40 oz. bottle)', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Take an ice cold 40 of Olde English 800 and gulp it down to the top of the label. Pour in orange juice until the bottle is full, shake or turn it over, then gulp. You don't want this to get warm, trust me. Best parts of this drink are that the total cost is really low and the Olde English still have the small mouth bottles built for chugging.

Name: Brass Monkey (The Real Deal)
Ingredients: ['40 oz. Malt Liquor', '2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Drink the 40oz of Malt Liquor down to the top of the label. Add Southern Comfort and fill to top of bottle with orange juice.

Name: Brave Bull #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur']
Making: Pour tequila and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and stir. Garnish with a twist of lemon and serve.

Name: Brave Bull with Cream
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Milk']
Making: Mix over ice and add milk to taste.

Name: Brazen Hussy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (or Sour Mix)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Brazil Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Sherry', '1 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Anis', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Brazilian Firecracker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '5 Blueberries', '5 Pomegranate(s)', 'Club Soda']
Making: Muddle 5 blueberries and 5 pomegranates in a mixing glass. Add 2.0 oz VeeV and ice in a cocktail shaker and shake. Pour into a lowball glass and top with club soda.

Name: Brazilian Mimosa
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Champagne', '3 oz. Condensed Milk']
Making: Pour orange juice and condensed milk in mixer for a few seconds. Mix that with the champagn. Often drunk in Brazil during New Year's Eve.

Name: Brazilian Rickey
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '1 slice(s) Lemon', '1 slice(s) Lime', '1 slice(s) Orange', '3 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Shake the VeeV and citrus wedges with ice and pour into a highball glass adding additional ice if necessary. Top with tonic. Stir and garnish with a citrus wheel.

Name: Brazilian Roman Candle
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '2 Raspberries', '2 slice(s) Strawberries', 'Champagne']
Making: Muddle the raspberries and the strawberry slices in a mixing glass. Add 2.0 oz of VeeV, a dash of sugar and ice in a cocktail shaker and shake. Strain and pour into a champagne flute and top with champagne. Sprinkle Pop Rocks into the flute just prior to serving.

Name: Brazilian Rose
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '1/2 tsp. Rose Water', '1 oz. Heavy Cream', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously, strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a rose pedal.

Name: Brazilian Thyme
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 wedge(s) Lemon', 'Thyme']
Making: Muddle 2 lemon wedges, 1/2 orange and thyme in a mixing glass, add 2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit and ice in a cocktail shaker and shake. Pour into a glass.

Name: Breakfast Of Champions
Ingredients: ['1/4 cup(s) Kahlua', '1/2 cup(s) Milk', '2 cup(s) Cereal (Preferably Golden Grahams)']
Making: Pour the cereal into a bowl, add the Kahlua and let it soak in. Add the milk and enjoy!

Name: Breast Caresser
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Madeira', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass over crushed ice.

Name: Breastmilk
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ouzo', '2 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Breezy Point
Ingredients: ['1/3 part(s) Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '2/3 part(s) Strawberry Daiquiri Mix']
Making: Mix in any type of glass.

Name: Brian's Belief
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '4 oz. Tea (Cold)']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, creme de cacao, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the tea and stir well.

Name: Brian's Medicinal Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Everclear', '6 oz. Cranapple Juice']
Making: Combine over ice into a highball glass.

Name: Brickshire Bomb
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', 'Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Pour in a rocks glass over ice and fill with Red Bull.

Name: Brief Encounter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Coconut Liqueur', '1 scoop(s) Sherbet (Orange)', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Blend the sorbet and the alcohol until smooth, and drizzle with the grenadine. Serve in a tall glass, with lemon slices.

Name: Brighton Punch
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Benedictine', '1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 Lemon Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over shaved ice into a collins glass. Top up with club Soda and stir. Garnish with orange and lemon slices and a straw.

Name: Brighton Tea
Ingredients: ['1 sprig(s) Rosemary', '1 stick(s) Cinnamon', '2 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1/2 tsp. Honey', '3 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake the Bombay Sapphire Gin vigorously with the rosemary, cinnamon stick and honey over ice. Strain into a punch glass or teacup and float the milk on top. Garnish with a few grains of freshly cracked black pepper.

Name: Bring The Noise - Anthrax
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1 1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Don Q Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Velvet Falernum']
Making:
Combine all ingredients with Ice, shake and strain into a tall glass.
In honor of the Big 4 (Metallica, Slayer, Anthrax and Megadeth) playing Yankee Stadium, Jagermeister, a brand known for rocking the music scene, has come up with some metal cocktails….

Name: Brittany
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Amer Picon', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Brivari
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Brandy', '6 oz. Rum', '6 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Pour into a liqueur glasses. May be served on the rocks if desired.

Name: Broken Down Golf Cart #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Melon', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Broken Down Golf Cart #5
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a cocktail glass. Or just pour straight into a shot glass.

Name: Broken Leg
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Apple Cider (Warm)']
Making: Mix in a tall glass and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Broken Nose
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila (Golden)', '1 1/2 oz. Advocaat', '2 oz. Grenadine', 'Lemonade']
Making: Mix tequila and grenadine together in a highball glass. Add Advocaat, making sure it does not properly mix and remains phlegm like. Dilute to desired strength with lemonade.

Name: Broken Spur Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Port', '1/4 tsp. Triple Sec']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Bronx Ain't So Sweet
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bronx Cheer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Apricot Brandy', 'Raspberry Soda']
Making: Pour the brandy in a collins glass filled with ice cubes and add the soda. Stir gently and garnish with some fresh raspberries and an orange peel.

Name: Bronx Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Bronx Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 Orange (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the slice of an orange.

Name: Bronx Golden Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1/4 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Bronx Silver Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass.

Name: Bronx Terrace Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Brooklyn
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Maraschino Liqueur', 'dash(es) Amer Picon']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Brooklynite
Ingredients: ['dash(es) Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Honey', '2 oz. Jamaica Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Brown Bear
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Pepper Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur (Preferably Caffe Sport Espresso Liqueur)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a stemmed glass.

Name: Brown Bomber #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peanut Liqueur', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Brown Bomber #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Whiskey (Preferably Glenmorangie)']
Making: Stir well over ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: Brown Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. White Rum', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Brown Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir well over ice cubes and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a kumquat.

Name: Brown Cow #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Milk']
Making: Fill highball glass with ice, add Kahlua and top with milk. Stir. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Brown Cow #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tia Maria (Or to taste)', 'Milk (Cold)']
Making: Mix and serve.

Name: Brown Dick With A Kick
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Brandy (Preferably Korbel)', '1/3 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix and serve well chilled.

Name: Brown Eye
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Rose Water']
Making: Stir and serve over ice in cocktail glass.

Name: Brown Russian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Chocolate Syrup', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Mix over ice and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Brown Sugar
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Sprite', '1 part(s) Pisang Ambon', '3 part(s) Strawberry Mix', '2 part(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix together and enjoy with ice cubes.

Name: Brugal Caribbean Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brugal Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Sugar Syrup', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: In a shaker with ice, combine ingredients, shake well and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Brugal Golden Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brugal Anejo Rum', '10 leaf(leaves) Mint', '1/2 Lime', '2 tbsp. Sugar Syrup', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Using a muddler or a wooden spoon, crush mint leaves and lime in a tall glass. Cover with bar syrup and fill glass with ice. Add Brugal Anejo Rum. Fill glass with ginger ale. Mix all ingredients. Garnish with a sprig of mint. Drink and enjoy.

Name: Brugal Maria Pickford
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brugal Blanco Rum Especial', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with cherry.

Name: Brugal Santo Libre
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brugal Anejo Rum', '1 squirt(s) Lime Juice', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour Brugal Anejo Rum over ice in a tall glass. Add a squeeze of fresh lime juice. Fill with lemon lime soda. Stir and enjoy.

Name: Brugal Splash
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brugal Anejo Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour Brugal Anejo Rum over ice in a tall glass. Add pineapple juice, splash of lemon lime soda.

Name: Bruised and Bloody
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Tomato Juice', '3 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1/3 oz. Lime Juice', '1 pinch(es) Black Pepper', '1/2 oz. Argentinean Malbec']
Making:
Add all ingredients, except Malbec, to shaker with ice; hard-shake. Strain over ice, then float Malbec on top of drink against the back of a bar spoon to help retain a separation of layers.
A distinct tasting and full-flavored “hangover cure,” the addition of red wine gives this drink amazing depth and complexity.
Created By Darren Geraghty
Darren Geraghty is the head mixologist at Dublin’s Exchequer Pub and winner of the first-ever Irish Open Cocktail Competition. A lifetime Dubliner, Darren’s creations are contemporary with an Irish twist.

Name: Bruiser (Blue)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao', 'Sprite']
Making: Shake the gin and the juices over ice and strain over ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Fill with Sprite and add the curacao.

Name: Bruiser (Red)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Sprite']
Making: Shake the gin and the juices over ice and strain over ice cubes in a cocktail glass. Fill with Sprite and add the grenadine.

Name: Bruja Mexicana
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Strega', '1/2 oz. Agavero Tequila Liqueur', 'Soda Water', 'dash(es) Sugar Syrup']
Making: Blend the Stega and the tequila with crushed ice. Moist the rim of a collins glass with lemon and frost with sugar. Add a little sugar syrup and fill with soda.

Name: Brutal Hammer
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Red Wine (French)', '7 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix in a large glass, pray to God, then slam it!

Name: Bryce's Erotic Dance of Freedom
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. DeKuyper Key Largo Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a Boston Shaker. Do an erotic dance while shaking (hence the name) and serve in a hurricane glass.

Name: Bu-Dew Child
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Mountain Dew', '10 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Mix in a 24 oz. glass.

Name: Bubble Gum
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Milk']
Making: Build in a lowball glass and fill with milk. Top with grenadine.

Name: Bubblegum Shaker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and serve in shots glasses. Tastes sweet like a bubblegum milkshake and not to mention easy to drink!!

Name: Bubblegum Sundae
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Blend with ice (except grenadine) until slushy. Pour into a tall glass, and add the grenadine which should slowly sink down the side of the glass.

Name: Bubblin' Blue
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Champagne or sparkling wine']
Making: Pour Grand Marnier and Blue Curacao into a flute glass. Drop one ice cube into the glass. Fill with chilled Champagne. Garnish with orange slice.

Name: Bubbly And Fuzzy
Ingredients: ['1/3 part(s) Peach Schnapps', '2/3 part(s) Sprite']
Making: Mix and serve in a rocks glass. Could be mixed half and half if desired.

Name: Bubbly Red Sex
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Tonic Water']
Making: Pour liquors and grenadine over ice into medium size drinking glass. Fill the glass halfway up with tonic water and enjoy.

Name: Bubbly Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Vodka', '6 part(s) Orange Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Mix vodka with orange juice and then add soda.

Name: Bucabeer
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Root Beer', '1 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Mix over ice in a rocks glass and enjoy.

Name: Buck - n - Cola
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Pendleton Whisky', 'Cola']
Making: Serve on the rocks.

Name: Buck Jones
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Sweet Sherry', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour rum, sherry, and juice of lime in a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with Ginger Ale, stir, and serve.

Name: Buck Shot
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Red Stag Kentucky Bourbon']
Making: Simple neat shot, served chilled.

Name: Buck's Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', 'Champagne (Chilled)']
Making: Serve in a tall glass.

Name: Buck-A-Roo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum (Preferably white rum)', "Root Beer (Preferably Dad's Root Beer)"]
Making: Mix and drink. Piers' comment: I find it worth mentioning that if you find the right combination of white rum with Dad's Root Beer, this drink will not simply taste like rum mixed with root beer, instead it will taste like a very sweet drink.

Name: Bucking Bronco
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Pendleton Whisky', '1 part(s) Seltzer Water']
Making: Serve on the rocks.

Name: Buddha's Banshee
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/4 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '3 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake well. Pour into ice cube filled cocktail glass. Garnish with a pinch of nutmeg.

Name: Buddy Rich
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '3/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Frangelico', 'Half and Half Cream']
Making: Build the ingredients into a rock-filled highball glass and top off with half and half.

Name: Buddy's Bloody Mary
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. V 8 Juice', '1 tsp. Horseradish', '1/2 tsp. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '4 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce (Or to taste)', '4 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce (Or to taste)', 'Celery Salt (To taste)', 'Pepper (To taste)']
Making: Pour some ice cubes in a highball glass, grind some pepper on top and add some celery salt to make seasoned ice cubes. Then shake well all the ingredients and pour the mixture over the ice cubes. Squeeze a lime slice over the drink and drop it in the glass.

Name: Buddy's Favourite
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '6 oz. Water (Cold)']
Making: Mix in a highball glass.

Name: Buffalicious
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '10 Grapes (green)', '15 piece(s) Ginger', '1/2 oz. Peach Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Peach Nectar', '1/2 oz. Ginger Juice']
Making: Muddle ginger and grapes and add rest of ingredients to a shaker. Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a couple of grapes.

Name: Buffalo Bloom
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Martini and Rossi Bianco', '1 dash(es) Vermouth (Punt e mes)', '1/2 tsp. Honey Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a mint leaf.

Name: Buffalo Blush
Ingredients: ['3 Strawberries', '1/4 oz. Vanilla Syrup', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', 'Ginger Beer']
Making: Muddle strawberries and shake all except ginger beer with ice. Strain into a rocks glass and top with ginger beer.

Name: Buffalo Cum
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Mix well with ice until the mixture has a syrup consistency. Strain and serve.

Name: Buffalo Fiesta
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '8 Mint Leaves', '1 tbsp. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Mango Nectar', '1 dash(es) Mango Liqueur', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Stir with ice in a tall glass and top with Ginger Ale.

Name: Buffalo in Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Buffalo Julep
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '10 Mint Leaves', '1/3 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Pour into a Julep cup filled with ice. Stir well and fill with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Buffalo Julep Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar', '5 Mint Leaves', 'Club Soda']
Making: Cut mint into fine pieces, mix and pour into a tall glass, partially filled with ice. Fill with club soda and garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Buffalo Lemon Lager
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '12 oz. Lager', '12 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '12 oz. Limeade (frozen, contentrate)']
Making: Fill a pitcher half with ice and add limeade and lemon lime soda. Stir and add the rest of the ingredients.

Name: Buffalo Slushy
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/3 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Blend with ice and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Buffalo Stampede
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1 oz. Rum', '1 dash(es) Triple Sec']
Making: Serve on the rocks in a highball glass.

Name: Buffalo Stance
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1/4 part(s) Cherry Cordial', '4 part(s) Lemonade']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Buffalo Trace Banana Split
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1 oz. Double Cream', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 dash(es) Grand Marnier']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Buffalo Trace Blender
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Blend with a cup of ice until smooth and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Buffalo Twist
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '3 wedge(s) Apple', '2 wedge(s) Pear', '1/3 oz. Pear Schnapps', '1 pinch(es) Ginger']
Making: Muddle fruit and shake all with ice. Strain into a tall glass and garnish with pear slices.

Name: Buffalo Zoo
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Barton's Long Island Mix", '1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill 23oz. Schooner with rocks. Add Barton's Long Island Mix, Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey, Black Raspberry Liqueur and Sloe Gin. Fill with equal parts orange, cranberry and pineapple juice. Garnish with orange slice and 2 cherries. Stir and enjoy!

Name: Buffalo-Cherry Slush
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Water', '1 can(s) Orange Juice (frozen, concentrate)', '1 can(s) Lemonade (frozen, concentrate)', '1 cup(s) Cherry Juice', '2 cup(s) Buffalo Trace Bourbon']
Making: Stir in a large bowl and let rest in the fridge until chilled. Blend mixture with ice and serve in margarita glasses. Garnish with a lemon slice and a mint sprig.

Name: Buffalovin’
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a hurricane glass and garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Bukhara Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '3/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 cup(s) Coffee (Hot or cold)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix vodka, Bailey's Irish Cream and creme de cacao in a large preheated mug. Pour in boiling hot coffee and top with whipped cream. For a cold drink, chill all the ingredients until ice cold. Mix in a chilled, stemmed glass and top with whipped cream. A scoop of vanilla or chocolate ice cream may be added to cold version.

Name: Bull and Bear
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Orange Curacao', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tbsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Bull Cum
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Crown Royal']
Making: Pour over 5 ice cubes in a lowball glass. Stir and let sit for 3 to 5 minutes, then enjoy.

Name: Bull Dog Cooler
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Cointreau', '4 oz. Orange Juice', 'Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with water.

Name: Bull Rush
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Absinthe', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink', '1 dash(es) Black Currant Juice optinal']
Making: Add vodka, absinthe and blackcurrent juice over ice in a tall glass. Fill with Red Bull Energy Drink.

Name: Bull Shot
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Beef Bouillon (Chilled)', 'dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', 'dash(es) Salt', 'dash(es) Pepper']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Bull's Eye
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '2 oz. Cider', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour brandy and cider into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with Ginger Ale, stir, and serve.

Name: Bull's Milk
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 cup(s) Milk', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake rum, brandy, milk, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with nutmeg and a pinch of cinnamon and serve.

Name: Bulldog
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Add gin to highball glass, fill with Club Soda, add splash orange juice

Name: Bulldog Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bulleit and Cola
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '2 oz. Cola']
Making: Stir with cracked ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Bulleit and Ginger Ale
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '2 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Stir with cracked ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Bulleit and Soda Water
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '2 oz. Soda Water']
Making: Stir with cracked ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Bulleit Bourbon Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['2 slice(s) Orange', '2 Cherries Kirsch Soaked', '1 Sugar Cube Soaked in bitters', '1 1/3 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '1 tsp. Honey', '1 splash(es) Elderflower Syrup']
Making: In a mixing glass, muddle the oranges, cherries and sugar cube. Add the Bulleit Bourbon, a splash of Elderflower syrup and honey.

Name: Bulleit Bourbon Perfect Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 Maraschino Cherries', '1 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '1/3 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2/3 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: In a shaker, combine Bulleit Bourbon, Dry Vermouth, and Sweet Vermouth. Shake and pour over an ice-filled mixing glass. Add dash of bitters and garnish with a Maraschino cherry.

Name: Bulleit on the Rocks
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Bulleit Bourbon']
Making: Stir with cracked ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Bullshot
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Beef Bouillon (Cold)', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '4 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', 'Tabasco Sauce (To taste)', 'Celery Salt (To taste)', 'Pepper (Freshly ground and to taste)']
Making: Mix with ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: Bum F**ker
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Bumbo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '1/4 tsp. Nutmeg (Ground)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Bumpy Grapefruit
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Bunky Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Grape Juice']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Bunnae On Top
Ingredients: ['2 oz. E & J VS Brandy', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Serve on the rocks in a cocktail glass. Garnish with two cherries.

Name: Bunny Bonzana
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Apple Brandy', '3 dash(es) Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '3/4 tsp. Maple Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Burgundy Bishop
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Red Wine']
Making: Shake rum, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with red wine and stir. Decorate with various fruits and serve.

Name: Burgundy Bubbler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Burgundy Wine', '4 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Serve over ice in a large wine glass. Garnish with lemon, lime and orange slices.

Name: Buried Treasure
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Kahlua', '6 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a swirl of whipped cream.

Name: Burnette Russian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '4/5 oz. Vodka', 'Chocolate Milk']
Making: Pour Kahlua and vodka over ice in a rocks glass. Top up with chocolate milk.

Name: Burning Love #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur (Burnt)', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Peychaud Bitters', 'Fee Brothers Aztec Chocolate Bitters']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a tall mixing tin, including the bitters, excluding the Drambuie, shake vigorously and set aside. Pour 1/2 oz Drambuie in a doubled mini tin and ignite with a match or lighter. (A match is preferable to avoid gas expose. A doubled mini tin is important to protect the hands against heat.) Pour ignited Drambuie directly from the mini tins into a coup or cocktail glass. The spirit should remain aflame inside the glass. Briefly re-shake and Hawthorn strain cold mixture on top of flaming Drambuie, dousing the flames. Garnish with a saddled red tulip bulb or lime slice.

Name: Burning Sun
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and stir. Garnish with a fresh strawberry.

Name: Burnt Embers
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Burr Cutter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bundaberg Rum', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Milk']
Making: Add Bundaberg Rum and Kahlua over ice in a 7 oz. glass. Fill with milk.

Name: Buschwacker #6
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao light', '2 tbsp. Coco Lopez', 'Milk', 'Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 sprinkle(s) Nutmeg']
Making: Mix over ice in blender. Pour and serve in old fashioned glasses. Top with a cherry if desired.

Name: Bushranger
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Rouge)', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Dubonnet, and Bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Bushwacker #1
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Nutmeg']
Making: Fill blender 3/4 with ice . Add vodka, Grand Marnier, Kahlua and Amaretto. Fill the blender with Irish cream, and blend until smooth

Name: Bushwacker #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 can(s) Coconut Milk', '3/4 cup(s) Milk']
Making: Pour all ingredients in blender and gradually add ice until thickened. Serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Bushwacker #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Blend all the ingredients then add enough ice to fill the blender. Blend again until frozen. Serve in cocktail glasses and top with FRESH grated nutmeg. A note from Joel: I learned to make this one in a little bar on St. John, USVI....Enjoy!

Name: Bushwacker #4
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Pineapple (Crushed)']
Making: Blend, adding ice gradually, until thickened. Serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Bushwacker (Original)
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Rum (Preferably Pusser's Rum)", '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Fill a blender half-full with ice and blend until smooth. Pour into a collins glass and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

Name: Busted Cherry #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Cherry Brandy', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', 'Grenadine']
Making: Combine the ingredients in a highball glass and serve.

Name: Butt Sex On The Beach
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 sprinkle(s) Chocolate (Shredded)']
Making: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice. Line the rim of the glass with chocolate. Stir well.

Name: Buttafuoco
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Tequila', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Cherry', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into a highball glass. Fill with club soda, stir gently and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Butter Finger
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Milk']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice and add alcohol. Fill with milk and serve with a sip straw.

Name: Butter Shots
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Butter Smucker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', "1 tsp. Smucker's Butterscotch Syrup"]
Making: Put Smucker's Butterscotch syrup in the bottom of a shot glass. Add the Butterschotch Schnapps and Bailey's Irish Cream. Mix and drink.

Name: Butter Swirl
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Strawberry Swirl Ice Cream', '1 oz. Butter Shots', '1 Banana']
Making: Add strawberry swirl ice cream, Butter Shots and the banana in a blender. Blend 1 minute on blend, then whip for 1 minute. Pour into a Highball glass and drink cold with a straw.

Name: Butterball
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Vodka (Optional)', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream (Or to taste)']
Making: Mix and pour over ice. May also be served as a warm drink.

Name: Buttered Brandy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur']
Making: Pour into a glass over ice and mix. Add water if you plan to drink before the ice melts.

Name: Buttered Pancakes
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '6 oz. Pepsi Cola']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in scotch glass, and pound like a mutha (add ice if desired.) Pleasant taste of maple syrup.

Name: Butterf**kyouup
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Butter Shots', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Milk']
Making: Pour the alcohol into a hurricane glass filled with ice, top up with milk and shake.

Name: Butterfinger
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Butter Shots']
Making: Add to a hurricane glass filled with ice and shake.

Name: Butterflies Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Applejack', '1/4 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Buttermilk
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', 'Milk']
Making: Pour butterscotch schnapps into a highball glass and add milk. Stir well, otherwise the butterscotch sits on the bottom and sometimes curds.

Name: Buttermint Delight
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Butter Shots', '2 scoop(s) Ice Cream (Mint chocolate chip ice cream)']
Making: Blend until smooth and serve with a straw in a collins glass.

Name: Butterscotch Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '4 oz. Eggnog']
Making: Mix schnapps with eggnog in a glass and sprinkle with nutmeg (optional).

Name: Butterscotch Kiss
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Everclear', '2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '4 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Butterscotch Milkshake
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Butter Shots', '1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', 'Half and Half Cream']
Making: Fill a pint glass with ice. Add Butter Shots and Stolichnaya Vanilla Vodka. Top up with half and half cream. Pour into a blender and blend until smooth. Pour back into the pint glass and serve.

Name: Buttery Buzz
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Butter Shots', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 squirt(s) Chocolate Syrup', 'Milk']
Making: Blend over ice for a very satisfying frozen drink. Serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Button Hook Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Anis', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Buzz Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Benedictine', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Champagne']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with champagne.

Name: Buzzer
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Windsor Canadian Whisky', '1/6 oz. Orange Juice', '1/6 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1/6 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/6 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Shake and enjoy!

Name: Buzzsaw
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Citrus Juice (i.e. Five Alive)', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

Name: By Any Other Name
Ingredients: ['2 oz. SENCE Traditional Rose Nectar', "1 1/2 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '1/2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 dash(es) Simple Syrup (Sonoma Syrup Pomegranate Infused)']
Making:
Garnish with a red rose petal dusted with Argento Fino edible silver flakes.
Created by Sean Bigley, The Ultimate Bar Chef

Name: By The Pool
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '7-Up', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix Midori and peach schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Top with equal amounts of 7-Up and orange juice. Decorate with an orange wheel if desired.

Name: Byrrh Cassis
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Byrrh', '1 oz. Creme de Cassis', 'Sparkling Water (Chilled)']
Making: Mix in a wine glass with some ice cubes and fill with sparkling water.

Name: Byrrh Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Byrrh', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Byrrh Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Byrrh', '1 oz. Gin']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: C 2
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Courvoisier Rose', '1 1/2 part(s) Courvoisier Cognac VSOP', '1/4 part(s) Agave Nectar', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake well and strain into a stemless wine glass. Garnish with a flamed orange peel.

Name: C C Kazi
Ingredients: ['1 1/8 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 tsp. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cordial glass.

Name: C. M. Spiceberry
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '3 oz. Strawberries', '1 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Blend all ingredients in a blender with a scoop of crushed ice.

Name: C2 (Cupid's Cocktail)
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Courvoisier Rose', '1 1/2 part(s) Courvoisier Cognac VSOP', '1/4 part(s) Agave Nectar', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Bitters']
Making: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a coup glass. Garnish with a flamed orange peel.

Name: C2K
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Apple Pucker', 'Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Shake and serve in a Tom Collins glass.

Name: Cabana Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beachcomber Coconut Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Mr. Boston Blue Curacao']
Making: Serve over ice.

Name: Cabana Shrub
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cabana Cachaca', '1 oz. Raspberry Syrup * Shrub Syrup see below', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making:
Build in a short ice filled glass. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with a sugar cane stick.
The Cabana Shrub was created by Bridget Albert
* Shrub Syrup
1 cup white vinegar
1 cup sugar
2 pint fresh raspberries
Splash of water
Bring ingredients to a boil. Stir. Reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Strain into a glass bottle.

Name: Cabaret
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Benedictine', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, Benedictine, and Bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Cabernet Cobbler
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Cabernet (Chilled)', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '2 oz. Sparkling Water (Chilled)']
Making: In a large wine glass, dissolve the sugar in the lemon juice and the water. Add the some cracked ice and pour the claret. Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Cablegram
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Stir blended Scotch whisky, lemon juice and powdered sugar with ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with Ginger Ale, stir, and serve.

Name: Cabo Wabo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '3/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', "1 splash(es) Lime Juice (Preferably Rose's)"]
Making: Fill shaker with ice and first 4 ingredients and shake vigorously. Pour into a margarita glass and add the lime juice. No salt please...leads to high blood pressure!

Name: Cachaca and Cola
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cachaca Fazenda Mae de Ouro', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour cachaça into a tall glass filled with ice. Add Coca-Cola.

Name: Cactus
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend ingredients with ice and serve in a daiquiri glass with a lime flag. A refreshing melon flavoured colada.

Name: Cactus Berry
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Tequila', '1 1/4 oz. Red Wine', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '6 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: salt the rim of a large margarita or cocktail glass. Shake with ice and pour into a the salted glass.

Name: Cactus Bite
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Triple Sec', '2 tsp. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cactus Cola
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Parfait Amour', 'Cola', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Mix with ice in a highball glass.

Name: Caddy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice', 'Kool-Aid']
Making: Pour the vodka in a glass. Add orange juice and Kool Aid Mix until glass is full, stir with a spoon and serve chilled.

Name: Cadillac Rio Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Sauza Blue Silver Tequila', '1 part(s) JDK and Sons O3 Premium Orange Liqueur', '1 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 part(s) Agave Nectar']
Making: Shake all the ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange on the rim.

Name: Cadiz
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dry Sherry', '3/4 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a old-fashioned glass.

Name: Caesar
Ingredients: ['5 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce', '3 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '1 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Clamato Juice']
Making: Salt the rim of a highball glass and pour ingredients in. Garnish with a lime slice or a celery stick. A note from Ray: If you add a 1/2 oz. of lemon juice it gives the drink a delightful bite.

Name: Caesar Salad
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '1 dash(es) Hot Sauce (Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce)', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice', "Mott's Clamato Juice", 'Cheese (Parmesan)']
Making: Use the parmesan cheese around the rim of your glass. Add all the ingredients over lots of ice and stir well. If you have real parmesan (grated not powdered Kraft stuff) then you can sprinkle some on top as well (the powdered stuff tends to look pretty ugly in the drink).Try the Hot Chili Sauce (the kind in with the rooster on it that's on the table in lots of Thai and Vietnamese restaurants) instead of Tabasco in any drink. I think it's 10 times better.

Name: Cafe Antrim
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1 tsp. Cognac', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Coffee']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange wedge.

Name: Cafe Au Kirsch
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kirsch', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Egg White', 'Coffee']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass and fill with coffee.

Name: Cafe Cabana
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Pour into a collins glass and stir. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Cafe De Paris Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Anis', '1 tsp. Light Cream', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cafe Romano
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca (White)', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cafe San Juan
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '4 oz. Coffee (Cold and Strong)', 'Sugar']
Making: Pour coffee and rum into ice cube filled hi-ball glass. Add sugar to taste. Garnish with a lemon peel twist.

Name: Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Cachaca', '8 wedge(s) Lime', '2 tsp. Granulated Sugar']
Making: Muddle the sugar into the lime wedges in an old-fashioned glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour the cachaca into the glass. Stir well.

Name: Caipirinha (the real Brazilian Way)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cachaca', '1 Lime', '3/4 oz. Sugar Syrup']
Making: Cut the lime lengthways(not across the middle). Then cut out the central stem using two 45 degree incisions on each side of the stem. Now deeply cut but not all the way through twice width ways. Place the two identically dissected lime halves into your tumbler/ old fashioned glass. Add the sugar syrup. Squash the lime and sugar together with a muddler. Fill the glass with crushed ice and top with cacahaca. Stir throughly and drink with short straws (and some friends!!)

Name: Caipirissima
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '2 tbsp. Sugar', '2 Limes (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Pour white rum into rocks glass over ice, add sugar, squeeze limes over top, stir.

Name: Caiprinha The Little Peasant Girl
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Cachaca Fazenda Mae de Ouro', '1/2 Lime Tahiti', '2 tbsp. Sugar Superfine Cane']
Making:
Cut off the ends of the lime and cut it into eight even wedges. Be sure to remove the white core. Sprinkle the sugar over 4 lime slices in the bottom of an old-fashioned glass. With a wood pestle; press only the core of the fruit, without pressing the rind. This prevents the drink from becoming sour. Fill the glass with crushed ice and add Cachaça Fazenda Mãe de Ouro. Shake or stir well. Serve in a glass decorated with a slice of lime.
Fresh Fruit Variations – Try Pineapple, Kiwi, Strawberry, Cherry or Passion Fruit.

Name: Caitian Tongue Tickler
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Pineapple (Pieces)', '1/3 oz. Grenadine', '3 oz. Pineapple Flavoured Wine']
Making: Fill a highball glass 2/3 full of pineapple pieces and pour in grenadine. Fill with the wine.

Name: Cajun Martini
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Beer', '1 Olive(s) (pimento, stuffed)']
Making: Pour cold beer into a glass and add the olive.

Name: Caleigh
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cali and Mass
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Vodka', '1 can(s) Limeade', 'Beer (To fill the blender up…but not too full)']
Making: Mix in a blender with ice and serve.

Name: Caliente
Ingredients: ['3 chunk(s) Pineapple', '2 slice(s) Ginger', '1/2 oz. Cactus Juice', '1/6 piece(s) Lime', '1 1/2 oz. Partida Reposado Tequila', '1/2 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Muddle the first four ingredients, add the Partida, shake and serve on the rocks. Top off with the ginger ale. Garnish with a crystalized ginger.

Name: California Cadillac
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Brandy', '1 part(s) Creme de Cacao white', '1 part(s) Galliano', '3 part(s) Cream']
Making: Stir and serve over ice in a cocktail glass or… blend with ice and serve.

Name: California Dream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the tequila, sweet vermouth, and dry vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: California Lemonade #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tbsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/4 tsp. Grenadine', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over shaved ice. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Decorate with slices of orange and lemon. Add the a cherry and serve with a straw.

Name: California Lemonade #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Sweet)', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'Sour Mix']
Making: In a shaker add alcohol, lime juice, dash of grenadine and dash of Sour Mix. Shake well and pour into a highball glass with ice. Fill with Sour Mix and float the remaining grenadine on top (you can add extra grenadine for desired sweetness). Garnish with a lemon wheel and a cherry.

Name: California Liquid Cocaine
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Southern Comfort', '1 part(s) Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour equal parts of Southern Comfort and Amaretto in a large tumbler filled with ice. (Glass should be 3/4 full) Add the Malibu Rum and top off with pineapple juice. Stir. Beautiful colour layers are created.

Name: California Mother F**ker
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Rum', '3/4 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Combine the alcohol and sour mix over ice in a highball glass. Top up with cranberry juice Garnish with a lime slice if desired. Tastes just like Hi-C fruit punch.

Name: California Root Beer #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Galliano', '2 oz. Club Soda', '1 oz. Cola', '1 splash(es) Beer']
Making: Serve in a highball glass.

Name: California Root Beer #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Soda Water', 'Galliano']
