Making: Build in a large rocks or highball glass filled with ice. Pour Kahlua and fill with soda water. Float the Galliano and mix with a straw. It tastes like root beer.

Name: California Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Lemon', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a shaker 1/2 full of ice and pour in ingredients. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass. Drizzle Chambord to give the final liquid a light purple haze. Thus the name California Sunset

Name: California Surfer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Jagermeister', '1 1/2 part(s) Coconut Rum', '5 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a tall ice filled glass. Shake and garnish with a slice of orange and enjoy!

Name: Calm Voyage
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Strega', '1 tbsp. Passion Fruit Syrup', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/2 Egg White']
Making: Combine all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

Name: Caltech Cocktail
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Water']
Making: Pour into glass...drink. Repeat if desired.

Name: Calypso
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gold Rum', '1 tsp. Falernum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Calypso Colada
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beachcomber Coconut Rum', '3 tbsp. Coconut Milk', '3 tbsp. Pineapple Crushed']
Making: Serve over ice in a hurricane glass.

Name: Calypso Cooler
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Shake well. Pour into ice cube filled collins or specialty glass. Top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with an orange flag.

Name: Cam2 Racing Fuel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Everclear', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Mix over ice in a collins glass and top off with Coca-Cola. Give to enemies only!

Name: Cambridge
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Grey Goose Vodka', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Milk']
Making: Serve over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Camel Piss
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Beer (Preferably Canadian Beer)', '2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Bacardi Dark Rum', '1 oz. Ouzo', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Fill a large glass with the spirits and top up with mountain dew... best served to the rookie.

Name: Cameron's Kick Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Scotch', '3/4 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Campari Americano
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Campari', '1 oz. Cinzano Rosso Vermouth', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Pour Campari and Cinzano Rosso Vermouth over ice in a rocks or highball glass. Add a splash of club soda. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Campari Safari
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Campari', '1 oz. Gin', 'Tonic Water', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Campari-Soda
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Campari', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Pour the Campari over ice cubes in a highball glass, then fill with sparkling water. Squeeze a lime wedge over the glass and drop it in the drink.

Name: Camus Canine Reviver #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Camus VS Elegance', '1 oz. Lillet', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '3 dash(es) Lucid Absinthe Superieure']
Making:
Combine all ingredients in a shaker and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange or a slice of Bacon across the top of the glass.
Created by Ted Kilgore of Taste Bar in St. Louis, MO

Name: Camus Honey
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Honey Syrup', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '2 oz. Camus VS Elegance']
Making:
Shake with ice, and strain into a chilled coupe.
Created by Richard Boccato of Dutch Kills in NYC

Name: Camus Independence
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Camus VS Elegance', '3/4 oz. Ruby Port', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir over ice. Strain into Champagne flute.

Name: Cana Cana
Ingredients: ['1 Banana', '8 Strawberries', '2 cup(s) Grape Juice (frozen cocktail, following directions)', '1 cup(s) Jose Cuervo']
Making: Combine ingredients in a blender with 3 cups of ice. Blend and enjoy!

Name: Canadian and Campari
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1 oz. Campari', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Canadian Apple
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1/2 oz. Apple Brandy', '1 1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar Syrup', '1 pinch(es) Cinnamon']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Canadian Bacon Caesar
Ingredients: ['2 oz. SKYY Infusions Ginger Vodka', '4 oz. Clamato Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tbsp. Capers', '1 tbsp. Bacon Bits', '2 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce']
Making: Combine all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice. Garnish with pickled green beam.

Name: Canadian Blackberry Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1/2 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Canadian Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1 tsp. Pineapple Juice', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

Name: Canadian Cherry
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 1/2 tsp. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Moisten rim of glass with a cherry brandy and serve.

Name: Canadian Cider
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '3 oz. Spiced Cider (Hot)']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Canadian Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1 1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Canadian Cranberry Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Grey Goose Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 slice(s) Lime']
Making: Shake with ice and serve in an old fashioned cocktail glass with the lime on the rim of the glass.

Name: Canadian Daisy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1 tsp. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Raspberry Syrup', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Shake the whisky, the lemon juice and the raspberry syrup with ice and pour into a chilled highball glass. Fill with the sparkling water and float the brandy on top. Garnish with a few fresh raspberries.

Name: Canadian Gold Medal
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Fill a bucket glass with ice and add whiskey and amaretto. Fill with orange juice. Garnish with a cherry and an orange(flag).

Name: Canadian Highball
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Crown Royal', '6 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice into a highball glass.

Name: Canadian Killer Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Sprite']
Making: Build in order over ice in a highball glass and stir.

Name: Canadian Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1 tsp. Triple Sec', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and an orange twist.

Name: Canadian Pineapple
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1 tsp. Pineapple Juice', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except pineapple stick) with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple stick and serve.

Name: Canadian Power Drink
Ingredients: ['2 Eggs', '2 Lemons', '1 cup(s) Vinegar', '1 cup(s) Milk', '1 cup(s) Beer']
Making: Mix beer, milk and vinegar. Then get the juice from the lemons and add that. Add the two eggs. Voila avec ca tu vas avoir le force de faire tout.

Name: Canado Saludo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '5 dash(es) Lemon Juice', '5 dash(es) Grenadine', '5 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and garnish with pineapple slices, an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Canal Street Daisy
Ingredients: ['1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/4 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', 'Club Soda']
Making: Pour into a collins glass over ice cubes and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Cancun MAKE A WISH
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Vodka 100 proof', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Olive Juice', '4 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '1 tsp. Tequila']
Making: Add all ingredients except tequila over ice in shaker glass. Stir to blend. Salt rim of a margharita glass and strain drink into glass. Top with tequila and serve.

Name: Candy Apple #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. 7-Up', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Candy Apple #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. DeKuyper Sour Apple', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice (except grenadine) and pour into a highball glass. Add the grenadine.

Name: Candy Apple #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '1 oz. Apple Cider', '1/2 oz. Apple Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake very well. Strain over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a caramel covered apple slice.
A candy apple is perhaps the most sought out seasonal treat, especially in the north east, where fresh, locally grown apples are in abundance. This cocktail utilizes all the familiar flavors for fall and a hint of something new, VeeV (the world’s first acai liqueur). Take my advice; the garnish is good enough to eat by itself!
Created by: Jonathan Pogash, Cocktail Guru

Name: Candy Apple Fizz
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Apple Pucker', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix together and put over ice.

Name: Candy Cane #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '4 oz. 7-Up (Or Sprite)', '1 oz. Cherry Juice (See instructions)']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry. Note from the person who submitted the recipe: By cherry juice, we mean the cherry flavoured water mixture from those little bottles of cherries that the grocery stores sell.

Name: Candy Cane #4
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Strawberry Mix', '1 oz. Pina Colada Mix', 'dash(es) Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Divide the rum in two shot glass. Add the strawberry mix to one shot glass filled with rum, and the pina colada mix to the other glass filled with rum. Take a double shot glass and use a piece of metal or wood to separate the glass into two sections. Fill one side with the strawberry daiquiri, and the other side with the pina colada. Use the metal divider to swirl them together. Float the peppermint schnapps on top.

Name: Candy Cane Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '3/4 oz. Cherry Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', '2 Candies (2 crushed candy canes)', 'Milk', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: For this drink, you will need two shakers. Fill a collins glass or tall cocktail glass with ice. Fill the 2 shakers with ice. In the first shaker add 3/4 oz. cherry whiskey, 1/4 oz. Grenadine, and 2 oz. of milk. Shake for a few seconds and add to the collins glass. In the second shaker, add 1 oz. green creme de menthe and 2 oz. of milk. Shake for a few seconds then pour gently into the collins glass as to layer it on top of the cherry whiskey mixture. Top off with whipped cream and sprinkle the candy cane pieces on it.

Name: Candy Cane Swirl
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Skyy Infusions Raspberry Vodka', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Rim martini glass with crushed candy cane. Combine SKYY Vodka, Peppermint Schnapps, Cranberry Juice and Grenadine into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into martini glass. Top with Lemon Lime Soda and garnish with a small peppermint candy cane.

Name: Candy Corn
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin (Kettle Corn infused*)', '1/2 oz. Wine (Moscato sweet dessert wine)', '3/4 oz. Grenadine (Citrus Peel**)']
Making:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake very well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with 3 candy corns.
*To make Kettle Corn-infused Bombay Sapphire: for every 750ml bottle of Bombay Sapphire, add in 1 cup kettle corn and allow to infused in an airtight container for approx. 24 hrs. Fine strain kettle corn and re-bottle. Store in fridge.
*To make grenadine syrup: for every 1 cup of POM wonderful pomegranate juice, dissolve 1 cup granulated sugar over stove top. Once dissolved, add in the skins of 1 orange and 1 lemon and simmer for 10 mins. Remove skins and chill syrup.
Halloween means one thing: Candy, the most popular, Candy Corn. Invented in the 1880s, candy companies now produce nearly 35 million pounds of the corn candy each year. So spot on, one sip of this cocktail might make you forget you aren’t actually eating candy corn… Bombay Sapphire’s 10 botanicals lend themselves nicely to the kettle-corn infusion, which will bring you right back to chilly afternoons outside spent trick or treating.
Created by: Jonathan Pogash, Cocktail Guru

Name: Candy In A Glass
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', 'Cranberry Ginger Ale', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix serve with ice.

Name: Candy Rider
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '9 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Find a nice red cup. Stir in the ingredients over ice if your Dr Pepper is warm. Drink quickly. It's good. Tastes like candy -hence the name.

Name: Candy Rose
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Rose', '1/2 oz. Midori', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients well and serve over ice. Ttastes like laffy taffy or a jolly rancher.

Name: Candy Store
Ingredients: ["1 scoop(s) Ice Cream Cookies N' Cream Ice Cream", '2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Creme de Noyeaux']
Making: Frappe in a highball glass.

Name: Candycane
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '4 oz. Pina Colada Mix', '4 oz. Strawberry Margarita Mix']
Making: Mix the pina colada mix with the light rum. Separately, mix the strawberry mix with the Malibu. Fill a glass with crushed ice. Fill the glass 2/3 full with pina colada and pour the strawberry puree over the pina colada

Name: Cane and Cola
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 10 Cane Rum', '6 oz. Cola']
Making: Mix in a tall glass with ice. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Cane Toad
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cherry Brandy', 'Soda Water']
Making: Mix in a 10 oz. glass and add a swizzle stick. Warning after 6 of these things could get hazy :)

Name: Cannibalized Christian
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Jagermeister', "3/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '3/4 oz. Amaretto', 'Coca Cola (Cherry flavoured)']
Making: Combine in a large cocktail glass. Stir and serve.

Name: Canoe River Special
Ingredients: ['1/3 cup(s) Kahlua', '1/3 cup(s) Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', 'dash(es) Absolut Vodka (Optional)']
Making: Fill a blender 3/4 full of ice, add the ingredients and blend until smooth. Serve in cocktail glass.

Name: Cantaloupe Cup
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum', '1/3 cup(s) Cantaloupe (Diced)', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth, then pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cantaloupe slice.

Name: Canton Ginger Mojito
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) White Rum', 'Mint Leaves', 'Soda']
Making: Muddle fresh mint and 2 lemon or lime wedges. Serve in a tall glass filled with ice and garnish with a mint sprig and lemon slice. Top with soda.

Name: Canton Negroni
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1 1/2 part(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 part(s) Campari', '1/2 part(s) Dry Vermouth', '1 splash(es) Soda']
Making:
Serve in a rocks glass over ice and garnish with an orange slice.
Created by Dominick Chrzaszcz

Name: Canton Pimm's Cup
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1 part(s) Pimms No. 1', '3 part(s) Ginger Ale', 'Soda', 'slice(s) Orange', 'slice(s) Lemon', 'slice(s) Strawberry', 'slice(s) Cucumber', 'sprig(s) Mint']
Making: Pour Domaine de Canton, Pimms and Ginger Ale into a tall glass filled with ice. Add slices of orange, lemon, strawberry, cucumber and garnish with sprigs of mint. Top with soda.

Name: Canton Royale
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '3 part(s) Champagne', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Serve in a champagne flute.

Name: Canyon Quake
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Irish Cream', '3/4 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into a large brandy snifter.

Name: Cap'n Coke
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '3 oz. Cola']
Making: Mix over ice.

Name: Cape Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Combine ingredients over ice in a highball glass, stir and enjoy!

Name: Cape Cod
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix vodka and cranberry juice in a highball glass.

Name: Cape Cod Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Gin', '5 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 oz. Orgeat Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Cape Cod Honolulu Style
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Li Hing Mui (Seedless)', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: In a highball glass half way filled with ice, layer Li Hing Mui, then pour vodka over it and fill with cranberry juice.

Name: Cape Codder
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and stir. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Cape Codder Ale
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Vodka', '2 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '2 part(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Cape Of Good Will
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cape Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 tbsp. Grenadine', 'Guava Juice (Preferably Nantucket Nectars-brand Guava flavored juice cocktail)']
Making: Pour the Malibu over ice in a highball glass and fill with Nantucket Nectars-brand Guava flavoured juice cocktail. Stir. Drizzle Grenadine into the mix. Enjoy! Another beverage inspired by our family's vacation visit to Cape Cod!

Name: Capital Punishment
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto (or Cointreau)']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Cappuccino Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Coffee Brandy', '3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Capri
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '3/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '3/4 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Capt. Jager
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 oz. Jagermeister', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Combine Rum and Jagermeister over ice. Top off with coke.

Name: Capt. MyOrgan
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", "3/4 oz. Myer's Rum", 'Cola']
Making: Build over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Captain & Root Beer
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Root Beer (Preferably A&W Root Beer)']
Making: Combine in a highball glass.

Name: Captain Al
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', "3/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/4 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Mix on ice and stain into a shot glass.

Name: Captain Ale
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a highball glass. It tastes like cream soda.

Name: Captain Butt F**ks
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '3 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Captain Cook
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Captain Cotton Candy
Ingredients: ["1 part(s) Captain Morgan's Rum", '3 part(s) Orange Juice', '3 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Enjoy over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Captain Courageous
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", "1 oz. Myer's Rum", '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour the Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum over ice in a collins glass, then add the pineapple juice. Float Myer's dark rum on top.

Name: Captain Do
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Add rum to highball glass, fill with Mountain Dew

Name: Captain Howdy
Ingredients: ["3 part(s) Captain Morgan's Rum", '1 part(s) Root Beer']
Making: Mix and serve over ice.

Name: Captain Jack Sparrow
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", "2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Creme de Cacao', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Just make sure it's cold. You can't go wrong with extra rum (particularly Captain Morgan's). This drink was put together by a friend and I for another friend on his birthday. The flavors go great together but you can taste each individually with this particular ratio.

Name: Captain Libre N.F.L.
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Coca Cola']
Making: In a rocks glass filled with ice, combine Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum and Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum. Top with Coca Cola and serve without a garnish.

Name: Captain Morgasim
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Rum", '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake and strain over rocks and top with pineapple juice and grenadine. Garnish with a cherry and enjoy.

Name: Captain Morgasm
Ingredients: ["1 part(s) Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 part(s) Peach Schnapps', '1 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 part(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients and serve over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Captain Nog
Ingredients: ["1/3 part(s) Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '2/3 part(s) Eggnog', '1 sprinkle(s) Cinnamon optional']
Making: Any size glass may be used. Top with cinnamon if desired.

Name: Captain Pepper
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Captain Morgan's Rum", 'Dr Pepper']
Making: Fill a glass half with ice and add Captain Morgan's Rum. Fill the rest with Dr.Pepper.

Name: Captain Pepsi
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Pepsi Cola']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Captain Smash
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '2 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except orange juice) and serve over ice in a tall glass. Float orange juice on top and garnish with an orange wheel, lemon wheel and lime wedge.

Name: Captain's Bootey
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Captain's Kiss
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice into a cocktail glass.

Name: Captain's Punch
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in an 8 oz. glass over ice.

Name: Captain's Table
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Campari', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Campari, grenadine, and orange juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the Ginger Ale. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Captain's Tsunami
Ingredients: ["1 part(s) Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 part(s) Sobe Tsunami']
Making: Mix in a highball glass on the rocks.

Name: Captains Coffee
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 oz. Kahlua', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice until chilled and strain into a rocks glass as is or over ice. An easy, delicious after dinner drink!

Name: Captains Cream Soda
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/4 tsp. Vanilla Extract', '1 can(s) Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour the rum and vanilla into the bottom of a glass filled with ice. Pour in the Mountain Dew and enjoy (make sure the glass will hold the entire 12 oz. can).

Name: Captian Jack Sparrow
Ingredients: ["1 part(s) Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", "1 part(s) Jack Daniel's Whiskey", 'Coca Cola']
Making: Mix in a rocks glass over ice and top with Coca Cola.

Name: Car Bomb #3
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Guinness 1', 'oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour Baileys into a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the mug of beer and chug it immediately.

Name: Cara Sposa
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coffee Brandy', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cara-Legal The Cool Guy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cachaca Fazenda Mae de Ouro', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake cachaça, lemon juice, and superfine sugar in a shaker with ice and strain into a tall glass over crushed ice. Add club soda and stir. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Carabinieri
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', "1 tsp. Rose's Lime Juice", '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: Shake and strain into a collins glass over ice. Garnish with a red and a green cherry and a lime slice.

Name: Caramel Apple #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Pucker', '3/4 oz. Butter Shots', '7-Up']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a lowball glass. Serve with a straw.

Name: Caramel Nut
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Caramel Liqueur', '5 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Combine creme de cacao, caramel liqueur, and vanilla ice cream in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute, garnish with whipped cream and chopped nuts, and serve.

Name: Carbon Rod
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Serve up (no ice) in a tall thin glass.

Name: Cardicas
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Port', '1 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. White Rum']
Making: Pour in a wine glass.

Name: Cardinal
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Care Bear
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/3 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Island Blue Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Apple Pucker', '7-Up']
Making: Pour into a rocks glass over ice and top with 7-Up.

Name: Caret Cobbler
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Claret', '2 oz. Club Soda', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Dissolve the sugar in the soda then add the wine. Pour over ice in a red wine glass and garnish with fruit of the season. Serve with a straw.

Name: Caribbean Anti Freeze
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gold Rum', '1 oz. Malibu Mango Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '3/4 cup(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake well and strain on the rocks.

Name: Caribbean Bitch
Ingredients: ["1/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Lemon Bar Mix', 'Lime Bar Mix', '1 dash(es) Sprite']
Making: In a cocktail glass combine liquors and add equal parts of lemon and lime mixes to fill. Top with a dash of sprite

Name: Caribbean Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Midori', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour in order in a highball glass to get the full effect of the colors. Peach schnapps first, then coconut rum, then Midori melon, fill with pineapple juice and save a little room for a splash or 2 of cranberry juice.

Name: Caribbean Champagne
Ingredients: ['1/2 tsp. White Rum', '1/2 tsp. Creme de Banane', 'Champagne (Chilled)']
Making: Pour into a champagne flute and fill with champagne. Stir lightly and garnish with a slice of banana.

Name: Caribbean Chat
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Pour rum, creme de cacao and orange juice over ice in a glass. Stir. Add soda and stir gently.

Name: Caribbean Cooler #1
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Whirl in a blender at low speed for 10 - 15 seconds with 1 cup of crushed ice. Pour into a wine goblet. Garnish with grated coconut and a maraschino cherry.

Name: Caribbean Cooler #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Silver', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) 151 Proof Rum optional']
Making: Shake all ingredients. Strain and pour over ice into a cocktail glass. Optional - float 151 Proof Rum on top.

Name: Caribbean Cooler #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beachcomber Coconut Rum', 'Lemonade']
Making: Fill a Tall glass with Lemonade and serve over ice.

Name: Caribbean Cruise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Coconut Rum', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake all except juice with ice and pour into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill with pineapple juice and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

Name: Caribbean Dream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Rum', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Caribbean Iced Tea
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Admiral Nelson's Vanilla Rum", '1 oz. Arrow Blue Curaco', '1 oz. Margaritaville Gold Tequila', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Mix all of the ingredients together and serve over ice. Garnish with an orange. Tastes like a Long Island Ice Tea, but with a Caribbean twist.

Name: Caribbean Kiss
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '3/4 oz. Cream', 'Brown Sugar']
Making: Dip the rim of a cocktail glass in Kahlua, then in brown sugar. Shake the spirits and cream with ice, strain into the glass and garnish with cinnamon on top.

Name: Caribbean Madras
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Blend, serve over rocks. Garnish with a fresh orange.

Name: Caribbean Mudslide
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Mix over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Caribbean Murder
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum (Preferably Redrum)', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix the liquors in a chimney glass, add the fruit juice and finish with the grenadine. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Caribbean Pineapple
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a lowball glass and fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Caribbean Punch #1
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a nutmeg.

Name: Caribbean Romance
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass. Float grenadine and garnish with orange, lemon, or lime slices.

Name: Caribbean Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Obviously this is not a drink for a small glass. Shake with ice in a shaker glass. Strain into a tall glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Caribbean Sludge
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 oz. DeKuyper Key Largo Schnapps', 'Mauna Lai Mango Mango Juice']
Making: Pour rum and schnapps into an ice-filled highball glass. Fill with Mango Mango. Stir and enjoy!

Name: Caribbean Smuggler
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Margarita Mix', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '3 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Shake first 5 ingredients well. Pour into ice cube filled specialty glass. Top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with a lime wheel and an orange flag.

Name: Caribe Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Dark Rum (or Spiced Rum)', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into stemmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Caribian Buck
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Coconut Liqueur', '2/3 oz. Lime Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass and fill with Ginger Ale.

Name: Caribou Lou
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '2 oz. Malibu Rum', '12 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix in a cocktail Glass.

Name: Caribou Mudslide
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Caribou Iced Coffee', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Carmela Supreme
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Courvoisier Cognac', '2 tbsp. Strawberry Jam', '1 squirt(s) Lemon', 'Wine Semi-sparkling']
Making:
Madonn'! After six wildly successful seasons, The Sopranos® closed the books on June 10th. Authentic Jersey bartender, John Martella, from Hoboken's Gaslight has whipped up some liquid libations to toast Tony, Carmela and the family as this iconic chapter in American pop culture comes to a close. Raise a glass and toast to the first family of New Jersey. Salut to this thing of ours!
A supreme and decadent cocktail honoring the First Lady of the New Jersey mob. It goes great with her famous ricotta pie.
In a glass shaker add Courvoisier, jam (or DeKuyper Pucker Strawberry Passion) and lemon juice. Mix with a muddler or bar spoon. Add ice to the glass shaker and add sparkling wine. Stir the mixture softly and slowly so as not to disturb the bubbles. Strain into a champagne flute and garnish with a strawberry slice. Serve.

Name: Carmeled Apple Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1 part(s) Apple Pucker', '1 part(s) Dekuyper Buttershots Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Add 1 lemon wedge... this is key.

Name: Caroli
Ingredients: ['dash(es) Orange Bitters', '2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Carolina
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Tequila Gold', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 tsp. Vanilla Extract', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake vigorously with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle with cinnamon and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Carolina Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Orange Juice', 'Tonic Water']
Making: This begins as a basic gin and tonic without the lime. Pour gin in a tall glass over ice. Fill the glass with equal parts of orange juice and tonic water. Very refreshing in the summer time.

Name: Carpet Licker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Wine (Preferably Chardonnay)', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Dr Pepper', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix well all the spirits and pour into a shot glass. Top with a dollop of whipped cream and sprinkle with Hundreds and Thousands (a treat for kids). Wipe your tongue with your sleeve so that its dry and drink up.

Name: Carriaggi Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kirsch', '1/3 oz. Strega', '1/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Place some ice cubes in the shaker and add all the other ingredients. Shake for 6-8 seconds and strain into the glass. Decorate with a cocktail cherry.

Name: Carribbean Mist
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Build in a highball glass with ice. Cover the top and shake. When you remove the cover it should be a greenish-blue colour with what looks like a mist of foam on the top. Garnish with a cherry and a pineapple flag.

Name: Carribean
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. White Rum', '3/4 oz. Coconut Rum', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass over ice and fill with equal parts of Pineapple and Cranberry Juice.

Name: Carribean Breeze ( The Real Thing)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Midori', '1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice or to taste']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice for 5 seconds. Strain and pour into a Collins glass over ice. Garnish with a slice of pineapple.

Name: Carribean Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a tulip glass filled with ice. Fill with the Pineapple Juice.

Name: Carribean Romance
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix over ice in a 14 oz glass. Fill with equal parts pineapple juice and orange juice. Float with grenadine. Serve with an orange flag.

Name: Carrie's Midori Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 1/2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix all the ingredients and serve over ice in a highball glass. Amounts are approximate to taste.

Name: Carrol Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Brandy']
Making: Stir vermouth and brandy with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with a cherry and serve.

Name: Carrot Top
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Build over ice cubes into a collins glass.

Name: Cartwheel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tuaca', '1 oz. Bitters', '1 slice(s) Lime', 'Powdered Sugar']
Making: Pour shot of Tuaca. Thoroughly drench the lime in Bitters, then coat in powdered sugar. Drink shot, bite into lime, experience a veritable explosion of flavour.

Name: Caruso
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Green Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Caruso Blanco
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. White Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cary Grant
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Mix in an old fashion tumbler over ice. It is said that the drink is named after Cary Grant because apparently it was what he drank.

Name: Casa Blanca
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 tsp. Lime Juice', '1 1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Casa Noble Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila Casa Noble Gold', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake all the ingredients and pour over ice into a cocktail glass. For special margarita use Casa Noble Reposado. For millennium margarita use Casa Noble Anejo.

Name: Casablanca
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Advocaat', '1 tsp. Galliano', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake and strain over crushed ice in a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Casco Bay Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Citrus Vodka', '4 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Shake vodka, Sour Mix, and cranberry juice and pour into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill with lemon lime soda and float a lemon slice on top.

Name: Casino Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry

Name: Casino Night Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1 Cherry']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the cherry on top and serve.

Name: Casino Royale
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

Name: Cassinova
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Black Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Orange Juice (To taste)', 'Cranberry Juice (To taste)']
Making: Blend (except grenadine) with ice until slushy. Serve in a cocktail glass and drizzle the grenadine on top. (Optional: add whipped cream, then drizzle the grenadine).

Name: Cast Away
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Banana Juice', '2 oz. Strawberry Mix']
Making: Pour the rum into a highball glass, add crushed ice and fill with juice.

Name: Castel Jane Barbancourt Rum Punch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Rum']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Castle In The Clouds
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Knappogue Castle Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Pallini Limoncello', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine Rouge']
Making: In a shaker with ice combine Knappogue Castle, Pallini Limoncello and Dubonnet Rouge. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Cat Killer
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Melon Liqueur', '1 part(s) Coconut Rum', '1 part(s) Banana Liqueur', '1 part(s) Peach Schnapps', '1 part(s) Blue Curacao', '1 part(s) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add alcohol. Top with equal amounts orange juice, pineapple juice and cranberry juice. Shake well.

Name: Catalina Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '4 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain in a chilled cocktail or margarita glass.

Name: Catherine Of Sheridan Square
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Light Cream', '4 oz. Coffee (Cold)']
Making: Pour all of the ingredients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

Name: Catherine Was Great!
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto (Preferably Di Saronna Amaretto)', '1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1 tsp. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake or blend over ice and strain into a chilled stemmed glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Catherine's Cloud
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Carolans Irish Cream Liqueur', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Pour Grand Marinier and Carolan's over crushed ice and add club soda to taste.

Name: Catholic Virgin
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Lemonade', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Apple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix together in a cocktail glass filled with ice.

Name: Cavanaugh's Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Amaretto', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Pour coffee liqueur in a brandy snifter and set aside. Blend the rest with ice cubes until smooth. Then pour over coffee liqueur. Top with whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles.

Name: Cave In
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Serve over ice in a lowball glass, adding the splash of orange juice last.

Name: Cayman Climax
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice (About 1/8 of the drink)', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a collins glass and finish off with the grenadine; you'll know when you get it right. If you can taste the grenadine you went too far, stop just before that happens. Serve slightly stirred, seldom shaken. To have it shaken, you have to have it perfect, so taste frequently when making a large punch bowl.

Name: Cayo Hueso Sunrise / Key West Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Coconut Cream', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: In a large tulip glass fill with ice add rum, amaretto and cream of coconut. Fill with pineapple juice and top with a dash of grenedine.

Name: CB7
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Christian Brothers Brandy', '10 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass.

Name: Cecilian Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Amaretto', '1 part(s) Southern Comfort']
Making: Mix equal amounts and serve on the rocks.

Name: Celery Killer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cabana Cachaca', '2 1/2 oz. Limeade (Homemade with celery juice)', '1 dash(es) Pepper (Thai Long pepper tincture)']
Making: Shake and strain over fresh ice in a Collins glass.

Name: Celeste Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Advocaat', '2 oz. Cream', 'Lemonade']
Making: Combine everything except the lemonade, shake and strain into cocktail glass. Top with lemonade making it froffy. Garnish with a strawberry. Made for Celeste Mcgary whilst the sun was rising on Long Island Australia.

Name: Celtic Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', 'Coffee Iced']
Making: Dip the rim of an Irish Coffee Mug in Celtic Crossing and sprinkle with green cocktail sugar. Add the Celtic Crossing and then the Iced Coffee. Stir and top with whipped cream. Garnish with green cocktail sugar.

Name: Celtic Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', 'Club Soda']
Making: In a tall glass with ice pour the Celtic Crossing Liqueur, top with club soda and garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Celtic Cross
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Pour Irish whiskey over ice in a lowball glass. Float Drambuie on top.

Name: Celtic Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', '1 oz. Boru Vodka', '4 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Add all ingredients to a tall ice-filled glass and garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: Celtic Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', 'Margarita Mix']
Making: Combine Celtic Crossing Liqueur with your favorite margarita mix and tequila to make your connection south of the border.

Name: Celtic Mix Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Celtic Rocks
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur']
Making: Poured over rocks with a garnish of your choice – you’ll find your connection.

Name: Celtic Twilight
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', "1 oz. Bushmill's Irish Whiskey", '1 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Mix all the ingredients and serve.

Name: Cement Shoes
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Amaretto', '5 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '3 Pepsi Cola', '1 Milk']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass and mix till smooth and foamy. Garnish with cinnamon sprinkles and 1 ice cube.

Name: Centauri Sundown
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Mix with ice and serve in a cocktail glass. Top off with sour mix. Can be served as a shooter.

Name: Cereal Killer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '2 oz. 7-Up', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix over ice and serve in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry if desired.

Name: Cerro Agudo (Sharp Hill) Sunrise
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila Silver Suggested Tequila: Herradura Silver', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Lime Juice', '12 oz. Squirt', 'Salt']
Making: Combine liquid ingredients in a large glass or mug. Add ice and stir. Add a dash of salt and enjoy. Kick it up a notch by adding an extra oz. of Tequila.

Name: Cervoise
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Beer (blonde)', '4 oz. White Wine', '1 oz. Lemon Syrup']
Making: First add the syrup then some cold blonde beer and the wine. You can ommit the lemon or replace the syrup by drops of lemon juice might be less sweet... I prefer it this way... )

Name: Chachodaddy
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Chaise Lounge
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bacardi Limon', '3/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a highball glass or without ice in a shot glass.

Name: Chambord and Champagne
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Champagne', 'dash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Pour in a champagne glass and fill with champagne.

Name: Chambord and Cognac
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Cognac']
Making: Heat gently and pour into a brandy snifter.

Name: Chambord Colada
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Frappe in a highball glass.

Name: Chambord Frost
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Chambord Pina Colada
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '3 tbsp. Whipped Cream', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '4 oz. Pina Colada Mix']
Making: Combine all ingredients in blender with ice. Blend untill smooth.

Name: Chambord Raspberry Bombshell
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Chambord Flavoured Vodka', '3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Lemonade', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a tall glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a lemon twist and a black raspberry.

Name: Chambord Royale
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Chamborlada
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Dark Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Blend all ingredients (except Chambord) with ice until smooth. Pour the Chambord into the bottom of a large wine glass and add slowly the mixture on top to layer it. Float a little Chambord on top.

Name: Champagne Bleu
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Alize Blue', 'Champagne']
Making: Serve in a chilled champagne flute. Pour Alize Blue and fill with Champagne.

Name: Champagne Blitz
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Champagne', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Menthe']
Making: Build in a champagne flute.

Name: Champagne Cobbler
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Icing Sugar', 'Champagne (Alternatively you can use sparkling wine)']
Making: Put the sugar in a tumbler with some thin parings of orange and lemon peels. Fill 1/3 of the glass with shaved ice and top up with champagne. Stir and garnish with fruit and 2 straws.

Name: Champagne Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Champagne (Chilled)', '1 Sugar Cube', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Place sugar cube and Bitters in a chilled champagne flute. Fill with champagne. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Champagne Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Strawberry Liqueur', 'Champagne']
Making: Build in a champagne flute and fill with champagne. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Champagne Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Triple Sec', 'Champagne (Or sparkling wine)']
Making: Pour the liquors into a large wine glass and fill with champagne. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Champagne Cornucopia
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 scoop(s) Sherbet (Rainbow)', '1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Champagne']
Making: Pour cranberry juice into an oversized red wine glass and set aside. Blend sherbet, vodka, and schnapps until smooth. Pour over cranberry juice to produce a swirl effect and layer champagne on top. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Champagne Cup #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Curacao', '1/2 oz. Cognac', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour the liquors into a large wine glass, add one ice cubes and fill with champagne. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a slice of orange.

Name: Champagne Dreams
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Champagne']
Making: Assemble the first three ingredients in a cocktail glass with ice. Slowly pour in the Champagne while stirring very gently to retain the bubbles and chill the mixture. Strain into a Champagne flute and garnish with orange and cherry.

Name: Champagne Punch #1
Ingredients: ['8 bottle(s) Champagne', '1 bottle(s) Brandy (Preferably grape brandy)', '1 bottle(s) Jamaica Rum', '4 1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '4 1/2 oz. Curacao', '2 1/3 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '1 pound(s) Sugar', '4 Pineapple (Ripe)']
Making: Dice the pineapples and let them stand covered with the sugar for 2 to 3 hours. Add all the other ingredients, except the champagne. Mix vigorously and leave overnight. The next day, a few hours before serving add a block of ice and only when well chilled, add the champagne.

Name: Champagne Rita
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Tequila', '4 oz. Limeade', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 cup(s) Champagne']
Making: Mix in a blender with ice.

Name: Champange Rita
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Champagne', '4 oz. Limeade']
Making: Blend with ice and pour into cocktail glasses.

Name: Champion's Bubblin Cherry
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka (Preferably Jacques Wild Cherry 66 Proof Vodka)', '9 oz. Sprite']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Be careful not to get a lot of fizz when you pour the Sprite.

Name: Champs Elysees Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Yellow Chartreuse', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Changuirongo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila Silver', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Stir into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Chanticleer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 tbsp. Raspberry Syrup', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake vigorously with cracked ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Chapala
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', 'dash(es) Triple Sec', '2 tsp. Grenadine', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

Name: Chapel Hill
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel.

Name: Charger
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Charles Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Charleston
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Mandarine Napoleon', '1 2/3 oz. Cherry Brandy', 'Lemonade']
Making: Stir the Mandarine Napoleon and cherry brandy. Top up with lemonade and serve with ice in collins glass.

Name: Charlie Chaplin
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Charmer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Charmides
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Pernod Absinthe', 'Grapes Green and seedless', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1 1/2 part(s) Beefeater Dry Gin', '3/4 part(s) Ginger Syrup', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', 'Soda Water']
Making:
Muddle grapes, Pernod Absinthe and bitters. Add gin, ginger syrup and lime juice. Shake and strain into an ice-filled Collins glass, top with soda water. Garnish with grapes and candied ginger.
Marcos Tello
The Doheny
Los Angeles
Muse – Oscar Wilde
Pernod Absinthe has partnered with noted mixologists around the country to create specialty cocktails inspired by artists and writers who were influenced by absinthe.

Name: Chase the Trace
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1 piece(s) Melon (honeydew)', '5 piece(s) Orange (or tangerine)', '1/2 tsp. Honey', '1 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Muddle, shake with ice and strain into an old fashioned glass.

Name: Chasme
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/4 oz. Light Rum', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Sprite']
Making: Fill a bamboo glass with ice. Add in the given order. Fill the rest of the glass with equal parts of pineapple juice and sweet and sour. Float Sprite. Garnish with a pineapple flag.

Name: Chatham Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Ginger Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a piece of candied ginger.

Name: Cheap Trick
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sink the Cassis.

Name: Cheesecake
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '6 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Chekers
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Beer', '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Pour the beer in a mug, drop in the shot of tequila, stir and drink!

Name: Chekhov Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '4 oz. Ocean Spray Juice (Cranberry-Raspberry)', '6 Raspberries (Fresh)']
Making: Mix all the ingredients, except the fresh raspberries, with several ice cubes in a chilled double old-fashioned glass. Add fresh raspberries and garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Chelada
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Lime Juice', '4 oz. Beer', 'Kosher salt']
Making: Salt the rim of a tall glass with Kosher Salt. Pour in lime juice then beer. Stir gently. Add ice. Makes a very refreshing drink on a hot day. A popular one on the Yucatan Peninsula.

Name: Chelsea #912
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon peel and a cherry. This is a variation of a Chelsea Hotel. If you've been there and loved it, make your own variation as a tribute.

Name: Chelsea Hotel
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Chelsea Sidecar
Ingredients: ['1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Chelsea Sidecar Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Gin']
Making: Build in a cocktail glass.

Name: Cherie
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Cherrie Cola
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gold Rum', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Brandy', 'Cola']
Making: Pour rum and grenadine over ice in a rocks glass. Add brandy and top off with cola. ( Caution this drink is very sweet if you are using Pepsi or diet coke put less grenadine) Enjoy!

Name: Cherried Cream Rum
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cherry Amaretto
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 cup(s) Country Time Lemonade (powder)', '12 oz. Sprite', '1 tbsp. Maraschino Cherry Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients and stir until the powder is dissolved. Add ice and top with a cherry.

Name: Cherry Benson
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '12 oz. Tropicana Twister (Cherry flavoured)']
Making: Combine over ice in a small pitcher and serve in cocktail glasses.

Name: Cherry Bitch
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Bulldog Gin', 'Tea Bags Black Currant', '5 Cherries', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', '4 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Muddle cherries in a cocktail glass. In another glass, infuse Bulldog Gin with black currant tea. Remove tea bag and pour into the cocktail glass. Add lime juice, simple syrup and apple juice. Pour into a shaker and shake with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over ice and garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Cherry Blast
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Snapple (Lightning)', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix together, chill, serve in a collins glass and enjoy!

Name: Cherry Blossom #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. Brandy', 'dash(es) Orange Curacao', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cherry Blossom #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Moisten rim of cocktail glass with a cherry brandy and rub rim in powdered sugar. Shake with ice and strain into the sugar-rimmed glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Cherry Bomb #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '3/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Serve in a rocks glass over ice.

Name: Cherry Bomb #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Rum Cream Liqueur', '1/6 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/6 oz. Cherry Brandy']
Making: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Cherry Bourbon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Makers Mark Bourbon', '1 dash(es) Grenadine', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour bourbon over ice in highball glass with a dash of grenadine. Add ginger ale. No need to stir. The fizz from the ginger ale will mix it.

Name: Cherry Cheesecake #2
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Vanilla Schnapps (Preferably Dr. Magillicuddy's vanilla schnapps)", '1/2 oz. Cream', 'Cranberry Juice (To taste)']
Making: Pour the vanilla schnapps over ice and mix in the cranberry juice. Top off with cream or half & half.

Name: Cherry Cinn
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Coca Cola', 'Maraschino Cherries']
Making: Shake 1st 3 ingredients in ice. Strain into a very large frozen Martini glass.Pour (from a distance to release bubbles) Coke into remainder of glass to taste.Prick a Maraschino cherry twice and drop it into the drink.

Name: Cherry Cobbler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Cherry Heering Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 tbsp. Sugar Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon slice and a maraschino cherry.

Name: Cherry Coke
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stroh Rum', '4 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass.

Name: Cherry Coolaid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Squirt']
Making: Pour Midori and peach schnapps into a tall glass over ice. Fill the remaining with equal parts Cranberry juice and Squirt.

Name: Cherry Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kirsch', 'Cola']
Making: Stir over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Cherry Cordial
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Coca Cola', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Cherry Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Cherry Liqueur', '1/4 tsp. Kirsch', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Cherry Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake juice of lemon and a cherry brandy with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Cherry Flip
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 tsp. Light Cream', '1 Egg']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with nutmeg and serve.

Name: Cherry Gobbler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '3/4 oz. Grenadine', 'Mello-Yellow']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

Name: Cherry Heering n' Cola
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cherry Heering Liqueur', '1 dash(es) Lemon Juice', 'Cola']
Making: Combine ingredients over ice in a rocks glass and top with Cola.

Name: Cherry Ice
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Smirnoff Ice', 'Grenadine']
Making: Pour the neck of the bottle out then fill with grenadine.

Name: Cherry Kick
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", "1 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '4 oz. Sprite', '2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass. Add the grenadine.

Name: Cherry Life-Savor
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Stir over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Cherry Lifesaver
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass and top off with grenadine.

Name: Cherry Liqueur #2
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Brandy', '3 cup(s) Cherries', '1/4 oz. Sugar Syrup']
Making: Pit and cut up cherries. Take about half of the pits, wrap them in cloth, and smash them with a hammer. You will know each time a seed breaks from the loud "pop". Put the cherries and the crushed seeds in a jar, add the brandy, and close tightly. Let steep for about three weeks, then strain off the liquid with a wire strainer and extract any additional fluid you can from the cherries by wringing them wrapped in a cloth. Add the sugar syrup, shake, and filter through a cloth to remove any remaining fruit particles.

Name: Cherry Liqueur #3
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Vodka', '1/3 cup(s) Sugar Syrup', '1 Cloves', '1 pinch(es) Cinnamon', 'Cherries']
Making: Remove the stones from the cherries and crush them. You will need 2/3 of a cup. Put the crushed stones in an air tight jar with the vodka, a small piece of a clove, cinnamon, and let steep for three weeks. Filter through a clean l cloth and add the sugar syrup.

Name: Cherry Nog
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Red Stag Kentucky Bourbon', '4 part(s) Eggnog']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice until frothy and strain into a chilled white wine glass. Garnish with a dash of nutmeg on top.

Name: Cherry Pepper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cherry Vodka', 'Dr Pepper']
Making: Mix with ice in a lowball glass.

Name: Cherry Popper #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine in order over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Cherry Popper #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake well over ice and strain into a highball glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Cherry Poppin Jimmy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', 'Dairy Queen Misty Slush Cherry']
Making: PourJim Beam Bourbon Whiskey in a hurrican glass. Fill with Dairy Queen Cherry Misty Slush.

Name: Cherry Pucker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Stir over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a twist of lime and a twist of lemon.

Name: Cherry Raspberry Shake
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Cherry Cider (Unsweetened)', '4 oz. Sherbet (Raspberry)', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Blend until slushy and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a straw.

Name: Cherry Repair Kit
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '6 Maraschino Cherries', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Cherry Juice']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Cherry Rum
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 tsp. Cherry Brandy', '1 tbsp. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cherry Shake #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cherry Whiskey', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Cherry Sling
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Pour brandy and lemon juice into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Cherry Tree
Ingredients: ['Sugar', "1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", 'Cherry 7-Up', 'Candy (Twizzler licorice)']
Making: Pour two cups halfway with ice. Pour one sugar packet in each cup of ice and pour Jack Daniel's on that and then add the Cherry 7-Up. Bite off the ends of a piece of Twizzler licorice and use it as a straw to drink through. Note: By using this self-made straw the drink automatically becomes more potent because the alcohol doesn't become oxidized. The twizzler adds more cherry taste to the drink.

Name: Cherry Vanilla Dr Pepper
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Rum', '8 oz. Dr Pepper', '2 drop(s) Vanilla Extract']
Making: Mix into tall glass, stir.

Name: Cherry Vanilla Love
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Travis Hasse's Cherry Pie Liqueur", '3 oz. Vanilla Vodka']
Making: Shake over ice and pour with ice into a martini glass. Garnish with three cherries.

Name: Cherry Whiskey Fizz
Ingredients: ['3/4 part(s) Cherry Heering Liqueur', '2 part(s) Bourbon Whiskey', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 part(s) Egg White', 'splash(es) Soda']
Making: Combine all ingredients except soda in a mixing glass, add ice and shake well. Pour into rocks glass over fresh ice and top with soda. Garnish with a brandied cherry and a lemon wedge.

Name: Cherub's Cup
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', "2 part(s) Hendrick's Gin", '3/4 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/4 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1 Strawberry', 'Champagne (Brut Rose)']
Making: Muddle the strawberry in a shaker. Add the Gin, Lemon Juice and Simple Syrup. Shake and strain over fresh rocks in a collins glass. Top with Brut Rosé or Brut Champagne. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Cheznut
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Hot Sauce']
Making: Mix together in a highball glass and fill with equal parts Cranberry Juice and Orange Juice. Add a splash of Hot Sauce.

Name: Chi-Chi
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', 'Half and Half Cream (Optional)']
Making: Blend vodka, pineapple juice, and coconut cream with one cup ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour into a red wine glass and garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry.

Name: Chia's VBV
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', 'Pepsi Cola (Blue)']
Making: Pour 3 Stolichnaya Raspberry Vodka into a 14 oz glass. Fill with Pepsi Blue. Enjoy.

Name: Chicago Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1/4 tsp. Triple Sec']
Making: Rub the rim of an old-fashioned glass with lemon and dip in powdered sugar. Stir ingredients in ice and pour into the prepared glass.

Name: Chicago Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Port', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg White', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Name: Chicago Tanker
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '2 oz. Everclear', '1 pint(s) Stout']
Making: Mix in a large beer glass.

Name: Chicken Fetus
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2/3 oz. Cherry Brandy', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Serve with ice in a rocks glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Chihuahua
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Cointreau', 'Sugar Cubes']
Making: Pour in a lowball glass and add sugar cubes.

Name: Chilcano De Pisco
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pisco', '4 oz. Ginger Ale', '1 drop(s) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Put 3 ice cubes in a highball glass. Pour in Pisco and ginger ale. Add a twist of lemon. Finish with 1 or 2 drops of Angostura.

Name: Chilly Chocolate Mint
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 oz. Chocolate Syrup', '1 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Blend with 16 oz. crushed ice until smooth and creamy. Serve in a specialty glass and garnish with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry.

Name: Chilly Irishman
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Espresso (Cold)', '1 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream', 'dash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Blend with 4 cups of crushed ice until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with 3 or 4 leaf clover.

Name: Chilton
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lemon Juice squeezed', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Club Soda']
Making: Salt rim of rocks glass. Squeeze 1/2 lemon into bottom of glass - over ice. Add Vodka and fill with Club Soda.

Name: China Girl
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila (Jose 1800)', '1 1/2 oz. Frost Brandy (Christian Brothers)', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila Rose', '6 oz. Sweetened Condensed Milk']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into an exotic glass.

Name: Chinese Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jamaica Rum', '1 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 tbsp. Grenadine', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Chinese Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '4 dash(es) White Curacao', '4 dash(es) Maraschino Liqueur', '1 tbsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Chinese Mary
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Sweet and Sour Sauce', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce', '3 drop(s) Soy Sauce', '3 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce (Optional)', 'Pineapple (Juice or Pulp)']
Making: Make like a Bloody Mary, improvising with ingredients until you find your preferred taste and texture. Ken finds it's a good idea to add extra vodka to thin out the sauce a little. When heated, this also makes a great sauce for food!

Name: Chiquita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/4 cup(s) Bananas (Sliced)', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Orgeat Syrup']
Making: Stir well with cracked ice and pour in a champagne cup.

Name: Chiquita Gitta
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '4 oz. Cream', '1 splash(es) Cherry Juice']
Making: Blend all ingredients over ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry to serve.

Name: Choca Russian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour Vodka and Creme de Cacao into a cocktail glass over ice. Top with Coca Cola

Name: Choco Baileys Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Chocolate (25 grams Toblerone)']
Making: Mix Baileys, cream, Toblerone chocolate and several ice cubes in a blender. Serve with a dash of whipped cream.

Name: Choco Banana
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pisang Ambon', '8 oz. Chocolate Milk']
Making: Put a few ice cubes into a glass. Pour Pisang Ambon and top wiith the chocolate milk.

Name: Choco Banana Smash
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Vanilla Extract', '1/2 oz. Light Cream', '1/2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1/2 Banana']
Making: Blend with small scoop of crushed ice until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and garnish with a cherry. Add a 1 inch banana slice on a cocktail pick. Top with whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles.

Name: Choco Colada
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cream', '3/4 oz. Coconut Cream', '3/4 oz. Chocolate Syrup', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Dark Rum']
Making: Frappe in an exotic glass. Top with chocolate shavings.

Name: Chocobo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cognac', '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build into a 14oz Collins glass. Garnish with a squeeze of lime.

Name: Chocodka
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Empty Yoohoo into glass. Add two shots of vodka or to taste. Enjoy.

Name: Chocolat Banana Sherbet
Ingredients: ['4 tsp. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1 cup(s) Bananas (Ripe and mashed)', '1 cup(s) Yogurt (Low-fat)', '1/4 cup(s) Brown Sugar', '4 tsp. Sugar', '2 tsp. Vanilla']
Making: Blend until smooth and freeze overnight. When needed, break up the frozen mixture and blend until smooth with 2 tbsp. of cold water. Serve with a spoon in a frosted goblet.

Name: Chocolate Almond Cream
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Ice Cream', '1/2 cup(s) Amaretto', '1/2 cup(s) White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

Name: Chocolate Banana Banshee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Mix and serve over ice.

Name: Chocolate Barkchip
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '1/2 bottle(s) Sobe (Tsunami)', '2 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Combine in a highball glass.

Name: Chocolate Beer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '12 oz. Beer']
Making: Pour half the beer in a mug. Add the rum into the beer mug. Top with beer.

Name: Chocolate Black Russian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Chocolate Ice Cream']
Making: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

Name: Chocolate Butter Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Syrup', '4 Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake and strain over ice. Garnish with a cinnamon or chocolate stick.

Name: Chocolate Chambord Smoothie
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Dark Rum', '3 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Milk']
Making: Mix Chambord, rum and ice cream in a blender. Add milk to desired texture. Pour into a beer glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Chocolate Cherry Cheesecake in Mint Condition
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys with a hint of Mint Chocolate', '1/2 oz. Smirnoff Black Cherry Vodka', '2 tsp. Cheesecake Pudding Mix', '1 Cherry (Black)']
Making:
Shake together Baileys with a hint of Mint Chocolate, vodka and pudding mix in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with black cherry, whipped cream, dark chocolate shavings and mint sprig.
Some go with chocolates others with flowers, but the one thing you can never go wrong with is a cocktail. This Valentine’s Day, Ketel One Vodka and Baileys Original Irish Cream are honoring the day of romance by encouraging couples to sip on delectable aphrodisiac cocktails.
This recipe uses Chocolate and Black Cherry as aphrodisiac ingredients.

Name: Chocolate Chicken
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao dark', '2 oz. Cream', '1/2 oz. Pepsi Cola']
Making: Fill blender with ice about quarter full. Add ingredients as listed and blend. Serve in a pounder glass.

Name: Chocolate Cloud
