Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Layer the creme de cacao and the blue curacao, top with whipped cream and garnish with chocolate shavings.

Name: Chocolate Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Port', '1 1/2 tsp. Yellow Chartreuse', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Dark Chocolate (Finely Grated)', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Chocolate Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Port', '1 oz. Yellow Chartreuse', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with 1 tbsp. of grated semi-sweet chocolate.

Name: Chocolate Coffee Cream
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Alchemy Chocolate Infused Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Chocolate Cover Apple
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '2 oz. Everclear']
Making: Mix well over ice and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Chocolate Covered Banana
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 Banana (Sliced)', '2 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup', '1/2 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Pour rum into blender. Add banana, chocolate syrup and ice cream. Blend until smooth. Pour into specialty glass. Garnish with a banana slice.

Name: Chocolate Covered Cherries
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Half and Half Cream', 'Milk', "Hershey's Chocolate Syrup"]
Making: Fill a rocks glass, a little less than half full with regular sweet white milk. Then fill about one inch from top of glass with half and half cream. Use chocolate to make chocolate milk the strength you like it. Then add Amaretto. This is a nice after dinner drink.

Name: Chocolate Covered Cherry #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in order (grenadine at the bottom) in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Chocolate Covered Cherry #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine the liqueur over a stemmed cherry, into a 10-12 oz. cup filled with ice. Float grenadine on top.

Name: Chocolate Covered Strawberry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Stir and serve over ice in a red wine glass. Garnish with a fresh strawberry.

Name: Chocolate Covered Strawberry Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Goldenbarr Chocolate Vodka', '1 cup(s) Strawberries (Fresh strawberries or 1 1/2 cup of strawberry daiquiri mix)']
Making: Blend and serve in a daiquiri glass. Garnish with chocolate covered strawberry.

Name: Chocolate Decadance
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Rum', '1/3 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1 squirt(s) Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Fill a shaker 1/2 with ice. Add the liquors cream and chocolate syrup. Shake well and strain into a tumbler. Top with whipped cream, a cherry and cocoa powder.

Name: Chocolate Fantasy
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Creme de Cacao', '2/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '2/3 oz. Frangelico', '2 oz. Milk', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Chocolate Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Alchemy Chocolate Infused Vodka', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass, top with coke and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Chocolate Flambe
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Milk']
Making: In large shot glass, put milk on bottom then add the amaretto and the chocolate liqueur. Layer the baccardi on top. Light on fire. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Chocolate Goldfish
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Milk', '4 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Layer in order. Pete says: be sure to pour in that order and be careful, the Coke usually foams a lot. One quick stir. The milk will curdle a bit, and it isn't exactly pretty, but it tastes great.

Name: Chocolate Hurricane Cocktail
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', 'Orange Juice (Or pineapple juice)', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Chocolate Luv
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass.

Name: Chocolate Milk
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Godiva Chocolate Cream Liqueur', 'Light Cream']
Making: Fill a large glass with ice. Add Kahlua, malibu Rum, Amaretto and Godiva Chocolate Cream Liqueur. Fill the rest of the glass with light cream and stir. This drink tastes exactly like chocolate milk and one of these drinks will kick your ass cause you will find yourself chugging it!

Name: Chocolate Milk #3
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Creme de Cacao', '3/4 oz. Coconut Rum', '3/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass, mix and enjoy!

Name: Chocolate Milk#2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Chocolate Liqueur (Dark and preferably Godiva Dark chocolate Liqueur)', '1 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Pour the ingredients into a shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled glass or mug.

Name: Chocolate MilkShake
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', 'Milk']
Making: Shake ingredients. Serve with ice in pilsner glass.

Name: Chocolate Mint Rum
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '2 tsp. White Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Chocolate Mood
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Godet White Chocloate Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Shake with ice and serve straight or on ice.

Name: Chocolate Paradise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Menthe', '3 oz. Chocolate Milk']
Making: Simply pour over ice into a tall glass.

Name: Chocolate Rum
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 tsp. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '1 tbsp. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Chocolate Sex
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', "1/2 oz. Trader Vic's Macadamia Nut Liquor", '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix in a highball glass.

Name: Chocolate Snow Bear
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '5 oz. French Vanilla Ice Cream', '1/4 oz. Chocolate Syrup', '2 dash(es) Vanilla Extract']
Making: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and serve.

Name: Chocolate Soldier
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Chocolate Starfish Excavation
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a shaker and pour over crushed ice in a cocktail glass. Sprinkle with chocolate powder and serve.

Name: Chocolate Swirl
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Chocolate Milk']
Making: Layer the alcohol in a cocktail glass. Fill with chocolate milk and stir. Garnish with cherries.

Name: Chocolate Thunder
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Rum", '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Mix Captain Morgan's Rum, Bailey's Irish Cream and Kahlua over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with Coca Cola.

Name: Chocolate Toasted Almond
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Amaretto', '8 oz. Milk', '2 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Mix all together, serve in a collins glass over ice.

Name: Chocolatier
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '5 oz. Chocolate Ice Cream']
Making: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and garnish with chocolate shavings.

Name: Chocolatier Cake
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao (Chilled)', '1 oz. Brandy (Chilled)', '1 oz. Heavy Cream (Chilled)']
Making: Layer in order: creme de cacao, brandy and finish with the cream.

Name: Choker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '2 tsp. Pernod Absinthe', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Chowning's Tavern Wine Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Dry Red Wine', '3 part(s) Lemonade']
Making: Pour 3/4 of a glass with lemonade over crushed ice, then slowly fill with red wine. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a cherry.

Name: Christian Swinger
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Christian Brothers Brandy', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Pour on the rocks in a highball glass. Garnish with a Cherry. Every Swinger loves a cherry!

Name: Christina
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Pisang Ambon', 'Schweppes (Bitter Lemon)']
Making: Fill a high ball glass with ice and add dry vermouth, vodka and Pisang Ambon. Fill with Bitter Lemon.

Name: Christmas Tini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a candy cane.

Name: Christy On The Bar
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry-Raspberry Juice']
Making: Mix and pour over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange wheel.

Name: Chrysanthemum
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Pernod Absinthe', '2 part(s) Brandy', '5 part(s) Dry Vermouth']
Making: In a cocktail shaker, stir together absinthe, Brandy Liqueur and vermouth. Add ice and stir for one minute, then strain into a martini glass. Squeeze an orange peel over the drink, making sure the oils fall into the glass, then drop the peel in and serve.

Name: Chrysanthemum Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Benedictine', '1/4 tsp. Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Stir the vermouth and the Benedictine with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the Pernod and garnish with an orange twist dropped in the glass.

Name: Chubby Chekah Champong
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Soda (Preferably Chubby Kola Champagne)', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Rum (Preferably Appleton)']
Making: Drink all except 2 oz. of a Chubby Kola Champagne and then add the other ingredients to the bottle. Ensure that you dance on a Chubby Checker CD while adding a twist of lemon.

Name: Chuck Pucker
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Cider (Woodchuck)', '1 oz. Apple Pucker']
Making: Mix in a tall glass.

Name: Chuhai
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Shochu (Japanese liquor)', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice', 'Soda Water']
Making: In a cocktail glass, mix the Shochu with soda water, and add the lemon juice. Lee's comment: It tastes like Sprite when you add lime, and I prefer a little bit of orange squeezed in.

Name: Chunky Chimp
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Coconut Syrup']
Making: Don't monkey around! Whip it up in a blender and drizzle it over 2 peanuts in a cocktail glass.

Name: Church Lady Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with lemon, lime and orange peels.

Name: Churchill Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', 'Dry Vermouth']
Making: Pour gin into an ice filled shaker. Look intently at bottle of vermouth for a moment. Then shake (or stir) gin and strain into a martini glass. Garmish with an olive or two.

Name: Chyna's Special
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1 dash(es) Blue Curacao', '1 dash(es) Kahlua', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Pour 1 tsp. of Dry Vermount in a cocktail glass. Shake all the other ingredients except kahlua. Pour into the cocktail glass and add the dash of kahlua.

Name: Ciao Baby
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Strawberries (Frozen and in Syrup)', '1 oz. Collins Mix', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Blend with 16 oz. of crushed ice until the mixture is slushy.

Name: Cider Cup #3
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Cider', '3 oz. Sugar', 'Cloves', 'Cinnamon Sticks']
Making: Bring to the boil, stirring constantly, then allow to cool. When cool, strain and chill for several hours. Re-heat one hour before serving, and serve lukewarm.

Name: Cider House Blues
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Apple Cider', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Pour Kahlua then Apple Cider into a glass. Add one scoop of Vanilla Ice Cream. Stir until ice cream has mostly melted away.

Name: Cidercar
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cognac', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Triple Sec', '1/2 part(s) Hiram Walker Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, and serve up in a sugar-rimmed chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Ciel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Fill the shaker with ice and orange juice, add Bailey's and Tia Maria. Shake and serve in a cocktail glass. It tastes the same as an orange popsicle with ice cream in the middle.

Name: Cielito Lindo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Lime Juice', 'Powdered Sugar']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass. Add powdered sugar (to taste).

Name: Cielo Apricot Margarita
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) El Diamante del Cielo Reposado Tequila', '1 1/2 cup(s) Apricots Halved and Pitted', '1/4 cup(s) Sugar', '1/4 cup(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Apricot Nectar']
Making: Combine apricot halves, tequila, sugar, lime juice and apricot nectar in a blender; cover and blend until smooth. With blender running, add ice cubes, a few at a time, blending until frothy. Serve in salt-rimmed margarita glasses. Serves four.

Name: Cielo Authentic Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Blanco Tequila', '2 oz. Controy', '2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Place a few ice cubes in a shaker and add tequila, controy and lime juice. Shake well. Rub a lime wedge around the rim of glass and rim with coarse sea salt. Pour contents of shaker into glass. Serve with a lime wedge.

Name: Cielo Black Currant Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Reposado Tequila', '3/4 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Fill an old fashioned glass with ice. Add first three ingredients and stir gently. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Cielo Bloody Blanco
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Blanco Tequila', '1 pinch(es) Salt', '3 oz. Clamato Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '1 dash(es) Celery Salt', '1 dash(es) Black Pepper', '1 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '1/2 piece(s) Jalapeno Pepper', '1 Olive(s)', '1 White Onion']
Making: Fill a tall highball glass with ice. Add first eight ingredients. Transfer to a shaker and shake well and pour back into glass. Skewer jalapeño, onion and olive. Garnish with a bamboo skewer and a celery stalk.

Name: Cielo Blue Lagoon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Blanco Tequila', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '5 Mint Leaves Chopped', '2 oz. Champagne']
Making: Add first four ingredients in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into champagne flute and top with champagne.

Name: Cielo Desert Rose
Ingredients: ['2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Blanco Tequila', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Cactus Juice', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 pinch(es) Salt']
Making: Fill a blender 1/4 of the way with ice. Add tequila, Cointreau, cactus pear and lime juice blend until frothy. Rub a lime wedge around the rim of cocktail glasses and dip the rim into a saucer of coarse salt.

Name: Cielo Diamond Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Anejo Tequila', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '2 1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Add ice and ingredients to shaker. Shake well. Pour into salt rimmed martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Cielo Jalisco Sling
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Anejo Tequila', '3/4 oz. Peach Brandy', '1 splash(es) Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Raspberries', '1 slice(s) Peach']
Making: Add ice and ingredients to shaker. Shake well. Strain into an ice filled champagne flute. Garnish with fresh raspberries and a peach slice.

Name: Cielo Jalisco Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Reposado Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Blanco Tequila', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', 'Cola']
Making: Pour first seven ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice and stir. Top with a splash of cola. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Cielo Mango Sunset
Ingredients: ['2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Reposado Tequila', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1/4 Mango Peeled', '1/2 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Add ingredients to blender and blend until frothy. Pour into a chilled margarita glass. Garnish with a slice of mango.

Name: Cielo Neat
Ingredients: ['2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Anejo Tequila']
Making: Served chilled with a sangrita sidecar.

Name: Cielo Paradise Lost
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Reposado Tequila', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '1/8 cup(s) Pineapple Crushed', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '5 sprig(s) Mint']
Making: Combine tequila, pineapple juice, soda, pineapple, Grand MarnierTM and mint in a shaker with ice. Shake well. Pour into old fashioned glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Cielo Pear Divine
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Anejo Tequila', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '2 oz. Lemon Juice Freshly Squeezed', '1 oz. Prickly Pear Syrup', '1 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Add ice and ingredients to shaker. Shake well. Strain into an ice filled champagne flute. Garnish with a pear slice.

Name: Cielo Pomegranate Blush
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Blanco Tequila', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '2 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Fill shaker with ice. Add all ingredients. Shake well. Pour into white wine glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Cielo Prickly Pear
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Blanco Tequila', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Pear Puree', '1 1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Coconut Rum']
Making: Fill shaker with ice. Add all ingredients. Shake well. Strain into ice filled old fashioned glass. Garnish with a pear slice.

Name: Cielo Tequila Mojito
Ingredients: ['3 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Blanco Tequila', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '5 Mint Leaves Chopped', 'Soda Water']
Making: Muddle juice of half the lime with chopped mint leaves and add to white wine glass filled with ice. Add tequila, CointreauTM simple syrup and juice of the other half of the lime. Stir well. Top with soda water. Garnish with a lime wheel and mint sprig.

Name: Cielo Triple Berry Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) El Diamante del Cielo Blanco Tequila', '1/2 pint(s) Blackberry (ies)', '1 1/2 pint(s) Raspberries', '1/2 cup(s) Lime Juice', '2/3 cup(s) Sugar', '2/3 cup(s) Grand Marnier', '1/8 cup(s) Cointreau', '2 pint(s) Strawberries Sliced and frozen.', '1/4 cup(s) Soda Water']
Making:
Puree blackberries, raspberries, and lime juice in blender until smooth. Strain through fine mesh strainer into large measuring cup. Add sugar; stir until dissolved. Refrigerate berry puree at least 1 hour and up to 1 day.
Mix tequila and Grand Marnier and Cointreau into berry puree. Transfer half of mixture to blender; add half of frozen strawberries and 2 1/2 cups ice and soda water. Blend until smooth. Transfer to pitcher. Repeat with remaining berry puree, frozen strawberries, and ice. Pour into sugar-rimmed Margarita glasses and serve.
Serves 8.

Name: Cielo Winter's Night
Ingredients: ['4 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Anejo Tequila', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Blue Curacao', '4 oz. Cream']
Making: Add ice and ingredients to shaker. Shake well. Strain into a chilled old fashioned glass.

Name: Cincinnati Lunchbox
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Orange Juice', '6 oz. Beer pilsner or lager', '1 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a large glass. GREAT HANGOVER CURE!

Name: Cinco Herradura
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making:
Stir the tequila, fruit juices and soda together in a tall glass. Add the lime juice and stir again.
Rim a third of a tumbler with lime and dip in green sugar. Rim the adjoining third of the glass with lime and dip in white sugar and the last third with lime and dip in red sugar.
Pour the drink into the rimmed glass and serve.

Name: Cinnamon Orange Caipirihna
Ingredients: ['1 1/5 oz. Cabana Cachaca (cinnamon infused)', '2 tsp. Sugar', '1/4 Orange (cut into pieces)', '1/4 Lemon (cut into pieces)']
Making: In a large rocks glass muddle lemon, orange and sugar. Fill with ice, add Cabana and stir. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Cinnamon Toast
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '6 oz. Apple Cider (Hot)']
Making: Rim glass with sugar and cinnamon. Add hot cider and rum.

Name: Cinnamon Twist
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '3 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Stir in a highball glass over ice.

Name: Cinncinanti Shanty
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Das Komet Vanilla Liqueur', '1 oz. Creme de Menthe', '8 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix and serve over ice. Tastes like a shamrock shake.

Name: Cinzano Ambassador
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Cinzano Bianco', '1 1/3 oz. Gin', '2/3 oz. Banana Creme Liqueur', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Add the ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a tumbler glass. Decorate with pineapple cubes.

Name: Cinzano Apple Jack
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cinzano Rosso Vermouth', 'Apple Juice']
Making: Add Cinzano Rosso to a highball glass filled with ice. Stir and top with apple juice. Add a dust of grated cinnamon.

Name: Cinzano Apple Secco
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Apple Schnapps', 'Cinzano Prosecco', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour the ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Squeeze the juice out of a lime wedge and leave it in the glass. Pour over Cinzano Prosecco until it is 2/3 full. Top with cranberry juice.

Name: Cinzano Berry Rosso
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cinzano Rosso Vermouth', '1/3 oz. Strawberry Syrup', '2 2/3 oz. Orange Juice', '2/3 oz. Skyy Vodka', '2/3 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a tumbler glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Cinzano Bianco Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Cinzano Bianco', '2/3 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 dash(es) Grenadine', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Add the spirits to a highball glass filled with ice. Top with pineapple juice. Add the grenadine and garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Cinzano Bronx Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Cinzano Extra Dry Vermouth', '1/3 oz. Cinzano Rosso Vermouth', '2/3 oz. Gin', '1/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with a slice of orange.

Name: Cinzano Cool Delicious
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cinzano Orancio Vermouth', 'Cinzano Asti']
Making: Pour Cinzano Orancio into a highball glass filled with ice. Top with Cinzano Asti. Decorate with an orange peel.

Name: Cinzano Cucaracha
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Cinzano Rosso Vermouth', '2/3 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '2/3 oz. Orange Juice', '1/3 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Pour the ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Stir and decorate with an orange peel.

Name: Cinzano Devil
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Cinzano Extra Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Port', '1 dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour the ingredients into a cocktail glass and stir. Decorate with a slice of orange.

Name: Cinzano Estate Sunshine
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cinzano Bianco', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Stir and pour into a tumbler glass filled with ice cubes. Decorate with a slice of orange.

Name: Cinzano Frozen Limetto
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Cinzano Limetto Vermouth', '2/3 oz. Lime Cordial', '2/3 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Pour ingredients into a blender. Blend at high speed. Pour into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Decorate with a sprig of mint.

Name: Cinzano Gerry
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Cinzano Bianco', '1 2/3 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '2 dash(es) Lemon Juice', '1 dash(es) Raspberry Juice']
Making: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with a raspberry in the bottom of the glass and a lemon slice on top.

Name: Cinzano Golden Prosecco
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cinzano Orancio Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Cognac', '1 piece(s) Brown Sugar', 'Cinzano Prosecco']
Making: Put brown sugar into a white wine glass and all ingredients. Top with Cinzano Prosecco. Squeeze a zest of orange over the glass and leave it in the drink.

Name: Cinzano Ines
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Cinzano Rose', '2/3 oz. Cinzano Extra Dry Vermouth', '2/3 oz. Gin', '1/3 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cinzano Lady Elizabeth
Ingredients: ['4 Strawberries', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis', '2/3 oz. Skyy Vodka', 'Cinzano Asti']
Making: Mix the strawberries and Creme de Cassis together in a glass. Add ice and vodka. Stir and pour into a large wine glass. Pour over Cinzano Asti Garnish with a sprig of mint and a strawberry.

Name: Cinzano Limetto Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Cinzano Limetto Vermouth', '2/3 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/3 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Add ingredients to a Boston Glass filled with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with a zest of lime.

Name: Cinzano Limetto Mediterranean
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cinzano Limetto Vermouth', '2/3 oz. Port', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', 'Soda']
Making: Mix the fruits and sugar syrup together ina highball glass. Fill with ice cubes. Add spirits and top with soda. Decorate with wedges of orange, lemon and lime.

Name: Cinzano Limetto Prosecco
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cinzano Limetto Vermouth', '1 part(s) Cinzano Prosecco']
Making: Pour Cinzano Limetto into a tumbler glass filled with ice cubes. Top with Cinzano Prosecco and stir.

Name: Cinzano Mint
Ingredients: ['10 Mint Leaves', '4 piece(s) Lime', '1 piece(s) Brown Sugar', '1/2 tbsp. Honey', 'Cinzano Asti']
Making: Mix all the ingredients together in a tumbler glass. Fill with ice cubes and top with Cinzano Asti. Decorate with a sprig of mint.

Name: Cinzano Morning Light
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cinzano Extra Dry Vermouth', '2/3 oz. Gin', '1/3 oz. Peach Liqueur']
Making: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with a cherry.

Name: Cinzano Orancio French Kiss
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Cinzano Orancio Vermouth', '2/3 oz. Cognac', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 tbsp. Honey']
Making: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with a cherry.

Name: Cinzano Orancio Tiramisu
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Cinzano Orancio Vermouth', '2/3 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '2/3 oz. Espresso', '2 Coffee Beans', '1 tsp. Brown Sugar']
Making: Crush the coffee beans with the brown sugar. Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake, strain and sieve into a cocktail glass. Decorate with 3 coffee beans on top.

Name: Cinzano Red and Red
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cinzano Rosso Vermouth', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '4 piece(s) Sage Leaves']
Making: Add the ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes.

Name: Cinzano Rose Glow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cinzano Rose', '1/2 oz. Cinzano Extra Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Apricot Nectar']
Making: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a cherry and a sprig of mint.

Name: Cinzano Santa Vittoria
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Cinzano Rose', '2/3 oz. Gin', '2/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Decorate with rose petals.

Name: Cinzano Sun 'n' Fun
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Cinzano Orancio Vermouth', '1 2/3 oz. Orange Juice', '1/3 oz. Campari', '1 2/3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Add ingredients to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Decoarte with a slice of pineapple.

Name: CIROC La Pina
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. CIROC Pineapple Vodka', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a stemmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Citron My Face
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Citronella Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Citrus Vodka', 'dash(es) Lime Juice', '2 oz. Lemonade', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build in a collins glass and top with a squeeze of fresh lime.

Name: Citrus Cooler
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Combine first 5 ingredients in a large, ice cube filled, specialty glass. Top with lemon-lime soda. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Citrus Delight
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Orange Juice of', 'Seltzer Water Lemon lime']
Making: Mix together in an Old Fashioned glass containing 3 crushed ice cubes.

Name: Citrus Explosion
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Soda Citrus Flavour', '6 oz. Tecate Light']
Making: For a quick burst of citrus, pour citrus soda and Tecate Light into the bottom of the glass. Stir well, and enjoy!

Name: Citrus Mist Colada
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Canadian Mist', '4 1/2 oz. Pina Colada Mix', '2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Blend with ice until thick. Serve in an old-fashioned glass and garnish with a cherry and a slice of lime.

Name: Citrus Neon
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Stir over ice in a cocktail glass and finish with the splash of 7-Up.

Name: Citrus Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Sugar']
Making: Rim a straight glass with sugar. Pour vodka in the glass over ice. Add 1 oz. lime juice then lemon juice. Stir then add remaining lime juice. Garnish with a lemon slice and serve. For more sour add another 1-2 oz. of lime juice and for more kick add more vodka.

Name: Citrus Twist on Fire
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Goldschlager', '3/4 oz. Citrus Vodka']
Making: Serve over ice in a rocks glass

Name: City Slicker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: CJ-5
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '6 oz. Orange Juice', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass, or pour in shot glasses. This drink is neon green.

Name: Clamato Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Tomato Juice', '1 oz. Clam Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Clammy Beer
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Beer', '2 oz. Clamato Juice']
Making: Mix in a pint glass and serve.

Name: Claret Cobbler
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Claret (Chilled)', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '2 oz. Sparkling Water (Chilled)']
Making: In a large wine glass, dissolve the sugar in the lemon juice and the water. Add the some cracked ice and pour the claret. Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Claret Lemonade #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Claret (Or red wine)', '2 tsp. Sugar', '1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', 'Water']
Making: Dissolve the sugar and the lemon in a collins glass, then add water, leaving enough room to float the Claret. Garnish with a straw and slices of lemon and orange.

Name: Claret Lemonade #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Claret', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 splash(es) Seltzer Water', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour in a collins glass. Garnish with fruit.

Name: Claret Punch #1
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Claret', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '2 dash(es) Curacao', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 splash(es) Seltzer Water']
Making: Pour in a collins glass. Garnish with fruit goblet.

Name: Claridge Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Apricot Brandy', '1 tbsp. Triple Sec']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Clarity
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca (White)', 'Lemonade (Or tonic water)']
Making: Stir into a tall glass filled with ice.

Name: Classic Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 1/2 tsp. Curacao', '1 1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Prepare an old-fashioned glass by rubbing a slice of lemon around the rim and dipping it into powdered sugar. Shake with ice and strain ingredients into the prepared glass.

Name: Classic Margarita
Ingredients: ['1/4 cup(s) Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1/4 cup(s) Triple Sec', '1/4 cup(s) Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Rim a cocktail glass with lime, dip into course salt. Combine the ingredients, stir with ice, strain and pour into glass. Serves two, or one big one.

Name: Classic Wild Hibiscus Champagne Cocktail
Ingredients: ['Champagne', 'Wild Hibiscus Flower', 'Wild Hibiscus Syrup']
Making: Place a whole Wild Hibiscus Flower pointy end up in the bottom of a Champagne flute (so bubbles will flow up through hole at the base of the flower). Add your preferred bubbly (not sweet or extra dry). Add a dash of hibiscus syrup to desired crimson color or for expensive bubbles just add the flower

Name: Classy Bitch
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", 'Tonic Water']
Making: Build over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Classy Pirate
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Red Wine', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum"]
Making: Mix in a wine glass shot glass mug paper cup dog water dish... it's really that classy. Plug your nose and drink away. We actually drank this but we were really toasted and couldn't really taste it...

Name: Clear Cell
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Vodka', '1 oz. Bacardi Lemon', '1 oz. Tequila (Light)', '1 oz. Dry Gin', '2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Shake with ice (except soda) and strain into a highball glass. Top with soda and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Clear Spring Kahlua
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Grain Alcohol (PGA) (Preferably Clear Spring)', '25 cup(s) Water', '2 cup(s) Brown Sugar', "7 oz. Coffee Taster's Choice Freeze-dried Coffee", '5 oz. Vanilla Extract (Pure)', '5 pound(s) Granulated Sugar']
Making: Combine water, sugars, and coffee in a pot and bring to a boil. Start with 20 cups water, and allow to boil for 3-4 hours, replacing water as it evaporates. Remove from heat and allow to cool completely--overnight is ideal. This must be completely cool before the next steps are taken. When completely cool, add vanilla and alcohol and stir well. Sanitise 10 to 15 one litre bottles before using, then bottle the Kahlua--it's ready to drink! This keeps indefinitely when tightly bottled. *Important: Do not substitute imitation vanilla for pure vanilla--the result will be less than satisfactory and do not substitute ANYTHING for the Freeze-dried coffee. It simply won't work the same nor taste the same.

Name: Cleary's Famous Mudslide
Ingredients: ['1/4 cup(s) Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 cup(s) Kahlua', '1/3 cup(s) Vanilla Vodka', '1 cup(s) Milk (not skim)', '1 pint(s) Chocolate Ice Cream']
Making: Pour contents in a blender and mix just until the ice cream chunks have disappeared. Harder icecream works best. Serves 3-6.

Name: Clifford
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Juice', '1 oz. Ginger Beer (Jamacian)', '1 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Serve over ice in a tall glass.

Name: Climax
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Cloister
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Yellow Chartreuse', '1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Close Encounter
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Triple Sec', '2/3 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour Triple Sec in a cocktail glass. Fill 1/2 of glass with Orange Juice. Pour in Blue Curacao. The bottom of the drink should go green and the top remain orange.

Name: Cloud 9
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Top with whipped cream and 1/2 a Reese's peanut butter cup.

Name: Cloud 99
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Schnapps', 'dash(es) Orange Juice', 'drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Follow these directions EXPLICITLY. Mix the banana, peach, and strawberry schnapps. Shake and strain into a double shot glass. Add a drop of grenadine and let it sink to the bottom. Add a splash of orange juice and let it swirl. If done properly, it will look like a cloudy sunset, hence the name.

Name: Cloud Nine
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Milk']
Making: Pour vodka into a glass of milk. Stir. CAUTION: It is said that this drink will curdle in the stomach and cause vomiting.

Name: Clove Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Muscatel']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Clover Club Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '2 tsp. Grenadine', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Clover Leaf
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '4 dash(es) Grenadine', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Club Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry or an olive.

Name: Club Haus
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', 'Club Soda']
Making: Mix over ice in a tall glass. Garnish with an orange wedge.

Name: Co-Co Cow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Blend all ingredients in a blender with a scoop of crushed ice.

Name: COBRA
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Coca Cola', '1/2 cup(s) Milk', '2 scoop(s) Chocolate Ice Cream', '1 squirt(s) Maple Syrup']
Making: Mix together and pour into a large glass.

Name: Cocaine Lady
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Light Cream', '1 oz. Cola']
Making: Shake with ice and stain over ice. Float 1 ounce of cola on top.

Name: CocaMocha
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Coca Cola', '2 part(s) Crown Royal', '1/2 part(s) Kahlua', '1/2 part(s) Di Saronno Oringinale Amaretto']
Making: Build over ice in a 16 oz. Tumbler.

Name: Cock N'Bull Shot
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Beef Bouillon', '2 oz. Chicken Bouillon', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', 'Worcestershire Sauce (To taste)', 'Pepper (To taste)', 'Celery Salt (To taste)', 'Tabasco Sauce (To taste)']
Making: Stir well with cracked ice and serve into an old fashioned glass.

Name: Cockspur Silver Belle
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cockspur Fine Rum', '1/4 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Earl Grey Tea', '3/4 oz. Wild Hibiscus Syrup', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain Into a chilled cocktail glass with a sugar coated rim. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Cockville Concoction
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Gatorade passionfruit', '2 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka']
Making: Pour ingredients into a tall glass and stir.

Name: Coco Amor
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cocoribe', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass.

Name: Coco Cabana
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beachcomber Coconut Rum', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Serve over ice. Garnish with lime.

Name: Coco Channel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with chocolate curls.

Name: Coco Loco #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Coconut Cream', '1/2 oz. Sugar Syrup']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a chilled highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Coco Loco #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila Silver', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar Syrup', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 Coconut (Fresh and with the coconut water)']
Making: Saw off the top of the coconut and pour the cocount water in a glass. Pour 1 cup of crushed ice into the coconut and add all the other ingredients (including the coconut water). Drop the squeezed 1/2 lime into the drink and stir well. Garnish with a straw and a paper umbrella.

Name: CoCo-bu
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Chocolate Milk']
Making: Pour Malibu into a tall glass and fill with chocolate milk.

Name: Coco-Mocha Alexander
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Coffee Brandy', '1 oz. Coffee (Black and Cold)', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Blend with 8 oz. crushed ice until smooth. Serve in a specialty glass.

Name: Coco-Sexo The Sexy Coconut
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cachaca Fazenda Mae de Ouro', '1/2 Lime', 'Coconut Cream']
Making: Squeeze lime into cachaça and coconut water. Shake all ingredients in a shaker with crushed ice. Strain over ice into a tall glass.

Name: Cocomacoque
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Red Wine']
Making: Shake all ingredients except wine and pour into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with wine and garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Cocomoni
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Coconut Liqueur', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '2 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Build in a tall glass over ice.

Name: Coconut Climber
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Mango Liqueur', '2 oz. Coconut Cream', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tbsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with crushed ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with toasted coconut.

Name: Coconut Colada
Ingredients: ["1 1/4 oz. Admiral Nelson's Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Milk', '5 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend with a cup of ice for 10 - 15 seconds. Pour into specialty glass and garnish with a pineapple spear.

Name: Coconut Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 1/2 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Mix with 8 oz. of crushed ice until smooth. Serve in wine glass and garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Coconut Grove
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey (100 proof)', '1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Cointreau (Or other orange liqueur)', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Coconut Shell
Ingredients: ['3 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '2 Coconuts (Large)', 'Milk']
Making: Drain the coconuts and save the liquid. Scoop out the flesh and mix with the ingredients. Add 3-4 oz. of crushed ice and blend until smooth. Serve in the coconut shells, using more milk if there is not enough liquid.

Name: Coconut Tequila
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Coconut Cream', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Mix with crushed ice for 15 seconds in a blender. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Coconut Toastie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '5 tbsp. Ice Cream', '1/4 oz. Whipped Cream']
Making: Combine all ingredients (except coconut) in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a chilled champagne flute and garnish with shredded coconut.

Name: COD
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Orange Vodka', 'Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Fill a pint glass with ice. Pour in vodka and cranberry juice leaving a little room for the splash of Sprite.

Name: Coffee
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '6 oz. Milk', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 tsp. Sugar Syrup', '1/2 tsp. Instant Coffee', '1 Egg']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into a collins glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Coffee Alexander
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Coffee Brandy', '2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Coffee Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Port', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Coffee Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '6 oz. Milk', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 tsp. Sugar Syrup', '1/2 tsp. Instant Coffee', '1 Egg']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into a collins glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Coffee Fantasy
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/3 oz. Coffee (Cold)', 'Milk']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with milk.

Name: Coffee Flip
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Port', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg', '2 tsp. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Coffee Grasshopper
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Coffee Brandy', '3/4 oz. Creme de Menthe', '3/4 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Coffee Kahlua
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Coffee (cold)']
Making: Pour Kahlua into a brandy glass. Fill with coffee. Serve On The Rocks. Garnish With a cherry or an orange wheel.

Name: Coffee Liqueur
Ingredients: ['10 tbsp. Coffee (Instant)', '4 tbsp. Vanilla Extract', '2 1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '1 quart(s) Vodka', '2 1/2 cup(s) Water']
Making: Combine coffee, sugar and water. Simmer 1 hour and let cool. Add vanilla and vodka. Age in sealed jar 2 to 3 weeks.

Name: Coffee Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '2 dash(es) Bitters', '1/2 cup(s) Water', '2 oz. Club Soda', '2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 1/2 tsp. Instant Coffee']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass dissolve the instant coffee in the water then gradually stir in the sugar, the bitters and the Bourbon. Add ice and top up with the soda. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Coffee Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Coffee Brandy', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a sour glass, and serve.

Name: Cognac Coupling
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Tawny Port', '1/2 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '3 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Cognac Highball
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac', 'Carbonated Water (or Ginger Ale)']
Making: Pour Cognac into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel, stir, and serve.

Name: Coke And Boogers
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '2 oz. Irish Cream', '4 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix coffee liquer and coke then float the irish cream on top. DO NOT STIR!

Name: Coke Monkey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Add equal parts Creme de Banane and Kahlua. Fill with Coke to taste. AKA Creamsicle Monkeysicle

Name: Coke Sucker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '6 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Fill a beer mug half with ice and add the ingredients in order. Stir lightly. (Note: vanilla ice cream can be substituted for cream).

Name: Cola Cube
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Taboo', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 oz. Black Currant Cordial', 'Pepsi Cola']
Making: Build all ingredients into ice filled collins glass and enjoy!

Name: Cola Frenzy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Mix in a highball glass over ice and fill with Coca Cola.

Name: Colby's Delight
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Apple Juice', '1 oz. Gin', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix and serve over ice into a lowball glass. Garnish with an apple slice and cherries.

Name: Cold and Clammy Bloody Mary
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Clamato Juice', '1/2 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce', '1/2 tsp. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '4 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', 'Pepper (To taste)', 'Salt (To taste)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain over ice cubes into highball glass. Garnish with a green onion.

Name: Cold Brandy Alexander
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Nutmeg']
Making: Combine in a blenderand blend in med-low until smooth. Pour and garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Cold Chillen
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake the ingredients with ice (keep 2 oz. of pineapple juice aside) and strain into a highball glass. Top with the pineapple juice left.

Name: Cold Deck Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 tsp. White Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Brandy']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cold Green Slime
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Surge Energy Drink', '2 oz. Vodka', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Combine Surge and vodka, then stir in sugar. Be careful when adding sugar, because it causes a lot of fizz. Serve chilled for best taste. Enjoy!

Name: Cold Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '2 tsp. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Cold War
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '12 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Sour Mix']
Making: In shaker combine first three ingredients. Add sour mix to taste - to give a bit of a kick. Shake well, pour into a tall glass and serve. (Hint the reall magic to this drink is in the shake shake shake…let the fizz and bubbles go straight to the brain). Enjoy!

Name: Cold Winters
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Canadian Club 6 Year Old', '1 oz. Kahlua', '3/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Milk']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass.

Name: Coldcocked
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Pina Colada Mix (Frozen)', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '3/4 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Frappe in a collins glass.

Name: Colin Killer
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Gin', '1 bottle(s) Alcopop (Your favourite)']
Making: Combine in a pint glass. Give it to friend who's birthday it is. If they don't either attack a bouncer, or spend the night in the toilets, then they're a better man than I! E.S.F.

Name: Collins
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Liquor', '3 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Colonel Dan's Ice Tea
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice', 'Iced Tea (Sweetened)', '7-Up (Or Sprite or Mountain Dew)']
Making: In a tall glass or a beer mug, full of ice, add the bourbon and a dash of lemon juice. Then fill 3/4 of the glass with brewed sweetened ice tea and top up with 7-UP. Give a quick stir & enjoy!

Name: Colonial Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive and serve.

Name: Colorado Bull Dog #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Hennessy Cognac XO', '1 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake well, pour over ice and enjoy. Tastes like a root beer float!

Name: Colorado Bulldog
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Malibu Tropical Banana Rum', 'Milk', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour Malibu and Kahlua into a glass then fill with milk and add a dash of Coca Cola.

Name: Colorado Bulldog #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Milk', 'Cola']
Making: In a shaker mix vodka, Kahlua, and milk. Pour into a rocks glass and add a splash of cola. Janice Magnini suggests you should use root beer instead of cola. Thanks Janice! And another user, Colorado Girl, suggests using Stolichnaya Vanilla Vodka…Yours to try! And somebody else (Wow! This recipe is popular) suggests to use half and half instead of milk. It's much richer and tastes a lot better.

Name: Colorado Bulldog #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Mix, shake and pour over ice.

Name: Colorado Mother F**ker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola', 'Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with milk.

Name: Colorado Skies
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Tequila', '5 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass.

Name: Columbia
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Grenadine', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Combier Cherry Truffle Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Royal Combier Grande Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Combier Rouge Cherry Liqueur', 'Milk (to taste)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into a cocktail glass.

Name: Combier Cosmo
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Combier Liqueur d'Orange", '1 1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a flamed orange zest.

Name: Combier Festive Sundae
Ingredients: ['1/4 tsp. Champagne', '1/4 tsp. Royal Combier Grande Liqueur', '1/4 tsp. Combier Rouge Cherry Liqueur', "1/4 tsp. Combier Liqueur d'Orange", '3 tbsp. Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 Maraschino Cherries']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into a cocktail glass.

Name: Combier Margarita
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Combier Liqueur d'Orange", '1 1/2 oz. Partida Blanco Tequila', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over rocks. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Combier Red Sage
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Combier Rouge Cherry Liqueur', '2 leaf(leaves) Sage', '1 bottle(s) Coca Cola']
Making: Shake vodka and Rouge with ice. Garnish with Sage leaves. Serve alongside a bottle of Coke.

Name: Combier Sidecar
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', "1 oz. Combier Liqueur d'Orange", '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: If served down, shake and strain into an old fashioned glass. If served up, shake and strain into a martini glass with sugar rim. Garnish with a flamed orange peal.

Name: Combo
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Combustible Edison
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Campari', '1 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: In a shaker full of cracked ice, combine Campari and lemon juice. Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Heat and ignite brandy and pour in a flaming stream into the cocktail glass.

Name: Come To Me
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix alcohol with ice in a highball glass, fill with pineapple juice and top with grenadine.

Name: Comfort Zone
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Milk', '1/2 oz. Sugar Syrup', '4 Strawberries']
Making: Blend all ingredients and serve in highball glass.

Name: Comfortable Brother
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Pour into a lowball glass.

Name: Comfortable Fuzzy Screw
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Comfortable Fuzzy Screw Up Against A Wall
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Galliano', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Comfortable Pirate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix together and serve over ice.

Name: Comfortably Numb
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '8 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Combine in a highball glass.

Name: Comfortably Numb Red Lamb Balls
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Amber Rum (Preferably Lambs)', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '7-Up']
Making: Pour the Southern Comfort and the rum in a cocktail glass, top with 7-Up and add the splash of grenadine.

Name: Comforting Tiger
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: In a mixing glass, half-filled with crushed ice, combine the brandy, Southern Comfort, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Commando Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '2 dash(es) Pernod Absinthe', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Commodore
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add sugar to taste.

Name: Commodore Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Commodore Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Commonwealth Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Stir well with ice and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange.

Name: Communicator
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '2 tsp. Brown Creme de Cacao']
Making: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Name: Communist Plot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 pinch(es) Powdered Sugar', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour rum, vodka, triple sec and tequilia into a shaker with ice. Add the powdered sugar and fill the shaker to the top with cranberry juice. Shake and pour into a tall glass over a few ice cubes. Add more cranberry juice if needed. As for the name… Drink three and plan to take over the world!

Name: Comoco
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Dry Gin', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Bols Blue Curacao', '12 oz. Bitter Lemon']
Making: Add Dry Gin, White Rum and Bitter Lemon into a cocktail glass over ice. Pour the Bols Blue last down the inside edge of the glass for a quality gradient effect.

Name: Compadre
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Compound #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Lemon', '5 oz. Orange Juice', '5 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix well in tall glass and enjoy!

Name: Compton Sunrise
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', 'Orange Juice', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Fill 1/4 of tall glass with ice. Add gin and then almost fill to top with orange juice. Top off with tonic water. Perfect early morning aid.

Name: Concoction #1
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. DeKuyper Sour Apple', '2 1/2 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', 'Sprite']
Making: Combine in a 16 oz. Glass

Name: Concoction #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix in a tall glass with ice.

Name: Coney Island Baby
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', 'Seltzer Water']
Making: Shake well liquors with cracked ice and strain over ice cubes into a highball glass. Gently stir in Seltzer.

Name: Confirmed Bachelor
Ingredients: ['1 Egg White', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Grenadine', "1/2 tsp. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: In a shaker half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: ConnieCola
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cherry-Berry Schnapps', 'Cola']
Making: Mix in a highball glass filled with ice.

Name: Connolly's Irish Connection #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into either a tulip glass or a collins glass.

Name: Connolly's Irish Connection #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1 splash(es) Green Creme de Menthe']
Making: In a tall tulip glass filled with ice add all the ingredients and top with Green creme de menthe. Shake vigorously and drink. Enjoy

Name: Conquistador
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Anchos Reyes Chile Liqueur', '1 1/2 part(s) Milagro Reposado Tequila', '1/2 part(s) Creme de Cacao', '1/2 part(s) Manzanilla Sherry', '1 dash(es) Angostura Orange Bitters']
Making: Combine all ingredients except the rich Chill coupe glass with ice and water and set aside. Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass. Add ice and stir until well chilled and diluted. Discard chilling ice from the coupe. Strain ingredients into chilled coupe. Using a vegetable peeler, remove a long piece of orange peel. Express the oil over the cocktail, rub the peel around the rim of the glass, and place atop the cocktail.

Name: Constipolitan
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1/2 oz. Prune Juice']
Making: Mix with crushed ice. Pour into a champagne flute. Garnish with lime zest and brace yourself.

Name: Continental
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 tsp. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Cooch Behar
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pepper Vodka', '3 oz. Tomato Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Cookie Monster
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour Blue Maui into a highball glass and fill the rest with pineapple juice.

Name: Cool Carlos
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Curacao', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Mix all ingredients except Curacao with ice. Shake with ice and pour into a collins glass. Float Curacao and garnish with pineapple and orange slices and a cherry.

Name: Cool Mist
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Mist', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour Irish Mist over ice into an old fashioned glass. Fill with Sprite.

Name: Cool Operator
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. White Rum', '4 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Fill a blender 1/2 way with ice and add ingredients. Blend until thick. Pour into a parfait glass and garnish with a melon wedge and a cherry.

Name: Cool Sky
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Soju', '1/2 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '4 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Pour into a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Cool Sophistication
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Godiva Chocolate Cream Liqueur', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Cool Summer Brease
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Crush ice into a pilsner glass and add vodka. Fill with orange juice and add Kirsaou.

Name: Cool-Aide
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Use a large glass filled with ice, add the blueberry schnapps then thecranberry juice. Stir and then top off with 7-Up.

Name: Cooperstown Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint and serve.

Name: Copas Organic Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 4 Copas Blanco', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice Organic', '1 1/2 oz. 4 Copas Organic Agave Nectar', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Fill glass with ice. Strain the mixture over fresh ice and garnish with lime slice and serve.

Name: Corazon Bloody Maria
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Corazon Tequila Blanco', '1 1/2 part(s) Tomato Juice', '1 dash(es) Salt', '1 dash(es) Pepper', '1 drop(s) Worcestershire Sauce']
Making: Add ingredients in a tall glass and stir. Add Worcestershire Sauce to taste and garnish with celery and a lemon or lime.

Name: Corazon Cola
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Corazon Tequila Reposado', 'Cola']
Making: Pour Corazon over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill glass with cola and stir

Name: Corazon de Peche
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Corazon Tequila Blanco', '1 part(s) Peach Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Serve over ice and garnish with a peach slice.

Name: Corazon Encantado
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Corazon Tequila Reposado', '3/4 part(s) Peach Brandy', '1 splash(es) Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Corazon Grapefruit
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Corazon Tequila Blanco', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over ice. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Corazon Green Iguana
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Corazon Tequila Blanco', '1 part(s) Melon Liqueur', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a margarita glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Corazon Invisible Hombre
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Corazon Tequila Blanco', '2 1/2 part(s) Tonic Water', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Mix in a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Corazon Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Corazon Tequila Blanco', '1 part(s) Orange Liqueur', '1 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake and serve on the rocks. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Corazon Mojita Fresa
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Corazon Tequila Blanco', '1/2 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '2 Strawberries', '1/2 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake and serve on the rocks. Muddle the strawberries and stir in the sugar. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Corazon Orange
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Corazon Tequila Blanco', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in a tall glass and garnish with an orange wheel.

Name: Corazon Paloma
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Corazon Tequila Blanco', 'Lemon Lime Soda', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Mix in a tall glass and garnish with a lime wheel..

Name: Corazon Pasion
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Corazon Tequila Blanco', '1/2 part(s) Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Serve over ice in a margarita glass. Garnish with an orange wedge.

Name: Corazon PomTini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Corazon Tequila Reposado', '1 part(s) Pomegranate Juice', '1/2 part(s) Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Serve in a martini glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Corazon Sangrita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 tsp. Tabasco Sauce', '3/4 tsp. A-1 Steak Sauce', 'Grenadine', 'Salt', 'Pepper', '1 oz. Corazon Tequila Reposado']
Making: Mix together and pour into a shot glass. Pour the Corazon into another glass.

Name: Corbins Riptide Crash
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gatorade (Frost Riptide Rush)', '2 1/2 oz. Sprite', '1 1/2 oz. Smirnoff Blueberry Vodka']
Making: Pour into a glass. Stir and drink.

Name: Corbob
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '12 oz. Root Beer']
Making: Pour Bailey's Irish Cream into glass first and then add root beer. Tastes just like a root beer float after you've snarfed down the ice cream!

Name: Cordless Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Vodka', 'Sugar']
Making: Pour chilled vodka into a shot glass. Dip an orange wedge in sugar. Shoot the vodka and immediately take a draw on the orange.

Name: Corkscrew
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Peach Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Corkscrew #2
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Spiced Rum", '1 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Peach Brandy']
Making: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass, serve over ice, garnish with lime wedge.

Name: Cornell Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cornell Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 Egg White']
Making: Shake vigorously with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Cornwall-Nash
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 tsp. Cherry Brandy']
Making: Pour the rum, gin, Triple Sec, and grapefruit juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the a cherry brandy into the centre of the drink. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Coronado
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. White Curacao', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '4 dash(es) Kirsch']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Coronation
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Sherry', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters', 'dash(es) Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Coronation Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Corpse Reviver #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Fernet Branca', '1 oz. White Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Corpse Reviver #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Calvados', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Corpse Reviver #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '4 oz. Milk', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'Soda Water']
Making: Shake over ice and serve in a lowball glass.

Name: CORZO Bite
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Corzo Silver Tequila', '1/2 part(s) Campari', '1 part(s) Orange Juice (Blood Orange)', '1/4 part(s) Grenadine', '2 part(s) Jarritos Tamarindo Soda']
Making:
Build all ingredients into a highball glass filled with ice. Add the "blood" (grenadine) at the end. Garnish with a blood orange wheel and strawberry syrup.
*Created by The Cocktail Guru Jonathan Pogash

Name: Cosmic Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix, toss in a couple of cherries and Tada Cosmic Kool-Aid!

Name: Cosmo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice into your favorite cocktail glass and serve.

Name: Cosmogreek
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry-Raspberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 dash(es) Ouzo']
Making: Shakewith ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cosmopolitan #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '1 1/4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Or lemon)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. The lime or lemon juice is optional. I find the citron vodka to contain enough citrus but some like the extra bite of the juice.

Name: Cosmopolitan #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka (Or Lemon Vodka)', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a martini shaker. Shake gently. Strain and pour into chilled glasses.

Name: Cosmopolitan #4
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Cosmopolitan (Original)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnished with a twist of lemon for looks, or a lime wedge for taste.

Name: Cosmoquila
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Riazul Silver Tequila', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake ingredients in mixing glass with ice, then strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cosmos
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cosmotequila
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila Casa Noble Gold', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice, strain and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cossack
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cognac', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Gomme Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cossack Charge
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cognac', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy']
Making: Shake or blend over cracked ice and pour into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Costa Del Sol
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Cote's Cock
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Beer', '1 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Combine in a collins glass.

Name: Cotillion Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cotton Candy
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Butterscotch Ripple Schnapps', 'Root Beer']
Making: Mix in a mug and enjoy!

Name: Cotton Candy #3
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '1 part(s) Vanilla Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Pisco']
Making: Garnish with a orange slice

Name: Cotton Mouth
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Curacao', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add grenadine and coke and enjoy.

Name: Count Currey
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Champagne (Chilled)']
Making: Shake gin and sugar with ice and strain into a champagne flute over ice cubes. Fill with champagne.

Name: Count Stroganoff
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Country Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis', '2 1/2 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Fill glass with ice and pour in the Plymouth Gin. Add the Creme de Cassis and top with apple juice. Stir and add garnish of sliced apples and a blackberry.

Name: Country Club Cooler #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Pour grenadine and 2 oz. carbonated water into a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes and dry vermouth. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and an orange spiral so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

Name: Country Club Cooler #2
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Lillet', '1 tsp. Grenadine', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Stir Lillet and grenadine into a collins glass and add ice cubes. Fill with sparkling water, stir gently and garnish with a twist of orange.

Name: Country F**k
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila', 'Country Time Lemonade (Pink)']
Making: Mix with ice in a highball glass.

Name: County and Western
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Blend all ingredients in blender with a scoop of crushed ice.

Name: Courage
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine the liquors in a cocktail shaker 3/4 full of ice and add juices. Shake and strain into a highball glass.

Name: CoUrT N JoHn
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and bottoms up! A great drink for a great couple!!

Name: Courvoisiberry
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Courvoisier Cognac VSOP', '1 part(s) Rum', '2 part(s) Wine (Rose)']
Making: Combine all ingredients, stir and serve in a wine glass over ice. Garnish with exotic berries.

Name: Courvoisier and Coffee
Ingredients: ['Coffee', '1 oz. Courvoisier Exclusif Cognac', 'Double Cream']
Making: Simply mix Courvoisier EXCLUSIF Cognac with your favorite coffee, then add fresh double cream to put the final touches on this warm cocktail. To ensure the cream stays on top, pour it over the back of a spoon.

Name: Courvoisier Eggnog
Ingredients: ['4 part(s) Eggnog', '1 part(s) Dekuyper Buttershots Schnapps', 'Courvoisier Exclusif Cognac', 'Nutmeg']
Making: Mix eggnog and butterscotch schnapps in a glass or mug. Add Courvoisier Cognac to taste. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Courvoisier Strawberry Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Courvoisier Cognac VSOP', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Strawberry Passion Schnapps', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '2 Strawberries (optional)']
Making: Shake well and strain into an ice - filled tall glass. Top with club soda.

Name: Covered in Mud
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Orange Juice', '1 part(s) Sprite', '1 part(s) Kahlua']
Making: Build over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Cowboy
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Whiskey', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Cowboy Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 tbsp. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cowboys Cumm
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. 7-Up', '1 tsp. Honey', 'Milk']
Making: Combine 7-Up and vodka in a highball glass, fill with milk and stir in the honey.

Name: Cowgirl Quencher
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix all ingredients together in a cocktail glass over ice.

Name: Cowgirl's Prayer
