Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', 'Lemonade']
Making: Stir into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with slices of lime and lemon.

Name: Cowwooo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Ginger Brandy']
Making: Mix White Rum and Ginger Brandy over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Coyote Kiss
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Bacardi O', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Lemonade', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour equal parts of all three liquors into a pint glass full of ice. Fill with equal parts of Cranberry juice and Lemonade. Top with a generous splash of Pinapple juice. Be careful... just like it's name the kisses taste sweet but this coyote can bite!

Name: Cozumel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', 'Fruit Punch']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with fruit slices.

Name: Cozza
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Lemon Squash']
Making: Lay Bacardi Rum, Sambuca, Vodka, Blue Curacao and Grenadine over crushed ice in a highball glass. Fill with Lemon Squash and serve with a lemon slice.

Name: Cpt. Nemo's Favorite
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Pisang Ambon', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake Amaretto, Pisang Ambonand cream in a shaker and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Crack Attack Special
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Cranberry-Raspberry Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass over ice and fill with equal parts cranberry-raspberry juice and orange juice.

Name: Cracka's Lemonade
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Bacardi Limon (Or to taste)', 'Water', 'Country Time Lemonade (Powder)']
Making: Put the lemonade powder into a 2 quart pitcher (double the amount of powder recommended). Pour the Bacardi Limon into the pitcher and stir. Fill the pitcher to top with water, and stir again. Enjoy!

Name: Cracked Chandelier
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '4 oz. Sprite']
Making: Pour over ice cubes into a lowball glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon/lime.

Name: Crackhead Slammer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 can(s) Dr Pepper']
Making: Mix over ice.

Name: Cran "D.J.B."man
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Sprite', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry.

Name: Cran-Apple Cobler - TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. TY KU Sake', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '3 oz. Apple Cider']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with crushed cranberries.

Name: Cranapple
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Apple Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Cranapple TYLite
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Apple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Cranberry Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of crushed ice until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass.

Name: Cranberry Crusher
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cranberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Grain Alcohol (PGA)', 'Squirt']
Making: Fill tall glass with ice. Add cranberry liqueur and grain alcohol. Fill with Squirt, stir and serve.

Name: Cranberry Hooker
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Lemon Liqueur', '4 oz. Sour Mix', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a mason jar with ice. Add liquor and sour mix. Top with the cranberry juice. Serve and watch the smiles as they taste!!

Name: Cranberry Kiss
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '2 oz. Collins Mix', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine rum, schnapps, collins mix and cranberry juice in an ice cube filled highball glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Cranberry Prunier
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass. Fill with cranberry juice and stir with a little ice. It can also be served with no ice but serve very cold.

Name: Cranberry Sour
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice into a cocktail glass. Mix. Enjoy!

Name: Cranberry Spice Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Partida Reposado Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Bar Mix', '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '3/4 oz. Velvet Falernum', '11 Cranberries 8 muddled, 3 for garnish', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making:
In a mixing glass, muddle fresh cranberries with lime sour and add remaining ingredients then shake with ice. Strain over ice into a Margarita glass rimmed in sugar. Garnish with a pick of cranberries.
Courtesy of Trudy Thomas, JW Marriott Camelback Inn Resort & Spa

Name: Cranberry Zambonee
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Cranberry Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Wild Spirit Liqueur']
Making: Add ingredients to shaker with ice, shake, strain, and serve in rocks glass.

Name: Cranntana
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Cransoma
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. DeKuyper Wild Strawberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Finlandia Cranberry Vodka', '1/3 oz. Soho Lychee Liqueur', '1 1/3 oz. Apple Juice', 'Schweppes Russian Water']
Making: Shake with ice (except Schweppes) and strain into a hurricane glass. Top with Schweppes and garnish with a stick of cucumber, a cherry, a slice of lemon and pineapple leaves.

Name: Crantini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice (Unsweetened)']
Making: Pour the liquor in a chilled cocktail glass and slowly add the cranberry juice. Garnish with a lime or a lemon twist.

Name: Crapton
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into a cocktail glass.

Name: Crazy 8
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Sourpuss Raspberry Liqueur', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour into a beer glass and fill with equal parts cranberry juice and Sprite.

Name: Crazy Banana
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Irish Whiskey', '12 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix with ice. Drink and be careful.

Name: Crazy Finn
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Finlandia Vodka', '1 oz. Dry Sherry', '1 oz. Cointreau', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Crazy Linda
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3/4 oz. 7-Up', '1 dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour 7-Up into a frosty highball glass along with Peach schnapps and sour Lemon juice. Do not stir. Let the bubbles do the trick. The drink was named after me (I created the drink in a contest). A very popular choice among students at York University Canada. Enjoy!

Name: Crazy Mexican
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Presidente Brandy', '1 squirt(s) Grapefruit Soda', '1 dash(es) Salt']
Making: In a 6-8 oz. glass mix all the ingredients stir and enjoy...)

Name: Crazy Orgasm #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 cup(s) Cranberry Juice', '1/3 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 pinch(es) Sugar']
Making: Pour all the ingredients in a large glass over ice, then stir well.

Name: Crazy Orgasm #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 pinch(es) Sugar']
Making: Stir well with ice and strain over ice into a cocktail glass.

Name: Crazy Parrot
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '3/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a cocktail glass. Pour the cranberry on last to get a pretty mixture of color. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Cream Cadillac Paralyzer Float
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', 'Milk', '3 oz. 7-Up', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Put a small scoop of ice in a blender. Add Kahlua, vodka, sambuca and some milk. Add a small scoop of ice cream. Blend it all up and drink it!

Name: Cream Cordial
Ingredients: ['14 oz. Eagle Brand Sweetened Milk', '1 1/4 cup(s) Coffee Liqueur (or Almond, Orange or Mint)', '1 cup(s) Whipping Cream (or Light Cream)', '4 Eggs']
Making: In blender container, combine all ingredients, blend until smooth. Serve over ice if desired.

Name: Cream De La Splooge
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Beer', '1 can(s) Cream Soda']
Making: Mix beer and cream soda together in equal parts in a tall glass. Works best if both are VERY cold.

Name: Cream Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Light Cream', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Name: Cream of Jack
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '2 oz. Amaretto', 'Cream Soda']
Making: Pour the Jack Daniel's Whiskey and Amaretto into a highball glass with ice. Then add the cream soda. Kick back and enjoy.

Name: Cream Puff
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Light Cream', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with Club Soda and stir.

Name: Cream Soda
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vanilla Liqueur (Or vanilla rum)', 'Sprite (To taste)']
Making: Mix in a highball glass.

Name: Creamalada
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', 'Ginger Ale', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake and serve over ice. Can also be a frozen drink : just blend the ingredients with ice until smooth.

Name: Creaming Soda
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Parfait Amour', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Blend lemonade, Parfait Amour and Triple Sec with ice and pour into a hurricane glass. Blend grenadine and lemonade with ice and layer this on the top. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Creamsicle #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vanilla Liqueur', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Milk']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

Name: Creamsicle #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/2 oz. Milk', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Creamsicle #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pear Brandy', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Milk', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream']
Making: Pour pear brandy, orange juice and milk over ice cream in a highball glass. Stir and enjoy.

Name: Creamsicle (Original)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Vanilla Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass.

Name: Creamy Bush
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', "1 1/2 oz. Bushmill's Irish Whiskey"]
Making: Pour into a lowball glass.

Name: Creamy Crotch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Cream', '1 oz. Cocoa Powder']
Making: Mix well and drink!

Name: Creamy Orange
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Cream Sherry', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tbsp. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Creamy Pirate
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '2 cup(s) 7-Up']
Making: Mix well. Serve over ice.

Name: Creamy Punani
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua', '3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Amaretto', 'Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Fill blender about 3/4 with ice cream (not solid). Add Amaretto, Kahlua and Bailey's Irish Cream. Blend. Drink.

Name: Creamy Rum Liqueur
Ingredients: ['13 1/3 oz. Condensed Milk', '10 oz. Cream', '10 oz. Milk', '3/4 cup(s) Rum', '2 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup', '2 tsp. Coffee (Instant)', '2 tsp. Water (Boiling)']
Making: Dissolve coffee in the water. Mix all ingredient's slowly in a blender. Serve chilled.

Name: Creamy Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: Combine all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a collins glass and serve.

Name: Creamy Sex On The Beach
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 oz. Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix all the ingredients (except the whipped cream). Add the whipped cream and shake vigorously until frothy. Serve as a shot or over ice as a drink.

Name: Creamy Vodkanilla
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Milk', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 tsp. Vanilla Extract']
Making: Mix ingredients, stir and serve.

Name: Creep
Ingredients: ['25 oz. Alize Blue', '25 oz. Hennessy Cognac XO']
Making: Mix all the ingredients into a gallon milk container shake well. Serve cold.This drink will make you CREEP

Name: Creepy Crawler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix in a tall glass and fill with equal parts orange juice and cranberry juice.

Name: Creme de Cachaca
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cachaca Fazenda Mae de Ouro', '1 1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Hazelnut Liqueur']
Making: Shake all ingredients in a shaker with crushed ice. Strain over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Creme de Cafe
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coffee Brandy', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Anisette', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Creme de Gin Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Orange Juice', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Creme de Menthe
Ingredients: ['8 cup(s) Sugar', '6 cup(s) Water', '1 pint(s) Grain Alcohol (PGA) (188 Proof)', '1 oz. Pure Peppermint Extract', '1 tbsp. Food Colouring (Green)']
Making: Bring sugar and water to a boil and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool. Add the remaining ingredients and stir. Cover and let ripen for 1 month.

Name: Creme de Menthe Frappe
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe']
Making: Serve over shaved ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a mint sprig and a short straw.

Name: Creme de Menthe Parfait
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '2 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Blend with 16 oz. crushed ice until smooth and creamy. Serve in a specialty glass and garnish with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry.

Name: Creme Rosa
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Strawberry Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '5 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake all ingredients vigorously, then pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Creole
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', 'dash(es) Salt', 'dash(es) Pepper', 'Beef Bouillon']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Creole Lady
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Madeira', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with both a red and a green cherry.

Name: Crimson
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Ruby Port', '2 tsp. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake gin, grenadine and lime juice with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Float the port on top.

Name: Crimson Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '3/4 oz. Port']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Float port.

Name: Crimson Sky
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 bottle(s) SKYY Blue Malt Beverage']
Making: Pour Chambord into a pint glass and then add the SKYY Blue.

Name: Crimson Sunset
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Tawny Port']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the grenadine into the centre of the drink and float the port on the top.

Name: Crimson Tide
Ingredients: ['6 part(s) Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila', '2 part(s) Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '2 part(s) Mountain Dew Code Red']
Making: Stir, do not shake the ingredients in a separate container. Pour over ice in a glass. Repeat until you see red.

Name: Crimson Tide #2
Ingredients: ['Sunny Delight Orange Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Everclear', '2 tbsp. Grenadine']
Making: Fill a standard blender 1/2 full with ice cubes. Pour Sunny Delight into blender until level with ice and add the Everclear and grenadine for color. Blend until ice is crushed and is similar to a orange flavored ice. Easy to drink, and packs a hell of a kick. Serves 3-4

Name: Cringo Wetmouth
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Garnish the rim of a glass with sugar then chill the glass. Mix together liquor and juice and pour into the glass over crushed ice.

Name: Crispy Treat Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Rum Chata', '2 part(s) Smirnoff Fluffed Marshmellow Vodka']
Making: Shake; serve; enjoy!

Name: Crocodile Cooler #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Sour Mix', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour first four ingredients in a parfait glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with soda and stir. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

Name: Crocodile Cooler #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Midori', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Crooked Road
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Jagermeister (Optional)', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake all the ingredients (except grenadine) with ice and pour into a lowball glass. Float the grenadine and garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

Name: Cropover Eclipse
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Galliano', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake all the ingredients, pour in a poco grande glass, garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

Name: Crotch Kicker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cuervo Tequila', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', 'Olive Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into salt rimmed old fashioned glass over rocks.

Name: Crotch Rot
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '4 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Serve in a lowball glass -not chilled.

Name: Crow's Nest #2
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Vanilla Rum", '1 1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '3 oz. Pina Colada Mix', '3 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: In a blender combine ingredients with ice and enjoy!

Name: Crown Jewel
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Crown Royal', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake all the ingredients (except the 7-Up) with ice. Strain in a highball glass and add a splash of 7-Up to make it bubbly. Can also be drank as a shooter.

Name: Cruiser
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Coconut Rum', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix in shaker. Pour over ice in a tall glass.

Name: Crusta
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 tsp. Curacao', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass.

Name: Crustas
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jamaica Rum', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Sugar', '3 dash(es) Maraschino Liqueur', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'Soda Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sugar rimmed collins glass. Fill with soda and garnish with fruit.

Name: Cruzan 9 and Cola
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum', '6 part(s) Cola']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Cruzan 9 Apple
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum', '6 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Cruzan 9 Lives
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum', '1 part(s) Cruzan Estate Light Rum Two Years', '3 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '2 part(s) Orange Juice', '3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake all ingredients except bitters with ica and pour into a Hurrican Glass. Garnish with 2-3 dashes of bitters and a pineapple wedge or orange wheel on the rim.

Name: Cruzan 9 Peaches
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 part(s) Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum', '3/4 part(s) DeKuyper Peachtree Schnapps', '3 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and pour into a Hurricane Glass. Garnish with a pineapple/cherry stack on the rim.

Name: Cruzan 9 Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 part(s) Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum', '4 part(s) Orange Juice', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Cruzan 9 Rise
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum', '6 part(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 part(s) Grenadine']
Making: Build in order over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and a cherry.

Name: Cruzan 9 Root Beer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum', '1/2 part(s) Galliano', '6 part(s) Cola']
Making: Build over ice in a tall highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Cruzan 9 Spiced Ale
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum', '6 part(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Cruzan 9 Strawberry Smooch
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 part(s) Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Mountain Strawberry Schnapps', '6 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a strawberry and or a pineapple wedge on the rim.

Name: Cruzan 9 Tanned
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 part(s) Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum', '1/4 part(s) Cruzan Rum Cream', '1/4 part(s) Whipped Cream']
Making: Layer in order in a tall shot or pony glass. Garnish with a cherry on top.

Name: Cruzan 9 Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 part(s) Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Peachtree Schnapps', '6 part(s) Iced Tea']
Making: Build in order over ice in a tall highball glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Cruzan 9 Voodoo Hurricane
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum', '1 part(s) Cruzan Rum 151', '1 part(s) Cruzan Vanilla Rum', '3 part(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 part(s) Grenadine', '3 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients, mix well. Pour over crushed ice in a tall glass. Garnish with a fruit wedge.

Name: Cruzan Banana Nana
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Banana Rum', '1 part(s) Cruzan Aged Dark Rum', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour rums and juice over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a banana slice.

Name: Cruzan Bay Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Estate Light Rum Two Years', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice', '1 wedge(s) Lime']
Making: Pour Cruzan Aged Light Rum over ice in a rocks- or long drink glass. Fill with pineapple juice and cranberry juice. Squeeze a lime wedge over and drop in!

Name: Cruzan Be Mine, Valentine Sparkler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Cruzan Aged Light Rum', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup (vanilla)', '1/2 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '4 part(s) Sparkling Wine']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a champagne flute and stir twice. Garnish with an orange peel cut in the shape of a heart.

Name: Cruzan Blueberry Bramble
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Cruzan Aged Light Rum', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup', 'Blueberry Flavouring (Syrup)']
Making: Add rum, lemon and simple syrup over crushed ice in an old-fashioned glass. Add a mountain of crushed ice and drizzle blueberry syrup on top. Garnish with rosemary speared blueberries.

Name: Cruzan Blueberry Lemonade Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Cruzan Blueberry Lemonade Rum', '3/4 part(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1 pinch(es) Salt', 'Club Soda']
Making: Combine rum, grapefruit juice and salt over ice in a shaker. Shake vigorously for 10 seconds. Double strain into a glass over ice and top with club soda. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

Name: Cruzan Brew Berry Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Cruzan Strawberry Rum', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 part(s) Agave Nectar', '5 part(s) Lager (Blonde)', '3 Strawberries', '10 leaf(leaves) Mint']
Making: Muddle strawberry, mint and agave nectar in a tall glass. Add lemon juice, rum and ice and shake. Add beer, shake lightly, and strain over ice into glass of choice. Garnish with a halved strawberry and sprig of mint.

Name: Cruzan Caipirissima
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Cruzan Estate Light Rum Two Years', '1/2 Lime', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup']
Making: Place lime wedges in the bottom of a glass, add syrup, and muddle. Add Cruzan Aged Light Rum, add ice. Stir, and serve with a spoon!

Name: Cruzan Car #9
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum', '3/4 part(s) DeKuyper Orange Curacao', '3/4 part(s) Orange Juice', '2 part(s) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake all with ice and strain into a chilled cinnamon sugar rimmer cocktail glass. Garnish with a flamed orange peel.

Name: Cruzan Cherry Pop
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Black Cherry Rum', '1 part(s) Cruzan Estate Light Rum Two Years', 'Cola']
Making: Muddle pieces of lime in a rocks glass, add the Cruzan Rums. Garnish with lime wedge and a cherry.

Name: Cruzan Cinngle lady
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Cruzan Black Strap Rum', '1 part(s) Cruzan Velvet Cinn', '1/2 part(s) Coco Lopez']
Making: Combine all over crushed ice and stir. Garnish with fresh grated nutmeg.

Name: Cruzan Citrus Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Citrus Rum', '6 wedge(s) Lime', '2 sprig(s) Mint', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Club Soda']
Making: Muddle the mint with sugar and fresh lime in a tall glass. Add Cruzan Citrus Rum and ice cubes. Stir.Top up with club soda.

Name: Cruzan Classic Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Estate Light Rum Two Years', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1/2 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Combine ingredients into a mixing glass and shake well with ice. Serve in a rocks glass, or strain to a cocktail glass.

Name: Cruzan Colada
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Estate Light Rum Two Years', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Creme de Coconut']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an ice filled long drink glass. Garnish with pineapple!

Name: Cruzan Confusion
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Coconut Rum', '1 part(s) Cruzan Mango Rum', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients together with ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a cherry and an orange wedge.

Name: Cruzan Hula Hula
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cruzan Tropical Fruit Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Cruzan Black Strap Rum']
Making: Build over ice in a tall glass. Float Cruzan Black Strap Rum. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Cruzan Independence Sparkler
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Strawberry Rum', '1 part(s) Cruzan Aged Light Rum', '1/2 part(s) Sugar', '1/2 Lime Cut into quarters', '6 leaf(leaves) Basil', 'Soda Water']
Making: Muddle lime and basil with sugar in a tumbler. Add Cruzan Strawberry and Aged Light Rums and ice, then shake 2 times to mix. Pour into a rocks glass and top with soda. Garnish with basil & a fanned strawberry slice.

Name: Cruzan Island Cream
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Rum Cream', '1 part(s) Cruzan Coconut Rum']
Making: Combine Cruzan Rum Cream and Cruzan Coconut rum over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Cruzan Island Life
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cruzan Tropical Fruit Rum', '1 oz. Cruzan Coconut Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a tall glass. Garnish with a cherry & lime wedge.

Name: Cruzan Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Estate Light Rum Two Years', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour Cruzan Aged Light Rum over ice in a long drink glass. Fill with lemon/lime soda, and squeeze a lime wedge over and drop in.

Name: Cruzan Light and Tonic
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Estate Light Rum Two Years', 'Tonic Water', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Pour Cruzan Rum over ice cubes in a highball glass. Add tonic, and - optional - a splash of lime juice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Cruzan Love Potion #9
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Cruzan 9 Spiced Rum', '3/4 part(s) DeKuyper Coconut Amaretto', '3 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and pour into a Hurricane Glass. Garnish with a pineapple/cherry stack on the rim or a strawberry.

Name: Cruzan Mango Hurricane
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Mango Rum', '1 part(s) Cruzan Aged Dark Rum', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine ingredients with ice in a hurricane glass. Add a splash of grenadine. Garnish with orange wedge and a cherry.

Name: Cruzan Mango Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Mango Rum', '4 chunk(s) Mango', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Simple Syrup', '6 leaf(leaves) Mint', 'Club Soda']
Making: Muddle mint and mango chucks with simple syrup in a tall glass. Add limejuice, Cruzan Mango Rum and ice. Stir, and top with club soda. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Cruzan Mojito
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Cruzan Estate Light Rum Two Years', '1 part(s) Lime Juice', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup', '6 leaf(leaves) Mint', 'Club Soda', 'Bitters']
Making: Gently muddle mint leaves with simple syrup. Add lime juice and Cruzan Aged Light Rum over fresh ice into a tall glass and top with soda. Add a dash of bitters (optional) and garnish - suggestible with a sprig of mint, lime, and, if possible, a stalk of sugar cane.

Name: Cruzan Mojito with a twist
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Cruzan Strawberry Rum', '2 tsp. Sugar', '4 leaf(leaves) Mint', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Muddle sugar, mint, lime juice, and a splash of club soda together in a tall glass. Add rum and garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Cruzan New Fashion
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Aged Dark Rum', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 dash(es) Bitters', '1 slice(s) Orange', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Muddle the orange slice with sugar (cube) and bitters in a rocks glass. Add ice, and remaining ingredients and stir. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Cruzan Rum Rita
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Pineapple Rum', '1 part(s) Cruzan Citrus Rum', '2 part(s) Margarita Mix']
Making: Combine ingredients and pour over ice into a salt rimmed margarita glass.

Name: Cruzan Sidecar
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Cruzan Single Barrel Estate Rum', '1 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients together and shake with ice in a mixing glass until chilled. Strain and pour into a cocktail glass. (The sugar-rim is optional!)

Name: Cruzan Single Barrel on the rocks
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Single Barrel Estate Rum']
Making: Pour Cruzan Rum over ice and serve in a rocks glass.

Name: Cruzan Smitten Sidecar
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Cruzan Single Barrel Estate Rum', '1 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients and shake with ice in a mixing glass until chilled. Stir in and pour into a cocktail glass. (The sugar-rim is optional.)

Name: Cruzan Strawberry Ginger Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Cruzan Strawberry Rum', '1 1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '1 1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup']
Making: Fill mixing glass with 3/4 ice. Add all ingredients and shake for 5 sec. Pour into chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Cruzan with Cola
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Aged Dark Rum', 'Cola', '1 wedge(s) Lime']
Making: Pour Cruzan Aged Dark Rum over ice in a tall glass and fill with cola. Squeeze in a lime wedge. Suggestion: This drink tastes better if you begin by muddling half a lime in the glass rather than squeezing in a wedge.

Name: Crying Game
Ingredients: ["1/5 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/5 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/5 oz. Kahlua', '1/5 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/5 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Rum', '5 oz. Tomato Juice']
Making: Mix JD, vodka, and Kahlua. Heat Bailey's Irish Cream, tequila, and rum over medium flame. Mix all with tomato juice, and top with grenadine. Garnish with a stalk of celery and a green onion.

Name: Crying Zombie
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. Blackberry Liqueur']
Making: Pour in a highball glass, stir, and add desired amount of ice. Enjoy.

Name: Crypt Keeper
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Canadian Club 6 Year Old', '2 part(s) Apple Cider', '1 part(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix all ingredients and serve in a cocktail glass over ice. Get ready for some scary tales.

Name: Crystal Head Brain Freeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Crystal Head Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Combine all the ingredients with ice in a blender. Blend until ice is well crushed. Serve in a sugar rimed rocks glass garnished with a slice of lime.

Name: Crystal Head Bubble Head
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Crystal Head Vodka', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice', 'Soda Water']
Making: Pour Crystal Head Vodka into rocks glass with ice. Add soda water and a squeeze of fresh lemon juice. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Crystal Head Cranium
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Crystal Head Vodka', 'Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour Crystal Head vodka and Cranberry juice over ice in a tall glass. Add splash of Grenadine (unstirred) on the top. Garnish with a blood orange slice.

Name: Crystal Head Heads Up
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Crystal Head Vodka', '7-Up', '1 splash(es) Lime Cordial']
Making: Pour Crystal Head vodka over ice in a tall glass. Add a splash of Lime Cordial (unstirred) and garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Crystal Head Lobotomy
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Crystal Head Vodka', '1/4 oz. Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 pinch(es) Sugar', '8 Raspberries (muddled)', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Muddle Raspberry with Lemon Juice, add all other ingredients, shake with Ice and pour in Martini glass (For Girls) and on rocks (for Guys).

Name: Crystal Head MelonHead
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Crystal Head Vodka', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Watermelon Juice']
Making: Pour ingredients into cocktail shaker with ice and shake. Strain into champagne glass and garnish with watermelon.

Name: Crystal Head Red Head
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Crystal Head Vodka', '1/2 oz. Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 slice(s) Pomegranate(s)']
Making: Fill cocktail shaker with ice and add Crystal Head Vodka and Pama. Shake well and strain into martini glass. Garnish with a slice of pomegranate.

Name: Crystal Slipper Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Cuarenta Y Tres Con Leche
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cuarenta Y Tres', '2 oz. Milk']
Making: Blend liquor and milk over ice, and sprinkle some cinnamon on top. According to Stein, this drink is best served in La Batey, Old Town, San Juan, Puerto Rico.

Name: Cuba Libre
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Cola']
Making: Put lime juice and a twist of lime into highball glass. Add rum and fill with cola.

Name: Cuban
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '2 dash(es) Strega', 'Ginger Ale', 'Pineapple Cubes', 'Apple Cubes', 'Cherry']
Making: Pour over ice and stir lightly. Garnish with the fruit.

Name: Cuban Blue Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Rum', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Blend all ingredients with ice in a cocktail glass. Top with 7-Up and enjoy!!

Name: Cuban Breeze #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', "1 oz. Creme d'Almond", 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a hurricane glass with ice and add the ingredients (you can also blend the ingredients with ice until slushy). Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

Name: Cuban Breeze #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a hurricane glass with ice and add the ingredients (you can also blend the ingredients with ice until slushy). Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

Name: Cuban Cappachino
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Havana Mocha Cappuccino', '2 oz. Cruzan Rum Cream']
Making: Pour over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Cuban Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 tsp. White Rum', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cuban Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Cuban Cocktail #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cuban Screw
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rum', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Cuban Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cuban Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cubano
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cubic Zirconia
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Amaretto', '4 oz. Snapple Fire']
Making: Mix over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Cucaracha #1
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Kahlua']
Making: In a lowball glass add tequila then Kahlua. Flame the cocktail. Two people drink from the same glass with two plastic straws. Try to finish before the straws melt. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Cucaracha #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Casa Noble Gold', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Combine ingredients into a cocktail glass and ignite. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Cucumber and Strawberry Mojito
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '3 slice(s) Cucumber', '2 Strawberries', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Soda']
Making: Muddle strawberries and cucumber together. Add other ingredients (except soda) and shake. Strain over fresh ice in a highball glass. Top with a splash of soda. Garnish with a half a strawberry and a cucumber slice.

Name: Cuervo Silver Margarita on the Rocks
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila', '4 1/2 oz. Margarita Mix Lime', '1 tsp. Salt']
Making: Mix ingredients in cocktail shaker with ice. Serve in a chilled martini glass straight up. Garnish with a lime wedge. Salt is optional.

Name: Cuff and Buttons
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '4 dash(es) Sweet Vermouth', '2 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Cul-De-Sac
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Ricard']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine both of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Culloden
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', 'Champagne']
Making: Fill your champagne flute with champagne. Drink enough to allow room for 1 oz of Drambuie. Add the Drambuie and allow it to mix on its own.

Name: Culross
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lillet', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Cum In A Blender
Ingredients: ['3 oz. White Chocolate Liqueur', '3 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Whiskey', '1 cup(s) Milk', '1/2 cup(s) Pepsi Cola', '1 Banana (Large)']
Making: Grind some ice and the milk in a blender until smooth. Then add the other ingredients and blend. Serve in a large glass.

Name: Cum In Your Mouth
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Cum Shot
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Coconut Liqueur', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Cumdumpster Juice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Mix in a highball glass.

Name: Cuntrat Supreme
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '4 oz. Sprite']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Cup O’ Agave Gold
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cabo Wabo Reposado Tequila', '4 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour Tequila and soda into a tall glass nearly filled with ice. Stir well and garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Cupid's Arrow #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', '7-Up']
Making: Build ingredients over ice and fill with 7-Up. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Cupids Arrow
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Pallini Peachcello', '1 1/2 oz. Boru Vodka', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into an ice-filled highball glass.

Name: Cupid’s Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Frangelico', '1 1/4 oz. Carolans Irish Cream Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Cherry Brandy']
Making:
Instead of eating your dessert, try drinking this tempting libation to celebrate the day.
Shake it up with ice and strain into a chilled Martini glass. Garnish with an edible flower.

Name: Curacao Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 1/2 oz. White Curacao', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Shake well the spirits and the lime juice with ice. Pour into a highball glass, fill with sparkling water and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Cure
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Red Wine', '1 part(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Half red wine (your choice) and half orange juice. This drink is similiar to the drink Vouraste. Howerver the list of ingredients for the Vouraste is incorrect to the authours instructions. His drink calls for orange SODA. Not orange JUICE. So this drink is unique. Robert Smith band leader drinks this so it's name after his band 'The Cure'.

Name: Curielle
Ingredients: ['Champagne', '1 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Stir softly into a slightly chilled Rydell wine glass. Sip slowly.

Name: Curled Satan's Whiskers
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1/2 oz. Curacao']
Making: Mix together in highball glass, drink only when it is light out. For a variation for the night, see Straight Satan's Whiskers. This is the perfect drink for those early morning times when you just don't want to go to class or work. So arrive with a little devil on your shoulder, and in your stomach!

Name: Currant Fuzzy Navel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '6 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Cutty Cobbler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cutty Sark', '4 dash(es) Brandy', '4 dash(es) Curacao']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a large wine glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple, a slice of orange and a sprig of mint.

Name: Cutty Collins
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cutty Sark', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Club Soda']
Making: Serve over cracked ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Cutty Rickey
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cutty Sark', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Club Soda']
Making: Stir over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Cyclone Attack
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Layer in a cocktail glass.

Name: Cynar Biere
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cynar', '1/3 oz. Lemon Syrup', 'Beer']
Making: Pour Cynar and lemon syrup into a beer mug. Fill the mug with beer and stir.

Name: Cynthia Daquiri
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Limeade frozen', '16 oz. Strawberries frozen', '6 oz. White Rum', '3 oz. Maraschino Liqueur or blackberry brandy']
Making: Let strawberries thaw for 30 minutes. Add ingredients to a blender in order listed and blend together. Serve in a cocktail glass with a straw and strawberry garnish. ( In season you can substitute fresh strawberries for half of the frozen berries but add cracked ice before blending in order to maintain consistency. If maraschino liqueur is unavailable substitute blackberry brandy)

Name: Czar's Cup
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', 'Champagne (Brut)']
Making: Pour cold vodka and maraschino liqueur into a chilled 8-oz. wine glass and fill with cold champagne. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Czarina #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. French Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Italian Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Czarina #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream (Or light cream)', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Mix or blend all the ingredients with ice, except the maraschino liqueur. Serve in a chilled stemmed glass and top with maraschino liqueur.

Name: D.B.A (Death By Alcohol)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. After Shock Liqueur Red', '1 oz. After Shock Liqueur Blue', '2 oz. Absinthe']
Making: Drink - then call an ambulance.

Name: D.C. Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sprite', '2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Build on the rocks in a highball glass.

Name: D.C. Splash
Ingredients: ['Orange Juice', '2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Pour vodka and grenadine in a highball glass over ice. Fill with orange juice.

Name: D.J.Killer
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Pour into a highball glass chilled or shake with ice, drink, repeat, repeat, repeat till last call. Do this at least one month. Guaranteed an arrest (cardiac that is). Dedicated to my favorite DIE-HARD! BIG MAC(Macky-Poo)oh ya Fubard Cris too. Love,your favourite bartender.

Name: D.U.I.
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Tuaca', "1/2 oz. Myer's Rum", '1/2 oz. Bacardi White Rum', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a pint glass. If you can, add more ice and give the extra as a sample to someone else. The original recipe had Malibu rum also but I think it is better without. Tastes like fruit punch!

Name: D/B Snake Bite
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Mix with ice and strain in a lowball glass.

Name: Da Blue Lou
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Bacardi O', '7-Up']
Making: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add Maui Blue and Bacardi O. Top with 7-Up. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Dad REAL Bull Frog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Dry Gin', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Add alcohol over ice in a pint glass. Fill with Red Bull Energy Drink and just add two straws.

Name: Daddy's Bloody Mary
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Clamato Juice', '1/2 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce', 'Lime Juice', 'Celery Salt']
Making: Wet the rim of a highball glass with lime juice and dip in Celery Salt. Add ingredients and fill with Clamato over 2-3 ice cubes.

Name: Daffy Duck
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Wine (Baby Duck)']
Making: Combine in a wine glass.

Name: Dagwood's Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', 'Club Soda', '1/16 tsp. Coffee Flavouring Syrup hazelnut']
Making: Pour Stolichnaya Vanilla Vodka over 3/4 ice filled highball glass. Fill with club soda and top with hazelnut coffee flavouring syrup. Shake or stir and serve with a straw.

Name: Daily Double C
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Italian Vermouth']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass and garnish with two cherries.

Name: Daily Mail
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '2 dash(es) Curacao', 'dash(es) Amaretto']
Making: Stir in a lowball glass.

Name: Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. (See also Frozen Daiquiri.)

Name: Daiquiri Blossom
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)', 'dash(es) Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Daiquiri Liberal
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Amer Picon']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Daisey Duke
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', 'Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Fill a rocks glass with rocks. Add creme de banana, blue curacao and coconut rum. Fill with sour mix and a splash of lemon lime soda. Stir with a straw and enjoy!

Name: Daisy Dueller
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tennessee Whiskey', '1 1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 tsp. Simple Syrup', 'dash(es) Cointreau', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice -except Club Soda- and strain over ice cubes into a highball glass. Top up with Club Soda and garnish with fruit slices.

Name: Daisy Special
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Orange Juice', '3 part(s) Vodka', '3 part(s) Bacardi Rum']
Making: Mix well and serve over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Dalton
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Combine over ice in a lowball glass and mix well. Bourbon equivalent of Rusty Nail.

Name: Dam Punch
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Gatorade (Punch Flavoured)', '1 part(s) Malibu Rum']
Making: Fill a glass with ice. Fill with equal parts Punch flavored Gatorade and Malibu Rum. Stir and serve.

Name: Dam Rita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Patron Silver Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Damiana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (freshly squeezed)', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Pour first three ingredients over ice into a Collins glass. Fill with sour mix. Shake and serve garnished with 2 cherries.

Name: Dambuster
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Ginger Ale', 'Milk']
Making: In a highball glass with ice, pour three oz. of rum, one oz. of Kahlua, an oz. of Ginger Ale and fill the rest of the glass with milk, stir.

Name: Damn Coke
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '12 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Pour Hot Damn in a mug and add cola.

Name: Damn-The-Weather Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Damn-Your-Eyes
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Blanc)', '1 tsp. Dry Vermouth']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Dubonnet, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Dan Marino
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Pineapple Rum', '2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Mix all liquors together over crushed ice in a normal pint glass. Mix in sour mix and watch the combination turn green (Dolphins jersey green color). Appealing to the eye and the tastebuds.

Name: Dan Ryan
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix equal parts gin and ginger ale and pour over ice. Serve with 2 limes.

Name: Dan's Delight (the Double D)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Cream']
Making: Mix all ingredients and blend with ice until you have a milkshake consistency. Add cream until the color is lavendar. Drink with a straw or straight from the glass.

Name: Dance With A Dream Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Anisette']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Dances with Wenches
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Spiced Rum (Preferably Blackbeard's Made On Sint Maarten)", 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix in a collins glass and garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Dandy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '3 dash(es) Cointreau', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with twists of lemon peel and orange peel.

Name: Dango
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a bucket glass with ice and build ingredients. Fill with pineapple juice. Shake if desired.

Name: Danish Gin Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Cherry Heering Liqueur', '1 tsp. Kirsch', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into a highball glass. Gently stir in the sparkling water and garnish with a maraschino cherry and a lime slice.

Name: Danny Shaffer
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Danny's Delight
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Irish Whiskey (Preferably Tullamore Dew)', "1/2 oz. Ginger Wine (Preferably Stone's)", 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'Lemonade']
Making: Wash glass with bitters and ice, then discard. Add vermouth, whiskey and wine, top up with lemonade.

Name: Danny's Special
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 tsp. Grand Marnier', '3 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Stir and serve in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Daphrine
Ingredients: ['3 1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '3 1/3 oz. Midori', '3 1/3 oz. Vodka', 'Lemon Soda']
Making: Built over ice and fill with the soda.

Name: Darb Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Daring Dylan
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Kahlua', '4 oz. Mexican Hot Chocolate']
Making: Let the Mexican hot chocolate cool to room temperature. Pour all of the ingredients into an Irish coffee glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

Name: Dark and Stormy
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Gosling's Black Seal Rum", 'Ginger Beer Barritts']
Making: Pour rum over ice in a tumbler and fill with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wedge(optional).

Name: Dark and Stormy #2
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Gosling's Black Seal Rum", 'Ginger Beer']
Making: Mix rum and ginger beer over ice.

Name: Dark Destroyer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Lemonade']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass and drink slowly!

Name: Dark Horse
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '2 oz. Campari', 'Soda Water']
Making: Mix Bombay Sapphire Gin and Campari over ice in a highball glass. Top up with soda water. Garnish with a lime wedge if desired. Definitely for the bitter and twisted .. makes a G and T taste like cordial !!

Name: Dark Lagoon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Pineapple Flavoured Wine']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with the wine. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Datsun T
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Tia Maria', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '3 1/3 oz. Milk', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Blend (except whipped cream) for approximately 5 seconds and pour over ice into a highball glass. Layer whipped cream and garnish with a half strawberry.

Name: Dave's Diesel
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Guinness', '1/2 pint(s) Cider', '2 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1 oz. Black Currant Cordial']
Making: Mix in a pint glass and serve.

Name: Davids Punch
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 part(s) Midori', '1 part(s) Banana Liqueur', '1 part(s) Peach Schnapps', '1 part(s) Orange Juice', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice, strain and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Dawa
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Honey', '1 Lime (cut into 8 pieces)']
Making: Add lime to a short glass. Use a bamboo stick and dip one end into the honey. Dunk the stick with honey in the glass. Add ice and vodka. Drinking instructions.....use stick to crush lime as well as mix the honey in.

Name: Dax's Deadly Bloody Mary
Ingredients: ['6 dash(es) Pepper', '5 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce', '5 squirt(s) Worcestershire Sauce', '2 squirt(s) Lime Juice', '3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix it. Shake it. Drink it. Forget it.

Name: Daytona Daydream
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '3 oz. Pink Grapefruit Juice', '2 oz. Coconut Cream', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake well and pour into ice cube filled highball glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Daytona Rollin'Thunda
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake all the liquors with crushed ice then strain into a frostedb mug with a few ice cubes. Fill with orange and pineapple juice and stir. Garnish with a round slice of orange centered on the rim. Add straw and watch the Daytona 500!

Name: Dazzling Beach
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1/6 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', 'Soda Water', '4 Mint Leaves', '1/6 oz. Simple Syrup (optional)']
Making: Put mint leaves into a chilled martini glass then muddle to produce an essence. Shake the rest of the ingredients (except soda water) with ice and strain into the martini glass. Top with soda water and add simple syrup if desired. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: De Main Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Fill a martini glass with ice and water and leave to cool. Fill a shaker with ice and pour in dry vermouth. Shake thouroughly. Pour off excess vermouth. Add equal measures vodka and gin. Shake and strain into the chilled martini glass after having discarded the iced water. Garnish with a pimento olive to finish.

Name: Dead Bastard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Ginger Ale', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Pour all the ingredients with ice into a cocktail glass. John’s comment: The series of drinks, Suffering Bastard, Dying Bastard, Dead Bastard is from the Rongovian Embassy to the USA. A weird bar in Trumansburg, New York. Only a few have done the series and found their car. Generally you end up waking up on a golf course somewhere.

Name: Dead Budgie
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Coconut Rum', '3/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '4 oz. Orange Juice (Or to taste)', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice (Or to taste)', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice and pour all the ingredients, except the grenadine. Finish with a drizzle of grenadine around the inside edge of the glass.

Name: Dead Doctor
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Rumple Minze', 'Cola (Optional)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Dead Hand
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Midori']
Making: Combine over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Dead Nazi #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Pour over ice and enjoy!

Name: Dead Penis
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Scotch', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Stout', '2 Eggs', '2 Lychee Nuts', '2 pinch(es) Salt']
Making: Mix in a tall serving glass... Then add the eggs in and after which, place the lychees in it too. Drink with a straw for an unbelievable effect. Use a stick of celery as stirrer.

Name: Dead Pirate Seaspray
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Kahlua', '1 tbsp. Whipped Cream (Or to taste)']
Making: Blend well the Malibu and the Kahlua. Grind ice cubes together with mixture, to get a cold, thick drink (like a real pina colada). Put a cocktail pick with a maraschino cherry in it, and top with whipped cream. It is now ready to enjoy. This is one that my friends and I made up and we discovered it was EXCELLENT!

Name: Deansgate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lime Cordial']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel.

Name: Dear Abby
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Dry Gin', '1 oz. Malibu Rum Spiced', '5 oz. Apple Cider']
Making: Pour cider into a glass. Combine everything else in a shaker. Mix until cold and add to cider.

Name: Death By Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 scoop(s) Chocolate Ice Cream']
Making: Blend with 1 cup crushed ice until smooth. Pour into a parfait glass and garnish with whipped cream and chocolate curls.

Name: Death In A Bottle
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '3 oz. Strawberry Mix', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour the ingredients into an empty (Snapple) bottle. Shake well and drink...Good to use as a 'prize' for losing one of those games!

Name: Death In The Afternoon
Ingredients: ['Champagne (A flute)', 'dash(es) Absinthe', '1 Sugar Cube']
Making: In the Words of Ernest Hemmingway : Pour 4 jiggers (large Dash) over a sugar cube into the Champagne until cloudy.

Name: Death in the Afternoon #1
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Champagne (GH Mumm Brut)', '1/2 part(s) Pernod Absinthe']
Making:
Add Pernod Absinthe into a chilled champagne flute. Add iced champagne until absinthe attains proper opaqueness.
Grown-up Halloween Parties can full of campy and ghoulish surprises...whether it’s fangs in the punch or blood red cocktails, the opportunity to get creative for an evening of imbibing is endless! Pernod Absinthe, however, requires no added gimmicks to make cocktails that are perfect for Halloween!
Pernod is the ORGINAL Absinthe and it was the favorite drink of some seriously deviant art and literary greats like Edward Allen Poe, Van Gogh and Oscar Wilde. Now available in the US, Pernod Absinthe is an authentic way to add an aura of 18th century-style drama and mystery to a modern Halloween celebration... Its eerie green color and legendary status make Pernod Absinthe the smart host’s spirit of choice.

Name: Deauville Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Brandy', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Debutante's Dream
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/3 oz. Brandy', '1/3 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Deceiver
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Galliano']
Making: Pour into a lowball glass.

Name: Dee's Pink Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', 'Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Cranberry Juice', '2 slice(s) Lemon']
Making: Pour Smirnoff Vodka into a highball glass filled with ice. Pour sweet and sour mix until the glass is 3/4 fulll. Now pour the cranberry juice on top until the color turns pink. Squeeze one slice of lemon in the drink andstir. Garnish with the other lemon slice.

Name: Dee-Dee's Delight
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Blend with ice and pour in a small rock glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: DeeDee
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/4 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with gin-infused cranberries.

Name: Deep Blue Funk
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 part(s) Light Rum', '1/2 part(s) Blue Curacao', '1/2 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Deep Blue Something
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Mix vodka, Red Bull and Peach Schnapps together and add a small amount of curacao until the mixture is a deep green. Add some ice and pour the remainder of curacao down the side of the glass to leave a blue layer at the base of the glass.

Name: Deep Dark Secret
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Deep Eddy Peach Bellini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Deep Eddy Peach Flavored Vodka', '4 oz. Sparkling Wine']
Making: Pour chilled ingredients into a champagne flute, serve and enjoy.

Name: Deep Sea Battery

Making: Shake vodka and Curacao with ice and strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Top with Battery Energy Drink.

Name: Deep Sea Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Anisette', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Deep Sea Sex
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Deep Six
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Sugar Syrup', 'Champagne']
Making: Smooth, flavourful, expensive, and very powerful...You've been warned! Combine the rum, lime juice and sugar, and stir well. Then fill the glass with champagne and stir gently. Garnish with a slice of lime. A true officer and gentleman's drink! Only the best from the Canadian Navy!

Name: DeGeorge's Absolut Kool Aid
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Boggs Cranberry Liquor', '2 oz. Absolut Vodka']
Making: Stir in a 6 oz. glass and drink.

Name: Degobah Dropkick
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 oz. Everclear', '6 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix in a lowball glass.

Name: Delicious Dani
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix and serve with over ice in a old fashioned glass.

Name: Delilah
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and serve in a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Delmonico #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Delmonico #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Brandy']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Delmonico Cocktail #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir well with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Delta
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a fresh slice of peach.

Name: Dempsey Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Brandy', '1 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Anis', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Depth Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Brandy', '1 oz. Brandy', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes.

Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Calvados', '4 dash(es) Lemon Juice', '2 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Derby Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Peach Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Making: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup shaved ice in an electric blender at a low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

Making: Shake vigorously all the ingredients (except the water) with cracked ice and strain over ice cubes into a collins glass. Gently stir in the sparkling water.

Making: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: DeRosier
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Desert Death
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Stir and serve chilled.

Name: Desert Rose

Making: Shake well, strain and pour over ice into a tall glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Making: Fill a 16 oz. mason jar with ice. Add liquors and fill with limeade. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Making: Pour over crushed ice into a collins glass. Top with grenadine.

Making: Fill highball glass with ice. Add icing sugar then Absolut Mandarin, Bacardi Limon and Bacardi Dark Rum. Cover and shake to mix. Add a splash of orange juice and top with grenadine. Garnish with your choice of either lemon wedge with cherry or orange slice with cherry.

Name: Desperation

Making: Blend in a shaker and pour into a highball glass. Ice is optional but must be served very cold. Fill with tonic water.

Name: Despina
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Pour the Kahlua into a lowball glass. Layer the Frangelico on top of it.

Name: Desporado
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Beer', '2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Pour beer into a pint glass. Drop in tequila, stir and drink.

Name: Detroit Daisy
Ingredients: ['dash(es) Grenadine', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '2 oz. Dark Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a green cocktail cherry and a sprig of mint.

Name: Devil Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Brandy', '1 1/3 oz. Green Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Devil Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. French Vermouth', '3 dash(es) Curacao', '2 drop(s) Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Devil's Cocktail

Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Making: Shake and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Devil's Piss

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Devil's Sweat

Making: Stir well in a mixing tin and pour over ice cubes in a lowball glass.

Name: Devil's Tail

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a champagne flute and float apricot brandy on top. Garnish with a lime peel.

Name: Devil’s Island - Megadeth
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Don Q Anejo Rum', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Velvet Falernum', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making:
Combine all ingredients in a tall glass, swizzle with crushed ice. Add more crushed ice and float with Jägermeister on top. Garnish with a pineapple leaf.
In honor of the Big 4 (Metallica, Slayer, Anthrax and Megadeth) playing Yankee Stadium, Jagermeister, a brand known for rocking the music scene, has come up with some metal cocktails….

Name: Devin's Bloody Mary
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Clamato Juice', '1 oz. Mr. and Mrs. T Original Bloody Mary Mix', '1/4 slice(s) Lime', '6 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '4 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '6 dash(es) Paprika', '1/3 oz. Olive Brine (Green Olive)', '1 Olive(s) (Green)', '1/4 piece(s) Celery']
Making: In a glass with cubed ice pour the vodka. Add a dash of nutmeg and 6 dashes of paprika. Squeeze in the lime and addthe slice. Add green olive juice and the green olive. Pour in the Clamato and Bloody Mary mix. Add 1-6 dashes of Tabasco sauce to taste. Stir mixture until all items are fully dissolved and mixed. Add in celery stalk as garnish.

Name: Devine Guinness
Ingredients: ['Guinness', '1 oz. Smirnoff Vanilla Vodka']
Making: Pour Guinness in a pint glass and add Smirnoff Vanilla Vodka.

Name: Dew It Sloe

Making: Fill a Tom Collins glass with ice. Add Southern Comfort and Sloe Gin. Mix and fill with Mountain Dew. Decorate with a lime wedge if desired.

Name: Dew Me

Making: Fill a lowball glass with ice and add the Jack Daniel's, Southern Comfort and lemon juice. Then top up with Mountain Dew.

Name: Dew-Driver

Making: Fill glass with ice, add vodka and Mountain Dew. Adjust sizes with larger cups (can anyone say Slurpee?)

Name: Dewars Side Car

Making: Combine first four ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Dewars Smash

Name: Dewwy Peach Pussy

Making: Combine in a cup.

Name: Di Amore Dream

Making: Blends until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: di Amore Royale

Name: Diablo #1

Making: Pour in order all the ingredients over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Diabolical

Making: Fill a very large glass with ice. Add first four ingredients. Stir. Fill to top with Coca Cola stirring constantly. Stirring helps give it a nice foamy head.

Making: Shake gin, juice of lemon, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with chilled champagne, stir, and serve.

Name: Diamond Fizz #2

Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with champagne.

Name: Diamond Head

Making: Shake vigorously with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Making: Mix rum, brandy, gin and sour mix ina blender. Add crushed ice and blend. Strain into a 15 oz. beer glass. Add cold beer to top. Tastes and goes down like lemonade. BE CAREFUL!

Making: Fill a wine glass with crushed ice and pour in the creme de menthe. Float the brandy on top.

Name: Diana #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '3 tsp. Cognac']
Making: Fill a wine glass with crushed ice and pour in the peppermint schnapps. Float the brandy on top.

Name: Diana Cocktail
