Making: Fill a cocktail glass with ice and fill 3/4 with creme de menthe. Top with brandy.

Name: Dianne-On-The-Tower
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 tsp. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1 tsp. Cherry Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Dickie Ward
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', 'dash(es) Bitters', '4 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour the Scotch, Bitters, and Ginger Ale into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Dickie's Bloody Mary and Mix
Ingredients: ["64 oz. Tomato Juice (Campbell's)", '2 tbsp. Celery Salt', '3 tbsp. Lime Juice (freshly squeezed)', '2 tbsp. Vinegar (rice)', '1 tsp. Tabasco Sauce', '1 tbsp. Horseradish', '1 tsp. Onion Powder', '1 tsp. Garlic Salt', '1/4 tsp. Black Pepper', '1/4 tsp. Salt', '1 tbsp. Sugar', '1 tbsp. A H Hirsch 16yr Bourbon', '2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Pour 1 cup of the tomato juice and set aside. Combine all of the above ingredients with the tomato juice in the a jar. Cap and shake well. Fill the jar with the reserved tomato juice and shake again. Place in the refrigerator and chill for at least 1 hour before using. For the Bloody Mary pour 4-5 oz of mix in a 10 oz. chilled glass. Add good vodka and stir gently. Garnish with a celery stalk or sliced dill pickle. Top off with coarsely crushed ice or broken ice cubes. If desired shake a small amount of celery salt on top after adding ice.

Name: Die Hard
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Everclear', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a rocks glass and drink fast.

Name: Dieci E Lode
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Campari', '2 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/5 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making:
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add Campari and grapefruit juice and shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a lime wedge.
Originally served at No 9 Park in Boston, created by mixologist Jon Gertsen

Name: Diesel
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Lager', '1/2 pint(s) Cider', 'dash(es) Black Currant Cordial']
Making: Pour the lager first then add the blackcurrant cordial. Top up with the cider. The colour should be very dark; approaching the colour of Guinness.

Name: Diki-Diki
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Calvados', '1/2 oz. Swedish Punch', '1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Dinah Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a sprig of mint and serve.

Name: Dingo
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Dinkiboo
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '6 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Fill up a tall glass with ice. Add Jack Daniel's whiskey and fill with Coca Cola. Stir 10 - 20 seconds and serve.

Name: Dionisia
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Diplomat
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

Name: Dipped Strawberry
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 cup(s) Strawberries']
Making: Mix with ice in a blender and pour into a hurricane glass. Top with whipped cream and dribble with chocolate syrup.....mmmmm!

Name: Dirty Apple
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', '2 1/2 oz. Apple Juice', 'Cream (To taste)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

Name: Dirty Banana #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 Banana (Sliced)', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Frappe in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a banana slice.

Name: Dirty Bastard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Chocolate Milk']
Making: Pour alcohol into a collins glass and fill with chocolate milk.

Name: Dirty Bong Water #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Mix and enjoy! Webmixer's note: Approximate measures.

Name: Dirty Bowl
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua', "2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup', 'Club Soda']
Making: Pour chocolate syrup into the bottom of a glass. Pour coconut rum and Kahlua on top. Fill with Club Soda. Stir until syrup is off the bottom and looks 'swirly' (Like a dirty bowl).

Name: Dirty Butt Whore
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey (Preferably Early Times Whiskey)', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '2 oz. Orange Juice', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Mix ingredients in highball glass and fill the rest of the glass with coke..Enjoy!

Name: Dirty Cow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Stirred on the rocks.

Name: Dirty Dick's Downfall
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Campari']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, and Campari. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Dirty Dog
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/2 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink', 'Snapple (Cranberry/Peach)']
Making: Pour the Vodka and Redbull into a cocktail glass. Fill the rest of the glass with the Snapple. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Dirty Frenchman
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Courvoisier Cognac', 'Orange']
Making: Pour over ice in a tumbler and juice the orange, leaving the pulp in it.

Name: Dirty Girl Scout #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 tsp. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Dirty Girlscout
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Creme de Menthe', 'Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: iFill rocks glass with ice. Pour in Kahlua and Crème de Menthe. Top up with Bailey's Irish Cream, mix and serve.

Name: Dirty Hooker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '7-Up']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in liqueurs and fill with 7-Up.

Name: Dirty Hornitini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Hornitos Reposado Tequila', '1 part(s) Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 part(s) Olive Juice', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake over ice and pour into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a green olive.

Name: Dirty Lifeguard
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1 1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine Jagermeister and Rumple Minze over ice in a pint glass. Filll with equal parts orange and pineapple juice. Stir and enjoy. Not the best taste but enjoyed by the Life Guards of Lack's Beach Service in Myrtle Beach, SC.

Name: Dirty Mama
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Milk']
Making: Combine over ice in a tumbler.

Name: Dirty Mexican Ghetto Whore
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Tequila (Preferably Hornitos Tequila)', '2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix alcohol together first, then top with pineapple, O.J, and grapefruit, finally add the grenadine, shake and enjoy...For a truly dirty one, add 1oz Canadian Club whiskey.

Name: Dirty Monkey
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Dark Rum']
Making: Mix in order in a brandy glass. Do not stir.

Name: Dirty Mother
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Milk']
Making: Pour creme de banane, Baileys and Kaluha into the bottom of a medium sized glass (like plastic beer cups). Fill the rest up with milk. Stir and top it off with whipped cream then place a cherry on the top. It's normally best served on ice.

Name: Dirty Mother #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes, stir well, and serve.

Name: Dirty Mother #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 splash(es) Pepsi Cola']
Making: Mix over ice in a lowball glass.

Name: Dirty Sock
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour in a lowball glass.

Name: Dirty Virgin
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Dirty White Mother
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Light Cream']
Making: Pour brandy and Kahlua into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice cubes and stir. Float cream on top and serve.

Name: Dirty White Mother #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Milk']
Making: Mix over ice and add milk to taste.

Name: Disappointed Lady
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Tia Maria Chocolate Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Orange Juice', '3/4 oz. Creme de Noyeaux', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Disco Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka (Preferably Kettle One vodka)', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour over ice in a 16 oz. glass or put everything into a blender and make a frozen drink.

Name: Dita Grapefruit
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dita Lychee Liqueur', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Pour Dita Lychee Liqueur into a cocktail glass over ice. Fill with the Grapefruit Juice and stir.

Name: Ditch The Bitch
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '5 oz. Brandy', '2/3 oz. Safari', '3 1/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients and pour over 2 icecubes in a longdrinkglass.

Name: Diva Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Raspberry Vodka', 'Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 squirt(s) 7-Up']
Making: Pour Raspberry Vodka over ice in a pint glass. Then fill the glass with sweet and sour mix. Add a squirt of 7-Up on the top for bubbles! Yummy! Serve with a straw.

Name: Divo
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '9 oz. Strawberry Milk']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Dixie Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Anis', '1/4 Orange (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Dixie Dew
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 tsp. White Creme de Menthe', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Dixie Julep
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '3 sprig(s) Mint']
Making: Combine Bourbon whiskey and powdered sugar in a collins glass. Fill with ice and stir gently until glass is frosted. Add the three sprigs of mint and serve with a straw.

Name: Dixie Stinger
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '1/2 tsp. Southern Comfort']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Dixie Whiskey Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 tsp. White Creme de Menthe', '1/4 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: DK's Smoothness
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', 'Chocolate Milk']
Making: Build in glass over ice and strain into a lowball glass. Garnish with whipped cream shaved chocolate and a cherry.

Name: Do Be Careful
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Do You Like Candy?
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Malibu Rum', '4 oz. Orange Soda']
Making: Mix over ice. It tastes like candy!

Name: Doc Holiday
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Whiskey', '12 oz. Surge Energy Drink', 'Orange Juice (To Taste)', 'Sugar (To Taste)']
Making: Mix ingredients in a large glass.

Name: Doc Hollyblock
Ingredients: ["5 oz. Seagram's Extra Dry Gin", '3 oz. Sprite', '2 oz. Lemonade (Preferably Minute Maid)']
Making: Stir into a highball glass.

Name: Doc Z #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine all the ingredients (except the grenadine)over cracked ice in a rocks glass. Stir, then add the dash of grenadine and serve with a wedge of lime.

Name: Doc Z #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '1 oz. Alize Gold Passion (Red)', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '3 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a tall glass over ice cubes. Stir and garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry on a cocktail pick.

Name: Doc-Tail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 bottle(s) Smirnoff Ice']
Making: Pour in a tall glass over ice and fill with Smirnoff Ice.

Name: Docks After Eight
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake lightly with ice, strain and pour into a rocks glass over ice..

Name: Doctor
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Swedish Punch', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Doctor Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Swedish Punch', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '3/4 oz. Jamaica Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Doctor Dawson
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1 Egg', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the tequila, lemon juice, sugar, Bitters, and egg. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the Club Soda.

Name: Doctor Morgans Prescription
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Dr Pepper', "2 oz. Captain Morgan's Dark Deluxe"]
Making: Mix over ice and enjoy

Name: Dog Piss
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '12 oz. Beer', '4 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Pour the ingredients into a container and stir it. Share with a friend or two :-)

Name: Dog Slopper
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 oz. Soda Water']
Making: Build in a cocktail glass with ice and stir.

Name: Doh
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Tahitian Treat Soda']
Making: Just throw them all together, add some ice, and drink. If you can't get Tahiti Treat use pineapple juice

Name: Doh Doh
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lime Cordial', '2 drop(s) Lemon Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Mix in a mid sized glass and top off with 7-Up.

Name: Dolce Amaro
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Averna Bitters - Amaro', '1 oz. Orange Liqueur', '1 oz. Expresso', '1 dash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Combine all ingredients and shake vigorously over ice. Strain and serve in a cocktail glass garnished with a lemon twist.

Name: Dolce Delight
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Carmichael's Irish Cream Liqueur", '1 oz. Raspberry di Amore', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream Vanilla']
Making: Top with whipped cream.

Name: Dolores
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spanish Brandy', '3/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', '3/4 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Dolph Lundgren
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Brandy', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend until smooth and serve in a highball glass. Garnish with pineapple chunks.

Name: Domaine de Canton Margatita
Ingredients: ['1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1/2 part(s) Tequila Reposado', '2 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur']
Making: Serve over ice in a rocks glass and garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Domaine de Canton Mimosa
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Champagne', '1 part(s) Orange Juice', '1 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur']
Making: Serve in a champagne flute and garnish with an orange wheel.

Name: Dominator
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Orange Juice', '3 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Tequila', '4 oz. Dark Rum', "5 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '2 oz. Gin', '3 oz. Scotch']
Making: Mix all in a blender with ice and pour into a tall glass. Enjoy ) Note This Drink is not for rookies.

Name: Dominic
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake in a cocktail shaker and serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Don Citrus
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', "2/3 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", 'Sprite']
Making: Fill a half a cocktail glass with ice cubes. Add the Absolut Mandarin and Rose's Lime Juice. Fill up with the Sprite.

Name: Don Julio Pomegranate Margaritia
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Don Julio Blanco Tequila', '2 1/2 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Combine Don Julio Blanco, pomegranate juice, fine sugar and lime juice in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Rim margarita glass with sugar. Strain ingredients into margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Don Matteo
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 2/3 oz. Whiskey']
Making: Serve chilled in a cocktail glass.

Name: Don Pedro
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Cream']
Making: Blend all ingredients until ice cream is not lumpy.

Name: Don Roberto
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/4 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '7-Up']
Making: Combine in a highball glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir gently and serve.

Name: Don Roberto Old Fashion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Campari', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Fill an old-fashioned glass with semi-crushed ice cubes, add the Campari and the orange juice. Stir and enjoy.

Name: Don't Touch My Buddha
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Feni - The Spirit of india', '1/2 oz. DeKuyper Orange Curacao', '1 Ginger (fresh and peeled)', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '5 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Muddle Ginger. Add Feni, Lime Juice and Orange liqueur. Add 7-Up. Add ice to fill glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Doralto
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', 'dash(es) Bitters', '4 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the tequila, lemon juice, sugar, and Bitters. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the tonic water and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Double O Cider
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi O', '3 oz. Pear Cider', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a high ball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Double Oh 7 (007)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix and pour over ice in a lowball glass.

Name: Double Shot Cherry Popper
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Kool-Aid (Cherry)', '4 oz. Vodka', '1 slice(s) Orange', 'Sugar', '1 Cherry']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a sugar-rimmed glass. Sink the cherry and stir. Garnish rim with orange slice. Enjoy.

Name: Double Standard Sour
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '3/4 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with 1/2 a slice of a lemon and a cherry.

Name: Double Strike
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '3/4 oz. Cranberry Juice', "3/8 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker half filled with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass and serve with a slice of lime.

Name: Doublemint
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spearmint Schnapps', 'dash(es) Green Creme de Menthe', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour schnapps into an Irish coffee mug and fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream and add creme de menthe for colour.

Name: Douglas Slammer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '4 oz. Cola']
Making: Blend with ice. Enjoy!! Courtesy of Ryan McGrath, G-House Douglas Hall, McGill University, Montreal, Quebec, CANADA!!

Name: Down - Under
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Soda Water']
Making: Mix over ice in a cocktail glass and enjoy!

Name: Down Home Punch AKA Redneck Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the liquors and fill with half orange juice and half sour mix. Shake. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Down To Earth
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 bottle(s) Snapple (Earth flavour)']
Making: Combine in a highball glass.

Name: DPPC
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Everclear', '2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Just mix em in a brandy glass.

Name: Dr. Bacardi
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '8 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Mix in a highball glasss, stir and enjoy!

Name: Dr. Chia
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coconut Rum', '20 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Pour the Dr. Pepper into a tall glass. Top with Coconut rum. Mix lightly, drink and let Dr. Chia take care of ya!

Name: Dr. Comfort
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Dr Pepper']
Making: Pour Southern Comfort over ice in a highball glass. Fill with Dr. Pepper and garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Dr. Daniels
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '10 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Stir over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Dr. Dewar's
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Scotch (Preferably Dewar's Scotch)", '6 oz. Dr Pepper (Diet)']
Making: Mix well in a lowball glass and add ice. Enjoy. Taa-Daa says: You may want to adjust ingredient amounts for personal taste. My girlfriend swears it is better with Diet Dr Pepper than with regular Dr Pepper.

Name: Dr. Doctor
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy (Preferably Hartlys Brandy)', 'Dr Pepper']
Making: Combine over ice in a rocks glass. Just what the Dr. ordered!

Name: Dr. Jager
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Jagermeister', 'Cherry Cola']
Making: Pour Jagermeister into an ice filled rocks glass. Fill with cherry soda.

Name: Dr. Jager #2
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 can(s) Dr Pepper']
Making: Pour both over ice In a rocks glass.

Name: Dr. Kovorkean
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. E & J VS Brandy', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Dr. Morgan
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Spiced Rum', '4 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Mix and serve over ice.

Name: Dr. Pecker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rye Whiskey', '2 oz. Cola', '2 oz. Cranberry-Raspberry Juice']
Making: Mix in a large glass. Ron and Kevin's comment: It really does taste like Dr Pepper.

Name: Dr. Pepper #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 cup(s) Beer']
Making: Fill a shot glass with the Amaretto and the Bacardi. Light the top with a match then pour the beer and slam. It tastes just like Dr Pepper. Webmixer's Note: Make sure flame is out before drinking. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Dr. Schlager
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Goldschlager', '2 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Pour the Goldschlager into a highball glass. Add the Dr Pepper and some ice cubes. Drink away.

Name: Dr. Slivovitz
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Slivovitz', '4 part(s) Dr Pepper', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass over ice with a slice of lime for garnish.

Name: Dr. Spice
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Gin', '1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 can(s) Dr Pepper', '1 splash(es) Goldschlager']
Making: Put both the Gin and rum in the bottom of a tall glass. Add a few pieces of ice. Then fill the rest with Dr. Pepper. Stir a few times just enought to mix the drink fully. Then cap it with a splash of Goldschlager (a bottle top full should be enough for the effect).Then sit back and enjoy. Cheers, Dave.

Name: Dr. YEYO
Ingredients: ['1 oz. YEYO Silver Tequila', '1/2 oz. Di Saronno Oringinale Amaretto', '6 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Pour all ingredients, except the Dr Pepper, in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into your favorite glass then add Dr Pepper. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Dragon Breath
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Ouzo', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Mix Ingredients in a shaker and pour into a highball glass. Ignite for 7 seconds and extinguish.

Name: Dragon's Blood #2
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '3/4 oz. Tequila Gold (Or white)', '4 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix the whisky and the tequila in a shot glass. Put in 3-4 drops of Hot Tabasco Sauce. Optional: heat up in the microwave (20 seconds). Shoot. Try not to drink/eat anything for 5 minutes :-) (Also called Sang De Dragon).

Name: Dragon's Breath #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Everclear', '2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '3 oz. Beer', 'Dry Ice (Sure you have it at home!!)', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with Coca-Cola.

Name: Dragonball Z
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Irish Whiskey', '2 oz. Sour Mix', 'Sprite', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix all of the liquor in a tall glass (pint glasses work well) with ice. Add the Sour Mix. Fill with equal parts Sprite and Orange Juice. The desired effect is a radioactive opaque and swirly greenish-yellow color.

Name: Dragonfly
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '4 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and Ginger Ale. Stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Drama Queen
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '7-Up', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Fill hurricane glass with ice. Pour in Bacardi Rum and Peach Schnapps. Fill with equal amounts of 7-Up and orange juice. Stir and serve with a straw.

Name: Drank
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', "2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Mountain Dew', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Corona Extra']
Making: Pour rum, vodka and Parrot Bay into a pitcher. Stir with a wooden spoon then add Mountain Dew and orange juice. Throw in a hint (not pinch not punch) of Corona Extra. While no one is looking drop a dash or whatever your taste buds require of lime juice into your concoction. Stir until you no longer feel stirring is necessary. Drink directly from pitcher or if you must, use plastic cups.

Name: Drawsneckker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour over ice in a lawball glass. The lemon takes away the taste of the brandy…but watch out, this drink will hit you!

Name: Dream Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 tsp. Anisette']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Dream Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['dash(es) Triple Sec', 'dash(es) Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Dream Girl-sicle
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Starbucks Cream Liqueur', '1 part(s) Amaretto', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Thrilla Vanilla French Vanilla', '1/2 part(s) Creme de Cacao', '3 Eggs', '1 oz. Milk Buttermilk', '2 1/4 tbsp. Sugar', '1 pinch(es) Nutmeg']
Making: Crack two duck eggs (or three brown eggs) and combine in a shaker with buttermilk, sugar, ground nutmeg and dry shake vigorously. Add in Starbucks Cream Liqueur, DeKuyper® Amaretto Liqueur, DeKuyper® Thrilla Vanilla® French Vanilla Liqueur, DeKuyper® Dark Crème de Cacao and dry shake vigorously again. Now add ice and shake for no less than 30 seconds. Serve over ice in a pint glass rimmed with chocolate powder. Top with a dollop of hand made vanilla whipped cream and sprinkle nutmeg on top with a light drizzle of chocolate.

Name: Dream of Love
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bacardi Rum', '3/4 oz. Creme de Cacao', '3/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka']
Making: Fill a blender with ice and add the ingredients. Blend and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Dreamcicle
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Heavy Cream', '1/2 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Fill a highball glass 3/4 full with ice. Add ingredients and mix well. Serve with a slice of orange.

Name: Dreamcicle/push up
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake the schnapps with the orange juice, pour over ice in a cocktail glass and add the half and half.

Name: Dreamer Special #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Dreamsicle #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '3 1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: In a lowball glass combine the two and stir.

Name: Dreamsicle #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Blend and pour over ice. Larry's comment: Drink has the color and taste of a _Dreamsicle_ ice cream bar.

Name: Dreamsicle #3
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's Fireball", '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Half and Half Cream']
Making: Mix all together and serve over the rocks in an old fashioned glass.

Name: Dreamsicle #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Fill a cocktail glass with ice, add the ingredients in order and stir.

Name: Dreamsicle Delight
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum (Silver Label)", 'Sunny Delight Orange Juice']
Making: Pour in a glass 3/4 full of ice , stir and drink. It tastes just like a Dreamsicle, and has plenty of zip!!!

Name: Dreamy Monkey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/2 Banana', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Frappe in a parfait glass. Garnish with whipped cream and the remaining 1/2 banana.

Name: Dressed Up Like A Dogs Dinner
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Applejack', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Drew's Feni
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Feni - The Spirit of india', '1 Ginger (fresh and peeled)', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '5 oz. Ginger Beer']
Making: Muddle ginger in glass. add Feni and lime juice. Pour Ginger beer on top and add ice to fill glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Drink #1
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Apple Schnapps', '1 oz. Midori', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice and pour in schnapps. Layer Midori and add the two juices. If done properly all four will layer.

Name: Drink - Arkansas Hellraiser
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Canadian Mist', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Mix with ice in a collins glass.

Name: Drink Of The Gods
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Drive Away
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice in a glass. Stir.

Name: Droog's Date Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '2 tsp. Cherry Brandy', '2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Drummer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Peach Brandy']
Making: Pour over ice and stir. Garnish with lime and cherry.

Name: Drunk Driver
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1 oz. Cherry Pucker', 'Sprite']
Making: Mix over ice in a cocktail glass. Top with sprite.

Name: Drunk Monkey #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice into a highball glass and top with equal parts of cranberry juice and pineapple juice. Mix well and enjoy!

Name: Drunken Kathey
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka (Preferably Vox vodka)', '1 oz. Cuarenta Y Tres']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes in a rocks glass.

Name: Drunken Monkey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 Banana', '1 splash(es) Coco Lopez']
Making: Combine all ingredients over ice in a blender. Blend and pour into a cocktail glass. Serve with a straw.

Name: Drunken Monkey Milkshake
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Gosling's Black Seal Rum", "1 oz. Gosling's Gold Rum", '2 Bananas Ripe', '1 oz. Honey', '1 cup(s) Milk', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend ingredients and pour into a parfait glass. Top with whipped cream.

Name: Drunken Spring Break Orgy
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 can(s) Dr Pepper']
Making: Mix in a highball glass, rinse and repeat.

Name: Dry Cynar
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cynar']
Making: Build in a rocks glass over ice and garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Dry Hole
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with Club Soda.

Name: Dry Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar', '7-Up']
Making: In an 8 oz. glass pour Absolut Citron over ice. Fill the rest of the glass with Sprite or 7-up. Add lime juice and sugar. Top off with a twist of lemon.

Name: Dry Manhattan
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir well with ice cubes and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Dry Rob Roy
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 1/2 tsp. Dry Vermouth']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Du Barry Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Anis', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

Name: Dubonnet Cassis
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Rouge)', '1 oz. Creme de Cassis', 'Perrier']
Making: Stir in an old-fashioned glass and top with Perrier.

Name: Dubonnet Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '3/4 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Dubonnet Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1 tsp. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1/4 Lemon Juice', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Name: Dubonnet Royal
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1/2 oz. Gin', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '2 dash(es) Curacao', 'dash(es) Pastis']
Making: Stir all the ingredients, except Pastis, with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with a dash of Pastis and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Dubonnet Royale
Ingredients: ['2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '2 dash(es) Curacao', '1 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1 dash(es) Pastis']
Making: Stir all the ingredients, except Pastis, with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with a dash of Pastis and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Duchess
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Anis', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Duck
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rye Whiskey', 'Ginger Ale', 'Water']
Making: Build in a highball glass and mix to taste.

Name: Duck Soup
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 1/2 oz. Powerade (Blue)', '1 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Mix and pour in a plastic bud light bar cup. Kevin's comment: This drink was created by Donnie Larsen of Stockman's Bar, Missoula, MT.

Name: Dulce de Leche
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Godiva Mocha Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Sweetened Condensed Milk']
Making:
Shake very well in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a pinch of ground cinnamon and shaved chocolate.
"Guys and Dolls," the classic American musical comedy about rolling the dice and falling in love under the bright lights of Broadway, will return to the stage March 1st starring Oliver Platt ("Frost/Nixon," "Nip/Tuck," "Flatliners") and Lauren Graham "(Gilmore Girls," "Evan Almighty").
This highly anticipated revival not only provides a re-vamped version of one of the best-loved musicals of our time, but it also offers the perfect inspiration to reintroduce a delicious cocktail. .
The Dulce de Leche cocktail is an important part of a memorable scene in which the two main characters, Sarah and Sky, travel to Havana. Sarah orders this delicious BACARDI Rum based concoction and absolutely adores it.
To reflect this exciting new production, this classic cocktail has been re-created with a modernized twist. The perfect way to toast this celebrated musical -- the BACARDI Dulce de Leche is the "official" cocktail of "Guys and Dolls." It represents the same authentic elements as the original cocktail, which has been featured in the musical since its popular 1950 debut.

Name: Dulce Y Salado (Sweet and Salty)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Castries Creme Peanut Rum', '1 oz. Sherry (Oloroso Lustau)', '1 oz. Coffee (iced)', 'Coffee Beans (ground)', 'Salt (Kosher)', 'Lime']
Making: Combine ground coffee & salt and use limes to rim half the rim of a rocks glass. Stir ingredients over ice and strain over ice.

Name: Dumpster Juice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix in a tall glass and stir well. It should have a murky brown color, hence the name.

Name: Duplex
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. French Vermouth', '1 1/3 oz. Italian Vermouth', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Pour in a lowball glass.

Name: Durango
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice (Frozen concentrate)', '1 tsp. Orgeat Syrup', 'Spring Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Fill with spring water and garnish with mint sprigs.

Name: Durban Poison
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Mainstay Cane', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Serve over crushed ice in a long glass.

Name: Dusty Buffalo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1 1/2 oz. Sherry', '1 dash(es) Lemon Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Pour into a Collins glass filled with ice. Fill with club soda.

Name: Dutch Flag
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Pina Colada (Pre mixed)', '1 oz. Bessen Jenever']
Making: Layerin the given order in a wineglass and you will have the Dutch flag. (Red, white and blue)

Name: Dutch Trade Winds
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dutch Genever Gin', '1/2 oz. Dutch Curacao', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Sugar Syrup (To taste)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Dutch Velvet
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chocolate Mint Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with shaved chocolate and serve.

Name: Dwarven Ale
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Ale dark', '1 oz. Whiskey']
Making: Mix together in a large tankard and enjoy.

Name: Dying Bastard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Ginger Ale', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Pour all the ingredients with ice into a cocktail glass. John's comment: The series of drinks, Suffering Bastard, Dying Bastard, Dead Bastard is from the _Rongovian Embassy to the USA_, a weird bar in Trumansburg, New York. Only a few have done the series and found their car. Generally you end up waking up on a golf course somewhere.

Name: Eager Beaver
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '3 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Eagle Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Creme Yvette', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass.

Name: Earl-y Chill
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Beefeater 24', '1 oz. Tea (Earl Grey - syrup) * see below', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Egg White', '2 dash(es) Fee Brothers Peach Bitters']
Making:
Add all ingredients to a mixing glass and dry-shake (with no ice); add ice and shake again (this will make for a great froth on top of the drink). Strain into a cocktail glass, and garnish with a lemon zest.
Earl Grey syrup is made by mixing very strong Earl Grey Tea 1:1 with sugar.
Created by Beefeater Gin Brand Ambassador Jamie Gordon

Name: Earle's Elegance
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and pour in all the ingredients. Shake well until cold and pour into a large cocktail glass. Appreciate the beautiful turquoise colour and sip slowly to savour the elegant taste.

Name: Early Autumn
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin (infused with dried pears and apples)', '1/2 oz. Lucid Absinthe Superieure', '1 oz. Apple Cider', '1/2 oz. Pear Brandy (Adam recommends: Massenez Williams Poire Brandy)', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 dash(es) Bitters (Fee Brothers Aztec Chocolate Bitters)', 'Ginger Beer']
Making:
Shake all ingredients well. Strain into a highball glass. Top with gingerbeer. Garnish with a Cinnamon stick and lemon peel.
Just as summer has suddenly left us, the familiar flavors of fall and a strong cooling breeze are here to remind us of warm sweaters, pumpkin picking and trick or treating. This cocktail takes your classic apple cider and gives it the ultimate makeover with a touch of class and major sophistication. Pear brandy and chocolate bitters are sure to warm up even the coolest brisk fall nights and a flavor explosion that will have you talking all through winter.
Created by: Adam Schuman, Fatty Crab

Name: Early Morning Piece
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 cup(s) Grape Juice', '1 cup(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix over 2 ice cubes in a tall glass, stir and enjoy.

Name: Earthquake
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Earthquake Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Absinthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: East India Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Jamaica Rum', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and a cherry.

Name: East India Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Curacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: East India Cocktail #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Sherry', '1 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: East India Cocktail #4
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/4 oz. Curacao', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: East Side Press
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '2 part(s) Cognac', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1 Egg White', '4 drop(s) Angostura Bitters', '1 tsp. Brown Sugar', '5 piece(s) Ginger', '2 piece(s) Ginger - Candied']
Making:
Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with the pieces of ginger.
Created by Xavier Herit

Name: East Wing
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Campari']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Eastern Shore Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. 7-Up or Sprite']
Making: Pour over ice in a mug and serve with lemon wedge.

Name: Eastern Trace
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '3 wedge(s) Lime', '3 piece(s) Ginger', '1 dash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Muddle lime and ginger and then shake all with ice and strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Eclipse Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice', 'Grenadine']
Making: Pour enough grenadine in a cocktail glass to cover an olive. Shake the remaining ingredients with ice and slowly strain into the cocktail glass to create a layer on top of the grenadine.

Name: Edith Day Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 Egg White', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Dry Gin', '1/2 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Frappe in a champagne flute.

Name: Eels Tail
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', 'Sprite', 'Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Fill cocktail glass with the alcohol and equal amounts of Sprite and Sweet and Sour Mix. Shake until blended. The drink should end up being a green colour.

Name: Effen Vodka Grapefruit Bubbly
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Effen Vodka', '1 part(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1 part(s) Prosecco']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a champagne flute. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Egg Crusher
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Eggnog', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a large snifter. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Egg Nog #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Brandy', '1/2 cup(s) Rum', '6 Eggs (Large)', '4 cup(s) Milk', '4 cup(s) Cream', '3/4 cup(s) Sugar', '1/2 cup(s) Icing Sugar']
Making: Separate the yolks from the whites of the eggs. Beat the yolks slowly while simultaneously adding the sugar; do this until the mixture is pale and golden. Now slowly add in the brandy and rum, then beat in the milk and half the cream. Set aside until just before serving, then whisk the egg whites until stiff and fold them into the eggnog mixture. Whip the remaining cream and icing sugar until thick. Top each glass of eggnog with whipped cream and a shake of nutmeg. This yields eight servings.

Name: Egg Nog - Healthy
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Egg Substitute', '3 tbsp. Sugar', '1/3 oz. Evaporated Skimmed Milk', '3/4 oz. Skimmed Milk', '1 tsp. Vanilla', '3 oz. Rum']
Making: Whip egg substitute and sugar together, combine with the two kinds of milk, vanilla, and rum. Mix well. Chill overnight. Sprinkle with nutmeg. Makes 6 servings.

Name: Egg Nog - Kahlua
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '4 oz. Eggnog']
Making: Mix Kahlua with eggnog in a wine glass and then sprinkle nutmeg on top.

Name: Egg Nog Ice Cream
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Eggnog', '1 quart(s) Eggnog Ice Cream', "1 pint(s) Myer's Rum", '1 pint(s) Brandy']
Making: Allow ice cream to soften. Mix all of the ingredients together and refrigerate. Serve with ground nutmeg sprinkled on top.

Name: Egg Sour
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '3 dash(es) Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Curacao', '1 oz. Brandy', '1 Egg']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Egge Von Kabel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Pisang Ambon', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir ingredients with ice in a Collins glass and fill with orange juice. Top with a few raspberries.

Name: Ego Alley Breeze
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Coconut Rum', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice', '4 oz. Limeade']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into martini glass. Add pineapple wedge and cherry on toothpick. Named after Ego Alley Annapolis, MD. A huge boater's hangout.

Name: Ehh Doggyman
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 dash(es) Vanilla Extract', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Make in a tumbler over ice and fill with Coca Cola.

Name: El Bano
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Tonic Water', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix and serve in a cokatil glass. Garnish with one Twix bar to give it that "toilet look and feel that we all love." This drink is also known as Tequila Toilet.

Name: El Cid
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Gin', '1/2 oz. Midori', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: El Cubano A Brazilian Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cachaca Fazenda Mae de Ouro', '1/2 Lime', '2 tsp. Sugar', '4 sprig(s) Mint', 'Club Soda']
Making: Gently muddle mint and sugar with a little soda water in a mixing glass until the sugar dissolve. Squeeze the lime into the glass, add cachaça and shake with ice. Strain over cracked ice in a highball glass. Add soda water. Garnish with Mint Sprig.

Name: El Dragao Matador The Dragon Killer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cachaca Fazenda Mae de Ouro', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Orange Juice']
Making:
Shake all ingredients in a shaker with crushed ice. Strain over ice into a tall glass.
Background: Dragão is Brazilian slang for someone who is “not that attractive”. You can figure what happens after a few of these…From Emio Kamatani, São Paulo, Brazil

Name: El Fulo
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Honey Syrup Clover - 2 parts clover honey and 1 part water', '3 wedge(s) Lemon', '9 Mint Leaves', '2 oz. Dry Gin', '1 oz. Gin']
Making:
Gin is the most traditional cocktail base. In El Fulo, the clover honey syrup infuses taste to the mild flavored gin, resulting in a tropical blonde (fulo) cocktail of exhilarating candor.
In a pint glass, hand press lemon wedges and mint leaves. Add all spirits and mixers, add ice and shake vigorously for 6 sec. Strain over fresh ice in an old fashioned glass. Crown it with crushed ice. Garnish with a powdered sugar dusted mint sprig and lemon peel.
Pablo Moix's undeniable passion for mixing drinks along with nearly 16 years of experience behind the bar, from dive bars to LA's hottest restaurants and nightclubs, have gained him recognition as one of the region's most respected mixologist.
Pablo earned second place honors at the Leblon Cachaca Competition and his unique cocktail blend at the Flor de Cana Competition led him to the victorious first place win.
Currently, Pablo is Principal Bartender for the ONE Group Los Angeles and the Master Mixologist at the acclaimed STK restaurant where he develops signature cocktails with what he describes as a "California Fresh" sensibility, balancing complex spirits and bitters with fresh, straight forward fruit flavors that appeal to connoisseurs and newcomers alike.

Name: El Presidente
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/6 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/6 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Name: El Presidente Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rum', '1 1/4 oz. French Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: El Presidente Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: El Topo
Ingredients: ['3/4 part(s) Anchos Reyes Chile Liqueur', '1 part(s) Hudson Baby Bourbon', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 part(s) Agave Nectar', '5 Tomatoes (Cherry)', '3 part(s) Tecate Light', '1 pinch(es) Salt']
Making: Muddle the cherry tomatoes in a mixing tin. Combine remaining ingredients except the Mexican lager. Add ice, shake, and double strain over fresh ice into a pilsner glass. Top with Mexican lager. Using a vegetable peeler, remove a long peel of lemon. Express the oils over the cocktail, rub peel around the glass rim, and place atop the cocktail alongside three cherry tomatoes.

Name: Elder Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and fine strain into an ice-filled glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Elderflower Collins
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Soda']
Making: Shake first three ingredients and strain into an ice-filled Collins glass. Top with soda. Garnish with a lemon wedge or wheel.

Name: Eldorado
Ingredients: ['1 tbsp. Honey', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Electric Blue Dynamite
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Smirnoff Ice', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '7-Up']
Making: Pour bottle of Smirnoff Ice, vodka and blue curacao into a highball glass and top off with 7-Up. Toss in several brightly colored straws and serve. This drink is a favorite at Keele University in England because it is relatively inexpensive and results in a buzz after just one or two (especially if you drink it through the straws)!

Name: Electric Blue Freezie
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Sourpuss Raspberry Liqueur', '7-Up']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass over ice and fill with 7-Up.

Name: Electric Blue Popsicle
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/3 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/3 part(s) 7-Up']
Making: Fill a Tom Collins glass with ice and add Triple Sec, Amaretto and Blue Curacao. Add equal parts of lemon juice, lime juice and 7-Up until full. Garnish with either a lemon or lime wedge.

Name: Electric Gatorade
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Combine vodka, gin, rum, tequila, triple sec and sour mix in a standard bar glass. Shake ingredients.Top with Midori for color and added flavor.

Name: Electric Ice Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao', '7-Up']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and top with 7-Up. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Electric Jam
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Sour Mix', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour over ice into a collins glass and stir.

Name: Electric Koolaid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 splash(es) Galliano (Or lime juice)', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Grape Juice']
Making: Combine over a little ice in a cocktail glass, finishing with the splash of Galliano.

Name: Electric Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Flash blend in a tall glass and garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Electric Lemonade #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Electric Lemonade #3
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Hiram Walker Orange Curacao', '4 part(s) Lemonade', '1/2 tbsp. Strawberries (pureed)']
Making: Blend with ice. Serve in a hurricane glass with a lemon wheel garnish.

Name: Electric Lizard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake and serve in a tall glass filled with ice.

Name: Electric Sex
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Tequila (Optional)', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon wedge

Name: Electric Watermelon #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Midori', '2 1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '3 drop(s) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a fishbowl glass with crushed ice. Once settled, float the grenadine in the center with a stir-straw.

Name: Elephant Lips
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Elephant Man
Ingredients: ["1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: In a shot glass, pour the Jack Daniel's in first, add the tequila, then the 151 proof rum. Light it up, put straw in and drink. Warning: Have a fire extinguisher near by. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Elephant Ride
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Feni - The Spirit of india', '1 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Campari', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Build in a shaker filled with ice. Strain into a glass with 1 ice cube. Garnish with a lime twist and an orange wedge.

Name: Elevated Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Avion Silver Tequila', '1 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 part(s) Agave Nectar']
Making:
Add Avion, Lime Juice and Agave Nectar into a shaker with ice. Shake the mixing can vigorously; salt your rim and fine strain over fresh ice. Garnish with a lime and enjoy!
With Art Basel, one of the most prestigious art shows in the Americas, right around the corner, what better way to celebrate than with a Tequila Avion Elevated Margarita? This year marks the tenth anniversary of a celebration recognizing renowned artists and budding talents; with a larger global following each year, artists and art enthusiasts participate in the "winter meeting place for the international art world." Tequila Avion will collaborate with two title sponsors to celebrate art with extravagance and exclusivity: NetJets Inc., the worldwide leader in private aviation, and Cartier, the renowned French jeweler with a heritage embedded in luxury. Whether you're in Miami or not, toast with Tequila Avión to luxury and talented artists like a celebrity.

Name: Elf Tea #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peppermint Liqueur', '3 oz. Iced Tea', '1/2 Lemon', 'Sugar (To taste)']
Making: Mix all the ingredients and squeeze lemon over the top.

Name: Elf Tea #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '4 oz. Iced Tea']
Making: Mix and pour over ice.

Name: Elixir de Menthe
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '2 tbsp. Honey', '4 sprig(s) Mint']
Making: Let the mint sprigs infuse for 2 to 3 minutes in the boiling water. Add the honey and stir well. Take the pan of the heat and cool. Once cold, filter the mixture and serve over ice in a collin glass.

Name: Elk's Own Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '3/4 oz. Port', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice and serve.

Name: Embassy Royal
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Orange Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Embryo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', 'dash(es) Half and Half Cream', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour half and half into the middle of the schnapps and add grenadine. Use a highball glass.

Name: Emerald #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass.

Name: Emerald #2
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Brandy', '2 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Emerald #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cork Gin', '1 tsp. Green Creme de Menthe', '3 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a green cherry.

Name: Emerald City
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with crushed ice and pour into your favourite glass.

Name: Emerald City #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Light Rum', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '3/4 oz. Lime Vodka', '3/4 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Pour all the ingredients into tall glass filled with ice. Cover with a shaker and swirl gently. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Emerald Forest
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. White Creme de Menthe', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Green Creme de Menthe']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Emerald Isle Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Green Creme de Menthe', '3 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Emerson #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Empire Glory
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Ginger Wine', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Endurance
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hazelnut Liqueur', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 Banana', '1 oz. Espresso (Hot)', 'Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Add all but chocolate sauce into the blender, adding the espresso last and blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass that you have swirled chocolate into.

Name: English Bolo
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Dry Sherry', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 Cinnamon Stick']
Making: Pound cinnamon stick with lemon juice and sugar in an old-fashioned glass. Pour in sherry and stir.

Name: English Highball
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Pour brandy, gin, and sweet vermouth into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel, stir, and serve.

Name: English Orchard
Ingredients: ['1 dash(es) Apple Juice', '1 2/3 oz. Plymouth Gin', '2 1/3 oz. Ginger Ale', '1 Plum']
Making: Cut plum in eights. Place with the apple juice in tall glass and muddle ingredients together. Add the Plymouth Sloe Gin and top with ginger ale. Stir and add garnish.

Name: English Rose Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim of glass in powdered sugar. Shake all ingredients (except a cherry) with ice and strain into sugar-rimmed glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Enigma
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix and serve over ice.

Name: Entwistle's Error
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '4 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Name: Envious Passion
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Midori', 'Sprite']
Making: Stir into a cocktail glass and garnish with 2 cherries.

Name: Erection #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cherry Vodka', '1 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '1 can(s) 7-Up']
Making: Combine in a highball glass over crushed ice.

Name: Erika's LiZard GiZard
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Vodka', '3 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1/4 cup(s) Milk']
Making: Blend until smooth and serve in a highball glass. Garnish with a straw.

Name: Eruption
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Esan Perse
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Finlandia Cranberry Vodka', '2/3 oz. Green Apple Pucker (Or green apple liqueur)', '2 splash(es) Club Soda', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour all the ingredients over ice in a rocks glass. Stir. No garnishing.

Name: Eskimo Joe's (Barry Sanders)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice (Or to taste)', '2 oz. Coca Cola (Or to taste)']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass or follow the directions given in this story: This is just a rum and Coke and a Cape Cod mixed together. Try it. It is really good. The drink came about in Eskimo Joes in Stillwater, Oklahoma the day Barry Sanders got the Heisman Trophey. When they announced it a waitress was knocked over and broke the only big screen TV in the Bar, at the time. The two drinks were knocked over on the table. One of the football players took a straw and just sucked it off the table. He liked it so much that it was all that was served for the next day. For a while it was "the drink that got knocked over". Now its an Eskimo Joe, Barry style. If you do it right, knock it on the table, the waitress will go get another for you (free). While she is gone, you suck it off the table. It is rarely done, except for when alumni come into town, because what college kid would waste liquor on purpose?

Name: Eskimo Joe's Drink
Ingredients: ['1/2 Pineapple', '1 Lemon (Seeded and peeled)', '1 Apple (Green - Seeded and peeled)', '1 Orange (Seeded and peeled)', '8 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 cup(s) Yogurt (Raspberry)', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Blend rum, fruits, juice, yogurt and 1 cup of ice until smooth. Pour into collins glasses.

Name: Eskimo Slugger
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream (Chilled)', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka (Chilled)', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze (Chilled)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into small rocks glass. Enjoy!

Name: Esmeralda’s Spiced Tea
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '3 part(s) Tea Cinnamon Spiced']
Making: Mix all ingredients and sweeten to taste with Fee Brothers® Spiced Cordial Syrup. Serve over ice in a rocks glass and garnish with a cinnamon stick. Bubble, bubble toil and trouble.

Name: Espirit de June Highball
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', "1 oz. L'Espirit de June", '3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'Soda Water']
Making: Fill a champagne flute with ice, add the ingredients and stir briefly. Garnish with a zest of orange, sprayed, rimmed on the glass.

Name: Espolon Margarita
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Espolon Tequila Reposado', '2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Agave Nectar']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice. Strain into a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with a lime twist. Optional salt-rimmed glass.

Name: Espolon Paloma
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Espolon Tequila Blanco', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Fresca']
Making: Rim highball glass with salt. Shake Blanco and lime juice over ice and pour into glass. Fill remainder of glass with Fresca or Sparkling Grapefruit Juice. Garnish with grapefruit peel or wedge.

Name: Essence Of Lee
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Milk', '2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Mix with ice.

Name: Estridentista
Ingredients: ['3/4 part(s) Anchos Reyes Chile Liqueur', '1 1/2 part(s) Dry Vermouth', '3/4 part(s) St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '2 dash(es) Bitters (Grapefruit)']
Making: Chill a coupe glass with ice and water and set aside. Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass. Add ice and stir until well chilled and diluted. Discard chilling ice from coupe and strain cocktail into chilled glass. Using a vegetable peeler, remove a long peel of lemon. Express the oils over the cocktail, rub the peel around the glass rim, and place in the coupe.

Name: Ethel Duffy Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: European
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Cream Sherry', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Rouge)', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Grand Marnier']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sherry, Dubonnet, vermouth, and Grand Marnier. Stir well. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Euthanasia
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Southern Comfort', "1 cup(s) Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 pint(s) Beer (Scottish, heavy)']
Making: Mix. Drink. Repeat. Fall over.

Name: Eve's Apple Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '2 oz. Apple Juice (Frozen concentrate)']
Making: Mix with 8 oz. of crushed ice until smooth. Serve in round wine glass and garnish with an apple wedge or a lime wheel.

Name: Evelyne
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Calvados', '3/4 oz. Creme de Banane']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over fresh ice.

Name: Everglade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '1 oz. Gatorade (Green)']
Making: Pour into a lowball glass.

Name: Everybody's Irish
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Green Chartreuse']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Evil Blue Thing
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. White Rum']
Making: Pour into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Optional: Garnish with a Blue Whale.

Name: Exam Reliever
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bols Vanilla Liqueur', '16 oz. Cherry Cola']
Making: Mix and drink while the exam period passes.

Name: Excitabull
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix the vodka, the peach schnapps and the Red Bull in a large glass, then top up with the cranberry juice.

Name: Executive Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila Gold', '4 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)', '2 tsp. Creme de Cassis']
Making: Pour the tequila and the orange juice into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the cassis into the centre of the drink.

Name: Exorcist
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Exotic Finn
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Finlandia Vodka', '1 oz. Passion Fruit Extract', '1 tbsp. Strawberry Syrup', 'Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with mint leaves, a strawberry and an orange twist.

Name: Explosion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cointreau', "1 splash(es) Rose's Lime Juice (Or to taste)", 'Pear Cider (Strong and sweet)']
Making: Combine in a large beer glass. Eric says: Beware, despite the sweet taste, the glass contains around 3 oz. of alcohol, hence the name :)

Name: Extreme Cherry Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Players Extreme Cherry Infused Vodka', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Serve on the rocks in a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Eye of the Dragon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bulldog Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Lychee Liqueur', '1 dash(es) Lychee Juice']
Making:
Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with 2 lychees.
one of Bulldog's botanicals, dragon eye, is a cousin of the lychee fruit so lychee drinks taste great with Bulldog.

Name: Eye-Opener
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 tsp. Pernod Absinthe', '1 tsp. White Creme de Cacao', '1 Egg Yolk', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

Name: Eyeball
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Martini', '1/2 oz. Martini and Rossi Rosso (Sweet)', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '4 drop(s) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice until the shaker becomes frosted. Strain into a highball glass and garnish with a green olive.

Name: Ez Creamcicle
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '4 oz. Mountain Dew (Diet)']
Making: Shake with crushed ice and strain (or not) in a highball glass. The colder, the better.

Name: F B I Fizz
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cherry Heering Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Jamaica Rum', 'Soda Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with soda water. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: F U
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Frangelico', '2 1/4 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Pour into a highball glass.

Name: F**k Buck In The Ass With a Banana
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '3 oz. Sprite', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: F**k Me in the Shower
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a glass, preferably a 14 oz. or 18 oz. glass. Garnish with a orange, pineapple, and cherry.....enjoy!

Name: F**k Me Sideways
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Smirnoff Citrus Twist Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '4 oz. Grapefruit Juice (Preferably Ruby Red Grapefruit Juice)', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the shots of alcohol first, then add the juices. Stir vigorously. If the drink is too strong keep adding grapefruit juice. Chug it and e-mail me with how you like it.

Name: F**k You
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac (Preferably Remy Martin)', '2 oz. Alize Gold Passion', '2 oz. Cherry Brandy', 'dash(es) Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a highball glass.

Name: F**k You Up The Ass With A Banana
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1 splash(es) Cream']

Name: F**k'n'Bill

Name: F**ka Chile

Making: Blend with lots of ice (except the chilli pepper). Take a bite out of the chilli pepper, and start drinking your 'F**ka Chile'. Enjoy the burning feeling as you drink it!

Name: F**ked Apples
Ingredients: ["1/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '3/4 oz. Apple Cider']
Making: Mix over ice, strain into a lowball glass and drink at will. Mess with the amount of Captain added to each drink to taste, some like it stronger, but it tastes great regardless.

Name: F**ked Up Fuzzy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Cooler (Preferably Fuzz Navel Wine Cooler)']
Making: Drink a sip from the bottle, pour the vodka in the bottle and shake carefully.

Name: F**ker Pucker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', '2/3 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/3 oz. Sprite']
Making: Combine ingedients, pour over ice, drink and enjoy!!

Name: F**king Hot
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Peppar Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. DeKuyper Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Pour into a metal cup.

Name: F**king Idiot
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Tampico Punch (Citrus)']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass and stir.

Name: F**king Snake in the Grass
Ingredients: ['40 oz. King Kobra', '2 oz. Tequila', '2 tbsp. Sugar', '2 tbsp. Honey']
Making: Drink 1/2 of the 40 oz. then pour remaining ingredients into the bottle. Shake with ice and drink quickly. Repeat as desired.

Name: F-Bomb
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's Fireball", '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Galliano', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Fruit Punch']
Making: Use a regular Collins glass. Mix in the Fireball Whiskey, peach schnapps, Galliano and vodka. Fill the rest with fruit punch. Add ice to keep cool.

Name: Face First

Making: Combine in a highball glass with cracked ice and you will go down, face first.

Name: Fair and Warmer Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Fairy Belle Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Fairy Liquid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice', 'Lemonade']
Making: Put ingredients into high ball glass and fill with lemonade.

Name: Faith Hope and Garrity
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Whiskey', '4 oz. V 8 Juice', '1 tsp. Barbecue Sauce (Smokey)', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', 'Beer']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with beer.

Name: Falcon Eddy

Making: Mix the gin and the vodka in a cocktail glass and add the teaspoon of sugar. Stir thoroughly. When the sugar is all dissolved add in the peppermint schnapps.

Name: Fallen Angel
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. White Creme de Menthe', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with a cherry and serve.

Name: Falling Star
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Pour rum, lime juice, and orange juice over ice in a glass. Stir. Add tonic and stir gently.

Name: Fancy Bourbon
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/4 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Bourbon whiskey, Triple Sec, sugar, and Bitters. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Fancy Brandy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/4 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/4 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Fancy Free
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rye Whiskey', '2 dash(es) Maraschino Liqueur', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'Lemon Juice', 'Powdered Sugar']
Making: Coat the rim of a cocktail glass with lemon juice then powdered sugar. Shake with ice and strain into the cocktail glass.

Name: Fancy Gin
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/4 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Fancy Scotch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/4 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '2 dash(es) Bitters']

Name: Fancy Whiskey
