Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Fanny's Favorite
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Raspberry Rum", "1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Coconut Rum", '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Arrow Black Raspberry Liqueur', 'splash(es) Pineapple Juice', 'splash(es) Soda']
Making: Mix the first five ingredients and pour over ice. Top with white soda and garnish with a twist of orange and a cherry.

Name: Fantasio Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. White Creme de Menthe', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Fare Thee Well
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Farmer Giles
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, dry vermouth, sweet vermouth, and Bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Farmer's Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Fashionable Manhattan
Ingredients: ['3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '3 part(s) Makers Mark Bourbon', '1 part(s) Sweet Vermouth']
Making:
The Maker’s Mark Fashionable Manhattan was chosen as the grand champion at the 2006 Kentucky Bourbon Festival Cocktail Challenge.
Place the Angosturo Bitters in a cocktail glass along with a wedge each of lemon, lime and orange. Thoroughly mascerate the fruit in the bitters until fruit oils and bitters completely cover the inside of the glass. Empty the glass and set it aside. Add the Maker's Mark and Sweet Vermouth to a Boston shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously for 45 seconds to a minute and strain into the cocktail glass. Break one Marischino cherry into the glass and scrape the inside of the glass with a bar spoon to release the fruit oils and bitters. Garnish with a half slice of orange.

Name: Fastlap
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Fat Face
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1 Egg White']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

Name: Fat Titties
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bacardi Limon', '3 oz. Sprite', '3 oz. Ocean Spray Juice (Kiwi Strawberry)']
Making: Mix in a highball glass.

Name: Fat Tuesday Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Skyy Infusions Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Lemonade', '3 oz. Iced Tea (sweet)']
Making: Combine all ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Favorite Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Fear Factor
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Cranberry Juice', '2 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Add peach schnapps and Amaretto to a glass with ice. Fill the glass 3/4 full with cranberry juice and add grenadine. Shake. Top up glass with 7-Up and drop in a few gummy worms.

Name: Felix's Feast
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Chocolate Milk']
Making: Mix chocolate milk and Bailey's Irish Cream. Pour over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Fender Bender

Name: Feni Highball

Making: Pour the Feni apple liqueur into a highball glass with several ice cubes. Add the fresh lime juice and fill with 7-Up. Stir, garnish with a mint sprig and lime wedge, and serve.

Name: Feni Indian Summer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Feni - The Spirit of india', '1 oz. Cointreau', '3 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Orange Juice', '1 tsp. Soda Water']
Making: Build in a glass or shaker. Add soda water afterward. Garnish with a lemon or lime twist.

Name: Feni Paloma

Making: In a cocktail shaker add Feni, fresh grapefruit juice, ice, and Grand Marnier. Shake mixture for 20 seconds and then pour mixture into serving glass. Top with grapefruit soda. Garnish with a grapefruit slice and grapefruit zest

Name: Feni Tiki Cocktail

Name: Fernet

Name: Ferrari

Name: Fever's Flavor

Making: Shake until blended (shaking is important in order to incorporate the half and half into the drink). Pour over ice and serve in a highball glass.

Name: Fickle Pickle

Name: Fifty-fifty Cocktail

Name: Fight On

Making: Combine ingredients in a rocks glass with some ice. Stir. Based on the school colors cardinal and gold of USC.

Name: Final Fantasy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sour Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1 oz. Raspberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Lime Vodka', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: You will need a tall glass filled about half with crushed ice. Pour raspberry vodka, strawberry vodka, lime vodka and sour apple and stir throughly. Now pour peach scnapps, triple sec, 99 bananas, raspberry schnapps, sweet vermouth and dry vermouth. Stir again and drink. If you don't want to drink it straight pour in a 3 or 4 shots of orange juice and cranberry juice for a modified Sex on the Beach.

Name: Fine and Dandy

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Finger Me Soooo Good

Name: Finicky F**ker (FF)

Name: Firefly Island Tea

Making: Fill Glass full of ice. Add ingredients in the order listed. Pour into tin, cap, & shake. Pour back into glass, garnish, & serve. Garnish with a lemon slice, pomegranate arils and a mint sprig.

Name: Firefly Screw Fly

Name: Firefly Sex on the Plantation

Making: Mix in a tall glass over ice.

Name: Firefly Southern Fly
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Firefly Sweet Tea Vodka', '1 part(s) Spring Water']
Making: Mix over ice in a tall glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Firefly Spiked Palmer
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Firefly Sweet Tea Vodka', '1 part(s) Lemonade']
Making: Mix over ice in a tall glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Firefly Super Fly

Name: Firefly Tea-Breeze

Name: Fireman's Sour

Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lime juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the Club Soda. Stir well. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Fireside Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Makers Mark Bourbon', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 part(s) Honey Syrup', '1 part(s) Apple Cider', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '4 piece(s) Ginger (Crystalized)']
Making:
Muddle Ginger, lemon and honey in mixing glass. Add apple cider, Maker's Mark, bitters and ice. Shake and strain into iced double old fashioned glass. Garnish w/skewered crystallized ginger.
created by: Bill Norris of FINO, Austin

Name: First Love
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Champagne', '1/3 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Sugar', '2 dash(es) Cherry Heering Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: First Nighter

Making: Stir in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

Name: FitzWell
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum, Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum, Crème de Banane and equal amounts of Pineapple Juice and Orange Juice. Strain and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Five Green Brothers
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Budweiser Light Beer', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Start with a large glass of ice, mix all together and fill with mountain dew. Enjoy if you can HANG!

Name: Five Horsemen Surprise
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bacardi Limon', '2 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Sunny Delight Orange Juice', '4 oz. Sprite']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth.

Name: Five Magics - Megadeth
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1 oz. Gekkeikan Plum Wine', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making:
Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a glass with ice. Top with Ginger Beer and a piece of crystallized ginger.
In honor of the Big 4 (Metallica, Slayer, Anthrax and Megadeth) playing Yankee Stadium, Jagermeister, a brand known for rocking the music scene, has come up with some metal cocktails….

Name: Fizzy Lifting Drink
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coconut Rum', '6 oz. Mountain Dew Code Red', 'Candy (Wonka Pixie Stix)']
Making: Mix the rum with the Mountain Dew with no ice. Pour in pixie sticks any flavor to enjoy your own 'Fizzy Lifting Drink' - Props to Gene Wilder as Willy Wonka

Name: Fizzy Lightning
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Junior Johnson's Midnight Moon Lightning Lemonade", 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Build in a rocks glass over ice and fill with lemon-lime soda.

Name: Fjellbekk (Mountain Stream)
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Akvavit (Preferably Linie Akvavit)', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Mix alcohol and lime juice, pour over ice in a collins glass, add Sprite.

Name: Flame Of Love
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tio Pepe Sherry', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Swirl sherry in a lowball glass to coat. Add vodka and garnish with an orange peel.

Name: Flamin' Galah
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 dash(es) Grenadine', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 dash(es) Sambuca']
Making: Put dash of Sambuca in V-shaped cocktail glass and ignite. Mix vodka, cherry brandy, grenadine and cranberry juice over a scoop of ice in a shaker and shake well. Strain over burning Sambuca in the glass. Garnish with a lemon twist. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE!!!

Name: Flaming 7-7
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '12 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Pour Seagram's 7 in a shot glass and pour the 7-Up into a highball glass. Light Seagram's 7 on fire and drop the flaming shot into the highball. Stir and enjoy. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Blue Lamborghini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Sambuca (White)', 'Cinnamon', 'Cream']
Making: Layer the Kahlua, curacao, and Galliano in a martini glass. Pour the Sambuca into a shot glass and light it on fire. Pour it flaming into the drink (ooooohhh ahhhhh pretty blue fire yay!) and throw a pinch of cinnamon over it for the crackling fireball effect. Douse the flames with cream and drink. Pete says: FYI this drink tastes like sh*t (unless you like creamy black liquorice... puke) and is all for the show. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Cherry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 can(s) Cherry Cola']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass over ice.

Name: Flaming Dr Pepper #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Dr Pepper (Or Coca Cola)', '1 oz. Beer']
Making: Add Amaretto, Bacardi, and vodka. Mix in the Dr Pepper and beer.

Name: Flaming Dr Pepper #4
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Light Beer', '2 oz. Everclear']
Making: Pour the beer into a glass and then pour the shot of Everclear into a shot glass. Light the shot on fire and drop the flaming shot down into the glass of Beer. Slam it all back as fast as you can. Then wait a couple seconds for a HELLUVA KICK!! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Dr Pepper #5
Ingredients: ["Beer (Preferably ale, and Michael Shea's)", '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Light the shot of Bacardi on fire, drop it into the large beer glass and put it down quick. It tastes just like Dr Pepper. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Dr Pepper #6
Ingredients: ['Beer', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 tsp. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Fill a shot glass with Amaretto and use the back of a spoon to layer the Bacardi 151on top of the glass. Ignite and quickly drop the shot glass in the beer glass (the drink will begin to fizz). Drink fast! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Ferrari
Ingredients: ['3 oz. White Rum', '3 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Pour the white rum into a glass. Add the dark rum. Pour the Blue Curacao into a separate shot glass. Light the rum mixture and suck with a straw. Whilst doing this, pour in the Blue Curacao into the glass and finish. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Gay Morgan
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 oz. Cherry Liqueur (Preferably Pucker wild cherry liquor)', '6 oz. Tonic Water', 'dash(es) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum (Optional)']
Making: Mix spiced rum, wild cherry liquor and tonic water with cracked ice in a shaker and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and cherry on a pick. Optional: float Bacardi 151 on top of shaken drink and ignite Bacardi with a match immediately before serving. Use caution when igniting this drink! An alternative is to pour the Bacardi onto the lime and cherry and float on top of the drink. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Hooker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Place Drambuie in a wine glass. Dim the lights in the room. Swirl, then light. Quickly but carefully raise to mouth, with thumb between the glass and the lower lip, and swallow in one gulp. Promptly set the glass back on the counter -- full success if the flame still in the glass. Danger -- do not spill! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Lamborghini (Diablo)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Pour Kahlua, Tequila and Vodka into a cocktail glass. Light Sambucca and dim lights. Pour slowly from about 30cms into Kahlua. When it's alight give client two straws. As he starts to drink pour in Irish Cream and Blue curacao at the same time. (NOT FOR THE FAINT-HEARTED) Webmixer's Note: Make sure flame is out before drinking. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Layrnx
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Clamato Juice']
Making: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice.

Name: Flaming Mullet
Ingredients: ['1/10 part(s) Smirnoff Vodka', '9/10 part(s) After Shock Liqueur', '1 dash(es) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour into a mixer glass. Light on fire, blow out, then drink.

Name: Flaming Orgasm
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Lager', '1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Light the shot, drop shot glass into mug of beer, consume.

Name: Flaming Todd
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Grenadine']
Making: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice combine all ingredients and shake. Strain into a glass and add a splash of grenadine and garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry. This is a fruity tropical drink! Yum!

Name: Flaming Wizard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 oz. Cherry Liqueur', '6 oz. Coca Cola', '1 splash(es) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix spiced rum, cherry liqueur and Coca Cola in a low ball glass. Layer Bacardi 151 Proof Rum on top. Light and enjoy. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE!!!

Name: Flamingo Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Flamingo-Rita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '5 Strawberries', '1/2 cup(s) Sweet and Sour Mix (Or to taste)']
Making: Blend with ice until frothy and pour into a tacky pink glass with a flamingo stir stick or a flamingo straw.

Name: Flander's Flake-Out
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sambuca', 'Sarsaparilla']
Making: Add together with ice in collins glass. Stir.

Name: Flapper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. French Vermouth', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'Sugar']
Making: Mix in a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Flashback
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Gatorade (Preferably fruit flavoured)', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix the vodka and the Gatorade in a collins glass, then fill with Ginger Ale. Serve on ice.

Name: Flathead Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['3 tbsp. Tang Drink Mix', 'Vodka']
Making: Put tang into an 8 oz. glass and fill with vodka. Stir and drink.

Name: Flatliner #1
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Cognac (Preferably Hennessy)', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix vodka, tequila and cognac with ice and strain into shot glass. Top with a splash of Tabasco Sauce ... Got this one served in London OUCH!

Name: Flatliner #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '12 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce', '2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Pour the rum to fill the bottom half of a glass. Tilt the glass to 45 degrees, add 15 drops of Tabasco. Then, pour in the vodka SLOWLY so as to leave a neat red line separating the two clear spirits.

Name: Fleet Street
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Flip A Pack
Ingredients: ['3 oz. 151 Proof Rum (Or everclear)', '3 oz. Midori', '2 1/2 oz. Coconut Cream', '11 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend with ice until thick like a slurpee. Pour into a highball glass and serve with a squirt of whipped cream.

Name: Flirt Club
Ingredients: ['5 part(s) Tequila', '5 part(s) Tonic Water', '6 piece(s) Lime', '3 tsp. Brown Sugar', '6 leaf(leaves) Basil']
Making:
Prepare the Club FLIRT directly in tall tumbler. Put in the lime cubes and two tablespoons of brown sugar. Crush the lime and sugar well. Add the basil leaves and press gently so as not to become bitter. Now add brown sugar and fill the glass to the rim with broken ice. Add Tequila and tonic water. Stir Flirt club bringing up the basil and lime, garnish with sa prig of basil and a slice of lime on the rim of the glass.
OPTIONS
For a softer taste you can use the Tequila Reposada. For effect garnish, wetting the entire rim of the glass with a slice of lime and then pass in the sugar cane.
CURIOSITY
The FLIRT club is a cocktail drink fresh and light, can be drunk safely during the day and is great both as a pre-dinner and as a post dinner. Was created by Gennaro Scolastico for the first and only swingers club and naturist village in Italy for couples and single ladies only: just the FLIRT swingers club in Rome, which was officially presented on 25/09/2010.

Name: Flirting With The Sandpiper
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Name: Flirtini #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Champagne', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with two olives (optional).

Name: Floating Rose
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Rose', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour Tequilla Rose over ice and add sprite.

Name: Flor de Cana Firecracker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Flor de Cana 7 Year Old Rum', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '3 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters', '1 dash(es) Lucid Absinthe Superieure', 'Grapes']
Making:
Salt rim of small rocks glass. Add Flor de Cana, simple syrup, Peychaud Bitters, and Lucid to shaker with ice. Strain into coup style glass. Garnish with red grapes.
Created by: Duane Fernandez Jr., New York City

Name: Flor de Cana Peanut Butter and Jelly
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Flor de Cana 7 Year Old Rum', '1/2 oz. Lustau Almacenista Palo Cortado (Vides)', '1/4 oz. Strawberry Jam', '1/4 oz. Peanut Butter', '1 Egg White']
Making:
Shake all ingredients in a shaker without ice, then add ice and shake vigorously again. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass that is rimmed with minced salted-peanuts. Garnish with a banana slice.
November is Peanut Butter Lover's Month
What do President Bill Clinton, Billy Joel, and Bill Cosby have in common? Aside from sharing the same first name, they're all members of the Peanut Butter Lovers' Fan Club! And since it is November, they're celebrating Peanut Butter Lover's Month with peanut butter fans around the world. But instead of your normal Peanut Butter and Jelly/Banana/Fluff sandwich, let's mix these legumes up with our favorite spirits and create some awesome Peanut Butter cocktails! Even the arachibutyrophobics, afraid of getting peanut butter stuck to the roof of their mouths, can enjoy these drinks without fear.

Name: Floradora
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '1/2 oz. Raspberry Syrup', '3 oz. Ginger Ale', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Build ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and fresh raspberries.

Name: Floradora Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tbsp. Grenadine', '2 oz. Club Soda', '2 oz. Gin']
Making: Stir first four ingredients in a collins glass filled with ice. Add gin and fill with Club Soda and stir.

Name: Florida
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 tsp. Kirsch', '1 1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Florida Buffalo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1 oz. Orange Curacao', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass with ice. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Florida Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '2 dash(es) Green Creme de Menthe', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with mint leaves.

Name: Florida Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake vigorously with shaved ice. Pour contents into large cocktail glass. Garnish with a citrus wheel and a maraschino cherry.

Name: Florida Freeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1 1/4 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend with 6 oz. of ice until the mixture is slushy.

Name: Florida Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '4 part(s) Iced Tea']
Making: Mix one part Absolut Mandrin with 4 parts iced tea in a cocktail glass filled with ice.

Name: Florida Punch #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice. Strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Florida Sunshine
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 oz. DeKuyper Peachtree Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a tall cocktail glass with ice. Pour in Absolut Citron Vodka and Peachtree Schnapps. Mix with equal parts of Orange and Cranberry Juices. ENJOY !!

Name: Floridita Daiquiri No. 3 (aka Hemingway Daiquiri)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Flor de Cana Extra Dry 4 Year Old White Rum']
Making:
Shake with ice, and strain into a chilled 5 1/2 oz. coupe. Garnish with a cherry. The Hemingway Daiquiri is on the menu at PKNY in New York City, the ultimate Tiki Bar.
Daiquiri Facts/Tips:
A Daiquiri is one of the most classic, delicious cocktails of all time
It’s important to stay true to the core ingredients when creating this
Choosing a high quality rum is the first step as mixability is key
Dryer rums, like the Nicaraguan Flor de Cana 4 Year Extra Lite, really compliment the desired flavor profile of a perfect daiquiri
Daiquiri History:
Originally created by the La Floridita Bar in Havana, the daiquiri may have been made to suit the specific tastes of Ernest Hemingway, who frequented this bar. He is rumored to have said that if he really wanted to tie one on, he would order several double servings of this drink, hence the name "Papa Doble."
Although there are many variations of this drink, La Floridita’s classic ingredients make it exceptional - fresh lime and grapefruit juice, maraschino liqueur, and quality rum. The dryness of the Flor de Cana 4 year Extra Lite rum compliments the sweetness of the other ingredients.

Name: Floridita Special
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '4 dash(es) Grapefruit Juice', '1/6 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Blend at high speed in a blender with 3/4 cup of ice until smooth. Pour into wine goblet and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Flowerery Screw
Ingredients: ['1 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1 oz. Tequila Rose', '1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Mix and enjoy.

Name: Floyd Collins
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 1/2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Shake vodka, Malibu and sweet and sour. Pour over ice into a cocktail glass and mix in soda. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry. Jeff says: Essentially this is a vodka collins with a shot of Malibu. Trivia: The "Floyd" part of the name comes from a famous caver.

Name: Fluffy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Light Rum (Optional)', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix and serve over ice.

Name: Fluffy Duck
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Gin', '1/3 oz. Advocaat', '1/6 oz. Cointreau', '1/6 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)', 'Soda Water']
Making: Build into a collins glass filled with ice and stir in soda water .

Name: Flunk Day Rum And Coke
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Coca Cola', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix over ice.

Name: Fluttering Heart
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Champagne', '1 oz. Pallini Raspicello']
Making: Fill a champagne flute with champagne and top with Pallini Raspicello.

Name: Flyer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tomato Juice', '1/2 oz. Passion Fruit Juice', '2 oz. Kahlua', '3 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Vinegar (wine)', '6 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Molasses (german)']
Making: Combine ingredients into a wine glass and rim with margarita salt. Enjoy!

Name: Flying Bull
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix the rums and the Red Bull in a large glass, then top up with the orange juice.

Name: Flying Cow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 Banana', 'Cream (To taste)']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Flying Dutchman #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and Triple Sec. Stir well.

Name: Flying Dutchman #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Dutch Curacao', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Swirl the Curacao in a glass and pour out. Pour in the gin and Bitters.

Name: Flying F**k
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sambuca', "1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Flying Fortress
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Absinthe', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass.

Name: Flying Grapefruit
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1/2 oz. Martini and Rossi Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 Lemon Juice', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Prepare a highball glass with sugar frosting. Stir in all the ingredients, except the grapefruit juice and the Martini and Rossi, in this glass over plenty of ice till smooth. Fill with grapefruit juice. Add the Martini and Rossi. Enjoy!

Name: Flying Grasshopper
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '3/4 oz. Vodka']
Making: Stir and strain into a cordial glass.

Name: Flying Purple Squirrel
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum (Or to taste)', '1 oz. Coconut Rum (Or to taste)', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Freshly squeezed)', '1 oz. Club Soda (Or to taste)']
Making: Mix everything but Club Soda and shake well in a tumbler. Add the Club Soda and pour over ice in cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime with an Almond embedded in it.

Name: Flying Scotchman
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1/4 tsp. Sugar Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Flying Scotsman
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1/4 tsp. Sugar Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Flying Tiger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Grenadine', '5 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix all in a pitcher with ice and serve. Or mix all but orange juice in a pitcher and refrigerate. Then let guests add their own orange juice to taste.

Name: Fog Cutter
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '3 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 tsp. Orgeat Syrup']
Making: Shake all ingredients and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Top with a Tsp. of sweet sherry and serve.

Name: Fog Horn
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with Ginger Ale. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Foghorn
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', 'Ginger Ale', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Pour over ice cubes in a highball glass, and put the squeezed lime in the glass as a garnish. Stir.

Name: Fondling Fool
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Madeira', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Fontainbleau Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Anisette', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Footloose
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 tsp. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '2 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice, strain and serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime.

Name: Force 12
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum (Preferably Navy Lamb)', '1 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake well with ice and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with fruit slices/cherry. A Royal Canadian Navy drink: My personal favorite during my service. Never had any complaints when making it or ordering it for others. WARNING! This thing really hits hard! Enjoy! Marc.

Name: Forest Glen
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bourbon Whiskey', '1 part(s) Vermouth', '1 part(s) Coca Cola', '1 dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix bourbon and vermouth in a cocktail glass full of ice. Add cola and stir gently. Add a splash of lemon.

Name: Fort Lauderdale
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Vermouth', '1/4 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1/4 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

Name: Fosacci
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients together in a shaker and serve in a highball glass.

Name: Founding Father
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jefferson's Reserve", '3/4 oz. Pallini Peachcello', '1/2 oz. Lemon', '4 oz. Ginger Ale', '5 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Combine the bourbon, Peachcello, lemon juice and bitters in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Top with ginger ale.

Name: Four Wheeler
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend all ingredients in blender with a scoop of crushed ice.

Name: Four Zeroes
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '2 oz. Malibu Rum', '12 oz. Cola (RC)']
Making:
Mix in a cocktail glass over ice.
When playing UNO if all 4 Zeroes in the deck are layed down in succession everyone must immediately get drunk!! This is the drink of choice - the Four Zeroes Special. Great anytime anywhere... Enjoy!

Name: Fourth Of July Tooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Layer carefully in order of recipe so that each floats on the preceding without mixing.

Name: Fox and Hounds
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Fox River Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 tbsp. Brown Creme de Cacao', '4 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Fox Trot
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', 'dash(es) Curacao', '1/3 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with crushed or shave ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Foxy Lady
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Fragoli Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['3 1/2 oz. Toschi Fragoli Liqueur', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a fresh strawberry.

Name: Fragoli Frag-Up
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Toschi Fragoli Liqueur', '3 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Serve in a tall glass with a fresh strawberry garnish.

Name: Fragoli Frallini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Toschi Fragoli Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Champagne']
Making: Serve in a chilled champagne glass.

Name: Fragoli Margarita
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Toschi Fragoli Liqueur', '1 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Line the rim of a cocktail glass with lime juice and dip in salt. Shake all the ingredients with ice and strain into the cocktail glass.

Name: Fragoli Passion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Toschi Fragoli Liqueur', '4 oz. Passionne Di Fiore Prosecco']
Making: Mix in a champagne flute.

Name: Fragoli Red Russian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Toschi Fragoli Liqueur', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a rocks glass. Swirl 1 oz. of Fragoli.

Name: Fragoli Strawberries and Cream
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Toschi Fragoli Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain in a champagne glass.

Name: Fragolie Free
Ingredients: ['1 1/5 oz. Toschi Fragoli Liqueur', '1 1/5 oz. Gin', '1 1/5 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 4/5 oz. Sparkling Wine (Brut Spumante)', '3/5 oz. Bitters']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with Brut Spumante.

Name: Frainbreeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Ice 101', '3 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '6 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix it all in a blender and enjoy a cool summer treat. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Fraises Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 tsp. Sugar Syrup', 'Soda Water']
Making: Shake all except soda with ice and strain into a highball glass. Pour in soda and stir. Garnish with a lemon peel and a strawberry.

Name: Fran's Passion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Alize Wild Passion', '1/2 oz. Bacardi O', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Served over ice in a rock glass. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: France Meets Mexico
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chartreuse', '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix both in a rocks glass and drink fast. This is quite painful to drink.

Name: Frangelico and Chocolate
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Frangelico', '6 oz. Hot Chocolate']
Making: Mix in a beer mug.

Name: Frankenjack Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 tsp. Triple Sec']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Frankie's Figg
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 splash(es) Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix to in a highball glass.

Name: Franko Ra
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '2/3 oz. Orange Juice', '1/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Frapple
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Firewater', '4 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Mix and enjoy.

Name: Fraser
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Galliano', '2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Mix over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: FrazzleBerry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Raspberry Vodka', 'Ginger Beer', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Add the raspberry vodka to a glass with ice, fill with ginger beer and a splash of lime juice.

Name: Fred Fuddpucker
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Galliano']
Making: Pour the tequila in a highball glass, fill with orange juice and top off with galliano.

Name: Freddy Fudpucker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Galliano']
Making: Pour the tequila and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Pouring slowly and carefully over the back of a tsp., float the Galliano on top of the drink.

Name: Freddy Fudpucker Cactus Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Galliano', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour in a Collins glass over ice. Top with orange juice and stir well. Float Galliano.

Name: Freddy Fudpucker II
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix in a highball glass.

Name: Free Silver
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tbsp. Milk', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Name: French 125
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 oz. Brandy', 'Champagne (Chilled)']
Making: Pour brandy and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with chilled champagne and stir lightly. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

Name: French 75
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Champagne (Chilled)', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, sugar, and lemon juice. Shake well. Pour into a collins glass. Top with the champagne. Stir well and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: French 75 #2
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Plymouth Gin', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Simple Syrup', 'Champagne']
Making:
Created around 1925 at Harry's New York Bar in Paris.
Shake Plymouth Gin, lemon juice and simple sugar with ice and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Top with champagne and garnish with a lemon twist. Note: Amount of simple sugar may need to be adjusted depending on dryness of the champagne.

Name: French Connection #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cognac', '3/4 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Build in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: French Connection #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cognac (Preferably Remy Martin VSOP)', '1 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Mix with or without ice and pour into a brandy snifter.

Name: French Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '2/3 oz. Bacardi Rum', 'dash(es) Creme de Cassis', 'Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with mint leaves.

Name: French Fantasy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and stir. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: French Foam
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Kirsch', '1 1/2 oz. Sugar Syrup', '3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '7 oz. Dry Sparkling Wine']
Making: Pour in a highball glass. Float lemon or orange sherbet on top.

Name: French Fry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Also very good as a shooter.

Name: French Green Dragon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cognac', '1 1/2 oz. Green Chartreuse']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: French Lick
Ingredients: ["5 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Build in order over ice in a highball glass.

Name: French Martine
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake and enjoy!!I Tastes like Lipton Iced Tea.

Name: French Orgasm
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Cognac', '1 1/2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Mix in order in a brandy glass. Do not stir.

Name: French Perfume
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Combier Liqueur d'Orange", 'Champagne']
Making: Simply pour ingredients into champagne glass.

Name: French Style Pernod
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Water', '1 oz. Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Prepare a tall glass over ice.

Name: French Summer
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '3 oz. Spring Water']
Making: Pour into a wine glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and lemon.

Name: French Velvet
Ingredients: ['White Wine', '2 oz. Ribena', '1 oz. Gin', 'Sugar']
Making: Fill a wine glass 3/4 full of sweet white wine. Add the Ribena and gin and stir in a little sugar to taste.

Name: Frenchi
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Passion Fruit Juice']
Making: Pour over rocks in a tall glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Frenchman
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Courvoisier Cognac', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a tumbler.

Name: Friday Sign
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 Tangelo', '1/2 Lemon']
Making: Squeeze the juice from the half tangelo and lemon. Shake everything with crushed ice and strained into a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon and tangelo peel tied together.

Name: Friggin J'nette
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '7-Up', 'Grenadine']
Making: Mix Southern Comfort, Jose Quervo, Malibu Rum, blue curacao, peach schnaaps, Amerretto and sweet and sour mix in a tall shaker with ice. Strain into a Chimney Glass over ice. Add a small blast of 7-Up and float the grenadine for color.

Name: Frigid Hairy Virgin
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice and pour in a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Frisco Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Benedictine']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Frisco Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 oz. Benedictine', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a slice of lime.

Name: Frisky Whisky
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Michael Collins Single Malt Irish Whiskey', '1 part(s) Barenjager Honey Liqueur', '1 part(s) Orange Juice', '1/4 part(s) Simple Syrup', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass over ice.

Name: Frisky Witch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass and stir. Garnish with a black licorice stick.

Name: Frog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Frog In A Blender
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '3 oz. Orange Drink', '2 oz. Kool-Aid Berry Blue']
Making: Stir and serve in a highball glass over ice. Decorate with a slice of orange.

Name: Frostbite
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Island Blue Schnapps', 'Sprite Remix', '1 splash(es) Peppermint Schnapps']
Making:
This drink is perfect for a refreshing pick-me-up on a hot day, or can be used at the end of a meal to cover some unfortunate breath.
All ingredients should be chilled. Serve in a Collins or Highball.
Coat the glass with Peppermint Schnapps. There should be a little more than a quarter oz left in the bottom of the glass after the sides are totally coated. With clean fingers, rub a little on the rim. Add the gin and Pucker and mix with your trusty spoon. Fill the glass with Remix.
Like most gin drinks, this is a very refreshing libation. It was born from a search to create a palatable drink that was blue. It is important to note that substituting any of the ingredients (i.e. Sprite Remix for normal Lemon Lime or any other Pucker) will greatly change the flavor. We accidentally changed it the second time we tried to make it and the power of the gin was overwhelming.
This gets a rating of slightly boozy. You can still taste the gin, especially if you pour with a heavy hand, but by adjusting the Pucker up or the booze in general down, you can promote (demote?) the drink to “evil”.

Name: Frosted Apple
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Green Apple Pucker', '6 oz. Squirt']
Making: Mix over ice in a tall frosted glass.

Name: Frosted Mini-Wheat
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '8 oz. Mountain Dew', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour ingredients in order given over ice into a highball glass. Stir gently to mix lemon juice in. Drink is called "Frosted Mini-Wheat" because of the bourbon for the adult in you and the Malibu Rum for the kid in you.

Name: Frostitue
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 1/2 Passion Fruit (pureed)']
Making: Blend alcoholic ingredients in a blender 2/3 full of ice until the mix looks smooth and an eletric blue colour. In a viva la grande glass pour about 45ml passionfruit puree. Tilt glass and spoon out mixture. Stir and enjoy.

Name: Frosty Dawn
Ingredients: ['4 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 oz. Falerno', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in a highball glass.

Name: Frosty Jooga
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Milk', '3 tbsp. Chocolate powder', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '3 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Basically use the milk chocolate powder and ice cream and mix to make a milkshake - Add vanilla schnapp and Kahlua and mix well.

Name: Frosty Lay
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Milk', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with 2 cranberries and a lime. Absolutely Fantastic!!

Name: Frosty Nog
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Eggnog', '2 tbsp. Sugar']
Making: Blend at medium speed and slowly add 3 cups of ice. Blend until smooth and frosty, then serve in a parfait glass. Garnish with almond slivers and nutmeg.

Name: Frosty Noggin
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rum', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '3 oz. Eggnog', '3 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a few drops of green creme de menthe and a rolled cookie.

Name: Froth Blower Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Frothin Monkey Ass
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1 cup(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Light Rum']
Making: Add all ingredients in a blender with 3 cups fo ice and set to high. Immediately pour in separate glasses and serve with straws. For best results drink equal parts of froth and drink with each sip. Born in a downstairs apartment of Billings MT.

Name: Frothy Redhead
Ingredients: ['3 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '8 oz. Club Soda', '8 oz. Red Wine', '1 sprinkle(s) Sugar']
Making: Add in order. Do not shake, soda will mix. Garnish with 2-3 grapes.

Name: Froupe Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 tsp. Benedictine']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Frozen Andes Mint
Ingredients: ['2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe (Light)', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Milk (Or Half and Half)']
Making: Blend until smooth, but a bit thick. Pour in a milkshake or a cocktail glass. Garnish with whipped cream and top off with a dash of creme de menthe (dark) and a cherry. Add 1 or 2 straws.

Name: Frozen Apple
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Applejack', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1/2 Egg White']
Making: Blend all ingredients with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

Name: Frozen B 52
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Cream']
Making: Mix in a blender with ice and serve.

Name: Frozen Berkeley
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 tbsp. Passion Fruit Syrup', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

Name: Frozen Black Irish
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Vodka', '2 scoop(s) Chocolate Ice Cream']
Making: Mix in blender then add ice. Extremly rich but good.

Name: Frozen Brandy and Rum
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg White']
Making: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

Name: Frozen Cappuccino
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Hazelnut Liqueur', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'dash(es) Light Cream']
Making: Blend with 1/2 cup crushed ice until smooth and pour into a parfait glass rimmed with cinnamon sugar. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and an 8 inch straw.

Name: Frozen Citron Neon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

Name: Frozen Daiquiri #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 tbsp. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of crushed ice at low speed for five seconds then at high speed until firm. Pour contents into a champagne flute and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Frozen Daiquiri #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Silver Rum', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'dash(es) Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Frappe in a champagne flute. Garnish with a lemon wedge or an orange slice.

Name: Frozen Domingo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '2 oz. Pina Colada Mix', '2 oz. Orange Juice (Freshly squeezed)', '2 oz. Ocean Spray Juice (Cranberry)']
Making: Put all the ingredients in a blender with a scoop of ice and blend until puree. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Frozen Fuzzy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Blend on low for 5 seconds with equal amount of crushed ice then on high until firm. Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with a slice of lemon or lime.

Name: Frozen Fuzzy Navel
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Orange Juice frozen', '3 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Add Orange Juice, Peach Schnapps and 3 cans of ice in a blender, mix and pour into insulated glasses. (Keeps drink frozen longer.) Garnish with orange slice.

Name: Frozen Margarita #1
Ingredients: ['2 tsp. Salt (Coarse)', '2 oz. Lime Juice', '3 oz. White Tequila', '1 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Rub rim of a collins glass with a lime wedge and dip glass into salt to coat rim thoroughly. Pour tequila, Triple Sec, lime juice and 1 cup of crushed ice into a blender. Blend well at high speed and pour into the collins glass.

Name: Frozen Margarita #2
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Limeade', '4 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Combine ingredients in blender. Blend, adding ice cubes until the drink becomes slushy and holds in peaks. Serves 4.

Name: Frozen Matador
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice']
Making: Blend all ingredients with 1 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with a pineapple stick.

Name: Frozen Mezcal-Avocado
Ingredients: ['1 tbsp. Honey', '1/4 Avocado', '1 oz. Partida Agave Nectar', '3/4 oz. Agwa Coca Leaf Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Scorpion Mezcal Silver']
Making:
Rim a tall glass with The Liquid Chef's Dehydrated Cactus-Lemon Grass Salt. Pour all the ingredients in a blender, add 1 cup of ice and blend. Pour into the glass.
created by Junior Merino, the Liquid Chef

Name: Frozen Mint Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '6 Mint Leaves', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and serve.

Name: Frozen Mudslide
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Absolut Vanilia Vodka', '1 part(s) Starbucks Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Starbucks Cream Liqueur', '1 part(s) Ice Cream Vanilla']
Making: Blend with ice and pour into a martini glass.

Name: Frozen Mudslide #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend all the ingredient. Add small amounts of ice until the drink is slushy. Serve in chilled cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream and Hershey's Chocolate Sauce.

Name: Frozen Mudslide #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '6 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend alcohol with ice cream. Serve in frosted glass.

Name: Frozen Pine
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Canadian Mist', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and serve in a stemmed tulip glass. Garnsih with a cherry.

Name: Frozen Pineapple Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '4 chunk(s) Pineapple', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '1/2 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Combine all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

Name: Frozen Rhubarb Daiquiris
Ingredients: ['6 cup(s) Rhubarb (chopped)', '1/2 cup(s) Water', '1 1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '1 bottle(s) Lemon Lime Soda (2 liter)', '12 oz. Limeade', '1 1/2 cup(s) White Rum']
Making: Combine rhubarb and water and bring to a boil over medium heat. Stir in sugar and heat until sugar is dissolved and rhubarb is soft. Remove from heat and strain. Let the liquid come to room temperature. Combine remaining ingredients, add rhubarb juice, and freeze. Stir occasionally while mixture freezes. To serve, simple spoon frozen daiquiris into glasses and top with a sprig of mint.

Name: Frozen Steppes
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Finlandia Vodka', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Frappe in a parfait glass. Garnish with a goblet of fruit.

Name: Frozen Strawberry Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '4 Strawberries', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Frappe in a champagne glass.

Name: Frozen Strawberry Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Silver', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur']
Making: Fappe in a margarita glass.

Name: Frozen Strawberry Margarita #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila', '3 oz. Margarita Mix Lime', '6 Strawberries', 'Sugar']
Making: Rub the rim of a margarita glass with lime and dip into sugar. Mix all ingredients with 1/2 cup of ice in a blender (except sugar and one strawberry) and blend until smooth. Pour contents into margarita glass with a fresh strawberry for garnish.

Name: Frozen Tequila Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Frappe in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Frozen White Buffalo
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1/4 cup(s) Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1 tsp. Vanilla']
Making: Blend until smooth and garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Fruit and Gingerly
Ingredients: ['2 oz. SKYY Infusions Ginger Vodka', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '3 chunk(s) Pineapple', 'Club Soda']
Making:
Muddle cranberries and pineapple in a cocktail shaker. Add ice and rest of ingredients except soda and shake vigorously. Pour into a Collins glass with fresh ice and top with soda. Garnish with chunk of pineapple and/or three cranberries on a toothpick laid horizontally over rim of the glass.
Created by Adam Wilson of Beretta San Francisco

Name: Fruit Cake
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. DeKuyper Apple Barrel Schnapps', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '7-Up', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Add alcohol to an ice filled tall glass. Fill with 7-up and stir. Sprinkle the grenadine on top.

Name: Fruit Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['4 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Fruit Liqueur (Your choice)', '1 cup(s) Fruit']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice and your choice of fruit and pour into an exotic glass.

Name: Fruit Explosion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Strawberries (Frozen)', '1/4 Banana', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '3 oz. Pina Colada Mix']
Making: Frappe in a highball glass. Garnish with a strawberry and a banana slice.

Name: Fruit Fly
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Midori', '3/4 oz. Apple Pucker', '3/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build in a collins glass over ice. Fill with equal parts of Orange and Pineapple Juices and top with a splash of Cranberry Juice. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Fruit Fusion
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Midori', '1/2 cup(s) Peach Schnapps', '1/4 cup(s) Smirnoff Vodka', '1/4 cup(s) Bacardi Rum', "1/4 cup(s) Gordon's Dry Gin", '1/4 cup(s) Malibu Rum', '6 2/3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix over ice (except the cranberry juice) and strain over crushed ice into 2 highball glasses. Float a dash of cranberry juice in each glass and garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Fruit Knock Out
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Shake with ice (except coke) and strain over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with Coca-Cola and enjoy the fruit punch taste.

Name: Fruit Loop #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Liqueur', '6 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Serve in a highball glass over ice.

Name: Fruit Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '4 oz. Sour Mix', '1 cup(s) Fruit (Your choice)']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice and pour in an exotic glass.

Name: Fruit Milk Shake
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '4 oz. Milk', '1/2 oz. Sugar', '2 drop(s) Vanilla Extract']
Making: Blend with 2 oz. of ice until smooth. Serve in a highball glass and garnish with a straw.

Name: Fruit Punch on Fire
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Pepper Vodka', '1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Tabasco Sauce', 'Grenadine']
Making: Mix well in a tall glass. Add grenadine for colour.

Name: Fruit Salad
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Grape Pucker', '1 oz. Cherry Pucker', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Serve chilled, on the rocks, in a pilsner glass.

Name: Fruit Smoothie
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Orange Juice (Chilled)', '1 Banana (Sliced)', '1/2 cup(s) Raspberries (Or blueberries, strawberries, …)']
Making: Blend at low speed and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with the same type of berries that you chose to make your smoothie.

Name: Fruit Tasanee
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Cointreau', 'Cucumber Wheel', 'Fruit watemelon, tangerine, pomelo, longan etc.', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Combine Mekhong, Cointreau, lime juice, mint, fruits and cucumber in a Collins Glass. Add Ice and cover with a shaker tin. Shake briefly and vigorously. Top of with Ginger Ale. Serve long with a straw.

Name: Fruit Tingle
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1/3 oz. Red Cordial', '1/3 oz. Lemonade', '1 dash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Layer in a tall glass over ice. Add Blue Curacao to form a purple layer on top.

Name: Fruit Tingle #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Cordial', 'Lemonade']
Making: Mix and strain into a highball glass. Top up with the lemonade.

Name: Fruit Tingle #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Raspberry Cordial (Preferably Cottees)', 'Lemonade']
Making: Mix the Curacao and the cordial in a tall glass and fill with lemonade.

Name: Fruit Tingles
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Lemonade', 'Grenadine']
Making: Pour the blue Curacao over ice in a tall glass then add the lemonade and a dash of grenadine.

Name: Fruit Tongue F**k
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 splash(es) Bacardi Peach', '1 splash(es) Bacardi Dark Rum', '1 can(s) Strawberry Kiwi Soda']
Making: Let the strawberry kiwi soda go flat but keep cold. Mix in Limon until you start to taste it. Then add a splash of the Bacardi peach and Bacardi Dark.

Name: Fruitbooty 69
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Rum', '3 oz. Orange Juice', 'Ginger']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Stir well (very important).

Name: Fruitie Tootie Kiss a Cutie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', "3 oz. Honest Tea's Honest Ade Superfruit Punch"]
Making: Mix in a champagne flute and garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Fruitopia
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Everclear', '20 oz. Fruitopia (Kiwi flavour)']
Making: Pour the everclear in the Fruitopia bottle and shake. Drink from the bottle.

Name: Fruitopia Snap
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. DeKuyper Sour Apple', '1/2 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake alcohol with ice and strain over ice cubes into a highball glass. Add the fruit juices and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Fruity F**K
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'dash(es) Creme de Cassis', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with fruit.

Name: Fruity LaPointe Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Ginger Ale', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Stir ingredients in a Hurricanne Glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry.

Name: Fruity Pebble
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Milk', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and serve in a collins glass.

Name: Fruity Pebbles Milk Punch
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Fruity Pebbles Cereal', '1 cup(s) Milk (Whole)', '2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/4 tsp. Vanilla Extract']
Making: Combine Fruity Pebbles and milk in a cereal bowl. Allow to sit for 30 minutes. Strain out milk and discard cereal. In a cocktail shaker, combine the Fruity Pebbles cereal milk, bourbon and vanilla extract with 3 ice cubes, and shake until frothy, about 30 seconds. Strain into a double-old fashioned glass filled with ice. Optional: Garnish with a dollop of whipped cream, a dusting of nutmeg and sprinkle of cereal.

Name: Fruity Russian On A Mountain
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Midori', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3/4 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Served on the rocks, lightly stirred.

Name: Fruity Slut
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Jagermeister', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Fruit Punch']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Fruity Smash
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1/3 cup(s) Cherry Brandy', '1/3 cup(s) Creme de Banane']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with cherries.

Name: Fruity Toad
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'dash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Fudge Slide
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldenbarr Chocolate Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake well in a jigger with ice and serve.

Name: Fudgesickels
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', 'Half and Half Cream (To taste)']
Making: Blend with ice until the mixture has the consistency of a milk shake. Serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Fudgesicle
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', 'Milk']
Making: Combine in a highball and drink with a straw.

Name: Fudgsicle
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 1/2 oz. Kamora', 'Milk']
Making: Pour over ice in a highball glass and fill with milk.

Name: Full Body Massage
Ingredients: ["1/3 part(s) Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1/6 part(s) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/6 part(s) Peach Schnapps']
Making: Pour ingredients into any size glass with plenty of ice. Stir very well. Insert 3 - 4 straws and drink the whole glass as fast as you can. This massages your mind and body.

Name: Full Frontal Nudity
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', 'Grenadine']
Making: Mix over ice in a Hurricane Glass. Stir well. Float grenadine and serve.

Name: Full House
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a 10 oz. glass.

Name: Fungi Daisy
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cabana Cachaca', '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake and strain over fresh rocks in old-fashioned glass with a dried porcini and sea salted rim.

Name: Funky Garlic
Ingredients: ['1/3 cup(s) White Wine', '1/3 cup(s) Coca Cola', '1/3 cup(s) Sprite (You can use 7-Up instead)']
Making: Mix well and serve in a tall glass.

Name: Funky Ho
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '3 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Island Blue Schnapps', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Mix ingredients in a shaker and serve over ice in a 12 oz glass.

Name: Furry Purple Squirrel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Light Rum (Or to taste)', '1 oz. Coconut Rum (Or to taste)', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Freshly squeezed)', '1 oz. Club Soda (Or to taste)', 'dash(es) Coconut Rum']
Making: Mix everything (but the Club Soda and the dash of coconut rum) and shake well in a tumbler. Add the Club Soda and pour over ice in cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime with an Almond embedded in it and pour the dash of coconut rum.

Name: Fuselage
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '10 oz. Snapple (Peach Iced Tea)']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Futurity
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Fuzzy Balls
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1 1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Frappe in a highball glass.

Name: Fuzzy Bear
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', 'Coca Cola', 'Milk']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass over ice. Add kahlua, pour cola and milk at same time until full. Adding the cola and milk at the same time will reduce the head on the cola.

Name: Fuzzy Bollix
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Cider']
Making: Mix over ice and fill with Cider. Enjoy.

Name: Fuzzy Charlie
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Banana Creme Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Coconut Cream', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake rum, banana creme, coconut cream and pineapple juice vigorously with ice. Strain over ice cubes in tall glass. Top with Ginger Ale. Or blend with crushed ice to serve as frozen drink. Garnish with a pineapple spear.

Name: Fuzzy Coconut
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Fuzzy Coconuts in a Banana Hammock
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 part(s) Amaretto', '1 part(s) 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1/2 part(s) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Kinda tastes like banana cough syrup.

Name: Fuzzy Cola
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Stir over ice and enjoy.

Name: Fuzzy Duck
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Brandy']
Making: Serve straight or on the rocks.

Name: Fuzzy Evil
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '6 oz. Orange Juice', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients with crushed ice.

Name: Fuzzy Fruity Brain Blitzer
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '2/3 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '2/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Clear Springs', '6 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Fill a 12 oz. glass 3/4 full with ice. Add the alcohol, top off with 7-up, stir and enjoy.

Name: Fuzzy Leprachaun #1
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '16 oz. Gatorade (Lemon Lime)']
Making: Pour the rum over the Gatorade in a glass.

Name: Fuzzy Melon
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build and shake well. Serve with ice in a tall glass.

Name: Fuzzy Melon Ball
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Fuzzy Monkey
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Milk', '1/3 oz. Banana Liqueur']
Making: Mix together and serve cold.

Name: Fuzzy Moo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', '6 oz. Milk (Whole)']
Making: Build in a highball glass over ice and stir.

Name: Fuzzy Navel
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and stir. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Fuzzy Nutz
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', 'Sunny Delight Orange Juice (Chilled)']
Making: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice.

Name: Fuzzy Peach - TY KU
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Sake', '3 oz. Peach Juice', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a peach slice and an orange slice.

Name: Fuzzy Pineapple
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over fresh ice.

Name: Fuzzy Pissbomb
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour into rocks glass. Stir. Watch it fizz for thirty seconds. Drink fast.

Name: Fuzzy Rita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tbsp. Lime']
Making: Mix the Crown Royal and the peach schnapps, then add the orange juice and the lime. Serve on the rocks or frozen.

Name: Fuzzy Russian
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '5 oz. Orange Juice', '1 slice(s) Kiwi']
Making: Place the vodka in small, chilled glass. Add half of orange juice. Then, add the peach schnapps and pour into larger glass with the rest of the orange juice. Garnish with one slice of kiwi.

Name: Fuzzy Screw
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Fuzzy Screw Up Against A Wall
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Galliano', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with orange juice. Top with Galliano.

Name: Fuzzy Watermelon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '5 oz. Lemonade', 'Grenadine']
Making: Mix vodka, Midori, triple sec, peach, and lemonade in a cocktail shaker and shake with ice. Strain contents into a chilled cocktail glass and put in a dash of grenadine. It will sink to the bottom, creating a layered effect, making it look like a watermelon.

Name: G'Fizz
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1 1/2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. Egg White', '1/2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Put all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and strain into a chilled rocks glass. Sprinkle a little bit of cinnamon powder.

Name: G'igapple
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1 oz. DeKuyper Sour Apple', '1 oz. Lychee Juice', '1/2 oz. Ginger Beer', '1/3 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Put all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and serve in a highball glass. Garnish with a three green apple slice effect.

Name: G'inasmuch
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '2 oz. Tea White Jasmine, cold', '3/4 oz. Creme de Peche Massenez', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Put all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and serve in a high ball glass. Garnish with Oolong Tapioca pearls.

Name: G'indian Summer
Ingredients: ["2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '3/4 oz. Aperol Orange Liqueur', '1 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1 oz. Tea Green, cold', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Put all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and serve in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with orange and lemon wheels.

Name: G'intastic Garden
Ingredients: ['1 Strawberry quartered', '2 Basil leaves', '4 wedge(s) Lime', '1/2 oz. Partida Agave Nectar', "1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1 oz. Grape Juice White']
Making: Muddle the first four ingredients in a shaker. Add G’vine, the White Grape juice, ice, shake and serve in a special cocktail glass or tall glass. Garnish with half a strawberry and a basil sprig.

Name: G'intriguing
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Partida Agave Nectar', '2 slice(s) Cucumber', '5 Cilantro Leaves', '4 wedge(s) Lime', "1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Muddle the first four ingredients in a shaker. Add G’vine, Tonic, ice, shake and serve in high ball glass. Garnish with cucumber tier.

Name: G'inyard
Ingredients: ['5 Grapes Green, ugni blanc if available', '2 Basil Leaves', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Martini and Rossi Bianco', "1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin"]
Making: Muddle the first four ingredients, add G’vine, Vermouth, ice, shake, and strain through a fine mesh strainer into a martini glass. Garnish with an edible flower.

Name: G'man
Ingredients: ["2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Put all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and serve in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a mint sprig and a lemon twist.

Name: G'Spot
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Put all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and a lemon twist.

Name: G'Spring
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '3 1/2 oz. Tonic Water', '3 Grapes Cut in halves']
Making: Put the grapes, G’vine, tonic water in a high ball with ice and stir a few times. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: G'time
Ingredients: ['3 Basil Leaves', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '3 oz. Grape Juice White']
Making: Muddle the basil leaves, add ice and the other ingredients, shake gently and serve in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with half a moon of lemon.

Name: G'tini
Ingredients: ['Dry Vermouth', "2 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin"]
Making: Rinse the glass with dry vermouth. Put G’Vine in a shaker, add ice, shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with olive and a mist of vermouth.

Name: G'Vine Cosmo
Ingredients: ["2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Put all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and an orange twist.

Name: G'Vine Frostbite
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1 scoop(s) Pepper (Lemon Pepper Zest)', '1 1/2 oz. Averna Lemoncello']
Making:
Build in a highball glass over ice. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Developed by NYC Mixologist Dalio Calada

Name: G'vinity
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1/2 oz. Partida Agave Nectar', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice Blood Orange', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Champagne Brut', '5 Tarragon Leaves']
Making: Put the Champagne in the martini glass. Put the rest of the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and serve in the martini glass with the Champagne. Garnish with a skewered Blueberry, Raspberry, Gooseberry and a tarragon sprig.

Name: Gaawanger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass and fill the rest of the glass with equal parts pineapple juice and ginger ale.

Name: Gabe's Puckerita On The Rocks
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. DeKuyper Sour Apple', '3 oz. Margarita Mix']
Making: Pour over ice and add a splash of ice water. Stir until well blended and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Gables Collins
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Creme de Noyeaux', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tbsp. Pineapple Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with Club Soda and garnish with a slice of lemon and a pineapple chunk.

Name: Gaelic Coffee
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Irish Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Milk', '1 tsp. Instant Coffee']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into an Irish coffee mug. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with green creme de menthe for color.

Name: Gagliardo
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Rose Water']
Making: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass. This is a home cocktail of American/Internet Bar del Pozzo, Pavia, Italy.

Name: Gail's Summer Storm
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Iced Tea', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Mix in a tall glass over ice, stir and enjoy.

Name: Gail's Winter Storm
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Coffee', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Mix in a tall glass over ice, stir and enjoy.

Name: Galliano
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Water (Distilled)', '1 cup(s) White Corn Syrup', '1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '3 drop(s) Food Colouring (Yellow)', '1 1/2 cup(s) Grain Alcohol (PGA) (188 Proof)', '6 drop(s) Anise Extract', '2 tsp. Vanilla Extract']
Making: Boil water, corn syrup and sugar for 5 minutes. Add the remaining ingredients and stir. Cover and let stand 1 month.

Name: Galway Grass
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Knockeen Hills Irish Poteen - Farmers Strength', '1 oz. Midori', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour in a 10 oz. glass over ice and fill with the Orange Juice.

Name: Gandy Dancer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Yukon Jack', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass.

Name: Gareth Glowworm
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Heavy Cream', '1 tsp. Cherry Brandy']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, creme de cacao, and heavy cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the a cherry brandy into the centre of the drink.

Name: Garnet Grit Betty Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Smirnoff Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '2 oz. 7-Up', '2 splash(es) Grenadine']
