Making: Shake with ice and strain into a pounder glass with crushed ice.

Name: Garnets Amore
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Ginger Ale', '5 oz. Cranapple Juice']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice in a highball glass and stir. (Ice appears as sparkling gemstones of garnet.) Great drink at Christmas parties.

Name: Gas & Coke
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Pour over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Gasoline #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Gaston
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Gin', "2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '3 oz. Lemon Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with 7-Up.

Name: Gatekeeper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Tequila Gold']
Making: Can be poured in layers. Over ice or neat. Can also be blended. If blended, chill glass and squeeze chocolate syrup around the inside of the glass. Pour from the blender then top with whipped cream and a cherry. Forspecial effects add chocolate sprinkles.

Name: Gates Of Hell
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Cherry Brandy']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the tequila, lemon juice, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice. Drizzle the a cherry brandy over the top.

Name: Gator Booger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gatorade', '1 oz. Five Alive', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix in a tall glass with ice (or a frosted mug) and garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Gator Tails
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Gatorade Fruit Punch', '1 part(s) Vodka or Rum']
Making: Mix equal parts - Fruit Punch Gatorade and Vodka (or Rum). Stir and serve over crushed ice. Easy summertime drink.

Name: Gauguin
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Passion Fruit Syrup', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients in blender with 1/2 cup of crushed ice. Blend for 15 seconds, pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Gay Hamptons
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mount Gay Barbados Rum', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add rum and then fill the glass with tonic. Top with a lime.

Name: Gayhound
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Pink Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Regular grapefruit juice and vodka is a 'Grayhound', PINK grapefruit juice and vodka is a 'Gayhound'.

Name: Geien Ma (Geissen Mass)
Ingredients: ['1/2 bottle(s) Beer (Dark German)', '1/2 bottle(s) Cola', '1 oz. Kirsch', '1 oz. Cognac']
Making: Mix beer and cola in a litre glass (in Germany called a Ma (Mass)) and add the shots of Kirsch and Cognac. Most people find it difficult to chug a litre so it's probably better off as a cocktail.

Name: Gene Splice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Genoa
Ingredients: ['2 tsp. Sambuca', '2 tsp. Martini and Rossi Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Grappa']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Genome Project
Ingredients: ['6 oz. DNA Alcoholic Spring Water', '1/2 oz. Dry Gin', '1 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Pour DNA Alcoholic Spring Water, Dry Gin, Skyy Vodka and Lime Juice in a cocktail glass over ice. Stir.

Name: Gent Of The Jury
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 tsp. Dry Vermouth']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with 3 cocktail onions.

Name: Gentle Ben
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Tequila', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake pour into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with orange juice and stir. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Gentleman's Club
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well.

Name: Gentleman's Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', 'Club Soda']
Making: Stir over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Georges Cousin
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', 'Orange Soda (Jolt Orgasmic Orange Soda)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour rum in a glass of orange soda. Spray whipped cream on top and enjoy Georges Cousin.

Name: Georgia Mint Julep
Ingredients: ['Mint Leaves (Crushed)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 splash(es) Water', '1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Peach Brandy']
Making: Build in a collins glass and garnish with mint leaves.

Name: Georgia Peach #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour first 3 ingredients into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill with lemonade.

Name: Georgia Peach #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', 'Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Cranberry Juice (For colour)']
Making: Mix the ingredients with ice in a 16 oz. pint glass. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of orange.

Name: Georgia Peach #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Peach Pucker', 'Sprite']
Making: Mix in a lowball glass.

Name: Georgia Peach #5
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Cream', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Combine in a collins glass filled with ice in the order given above. Stir.

Name: Georgia Punch
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a pounder glass with ice. Pour in Malibu Rum and Peach Schnapps. Fill with equal amounts of orange juice and cranberry juice. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Georgian Sunrise
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '3 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Combine and blend all four ingredients and serve in a highball glass with a lime garnish.

Name: Georgio
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 Banana', '1/2 cup(s) Light Cream']
Making: Frappe in a parfait glasses and garnish with mint leaves, whipped cream and a light dusting of cocoa.

Name: Gerbil
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Sprite', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a lowball glass.

Name: Gerbil #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Sprite', '2 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix and stir with ice in a lowball glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Get Laid #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with pineapple juice. Top with cranberry juice.

Name: Get This Shit Goin'
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Gatorade (Lemon/Lime)', '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Pour over ice into a tall glass, stir and serve. Don't let the taste fool ya!

Name: Ghetto Anger
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Alize Gold Passion', '1 part(s) Alize Red Passion', '1 part(s) Absolut Vodka']
Making: Mix in a glass and stir. Then tip the glass over as to spill out a small amount for the Ghettos!

Name: Ghetto Blaster #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass. Serve with a lemon wedge.

Name: Ghetto White Russian
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Vodka McCormick's", '6 oz. Skimmed Milk']
Making: Make when you run out of Kahlua and still want White Russians.

Name: Ghost
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Smirnoff Vanilla Twist', '1/4 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Combine ingredients and serve in a martini glass. Garnish with Shaved White Chocolate and a White Chocolate Rim.

Name: Ghostbuster #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Giant Peach
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. 4 Copas Blanco', '3/4 oz. Citron Liqueur', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. 4 Copas Organic Agave Nectar', '1/4 oz. Peach Organic']
Making: In a mixing glass muddle Peach in lime juice and Agave Nectar, add tequila, ice and pour into an attractive glass. Garnish with peach slices.

Name: Gibbs
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Mad Melon Watermelon Schnapps', '1 can(s) Sprite']
Making: Mix in a tall glass and stir well.

Name: Gibson
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin (Or vodka)', '4 dash(es) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir well with ice cubes and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with cocktail onions.

Name: Gildemiester Sludge
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Hershey's Chocolate Syrup", '4 oz. Milk', '4 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', "10 oz. Chi Chi's Caribbean Mudslide Mix"]
Making: Mix ingredients well and serve chilled in a tall glass.

Name: Gilligan's Revenge
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Ginger Ale', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour vodka over ice in a tall glass. Fill with ginger ale and swirl in grenadine. .Kick back in front of the TV and watch those re-runs of 'Gilligan's Island'…

Name: Gilltobelli
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1/2 oz. Margarita Mix', '7-Up']
Making: Fill a chimmney glass with ice. Pour in Stoli, Margarita Mix and top with 7-Up. Stir.

Name: Gilroy Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Gimlet #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Gimlet #2
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin (Or vodka)', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Gimto
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Black Currant Cordial (Preferably Vimto Cordial)', 'Lemonade']
Making: Mix in a chilled lowball glass. Stir well. Simple but extremely nice!

Name: Gin Alexander
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Gin Aloha
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Pineapple Juice (Unsweetened)', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Gin and Bitter Lemon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '4 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the tonic water.

Name: Gin and Bitters
Ingredients: ['1/2 tsp. Bitters', 'Gin']
Making: Put Bitters into cocktail glass and revolve the glass until it is entirely coated. Fill with gin.

Name: Gin and Fresca
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Fresca']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Gin and Grape Juice
Ingredients: ['Gin', 'Grape Juice']
Making: Fill your blender a third full with gin then almost to the top with grape juice. Finish filling with ice and blend. Pour into a glass and serve.

Name: Gin and It #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Stir gin and vermouth in a cocktail glass. (No ice is used in this drink.)

Name: Gin and It #2
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Gin and Pink
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '5 oz. Tonic Water', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: In a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, tonic, and Bitters. Stir well and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Gin and Sin
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Gin and Tonic
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '5 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Pour the gin and the tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Gin Berry Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Beefeater Dry Gin', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Raspberry Schnapps', '1 part(s) Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Combine in a shaker with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Gin Buck
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour gin and juice of lemon into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Fill with Ginger Ale, stir, and serve.

Name: Gin Cassis
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '3 oz. Creme de Cassis']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Gin Cobbler
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '3 oz. Club Soda', '2 oz. Gin']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the Club Soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the gin. Stir well. Garnish with a cherry, an orange slice and a lemon slice.

Name: Gin Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir gin and Bitters with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Gin Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and add gin. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with a lemon peel and an orange spiral so that the end of the orange spiral dangles over rim of glass.

Name: Gin Crusta
Ingredients: ['5 oz. London Dry Gin', '30 drop(s) Gomme Syrup', '10 drop(s) Angostura Bitters', '10 drop(s) Blue Curacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled glass rimmed with lemon juice and sugar. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel so it dangles over the rim of the glass.

Name: Gin Daisy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the wine, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Gin Dog
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 bottle(s) Hoopers Hooch']
Making: Pour over ice in a pint glass.

Name: Gin Drink
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin', '1 cup(s) Crystal Light (Lemon Lime)', '1 cup(s) Tonic Water']
Making: Mix with ice in a large glass.

Name: Gin Fix
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Water', '2 oz. Gin']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the gin. Stir well and garnish with a cherry and a lemon slice.

Name: Gin Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with Club Soda..

Name: Gin Flurrie
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', "2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Blend Tanqueray Gin, Rose's Lime Juice and 15 ice cubes until it is slurry and pour into a cocktail glass. Named in honor of a famous 1992 Guam bartender who was fun to be with, but always left you with a headache.

Name: Gin Genie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Plymouth Gin', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. Plymouth Sloe Gin', '1/3 oz. Gomme Syrup', '8 Mint Leaves']
Making:
Place a little crushed ice in a highball glass and add the mint and syrup de gomme. Muddle ingredients together and fill the glass with more crushed ice (not quite full). Add the Plymouth Gin and lemon juice (freshly squeezed). Stir and fill glass full with more crushed ice. Float the Plymouth Sloe Gin and garnish with a mint sprig and a blackberry.
Origin: This drink won the Drinks International Cocktail Challenge 2001 and was created by mixologist Wayne Collins

Name: Gin Highball #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Pour gin into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel, stir, and serve.

Name: Gin Highball #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', 'Soda Water']
Making: Pour gin over ice into a highball glass and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with a slice of lime and add lime juice until drink is slightly cloudy. Stir, and serve.

Name: Gin Lime Rickey
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', 'Tonic Water', "1 splash(es) Lime Juice (Preferably Rose's)", '2 wedge(s) Lime']
Making: Mix the gin and tonic in a highball glass over ice and pour the lime juice. Drop the lime wedges in a the glass and serve.

Name: Gin Milk Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 cup(s) Milk', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Nutmeg']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Name: Gin n Juice
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Plymouth Gin', '3/4 oz. Sparkling Water', '1 3/4 oz. Pink Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Fill glass with ice, pour in the Plymouth Gin, add the pink grapefruit juice and top with sparkling water. Stir and garnish with a grapefruit zest.

Name: Gin Rickey
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with carbonated water. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Gin Sangaree
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Port', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Water', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Dissolve powdered sugar in water and add gin. Pour into a highball glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Float port on top, sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, and serve.

Name: Gin Sling
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Water']
Making: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add gin. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Garnish with a twist of orange peel and serve.

Name: Gin Smash
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Carbonated Water', '1 Sugar Cube', '4 sprig(s) Mint']
Making: Muddle sugar with carbonated water and mint sprigs in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and 1 ice cube. Stir, garnish with an orange slice and a cherry and serve.

Name: Gin Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Gin Squirt
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1 tbsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Stir gin, grenadine, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with pineapple chunks and strawberries.

Name: Gin Strawberry Crush
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1 1/4 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Prepare strawberries in a highball glass. Add crushed ice and Tanqueray London Dry. Top with lemon-lime soda.

Name: Gin Swizzle
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '2 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) Bitters', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the lime juice, sugar, gin, and Bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with ice cubes. Stir until the glass is frosted. Strain the mixture in the shaker into the glass and add the Club Soda.

Name: Gin Thing
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with Ginger Ale.

Name: Gin Toddy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 tsp. Water', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Mix powdered sugar and water in an old-fashioned glass. Add gin and one ice cube. Stir, garnish with the twist of a lemon peel, and serve.

Name: Gin Twist
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Gin', '4 oz. Pepsi Twist']
Making: Mix with ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Gin-and-Chile-Infused Grapefruit
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Grapefruit Juice freshly squeezed', '1/4 Serrano Chile', '3 oz. Plymouth Gin', '2 oz. Sugar', 'Grenadine']
Making:
A spiced-up version of a greyhound cocktail (gin and grapefruit juice, classically); Freeman nicknames this frozen drink the "Hot Dog." As your mouth turns cold, you're bombarded with that most elusive of taste sensations: citrusy icy-hotness.
Combine all ingredients in a bowl, and let rest in the refrigerator for half an hour. Remove chile, add liquid to molds, and freeze. Serves about 10.
created by: Eben Freeman, mixologist at Tailor in NYC

Name: Gin-Cassis Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '4 oz. Club Soda', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the Club Soda. Stir well. Drop the cassis into the centre of the drink.

Name: Ginger and Bloody Mary Ann
Ingredients: ['2 oz. SKYY Infusions Ginger Vodka', '4 oz. Tomato Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Capers', '1 tbsp. Bacon Bits', '2 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce']
Making:
Combine all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice. Garnish with pickled green bean.
Created by Adam Wilson of Beretta San Francisco

Name: Ginger Colada
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Ginger Brandy', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Blend with 12 oz. of crushed ice until the mixture is slushy.

Name: Ginger Goddess
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. SKYY Infusions Ginger Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kiwi Juice', '3 slice(s) Pear (Anjou)', 'Champagne']
Making:
Muddle kiwi and pear in a cocktail shaker. Add SKYY Infusions Ginger with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a champagne flute and top with Champagne or Sparkling Wine. Garnish with a slice of kiwi.
Created by Alex Straus of Suite 700 at the Hotel Shangri-La in Los Angeles

Name: Ginger Jack
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Whiskey', '2/3 oz. Monin Gingerbread Syrup', '2/3 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Pour into an old-fashioned glass and decorate with apple slices.

Name: Ginger Lime
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Alchemy Ginger Infusion Vodka', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice Freshly Squeezed']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass over ice.

Name: Ginger Lime Long-Tail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Ginger Ale', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '3 Lime Wheels']
Making: Pour Mekhong and lime juice into a Collins Glass. Add Ice and lime wheels. Cover with a shaker tin and shake briefly. Top off with ginger beer or ginger ale and add bitters. Serve with a straw. Based on the Moscow Mule

Name: Ginger Mint
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Alchemy Ginger Infusion Vodka', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass, top with ginger ale and garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Ginger Phips
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour in a highball glass over ice. Fill with your favourite ginger ale.

Name: Ginger Snap
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Ginger Brandy', '4 oz. Eggnog', '1 Candy (Ginger Snap)']
Making: Whirl ingredients in blender. If desired, garnish with additional ginger snap for dunking.

Name: Ginger Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. SKYY Infusions Ginger Vodka', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Egg White', '1/2 oz. Maple Syrup']
Making:
Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with twist of lemon.
Created by Adam Wilson of Beretta San Francisco

Name: Ginger Spritz
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Alchemy Ginger Infusion Vodka', 'Sparkling Wine']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass, top with sparkling wine and garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Ginger Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 oz. Ginger Ale', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Add Gin, Pineapple Juice and Ginger Ale over ice in a cocktail glass. Add Grenadine. Do not stir. Enjoy.

Name: Ginger Tom
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Ginger Syrup', '1 dash(es) Gomme Syrup', '3/4 oz. Sparkling Water', '1 1/2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Fill glass with ice. Add the Plymouth Gin and lime juice (freshly squeezed). Add the ginger cordial and syrup de gomme. Top with sparkling water. Stir and garnish with lime wedge and mint sprig.

Name: Ginger Vodka Caipirniha
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Alchemy Ginger Infusion Vodka', '1 tsp. Brown Sugar', '3 piece(s) Lime', 'Soda Water']
Making: Muddle Alchemy Ginger Infused Vodka, brown sugar and lime. Pour into a cocktail glass over ice. Top with soda water.

Name: Ginger Whiskey
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '6 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Combine over ice into a highball glass.

Name: Ginger-Chile Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Reposado Tequila', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '5 sprig(s) Mint', '1/2 oz. Ginger-Habanero Syrup', 'Ginger Ale', '1 slice(s) Pomegranate(s)']
Making: Muddle mint and lime and pour into highball glass filled with ice. Add ginger-habanero syrup and tequila. Stir gently and top with ginger ale. Garnish with a slice of pomegranate.

Name: Gingerbread Apple Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '2 1/2 oz. Apple Cider', '3 drop(s) Lemon Juice', 'Partida Agave Nectar']
Making: Line a chilled martini glass lightly with agave syrup on a dish followed by spiced graham cracker crumbs. Place all ingredients except for orange zest in a shaker and shake vigorously. Strain into glass. Freshly grate orange zest on drink and serve immediately.

Name: Gingerbread Caraib
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Rum', '2/3 oz. Monin Gingerbread Syrup']
Making: Pour into an old-fashioned glass and squeeze a lime slice and drop it in the glass. Serve with a chilled water glass.

Name: Gingerbread Cognac
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Cognac', '2/3 oz. Monin Gingerbread Syrup', '1 drop(s) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Pour into an old fashioned glass and fill with ice.

Name: Gingerbread Man #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Layer in sequence in a shot glass.

Name: Gingerbread Mojito
Ingredients: ['4 Lime Slices', '4 Mint Leaves', '1 oz. Monin Gingerbread Syrup', '1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Soda']
Making: Pour into a tumbler glass, stir and add crushed ice.

Name: Gingergrass Mule
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cabana Cachaca', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Ginger Beer']
Making: Shake and strain over fresh ice into rocks glass. Top up with homemade Lemongrass/Ginger Beer

Name: Ginlade
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Gin', '6 oz. Pink Lemonade']
Making: Serve on the rocks or chilled.

Name: Ginspiration
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', 'Squirt']
Making: Pour one shot of gin into a lowball glass (or whatever is handy), then fill with sprite. Comment: This drink is super easy to make and really masks the taste of gin for those who don't really like the flavour of it. For an extra bang, add a splash of flavoured wine cooler (strawberry or watermelon is great).

Name: Ginza Strip
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sake', '2 dash(es) Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Gipsy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Benedictine', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Girl Lemonade
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Coconut Rum', '3 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Blend and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Girl Scout Cookie #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Girl Scout Cookie #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Fill a blender 3/4 full with ice and add alcohol. Blend until smooth and pour into a tall glass. Serve with a straw.

Name: Girl Scout Cookie #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Glacier
Ingredients: ['3 1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Lift', 'Lemon Juice', 'Coconut (Desiccated)']
Making: Dip the rim of a cocktail glass in lemon juice and then in desiccated coconut. Then fill the glass two thirds with ice (roughly crushed). Pour in vodka, Southern Comfort and blue curacao followed by Lift (just enough to fill the glass). Do not stir drink because it will lose its spectrum of blue to lime to yellow.

Name: Glacier Bay Lemonade
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '3 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '6 oz. Sprite']
Making: Shake Absolut Citron Vodka and sour mix. Pour over ice in a cocktail glass. Stir in cranberry juice then top with Sprite.

Name: Glacier Headrush
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Brandy (Preferably a premium)', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Milk (Or half and half - to taste)']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and serve in a highball glass. Note from Michael: I like mine with a little more Godiva for more of a chocolate taste.

Name: Glacier Mint
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Finlandia Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Stir in a sugar rimmed highball glass. Garnish with mint leaves.

Name: Glacier Mist
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. 7-Up', '2 oz. Soda Water', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Build into a cocktail glass over ice.

Name: Glad Eye
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pastis', '1/2 Peppermint Liqueur']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Glad Eye Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Peppermint Liqueur', '2/3 oz. Absinthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Glamis Sand Diva
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Captain Morgan's Rum", '3 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pre-mixed in a tight sealed container. Drive your buggy to Comp-Hill (at night). Glamis California Sand Dunes. Enjoy

Name: Glass Jaw
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice in a tumbler. Mix and fill with orange juice.

Name: Glass Tower
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Build in a collins glass and fill with lemon lime soda. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Glitter and Trash
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) Vodka', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour gin into a highball glass filled with ice and fill with Sprite. Top up with a splash of vodka.

Name: Gloom Chaser
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Curacao', '3/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '3/4 oz. Grenadine', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Gloom Lifter
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Sugar Syrup', '1/2 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Glow And Blow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '8 oz. Coca Cola (diet)']
Making: Fill a glass with ice and pour in Diet Coke. Light Everclear on fire in a shot glass.Drop shot glass into Diet Coke. Blow out fire. Enjoy !

Name: Go Girl!
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Vodka', '2 tbsp. Sour Mix', 'Club Soda']
Making: Mix it all together over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Godchild
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

Name: Godfather
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '3/4 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

Name: Godiva Peppermint Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Liqueur']
Making: Stir over ice in a in rocks glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Godmother
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Pour vodka and Amaretto into an old-fashioned glass over ice and serve.

Name: Gogl-Mogl
Ingredients: ['1 Egg', '1 oz. Whiskey', '1 tbsp. Honey', 'Milk']
Making: This is essentially a hot eggnog. Beat an egg, add honey and a shot of whiskey. Pour into a glass, fill with warm milk, and stir until well mixed.

Name: Gold Cadillac
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Galliano', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Gold Margarita #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Anejo Tequila', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Gold Margarita #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Gold Standard
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cuervo Tequila (Preferably 1800 Cuervo Tequila)', '1 oz. Licor 43', '1/2 oz. Curacao', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', 'dash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake and serve in a chilled glass.

Name: Gold Velvet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour Goldschlager into a champagne flute. Top with chilled champagne.

Name: Golden Apple Cider
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '6 oz. Apple Cider (Hot)']
Making: Serve in traditional mug.

Name: Golden Bronx
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

Name: Golden Cadillac #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Galliano', '2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Combine all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender. Blend at low speed for ten seconds. Strain into a champagne flute and serve.

Name: Golden Cadillac #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Galliano', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Golden Coke
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '12 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add Goldschlager and fill with Coca Cola.

Name: Golden Dawn
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Brandy', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake all ingredients except grenadine with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Top with grenadine.

Name: Golden Daze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Peach Brandy', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Golden Dream
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice', '1 tbsp. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Golden Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tbsp. Sugar', '1 Egg Yolk', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and serve.

Name: Golden Friendship
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. White Rum', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix first 3 ingredients in a collins glass with ice then fill with Ginger Ale. Garnish with an orange spiral and a cherry.

Name: Golden Gate
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Square One Organic Vodka', '2 oz. Persimmons Puree']
Making:
Place vodka and puree in a shaker with a lot of crushed ice. Shake vigorously for 30 seconds. This cocktail needs dilution or it will be too thick, so shake away! Strain into chilled martini glass. No garnish required as the vanilla bean specks float beautifully in the glass!
A delightful Holiday cocktail using seasonal persimmons and traditional Holiday spices, yet with a decidedly light and modern taste. Also known outside of the Bay Area as “Square ‘simmon.”
Credit: Allison Evanow

Name: Golden Glamour
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Moet and Chandon Brut Imperial Champagne', '1/4 oz. Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Passion Fruit Juice']
Making:
Combine all ingredients in a champagne coupe. Top with fresh sprig of mint for garnish.
Moet & Chandon, the exclusive champagne of the 82nd Annual Academy Awards, celebrates a return to old-time Hollywood elegance, with the debut of a specially designed cocktail, the "Golden Glamour," to be served on Hollywood's biggest night. Featuring Moet & Chandon's flagship champagne Imperial, the cocktail is simple to recreate for your at-home Oscar viewing party

Name: Golden Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Triple Sec', "3/4 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a salt rimmed margarita glass.

Name: Golden Nugget #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Yukon Jack', '5 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake over ice and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Golden Nugget #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '5 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake over ice and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Golden Oldie
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine in an ice cube filled highball glass.

Name: Golden Panther
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Gin', '2/3 oz. Brandy', '2/3 oz. Whiskey', '1/3 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Golden Rasperry
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jagermeister', '1/2 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Tequila', '1/2 part(s) Raspberry Juice', '1/2 part(s) Grenadine']
Making: Combine and shake all ingredients over ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

Name: Golden Shower
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila Gold', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '2 oz. Apple Juice', 'Lemonade']
Making: Combine all the ingredients (except lemonade and Galliano) in a mixing tin, pour over ice in a collins glass, top with lemonade and float Galliano.

Name: Golden Slipper
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '3/4 oz. Yellow Chartreuse', '1 Egg Yolk (Unbroken)']
Making: Stir brandy and chartreuse with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Float unbroken egg yolk on top and serve.

Name: Golden Spider
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Galliano', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour Galliano into a tall glass and top with ice cream. Slowly add Coca Cola to top up. Stir very carefully.

Name: Golden Tang
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Strega', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice (Or orange squash)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: GoldFinger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 1/2 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass and enjoy. A golden coloured drink, with pieces of gold floating around, and tastes great.

Name: Golf Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Goli the Bullet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lime Cordial', '3 oz. Absolut Vodka', "3 oz. Gordon's Dry Gin", 'Beer', 'Soda']
Making: Pour lime cordial, Absolut Vodka and Gordon's Gin into a cocktail glass.. Add soda and beer. Serve chilled.

Name: Gomez
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila Gold', '1 wedge(s) Lime', '3 dash(es) Barbecue Sauce (Old El Paso Mesquite)', '1 slice(s) Jalapeno Pepper']
Making: Shake the whiskey, tequilla and lime wedge together with ice. Strain into a Martini glass and swizzle the BarBQ sauce in the middle of the glass. Garnish with a slice of jalapeo pepper.

Name: Gone Tomorrow
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 drop(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Build in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with just the stem of a cherry.

Name: Goober
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Grenadine', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Good 'n' Plenty
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Black Sambuca', '4 oz. Coca Cola (diet)']
Making: Pour sambuca over ice. Add Diet cola and mix thoroughly.

Name: Good and Plenty #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '6 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Pour Dr Pepper down the side of a chilled glass and then pour the Sambuca in over the back of a spoon. Microwave on high for 3 minutes and serve.

Name: Good Coffee
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Double Espresso', '1 oz. Everclear']
Making: Mix in a coffee mug.

Name: Good Night
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '10 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Chill on Ice. Stir well. And say goodnight

Name: Goombay Smash #1
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Coconut Liqueur', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 dash(es) Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour into an ice cube filled specialty glass. Garnish with a pineapple flag.

Name: Goombay Smash #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', "1/2 oz. Myer's Rum", '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur (Or banana rum)', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Rum', 'dash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine the spirits in a cockail glass and add equal parts of pineapple juice, orange juice, cranberry juice. Float Chambord on top.

Name: Goombay Smash #3
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bacardi Spice Rum', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Light Rum', '1/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Coconut Cream', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass filled with ice.

Name: Goosie 66
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and/or lemon if desired.

Name: Gorgeous
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '3/4 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Gorila
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy Don Pedro or Presidente', '3 oz. Mexican Eggnog', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour the brandy and Mexican eggnog into a 10 - 18 oz. glass. Fill with Coca-Cola.Pour about 2-3oz of eggnogg and 1-3oz of brandy into a 10-18oz glass. Then mix with Coca-Cola.

Name: Gorilla Fart #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Gorilla Milk
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and pour over ice into a parfait glass. Garnish with a banana slice.

Name: Gorilla Snot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Port', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Measure the port into a brandy glass, the pour the Bailey's Irish Cream in. As the Bailey's Irish Cream enters the port it will solidify, forming a glob.

Name: Gorky Park Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake or blend over ice and pour into a large, chilled wine goblet. Add ice cubes if necessary and garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Graham Cracker Smasher
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Orange Juice', 'Crackers (From 1-2 cinnamon Graham Crackers)']
Making: Blend with ice and serve in a collins glass. Chris comments: Believe me it sounds strange but it tastes really good because the Graham crackers provide an interesting aftertaste....try it....you will not be disappointed.

Name: Grampa Doogin
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Yukon Jack', '2 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Layer Yukon Jack on the bottom of an old fashioned glass, add the blueberry then the orange juice. Top with cranberry juice.

Name: Grand Berry
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Grand Marnier', '3 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making:
This very harmonious long drink combines the tangy fruity flavours of cranberry with the roundness of Grand Marnier liquor. The cognac brings an aromatic complexity to this fruity mix.
In a tall glass, pour Grand Marnier liquor over crushed ice. Fill up with cranberry juice. Squeeze a wedge of lime above the glass and add same wedge in the glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.
Add seasonal berries for a deeper colour and a touch of bitterness.

Name: Grand Blue
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Mix all into an old-fashioned glass and stir.

Name: Grand Cosmo
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 1/2 oz. Belvedere Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Fill with ice, shake hard and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a thin wheel of lime.

Name: Grand Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making:
This very harmonious cocktail combines the tangy fruity flavours of cranberry with the roundness of Grand Marnier liqueur. The oaked notes of the cognac add aromatic intensity to the cocktail, and give more length on the finish.
Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Grand Espirit
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Grand Marnier', '1/2 part(s) Elderflower Syrup', '3 1/2 package(s) Soda Water', 'piece(s) Orange', 'piece(s) Strawberry']
Making:
Grand Marnier liquor, the icon of French Art de Vivre, brings a touch of sophistication in a refreshing summer drink that is enjoyed with friends in a pitcher. French Cognac adds complexity and taste length.
In a tall glass, pour Grand Marnier liquor, Elderflower cordial over ice cubes. Add orange and strawberry pieces. Fill up with soda water.

Name: Grand Ginger
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Grand Marnier', '3 part(s) Ginger Ale', '1 wedge(s) Lime']
Making:
A wonderful encounter between the intense aroma of Grand Marnier Liquor and the peppery flavourful notes of ginger ale for a perfectly refreshing drink.
In a tall glass, pour Grand Marnier liquor over ice cubes. Fill up with ginger ale. Squeeze a wedge of lime above the glass and add same wedge in the glass.

Name: Grand Iced Cafe Latte
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '6 2/3 oz. Milk', '1 Espresso (cold)']
Making:
This iced gourmet coffee enhances the flavourful notes of Grand Marnier liqueur.
Combine all ingredients in an ice-filled shaker. Pour into a tall glass.
If you don’t have a shaker, you can combine the ingredients along with ice cubes in the glass itself. However, the ice cubes will dilute the drink as they melt, so remove them before serving.

Name: Grand Margarita
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Partida Agave Nectar']
Making:
Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Fill with ice, shake and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass or over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a lime wedge. Optional: wipe half the glass with a lime and dip in course salt.
What makes a really good Margarita work? It’s a balance of three flavor elements:
The tart notes brought by fresh lime juice or sour mix
The smoky/vegetal notes brought by good tequila
The sweet, round flavors brought by orange liqueur
Grand Marnier adds richness and complexity to any Margarita. Due to its ten-year ageing process in French oak barrels, Grand Marnier brings a deeper color, smoother texture and more delicate aroma to Margaritas, making them more refreshing and delicious. Triple sec can throw off the balance of a Margarita by adding too many sweet notes. A triple sec is not aged: “made in the morning bottled at night.” It’s made with orange essence or sometimes just orange flavoring and mixed with a neutral alcohol. As a result, triple secs lack complexity or depth. No one ever orders a triple sec on the rocks or in a sniffer, do they?
Notice the ageing complements the vegetal notes in the tequila, followed by the interplay between the orange and lime notes. The finish should not be harsh or acidic, nor sweet or cloying. That’s how you know you have a good Margarita.

Name: Grand Margarita #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 1/3 oz. Tequila', '2/3 oz. Lime Juice']
Making:
This highly refreshing cocktail pairs the sour flavours of lime with the herbal notes of tequila. Grand Marnier liqueur's orange and oaked cognac flavours provide harmonious balance, giving more flavour and smoothness to your Margarita.
Lime wedge on rim of a cocktail glass.
For an authentic presentation, garnish the rim of the glass with salt. Begin by filling a wide, shallow dish with 2 to 3 mm of fine salt. Cut a lemon in half and rub the cut side around the rim of the glass. Then, holding the glass upside down, dip it delicately into the salt, so that it adheres to the rim to a thickness of 2 or 3 mm. Turn the glass upright and wait a few minutes.

Name: Grand Marnier Neat
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making:
Grand Marnier Cordon Rouge is a spirit that is appreciated for its unique and highly aromatic taste. Visual: brilliant and luminous, with golden highlights. Nose: Scents of orange blossoms underscored by a touch of candied zest, with oaked vanilla notes hint at cognac aged in oak barrels. Palate: Flavours of bitter orange that the cognac base infuses with nuances of candied orange, hazelnut, marzipan, and toffee. The finish is long and harmonious.
Swirl to release fully the subtlety of its aromas. Serve neat to experience the full flavour of Grand Marnier liqueur.
For the ideal tasting experience, serve in a snifter. First, admire the colour, then swirl the liqueur in the glass to fully release its subtle aromas. Finally, savour the liqueur, allowing the flavours to linger on your palate and fully express themselves.

Name: Grand Marnier on Ice
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making:
Grand Marnier Cordon Rouge is a spirit that is appreciated for its unique and highly aromatic taste. Visual: brilliant and luminous, with golden highlights. Nose: Scents of orange blossoms underscored by a touch of candied zest, with oaked vanilla notes hint at cognac aged in oak barrels. Palate: Flavours of bitter orange that the cognac base infuses with nuances of candied orange, hazelnut, marzipan, and toffee. The finish is long and harmonious.
Swirl to release fully the subtlety of its aromas. Serve on ice for a cooler sensation.
For a cooler sensation, add 1 or 2 ice cubes. By slightly offsetting the intensity of the cognac, the ice brings out more flavour on the palate.

Name: Grand Marnier Smash
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '4 chunk(s) Lemon about 1/2 a lemon', '8 Mint Leaves']
Making: Muddle mint leaves and lemon wedges in a tall mixing glass. Add Grand Marnier and ice and shake vigorously. Strain over ice in a rocks glass and garnish with a fresh mint sprig.

Name: Grand Marnier Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making:
Fruity, tangy citrus notes make this a highly refreshing cocktail. Cognac adds subtle balance to the roundness of orange and the tang of lemon juice.
Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.
For guaranteed effect: Place a maraschino cherry in the bottom of the glass. Serve the cocktails in tumblers.

Name: Grand Master
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Pour the Scotch, schnapps, and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Grand Mimosa
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Champagne']
Making: Combine Grand Marnier and fresh orange juice in a champagne flute. Top with champagne. Optional - Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Grand Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Grand Marnier', '3 part(s) Soda Water', '1/2 Lime', '7 leaf(leaves) Mint']
Making:
A bar must have in which Grand Marnier liquor reveals its exotic Carribean origin mixed with the sophisticated aroma of French Cognac.
In a tall glass, muddle gently mint leaves with Grand Marnier liquor. Squeeze half of lime above the glass. Add ice cubes. Fill up with soda water.

Name: Grand on the Rocks
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Pour over ice in a rocks glass. Grand Marnier is also delicious neat, chilled or on the rocks. A balance of orange, oak, vanilla, hazelnut and toffee flavors makes Grand Marnier a sublime drinking experience.

Name: Grand Orange Collins
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Combine Grand Marnier orange, lemon and simple syrup in a shaker, fill with ice and shake hard. Strain into a Collins glass with ice and top with club soda. Stir with a spoon and garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Grand Quetsch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 tsp. Quetsch', '1 tsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Stir without ice and pour over ice into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Grand Royal Fizz
Ingredients: ['1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '2 tsp. Light Cream', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with Club Soda and stir.

Name: Grand Sangria
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Grand Marnier', '1 cup(s) Grapes seedles, red or black', '1 Lemon sliced', '1 Orange sliced', '2 wedge(s) Apples red and green', '2 Cinnamon Sticks', '1 bottle(s) Wine Casa Merlot by Lapostolle', '1 tbsp. Superfine Sugar', '1 cup(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Soak the fruit with sugar, Grand Marnier and cinnamon for at least 1 hour. Stir in chilled wine and orange juice.

Name: Grand Sidecar
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 dash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a shaker (adjusting simple syrup to tartness of lemons). Fill with ice, shake hard and strain into a chilled martini glass half-rimmed with sugar.

Name: Grand Slam #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Swedish Punch', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Grand Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '3 1/2 oz. Iced Tea', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients in a shaker and fill with ice. Shake and strain over fresh ice into a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: Grand Tonic
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Grand Marnier', '3 part(s) Tonic Water', '1 wedge(s) Lemon']
Making:
Grand Marnier liquor brings a touch of sophistication in a classic, adding fruit intensity and sweetness to the slight bitterness of tonic. A refreshing drink with flavourful notes of orange.
In a tall glass, pour Grand Marnier over ice cubes. Fill up with Indian Tonic. Squeeze a wedge of lemon above the glass and add same wedge in the glass. Garnish with 1 slice lemon and 1 slice orange.

Name: Grand Vizier
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '3/4 oz. Vanilla Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Grand'O
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Grand Marnier', '1 1/2 part(s) Orange Juice', '1 1/2 part(s) Soda Water', '1 wedge(s) Lemon']
Making:
This sparkling long drink brings freshness and lightness to a perfect mix of orange and Grand Marnier liquor. It reveals the intense aroma of Caribbean orange. French Cognac adds complexity and taste length.
In a tall glass, pour Grand Marnier and orange juice over ice cubes. Fill up with soda water. Squeeze a wedge of lemon above the glass and add same wedge in the glass. Garnish with seasonal berries.
Replace soda water with Champagne for exciting and glamorous moments.

Name: Grandma's Hairy Nipple
Ingredients: ["2/3 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 splash(es) Kahlua', '1 splash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Whip it up until Grandpa begs you to quit! Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Grandpa's Slippery Worm
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Frangelico']
Making: Blended or just whipped until limp.

Name: Granny
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '3 oz. Gatorade']
Making: Combine with 4 to 8 ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: Granny Buffalo
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '2/3 oz. Caramel Liqueur', '2/3 oz. Apple Liqueur', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice', '1 scoop(s) Sherbet (Green apple sorbet)']
Making: Stir with ice and pour over sorbet in a martini glass. Garnish with a green apple slice.

Name: Granny's Melons
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sour Apple Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Chilled the old fashioned way. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Grape Ape #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Grape Pucker', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Soda Water', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Grape Coconut
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build over ice into a highball glass.

Name: Grape Godfret
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Grape Soda']
Making: Mix over ice and pour into a lowball glass.

Name: Grape Juice (Ginger's Dancing Shoes)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix liquor and pour over ice in a highball glass. Fill with ginger ale and stir.

Name: Grape Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients into metal tin. Blend and pour into a 12 oz. glass with ice. Garnish with either an orange flag or pineapple flag. I prefer no garnish. Looks horrible but tastes just like grape kool aid.

Name: Grape Kool-Aid #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend and serve over ice in a 12 oz glass.

Name: Grape NeHi
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up or Sprite']
Making: Pour vodka and Chambord Raspberry Liqueur over ice in a tall glass. Add sweet and sour mix to taste, then finish with a splash of 7-Up or Sprite.

Name: Grape Popsicle
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Grape Pucker', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Serve over ice in high ball glass and fill with Mountain Dew. Tastes just like a grape popsicle!

Name: Grape Quencher
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lime Juice', 'Grape Juice']
Making: Mix vodka, triple sec and lime juice in a highball glass over ice. Top with grape juice.

Name: Grape Rape
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '4 oz. Grape Juice (White)']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into an ice filled highball glass. Garnish with white grape.

Name: Grape Rocket
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Whiskey', '2 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Grape Juice (Or anything flavoured with grape)']
Making: Mix and enjoy!

Name: Grape Soda
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Sprite']
Making: Fill a collins glass with ice then build the drink starting with the blue curacao. After you pour the cranberry juice you'll want to give it a good shake and then fill with a splash of soda. Now you got a drink that taste just like the grape soda you drank when you were a kid!

Name: Grape Vine
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Grape Pucker', '4 oz. 7-Up', '1 oz. Vodka (optional)']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice. Use a straw to stir.

Name: Grapefruit Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Grapefruit Nog
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 cup(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tbsp. Honey', '1 Egg']
Making: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a collins glass over ice cubes and serve.

Name: Grapefruit Splash
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka (Or to taste)', '3 oz. Grapefruit Soda (Or to taste)']
Making: Mix vodka with grapefruit soda to desired strength. Serve with ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Grappa Strega
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grappa', '1 oz. Strega', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Grass Skirt #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Triple Sec, pineapple juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Grasshopper #1
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '3/4 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Grasshopper #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream']
Making: Belnd and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Grasshopper #3
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Creme de Menthe green', '3/4 oz. Creme de Cacao white', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream large']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a blender and mix until ice cream is smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve.

Name: Grateful Dead #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Grateful Dead #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Rum', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Sour Mix', '7-Up']
Making: Fill a tall glass with ice and add each ingredient. Fill to top with Sour Mix and add a splash of 7-Up. Serve with a drinking straw.

Name: Grateful Dead #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', 'Cranberries']
Making: Pour the liquors into a highball glass then fill the glass with cranberries and add a splash of 7-Up. Serve with a drinking straw.

Name: Grateful Dead #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Fill a highball glass half way with crushed ice. Combine vodka, gin, rum, triple sec and sour mix. Stir. Float Coca Cola and at the same time add blue curacao and grenadine to achieve a tie dyed effect. Garnish with marachino cherries

Name: Grateful Dead (Top Shelf)
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '2 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. Seltzer Water (Or Club Soda)']
Making: Add in order (Absolut Mandarin at the bottom) over ice in a highball glass and stir (served at Murphy's Law - Chesterfield, Va).

Name: Grateful Mexican
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Dry Gin', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '4 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Pour over ice in a Highball glass. Mix thoroughly. Enjoy.

Name: Gravedigger #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Combine in a shot glass and serve at room temperature.

Name: Graveyard
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Scotch', 'Beer', 'Stout']
Making: Mix the liquors in a beer mug in equal amounts. Top up the rest of the mug with half beer and half stout.

Name: Graveyard (light)
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Tequila', 'Beer', 'Stout']
Making: Mix the liquors in equal amounts in a beer mug. Fill up the rest of the space with half beer and half stout.

Name: Grayhound
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Regular grapefruit juice and vodka is a 'Grayhound' whereas pink grapefruit juice and vodka is a 'Gayhound'!

Name: Great Head
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Apple Schnapps']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Great Sex On The Beach
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain and pour into an ice filled tall glass. Serve with an orange slice and a cherry...ENJOY!

Name: Greek Buck
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 tsp. Ouzo', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake brandy and lemon juice and pour into a collins glass. Fill with Ginger Ale and float Ouzo.

Name: Greek Iced Coffee
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Coffee', '1/2 cup(s) Milk', '2 tsp. Honey']
Making: Blend with 1/2 cup of ice and pour into a coffee mug.

Name: Green Ant
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Melon Liqueur (Green)', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', 'Cider']
Making: Serve over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Green Apple Passion
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', "4 oz. Captain Morgan's Silver Spiced Rum", '6 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps', '6 oz. Midori']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a large cocktail glass.

Name: Green Bastard
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Cider', '1/2 pint(s) Lager', '2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Pour lager and cider into a pint glass leaving enough room for the blue curacao. Top up with curacao

Name: Green Champagne
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/3 Marie Brizard Charleston Follies', '1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '7-Up', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour vodka, Charleston and melon liqueur into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with 7-Up and float champagne.

Name: Green Cow
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Pisang Ambon', '1 part(s) Milk']
Making: Blend the two ingredients together. Use about half of each.

Name: Green Demon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', 'Lemonade']
Making: Shake vodka, rum, and liqueur and pour over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Green Devil
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake gin, creme de menthe, and lime juice with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves and serve.

Name: Green Diarrear
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'dash(es) Vodka', '2 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix over ice in a collins glass.

Name: Green Dinosaur
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Midori', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. White Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '3 1/3 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Sprite']
Making: Mix all liquors together over ice (possibly in a pitcher?). This will taste better if you use good liquors instead of the cheap stuff. Be careful. This stuff is strong but you can't really taste the alcohol if it is mixed right.

Name: Green Dragon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Gin', '1 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Kummel', '3 dash(es) Bitters (Peach)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Green Dragon #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kummel', '1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '4 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Green Dragon #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '2 oz. Milk', '2 oz. Heavy Cream', '1 oz. Sugar Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass.

Name: Green Dream
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Midori', '2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Pine Orange Banana Fruit Juice']
Making: Blend on low speed with ice and serve in a highball glass.

Name: Green Eggs And Ham
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Cream', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Green Eyes
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Orange Juice', 'Curacao']
Making: Build in a highball glass and float a layer of Curacao. Garnish with the slice of an apple and a green cocktail cherry.

Name: Green F**ker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tumbler.

Name: Green Fairy
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Absinthe (Preferably Hill's Absinthe)", '1 oz. Water', '1 Lemon Juice (Juice of, fresh)', '2 tsp. Egg White', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake thoroughly with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

Name: Green Fantasy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur']
Making: Build in a cocktail glass and garnish with kiwi fruit slices.

Name: Green Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Green Creme de Menthe', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg White', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Name: Green Frog
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pisang Ambon', '4 oz. Sprite', '4 drop(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Mix together over ice in a collins glass.

Name: Green Frogg With Icecream
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cream', '1 oz. Creme de Menthe green', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '2 cup(s) Ice Cream']
Making: Pour cream, green crème de menthe and crème de cacao into a blender. Add ice cream and blend on high. Pour into cocktail glasses and serve with a straw.

Name: Green Gables
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Pisang Ambon', '2/3 oz. Vodka', '2/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Apple Juice', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and pour into a collins glass filled with cracked ice. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Green Ghost
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Archers Peach Schnapps', '1 dash(es) Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: In separate glass/jug/whatever mix all ingredients in order except Blue Curacao (For Malibu and Archers I used a spirit measure and mixed them together before adding to the rest of the mixture). Pour contents into a glass half filled with ice then pour the Blue Curacao into the centre of the drink. Watch as the Curacao sinks into the drink and Enjoy!

Name: Green Gobbler
Ingredients: ['3/4 part(s) Hiram Walker Pumpkin Spice Schnapps', '3/4 part(s) Absolut Raspberri Vodka', '3/4 part(s) Sour Mix', '1/8 part(s) Hiram Walker Blue Curacao']
Making: Combine the first three ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into a rocks glass and serve. A splash of Blue Curacao at the end sinks and turns green when you add it to the drink.

Name: Green Goblin
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Cider', '1/2 pint(s) Lager', '1 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: cider first, Lager then Curacao.

Name: Green Goblin - TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 part(s) Coconut Rum', '1 splash(es) Sierra Mist']
Making: Shake TY KU and Coconut Rum with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and top with a splash of Sierra Mist.

Name: Green Grinch
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '7-Up']
Making: Fill a Collins glass with ice. Mix all ingredients together in a shaker and give a short shake. Pour into the collins glass and garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Green Hat
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Green Chartreuse', '1 part(s) Gin', 'Soda Water']
Making: ill a chilled cocktail glass with crushed ice. Add green chartreuse and gin. Top up with soda water.

Name: Green Headache
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps (Must be Blue)', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass, and slam it! Be prepared for a five-alarm headache if you do too many of these.

Name: Green Hell #1
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Kool-Aid (Green)', '1 oz. Everclear']
Making: Pour both into glass and keep away from open flames!!

Name: Green Hell #2
Ingredients: ['8 cup(s) Mountain Dew', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid (Lemon Lime)', 'Vodka']
Making: Empty the Mountain Dew out of the bottle until it touches the top of the bottle's label. Pour in the packet of Kool-Aid. (pour slowly; the Kool-Aid causes the Mountain Dew to bubble.) Top the bottle with vodka. Shake gently, chill and serve. Watch out! This drink is delicious but deadly! Enjoy!

Name: Green Hornet #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pisco', '2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Chill ingredients, pour lemon juice over pisco in lowball glass and top off with mixer (water or tonic etc.). Serve with a slice of lime, take a deep breath and get ready for the STING !

Name: Green Hornet #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '12 oz. Surge Energy Drink', 'Orange Juice (To Taste)', 'Sugar (To Taste)']
Making: Mix ingredients in a large glass.

Name: Green Hornet #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo (Preferably Cuervo 1800)']
Making: Mix in a shaker with ice then strain into a frosted rocks glass.

Name: Green Hurricane
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an ice filled highball glass. Top with whipped cream and add a straw.

Name: Green Iguana
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Lime Cordial', 'Lemonade']
Making: Mix the rum, the vodka and the cordials. Add the curacao until the cocktail turns into a blue green colour. Top up glass with lemonade.

Name: Green Island
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Sugar Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a parfait glass and top with creme de menthe. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Green Johnston
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Blend in a cocktail glass.

Name: Green Lagoon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Green Lantern
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Midori', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Mix all together in order, shake once and pour into glass over ice.

Name: Green Lifesaver
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Midori', '1 part(s) Blue Curacao', '2 part(s) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Pour into a highball glass. Add ice if desired and stir. Since the liqueur is mild you can adjust the proportions to suit your taste. If you mix correctly it should taste like a tropical green lifesaver...(For a Green Lifesaver with a Kick add a splash of tequila and stir).

Name: Green Mexican
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Tequila', '3 oz. Midori', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Fill collins glass with ice. Add tequila and Midori, fill rest of glass with Sour Mix. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Green Mist #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of kiwi fruit and a mint.

Name: Green Mist#2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Galliano', '3/4 oz. Green Chartreuse', '3/4 oz. Italian Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Italian Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Green Monster
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lime Vodka', 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour vodka in an ice filled highball glass then fill with lemonade.

Name: Green Monster #1
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '1 Pickled Pepper']
Making: Into an old fashion glass, pour vodka over ice. Add pickled pepper, and stir around with its stem. Devour pepper after draining drink.

Name: Green Monster #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Advocaat', '1/3 oz. Cointreau', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Lemonade']
Making: Mix all alcohol together and make up to a half pint with lemonade.

Name: Green Monster #3
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Layer in order (Midori at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass.

Name: Green Monster #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lime Vodka', 'Lemonade']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Great for a hot summer day!

Name: Green Mountain Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vermont Gold Vodka', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Cream', '1/4 oz. Maple Syrup', '1 Egg White', '3 drop(s) Orange Flower Water', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake all ingredients except for orange flower water and club soda WITHOUT ice for about one minute, then add ice and shake again very well for another minute. Strain ingredients into a tall glass without ice. Top with club soda. Gently place the 3 drops of orange flower water atop the froth, then gently float 1 tsp. maple syrup. Garnish with a mint leaf dipped in maple syrup.

Name: Green Niagra
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Bols Blue Curacao', '6 oz. Vodka', '3 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Fill a jug with ice. Pour in Bols Blue Curacao, vodka and Red Bull. Stir well. It should go a greenie colour.

Name: Green Opal
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Anisette', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Anis']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Green Pussy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. White Rum']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Green Radio
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Smirnoff Black Ice or Triple Black', '1 oz. Smirnoff 100 Vodka', '1/2 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making:
Pour the Triple Black into a large glass. Add the Smirnoff 100 and Mountain Dew. You can't see the Mountain Dew until you hold the drink up to a light. You'll then notice a really cool green hue.
Hey James, you didn't think we'd add it?

Name: Green Room
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '2 dash(es) Orange Curacao']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Green Slime
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/2 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Green Spider
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Green Creme de Menthe']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Green Star
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Midori', '2 part(s) Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Green Stinger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Brandy']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Green Tree Frog
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Midori', 'Lemonade']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Green Vodka
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Kool-Aid (Lemon Lime)', '4 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Mix and drink.

Name: Green Vodka Kool Aid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'Kool-Aid (Lemon Lime)', '7-Up']
Making: Mix Kool Aid in a pitcher. Pour vodka and a 50 - 50 mixture of Kool Aid and 7-Up into a highball glass. Stir and drink.

Name: Greenback
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Greenbriar
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Sherry', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters (Peach)']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Greenbrier Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Gin', '1 1/3 oz. Italian Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a mint leaf.
