Name: Greenham's Grotto
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Brandy', '2 tsp. Orgeat Syrup', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Greg's Tennesse Hot Tub
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '3 oz. Five Alive', '3 oz. Sprite']
Making: Pour ingredients into a highball glass over ice. Stir and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry (optional). This drink is very easy and simple and YUMMY!

Name: Gremlin
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', '4 oz. Hiram Walker Fruja Tangerine Liqueur', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients well over crushed ice and pour into a tall glass. Very good drink gets you drunk quick without realizing it!

Name: Greyhound
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Pour ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

Name: Grinch
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Lemon Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Build in a highball glass filled with ice.

Name: Grinner Snot
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Cider']
Making: Pour in order (Bailey's at the bottom) in a cocktail glass. Great for a birthday treat.

Name: Grizz Killer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Light Rum', "1 oz. Myer's Rum", '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'dash(es) 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Combine (except 151) over ice in a large rocks glass and float the 151 on top.

Name: Grizzly Bear
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Kahlua', '2 1/2 oz. Milk']
Making: Served over ice. Sounds nasty, but tastes great.

Name: Grog #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '3 oz. Water']
Making: Pour the rum and the water into an old-fashioned glass with no ice cubes. Stir well.

Name: Gross Pointe Blank
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Benedictine', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Cognac (Preferably Henessey)']
Making: Combine in a snifter or on the rocks.

Name: Grover
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice', '2 oz. Orange Vodka', '3 dash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: This drink can be made in many ways. On the rocks you add the vodka then the lime juice then pineapple and finish it with the chambord. In a martini glass, shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Either way, it is better with a sugar rimmed glass. Enjoy.

Name: Grovschpol
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Cola']
Making: Mix whiskey, Midori, Bailey's Irish Cream in large glass. Add cola until you have enough foam (it looks horrible). Drink it with a straw and don't look at the colour :-)

Name: Grüngheist
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Citrus Vodka (Preferably Danska Citrus)', '1 1/2 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '3/4 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', 'Grapefruit Soda']
Making: Blend (except grapefruit soda) with ice and pour into a hurricane glass previously frosted with orange juice and sugar. Fill with soda and garnish with a twist of lemon.

Name: Gryphon's Piss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Everclear', '3 oz. Lime Bar Mix', '3 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour over ice in a collins glass.

Name: GSM
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Gin', '5 1/3 oz. Skimmed Milk', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Stir it all together in a large glass.

Name: Guadka
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Guava Juice']
Making: This is basically a screwdriver, only with guava juice. Guava masks the vodka better. Pour both (preferably cold) into a glass and enjoy. My buddy Ryan thought this one up.

Name: Guava Colada
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '3 oz. Guava Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Blend with 8 oz. of crushed ice until smooth. Serve in specialty glass and garnish with a kiwi wheel, a tropical edible flower or a pineapple flag.

Name: Guavaberry Colada
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Guavaberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Creme de Coconut', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend with ice, pour in a cocktail glass and top with a dash of pineapple juice. Garnish with fresh grated nutmeg and a pineapple wedge.

Name: Guavaberry Kir
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Guavaberry Liqueur', 'White Wine (Dry)']
Making: Pour the guavaberry liqueur in a chilled wine glass and top with cold white wine.

Name: Guavaberry Royale
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Guavaberry Liqueur', 'Champagne (Dry)']
Making: Pour the guavaberry in a frozen champagne glass and top with chilled champagne.

Name: Guavaberry Sunset
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Guavaberry Liqueur', '5 oz. Grapefruit Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: In a highball glass filled with ice, pour first the guavaberry liqueur, then the grapefruit juice and carefully add the grenadine. Garnish with a slice of fruit and grated cinnamon.

Name: Guilty O.J.
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake Malibu and orange juice with ice. Pour into a highball glass and top with grenadine. Garnish with 2 crushed cherries.

Name: Guilty OJ
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Smirnoff Ice', '1 part(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix equal parts in a cocktail glass over ice.

Name: Guiness Shandy
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Guinness', '1/2 pint(s) Lemonade']
Making: Mix lemonade with Guinness in a pint glass. Serve in a beer mug.

Name: Guinness Black Velvet
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Guinness Chilled', '1 1/2 oz. Champagne']
Making: Pour Guinness into champagne flute. Add champagne carefully, so it does not mix with Guinness, and serve.

Name: Gulf Stream
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '3 oz. Champagne', '1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '6 oz. Lemonade', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Frappe in a sugar rimmed parfait glass. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Gumby On Acid
Ingredients: ['Champagne brut', '1/2 oz. Green Chartreuse 110 proof']
Making: Pour a flute 3/4 full of Brut Champagne. Pour 110 proof Green Chartreuse over a spoon and carefully down the side of the tipped flute. Great drink for a short but intense celebration.

Name: Gumdrop
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amarula Cream Liqueur', '1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '2 oz. Cream', 'dash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Combine Amarula, cream and schnapps in a shaker with ice. Shake until cold. Strain into a cocktail glass and pour a dash of blue curacao down two opposite sides of the glass using a teaspoon.

Name: Gummi Berry Juice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/4 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '3/4 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Pour the Blue Maui into a chilled cocktail glass and add the 7-Up. Top with the coconut rum.

Name: Gummy Beary Juice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Squirt']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Gush
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Mountain Dew', '17 oz. Vodka', '3 package(s) Kool-Aid (Blue)']
Making: Pour 1/2 of the bottle of Mountain Dew out. Fill with vodka and add 3 packages of Blue Kool-Aid. Shake.

Name: Gypsy Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: G’vine Orchid
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1 1/2 oz. Pink Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Elderflower Syrup', '1 1/2 oz. Champagne Brut']
Making: Put the pink grapefruit juice, the elderflower syrup and G’vine in a shaker, add ice, shake and serve in a high ball glass. Before pouring the drink into the highball, add the Champagne so that it mixes with the rest of the ingredients. You can garnish it with an orchid if available.

Name: H'allo Police
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: H-Bomb
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum (Or to taste)', '1 bottle(s) Gatorade (Melon)']
Making: Blend with ice and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: H. E. Double Hockey Sticks And Baseball Bat To The Kneeknees
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '16 oz. Beer (Preferably Busch beer)']
Making: Shoot 2 shots of tequila, preferably one directly behind the other, then chase with a 16 oz. BUSCH beer, from the can, of course.

Name: H.P.W. Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel and serve.

Name: Ha Ha Tonka
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Fill 16oz. cup with ice, pour in alcohol, then fill with orange juice.

Name: Habaneros
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '4 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Haidin-Haidin
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, and Bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Haiku
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sake', 'dash(es) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir and strain into a lowball glass. Garnish with a cocktail onion.

Name: Hail Storm
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '2/3 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Shake then pour into an oldfashioned glass filled with ice. Stir and serve.

Name: Hair Gel
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao (Preferably Bol's)", '1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Lemonade', '1 package(s) Candies (Jelly tots)']
Making: Blend with ice until slushy. Pour into a lowball glass and top with a dash of blue curacao.

Name: Hair of the (Bull) Dog
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Bulldog Gin', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '3 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Shake Bulldog Gin and tabasco with ice and strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with a chili pepper.

Name: Hair Of The Dog #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Tabasco Sauce', '1/4 oz. Salt']
Making: Pour Tabasco sauce, tequila and whiskey into a shot glass. Lay salt on top. Have a nice hangover!

Name: Hair of The Dog #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tomato Juice', '2 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '8 oz. Cider (Irish)']
Making:
Add juice and Tabasco sauce to serving glass and top with cider.
In Ireland, cider has always been considered a good way to get over a hangover because of its water and sugar content. With the addition of tomato juice and Tabasco sauce, cider becomes a breakfast cocktail for champions.
Created By Darren Geraghty
Darren Geraghty is the head mixologist at Dublin’s Exchequer Pub and winner of the first-ever Irish Open Cocktail Competition. A lifetime Dubliner, Darren’s creations are contemporary with an Irish twist.

Name: Hair Raiser
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka (100 Proof)', '1/2 oz. Rock and Rye', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Hairy Ass
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Yukon Jack', '2 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Mix the liquors with a cup of crushed ice and add the soda.

Name: Hairy Berry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake and strsain into an old fashioned glass.

Name: Hairy Bitch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Frappe in an exotic glass.

Name: Hairy Cooter Juice And A Pink Bikini On The Beach
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour in a cocktail glass and fill qith equal parts of orange juice and cranberry juice. Garnish with a grapefruit slice and a cocktail umbrella. Enjoy with your favorite pink plastic flamingo and a good hawaiian shirt.

Name: Hairy Navel
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Hairy Shmegma
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Vodka', '3 tbsp. Sugar', 'Mountain Dew', 'Lemon Juice (Optional)']
Making: Shake the 4 first ingredients with ice, pour into a highball glass and fill with Mountain Dew. Add a few drops of lemon juice.

Name: Hairy Slut
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Frappe in an exotic glass.

Name: Hairy Sunrise
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix all ingredients in blender except grenadine and pour into a collins glass. Float grenadine and garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Hairy Virgin
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build in an exotic glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Hal Ligon
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka premium', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a collins glass. History: The Hal Ligon originated in Key West sometime in the 1930's when famous local/author Ernest Hemingway and fishing buddy Hal Ligon began ordering the drink at nearby bars. The drink migrated north into mainland Florida but its name eventually evolved into todays Screwdriver. You can still order the drink by its original name in many south Florida bars and are encouraged to revive its name in your local pub or wherever drinks are enjoyed.

Name: Hale Bopper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry…and shoot it if you are really brave.

Name: Halfcast Russian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Vodka', "2 oz. Cappuccino (Preferabl Father o'leary's cappuccino)"]
Making: Pour the Tia Maria and the vodka over ice in a lowball glass, then layer on the cappuccino with a teaspoon. It will sink to the bottom leaving a swirling marbled effect. Garnish with a drink stirrer and serve.

Name: Halley's Comet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: In a martini glass, layer equal parts of the curacao, Bailey's Irish Cream and room temperature vodka in that order. Dribble the Bailey's and the vodka over the back of a spoon so the layers don't mix. Then, using a long match and dim lighting, ignite the vodka. Pour this quickly into an old-fashioned glass containing ice and 1 oz. of half-and-half. It comes out a milky blue with an orangelike flavour. Exercise caution when working with flaming drinks. Practice pouring from the martini glass using an unflaming mixture so you can do it without spilling. And have a fire extinguisher handy. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Hammer
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Combine ingredients and serve over ice in a tall glass.

Name: Hammered Farmer
Ingredients: ["4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '3 oz. Apple Juice', '4 oz. Root Beer']
Making: Pour root beer into a tall glass then mix in Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum and apple juice.

Name: Hana and Han
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Brown Sugar', '6 wedge(s) Lemon', '6 wedge(s) Orange', '2 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka']
Making: Mix in a large rocks glass.

Name: Hanalei Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Ocean Vodka', '3 oz. Watermelon', '1 tbsp. Limeade']
Making: Combine all ingredients with 4 oz. of ice in a blender and blend until smooth. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Hand Job
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila (Can substitute rum or whisky)', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Carolans Irish Cream Liqueur']
Making: Mix everything over ice and shake in motion deserving of the name.

Name: Handball Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill almost to top with Club Soda. Top with orange juice and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Handcuff
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Coca Cola', '1 dash(es) Vanilla Extract']
Making: Mix spiced rum in a highball glass over ice. Add vanilla extract and fill with Coca Cola.

Name: Hangover
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Johnnie Walker Black Label Scotch']
Making: Shake the ingredients and pour into a large glass.

Name: Hanky Panky
Ingredients: ['2 dash(es) Fernet Branca', '1/2 oz. Italian Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

Name: Happily Ever After
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix and serve on the rocks.

Name: Happy Camper
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Shake and pour over ice.

Name: Happy Colada
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix or blend with ice.

Name: Happy Happy
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in shaker and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Happy Hawaiian
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build in a lowball glass and fill with pineapple juice.

Name: Happy Juice #1
Ingredients: ['8 cup(s) Mountain Dew (Keep the bottle)', '1 bottle(s) Spiced Rum (Or vodka)']
Making: 1)Drink about one-fifth of the soda bottle. 2) SLOWLY add entire bag of Pixy Stix to the soda, capping it when it threatens to bubble over and shaking occasionally. 3) Add desired amount of liquor and shake well (don't fill all the way up or it will be hard to shake). May be drunk straight from the bottle or poured into smaller beverage containers. Howard's comment: This can get messy, so BE CAREFUL!

Name: Happy Juice #2
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum (Or to taste)", '1 bottle(s) Tropicana Twister (Any flavour you like)']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Happy Skipper
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour spiced rum over ice, fill glass to top with Ginger Ale. Garnish with a lime slice. Named for the Gilligan's Island reference ('The Captain' in 'ginger' is a Happy Skipper!)

Name: Happy Youth
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour in a flute and fill with a similar amount of champagne.

Name: Harbor Lights
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Galliano', 'dash(es) 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Build with ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Hard Cherry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix Vodka, Amaretto and Chambord Raspberry Liqueur in a rocks glass, half filled with ice. Top with Cranberry Juice and serve with a small straw - no other garnish.

Name: Hard Code Red
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', 'Mountain Dew Code Red']
Making: Mix in a highball glass and fill with Code Red.

Name: Hard Core
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Everclear (190 Proof)', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', 'Cola']
Making: Combine all into a tall glass or wine goblet. Add the cola last. Hang an orange slice on the rim of the glass.

Name: Hard F**k
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Blueberries', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients over ice and pour in a highball glass. Top up with orange juice.

Name: Hard Icey Nipple
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Jagermeister', '2 oz. Ice 101', '5 oz. Chocolate Milk']
Making: Mix and serve in highball glass.

Name: Hard Love Shaft
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Tabasco Sauce', 'Club Soda']
Making: Combine all these shots together in a highball glass, add more Tabasco sauce if you want, combine with club soda, and I guarantee you will feel a "HARD LOVE SHAFT" later on!!! :-)

Name: Hard Mick
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice (To taste)', 'Mountain Dew (To taste)']
Making: Combine to your liking and serve over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Hard Rhum With Devil
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cherry Liqueur', "1 oz. Myer's Rum", '1 oz. Tia Maria']
Making: Blend. Serve in a Long Island Punch Glass.

Name: Hard Turbo Phone Sex to Montana
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cloudberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Raspberries (Fresh)']
Making: Mix all the ingredients together in a blender.

Name: Hari Kari
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Harleigh's Cherry Bomb
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '7-Up']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass with ice. Add 7-Up until you reach your desired strength. Splash grenadine and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Harlem Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake gin, pineapple juice, and maraschino with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with pineapple chunks and serve.

Name: Harley Davidson #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Yukon Jack']
Making: Combine in a shaker with ice, strain into a rocks glass and good luck!!!

Name: Harpic
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Build in a highball glass and top with lemonade.

Name: Harrent and Trerry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour Midori and grenadine in 'pump' water bottle and fill with lemonade.

Name: Harry Neilson
Ingredients: ['Coconut Rum', "Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making:
Fill an old-fashioned or rocks glass with small cubed ice. Pour enough Coconut Rum in to 'settle' the ice and cover it. Pour in a splash of Rose's Lime to taste. 'Box the drink to mix. (Pour from one glass to another, once or twice, only).
I think it would probably be considered a Coconut Rum Gimlet, but the idea was inspired while sitting at a bar in Florida, as Harry’s 'Coconut' song was playing ... After a few 'sample rounds' were made and passed around... it was a hit and the name stuck... Sadly, the bar, 'Jakes' in Stuart, Florida, no longer exists.
Enjoy!
Bob

Name: Harsh But Fair
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Lime']
Making: Mix the liquors in a champagne flute (a little ice can help it go down), then add the lime. Tim's comment: It tastes nicer than it sounds!

Name: Harvard
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Angelica Root', 'dash(es) Gomme Syrup']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

Name: Harvard Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Harvard Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Carbonated Water', '2 oz. Apple Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Pour 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Add powdered sugar and stir. Add ice cubes and apple brandy. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and a spiral of orange so that it dangles over the rim of the glass.

Name: Harvest Skyy
Ingredients: ['Snapple (Mango Madness)', '3 oz. Skyy Vodka', 'Sprite']
Making: Fill a 12-14oz glass with ice. Add Skyy vodka. Fill almost to the top with Mango Madness Snapple. Top with sprite(do not substitute with 7-up). Stir and serve.

Name: Harvest Spiced Cider
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Gold', '2 oz. Apple Cider', '1 1/2 oz. Pumpkin Puree', '1 dash(es) Clove']
Making: Combine in a shaker filled with ice and shake vigorously. Strain in to a tumbler filled with ice. Garnish with a large orange peel.

Name: Harvey Cowpuncher
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '4 oz. Milk']
Making: Similar to Harvey Wallbanger. Can you see the difference? :-)

Name: Harvey Wallbanger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour vodka and orange juice into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir. Float Galliano on top and serve.

Name: Haschi Baschi
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Gin', '2/3 oz. Campari', 'Schweppes Russian Water']
Making: Stir into a cocktail glass.

Name: Hasta La Vista
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '4 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Mix orange juice, cranberry juice and grenadine in a highball glass. Add Absolut Mandarin and 7-Up. Stir lightly and serve with a fruit garnish.

Name: Hasta La Vista Baby
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. B and B Liqueur', '1 dash(es) Dry Vermouth', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a tall glass with ice and add liquors and lime juice. Fill with equal parts of orange and pineapple juice. Shake and enjoy!

Name: Hasty Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Anis', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Hat Trick #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. White Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Hat Trick #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, and Bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Haus Mix
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Serve in a tall glass.

Name: Havana
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Swedish Punch', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Havana Beach Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1 1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '4 dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Havana Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Hawaii Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass.

Name: Hawaii Five-0
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Serve in a bucket over ice.

Name: Hawaiian Cherry Popper
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Malibu Rum', '6 oz. Cherry Cola', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Mountain Dew (Optional)']
Making: Mix over ice and serve in a tall glass. Garnish with an umbrella and a slice of pineapple.

Name: Hawaiian Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Hawaiian Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 tsp. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix and pour into cocktail glass.

Name: Hawaiian Punch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice', 'Grenadine']
Making: Mix vodka, Southern Comfort and Razzmatazz in a tall glass over ice. Add equal parts of pineapple juice and orange juice. Float grenadine on top.

Name: Hawaiian Punch #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix Sloe Gin, rum, orange juice and pineapple juice in tall glass with ice cubes, leaving room for 1/4 oz. Amaretto at top. Have one at first...wait...see what happens. (Try to stand after three, ha ha ha)

Name: Hawaiian Punch #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Pour over ice in tall glass and stir.

Name: Hawaiian Sea Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with pineapple juice.

Name: Hawaiian Seduction
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Lime Juice']
Making: Pour in tall glass and fill with lime juice. Add ice and mix very well.

Name: Hawaiian Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Snapple (Kiwi Strawberry)', '3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Stir and serve in a highball glass over three ice cubes.

Name: Hawaiian Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice (Or to taste)', '2 oz. 7-Up (Or to taste)', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix the ingredients -except the grenadine- over ice. Then pour the grenadine fast so it settles in them bottom of the glass. Slowly stir in the grenadine -it should taste like cherry cream soda.

Name: Hawaiian Wipeout
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '1 oz. Goldschlager', 'Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Mix with ice in a cocktail glass and fill with Hawaiian Punch.

Name: Head Banger
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', "1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Headless Horseman
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '3 dash(es) Bitters', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour into collins glass and add several ice cubes. Fill with Ginger Ale and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Heart Attack
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '8 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Mix ingredients in a glass with or without ice. Enjoy!

Name: Heart-Shaped World
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Level Vodka', '1/4 part(s) Parfait Amour', '1/4 part(s) Maple Syrup', '1/2 part(s) Orange Juice Freshly Squeezed', '1/2 part(s) Strawberry Puree', '2 dash(es) Bitters Peach']
Making: Shake all ingredients, and strain over ice into a rocks glass. Garnish with a strawberry and colorful conversation hearts.

Name: Heat Of The Heart
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Finlandia Vodka', '1 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Cointreau', 'Cointreau']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Float Cointreau. Garnish with an orange peel and blackberries.

Name: Heat Wave #1
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Myer's Rum", '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Soda Water', 'drop(s) Lemon Juice', 'Water (Hot)']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and fill with hot water. Garnish with an orange slice and a cinnamon stick.

Name: Heat Wave #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Pour all ingredients except grenadine over ice in a parfait glass. Top with grenadine and garnish with a fresh peach slice.

Name: Heated Cape Cod
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Heat gently and pour into a lowball glass.

Name: Heather Blush
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '3 oz. Sparkling Wine (Chilled)']
Making: Pour Scotch and liqueur into a champagne flute and top with sparkling wine. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Heatmizer
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jagermeister', "1 part(s) Dr. McGillicuddy's Fireball"]
Making: Pour into a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Heaven On Earth
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '8 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Mix in a highball glass, rinse and repeat.

Name: Heaven Sent
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Pina Colada Mix', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Pour into a shaker. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Top off drink with a splash of blue curacao. Enjoy!

Name: Heavenly Mix
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 dash(es) Sambuca', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 dash(es) Lime Juice', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix all with crushed ice and pour in a cocktail glass (do not strain). Top with a dash of grenadine.

Name: Heavenly Orgasm
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and pour over ice into a rocks glass. Good for the ladies.

Name: Heavens to Margatroid
Ingredients: ['2 1/5 oz. Tequila', '2 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/8 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps', '1/8 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/8 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', '1/8 oz. DeKuyper Crantasia Cranberry Schnapps', '1/8 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Grape Schnapps']
Making: Mix in a tall glass over ice.

Name: Heavy Navel
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Budweiser Light Beer', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Mix peach schnapps and vodka, stir and add the beer. Have Fun.

Name: Heering Royale
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cherry Heering Liqueur', '5 part(s) Champagne']
Making: Pour Cherry Heering liqueur into a champagne glass, top with champagne and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Heidi's Comet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Apple Cider']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass. Swizzle with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Hell On Earth
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '6 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Mix well with plenty of ice in a highball glass and stand well away from any sharp objects.

Name: Hell's Kitchen
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Bushmill's Irish Whiskey", '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice in a tumbler. Stir. Mow the new hair off of your back.

Name: Help Me I've Fallen and I Can't Get Up (Purple Drink)
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Gin', '1/3 oz. Rum', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sprite', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour in a highball glass and fill to rim with equal parts Sprite and cranberry juice.

Name: Help Wanted
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Hemingway Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice fresh', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake well with cracked ice. Strain and serve in chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Hendrick's Gin and Tonic
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Hendrick's Gin", 'Tonic Water']
Making: Pour Hendrick's Gin into highball glass over ice cubes and fill with tonic water. Stir. Garnish with cucumber.

Name: Hendrick's Quince and Clove Sour
Ingredients: ["1 2/3 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '1/2 oz. Honey Syrup', '1 tsp. Quince Preserves', 'splash(es) Pink Cloves Cordial', '2/3 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Assemble all the ingredients except the garnish in a mixing glass with ice and shake well. Strain through a tea strainer into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a flamed lemon peel and a spiral of lemon on the rim of the glass.

Name: Hendrick's Strawberry Jive
Ingredients: ["1 2/3 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '2 Basil Leaves', '4 Mint Leaves', '2 Strawberries', '2/3 oz. Simple Syrup', '2 dash(es) Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Muddle the mint, strawberries and basil leaves in the bottom of a mixing glass with the syrup. Add the remaining ingredients except the mint sprig garnish and shake well with ice. Strain into an ice filled rocks glass garnish with mint sprig.

Name: Hendrick's Tawny Orange Jelly Sour
Ingredients: ["1 2/3 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '1/2 oz. Honey Syrup', '1 tsp. Orange Marmalade', '2/3 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Assemble all the ingredients except the garnish in a mixing glass with ice and shake well. Strain through a tea strainer into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a flamed orange peel and a spiral of orange on the rim of the glass.

Name: Hennessy Miami
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hennessy Cognac VS', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '4 Mint Leaves']
Making: Pour all ingredients (including mint) in a shaker and shake over ice. Strain into a Hennessy glass and garnish with a mint leave. Serve.

Name: Hennessy Moscow
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Hennessy Cognac VS', '1 slice(s) Lemon', 'Sugar']
Making: Shake Hennessy over ice with a dash of lemon juice and strain into a mini Hennessy glass. Add a sugar coated lemon slice on the side of glass and serve.

Name: Hennessy New York
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hennessy Cognac VS', '3 1/2 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Pour ingredients in an ice filled Hennessy glass, stir a few seconds with a bar spoon and serve. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Hennessy Paris
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hennessy Cognac VS', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a Hennessy glass.

Name: Hennessy Passion
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hennessy Cognac VS', 'Alize Red Passion']
Making: Fill a 5 oz. rocks glass with ice. Add Hennessyand ill the rest of the way with red passion alize. A bit tart but very good.

Name: Hennessy Shanghai
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hennessy Cognac VS', '3 1/2 oz. Ginger Ale', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Pour ingredients in an ice filled Hennessy glass, add a twist of orange peel, stir a few seconds and serve.

Name: Hennessy Side Car
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hennessy Cognac VS', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake and strain in a sugar-rimmed cocktail glass.

Name: Hep Cat
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Berry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Cointreau']
Making: Stir well over cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Her Valentines
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Vox Raspberry Vodka', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Strawberry Passion Schnapps', '2 part(s) Rose Water', '1 splash(es) Egg White', '1 splash(es) Champagne']
Making: Shake with ice and strain in a champagne flute. Top with champagne, garnish with a rose petal and sprinkle with edible gold dust.

Name: Here Today
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 drop(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Build in an old-fashioned glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Heroic Bloodshed
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Tomato Juice', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 tsp. Marmite']
Making: Thoroughly mix tomato juice and marmite then pour over vodka in a rocks glass.

Name: Heroshima
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Squirt Ruby Red Citrus Soda']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass over ice. Garnish with a cherry or lemon/orange slice.

Name: Herradura Agave Kiss
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Double Cream', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making:
Looking for a unique treat for your Valentine’s Day honey? Move over flowers and candy. Herradura, the world’s finest tequila, introduces its signature Agave Kiss cocktail just in time for V-Day. A unique romantic Mexican twist on the traditional martini, the Herradura Agave Kiss is so delectably sweet that it can even be enjoyed as dessert.
In a shaker with ice, add Herradura tequila, white crème de cacao, double cream and Chambord. Shake for 15 seconds. Pour into a chilled cocktail glass, rimmed with white chocolate, add a spear of fresh raspberries, and serve.

Name: Herradura Brisa
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '2 oz. Lemonade', '1 oz. Pomegranate Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients in a shaker and shake vigorously. Strain into a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with a squeeze of lime.

Name: Herradura Charro Negro
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Herradura Anejo Tequila', '4 oz. Cola', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making:
In a tall glass with ice mix the Herradura Anejo and cola. Squeeze with lime.
The month of October begins preparation for one of Mexico's most celebrated and historic holidays, Dia de los Muertos (Day of the Dead) which falls on November 1 and 2. Tequila Herradura, the world's most revered and storied premium tequila, is featuring the Herradura Charro Negro, referring to the traditional cowboy of Mexico who sometimes dresses in black when mourning a loved one, as its drink of the month in recognition of the holiday.
This authentic Mexican drink is quickly becoming a staple all over the U.S. Many people will celebrate Day of the Dead by creating some of their favorite recipes as an offering to honor their lost loved ones. The Herradura Charro Negro is simple and easy to make pairing Tequila Herradura Anejo with your favorite cola.

Name: Herradura French Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 1/4 oz. Cointreau', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Agave Nectar']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a salt-rimmed, ice filled margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Herradura Fresh Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Reposado Tequila', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: In a shaker filled with ice, add ingredients and shake to mix. Strain into a salt-rimmed rocks glass.

Name: Herradura Ginger
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Reposado Tequila', 'Lime', '4 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Fill tall glass with ice. Squeeze lime into glass and add tequila and ginger ale. Stir to mix and garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Herradura Ginger and Spice
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Reposado Tequila', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '4 oz. Ginger Ale', '2 Jalapeno Pepper']
Making: Muddle jalapenos in a shaker. Add all other ingredients into shaker and roll to mix. Fill tall glass with ice and strain into that glass. Garnish with a jalapeno pepper.

Name: Herradura Italian Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '1 oz. Tuaca', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '1/4 oz. Cointreau', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Salt rim of glass. Combine ingredients in a shaker, shake vigorously and pour into glass.

Name: Herradura Jimango
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '4 oz. Mango Juice', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', 'Tabasco Sauce']
Making:
In a glass frosted with salt, add crushed ice, Tequila Herradura Blanco, a pinch of salt and a dash of Tabasco sauce (to your liking). Pour in lemon and mango juice, and stir softly.
Prepared with the Herradura's 100 percent blue agave Blanco expression, fresh mango juice and a spicy touch of Tabasco, we thought that this great tropical-themed option will cool you off on summer nights.

Name: Herradura Luxe
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '1 oz. Agave Nectar', '1 oz. Water', '2 wedge(s) Lime', '2 wedge(s) Lemon']
Making: In a rocks glass, muddle lime and lemon wedges. In a shaker filler with ice, add remaining ingredients. Shake to mix and transfer to rocks glass.

Name: Herradura Mango Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '3 sprig(s) Mint', '2 tsp. Sugar', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '2 1/2 oz. Mango Juice', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Muddle the mint leaves, sugar and lime juice in the bottom of a tall glass. Add Herradura and mango juice. Add a splash of club soda and ice cubes. Serve with a mint leaf garnish.

Name: Herradura Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Anejo Tequila', '1/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Herradura Mojito
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '1 oz. Agave Nectar', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '4 leaf(leaves) Mint', '2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: In a shaker, muddle mint leaves. Add ice and remaining ingredients, roll to mix. Pour into Collins Glass.

Name: Herradura Promise
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '3 oz. Pomegranate Juice']
Making: Shake with ice for 10 seconds and pour into a chilled champagnei glass. Add a few pomegranate seeds for garnish and serve.

Name: Herradura Red, White and Blue
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '4 Strawberries', '12 Blueberries']
Making:
Combine each set of ingredients in advance as you’ll want to blend these quickly one after another. Blend the ingredients of layer 3 and place in the base of the glass. Blend the ingredients of layer 2 and layer carefully over the first base. Blend the ingredients of layer 1 and layer carefully. Garnish with half a strawberry and 3 blueberries. Layer 1
1/2 oz. Herradura Silver
1/2 oz Lime juice
1/2 oz Agave Syrup
4 Strawberries
Layer 2
1 oz. Herradura Silver
1/2 oz Lime juice
1/2 oz Agave Syrup
Layer 3
1 oz. Herradura Silver
1/2 oz Lime juice
1/2 oz Agave Syrup
12 Blueberries

Name: Herradura Ruby Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Reposado Tequila', '1/2 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Salt rim of a rocks glass. Combine ingredients in a shaker and shake vigorously. Pour into the rocks glass.

Name: Herradura Smoked Peach Ice Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Reposado Tequila', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Tea (Earl Grey)', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/4 oz. Mezcal']
Making: Fill a high ball with good quality cubed ice. Add all ingredients and stir thoroughly with a bar spoon. Garnish with a long lemon twist and/or a peach slice.

Name: Herradura Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: In a shaker filled with ice, add ingredients and roll to mix. Shake and strain in a tall glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Herradura Thanksgiving Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Reposado Tequila', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Honey Syrup']
Making: Add all ingredients into shaker filled with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into an Old Fashioned glass with ice. Garnish with a sprinkle of cranberries (fresh or dried).

Name: Herradura Tropical Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '4 oz. Peach Nectar', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Strain into a rocks glass and garnish with a grilled peach and pineapple slice.

Name: Herradura's Cincorita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Partida Agave Nectar', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Mix Tequila Herradura Silver, Cointreau, agave nectar and fresh lime juice in a shaker with ice. Pour into a margarita glass rimmed with salt. Pour the Chambord on top, so as to create a crimson floater. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Hey Bitch - Come Here
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Chocolate Milk (Preferably YooHoo chocolate drink)', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Butter Shots', '1 oz. Raspberry Schnapps']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass….or blend it with ice for a "cold bitch, come here". Add 1oz. of grenadine to make the bitch bloody. This drink is very sweet, good for weak drinkers.

Name: Hi Rise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Frappe in a tall glass.

Name: Hierba Buena Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Averna Bitters - Amaro', '1 1/4 oz. Don Julio Reposado Tequila', '1/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '3 dash(es) Bitters Fees', '1 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making:
First to make bitter mint cream: add mint bitters and heavy cream to a cocktail shaker. Dry shake(no ice) for 30 secs. Set aside. Then stir Averna, Tequila, and Cacao in a mixing glass full of ice for 45 secs. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Using a bar spoon, carefully layer the cream on top of the cocktail. Garnish with shaved chocolate and fresh mint sprig.
Thomas R. Waugh, Alembic Bar San Fransisco

Name: High Noon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jose Cuervo', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Fill a highball glass half full with ice. Add the Jose Cuervo Gold Tequilla and then fill with Mountain Dew. Squeeze a slice of lime into the drink and add the slice as a garnish.

Name: High Plains Drifter No. 1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila Blanco', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Honey Syrup', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1 splash(es) Campari']
Making: Shake first four ingredients with ice and strain into chilled, Campari-rinsed cocktail glass

Name: Highland Cooler #1
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1 oz. Scotch', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with Ginger Ale.

Name: Highland Cooler #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. Scotch', 'Club Soda']
Making: Add sugar and 2 oz. of Club Soda into a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes and Scotch and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with a spiral of lemon or orange peel over the rim of the glass.

Name: Highland Fling
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Build in a tall glass and garnish with a twist of orange.

Name: Highland Fling Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive and serve.

Name: Highland Ghost
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Cognac', '1/2 pint(s) Pepsi Cola', '1/2 pint(s) Guinness']
Making: Combine in a pint glass. Your choice - drink or chug it!

Name: Highland Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', 'Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass with a salted rim. Garnish with lime.

Name: Highland Sling
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '2 tsp. Water', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Scotch']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, water, lemon juice, and Scotch. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Hillinator
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Firewater', '8 oz. Mountain Dew', '4 tbsp. Sugar']
Making: Mix the rum, Mountain Dew, and sugar in one glass. Pour the Fire Water into a shot glass. Shoot the Fire Water and chase with the mixed drink.

Name: Hina Blast
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Red Wine', '1 oz. Cola', '4 oz. Tequila', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 tbsp. Bananas (Chopped)', '1 cup(s) Raisins', '6 oz. Dom Perignon', '1/4 tsp. Red Pepper (Hot and in flakes)']
Making: Heat wine, add raisins, and boil. Mix cola, tequila, orange juice and add to mixture. Toss bananas with hot red pepper flakes. Pour Don Perignon over bananas. Mix everything together and store in a glass jar. Chill overnight.

Name: Hippy Jack
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Vanilla Soy Milk']
Making: Just mix the soy milk and the Jack and enjoy! Goes down smooth.

Name: Hiram Walker - Caramel Apple Cosmo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Absolut Citron Vodka', '3/4 part(s) Hiram Walker Caramel Apple Liqueur', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making:
Build ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an apple slice.
Created by Tobin Ellis, BarMagic (Las Vegas)

Name: Hiram Walker - Citron Long Board
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Triple Sec', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a chilled highball glass with ice cubes. Add vodka and triple sec. Top up with cranberry juice. Garnish with lime.

Name: Hiram Walker - Golden Delicious
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Caramel Apple Liqueur', '1 part(s) Sour Mix']
Making:
Serve up in a cocktail glass. Garnish with an apple slice.
Created by Tobin Ellis, BarMagic (Las Vegas)

Name: Hiram Walker - Highland Harvest
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Glenlivet Scotch Whisky', '1/2 part(s) Hiram Walker Caramel Apple Liqueur', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making:
Build in a rocks glass with a large ice cube.
Created by Tobin Ellis, BarMagic (Las Vegas)

Name: Hiram Walker - Irish Applesauce
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1/2 part(s) Hiram Walker Caramel Apple Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making:
Build over ice in a rocks glass. Squeeze lemon and drop fruit into the drink.
Created by Tobin Ellis, BarMagic (Las Vegas)

Name: Hiram Walker - Island Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1/2 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Peach Schnapps']
Making: Shake and serve over ice.

Name: Hiram Walker - MangoRita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Tequila', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Mango Schnapps', '1/4 part(s) Hiram Walker Triple Sec', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake or blend with ice into salt-rimmed margarita glass.

Name: Hiram Walker - Pampered Princess
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Hiram Walker Pomegranate Schnapps', '3 part(s) Sparkling Wine']
Making: Stir gently. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Hiram Walker - Peach Tea
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Hiram Walker Peach Schnapps', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '4 part(s) Iced Tea (freshly brewed)']
Making: Add all ingredients to a Collins glass over ice. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Hiram Walker - Peaches and Cranberry
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Hiram Walker Peach Schnapps', '2 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a tall glass.

Name: Hiram Walker - Pometini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Pomegranate Schnapps']
Making: Shake and strain into martini glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Hiram Walker - Southern Apple Sweet Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Rye Whiskey', '3/4 part(s) Hiram Walker Caramel Apple Liqueur', '1 tsp. Apricot (Preserves)', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making:
Build in a tall glass with ice and garnish with a lemon slice.
Created by Tobin Ellis, BarMagic (Las Vegas)

Name: Hiram Walker Cinn and Pom Tea
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Hiram Walker Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 part(s) Pomegranate Juice', '3 part(s) Tea']
Making: Brew tea as instructed then chill. Once tea has chilled, use all ingredients and build in a Collins glass.

Name: Hiram Walker Mango Nut Punch
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1/2 part(s) Dark Rum', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Mango Schnapps', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Serve over ice in tall glass, float dark rum on top, garnish with pineapple chunk. Increase recipe in equal proportions to for multiple servings in a punch bowl.

Name: Hiram Walker Melon Mojito
Ingredients: ['3/4 part(s) Hiram Walker Melon Liqueur', '1 1/2 part(s) Dark Rum', '12 leaf(leaves) Mint', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '2 tbsp. Simple Syrup', 'Club Soda']
Making: Muddle mint leaves and lime in tall glass. Cover with simple syrup and fill glass with ice. Add rum and top with club soda; stir. Garnish with lime and mint.

Name: Hiram Walker White Peach Sangria
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Wine (Pino Grigio)', '1 1/4 cup(s) Malibu Mango Rum', '1 1/4 cup(s) Hiram Walker White Peach Schnapps', '12 squirt(s) Lemon Juice', '12 squirt(s) Lime Juice', '12 squirt(s) Orange Juice', '2 1/2 cup(s) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Combine ingredients in Punch Bowl 3/4 full of ice. Multiple servings.

Name: Hiroshima
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Whiskey', '2 oz. Martini and Rossi Extra Dry Vermouth', 'drop(s) Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: His Valentines
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Knob Creek 100 Proof Bourbon', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Peachtree Schnapps', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice Blood', '1 part(s) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Squeeze blood orange and lime juices, add ingredients except lemon lime soda, shake with ice and pour in a 12oz bucket, and top with lemon lime soda. Garnish with fresh blueberries.

Name: Hocus Pocus
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Frappe in a champagne flute.

Name: Hoiberg
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'All Sport (Any flavour)']
Making: Mix with ice and enjoy. Comment: We, here at the university of Colorado, have found that mixing vodka with the sports drink All Sport is a delicious combination. We've named it a Hoiberg and the full name depends on the flavour of All-Sport. i.e....Purple Hoiberg for grape, Fruity Hoiberg for fruit punch, etc.

Name: Hokkaido Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sake']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Hole In One
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Scotch', '3/4 oz. Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Holiday Brandy Alexander
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Eggnog']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

Name: Holiday Eggnog
Ingredients: ['8 Eggs', '4 Egg Yolks', '1 cup(s) Sugar Granulated', '5 cup(s) Whole Milk', '1 1/2 cup(s) Mount Gay Eclipse Rum', '1 cup(s) Bourbon Whiskey', '1 tbsp. Vanilla Extract', '1/2 tsp. Nutmeg Grated', '2 cup(s) Whipping Cream', '2 tbsp. Sugar Super Fine']
Making:
Makes 16 cups; serves 18-20.
In a mixing bowl, whisk eggs, yolks and granulated sugar until smooth. Pour into a large, heavy-bottomed saucepan. Stir in milk, gradually, blending well with each addition. Heat slowly over very low heat, stirring steadily, until the mixture reaches 160º-170ºF on an instant read thermometer. The custard should be thick enough to coat the back of a spoon: If you draw your finger across the back of the spoon, the line will remain distinct and the custard sauce is done.
Pour the custard through a fine-meshed sieve into large bowl. Stir in vanilla the Mount Gay ECLIPSE rum, bourbon and nutmeg. Let mixture cool, then cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate until cold, at least three hours and or up to one day.
Just before serving, whip cream to very soft peaks, beating in, superfine sugar as you go. Gently fold into custard mixture until incorporated. Serve from a chilled punch bowl or ladle into individual martini glasses, garnishing with grated nutmeg if desired.

Name: Holiday Hangover
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Bacardi Rum', '5 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Mix, serve and garnish with a candy cane.

Name: Holiday Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into two chilled martini glasses. Garnish with chocolate covered coffee beans.

Name: Holiday Punch
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Sugar', '8 oz. Cranberry Juice', '8 oz. Orange Juice', '8 oz. Tea', '1 bottle(s) White Rum']
Making: Mix in a punch bowl and garnish with lemon slices.

Name: Holidazzle
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '2 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice (light)', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice (light)', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Build in a martini glass and garnosh with a lime twist. The “Skinny” Cosmo: 140 Calories so you can have more than one – without feeling guilty! The original Cosmo has 287 calories.

Name: Holly Jolly Roger
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cruzan Black Strap Rum', '2 oz. Apple Cider Spiced', '1/2 oz. Torani Hazelnut Syrup', '1/4 tsp. Absinthe La Fee works well']
Making: Combine everything in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into an ice-filled rocks glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Hollywood Boulevard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Orange Juice', 'White Wine']
Making: In a highball glass filled with crushed ice add the vodka and orange juice and stir. Then add the white wine to taste and briefly.

Name: Hollywood Scully
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 dash(es) Dry Vermouth', '1 dash(es) Sour Mix', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass over ice.

Name: HollyWood Vampire
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka (100 Proof)', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass, stir and serve.

Name: Holly’s Habanero Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Flor de Cana 7 Year Old Rum', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', 'Pepper (Poblano, muddled)']
Making:
Muddle peppers and combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain into a short rocks glass over ice and garnish with a poblano and jalapeno pepper.
With the Emmys just around the corner, it’s time to start thinking about how and where you’ll be spending the star-studded evening. Whether you’ll be throwing a Hollywood-worthy bash for your friends or be curled up on the couch, we’ve got the perfect cocktails to compliment your night. Each of the following creations pays homage to some of this year’s newcomers and also the staples; and assures that you’ll have the perfect drink in hand no matter which show gets your vote!
GLEE
A fan favorite, Glee continuously scores nominations due to its high energy musical numbers and campy style. But Gwyneth Paltrow’s nomination as a Guest Actress in a Comedy for her turn as Holly Holiday definitely deserves a toast. This cocktail that embodies Holly’s spunk and sweetness, with Nicaraguan Flor de Cana Rum!

Name: Homebrew Wine Cooler
Ingredients: ['3 tbsp. Superfine Sugar', '1 1/2 tbsp. Water', '1/4 cup(s) Orange Juice', 'Wine (red or white)']
Making: Put the sugar and water in a glass serving pitcher and stir until the sugar is dissolved. Add the orange juice and ice cubes and fill with any chilled red or white wine. Garnish red wine cooler with a slice of lemon and white wine cooler with a slice of orange.

Name: Homemade Sweet and Sour Mix
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Sugar Granulated', '1 cup(s) Lime Juice Freshly Squeezed', '1 cup(s) Lemon Juice Freshly Squeezed', '1 cup(s) Water']
Making: In a 2 quart sauce pan - bring water to a rolling boil and remove from heat. Stir in sugar until dissolved. Add lime and lemon juice and refrigerate.

Name: Homestead Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Homewrecker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice (To taste)', 'Strawberry Daiquiri Mix (To taste)']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain in a large cocktail glass. You can also blend the ingredients with ice until smooth.

Name: Honey Bee
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jamaica Rum', '1/4 oz. Honey', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Honey Bunny
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', '2 oz. Sour Mix', 'Pear Cider', '7-Up', 'Lemon Juice']
Making: Serve in a highball glass and use lots of ice. Stir it all together. A real summer drink, refreshing and designed by myself.

Name: Honey Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Alchemy Chocolate Infused Vodka', '1 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Honey Comber
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Honey Vodka', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1 splash(es) Tuaca']
Making: Flip into a cocktail mixer and swirl gently pour mixed contents back into rocks glass. Top with Tiara. ~Sault, viva la cocktail

Name: Honey Dew #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Lychee Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with your choice of fruit or rind.

Name: Honey Dew #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Midori', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a triple sec floater.

Name: Honey Drop
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Margarita Mix', 'Lemonade']
Making: Fill an old fashioned glass with ice and add blue curacao and melon liqueur. Next add either a half shot of margarita mix or for a sweeter touch add a full shot. Fill the rest of the glass with lemonade and enjoy!

Name: Honey Nuts
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Advocaat', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Honey']
Making: Shake and pour into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream and garnish with strawberries and/or cocoa.

Name: Honey on a Pink Part
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Grenadine', '12 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in a tall glass.

Name: Honey-do Wild Cherry
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Alchemy Wild Cherry Infused Vodka', '1 splash(es) Midori']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lime slice and a cherry.

Name: Honey-Ginger Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Honey Thyme', '1 1/2 oz. Cachaca', '1/2 oz. Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making:
Pour all the ingredients in a mixing tumbler then stir until the honey dissolves completely. Add ice and shake vigorously. Pour into a rocks glass and garnish with a crystallized ginger wheel.
Balance is synonymous with Junior Merino's cocktails. Fusing ingredients from diverse cultures, this cocktail has a sophisticated flavor that is the perfect complement to any dish

Name: Honeybush Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Strega']
Making: Serve well chilled in a tall glass.

Name: Honeymoon Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Apple Brandy', '3/4 oz. Benedictine', '1 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Hong Kong Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Green Chartreuse', '1 oz. Yellow Chartreuse', '1 oz. Benedictine', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Soda Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients except soda water with ice and strain into a chilled highball glass with fresh ice. Top with soda water and garnish with a slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry.

Name: Honolulu Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1/4 tsp. Orange Juice', '1/4 tsp. Pineapple Juice', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Honolulu Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Benedictine']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Honolulu Hammer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Hoodlum Drink (See First Look- J.Buffet)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Grand Marnier', '2 oz. Dark Rum', '6 oz. Passion Fruit Juice']
Making: Chill passion fruit juice and pour into a blender. Mix liquor over ice and strain into cold passion fruit juice. Blend well and serve in a tall chilled glass.

Name: Hoolas Mont
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Fanta']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Hoopla
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Lillet', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Hoosier Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Zubrowka Vodka', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir well over cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Hoot Mon Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 tsp. Benedictine']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a twist of lemon peel in the glass.

Name: Hoots Mon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Lillet', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Hop Toad
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '3/4 oz. White Rum', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Hopeless RomantiX
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '2 oz. Prosecco', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Muddle pineapple, orange and lemon. Add prosecco and X-Rated Fusion Liqueur. Strain and serve in a highball glass and garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Horizon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1 oz. Bacardi Light Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Orange Juice', '1 dash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass and nearly fill with orange juice. Add a dash of cranberry juice and float Bacardi 151.

Name: Horizon Banana
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '6 1/2 oz. Ginger Ale', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix banana liqueur, melon liqueur and ginger ale together with ice. Strain into a 10 oz. tall glass (ice optional). Top with grenedine. Garnish with an orange wheel. Viola you've got yourself a Horizon Banana.

Name: Hornijo
Ingredients: ['2 tsp. Sugar', '7 Mint Leaves', 'Club Soda', '3 part(s) Hornitos Reposado Tequila', '1 Lime Halved']
Making: Muddle sugar, mint and lime in a tall glass, add club soda and Hornitos over ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Hornitos Dog Daze
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Hornitos Plata Tequila', '1/4 part(s) DeKuyper Mixed Berry Medley Schnapps', '1/4 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1/4 part(s) Lime Juice', '1 pinch(es) Black Pepper', '3 part(s) Beer (American Pilsner)']
Making: Combine all ingredients (except for beer) in a shaker. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Drink and follow with the pilsner.

Name: Hornitos Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hornitos Anejo Tequila', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Add vermouth, bitters and tequila to rocks glass, pour into shaker and then back into rocks glass or straight up into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with Orange Twist.

Name: Hornitos Pomerita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Hornitos Plata Tequila', '1 part(s) Dekuyper Pomegranate Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup']
Making: Add all ingredients to shaker. Shake well. Strain into rocks glass filled with ice or into chilled cocktail glass straight up. Garnish with lime wheel.

Name: Hornpipe
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '2 tsp. Cherry Brandy', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Horny Green Lantern
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Build in order over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Horny Maria
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tanduay Silver Asian Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '2 oz. Pineapple Orange Juice']
Making: Shake the ingredients with ice then pour into a tall glass. Garnish with Pineapple and orange fruit.

Name: Horny Nut (Mich's Maniac Mocha)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao']
Making: Pour ingredients ina bar blender. Fill with ice and blend until smooth. Top with whipped cream if desired.

Name: Horny Shamrock
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Orange Juice (To taste)']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Horse and Jockey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Anejo Rum', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Horse and Rider
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Crown Royal']
Making: Pour into a lowball glass. Can be drank neat or on the rocks.

Name: Horse Feather
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rye Whiskey', 'Ginger Ale', '1 dash(es) Bitters', '1 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour over ice in a chilled highball glass and fill with ginger ale. Garnish with a marachino cherry.

Name: Horse Piss
Ingredients: ['2/3 cup(s) Rye Whiskey (Preferably Canadian Mist)', '1/3 cup(s) 7-Up', '1/3 cup(s) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Combine and serve in a tumbler.

Name: Horse's Neck
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '5 oz. Ginger Ale', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Place a lemon peel spiral in a highball glass and drape one end of it over the rim of the glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour the brandy, Ginger Ale, and Bitters into the glass. Stir well.

Name: Horse's Neck With A Twist
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 Lemon', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Make a spiral with the peel of the whole lemon and put it in a collins glass, with one end hanging over the rim of the glass. Add ice cubes and fill with the scotch. Top up with Ginger Ale and stir well.

Name: Horsley's Honor
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Applejack', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, Applejack, and Triple Sec. Stir well and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Hot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Brandy', '1 Egg', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Milk (Hot)']
Making: Mix all the ingredients, except the milk, in a tall glass. Add the milk. Stir and garnish with grated nutmeg.

Name: Hot Anal Sex
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass filled with ice.

Name: Hot and Cool Clontarf
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Clontarf Irish Whiskey', '1 tsp. Simple Syrup', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '3 slice(s) Jalapeno Pepper Seeds Removed']
Making: Build in an ice-filled rocks glass. Garnish with a cucumber slice.

Name: Hot Blah!
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', 'Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Dilute the sweet and sour mix with water and mix with the vodka. Pour over ice in a lowball glass, add the shot of Hot Damn and hold your breath!!!

Name: Hot Chocolate #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '6 oz. Milk', "Hershey's Chocolate Syrup (To taste)"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Hot Chocolate Almond
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '5 oz. Hot Chocolate']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Hot Cinnamon Roll
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', 'Apple Cider (Hot)']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and fill with schnapps. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Hot Cola
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) After Shock Liqueur', '1 part(s) Cherry Cola or Dr. Pepper']
Making: Mix After Shock and cherry cola and serve over ice in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Hot Dick n Cider
Ingredients: ['2 oz. George Dickel Tennessee Sour Mash', '6 oz. Apple Cider (hot)']
Making: Served neat in an Irish Coffee mug. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry pick.

Name: Hot Gin Toddy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 Sugar Cube', 'Water (Boiling)']
Making: Put sugar into an Irish coffee mug and fill 2/3 full with boiling water. Add gin and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

Name: Hot Gold
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Amaretto', '6 oz. Orange Juice (Very warm)', '1 stick(s) Cinnamon']
Making: Pour orange juice into a wine glass and add Amaretto. Garnish with the stick of cinnamon as stirrer and serve.

Name: Hot Mon Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 tsp. Benedictine']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Twist a lemon peel and drop into the glass.

Name: Hot Pants
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 tbsp. Grapefruit Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass rimmed with salt.

Name: Hot Pecker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Single Malt Scotch Whisky', '1 1/2 oz. Firewater', '1/2 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix and drink over rocks.

Name: Hot Pussy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '2 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce', '1 oz. La Grande Passion Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Hot Rum Toddy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '1 Sugar Cube', 'Water (Boiling)']
Making: Put sugar into and Irish coffee mug and fill 2/3 full with boiling water. Add rum and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

Name: Hot Sex
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine over ice in a rocks glass. Add grenadine last and garnish with cherries.

Name: Hot Springs Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Wine', '1 tbsp. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Hot Throbbing Banana
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '3/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka (Chilled)', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Kahlua', '3/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream (Chilled)']
Making: Mix all the liquors in a rocks glass. Serve with a stemless Maraschino cherry at the bottom. Shoot all 4 1/2 oz and enjoy the cherry.

Name: Hot Wet and Sticky
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Safari', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir into a glass filled with ice and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Hot Whiskey
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1 tsp. Sugar', '3 Cloves', '1 slice(s) Lemon', 'Water (Hot)']
Making: Stick the cloves in the lemon, and drop in a mug. Add the whiskey, the sugar and the hot water and serve immediately.

Name: Hot Whiskey Toddy
Ingredients: ['1 Sugar Cube', '2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', 'Water (Boiling)']
Making: Put sugar into an Irish coffee mug and fill 2/3 full with boiling water. Add blended Scotch whisky and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

Name: Hotel Plaza Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Gin']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a crushed slice of pineapple and serve.

Name: Houlama
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '2/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/3 oz. Lime Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour into a tall glass, fill with ginger ale and stir.

Name: Hourglass
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Spiced Rum", '4 oz. Orange Juice', 'splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Serve over ice.

Name: HPNO - Blue Dreamsicle
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. Rum (Vanilla Flavoured)', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice and serve in a rocks glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: HPNO-Colada
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '2 oz. Coconut Liqueur', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Blend ingredients with ice, serve in a hurricane glass and add a splash of Grenadine to color. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: HPNO-Rita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice, pour into a salt-rimmed glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: HPNOTIQ & 7
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Serve over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: HPNOTIQ Amaretto
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Hpnotiq Blue Devil
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Scotch (Single Malt)']
Making: Pour HPNOTIQ and dry vermouth into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass and stir briefly. Float the Scotch on top of the drink. - Gary Regan

Name: HPNOTIQ Blue Wave
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. White Wine', '1 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour chilled HPNOTIQ and white wine into a Champagne flute. Garnish with a raspberry and lemon twist.

Name: HPNOTIQ Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake well or blend. Pour into a rocks or hurricane glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: HPNOTIQ Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 splash(es) White Rum', 'wedge(s) Lime']
Making: Muddle lime wedges in the bottom of a glass. Add HPNOTIQ, splash of rum, crushed ice and stir.

Name: HPNOTIQ Chill
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Serve over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: HPNOTIQ Dreamy (Bellini)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Champagne']
