Making: Pour HPNOTIQ and peach schnapps into a Champagne flute. Top with Champagne. Garnish with a peach slice.

Name: HPNOTIQ Green Lantern
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Serve over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: HPNOTIQ Heaven
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. Champagne', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Pour chilled HPNOTIQ and Champagne into a Champagne flute. Slowly add Chambord. Garnish with cherries.

Name: HPNOTIQ Hulk
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. Cognac']
Making: Layer over ice in a rocks glass. Stir for transformation.

Name: HPNOTIQ Island
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps']
Making: Pour over ice in a hurricane glass and stir. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: HPNOTIQ Lei
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Banana Rum', '1 oz. Mango Liqueur', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: HPNOTIQ Lemonade
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Lemonchello', '1 oz. Champagne', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Pour chilled HPNOTIQ, lemoncello and Champagne into a Champagne flute. Add a splash of lime juice. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: HPNOTIQ Metro
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice (White)']
Making: Serve over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: HPNOTIQ Metropolitan
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice (White)', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour chilled HPNOTIQ, white cranberry juice and Champagne into a Champagne flute. Garnish with a cranberry or a strawberry.

Name: HPNOTIQ Mimosa (Hpnosia)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. Champagne']
Making: Pour chilled HPNOTIQ and Champagne into a Champagne flute. Garnish with a lemon twist or orange wheel.

Name: HPNOTIQ Mojito (HPNO-Hito)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. White Rum', '3 oz. Club Soda', 'Mint Leaves']
Making: Muddle 6 fresh mint leaves in the bottom of a glass. Add HPNOTIQ, rum, crushed ice and stir. Garnish with a mint sprig and top with club soda.

Name: HPNOTIQ Nirvana
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. Champagne', 'Grenadine']
Making: Pour chilled HPNOTIQ and Champagne into a Champagne flute. Slowly add a touch of grenadine. Garnish with a strawberry. Gaylord Lamy, Dunes Bar – Boston

Name: HPNOTIQ Patriotic Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Coconut Milk', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Strawberry (Puree)']
Making: Combine rum, coconut milk, lime juice, pineapple juice, strawberry puree and 1/2 cup crushed ice in a blender. Pour HPNOTIQ into a margarita glass and layer blended mix on top. Garnish with coconut flakes or use a salt-rimmed glass as a variation.

Name: HPNOTIQ Peach Spray
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice (White)', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: HPNOTIQ Wedding Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', 'Prosecco']
Making: Pour chilled gin, HPNOTIQ, and amaretto into a Champagne flute. Top with the prosecco, and stir just to mix. Garnish with a lemon twist. - Gary and Mardee Regan

Name: Hudson Bay
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 tsp. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 tsp. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Hugs-N-Kisses
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Kelli from Applebees in Marietta, Georgia made this for me. It has a very sweet maple flavor.

Name: Hula Hula
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Orange Juice', '1/4 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Build in a cocktail glass.

Name: Hulk Smash
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Smirnoff Orange Twist Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'dnL Soda']
Making: In a 16 oz (or bigger) glass mix Smirnoff Orange Twist Vodka, triple sec and lime juice. Add ice and fill glass with the bright green dnL soda. Stir. Gently add the Chambord to the center of the glass. DO NOT STIR! The purple Chambord will make a column of purple in the center but then will settle towards the bottom. Enjoy and Hulk out!

Name: Humilitas
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '4 oz. Lemonade Mix']
Making: Prepare the lemonade using only 1/2 of the water called for. Mix in the alcohol and shake well. Rim the glass with salt.

Name: Humm On My Nutz
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', 'Coca Cola', '1 splash(es) Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Combine Amaretto and Drambuie over ice in a highball glass. Top up with Coca Cola and finish with a splash of Bailey's Irish Cream.

Name: Hummer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 oz. White Rum', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

Name: Hummer #2
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Admiral Nelson's Spiced Rum", '1 oz. Caffe Lolita Coffee Liqueur', '2 scoop(s) Ice Cream Vanilla']
Making: Blend with a bit of crushed ice, serve in a decorative glass.

Name: Hummingbird
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum Cream Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Tia Maria (You can use Kahlua instead)', '1 Banana', 'dash(es) Strawberry Syrup', 'dash(es) Milk']
Making: Blend all the ingredients with some ice and serve as a smoothie.

Name: Hummingbird (Antigua Style)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Irish Cream', '3/4 cup(s) Strawberry Syrup']
Making: Combine all ingredients in blender with 1 cup ice until smooth. Pour into a highball glass with a strawberry garnish.

Name: Hunter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Huntin' Camp Concoxion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Ginger', '1 squirt(s) Grenadine', '2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass.

Name: Huntsman Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Jamaica Rum', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Hurdy Gurdy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cream', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Add ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake and pour.

Name: Hurricane #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 tbsp. Passion Fruit Syrup', '2 tsp. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Hurricane #2
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Pineapple Juice', '4 oz. Orange Juice', "1 1/4 oz. Myer's Rum", '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Build in a parfait glass.

Name: Hurricane Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '3/4 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Hurricane Haz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Passoa Passion Fruit', 'Raspberry Juice', 'Sprite']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with equal parts raspberry juice and Sprite. Garnish with a twist of lime.

Name: Hurricane Leah
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Cherry Brandy', '3 oz. Sour Mix', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a parfait glass and stir. Garnish with an orange wheel.

Name: Hurt Me
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Start by pouring about 1oz of the Kahlua into a rocks glass, highball, coffee mug (or whatever you have lying around but NOT A SHOT GLASS!). Then, add the vodka, slowly. Sprinkle or splash lightly with Southern Comfort (to taste). Then add the last ½ oz of Kahlua and stir. This stirring is very important, otherwise the drink will remained layered. Thus drink has also been called a “Black Russian SUNY Albany derivative”. About 2 of these will make you totally forget about that physics test on Monday, and if you double the ingredients, it will make you forget how to walk. People have also experimented by using Spiced Rum or Black Sambuca in place of Southern Comfort. Good luck. This drink was invented the day after spring finals, 2000 by the unknown person who submitted it and a bunch of his/her SUNY Albany student friends.

Name: Huskey
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '3 oz. Strawberry Daiquiri Mix', '4 1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Hussey
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Whiskey', 'Limeade', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Top off with just enough grenadine to make it pink. If you don't have grenadine on hand, cherry juice will work, and you can add some cherries on the top too!

Name: Hype Shambles
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Hype Energy Drink', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Champagne']
Making: Combine all ingredients and serve chilled.

Name: Hypothermia Granny
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '3 oz. Gatorade (Blue)']
Making: Combine with 4 to 8 ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: I Spirit Bloody Mary
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) I Spirit Vodka', '1 part(s) Tomato Juice']
Making: Add lemon juice, Worchester Sauce, Tobasco and Celery salt to taste

Name: I Spirit Vodka Sour
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. I Spirit Vodka', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Sugar', '1 slice(s) Orange']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: I'm Blue Without Wendy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a blender. Add ice. Use each blender setting at for at least 10 seconds.NOTE Remember to toast to WENDY! LONG LIVE WENDY!!!!

Name: Iberian Dawn
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sandeman Porto Tawny Dr. Bamboo recommends the 10 Year Old', '1/4 oz. Cointreau', '2 dash(es) Fee Brothers Peach Bitters', 'Sparkling Wine Dr. Bamboo recommends brut Cava']
Making: Put first 3 ingredients in Champagne flute. Fill with Cava and enjoy!

Name: Ice Bear
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sprite']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with Sprite.

Name: Ice Bet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Build in a brandy snifter.

Name: Ice Breaker #1
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Cognac', '1/4 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Creme de Noyeaux']
Making: Shake ingredients vigorously in ice cube filled mixing glass. Pour into a 14 oz. glass. Garnish with a fruit flag.

Name: Ice Breaker #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 tbsp. Grenadine', '2 tsp. Cointreau']
Making: Blend with 4 oz. of crushed ice for 15 seconds and strain into a sour glass.

Name: Ice Coffee
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Coffee (Cold)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with coffee.

Name: Ice Cream Hogarth
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '3 tbsp. Maple Syrup']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a blender. This drink can be consumed in a number of ways, use your imagination!! Inspired by Steve Hogarth of Marillion.

Name: Ice Mocca
Ingredients: ['3 1/3 oz. Milk', '1 cup(s) Espresso', '2 1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '2 tsp. Cocoa Powder']
Making: Pour into a Boston Shaker with ice. Shake it very well. Fill a cocktail glass with crushed ice. Add a few coffee-beans and pour in your cocktail.

Name: Ice Palace
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

Name: Ice Pick #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Iced Tea']
Making: Put vodka in glass fill with iced tea. Stir in lemon to taste.

Name: Ice Pick #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Snapple (Lemon)']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Throw in a slice of orange. A definite summertime favourite.

Name: Iceberg Yuletide
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Iceberg Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cinnamon Syrup', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Ginger Beer']
Making: Combine ingredients in an ice-filled glass and top with the ginger beer. Garnish with a lime.

Name: Iced Chai Tea Latte
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Voyant Chai Cream Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Tea']
Making: Fill a tall glass with Ice. Add all ingredients and stir. Garnish with a small scoop of Vanilla (or Green Tea) Ice Cream.

Name: Iced Coffee A L'Orange
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '4 tsp. Instant Coffee', '1 cup(s) Triple Sec']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into parfait glass. Garnish with orange slices.

Name: Iced Coffee Fillip
Ingredients: ['2 tsp. Kahlua', 'Coffee (Cooled)']
Making: Mix together in a glass and chill before serving.

Name: Iced Jack
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 can(s) Iced Tea (Nestea)']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Iced Te-Quiller
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', 'Iced Tea', 'Lemon Juice (To taste)', 'Sugar (To taste)']
Making: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice.

Name: Iced-Cappacino Special
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Cappuccino (iced)']
Making: Pour the shots into the iced-cappuccino cup and stir.

Name: Ichabod's Nightmare
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build the ingredients over ice. It looks more interesting if you pour the Blue Curacao last. You see the blue trickle into the red and turn the drink purple.

Name: Ideal Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 tsp. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Idol Black Mint Colins
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Simple Syrup', 'Mint', '2 oz. Idol Vodka', '1 oz. Lime', '2 oz. Marie Brizard Blackberry']
Making: Muddle 3 blackberries, mint, simple syrup and lime. Add ice, Idol Vodka, Blackberry liqueur and shake. Pour into a tall glass and fill with club soda. Garnish with a lime whell and a blackberry.

Name: Idol Chocolate Zintini
Ingredients: ['1 splash(es) Marie Brizard Dark Creme de Cocoa', '1 splash(es) Wine Zinfandel', '2 oz. Idol Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Idol Lavender Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Champagne', '1 oz. Idol Vodka', '3/4 oz. Marie Brizard Parfait Amour']
Making: Combine in a champagne flute and garnish with lavendar and a cherry.

Name: Idol Orange Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Ginger Ale', '1/2 oz. Orange Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Idol Vodka']
Making: Rim a tall glass with cinnamon sugar. Build over ice and garnish with an orange wedge.

Name: Idol Raspberry Cooler
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Marie Brizard Raspberry', '2 oz. Idol Vodka']
Making: Build in a tall glass with ice. Fill with tonic water and garnish with raspberries and a lime wedge.

Name: Iguana
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Illusion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '2/3 oz. White Curacao', '2/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Vodka', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake alcohol with cracked ice and strain into a chilled highball glass. Top up with pineapple juice and add ice. Garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: Illy issimo Amaretto Highball
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Illy Issimo Cappuccino', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Build in a highball glass and garnish with orange zest.

Name: Illy issimo Cafe Mexico
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Egg White', '8 Raspberries', '2 oz. Illy Issimo Cappuccino', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Muddle the raspberries and mix in a cocktail glass.

Name: Illy issimo Chocolate Mochissimo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chocolate Syrup', '1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Cream', '2 oz. Illy Issimo Caffe', 'Nutmeg']
Making: Mix in a highball glass and garnish with shaved nutmeg.

Name: Illy issimo Latte Gin Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Heavy Cream', '1 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1/2 oz. Egg White', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '2 oz. Illy Issimo Latte Macchiato']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Illy issimo Strawberry Cafe Colada
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Strawberry Syrup', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '2 oz. Illy Issimo Latte Macchiato']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass.

Name: Imitation Beer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum (Or to taste)', 'Lemonade (Or to taste)', '1/4 tsp. Sugar (Or to taste)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix the rum, sugar and lemonade to your own personal taste, pour into a beer mug/glass and top with whipped cream.

Name: Immaculata
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Imperial Berry
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Moet and Chandon Brut Imperial Champagne', '1 oz. Raspberry Jam (or puree)', '1 splash(es) Grand Marnier']
Making: Stir ingredients with 2 oz. of Moet in a mixing glass. Strain into a chilled rocks glass. Add remaining Moet and garnish with a raspberry and a mint leaf.

Name: Imperial Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Imperial Fizz
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Name: Imperial Mango
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Moet and Chandon Nectar Imperial Champagne', '1/2 oz. Mango Nectar', '1 splash(es) Grand Marnier', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake all ingredients except for Moet in a shaker with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add moet and garnish with a mango spear.

Name: Imperial Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mandarine Napoleon', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 Egg White', '2 oz. Ginger Beer (Fever Tree)']
Making: Pour all ingredients except ginger beer into a mixing glass and shake vigorously for 20 seconds. Pour the ginger beer in the bottom of the serving glass and strain the cocktail over it. Finally garnish with a few drops of green chartreuse.

Name: Improved Brandy Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Cognac', '2 dash(es) The Bitter Truth Creole Bitters', '2 dash(es) Absinthe', '1/3 oz. Sugar Syrup']
Making: Stir in a mixing glass with ice and strain into a chilled tumbler or cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: In The Sack
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Cream Sherry', '2 oz. Apricot Nectar', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Incider Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', 'Apple Cider']
Making: Pour into an old-fashioned glass and fill with cider. Garnish with a slice of apple.

Name: Income Tax Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1/4 Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Incredible Hulk
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 tbsp. Sugar', '8 cup(s) Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour rum into glass. Add sugar. Add Mountain Dew till mix turns green.

Name: Indian Summer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Apple Schnapps', 'Apple Cider (Hot)']
Making: Wet rim of a sour glass and dip in cinnamon. Pour schnapps and fill with cider. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Indifferent Miss
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Simple Syrup', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Pour the rum, juice and syrup over ice in a glass. Stir. Add the soda and stir gently.

Name: Indigo Drop
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (freshly squeezed)', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Sugar the rim of a cocktail glass. Shake everything but the blue curacao with ice and strain into the glass. Pour the blue curaco so it falls to the bottom giving the drink colout. Garnish with a lemon.

Name: Inigo Montoya
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Rum', 'Sangria', 'Surge Energy Drink']
Making: Pour the Bacardi in a highball glass, fill halfway with Sangria, finish with Surge. Can be served with or without ice.

Name: Ink Street
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Instant Apple Pie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Whipped Cream (Canned, ready whip)', 'dash(es) Cinnamon (Powder)', 'Apple Juice']
Making: Pour apple juice, vodka, cinnamon, and whipped cream (in that order) directly into the drinker's mouth, then swallow. If done properly it actually tastes like apple pie.

Name: Instant Death
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '3 oz. Everclear', '3 oz. Jagermeister', '5 oz. Water', 'dash(es) Salt']
Making: Mix alcohol, then water and dash of salt to a mug. You may want to reduce the amount of alcohol somewhat if you do not actually want to die…

Name: Intercourse
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '4 oz. Orange Juice', 'Hawaiian Fruit Punch', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix the Absolut with the orange juice in a cocktail glass. Top with equal amounts of Hawaiian Fruit Punch and Mountain Dew.

Name: International Stinger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Metaxa', '1/2 oz. Galliano']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: IRA (alternative)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey']
Making: Shake vigorously with ice and strain into a highball glass over rocks. This is a version I really like. It is much smoother than the other one listed here on Bar None (which is also very good by the way) and is obviously without the Kahlua. Credit goes to 'THE ULTIMATE A-TO-Z-BAR GUIDE' by Sharon Tyler Herbst and Ron Herbst.

Name: Irish American
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', 'Cola']
Making: Pour over ice in a lowball glass.

Name: Irish Amore
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto di Soronno', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream Pistachio', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream Mint Chocolate Chip', '3 drop(s) Food Colouring Green']
Making: Combine Celtic Crossing, DiSaronno , pistachio and mint chocolate chip ice cream, and green food coloring. Blend with 6 large ice cubes until smooth and serve in a specialty glass.

Name: Irish Apple
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Clontarf Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Berentzen Apfelkorn', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a cocktail shaker partway with ice and then add whiskey, schnapps and cranberry juice. Shake until very cold; strain into a martini glass. Squeeze a drop or two of juice from the lime wedge into the cocktail before using it to garnish.

Name: Irish Apple #2
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1 1/2 part(s) Hiram Walker Sour Apple Schnapps', '5 part(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Serve over ice in tall glass, and garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Irish Beer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Whiskey', '12 oz. Beer']
Making: Pour half the beer in a mug. Add the Irish whiskey into the beer mug. Top with beer.

Name: Irish Black Russian
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Vodka', 'Coca Cola', '1 dash(es) Guinness']
Making: Build in highball glass.

Name: Irish Blast
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', 'Powerade Mountain Blast']
Making: Pour Jameson's into a tall glass over ice and fill with the Powerade.

Name: Irish Blue Bull
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Knockeen Hills Irish Poteen - Farmers Strength', '1 oz. Bacardi Light Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Stir ingredients together in a chilled Highball glass.

Name: Irish Brogue
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tullamore Dew Irish Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Irish Mist']
Making: Serve in a rocks glass over ice.

Name: Irish Car Bomb #2
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Guinness Extra Stout', '1 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Fill a shot glass with Jameson and Baileys. Fill a pint glass about 4/5ths full of Guinness. Drop in the shot glass and drink all in one go (like a boilermaker).

Name: Irish Charlie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Stir and strain into a cordial glass.

Name: Irish Chocolate Cement
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Milk', 'Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Serve in a 12 oz. glass and drizze the chocolate syrup on top. NOT FOR THE FAINT OF STOMACH…Pray you are Irish.

Name: Irish Cream - Bailey's #1
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Whipping Cream', '1 1/2 tsp. Vanilla', '1 3/4 cup(s) Brandy', '2 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup', '3 Eggs', '14 oz. Sweetened Condensed Milk (Not evaporated)']
Making: Combine all the ingredients in a blender. Blend on lowest setting until frothy or well blended.

Name: Irish Cream - Bailey's #2
Ingredients: ['3 Eggs', '1 tsp. Coconut Essence', '1 1/2 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup', '1 cup(s) Whiskey', '1/2 tsp. Instant Coffee']
Making: Blend all ingredients in a blender for no longer than 2 minutes. Pour over ice and enjoy straight away.

Name: Irish Cream - Bailey's #3
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Half and Half Cream', '2 Eggs', '1 1/2 cup(s) Irish Whiskey', '2 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup', 'dash(es) Cinnamon', '1 tsp. Vanilla']
Making: Blend all ingredients in a blender until mixed well, serve cold. Stores up to two weeks in the fridge.

Name: Irish Cream Soda
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Sprite']
Making: Pour Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum over ice in a rocks glass. Fill with Sprite and serve.

Name: Irish Dream
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Hazelnut Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '3/4 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '4 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend ingredients with ice until smooth and pour into frosted pilsner glass. Top with whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles.

Name: Irish Enema
Ingredients: ['4 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Chocolate Syrup (To taste)', 'Creme de Menthe (To taste)']
Making: Blend until smooth and drink.

Name: Irish Flag #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Menthe (Green)', '1 oz. Irish Cream (White)', '1 oz. Grand Marnier (Orange)']
Making: Layer in a cordial glass.

Name: Irish Flag #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Menthe (Green)', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream (White)', '1 oz. Southern Comfort (Orange)']
Making: Pour into a Cordial Glass in order of green, white, gold, taking care not to mix the layers.

Name: Irish Fog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Mist', '1 oz. Irish Whiskey', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Fill a rocks glass with ice. Add ingredients and stir.

Name: Irish Granny
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '3 oz. Gatorade (Green)']
Making: Combine with 4 to 8 ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: Irish Hooker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1 splash(es) Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Irish Mist', '1 splash(es) Kahlua', '1 splash(es) Frangelico']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice.

Name: Irish Iced Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '3 oz. Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Espresso (chilled)']
Making: Mix all ingedients and serve on the rocks. This is one drink to wake up to! Great for long winter nights with friends over a game of cards or next to a crackling fire. Not a party drink.

Name: Irish Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Knockeen Hills Irish Poteen - Gold Strength', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Pepsi Cola', 'Champagne']
Making: Serve in Collins glass over ice. Top with either the Pepsi Cola or Champagne.

Name: Irish Jig
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Clontarf Irish Whiskey', 'Ginger Ale', 'Peach Nectar']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice and add the Clontarf Irish Whiskey and equal parts of the ginger ale and peach nectar. Garnish with a peach slice and a mint leaf.

Name: Irish Julep
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey 12 Year Old', '1/2 oz. Averna Bitters - Amaro', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 oz. Water', '6 Mint Leaves', '3 sprig(s) Mint']
Making: Pour all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and pour into a tall glass. Garnish with gooseberry coins and a basil leaf.

Name: Irish Kiss
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Bushmill's Irish Whiskey", '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Irish Lady
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '2 oz. Green Curacao', '2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Irish Milkmaid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Boru Vodka', '1 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', "1 oz. Brady's Irish Cream"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass filled with ice.

Name: Irish Milkshake
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Combine in a small glass filled with finely crushed ice. Delicious!

Name: Irish Rickey
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Pour Irish whiskey and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Irish Shillelagh
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 1/2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1 tbsp. Sloe Gin', '1 tbsp. White Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with fresh raspberries, strawberries, a cherry and two peach slices.

Name: Irish Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beefeater 24', '2/3 oz. Suze', '2/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Yellow Chartreuse', '2 tsp. Monin Green Tea Concentrate', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake ingredients over ice and strain into an ice-filled glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Irish Spring
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Peach Brandy', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

Name: Irish Tea Party
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Pernod Absinthe', '1 part(s) Jameson Irish Whiskey', '4 part(s) Tea (Green, sweetened)']
Making: Rinse rocks glass with Pernod Absinthe, Add ice then combine the Jameson and green tea. Shake and strain into an ice filled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime.

Name: Irish Triathlon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Boru Vodka', '1 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', "1 oz. Brady's Irish Cream"]
Making:
Once every four years something amazing happens in the world of sports. For a few short weeks, over 10,000 athletes from 202 nations unite to compete in the greatest, most honorable sporting event in the world. Castle Brands invites you to get into the Olympic spirit with a few of their spirits. Enjoy their "international" cocktails inspired by the 2008 Summer Olympic Games.
Shake ingredients and serve over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Irish Trinity
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Tullamore Dew Irish Whiskey', '1 part(s) Irish Mist', '1 part(s) Carolans Irish Cream Liqueur']
Making: Serve in a rocks glass over ice.

Name: Irish Wake
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Irish Mist', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a snifter.

Name: Irish Whiskey
Ingredients: ['1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/2 tsp. Anisette', '1/4 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', 'dash(es) Bitters', '2 oz. Irish Whiskey']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Irish Whiskey Highball
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Irish Whiskey', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour into a highball glass over ice cubes and fill with Ginger Ale. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Irishman In Hawaii
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane']
Making: Crushed ice in shacker. Pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an umbrella poked into a cherry.

Name: Iron Butterfly
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Pour vodka over ice, add Kahlua and Irish cream. Stir add 1 to 3 filbert nut(s).

Name: IS Blue Lagoon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. IS Vodka', '1 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Add IS VODKA, Blueberry Schnapps and Blue Curacao to ice-filled shaker... shake well for refreshing crystals. Rim a martini glass with sugar, then pour. Add 3 blueberries and savour this Fruity Delight.

Name: IS Cream Soda
Ingredients: ['2 oz. IS Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Fill highball glass with ice, add ÍS VODKA, Amaretto, and finish with Ginger Ale. Swirl with a straw and enjoy this simply delicious treat with an Adult Twist.

Name: Is Paris Burning?
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Stirred, not shaken. Rocks acceptable. Fresh raspberry optional.

Name: Isbjorn
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '7-Up (Or Sprite)']
Making: Pour the alcohol over ice in a cocktail glass and top up with 7-Up.

Name: Island Breeze #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Coconut Rum', '6 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine in a tall glass over ice. Stir well.

Name: Island Breeze #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Island Comfort
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '4 oz. Pepsi Cola']
Making: Pour ingredients directly into a highball glass filled with ice. Mix and garnish with a swizzle stick and a lemon. Jaycen says the cocktail should taste exactly like a special iced tea.

Name: Island Cosmo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Cointreau', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Island F**k
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Island Toy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/4 oz. Peach Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice in a glass. Stir.

Name: Isle Royal
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour Crown Royal into a cocktail glass. Fill with pineapple juice and serve.

Name: Italian Delight
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Italian Double Gold
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pallini Limoncello', '1 1/2 oz. Alize Gold Passion', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making:
Once every four years something amazing happens in the world of sports. For a few short weeks, over 10,000 athletes from 202 nations unite to compete in the greatest, most honorable sporting event in the world. Castle Brands invites you to get into the Olympic spirit with a few of their spirits. Enjoy their "international" cocktails inspired by the 2008 Summer Olympic Games.
Shake ingredients and serve on the rocks.

Name: Italian Dream
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Blend with 1/2 cup of ice until smooth and serve in a parfait glass.

Name: Italian Fascination
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3 oz. Cream (Can be substituted by milk or ice cream)']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Italian Heather
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Galliano']
Making: Pour the Scotch and Galliano into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice. Stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Italian Ice
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add Vodka, Blue Curaco and Chambord. Stir and add lime juice. Top with 7-up and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Italian Margarita #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Salt']
Making: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice, dip rim in salt. Shake with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve.

Name: Italian Margarita #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Sugar']
Making: Rub the rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice, dip rim in sugar. Shake (or stir) the ingredients with ice, strain into the sugar-rimmed glass, and serve.

Name: Italian Russian
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice in a rocks glass. Twist an orange peel over the glass and drop it in.

Name: Italian Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Citrus Vodka', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 splash(es) Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour over ice into a sugar rimmed parfait glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Italian Soda
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '2 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour over ice, stir and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Italian Sombrero
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake Amaretto and cream well, pour into a champagne flute, and serve.

Name: Italian Surfer #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Brandy', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour into a collins glass and fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a cherry.

Name: Italian Surfer #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a collins glass and fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple slice and a cherry.

Name: Italian Surfer With A Russian Attitude
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix in a collins glass.

Name: Italian Tickler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto (Preferably DiSaronno Originale)', '5 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Pour over ice in highball glass. Garnish with a splash of passion.

Name: Itallion Stallion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Galliano', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '2 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Blend all the ingredients and pour into a wine glass.

Name: Izayoi
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Liqueur', '2/3 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/6 oz. Vodka', '1/6 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/6 oz. Grenadine']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass, and serve. (Name means 16th moon in Japanese)

Name: J. R.'s Godchild
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Milk']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Bourbon whiskey, Amaretto, and milk. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: J. R.'s Godfather
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine both of the ingredients. Stir to mix the flavours.

Name: J. R.'s Revenge
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: J.R. Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour whiskey then rum over ice in a lowball glass, add lemon juice, then fill with Coke. Stir and enjoy. Surprisingly good!

Name: Jack and Coke
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '10 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Pour JD into large glass filled with ice. Fill with Coca-Cola. Stir gently.

Name: Jack and Dewanne
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", 'Mountain Dew']
Making: That's it... just mix and enjoy.

Name: Jack Hammer #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', 'Milk']
Making: Serve over ice in a collins glass and top off with milk. Makes a great drink but powerful drink.

Name: Jack Hammer #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with pineapple juice.

Name: Jack Me Off
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Applejack', '1/2 oz. Midori', '3 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with 7-Up.

Name: Jack Me Off And Coke
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Fill highball glass with ice. Pour in Jack Daniel's Whiskey and add Coca Cola until almost filled. Top with Bailey's Irish Cream.

Name: Jack Me Up
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '7-Up']
Making: Combine over ice in a collins glass.

Name: Jack Off
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '1/2 cup(s) Vanilla Coffee Creamer']
Making: Mix well over ice in short rocks glass.

Name: Jack Rose
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Applejack', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '4 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Jack Slams Pam On A Harley Davidson
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Yukon Jack', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Mix ingredients in a cocktail glass and fill with sweet and sour mix. Top with whipped cream and start slammin!

Name: Jack The Ripper #1
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '3/4 oz. Butter Shots']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a brandy snifter.

Name: Jack the Tippler
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Pumpkin Puree', '1/4 oz. Maple Syrup', '1 dash(es) Pumpkin Pie Spice']
Making: Combine in a shaker filled with ice and shake vigorously. Strain in to a highball glass filled with ice.

Name: Jack's Bagpipe
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gentleman', '1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Combine in a collins glass and fill up with Ginger Ale.

Name: Jack's Creamsicle
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Golden Pear', '3/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Milk', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Build in order over ice in a lowball glass. Enjoy!

Name: Jack's Jam
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Apple Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '2 tbsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a mint sprig and a maraschino cherry.

Name: Jack's Uncle F**ker
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 1/4 cup(s) Milk', '1 tbsp. Sugar', '1 tsp. Vanilla Extract', '1 Egg']
Making: Beat the egg, then combine it in a glass with all the other ingredients. Mix until smooth.

Name: Jack-In-The-Box
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Brandy', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jackie O's Rose
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Cointreau', 'Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add sugar to taste.

Name: Jacqueline
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 pinch(es) Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jade #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 tsp. Green Creme de Menthe', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Jade #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple spear.

Name: Jaffa Schnapps
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Orange Curacao', '3 oz. Milk']
Making: Line the rim of a large cocktail glass with sugar syrup and shaved chocolate. Shake the ingredients with ice and strain into the glass. Garnish with orange sprinkles on drink.

Name: Jager Barrel
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jagermeister', '1 part(s) Root Beer Schnapps', 'Cola']
Making: Pour Jagermeister and schnapps into an ice filled rocks glass. Fill with cola.

Name: Jager Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink', '1 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Pour the Redbull into a keg cup so that it will be level with the top of the shot glass full of Jagermeister dropped into the cup. Dring fast, enjoy.

Name: Jager Club
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Jagermeister', 'Club Soda']
Making: Pour Jagermeister into an ice filled rocks glass. Fill with club soda and garnish with lime.

Name: Jager Float
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '4 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Shake Jagermeister and Bailey's Irish Cream over ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with Coca Cola. Should taste like a root beer float.

Name: Jager Merry Cherry
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jagermeister', '1/4 part(s) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 part(s) Chocolate Liqueur', 'Half and Half Cream']
Making: Combine Jager and Chambord and chocolate liqueur in rocks glass. Fill with half and half. Garnish with a cherry

Name: Jager Monster
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jagermeister', 'Grenadine', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour Jagermeister into a tall glass. Add a dash of grenadine and fill with orange juice.

Name: Jager on the Rocks
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Fill rocks glass with ice. Pour in Jagermeister. Add a twist of orange or lemon peel.

Name: Jager Rita
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Jagermeister', '1 part(s) Triple Sec', 'Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Combine Jagermeister triple sec in an ice filled cocktail glass. Fill with sour mix.

Name: Jager Tonic
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Jagermeister', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Pour Jagermeister into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with tonic water and garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Jager Vacation
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jagermeister Chilled', '2 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '3 part(s) Pina Colada Mix']
Making: Add all three ingredients in a shaker or blender and mix with ice. Garnish with your favorite tropical fruit!

Name: Jager-ale
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jagermeister (Chilled)', '1 bottle(s) Zima (Citrus flavoured)']
Making: Combine in a highball glass.

Name: Jagersicle
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jagermeister', '1 part(s) Coffee Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Cola']
Making: Mix and serve over ice.

Name: JagerTron
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', 'Energy Drink (Rockstar)', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Fill a Collins glass with ice and add Absolut Citron. Fill nearly to top with Rockstar and float Jagermeister.

Name: Jaime Molido
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Honey Syrup Clover - 2 parts clover honey and 1 part water', '2 oz. Honey Vodka', '3 Blackberry (ies)', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making:
A sensual and elegant cocktail inspired by Moix's father. This creation pleases both palate and sight and its handsome look makes it the talk of any cocktail hour
In a pint glass add all spirits and mixers, add ice and shake vigorously for 6 sec. Strain in a Collins glass filled half way with cubed ice. Top off with crushed ice. Then crown with hand made blackberry jam(3 blakcberries and 1/2 oz. honey).
Pablo Moix's undeniable passion for mixing drinks along with nearly 16 years of experience behind the bar, from dive bars to LA's hottest restaurants and nightclubs, have gained him recognition as one of the region's most respected mixologist.
Pablo earned second place honors at the Leblon Cachaca Competition and his unique cocktail blend at the Flor de Cana Competition led him to the victorious first place win.
Currently, Pablo is Principal Bartender for the ONE Group Los Angeles and the Master Mixologist at the acclaimed STK restaurant where he develops signature cocktails with what he describes as a "California Fresh" sensibility, balancing complex spirits and bitters with fresh, straight forward fruit flavors that appeal to connoisseurs and newcomers alike.

Name: Jake
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", 'Coca Cola']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with Coca-Cola.

Name: Jalisco Swing
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Alma De Agave Silver Tequila', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Peach Brandy', '1 splash(es) Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Add tequila, lime juice and brandy into a tumbler. Shake well, then pour into a high ball glass filled with ice. Float Raspberry liqueur on top and garnish with a Raspberry.

Name: Jamacian Ice Tea
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Pina Colada Mix', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a 12 oz glass with ice and mix in the ingredients.

Name: Jamaica Glow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Jamaica Rum', '1 tbsp. Claret', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jamaica Granito
Ingredients: ['1 scoop(s) Sherbet (Lemon)', '1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Triple Sec', 'Club Soda']
Making: Pour in a collins glass and stir. Fill with Club Soda and sprinkle nutmeg on top.

Name: Jamaica Hop
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coffee Brandy', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jamaica Hummingbird
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Rum Cream Liqueur', '1/2 Banana', '1 splash(es) Milk', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Put all ingredients into a blender and add ice. Blend to make a great yummy milkshake-like drink.

Name: Jamaica Me Crazy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amber Rum', '1/2 oz. Tia Maria', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour in rum and Tia Maria. Add pineapple juice.

Name: Jamaica Rum
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Gomme Syrup', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jamaican "No Problem"
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Cranberry Juice', 'dash(es) Bacardi Rum']
Making: Pour the Bacardi 151 Proof rum into a shot glass. Stir the other ingredients into a collins glass. Take the shot of 151 and chase with the cocktail.

Name: Jamaican 10-Speed
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Creme de Banane (Optional)', '1 splash(es) Milk', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour the liquors into an ice-filled highball glass and refill glass with ice, pour pineapple juice and splash of milk into glass. Shake well.

Name: Jamaican Bahama Mama
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Add all but Spiced Rum and grenadine to a shaker glass with ice. Shake with ice and pour into a specialty glass. Float Spiced rum and grenadine. Note: 3 oz. Pina Colada Mix may be substituted for the pineapple and coconut.

Name: Jamaican Banana
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 Banana']
Making: Blend all ingredients (except sliced banana) in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a large brandy snifter and add sliced banana. Sprinkle lightly with nutmeg, top with a whole strawberry, and serve.

Name: Jamaican Beer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ale', '1/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/4 oz. Dry Gin', '1/4 oz. Whiskey', 'drop(s) Red Vodka', 'drop(s) Blue Curacao']
Making: Pour vermouths, gin, and whiskey in a large glass. Add the beer and top with the drops of Curacao and vodka.

Name: Jamaican Bloodclot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jamaica Rum', '1 oz. Cherry Syrup', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix rum and syrup in a tall glass over ice. Add orange juice. Drink. Repeat. Repeat. Repeat. Fall Over.

Name: Jamaican Blues
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Coconut Cream', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend with 12 oz. of crushed ice until smooth. Serve in specialty glass and garnish with a pineapple fruit flag.

Name: Jamaican Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Jamaican Cooler
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix together and serve with ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Jamaican Crawler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a collins glass and float grenadine.

Name: Jamaican Hurricane
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cream']
Making: Shake ingredients (equal amounts of pineapple juice and cream) with ice. Strain into a highball glass.

Name: Jamaican Jill
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '3 oz. Cream']
Making: Combine in a mixer over ice. Shake and then strain into a martini glass. Garnish with flaked chocolate or cocoa powder.

Name: Jamaican Lifesaver
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 1/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '3 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a hurricane glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Jamaican Me Crazy
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Admiral Nelson's Raspberry Rum", "1 oz. Admiral Nelson's Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Arrow Banana Cream Liqueur', 'splash(es) Cranberry Juice', 'splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix in shaker glass. Serve on the rocks in a tall glass.

Name: Jamaican Reindeer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amber Rum', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Eggnog']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Variation: Rim glass with cinnamon.

Name: Jamaican Rum Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jamaica Rum', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jamaican Twist
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 oz. Midori', '3/4 oz. Creme de Banane', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake the alcohol with ice, pour (do not strain) into a cocktail glass and fill to taste with pineapple juice. Enjoy the islands, Mon!

Name: Jamaican Yo Yo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Tia Maria Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: James Dalton
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Gatorade (Melon)', '2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Mix with ice and serve in a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: James Special
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Serve over ice in a Hurricane Glass. So far everyone who has tried it loves it!! Although some say it is a little sweet. Perfect for those who don't want to taste to much alchohol but still feel its effects.

Name: James The Second Comes First
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Tawny Port', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jameson and Ginger
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Jameson Irish Whiskey', 'Ginger Ale', '1 squirt(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Pour Jameson into an ice filled highball glass. Fill with ginger ale and garnish with a squeeze of lime.

Name: Jameson Julep
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1/4 part(s) Simple Syrup', '4 sprig(s) Mint', '1 dash(es) Water']
Making: Muddle three mint sprigs with water and simple syrup in a highball glass or julep cup. Add Jameson and stir. Fill the glass with crushed ice, stir and garnish with fresh berries and mint.

Name: Jameson Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1 part(s) Sweet Vermouth', '1 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake over ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Jameson McCree
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 part(s) Jameson Irish Whiskey', '3/4 part(s) Raspberries Puree', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1/2 part(s) Raspberry Liqueur', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake over ice. Pour into a tall Jameson glass (12 oz highball) filled with crushed ice, and garnish with fresh raspberries and a mint leaf.

Name: Jameson Whirlaway
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker White Peach Schnapps', '1 dash(es) Bitters', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Mix all ingredients except Club Soda in a shaker with cracked ice. Pour into a tumbler and top with Club Soda.

Name: Jameson Whiskey Sour
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/3 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1 dash(es) Egg White', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker and shake over ice. Strain into a rocks glass and garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Jamie's Sweet Stuff
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', "3/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Mix in a shaker with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jan's Famous Eggnog
Ingredients: ['12 Eggs (separated)', '1 cup(s) Sugar', '3 pint(s) Heavy Cream', '1/2 tsp. Salt', '1 cup(s) Cognac', '1 cup(s) Bourbon Whiskey', '2 cup(s) Milk']
Making: Beat egg yolks and sugar untill lemon color. Add milk and slowly add the liquor. Beat and then chill several hours. In a separate bowl beat egg whites and salt till peaking. In a separate bowl beat cream till stiff. Fold Cream into yolksand then fold whites into cream mixture. Chill one hour. Sprinkle with Nutmeg. Sing Jaaaannnnn's Fa' mous' and Enjoy

Name: Jane's Absolut Famous Half And Halfs
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Fresca', '1 Absolut Citron Vodka equal amount (to Fresca)', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Gently pour Absolut Citron Vodka over ice in a tall glass and let it rest for 15 seconds. Add Fresca slowly. Top with a dash of Grenadine. Drink with a straw.

Name: Janet's Last Dance
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Melon Schnapps', '6 oz. Coca Cola', '1 Lime']
Making: Mix liquor and fresh lime halves in a glass. Add ice and fill with Coke.

Name: Janna Juice
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Sunny Delight Orange Juice', '1/4 cup(s) Whipped Cream', '3 oz. Citrus Vodka']
Making: Mix juice, vodka and whipping cream in a blender. Pour in glass and top with whipped topping.

Name: Janna's Banana
Ingredients: ['4 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Whipping Cream']
Making: Blend 99 Bananas, Vodka, Cream and Banana Daquari mix in a blender until fully mixed. Pour in a cocktail glass and top with Ready Whip (Whipped Cream).

Name: Janne's Summernight
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Vodka (Smirnoff)', '2/3 oz. Banana Liqueur (Bols)', '1 2/3 oz. Cream', '1/3 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Use a machine mixer and mix with ice. Strain off the ice and pour into a glass. Drink with a thick straw. It will be like an alcoholic milkshake.

Name: Japanese Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1 1/2 tsp. Orgeat Syrup', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lime peel and serve.

Name: Japanese Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tbsp. Port', '1 Egg White', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Name: Japanese Jack
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Wine (Fuki Plum Wine)', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '7-Up (Or Squirt)']
Making: Mix over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon or lime.

Name: Japanese Sex
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Combine over ice and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Japanese Sex Slick Style
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Midori', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour the alcohol in a highball glass filled with ice. Top up with equal parts orange and pineapple juice.

Name: Japanese Slipper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Blend with ice then pour into a cocktail glass. Serve with a straw.

Name: Japanese Traffic Lights
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Midori']
Making: Layer in order (banana liqueur at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass.

Name: Jar Head
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Pour equal parts of Southern Comfort and Wild Turkey 101 proof bourbon whiskey in a shotglass. Add a pinch of salt.

Name: Jasmine
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Cointreau', '1/4 oz. Campari', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with cracked ice, strain and serve in a cocktail glass with a lemon peel garnish.

Name: Jason Ball
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', 'Cranberry Juice (Or aronia berry juice)']
Making: Pour over ice into a highball glass.

Name: Jay Leno
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/8 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a shaker half-filled with small cubed or cracked ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jedi
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Creme de Cacao', 'Milk']
Making: Pour the milk into a chilled drinking glass. Add the blue curacao and the creme de cacao simultaneously. Stir briefly, then add one ice cube and serve.

Name: Jeff Jarrett (The Chosen One)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '9 oz. Sprite']
Making: Shake and pour over ice into a highball glass. (Great to drink while watching Nitro or Thunder. Sip every time someone makes a Jeff Jarrett reference).

Name: Jefferson's Brown and Stormy
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jefferson's Bourbon", '8 oz. Ginger Beer']
Making: Pour bourbon over ice, add ginger ale, and stir.

Name: Jefferson's Declaration
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jefferson's Bourbon", '3/4 oz. Pallini Peachcello', '3/4 oz. 10 Cane Rum']
Making: Combine 2 oz Jefferson's Bourbon, 3/4 oz Pallini Peachcello, 3/4 oz 10 Cane Rum in a mixing glass with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled flute glass.

Name: Jefferson's Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['3 dash(es) Bitters', '1 tsp. Water', '1 Sugar Cube', "3 oz. Jefferson's Bourbon", '1 Orange Slice', '1 Maraschino Cherries']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a teaspoon. Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the bourbon. Garnish with the orange slice and the cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

Name: Jeffreys Special
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's French Kiss Vanilla Schnapps", '1 1/2 oz. Beer', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Fill a 12 oz. glass with ice. Add beer and schnapps. Top off with orange juice. Mix and serve.

Name: Jello Slush
Ingredients: ['2 package(s) JELLO (cherry)', '4 cup(s) Sugar', '46 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 pint(s) Vodka', '1 pint(s) Bacardi White Rum', '13 cup(s) Water', '7-Up']
Making: Mix together JELLO and sugar in 4 cups of boiling water. Stir to dissolve. Add 9 cups of cold water and mix in vodka and rum. Stir. Allow to freeze. Fill glass and add 7-Up.

Name: Jellybean
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Anisette', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Jellyfish #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', 'Cherries (For layering)']
Making: In tall shot or cordial glass layer white cream de cacao, Amaretto and Bailey's. Using a drink straw or a bar spoon drop in grenadine from a height of 3 or 4 inches over the drink allowing grenadine to pull down the Bailey's through the layers, to form the _tentacles_ of the jellyfish. Backlight with a lighter or a match. Mike's comment: This is a very visual drink and also verrrrry tasty.

Name: Jenna Jameson
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Cherry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Mix all ingredients and serve over ice in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Jennsicle
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Orange Juice (frozen)', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Mandarine Napoleon', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Put everything in the blender except for the grenadine with 1/2 cup of crushed ice. Mix until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and stir in grenadine.

Name: Jenny's Banana Pudding
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a small bucket glass.

Name: Jenny's Summer Delight #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass.

Name: Jenny's Summer Delight #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass for a sweet drink.

Name: Jericho's Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake until frothy and strain into a stemmed goblet. Garnish with a pineapple spear and a cherry.

Name: Jersey Frenchman
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cabana Cachaca', "1 oz. Laird's Old Apple Brandy", '1 oz. Grenadine (homemade cranberry)', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 dash(es) Fee Brothers Rhubarb Bitters', 'Champagne (Domaine Chandon)']
Making: Shake and strain into champagne flute or coupe. Top up with Domaine Chandon

Name: Jersey Lightning
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Apple Brandy', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jersey Shore Lemon-aid
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Sugar', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add sugar and grenadine to taste. Enjoy. Wendy and Denise

Name: Jessica
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '3 oz. Fruit Punch (Preferably Frutopia)', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix and drink.

Name: Jesus In A Cup
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Shake with ice and dump into a rocks glass. The ultimate chick drink! For full effect consume while watching Sex in the City or any movie starring Meg Ryan. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Jet Black
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '2 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 tsp. Sambuca (Black)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jet Fuel Mix
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1 pint(s) Vodka', '12 oz. Rumple Minze', '2 quart(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix and serve in glass jars.

Name: Jewel
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Green Curacao', '2 oz. Martini and Rossi Bianco']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Jewel Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Green Chartreuse', '3/4 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Jewel Of The Nile
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Green Chartreuse', '1/2 oz. Yellow Chartreuse']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jeweler's Hammer
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Grape Juice (White)', 'Soda Water (Optional)']
Making: Pour vodka and white grape juice over ice and top with soda. Garnish with a squeeze of lime or lemon if desired.

Name: Jeyplak Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Anis']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Jillian's Yankee
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '12 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Combine in a tumbler with ice. Enjoy the two most famous Southern drinks :)

Name: Jillionaire
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '1 Egg White']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jim Jones
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Blue Curacao', '1 part(s) Port', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Mix well and serve in a martini glass. The drink should have a nice deep purple colour.

Name: Jim Jones Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Everclear', '4 oz. Beer (Preferably Pearl Light Beer)', '2 oz. Tequila (Preferably Juarez Tequila)', '3 oz. Kool-Aid (Red)']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass and destroy!

Name: Jim Morrison
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Mix the Jagermeister and Root Beer Schnapps over ice in an old fashioned glass. Top up with Coca Cola. Could be served as a shot by omitting the Coca Cola.

Name: Jingle Bell Rockarita
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Hornitos Plata Tequila', '2 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Strawberry Passion Schnapps', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Triple Sec', '6 part(s) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a margarita glass rimmed with sugar.

Name: Jo Momma
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour coconut rum into a tall glass. Fill with pineapple juice and add a splash of cranberry juice.

Name: Jock Collins
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the Club Soda. Stir and garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Jock-In-A-Box
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 Egg']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass half-filled with ice cubes.

Name: Jockey Club Cocktail
Ingredients: ['dash(es) Bitters', '1/4 tsp. White Creme de Cacao', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jocose Julep
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar', '5 Mint Leaves', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Blend all ingredients (except carbonated water) in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and serve.

Name: Joe Cassano
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Zima', '1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'Lemonade']
Making: Blend with ice and serve in a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Joe Collins
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Cola']
Making: Pour Scotch and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with cola and stir lightly. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: John Collins
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Bourbon whiskey, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the Club Soda. Stir and garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: John Collins (Me Pappy's Version)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Sugar', '1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Combine all ingredients with 7 oz. crushed ice iin a blender or shaker. Mix and pour into a 8 oz. glass. Garnish with maraschino cherry and lime slice. My Father made this one, e-mail me with comments.

Name: John Daly
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Iced Tea', '6 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled tumbler. Sweeten to taste.

Name: John Havens
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '12 oz. Coca Cola', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix and serve in a tall glass.

Name: John Rocker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Grape Juice (White)']
Making: Combine over ice in a collins glass and garnish with orange wedges.

Name: Johnnie Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Anisette']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Johnny Buffalo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '3 oz. Club Soda', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a Collins glass. Add club soda and stir. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Johnny Loftus
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', 'Milk (Or cream)']
Making: Put the alcohol except 1/2 oz of dark rum, milk or cream and ice in a blender. Blend till smooth, float last of rum on top of it.

Name: Johnny's Love Juice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass. Add the amaretto last as a float. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Johnson
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1 cup(s) Sprite']
Making: Mix with ice and serve in highball glass.

Name: Joie de VeeV
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '3 Mint Leaves', 'Lime', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Muddle 2 slices of lime, 2 strawberries, and 3 mint sprigs in a mixing glass. Add 2.0 oz VeeV and ice in a cocktail shaker and shake. Pour into a glass and top with ginger ale.

Name: Jojo And Alex Special
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Amaretto', '2/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Rum', '2 2/3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/3 oz. Apple Juice', '1 1/3 oz. Grenadine', '2/3 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice (except grenadine) and strain into a highball glass filled with crushed ice. Gently pour the grenadine over the top. Decorate with an orange slice and a cherry. Enjoy!

Name: Jolly Green Giant
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) 7-Up', '1 scoop(s) Kool-Aid (Sweetened lemon-lime)', 'Vodka']
Making: Place ice in a tall glass then pour in Kool-Aid. Add the 7-up to dissolve the Kool-Aid and finish off with as much vodka as you like.

Name: Jolly Homo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Butter Shots', "1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum"]
Making: Mix in a lowball filled with ice and garnish with four cherries. Michael says: This drink was named after me, Michael Kane, because several of them made me very jolly. :)

Name: Jolly Jumper
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Whiskey', '1 1/3 oz. Vodka', '1 1/3 oz. Gin', '1 1/3 oz. Passoa Passion Fruit', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Just put it together, fill with orange juice, add ice and drink it.

Name: Jolly Melon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '4 oz. Strawberry Daiquiri Mix', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Blend Daquiri Mix, Watermelon Pucker and Half and Half Cream with ice until smooth. Pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jolly Rancher #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake melon liqueur and blueberry schnapps with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Fill with sweet and sour, add grenadine for colour, and stir. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Jolly Rancher #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a 2oz. shot glass.

Name: Jolly Rancher #4
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Pour over ice into a highball glass.

Name: Jonesey
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum and creme de cacao. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jonestown Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine in a shaker with the juice of 2 lemon wedges. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Jonesy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake vigorously. Serve in a tall glass over ice (optional).

Name: Jonny Rocket
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Galliano', '1/3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec', 'Bar Mix', '7-Up']
Making: Mix liqueurs in a shaker and fill with bar mix. Shake and top with 7-Up. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

Name: Jose's Valentine's Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Apple Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Fill a glass with ice. Add tequila, cranberry juice, and apple juice. Top off with soda.

Name: Josh And Doug Bamma Slamma
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Lemonade', '1 splash(es) Sloe Gin']
Making: Pour lemonade over Southern Comfort and Ameretto. Swirl Sloe Gin on top and mix well. Nice and sweet drink you can drink all night like it was candy!

Name: Joshua's Fru-Fru Drink
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Triple Sec', 'dash(es) Grenadine', '8 oz. Strawberries (Frozen)']
Making: Blend in a mixer. Vary the amount of ice depending on how thick you like your frozen drinks. (This recipe makes three drinks).

Name: Joulouville
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Apple Brandy', '1 1/2 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '2 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Journalist Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Jovian Sunspot
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Cranapple Juice', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Place ice in an old fashioned cocktail glass. Pour ingredients in order listed above or shake and pour over ice.

Name: Joy Juice
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Stir into a old fashioned glass. Best if drank copiously and rapidly!!!

Name: Joy-To-The-World
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Joyful Jolly Rancher
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice unsweetened', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Shake all ingredients except sour mix and strain into a tall cocktail glass. Top off with sour mix.

Name: JR's Tropical Titty Twister
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Soda Water', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice (Or fill with pineapple juice)']
