Making: Mix in a glass then shake and pour into a cocktail glass. JR says: The flavour comes from the banana liqueur, coconut rum and pineapple juice. Cranberry juice is used to break the acidity of the pineapple juice, while the soda water breaks up the sweetness. The flavored vodka adds a twist and some kick. Knowing this you can vary the recipe to your liking. Can be made stronger by adding more flavored vodka. Also great if mixed in a blender. Created by JR@4RedAnts.com while bartending at a night club in Boston.

Name: Jr's Vanilla Bomb
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Root Beer (Preferably Mug Root Beer)']
Making: Combine in a mug and garnish with a funky straw to sip it up.

Name: Juan Collins
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Hornitos Plata Tequila', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '6 part(s) Club Soda']
Making: Add all ingredients to a tall glass over ice. Garnish with lemon.

Name: Jubilee On The Square
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Midori', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake well and serve over ice. Garnish with a slice of orange, a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

Name: Judge Jr.
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Rum', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Grenadine', '1/4 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/4 Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Judgette Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Peach Brandy', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Judy's Delight
Ingredients: ['1 oz. DeKuyper Tropical Pineapple Schnapps', "1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Coconut Rum"]
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Juiced Apple
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps', '1 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '1 part(s) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass with ice.

Name: Juicy Jessie
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Raspberry Syrup', 'Vanilla Cola']
Making: Mix vodka, schnapps and syrup in a glass. Add ice. Fill with Vanilla Coke.

Name: Juicy Juice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Orange Vodka', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a cocktail glass. Tastes just like the red fruit drink Juicy-Juice!

Name: Juicy Lucy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1/4 pint(s) Orange Juice', '1/4 pint(s) Lemonade']
Making: Mix well with ice.

Name: Juicy Pussy #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Julius Special
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Lime Juice', '1/3 oz. Cointreau', '2/3 oz. Jamaica Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Julius's Fuzzy Navel
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '6 oz. Orange Juice', '1 cup(s) Milk', '1 cup(s) Water', '1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '1 tsp. Vanilla']
Making: Place all ingredients in a blender with 12 ice cubes and process at high speed for 30 seconds.

Name: Jumping Jack Flash
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: June and Champagne
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Champagne', "1 oz. L'Espirit de June"]
Making: First pour the champagne (slightly less than a normal serving). Then add Esprit de June. Stir briefly.

Name: June and Tonic
Ingredients: ["1 oz. L'Espirit de June", 'Tonic Water']
Making: Pour into an ice-filled longdrink glass. Top with freshly-opened good-quality tonic water. Stir briefly. Garnish with an orange peel, a physallis or an orange flower.

Name: June and Wine
Ingredients: ['4 1/2 oz. Red Wine', "1 1/2 oz. L'Espirit de June"]
Making: First pour the wine (slightly less than a normal serving). Then add the Esprit de June. Stir briefly.

Name: June Buck
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', "3/4 oz. L'Espirit de June"]
Making: Pour into an ice-filled longdrink glass. Top with freshly-opened good-quality ginger ale. Stir briefly.

Name: June Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', "1 oz. L'Espirit de June", '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 dash(es) Agave Nectar']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a margarita glass rimed with lime juice and salt.

Name: June on the Rocks
Ingredients: ["2 oz. L'Espirit de June"]
Making: Pour over ice cubes in a short-drink glass. Stir briefly. Spray a zest of a lime over the surface of the liquid and rub it around the rim of the glass.

Name: Junebug
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Light Rum', '3/4 oz. Midori', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice and garnish with an orange flag.

Name: Jungle Boogie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Vodka (Preferably Skyy Vodka)', '1 splash(es) V 8 Juice (Tropical blend)', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix ingredients in blender and serve cold a in large container, preferably a bowl. While mixing, make sure _Jungle Boogie_, by Kool and the Gang, is blasting in the background. This mix is great for pre-partying!

Name: Jungle Juice #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour into a collins glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Jungle Juice #5
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 Pineapple (Diced)', '4 Bananas (Sliced)', '1/2 Watermelon (Diced)', 'Cherries']
Making: The fruit quantities given can change according to your tastes, and you can add any other fruit, fresh or canned that you like. Cut all fruit into bite size pieces, and put in a bowl or a tub. Completely soak all fruit in the alcohol overnight or a several hours. Serve in punch cups, with or without ice.

Name: Jungle Juice #6
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'dash(es) Lemon Syrup (Or cordial)', 'dash(es) Lime Cordial', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass or shot glasses.

Name: Junior's Lemon Tea
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Junior Johnson's Midnight Moon Lightning Lemonade", 'Tea (southern style sweet tea)']
Making: Build in a rocks glass over ice and fill with sweet tea.

Name: Just Before Dawn
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Smirnoff Raspberry Twist Vodka', '1 part(s) Smirnoff Orange Twist Vodka', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour in a cocktail glass over ice and fill with equal parts of pineapple and cranberry juice.

Name: K Town Bomber
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with Red Bull.

Name: K. G. B.
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Kirsch', '2 tsp. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Kirsch, apricot brandy, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: K.G.B. Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Kummel', '1/4 tsp. Apricot Brandy', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: K9NV
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Bulldog Gin', '5 oz. Orange Juice', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '3/4 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Pour Bulldog Gin, Grand Marnier, Blue Curacao and orange juice into a cocktail glass. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass over ice. Garnish with an orange peel.

Name: Kabuki
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sake', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Pour into a salt rimmed old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Kahlua #1
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Water', '3 cup(s) Sugar', '4 tbsp. Instant Coffee', '1 tbsp. Vanilla']
Making: Bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 1 hour. Let cool and add vanilla and either a pint or a fifth of vodka. Drink and enjoy!!

Name: Kahlua #2
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Water', '4 cup(s) Sugar', '2 oz. Instant Coffee', '1 Vanilla Bean', '1/5 gallon(s) Bourbon Whiskey']
Making: Simmer water, sugar, and coffee until the sugar dissolves. Put vanilla bean and Bourbon whiskey in a gallon jug and add the coffee syrup you just prepared. Cover and let sit one month.

Name: Kahlua #3
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Water', '5 tsp. Instant Coffee', '2 1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '1 1/2 cup(s) Vodka', '1 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Boil water. Add coffee. Add sugar. Simmer, 20 min. Remove from heat, add chocolate. Allow to cool. Add vodka.

Name: Kahlua #4
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Sugar', '3 cup(s) Water', '12 tsp. Instant Coffee', '2 tbsp. Coffee (Fresh and coarsley ground)', '3 cup(s) Vodka', '1 cup(s) Brandy', '6 tsp. Vanilla Extract']
Making: Mix first 4 ingredients and simmer them for 1.5-2 hours with occasional stirring. Cool. Add the rest of the ingredients. Filter and pour into dark bottles. Keep the bottles in a cool, dark place for 3 months. Shake every day.

Name: Kahlua #6
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Brandy', '1 quart(s) Vodka', '1 oz. Vanilla Extract', '1 tsp. Chocolate Syrup', '1 quart(s) Water', '4 cup(s) Sugar', '1/4 cup(s) Instant Coffee']
Making: In saucepan, bring to the boil water, instant coffee, and sugar. Remove from heat and let cool. Add brandy, vodka, and vanilla.

Name: Kahlua and Cola
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Kahlua', '3 part(s) Cola']
Making:
Pour Kahlua in a highball glass filled with ice. Add the cola. Stir and enjoy.
If you like a classic rum and cola cocktail, you’ll love a Kahlua and cola. A perfectly balanced sweet drink when you’re in the mood for a caffeinated cocktail.

Name: Kahlua and Soda Water
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Kahlua', '4 part(s) Soda Water']
Making:
Pour Kahlua into a highball glass filled with ice. Add soda water. Top it with a lime and serve.
Complement the pure flavors of 100% Arabica coffee and sugarcane spirit with a splash of soda water. Kahlua mixed with effervescent water creates a simple cocktail that’s perfect for summer picnics or anytime you want a light aperitif.

Name: Kahlua Black Russian
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Absolut Vodka']
Making:
Fill a rocks glass with ice, add Kahlua and Absolut Vodka and stir.
Enjoy the drink of diplomats the next time you're looking to bring elegance and style to any occasion. Legend has it the Black Russian was created in 1949 by a Belgian bartender to honor a feisty socialite who was the U.S. ambassador to Luxembourg. The cocktail is so named because it mixes the dark liqueur of Kahlua with vodka, the beloved Russian spirit. For a touch of international mystery and intrigue, try this famous drink that has been described as "a flavor more complex than calculus." A rich and balanced cocktail for all seasons!

Name: Kahlua Black Russian Lemon
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Absolut Vodka']
Making:
Fill a rocks glass with ice, add Kahlua and Absolut Vodka, stir and finish with a lemon zest.
Enjoy the drink of diplomats the next time you're looking to bring elegance and style to any occasion. Legend has it the Black Russian was created in 1949 by a Belgian bartender to honor a feisty socialite who was the U.S. ambassador to Luxembourg. The cocktail is so named because it mixes the dark liqueur of Kahlua with vodka, the beloved Russian spirit. For a touch of international mystery and intrigue, try this famous drink that has been described as "a flavor more complex than calculus." A rich and balanced cocktail for all seasons!

Name: Kahlua Black Russian Lime
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Absolut Vodka']
Making:
Fill a rocks glass with ice, add Kahlua and Absolut Vodka, stir and finish with a lime zest.
Enjoy the drink of diplomats the next time you're looking to bring elegance and style to any occasion. Legend has it the Black Russian was created in 1949 by a Belgian bartender to honor a feisty socialite who was the U.S. ambassador to Luxembourg. The cocktail is so named because it mixes the dark liqueur of Kahlua with vodka, the beloved Russian spirit. For a touch of international mystery and intrigue, try this famous drink that has been described as "a flavor more complex than calculus." A rich and balanced cocktail for all seasons!

Name: Kahlua Black Russian Orange
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Absolut Vodka']
Making:
Fill a rocks glass with ice, add Kahlua and Absolut Vodka, stir and finish with an orange zest.
Enjoy the drink of diplomats the next time you're looking to bring elegance and style to any occasion. Legend has it the Black Russian was created in 1949 by a Belgian bartender to honor a feisty socialite who was the U.S. ambassador to Luxembourg. The cocktail is so named because it mixes the dark liqueur of Kahlua with vodka, the beloved Russian spirit. For a touch of international mystery and intrigue, try this famous drink that has been described as "a flavor more complex than calculus." A rich and balanced cocktail for all seasons!

Name: Kahlua Cinnamon Sparkler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kahlua Cinnamon Spice Liqueur', '3 oz. Apple Cider (Sparkling)', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake Kahlua Cinnamon Spice and lemon over ice. Top with sparkling apple cider. Grate nutmeg on top.

Name: Kahlua Cobweb
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bundaberg Rum', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Build Bundaberg and Kahlua over ice cream in a highball glass. Top up with coke and wait for your cobwebs to be cleared!

Name: Kahlua Durango Royale
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Kahlua Cinnamon Spice Liqueur', '1 oz. Aquavit', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Apple Cider (Dry French fermented sparkling)']
Making:
In a shaker add all ingredients except sparkling cider. Strain into a flute and top with dry fermented cider.
Created by mixologist Lynnette Marrero

Name: Kahlua Float
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Galliano', 'Half and Half Cream', 'Pepsi Cola']
Making: Combine vodka, Kahlua and Galliano in a collins glass. Stir well, then add the half and half until the glass is 3/4 full. Top with the Pepsi.

Name: Kahlua Ginger Ale
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Kahlua', '4 part(s) Ginger Ale']
Making:
Fill a highball glass with ice, add Kahlua and ginger ale, then stir.
Ginger ale, a mixer that became popular in the United States during Prohibition, adds a sweet kick to the rich, smooth taste of Kahlua. The bubbly blend of carbonated water, ginger and cane sugar balances the flavors of Kahlua to make an easy-to-drink cocktail. Serve it anytime you want to add some sparkle to a gathering with good friends or when you want to cool down after a long day.

Name: Kahlua L.P.R. ( Liquid Panty Remover )
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 splash(es) Milk (If needed)']
Making: Combine all the ingredients in a blender with 2 scoops of ice. Blend until smooth. If the mix is too thick, add a splash of milk. Serve in a tall glass with a straw.

Name: Kahlua Montanya Mermalada
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua Cinnamon Spice Liqueur', '1 oz. Avion Silver Tequila', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '6 Grapes (Concord)']
Making:
Muddle Grapes. Add rest of the ingredients. Shake and strain over fresh ice in a rocks glass.
Created by mixologist Lynnette Marrero

Name: Kahlua on the rocks
Ingredients: ['Kahlua']
Making:
Fill a rocks glass with ice, add Kahlua, stir gently to cool to its perfect temperature. Finish off with orange zest.
Pure Kahlua and ice. When served on the rocks, the distinctively rich, smooth flavors of the coffee and cane spirit come through, making it easy to imagine the coffee plants and sugarcane growing side-by-side in Veracruz, Mexico. Simple to make and the perfect complement to stimulating conversation.

Name: Kahlua on the rocks lemon
Ingredients: ['Kahlua']
Making:
Fill a rocks glass with ice, add Kahlúa, stir and finish with a lemon zest.
Brighten this dark, delicious blend of coffee and sugarcane spirit with a little lemon. Enrich your taste buds with the pure ingredients of Kahlua from Veracruz, Mexico. An ideal way to add some zing to your drink and conversation.

Name: Kahlua on the rocks lime
Ingredients: ['Kahlua']
Making:
Fill a rocks glass with ice, addKahlua, stir and finish with a lime zest.
Brighten this dark, delicious blend of coffee and sugarcane spirit with a little lime. Enrich your taste buds with the pure ingredients of Kahlua from Veracruz, Mexico. An ideal way to add some zing to your drink and conversation.

Name: Kahlua Peppermint Storm
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua Peppermint Mocha Liqueur', '1 oz. Absolut Vanilia Vodka', '1 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix ingredients together in a rocks glass- garnish with mint sprig

Name: Kahlua Sour #1
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Kahlua', '1 cup(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Put the ingredients into blender with a cup of ice and blend until ice cubes are like chips.

Name: Kahlua Sour #2
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 part(s) Sugar Syrup']
Making:
Shake the ingredients with lots of ice and strain into a chilled rocks glass.
Full of character, this cool cocktail is as lovely to look at as it is to taste. With the dark, intense flavors of Kahlua as the base, the drink gets more complex when mixed with simple syrup and lemon. This unique twist on the traditional sour is a special treat when celebrating with friends.

Name: Kahlua White Russian
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Milk']
Making: Mix equal parts of each (depending on the amount you want) and serve on the rocks or strain through ice into a glass.

Name: Kahlua Zocalo Sidra
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua Cinnamon Spice Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Martell VS Cognac', '2 tsp. Apple Sauce (Apple Butter)', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making:
Place all ingredients in a shaker. Shake and strain into a couple glass garnish with cinnamon stick.
Created by mixologist Lynnette Marrero

Name: Kaiser !!
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '3 oz. Everclear', '3 oz. Yukon Jack', '5 oz. Pineapple Juice', '5 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour into a very big glass and stir.

Name: Kaisermeister
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Jagermeister', '2 part(s) Root Beer Schnapps']
Making: Combine ingredients and serve over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Kak In The Eye
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Apple Juice', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a glass. Add a squirt of whipped cream and a dash of cinnamon and sugar. According to Steve and J., too many of these and you may end up with a Kak in the Eye.

Name: Kalhua
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Vodka', '5 cup(s) Sugar', '6 tbsp. Instant Coffee (Preferably good instant coffee)', '2 Vanilla (Vanilla beans)', '5 cup(s) Water']
Making: Slice vanilla beans length wise and scrape out pulp. Slice beans into 1-2* strips and add to vodka. Let set 2 weeks. At the end of two weeks, remove beans. Pour all ingredients into a large glass gallon jug. Shake well to dissolve sugar. Let set 3 days or until all sugar is dissolved. No need to refrigerate.

Name: KaMaKaZi #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '8 oz. Sunny Delight Orange Juice']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a glass. Add more or less lime juice and vodka depending on your taste. Enjoy!

Name: Kamikaze #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Kamikaze #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', "1/4 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', 'Lime (Fresh)']
Making: Mix with a squeeze of fresh lime and chill over ice. Then strain into a chilled glass.

Name: Kamikaze Light
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Sprite']
Making: Combine lime juice, Triple Sec and vodka over ice in a highball glass. Fill with Sprite and decorate with a twist of lime.

Name: Kampai Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake first 4 ingredients. Pour into an ice filled high ball glass. Add Bitters, do not mix. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Kangaroo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Kangaroo Kicker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. French Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Kansas City Ice Water
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. 7-Up', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Fill a tall glass with ice, and add the vodka and the gin. Shake then add the 7-Up and the lime juice. Be careful not to add too much lime juice or it ruins the drink. Garnish with a cherry

Name: Kapalua Chemillion
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '5 oz. Pineapple Juice', '5 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Midori']
Making: Layer in a cocktail glass over ice. Float Midori and garnish with a pineapple slice

Name: Kara's Special Gin Juice
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Dry Gin', '1 1/2 cup(s) Grape Juice']
Making: Blenc with ice until the ice is crushed. Pour in a large cocktail glass.

Name: Karamozov Koffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Coffee Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto (Preferably Di Saronna Amaretto)', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Blend with cracked ice then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. May be served in a tall glass with iced coffee with or without cream.

Name: Karen K
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Lime Juice', 'Tomato Juice', 'Tabasco Sauce']
Making: In a bucket glass filled with ice add Vodka, 151 Rum, Lime Juice and nearly fill the glass with Tomato Juice. Add 1 to 7 drops of Tabasco Sauce and stir well. Enjoy.

Name: Karma Killer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Peach Brandy', '3 oz. Fruit Punch (See ingredients below)', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Make fruit punch. Fill long glass with all ingredients. Add fruit punch. Stir well !! To make more punch just increase the amounts but keep the same ratio.

Name: Karsk
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Coffee (Hot)', '1/2 cup(s) Vodka (Or any pure alcohol, 80-120 proof)']
Making: Mix and drink. A traditional Norwegian beverage.

Name: Kassie's Black Hat
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1/3 oz. Bacardi Light Rum', '1/3 oz. Jose Cuervo', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Fill a 13 oz. barrel glass with ice and ingredients. Garnish with a lemon.

Name: Katie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', '1 oz. Cinzano Bianco']
Making: Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass. Stir with a stick.

Name: KB Slam
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Ke Ke And Coke
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Ke Ke Beach Key Lime Cream Liqueur', '6 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix Ke Ke Beach Key Lime Liqueur and Coca Cola in a 12 oz. glass over ice.

Name: Kelly's Valentine
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '5 1/2 oz. White Wine (White Zinfandel)']
Making: Pour in a wine glass and top with the White Zinfandel.

Name: Kelly-K
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Campari', 'Soda Water']
Making: Fill a glass with ice then add the Campari and vodka. Top with the soda and stir

Name: Kentucky B and B
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Benedictine']
Making: Pour the Bourbon whiskey and Benedictine into a brandy snifter.

Name: Kentucky Blizzard
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a half slice of orange.

Name: Kentucky Breakfast
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a rocks glass and fill with orange juice. .Enjoy!

Name: Kentucky Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Kentucky Colonel
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Benedictine']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes combine the Bourbon whiskey and Benedictine. Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Kentucky Cream
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '3/4 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chocolate powdered martini glass.

Name: Kentucky Flower
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1 oz. Elderflower Syrup', '1 dash(es) Lemon Juice', '3 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice. Garnish with a green apple wheel.

Name: Kentucky Girls
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '5 oz. Lemonade', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over fresh ice. Add Sprite. Drink and enjoy.

Name: Kentucky Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '2/3 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Passion Fruit Nectar', '2/3 oz. Lime Juice', '2/3 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and double strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with a piece of passion fruit.

Name: Kentucky Sweet Tea
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Amaretto']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice in a tall glass. Garnish with a wedge of lemon.

Name: Kermit On Crack
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1 oz. DeKuyper Sour Apple', '1 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix in equal parts and enjoy.

Name: Kevin's Special Blend
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Rye Whiskey (preferably Crown Royal or Gibson's finest)", '1 1/2 tsp. Iced Tea Mix', '12 oz. Water (Cold)']
Making: Put iced tea mix into glass and fill about half full of water. Add 2 oz. of rye, then fill remainder of glass with water. Stir. Add ice cubes.

Name: Kevinrita
Ingredients: ['2/3 part(s) Tequila premium', '1/3 part(s) Cointreau', '6 Limes juice of']
Making: Mix the tequila and Cointreau in a pitcher. Squeeze the lime juice into the pitcher and drop in remaining lime parts. Mash to extract more lime juice and serve over ice in a salt rimmed glass.

Name: Key Largo Kooler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. DeKuyper Key Largo Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix juices and alcohol in mixing tin, flash blend, and pour over ice in a 23 oz. squall glass and float rum. Garnish with an orange flag and an umbrella.

Name: Key Lime Quencher
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '3 oz. Heavy Cream', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Blend with 12 oz. crushed ice until smooth. Serve in 16 oz. specialty glass and garnish with a lime wheel and a sprinkle of graham cracker crumbs.

Name: Key Lime Sling
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Licor 43', '3/4 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice (Key Lime)', '1/4 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix (Toutfini)', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Combine all ingredients over ice into shaker cup. Shake vigorously. Strain over rocks into a hurricane glass or other tall glass. Garnish with a lime wedge (use a real Key Lime wedge if possible).

Name: Key West Cooler
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a tall wine glass with ice and pour in the Midori. Slowly add the vodka, peach schnapps, and Malibu Rum. Carefully top up with orange and cranberry juices.

Name: Key West Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Key Lime Juice Concentrate)', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the vodka into a frozen highball glass. Add the lime juice. Fill with orange juice and stir. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Key West Song
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Blend all ingredients in a blender with a scoop of crushed ice.

Name: Kick In The Ass
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice', 'Guava Juice']
Making: Mix in a tall glass then top off with Orange Juice and Guava Juice.

Name: Kicking Cow
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Maple Syrup', '1/3 oz. Cream', '2/3 oz. Whiskey']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Kiev Sundae
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Zinamom Cinnamon Vodka', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '3/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 tsp. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix all ingredients, except Razberi Vodka and whipped cream, with cracked ice in a blender for about 10 seconds until texture is thick and smooth. Do not overmix. Pour into a large, chilled wine goblet and float Razberi Vodka on top. Add a dollop of whipped cream and serve with a teaspoon.

Name: Kilgore Trout
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Everclear', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Start with a full rocks glass of ice. Pour in 151 Proof Rum and Everclear. Top up with orange juice. Use 9 cherries and one olive as a garnish for a strange look. The olive in this drink is Kilgore Trout, an oddball in somewhat similar world.

Name: Killer Coconut
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Soda Water']
Making: Shake the 151, coconut rum and the pineapple juice vigorously with ice. Strain into a rocks glass. Splash with soda and serve.

Name: Killer Kool-Aid #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice (Sweetend)']
Making: Fill highball glass with ice. Layer ingredients. Serve.

Name: Killer Kool-Aid (Authentic)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Soda Water (7-Up if you want it really sweet)']
Making: Pour over ice into a collins glass and serve with a straw... mmmmmm... Pete says: Stop drinking when your girlfriend/boyfriend starts to look like the big Kool-Aid jug dude and proceeds to smash through walls.

Name: Killer Sniff
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Sambuca', '1 dash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Pour the sambuca into highball glass and drop a dash of blue curacao into a wine glass. Placing your hand over the highball glass shake as to cover the insde of the glass with sambucca then pour the sambuca into the wine glass with the blue curacao. Shake the wine glass once again placing your hand over the glass and then light it. Pour the lighted contents into the highball glass( If you can do this from about 6 inches from the glass it looks better). Now place your hand fully over the still burning highball glass. This will exstinguish the fire and create a vacuum causing the glass to stick to your hand. Shake the glass which is stuck to your hand and instruct your customer to get into a crouch position. Pull your hand off the glass and let your customer rise to a standing position while sniffing the fumes from the glass. Down the contents when standing up. Repeat the burning and sniffing process once more when the glass is empty and this should cause the customers eyes to water and keep him quiet for the the next 10 minutes…

Name: Kim's Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Apple Schnapps', '2/3 oz. Cherry Whiskey', '2/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '6 oz. 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a highball glass, adding the splash of cranberry last. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Kim-Berry
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass.

Name: King Cole Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 slice(s) Orange', '1 slice(s) Pineapple', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Muddle orange slice, pineapple slice, and powdered sugar in an old-fashioned glass. Add blended Scotch whisky and 2 ice cubes, stir well, and serve.

Name: King of Denmark
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '6 oz. Black Currant Cordial', '20 oz. Water']
Making: Mix together in pitcher, add several big ice cubes.

Name: King's Ruin
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Dry Champagne', '2 oz. Cognac']
Making: Pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Kingston
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '3 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake ingredients with crushed or shaved ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Kinky Hawaiian
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Serve over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple/cherry flag.

Name: Kinky Kitty Kocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Creme de Cassis', '4 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Layer it in the order listed.

Name: Kinky Russian
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', 'Half and Half Cream']
Making: Pour the coffee liqueur and the coconut rum over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Fill with half and half cream and stir. Enjoy.

Name: Kinky Tea
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Bulldog Gin', '1 Tea Bags Green Tea', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Put tea bag into a glass with Bulldog Gin and heat for 30 seconds. Remove tea bag and squeeze a lemon slice into the gin and add simple syrup. Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Kir
Ingredients: ['Dry White Wine (Edelzwicker is recommended)', 'dash(es) Creme de Cassis']
Making:
In a white wine glass, pour the cassis first, then the wine. Serve chilled. Very popular drink in France.
Kir is a popular cocktail that is created when the blackcurrant-flavored crème liquor Crème de cassis is combined with a white wine of the drinker’s choice. To make it the even more well-known Kir Royal, champagne is added instead of white wine.
The origins of the drink are quite interesting. Kir is named after Felix Kir, also referred to as Canon Kir, who ruled as Dijon’s mayor between 1945 and 1968. Kir enjoyed drinking the mixture of white wine and blackcurrant liquor so much, that he often offered the sweet concoction to visiting delegations at receptions. His love for the drink was so popular that it was soon being served at the receptions as their official aperitif.
In addition, Kir allowed Lejay Lagoute, a producer of blackcurrant liquor, the use of his name during promotions for their liquor, Crème de Cassis de Dijon.
Today, when in a bar, those who ask for a Kir will more than likely be given a drink made with blackcurrant liquor and white wine. The drink is quite refreshing, but doesn’t have the sparkling kick that many people enjoy.
To truly enjoy all that a Kir has to offer, make sure to ask for a Kir Royal. The bartender will replace the white wine with champagne to give it the higher end taste that connoisseurs truly love. Of course, when ordering a Kir Royal, expect it to cost a little more than an average Kir since the more expensive champagne is being used. But for a couple extra bucks, it’s worth it!

Name: Kir Royal
Ingredients: ['Champagne', 'dash(es) Creme de Cassis']
Making: In a flute, pour the cassis first, then the champagne. Serve chilled. Very popular drink in France. Also see the recipe for Kir for a history of both drinks.

Name: Kirby
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '8 oz. Limeade']
Making: Mix together with ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Kirsch and Cassis
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1 oz. Kirsch', 'Soda Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over 2 ice cubes in a wine glass.

Name: Kish Wacker

Making: Mix the ingredients in the blender with ice. Tastes like a chocolate shake.

Name: Kisko Kid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', 'Margarita Mix']
Making: Pour Raspberry Vodka over ice in a rocks glass. Fill with margarita mix and garnish with a lemon or lime.

Name: Kiss and Tell #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Calvados', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Kiss and Tell #2

Making: Poor bourbon and Kahlua over ice. Add water to taste (1 - 3 oz.). The Kahlua will take the bite out of the bourbon without overpowering the flavor. I was introduced to this drink by an old Navy buddy Kristina Cate. Hench the name... 'Kiss me Cate'.

Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with Club Soda.

Name: Kiss Me Slow

Name: Kiss Of Death

Name: Kiss Off

Name: Kiss On The Lips

Name: Kiss-In-The-Dark
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Gin']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Making: Shake all the ingredients (except the lime juice) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the dash of lime.

Name: Kleinfeld

Name: Klingon Battlejuice

Making: Build over ice into a highball glass. Good for a weak drinker who doesn't like the taste of alcohol.

Name: Krazy Carl #2

Making: Combine over ice into a highball glass.

Name: Kretchma

Name: Kretchma Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', 'dash(es) Grenadine', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Making: Blend Bailey's Irish Cream, Irish Whiskey and Milk with a cup of ice. Pour into a cocktail glass and top with whipped cream. Serve with a mint garnish. (Could also be served over ice.)

Name: Kung-Fu Punch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake over ice and strain over ice cubes in a tall glass. Can be served as a shooter using 1/4 oz. of each ingredient.

Name: Kup's Indispensable Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) Bitters']

Name: KV's Jolly Rancher

Making: Pour all ingredients except run into a parfait glass filled with ice cubes. Float rum and garnish with a lime wheel and a cherry.

Name: L and G

Making: Stir and strain into a chilled martini glass. There is no garnish. The L and G is named after the Labrot and Graham distillery where it is made! It was invented by Enzo Vincenzo at Matchbar, London, England.

Name: L and M's Delight

Name: L'aird Of Summer Isle

Making: Mix in a cocktail glass and fill with equal parts sour and 7-Up.

Name: L.E.M.(Lezlie Elizabeth Rutland)

Making: Mix vodka and Sunny Delight over crushed ice.

Name: La Bandera

Making:
Muddle the cilantro leaves in ice (leaving you with beautiful green crushed ice) and build a cone of ice in the glass. Combine all other ingredients in a shaker (no ice) and stir to incorporate well. Pour over ice and serve.
Mexican Flag Colors; created by Ryan @ Beaver's Houston

Name: La Berceuse

Making:
Muddle strawberries and agave nectar. Add the juice of one half lemon, spirits and ice. Shake and strain into a tall ice-filled glass and top with seltzer.
Jim Ryan
Dressler
New York
Muse – Vincent van Gogh
Pernod Absinthe has partnered with noted mixologists around the country to create specialty cocktails inspired by artists and writers who were influenced by absinthe.

Name: La Bomba

Making: Shake all ingredients except grenadine with ice 3 times only. Pour into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass and add grenadine. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Making: Fill 1/2 a shaker with ice. Squeeze the lime. Add rum and sugar. Shake vigorously! Strain into a cocktail glass. Listen to Cuban music and enjoy…Trev says: BTW, this obviously is a modified Daiquiri, but in my opinion much more tasty.

Name: La Canne Creuse

Making:
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass. Add ice, and stir until well chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with an orange twist.
Jeff Hollinger
Absinthe Brasserie & Bar
San Francisco
Muse – Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec
Pernod Absinthe has partnered with noted mixologists around the country to create specialty cocktails inspired by artists and writers who were influenced by absinthe.

Name: La Cola Nostra

Shake and strain into a long glass with ice. Top with Champagne.
Don Lee, PDT New York

Making: Grate fresh nutmeg into a snifter glass. Add liquor and ice. Shake. Pour back into snifter glass. Top off with Milk. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.

Name: La Jolla
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 tsp. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: La Pussy
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/3 oz. Cointreau', '1/3 oz. Brandy', '3 dash(es) DeKuyper Apple Barrel Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Making: Shake over ice, strain into flute, top with rose cava or champagne (garnish with a few pomegranate seeds). Serve in a champagne flute. It can also be served as a punch.

Making: Pour ingredients into a chilled fluted glass and stir lightly. Float half a strawberry, a few raspberries or garnish with a lemon twist. Drink a toast to the elegance of simplicity and the divinity of fraises fraiches.

Name: La Stephanique
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Ladies Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 tsp. Anisette', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple stick.

Name: Ladies Cream
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Rose', '1 oz. Godet White Chocloate Liqueur']
Making: Rim glass with sugar and then fill glass with ice. Slowly pour ingredients over ice. Let chill for few minutes before drinking and tasting the fruits of the woman.

Name: Lady Be Good
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Lady Dani
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Belvedere Vodka', '1 oz. Elderflower Syrup', '1 Lime', '1 splash(es) Bitters', 'Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Top with soda.

Name: Lady Finger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Kirsch']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Lady Godiva
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Sugar', '2 dash(es) Triple Sec', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Brandy']
Making: Shake all except brandy and strain into a highball glass. Fill with brandy.

Name: Lady Killer
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3 dash(es) Orange Bitters']

Making: Stir in mixing glass half filled with cracked ice and strain into a 5 oz. champagne glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon rind.

Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Lanas
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Canadian Club Classic Whisky', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Pour over ice.

Name: Land Ho
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Admiral Nelson's Vanilla Rum", '1 oz. Arrow Amaretto', "1 oz. Admiral Nelson's Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Arrow Banana Cream Liqueur', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a large glass. Pour alcohol in first and top with pineapple, giving it a two layered look. Serve with a straw and two cherries.

Name: Landed Gentry
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Las Fresas
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Ron Zacapa XO Rum', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 oz. Strawberry (puree)']
Making:
Combine Zacapa Rum 23, lime juice, simple syrup, and strawberry puree into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a highball glass.
Created by Zacapa Brand Ambasador Tekla Israelson

Name: Laser Beam #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Galliano', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Frappe in a highball glass.

Name: Lasky Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Grape Juice', '3/4 oz. Swedish Punch']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Latte Spice
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Vodka', '2 part(s) Coca Cola']
Making: Mix in rocks glass over ice.

Name: Lava Lamp #2
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour all ingredients except the grenadine into a pilsner glass. Shake. Drip grenadine (like a lava lamp) and garnish with a slice of lime for colour.

Name: Lawhill Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Anis', '1/4 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Lawhorne Leg Spreader
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Moonshine', '2 oz. Tequila Silver', 'Kool-Aid']
Making: Just mix it all up and get wild

Name: Lay Back And Relax
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Grand Marnier', '2 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake and serve over ice in a tall glass.

Name: Lay Me Down And Lick Me
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', '1 Grenadine']
Making: Pour in a cocktail glass with ice and nearly fill with the orange juice. Add enough grenadine to tint it pink and then drink.

Name: Lazerbeam
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice and stir until chilled. Pour into an 8 oz. glass or chill and drink as 2 oz. shooters

Name: Lazy Afternoon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Peach Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine whiskey, peach liqueur and pineapple juice and pour over ice into a highball glass. Float with cherry brandy and garnish with an umbrella, a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

Name: Lazy Labour Day
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Le Fleur Vert (the green flower)
Ingredients: ['1/3 Kiwi', '2 Basil Leaves', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup', "1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin Nouaison", '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '2 1/2 oz. Champagne Moet & Chandon Imperial Brut']
Making: Pour the champagne into a special champagne glass. Muddle the kiwi, basil, and syrup then add the lime juice, G'vine, ice, shake and double strain in the glass with the Champagne.

Name: Le Grand Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Build over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill to just below the top with orange juice. Dribble with grenadine and shake gently to mix.

Name: Le Margarita Des Artistes
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cuervo Tequila (Preferably 1800 Cuervo Tequila)', '1/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '2 drop(s) Vermouth', '1 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake to a froth and pour into a chilled and salted up-glass.

Name: Leaning Tower
Ingredients: ['2 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Dry Vermouth']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: LeAnne's Juices
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine alcohol over ice in a highball glass. Fill the rest of the glass with orange juice and cranberry juice. Add pineapple juice for taste.

Name: Leap Frog
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour gin and juice of lemon over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with Ginger Ale, stir, and serve.

Name: Leap Year Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Orange Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Leave It To Me Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Raspberry Syrup', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/4 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Leave It To Me Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/4 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Leave It To Me Cocktail #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Lebanese Arak
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Al Mimas Arak', '4 oz. Water']
Making: Pour in Arak into a glass. Add water and 2 ice cubes.

Name: Lebanese Snow
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a large red wine glass. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Left Handed Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into 12 to 16 oz. beverage glass. Garnish with a picture of Tim Allen.

Name: Leg Spreader #1
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Everclear', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Frappe in a highball glass and fill with Coca-Cola.

Name: Leg Spreader #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Midori', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a highball glass. A great summer time drink at the cabin!

Name: Lei Lani
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Papaya Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine', '2 oz. Soda Water']
Making: Pour all ingredients, except soda water, into ice cube filled 10 oz glass. Stir well. Top with soda water. Garnish with a fruit flag or a pineapple wedge.

Name: Lemmings Leap
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and float orange juice.

Name: Lemon Cry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix in a lowball glass and drink!

Name: Lemon Drop (Better Than The Best)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka (Chilled)', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Sugar', 'Lemon']
Making: Pour 1 oz. of Absolut Citron into a shot glass. Marinate a lemon wedge in the Grand Marnier. Then take the wedge out of the Grand Marnier and sprinkle it with sugar. Drink the shot of Absolut then eat lemon wedge.

Name: Lemon Herpes
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Lemon', '6 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Combine over ice chips (not cubes) in a collins glass.

Name: Lemon Joe
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '7-Up']
Making: Mix over ice and garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Lemon Liquorice
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Sambuca', '6 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour Jack Daniel's and Sambuca into a cocktail glass. Add Orange Juice and top with a splash of Lemon Juice.

Name: Lemon Sherry Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Honey', '3 oz. Sherry']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange slice.

Name: Lemon Shots Two
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 Lemon (Slice)', 'Salt']
Making: Lick the top of the shooting hand and pour some salt on the of it. Lick the salt off the hand, shoot the vodka and suck the lemon slice.

Name: Lemon Twist
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka (Or any other lemon-flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Lemon-TIQ
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. Lemonchello']
Making: Layer over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Lemonade #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour into a lowball glass and fill with lemon juice..

Name: Lemonade #2
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Gin', '1 can(s) Lemonade (12 oz. - frozen concentrate)', '1 can(s) Beer (12 oz. )']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a tall glass.

Name: Lemonade #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tanqueray Gin', 'Country Time Lemonade']
Making: Make lemonade per directions on the package. Pour 1 oz. gin over ice, add lemonade and stir. Great for dieters - Country Time has no sugar.

Name: Lemonade And Vodka
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Vodka', 'Lemonade']
Making: Mix in a highball glass. You can't even taste the alcohol.

Name: Lemongrass Lawan
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '1 Lemon Grass Stem', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '2 tsp. Brown Sugar', 'Club Soda']
Making: Chop up half of the lemongrass and muddle in base of mixing glass. Pour Mekhong and the rest of the ingredients except the Club soda into the mixing glass. Add Ice and shake vigorously for 7-8 seconds. Strain into a chilled hurricane glass. Bash the other half of the lemongrass and add for garnish.

Name: Lemonhead Punch
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Rum', '2 oz. Triple Sec', '3 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '2 cup(s) Sugar', '2 cup(s) Water', '2 oz. Grenadine', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Boil sugar and water until blended. Mix with lemon juice, pour into ice cube trays, freeze overnight. Afterwards, pry out "cubes" with a grapefruit spoon, and mix with the other ingredients in a blender. If blender is too small, mix the rum in by hand. Serve in a collins glass.

Name: LemonMint
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps (Preferably De Kuyper's)", '6 oz. Snapple (Lemonade)']
Making: Stir over ice in a collins glass.

Name: Lemony Summer
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Whiskey', '4/5 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake well and pour into a highball glass over crushed ice.

Name: Lemony Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', 'Orange Juice', 'Pink Grapefruit Juice', 'Grenadine']
Making: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add Absolut Citron and fill remain glass with equal parts of orange and pink grapefruit juice. Top with a splash of grenadine and garnish with a lemon wedge. Serve with a long straw.

Name: Leprechaun
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Irish Whiskey', '2/3 oz. White Rum', '1/3 oz. Sloe Gin', '2/3 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/4 Peach', 'Strawberries']
Making: Blend and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Leprechaun #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Fill a 8 oz. glass with ice. Add peach schnapps first then the blue curacao. Pour in the orange juice slowly for good presentation. Stir before consumption.

Name: Leprechaun Cum
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Cream', 'Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Rumple Minze (Around the rim)']
Making: Mix cream, schnapps and blue curacao over ice in a cocktail glass rimmed with Rumple Minze. Fill with orange juice.

Name: Leprechaun F**k
Ingredients: ["1 1/4 oz. Menthe Schnapps (Dr. Mcgillcuddy's)", '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Combine with ice. Yummy

Name: Leprechaun’s Revenge
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1/2 oz. DeKuyper Crantasia Cranberry Schnapps', 'Roaring Lion Energy Drink']
Making: Serve in a highball glass and top with Roaring Lion Energy Drink.

Name: Leprochaun's Lunch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', 'Milk']
Making: Take a large drinking glass (about 7-8 oz), add an ice cube or two, then the alcohol in no particular order. Fill with milk and stir!

Name: Lesbian Delight
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix (Or to taste)', '1 splash(es) Maraschino Cherry Juice (Or to taste)', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice (Or to taste)', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice (Or to taste)', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice (Or to taste)']
Making: Build in a highball glass and add 2 cherries.

Name: Leslie's Pussy
Ingredients: ['3 oz. White Wine', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Stir (gently) with ice and strain into a collins or a highball glass. Garnish with 2 cherries.

Name: Let Me Kiss Your Pineapple
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Damiana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Midori', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake the ingredients with ice and serve on the rocks in a collins glass.

Name: Lethal Lemonade
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', "10 oz. Lemonade (Pre-mixed, not powdered--it's too watery if you have to make it from a mix)"]
Making: Put 3 ice cubes in a highball glass and alternate adding vodka and lemonade, 2 oz. at a time, until mixed to your preferred strength. Enjoy, but be careful--this packs a powerful punch, and it's stronger than it tastes!

Name: Level Peppermintini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Level Vodka', '1 part(s) Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Frangelico', '1 squirt(s) Expresso']
Making: Shake all of the ingredients with ice, strain and serve up. Garnish with a with a mini candy cane.

Name: Level Raspberry Chocolate Turtle Dove
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Level Vodka', '1/4 part(s) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '4 Raspberries', '3/4 part(s) Lemon Juice', '3/4 part(s) Simple Syrup', 'Chocolate Sauce']
Making: Shake first five ingredients with ice and double strain into a rocks glass with chocolate sauce in the bottom.

Name: Leviathan
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Liberty Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Apple Brandy', '1/4 tsp. Simple Syrup']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Libra
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Smirnoff Vodka (Preferably Smirnoff Orange Twist Vodka)', '1 cup(s) Sprite', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix vodka and Sprite in a cup and top with whipped cream.

Name: Lichee Nut Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 tsp. Sugar', '3 Lychee Nuts']
Making: Blend thoroughly in blender. Pour into 14 oz. glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and a maraschino cherry.

Name: Lick and a Promise
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Midori']
Making: Mix the first 4 ingredients in tall glass filled with ice. Shake it and drizzle Midori on top.

Name: Lick Out A Sheep
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Advocaat']
Making: Mix all the ingredients and pour over ice in a long frosted glass, garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Lickalotapuss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '1 oz. Amaretto', '4 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Fill an 8 oz. glass with ice, add the watermelon pucker and the 7-Up. Lace with amaretto.

Name: Licoco Exotic
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Licoco Coconut Liqueur', '2 oz. Coffee']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over fresh ice.

Name: Licorice Mist
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Coconut Liqueur', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Cut the ends off of a black licorice stick to use as a straw.

Name: Licorice Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Ouzo', '1 oz. Tequila', '12 oz. Orange Juice', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour the orange juice into a tall glass and top with the Ouzo and Tequila so they float on top. Follow with the grenedine.

Name: Life Saver
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Cactus Juice', 'Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Grape Pucker']
Making: Fill in a tall glass with ice. Add the 2 shots in order. Pour in the orange juice and float the grape pucker. You should see green, white, orange and grape just like the lifesavers in a package.

Name: Life Saver #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Up or On the Rocks.

Name: Lift
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Tia Maria Chocolate Liqueur', '5 oz. Coffee']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with coffee. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Lightning Rod
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Jolt Cola']
Making: Mix and serve or, like Levi says: build however the hell you want but don't use near water or electric equipment.

Name: Lil Naue
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Port', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a red wine glass. Sprinkle cinnamon on top and serve.

Name: Lil' Johnson
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Country Cocktail (Downhome Punch)", "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Pour into collins glass over ice and serve.

Name: Lillet Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Lillet', '1 tbsp. Dry Gin']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Lilly Pad
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Midori (Or to taste)', '2 oz. Malibu Rum (Or to taste)', 'Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Blue Curacao', '1 Candy (Gummy Frog)', 'Lime']
Making: In a pint glass, mix equal parts of Midori and Malibu...then fill the remaining part of the pint with pineapple juice and shake..shake..shake…Float the blue curacao on the top...cut a lime in a coin shape and float it over the ice..(the more ice the better in this cocktail)…Lastly put a happy little gummy frog on his pad and yum!yum!yum!....cheers!

Name: Lime and Pear Panya
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Elderflower Syrup', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1/4 Pear cut lengthwise', '3 piece(s) Ginger root, thumbnail size']
Making:
In a mixing glass muddle the pear, ginger and sugar into a paste. Add Mekhong and the rest of the ingredients. Add Ice and shake vigorously for 7-8 seconds. Strain into a rock glass over ice. Garnish with torn Kaffir lime leaf.
(Just won the Bronze Medal in the annual Drinks International Cocktail Challenge event in London).

Name: Lime Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Light Rum', '1/2 cup(s) Limeade (Concentrate - frozen)', '1 cup(s) Sparkling Water']
Making: Pour in a blender with three cups of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Serve immediately in a large cocktail glass.

Name: Lime Lambada
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Lime Liqueur (Preferably Sint Maarten Wild Lime liqueur)', 'Cola']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Lime Light
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lime Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', 'Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice. Fill with Sprite. Garnish with a twist of lime.

Name: Lime Lighter
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum (Appleton's or better)", '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', "1 splash(es) Rose's Lime Juice", '1/4 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Lime Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao', '7-Up']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and top with 7-Up. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Limestone
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', 'Collins Mix', 'Lime Juice (To taste)']
Making: Stir the Bourbon with ice in a highball glass and top up with Collins Mix. Add lime juice.

Name: Limestone Cowboy
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '2/3 part(s) Lime Cordial', '4 part(s) Soda']
Making: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Limey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 tbsp. Lime Liqueur', '2 tsp. Triple Sec', '2 tsp. Lime Juice']
Making: Mix at low speed for 10-20 seconds with 3 oz. of crushed ice. Strain into a large champagne glass and garnish with a sliver of lime.

Name: Limey Lager
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Lager (Your favourite)', '6 oz. Ginger Ale', '2 tbsp. Sugar']
Making: Combine the lager and the ginger ale in a pilsner glass. Add the sugar and stir. Garnish with a twist of lime and serve cold.

Name: Limon Collins
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Lemon Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Sweetened)']
Making: Fill a 5-oz. rocks glass with ice. Add vodka and sweetened lemon juice. Stir and serve.

Name: Limon Dew
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '4 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Fill a glass with ice and pour in the ingredients. Stir and enjoy.

Name: Limon Dew Drop
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '6 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Serve in a tall glass over ice. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Limon Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Lemon Vodka', '3 oz. Orange Juice (Can be 4 oz.)', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Fill a 5-oz. rocks glass with ice. Add the vodka and the orange juice. Slowly add grenadine and stir gently.

Name: Limoncello Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '2 oz. Pallini Limoncello', '3 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Muddle lemon juice, simple syrup and mint in a tall glass. Add ice, Pallini Limoncello and club soda. Garnish with a lime wedge and mint.

Name: Limongrad
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Lemon Vodka', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice (Can be 4 oz.)']
Making: Serve in a 5-oz. rocks glass over ice.

Name: Limonita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Lemon Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Sweetened)']
Making: Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add vodka, sweetened lemon juice and Triple Sec. Strain into a cocktail glass rimmed with salt.

Name: Linchburg Lemonade
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Country Cocktail (Downhome Punch)", '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Squirt']
Making: Mix over ice in a tall glass.

Name: Linstead Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 tsp. Sugar', '1/4 tsp. Anis', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Linux
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with Coca-Cola. Garnish with a lime peel.

Name: Lion on the Beach
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Roaring Lion Energy Drink', '1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1 part(s) Pomegranate Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a cocktail glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge and an Umbrella.

Name: Lion's Blood
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', 'Roaring Lion Energy Drink', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making:
"A hearty shot of tequila, served with Roaring Lion, ice and a dash of Grenadine, creating a blood-red cocktail with teeth"
Build over ice in a short glass. Top with Roaring Lion and add the grenadine.

Name: Lipstick
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Bacardi Rum', '2/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 1/3 oz. Cream', '1 1/3 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Blend with ice and strain into a frosted hurricane glass with cracked ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Liquid Caramel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream (Chilled)', '1 oz. Kahlua (Chilled)', '1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps (Chilled)', 'Milk (Cold)']
Making: Make sure all ingredients are cold, this will go down nasty if it is warm, or made with ice. Take a tall glass, mix the shots, and top off with cold milk. Stir well and enjoy.

Name: Liquid Cocaine
Ingredients: ['1/5 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/5 oz. Amaretto', '1/5 oz. Yukon Jack', "1/5 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/5 oz. Tequila', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour liquor over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with pineapple juice and a splash of grenadine. Finish with a cherry.

Name: Liquid Cocaine #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Rum', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the ingredients into a 10-12 oz. glass over ice and top up with orange and pineapple juice. Then stir well and serve.

Name: Liquid Cocaine (Sammy Style)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a rocks glass filled with ice of course and get ready to burn.

Name: Liquid Cocaine (the original)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Crown Royal', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 splash(es) Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Shake everything but Coca-Cola with ice. Pour into a highball glass and fill with Coca-Cola. Stir. Tastes smooth.

Name: Liquid Cocaine (the Real One)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Midori', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix Spirits in a shaker over ice. Pour into a Large Margarita Glass 3/4 full of ice. Top off with orange juice, pineapple juice and a splash of grenadine.

Name: Liquid Cocaine - 8 ball
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix alcohol over ice in collins glass, fill with pineapple juice, add dash grenadine.

Name: Liquid Cocaine - Chicago Style
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix over ice cubes in a highball glass. This is a fruity drink. I have never had a women tell me she didn't like. Some men don't care for the sweet taste but it is the only way to drink a Liquid Cocaine.

Name: Liquid Cocaine - New
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour over ice in rocks glass.

Name: Liquid Cocaine - North West Style
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Build in order over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Liquid Ecstasy
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Combine all spirits in a highball glass, add the cranberry juice and shake. Top with 7-Up.

Name: Liquid Elmo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '7-Up', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour raspberry vodka over ice in a highball glass. Fill with 7-UP and float grenadine on top. Garnish with orange slice and cherry.

Name: Liquid Kryptonite
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '6 oz. Surge Energy Drink']
Making: Mix with ice and strain over ice cubes into a highball glass.

Name: Liquid Lite
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Galliano', '1 splash(es) Amaretto', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cockatil glass. Garnish with a cherry and a lime flag. POTENT!

Name: Liquid Marajuana
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '3/4 oz. Midori', '2 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: Liquid Nerds
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '2/3 oz. 7-Up (Or Sprite)', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a wedge of lime. Note from John: For some reason the taste is very similar to the candy called Nerds.

Name: Liquid Panty Remover #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/4 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Liquid Personality
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Starbucks Bottled Coffee Frappuccino Coffee Drink', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a BIG shaker over ice. Strain and serve in a rocks glass with or without rocks. *The brave may add 1 oz. of vodka

Name: Liquid Pez
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Bacardi Limon', '2 oz. Orange Soda', '2 oz. Mountain Dew', '1 oz. Grape Soda']
Making: Pour over ice.

Name: Liquid Sex
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Metz', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Shake the tequila, Malibu and Metz over ice. Strain and pour into a highball glass. Stir in a few tablespoonfuls of whipped cream.

Name: Liquid Sword
Ingredients: ['3 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '7 oz. Root Beer']
Making: Mix Stir Serve

Name: Liquid Virgin
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka (Or to taste)', 'Dr Pepper (Preferably 7-11 Super Big Gulp of Dr. Pepper)']
Making: Take a few big swigs from the SBG then top it up with vodka. We used to drink this skateboarding.

Name: Liquid Weed
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients in shaker over ice, shake and serve. Fill rest of glass with pineapple juice.

Name: Lisa's Grapefruit Juice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Lime Juice']
Making: Blend all together with crushed ice until smooth. Note: You can increase the orange and lemon-lime juices to taste.

Name: Lisa's Raspberry Tea
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Smirnoff Raspberry Twist Vodka', '12 oz. Iced Tea (Lipton Brisk)']
Making: Add ice to a 20 oz. cup. Pour vodka over ice and add one can of ice tea.

Name: Lithium Mother F**ker
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '12 oz. Orange Soda']
Making: Mix with ice in a highball glass.

Name: Little Bastard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with 7-Up.

Name: Little Blue Crunchy Thing
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Lemon', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Pour into a highball glass over ice and fill with Sour Mix.

Name: Little Devil
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Gin', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Little Ginny
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '6 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix Gin and juice over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Little Green Mother F**ker
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'dash(es) Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka']
Making: Pour the Midori in a shot glass, layer the Bailey's with a spoon and float the Stoli.

Name: Little Mermaid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. UV Blue Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 splash(es) Tonic Water', '7-Up']
Making: Mix over ice in a tall glass. Top with 7-Up and stir. The Tonic Water makes the drink glow under black light.

Name: Little Orphan Apple
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Square One Cucumber Flavored Organic Vodka', '1/5 Apple (Fuji, cored and cubed)', '1/2 oz. Aperol Orange Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh Organic)']
Making:
In a mixing glass, muddle half of the apple cubes with lemon juice. Add the remaining ingredients and ice. Shake well and strain into a short glass (coup or old fashioned). Garnish with three apple cubes on a toothpick resting in the glass. Variation: Strain over ice and top with soda water to create a crisp cooler.
The Fuji apple's crisp sweetness stands out.
Credit: H. Joseph Ehrmann
Square One Brand Ambassador and Mixologist

Name: Little Princess
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Loch Lomond #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, Drambuie, and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Loch Lomond #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '3 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a parfait glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Loch Ness Monster #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 tsp. Peppermint Schnapps', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Stir and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Loco Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Grenadine', '4 oz. Lemonade', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Build over 4 ice cubes and squeeze a lemon over top.

Name: Loco Motion
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Loft A Better Mule
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Ginger Beer', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: Loft Almost Purple Haze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Loft Lavender Liqueur', '2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Soda Water', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Loft Cold Comfort
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '1 oz. Spiced Rum', '2 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with cinnamon or grated nutmeg.

Name: Loft Craig’s Drink List
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Loft Desert Flower
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Lavender Liqueur', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Loft Easy Like Sunday Morning
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Soda Water', '3/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange wheel.

Name: Loft Garden Party
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Soda Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Loft George Washington in London
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Loft Ginger Peach Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1/8 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Peach Nectar', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a wedge of peach.

Name: Loft Ginger Pear Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1/8 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Pear Nectar', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a wedge of pear.

Name: Loft Good Night Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Lavender Liqueur', '2 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.
