Name: Loft Lavender Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Loft Lavender Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Loft Lavender Lady
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Loft Lavender Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Tonic Water', '1 oz. Soda Water', '1/2 oz. Pomegranate Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Loft Lavender Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Lavender Liqueur', '1 oz. Vodka (optional)', '4 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Loft Lavender Mint Julep
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Loft Lavender Liqueur', '2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '10 Mint Leaves']
Making: Stir mint and bourbon before adding other ingredients. Serve in a tall glass over ice and garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Loft Light and Fiery
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', "1 oz. Gosling's Black Seal Rum", '1 oz. Ginger Beer', '1 oz. Soda Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Loft Midnight Hurricane
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Loft Partridge in a Pear Tree
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Loft Lavender Liqueur', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Pear Nectar', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 splash(es) Soda Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an Oven-dried thin-sliced pear.

Name: Loft Pear Ginger Cobbler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '2 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. Pear Nectar', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Sparkling Wine']
Making:
Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with sparkling wine.
Amanda Schuster created this recipe for her appearance on Martha Stewart Radio

Name: Loft Spicy Ginger Caipirina
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '2 1/2 oz. Cachaca', '3/4 Lime (cut into 8 pieces)']
Making: Muddle lime before adding other ingredients. Do not strain. Serve in a rocks glass.

Name: Loft Spicy Ginger Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '1 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: Loft Table It
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Carrot Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with curled carrot shavings.

Name: Loft Winter Holiday
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a dash of cinnamon.

Name: Lola Chiquita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Grand Marnier', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with equal parts Cranberry and Pineapple juice. Originated in Tampa Florida!

Name: Lolita
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Burgundy Wine', '4 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Pour in a wine glass and garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

Name: Lomomba
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac', 'Chocolate Milk']
Making: Pour the Cognac into a highball glass and top with chocolate milk.

Name: London Buck
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1/2 tsp. Simple Syrup']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: London Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1/2 tsp. Simple Syrup', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: London Fog
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Frappe in a highball glass.

Name: London Special
Ingredients: ['1 Sugar Cube', '2 dash(es) Bitters', 'Champagne (Chilled)']
Making: Pour the sugar and the bitters over a twist of orange peel in a champagne glass. Fill with the champagne and stir.

Name: London Town
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: London-Maui Connection
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Stretton's London Dry Gin", '1 can(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '2 oz. Water Filtered']
Making:
I bring to you a drink that has won recent popularity in my group of chums. I have happened upon a bottle of Stretton’s London Dry Gin, which I have found a drink that it is wonderful in.
Make sure the can is cold, and the water chilled as well. Mix the whole drink thoroughly in a large glass. Due to the specific gravity differences in the different liquids, this drink needs to be stirred through the whole experience, lest the gin separate and fall to the bottom, making that last swig a doozy!
This drink is particularly well balanced. The gin takes away from the sweet of the Punch and the water mellows the gin so you can actually drink this one without the bite of the juniper. Just be sure to mix often. Enjoy!

Name: Lone Tree Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Lone Tree Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Carbonated Water', '2 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Stir powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice, add gin and vermouth, and stir. Fill with carbonated water and stir again. Garnish with the twist of lemon and an orange slice.

Name: Lonely Night
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 1/4 oz. Irish Cream', '1 1/4 oz. Hazelnut Liqueur', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with whipped cream and shaved chocolate.

Name: Long Beach Ice Tea #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '4 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a beer mug. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Long Beach Ice Tea #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a beer mug. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Long beach Ice Tea #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a collins glass full of ice, pour alcohol, add 1oz. sweet and sour and top with cranberry juice. Shake in a mixing tin and pour back into the glass.

Name: Long Island
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Whiskey', '1/4 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 splash(es) Cola', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix alcohol in large glass, add syrup and fill with orange juice. Add splash of cola for colour.

Name: Long Island Ice Tea
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sour Mix', 'Amaretto']
Making: Fill shaker with ice, alcohol and Sour Mix. Add Amaretto to taste. Shake, strain and pour over ice into a highball glass. (Amaretto substitutes for cola in this drink)

Name: Long Island Ice Tea - Official
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Gin', '1 part(s) White Rum', '1 part(s) Tequila Silver', '1/2 part(s) Triple Sec', '1/2 part(s) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Build in a tall glass over 2 cups of ice with a lemon wedge for garnish. Originally invented by Robert Butt while working at the Oak Beach Inn for a cocktail contest in 1972. Down the hatch.

Name: Long Island Ice Tea California Style
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Cointreau', '2/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '2/3 oz. Vodka', '2/3 oz. Tequila', '2/3 oz. White Rum', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Pour all alcohol in a mixer and shake well. Fill a tall glass 2/3 crushed ice. Pour alcohol over the ice. Add a splash of Coca Cola for coloring. Correctly done there should be nearly no alcohol taste. Just a nice drink that will make you drunk quickly.

Name: Long Island Iced Berry Tea
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with pineapple juice.

Name: Long Island Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Tequila', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', 'Cola']
Making: Mix all ingredients (except cola) and shake with crushed ice. Finish with cola, stir and garnish with a wedge of lime. The Southern Comfort makes it taste more like iced-tea.

Name: Long Island Iced Tea #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lemonade', 'Coca Cola', '7-Up']
Making: Pour all the ingredients over ice and top up with equal amounts of Coke and 7-Up. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Long Island Iced Tea #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sour Mix', 'Cola']
Making: Fill 12 oz. glass with ice. Add all the alcohol and Sour Mix. Top off glass with cola to taste.

Name: Long Island Iced Tea #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Cola']
Making: Combine the ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Add the cola for color. Garish with a slice of lemon. It tastes just like Iced Tea.

Name: Long Island Iced Tea #4
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Mix all contents in a highball glass and stir gently. Add Coca-Cola for the colouring and garnish with a lemon or lime twist.

Name: Long Island Iced Tea #5
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Bitters', '1 splash(es) Cola']
Making: Build over ice in a collins glass.

Name: Long Island Iced Tea - Top Shelf
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1/2 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1/2 oz. Rum (Preferably Mount Gay Eclipse Rum)', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1 oz. Cola']
Making: Build in a chilled collins glass (except Cola). Shake. Stir in Cola. Garnish if desired with lemon or lime.

Name: Long Island Sunset
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Spiced Rum', '3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Sour Mix', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into large glass. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of orange.

Name: Long Sex On The Island
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Layer in a tall glass with ice and will with equal parts orange juice and cranberry juice.

Name: Long Slow Comfortable Screw Up Against a Cold Hard Wall with a Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 splash(es) Galliano', '1 splash(es) Amaretto']
Making: Mix vodka, orange juice, Sloe Gin, SoCo and pour over ice. Float a splash of Galliano and a splash of Amaretto on top. The vodka and the orange juice are the Screw, Sloe Gin the slow, SoCo the Comfortable, Galliano the Wall, Amaretto the Kiss and ice the Cold Hard.

Name: Long Vodka
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Tonic Water', '4 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake vodka with ice and pour over 4 ice cubes and Angostura in a tall glass. Mix with tonic and garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Long Walk Off A Short Pier
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Midori', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Longview Palm Party
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass. Decorate with a cherry.

Name: Look Better Naked Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Partida Reposado Tequila', '1/2 oz. Sambazon Pure Organic Acai', '3/4 oz. Partida Agave Nectar', 'Rosemary 4" Sprig', '1/2 oz. Egg White', '1 Lime Fresh Squeezed']
Making:
Remove the Rosemary Leaves from the wood stem and muddle in a 16 oz. pint glass until aromatic. Add Liquid Ingredients.
Rim a martini glass with equal parts of organic salt with 50 Trace Minerals and fresh cracked organic green peppercorns.
Shake liquid ingredients vigorously until metal shaker is frosted. Strain into chilled, rimmed martini glass and float a 1" Rosemary Sprig on top.
Every year, one of the top New Year's resolutions is to get in shape.
Partida Tequila and Nacional 27 Manager/Mixologist Adam Seger have a better solution to help you get a little healthy while you imbibe this season: LookBetterNaked! This holiday season, Partida has teamed up with Seger to create a new margarita crafted from healthy ingredients for a guilt-free indulgence that fuels the body while it delights the taste buds.
The LookBetterNaked margarita is made from all-natural ingredients, including Partida Reposado tequila, organic acai, organic agave nectar, rosemary, egg white and fresh squeezed lime juice. Using Sambozan Pure Organic Acai and Partida Organic Agave Nectar fills the margarita with antioxidants, amino acids, dietary fiber, iron, calcium, cholesterol-reducing fructans and Vitamins A and C. The rosemary is rich in vitamin E, preventing cancer and skin damage. An egg white provides a lean source of protein, while the fresh lime juice prevents heart disease and gives an extra dose of Vitamin C. The LookBetterNaked margarita is this year's answer to those countless toasts to a holiday season!

Name: Look Out Below
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes.

Name: Loose Virgin
Ingredients: ['1 oz. UV Blue Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '7-Up']
Making: Mix over ice in a tall glass. Top with 7-Up and stir.

Name: Lord and Lady
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Tia Maria']
Making: Pour the rum and Tia Maria into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Name: Lorraine Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Kirsch', '1/2 oz. Benedictine', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Los Angeles Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a sour glass, and serve.

Name: Los Muertos
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Espolon Tequila Reposado', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Apple Cider (Vinegar Shrub)', '1/2 oz. Cardamaro Amaro', '1 tsp. Agave Nectar (Infused with Apple Butter)', '4 chunk(s) Apple']
Making:
Muddle apple chunks in bottom of a mixing glass. Shake all ingredients together with ice and double strain into a rocks glass over ice. Top with apple cider foam and drizzle with blackstrap molasses.
Created by Raul Yrastorza, Las Perlas, Los Angeles

Name: Lost Island Ice Tea
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Sake', "1 splash(es) Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '3 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Pour into a 12 oz glass over ice. Fill to the brim. Turn on the TV show LOST and Enjoy!

Name: Louisa County Pear
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. DeKuyper Peachtree Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cross slice of Royal Riviera Pear.

Name: Louisiana Lullaby
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '2 tsp. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Rouge)', '3 drop(s) Grand Marnier']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sliver of lemon.

Name: Louisiana Orange Blaster
Ingredients: ['Orange Juice (Orange Frutopia)', '2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Pour amaretto over ice into a cocktail glass and fill with fruitopia. Stir and serve!

Name: Louisville Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over cracked ice. Garnish with a half slice of orange.

Name: Louisville Lady
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '3/4 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Lounge Lizard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Cola']
Making: Build in a collins glass and fill with cola. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Love Birds
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Sour Mix', 'dash(es) Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Frappe in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Love Bite
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cherry Liqueur', '1 oz. Parfait Amour', 'Cream (Sweet)']
Making: Layer (Cherry then Parfait) in a cocktail glass and top off with a teaspoon of cream. Delicious.

Name: Love Bug
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Dekuyper Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '3 part(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix over ice in a cocktail glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Love Bug #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Dekuyper Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 part(s) Vox Vodka', '3 part(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Stir and serve over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Love Dart
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grape Pucker', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '7-Up', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Serve in cocktail glass with ice and fill with equal parts 7-Up and sour mix.

Name: Love EliXir
Ingredients: ['1 oz. X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Serve on the rocks and garnish with an orange peel spiral.

Name: Love For Toby
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 tsp. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Love In An Elevator
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Green Curacao', 'Pommac Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass and fill with soda.

Name: Love In The Afternoon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake the pineapple juice, white rum and peach schnapps with ice and strain into a cocktail glass filled with crushed ice. Add creme de menthe and serve.

Name: Love Juice (LJ)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '2 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Apple Juice', '6 1/2 oz. Squirt (Or any other citrus soda)']
Making: First add rum, followed by other ingredients, mix well. Serve on the rocks with an orange slice in a collins glass.

Name: Love Letter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Campari', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '1/4 oz. Maple Syrup (1:1 with water)', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', '3 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters']
Making:
Shake. Add Soda. Pour over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lime zest.
Created by Adam Wilson of Beretta

Name: Love Line
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake Midori, Malibu and pinapple juice in a shaker with ice. Strain into a martini glass. Sink Chambord and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Love Machine
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Pour in order over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Love Potion
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Yazi Ginger Flavored Vodka', '1 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice', '1 dash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and serve up in martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Love Potion # 69
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', "1/2 oz. Creme d'Almond", '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake and serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple and cherry flag.

Name: Love Potion 69
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Rum', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a 12 oz. glass up to 2/3 with ice, then pour the coconut rum and the peach schnapps. Add some pineapple juice till about 3/4 of the glass is filled and fill the rest with cranberry juice. Finish with a splash of rum. Shake and enjoy!!!

Name: Love Potion No. 9
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Sauza Silver Tequila', '1 part(s) Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '4 part(s) Ice Cream (Chocolate)']
Making: In a blender, combine tequila, raspberry liqueur and chocolate ice cream. Pour into glasses and garnish with raspberries.

Name: Lovely L7
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', 'Sprite']
Making: Put 4 ice cubes in a 16 oz. glass. Add Peach Tree Schnapps and fill with Sprite.

Name: Lover's Kiss
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a parfait glass. Garnish with whipped cream and sprinkle with chocolate shavings and a cherry.

Name: Lover's Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Agavero Tequila Liqueur', '1 oz. 1800 Reposado Tequila', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making:
Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake until cold. Pour into a salt rimmed margarita glass over ice. Garnish with a lime slice.
We recommend doubling the recipe and using two straws!

Name: Lover's Nocturne
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: LoVerde Buttslam
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Cream Soda (A and W)', 'Mango Juice']
Making: Fill a 14 oz glass with ice. Pour in Captain Morgan Spiced Rum. Fill glass over halfway with Mango juice. Fill rest of the way with A and W Cream Soda. Stir. Lemon twist if desired.

Name: Lovers Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 Egg White', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Raspberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Low Rider
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1 oz. Canadian Mist', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Just blend and enjoy the power of a Low Rider.

Name: Lt. Kije's Kolada
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 Banana (Small and ripe)', '1/4 cup(s) Strawberries (Fresh)', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Cream (Or to taste)']
Making: Blend all the ingredients until smooth and creamy. Pour into chilled hurricane glass and garnish with a pineapple stick or slice.

Name: Lube Job
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass, starting with the vodka.

Name: Lucid Brazilian Sangria
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Lucid Absinthe Superieure', '1 1/4 oz. Cachaca', '1/2 oz. Spanish Brandy', '1/2 oz. Orange Liqueur', '1 oz. Red Wine']
Making:
In a cocktail shaker, thoroughly muddle fresh seasoned fruit (recommended: strawberry, lime, orange, kiwi, and passionfruit) with Lucid, cachaca, brandy, and orange liquor. Pour into wine glass. Float red wine on top of cocktail. Stir and enjoy.
Developed by Ben Scorah
Beekman Bar and Books New York, NY

Name: Lucid Gingerbread Man
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lucid Absinthe Superieure', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 dash(es) Cinnamon', '1 dash(es) Nutmeg', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Green Chartreuse']
Making: In a mixing glass, muddle 3 dials of fresh ginger. Add all ingredients. Shake thoroughly with ice, then strain over fresh ice in a highball glass. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with a small Christmas tree gingerbread cookie.

Name: Lucid Mint Muse
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Lucid Absinthe Superieure', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Mint Leaves', '1 wedge(s) Lime', 'Sprite']
Making: Muddle mint leaves with lime wedge and add Lucid. Add ice and pineapple juice and shake briefly. Top with Sprite or 7-UP and add mint sprig.

Name: Lucid Starry Night
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Van Gogh Dutch Chocolate Vodka', '1/2 oz. Lucid Absinthe Superieure', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: In an iced filled shaker, add the Vodka, Lucid and simple syrup. Shake thoroughly and strain into a chocolate cookie crumbed rimmed martini glass. Garnish with a Chinese Star Anise.

Name: Lucid Traditional
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Lucid Absinthe Superieure', '1 Sugar Cube', 'Water (ice)']
Making:
Pour 1 1/2 oz. Lucid into an absinthe glass. Place sugar cube atop a flat, perforated spoon that rests on the rim of the glass. Slowly drip 4-5 oz. of ice cold water on top of the sugar cube (or directly into the glass), which dissolves into the absinthe. The cold water causes the Lucid to louche into an opalescent cloud as the herbal essences emerge from the absinthe and perfume the room.
Available at Currant American Brasserie, San Diego

Name: Lucky Driver
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Coconut Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '5 1/2 oz. Sugar Syrup']
Making: Prepare in a blender or shaker, serve in a long drink glass with 2-3 ice cubes. Garnish with one orange slice, and one lemon slice.

Name: Lucky Lion
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Roaring Lion Energy Drink', '2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Serve in a highball glass.

Name: Lucky Purple
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and top with lemonade.

Name: Lucy
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '2/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '2/3 oz. Malibu Rum', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain into a long drink glass with ice. Serve with a straw.

Name: Ludwig and The Gang
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Anejo Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice cubes in a mixing glass and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice.

Name: Lugger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Brandy', '1 oz. Brandy', 'dash(es) Apricot Brandy']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Lulu
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a exotic glass. Add splash of grenadine. Garnish with a straw.

Name: Lumpy Lime
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka (Lime flavoured)', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '7-Up']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass.

Name: Lumumba
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', 'Chocolate Milk']
Making: Pour in a highball glass and fill with chocolate milk .

Name: Lunar Landing
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Zima', '2 oz. Bacardi Limon']
Making: Mix like hell and pour over ice.

Name: Lunch Bucket
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Beer', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix everything in a glass and enjoy. It is important to use cold beer, and is best when served before the beer goes flat. This is a great breakfast drink.

Name: Lush
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Just mix over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge. Yummmm....

Name: Lusty Hussy
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '2 sprig(s) Mint', '1 slice(s) Watermelon (flesh only)']
Making: Blend then shake well and serve up. A Lusty Hussy to be drunk by lustful bold women who are not afraid to take their suitors beyond their sureal expectations!

Name: Luv
Ingredients: ['1 oz. J.W. Dant Kentucky Straight Bourbon Whisky', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 dash(es) Pineapple Juice', 'Fruit']
Making: Mix in a tall glass with ice and garnish with some fruit. Bill says this recipe came out of Playboy Magazine in the 80s'. The caption stated: Luv - One drink and you'll want too!

Name: Luxury Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Brandy', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '3 oz. Champagne (Chilled)']
Making: Stir and pour into a champagne flute.

Name: Lynard Skynard
Ingredients: ['1/2 bottle(s) Pina Colada', '1/2 cup(s) Grenadine', '4 oz. Grand Marnier', '5 oz. Sloe Gin', 'Strawberries']
Making: Fill blender with ice and add about 8-10 whole strawberries, and the rest of the ingredients. Blend well. Serve in margarita glasses.

Name: Lynchburg Lemonade
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '4 oz. Sprite (You can also just add 2 oz. of Sprite)']
Making: Combine over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Lynchburg Lemonade #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cointreau', "1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Lemonade']
Making: Shake and pour into an ice filled highball glass. Top with the lemonade.

Name: M&M
Ingredients: ["1 bottle(s) Alcopop (Mike's Hard Lemonade)", '4 oz. Midori']
Making: Drink the neck of a bottle of Mike's Hard Lemonade, then fill it up with Midori...and DRINK!

Name: M'bata
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac', '2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Swedish Punch', 'Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with milk.

Name: M.V.P
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake Malibu Rum, Vodka and pineapple juice over ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and decorate with a cherry.

Name: Ma Bonnie Wee Hen
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Cream Sherry', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Ma Wee Hen
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Dry Sherry', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Mac Daddy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Tropico Liqueur', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Sprite', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix Peach Schnapps, Tropico Liqueur and Malibu over ice in a 16 oz. glass. Fill with Sprite and top with a drizzle of grenadine. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Macaco-Loco The Crazy Monkey
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cachaca Fazenda Mae de Ouro', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '2 tbsp. Lime Juice', '1/2 Banana Chopped']
Making: Combine all ingredients in an electric blender and blend at high speed until smooth. Pour into a large glass.

Name: Macaroni
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pastis', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Macaroon
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Macarthur Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '3 dash(es) Jamaica Rum', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', 'dash(es) Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass.

Name: Macbeth's Dream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1 tsp. White Curacao', '1 tsp. Amaretto', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Machete
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '4 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Fill a 12 oz. glass half full of ice. Add ingredients. Stir or shake.

Name: MacLaren F1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Rouge)']
Making: Although sounding (and looking) vile, it does taste very nice (the Pernod doesn't completely dominate the taste), and goes down far too easily.

Name: Mad Bomber
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin', '1 can(s) Coca Cola']
Making: Build over ice cubes into a highball glass.

Name: Mad Cow
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Cream', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix in a shaker 1/4 filled with ice and pour into large shot glass.

Name: Mad Dog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Crowberry Syrup', '5 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour the vodka into a glass then put the crowberry syrup. Top with 5 drops of tabasco. You need to drink the whole glass if you want the full effect (drinking slowly will make your lips very hot because of the tabasco on top of the drink).

Name: Mad Jawa Droid Lubricant 1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '7-Up or Sprite', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Add Stolichnaya Vanilla Vodka over ice in a highball glass. Fill with 7-Up or Sprite. Add Midori to taste. Enjoy.

Name: Mad Jawa Droid Lubricant 2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vanilla Vodka', 'Mountain Dew', 'Midori']
Making: Pour vanilla vodka over ice in a highball glass. Fill with Mountain Dew and add Midori to taste.

Name: Mad Jawa Valentines Day Massacre
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Tequila Rose', '1 oz. Milk', '1 dash(es) Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Mix Milk, Banana Liqueur, Sambuca and Tequila Rose in a cocktail glass. Layer the Hot Damn on top and garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Mad Melon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Mad Melon Watermelon Schnapps', 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour in a cocktail glass and fill with lemonade.

Name: Mad Mimosa
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Champagne (GH Mumm Brut)', '1 part(s) Orange Juice', '1/4 part(s) Pernod Absinthe']
Making:
Add ingredients to champagne glass.
Grown-up Halloween Parties can full of campy and ghoulish surprises...whether it’s fangs in the punch or blood red cocktails, the opportunity to get creative for an evening of imbibing is endless! Pernod Absinthe, however, requires no added gimmicks to make cocktails that are perfect for Halloween!
Pernod is the ORGINAL Absinthe and it was the favorite drink of some seriously deviant art and literary greats like Edward Allen Poe, Van Gogh and Oscar Wilde. Now available in the US, Pernod Absinthe is an authentic way to add an aura of 18th century-style drama and mystery to a modern Halloween celebration... Its eerie green color and legendary status make Pernod Absinthe the smart host’s spirit of choice.

Name: Mad Shandy
Ingredients: ['1/2 bottle(s) Ale', '1 bottle(s) Smirnoff Ice']
Making: Pour half a bottle of brown ale into a pint glass then add bottle of smirnoff ice. (Should make a pint)

Name: Madagascar Margarita
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/4 Jalapeno Pepper (Muddled)', '1 tsp. Agave Nectar']
Making: Muddle jalapeno in the bottom of a mixing glass. Add the other ingredients. Shake and serve in a rocks glass with a jalapeno and lemon garnish. You can spice this to your liking - leave the seeds in the jalapeno to fire it up or remove to take off the heat.

Name: Madd Bacardi
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Sprite']
Making: Serve over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Maddress
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour vodka into an 8 oz. glass. Next add orange juice and top off with cranberry juice. Mix slightly and add 3 ice cubes.

Name: Madras
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass over ice. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Maebelle
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a tumbler with ice and add the ingredients. Stir and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Maeek
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '2/3 oz. Campari', '1/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Serve over ice in rocks glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

Name: Maestro
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Cream Sherry', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '4 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, sherry, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with crushed ice. Top with the Ginger Ale. Garnish with the lemon twist.

Name: Mag 7
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '1 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Everclear', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '7-Up']
Making: Mix with ice then pour into a cocktail glass. Fill the rest with 7-Up.

Name: Magic Mojo Mix
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Fruit Punch', '1/5 gallon(s) Tequila', '1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix all into a large container. Stir until all the sugar dissolves and store in a dark cool place for seven days. Serve with Mountain Dew in bottom half of glass. Works best if served out of clean toilet bowl.

Name: Magic Mountain Dew
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '5 oz. Triple Sec (Preferably Bols)', '10 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Stir or shake just enough to mix well. Chill drink for approximately 10 minutes or pour over ice. Tastes just like Skittles with a little kick. Adjust amounts to suit taste.Do not pre-mix. Alcohol taste becomes extremely strong after approx. 3 hours.

Name: Magic Trick
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', 'Milk']
Making: Pour over ice in a pint glass and stir well.

Name: Magnet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. DeKuyper Peachtree Schnapps', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Orange Juice or cranberry juice']
Making: Mix liiquors over ice in a highball glass. Top with either orange juice or cranberry juice and garnish with an orange wheel and a cherry. Also good as a shooter.

Name: Magnolia Blossom
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Cream', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', 'drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Magnolia Maiden
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 1/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 splash(es) Simple Syrup', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Shake all the ingredients -except soda- with crushed ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice. Top up with the soda.

Name: Mahogoney Ridge
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Cream']
Making: Shake over ice and serve in a cocktail glass with a sprinkle of nutmeg on top.

Name: Mai Tai #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Orgeat Syrup', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Mai Tai #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Mai Tai #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. White Rum', "1/2 oz. Creme d'Almond", '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients over ice, chill then strain into a wine glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and cherries.

Name: Mai Tai #4
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '1 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Combine all the ingredients, using grenadine last, in a highball glass. Add alcohol and juice to your own taste.

Name: Mai Tai #5
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. White Rum', "3/4 oz. Creme d'Almond", '1/2 oz. Dark Rum', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Sour Mix']
Making: In a cocktail glass, add white rum and creme d'almond. Fill with juices and sour mix to 1' below top. Float dark rum.

Name: Mai Tai ( Vunda's)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Orgeat Syrup', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Shake all the ingredients with ice and strain into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and serve.

Name: Mai Tai - Michael's Ultimate
Ingredients: ['1/6 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Sugar (To taste)']
Making: Squeeze lime wedge in tall glass with ice. Add other ingredients. sugar is optional.

Name: Mai Tai - The Ultimate
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Orange Curacao', '1/2 oz. Orgeat Syrup', 'Lime Juice Fresh from 1 lime', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup (Rock Candy Syrup)']
Making: Hand shake the Dark Rum, Orange Curacao, Orgeat Syrup, Lime Juice and Rock Candy Syrup. Garnish with half of a lime shell inside the drink and float a sprig of fresh mint at the edge of the glass.

Name: Mai Tai Mai
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/4 oz. Apricot Liqueur', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour first four ingredients over ice in glass. Stir. Add the soda and stir gently.

Name: Mai Tai T-Twist
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', "1/2 oz. Myer's Rum", '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour the coconut rum and the 151 rum in a tall glass filled with ice. Add equal parts of orange juice and pineapple juice to 1/4 of an inch from the rim of the glass. Float with Myer's Rum and add a splash of grenadine. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry .... Yummmm!

Name: Maiden - No - More
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Brandy', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Maiden's Blush
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Triple Sec, a cherry brandy, and lemon juice. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Maiden's Blush #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Absinthe', '2/3 oz. Dry Gin', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Maiden's Blush Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Maiden's Dream
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '3 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Maiden's Prayer #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Maiden's Prayer #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Beefeater Dry Gin', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Maier Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blackberry Brandy', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour (do not strain).

Name: Main Land Ice Tea
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Long Island Iced Tea Mix', '4 oz. Carbonated Water', '6 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix well with ice.

Name: Mainbrace
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Majik Spritzer
Ingredients: ['6 oz. White Wine (Preferably Zinfandell)', '6 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Mix and serve with ice. Garnish with a lemon or a lime slice.

Name: Major Bailey #1
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Sugar Syrup', '12 Mint Leaves', '2 oz. Plymouth Gin']
Making:
To a shaker filled with ice first muddle the mint leaves with Plymouth Gin then add; lime juice, lemon juice and sugar syrup. Shake with ice and fine strain into a glass half filled with crushed ice. Stir drink and garnish with a mint sprig and lime wedge.
It may be difficult to choose the right libation this coming May 5. After all, it's Cinco de Mayo and Kentucky Derby Day…but what if bourbon and tequila are a bit too rough and tough for your tastebuds? We've got the perfect solution with a minty cocktail that's perfect for entertaining.
2007 marks the 133rd year of the Kentucky Derby, but did you know that traditional thoroughbred racing actually began in England over 200 years ago? England also lays claim to the origins of the thoroughbred of white spirits - the renowned Plymouth Gin. Perfectly balanced and remarkably smooth, Plymouth Gin's rich heritage and classic sophistication makes it a timeless choice for savoring during this prestigious event.
The Kentucky Derby wouldn't be the same without a minty cocktail, so if you are looking for something other than the traditional Mint Julep, try a Major Bailey. Made with Plymouth Gin, this mouthwatering cocktail will be first to the finish line for Derby fans - and even for those who just come along for the parties…
Celebrate two distinguished traditions by toasting the Kentucky Derby with a Major Bailey.

Name: Major Bailey #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '4 dash(es) Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Stir in a beer mug. Garnish with a mint leaf.

Name: Makaveli Mix
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Hennessy Cognac XO', 'Pepsi Cola', 'Cinnamon', 'Vanilla Extract']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass with ice. Sprinkle in cinnamon or vanilla extract for additional taste. Bottoms up!!!

Name: Make Believe
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Marasquin', '2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Framboise', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass and garnish with a mint leaf.

Name: Maker's Green Apple
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Makers Mark Bourbon', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Sour Apple', '1 splash(es) DeKuyper Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake ingredients over ice. Strain into cocktail glass coated with cherry brandy. Garnish with apple slice and cherry.

Name: Maker's Mark Eggnog
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Makers Mark Bourbon', '1 quart(s) Milk', '1 quart(s) Heavy Cream', '24 Eggs', '1 1/2 cup(s) Sugar', 'Nutmeg']
Making: Separate eggs and beat yolks until creamy. Whip sugar into yolks. Beat whites until they stand in peaks, adding 1/2 cup additional sugar, if desired. Beat yolks and Maker's Mark® together and add whites. Beat cream and add cream and milk to mixture. Add nutmeg to taste, and garnish each cup with nutmeg.

Name: Malibu Bay Breeze #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients and serve over ice.

Name: Malibu Bay Breeze #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients thoroughly in a collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with fruit (pineapple, orange, or lime), add a cherry sip stick and serve.

Name: Malibu Baybreeze #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build in Collins glass with ice. Fill qith equal parts cranberry and pineapple juice.

Name: Malibu Black 'n Stormy
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Malibu Black', 'Ginger Beer']
Making: Serve over ice in a highball glass and fill with ginger beer.

Name: Malibu Black Cat
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Malibu Black', '3 part(s) Ginger Beer']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Malibu Blacklight
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Malibu Black', '3 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', 'Soda']
Making: Serve over ice in a tall glass and top with soda.

Name: Malibu Blizzard
Ingredients: ['2 tbsp. Coconut dessicated', '3 oz. Malibu Rum', '6 oz. Cream Soda']
Making: Mix and pour over ice in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Malibu Blue Lagoon
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sprite']
Making: In a highball glass add ice. Put in rum and blue curacao and fill with sprite. Stir and enjoy.Tastes really good on a hot summer day!

Name: Malibu Cherry
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Cherry Cola']
Making: Combine over 3-4 crushed ice cubes in a highball glass. Add 2-3 maraschino cherries and serve.

Name: Malibu Hawaiian Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass and fill with equal parts pineapple juice and cranberry juice. Add ice as desiered.

Name: Malibu Heaven
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine over ice into a collins glass. Stir.

Name: Malibu Juice
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Malibu Rum', "Orange Banana Juice (Dole's)"]
Making: Put 3 oz. of the rum in a glass, fill the rest of the cup with the juice.

Name: Malibu Kangaroo
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', 'Root Beer']
Making: Combine liquors in glass over ice. Top with root beer and stir.

Name: Malibu Liquid Sunshine
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 part(s) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Build over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Malibu Maddness
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Midori', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Malibu Mango Mojito
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Malibu Mango Rum', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup', '4 sprig(s) Mint', '3 wedge(s) Lime', '3 dash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Serve over ice in a tall glass. Garnish with a mint sprig and lime.

Name: Malibu Mike
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour in a highball glass over ice.

Name: Malibu Paralyzer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '7-Up', 'Cream']
Making: Pour in a highball glass over ice. Fill almost with 7-Up and top cream.

Name: Malibu Punch
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/3 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Pineapple Juice (To taste)', 'Lime Juice (To taste)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice or lemon or lime.

Name: Malibu Punch #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '6 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch (Red Fruit Punch)', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Stir over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Malibu Runner
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 part(s) Midori', '1 part(s) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Mix equal parts of all alcohol, splash of pineapple juice and sour mix in a shaker. Strain and serve on the rocks in an old fashioned glass or straight up as a shooter.

Name: Malibu Sensation
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour Malibu Rum over ice in a highball glass. Fill with equal amounts (or to taste) of cranberry juice and Sprite. Stir and garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Malibu Splash
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Malibu Rum', '2 part(s) Coconut Cream', '1 Lemon', '1 Lime', '1 dash(es) Sugar']
Making: Muddle lemon and lime and shake with ice and serve in a rocks glass.

Name: Malibu Sunrise
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '3/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Combine Malibu and orange juice over ice in a highball glass.. Slowly pour grenadine in the center allowing time for it to sink to the bottom. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Malibu Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Iced Tea']
Making: Fill a glass with ice. Add Malibu Rum and top off with Iced Tea. YUM!

Name: Malibu Wave
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/8 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

Name: Mallelieu
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the rum, Grand Marnier, and orange juice into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Name: Malmaison
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Cream Sherry']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass rimmed with anisette.

Name: Mambo's Dream
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Frappe in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Mamie Gilroy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

Name: Mamie Taylor #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '6 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Stir and serve in silver tumblers on Kentucky Derby Day. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Mamie Taylor #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '6 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Stir in a tall glass and garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Mamie's Sister
Ingredients: ['1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '2 oz. Gin', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour into a collins glass and fill with Ginger Ale and ice.

Name: Man Of The Moment
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Manchester Sunrise
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '4 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '3/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Build drink in a highball glass over ice. Top with grenadine and allow it to settle before serving. It becomes a dirty grey colour, so if you have ever been to Manchester, the name makes perfect sense.

Name: Mandarin Splash
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', 'Tropicana Orange and Pineapple Juice or separate orange and pineapple juices']
Making: Pour Absolut Mandarin into a tall glass filled with ice. Top with Tropicana Orange and Pineapple Juice. Garnish with an orange wheel and cherry.

Name: Mandarin Tonic
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '2 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Pour in a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with a tangerine or orange slice.

Name: Mandarine and Cranberry
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mandarine Napoleon', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour the ingredients in an ice-filled collins glass and stir. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Mandarine and Tonic
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mandarine Napoleon', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Pour the ingredients in an ice-filled collins glass and stir. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Mandarine Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Lemon Vodka', '3/4 oz. Mandarine Napoleon', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake all the ingredients with ice and fine strain in a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a flamed orange zest.

Name: Mandarine Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Mandarine Napoleon', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake all the ingredients with ice and fine strain in a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Mandarine Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Mandarine Napoleon', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Lime Juice', 'Soda', 'Mint']
Making: Rim a collins glass with mint and crush the mint in a the glass. Add the remaining ingredients and stir with crushed ice. Top with soda. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Mandarine Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Mandarine Napoleon', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Put the bitters and orange zest in an old-fashioned glass with 2 ice cubes, add .2 oz of Mandarine Napoleon and .2 oz of Bourbon and stir. Add another 2 ice cubes, plus product and stir, repeating this step for 4 minutes.

Name: Mandarine Sour
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Mandarine Napoleon', '1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 Egg White', '3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake all ingredients and pour in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge and a cherry.

Name: Mandarini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Mountain Dew Live Wire', '1 1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 wedge(s) Lime']
Making: Pour vodka, melon liqueur and triple sec with ice into a shaker. Squeeze lime wedge into liquors then stir in Mountain Dew Live Wire. Strain into a Martini glass. Stab a mandarin orange segment and lime wedge with a cocktail fork and add to drink as a garnish.

Name: Mandevile
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Dark Rum', 'dash(es) Galliano', "dash(es) Rose's Lime Juice", 'dash(es) Coca Cola', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass

Name: Mandeville
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 tsp. Anisette', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '1 oz. Cola']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the white rum, dark rum, anisette, lemon juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the cola. Stir well.

Name: Mandrin Sunrise
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mandrin Liqueur', 'Orange Juice (Or Sunkist)']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: Mango Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Grey Goose Vodka', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Ricardo Mango Rum', "5/8 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Mango Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Orange Curacao', '3 oz. Mango', '1 1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Blend thoroughly in blender with 8 oz. of crushed ice. Pour into 14 oz. glass and garnish with a mango stick or a fruit flag.

Name: Mango Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Mango Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass.

Name: Mango Rita
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) DeKuyper Triple Sec', '2 part(s) Sauza Silver Tequila', '2 part(s) DeKuyper Luscious Tropical Mango Liqueur', '2 part(s) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a margarita glass.

Name: Mango Sunrise
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mango Liqueur', 'Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Pour in order in a collins glass. Do not stir.

Name: Mango-Ginger-Habanero Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Flor de Cana 7 Year Old Rum', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Ginger-Habanero Syrup', '3/4 oz. Mango Puree']
Making: Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled 10 ounce cocktail glass rimmed with sweetened Homemade 7 Spice (wet rim with a lime wedge, then dip in equal parts superfine sugar and spice blend. Spice Blend: 2 parts Fresh Ground Cinnamon, 2 parts ground fennel, 2 parts Dried Ginger, 1 part Ground Szechuan Peppercorns, 1 part Ground Cloves, 1 part ground star anise, 1 part ground cardamom)

Name: Mango-Mosa
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Mango Liqueur (Preferably Marie-Brizzard Mango-Passion Liquor)', '3 oz. Ocean Spray Juice (Mango-Mango)', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour into a champagne flute and garnish with a slice of star fruit.

Name: Mangorita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Tequila', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Mango Schnapps', '1/4 part(s) Hiram Walker Triple Sec', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake or blend with ice into salt-rimmed margarita glass.

Name: Mangotini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cointreau', '4 oz. Snapple ("Snapple Mango Madness" flavour)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Tastes like juice but is very powerful.

Name: Manhandler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', "1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin']
Making: Stir and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Manhasset #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 1/2 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Manhasset #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Manhattan #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rye Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Manhattan #2
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/3 oz. Italian Vermouth']
Making: Stir in a collins glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Manhattan (Classic - From New York City/Manhattan)
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Corby's Canadian Whisky", '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1 Maraschino Cherries']
Making: Place all ingrediants in a bar shaker with about 6-8 ice cubes. Shake until your hands are really cold on the metal shaker part (about 20-30 times). Strain into a martini glass. Add a marschino cherry to the drink and serve immediately. This drink was explained to me at the Howard Johnson's Restaurant Bar on Times Square Manhattan at New Year's Celebrations 2001. Try it - it is the best tasting Manhattan I have ever made/drunk/shared with loved ones.

Name: Manhattan (Smooth)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry or a lemon twist.

Name: Manhattan (Sweet)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey']
Making: Serve over ice in rocks glass.

Name: Manhattan Cocktail (Gin)
Ingredients: ['4 sprig(s) Mint', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Muddle ingredients and shake with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Manhattan Dry #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir vermouth and blended Scotch whisky with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive and serve.

Name: Manhattan Dry #2
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Canadian Club 6 Year Old', '1 1/4 oz. Noilly Prat Dry', '3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry. This is a German version of a Manhattan Dry.

Name: Manila Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Root Beer', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 Egg', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes and serve.

Name: Manilla Flame
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '3/4 oz. Passion Fruit Nectar', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Manila Dark Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a pilsner glass.

Name: Maple Apple Punch
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Flor de Cana 7 Year Old Rum', '2 oz. Apple Cider', '1 oz. Maple Syrup', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and stir well. Pour into Collins glass and garnish with slice of lemon.

Name: Maple Leaf
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Maple Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Maple Mudslide
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Milk', '1 oz. Sapling Vermont Maple Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Mix ingredients in shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Pour over ice in your favorite glass.

Name: Maraschino Cherry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Blend with 2 cups of ice until smooth and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a cherry.

Name: Mardee Mine
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Mardi Grape
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Skyy Infusions Grape Vodka', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '2 oz. Grape Juice', '1/2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a Collins glass with fresh ice. Garnish with green and red grapes on a toothpick.

Name: Mardi Gras Flasher
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum (Preferably New Orleans 90 proof Dark Rum)', '6 oz. Ginger Ale', 'Grenadine (To taste)']
Making: Mix in a highball glass and enjoy... See yours at Mardi Gras!

Name: Marga-Regis
Ingredients: ['3 slice(s) Kiwi', '4 part(s) Sauza Silver Tequila', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1 part(s) Sparkling Wine']
Making:
In a shaker, muddle kiwi. Add next three ingredients. Shake and pour over fresh ice. Top with sparkling wine and garnish with a slice of kiwi.
On November 18, 2011, we raised a glass to the longest running broadcaster, Regis Philbin, with Sauza Tequila’s Marga-Regis! as he signed off from over 28 years on-air. If you're planning a trip to New York to toast Regis, stop by The Atlantic Grill to sip on this sparkling kiwi margarita, the kind of cocktail that "Reeg" would order at one of his favorite NYC hot spots.
This delicious Marga-Regis! features kiwi as a key ingredient for a little touch of green in honor of the beloved host's extreme Irish pride for alma mater Notre Dame. So even if you can't make it to the Big Apple to say goodbye to Regis in person, you can still commemorate his last day at-home with this easy-to-make margarita.

Name: MargaFeni
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Feni - The Spirit of india', '1 oz. Sauza Silver Tequila', '1/2 oz. DeKuyper Orange Curacao', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients together in a cocktail shaker 1/3 filled with ice cubes. Shake well, and pour into a salt-rimmed margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge, and serve.

Name: Margaret In The Marketplace
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Anejo Rum', '2 tsp. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Light Cream', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Margarita #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Salt']
Making:
Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice, dip rim in salt. Shake with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass, and serve. (See also Frozen Margarita.)
A cool, frosty margarita isn’t only a tasty drink, it’s also considered to be among the most common of cocktails with a tequila base.
A margarita, which means pearl Latin and daisy in Spanish, has an origin that is often debated. Some say it was created in 1936 by Danny Negrete and Rob Garcia. Others feel that Francisco “Pancho” Morales gets the credit for mixing up the first Margarita on July 4, 1942. Others, still, debate over whether it was Carlos “Danny” Herrera in 1938, Margaret Sames or Santo Cruz in 1948, or even Enrique Bastate Gutierrez. What is known for sure is when the first frozen margarita machine mix came on the scene. Chemist John Hogan created the mix for Mariano, a Dallas restaurant, in 1971. Hogan is also credited with inventing the frozen margarita machine. So, next time you partake in a frozen margarita, raise a glass to Hogan and give him a hearty salute!
To make a margarita, combine tequila, triple sec, and lime/lemon juice. Pour the mixture over crushed ice or blend in a blender for a frozen effect. The drink is most often served in a margarita glass rimmed with salt and adorned with the rind of a lime or lemon. Today, margaritas are served in many different flavors to please just about any palate. Strawberry, mango, peach, and raspberry are fruity alternatives to the original drink that will keep you cool and refreshed on a warm day.

Name: Margarita #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/6 oz. Tequila Silver', '2/3 oz. Triple Sec', "2/3 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a salt rimmed highball glass.

Name: Margarita (al A Sinclair)
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Tequila (Silver)', '3 oz. Cointreau', '4 oz. Lime Juice', '1 Orange (Twist)']
Making: Chill a martini glass in a freezer for about one hour. Shake ingredients with ice for 5 seconds. Pour into the chiller margarita glass. Now squeeze your orange twist downwards onto the surface of your drink. This is so that the oil from the oranges skin will sit on the drinks surface and enhance the Cointreau's orange taste. If you have done it right it should be ice cold with a perfect balance of flavours. Ahriba!

Name: Margarita - Art's Tavern Style
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Beer', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Rim a glass with salt. Combine in a mixing tin over ice. Shake and serve with a lime squeeze. If you want to step it up use Patron Silver and Grand Marnier.

Name: Margarita and Chambord
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Margarita Mix (Jose Cuervo)', '1 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 1/2 oz. Corona Extra']
Making: Mix and serve blended or over ice. With or without a salt rimmed glass.

Name: Margarita De Original
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Tequila Gold', '1 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 part(s) Lime Juice fresh squeezed']
Making: Stir equal parts of listed ingredients and serve on the rocks in a rocks glass.. Rim the glass with coarse salt if desired.

Name: Margarita Francesa
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Alma De Agave Silver Tequila', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making:
Combine Grand Marnier, tequila, lime juice, orange juice and simple syrup in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a tall glass with ice and garnish with an orange wheel and lime wedge.
Marking the 25th anniversary Celebrating National Hispanic Heritage Month, Grand Marnier and Rosa Mexicano explore the Hispanic influence on food and drink with a delightful toast: the Grand Marnier Margarita Francesa.
The traditional margarita, mixing together the spirit of Mexico (tequila), orange liqueur and fresh lime juice, is the #1 selling cocktail in the US however, over the years its popularity has sparked unique twists on the classic recipe. In the 1990’s Grand Marnier introduced the Cadillac Margarita that was a huge success. Now, to celebrate National Hispanic Heritage Month, Grand Marnier and Rosa Mexicano have teamed up to develop an internationally innovative recipe, Margarita Francesa.
The Margarita Francesa (available at all Rosa Mexicano restaurants nationally), simply reverses the amount of spirit ingredients from a traditional margarita for a more vibrant taste. The result: a profile that is smoother and more balanced with the enticement of the citrus notes and the complexity of cognac found within Grand Marnier. For those who may shy away from the “bite” of tequila, this is the ideal cocktail that will fast become consumers’ drink of choice.

Name: Margarita Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Mix ingredients in cocktail shaker with ice. Serve in a chilled martini glass straight up. Garnish with a lime wedge. Salt is optional.

Name: Mari Merceded
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Honey Syrup Clover - 2 parts clover honey and 1 part water', '2 1/4 slice(s) Serrano Chile', '2 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making:
Inspired by his mother, of sweet and spicy character, this cocktail goes down easy then finishes off with a surprising hint of chili
In a pint glass, crack Serrano chili slice. Add all spirits and mixers, add ice and shake vigorously for 6 sec. Strain into a super fine sugar rimmed cocktail glass and garnish with an additional slice of serrano chili.
Pablo Moix's undeniable passion for mixing drinks along with nearly 16 years of experience behind the bar, from dive bars to LA's hottest restaurants and nightclubs, have gained him recognition as one of the region's most respected mixologist.
Pablo earned second place honors at the Leblon Cachaca Competition and his unique cocktail blend at the Flor de Cana Competition led him to the victorious first place win.
Currently, Pablo is Principal Bartender for the ONE Group Los Angeles and the Master Mixologist at the acclaimed STK restaurant where he develops signature cocktails with what he describes as a "California Fresh" sensibility, balancing complex spirits and bitters with fresh, straight forward fruit flavors that appeal to connoisseurs and newcomers alike.

Name: Maria's Delight
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '2/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Safari', '1/4 oz. Cointreau', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a drink mixer with ice cubes. Pour in a highball glass and fill up with Ginger Ale.

Name: Maria-Rocker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. DeKuyper Peachtree Schnapps', '1 oz. Passoa Passion Fruit', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 splash(es) Lime', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix Peachtree, Passoa and vodka with ice in a tall glass. Add lime and fill up with Sprite, add cranberry juice for color. Garnish with a piece of fresh lime. Drink and enjoy!

Name: Marichino Collins
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 1/2 oz. Sweetened Maraschino Cherry Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Mix and pour into tall collins glass (13 Oz) half filled with crushed ice and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry. Also try with unsweetened juice and a tsp. of sugar. You can also try other primary alcohol and other types of juice.

Name: Marines
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 part(s) Vodka']
Making: Mix and serve on the rocks in an old fashioned glass.

Name: Marionette
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Cherry Heering Liqueur', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Dry Sake']
Making: Pour into a lowball glass.

Name: Mariposa
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Marisol
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Anejo Tequila', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour Herradura Gold Tequila over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with Orange Juice and stir.

Name: Marla Singer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Coca Cola', '1 splash(es) Cream']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Marlenetini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Vodka (Your favourite)', '1 splash(es) Ginger Ale', 'Pineapple Juice (To taste)']
Making: Combine over crushed ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Marmalade
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Curacao', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with tonic water and ice. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Marnie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Tia Maria', '6 oz. Milk']
Making: Pour Frangelico, Tia Maria and Milk into a cocktail glass voer ice. Garnish with a sprinkle of Nutmeg.

Name: Marquetini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Gold']
Making: Marquette Golden Eagles Blue and Gold. Shake with ice and serve on the rocks in a highball glass.

Name: Marrakech Express
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'dash(es) Orange Flower Water', 'Citrus Juice']
Making: Pour gin over ice in a tall glass. Add splash of grenadine and dash of orange flower water. Fill glass with citrus juice and stir. Note: Orange flower water can be found in gourmet shops or at Middle Eastern delicatessens. Use sparingly, it is quite strong in flavor.

Name: Martian Madness
Ingredients: ['12 oz. DNA Alcoholic Spring Water', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Pour DNA and Midori Melon over ice in a cocktail glass. Stir and serve.

Name: Martian Melody
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Midori', '2 dash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '7-Up']
Making: Fill a rocks glass with ice, add the Malibu, Midori, sweet & sour. Fill with 7-Up and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Martinez Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Triple Sec', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Martinez Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 tsp. Sugar Syrup (Optional)', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass.

Name: Martunia
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with some edible flowers.

Name: Mary Elizabeth Wagoner
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Everclear', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients except lime juice. Add lime juice just before consuming. Invite over your favourite Head Counsouler and enjoy.

Name: Mary Garden Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Mary Got Hit By A Mack Truck
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pepper Vodka', '1 oz. Vodka (Preferably Diesel brand vodka - may substitute with everclear)', '1 tsp. Horseradish (Fresh and grated)', '10 oz. Tomato Juice', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce (LIGHT dash)', '1 pinch(es) Salt (Coarse)', 'Pepper (Freshly ground)']
Making: Combine the ingredients in a highball glass, stir well, garnish with a celery stick and a cherry tomato and make sure the drinker is sitting down before serving. Brian says: Pretty spicy drink with a pretty potent kick.

Name: Mary Pickford
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1 1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Mary Pickford Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, pineapple juice, maraschino liqueur, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Mary's Dream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Pour the rum, Triple Sec, orange juice, and orange Bitters into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Mashed Kermit
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '6 oz. Orange Juice', '1 package(s) JELLO (Strawberry flavour)', 'Vodka']
Making: Make vodka jelly by mixing vodka with a powdered strawberry jelly mix. Mix the orange juice, vodka and blue curacao in a highball glass, then dump a big lump of red jelly into it. Gather a crowd, count to three, then down. Enjoy!

Name: Master Blaster
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Galliano', 'Lemonade', '1/6 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass over ice. Top with lemonade. Garnish with a lemon wedge. Enjoy.

Name: Master of Puppets - Metallica
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 tsp. Demerara Sugar (syrup)', '2 dash(es) The Bitter Truth Jerry Thomas Own Decanter Bitters']
Making:
Build, stir with ice, strain into cocktail glass serve with Lemon Twist.
In honor of the Big 4 (Metallica, Slayer, Anthrax and Megadeth) playing Yankee Stadium, Jagermeister, a brand known for rocking the music scene, has come up with some metal cocktails….

Name: Masterblaster
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink', '1 oz. Orange Juice (Optional)']
Making: Combine in a highball glass. The orange juice is optional but it adds to the flavour.

Name: MasterMix
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Jagermeister', '1 part(s) Dry Vermouth', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Combine all ingredients with ice in a tumbler and stir. Strain into cocktail glass. Add a cherry to garnish

Name: Matador
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '3 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '3 oz. Limeade (Frozen)', 'dash(es) Salt']
Making: Blend with ice until slushy and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Matchmaker
