Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', "1/2 oz. Myer's Dark Rum", '1 oz. Bacardi Light Rum']
Making: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add Malibu and fill glass 3/4 with pineapple juice. Add Bacardi Light Rum, float the Meyers Dark and then the 151. Drop a cherryin. DO NOT STIR!

Name: Matt's Lion
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Roaring Lion Energy Drink', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a cocktail glass and fill cup with equal parts Orange Juice and Roaring Lion

Name: Matti Nyknen
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Lemon', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Matty-Bomb
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/8 oz. Vodka', '1/8 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps']
Making: Pour half the Irish Cream first in a shot glass then add the other liquors. Top off with the rest of the Irish Cream. Tastes great!

Name: Maui Breeze
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Guava Juice']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a pineapple spear, a cherry and an orchid.

Name: Maui Eruption
Ingredients: ['2 1/4 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a collins glass.

Name: Maui Milkshake
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Godiva Chocolate Cream Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Smirnoff Vanilla Twist', '3/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Chocolate Syrup', '3 oz. Ice Cream (liquid, smoothie mix)']
Making: Blend with ice and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Maui Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Maui Platinum Rum', '2 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Soda', 'Sugar']
Making:
With the mint muddling left to the customer the bartender has no more work to do than for the average mixed drink. Because it is a MAUI mojito, it is not expected to be exactly the same as a NY or Cuban mojito. Most Americans don't like the muddled mint leaves floating around in their drink anyway. If they poke at the whole mint leaves with their stirrer they will dislodge an essence of mint into the drink.
Alternatively, you could just garnish with Pineapple only and add a splash of one of the mint liqueurs you already have on hand. The Mojito went from not even being on the menu to number one in volume in less than one year in both Austin and NYC. I am sure it did well elsewhere, but those two datapoints are hard facts and leading edge indicators.

Name: Maui Night
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 oz. Midori', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a hurricane glass with ice and pour liquors. Add equal parts of orange and pineapple juice. Top with a splash of cranberry juice.

Name: Maurice Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/4 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Maverick
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice', 'Orange Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Pour into a half pint glass. Add orange juice to nearly fill and top with 7-Up. Stir and enjoy...

Name: Max The Silent
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Applejack', '1 tsp. Anisette']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Maxi-Pad
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '2 oz. Tonic Water', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Stir over ice into a tumbler.

Name: Maxim
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: May Blossum Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Swedish Punch', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Name: Mayan Whore
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Kahlua', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice (Chilled)', 'Soda Water']
Making: Pour tequila then pineapple juice into a pousse-cafe glass. Top with soda then float the grenadine. Do not stir. Drink the layered drink with a straw.

Name: McCann
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 1/2 oz. Mango Juice']
Making: Pour all ingedients into a highball over cracked ice cubes stir serve and enjoy this simple but elegant cocktail.

Name: McClelland Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Mccurry Flurry
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 part(s) Apple Pucker', '1 part(s) Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 part(s) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Fill a shaker with ice and add ingredients. Shake with passion and strain into a martini glass. My guests love it. Yours will to.

Name: McDuff
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, Triple Sec, and Bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: McFayden
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '8 oz. Cola']
Making: Pour Bacardi Limon over ice in a tall glass. Add Triple Sec and top with cola. Stir and add a lime slice for garnish.

Name: McRita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Tequila', '1/2 cup(s) Triple Sec', '1 cup(s) Sweet and Sour Mix', "1/2 cup(s) Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Pulse with ice in a blender. Prepare a glass with a wedge of lime and salt. Fill glass with ice, pour in pulsified mixture. Get silly!!!!

Name: McTavish's Fuzzy Navel
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix vodka and peach schnapps in a cocktail glass. Fill with orange juice and top with a little cranberry juice for colour.

Name: MD Special
Ingredients: ["6 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '4 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Pour Seagrams over ice then add the orange juice and stir. Finally add the Coca Cola and do not stir.

Name: Mead
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Irish Mist', '1 pint(s) Beer']
Making: Pour into a beer mug.

Name: Meade Special
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Mountain Dew', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '2 tsp. Kool-Aid (strawberry)']
Making: Mix and enjoy.

Name: Medditeranian
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Milk']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass. Fill with pineapple juice and layer milk on top.

Name: Meehan's Black Flip
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Brooklyn Black Chocolate Stout', '1 1/2 part(s) Cruzan Black Strap Rum', '1/2 part(s) Sugar Syrup (Demerara)', '1 Egg']
Making:
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and swirl to decarbonate beer. Dry shake, shake with ice, and strain into a chilled fizz glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg.
Contributed by Jeff Bell, New York City mixologist

Name: Meet You On The Floor
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Fernet Branca', '1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cachaca', '3 drop(s) Coca Cola']
Making: Mix over ice. Add Coke last and meet ya there!

Name: Megan's Hard Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Sour Mix', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour Bacardi Limon, Absolut Citron and triple sec into a 16 oz. pint glass. Add a splash of grenadine (for color). Pour sour mix almost to top and finish with the Sprite.

Name: Megan's Valentine
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Minute Maid Fruit Punch', '2 oz. Absolut Vodka']
Making: Pour vodka over ice in a highball glass. Fill with Minute Maid Fruit Punch and add sugar to taste. Stir and serve with a straw.

Name: Meh-jito
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '3 tsp. Sugar', '1 pinch(es) Mint Leaves', '3 piece(s) Ginger Root, thumbnail sized', 'Club Soda']
Making: Muddle Ginger, mint and sugar in a Collins Glass. Add Mekhong and lime juice. Add ice and cover with a shaker tin. Shake briefly and vigorously. Top off with Club Soda and a dash of Bitters. Serve long with a straw. Based on the Mojito

Name: Meister Mind Meld
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Cola', '2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Pour the cola into a highball glass then add the Amaretto.

Name: Mekhong Iced Thai Tea
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', 'Tea Thai', 'Condensed Milk']
Making: Add Mekhong and ice to a Collins Glass. Pour in pre mixed Thai tea and condensed milk and stir thoroughly. Recipe works best with freshly brewed Orange Pekoe tea and can also be mixed without using condensed milk.

Name: Mekhong Mai-Thai
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Orange Curacao', '3/4 oz. Orgeat Syrup']
Making: Pour Mekhong and the rest of the ingredients into a mixing glass. Add ice and shake vigorously for 7-8 seconds. Strain into a rocks glass over ice and garnish with a fresh sprig of mint. Based on the Mai Tai.

Name: Mekhong Mali
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Lime Juice', 'Syrup Hibiscus, see instructions below.']
Making:
Pour Mekhong and the rest of the ingredients into a mixing glass. Add Ice and shake vigorously for 7-8 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini-cocktail glass. Garnish with a Hibiscus flower or an edible orchid.
Hibiscus syrup: Bring 1 cup of water to boil. Add 2 tablespoons of hibiscus tea. Let steep for 10 minutes. Take the tea bag out and add 1 cup of Domino’s superfine (not powdered) sugar. Stir until all sugar dissolves.

Name: Mel's Summersault
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a longball glass.

Name: Mel's Swing
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Midori', '1 part(s) Raspberry Liqueur', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Fill a cocktail glass with ice and add midori and raspberry juice. Top with grapefruit juice. Optional: garnish with fresh raspberries.

Name: Mel's Swing #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Creme de Cassis', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a higball glass.

Name: Mel's Swing #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Combine with ice in a higball glass.

Name: Melanie's Cookie Dough
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amarula Cream Liqueur', 'Milk']
Making: Combine over ice in a rocks glass. Stir and sip. Mmmmmm Cookie Dough!

Name: Meli-melo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Milk (2 per cent)', '1/2 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1/2 cup(s) Yogurt', '1 Egg', '1 Banana (Sliced)', '1 pinch(es) Nutmeg', '1 pinch(es) Cinnamon']
Making: Blend until smooth. Serve chilled in rocks glasses. (Serves 4)

Name: Mellow Yellow
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Galliano']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Melon Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/4 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Melon Colada
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Rum', '6 oz. Pina Colada Mix']
Making: Combine ingredients in a blender with ice. Blend and pour into a tall glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Melon Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and a cherry.

Name: Melon Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1/2 Cantaloupe', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Midori', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Blend and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Melon Fever
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Melon Island
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Pisang Ambon', '1/3 oz. Passion Fruit Liqueur', '2/3 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream', '3 1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake well and serve in a highball glass. Garnish with a wedge of pineapple, a slice of lemon and a sprig of mint. You can also serve this drink in a melon cut in half with the seeds and most of the flesh removed.

Name: Melon Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Combine ingredients in a blender with ice. Blend and serve in margarita glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Melon Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Ketel One Vodka', '3 oz. Midori']
Making: Chill a martini glass in ice. Pour equal amounts of Vodka and Melon liquor into a shaker with ice. Shake only once. Strain into the glass. Take an orange peel and wet the rim of the glass. Makes an excellent refresher on those hot summer nights.

Name: Melon Patch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Club Soda']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Melon Spritz
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Pour rum, liqueur and juice over ice in a glass. Stir. Add the soda and stir gently.

Name: Melonball
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Midori', '3 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Melt My Heart Mojito
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', 'Lemon Lime Soda', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in a tall glass and fill with lemon lime soda. Garnish with mint leaves.

Name: Melvin
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '7 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour over Ice in a 8 oz. glass. Add the shot of Jack Daniel's and fill with pineapple juice. Splash grenadine and garnish with cherries.

Name: Menage A Trois
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Mendy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Sunny Delight Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in a highball glass and enjoy.

Name: Merlot Mindbender
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Red Wine']
Making: Put 1oz Chambord in a tumbler add a few cubes of ice. Fill the glass with Dark Merlot Wine.

Name: Merry Bloody Forest
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Kool-Aid (Raspberry)']
Making: Stir in a lowball glass.

Name: Merry Little Melon Rita
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Hornitos Plata Tequila', '2 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Triple Sec', '6 part(s) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a margarita glass rimmed with sugar.

Name: Merry Widow
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Gin', '1 1/3 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Merry Widow Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 1/4 oz. Cherry Brandy']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Merry Widow Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Gin', '1 1/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Benedictine', '1/2 tsp. Anisette', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Merry Widow Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 Egg White', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Name: Mersey Turd
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Absolut Vodka', '2 oz. Vermouth', '1 oz. Tequila (Must be 100% agave azul)', '1 oz. Blue Curacao (Preferably Bols)', 'Orange Juice (Freshly squeezed)', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a shaker and fill with equal parts of orange juice and cranberry juice. Shake well and serve over crushed ice in a highball glass.

Name: Meryl's Smile
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Strawberry Juice', '2 Strawberries', '2 part(s) Vodka', '4 part(s) 7-Up']
Making: Crush strawberries. Shake all of the above with ice. Strain and serve in a cocktail glas

Name: MERYL's STROOBS
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Banana Liqueur', '1 part(s) Coconut Rum', '1 part(s) Orange Juice (concentrate)', '4 part(s) Mountain Dew']
Making: Shake on the rocks and strain into a cocktail or martini glass.....and enjoy. I know all Streepers will

Name: Metal Thrashing Mad - Anthrax
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Appleton Estate Reserve Jamaica Rum', '1/2 oz. Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Syrup']
Making:
Dry Shake and pour over crushed ice in a tall glass. Garnish with a mint leaf and float 2 barspoons of Jagermeister over the top.
In honor of the Big 4 (Metallica, Slayer, Anthrax and Megadeth) playing Yankee Stadium, Jagermeister, a brand known for rocking the music scene, has come up with some metal cocktails….

Name: Metaxa Sour
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Metaxa', 'Sprite', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Metro Vanilla Ice
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '3 part(s) Cream Soda']
Making: Mix. Stir. It's good.

Name: Metropolis
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', "1 splash(es) Lime Juice (Preferably Rose's)", '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Metropolitan
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Black Currant Vodka (Or any other currant vodka)', '1/2 oz. Lillet (White)', '1/2 tsp. Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Metropolitan Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/4 oz. Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Sugar Syrup', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Mexican Avalanche
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', 'Milk', '1 splash(es) Coconut Rum']
Making: Pour tequila in highbal glass and fill with milk. Add a splash of coconut rum.

Name: Mexican Beer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '12 oz. Beer']
Making: Pour half the beer in a mug. Add the tequila into the beer mug. Top with beer.

Name: Mexican Dew
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour the shot of tequila over ice in glass and add Mountain Dew.

Name: Mexican Dream
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Kahlua', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '4 oz. Milk']
Making: Pour into blender and blend until it has the consistency of milk. Add straws and go for it.

Name: Mexican Fire Engine
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', 'Beer', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Combine in a collins glass.

Name: Mexican Grasshopper
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Mexican Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila Gold', '3 oz. Beer (Corona Extra)']
Making: Pour tequila and beer over ice in a lowball glass. Stir gently. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Mexican Latte
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Tequila', '2/3 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Mexican Madras
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Tequila Gold', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Mexican Midget
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Cranapple Juice']
Making: Mix the ingredients on the rocks in a tumbler.

Name: Mexican Mojito
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Partida Blanco Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Partida Agave Nectar', '4 wedge(s) Lemon', '4 wedge(s) Lime', '10 Mint Leaves', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Muddle the fruit, add ingredients and ice, then stir gently. Served in a rocks glass.

Name: Mexican Panty Raid
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Fruit Punch']
Making: Mix all ingrediants together in a Collins Glass with about 4 oz. of ice. Garnish rim of glass with a lime wheel.

Name: Mexican Peach
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pallini Peachcello', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Numi Organic White Nectar Tea', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Squeeze 1 lemon wedge into a cocktail shaker with ice before adding Pallini Peachcello, tequila, Numi Organic White Nectar Tea and simple syrup. Shake and strain into a wine goblet over fresh ice. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Mexican Riptide
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Mix with ice in a collins glass.

Name: Mexican Screw
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Mexican Sex Disorder
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Parfait Amour', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Build ingredients over ice cubes. Garnishwith a lemon slice.

Name: Mexican Thanksgiving - Flaming
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1 tbsp. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and serve.

Name: Mexican Virgin
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '3 oz. Cherry Cider']
Making: Pour into an 8 oz. glass and stir. Then pour into another 8 oz. glass over ice.

Name: Mexicana
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Mexicola
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Cola']
Making: Pour tequila and lime juice over ice cubes in a collins glass. Fill with cola, stir, and serve.

Name: Mi Jarito
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Squirt', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine in a clay jug. The name means "clay jug", and using a clay container to serve this drink gives it a different taste.

Name: Mi Paschen
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '2 oz. Apple Cider']
Making: Combine over ice into a cocktail glass.

Name: Mi-so Tal Sling
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Soju (Andong)', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Mango Juice', '2 oz. Peach Juice', 'Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a tall glass over crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of mango, a slice ofstarfruit or slice of orange and 1 red cherry.

Name: Miami
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Miami Beach
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Stir and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Miami Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe', "dash(es) Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Miami Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '4 dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Miami Ice #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Sour Mix', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with orange juice. Garnish with a mint leaf and an orange slice.

Name: Miami Meloni
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Miami Vice
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) Pina Colada Mix', '1 package(s) Daquiri Mix', '5 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix pina colada mix with 2.5 oz of rum and ice. Set aside. Mix daiquiri mix with 2.5 oz of rum and ice. While frozen, add pina colada mix to a cocktail glass. Add the daiquiri mix on top, keeping it seperated from the pina coloda mix. Serve.

Name: Michelada
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Beer', '2 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', 'dash(es) Soy Sauce', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '1 pinch(es) Black Pepper', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Salt (To taste)']
Making: Mix ingredients in a tall high glass with lots of ice. Add beer at the end. Mix.

Name: Mickey Rourke
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Pour over ice, mix and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Mid Week Tweak
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka (Preferably Kettle One Vodka)', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Combine ingredients over ice. Kim's comment: Wait half hour after drinking to feel the stimulating effects of the Red Bull combine with the cool buzz of Kettle One.

Name: Midnight Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Midnight Cowboy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Midnight Express
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and pour over ice into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Midnight Ghost
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Malibu Black', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup (Vanilla flavoured)*', '1 part(s) Cream', '1 part(s) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Shake ingredients in a shaker filled with ice, then strain into a martini glass. *For vanilla simple syrup, add a few drops vanilla extract to a mixture of one part sugar and one part water

Name: Midnight In Sicily
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Averna Bitters - Amaro', '1 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Sauce Blood Orange Agrodolce', '6 Mint Leaves']
Making:
Combine ingredients in an ice filled cocktail shaker and shake for 20 to 30 seconds, or until well chilled. Double strain through a fine meshed strainer into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a flamed blood orange rind.
Jeffrey Hollinger, Absinthe Brasserie & Bar San Fransisco

Name: Midnight Kick
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cabo Wabo Anejo Tequila', '1 slice(s) Orange', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Wet the rim of a chilled shot glass with the orange slice. Then rim the shot glass with powdered cinnamon on a plate. Be careful not to turn the glass right side up until it has been rimmed. The orange liquid will drip otherwise. Shake the Cabo Tequila with ice in a shaker and strain into the chilled shot glass. Slam the shot and then bite into the orange slice to finish.

Name: Midnight Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pallini Raspicello', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'splash(es) Lime Juice', '3 oz. Champagne']
Making: Shake Pallini Raspicello, cranberry juice and lime juice with ice. Strain into a champagne flute and top with champagne.

Name: Midnight Liaison
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Parfait Amour', '4 oz. Lemonade', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour the ingredients except the grenadine over ice into a highball glass. Sink grenadine and enjoy. Aaron says: This one is all mine - figure I'd share with the world and have one hell of a party :) enjoy in moderation.

Name: Midnight Moon Bootleg Driver
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Junior Johnson's Midnight Moon Carolina Moonshine", 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass and fill with Orange Juice.

Name: Midnight Moon Burn Out
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Junior Johnson's Midnight Moon Carolina Moonshine", '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Cola']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass over ice.

Name: Midnight Moon Caution Flag
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Junior Johnson's Midnight Moon Carolina Moonshine", 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass and fill with Lemonade.

Name: Midnight Moon Red Flag
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Junior Johnson's Midnight Moon Carolina Moonshine", 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass over ice and fill with Cranberry Juice.

Name: Midnight Passion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pallini Limoncello', '1 oz. Mango Puree', 'Champagne Brut']
Making: Mix ingredients in a flute glass. Fill with Brut Champagne.

Name: Midnight Sloosh
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Porter or Stout', '3 oz. Champagne']
Making: Chill Porter (or Stout) and Champage. Mix gently in a cocktail glass - do not create too much effervescence. Just stir till blended. Enjoy. This one is guaranteed to help you sleep.

Name: Midnight Smash
Ingredients: ['6 Blackberry (ies)', '1 oz. Lemon Juice hand-squeezed Meyer Lemon', '1 oz. Averna Bitters - Amaro', '1 oz. Orange Vodka', '2 oz. Ginger Beer']
Making: Muddle blackberries in a shaker, add the juice of 1 meyer lemon, Averna, and orange-flavored vodka and shake vigorously over ice. Strain over ice in a highball glass and add ginger beer. Garnish with an orange wheel.

Name: Midnight Sun
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Finlandia Vodka', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Midnight Thunder
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Raspberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. White Tequila', '1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Bacardi Dark Rum', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: The ingredients must be poured in this order. Once poured, stir the drink and watch it turn black. You may not like the looks but you will love the taste

Name: Midori Blood Bath
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Strawberry Liqueur']
Making: Pour pineapple juice into a cocktail glass. Add Midori and Blue Curacao. Then carefully pour the strawberry liqueur down the inside of the glass.

Name: Midori Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Champagne', '1 oz. Midori']
Making: Serve in champagne glass.

Name: Midori Colada
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Midori', '2 oz. Coconut Cream', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend and serve in an exotic glass. Garnish with a straw.

Name: Midori Cold Fusion

Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']

Mildred Pierce
With the Emmys just around the corner, it’s time to start thinking about how and where you’ll be spending the star-studded evening. Whether you’ll be throwing a Hollywood-worthy bash for your friends or be curled up on the couch, we’ve got the perfect cocktails to compliment your night. Each of the following creations pays homage to some of this year’s newcomers and also the staples; and assures that you’ll have the perfect drink in hand no matter which show gets your vote!
The five-part, three-week HBO mini-series Mildred Pierce was packed with great performances pulling in 21 nominations; making it the lead in programming. The best way to celebrate should be obvious: with a classic cocktail made with one of the world’s most awarded rums - Flor de Cana from Nicaragua.

Name: Mint Julep #1
Ingredients: ['8 Mint Leaves', '1 1/2 tbsp. Simple Syrup', '1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/4 tsp. Angostura Bitters']
Making:
In electric blender, blend on high for a few seconds, until leaves are reduced. Strain into silver tumbler packed with shaved ice, add more Bourbon whiskey to saturate the ice, garnish with a sprig of mint.
If you’re from the South, have ever attended the Kentucky Derby, or just love a good, classic drink, then you have probably tried or heard of a mint julep.
No one is really sure when the mint julep first came onto the scene. However, it is known when the drink was first seen in print.
In London in 1803, John Davis published a book that described a drink that used mint and a spirituous liquor. Unfortunately, bourbon wasn’t actually specified as the liquor, so it can only be speculated that what he was referring to was the mint julep.
It is known that the drink did originate in the South, and probably did so during the 18th Century. At that time, the drink was introduced by Senator Henry Clay to the Willard Hotel’s Round Robin Bar in Washington D.C.
Julep, a word derived from Persian gulab and Arabic julab, both of which mean rosewater, is a term that refers to a sweet drink that is usually used for medicinal purposes. The drink is traditionally served in a pewter or silver cup that should be held by either the edge or the bottom so that frost can form on the cup’s outside.
When creating a mint julep, just four traditional ingredients are needed: water, sugar, bourbon, and, of course, mint. Some feel that a sprig of mint should be used as a garnish, others enjoy using slightly bruised leaves, and others still use a muddling technique. The drink’s preparation is often debated, and the way you create the drink depends solely on your own taste.

Name: Mint Julep #2
Ingredients: ['4 sprig(s) Mint', '2 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 tsp. Water']
Making: Muddle mint leaves, powdered sugar, and water in a collins glass. Fill glass with shaved or crushed ice and add Bourbon whiskey. Top with more ice and garnish with a mint sprig. Serve with a straw.

Name: Mint Julep #3
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 part(s) Water', 'Powdered Sugar', 'Mint Fresh']
Making:
Many days on the fields swamps of the southern states of America, you can see people sitting on their porch swings, enjoying a cool concoction. This is a drink that is responsible for many things. Romantic strolls, unfortunate lapses in judgment, and even fresh breath can be attributed to this one drink. It was the cause of it all…
This drink is traditionally served in a silver or pewter mug. There’s a good reason for this, which I discovered upon my first attempt at it; crushed mint leaves don’t look so pretty. In the bottom of the glass, take as much mint as you’d like and muddle it really well. Use the back of a spoon if you have no muddler. Add the sugar into the muddled mint, and continue crushing. When your leaves are nothing more than a pulp, add the bourbon and give it a good stir. Use the water to mediate the burn of the whiskey until you have a perfect sipping drink. Garnish with a few sprigs of mint. Your nose should be deep in mint when ever you sip.

Name: Mint Julep (Deluxe)
Ingredients: ['5 1/4 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '2 tbsp. Demerara Sugar', '5 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters', '32 sprig(s) Mint']
Making:
In a blender, combine Demerara Sugar and Bulleit Bourbon. Pulse until sugar is dissolved. Take 12 sprigs of mint and strip the leaves from the stems. Add the leaves to the mixture. Add the Peychaud's Bitters. Add 4 cups of ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into metal Julep cups. Garnish with 5 mint sprigs with the bottoms cut off to allow the mint flavor to bleed out of the bottom of the stalks. Dash Peychaud's Bitters on top of mint. Cut 2 straws so they are only 3/4" above the mint and place them into the bouquet so each sip provides a new breath of fresh mint essence.
Mixologist's note:"A frozen Mint Julep for a party with the luxury of time and resources. You won't find a more wonderfully complex Julep drink - not even in Churchill Downs on race day." Serves 4

Name: Mint Julep (Simplified)
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '3 sprig(s) Mint', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making:
Toss the sugar into a glass. Add the Bulleit Bourbon. Stir until the sugar is incorporated. Break up 3 mint sprigs into small pieces and drop them into the glass. Take ice and put it into a ziplock bag. Using the Bulleit bottle, break up the ice as much as possible. Top the drink with crushed ice. Swizzle the drink with a knife like you're making a campfire. The ice will go down a bit. Top again. Garnish with a mint sprig. Drink with a straw.
Mixologist's note:"This simplified Julep is designed for the racing fan that likes a good drink but doesn't have access to a complete bar. Pick up some mint at any grocery store and look into your kitchen cabinets for the rest."

Name: Mint Julep (Variation)
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '6 sprig(s) Mint', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '5 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making:
Take 3 sprigs of mint and rip them into 3 equal size pieces and put them into a glass. Peel a lemon lengthwise. Squeeze the essential oils of the lemon peel on top of the mint. Add lemon juice, simple syrup and Bulleit Bourbon. Let sit 1 minute. Stir briefly to incorporate all ingredients. Add cubed ice. Garnish with 3 mint sprigs with the bottoms cut off to allow the mint flavor to bleed out of the bottom of the stalks. Cut 2 straws so they are only 3/4" above the mint and place them into the bouquet so each sip provides a new breath of fresh mint essence.
Mixologist's note:"Designed to be a new take on the classic Mint Julep recipe. Distinctively different for someone who is ready to take their Julep drinking to a new direction."

Making: Soak the sugar cube in pomegranate juice and drop into a chilled Champagne flute. Add Moet and garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Mofo
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Milk']
Making: Layer in a rocks glass.

Name: MoG'ito
Ingredients: ['3 Mint sprigs', "1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Put all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and serve in a high ball glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Mohegan Sun Windfall Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hennessy Cognac Richard', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier 150 Year', '1 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Champagne Krug Grand Cuvee Brut']
Making: Place one raspberry and one blackberry in a snifter glass. Fill glass halfway with ice. Add in order for a layered effect.

Name: Moist Panties
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Strawberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Cream', '1 oz. 7-Up', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Stir and enjoy!

Name: Mojito #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Mint Leaves', 'Soda Water']
Making:
Put juice and sugar into glass, stir until dissolved. Rub mint leaves on inside of glass and discard. Fill with crushed ice and rum, stir. Top with soda water and garnish with a sprig of mint.
Right now, one of the most popular and trendy drinks is the Mojito. In fact, your chances of being in a bar and hearing someone near you order one is pretty darned good, especially during the warmer months.
Unlike many drinks that have been around for years but are just reemerging as popular menu items, the Mojito has been around for a relatively short amount of time, at least in the United States.
The conventional Cuban cocktail, which is often compared to a mint julep, has been a favorite in Cuba for decades. Rumor has it that Ernest Hemingway loved a good Mojito and enjoyed the minty drink on occasion.
Miami residents have been enjoying Mojitos for a while now, mainly because of its large Cuban populace. However, it wasn’t until the late 1980s that the Mojito began to catch on elsewhere in the United States. It seems that in the last few years the cocktail really began to grow a fan base and become a popular choice in trendy clubs and bars.
When creating a Mojito, a traditional recipe calls for only five ingredients, which are sugar, rum, mint, lime, and carbonated water. Some might not enjoy rum because it packs such a potent punch, but in this cocktail, the heavy flavor is nicely masked by the refreshingly sweet flavors of the mint and lime. Should you order a Mojito in Havana, you might find that your drink is prepared with an additional ingredient, Angostura Bitters, to help cut a bit of its sweetness.

Name: Mojito #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar', '2 oz. Soda Water', '1 Mint Leaf']
Making: Place 1 mint leaf in bottom of 10 oz. glass. Fill with crushed ice. Add rum, sugar, lime juice, stir, add soda. Garnish with a mint leaf.

Name: Mojito #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '5 Mint Leaves', '1 tsp. Sugar', '4 drop(s) Angostura Bitters (Or to taste)', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Mojito is one of the national drink of Cuba, I went there 3 times and it's my favorite drink there; it's very refreshing on the beach. The recipe changes from place to place but here are the things that remain almost constant: Put the mint leaves, the sugar and ice in a glass, crush together for a few seconds with an ice pick (leave ice in chunk, not completely crushed) this will mix the crushed mint, juice and sugar. Add the rum, tonic water and few drop of Angostura. Garnish with fresh mint leaves and slice of lime and enjoy on the beach.

Name: Mojito (el Bodeguita Del Medio)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '8 leaf(leaves) Mint', 'Soda Water (Chilled)']
Making: Place your mint leaves in a highball glass. Muddle briefly to bruise the leaves but not to pulp them into a mush. Add thesimple syrup and fresh lime juice. Fill the glass with cubed ice and add the rum. Stir and add more cubed ice if neccesary. Top with soda water. Stir gently. Add a long straws and garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Mojito del Perro
Ingredients: ['3 1/2 oz. Bulldog Gin', '3 sprig(s) Mint', '1 1/2 oz. Lychee Juice', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', 'Club Soda']
Making: Muddle mint and 1 lime slice in a cocktail glass. Add Bulldog Gin, lychee juice and simple syrup. Transfer to a shaker and shake with ice. Strain into a highball glass and top with club soda. Garnish with a lime slice and lychee fruit.

Name: Mojito Highball
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Soda Water']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with soda. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Mojito Italiano
Ingredients: ['10 Mint Leaves Torn', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '2 oz. Averna Bitters - Amaro', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Muddle mint and simple syrup in a highball glass. Add remaining ingredients and stir with a bar spoon. Garnish with mint spring and lemon.

Name: Mojito on IS
Ingredients: ['4 oz. IS Vodka', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '3 sprig(s) Mint', '1 tbsp. Sugar -Raw', '1 splash(es) Tonic Water']
Making: Sprinkle sugar over mint in a tall glass, then ‘muddle’. Add ice, IS VODKA, grapefruit juice and top with tonic. Garnish with a lime wheel and a sprig of mint. Truly a Refreshing Summer Delight!

Name: Mojito Parisien
Ingredients: ['10 Mint Leaves', '2 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '1 oz. Lime Juice', 'Simple Syrup']
Making: Lightly muddle mint in glass. Add other ingredients. Half fill glass with crushed ice and stir. Fill to the brim with more crushed ice and stir again. Garnish with a lime wedge. Add simple syrup to taste.

Name: Mojo
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Ale', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Cherry Brandy', '2 oz. Orange Juice (Or to taste)', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice (Or to taste)', '2 oz. Cola (Or to taste)', '2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda (Or to taste)']
Making: Stir into a glass filled with ice.

Name: Moles Juice
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sweet and Sour Mix (To taste)', 'Pineapple Juice (To taste)']
Making: Mix and serve over ice.

Name: Molester
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '1/2 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '7-Up', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Mix well over ice in a goblet and fill with equal parts of 7-Up and sour mix.

Name: Moll Flanders
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '4 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Molly Brown
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Whipping Cream', '1/4 cup(s) Lemonade', '1/2 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Vodka', '2 Lemons']
Making: Pour first four ingredients into blender. Blend for 30 seconds. Add 1 cup crushed ice and blend for another 30 seconds. Squeeze in juice from 2 lemons and blend until frosty. Pour into chilled cocktail glasses.

Name: Molotov Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '2 cup(s) Coffee', '1 quart(s) Vodka', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Blend first three ingredients and pour into a coffee mug. For each serving add the Bacardi 151 Proof rum. Garnish with cinnamon or nutmeg.

Name: Mona
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', "dash(es) Rose's Lime Juice (Sweetened)"]
Making: Stir over ice into a collins glass.

Name: Mona-Lisa
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Lemon Soda']
Making: Stir ingredients and pour into a highball glass. Drink while dancing to the song 'Mona-Lisa'.

Name: Monaco
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) 7-Up', '1/2 pint(s) Lager', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: In a pint, first pour the grenadine then the 7-Up and the lager. This is a very popular drink in France.

Name: Money Gland
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Pastis', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Mongolian
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Grapefruit Juice (To taste)', 'Pineapple Juice (To taste)', 'Orange Juice (To taste)']
Making: Mix with ice and strain over ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: Mongolian Dingbat
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream']
Making: Blend together and pour into a cocktail glass......very refreshing in the summer!!!

Name: Mongolian Fog Cutter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Umeshu (Japanese Sour Plum Wine)', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. White Rum', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass and fill with pineapple juice.

Name: Mongolian Mother F**ker
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Wildberry Schnapps', 'Sour Mix', 'Fruit Juice']
Making: Mix all the ingredients over ice in the largest glass you have and top with equal parts of orange, cranberry and pineapple juice.

Name: Monk
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Frangelico', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend until smooth and serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a straw.

Name: Monkey Cum
Ingredients: ['6 2/3 oz. Vodka', '1 cup(s) Milk', '1/2 Banana']
Making: Blend the milk and the banana just for a few seconds (or until there is only little lumps). Add the vodka and mix well. I don't think you should drink it all a once!

Name: Monkey Doo
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 can(s) Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix in a highball glass with ice if preferred…and go Ape!

Name: Monkey Gland
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Benedictine', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Monkey Madness 4:20
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Creme de Cassis', '2 oz. Banana Juice', '4 slice(s) Banana']
Making: Blend with ice (except crème de cassis) and pour into a highball glass. Add the crème de cassis, drink and watch your friends and yourself transformed into monkeys!!

Name: Monkey Mix #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Everclear', "3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '3 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Cola']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a pint glass and stir.

Name: Monkey Shine Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cordial glass.

Name: Monkey Spunk
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix vodka and banana liqueur in a cocktail glass. Fill the rest of the glass with milk. Serve over ice or cold.

Name: Monkey Wrench
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '3 oz. Grapefruit Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Pour all of the ingredients into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Name: Monkey's Lunch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Milk']
Making: Mix in a 12 oz. glass half full of ice then add the milk.

Name: Monkey's Lunch (Electric)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', '8 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake lightly with 4 ice cubes and pour into a brandy glass. Add a cherry for some color. Enjoy!!

Name: Monkeys Brain
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Tonic Water (Preferably Indian Tonic Water)']
Making: Add the vodka, the grenadine and the Bailey's into a whiskey tumbler, shake small bottle of tonic and spray into mixture. The Bailey's forms the monkey's brain on top of blood red vodka.

Name: Monongahela Cobbler
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Icing Sugar', 'Bourbon Whiskey']
Making: Put the sugar in a tumbler with some thin parings of orange and lemon peels. Fill 1/3 of the glass with shaved ice and add Bourbon to taste. Stir and garnish with fruit and 2 straws.

Name: Monster Mash
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Light Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Blend with a cup of ice and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with 2 apple wedges.

Name: Mont Blanc
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Light Cream', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend until smooth and serve in a large red wine glass.

Name: Montana #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Port']
Making: Stir all ingredients in an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and serve.

Name: Montana #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Port', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '2 dash(es) Anisette']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Monte Carlo Imperial
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour in a highball glass and fill with champagne.

Name: Monte Carlo Imperial Highball
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', 'Champagne']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with champagne and stir.

Name: Monte Christo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Lemon Vodka (Absolut Citron)']
Making: Chill, mix, enjoy!

Name: Monte's Sex Potion
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass. Enjoy.

Name: Montezuma
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Madeira', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: Blend all ingredients with 1/2 cup crushed ice in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

Name: Montmartre Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dry Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Montreal Club Bouncer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Anisette']
Making: Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir.

Name: Montreal Gin Sour
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/2 Egg White']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

Name: Monty's Absolut Escapade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Peppar Vodka', '5 oz. Champagne (Preferably Ackerman Champagne)']
Making: Pour into a champagne flute.

Name: Monumental Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Raspberry Schnapps', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Strawberry Passion Schnapps', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Bluesberry Schnapps', '1 part(s) Soda Water', '1 splash(es) Cruzan Estate Light Rum Two Years', '2 Limes']
Making: Muddle mint, lime, soda and sugar in a tall glass. Add ice and equal parts of fruit schnapps. Stir and top with rum. Add garnish of fresh berries and dust with sugar.

Name: Moobooster
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Creme de Cassis', '3 part(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Moog Patrol Swisher
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Safari', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Grenadine', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Mooing Irish Pepsi
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Pepsi Cola', '2 oz. Milk']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Moon Beam
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '2 oz. Vanilla Cola']
Making: Mix in a tall glass over ice.

Name: Moon Mountain Fall Harvest
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Sugar rim a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: Moon Mountain Green Glass
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '2 sprig(s) Cilantro Leaves', '1 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce (green)']
Making: Tear and drop the cilantro into a cocktail shaker. Fill shaker with ice and add Moon Mountain Vodka, lime juice, agave nectar and green Tabasco. Shake vigorously and straining over fresh ice into a Collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge and a sprig of cilantro.

Name: Moon Mountain Honey Moon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Champagne', '3/4 oz. Honey', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Build in a champagne flute. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Moon Mountain Kona Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Romana Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Espresso', '1 splash(es) Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with ground espresso.

Name: Moon Mountain Mary on the Moon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '4 oz. Tomato Juice', '3 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cucumber slice.

Name: Moon Mountain Mother Earth Mint
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '4 slice(s) Cucumber', '3 sprig(s) Mint']
Making: Add the cucumber and mint to a cocktail shaker and muddle to release the flavors. Fill cocktail shaker with ice and add Moon Mountain Vodka, lime juice and agave syrup. Shake vigorously and strain into an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of cucumber and mint sprig.

Name: Moon Mountain Nature's Nectar
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '3/4 oz. Orange Curacao', '3/4 oz. Sour Mix', '1 1/2 oz. Tea', '1 dash(es) Honey']
Making: Build in a cocktail glass and garnish with a mint sprig and an orange slice.

Name: Moon Mountain Tantalus
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into acocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Moon Mountain The Forbidden Fruit
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '3/4 oz. Pomegranate Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: Moon Mountain The Natural
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '3 oz. Ginger Beer', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Moon Quake Shake
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coffee Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Moonage Daydream
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 Egg White', '1 tsp. Brown Sugar (Or caster sugar)', 'Soda Water']
Making: Place the ingredients (excluding the soda water) in a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously with ice. Pour into a tall glass and top up with soda water. WARNING! BEWARE OVERFLOW! Garnish with a slice of lemon in accordance with the current shape of the moon.

Name: Moonlight
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Apple Brandy', '1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Moonlight Sail
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Admiral Nelson's Raspberry Rum", "1 oz. Admiral Nelson's Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Arrow Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Arrow Amaretto', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour alcohol into a cocktail shaker, then add juices. Shake well, then pour into a tall glass with ice. Garnish with a cherry and a lemon twist.

Name: Mor-Drink-A-Rino
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Iced Tea', '12 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Mix chill and pour ....Great Social!!

Name: More Sunshine
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Gin', '2/3 oz. Creme de Cassis', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Morgan Coke
Ingredients: ["4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '6 oz. Coca Cola Classic']
Making: Fill a 16 oz. glass with ice. Add Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum and fill with Class Coca Cola.

Name: Morgan Madras
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour rum over ice in highball glass. Add orange and cranberry juices. Garnish with an orange slice and a maraschino cherry.

Name: Morgan's Blue Balls
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake Captain Morgan's, blue curacao, Malibu Rum and juices with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the splash of 7-Up and sour mix.

Name: Morgan's Mountain
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Heavy Cream', '1 tsp. Kahlua']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, creme de cacao, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the Kahlua into the centre of the drink.

Name: Morir Sonando
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cuarenta Y Tres', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Milk']
Making: Serve in a highball glass.

Name: Morning Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/4 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/4 tsp. Anisette', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Morning Glory
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Orange Curacao', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'dash(es) Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Morning Glory Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 tsp. Anis', '1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg White', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Name: Morning Wood
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice', '1/4 oz. Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Blackberry Liqueur']
Making: Combine the first four ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a champagne flute or shooter glass. Finally, sink the blackberry liquor to form a layer at the bottom.

Name: Morro
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 tbsp. Pineapple Juice', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Rub rim of old-fashioned glass with lime juice. Dip rim in powdered sugar. Shake with ice, strain into the sugar-rimmed glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Moscow Bobsled
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Chocolate Milk']
Making: Stir and drink.

Name: Moscow Chill
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Pepper Vodka', '4 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Pour the vodka over shaved ice in a champagne glass. Fill with Dr Pepper. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Moscow Mule
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Lime Juice', '8 oz. Ginger Beer']
Making: Mix all ingredients in tall glass with ice. Here are some tips from one of our user: for the best Moscow Mule, use a copper cup instead of glass. After packing it full of ice, squeeze 1/2 of a lime into the cup and scrape the remainder of lime pulp around top rim. Add 2 shots of vodka and then fill with Ginger Beer. Cold and refreshing. Be careful, though!

Name: Mosquito Bite
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Country Time Lemonade', '2 oz. Tahitian Treat Soda', '4 oz. Sprite', '2 oz. Bacardi Lemon']
Making: Try to get the Country Time out of a bottle rather than the powdered stuff. It just tastes better. Just mix together over ice and enjoy.

Name: Mostly Mal
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, triple sec and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Mother Goose
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Grey Goose Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Lemonade', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Fill a pint glass with ice. Add vodka, chambord and a splash of lime juice. Fill with lemonade (fresh is better!). Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Mother Pucker
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Grape Pucker', '4 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Use only Grape Pucker...beware of imitations. Stir into a tumbler. Good as a "sipper" or a fast shooter.

Name: Mother's Milk
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Bols Blue Curacao', '6 oz. Milk', '2 drop(s) Food Colouring (green)']
Making: Mix Midori, food colouring and milk together with ice. Pour into a frosted highball glass. Use the food dye to make the frosting green for added effect. Drizzle the nlue curacao so it slowly settles. Garnish with mint leaves.

Name: Moulin Rouge
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Mounaki
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake well with 5 ice cubes and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Mounds
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Place ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Mount Fuji #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sake', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Stir in a wine glass. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

Name: Mount Fuji #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Applejack', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Sugar', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 Lime (Scooped out shell)']
Making: Mix all but 151 proof and lime shell with ice to make an icy mixture. Pour into a sour glass in a heap and put the lime shell on top and fill it with the 151 proof and ignite. Watch the volcanic seen. As it melts, drink with a straw.

Name: Mount Gay Pumpkin Pie Frappe
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mount Gay Eclipse Rum', '4 tsp. Pumpkin Puree', '2 tsp. Sugar in the Raw (or Turbinado or Demerara)', '1 pinch(es) Cinnamon', '1 pinch(es) Allspice', '3 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making:
Combine all of the above ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth. Serve in nicely chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.
*There is a difference between 'pumpkin puree' and 'pumpkin pie mix.' Please use the puree - it really does make a difference

Name: Mount Red
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Add ingredients over ice into a cocktail glass and fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Mountain Berry Punch
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Combine the Jack Daniel's, the blueberry, the raspberry, the strawberry, the cranberry and the sweet and sour. Mix well, pour into a cocktail glass then add the splash of 7-Up. Float the cherry brandy and garnish with an orange twist and a cherry.

Name: Mountain Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/4 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Mountain Dew Gin Fizz
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Seagram's Extra Dry Gin", '1/2 Lime', '2 oz. Gatorade', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Fill a 9 oz. rocks glass with ice. Pour gin into the glass. Squeeze juice from half of a lime into the glass. Add Gatorade and fill with Mountain Dew. Stir with a straw and enjoy.

Name: Mountain Dew Me (Mount And Do Me)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Mountain Dew', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Fill a 12 oz. glass with ice. Pour in vodka and peach schnapps. Fill the rest of the glass with equal parts orange juice and Mountain Dew. Top off with a splash of lime juice. You can barely taste the alcohol and you feel it fast!

Name: Mountain Dew Ya
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Mountain Dew', '2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Salt the rim of a glass. Pour in Mountain Dew (over Ice or chilled). Add Tequila. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Mountain Don't
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Pour over ice in a lowball and stir well.

Name: Mountain Man
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Goldschlager', '1 part(s) Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour equal parts into a cocktail glass over ice. Stir and enjoy.

Name: Mountaineer
Ingredients: ['Mountain Dew', 'Budweiser Beer (Light)', 'Cooler (Berry Wine)']
Making: Pour a half cup of beer. Fill with Mountain Dew until the 3/4 line of the cup. Fill the rest with berry wine cooler and stir. It sounds weird but its really good.

Name: Mountian Dew
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Whipped Cream', '2 oz. Apple Pucker', '7-Up', '1 oz. Whiskey']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes in a collins glass. Garnish with lemon or lime.

Name: Mousetrap
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Grenadine', '10 oz. Orange Juice', 'Sparkling Wine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a beer mug and fill with sparkling wine.

Name: Mozart
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 tsp. Triple Sec', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, Triple Sec and orange Bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Mr. and Mrs. T Bloody Mary Original
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Mr. and Mrs. T Original Bloody Mary Mix', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Pour over ice in a tall cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge, celery stalk and seasoned rim, as desired.

Name: Mr. Bussey's Stinger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 oz. Brandy']
Making: Fill a Pabst blue ribbon mug with ice and add peppermint schnapps and brandy. Top off with a little water.

Name: Mr. Insaneo The Cow #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '2 cup(s) Milk', "1 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup (Hershey's)"]
Making: Blend the ingredients (except chocolate syrup) with 2 cups of ice. Blend well until smooth, pour into a collins glass and drizzle chocolate syrup over the top.

Name: Mr. Insaneo The Cow #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 cup(s) Milk', "1 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup (Hershey's)"]
Making: Blend the ingredients (except chocolate syrup) with 2 cups of ice. Blend well until smooth, pour into a collins glass and drizzle chocolate syrup over the top.

Name: Mr. Manhattan Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Orange Juice', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 Sugar Cube', '4 sprig(s) Mint']
Making: Mix well then shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Mr. Matt
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour into a tall glass over ice. Fill with the pineapple juice.

Name: Mr. New Yorker
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. French Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Sherry', 'dash(es) Cointreau']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Mrs. Taylors
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lillet', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Club Soda']
Making: Combine the ingredients into a red or white wine glass filled to the top with ice. Do not stir or strain this drink. Garnish with a burnt orange peel.

Name: Mt. Jack
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '12 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and stir.

Name: Muay Thai
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Cherry Heering Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Benedictine', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Combine Mekhong and the rest of the ingredients in a Hurricane Glass. Add Ice and cover with a shaker tin. Shake briefly and vigorously. Top off with dashes of Bitters. Serve long with a straw and garnish with an Orange half wheel. Based on the Singapore Sling.

Name: MuchoTE Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) MuchoTE Tequila', '1 part(s) Cointreau', '2 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Serve blended or over ice in a glass that has 1/2 the rim dipped in salt and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: MuchoTE on the Rocks
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) MuchoTE Tequila']
Making: Pour over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: MuchoTE Paloma
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) MuchoTE Tequila', 'Grapefruit Soda']
Making: Fill a glass with ice and fill with grapefruit soda (NOT grapefruit juice).

Name: MuchoTe Sangrita Recipe
Ingredients: ['2 1/4 cup(s) Orange Juice Freshly Squeezed', '3/4 cup(s) Lime Juice Freshly Squeezed', '5 tbsp. Grenadine', '1 tsp. Salt', '1 tsp. Cayenne Pepper']
Making: This recipe makes 18 shots. Blend together and refrigerate. Serve cold in a shot glass.

Name: MuchoTE Sunburn
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) MuchoTE Tequila', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a glass with ice and fill with cranberry juice.

Name: Mud F**k
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Dr Pepper', '4 oz. Milk', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Syrup', '3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix together in glass and blend with ice.

Name: Mud Slide
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Mix with cracked ice in a shaker. Serve in a chilled cocktail glass

Name: Muddy Golden Slide
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Gold', '2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour in the ingredients, stir and enjoy.

Name: Muddy Omlette
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', 'Eggnog']
Making: In a Low Ball glass or festive glass Pour Kahlua over ice in a low ball glass. .Fast-pour the eggnog into the glass. Stir lightly. The coffee liqueur will marble-blend with the eggnog. Garnish lightly with nutmeg. Works well as a layered shot too.

Name: Muddy Water #2
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass. And listen to Muddy Waters or other Blues Music.

Name: Muddy Waters Of Tuscumbia
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Grape Pucker', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Combine over ice in a collins glass. Very fruity!!

Name: Mudslide #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Mudslide #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tia Maria Chocolate Liqueur', '2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Mudslide #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Chocolate Milk']
Making: Mix liquors over one scoop of ice in a blender. Pour in chocolate milk almost to the top of the ice. Blend and serve in cocktail glass.

Name: Mudslide #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Boru Vodka', "1 oz. Brady's Irish Cream", '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Pallini Raspicello', '1 oz. Milk']
Making: Blend ingredients with ice. Drizzle chocolate syrup in bottom and sides of a parfait glass. Pour blended drink into glass.

Name: Mudslide #5
Ingredients: ['1/3 cup(s) Kahlua', '2/3 cup(s) Chocolate Milk']
Making: Mix together serve cold.

Name: Muff Diver #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 1/4 oz. Cream', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Muff Rider
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sake', '1 oz. White Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Lemon Soda (Bitter)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with lemon soda.

Name: Mug Shot
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Root Beer']
Making: Combine in a highball glass.

Name: Mulatto Russian
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', 'Chocolate Syrup', 'Light Cream']
Making: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned cocktail glass. Fill with light cream and add chocolate syrup to taste.

Name: Mule
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka (Or plain vodka)', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour lime juice and vodka over ice in a highball glass, then fill with ginger ale. Garnish with a lime wedge

Name: Mulled Claret
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Claret (Or red wine)', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 Sugar Cube', '1/2 tsp. Nutmeg', '1/2 tsp. Cinnamon']
Making: Bring to the boil and serve in a mug. Another way of preparing this recipe is to put all the ingredients into a metal mug and heat it poker red-hot until the liquid is boiling. Then serve, but watch your fingers!

Name: Multiple Orgasm #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes in a hurricane glass.

Name: Multiple Orgasm #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a 13 oz. "Foo Foo" glass.

Name: Multiple Screaming Orgasm
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '5 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake with ice until half and half becomes a little thicker. Pour into a rocks glass over fresh ice.

Name: Mumbai Bombshell
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Mumbo Jumbo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Applejack', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1/8 tsp. Cinnamon (Ground)', '1/8 tsp. Nutmeg (Grated)']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

Name: Mumsicle
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Bourbon whiskey, and Bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Munk
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Smirnoff Orange Twist Vodka', '2 part(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch (Chilled)', '1 part(s) Spiced Rum']
Making: Mix and garnish with an orange wedge.

Name: Muppet
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Muskmelon
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 cup(s) Cantaloupe', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Combine ingredients in blender with 1/3 cup of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a piece of cantaloupe.

Name: Mussolini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix into a cocktail glass.

Name: Mustang Ranch Freebie
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Frappe in a champagne flute.

Name: Mutagen
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Kahlua', 'Cream']
Making: Shake and serve in a lowball glass.

Name: Mutiny
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '2 dash(es) Bitters', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Rouge)']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Dubonnet, and Bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: My Blue Dream / mi Sueno Azul
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Patron Silver Tequila', '1 oz. 7-Up', '4 drop(s) Dry Vermouth', 'Blue Curacao', 'Sugar']
Making: Add the Bacardi Limon, Patron and 7-Up in a shaker over ice. Stir. Pour 4 drops of dry vermouth into a cocktail glass and swirl evenly, coating the glass. Pour off the excess. In a saucer have a small amount of blue curacao. Dip the lip of the cocktail glass in the curacao and then into the sugar. Pour in the cocktail from the shaker. Garnish with a twist and add a splash of blue curucao over the top.

Name: My Place Or No Place
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Gilbey's Gin", '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Frappe in a parfait glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: My Pleasure
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '8 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix together and pour over ice.

Name: My Sweet Midori
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', 'Ginger Ale', '3 wedge(s) Lime']
Making: Serve over ice cubes in a highball glass and squeeze in 2 or 3 lime wedges.

Name: Myer's Mai Tai
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Myer's Dark Rum", 'Guava Juice', 'Orange Juice', 'Papaya Juice']
Making: Shake with ice. Add equal parts of each juice.

Name: Myrtle Bank Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1/8 oz. Dark Rum', '1/8 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Mix rum, grenadine, lime juice and sugar into 10 oz. glass filled with crushed ice. Top with a cherry brandy. Garnish with a fruit flag or a lime wheel.

Name: Mystic Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1/4 part(s) Pernod Absinthe', '1/3 part(s) Irish Cream', '1/3 part(s) Creme de Cacao', '2 dash(es) Butterscotch Schnapps']
Making: Add absinthe first into a cordial size glass, then layer remaining ingredients beginning with Irish Cream.

Name: N.E. Rum Runner
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix well and add cranberry juice to taste. Malibu can be substituted with Captain Morgan's.

Name: Nabbz's Bleeding Face
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Midori', '1 cup(s) Ice Cream']
Making: Stir in a highball glass, then light. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE!!!

Name: Nacional
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 10 Cane Rum', '2 dash(es) Bitters', '5 wedge(s) Lime', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '2 oz. Cola', 'Di Saronno Oringinale Amaretto']
Making:
In a mixing glass, muddle lime wedges, simple syrup, and bitters. Add ice and 10 Cane. Shake vigorously and pour (do not strain) into a highball glass. Fill up with 2 ounces of cola and stir. Top off with a float of Disaronno. Garnish with a mint sprig.
Created by: Francesco Lafranconi, Master Mixologist

Name: Nadir
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Gin', '1/3 oz. Cherry Brandy', '2/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '2/3 oz. Strawberry Syrup', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '2 tsp. Pineapple Juice', 'Soda Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with soda water. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Nadir Blue
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Gin', '1/3 oz. Cherry Brandy', '2/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '2/3 oz. Strawberry Syrup', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '2 tsp. Pineapple Juice', '2/3 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Soda Water']
