Making: Shake with ice and strain all but water and Curacao into a highball glass. Fill with soda water and pour Curacao into the middle. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Nail Gun
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Vodka', '1 Mountain Dew (Large slurpee)']
Making: Get a large Mountain Dew slurpee and pour in the vodka. Stir well and drink up!

Name: Naked Barbie Doll
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

Name: Naked Lady
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '4 dash(es) Apricot Brandy', '2 dash(es) Grenadine', '4 dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Naked Navel
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a collins glass.

Name: Naked Pretzel
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Stir and pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Naked Sunburn
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Creme de Noyeaux', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix in a hurricane glass and fill with equal parts of pineapple juice and cranberry juice.

Name: Nantucket
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Brandy', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Nap On The Beach
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 dash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients in a hurricane glass. Add half orange juice and half pineapple juice. Top with a dash of cranberry for color.

Name: Napacello Colada
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Light Rum', '2 oz. Napa Valley Limoncello XO', '3 tbsp. Coconut Cream', '3 tbsp. Pineapple']
Making: Combine all ingredients into an electric blender with 2 cups of crushed ice. Blend until the desired consistency is reached. Strain into a cocktail glass and top with Napa Valley Limoncello and garnish with a slice of fruit.

Name: Napacellotini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Napa Valley Limoncello XO', '1/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tbsp. Olive Juice']
Making: Pour ingredients, except fot he olive juice in a shaker with ice and shake well until cold. Pour contents into a Martini Glass. Add the olive juice.

Name: Naple's Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1 Sugar Cube (Preferably a cane sugar cube)']
Making: Combine the sugar and the bitters in an old-fashioned glass and muddle well. Stir in the whiskey and the orange juice. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel, slices of orange and a cherry. Serve with a straw.

Name: Napolean
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 dash(es) Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '2 dash(es) Curacao', '2 dash(es) Fernet Branca']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Napolean's Opera
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Beefeater Dry Gin', '3/4 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1/2 oz. Mandarine Napoleon', '1 dash(es) Angostura Orange Bitters']
Making:
Stir with ice and strain into a chilled coupe. Garnish with an orange twist.
Cocktail by Jim Meehan, PDT, New York - Adapted from Jacques Straub's manual 'Drinks' - 1914.

Name: Napoleon
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. Curacao', '1/2 tsp. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Nappy Dugout
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake liquor with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Fill remainder of glass with equal parts pineapple and cranberry juice.

Name: Nappy Rash
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 tbsp. Iced Tea Mix', '12 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/4 Orange (Including peel and rind)']
Making: Pour the ingredients in a blender and mix well. Serve chilled.

Name: Narragansett
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Anisette']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the Bourbon whiskey, vermouth, and anisette. Stir well and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Nashville Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Eggnog', '6 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3 oz. Brandy', '3 oz. Jamaica Rum']
Making: Stir in a punch bowl. Serve in punch cups and sprinkle each cup with nutmeg. This punch makes approximately 10 servings.

Name: Nassau Paul
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Egg White', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a champagne flute. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Nasty #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Kahlua', '3/4 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '3/4 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and serve in a large cocktail glass over ice.

Name: Nasty #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Canadian Whisky', '3 oz. Water', '1 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Mix over ice in a lowball glass.

Name: National Aquarium
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a shaker of ice. Shake well. Serve on the rocks.

Name: National Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '3 dash(es) Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Natural Vanilla Cola
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '2 part(s) Club Soda', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour Navan into a tall glass filled with ice. Top off with soda and squeeze of lemon.

Name: Natural Vanilla Latte
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '2 part(s) Starbucks Cream Liqueur']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice; pour into a rocks glass filled with ice.

Name: Natural Vanilla Margarita
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 1/2 part(s) Tequila', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 part(s) Agave Nectar']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice; pour into a margarita or a rocks glass filled with ice.

Name: Naughty Milkshake
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Polar Ice Vodka', '1 oz. Godiva Chocolate Cream Liqueur', '1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 cup(s) Milk', '2 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a blender filled with ice. Mix until ice is completely blended in. Amount of ice depends on your preference of thickness. Pour into a glass and enjoy! (and don't forget to wipe off that milk mustache!)

Name: Navan on Ice
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur']
Making: Pour Navan over ice.

Name: Navan Pear Royal
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '2 part(s) Moet and Chandon Brut Imperial Champagne', '1 part(s) Pear Nectar', '1 splash(es) Creme de Cassis']
Making: In a Mixing glass, add all ingredients except the champagne, add ice, shake, strain into a champagne flute, and top with champagne.

Name: Navan Smash
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '6 chunk(s) Lemon', '6 leaf(leaves) Mint']
Making: Muddle the mint and lemon in the bottom of a mixing glass, add ice and NAVAN. Shake and strain onto fresh ice. Garnish with mint passed through the center of a lemon wheel.

Name: Navan Vanilla Bourbon
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tamarind Syrup', '1/2 oz. Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making:
In a mixing glass add all ingredients except soda, ice and shake well. Strain over fresh ice into a rocks glass, top with soda and add garnish. Garnish with 3 brandied cherries.
Created by by Master Mixologist Aisha Sharpe

Name: Navan Vanilla Orange Blossom
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Wild Hibiscus Syrup', '1/2 oz. Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', 'slice(s) Orange', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making:
In a mixing glass add one orange half wheel, all ingredients except the soda, add ice, shake and starain over fresh ice into a high ball glass. Top with soda and garnish with an orange peel. Garnish with an orange peel.
Created by by Master Mixologist Aisha Sharpe

Name: Navan Yellow Cab
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '2 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 squirt(s) Lemon']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice; pour into a tall glass filled with ice.

Name: Navel Destroyer
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Absolut Vodka', '3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake over crushed ice, strain, and serve over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Navy Grog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Guava Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Nazi Qualik
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Milk']
Making: Pour all the ingredients over ice into a collins glass. Fill with milk.

Name: Necrophiliac
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Nectar Of The Gods
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Grenadine']
Making: Shake all ingredients except Grenadine over ice. Strain and pour into a cocktail glass. Layer Grenadine on top.

Name: Nectarine
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Midori', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Add alcohol to a cocktail glass with ice. Fill with equal parts of Orange Juice and Pineapple Juice and finsih with a dash of grenadine. Enjoy.

Name: Negroni #1
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Campari', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Negroni #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Campari', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Negroni Sbagliato
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Campari', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'Wine (Pinot Chardonnay)']
Making: Pour all the ingredients into a tumbler with some ice. Top with Pinot Chardonnay. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Neon Neutron
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Long Island Iced Tea Mix', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '6 oz. Soda Water', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Netherland
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Brandy', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

Name: Neutered Purple Squirrel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Light Rum (Or to taste)', '1 oz. Rum (Or to taste)', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Freshly squeezed)', '1 oz. Club Soda (Or to taste)']
Making: Mix everything but Club Soda and shake well in a tumbler. Add the Club Soda and pour over ice in cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime with an Almond embedded in it.

Name: Neva
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Pepper Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tomato Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice into a stemmed glass.

Name: Nevada Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Nevins
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 1/2 tsp. Apricot Brandy', '1 tbsp. Grapefruit Juice', '1 1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: New Castle Voodoo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour your favourite vodka over ice in a highball glass and fill with Mountain Dew. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: New Jersey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Southern Comfort', '4 oz. Orange Juice fresh']
Making: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and strain into an ice filled collins glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: New Moon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", 'Tonic Water']
Making: Mix all the ingredients over ice in a tumbler and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: New Moscow
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Strega', '1 oz. Orange Juice Red']
Making: Shake well and pour into an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: New Orleans Buck
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except Ginger Ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with Ginger Ale, stir, and serve.

Name: New Orleans Fizz
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '2 dash(es) Orange Flower Water', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 oz. Sweetened Cream', '2 oz. Gin', '1 Egg White', '1 splash(es) Seltzer Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: New Year’s Sparkler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Skyy Infusions Passion Fruit Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '3 1/2 oz. Champagne', '6 Raspberries']
Making:
Combine SKYY Infusions Raspberry and cranberry juice in a chilled champagne flute and top with champagne. Garnish with raspberry tree.*
*Slide 5-6 raspberries onto long skewer and place vertically in champagne glass.
Infuse passion into the New Year with a flashy cocktail featuring SKYY Infusions Passion Fruit, fresh juice and raspberries. The New Year’s Sparkler is an easy way to spice up your champagne flute this New Year’s Eve.

Name: New York Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: New York Egg Cream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '2 oz. Milk', 'Seltzer Water']
Making: An alcoholic version of the classic Egg Cream. Mix the Bailey's Irish Cream, Godiva Chocolate Liqueur and the milk in a 12 oz. glass. Using a seltzer dispenser, top the ingredients with the seltzer. This should make a frothy sweet 'fountain' drink.

Name: New York Lemonade
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Lemon Vodka', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '2 oz. Lemon Juice (Sweetend)', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Lemon and sugar the rim. Stir and Strain.

Name: New York Mother F**ker
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', 'Cream']
Making: Mix with ice and top off with cream.

Name: New York Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Claret']
Making: Shake blended Scotch whisky, lemon juice and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a sour glass. Float claret on top. Garnish with half-slice of lemon and a cherry.

Name: Newbury
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Newfoundland Pop
Ingredients: ["6 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '6 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour in order into a highball glass, don't stir or mix.

Name: Niagara Falls
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Mandarine Napoleon', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Ginger Ale']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Nicci's Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake in a shaker with ice and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Nice Melons
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum', '1 1/2 cup(s) Watermelon', '2 tbsp. Lime Juice (Or lemon juice)', '1 Peach (Halved, preferably canned)']
Making: Blend with a cup of ice and serve in a cocktail glass with a straw.

Name: Nice Orange Shag
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '6 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Nicholas Nix's Red Strawberry
Ingredients: ["12 oz. Beer (Preferably George Killian's Irish Red)", '3 scoop(s) Ice Cream (Strawberry flavour)']
Making: Mix in your favourite drinking glass.

Name: Nick at Night
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a collins glass.

Name: Nickel
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '2/3 oz. Midori', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with 7-Up.

Name: Nickel Alloy
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '2/3 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with 7-Up.

Name: Nickel Fever
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '2/3 oz. Galliano', '1 1/3 oz. Cream', '1 1/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Stir in mixing glass half filled with cracked ice and strain into a 5 oz. champagne glass. Garnish with ice chips and 8-10 drops of blue Curacao.

Name: NickTea
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Old Crow Bourbon', 'Lemonade']
Making: Fill 1/2 a cocktail glass with ice. Add bourbon and top off with lemonade.

Name: Night Cap
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Milk (Warm)']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and fill with warm milk. Stir and sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Night Light
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Orange Curacao', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Nightmare #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Madeira', '1 tsp. Orange Juice (Optional)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Nightmare #2
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Gin', '5 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '5 oz. Tequila', '5 oz. Triple Sec', '5 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '7-Up', 'Sour Mix', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Add liquors in a 16oz. glass and fill with equal parts of orange juice, Sour Mix and 7-Up. Shake with a lemon wedge and serve.

Name: Nights In White Satin
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Chill a cocktail glass. Fill a shaker full of ice and shake. Strain into the chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple wheel.

Name: Nijinski Blini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Peaches (Pureed)', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 splash(es) Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Champagne (Chilled)']
Making: Pour into a champagne flute and stir gently.

Name: Nikki A
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Yukon Jack', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Serve on ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Nineteenth Hole
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Ninotchka
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka (Or any other vanilla-flavoured vodka)', '1 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Ninotchka Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Nitro Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Grey Goose Vodka', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink', '1 tsp. Coffee (grounds)']
Making: Shake all together and strain over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: No Clue
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '3 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Mix with ice in a collins glass.

Name: No Mames
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Don Julio Reposado Tequila', '1 oz. Barenjager Honey Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Pink Grapefruit Juice', '3 spray(s) St. Elizabeth Allspice Dram']
Making: Take chilled cocktail glass and apply the chipotle salt on half of the rim and spray the allspice dram inside. Put the rest of the ingredients into a mixing glass. Add large, cold ice and shake vigorously for 6 seconds. Strain into the prepared cocktail glass.

Name: Noble Sky
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Casa Noble Crystal', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Pour ingredients into iced mixing glass. Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Nog De Cacao
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Eggnog', '1 1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Stir with ice in an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with cocoa.

Name: Noilly Cassis
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Noilly Prat Dry', '2/3 oz. Creme de Cassis', 'Soda Water (optional)']
Making: Pour Noilly Prat Dry and Creme de Cassis into a rocks glass. Fill with cubed ice and top up with soda water. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Noodle Especial
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Bar Mix', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', 'Grenadine']
Making: Mix all alcohol over ice and pour into a cocktail glass. Float grenadine for effect. Serve with a cherry.

Name: Norsk Mulata
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Aquavit', '3/4 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake hard with crushed ice then strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: North Pole Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream and serve.

Name: Northern Exposure (Show Me Your Boobies)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '2 oz. Cappuccino (Use the already-made cappuccino mix)']
Making: Stir over ice in a lowball glass.

Name: Northern Lights #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur (Preferably Bols Raspberry Liqueur)', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', 'Pineapple Orange Juice']
Making: Mix over ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: Northern Lights #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake and pour over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Northern Lights-Out
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Rum", '1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '6 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Add all ingredients over ice in a tall glass. Add a lime twist and chug.

Name: Northside Special
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Soda Water']
Making: Add ingredients to ice filled 12 oz. glass. Stir lightly. Garnish with a fruit flag.

Name: Not Purple Shitface
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake well, strain and pour over ice in a tall glass. Garnish with an orange wheel.

Name: Not Purple Shitface (delicious)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake and strain over ice in a tall glass. Decorate with a lemon slice.

Name: Not So Blue Hawaiian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Remy Martin VSOP Cognac']
Making: Mix first three ingredients in a cocktail glass with ice and then float the Remy VSOP. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Not So Fuzzy Navel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Grapefruit Juice (Or pink grapefruit juice)']
Making: Stir over crushed ice and garnish with a slice of orange or lime. Great Summer Drink. Not too sweet, very refreshing!

Name: Nuclear Blue #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', 'Lime Mix']
Making: Put a little ice in a highball glass, add alcohol and fill the rest with lime mix.

Name: Nuclear Holocaust
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '7-Up', '2 oz. Melon Liqueur']
Making: Mix the vodka, gin, rum, triple sec, tequila, 151 and sour mix in a glass. Shake well then fill with 7-up. Float the 2 oz of Melon on top so that it floats down through the drink making it the whole glass neon green.

Name: Nuclear Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Mix liquor in a collins glass with ice and fill with Sour Mix.

Name: Nuclear Kool Aid
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Sprite', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Nuclear Slush
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '3/4 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Fill a blender about 3/4 with ice and add liqueurs. Mix and add Sweet and Sour Mix until the mixture funnels in the blender. The final result should be thick. Add more ice if necessary. Pour into a pint glass.

Name: Nuclear Waste #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur (Dekiepper)', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Put all ingredients into a shaker and mix really well. Pour into a shot glass or on the rocks in a highball glass.

Name: Nuclear Zima
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Zima', '1 1/2 oz. Grenadine (Or to taste)', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka (Or to taste)']
Making: Mix in a large glass, and look out! It doesn't taste very strong, but can catch up on you very quickly!

Name: Nude Ell Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1/2 oz. Cognac', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1/2 oz. Chartreuse']
Making: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Nueva Cuba
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Coca Cola', '6 oz. Tecate Light']
Making: Liberate yourself from the traditional rum-and-coke with this frosty concoction. Pour Coca-Cola into the bottom of a cold glass, followed by the Tecate Light. Squeeze a lime slice into the mix and drink up!

Name: Numi Grey Russian
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Numi Aged Earl Grey Tea', '1 1/2 oz. Van Gogh Oranje Vodka']
Making:
Steep tea at 4X normal strength for 2 minutes, then remove tea bag and chill liquid for later use. Combine and stir ingredients. Serve on the rocks. Garnish with Lemon Wedge.
Created by James Labe

Name: Nummer 10
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Raspberry Vodka (Can be made with Absolut Vodka and Raspberry flavouring)', '1 splash(es) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Schweppes Russian Water']
Making: Fill a glass up to 1/3 with raspberry vodka. Scatter a few drops of Kahlua into the raspberry vodka and mix it. Be careful, it’s important not to get too much Kalhua. Fill up the glass with Schweppes Russchian and the Number 10 is complete.

Name: Nush Baby
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Johnnie Walker Black Label Scotch', '4 oz. Heineken Lager Beer', '2 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix together in an 8 oz. glass and enjoy.

Name: Nut Case
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice (Sweetened)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Nutcracker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Nutcracker Bellini with homemade Tea - Infused Vodka
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Russian Standard Vodka (Tea infused**)', '1/4 oz. Limoncello', 'Sparkling Wine']
Making:
In a shaker, combine the Russian Standard, Tea Infused Vodka and Limoncello. Shake well and pour with into a champagne flute, and fill up with sparkling wine of your choice. Garnish with candied cherries on a skewer or drink stirrer.
**To make tea-infused vodka:
1 tbsp. loose Silver Needle Chinese Tea
1 750-ml. bottle of Russian Standard Vodka
Add tea to vodka and shake to combine. Set aside for 3 hours to infuse. Strain out tea and store vodka in a cool, dark place until ready to use.

Name: Nutella
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Frangelico', 'Chocolate Milk']
Making: Pour Frangelico into a tall glass and fill to top with chocolate milk. Enjoy.

Name: Nuts & Berries
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Hazelnut Liqueur', 'Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Note: can also be made by the pitcher and served as shooters!

Name: Nuts and Berries #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Half and Half Cream']
Making: Pour Frangelico and Chambord Raspberry Liqueur over ice into a 6 oz. glass and fill with cream.

Name: Nuts and Berries #2
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Frangelico', '6 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '12 oz. Half and Half Cream', 'Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Fill a blender with ice and add Frangelico and Chambord Raspberry Liqueur with cream. Blend until mixed, not creamed and add 2-4 scoops of ice cream blend again until smooth and creamy.

Name: Nuts And Berries #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Frangelico', '8 oz. Milk']
Making: Build the drink and then shake. Mix the indredients to make it frothy.

Name: Nuts and Berries #3 (a little stronger)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1 1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '5 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Nutty Chaser
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 oz. Hazelnut Liqueur', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Mix over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Nutty Colada #1
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Amaretto', '3 tbsp. Coconut Milk', '3 tbsp. Pineapple (Crushed)']
Making: Blend with 2 cups of ice at high speed for a short time and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with a straw.

Name: Nutty Hawaiian
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a large glass with ice. Mix coconut rum, Southern Comfort and Amaretto. Fill with pineapple juice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with a cherry.

Name: Nutty Jager
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jagermeister', '1 part(s) Frangelico', '1 part(s) Brown Creme de Cacao', 'Milk']
Making: Combine Jagermeister and frangelico and dark creme de cacao in an ice filled cocktail glass. Fill with milk

Name: Nutty Poteeny
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Knockeen Hills Irish Poteen - Gold Strength', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend with a 1/2 scoop of crushed ice. Perve in a tall wine glass.

Name: Nutty Russian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur']
Making: Serve well mixed over ice. You can add 1 part milk if desired.

Name: NYC Sex On The Beach
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix in a tall glass over ice with equal parts of Orange and Cranberry Juice.

Name: Nyquil
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1 1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Stir in a lowball glass.

Name: O Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi O', 'Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Fill a rocks glass half full of Red Bull. Pour the Bacardi O into a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the rocks glass and drink both.

Name: O-Face
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi O', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Build with ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: O-Squared
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Bacardi O']
Making: Pour orange juice and Bacardi O into a cup of your desire. Enjoy!

Name: Oakland Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Oaxaca Jim
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, orange juice, grapefruit juice, and Bitters. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with the cubes. Garnish with a lemon twist and a cherry.

Name: Obituary Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Plymouth Gin', '1/4 part(s) Dry Vermouth', '1/4 part(s) Pernod Absinthe']
Making:
Combine in iced tumbler. Stir well; strain into chilled cocktail glass; garnish.
Grown-up Halloween Parties can full of campy and ghoulish surprises...whether it’s fangs in the punch or blood red cocktails, the opportunity to get creative for an evening of imbibing is endless! Pernod Absinthe, however, requires no added gimmicks to make cocktails that are perfect for Halloween!
Pernod is the ORGINAL Absinthe and it was the favorite drink of some seriously deviant art and literary greats like Edward Allen Poe, Van Gogh and Oscar Wilde. Now available in the US, Pernod Absinthe is an authentic way to add an aura of 18th century-style drama and mystery to a modern Halloween celebration... Its eerie green color and legendary status make Pernod Absinthe the smart host’s spirit of choice.

Name: Ocean Dream
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Everclear', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid (Ice Blue)', '20 oz. Gatorade (Blue)', 'Sugar']
Making: Mix together in a big cup preferrably a thermos type. This is a large drink meant to be drank slowly. Add sugar to taste if it is too tart.

Name: October 27th
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Dark Rum', "1/2 oz. Grenadine (Preferably Rose's)", 'Coca Cola']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: October Screw Driver - TY KU
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Sake', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over ice. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Octopus's Garden
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a smoked baby octopus and a black olive.

Name: Odin's Juice
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour the ingredients in a cocktail glass over ice and top up with the orange and pineapple juice.

Name: Officer Down
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Amaretto', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", 'dash(es) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake with ice (except 151) and strain into a lowball glass. Float the rum on top and make sure the victim is seated.

Name: Ohrangarita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '3 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix with cracked ice in a shaker and strain into a margarita glass.

Name: Ohranj Blossom
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain in a cocktail glass.

Name: Ohranj Juice
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Serve over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Ohranj Julius
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix and pour over crushed ice. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Ohranj Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Stir with ice in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Oingo Boingo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Mix and serve cold with optional twist of lemon.

Name: OJ Trial
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix it all together on the rocks. You'll definitely think OJ Simpson is guilty after this drink!

Name: Ojen Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ojen', 'dash(es) Peychaud Bitters', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1/2 oz. Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Oklahoma Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Melon Deoria', '1 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix spirits and cranberry juice in a cocktail glass. Add a splash or two of 7-Up, stir and garnish with a wheel of lime and a cherry.

Name: Ol' Dirty Bastard
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', "2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Old 7's
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '7-Up']
Making: Mix over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Old Bay
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Tomato Juice', '1/4 tsp. Old Bay Seasoning', '1/8 tsp. Lemon Juice', '3 Olive(s)']
Making: Frost an old-fashioned glass with Old Bay Seasoning. Combine vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice and remaining Old Bay Seasoning. Shake with ice and strain into glass over ice cubes. Garnish with olives on a toothpick and lemon and lime wedges.

Name: Old Etonian
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Lillet', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters', 'dash(es) Creme de Noyeaux']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel.

Name: Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rye Whiskey (Or Bourbon)', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '2 tsp. Sugar Syrup']
Making: Stir the sugar syrup and the bitters in a tumbler until well blended. Add a little Rye and stir well. Add two ice cubes and stir again. Add the rest of the Rye and keep stirring. Garnish with a zest of lemon, a cherry and a spoon, so you can keep stirring.

Name: Old Fashioned (New Englander)
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Whiskey', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1 Sugar Cube', '1 slice(s) Orange', '1 Maraschino Cherry Juice', 'Water (warm)']
Making: In an old fashioned glass disolve the sugar with warm water. Add the slice of orange, the cherry and bitters to taste. Muddle throughly, then stir in some ice and the whiskey (you may want to add more or less whiskey and/or bitters depending on you taste).

Name: Old Fashioned Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '3 dash(es) Bitters', '1 Sugar Cube', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Stir over ice in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Old Fashioned Sweet With Southern Comfort
Ingredients: ['Sugar', '5 drop(s) Bitters', '1 slice(s) Orange', '1 Cherry', 'Sprite', '2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Cherry Juice']
Making: Cover the bottom of a tumbler with sugar. Add 5 drops of bitters, one cherry and an orange slice. Pour just enough Sprite in the bottom to cover the fruit. Mash everything together with the bottom of a shot glass or the back of a spoon. Add ice to the top of the glass. Pour Southern comfort over the ice. Fill almost to the top with Sprite and top with cherry juice. Normally decorated with two speared cherries or a speared cherry and orange. Enjoy!

Name: Old Fashioned Vermont Style
Ingredients: ['1 Cherry', '1 slice(s) Lemon', '1 slice(s) Orange', '1 tsp. Maple Syrup', '2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey']
Making: Marinate the cherry, lemon and orange slices in bourbon overnight. Blend bourbon and maple syrup. Squeeze orange and lemon slices .Add cherry. Stir and serve on the rocks in an old fashioned glass.

Name: Old Groaner
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Build in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Old Man Winter
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Square One Organic Vodka', '1/2 oz. Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '2/3 oz. Sweet Vermouth (Via)', '1/3 oz. Black Cavendish Syrup', '2 dash(es) The Bitter Truth Aromatic Bitters', '1/3 oz. Ardbeg 10 Year Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky', 'Cranberries', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Meyer)', '1 Egg White']
Making: In a mixing glass muddle cranberries, add all other ingredients, add ice and shake HARD. Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Old Pal
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Campari']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Old Pal Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/4 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Old Yeller
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Prune Juice', '2 Olive(s)']
Making: Throw all in a blender and mix well. Serve at room temperature and garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 Sugar Cube', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1 tsp. Water']
Making: Combine the sugar cube, Bitters, and 1 Tsp. water in an old-fashioned glass. Muddle well, add blended Scotch whisky, and stir. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel, slices of orange and a cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

Name: Oliver's Green Diamond
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Midori', '5 4/5 oz. Surge Energy Drink', 'Vodka (If you prefer it sweeter)']
Making: Serve in whatever you got - serve in any glass with a short stem to make it appear exotic; It's a great green. Add a cherry.

Name: Olympia
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Olympic
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Curacao', '3/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Olympic Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Once-Upon-A-Time
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lillet', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: One Exciting Night
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/3 oz. French Vermouth', '1/3 oz. Italian Vermouth', '1/3 oz. Plymouth Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sugar rimmed wine glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: One Eyed Joe
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '4 oz. Mountain Dew', '1 tbsp. A-1 Steak Sauce', '1 tsp. Garlic Salt (or a garlic pill)']
Making: Mix vodka, triple sec and mountain dew in a shaker. Pour into a glass and add steak sauce on top and drop a garlic pill in the center(let it dissolve).

Name: One Jacked Smurf
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '2 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '7-Up']
Making: Fill a 12 oz. glass 3/4 with ice (crushed or cubed). Add Yukon Jack and Blue Hawaiian Schnapps. Then fill the rest of the way with 7-Up. Stir with a swizel stick and enjoy.

Name: Oondoughtray Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Rum', '3 tsp. Brown Sugar', 'Mint', 'Club Soda']
Making: Combine lime juice, rum and brown sugar. Mix until sugar disolves. Pour mixture over ice in a large glass. Add 1/2 teaspoon fresh minced mint and top with club soda. Shake once. Serve. The substitution of dark brown sugar for plain old white sugar gives this variation an unbelievable carribean flair.

Name: Opal Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Opal Trace
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '3 piece(s) Basil', '1 pinch(es) Black Pepper', '1/3 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Vanilla Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Syrup']
Making: Muddle basil and pepper and shake all with ice. Strain into a rocks glass and garnish with a strawberry and a basil leaf.

Name: Opening Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Opening Day Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Boru Citrus Vodka', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Lemonade']
Making: Mix ingredients in an ice-filled tall glass and fill with lemonade.

Name: Opening Night
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Martini and Rossi Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Opera Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Oral Intruder
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Midori', "2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '2 oz. Ginger Ale', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice (Or lemon)']
Making: Fill glass with ice, shake ingredients together and spritz.

Name: Oral Sex On The Beach
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour the alcohol in a glass filled with ice and add the pinapple juice. Shake well and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Orang -A- Tang
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '6 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Blend on low speed -except rum- then strain into a large snifter half-filled with ice. Float rum on top and garnish with tropical fruits.

Name: Orange Banana
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass with ice.

Name: Orange Beam
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', 'Orange Soda']
Making: Pour the Jim Beam Bourbon in a rocks glass and fill with orange soda. Watch the fizzing for a few seconds and then guzzle!

Name: Orange Bloom
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Gin', '2 tsp. Cointreau', '2 tsp. Italian Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Orange Blossom #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/4 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Orange Blossom #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 tsp. Curacao', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '3 drop(s) Orange Flower Water', '1 tsp. Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Orange Blossom #3
Ingredients: ['1 dash(es) Elderflower Syrup', '1 oz. Plymouth Gin', '2 1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Fill glass with ice, pour in the Plymouth Gin, add the elderflower cordial and top with orange juice. Stir and garnish with an orange wheel.

Name: Orange Blossom Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 1/2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '3 oz. Sherbet (Orange)', '1 1/2 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream', '2 1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Blend with 6 ice cubes until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Orange Buck
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake gin, orange juice, and lime juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with Ginger Ale, stir, and serve.

Name: Orange Buffalo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Orange Cream Whip
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 cup(s) Orange Juice', 'Vodka (To taste)']
Making: Blend until somewhat runny but still thick and pour in a cocktail glass. Top with whipped cream.

Name: Orange Creamsicle
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Advocaat', '7-Up (To taste)']
Making: Pour Advocaat over ice in a lowball glass, add 7-Up or Sprite to taste, and stir. Tastes just like an orange creamsicle.

Name: Orange Creamsicle #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Mix in tall glass with ice and serve. A nice sweet cocktail.

Name: Orange Crush #1
Ingredients: ['4 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Orange Crush #4
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Amaretto', '4 scoop(s) Sherbet (Orange)']
Making: Mix the triple sec and the amaretto first (only a couple ounces of each, depending on the strength you want). Then add a few scoops of orange sherbet, stirring only a bit. Yum, yum

Name: Orange Dream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Big Red', '2 oz. Sunny Delight Orange Juice', '2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Stir with a straw and enjoy!

Name: Orange Ed
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Blend and pour over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Orange Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 tsp. Simple Syrup', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', 'Soda Water']
Making: Shake all except soda and orange juice with ice and strain into a sour glass. Fill with soda and top with orange juice. Garnish with the slice of an orange.

Name: Orange Foam
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', 'Soda Water']
Making: Add 3 ice cubes to a tumbler. Add ingredients and fill with soda water. Liam & Stefan Cameron Beeraz Bar & Grill Melbourne, Victoria

Name: Orange Jeff
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1 oz. Bacardi Dark Rum', '8 oz. Orange Juice', '1 Banana']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a blender and add the banana. Blend until smooth, pour and enjoy! Best sipped in a tropical paradise like Cayman or Key West (where this recipe was born).

Name: Orange Julious
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Fill a cocktail glass with ice and pour in vodka. Fill with orange juice and garnish with an orange slice. Taste just like it!!

Name: Orange Julius #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', 'Soda']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a rocks glass.

Name: Orange Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Orange Liqueur', 'dash(es) Lime Juice', '1 scoop(s) Sherbet (Orange)']
Making: Blend until smooth with 1/2 cup of ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a wedge of lime.

Name: Orange Moon
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 Soda (Preferably an orange freezy pop)', '3/4 cup(s) Sprite']
Making: Blend with 1/4 cup of ice and serve in a highball glass.

Name: Orange Oasis
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '4 oz. Orange Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake brandy, gin, and orange juice with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with Ginger Ale, stir, and serve.

Name: Orange Smartie
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Vodka', '2/3 oz. Kahlua', '2/3 oz. Triple Sec', 'Orange Juice (To taste)']
Making: Mix and shake, then serve in a highball glass.

Name: Orange Smasha
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 oz. Orange Curacao', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 scoop(s) Sherbet (Orange)']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and serve in a highball glass with a straw.

Name: Orange Splash
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '6 oz. Ginger Ale', '2 oz. Orange Juice (Or punch)']
Making: Layer in a tall glass in the given order. Drop in a maraschino cherry and add ice cubes.

Name: Orange Strega
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Strega', '6 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass.

Name: Orange Sunshine Napoleon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Mandarine Napoleon', '3 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Add Mandarine Napoleon and 7-up over crushed ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Orange Tree
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Creme de Noyeaux', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '3/4 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a thin slice of orange.

Name: Orange Whip
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '4 oz. Orange Juice (Not with too much pulp)']
Making: Shake ingredients and pour over ice.

Name: Oranges 'n Cream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Light Cream', '1 drop(s) Vanilla Extract']
Making: Pour in a cocktail glass over ice. Add a small amount of cream. Stir and enjoy.

Name: Orangina
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '8 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Fill a 16 oz. cup with ice and stir in ingredients.

Name: Orchid Cocktail
Ingredients: ['dash(es) Creme Yvette', '1 Egg White', '2 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Oregon Rain
Ingredients: ['1 oz. YEYO Silver Tequila', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into your favorite glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Oregon Special
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Put several ice cubes into a highball glass. Add white rum and fill glass almost to top with sweet and sour. Add orange juice and grenadine. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Oregon Spirit
Ingredients: ['1 oz. YEYO Silver Tequila', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into your favorite glass.

Name: Oreo Speedwagon
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '3 Oreo Chocolate Cookies']
Making: Blend in a blender and serve over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Organic Pomegranate Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 4 Copas Reposado', '2 oz. Pomegranate Juice Organic', '1 1/2 oz. 4 Copas Organic Agave Nectar', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake and pour the mixture into a salt-rimmed cocktail glass.

Name: Orgasm
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 oz. Mango Nectar', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Coconut Rum', '2 oz. Light Rum', '2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shaker twice with ice and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry

Name: Orgasm #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Orgasm #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Irish Cream', '3/4 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Orgasm #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Orgasm #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Orgasm #5
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Orgasm #6
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Orgasm #7
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Orgasm #8
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Midori', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Orange Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Build in order in highball glass half-filled with ice.

Name: Orgasm Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Mix ingrediants and pour into a cocktail glass over ice. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Orgonomically Correct Kiwi
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. 4 Copas Blanco', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. 4 Copas Organic Agave Nectar', '1 Kiwi Organic']
Making: Muddle lemon, simple syrup, and fruit Add Tequila, ice and strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a kiwi wheel.

Name: Oriental Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Original Green Monster
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Midori', 'Sour Mix', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour Malibu and Midori in a glass filled with ice. Fill with equal parts sour mix and pineapple juice.

Name: Original Half and Half
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Guinness', '1/2 pint(s) Lager Harp']
Making: From a chilled bottle, fill a clean pint glass just over halfway with Harp Lager. Open a chilled can of Guinness Draught. The head will rise. Prepare to pour. Place your Half & Half spoon (regular spoon will also work) face down on the rim of the glass and slowly pour your newly opened Guinness Draught over it. When the Guinness has risen to just proud of the rim, you're ready to enjoy the distinct pleasures of The Original Half & Half.

Name: Original Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['1 Sugar Cube', '1 tsp. Water (Bottled)', 'dash(es) Bitters', '2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey']
Making: Mix sugar, bitters and water until dissolved. Pour over ice in a lowball glass and stir in the bourbon. Garnish with a lemon twist. For an Original Old Fashioned, do not use soda to dissolve the sugar, but follow accurately the above recipe.

Name: Original Sin
Ingredients: ['12 oz. DNA Alcoholic Spring Water', '1/2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Pour DNA and Cinnamon Schnapps over ice in a cocktail glass. Stir and serve.

Name: Original Sin #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '3/4 oz. 99 Apples Schnapps', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Original Singapore Sling #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Benedictine', '1 oz. Cherry Brandy', '4 oz. Club Soda']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Benedictine, and a cherry brandy. Stir well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Top with the Club Soda and stir well.

Name: Original Singapore Sling #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 tsp. Benedictine', '1/4 tsp. Brandy']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, a cherry brandy, and lime juice. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Drop the Benedictine and brandy into the centre of the drink.

Name: Orthoniatis
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kiwi Liqueur', '1 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1/2 cup(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake well with 5 ice cubes and pour into a collins glass.

Name: Osaka Dry
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sake']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a pickled plum.

Name: Oscar
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', 'dash(es) Grenadine', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Hi-C (Orange)']
Making: Fill a snifter with ice and add the ingredients. Garnish with an orange wedge, a cherry with a stem and a plastic sword. Directions for drinking: 1) Eat orange wedge first and stick rind in the sword to keep track of how many you have drank. 2) Premier Oscar drinker can tie a knot with the stem of cherry with the tongue. 3) The stem sits on the upper left hand corner of a napkin under the glass. 4) The glass NEVER leaves the napkin. Drink with a straw or lift holding cocktail napkin underneath. 5) When done drinking the ice cubes must be placed in the mouth to get the last bit of goodness of the drink. 3 Oscar's makes you an unofficial member of the unofficial Oscar club. (There was about 20 of us who did this every Tuesday -Oscar Nite- at Michigan State.

Name: Otter Pop
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1 can(s) Mountain Dew']
Making: Drink or pour out about half of the Dew. Pour the Skyy into the can (very important) and swish to mix. Great to chug.

Name: Out Of Booze
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '6 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix all together in a highball glass with ice.

Name: Out Of The Blue
Ingredients: ["4 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '8 oz. Kool-Aid (Blue)']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth.

Name: Outhouse Slammer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '3 oz. Coca Cola', '3 oz. Beer']
Making: Mix the beer with the Coke in a 16 oz. glass. Fill a shot glass with everclear and light it on fire. Drop the burning shot into the beer/Coke mixture and drink the whole drink. It is more of a slammer than a shooter. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Outrigger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Brandy', '1 oz. Lime Vodka', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Over The Rainbow
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 oz. Orange Curacao', '2 scoop(s) Sherbet (Rainbow)', '4 slice(s) Peach (Peeled)', '2 Strawberries']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a strawberry and a slice of peach.

Name: Overcast Friday
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka (Cooled in a freezer)', '2 tbsp. Corn Syrup', '1 Cherry (Pit free)']
Making: Mix lemon and lime juice with vodka. Add corn syrup and shake well (corn syrup takes a few to dissolve in a cold drink). Pour into a highball glass over several ice cubes. Throw in a cherry for colour. SIT BACK AND ENJOY!

Name: Owen Moore
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Heavy Cream', '1 tsp. Blue Curacao']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, creme de cacao, and heavy cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the Curacao into the centre of the drink.

Name: P.B.L.T (Plymouth, Bacon, Lettuce, Tomato)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1 chunk(s) Lettuce Water', '1 chunk(s) Tomato Water']
Making:
First spray vinegar on a glass and dip in dehydrated bacon dust, then place a lettuce water cube, tomato cube, then pour the Plymouth Gin over top.
The second most popular sandwich in the United States, the B.L.T, is now a cocktail! The B.L.T has been a nationwide favorite for decades and now a top mixologist has found inspiration from the killer combination of ingredients.
Renowned Washington D.C. mixologist Gina Chersevani, created the P.B.L.T, an innovative drink infused with crisp flavors of lettuce and tomato and complimented with the latest trend in cocktails- bacon. The refreshing taste of each ingredient combined with the smooth and balanced essence of Plymouth Gin, creates a seemingly quirky cocktail that is both surprisingly sophisticated and enjoyable.

Name: P.T.O.
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the rum, vodka, Triple Sec, and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Pacific SKYY Blue
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Triple Sec']
Making:
Olympic inspired hand crafted cocktail
Mix ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously and strain into martini glass.

Name: Pacific Sunshine
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled parfait glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: Padas Battery
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Smirnoff Citrus Twist Vodka', '2 oz. Passoa Passion Fruit', '20 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Mix with ice in a small pitcher and serve in lowball glasses.

Name: Padas Passoa
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Passoa Passion Fruit', '2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '10 oz. Orange Juice', '10 oz. Grape Soda', 'dash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix with ice in a small pitcher and serve in lowball glasses.

Name: Paddy Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Paddy O'Punch
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour measured ingredients over 4-5 cubes of ice in tall glass (approx. 12 oz.) Fill to top with pineapple juice. Thank you Bennigan's!

Name: Pain Killer
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Creme de Coconut', '2 oz. White Rum']
Making: Blend with ice and pour into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle grated nutmeg on top. Add a Maraschino Cherry.

Name: Pain Killer #1
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Pusser's Rum", '3 oz. Coconut Cream', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Fill a 12 oz. glass with ice. Pour Pusser's rum and coconut cream (Coco Lopez is good). Add some pineapple juice and a good splash of orange juice. Shake well. Garnish with a cherry and sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Pain Killer #2
Ingredients: ["4 oz. Pusser's Rum", '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Mix together in a large glass, garnish with a pineapple slice. This drink originates from Virgin Gorda (British Virgin Islands)

Name: Painkiller #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', "2 oz. Pusser's Rum"]
Making: Pour into big glass filled with ice and grate fresh nutmeg on top.

Name: Pair Of Jacks
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Yukon Jack']
Making: Mix with ice in shaker, pour over ice into a cocktail glass.

Name: Pajala Sunrise
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 slice(s) Sausage']
Making: Pour vodka over ice into rocks glass. Garnish with a sausage.

Name: Pall Mall
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Stir in an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes.

Name: Pallini Peach Sangrini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pallini Peachcello', '3 oz. Red Wine', '1 oz. Ginger Ale', '4 wedge(s) Peach']
Making: Fill a tall glass with the ice as well as the peach wedges, add all the ingredients and serve with a stirrer. This drink could also be made by the pitcher: 1 bottle of red wine, 12 oz Pallini Peachello, 8 oz ginger ale.

Name: Palm Beach Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 tsp. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Palm Beacher
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '6 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice in a glass. Stir.

Name: Palm Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Bodacious Berry Hawaiian Punch']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with equal amounts of orange juice and Blue Hawaiian Punch.

Name: Palmer Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Palmetto Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Palo Alto
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka (Or gin)', '5 oz. Soda Water', '2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a 10 oz. glass and garnish with mint/lime. This reminds my fiancé of home, Palo Alto.

Name: Paloma
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila Casa Noble Reposado', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Tonic Water', 'Grapefruit Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass.

Name: PAMA - Coco
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Coconut Milk Sweetened']
Making: Assemble all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and shake well with ice. Strain into a double old fashioned glass over ice. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and pineapple leaf.

Name: PAMA - Jama
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '4 oz. Ginger Ale', '2 Mint Leaves', '1 sprig(s) Mint']
Making: Bruise mint leaves in bottom of highball glass; add ice and build the rest of the ingredients. Stri and garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: PAMA and Champagne
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '2 oz. Champagne']
Making: Pour PAMA into a champagne flute and top with Champagne. Garnish with berries.

Name: Pama Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Sour Apple Pucker', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over ice. Garnish with 3 raspberries.

Name: PAMA Mimosa
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '3 oz. Champagne']
Making: Pour PAMA Pomegranate Liqueur into shaker over ice. Slowly pour in the Champagne while stirring very gently to retain the bubbles and chill the mixture. Strain into a Champagne flute and garnish with orange wheel.

Name: PAMA Pine
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Pineapple Vodka Van Gogh', '4 oz. Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sugar rimmed martini glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: PAMA Pomegranate Poinsettia
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Champagne']
Making: Mix first three liquids in a tumbler with ice. Slowly add champagne stirring gently. Rim a flute glass with orange zest. Strain into the champagne flute.

Name: PAMA Rita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '2 oz. Cointreau', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake and pour over ice into a margarita glass, or blend with ice to serve frozen. Rim glass with red sugar and garnish with lime.

Name: PAMA Soda
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 part(s) Club Soda']
Making: Serve over ice. Garnish with lemon twist.

Name: Pamela
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Simply make a standard vodka and tonic and garnish liberally with sliced cucumbers.

Name: Pamir Peach
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Peach Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto (Preferably Di Saronna Amaretto)', '2 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake or blend over cracked ice and serve in a chilled old-fashioned glass with several ice cubes.

Name: Pan Galactic Gargleblaster #1
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", "1 1/2 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '4 1/2 oz. Gin', '6 oz. Soda Water', '1 1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Johnnie Walker Red Label Scotch', 'dash(es) Cinnamon']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Pan Galactic Gargleblaster #2
Ingredients: ['2 1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'dash(es) Gin', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass and fill with Ginger Ale. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Pan Galactic Gargleblaster #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Panama Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Light Cream', '1 oz. Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Panda Bear
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '8 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an ice-filled rocks glass. Tastes like chocolate milk.

Name: Pandan Infused Mekhong
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', 'Club Soda']
Making: Pour Mekhong into an infusing bottle containing 3 to 4 Pandan leaves and leave for at least one week. Strain and return Mekhong to original bottle. Serve as a shot straight from the cooler or add ice and drink long by adding Club soda.

Name: Pangalatic Gargle Blaster
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Make in a high ball glass or margarita glass. Layer in order. Garnish with 2 cherries, a slice of lemon and a slice of lime on a toothpick. Tthis is a drink I made up to have on my 21st b-day. When I was 16 I read Douglas Adams 'Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy' and there was a drink in the book by this name. I decided that would be my first legal drink but there was no recipe for it so I made it up when I was bartending in Phillips WI. This drink is very fruity but will kick you in the ass.

Name: Panther #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Pour ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over several ice cubes. Stir well and serve.

Name: Panty Dropper #4
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 can(s) Five Alive (Frozen)']
Making: Blend with a cup of crushed ice. Pour into a highball glass and enjoy!

Name: Panty Dropper #5
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Cream', '1 splash(es) Pepsi Cola', '1/2 oz. Galliano']
Making: Combine in a collins glass filled with ice in the order given above.

Name: Panty Dropper #6
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Fruit Punch']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Panty Dropper #7
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 1800 Silver Tequila', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Peach Schnapps']
Making: Build in a Collins glass over ice. Pour in alcohol, fill with equal parts of cranberry juice and pineapple juice. Float the peach schnapps last.

Name: Panty Dropper Party Drink
Ingredients: ['1 small bottle(s) Lemonade Mikes Hard…', '1 1/2 oz. Smirnoff Citrus Twist Vodka', '1 tsp. Country Time Lemonade powder mix']
Making: Pour the mikes hard lemonade into a glass and add the shot and the lemonade powder mix.

Name: Panty Remover #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dry Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice', 'Fresca']
Making: Pour dry gin and vodka in a cocktail glass. Add the Fresca (whatever amount desired) and then a dash of lemon juice.

Name: Panty Remover #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Mountain Dew', 'Pineapple']
Making: Freeze 4 pineapple chunks. Once frozen, place them in a large glass and add the other ingredients.

Name: Panty Ripper
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Coconut Rum', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice and fill with pineapple juice.

Name: Panty Snatcher
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Grape Juice']
Making: Mix together in a cocktail glass over ice and fill with grape juice.

Name: Papa Muminek #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1 oz. Advocaat', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur (Not Kahlua)', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '3 oz. Milk', '1/2 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Shake ingredients with cracked ice and pour into a fancy glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

Name: Papa Muminek #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1/2 oz. Advocaat', '3/8 oz. Creme de Cacao', '3/8 oz. Tia Maria', '3/8 oz. Galliano', '2 oz. Milk', '3/8 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and garnish with a banana slice and a cherry.

Name: Papaya Sling
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tbsp. Papaya Syrup', 'dash(es) Bitters', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water and pineapple stick) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with a pineapple stick and serve.

Name: Paradise #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Paradise #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', 'Kiwi Strawberry Juice']
Making: Pour in a large glass and fill with Kiwi Strawberry juice, then stir well.

Name: Paradise Café
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Spiced Rum', '4 oz. Coffee (Hot)', 'Sugar (To taste)']
Making: Combine in a mug and top wih whipped cream.

Name: Paradise Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 Orange (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Paradise Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Icing Sugar', '2/3 oz. Lime Juice', '1/3 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '1 1/3 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1 tsp. Fernet Branca']
Making: Add the sugar and lime in a tin and stir it together. Pour in all of the other ingredients. Fil the shaker half full with ice cubes and the other half with crushed ice. Hard shake. Double strain. Garnish with a lime peel. Antonio Oliveira is a finalist in the Bacardi Legacy Competition.

Name: Paradise Dell' Isola
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Tropical Fruit Schnapps (Anything fruity BUT Puckers or sour)', '1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', "2 Hi-C (Boppin' Berry)", '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix the schnapps and Hi-C and stir very little. Pour in the rum and mix them all. Splash on the orange juice and serve on the rocks in a highball glass. This works much better if the schnapps and rum are chilled.

Name: Paradise Quencher
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Passion Fruit Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/4 oz. Apricot Liqueur']
Making: Shake well with crushed ice. Pour into large glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and a fruit flag.

Name: Paraflu
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour the vodka and the lemon juice in a cocktail glass filled with ice, then slowly pour the blue Curacao to the bottom of the glass.

Name: ParalytiQ
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1 2/3 oz. Vodka', '1 2/3 oz. Mineral water', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Mix Pernod, vodka and mineral water in a Martini glass. Sink Blue Curacao down the side of the glass so it sits at the bottom.

Name: Paralyzer #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '3/4 oz. Kahlua', 'Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass and fill with cream.

Name: Paralyzer #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Coca Cola', 'Milk']
Making: Combine vodka, Kahlua and Coca Cola in a highball glass. Fill with milk and stir.

Name: Parisian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Creme de Cassis']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Parisian Blonde #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Parisian Blonde #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. White Rum', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Jamaica Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cordial glass.

Name: Parisian Pousse Cafe
