Add all items into a shaker and shake well, strain over ice in a Collins glass. Add the soda, and serve.
November is Peanut Butter Lover's Month
What do President Bill Clinton, Billy Joel, and Bill Cosby have in common? Aside from sharing the same first name, they're all members of the Peanut Butter Lovers' Fan Club! And since it is November, they're celebrating Peanut Butter Lover's Month with peanut butter fans around the world. But instead of your normal Peanut Butter and Jelly/Banana/Fluff sandwich, let's mix these legumes up with our favorite spirits and create some awesome Peanut Butter cocktails! Even the arachibutyrophobics, afraid of getting peanut butter stuck to the roof of their mouths, can enjoy these drinks without fear.

Name: Pear Noel
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Square One Organic Vodka', '4 Pear (very ripe, peeled, cored and diced)', '1/3 cup(s) Brown Sugar', '3 tbsp. Tawny Port', '3 tbsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 cup(s) Honey', '10 Cardamom Pods', '1 cup(s) Whipping Cream']
Making:
Pear Puree
Place diced pears in non-stick saucepan and add brown sugar. Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently until sugar is melted and pears soften. Mash pears with a fork and continue cooking for 2 more minutes over medium heat or until sugar and pear mixture is bubbling and turning a light caramel color. Slowly add tawny port and red vermouth, cook over medium low heat for 3-4 minutes or until mixture has thickened and is slowly bubbling. Turn off heat, transfer to a blender or using a hand mixer and a bowl, beat until a smooth puree. Add 4 oz. Square One Organic Vodka and blend for 10 seconds. Set aside but keep warm.
. Spiced Honey Cream
Pour honey, water and all cardamom pods into a small saucepan. Cook over medium heat until you reach a low boil. With the back of a spoon, press on the cardamom pods to open them in the honey mixture to release more flavor. Turn down heat and maintain a low boil for 3-5 minutes or until syrup has reduced and can be drizzled from a spoon. Turn off heat and cool. When cooled, strain through a mesh strainer to remove pods and seeds. Set aside.
. Whip cream until it reaches the stiff peak stage. Add 2 tbsp. of cardamom honey and sweeten to taste. (Remaining spiced honey is delicious over morning pancakes or over ice cream.)
. Using sturdy martini glasses, spoon in pear puree mixture into each glass. Place large dollop of cardamom honey cream on top and place one ginger snap cookie on its edge in whipped cream. Serve.
Credit: Allison Evanow

Name: Pearl Pom Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pearl Pomegranate Vodka', 'Red Bull Energy Drink or your favourite energy drink']
Making: Pour Pearl Pomegranate Flavored Vodka over ice into a tall glass and fill with your favorite energy drink to fill. Stir well and garnish with a Maraschino cherry.

Name: Pearl Pom Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pearl Pomegranate Vodka', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour Pearl Pomegranate Flavored Vodka over ice into a tall glass and add equal parts cranberry juice and pineapple juice to fill. Stir well and garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Pearl Pom Island Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Pearl Pomegranate Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'splash(es) Pomegranate Juice', 'Cola']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice into a tall glass and add cola to fill. Stir well and garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Pearl Pom Press
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pearl Pomegranate Vodka', '1 part(s) Lemon Lime Soda', '1 part(s) Club Soda']
Making: Pour Pearl Pomegranate Flavored Vodka over ice into a lowball glass and add equal parts lemon-lime soda & club soda to fill. Stir gently and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Pearl Pomade
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pearl Pomegranate Vodka', 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour Pearl Pomegranate Flavored Vodka over ice into a tall glass and fill with lemonade to fill. Stir gently and garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Pearl Sea Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pearl Black Vodka', '1 part(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour Pearl Original Vodka over ice into a tall glass and add equal parts grapefruit juice and cranberry juice. Stir well and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Pearl Tropical Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pearl Black Vodka', '1 oz. Arrow Honeydew Melon Liqueur', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour Pearl Original Vodka and Arrow Melon Liqueur over ice into a tall glass and add orange juice to fill. Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Peckerhead
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Lime Vodka', '1 oz. Cherry Vodka', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Grape Pucker', '1 oz. Cherry Pucker', '1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Melon Schnapps', '1 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Fill a mixing glass with ice and add all the shots. Top with Mountain Dew until almost full. Put a shot pourer on top and serve. Your choice whether or not to stir it first. Enjoy. Can be poured into a separate glass or served as shots for many.

Name: Pediatrician
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Vodka McCormick's", '12 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Mix over ice.

Name: Pee On The Beach
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Tropico Liqueur', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build drink in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with a slice of pineapple.

Name: Pee Wee Herman
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", 'Squirt']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice and add Jack Daniel's. Fill with Squirt. It's called a Pee-Wee Herman because it is _Jack and Squirt_!

Name: Pee-One-Two
Ingredients: ['2 pint(s) Everclear', '1/2 can(s) Budweiser Beer', '1 pint(s) Milk']
Making: Mix in tall glass and light on fire. Watch out...ugly turns to sexy...ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Peep Show
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1/3 oz. Brandy', '1/3 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Peggy Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Anis', '1/4 tsp. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Pelican Punch
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Raspberry Rum", '1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Build into an ice-filled Hurricane glass. Garnish with and orange slice and a lemon wheel.

Name: Pelvic Crusher
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', 'Zima']
Making: Buile over ice into a highball glass.

Name: Pendennis
Ingredients: ['1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 Sugar Cube']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in a few drops of water. Almost fill the glass with crushed ice. Add the Bourbon whiskey. Stir well and garnish with the lemon slice.

Name: Pendennis Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '3 dash(es) The Bitter Truth Creole Bitters', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Pendennis Toddy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 tsp. Water']
Making: Nearly dissolve the sugar with the water in a sour glass. Fill with ice, add Bourbon and stir. Garnish with 2 slices of lemon.

Name: Pendleton Penguin
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Dr. Mcgillicuddy's Cherry Schnapps", '1/4 oz. Pendleton Whisky']
Making: Shake over ice and pour into a (chilled) shooter glass. Created by Steve Weatherbee and Friends

Name: Penetrator IV
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Tia Maria', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/6 oz. Milk']
Making: Pour all the ingredients together over 2 ice cubes and add the milk (for calcium). Stir, then drink. I actually found this at Mt Gambier East Football Club in South Australia.

Name: Penis Colarous
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Leroux Pina Colada Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Banana Liqueur (Preferably Leroux Banana Liqueur)', '1/2 oz. Cocoribe', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Pep Up
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '7-Up']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with 7-Up.

Name: Pepabacardi
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Bacardi Select Rum', '1/3 oz. Pepsi Cola']
Making: Simple but very good! Pour it over ice. Enjoy!

Name: Pepino
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. 901 Silver Tequila', '1 slice(s) Cucumber 1/4 inch thick', '1/4 oz. Partida Agave Nectar', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 Basil Leaves', "1/2 oz. Combier Liqueur d'Orange"]
Making: Muddle the cucumber then add the rest of the ingredients, ice, shake and pour into a tall glass. Garnish with a slice of cucumber and a sprig of basil.

Name: Pepper Delicious
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Aviation Gin', '10 Mint Leaves', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Fee Brothers Simple Bar Syrup', '2 slice(s) Red Pepper']
Making:
In a pint shaker glass, add red bell pepper slices and mint leaves and hand press with a muddler. Fill glass with ice and shake vigorously for 6 seconds. Double fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
This drink is a revelation not only because it's good, but it's one of those recipes that looks like it shouldn't be. On paper, this recipe doesn't seem to add up to a pleasant-tasting drink, but it will surprise you. It's tart and refreshing, and the flavors marry well. Give it a shot!
Bottom up!

Name: Pepper Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Pepper Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a stemmed glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Pepperclear
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Dr Pepper', '1 oz. Everclear']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Peppermint Beach
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Mix with ice. Serve cold.

Name: Peppermint Cream
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Milk']
Making: Shake with ice (except milk) and pour into a cockatil glass. Top with milk and garnish with a piece of kiwi fruit and a straw.

Name: Peppermint Dream
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Build drink in a highball glass over ice. Fill with 7-Up and serve.

Name: Peppermint Hot Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', 'Hot Chocolate']
Making: Pour in an Irish coffee mug and fill with hot chocolate. Garnish with whipped cream and a candy cane.

Name: Peppermint Iceberg
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Build in an old-fashioned glass and stir. Garnish with a peppermint candy swizzle stick.

Name: Peppermint Park
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice (Sweetend)', 'Champagne']
Making: Shake gin and juice with ice and strain into a large champagne flute. Top with champagne and serve with a straw.

Name: Peppermint Pattie #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '1 1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Peppermint Patty #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps (100 proof)', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Mix and serve.

Name: Peppermint Patty #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Stir with ice until chilled and strain into a rocks glass.

Name: Peppermint Penquin
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Mint Liqueur', '3 Oreo Chocolate Cookies', '3 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice until all the ice is crushed and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with whipped cream, a cookie and a cherry.

Name: Peppermint Pleasure
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix in a lowball glass.

Name: Peppermint Stick
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

Name: Peppermint Twist
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '3 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a mint sprig and a peppermint candy stick.

Name: Peppertini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Pepper Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake over ice and pour into a rocks glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Peppy Parrot
Ingredients: ['12 1/2 oz. Dr Pepper', '5 oz. Root Beer', "4 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum"]
Making: Mix in a very large glass over ice and serve.

Name: Peregrine's Peril
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 tsp. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Perfect Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Perfect Jim Joy
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1 splash(es) Dry Vermouth', '1 splash(es) Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Stir over ice and pour into a lowball glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

Name: Perfect Lady
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Peach Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Perfect Manhattan
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Perfect Rob Roy
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 tsp. Dry Vermouth']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, sweet vermouth, and dry vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Perfect Screw
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Harvest Pear Schnapps', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1/4 oz. Vodka']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Perfect Storm
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '3 oz. Ginger Beer', '3 drop(s) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Combine Grand Marnier, lime juice and bitters in a mixing glass. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain over fresh ice into a highball glass, top with Ginger beer and swirl. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Perky Goth
Ingredients: ['2 oz. London Dry Gin', '1/4 oz. Torani Blood Orange Syrup', '1/2 oz. Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1/4 tsp. Absinthe', '1 dash(es) Fee Brothers Whiskey Barrel-Aged Aromatic Bitters']
Making: Combine everything in a shaker and add ice. Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

Name: Pernod Absinthe Maiden’s Blush
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1 1/2 part(s) Plymouth Gin', '1/2 part(s) Sugar Syrup', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 part(s) Water', '4 Raspberries']
Making: Shake and double strain all ingredients into a small rock glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Perroquet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pastis', '1 splash(es) Sirop de Menthe', 'Water']
Making: Pour the syrup in a parfait glass, add the Pastis and fill with ice cold water. Note: This is a popular drink in France.

Name: Peruvian Eggnog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pisco Porton', '1/2 oz. Voyant Chai Cream Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Heavy Cream', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 Egg', '1 stick(s) Cinnamon']
Making:
Add the spirits, cream, egg, and simple syrup to an iced shaker. Shake for 20 seconds. Strain into a martini glass and top with fresh cinnamon.
You might not want to pass on the egg-nog this year, because it’s spiked with Pisco Porton - the premium Peruvian Pisco that is taking the country by storm!
Created by Nate DeWitt of Mise en Place in Tampa, FL

Name: Peruvian Mule
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Pisco Porton', '1/4 oz. Bitters (Apple Pear)', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '3 drop(s) Bitters']
Making: Shake, strain in champagne flute or tall glass. Top with Prosecco or Ginger Beer. Garnish with an apple wedge.

Name: Perverted Leprechaun
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', 'Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Combine ingredients in mixer. Fill with Sweet and Sour mix. Shake and pour over rocks.

Name: Pesticidal Cherries
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '8 oz. Cherry Cola', '8 oz. Tonic Water', '1 tbsp. Grenadine', '5 Maraschino Cherries']
Making: Add the grenadine to the tonic and mix well. Add cola and one shot of vodka at same time.. put the 5 cherries in the other shot of vodka and soak for at least 10 minutes (cherries can be soaked in advance and kept in the refrigerator). Remove cherries and add the other shot of vodka. Garnish with some more cherries.

Name: Peter Pan Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Peter Pantsless
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Dark Rum Virgin Islands', '6 oz. Iced Tea Nestea']
Making: Mix with ice and chase with popcorn.

Name: Petite Fleur
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Petron Purple Hooter
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Patron Silver Tequila', '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '3/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix together over rocks and enjoy!

Name: Petticoat Lane
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Campari']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, vermouth, and Campari. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: PG's Blue Balls
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Kool-Aid (Ice Blue kool-Aid)', '6 oz. Everclear', '2 oz. Collins Mix', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a pitcher. Serve cold.

Name: Phantasmic Explosion
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '3 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Pour over ice cubes into a collins glass. Simple but exquisite!

Name: PHD (Piled Higher and Deeper)
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Phil Aid
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jagermeister', '2 oz. Sambuca', '4 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '2 oz. Tequila', '1 cup(s) Kool-Aid (grape)', '1 cup(s) 7-Up']
Making: Mix everything together. Then pulse in blender with 1/4 cup of ice. Serve with a lemon twist. Enjoy!

Name: Phillip Island Firewater
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: PIA
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Soda Water', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: On rocks pour vodka, soda water then add equal parts orange juice and pineapple juice. Top with a splash of grenadine. Great for those with a taste for a fruity drink but unable to tolerate to much suger in their drink..thus the soda water.

Name: Piccadilly Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Anis', '1/4 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Pick Me Up
Ingredients: ['1 oz. French Vermouth', '1 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/4 oz. Dry Gin']
Making: Frappe in a cocktail glass.

Name: Pick Me Up Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Pastis']
Making: Mix over ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Pig Sticker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka (Or to taste)', '2 oz. Bacardi Limon (Or to taste)', 'Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Piggelin
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Pisang Ambon', '1 1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', 'Sprite']
Making: Shake Pisang Ambon, Vodka and Orange Juice. Pour into a long drink glass (until half of the glass). Fill with Sprite.

Name: Piggelin #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Midori', 'Tang Drink Mix']
Making: Mix it in a glass 1/4 full of ice and fill with Tang.

Name: Piggelin #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Midori', '7-Up']
Making: Mix it all in a glass 1/4 full of ice.

Name: Pillow-Biter
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a powder-rimmed highball glass. Add twist of citrus fruit for flavour.

Name: Pimm’s Cup
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pimms No. 1', '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '3 slice(s) Cucumber (thinly sliced)', '7 leaf(leaves) Mint', '1 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour Pimm’s, Cointreau and lime juice into a Collins glass. Add cucumbers and mint. Fill with large cold ice and cover glass with a small shaker top. Shake briefly and top off with ginger ale.

Name: Pimp Daddy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a beer mug filled with ice and garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Pimp Juice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Gin']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass. Fill with pineapple juice, lay back and enjoy!

Name: Pimp Juice #3
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Island Blue Schnapps', '1 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 part(s) Creme de Banane', 'Sierra Mist']
Making: Mix in a 16 oz. cup and top off with the Sierra Mist.

Name: Pimpy's Paradise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Pear Nectar', 'Mango Juice']
Making: Pour Absolut Vodka and Peach Schnapps over crushed ice in a highball glass. Fill with equal amounts pear nectar and mango juice. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Pina Colada #1
Ingredients: ['3 oz. White Rum', '3 tbsp. Coconut Milk', '3 tbsp. Pineapple (Crushed)']
Making: Put all ingredients into an electric blender with 2 cups of crushed ice. Blend at a high speed for a short length of time. Strain into a collins glass and serve with a straw.

Name: Pina Colada #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. White Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple (Crushed)', '2 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Shake and pour all into a collins glass filled with shaved ice. Garnish with pineapple pieces and a straw.

Name: Pina Colada #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake well and strain into a cocktail glass. Fill with pineapple juice and garnish with a lemon and a cherry.

Name: Pina Colada Pitcher
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '1/2 can(s) Coconut Cream', '5 oz. Coconut Rum', '3 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Fill a blender 1/3 full with ice. Add remaining ingredients except for ice cream. Blend. Add ice cream to top of blender (about 3 scoops). Enjoy!!

Name: Pina Colada Royal
Ingredients: ['3 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Coconut Rum (Canned concentrate)', '3 oz. Pineapple (Crushed)', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream (Vanilla - Bryers preferred)']
Making: Place contents in a blender with 1 1/2 cups of crushed ice. Blend until frozen, if not frozen, keep adding small amounts of ice until frozen. Serve in a short wide rim glass, garnish with cherry on top.

Name: Pina Con Cuarenta Y Tres
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Licor 43', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour pineapple juice and Liquor 43 over ice into a cocktail glass.

Name: Pincushion
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 1/2 oz. Wildberry Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine all alcohol in a 12 oz. glass Fill up with equal amounts of cranberry juice and pineapple juice. Decorate with a lemon slice.

Name: Pineapple Banana Refresher
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 cup(s) Sherbet (Pineapple)', '1/2 cup(s) Creme de Banane', '1/2 cup(s) Dark Rum']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a banana slice.

Name: Pineapple Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Pineapple Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Pineapple Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Wine', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Put white wine, pineapple juice, powdered sugar, and 2 oz. carbonated water in a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir again. Garnish with a lemon peel and an orange spiral so the end dangles over rim of glass.

Name: Pineapple Dream
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Butter Shots', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Pineapple Drink
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '1 cup(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice.

Name: Pineapple Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. White Rum', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with Club Soda and stir.

Name: Pineapple Grande
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Serve over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Pineapple Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Orange Juice', '5 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', 'Soda Water']
Making: Mix juice and sugar syrup in a large tumbler with several ice cubes. Stir well and top up with cold soda water. Serve with a drinking straw.

Name: Pineapple Pizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with water.

Name: Pineapple Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Tequila', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Pineapple Upside Down Cake
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Stir and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Pineapple Upside Down Cake #3

Name: Pink Fluffy Clouds

Name: Pink Gin
Ingredients: ['2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '2 1/2 oz. Plymouth Gin']
Making:
Pour the Bitters into a wine glass. Swirl the glass to coat the inside with the Bitters, shake out the excess. Pour the gin into the glass. Do not add ice.
Angostura bitters were invented as a remedy for stomach complaints. The medicine reached the British Navy who added it to their Plymouth Gin rations - hence 'Pink Gin'

Presented at the newly debuted and happening W, Miami Beach

Making: This is like a margarita...but with Pisco...Pisco is a traditional drink from Bolivia, Peru and Chile...It's made out off grapes. First get a bottle of Pisco (hard to get) then mix in a cocktail glass with lemon juice, white from one egg, sugar....and of course ice (1/3 of the cocktail glass). This is ideal for aperitifs...just keep in mind one egg per cocktail…

Name: Plymouth Express
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sparkling Water', '1 1/2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '3/4 oz. Lime Cordial']
Making: Place some ice in glass. Pour in the Plymouth Gin and add the Lime Cordial. Top with sparkling water. Stir and garnish with cucumber.

Name: Plymouth Gin Punch
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Plymouth Gin', '1 part(s) Champagne', '1 part(s) Pom Wonderful', '3/4 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 part(s) Cointreau', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1/4 part(s) Allspice Liqueur']
Making:
Despite the state of the economy people are still interested in washing their sorrows away by throwing an amazing party. Start off the New Year right with a cost effective beverage option at your next party with Plymouth Gin Punch. Traditionally a drink of gatherings, punch is known as a party beverage and is thought to have come from the Hindi word for five, suggesting the original number of ingredients.
Plymouth's take on punch incorporates an array of flavors including allspice and pomegranate paired with the taste of Plymouth Gin's botanicals and champagne.

Name: Plymouth Midtown Mule
Ingredients: ['1/6 Cucumber Sliced', '2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Cardamom Syrup', '1/2 oz. Cointreau']
Making:
This is the latest cocktail creation by NYC Insieme Restaurant's bartender Marshall Altier. His most recent creation appropriately named the Midtown Mule is an ideal and refreshing way to end a hot summer day or transition to warm fall evenings. Altier plays on two very popular trends present in the cocktail world - the resurgence of gin-based cocktails as well as the use of vegetables in drinks. The all star combination makes the Midtown Mule an excellent addition to the thriving cocktail culture in New York City.
Place cucumber slices and cardamon syrup in a tin and muddle to paste. Pour in remaining ingredients and shake. Pour over fresh ice in a collins glass and top with ginger beer. Garnish with a wedge of lime and 2 cucumber slices.
To produce Cardamom Syrup:
Steep 2 Tbsp. of black Cardamom pods in hot water. Combine the pods with equal parts sugar and water and steep until consistent. Cool mixture and bottle for later use.
Created by Marshall Altier at Insieme 777 7th Ave
New York, NY 10019
(212) 582-1310

Making: Shake or stir together! Serve over ice.

Name: Poker Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Polar Attraction
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Brandy', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with tonic water. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Polar Bear #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Strawberry Mix', '1 oz. Pina Colada Mix']
Making: Shake all the ingredients (except pina colada mix) with lots of ice. Pour into a highball glass and float the pina colada mix on top.

Name: Polar Bear #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Champagne']
Making: Stir and pour into a champagne flute.

Name: Polar Bears
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Milk (Optional)']
Making: Pour ingredients into a blender and blend till smooth. If too thick add a little milk while blending.

Name: Polarbear
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix together with ice in cocktail glass.

Name: Polish F**k
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Gin', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Scotch', 'Fruit Punch']
Making: Mix liquor in a tall glass. Top up with Fruit Punch.

Name: Polish Ice Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Iced Tea any flavour']
Making: Pour Vodka over ice in a tall glass. Fill with iced tea. .Stir and enjoy!

Name: Polla
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Squirt', 'Salt']
Making: Mix in a tall glass gently. Fill with Squirt and add salt to taste. Doesn't give hard hangovers.

Name: Pollenade
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Lemonade']
Making: Combine the three liquors and shake. Serve over ice in a collins glass, floating lemonade to top. Very similar to _Blue Monday_, which is also known as a _Corcovado_.

Name: Pollyanna
Ingredients: ['3 slice(s) Orange', '3 slice(s) Pineapple', '2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Muddle ingredients, shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Polo Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Polonaise
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 tbsp. Blackberry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Dry Sherry', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Polynesian Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Powdered Sugar']
Making: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime and dip into powdered sugar. Shake vodka, a cherry brandy, and juice of lime with ice, strain into the sugar-rimmed glass, and serve.

Name: Pom Star
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Passion Fruit Juice']
Making: Fill a glass with ice. Add the Plymouth Gin and top with equal parts of pomegranate and passion fruit juice. Squeeze and add the lime. Stir and garnish with a Quarter of Passion Fruit and a Mint Sprig.

Name: Poma-Bahama
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Tommy Bahama White Sand Rum', '1 part(s) Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Pomegranate Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Don Julio Blanco Tequila', '2 1/2 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '2 tsp. Sugar', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Sugar']
Making: Combine Don Julio Blanco, pomegranate juice, fine sugar and lime juice in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well. Rim margarita glass with sugar. Strain ingredients into margarita glass. Garnish with lime.

Name: Pomegretti
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Makers Mark Bourbon', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/4 oz. Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 tbsp. Pomegranate(s) (seeds, seperated)', '1 tbsp. Sugar', '1 tbsp. Cinnamon', 'Nutmeg']
Making: Mix cinnamon and sugar together. Coat the rim of a martini glass with the mixture. Set aside. Muddle 1/2 tablespoon of pomegranate seeds in a shaker glass. Add all liquid ingredients. Shake. Put 1/2 tablespoon of pomegranate seeds into the martini glass. Pour liquid mixture into the glass. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.

Name: Pomerita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hornitos Reposado Tequila', '2 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup or Honey']
Making: Add all ingredients to shaker. Shake well. Strain into rocks glass filled with ice or into chilled cocktail glass straight up. Garnish with lime wheel.

Name: Pompano
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: PomRita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Tequila', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Pomegranate Schnapps', '1/4 part(s) Hiram Walker Triple Sec', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake or blend with ice into salt-rimmed margarita glass.

Name: Pond Scum
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Club Soda', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and float Irish cream.

Name: Pookie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Rum', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Pour ingredients in a mixing glass. Shake and strain into a tall glass. Garnish with an orange and cherry.

Name: Poolside -SLRP
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Stir over rocks in a lowball glass.

Name: Poolside Margarita
Ingredients: ['3/4 cup(s) Tequila', '1/3 cup(s) Lime Juice', '1/4 cup(s) Powdered Sugar', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Blue Curacao', '1 Egg White (Optional)']
Making: Frappe in a cocktail glass.

Name: Poon Juice
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Mad Melon Watermelon Schnapps', '4 oz. Zima (Chilled)']
Making: Pour into in an 8 oz. glass and enjoy.

Name: Poop Deck Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 tbsp. Blackberry Brandy', '1 oz. Port']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Poop In The Pool
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 Candy (Small Tootsie Roll)']
Making: Pour the curacao into a shot glass and drop in the Tootsie Roll. Looks like a turd. Not the most creative, but it starts conversations…

Name: Poor Man's Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka (Cheap vodka)', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour the vodka into a small styrofome cup and fill the rest with coke!

Name: Poor Man's Mimosa
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Beer', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour beer into a highball glass, add orange juice until desired color is reached.

Name: Poor Man's Nectar
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Beer', '1 splash(es) Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Spiced Rum', '2 1/2 oz. Cranberry-Strawberry Juice']
Making: Pour the vodka, beer and juice over ice and shake. Add schnapps and rum.

Name: Poor Mans Bloody
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Beer', '8 oz. Tomato Juice', '1 splash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '1 splash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', 'Salt', 'Pepper']
Making: Build over ice in a lowball glass, add beer last. Garnish with a celery stalk.

Name: Pop Crotch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. DeKuyper Apple Barrel Schnapps', '2 oz. Iced Tea (Preferably Lipton Brisk lemon)', '1 package(s) Candies (Black Cherry Pop Rocks)']
Making: Stir the liqueur and the iced tea in an old-fashioned glass. Add the Pop Rocks and stir again. Increase quantities as need, try chilled or with different flavours of Pop Rocks.

Name: Pop The Cherry
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with orange juice. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Popa Louie
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Smirnoff Raspberry Twist Vodka', '1 2/3 oz. Triple Sec', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix and serve in a tulip glass on the rocks

Name: Popped cherry
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Served over ice in a tall glass with a popped a cherry.

Name: Popper #1
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Poppin' Tha Cherry
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cherry Brandy', 'Pepsi Cola (Wild Cherry flavour - NOT Cherry Coke)']
Making: Mix in a highball glass and drop in a maraschino cherry.

Name: Poppin' the Cherry
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Cherry Cola', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix all the ingredients and add a cherry to the bottom of the glass. Almeria's comment: After you've finished your drink, take the stem of the a cherry in your mouth and pass it to whoever you want to go home with.

Name: Poppy Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Pops Staples
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Soda Water']
Making: Mix rye, amaretto and Kahlua in a highball glass over ice and fill with soda.

Name: Port and Starboard
Ingredients: ['1 tbsp. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe']
Making: Pour carefully into a pousse-cafe glass, so that the creme de menthe floats on the grenadine. Serve without mixing.

Name: Port Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['1 Egg', '2 oz. Port', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass and fill with milk. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Port Flip
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Port', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 Egg']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Port Milk Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Port', '1 cup(s) Milk', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Port O Call
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Spiced Rum", '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Serve over ice.

Name: Port Wine
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ruby Port', '1/2 oz. Brandy']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel.

Name: Port Wine Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Port', '1/2 tsp. Brandy']
Making: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Port Wine Flip
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Port', '2 tsp. Light Cream', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Port Wine Negus
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Port', '1/2 Sugar Cube', 'Water (Hot)']
Making: Stir in a punch cup. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Port Wine Sangaree
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Port', '1 tbsp. Brandy', '1 tsp. Water', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Club Soda']
Making: Dissolve the sugar with the water in a highball glass. Add the port over ice cubes and fill with Club Soda. Stir well then float brandy on top and sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Porton Mai Tai
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pisco Porton', '1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Curacao', '1/2 oz. Orgeat Syrup']
Making: Pour all the ingredients except the dark rum into a shaker with ice cubes. Strain into an old fashioned glass half filled with ice. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and pineapple wedge.

Name: Porton Sangria
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Pisco Porton', '1 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Simple Syrup (Lemon Lime)', '1 Apple (Granny Smith)', '1 Orange', '1 Lime']
Making: Pour into a punch bowl. Add slices of the apple, orange and lime. Garnish with mint sprigs.

Name: Pot O' Gold
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin Floraison", '3/4 oz. Midori', '2 Basil Leaves', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and pour into a tall glass. Garnish with gooseberry coins and a basil leaf.

Name: Pottsville Moment
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", 'Lager (Preferably Yuengling lager)']
Making: Combine over ice in a beer mug.

Name: Pousse Cafe #1
Ingredients: ['1/6 oz. Grenadine (Red)', '1/6 oz. Creme de Cacao (Black)', '1/6 oz. Maraschino Liqueur (White)', '1/6 oz. Orange Curacao (Orange)', '1/6 oz. Creme Yvette (Violet)', '1/6 oz. Brandy (Amber)']
Making: Layer in a cordial glass.

Name: Pousse Cafe #2
Ingredients: ['1/6 oz. Grenadine', '1/6 oz. Yellow Chartreuse', '1/6 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1/6 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/6 oz. Green Chartreuse', '1/6 oz. Brandy']
Making: Layer in a pousse cafe glass.

Name: Pousse Rapier
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Champagne', "1 oz. Creme d'Armagnac"]
Making: In a sugar rimmed champagne glass, pour the creme d'Armagnac, then fill with champagne. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Power of Will
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 Strawberry', 'Butter (Melted)', 'Honey (Or bee pollen)']
Making: Melt a small amount of bee pollen and butter and pour into a cocktail glass. Squeeze the strawberry in the glass and add equal parts of rum and vodka to fill.

Name: Power Screwdriver #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Cola', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Make a plain old screwdriver but add cola.

Name: Power Screwdriver #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Everclear', 'Orange Juice (To taste)']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Power Screwdriver #3
Ingredients: ['1/3 cup(s) Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grain Alcohol (PGA)', '2/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: Powerade Puncher
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Powerade (Fruit Punch)', '2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/4 tsp. Vanilla Extract']
Making: Combine ingredients and blend with ice until desired consistency. Be careful don't water it down too much ) Serve in a tall glass with an umbrella.

Name: Powerdrill
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Fill highball glass with ice. Add vodka. Fill with orange juice and stir. Float the 151 on top and stir it in just before drinking.

Name: PR Mix
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Alize Red Passion', '1 oz. Remy Red']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Prairie Chicken #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 Egg', 'Salt', 'Pepper']
Making: Open egg without breaking the yolk and put into a red wine glass. Pour gin on top of egg, add salt and pepper to taste, and serve.

Name: Prairie Oyster
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce', '1 tbsp. Tomato Juice', '1 Egg Yolk (Raw)', '2 dash(es) Vinegar', 'dash(es) Pepper']
Making: Pour in order in a wine glass taking good care of not breaking the yolk.

Name: Preakness Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Benedictine', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making:
Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.
Anyone who loves watching a good horse race probably enjoys watching the annual Preakness.
The Preakness, which is known as the second leg of the legendary Triple Crown, is a 9 ½ furlong, or 1-3/16 mile, race that has been in existence since 1873. Believe it or not, although the Kentucky Derby is probably more well known among horse racing fans, the Preakness was actually introduced two years prior to the Derby running for the very first time.
While the Kentucky Derby is known for having fun traditions that coincide with the event, such as posh parties and partaking in a mint julep or two, the Preakness also has its own traditions that fans enjoy reveling in. In fact, the race just happens to have a couple of interesting drinks named after it. Because of the black-eyed susan horseshoe that adorns the neck of the winning horse, some refer to the Preakness as “The Run for the Black-Eyed Susans.” So, it is no surprise that one of the traditions that fan enjoy is consuming a Black-Eyed Susan cocktail.
While there are many variations of the drink’s recipe, one thing is for certain--Preakness fans sure to love it!

Name: Presbyterian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', 'Cola', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour blended Scotch whisky into a highball glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with equal parts of cola and Ginger Ale and stir well. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

Name: Presidente Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Rum', '1 1/3 oz. Italian Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Presto Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Port', '1 oz. Blackberry Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Prestone
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice with pulp']
Making: Combine Blue Curacao, Peach Schnapps and Vodka in a lowball glass. Top up with orange juice. (On hot summer days - mix and chill in freezer until slushy.)

Name: Pretty In Pink
Ingredients: ['2 quart(s) Country Time Lemonade (Pink mix)', '1 cup(s) Smirnoff Vodka']
Making: Mix Lemonade 4 scoops to every 2 quarts then pour in vodka. Mix and pour into tall glasses over ice. Garnish with strawberry halves.

Name: Pretty Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice', '1 oz. Maraschino Cherry Juice']
Making: Pour into a 12 oz. glass and fill with orange juice. Mix and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Pride and Passion
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '6 leaf(leaves) Mint (muddled)', '2 oz. Passion Fruit Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '2 dash(es) Fee Brothers Peach Bitters', '1 oz. Heavy Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Scorpion Mezcal Silver']
Making: Adding heavy cream last, shake with ice for 30 seconds and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of Mint

Name: Primo Trace Smash
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '3 wedge(s) Lemon', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', '5 Mint Leaves', '1 dash(es) Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Garnish with a raspberry.

Name: Prince Igor's Nightcap
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Coffee Vodka', '1 oz. Gin (Preferably light gin)', '1 oz. Light Cream', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a shaker or blender and serve in a chilled, stemmed glass. Sprinkle with grated nutmeg.

Name: Prince's Smile
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Brandy', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Princess Alexandra
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake or blend with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top.

Name: Princess Margaret
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Grey Goose Vodka', '1 tsp. Triple Sec', 'Perrier', '3 Mint Leaves']
Making: Bruise the mint together with the vodka and Triple Sec in a shaker with ice. Strain into a Collins glass filled with crushed ice and top off with Perrier. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Princess Morgan
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '2 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Pour the rum, creme de banane and orange juice over ice in a glass. Stir. Add the soda and stir gently.

Name: Princess Pousse Cafe
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 1/2 tsp. Light Cream']
Making: Pour brandy into a pousse cafe glass. Pour cream carefully onto brandy, so that it does not mix.

Name: Princeton
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Port', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

Name: Princeton Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Prohibition Sazerac
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Camus VS Elegance', '1 Sugar Cube', '3 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters', '1/2 oz. Lucid Absinthe Superieure']
Making:
Stirred, and served neat. Place white sugar cube in a chilled mixing glass and add bitters to saturate. Gently muddle. Add Cognac, and stir with ice. Strain into a whiskey (or rocks) glass with an Absinthe rinse. Spray (zest) the glass with a lemon peel or twist.
With the Emmys just around the corner, it’s time to start thinking about how and where you’ll be spending the star-studded evening. Whether you’ll be throwing a Hollywood-worthy bash for your friends or be curled up on the couch, we’ve got the perfect cocktails to compliment your night. Each of the following creations pays homage to some of this year’s newcomers and also the staples; and assures that you’ll have the perfect drink in hand no matter which show gets your vote!
BOARDWALK EMPIRE
Despite Prohibition laws, 1920 Atlantic City is as boozy as it gets, thanks to quintessential everyman Nucky Thompson. As any public figure rocked with a sex and corruption scandal knows, there’s nothing like a stiff drink to take the edge off. Enjoy the aromatic CAMUS Cognac in a snifter neat or in a classic cocktail like the Sazerac!

Name: Prom Night Virgin
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Zima', '3 oz. Mountain Dew', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix well and serve.

Name: Proof Negative
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '3 1/4 oz. Sour Apple Pucker', '1 dash(es) Watermelon Pucker', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Mix and pour into a tall glass on the rocks. Drinking through a straw will enhance the effects.

Name: Proud Mary
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Dill Sauce', '1 1/2 tbsp. Cucumber (chopped)', '3 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '3 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '1 dash(es) Salt', '1 dash(es) Pepper', '3 oz. Tomato Juice', '2 oz. Scorpion Mezcal Silver']
Making: Shake with ice for 20 seconds and pour into highball glass rimmed with sal de gusano from Caballeros or chili salt. Garnish with cucumber spear.

Name: Pseudo-Margarita (strawberry)
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Tequila', '3 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Gin', '1 can(s) Lemonade', '1 bag(s) Strawberries (frozen)']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a blender. Frappe and serve. Garnish with a sprig of mint(makes about 5-8 servings). Careful its got a big kick....Heh

Name: Pucker F**ker #1
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Green Apple Pucker', '6 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix in a highball glass and drink!

Name: Pucker Punch
Ingredients: ['1/8 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/8 oz. Strawberry', '1/8 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '1/8 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '10 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Shake with shaved ice then strain and serve in a 12 oz. glass.

Name: Pucker-7
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Apple Schnapps (Or any other kind of schnapps)', '7-Up']
Making: Mix in a tall glass over ice.

Name: Puckered Up Tom Collins
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Smirnoff 100 Vodka', '8 oz. Tom Collins Mix', '2 oz. Club Soda', '2 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps']
Making: Mx all ingredients in 32 oz. glass. Stir and enjoy.

Name: Puckin' Peach Martini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a peach wedge or dunk a cherry.

Name: Pudgy Bastard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Raspberry Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into a cocktail glass.

Name: Puebla Sour
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Anchos Reyes Chile Liqueur', "1 part(s) Hendrick's Gin", '3/4 part(s) Combier Creme de Pamplemousse Rose', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup', '3/4 part(s) Egg White', '1 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters']
Making: Combine all ingredients except the rich simple syrup in a mixing tin. Close the tin, dry shake to emulsify the mixture with the egg white. Open the tin, add simple syrup and ice. Shake again and double strain into coupe. Using an eyedropper, place 5 drops of Peychaud's on top of the foam and using a toothpick, drag a line.

Name: Puerto Apple
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Applejack', '3/4 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Orgeat Syrup', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lime and serve.

Name: Puerto Rican Russian
Ingredients: ["1 part(s) Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 part(s) Kahlua', '2 part(s) Milk']
Making: Fill a pint glass with the ice. Fill with a quarter of the rum, a quarter of Kahula and half with milk. It's Choclate Milk with a Kick!

Name: Puerto Rico Breeze #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', "1 oz. Creme d'Almond", 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a hurricane glass with ice and add the ingredients (you can also blend the ingredients with ice until slushy). Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

Name: Puerto Rico Breeze #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a hurricane glass with ice and add the ingredients (you can also blend the ingredients with ice until slushy). Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

Name: Puffer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Pour the rum, orange juice, and grapefruit juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Drop the grenadine into the centre of the drink.

Name: Puke
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Everclear', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Pumpkin Cider
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Kahlua Pumpkin Spice Liqueur', 'Apple Cider', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass, top with cider and stir. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Pumpkin Egg Noggy
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 tbsp. Pumpkin Puree', '1 1/2 part(s) Eggnog', '1 part(s) Cream', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Put all contents except cream and cinnamon into a mixing glass. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Float cream on top. Grate fresh cinnamon over top of drink. For an extra special touch, infuse navan with cloves, cinnamon, and all spice for one whole day.

Name: Pungie Stick
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '1/2 Lime', 'Grenadine']
Making: Fill an old fashion glass with ice cubes. Hand squeeze the 1/2 lime and pour in the vodka. Add an oz. of grenadine (or to taste) mix with your finger.

Name: Pure Guava
Ingredients: ['3 oz. White Rum', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Add rum first then the juices. Mix thoroughly. Best served with ice. It's very sweet with little alcohol aftertaste. Tastes like sherbert.

Name: Pure Paradise
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Add Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum and pineapple juice over ice in a highball glass. Fill with cranberry juice and garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Purlple Helmet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps (Blue)', '1 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps (Red)', '3 oz. Sprite']
Making: Pour over ice into a collins glass.

Name: Purple
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Blueberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix in a 4 oz. glass. Refill as necessary!

Name: Purple Alien
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Silver Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour Captain Morgan, Blue Curacao and grenadine in a cocktail glass over ice. Add a lime wedge. Add Sprite to fill.

Name: Purple Avenger
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour vodka, blue curacao and cranberry juice into an old fashioned glass. Stir well. Top with ginger ale. Note The ginger ale gives a metalic tinge to the purple color so do not substitue a clear soda.

Name: Purple Bang-Up
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Grape Soda']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass.

Name: Purple Death
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Club Soda']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and stir in Club soda.

Name: Purple Devil
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mx and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Purple Donkey Punch
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Everclear', '1/5 gallon(s) Absolut Mandarin Vodka', "1/2 cup(s) Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 can(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine well all the ingredients and chill. Serve in punch glasses.

Name: Purple Dragon
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka (Or to taste)', 'Gatorade (0"Riptide Rush")']
Making: Mix with ice in a highball glass.

Name: Purple Dragon #2
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Raspberry Rum", '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Arrow Black Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Purple Farmer
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '7-Up', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Fill a 12. or 16 oz. glass with ice fill and pour the liquors. Fill the remainder of glass with equal parts sour and 7-Up. I came up with this as a bartender at Penn State. My buddy "Farmer" was my guinea pig.

Name: Purple Fizzy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake Sloe Gin, Blue Curacao and Sweet and Sour Mix over ice and strain into a highball glass. Top the glass off with Club Soda.

Name: Purple Gecko
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Red Curacao', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a salt rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Purple Goatee (dimebag Darell Inspired)
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '6 oz. Grape Soda']
Making: Mix Seagram's 7 Crown and grape soda over ice in a chilled highball glass.

Name: Purple Haze #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with cranberry juice.

Name: Purple Haze #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour the curacao and the vodka into a cocktail glass. Fill with Sprite. Add touch of grenadine to make the drink purple.

Name: Purple Haze #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', 'Lemonade']
Making: Serve over ice in a lowball glass.

Name: Purple Haze #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Lime Juice (To taste)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over crushed ice into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Purple Haze #5
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Blue Curacao (Preferably Bols)', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Tonic Water']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a collins glass.

Name: Purple Haze #6
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Raspberry Rum", '1/2 oz. Margaritaville Gold Tequila', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Arrow Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Sour Mix', 'Soda']
Making: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add alcohol and sour mix. Top off with white soda.

Name: Purple Haze #66
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '7-Up', 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour in a cocktail glass and top with equal parts of 7-Up and lemonade. Splash in some grenadine.

Name: Purple Haze Made In A Purple Haze
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Lime Juice', "2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix lime juice, Jack Daniel's, blue curacao in a tall glass....add a dash of grenadine (and by dash I mean ... forget to look while pouring and realize that there's already to much).

Name: Purple Heather
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1 tsp. Creme de Cassis', 'Soda Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass and fill with soda.

Name: Purple Honker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '7-Up']
Making: Pour schnapps and Maui into a highball glass and fill the rest with 7-Up.

Name: Purple Hooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Serve in a tall glass over ice. Fill with sour mix. The girls love these.

Name: Purple Hooter With A Twist #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sweet and Sour Mix', '7-Up']
Making: Combine the spirits and add equal parts of sweet and sour and 7-Up. Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Purple Hooter With A Twist #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sweet and Sour Mix', '7-Up']
Making: Combine the spirits and add equal parts of sweet and sour and 7-Up. Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Purple Jesus #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila (Or vodka)', '3 oz. Kool-Aid (Purple)']
Making: Shake well and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Purple Jim Bob
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Grenadine', '7-Up', 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour the alcohol in a cocktail glass, then add equal parts of lemonade and 7-Up. Finish with the dash of grenadine.

Name: Purple Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. Creme de Noyeaux', 'dash(es) Cherry Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Purple Mask
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Grape Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Purple Mexican
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Corona Extra', '3 oz. Strawberry Daiquiri Mix', '3 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass over ice.

Name: Purple Mother F**ker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour Southern Comfort and Blue Curacao over ice in a 12 oz. glass. Fill with Cranberry Juice and stir slightly.

Name: Purple Motherf**ker #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Combine first five ingredients in a mixing glass half-filled with ice. Shake. Pour into a collins glass and top with 7-Up.

Name: Purple Orgasm
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Wild Spirit Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake well or blend on low and strain into a rocks glass over ice cubes. You add Wild Spirit to your taste.

Name: Purple Pancho
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '2 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a salt rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Purple Paradise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Light Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 oz. 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix and pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Purple Passion
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) DeKuyper Red Apple Liqueur', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Island Blue Schnapps', '1 1/2 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

Name: Purple Passion #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '3 oz. Grape Juice', 'Sugar']
Making: Stir in a collins glass and add sugar to taste.

Name: Purple Passion Jiggle Shots
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Amaretto', '1 tbsp. Vodka', '1 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '2 package(s) JELLO (Grape)']
Making: Mix the ingredients, pour in 2 oz. shot glasses and refrigerate.

Name: Purple Passion Tea
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '4 oz. Sour Mix', '3 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and stir. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Purple Pecker Spit
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 1/2 cup(s) Grape Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Purple People Eater
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Light Rum', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Lemonade']
Making: Mix all ingredients except lemonade over ice in a highball glass. Fill with lemonade, stir and garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Purple Pez
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 cup(s) Grape Juice']
Making: Mix ... drink ... enjoy

Name: Purple Poison
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '3 oz. Grape Pucker', '4 oz. Sprite']
Making: Stir vigorously and add ice.

Name: Purple Poofter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '5 oz. Lemonade', '2 oz. Raspberry Syrup']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass over ice.

Name: Purple Princess
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '3 oz. Grape Juice']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass and serve with a purple umbrella.

Name: Purple Pushover
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/4 oz. Dark Rum', 'dash(es) 151 Proof Rum', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'dash(es) 7-Up', 'Orange Juice (To taste)', 'Pineapple Juice (To taste)']
Making: Combine liquors into a large shaker, add the orange juice, the pineapple juice, the grenadine and a spritz of 7-Up. SHAKE WELL and strain over ice in a highball glass. Float a dash of 151 rum on top.

Name: Purple Rain
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Flugel', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour into a longdrink glass and fill with sprite. This drink was madeup by a girl who works in my bar called 'The Rock'. Her name is Simone

Name: Purple Rain #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Grenadine', '7-Up']
Making: Combine the vodka, blue Curacao and grenadine in a cocktail glass. Top with the 7-up, stir, then serve over ice.

Name: Purple Rain #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Pineapple Juice (To taste)', 'Lime Juice (To taste)']
Making: Blend until slushy and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Purple Rain #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Combine the ingredients in tall glass with ice. Fill with sour mix, Sprite, or 7-Up.

Name: Purple Slurpee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Grenadine', '2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Pour the blue Curacao and the creme de banane in a tall glass. Blend ice, soda and grenadine and mix in the glass. Change amounts of ice and soda to liking.

Name: Purple Squirrel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Light Rum (Or to taste)', '1 oz. Coconut Rum (Or to taste)', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Freshly squeezed)', '1 oz. Club Soda (Or to taste)']
Making: Mix everything but Club Soda and shake well in a tumbler. Add the Club Soda and pour over ice in cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime with an Almond embedded in it. Additional ingredients for variations: Creme d' Almond, Coconut Milk.

Name: Purplesauruswrecked
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Fill a 12 or 14 oz. glass with ice. Mix vodka, rum and Chambord. Fill with sour mix and top with 7-Up.

Name: Push Up
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Smirnoff Vanilla Vodka', '3 oz. Sprite', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Pushkin's Milkshake
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Coffee Vodka', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1 cup(s) Milk (Or half and half cream)', 'Cocoa Powder']
Making: Mix vodkas, cocoa and cold milk in a shaker or blender and pour into a chilled, stemmed glass. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Pusser's Pain Killer
Ingredients: ["4 oz. Pusser's Rum", '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Milk', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Pussy Foot #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 can(s) Malibu Rum (Use the Minute Maid can)', '1 can(s) Orange Juice (Minute Maid - Frozen)', '3 tbsp. Whipped Cream']
Making: Blend some ice then pour the orange juice in the blender and blend until you can't hear the ice anymore. Add the whipped cream (for a non-fat drink use half-half) and mix until it is a little thick. Finally, add the half a can of Malibu. Serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Pussy Is Guaranteed
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Cranberry-Raspberry Juice']
Making: Mix with ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Pussy Juice #2
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1 tsp. Lime Juice', 'Orange Juice (To taste)', 'Pineapple Juice (To taste)']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Pussy Liquor
Ingredients: ["4 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", 'Squirt']
Making: Pour into a 12 oz. glass over ice and fill with Squirt Soda.

Name: Pussy On The Beach
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix Mandarin vodka and Cointreau in tall glass with ice. Add equal parts of orange juice and cranberry juice. Stir.

Name: Pussy Paws
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Club Soda', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Stir cranberry, Amaretto, Sour Mix. Pour into a frosted highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with Club Soda and garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Putting Green
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Midori', '1 tbsp. Sugar', 'Lemon Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake it and strain on the rocks in a cocktail glass or large snifter. Fill with equal parts lemon and orange juice.

Name: Q Gin and Tax Thyme
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Q Tonic', '2 oz. Gin', '4 sprig(s) Thyme', '1 wedge(s) Lime']
Making: Add gin to a cocktail shaker. Place 3 sprigs in it and gently muddle. Add ice and shake. Strain into an ice-filled highball glass and garnish with a line wedge and sprig of thyme.

Name: Q's CTR (Corrupt The Righteous)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Tampico Punch (Mango)']
Making: Mix and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Q's Leg Spreader
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Strawberry Schnapps', '2 oz. Gatorade (Watermelon flavour)']
Making: Mix and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Q.F (quick F**k)
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Carefully pour Midori over the back of a spoon into a shot glass. Then layer in the Kahlua over the back of a spoon, finishing up with the Bailey's Irish Cream - also pouring over the back of a spoon. You should end up with 3 perfect layers.

Name: Quaalude
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Hazelnut Liqueur', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Milk']
Making: Build in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Quaker's Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. White Rum', '3/4 oz. Brandy', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '2 tsp. Raspberry Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Quarter Deck Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/3 oz. Cream Sherry', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Quarterdeck Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jamaica Rum', '1/2 oz. Dry Sherry', '1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 tsp. Granulated Sugar', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake well with cracked ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Quebec
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 tsp. Amer Picon', '1 1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

Name: Queen Bee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coffee Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cream Sherry']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Queen Charlotte
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Red Wine', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour red wine and grenadine into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with lemon-lime soda, stir, and serve.

Name: Queen Elizabeth
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 tsp. Benedictine']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Queen of Hearts
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1 oz. Strawberry Juice', '1/4 oz. Red Wine infused with simple syrup', 'Champagne']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass and top with champagne.

Name: Queen Of Scots
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Sugar', '2 tsp. Water', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 tsp. Green Chartreuse', '1/2 tsp. Blue Curacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Queen Tiff
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Ke Ke Beach Key Lime Cream Liqueur', 'Pineapple Juice (Or orange juice)']
Making: Combine over ice in a collins glass.

Name: Queens
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Queens Park Swizzle
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '3 Mint Leaves']
Making: Squeeze lime and drop shell into 14 oz. glass. Add 1 mint leaf. Add shave ice and remaining ingredients, except mint. Stir until glass is frosty. Garnish with remaining mint leaves.

Name: Queens Taste Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. French Vermouth', '2/3 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with crushed mint.

Name: Quentin
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Light Cream', '1/8 tsp. Nutmeg (Grated)']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, Kahlua, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with the nutmeg.

Name: Quick Sex On The Beach
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', '1 oz. Smirnoff 100 Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Quickie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: R & R #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 bottle(s) Beer (Preferably Red Dog Beer)']
Making: Shoot then drink the beer.

Name: R A F Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Applejack', '3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: R and B
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice.

Name: RAC
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and a twist of orange peel.

Name: Racquet Club
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '4 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Racquet Club Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Rad F**k
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Stir with ice and strain. (Don't shake.)

Name: Rad F**k #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix all in a Hurricane glass on the rocks. Fill with cranberry juice and top with 7-Up. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Radioactive Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Midori', 'Sweet and Sour Mix', '7-Up']
Making: Pour into a Collins glass and fill with equal parts sweet and sour mix and 7-Up. Garnish with a cherry..

Name: Rag Doll
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '2 oz. Cherry 7-Up']
Making: Mix Vodka and Watermelon Pucker then pour into a chilled glass with ice. Add Cherry 7-Up and garnish with a cherry. Mix and enjoy!

Name: Ragged Company
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 tsp. Benedictine', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Bourbon whiskey, vermouth, Benedictine, and Bitters. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Raging Bull
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '2/3 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a tumbler.

Name: Ragnar #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Currant Vodka', 'Lime Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Put the liquor in a tall glass, add a few drops of lime. Fill with 7-Up.

Name: Ragnar #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', "3/4 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", 'Sprite']
Making: Pour the Kurant into a highball glass full of ice. Add Rose´s lime to taste. Fill with Sprite.

Name: Ragtime
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with coffee beans.

Name: Rain Forest
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix the alcohol in a cocktail glass. Fill with equal amounts of pineapple juice and cranberry juice. Squeeze in a slice of lemon and lime and serve.

Name: Rain Man
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '3/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a parfait glass filled with ice.

Name: Rainbow Road
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Lemon Liqueur', 'Lemon Lime Mix', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Melon Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake the first three ingredients and pour into a lowball glass. On the left side add the splash of grenadine, in middle the splash of blue curacao and on the right side add the melon liqueur. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of lime.

Name: Rainforest on the Rocks
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '1 1/2 oz. Watermelon Juice', '8 sprig(s) Mint', '1 wedge(s) Lime', '1 dash(es) Sugar']
