Making: Muddle the mint sprigs and the lime wedge in a mixing glass. Add 2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit, fresh watermelon juice, and a dash of sugar and ice in a cocktail shaker and shake. Pour into a glass.

Name: Rainy Wednesday
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '3 oz. Soda (Mandarin Lime Hansens Soda)']
Making: Combine in a lowball glass. Optional: add a slice of lime or orange.

Name: Raki and Water
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Raki', '1 oz. Water']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Ramos Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 dash(es) Orange Flower Water', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Cream', '1 Egg White', 'Seltzer Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass and fill with seltzer.

Name: Ramos Gin Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Martin Millers Gin', '1 oz. Heavy Cream', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '3 drop(s) Orange Flower Water', '1 oz. Soda Water Fever-Tree']
Making: Add plenty of cracked ice and shake vigorously for a minimum of one minute, preferably two. Strain into a shilled Collins glass and add chilled club soda until an inch or so from the top.

Name: Rampage #2
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cherry Juice (Optional)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass filled 3/4 with ice. Garnish with a cherry and a thin slice of lemon.

Name: Ranger Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. White Rum', '1/3 oz. Gin', '1/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Rangers Rocker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. White Wine', '1 oz. Water']
Making: Pour ingredients into mason jar, stir.

Name: RaRocks
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Build over ice in a collins glass, adding the splash of Sprite last.

Name: Rasmaretto
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Raspberry Syrup', 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour over ice in a collins glass. Shake (or spindle mix for a nice foamy top). A real refreshing drink.

Name: Raspberri Drue Drop
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Raspberri Vodka', '1 oz. 7-Up', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making:
RASPBERRI (Urban intensity)
Raspberries, nature’s most passionate fruit, contribute to an intense flavor that encourages drinkers to embrace the moment and unleash their wild side. For a cocktail that will keep you partying like a rockstar this summer, try the “ABSOLUT Drue Drop”. Created at Rehab at the Hard Rock Hotel, Las Vegas.
Build ingredients over ice in a collins glass.
ABSOLUT Vodka celebrates the 2005 summer by “creating” seven distinct moods for summer socializing based on the affects of its flavor ingredients. From free spirited to passionate and intense, this summer ABSOLUT tempts consumers with a variety of cocktails and flavors to help get them in the mood for fun during the time of year they are most socially active.
According to industry experts in the field of flavor and sensory science, flavors and fragrances affect daily experiences and can trigger certain moods and reactions. Each member of the ABSOLUT family, APEACH, RASPBERRI, VANILIA, MANDRIN, KURANT, CITRON and PEPPAR contain natural ingredients that evoke individual feelings and sensations that contribute to seven stimulating moods for summer socializing.
“Our flavors are as diverse and dynamic as the people who drink them,” said Tim Murphy, brand director of the ABSOLUT portfolio, The Absolut Spirits Company, Inc. “Each flavor has an individual taste and feeling that encourages nightlife patrons to experiment with new drinks and find the flavors that suit them, their moods and the various occasions that they socialize around,” he continues.
This summer, ABSOLUT has partnered with hot venues across the country to feature seven innovative cocktails inspired by each of the seven ABSOLUT flavors. The distinct taste of these flavors inspires the creation of smart, exciting and diverse cocktails while reflecting the seven hottest moods for summer socializing.

Name: Raspberries Romanoff
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec (Or Curacao)', 'Raspberries (Fresh)', 'Champagne (Brut)', 'Kirsch']
Making: Add chilled vodka, triple sec and fresh raspberries to a large, chilled stemmed glass and fill with cold champagne. Sprinkle a few drops of kirschwasser on top.

Name: Raspberry - Marmalade Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Russian Standard Vodka', '1 tsp. Orange Marmalade', '4 Raspberries', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making:
Love left a sour taste in your mouth for the holiday? Try this martini out for a truly tart taste.
Shake well and strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

Name: Raspberry Beer
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Lager', '4 tbsp. Raspberry Syrup']
Making: Drop raspberry syrup into a beer glass then pour in the lager. Stir briskly.

Name: Raspberry Beret #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Blend all the ingredients with ice (like a mud slide). Pour in a mug rimmed with red-coloured sugar, top with whipped cream and sprinkle with red colored sugar.

Name: Raspberry Beret #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Cream', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Blend all the ingredients with 8 ice cubes (like a mud slide). Pour in a glass rimmed with red-coloured sugar, top with whipped cream and sprinkle with red colored sugar.

Name: Raspberry Blonde
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Canadian Club Classic Whisky', '8 oz. Light Beer']
Making: Pour in a tall glass. Do not stir.

Name: Raspberry Cheesecake
Ingredients: ['1 tbsp. Cream Cheese (Softened)', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend with 1/2 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a parfait glass.

Name: Raspberry Chocolate Love
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Level Vodka', '1/4 part(s) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '4 Raspberries', '3/4 part(s) Lemon Juice', '3/4 part(s) Sugar Syrup', 'Chocolate Sauce']
Making: Shake first five ingredients with ice and double strain into a rocks glass with chocolate sauce in the bottom. Garnish with a chocolate-filled raspberry.

Name: Raspberry Colada
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Raspberry Rum", '1 1/2 oz. Arrow Black Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Mix in blender with ice until smooth. Pour in tall glass and garnish with pineapple slice and maraschino cherry.

Name: Raspberry Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '5 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge. Try with any fruit flavored vodka for a new twist to your old vodka tonic.

Name: Raspberry Cordial #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Raspberry Juice', '2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/4 oz. Sugar']
Making: Combine all ingredients and stir until sugar is dissolved. Store in large bottles for 22 days, then put in gift bottles and seal.

Name: Raspberry Cordial #2
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Everclear', '4 cup(s) Raspberries', '4 cup(s) Sugar', '7-Up']
Making: Combine in a big mixing bowl and stir. Stir once a week for a month and a half. At that time strain the berries out. Fill a highball glass 1/4 with cordial and the rest with 7-Up. The berries you can use the make peanut butter and jelly sandwiches.

Name: Raspberry Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Raspberry Cosmopolitan #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Smirnoff Raspberry Twist Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a highball glass and fill with cranberry juice. Squeeze a fresh lime on top. Can also be shaken and poured as a shot or made in a short.

Name: Raspberry Cream
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 tbsp. Yogurt (Raspberry)', '1 1/2 tbsp. Raspberry Ice Cream', '1 1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed. Pour into a champagne flute and serve.

Name: Raspberry Hot Chocolate #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Vodka', 'Hot Chocolate']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and fill with hot chocolate.

Name: Raspberry Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Fill a cocktail glass with ice and pour the content in. Top with Coca Cola and stir.

Name: Raspberry Ricky
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Lime Cordial', '1 tbsp. Raspberries (Frozen)', 'Sprite']
Making: Mix together in a tall glass and top with Sprite.

Name: Raspberry Romance
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1 1/4 oz. Irish Cream', 'Club Soda']
Making: Build in a parfait glass and fill with Club Soda.

Name: Raspberry Roxie
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Raspberry Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Mix vodka, raspberry juice and pineapple juice over ice in a pint, highball or collins glass. For extra raspberry flavor, add 1/2oz Chambord Raspberry Liqueur.

Name: Raspberry Russian
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '7-Up']
Making: Over a tall glass with ice pour vodka and raspberry liqueur. Top off with 7-Up. Bottoms up!

Name: Raspberry Sherbet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Milk']
Making: Pour the shot into a mixing glass and fill half the glass with cranberry juice then top with milk. Either shake or blend for a smoothie.

Name: Raspberry Sherbet Shocker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Milk']
Making: Pour into a mixing glass and fill half the glass with cranberry juice then top with milk. Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Raspberry Sno-cone
Ingredients: ['2 oz. UV Blue Raspberry Vodka', 'Cranberry Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Ifill a mug with ice and add UV Blue Raspberry Vodka. Fill with equal amounts of cranberry juice and 7-Up. Add a straw and enjoy!

Name: Raspberry Truffle #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Milk (To taste)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into a cocktail glass.

Name: Raspberry Truffle #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Half and Half Cream (To taste)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Raspiroska
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Raspberri Vodka', '1 splash(es) Simple Syrup', '6 Raspberries']
Making: Muddle raspberry and simple syrup in a chilled rocks glass. Fill with crushed ice. Add ABSOLUT Raspberri. Stir.

Name: Rassman
Ingredients: ['1 oz. DeKuyper Peach Brandy', '1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Cruzan Banana Rum', '7-Up']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass over ice and fill with 7-Up.

Name: Rassman II
Ingredients: ['1 oz. DeKuyper Amaretto', '1 oz. Vodka', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass and fill with cranberry juice. Stir well.

Name: Rathbone Gardens
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '2 dash(es) Gomme Syrup', '2 piece(s) Lime Quarters', '1 piece(s) Peach Quartered']
Making: Fill mixing beaker with ice. Add the fruit, syrup de gomme and Plymouth Gin. Shake vigorously (to break up the fruit and basil) Strain into a glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a peach slice, basil leaves and a lime wedge.

Name: Rattler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila Gold', '3 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1/4 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Rattlesnake Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/4 tsp. Anis', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Rattlesnake Milk
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Milk']
Making: Mix liquors together and pour over ice into a Tom Collins glass. Top with milk and stir.

Name: Ratty Ol'Deer Head
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '3 oz. Milk (Preferably from a deer)', '2 Cherries']
Making: Serve over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Ratty Ol'Deer Head - Pinney Rat Style-
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Milk (Preferably from a deer)', '2 Cherries']
Making: Serve over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Rauhreif
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Curacao', '1 oz. Jamaica Rum', '2 tsp. Grenadine', '3 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Raving Psycho
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. 7-Up', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a lowball glass.

Name: Ray-Ray
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Alize Gold Passion (Red)', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '4 drop(s) Grenadine (Or more - for colour)']
Making: Shake and pour into a highball glass. Serve with a lemon slice centered between two cherries. Enjoy!

Name: Raz-Ma-Taz
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Pour vodka and Chambord into a highball glass. Add a splash of 7-Up and a splash of Sweet and Sour.

Name: Razzbaretto
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Mix in a blender and serve in a hurricane glass or a snifter. Garnish with a swirl of whipped cream.

Name: Razzle Dazzle
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Smirnoff Raspberry Twist Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 dash(es) Grenadine', '7-Up']
Making: shake until well blended and strain into a 16 oz. glass. Fill with the 7-Up and serve with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Razzputin
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Mix or blend with ice and serve in a chilled collins glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Real Dill
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Tres Generaciones Tequila', '1 part(s) Vox Vodka', '1 part(s) Lime Juice', '3/4 part(s) Partida Agave Nectar']
Making:
Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of dill and cucumber slices
The United States Bartenders' Guild (USBG) National Cocktail Competition and sponsor, Tres Generaciones Tequila, awarded Armando Rosario of Las Vegas the title of "Best Bartender in America." Rosario won for his cocktail creation, Real Dill, featuring Tres Generaciones Plata Tequila. Daniel Love of Chicago took second place for his cocktail, Aztec Gold, while Ricky Gomez of New Orleans took third place for his cocktail, The Real Pepper Daisy.
"On behalf of Tres Generaciones, we congratulate Armando Rosario on his 'Best Cocktail' and thank all the mixologists for designing creative, great-tasting cocktails," stated Bobby "G" Gleason, master mixologist for Beam Global Spirits & Wine and emcee of the 2009 USBG National Cocktail Competition. "Tres Generaciones is committed to recognizing and celebrating the next generation of mixologists and we wish Armando the best of luck as he takes on the world's best bartenders in the World Cocktail Competition held this August in Germany."
"The 2009 USBG National Cocktail Competition was a great success," said David Nepove, USBG national vice president. "We were able to watch the top bartenders in action as they mixed with Tres Generaciones. We congratulate Armando on his award and look forward to what he will create for the international competition."
Judging for "Best Cocktail" was based on aroma, taste, balance, originality and garnish. Judges also awarded a "Best Technical" prize to Ronaldo Colli for his expertise in managing his bar, bottles, glassware and bar tools. The 2009 USBG National Cocktail Competition took place in San Francisco on May 12.

Name: Real Thug Passion
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Alize Gold Passion', '1 part(s) Champagne']
Making: Ya'll mix it up right with some ice.

Name: Rearbuster
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Rebel Yell
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 Egg White']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Bourbon whiskey, Cointreau, lemon juice, and egg white. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Red Alert
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Rye Whiskey', '3 oz. Coca Cola', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Enjoy while watching your favorite Star Trek episodes (aka The Riker).

Name: Red Apple
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Apple Juice', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Red Assed Baboon
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Coconut Syrup', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake and strain all ingredients and pour over the splash of cranberry juice.

Name: Red Batshit
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '1 1/2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Put scoops of ice cream into a decent sized glass (softer ice cream works better). Pour the rum over it. Top up the glass with orange juice. Add Grenadine and stir it until it turns to milkshake consistency.

Name: Red Beer
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Beer', 'Tomato Juice or clamato juice']
Making: Take a big gulp out of your favourite can of beer and replace with tomato juice. For a great tasting Red Beer - try clamato juice.

Name: Red Bit
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'Schweppes (Bitter Lemon)']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass and garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Red Blizzard
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 oz. 99 Blackberries Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Bar Mix', '1/2 oz. Grain Alcohol (PGA)', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Dark Rum', "1/2 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '1 1/2 can(s) Sprite', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid (Tropical Punch)', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Tropico']
Making: Blend with 2/3 cups of ice and pour into 2 highball glasses. It is rather sour and you will taste little to no alcohol.

Name: Red Buffalo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1/3 oz. Green Chartreuse', '5 Cherries', '2 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters', '1 dash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Pour Chartreuse into a glass filled with ice and top with water. Muddle cherries and shake with the other ingredients. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with fresh cherries.

Name: Red Cloud
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Red Death
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', 'Tomato Juice', '1 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '1 dash(es) Salt', '1 dash(es) Pepper', '1/4 tsp. Horseradish (optional)', '1 dash(es) Salsa (hot)']
Making: Fill a cocktail glass 3/4 with tomato juice. Mix in the rest of the ingredients. Garnish with a celery stick or lemon wedge.

Name: Red Death #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour all the ingredients in mixing glass with ice. Shake with ice and pour through strainer. Serve cold.

Name: Red Death #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Whiskey', '1 bottle(s) Cherries', '1 1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Eat all but one of the cherries in the bottle and pour the remaining syrup and a cherry into a glass with ice. Add the creme de cacao and whiskey. Stir well.

Name: Red Death #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Peach Liqueur', '1 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Make in a tall hurricane glass.

Name: Red Demon
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Fill a large glass with ice and pour in all of the liquors. Fill almost to rim with equal parts cranberry and pineapple juices. Top off with grenadine. A nice garnish is an orange/cherry flag but it's not necessary. Another variation replace orange juice instead of pineapple juice (I personally hate orange juice but most people liked it better that way).

Name: Red Devil #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Red Devil #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Mix chilled and enjoy.

Name: Red Dragon
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Rum', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', 'Bar Mix', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass over ice. Fill almost to the top with bar mix. Splash grenadine.

Name: Red Dragon #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Rum', 'Bar Mix', 'Cherry Brandy']
Making: Pour into a Collins Glass and fill almost to the top with bar mix. Float the Kirshwasser on top. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Red Eye
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Beer', '1 part(s) Tomato Juice (Optional)', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Fill glass 1/2 to 3/4 full with beer and add vodka if wanted. Top with tomato juice.

Name: Red Gin
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Cherry Heering Liqueur', '2 oz. Gin']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine the gin and a cherry Heering. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Red Headed Slut
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Jagermeister', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix, shake, pour and don't let the Jager fool you, it really tastes good. Brent's comment: Also called a _Red Headed Princess_ if the bartender is a red-head!

Name: Red Heaven
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Corona Extra', 'Bacardi Lemon', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Drink a Corona until the bottom of the neck of the of the bottle. Then pour in the Bacardi half way up the neck. Fill the rest with Cranberry Juice. Flip bottle upside down and enjoy!

Name: Red Hot Chili Pepper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Gold', 'Ginger Beer', '4 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Combine in a highball glass.

Name: Red Hot Communist Bastard
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps (Preferably Red Hot Cinnamon Schnapps)']
Making: Mix ingredients together as a shooter or pour over ice as a cocktail.

Name: Red Hot Lover
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '2 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce', '1 splash(es) Lime', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with crushed ice (except cranberry juice) for 10 seconds, strain into a mug with ice cubes and fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with a cherry. Great drink for Valentine's day.

Name: Red Hot Passion
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice into a hurricane glass. Stir gently and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Red Kool-Aid In A Plastic Cup
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Gin', '1 1/2 cup(s) Vodka', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid (Red)', '5 cup(s) Sugar', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Pour the mix half way full in a yellow Dixie cup. Place in the freezer and remove it when mixture becomes slushy. Webmixer note: the complete name for this cocktail is: "Red Kool-Aid In A Plastic Cup That Quenches Your Thirst"…but it's way too long for our name field :)

Name: Red Light District
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1 Strawberry', '1 Pepper (Red Chili)']
Making: Muddle fresh strawberry and red chili pepper. Combine in shaker with Mekhong, strawberry liquor, lemon juice and simple syrup and shake vigorously. Pour over large ice cubes in teacup or short glass. Option to garnish with a fresh strawberry.

Name: Red Lion
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '3 dash(es) Grenadine', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Red Lyon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '3/4 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', 'Cream']
Making: Pour vodka and Razzmatazz over ice in a lowball, then fill with cream. Garnish with cherry.

Name: Red Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Red Stag Kentucky Bourbon', '1/2 part(s) Dry Vermouth', '1/2 part(s) Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Prepare in a shaker over ice and strain into a Martini glass with long stem black cherry garnish.

Name: Red Maple Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Campari', '1 oz. Maple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Egg White', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and dry shake. Add ice and shake again. Double strain into a martini glass and garnish with a twist of orange.

Name: Red Mo-Fo #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Red Mo-Fo #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Black Currant Vodka (Or any other currant vodka)', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Stir over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Red Navel
Ingredients: ['15 oz. Mountain Dew (Code Red)', '6 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Mix add ice...CHUG!... You can vary the amounts depeding on desired strength.

Name: Red Passion Colada
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Pina Colada Mix', '1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Alize Red Passion']
Making: Pour Pina Colada Mix and rum with 10 oz. of ice until smooth. Pour into a tall frosted glass and garnish with a splash of Alize and a pineapple spear.

Name: Red Raider #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Red Raspberry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Raspberry Vodka', 'Lemonade', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour vodka into a cocktail glass. Fill with lemonade and float grenadine on top.

Name: Red Risk
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Noilly Prat Dry', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Mix drink ingredients in shaker with ice and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime peel and a cherry.

Name: Red Rooster
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Skyy Infusions Raspberry Vodka', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into rocks glass with fresh ice. Garnish with cherry and orange slice.

Name: Red Rover
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '4 1/2 oz. Ruby Red Grapefruit Juice Drink']
Making: Stir in a 16 oz. tumbler filled with cracked ice.

Name: Red Ruby
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Red Rum #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '12 oz. Cooler (Red wine cooler)']
Making: Stir gently into a large wine glass.

Name: Red Rum #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Spiced Rum', '2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 bottle(s) Cream Soda (Red)']
Making: Pour the soda in a frosty mug until it is halfway full. Add the Irish cream and the rum. Mix it up with a straw and enjoy the evilness of the red rum!

Name: Red Russian #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Layer in a lowball glass.

Name: Red Russian #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Cherry Vodka']
Making: Stir over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Red Sea
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gold Puerto Rican Rum', "Hi-C (Flashin' Fruit Punch)"]
Making: Pour Gold Puerto Rican Rum in to an old fashion glass over 2 ice cubes. Fill with Hi-C Flashin' Fruit Punch and add a twist of lemon.

Name: Red Silk Panties
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake vodka and peach schnapps with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over fresh ice. Fill with cranberry juice.

Name: Red Snapper #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Crown Royal', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix in a tall glass and fill with cranberry juice.

Name: Red Snapper #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Vermouth', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Ginger Ale (To taste)']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass and add "a little too much" grenadine. Top with ginger ale to your chosen strength.

Name: Red Surfer
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '4 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Pour over ice.

Name: Red Tonic
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass and fill with tonic water.

Name: Red Trip
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tropico Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Remy Red', 'dash(es) Sour Mix (Or to taste)', 'dash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix (Or to taste)']
Making: Layer Tropico and Remy Red in a cocktail glass, then add equal parts sweet and sour.

Name: Red White and Blueberry
Ingredients: ['Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', 'Raspberries', 'Peaches (White)', 'Blueberries']
Making:
Pour equal parts of Navan and your favorite fruit puree into a pitcher and stir. Pour over ice into rocks glasses and top with club soda or pour into a chilled flute and top with Champagne.
Red - Equal parts NAVAN with Raspberries (to make the purée, blend until smooth and strain out the seeds)
White - Equal parts NAVAN with White peaches (to make the purée, peel and remove the stone and blend until smooth)
Blue - Equal parts NAVAN with Blueberries (to make the purée, blend until smooth and strain out the seeds)

Name: Red, White & Sauza Blue Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Sauza Blue Silver Tequila', '2 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '8 leaf(leaves) Mint', '1 part(s) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Combine all ingredients except mint leaves in a pitcher. Serve each glass with 2 mint leaves. Serve cold or iced.

Name: Red, White, and B-Lucid Punch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lucid Absinthe Superieure', '1 oz. Gin', '2 Strawberries', '2 Blackberry (ies)', '1/2 oz. Ginger Syrup', '3/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making:
Muddle the berries in the ginger syrup and orange juice. Add remaining ingredients and shake well with ice and strain over ice. Garnish with sliced strawberries and blackberries
Created by: Jonathan Pogash, New York

Name: Red-Eye
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Beer', '1 part(s) Tomato Juice', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: Fill a glass 1/2 to 3/4 full with beer and add vodka. Top with tomato juice and add the egg yoke.

Name: Redbull and Vodka
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making:
Combine over ice in a highball glass.
As the name suggests, Red Bull and Vodka, or Vodka Red Bull, is a drink that contains, well, Red Bull and vodka!
The concoction is quite popular in the club scene, although it’s become so well known that you will surely see someone drinking it at a party or the bar. It has been said club goers love the drink because its effects allow the drinker to consume alcohol while still providing the energy that he or she needs to dance the night away.
Red Bull and Vodka is considered to be a very pricey drink. Some clubs/bars can charge $10 and up for each serving. If you venture outside the United States, you’ll find that other countries do not charge quite as much. Should you want the same effects, but want to spend a little less money per drink, see if the establishment that you are in offers less expensive energy drink alternatives. But, be warned, it might be cheaper, but it might not taste quite as good.
It has been said that mixing Red Bull with alcohol can be dangerous, since you are mixing a stimulant with a depressant. However, the claim has never been substantiated.
Red Bull and Vodka can be served in several different ways. Some establishments may serve a shot along with the entire can of Red Bull, while others may split the can between several drinks. Another option is pouring the entire contents of a Red Bull can into a highball glass, pouring vodka into a shot glass, and then dropping the shot glass into the highball glass.

Name: Redcoat
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Redcoat Rickey
Ingredients: ['2 oz. London Dry Gin Beefeater 24 works well here', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur I like Luxardo', '1/2 oz. Falernum **', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making:
Shake everything with ice and strain into ice-filled rocks glass. Top with seltzer/soda water, and garnish with a cherry.
**There are commercially-made falernums available (Fee's, Velvet), but I strongly recommend making your own from scratch. It's easy and tastes fantastic.

Name: Redneck Blitzkreig
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass and fill with tonic water.

Name: Redneck Kamikaze
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain.

Name: Redneck Nightmare
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '3/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', "1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Start with your basic Black Russian. Add Southern Comfort then Jack Daniel's.

Name: Redneck Zombie
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '4 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Combine and mix with ice in a highball glass.

Name: Reese's Peanut Butter Cup

Name: Refajo
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Lager', '1 can(s) Soda Colombiana']
Making: Mix the beer and the Colombiana in a pitcher and serve chilled.

Name: Reform Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Sherry', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Reggae Ambassador

Making: Fill a blender 1/2 full with ice. Add vodka. Fill 1/2 of remaining space with pine-orange-banana fruit juice, the rest with fresh strawberries. Add about 4 Tsp. sugar. Blend and garnish with an orange slice.

Making: Shake all ingredients with plenty of ice. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with a sprig of fresh mint.

Name: Reign in Blood - Slayer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jagermeister', '3/4 oz. Beefeater 24', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Syrup', '1/2 oz. Iced Tea']
Making:
Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass. Add Ice and Stir. Strain into a Double Old Fashioned Glass and garnish with a Lemon Twist.
In honor of the Big 4 (Metallica, Slayer, Anthrax and Megadeth) playing Yankee Stadium, Jagermeister, a brand known for rocking the music scene, has come up with some metal cocktails….

Name: Reindeer's Tear
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Finlandia Vodka', '1 oz. Curacao', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Reisen
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butter Shots', '1 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Mix in a small glass. This drink is seved at Murphy's Law - Chesterfield, Va.

Name: Remote Control

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Remsen Cooler #1

Making: Put powdered sugar and 2 oz. carbonated water into a collins glass and stir. Add ice cubes and gin, fill with carbonated water, and stir again. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and a spiral of orange so that the end dangles over rim of glass.

Making: Stir in a tall glass and garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: Renaissance Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Sherry', '1 tbsp. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Rendezvous

Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with fresh cherries.

Name: Resevoir Dogs
Ingredients: ['12 can(s) Beer (Or more!)']
Making: Watch the movie "Resevoir Dogs" and everytime you hear the word f**k, drink!

Name: Resolute Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Gin', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Rhode Island Ice Coffee

Name: Riazul Brown Russian

Shake with ice and pour everything, including the ice into a glass. Enjoy a great way to finish off dinner. The White Russians will be jealous!
Todd @ Polo's Signature Houston

Name: Riazul Rita
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Orange Juice', '2 part(s) Riazul Silver Tequila', '3 part(s) Pom Wonderful']

Making:
Top a pint glass with ice and add the Gin, Tonic and Grapefruit Juice. Crisp, refreshing, classy, not too strong, easy to drink.
Whenever you order it, don't be surprised if a random person just yells Woooooooooooo. It's part of the drink appeal.

Name: Rickey
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Liquor', 'Club Soda']
Making: Pour in a highball glass and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Right Gin Berry Merry Christmas
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. RIGHT Gin', '3/4 oz. Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 oz. Blueberry Juice', '1 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1/4 oz. Blueberry Flavouring', '3 dash(es) The Bitter Truth Orange Bitters', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Sparkling Wine']
Making: Shake all ingredients except sparkling wine with cubed ice, poured into a highball glass filled with fresh ice and topped with sparkling wine. Garnish with sliced strawberries and blueberries.

Name: Right Gin Christmas Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. RIGHT Gin', '2 tsp. Cranberry Sauce', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 Egg White', '1 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters', '2 oz. Sparkling Water']
Making: Combine all ingredients except the sparkling water in a mixing glass. Add ice. Shake vigorously. Fill a Collins glass with ice. Pour in 2 oz of soda water and then strain mixture into the Collins glass over the ice and sparkling water. Garnish with a lemon wedge and a cranberry

Making: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass. Add ice, shake and strain into a cocktail or dessert wine glass. Dust with nutmeg and cinnamon.

Name: Riley's Sparrow
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Rimbaud’s Left Hand
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Pernod Absinthe', '1 part(s) Benedictine', '1 part(s) Aperol Orange Liqueur', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 Egg White', 'Rose Water']
Making:
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass, shake first without ice. Shake with ice and strain into a coupe glass with sidecar. Garnish with drops of rose water in the center.
Stephen Cole
The Violet Hour
Chicago
Muse – Arthur Rimbaud
Pernod Absinthe has partnered with noted mixologists around the country to create specialty cocktails inspired by artists and writers who were influenced by absinthe.

Name: Rimshot
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lime Juice (freshly squeezed)', '1/2 oz. Campari', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum']
Making: Shake it well with 3 ice cubes and pour everything including ice into a glass. Enjoy.

Making: Mix together and serve over ice. Add Sprite to taste.

Name: Rising from the Dead

Making: Squeeze half a lemon into a beer mug. Add Clamato Juice and 3/4 of the bottle of Corona. Add hot suace and squeeze the other half of the lemon in. Serve as cold as possible. This will make you rise from the dead…hangover.

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass and fill with orange juice. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

Making: In a highball add liquour..fill cup 2/3 with cream and top off with cola..shake gently.. Baileys and Cola tend to foam up..thus the name FLOAT. Tastes like a root beer float....served at the famous Gateway Clipper Fleet Cruise Ships Pittsburgh Pennsylvania.

Name: Roaring Lion Cougar Hunter

Name: Roaring Lion Goobstopper

Name: Robin's Nest

Name: Robitussin

Making: Stir, best without the rocks. Tastes just like the real thing.

Name: Robs Pepper Martinni
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Beefeater Dry Gin', '1/2 oz. Vermouth']
Making: Pour ingredients into a glass with 2 or 3 ice cubes and stir. Pour into a chilled glass and garnish with 2 jalapeno stuffed olives. Kick back and enjoy.

Name: Robson Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jamaica Rum', '1 1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Rock
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tio Pepe Sherry', '1 oz. Lemon Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon or lime twist.

Name: Rock and Rye Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rock and Rye', '1 oz. White Port', '1 1/2 tsp. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Rock Mountain Bear F**ker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Mix ingredients and strain either in a shot glass or a lowball glass. Suitable as a harsh cocktail or a quick shooter.

Name: Rock Spyder
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix the gin, the Malibu and the fruit juice with ice and pour in a highball glass. Add the blue curacao last.

Name: Rocket Forward
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Sprite']
Making: Mix in a highball glass (except Chambord), fill with Sprite and add the Chambord in the center of the drink.

Name: Rocket Fuel
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Rum', '3 oz. Whiskey', '6 oz. Rye Whiskey']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice in a 16 oz. glass. Stir - never shake - and garnish with a cherry. Note from submitter - do not let this drink near an open flame!!!

Name: Rocket Fuel #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Sloe Gin', '2 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Grenadine', '9 oz. Orange Juice', '9 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine in a 32 oz. pitcher. It's similar to an Alabama Slammer but sweeter. I usually get this made at my local bar and drink a metal pitcher of these myself. I don't like the taste of alcohol but I like the affect. This is great for those of you who are like me. Those who like fruity drinks with kick.

Name: Rocky Mountain Cooler #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Build in a collins glass and stir.

Name: Rocky Mountain UK
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Tia Maria', '1/2 oz. Lime Cordial', '4 oz. Canada Dry']
Making: Fill a 10 oz slim-jim glass with crushed ice. Add ingredients and stir. Drink through a straw. Gorgeous!

Name: Rococo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cherry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Rod Strawbitch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '6 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix in a blender with ice until it's slushy. Pour in a cocktail glass.

Name: Rogue Trader
Ingredients: ["2 part(s) Broker's London Dry Gin", '1 part(s) Blue Curacao', '1 part(s) Creme de Banane', '1 Pear pureed', '2 part(s) Apple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass. Decorate with fan of 3 pears.

Name: Roll Me Over And Take Me Home
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Ouzo']
Making: Combine over ice cubes into a lowball glass.

Name: Rolls Royce
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Benedictine']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Rolls-Royce
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Benedictine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Roman Coke
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', 'Coca Cola']
Making: 'Rum and Coke' with the 'Roman' twist of Sambuca. Get it? Mix over ice and top with Coca Cola. Garnish with a lemon or lime slice.

Name: Roman Riot
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1 1/2 oz. Galliano', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Romance Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Brandy', '1/4 oz. Curacao', '1/2 oz. Amer Picon', '1/2 oz. French Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Italian Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Romulan Ale
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '6 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce', '7-Up']
Making: Mix all ingredients together. Pour into a tall, narrow glass and fill with 7-Up. Add a grain of salt.

Name: Romulan Dream
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '2/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '2/3 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Stir and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Romulan Nipple Twister
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Throw 3 cups of ice into a blender and add the shots. Blend until smooth. Pour the alcohol slushie into cups. It should yeild about 4 - 5 8oz. cups. After the cups are filled float a half shot of 151 on top of each. This drink has very little bite going down and tastes like a Jamocha shake.

Name: Rong's Finnigan's Wake
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 Guinness']
Making: Combine in a highball glass or half a pint glass and enjoy. Dave says that this drink is very drinkable, so beware.

Name: Roosta Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Partida Blanco Tequila', '1 part(s) Roostas No 5 Bloody Mary Mix', '1 part(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake and Strain into a cocktail glass. Serve with an orange wheel. Arthur Infeld is well know in the Miami bar scene and has recently created his own Roostas No 5 Bloody Mary Mix. – Arthur Infeld, Town Kitchen & Bar, Miami

Name: Root Beam
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', "12 oz. Root Beer Barq's"]
Making: Combine Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey and root beer over ice in a tall glass.

Name: Root Beer #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Galliano', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Cola']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with cola.

Name: Root Beer Barrel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', 'Beer']
Making: Fill a beer mug half full of beer and a shot glass with the schnapps. Drop the shot into the mug and shoot the whole thing.

Name: Root Beer Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '4 oz. Root Beer']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the root beer. Stir well. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Root Beer Stassis
Ingredients: ['1/3 part(s) Root Beer', '2/3 part(s) Vanilla Vodka']
Making: Pour vanilla vodka over ice in a rocks glass. Fill with root beer. Stir and serve.

Name: Root Meister
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '6 oz. Root Beer (A and W)']
Making: Mix in an old fashioned glass over ice.

Name: Root of All Evil
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Pernod Absinthe', '3 part(s) Root Beer']
Making:
Fill cocktail glass with ice. Pour in Pernod Absinthe and top with a quality Root Beer.
Grown-up Halloween Parties can full of campy and ghoulish surprises...whether it’s fangs in the punch or blood red cocktails, the opportunity to get creative for an evening of imbibing is endless! Pernod Absinthe, however, requires no added gimmicks to make cocktails that are perfect for Halloween!
Pernod is the ORGINAL Absinthe and it was the favorite drink of some seriously deviant art and literary greats like Edward Allen Poe, Van Gogh and Oscar Wilde. Now available in the US, Pernod Absinthe is an authentic way to add an aura of 18th century-style drama and mystery to a modern Halloween celebration... Its eerie green color and legendary status make Pernod Absinthe the smart host’s spirit of choice.

Name: Rootbeer Float #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Light Cream', 'Cola']
Making: Pour vodka, Galliano, and light cream into a collins glass filled with ice cubes and stir well. Fill with cola, stir lightly and top with whipped cream.

Name: Rootbeer Float #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', 'Beer']
Making: Pour the schnapps in a shot glass and drop the shot glass in the glass of beer. Guzzle the entire thing…it tastes just a rootbeer float.

Name: Rootbeer Float #4
Ingredients: ['2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', 'Root Beer']
Making: Add vanilla ice cream into a tall glass. Add 1 oz. bourbon and fill with rootbeer. Garnish with whipping cream.

Name: Rootbeer Float #5
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's French Kiss Vanilla Schnapps", 'Root Beer', 'Cream']
Making: Fill glass with root beer and add French Kiss. Float the cream

Name: Rootbeer Paralyzer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '4 oz. Milk', '3 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Combine ingredients over ice. Stir and enjoy!

Name: Rory O'more
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Rosa Creme
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Vodka', '1/4 oz. Peppermint Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Bacardi Lemon']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with mint leaves.

Name: Rosalind Russell
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Aquavit (Preferably Danish Aalborg Aquavit)', '1/2 oz. Vermouth']
Making: Stir in a collins glass.

Name: Rose Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. French Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Kirsch', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix in a highball glass.

Name: Rose Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Coat rim of a cocktail glass with lemon juice and powdered sugar. Shake with ice and strain into the prepared glass.

Name: Rose Cocktail #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Rose Cocktail (English)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine', 'Powdered Sugar']
Making: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip into powdered sugar. Shake vermouth, gin, brandy, lemon juice, and grenadine with ice, strain into the sugar-rimmed glass, and serve.

Name: Rose Cocktail (French)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Rose Kiss
Ingredients: ['Pineapple', 'Mint', '2 part(s) Courvoisier Rose', '1/2 part(s) Dry Vermouth (French)', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/4 part(s) Simple Syrup', '3 splash(es) Peychaud Bitters']
Making: Start by muddling pineapple & mint in a cocktail shaker. Add the remaining ingredients, shake well and pour into a rocks glass. Garnish with a fresh pineapple chunk.

Name: Rose Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. SENCE Traditional Rose Nectar', '1 1/2 oz. Milagro Silver Tequila', '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 dash(es) Simple Syrup (Sonoma Syrup Pomegranate Infused)']
Making:
Shake all ingredients with ice; strain and serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a floating rose petal.
Created by Pascal Courtin, Brand Ambassador, Sidney Frank Importing Co. Inc.

Name: Rose of Warsaw
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Wyborowa Pure Vodka', '1 oz. Cherry Liqueur (Preferably Wisniak Cherry Liqueur)', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Rose-Colored Glasses
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Pink Lemonade']
Making: Stir well over ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: Roselyn Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Rosencrantz
Ingredients: ['Champagne', '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix together. Light it on fire for a flaming rosencrantz.

Name: Rose’ Zipang
Ingredients: ['2 oz. SENCE Traditional Rose Nectar', 'Zipang Sparkling Sake']
Making:
Pour SENCE Rose Nectar in a flute and fill with chilled Sparkling Sake.
Created by Pascal Courtin, Brand Ambassador, Sidney Frank Importing Co. Inc.

Name: Rosie's Day Off
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Sake', '1 1/2 oz. Grape Juice (white)', '1 1/2 oz. Club Soda', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Build over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Rosita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Campari']
Making: Stir in an old-fashioned glass with cracked ice. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Rosmarino Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Partida Agave Nectar rosemary infused', '1 Egg White', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters rosemary/grapefruit']
Making: Place all ingredients in a shaker and shake DRY, WITHOUT ICE 15-20 seconds. Then WITH ICE 15-20 seconds strain into a short glass. Place 2 large dashes of bitters inside the dry side of the mixing tin or into the mixing glass, if using a Boston set. Add 1-11/2 oz of soda into the tin using the spout to pour soda over the film left in the tin from the egg white and gather a foamy mixture. They will combine to create a reddish-brown foam/soda mixture which should be used to fill the glass and create an aromatic head to complete the drink.

Name: Roswell
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour orange juice, cranberry juice and rum over ice into an 8 oz. glass. Add the splash of pineapple juice and enjoy!

Name: Round Robin
Ingredients: ['1 Egg White', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 oz. Absinthe', '1 oz. Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass.

Name: Roxy
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. 4 Copas Blanco', '3/4 oz. 4 Copas Organic Agave Nectar', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '2 Strawberries Organic', '5 Cilantro Leaves']
Making: Muddle syrup, lime, strawberries, and cilantro. Add ice, tequila and shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass or over ice tall. Garnish with a fresh strawberry and a cilantro sprig.

Name: Royal Assassin
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Sprite']
Making: Combine in a highball glass.

Name: Royal Clover Club Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tbsp. Grenadine', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a sour glass, and serve.

Name: Royal Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a sour glass, and serve.

Name: Royal F**k
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine ingredients in a hurricane glass, fill with pineapple juice and dash of grenadine. Shake and serve over ice.

Name: Royal Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 Egg', 'Cola']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except cola) with ice and strain into a chilled collins glass. Fill with cola and serve.

Name: Royal Flush #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix over rocks, strain and serve.

Name: Royal Flush #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Crown Royal', '2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build over rocks, strain and serve.

Name: Royal Flush #4
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Level Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec or Cointreau', '2 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Pom Wonderful', '1/2 oz. Passion Fruit Coulis']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice until well blended, strain over fresh ice in a tall highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: Royal Gin Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Name: Royal Hot Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '8 oz. Hot Chocolate']
Making: Pour Chambord Raspberry Liqueur and creme de cacao into a coffee mug (or Irish coffee mug for elegance) and fill with hot chocolate.

Name: Royal Smile Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Brandy', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Royal Stretch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '3 oz. Sparkling Water', 'splash(es) Cherry Juice or Grenadine']
Making:
Serve over ice in tall glass with mint leaf garnish.
The Royal Stretch is a refreshing drink alternative for race day. The blend of Crown Royal paired with brisk sparkling water and a hint of cherry juice is easy to make and satisfying.

Name: Royal Tart
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Fill with cranberry juice and garnish with an apple slice

Name: Royalty Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Blue Curacao', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1 Egg', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, Curacao, sugar, and egg. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the Club Soda. Stir well.

Name: RSV Happiness
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Russian Standard Vodka', '2 oz. Vermouth', '3 oz. Cherry Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Egg White', 'Anise']
Making:
Muddle fresh anise in Boston shaker. Add all other ingredients and shake vigorously. Strain into glass and garnish with fresh cherries.
Created by Jeff Josenhans. San Diego, California

Name: RSV Love
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Russian Standard Vodka', "1/2 oz. L'Espirit de June", '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Rosemary (Syrup)', '1 1/4 oz. Strawberry (Puree)', '3 dash(es) Fee Brothers Rhubarb Bitters']
Making:
Combine all ingredients into a pint glass. Shake well for 10 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish is a Fresh Strawberry with fresh Rosemary.
Created by J.R. Starkus. RM Seafood, Las Vegas, Nevada

Name: RSV Love #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sake (rose petal infused)', '1/2 oz. Russian Standard Vodka (rose petal infused)', '1/2 oz. Rose Water', '1 splash(es) Ginger Syrup', "Sparkling Wine (Cremant d'Alsace)"]
Making:
Shake all ingredients in Boston shaker, strain into a cocktail glass. Top with sparkling wine, 2 grinds of Grains of Desire spice (dried rose petals, dried ginger, dried nutmeg, peppercorn, dried ginseng). Float sparkling wine. Garnish with a rose bud. Pre-make infusion of Rose petals, Sake and Russian Standard Vodka.
Created by Philip Khandehrish of The Setai in Miami

Name: RSV Passion
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Russian Standard Vodka', '2 oz. Tea (Organic Jasmine- warm)', '1 oz. Don Pedro Brandy (1979 Don PX Pedro Ximenez Gran Reserva)', '1 oz. Grand Marnier 100 Year', '1 1/2 tsp. Fig (puree)', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '10 drop(s) Fee Brothers Rhubarb Bitters']
Making:
Mix all ingredients (except the Bitters) in a mixing glass with no ice. Stir and double strain through a mesh strainer to remove the fig seeds. Add bitters and garnish. Garnish with Organic Figs soaked in Pedro Ximenez skewered on a tea tree scented toothpick.
Created by Alexander Velez. Santa Fe, New Mexico

Name: Ruby Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '3 dash(es) Grenadine', '3/4 oz. Applejack']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Ruby Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg White', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except carbonated water) with ice and strain into a highball glass over two ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Name: Ruby In The Rough
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 tsp. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Ruby Partida
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Partida Reposado Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice Ruby Red', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis']
Making:
Shake the first 4 ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Dribble the Â½ oz French Cassis down the inside of the glass so it will settle at the bottom.
Recipe by King Cocktail - Dale De Groff.

Name: Ruby Red
Ingredients: ['WKD Original Vodka Blue', 'Port']
Making: Fill a glass two thirds full with the WKD and then fill the rest with port. It should taste close to vimto.

Name: Ruby Runner (Ruby Tuesday's Rest)
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '3/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum']
Making: Shake the Malibu, brandy, banana liqueur and the juices with ice. Strain into a highball glass and add a splash of grenadine and a splash of Bacardi. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Ruby Soho
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry. Enjoy from Ruby at the Baja Night Club on Vernon Hills, IL

Name: Ruby Tuesday
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Gin', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass, fill with Cranberry Juice and garnish with mint.

Name: Ruby's Anti-Freeze
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Vodka', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Fill a highball glass halfway with pineapple juice and Mountain Dew. Add the Blue Curacao. The drink turns a nice greenish color just like anti-freeze! Add vodka for an extra kick.

Name: Ruddy Scotch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Single Malt Scotch Whisky', '1 splash(es) Cranberry-Raspberry Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Put ingredients in order in a highball glass filled with ice. Top with ginger ale. Garnish with raspberries if desired

Name: Rude Wingless Pigeon
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Ouzo', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 Egg']
Making: Pour all the drinks into a shaker. Crack the egg into the shaker. Shake powerfully. Pour over crushed ice. Garnish with a cherry. Enjoy.

Name: Ruhr Skipper
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Vodka', '2/3 oz. Cherry Brandy', '2/3 oz. Multivitamin Juice']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass.

Name: Rum And Bitter Lemon
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Myer's Dark Rum", 'Bitter Lemon']
Making: Fill old fashioned glass with 3-4 cubes of ice. Add Myer's Dark Rum and Bitter Lemon. Stir and serve with a slice of lemon.

Name: Rum And Black
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '3 oz. Black Currant Juice']
Making: Fill a glass 3/4 with crushed ice. Pour in dark rum and black currant juice.

Name: Rum and Coke
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '6 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Pour rum over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with cola. Stir. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Rum And Coko
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '4 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix together and serve over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Rum and Ginger
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '6 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour rum over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with Ginger Ale. Stir. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Rum Bana
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Jamaica Rum', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1/4 Banana (Sliced)']
Making: Frappe in a champagne flute.

Name: Rum Cobbler #1
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '3 oz. Club Soda', '2 oz. Dark Rum']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass, dissolve the sugar in the Club Soda. Add crushed ice until the glass is almost full. Add the rum. Stir well. Garnish with a cherry and orange and lemon slices.

Name: Rum Cobbler #2
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. Club Soda', '2 oz. White Rum']
Making: Mix sugar and Club Soda in a highball glass and wait for sugar to dissolve. Add rum and stir.

Name: Rum Cola
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '2 oz. Rum', 'Cola']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with cola.

Name: Rum Collins #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake rum, juice of lime, and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry.

Name: Rum Collins #2
Ingredients: ['1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. White Rum', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass with several ice cubes. Fill with Club Soda and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry.

Name: Rum Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '4 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour the rum and soda into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Rum Daisy #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Rum Daisy #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '2 oz. White Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a stein or metal cup. Add 1 ice cube and garnish with an lemon twist.

Name: Rum Dubonnet
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 tsp. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Rum Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum', '6 oz. Milk', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Name: Rum Fix
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Water', '2 1/2 oz. White Rum']
Making: Stir first 3 ingredients together in a highball glass and fill glass with ice. Add rum and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Rum Fizz
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Soda Water']
Making: Shake first 3 ingredients and pour into an ice filled 12 oz. glass. Top with soda water and garnish with lime.

Name: Rum Flip
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass and fill with milk. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Rum Gimlet
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Pour the rum and Rose's Lime Juice into a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Rum Highball
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour into a highball glass over ice cubes and fill with Ginger Ale. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Rum Julep
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/6 oz. Simple Syrup', '2 sprig(s) Mint']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle simple syrup with mint leaves. Fill glass with shaved/crushed ice and pour in rum. Stir. Garnish with additional mint sprig.

Name: Rum Milk Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 cup(s) Milk', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Name: Rum Old-fashioned
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 tsp. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1 tsp. Water']
Making: Stir powdered sugar, water, and Bitters in an old-fashioned glass. When sugar has dissolved add ice cubes and white rum. Garnish with the twist of a lime peel and float 151-proof rum on top.

Name: Rum Punch #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with equal parts of each juice.

Name: Rum Relaxer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour first 3 ingredients into a parfait glass and fill with lemon lime soda. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Rum Rickey
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', 'Club Soda']
Making: Pour into highball glass over ice cubes and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Rum Rummer (the Best Yet)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Rum Runner
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '3 oz. Pina Colada Mix', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Blend with ice and pour into a cocktail glass. Top with the Bacardi 151. This recipe was made by Jose on a Princess Cruise Ship.

Name: Rum Runner #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '5 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Rum Runner #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice', '2 tsp. Lime Juice', '1 1/2 tsp. Sugar Syrup', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass rimmed with salt.

Name: Rum Runner #3
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bacardi Amber Rum', "3/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass rimmed with salt.

Name: Rum Runner #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into an old-fashioned glass rimmed with salt.

Name: Rum Runner #5
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Admiral Nelson's Coconut Rum", '1/2 oz. Arrow Blackberry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Arrow Banana Cream Liqueur', 'splash(es) Pineapple Juice', 'splash(es) Orange Juice', 'splash(es) Grenadine', 'splash(es) Dark Rum']
Making: Shake well and serve over ice.

Name: Rum Runner (20 oz.)
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/4 oz. Blackberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Blend with 8 oz. crushed ice until the mixture is slushy.

Name: Rum Runner (Tiki John's)
Ingredients: ['3/8 oz. Bacardi Black Rum', '3/8 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', "3/4 oz. Creme de Banane (Preferably Hiram Walker's)", "3/4 oz. Blackberry Brandy (Preferably Hiram Walker's)", '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', "dash(es) Grenadine (Preferably Giroux's)"]
Making: Mix in a blender with ice. Serve in a 12oz. glass. Served best in the Keys, Florida.

Name: Rum Runner NYC Style
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Banana Creme Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'Sour Mix', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake with ice with equal parts of sour mix and pineapple juice. Pour into a glass and float with the 151 Proof Rum.

Name: Rum Scoundrel
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Lime Juice', '2/3 oz. White Rum', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Pour into a sugar rimmed old-fashioned glass.

Name: Rum Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '5 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour rum into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice, stir, and serve.

Name: Rum Sling
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jamaica Rum', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'Club Soda']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Rum Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Rum Sweetie
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Blend with 8 oz. of crushed ice until the mixture is slushy.

Name: Rum Swizzle
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 dash(es) Bitters', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of 2 oz. carbonated water and juice of lime in a collins glass. Fill glass with ice and stir. Add Bitters and rum. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve with a swizzle stick.

Name: Rum Swizzle #2
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Gosling's Black Seal Rum", "1 oz. Gosling's Gold Rum", '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 dash(es) Grenadine', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: In a tall glass with ice, pour Gosling's Black Seal Rum, Gosling's Gold Rum, orange juice, pineapple juice, dash of grenadine and a dash of Angostura Bitters. Garnish with an orange.

Name: Rum Toddy
Ingredients: ['1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 tsp. Water', '2 oz. Rum']
Making: Mix sugar and Club Soda in a highball glass and wait for sugar to dissolve. Add rum and stir. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Rum Waverunner
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '2 oz. Malibu Rum', '5 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Stir well.

Name: Rumalright
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a lowball glass.

Name: Rummy Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 3/4 oz. Lemon Lime Mix']
Making: Blend in blender with a scoop of crushed ice.

Name: Rumple Dew
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rumple Minze', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice. Pour Rumple Minze and fill with Mountain Dew. Stir well. Enjoy!

Name: Rumsfeld and Coke
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1 oz. Dark Rum', 'Coca Cola', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour the two rums into a highball glass. Add the Coca Cola and mix. Add the Irish Cream and the drink will fizz violently.

Name: Run Away Train
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', 'Grapefruit Juice', 'Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass with ice. Fill with equal parts grapefruit juice, sweet and sour mix and Coca Cola.

Name: Runaway Cab
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Cola (RC)', '2 oz. Bacardi Rum']
Making: Mix and drink. This was put together at a Runaway Cab concert among all places!

Name: Ruptured Duck
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Creme de Noyeaux', '2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Russian Banana
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Russian Bear
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 tbsp. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Russian Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Russian Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Brandy', '1/3 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters', 'dash(es) Absinthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Russian Fisherman
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 Cracker (Small Goldfish)']
Making: Chill vodka, pour into large shot glass and add fish. Drink quickly or fish will float.

Name: Russian Funk
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Russian Vodka', 'dash(es) Lime Juice', '1/2 tsp. Sugar', 'Perrier']
Making: Blend vodka, lime and sugar, top with Perrier Water, serve in highball glass.

Name: Russian Kamikaze #1
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 tsp. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Stir and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Russian Kamikaze #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', 'Cream (Or milk)']
Making: Combine in a lowball glass and stir gently.

Name: Russian Mist
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Pour vodka over ice in a low ball glass. Add peppermint schnapps and seve.

Name: Russian Mountain
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '12 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: In a 16 oz. glass add the Mountain Dew to the vodka and drink.

Name: Russian Nog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1 oz. Eggnog']
Making: Stir over ice in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Russian Quaalude
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Frangelico', '1 1/2 oz. Milk']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Russian Quallude
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Fill a shaker with ice and add Frangelico, Kahlua, Baileys and vodka. Add half and half and shake well. Strain over cracked ice in a large 16 ounce glass. (very frothy at this point....you need the big glass...unless you're serving this for two!) ENJOY!!

Name: Russian Rose
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka (Or any other strawberry-flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a rose.

Name: Russian Sombrero
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Coffee Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Mix all ingredients with cracked ice in a blender and serve in a chilled glass.

Name: Russian Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Orange Juice (To taste)']
Making: Mix with ice in a collins glass and enjoy.

Name: Russian Tea Haus
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '4 oz. Iced Tea']
Making: Mix over ice.

Name: Russian Therapy (Jack Style)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Russian Standard Vodka', '1 wedge(s) Lime', '5 oz. Ginger Beer (Regatta)']
Making:
Build cocktail over ice in your Russian Standard Copper Mug. Add Russian Standard Vodka. Squeeze a wedge of lime. Top with Regatta ginger beer.
