With the Emmys just around the corner, it’s time to start thinking about how and where you’ll be spending the star-studded evening. Whether you’ll be throwing a Hollywood-worthy bash for your friends or be curled up on the couch, we’ve got the perfect cocktails to compliment your night. Each of the following creations pays homage to some of this year’s newcomers and also the staples; and assures that you’ll have the perfect drink in hand no matter which show gets your vote!
30 ROCK
In true Liz Lemon Style, this is for the lazy drinker. Can’t figure out how to blend and mix complex ingredients, looking for a simple yet serious drink? Well look no further, Russian Standard is here to take your favorite show to a whole new level. Russia’s number one vodka offers a super easy to make cocktail, Even Liz could pull this one off!

Name: Russian Turkey
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Stir in lowball glass.

Name: Russian Vacation
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a highball glass. Add ice. Stir.

Name: Russina Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Russjkov
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Russkie Libre
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', 'Coca Cola', 'Lemonade']
Making: Mix ingredients in a highball glass over ice and fill with equal parts Coca Cola and lemonade.

Name: Rusty Nail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Scotch', '1/4 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Build in an old-fashioned glass and float Drambuie. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Rusty Shovel
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Serve over ice.

Name: Rusty Spoon
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum', '3 oz. Beer', '5 oz. Apple Cider']
Making: Mix chilled rum with apple cider and slowly pour into a mug of beer. Stir and enjoy.

Name: Rusty's Tropical Treat
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Sour Mix', '1/3 oz. Sunny Delight Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Pour in order in a glass 3/4 full of ice. For those who like it stiffer you may want to add more vodka then lemon sour.

Name: Ryan's Raspberry Long Island Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1 oz. Sour Mix', 'Coca Cola or Pepsi']
Making: Fill a 12 oz. glass with ice. Add all the liquor in order given, then add sour mix. Fill with either Coca Cola or Pepsi and stir. Decorate with a lemon slice and serve.

Name: Rye Highball
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rye Whiskey', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with Ginger Ale. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Rye Whiskey Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rye Whiskey', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: S & M Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Sprite (Or equivalent)', 'Lemonade (Country Time Berry Lemonade)']
Making: Combine Black Haus, vodka and Sprite over ice in a 12 oz. glass. Top up with the berry lemonade, stir and enjoy!

Name: S And K's Specialty
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Grape Pucker', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Combine Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps, Watermelon Pucker, Apple Pucker, Grape Pucker, Pineapple Juice and Sprite in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain over ice into two cocktail glasses. Garnish with a marischino cherry.

Name: S and M
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. DeKuyper Tropical Pineapple Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Pine Orange Banana Fruit Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Mix all ingredients but 7-Up in a shaker. Pour into a cocktail glass and top with 7-Up to taste.

Name: S. C. S. U. A. A. W. 151 Times In The Dark Mexican Style
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Galliano', '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Dark Rum', '1 splash(es) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake all the ingredients, except the Bacardi, with ice. Serve in a tall glass and add the Bacardi. Do not garnish. Note: The following is the whole name of the drink, but we had to abbreviate it for programming purposes: Slow Comfortable Screw Up Against A Wall 151 Times In The Dark, Mexican Style.

Name: S.C. Melon Balls
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Melon Liqueur', "2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: S.L.U.T. (Salt Lake Urban Transit)
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Southern Comfort 100 Proof', '4 oz. Vernors Ginger Soda']
Making: Mix it all together in a cocktail glass with ice and consume.

Name: S.S. Frutie
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 part(s) Orange Juice', '1 part(s) 7-Up', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Fill up a glass half way with ice. Then fill it half way up with vodka (the ice should be floating a little). Then fill the rest of the glass with equal amounts of orange juice pineapple juice and 7-up. Add a dash of grenadine to top it off.

Name: S.W.A.T. (Sweet Wild And Twisted)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass and fill with Sprite.

Name: Sabai Sabai (Thai Welcome Drink)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice Fresh Squeezed', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup', 'pinch(es) Basil Sweet Thai', 'Club Soda']
Making: Pour Mekhong and the rest of the ingredients except Club soda into a mixing glass. Add Ice and shake vigorously for 7-8 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini-cocktail glass. Top off with Club Soda.

Name: Sabin Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Firewater', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Combine in a shot glass and drop a cherry in the glass.

Name: Sabuzzo
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 Banana', '1 oz. Espresso (Fresh and hot)', '1 oz. Chocolate Syrup (Thick)']
Making: Add all ingredients into a blender. To ensure a nice thick consistency give the blender a good shake or two while blending. Make sure you hold both ends though, trust me! Pour into a large cocktail glass and there you have a Sabuzzo. Oh, by the way, when making this use good Italian coffee or don't bother at all because it just won't be the same.

Name: Saga 7
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sagatiba Pura Cachaca', '1 Lime', '3 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Squeeze lime wedge into a long glass full of ice. Add Sagatiba and top up with soda. You can also try it with Italian lemon soda.

Name: Sagatiba Brazilian Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sagatiba Pura Cachaca', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice, and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Sagatiba Classic Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sagatiba Pura Cachaca', '2 wedge(s) Lime', '2 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Place the lime and sugar in an old-fashioned glass and mash gently with a muddler. Add ice, pour Sagatiba and stir well.

Name: Sagatiba Fresh Mary
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sagatiba Pura Cachaca', '4 Tomatoes Cherry', '4 Basil leaves', '2 wedge(s) Lime', '2 1/2 oz. Tomato Juice', '1 dash(es) Hot Sauce', '1 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', 'Salt to taste']
Making: Muddle cherry tomatoes and lime in a shaker. Add salt, Worcestershire sauce and hot sauce, basil, tomato juice, Sagatiba and ice. Shake well and serve in a long glass garnished with basil.

Name: Sagatiba Mediterranean Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sagatiba Pura Cachaca', '3 Strawberries', '3 Grapes', '4 Basil Leaves', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Chop the fruit and muddle in a cocktail shaker with sugar and basil until the sugar is dissolved in the juice. Add Sagatiba Pura and ice and shake well. Serve in an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Sagatiba Saga Summer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sagatiba Pura Cachaca', '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '2 slice(s) Cucumber', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 slice(s) Lemon', '2 slice(s) Lime', '2 slice(s) Orange', '2 Raspberries or other seasonal berries', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake fruit slices, orange liqueur, cranberry juice, Sagatiba with ice in a cocktail shaker. Serve in a large fluted glass, top with ginger ale and garnish with cucumber.

Name: Sailor J's Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sailor Jerry Spiced Navy Rum', '2 splash(es) Sour Mix', 'Sprite']
Making: Combine over ice in a cocktail glass and top with Sprite.

Name: Saint Moritz
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'dash(es) Cream']
Making: Pour in a shot glass.

Name: Saint Petersburg
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Vodka', '4 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange peel.

Name: Saint Slater The Sinner
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', '5 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake over ice and serve in a highball glass.

Name: Saison Dubonnet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1/4 oz. Creme de Cassis Theuriet', '6 oz. Ale Saison Dupont Belgian']
Making:
Add the Dubonnet and cassis to a mixing glass, then fill with ice; stir and strain into a white wine glass. Top with Saison Dupont; garnish with a twist of lemon.
Created by Jim Meehan – PDT

Name: Sake Sangria
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Sake', '1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a slice of lime or other fresh fruit.

Name: Sake Siesta
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Sake', '1 oz. Light Rum', '4 oz. Pomegranate Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a wedge of pineapple.

Name: Sake Sunrise
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Sake', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Champagne']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a splash of champagne and garnish with a flower.

Name: Saketini #1
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 tsp. Sake']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin with the sake. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Saketini #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sake']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist wrapped with pickled ginger.

Name: Sakura Blossom
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Umeshu (Japanese Sour Plum Wine)', '1 oz. Sake', 'Sprite', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass, fill nearly full with Sprite and add lots of grenadine.

Name: Salome's Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. French Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Gin', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Salonis Nailer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 tsp. Wildberry Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix with ice and strain over ice cubes into a cocktail glass.

Name: Salt Water Gator
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Gatorade', '1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 tsp. Salt']
Making: Add tequila to Gatorade to a 10 oz. glass over ice. Stir in salt (or salt rim of glass). Pour over ice. Enjoy on a hot afternoon.

Name: Salty Dog
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Stir in a salt rimmed highball glass and fill with grapefruit juice.

Name: Salty Dog Collins
Ingredients: ['1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/4 tsp. Salt', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Sam Houston Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sam Houston Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into chilled martini glass and serve.

Name: Sam's Blackcurrant Ice
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Black Currant Cordial', 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour the Malibu in a highball glass filled with ice and add as much Blackcurrant as desired. Top up with lemonade and serve with a straw.

Name: Sam's Sweetie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 oz. Lemonade', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake all the ingredients (except the grenadine) and strain into a highball glass filled with ice. Gently pour the grenadine. Garnish with a straw. Very sweet and extremely delicious.

Name: Sam-Tini
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Sambuca', 'dash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange.

Name: Samarkand Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Zinamom Cinnamon Vodka', '6 oz. Orange Juice (Freshly squeezed)', '1 tbsp. Grenadine']
Making: Mix orange juice in a chilled highball glass with a few ice cubes. Top with grenadine so it runs down the inside of glass, creating a sunset effect.

Name: Samba Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cachaca Fazenda Mae de Ouro', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour Crème de Cassis and Cachaça into a tall glass. Fill with ice and top with fresh squeezed orange juice.

Name: Sambuca Fire
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Fill a wine glass half full with Sambuca. Light the Sambuca with a match and leave burning. Drink with straw.

Name: Sambuca Straight
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Pour in a brandy snifter and garnish with 3 coffee beans. Note: According to Italian tradition, an odd number of beans shows the guests they are welcome.

Name: Samie Howson (Special Ice Pop)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '3/4 oz. WKD Original Vodka Blue', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour Blue Caracao over ice in a highball glass. Fill 3/4 of the glass with Vodka Blue. Add fresh orange juice then use a straw to add grenadine to the bottom of the glass. The result tastes like the blueberry ice pops you used to get.

Name: Samuel De Champlain
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1 tbsp. Maple Syrup', '1 Lime', '8 sprig(s) Mint', 'Canada Dry']
Making: Place the mint leaves and maple syrup in a tall glass then squish it all around with a spoon for 20-30 seconds until you can smell that good minty smell. Cut the lime in half getting rid of the seeds as well as you can. Squeeze the juice out from both halves into the glass then drop one half into the glass. Pour in the whisky and stir. Add crushed ice then top off the mixture with ginger ale. Garnish with a sprig of mint and enjoy! Vive la Canada!

Name: San Diego Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1 cup(s) Ice Cream (Pineapple and papaya ice cream)', '1/2 cup(s) Tequila', '1/4 cup(s) Amaretto', '1 tbsp. Vanilla']
Making: Blend 2 cups of crushed ice with the tequila, orange juice, and Amaretto until slushy. Then add the ice cream and vanilla and blend on medium until slushy. Len's comments: It's a great breakfast drink! You can get the pineapple papaya ice cream at Niederfrank's ice cream in National City CA., or make your own.

Name: San Francisco
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Creme de Banane', '2 drop(s) Grenadine', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass and fill with orange juice. Float grenadine.

Name: San Francisco Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Sloe Gin', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: San Mateo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '2 Maraschino Cherries red', '2 Maraschino Cherries green', '3 drop(s) Bitters', '1/2 oz. Lemon', 'Grapefruit Soda or Wink']
Making: Add vodka, grenadine, marashino cherries, bitters and juice of 1/2 lemon over 3 ice cubes in a highball glass. Top up with grapefruit soda or Wink. Decorate with slices of orange.

Name: San Remo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pallini Raspicello', '4 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Pour into an ice filled highball glass and garnish with lemon slice and 2 raspberries.

Name: San Sebastian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 tsp. White Rum', '1 tbsp. Grapefruit Juice', '1 1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sanctuary
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Mango Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Muddle lime chunks and Cointreau. Build over ice in a Tulip Glass. Add mango and melon liqueurs. Top with dry ginger ale.

Name: Sand-Grown-Un
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sand-Martin Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Green Chartreuse']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Sandcrab
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Rum', '6 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Consume and dance.

Name: Sandeman Ciderhouse Sangria
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Sandeman Porto Founders Reserve', '24 oz. Apple Cider', '3 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Maple Syrup', '2 Apples (Granny Smith)', '2 Pears']
Making:
Dice apples and set aside. Mix all ingredients together in pitcher. Add in apples. Let sit for at least 12 hours.
The days are getting a little cooler, the ice cream lines a bit shorter, and the leaves a shade darker - and for once, we're excited about it. As we say good-bye to sandals, shorts and SPF 50, we happily welcome autumnal colors, weather, and best of all - flavors.
But change is never easy, and the transition from summer to fall should be a smooth one - right down to the cocktail in your hand. With this in mind, Sandeman Porto created this Ciderhouse Sangria, featuring Sandeman Founders Reserve Porto. While similar in approach to the summer sangria you know and love, this crowd-pleasing creation boasts autumn's most prized flavor components. Sandeman Founders Reserve serves as an ideal foundation for notes of apple, maple and spice to interlace seamlessly, with the end result calling forth memories of apple picking, campfire stories and - of course - sprints into leaf piles.

Name: Sandeman Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Sandeman Porto Founders Reserve', '1 1/2 part(s) Citrus Vodka', '2 part(s) Lemonade']
Making: Prepare and serve in a long drink glass. Fill the glass with ice. Add the ingredients and stir well. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: Sandeman Sangue Frio
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Sandeman Porto Founders Reserve', '1 1/2 part(s) Ginger Ale', '1/4 Apple (cut into small cubes)', '1/4 part(s) Orange Juice']
Making:
Combine all ingredients over ice. Mix and strain into an appropriately ghoulish glass.
Though we may have grown up believing that Halloween is just for kids, by now we know different. Whether the holiday is your excuse to dress up like the cowboy you always wanted to be or just to throw a good party, Halloween always means a celebration.
In keeping with the season, try serving Sandeman's Sangue Frio (Cold Blood). This devilish drink uses Sandeman Founders Reserve Port, a classic ruby port that gives the cocktail its crimson hue - perfect for that final dash of the macabre. For a larger affair, increase the recipe per head and mix as a punch. It's best served cold as the Grim Reaper's breath, and makes a festive display when presented in a hollowed-out pumpkin.

Name: Sandeman Sour
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sandeman Porto Founders Reserve', '1 1/4 oz. Wild Turkey Straight Rye Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 Egg White']
Making: Prepare the cocktail like a Collins. Pour whiskey, lemon juice and simple syrup into a mixing glass. Add ice and shake briefly. Strain over ice into a rocks or old-fashioned glass. Float the Sandeman Founders Reserve Porto on top and garnish with an orange and a brandied cherry.

Name: Sandeman Sparkler
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Sandeman 10 Year Old Porto', '3 part(s) Champagne']
Making:
Pour into a champagne glass.
This Valentine's Day, in lieu of a bunch of long stem roses for her, make your date a sexy cocktail to start out the night. Sandeman's Sweetheart Sparkler is an ideal drink of choice. Combining the new trend of port cocktails with the classic tradition of celebratory bubbles, the Sweetheart Sparkler is a sophisticated yet simple drink that is perfect for a fun, sexy celebration.

Name: Sandi Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Chill the Bacardi Rum, Malibu Rum and Blue Curacao. Pour into a chilled Martini Glass. Layer the pineapple juice on top.

Name: Sandra Buys A Dog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Anejo Rum', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Name: Sandy Landers
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend in a blender then serve in a long glass over ice.

Name: Sandys Sex Encore
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi White Rum', 'Raspberry Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour Bacardi White Rum over ice in a large cocktail glass. Add raspberry ginger ale and decorate with a lime twist.

Name: Sang de Dragon
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '3/4 oz. Tequila Gold (Or white)', '4 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix the whisky and the tequila in a shot glass. Put in 3-4 drops of Hot Tabasco Sauce. Optional: heat up in the microwave (20 seconds). Shoot. Try not to drink/eat anything for 5 minutes :-) (Also called Dragon's Blood)

Name: Sangria #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Claret', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '6 oz. Soda Water', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Stir in a collins glass.

Name: Sangrita
Ingredients: ['6 Tomato', '3 Oranges', '2 Limes', '1 White Onion', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 dash(es) Salt', '1 tsp. Cayenne Pepper']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Refrigerate.

Name: Santa Anita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Santa Barbara Ice Tea
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Layer in order in a highball glass (vodka at the bottom). To create a layered effect the juices are to be poured lightly! Splash 7-Up last. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice. The cocktail should look green on the bottom, with orange/yellow, and streaming cranberry colours throughout the middle and top of the cocktail. Serve, stir and enjoy!!!

Name: Santa Cruz Daisy
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '2 oz. Dark Rum', '3 dash(es) Sugar Syrup', '3 dash(es) Maraschino Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Soda Water']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Santa Maria
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 oz. Tequila Gold', 'dash(es) Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake gently with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Santa's Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Build in an ice-filled rocks glass. Garnish with grated cinnamon or a cinnamon stick and a lime wheel.

Name: Santiago Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/4 tsp. Grenadine', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Santiago Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Rum', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Santinas Pousse Cafe
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 oz. Orange Curacao', '1 oz. Cognac']
Making: Layer in order in a pousse cafe glass.

Name: Santini's Pousse Cafe
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 tbsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Rum']
Making: Pour into a pousse cafe glass.

Name: Sapphire Citrus
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1 part(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 part(s) Orange Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass.

Name: Sapphire French Martini Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1 1/2 part(s) Pineapple Juice', 'Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Drizzle raspberry liqueur.

Name: Sapphire Gin and Mint Nog
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Bombay Sapphire Gin', '2 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1 Tea Bags (peppermint)', '2 part(s) Eggnog']
Making: Pour Bombay Sapphire Gin into a mixing glass. Add the peppermint teabag, and let it steep for a couple of minutes. In the meantime, whip the egg white with sugar until stiff, and fold in the egg yolk, heavy cream, milk, and nutmeg. Combine equal parts eggnog and peppermint infused Bombay Sapphire Gin in a shaker over a small amount of ice, roll it, and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a mint leaf.

Name: Sapphire Ginger Grape Martini Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1 1/2 part(s) Cranberry Juice White', '4 slice(s) Ginger', '8 Grapes White']
Making: Muddle ginger, grapes and juice in a cocktail shaker. Add BOMBAY SAPPHIRE® Gin and ice. Shake well and double strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass.

Name: Sapphire Raspberry Mint
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1/2 Lemon', '1 dash(es) Simple Syrup', '5 Raspberries', '4 Mint Leaves', 'Club Soda']
Making: In a tall glass, muddle the raspberries and mint leaves. Fill the glass with ice and squeeze in the juice from half a lemon. Add simple syrup and BOMBAY SAPPHIRE Gin and mix thoroughly. Top with club soda or lemon-lime soda. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Sapphire Savoy
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Bombay Sapphire Gin', '2 part(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 part(s) Orange Liqueur']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon and a pinch of salt.

Name: Saratoga Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1 tsp. Pineapple Juice', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Saronno
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Brandy', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Sasha
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream (Chilled)', "4 oz. Root Beer (Preferably Barq's - chilled)"]
Making: Pour the chilled Bailey's into a collins glass then add the root beer (it foams like crazy). Sweet, smooth, creamy and delicious.

Name: Sasparilla Assassin
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Whiskey', '1 part(s) Tequila', '1 part(s) Peppermint Schnapps', 'Root Beer']
Making:
Pour into a lowball glass and fill with the Root Beer
This is certainly an interesting one. The flavor of the mixer determines the flavor of the drink; kind of like a Long Island Iced Tea. The Assassin one up’s that one though. Upon drawing a breath after quaffing this concoction, your mouth and throat are filled with a wonderful sensation which reminds you of the peppermint schnapps. The cocktail is about a four ounce drink, with the booze accounting for an ounce of that. Drink the Assassin before a meal of red meat or after it with a chocolaty desert.

Name: Sassy Lassi
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Mango Juice', '3 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Serve over ice in a cocktail glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Satan's Bitch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Whiskey', '2 oz. Jagermeister', '4 oz. Coca Cola', '7 oz. Faygo (Rock and Rye)']
Making: Combine in order over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Satan's Breath
Ingredients: ['1/4 part(s) Midori', '1/4 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1/4 part(s) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 part(s) 7-Up']
Making: Mix in an iced tea glass. Stir and serve.

Name: Satan's Little Helper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Raspberry Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Soda']
Making: Fill a pint glass 3/4 full of ice. Add the alcohol and splashes of Grenadine and Sweet and Sour Mix. Fill with the Cranberry Juice and splash the Soda. Garnish with cherries and lime and lemon wedges.

Name: Satan's Whiskers
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/4 oz. Grand Marnier', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Satan's Whiskers - Curled
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Curacao', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice and strain into a cocktail glass

Name: Saturday Morning
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cabana Cachaca', '1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Milk', '1 oz. Simple Syrup (Cacao)']
Making: Pour this mixture over a wide mouthed cup 2/3 full with corn flakes and Cabana soaked cranberry raisins

Name: Saucy Sue Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Apple Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Sauza Blooming Berry-rita
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Sauza Non-Alcoholic Classic Margarita Mix', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Raspberry Schnapps', '1/2 part(s) Sauza Silver Tequila', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice', 'Blueberries']
Making: Combine in shaker with ice and shake well. Strain into a margarita glass over ice. Garnish with blueberries.

Name: Sauza Empty Nester
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Sauza Silver Tequila', '1/2 part(s) Wine (Cabernet Sauvignon)', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Triple Sec', '1/2 part(s) Agave Nectar', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice in mixing glass. Shake and strain into a martini glass and garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Sauza Pomegranate Margarita
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Sauza Blue Silver Tequila', '3 cup(s) Pomegranate Juice', '1 cup(s) Coconut Cream', '2 oz. Dekuyper Pomegranate Liqueur', '2 oz. Orange Liqueur', '4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Rim your glasses; run a lemon wedge around the rim of your glass and dip in sugar. In a shaker filled with ice, combine pomegranate juice, coconut water, tequila, liquors and lemon juice. Shake and pour into prepared glasses. Garnish with a lemon wedge. For an extra special touch, add fresh pomegranate seeds to the cocktail and serve with a spoon so your guests can easily enjoy!

Name: Sauza Red Rocket
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Hornitos Reposado Tequila', '2 part(s) Cranberry Juice White', '1/2 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 squirt(s) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Angostura Bitters', "1 splash(es) Rose's Lime Juice", '1 splash(es) Sambuca', "1 splash(es) Creme d'Almond", '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao', 'Sloe Gin']
Making: Shake tequila, sambuca, lime, orange and Triple Sec over ice. Strain into a tall glass filled with crushed ice. Add sloe gin, poured down the side of the glass. Fill with cranberry juice and add splashes of Crème de Almond and Blue Curacao and serve.

Name: Sauza-rita
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Limeade (frozen)', '1 can(s) Sauza Silver Tequila', '1 bottle(s) Beer (light)', '1 can(s) Water']
Making: Pour limeade and beer into a pitcher filled with ice. Fill limeade can with Sauza® Silver, pour into pitcher. Fill limeade can with water, pour into pitcher. Stir and enjoy. Makes 9 servings.

Name: Savannah
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Savannah Ice Tea
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '3/4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Build over ice in a pint or collins glass.

Name: Save the Bee’s Knees
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cabana Cachaca', '1 oz. Honey Syrup', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 dash(es) Bitters (homemade blueberry)']
Making: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Savoy Sangaree
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Sherry']
Making: Stir in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange or a lemon peel and dust with nutmeg.

Name: Saxon
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '1 3/4 oz. Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange.

Name: Sazerac #1
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Ricard', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '2 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters', '1 tsp. Water', '2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey']
Making: Pour Ricard into a glass and swirl around to coat glass, discard any excess. Place the sugar, Peychaud Bitters, and water into other glass and muddle with the back of a spoon . Almost fill the glass with ice cubes. Pour the Bourbon whiskey over the ice cubes and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Sazerac #2
Ingredients: ['dash(es) Pernod Absinthe', '1 Sugar Cube', '1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', 'Peychaud Bitters']
Making: Stir in an old-fashioned glass and drop in the sugar cube that has been saturated with Peychaud Bitters. Garnish with an orange and a lemon twist.

Name: Scarlet Fever
Ingredients: ['14 oz. Vodka', '14 oz. White Rum', '8 oz. Dry Gin', '6 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix together and shake, pour into a draft glass, add 3 ice cubes and garnish with a lemon wheel on the side.

Name: Scarlett O'Hara
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Serve over ice in a tumbler glass and fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Scary Mary
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo Clasico', '3 oz. Tomato Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '4 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce (or Cholula)', '2 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '1 pinch(es) Salt', '1 pinch(es) Pepper']
Making: Mix in a tall glass and garnish with a celery stalk and a large shrimp.

Name: Scary's Code Red
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut 100 Vodka', '4 oz. Mountain Dew Code Red']
Making: Mix over ice.

Name: Sceptic
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Lemonade', 'Guinness']
Making: Build in a highball glass and float Guinness.

Name: Schalaley
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Schizophrenic Purple Squirrel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Light Rum (Or to taste)', '1 oz. Coconut Rum (Or to taste)', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', "1 oz. Creme d'Almond", '1 oz. Lime Juice (Freshly squeezed)', '1 oz. Club Soda (Or to taste)']
Making: Mix everything but Club Soda and shake well in a tumbler. Add the Club Soda and pour over ice in cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime with an Almond embedded in it.

Name: Schmoove
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '7-Up']
Making: Serve in 16 oz. glass filled with ice. Pour the Jameson and Grand Marnier. Fill with the 7-Up.

Name: Schnorkel
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Gold', '1/2 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: SchoolGirl
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine volka and peach schnapps over ice in a pint glass. Fill with equal amounts of cranberry juice and orange juice. Top with the splash of pineapple juice. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Schtroumpf
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Pastis (Preferably Berger Blanc)', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Water (To taste)']
Making: Mix with ice in a highball glass.

Name: Schwab A Wabba
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 pint(s) Lemonade', '1/3 pint(s) Orange Juice', 'White Rum (Optional -to taste)']
Making: Mix well.

Name: Schweetie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Scofflaw
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Scooby Snack #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum or Parrot Bay', '1/2 oz. Midori', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Blend ingredients and pour on ice.

Name: Scooby Snack (The Only One)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Midori', '1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '4 drop(s) Milk']
Making: Layer in a hurricane glass over ice. Gently mix so not to burn milk. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Scooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake all ingredients well with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Scorpion
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. White Rum', '2/3 oz. Dark Rum', '2/3 oz. Brandy', '2/3 oz. Orgeat Syrup', '2/3 oz. Orange Juice', '2/3 oz. Lime Juice', '2 dash(es) Gomme Syrup']
Making: Fill a 12 oz. wine glass with ice, add a lime wedge and transfer into shaker. Add ingredients, shake and pour back into glass. Garnish with a stirrer, a straw, a cherry, a pineapple stick, a parasol, and mint.

Name: Scorpion Queen
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '3 oz. Cherry Cola']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Scotch and Soda
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', 'Club Soda']
Making: Serve in a lowball glass and fill with Club Soda. Optional: Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Scotch and Water
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '5 oz. Water']
Making: Pour the Scotch and the water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Name: Scotch Bird Flyer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Light Cream', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

Name: Scotch Bishop Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice', '1/4 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Scotch Bounty
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a parfait glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

Name: Scotch Cobbler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '4 dash(es) Brandy', '4 dash(es) Curacao']
Making: Pour Scotch, brandy, and Curacao over ice in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a mint sprig.

Name: Scotch Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '3 dash(es) White Creme de Menthe', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Pour Scotch and creme de menthe over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Name: Scotch Daisy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, lemon juice, sugar, and grenadine. Shake well. Pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Scotch Fix
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Water', '2 oz. Scotch']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the sugar, lemon juice, and water. Shake well. Strain into a highball glass almost filled with crushed ice. Add the Scotch. Stir well and garnish with a cherry and a lemon slice.

Name: Scotch Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Pink Champagne']
Making: Pour into a champagne flute and garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Scotch Flip
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1 Egg', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, egg, sugar, and cream. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass and garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Scotch Highball
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Pour Scotch in a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: Scotch Holiday Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

Name: Scotch Milk Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '6 oz. Milk', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Scotch Mist #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch']
Making: Build in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and a short straw.

Name: Scotch Mist #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch']
Making: Pack a collins glass with crushed ice. Pour in the scotch and add the twist of lemon peel. Serve with a straw.

Name: Scotch Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: ['3 dash(es) Bitters', '3 oz. Scotch', '1 tsp. Water', '1 Sugar Cube']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass, muddle the Bitters and water into the sugar cube, using the back of a Tsp. . Almost fill the glass with ice cubes and add the Scotch. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry. Serve with a swizzle stick.

Name: Scotch on a Ladder
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine over ice into a collins glass, stir, drink and chase with a tequila.

Name: Scotch on the Rocks
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch']
Making: Pour Scotch into an old-fashioned glass 1/2 filled with ice.

Name: Scotch Rickey #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Pour Scotch and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with a rind of lime and serve.

Name: Scotch Rickey #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 oz. Scotch']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Scotch Royale
Ingredients: ['1 Sugar Cube', '1 1/2 oz. Scotch', 'dash(es) Bitters', 'Champagne (Chilled)']
Making: Place sugar cube in a champagne flute and add Scotch and Bitters. Fill with champagne.

Name: Scotch Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry.

Name: Scotch Stinger
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 1/2 oz. Scotch']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Scotch Tom Collins
Ingredients: ['6 dash(es) Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Scotch', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass and fill with Club Soda.

Name: Scott's Drink to Melissa
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Strawberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Screamin Greenie Weenie
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix into a cocktail glass on ice and hang on.

Name: Screamin' Orange Mother F**ker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Light Rum', '1 scoop(s) Sherbet orange', '4 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a blender with 4 ice cubes and blend until soupy. Pour into a cocktail glass. Adjust the rum amount until you find the perfect drink...this is a good and cheap drink that girls and guys both like!

Name: Screaming Against the Wall Orgasm
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Half and Half Cream']
Making: Add alcohol to tall glass filled with ice. Top with half and half. Shake and serve…..or….strain and pour into shot glasses.

Name: Screaming Banana Banshee
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Screaming Blue Monkey
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with Sour Mix. This drink is very good and was a hit with my regulars. Be sure to serve it cold with plenty of ice.

Name: Screaming Blue Monkey Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with sour mix. This drink is great. Be sure to serve it cold with plenty of ice.

Name: Screaming Cranapple
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Apple Schnapps', 'Cranberry Juice (To taste)', 'Sour Mix (To taste)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Screaming Mimi
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '3 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Screaming Monkey
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Creme de Banane', '3 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 splash(es) Malibu Rum', 'Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Fill with half and half cream. Can also be blended for a refreshing after dinner drink.

Name: Screaming Nazi #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Screaming Orgasm #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Pour vodka, then Irish Cream, then Kahlua into an old-fashioned glass over crushed ice. Stir. Use only high quality vodka. Cheap vodka can cause the Bailey's Irish Cream to curdle. Test by mixing 1 Tsp. of each first.

Name: Screaming Orgasm #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 1/2 oz. Galliano']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Screaming Orgasm #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Screaming Orgasm #4
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Screaming Orgasm #5
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Screaming Orgasm #6
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Fill a tall glass with ice and add liqueurs. Fill with Coca-Cola.

Name: Screaming Yellow Monkey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', 'Milk (Or cream)']
Making: Shake with ice and serve in a highball glass.

Name: Screw
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Screw 'Em Up
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. 7-Up', '1 oz. White Rum']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Screw By The Sea
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Cranberry-Strawberry Juice', '7 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. For a drier taste don't add ice to the glass. For a less dry to the mouth flavour add ice to the glass.

Name: Screw Up Against The Wall
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Galliano', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and stir.

Name: Screwdriver with a Twist
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Lemonade (You can use any lemon/lime carbonated beverage)', '1 slice(s) Lime']
Making: First mix together the orange juice and vodka and shake. Then pour the lemonade in, and stir. Garnish with a lime twist. Optional: Chill for half an hour.

Name: Screwed Strawberry Stripper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Build over ice.

Name: Screwing Squirts
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Squirt']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass over ice.

Name: Screwlimer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1/4 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Screwnail
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Orange Juice (Real orange juice)', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Beer']
Making: First a quick explanation: the drink does not taste as bad as it sounds; but tastes nothing like a "screwdriver". The "Screwnail" was made at a Sugar Coma party by complete fluke and is best kept that way so don't get hung-up on the measurements. Spill orange juice onto vodka (4oz:1oz or to taste) in a collins glass, then add the toenail of a bottle of beer (the yeasty part at the bottom of your chaser pint) and stir.

Name: Screwy Crazy Bastard
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix everything together with ice and have a good night.

Name: Scuba Steve
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice (except grenadine) and pour into a 12 oz. glass. Float the grenadine and garnish with cherries.

Name: Scud's Deal
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Hennessy Cognac XO', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '4 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix in an 8 oz. glass filled with ice.

Name: Sea Breez
Ingredients: ['Cranberry Juice', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Fill high ball glass with ice and fill to 3/4 with cranberry juice. Mix orange juice and vodka in separate glass, then pour into cranberry juice. Stir.

Name: Sea Breeze "Downeast"
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Combine the first 4 ingredients into a tall glass with ice and fill with grapefruit juice. Stir and garnish with slice of lime.

Name: Sea Breeze (Massachusetts style)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Flash blend and pour over ice. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Sea Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absinthe', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 Egg White', 'Seltzer Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with Seltzer Water.

Name: Sea Gull
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine over cracked ice in a collins glass and stir well.

Name: Sea Man
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Coconut Milk']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass over ice.

Name: Sea Mist
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Canadian Mist', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in an old-fashioned glass finishing with the splash of orange juice. Garnish with a wedge of lemon.

Name: Sea to Skyy
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1/2 oz. X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making:
Olympic inspired hand crafted cocktail
Shake all ingredients over ice, strain onto fresh ice in a highball glass and garnish with Star fruit.

Name: Sea Witch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Strega', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '3 oz. Sparkling Wine']
Making: Serve cold with a slice of lemon.

Name: Seaboard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves and serve.

Name: Seabreeze #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Build over ice, fill highball glass with 3/4 grapefruit juice and 1/4 cranberry juice.

Name: Seabreeze #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix over ice.

Name: Sean's Mom
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Canadian Whisky', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Fill a large glass with ice and add the Canadian whisky. Fill with Mountain Dew and serve.

Name: Seasons Blingings
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '2 part(s) Cranberry Juice', 'Champagne']
Making: Shake ABSOLUT with cranberry juice, and strain into a champagne flute. Top with chilled champagne. Garnish with a fresh berry.

Name: Seattle Slew
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Voyant Chai Cream Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur']
Making: Combine ingredients over ice in a shaker and shake well. Strain into an old fashioned glass over ice. Garnish with a few coffee beans.

Name: Seaweed
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Blue Curacao', '6 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Second Chance
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Spiced Rum', '4 oz. Sprite']
Making: Pour in a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with a twist of lime.

Name: Secret Ceremony
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Gin', '2 part(s) Strega', '7 part(s) Sprite', '1 dash(es) Italian Vermouth Punt e mes']
Making: Pour in a tall glass and garnish with a slice of lemon (without the peel) and a cherry.

Name: Secret Garden
Ingredients: ["2 part(s) Broker's London Dry Gin", '1/2 part(s) Pernod Absinthe', '1 part(s) Marie Brizard Parfait Amour', '4 dash(es) Orange Bitters Fee Bros.', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making:
Lavendar sugar rim, strained up in a cocktail. Garnish with a flower petal.
Created by Matthew Palumbo, Steehead Diner in Seattle, WA

Name: Secret Place
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '2 tsp. Brown Creme de Cacao', '4 oz. Coffee (Cold)']
Making: Pour all of the ingredients into an Irish coffee glass filled with crushed ice. Stir well.

Name: Sedona Airport Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: For a frozen Margarita blend with one cup of ice or serve on the rocks in a cocktail glass. Salt is optional. Garnish with a fresh slice of lime.

Name: Seeger's Mormon Killer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jamaica Rum', '1 oz. Tequila (With worm)', '1 oz. Whiskey (151 Proof)', '2 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Combine in a collins glass.

Name: Seelbach Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '4 dash(es) The Bitter Truth Creole Bitters', '1/3 oz. Cointreau', '4 dash(es) The Bitter Truth Aromatic Bitters', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a chilled champagne flute and stir. Fill with champagne and stir again. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Selina's Thing
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '2 oz. Milk', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Blend with a little ice.

Name: Seneca
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '1 bottle(s) Beer (Miller Lite)']
Making: Drink the beer then shoot the Seagram's 7.

Name: Sensation Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with sprigs of mint and serve.

Name: Sensious Orgasm
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. E & J VS Brandy', '1/2 oz. Milk (Or cream)']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass. (A nice drink for sipping)

Name: September Morn Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '4 dash(es) Grenadine', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass.

Name: September Morning
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 tsp. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sepultura
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absinthe', '1/2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps (Preferably Golden Stryke)', '1 Beer']
Making: Mix the two spirits in a shot glass, drink one quarter of the beer, then drop the full shot glass in the beer glass and shot it all! Remember Sepultura means Grave in Portuguese!

Name: Serendipity
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour Stolichnaya Vanilla Vodka over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with pineapple juice and enjoy. Could also be served as a shooter.

Name: Sergeant Batterton
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Seagram's Extra Dry Gin", '6 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix in a highball glass. When I was in the Army at Fort Gordon, Georgia, I met a guy named Charles Batterton. He was a Staff Sergeant in command of my detail. He introduced me to a wonderful little drink consisting of Mountain Dew and Seagram's Extra Dry Gin. It tasted like bubble gum and f**ked me up something good. It is a tasty little number and WILL get you drunk and happy. So this is my tribute to SSG Charles Batterton, one of the coolest people I've ever known. Gracias!

Name: Sergeant Major
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Brandy', '2 oz. Galliano']
Making: Stir in a lowball glass.

Name: Serpent's Kiss
Ingredients: ['1/4 part(s) Midori', '1/4 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1/4 part(s) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients in an iced tea glass. Stir and serve.

Name: Serpentine
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, brandy, vermouth, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Sestini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Build as a gin 'n tonic....1 1/2 oz. of Bombay Sapphire in a high ball glass. Add tonic water....and three green olives...sunk...as a garnish. First made in Providence Rhode Island in 97 in honor of its name sake Mr. Andrew DelSesto.

Name: Seven and Seven
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '6 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Put a few cubes of ice inside glass. Pour shot of Seagram's 7 into the glass, then pour 7-Up into glass. Shake or stir briskly.

Name: Seven Of Spades
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', "2 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '2 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Fill Tom Collins glass with ice. Pour in all ingredients and stir well. Serve with a cherry if desired.

Name: Seven Steps To Heaven
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Fill Hurricane glass with ice and pour in ingrediants.

Name: Seventh Heaven

Name: Seventh Heaven #1
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice']

Making: Cut 4 twists from the oranges (with knife or zester). Juice the oranges into a measuring jug (avoid seeds). Add sugar to juice and mix until completely dissolved. Chill 4 champagne glasses and divide juice mixture between each. Add a splash of Aperol to each glass then top up with cava. Garnish with an orange twist. Sit back and sip!

Name: Sex

Name: Sex Anywhere #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Sour Apple Schnapps', 'Zima']
Making: Pour sour apple schnapps and vodka over ice in a large glass then fill it up with Zima. This drink will mess you up.

In a tumbler, combine Russian Standard Vodka, lemonade and ice. Garnish with a slice of lemon.
As Hanukkah begins at sunset on December 20th, many preparations and traditions will unfold for the next 8 days. Dreidels will be spun, Menorahs will be lit and latkes will be consumed. So what is the modern Jew going to cheers their family and friends with? How about some kosher cocktails that are easily accessible to everyone! With Russian Standard Vodka being 100% Kosher, there are endless possibilities to the cocktails that can be created.

Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Russian Standard Vodka', '2 oz. Pom Wonderful', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making:
Shake Russian Standard Vodka, lemon juice and pomegranate juice gently over ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a mint leaf or lemon twist.
As Hanukkah begins at sunset on December 20th, many preparations and traditions will unfold for the next 8 days. Dreidels will be spun, Menorahs will be lit and latkes will be consumed. So what is the modern Jew going to cheers their family and friends with? How about some kosher cocktails that are easily accessible to everyone! With Russian Standard Vodka being 100% Kosher, there are endless possibilities to the cocktails that can be created.

Name: Shanaynay
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', '12 oz. Water', 'Lemonade (Powdered)']
Making: Mix the water and rum, add powdered lemonade to taste. Stir and enjoy!

Name: Shandy #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Beer', '1/2 pint(s) Lemonade']
Making: Pour into a beer mug and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Shandy #2
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Lager', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Pour in a beer mug and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Shandy Gaff
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Beer', '5 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Stir in a collins glass.

Name: Shanghai
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '3 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Shanghai Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jamaica White Rum', '1 tsp. Anisette', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Shanghai Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '3 oz. Peach Juice', '1 oz. 7-Up', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Pour Absolut Mandrin and peach juice over ice in a highball glass. Stir. Top with 7-Up. Slowly pour the grenadine in and let it settle at the bottom.

Name: Shannon
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', 'Cream']
Making: Build ingredients over ice, fill with cream and shake.

Name: Shark
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Shark Attack
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Sloe Gin']
Making: Shake vodkas and rums with a fist full of ice. Float caraco and gin. Serve in a pint glass. Add lemon, lime and cherry.

Name: Shark Bite #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '3 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour rum, orange juice and a splash of grenadine over ice in a tumbler. Serve with shark bite swizzle.

Name: Shark Bite Lagoon
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 splash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 dash(es) Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake the vanilla vodke, creme de cacao and Chambord with ice and strain into a large martini glass. It should be a slightly red liquid. Now pour the Baileys down the edge of the glass. The Baileys will settle to the bottom looking like sand. The Chambord should look like blood in the water.

Name: Shark Water
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1 oz. Maui Tropical Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Pour over ice and stir.

Name: Shark's Tooth
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Soda Water']
Making: Pour rum, lemon juice, lime juice, and grenadine in a short collins glass. Shake or stir, then add splash of soda.

Name: Shaved Pussy
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Vodka premium, chilled', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto premium, chilled', '1 cup(s) Sprite or 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice sweetened']
Making: Dip a pint glass into limejuice, then dip in sugar to sugar frost the rim. Fill the glass 3/4 full with ice. Add the chilled vodka, then the Sprite and chilled Amaretto. Top with a little sweetened lime juice.

Name: Shavetail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cordial glass.

Name: Sheer Elegance
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 1/2 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sherbet
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Vodka', '1 dash(es) Black Currant Cordial', 'Fanta (or other fizzy orange soda)']
Making: Pour the Jack Daniel's and vodka in a half pint glass and add the black currant. Top up with the Fanta. Enjoy

Name: Sherry Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Cream Sherry', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel.

Name: Sherry Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cream Sherry', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg', 'Milk']
Making: Shake sherry, powdered sugar, and egg with ice and strain into a collins glass. Fill with milk and stir. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Name: Sherry Flip
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cream Sherry', '2 tsp. Light Cream', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Name: Sherry Long Island
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Lemon Bar Mix', 'dash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Mix the ingredients in a glass filled with ice and stir thoroughly.

Name: Sherry Milk Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cream Sherry', '1 pint(s) Milk', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Name: Sherry Twist
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Sherry', '1/2 oz. Scotch', '2 dash(es) Cointreau', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Shifting Sands
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beefeater 24', '1 1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', 'Club Soda']
Making:
Build ingredients into a high-ball filled with fresh ice. Top with Soda and garnish with a grapefruit twist.
Adapted from a recipe by Sasha Petraske, Milk & Honey, New York

Name: Shillelagh
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '3 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Combine in an ice cube filled pilsner glass. Garnish with a green cherry.

Name: Shimmers
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Akvavit', '1 1/3 oz. St. Hallvard']
Making: Served on the rocks. Pour the St. Hallvard first, then the Aquavit. Add a lemon twist.

Name: Shinhwa
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix over ice and serve in a highball glass.

Name: Ship's Doctor
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Admiral Nelson's Vanilla Rum", '4 oz. Arrow Amaretto', '8 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Mix in a tall glass over ice.

Name: Shipp Out
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice (Or to taste)', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice (Or to taste)', '2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda (Or to taste)']
Making: Serve over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Shipwreck #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice (except grenadine) and strain into a highball glass. Top off with grenadine.

Name: Shipwreck #2
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '8 oz. Pineapple Juice (Sweetened)', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine over crushed ice in a highball glass.

Name: Shipwreck #3
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Spiced Rum", '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix and serve over ice, garnish with orange slice.

Name: Shirley Manson
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', 'Strawberry Punch']
Making: Mix in a tall glass over ice.

Name: Shirley Temple Black (or Dirty Shirley)
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 oz. Vodka', '10 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Just like the original with a kick!

Name: Shirley Temple Of Doom
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Fill a Collins glass with ice. Add ingredients in order and fill with lemon lime soda. Garnish with at least 1-2 cherries. This drink is perfect for those ladies that come into your bar that ask 'Do you have anything that doesn't taste like it has alcohol?.'--Wilson

Name: Shit Storm
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Amaretto']
Making: Mix in a collins glass and add ice if desired.

Name: Shock Wave
Ingredients: ['3 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass over ice. Stir. Garnish with a toothpick umbrella. Preferably red.

Name: Shogun
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Pour into a brandy snifter.

Name: Shoot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Sherry', '1 oz. Scotch', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Orange Juice', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Shore Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Light Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Build in a hurricane glass over ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Shotgun
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Pour into a brandy snifter.

Name: Shotgun Chicago Explosion
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '3 oz. Absolut Vodka', '5 oz. Jolt Cola']
Making: Mix the Jack Daniel's and Absolut Vodka over ice. Pour in the Jolt Cola and then throw in a burnt cigar butt.

Name: Show Tune
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Pour rum, Amaretto, juice and grenadine over ice in a glass. Stir. Add the soda and stir gently.

Name: Shrimptini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin (Or vodka)', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cooked shrimp.

Name: Shriner Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Simple Syrup', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Shrinking Violet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Lemonade']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into highball glass. Top off with chilled lemonade.

Name: Shuddering Orgasm
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Shake with crushed ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Shweetness
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '7-Up']
Making: Mix vodka and peach schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Fill with 7-Up and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Siberian Coma
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass with ice.

Name: Siberian Sleighride
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '3 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a brandy snifter. Garnish with chocolate shavings.

Name: Siberian Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '4 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake or blend over cracked ice and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Sicilian Kiss #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '7-Up']
Making: Mix well in a lowball glass. Sweet taste!

Name: Sicilian Kiss #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '7-Up']
Making: Combine Southern Comfort and Amaretto in a highball glass. Fill with 7-up, stir and serve.

Name: Sicilian Sangria
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '6 oz. Red Wine (Carlo Rossi Sangria Sweet)', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a large glass filled with crushed ice. Fill with cranberry juice/ Garnish with a mandarin segment, a strawberry and an orange slice.

Name: Sicilian Stallion
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Combine over 3 ice cubes in a collins glass. Stir and enjoy.

Name: Side Car
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '5 oz. Margarita Mix', 'Lemon']
Making: Rub a cocktail glass rim with lemon or lemon juice. Rim the glass with sugar. In a blender mix the brandy, the margarita mix and ice. Pour into the cocktail glass and serve.

Name: Sidebar
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Sidecar #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sidecar #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and serve in a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Sidecar #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and serve in a chilled cocktail glass with a sugar coated rim. Michael's comment: I noticed that you already have two sidecar recipes (with the second being the most historically accurate) but their lack of the sugar coated cocktail glass is just too important in my book. The Sidecar is the predecessor of the Margarita and therefore needs something on the rim.

Name: Sidecar #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. The orange juice softens the drink, and gives it more dimension.

Name: Sienna
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour over ice cubes in a tall wine glass.

Name: Sierpe Pisco Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gran Sierpe Pisco', '3 piece(s) Cucumber', '3/4 oz. Yuzu Juice', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making:
Muddle the cucumber in a mixing glass. Shake everything with ice and strain over rocks in a highball glass. Garnish with a cucumber wheel.
Created at the sleek and sophisticated The Setai, Miami Beach

Name: Sierpe Sunset
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gran Sierpe Pisco', '3 leaf(leaves) Basil', '8 Raspberries', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 splash(es) Mango (puree)']
Making:
Muddle in a mixing glass and pour into a highball glass.
Served at the modern and chic The Mondrian, Miami Beach

Name: Silent Broadsider
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Anisette', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Silent Third
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Silk Stockings
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', 'dash(es) Grenadine', '1 1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle cinnamon on top and serve.

Name: Silver And Black
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca (Black)', '2 oz. Tequila Silver']
Making: Layer in order (Sambuca at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass (use a bar spoon to layer the tequila). Sip or shoot.

Name: Silver Bronx
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 Egg White']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a sour glass.

Name: Silver Bullet #1
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 tsp. Scotch']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and Scotch. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Silver Bullet #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour the two ounces into a 1/2 pint glass. Then add ice and top with lemonade. For a change, add a fruit juice, such as cranberry or orange to the cocktail.

Name: Silver Cloud
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', 'dash(es) Kahlua', 'Milk']
Making: Combine the amaretto and the cocoa cream in an old-fashioned glass. Add the milk, cover with whipped cream and sprinkle with Kahlua. Top with a cherry.

Name: Silver Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Sugar Syrup', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Silver Devil
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Silver Fizz
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 Egg White', 'Seltzer Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with Seltzer Water.

Name: Silver Jubilee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Silver King Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Silver Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila Silver', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a salt rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Silver Mercedes
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka ice cold', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'Champagne well chilled']
Making: Mix ice cold vodka and cranberry juice together in a highball glass. Fill up with well chilled champagne. Add extra cranberry juice if desired.

Name: Silver Stallion Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '2 oz. Gin', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake gin and vanilla ice cream with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water, stir, and serve.

Name: Silver Streak #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Kummel']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Silver Streak #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Simple But Sweet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'Apricot Nectar']
Making: Pour into a rocks glass and half fill with apricot nectar.

Name: Simple Syrup
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Sugar', '1 part(s) Water (Boiling)']
Making:
Known under various names, from Bar Syrup to Sugar Syrup, this simple to create concoction is basically a supersaturated mixture of sugar and water. As a liquid, it easily dissolves in drinks where a bit of added sweetness is called for.
To make, gradually pour two cups of granulated sugar into a cup of boiling water and simmer for about ten minutes. Keep in your refrigerator until needed.

Name: Simply Pink
