Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '8 oz. Lemonade', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Build in a rocks glass over ice.

Name: Simpson & Son Revitalizing Tonic
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix and pour over ice. Joshua's comment: Put some ardor in your larder with our energizing, moisturizing, tantalizing, romanticizing, surprising, her-prizing, revitalizing tonic!

Name: Sin
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Midori', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix well and serve in a cocktail glass with a cherry garnish.

Name: Sing Sing
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Orange Curacao', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Half fill a mixing glass with cracked ice and add all ingredients. Stir and strain into a 5 oz. champagne glass. Garnish with a twist of orange rind.

Name: Singapore Sling
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Gin', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (fresh)', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (fressh)', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1/4 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis', 'Seltzer Water']
Making: Squeeze lime and drop into a 12 oz. glass with cracked ice. Add rest of ingredients and stir well. Fill glass with seltzer.

Name: Singapore Sling #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Pour grenadine, gin, and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with carbonated water and top with a cherry brandy. Garnish with a cherry on top and serve.

Name: Singapore Sling #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', 'dash(es) Benedictine', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tbsp. Club Soda']
Making: Build in a collins glass and float Club Soda. Garnish with a cherry, an orange slice and a mint leaf.

Name: Singapore Sling (the Best)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'dash(es) Cherry Brandy', '4 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Mix all the ingredients (except cherry brandy) and pour into a collins glass. Top of with a dash of cherry brandy.

Name: Singing Orchard
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '3 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Thoroughly blend first 4 ingredients with a large scoop of crushed ice. Pour into large goblet and top with grenadine. Garnish with a pineapple flag or a flower.

Name: Sinister
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Remy Martin VSOP Cognac', '40 oz. Malt Liquor']
Making: Drink about 1 oz off the top of the a 40 oz. bottle of Malt Liquor. Pour in the cognac. Slowly tilt bottle upside down to mix.

Name: Sino Soviet Split
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Milk']
Making: Build in an old-fashioned glass and fill with milk.

Name: Sint Maartenn Kir
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Guavaberry Liqueur', 'Champagne']
Making: Fill a champagne flute with champage and add guavaberry liqueur. Very refreshing.

Name: Sip and Go Naked
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Gin', '12 oz. Lemonade (Frozen)', '48 oz. Beer', '24 oz. Water']
Making: Mix all ingredients together in a pitcher. Tastes and smells non-alcoholic, but packs a wallop.

Name: Sip It Good
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 dash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Served in a glass over ice.

Name: Sip Me Sherry
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Orange Soda', '2 oz. Sherry']
Making: Pour the orange soda into a mixing glass with some ice. Then add the sherry. Shake once and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sir Walter Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Rum', '1 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sisco Peco
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gentleman', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Everclear', '4 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Serve over ice. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Sister Aggie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Ice 101', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime']
Making: Combine the ingredients in a lowball glass. Add a splash of lime. Enjoy!

Name: Sister Starseeker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '4 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Pour the rum, lemon juice, grenadine, and tonic water into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Sit On My Face #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Sitarski
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

Name: Sitter's Pumba
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '3 oz. Tropicana Twister (Strawberry-banana flavour)']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a highball glass. You can also mix to your taste!

Name: Six Bells
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Orange Curacao', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Six Bucks
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix the first five ingredients and pour over ice. Top with 7-Up and garnish with a twist of orange and a cherry.

Name: Six Shooter
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Light Rum', '2 oz. Gold Rum', '2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Passion Fruit Juice', '1 oz. Honey', 'dash(es) Bitters', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'dash(es) Anisette (Optional)']
Making: Mix in a blender with shaved ice, then pour into a large glass.

Name: Sizzler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Lemonade', '1 oz. Beer']
Making: Mix all together over ice in a rocks glass until fizzing.

Name: Sketchy Jimbo
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Kiwi Juice', '3 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '3 oz. Bacardi Rum']
Making: Mix in a shaker with ice cubes. Serve in ice-tea goblets and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Skiltwist
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Everclear', 'Five Alive']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a rocks glass.

Name: Skinny Black Bitch
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Cola diet']
Making: Pour vodka over ice in a rocks glass. Top with diet cola. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Skinny Senorita - TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 splash(es) Soda', '1 squirt(s) Lime']
Making: Stir in a rocks glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Skinny Tart
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 package(s) Artificial Sweetener']
Making: Blend with 8 oz. of crushed ice until the mixture is slushy.

Name: Skip and Go Naked
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Beer (Chilled)']
Making: Pour gin and sweet and sour into a collins glass over ice cubes and stir well. Fill with chilled beer, stir lightly, and serve.

Name: Skip Run and Go Naked
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', 'dash(es) Bitters', 'Beer']
Making: Mix in a highball glass and fill with beer.

Name: Skittle Shot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cryptonic', '5 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Pour into a rocks glass. Tastes just like the Skittles candy.

Name: Sky Walker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix alcohol together and fill with orange juice for desired taste.

Name: Skywalker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a highball glass. Decorate with fruit.

Name: Skyway Seabreeze
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Apple Juice', '1 oz. Lime Mix', '1/2 oz. Sugar Syrup', 'Soda Water']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass and fill with soda. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: SKYY Buon Giorno!
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1/2 oz. Campari', '1/2 oz. Luxardo Marachino Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Honey', '1 pinch(es) Salt', '1 oz. Prosecco', '3 chunk(s) Cantaloupe']
Making: Muddle cantaloupe chunks with honey and sea salt in a cocktail shaker. Add ice, SKYY Vodka, Campari and Luxardo and shake vigorously. Strain into a Collins glass with crushed ice. Top with Prosecco and Cantaloupe melon balls on a toothpick.

Name: SKYY Feelin' Fiennes
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Skyy Vodka', '3 oz. Grapefruit Juice (sparkling)', '3 slice(s) Cucumber']
Making:
Fill a rocks glass with ice. Add cucumber slices on top of the ice, followed by SKYY Vodka and Sparkling Grapefruit Juice. Stir gently to mix. Garnish with a slice of cucumber.
Inspired by Ralph Fiennes in Coriolanus
SKYY Vodka's specialty cocktails will be enjoyed at the 2011 Toronto Film Festival's official and additional buzz-worthy star-studded events including HELLO! Canada’s 5th Anniversary Red Carpet and Gala, NOW Magazine’s After Gala Party, Alliance Films Studio Party, OnexOne Concert, in partnership with DIESEL, Nikki Beach and Tribute Magazine’s Late Night Festival events

Name: SKYY Ginger & Bloody Mary Ann
Ingredients: ['2 oz. SKYY Infusions Ginger Vodka', '4 oz. Tomato Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tbsp. Capers', '1 tbsp. Bacon Bits', '2 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce']
Making: Combine all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice. Garnish with a pickled green bean.

Name: SKYY Ginger Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. SKYY Infusions Ginger Vodka', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Egg White', '1/2 oz. Maple Syrup']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with twist of lemon.

Name: SKYY Glamorous Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1 oz. Champagne', '1 splash(es) Tangerine Juice']
Making: Shake SKYY and tangerine juice with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass or a champagne flute. Top with champagne. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: SKYY Jack-O-Lantern
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Skyy Infusions Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Mango Nectar', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Combine all of the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and pour into a goblet glass and garnish with a slice of orange and a mint leaf laid flat on top.

Name: SKYY Lively Temptress
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Skyy Vodka', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Ginger Ale', '1 sprig(s) Mint']
Making:
Fill a tall glass with ice. Build ingredients over ice. Stir gently to mix. Garnish with a fresh mint sprig.
Inspired by Blake Lively in Hick
SKYY Vodka's specialty cocktails will be enjoyed at the 2011 Toronto Film Festival's official and additional buzz-worthy star-studded events including HELLO! Canada’s 5th Anniversary Red Carpet and Gala, NOW Magazine’s After Gala Party, Alliance Films Studio Party, OnexOne Concert, in partnership with DIESEL, Nikki Beach and Tribute Magazine’s Late Night Festival events

Name: SKYY Refresher
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Skyy Vodka', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Club Soda', 'Mint Leaves']
Making: Muddle mint and simple syrup in a mixing glass. Add SKYY and lemon juice and shake with ice. Serve on the rocks and top with club soda. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: SKYY Vampire's Elixir
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Skyy Infusions Raspberry Vodka', '3/4 oz. White Chocolate Liqueur', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream', 'Strawberry Syrup']
Making: Dress strawberry syrup on the inside and rim of a chilled martini glass. Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into martini glass. Garnish with vampire teeth.

Name: Slacker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '12 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour Malibu and Absolut over ice in a pint glass. Add Mountain Dew and stir. Serve ice cold.and you too can be a Slacker.

Name: Slacker's Slammer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream', 'Root Beer']
Making: Pour vodka into glass, then add root beer schnapps. Fill glass with root beer and place one scoop of ice cream at top of the glass.

Name: Slam Pam
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass. Fill with Sweet and Sour Mix.

Name: Slammer #2
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine over ice into a collins glass. Stir well and enjoy. Very refreshing on a warm day.

Name: Slant Eyed Ass Kicker
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a tall rocks glass.

Name: Slapshot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '2/3 oz. Scotch', '1/3 oz. Irish Mist', 'dash(es) Lime Mix', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry or a lime wedge.

Name: Slapstick
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 oz. Grenadine', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend with 16 oz. crushed ice until the mixture is slushy.

Name: Sleazy Hooker's Foot
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Everclear', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix the everclear and the peach schnapps, then take off your sock and put it over the glass and shake. Then mix in the amaretto and stir. Finish by adding the cranberry juice and serve.

Name: Sleeper
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Galliano', '1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Sleigh Ride
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a collins glass. Do not stir.

Name: Sliced Lemon
Ingredients: ['7 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Beer', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '3 oz. Slice', '2 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Slicks Lemonade
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tbsp. Sugar', 'Sprite']
Making: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well and enjoy!

Name: Slim Shady
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum (Or to taste)', 'Fruitopia (Tangerine)']
Making: Mix it to your favourite strength in a highball glass.

Name: Slime #1
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Sprite', '3 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps']
Making: Pour orange juice, vodka, and Sprite into highball glass. Shake well, combine blue Maui and shake well again. It will take on an odd green color.

Name: Slime #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour into a highball glass filled with ice cubes.

Name: Slimer
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Snapple (Rain)', '1 1/2 oz. Smirnoff Ice', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur']
Making: In a rocks glass over ice, pour Rain then Smirnoff Ice then vodka and top with the melon Liqueur.

Name: Slimy Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '1 oz. Gatorade (Orange)']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Sling
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Liquor', '3 oz. Sour Mix', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Slippery Johnson
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila Rose', '1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/3 oz. Di Saronno Oringinale Amaretto']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a coctail glass. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Slippery Johnson With Hairy Nuts
Ingredients: ['7/10 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '3/10 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 splash(es) Amaretto']
Making: Blend and serve in a short glass. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Slippery Nipple #3
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Slivovitz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Slivovitz', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar Syrup', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake ingredients -except Club Soda- with ice, pour into a highball glass and fill with soda. Garnish with a plum slice.

Name: Sloe Comfortable Screw Up Against The Wall
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '3/4 oz. Sloe Gin', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Galliano']
Making: Shake and pour. Float the galliano. The up against the wall comes from the Galliano. It's a cool bottle so most bars have it on display UP AGAINST THE WALL. Thanks - Eric - bartender for TGI Fidays

Name: Sloe Driver
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '5 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and stir.

Name: Sloe Gin
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sloe Gin Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/4 tsp. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Sloe Gin Collins
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake sloe gin and juice of lemon with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Garnish with slices of lemon and orange and a cherry. Serve with a straw.

Name: Sloe Gin Fizz #1
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Sloe Gin', '3 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Sloe Gin Fizz #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. Sloe Gin', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass with 2 ice cubes. Fill with Club Soda and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Sloe Gin Fizz #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Plymouth Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Combine Plymouth Sloe Gin and lemon juice in a shaker filled with ice. Shake and pour into a highball glass filled with ice and fill with club soda or sparkling water. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

Name: Sloe Gin Flip
Ingredients: ['1 tbsp. Sloe Gin', '2 tsp. Light Cream', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Name: Sloe Gin Rickey
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Pour sloe gin and juice of lime into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Drop a wedge of lime in glass and serve.

Name: Sloe Motion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Plymouth Sloe Gin', '3 oz. Champagne']
Making: Pour in the Plymouth Sloe Gin then top with champagne. Garnish with 3 blueberries.

Name: Sloe Tequila
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice']
Making: Blend with 1/2 cup of ice at low speed and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a twist of cucumber peel.

Name: Sloe Vermouth
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sloeberry Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sloe Gin', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Sloppy Bagina
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Mix in an exotic shot glass. Get drunk quick.

Name: Sloppy Joe's Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/4 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/4 tsp. Grenadine', '3/4 oz. Rum', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sloppy Joe's Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Brandy', '1/4 tsp. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Port', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/4 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sloppy Pussy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Campari', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix clear spirits with crushed ice. Add Midori and Campari and top off with juices. Serve in a 10oz. glass garnished with a strawberry. (Repeat if one isn't enough).

Name: Sloppy Seconds
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Cherry 7-Up', '1 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add Cherry 7-Up. Garnish with a pineapple chunk.

Name: Sloppy Snatch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Johnnie Walker Scotch', '1 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', '1/2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Faygo (Rock and rye flavour)']
Making: Combine over ice into a collins glass.

Name: Slow Burner
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Label Smirnoff', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/4 oz. Green Chartreuse']
Making: Mix and drink carefully. Note from the person who submitted the recipe : experimentally worked out from a "special" at a wine bar in Edinburgh, Scotland. Home made Sloe gin is better (stronger). I suspect that variations of the ingredients/proportions to suit individual tastes may not hurt. A surprisingly wide selection of friends found this cocktail very acceptable.

Name: Slow Comfortable Fuzzy Screw
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Slow Comfortable Fuzzy Screw Up Against The Wall
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Galliano', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Slow Comfortable Screw #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour Sloe Gin and Southern Comfort into a collins glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice, stir well, and serve.

Name: Slow Comfortable Screw #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass over ice and fill with orange juice.

Name: Slow Comfortable Screw In Between the Sheets
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a 12-14 oz glass over ice. Add more ice if needed, then fill with orange juice.

Name: Slow Comfortable Screw Up Against The Wall
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 splash(es) Galliano', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Slow Comfortable Screw Up Against The Wall Mexican Style #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Sauza Tres Generaciones Anejo Tequila', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Slow Comfortable Screw Up Against The Wall Mexican Style #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Galliano']
Making: Shake the first four liquors, grenadine and orange juice. Strain and pour into a cocktail glass. Float the Galliano on top.

Name: Slow Fuzzy Screw
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Slow Fuzzy Screw Up Against The Wall
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Galliano', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Slow Kisser
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Archers Peach Schnapps (Or Peach Schnapps)', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass over ice cubes.

Name: Slow Screw
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sloe Gin', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour Sloe Gin into a highball glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice, stir well, and serve.

Name: Slow Screw On The Beach
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', 'Gin']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass. Awsome drink. You can put gin in too for a extra kick.

Name: Slow Screw Up Against The Wall
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 splash(es) Galliano', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Slow Screw With Malachi
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys with a hint of Mint Chocolate']
Making: Mix with some ice to chill before serving.

Name: Slow Sneer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '12 oz. Beer']
Making: Pour the schnapps in a 16 oz. glass of beer.

Name: Slowride
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Cruzan Vanilla Rum', '2 splash(es) Jagermeister', '3 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a lowball glass over ice. Stir Briskly. Vary amount of Jagermeister depending on preference.

Name: Sludge
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Everclear', '1 cup(s) Sugar', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid lemon-lime', '1 cup(s) Country Time Lemonade prepared', 'Lemons juiced and sliced']
Making: Mix all ingredients except lemon slices in a blender with 2 cups crushed ice. Water may be added if necessary. Place blender in freezer until almost frozen. Remove. Juice lemons and add juice to the blender. Reblend. Slice lemons for garnish. The flavor should be stout and the color should be almost neon green.

Name: Sludge of Onondaga Lake aka S.O.L.
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 can(s) Limeade (Frozen)', '1/2 can(s) Strawberries (Frozen)', '1/2 cup(s) Fresh Fruit (Kiwi, watermelon, honeydew…etc.)']
Making: Blend till smooth. Depending on the type of fruit, the color can range from a _Crappy Brown_ to _Blue-Green Algea_. The drink was inspired by one of the nation's most polluted lakes. Enjoy, it may look like crud but it taste great!!

Name: Sluricane
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Serve over ice and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Slurrakane
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Sprite (NOT 7-Up)']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Slush
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Orange Juice (Frozen)', '12 oz. Lemonade (Frozen)', '1 cup(s) Cranberry Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Powdered Sugar', '2 cup(s) Gin', '1 tbsp. 7-Up']
Making: Frappe in a highball glass and float 7-up.

Name: Slushing
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Vodka', '2 cup(s) Orange Juice', '3 scoop(s) Ice Cream']
Making: Blend with a little crushed ice and serve in a collins glass. Garnish with a straw.

Name: Slut Juice
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Orange Juice', '1 scoop(s) Country Time Lemonade']
Making: Shake well with ice and serve in collins glasses.

Name: Sly Goes To Havana
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 tsp. White Creme de Cacao', '1 tsp. Green Chartreuse', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with crushed ice.

Name: Smack
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Chocolate Sauce', '1 tbsp. Lime Cordial']
Making: Mix and enjoy.

Name: Smart Christine
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Benedictine', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Benedictine, and orange juice. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Smartie #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', 'Fruit Juice (Any kind- to taste)']
Making: Mix well with ice.

Name: Smidgin
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Smirnoff Ice', '2 oz. Gin']
Making: Mix in a large glass and go nuts!

Name: Smile Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Smile Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Midori', '1 1/2 oz. Apple Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Smiler Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Smilin' Jerry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rye Whiskey', 'Orange Juice', 'Cola']
Making: Combine Vodka and Rye Whiskey in a highball glass. Fill with equal amounts of Orange Juice and Cola. Stir and garnish with a cherry to serve.

Name: Smirnoff Chocolate Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Mix all ingredients well in a martini glass and serve.

Name: Smirnoff Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix well and serve in a martini glass.

Name: Smith and Kearns
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Soda Water']
Making: Pour Kahlua and light cream into a highball glass filled with ice and stir well. Add carbonated water, stir lightly, and serve. Webmixer's Note: Thanks to Dave for correcting us with this recipe.

Name: Smith and Kerns
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 splash(es) Cream', 'Soda Water']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with Soda Water. Webmixer's Note: Thanks to Stevn for correcting us with this recipe.

Name: Smith And Kerr
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 1/2 oz. Heavy Cream', '2 oz. Soda Water']
Making: Fill an 8 ounce rock glass with ice and pour in order creme de cacao, heavy cream and soda water.

Name: Smith and Wesson
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Kahlua', '3/4 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Cream', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with Coca-Cola.

Name: Smoka
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Mountain Dew', '1 splash(es) Pepsi Cola']
Making: Fill a glass with ice. Add Southern Comfort. Fill glass almost full with Mountain Dew and add splash of Pepsi for color. Enjoy...only serious drinkers apply.

Name: Smokey Coke
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1 oz. Scotch', '5 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Combine over ice in a pint glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Smokey Joe
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Orange Juice fresh', 'splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour vodka, white rum, tequila and lime juice over ice into a shaker. Mix and pour into a highball glass. Top up with fresh orange juice and colour with grenadine. Decorate with a slice of lime.

Name: Smooth Beaver
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon', '9 oz. Pepsi Cola']
Making: Pour Pepsi on ice. Add the booze and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Smooth Beaver #2
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Pepsi Cola']
Making: Add to ice and garnish with a lemon slice or cherry.

Name: Smooth Brown Beauty
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '2 oz. Vodka', '2 drop(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice and pour in all the ingredients except the lime juice. Shake well until cold, add the lime juice and stir gently Pour into a large cocktail glass and decorate with fresh fruit. Sip slowly while dreaming about the smoothness to come.

Name: Smooth Casa Noble
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Tequila Casa Noble Reposado']
Making: Put 2 ice cubes in a old-fashioned glass and add the tequila slowly. Turn gently for 5 to 10 seconds and serve.

Name: Smooth Criminal
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Crown Royal', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour Crown Royal over ice in an old-fashioned glass and fill with Sprite.

Name: Smooth Dreams
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Grenadine', '6 oz. Coca Cola (You can add up to 8 oz.)']
Making: Mix the Jim Beam and Coke as usual and splash in grenadine for a sweet cocktail.

Name: Smooth Move
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Prune Juice', '2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice and pour into a sugar rimmed parfait glass. Garnish with a pineapple spear and a cherry.

Name: Smooth Operator
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 Banana', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Blend with a scoop of ice until smooth.

Name: Smooth Screw
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the alcohol in a 16 oz. glass filled 1/4 with ice and top up with orange juice.

Name: Smuggler's Gold
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Forester', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake in shaker half filled with cracked ice and strain into a 5 oz. champagne glass. Garnish with a gold leaf.

Name: Smugglin Peaches
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Apple Juice', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour on ice in a shaker. Shake, strain and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Smurf
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream vanilla']
Making: Blend until smooth and serve in a cocktail glass with a straw.

Name: Smurf Cum #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '7-Up', 'Milk']
Making: Half-fill a pony jug with ice and add the alcohol. Top with 7-Up and milk.

Name: Smurf Piss #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kool-Aid (Berry Blue)', '2 oz. Mountain Dew', '1 oz. Everclear']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Smurf Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Raspberry Syrup']
Making: Mix together and stir.

Name: Smurfed Up
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '7-Up']
Making: Pour in a medium sized glass and fill with 7-Up.

Name: Smyrna
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '2/3 oz. Suze', '1/3 oz. Skinos Mastiha Spirit', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '3 dash(es) Abbotts Aromatic Bitters']
Making:
Stir with ice into a mixing glass and strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with a mint sprig or leaf.
My source of inspiration was the city of Smyrna itself as well as its people, the Greeks who lived there until 1922 when they were violently deported by the Turkish army. The events of Smyrna bears great resemblance with the eviction of the Bacardi family from Cuba in 1960.
Webmixer note: George is running in the 2016 Bacardi Legacy competition. Click the link to learn more and help him out…

Name: Snake Bite #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Yukon Jack', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Pour Yukon Jack over ice, add a dash of lime juice.

Name: Snake Bite #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Yukon Jack', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Club Soda (Or 7-Up)']
Making: Mix together in a lowball glass over crushed ice.

Name: Snake Nuts
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass. Alternatively can be served in shot glasses.

Name: Snakebite #1
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Snakebite #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Snakebite #4
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Beer', '2 oz. Cider', 'dash(es) Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Snakebite (UK)
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Lager', '1/2 pint(s) Dry Cider']
Making: Pour ingredients into a pint glass.

Name: Snakebite and Black (UK)
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Lager', '1/2 pint(s) Dry Cider', 'dash(es) Black Currant Juice']
Making: Pour ingredients into pint glass.

Name: Snap The Boosters
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Whiskey', '4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Strawberry Jam', '1 tsp. Baking Soda']
Making: Frappe in a highball glass.

Name: Snapping Pussay
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Pink Lemonade']
Making: Build in a highball glass and stir.

Name: Snappy Red Beer
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Beer', '1/2 can(s) V 8 Juice', '1/4 tsp. Celery Salt', '1/4 tsp. Hot Sauce (Cholula)', '1/2 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce']
Making: Mix and enjoy (Adjust amounts to taste).

Name: Snazzy Razzy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 splash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Pour vodka and Chambord over ice. Fill with tonic. Stir and garnish with a lime slice. Voila a Snazzy Razzy.

Name: Sneak Attack!
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Smirnoff Raspberry Vodka', '3 oz. Cranberry-Raspberry Juice']
Making: Chill Smirnoff Raspberry and pour into a tall glass. Stir in juice.

Name: Sneaky Pete
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Rye Whiskey', '4 oz. Milk']
Making: Pour Kahlua over ice. Add milk and Rye. Stir before drinking.

Name: Sneaky Vern
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Fill a tall glass 2/3 full of ice. Add vodka and creme de Cacao and fill rest of the glass with Coca Cola. Serve with a straw for stirring.

Name: Snicker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Light Cream (Or milk)']
Making: Pour the liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned cocktail glass. Fill with light cream and serve. If mixed right, should taste like a Snickers candy bar.

Name: Snicker Liquor
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao dark', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Pour dark Crème de cacao, Irish cream and Frangelico liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Top with light cream, stir and serve.

Name: Snitchee's Cider
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spiced Rum', '8 oz. Cider', 'dash(es) Cinnamon (Optional)']
Making: Used crushed ice. Can be made in any size, from punchbowl to personal serving.

Name: Sno-bahl
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '2 oz. Fruit Punch', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Combine over ice in an 8 oz. glass or blend with ice for a frothy drink that doesn't hit quite as hard as some others.

Name: Snotty Toddy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Snow Bunny
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Hot Chocolate']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with hot chocolate. Garnish with a stick of cinnamon.

Name: Snow Cap #2
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Makers Mark Bourbon', '2 part(s) Orange Liqueur', '3 part(s) Heavy Cream', '2 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Stir ingredients together and pour over crushed ice into a small brandy snifter. Garnish with nutmeg and orange twist.

Name: Snow In Mexico
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Tia Maria', 'Ice Cream']
Making: Serve in a long glass with slighty melted ice cream. Like a long Dom Pedro.

Name: Snow White
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Snowball #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Anisette', '1 tbsp. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Snowball #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Advocaat', '1/2 oz. Lime Cordial', 'Lemonade']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Snowball #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Cream', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Put gin and cream in a short glass filled with ice. Top with ginger ale. Frothy and creamy and yummy!

Name: Snowball #5
Ingredients: ['3 oz. 1921 Tequila Cream Liqueur', '1 oz. Evaporated Skimmed Milk', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '3 drop(s) Vanilla', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Mix all ingredients with ice in a blender for about 10 seconds. Pour into a wineglass and sprinkle with cinnamon dust.

Name: Snowflake #3
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. 1921 Tequila Cream Liqueur', '1 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1/4 oz. Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a shaker w/ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with chocolate syrup.

Name: Snowglobe
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 bottle(s) Cream Soda (Blue)']
Making: Pour the curacao in a large, tall, clear decorative drinking glass filled with ice. Add some chilled blue cream soda almost to top, then, slowly add the Irish cream. Stir with swizzle stick. Once it is stirred it will look similar to a snow globe when you look at it from the side. Laurie uses Blue Nehi Soda for this particular drink, but since it is very hard to find, she says you can use any BLUE cream soda.

Name: Snowy Fields
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Cloudberry Liqueur', '2/3 oz. Parfait Amour', '2/3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2/3 oz. Cream']
Making: Blend with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a nutmeg.

Name: Snurf's Sperm
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pina Colada Mix', '2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Mix over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Snyder
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Sober-me
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '10 oz. Fruitopia (Kiwiberry)']
Making: Mix with ice in a highball glass.

Name: Society Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Soco and Cola
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Cola']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with cola.

Name: SoCo and Pepper (Old School Crazy Style)
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 can(s) Dr Pepper']
Making: Mix and pour over ice.

Name: SoCo Like A MoFo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 dash(es) Grenadine', 'Cherry Cola']
Making: Build in highball glass and fill with a cherry-Cola. Garnish with a cherry. Say _SoCo for the MoFo!_ Drink as fast as you can!

Name: SoCo Squeeze
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice.

Name: Sofia and Eros
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pallini Raspicello', '1 oz. Boru Vodka', '1/2 oz. Pallini Limoncello', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice. Strain into an ice-filled highball glass. Top with club coda.

Name: Sofia’s Swizzle
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Partida Reposado Tequila', '1 1/4 oz. Apple Juice', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Velvet Falernum', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'Ginger Beer']
Making: Shake the first 5 ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain over fresh ice into a highball glass. Top up the rest of the cocktail with chilled ginger beer and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Soft Day
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Clontarf Irish Whiskey', '1 part(s) Celtic Crossing Liqueur', 'splash(es) Ginger Ale']
Making: Serve over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Soft Kisser
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Lemon Juice (To taste)']
Making: Mix with ice and enjoy.

Name: Sohocki
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", 'Snapple (Use Bali Blast Snapple)']
Making: Pour in a tall glass, fill with Bali Blast Snapple and stir.

Name: Sohocki Special
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '12 oz. Snapple (Bali Blast flavour)']
Making: Mix in a tall glass and stir.

Name: Soiree
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Pallini Limoncello', '4 1/2 oz. Champagne Brut', '3/4 oz. Pomegranate Juice']
Making: Serve chilled in a champagne flute with a lemon twist for garnish.

Name: Soju September
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Soju', '1 1/2 oz. Grape Juice (white)', '1 1/2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Build over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Soju Squeeze
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Soju', '1 oz. Lillet blanc', '1 oz. Orange Juice Blood Orange', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Float two or three almond slivers on surface of drink.

Name: Sol Y Sombra
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Anisette']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a brandy snifter, and serve. (The English translation of the name of this drink is 'Sun and Shade', and after sampling this drink, you'll understand why. Thanks, Kirby.)

Name: Sola-rita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Place all ingedients in a shaker can with ice. Shake and pour into a tall glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

Name: SoLo
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Rum', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Gin', '1/3 oz. Champagne', '7-Up', '1/3 oz. Tia Maria', '1/3 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Build (pour) tequila, rum, triple sec, gin and champagne over ice and stir in a long drink glass.Fill with 7-Up. Float the Tia Maria and Drambuie.

Name: Sombrero
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Kahlua', '3 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Sombrero Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Combine in an ice cube filled collins glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Something "Fruity"
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Malibu Rum', '5 oz. Kerns Coconut & Pineapple Nectar', '5 oz. Ocean Spray Juice (Passion Fruit)']
Making: Pour in blender, mix to slurpy consistency then sip something fruity with me.

Name: Something Different
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Something From A Monkey's Ass
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Milk', '1 part(s) Amaretto', '1 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Baileys Irish Cream', '1 part(s) Brandy', '1 1/2 part(s) Banana Rum', '1/2 part(s) Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Frangelico']
Making: Drink on the rocks or mix in blender and add ice until frothy.

Name: Something Peachy
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Serve in a tall glass over ice. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Somras
Ingredients: ['3 wedge(s) Lime', '10 Mint Leaves', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: In a shaker add the limes, mint leaves,triple sec and crush them with a muddler. Then add lots of ice, the vodka and the cranberry juice. Shake and serve on the rocks in a highball glass. It's very refreshing!

Name: Son of a Preacher Man
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Gin (Or vodka)', '1 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Combine over ice in a rocks glass or blend for a frozen surprise.

Name: Son Of Adam
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sonic Blaster
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with orange and lime slices.

Name: Sonic Boom
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Build over ice into a rocks glass.

Name: Sonic Pink Lemonade
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Raspberry Lemonade (Concentate)', '12 oz. Bacardi White Rum', 'Water']
Making: Mix lemonade and rum in 2 quart pitcher and add water till full.

Name: Sonny Gets Kissed
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '2 tsp. Lime Juice', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Soother Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Brandy', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sophisticated Lady
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Knappogue Castle Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Briottet Crème de Figue', '2 drop(s) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with 4 ice cubes in a metal shaker until can is frosty and garnish with a small fresh fig.

Name: Soul Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Martini and Rossi Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine']
Making: Stir and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Soul Kiss Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 1/2 tsp. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1 1/2 tsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Liquor', '3 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Sour Apple
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Apple Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cordial glass.

Name: Sour Bitch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Add vodka over ice in a highball glass. Fill with sweet and sour mix. Add grenadine to taste.

Name: Sour Blood
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Margarita Mix', '1 1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Water']
Making: Combine over ice into a collins glass.

Name: Sour Buffalo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Pour over ice in a rocks glass and stir. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Sour Citrus Tree
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Put a few cubes of ice in a tall tumbler glass. Add vodka, orange juice, sweet and sour and a splash of cranberry juice for color. Swizzel and enjoy!

Name: Sour Gin and Sin
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sour Grape
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Sour Grapes
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Combine ingredients and pour over ice.

Name: Sour Greek
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Metaxa', 'Lemonade']
Making: Stir over ice into a highball glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon. Rick says: This is a recent invention. The name is not terrific, but the drink is delicious. Please e-mail me with name suggestions/comments.

Name: Sour Jack
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Pour into a rocks glass over ice and fill with grapfruit juice.

Name: Sour Jimmy Dew
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey (Or to taste)', 'Mountain Dew', '1/4 Lemon']
Making: Combine Jim Beam and Mountain Dew over ice in a lowball glass. Drop the lemon in the glass.

Name: Sour Mix
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Sugar Syrup', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix.

Name: Sour Patch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Sour Mix', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with equal parts of sour mix and cranberry juice.

Name: Sour Pussy #1
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'dash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake all ingredients until the ice starts chipping. Strain into a shot glass and enjoy!

Name: Sour Sex
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Windsor Canadian Whisky', '1 oz. Wine (Any kind will do)', '1 oz. 7-Up', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass and serve on the rocks.

Name: Sour Surfer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Lemon Bar Mix', '3 oz. Lime Bar Mix', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Serve in a sling glass and garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Sour Witch
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Lucid Absinthe Superieure', '3/4 oz. Almond Extract', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making:
In the bottom of a mixing glass, muddle the sour cherries in the lime juice and almond syrup. Add the Lucid with ice and shake very well. Strain into a chilled champagne flute. Top with sparkling wine or champagne. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.
A bit of a spell or a flick of the magic wand - the Sour Witch has just landed on her broomstick. This sophisticated cocktail is no laughing matter because it packs a powerful sour punch. Don’t be fooled by its soft exterior and champagne flute glass, this cocktail features absinthe and sour cherries.
Created by: Jonathan Pogash, Cocktail Guru

Name: South Beach
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 1/2 oz. Tropico Liqueur', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'Bacardi Rum (Preferably Bacardi Select)']
Making: Shake and pour into a cockatil glass. Float 1 oz. of Bacardi Select.

Name: South Bronx
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '6 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour over ice in an 8 oz. glass.

Name: South Of The Border
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. Coffee Brandy', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: South Of The Border Champagne
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '8 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix all ingedients in a highball glass with ice and serve.

Name: South Of The Border Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Tequila', "1 1/4 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Pour tequila and Roses' in a non-chilled cocktail glass. This is for those who are tired of the ice and sugar.

Name: South Side Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with two sprigs of fresh mint.

Name: South Side Fizz
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Seltzer Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with Seltzer Water. Garnish with a mint leaf.

Name: Southampton Slam
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Anisette', 'Club Soda']
Making: Serve in rocks glass (no ice). Pour both liquors, fill with Club Soda, roll once. Serve with straw

Name: Southern Apple
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Apple Schnapps', 'Squirt']
Making: Add Southern Comfort and Apple Schnapps in a Tom Collins glass filled with ice. Fill with Squirt. Stir and drink.

Name: Southern Belle
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Skyy Infusions Pineapple Vodka', '1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a hurricane glass with ice. Garnish with cocktail umbrella and straw.

Name: Southern Belle #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Benedictine']
Making: Pour the brandy into a pousse cafe glass. Tilt the glass to a 45-degree angle and slowly pour the creme de cacao down the side of the glass so that it floats on the brandy. Repeat this procedure with the Benedictine.

Name: Southern Belle #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Tennessee Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '8 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Stir once over ice in a highball glass, adding grenadine last.

Name: Southern Belle #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Apple Pucker', '7-Up']
Making: Mix over ice in a tall glass. Top with 7-Up and stir.

Name: Southern Bride
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', 'dash(es) Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Southern Comfort And Lime
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 dash(es) Sprite']
Making: Pour over ice into a cocktail glass.

Name: Southern Comfort Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '3/4 oz. Orange Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Southern Comfort Watermelon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3/4 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass.

Name: Southern Frost #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice. Mix with straw and drink up!!

Name: Southern Frost #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice. Mix with straw and drink up!!

Name: Southern Gin Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Southern Hangover
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '2 oz. Amaretto', '6 oz. Sour Mix', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Stirr and pour into a highball glass over ice.

Name: Southern Harmony
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Southern Comfort', "3/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '7-Up']
Making: Mix Southern Comfort and Jack Daniels with ice. Add a splash of sour mix and top it off with 7-Up. Garnish with a cherry. Voila you're done! Time to enjoy.

Name: Southern Hurricane
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Southern Comfort', '7-Up (Or Sprite)', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour the Southern Comfort into a collins glass. Fill with 7-Up and add a splash of grenadine.

Name: Southern Lady
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Creme de Noyeaux', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake the first four ingredients with ice and strain into a hurricane glass. Fill with soda and top with the lime juice. Garnish with a pineapple wheel and a cherry.

Name: Southern Lemonade
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '4 oz. Sprite (Or 7-Up)']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a tall glass.

Name: Southern Man
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Cherry Juice']
Making: Mix the three together. They are great on the rocks or if you prefer straight up.You'll love what this man does for you.

Name: Southern Peach #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Pour the grenadine over ice into a hurricane glass, then add the Bourbon. Blend the orange juice, the Sour Mix and the peach schnapps in a blender. Pour the blended mixture slowly into the glass. Garnish with a peach slice.

Name: Southern Pink Flamingo
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix in a shaker half filled with ice. Strain into a pony glass.

Name: Southern Russian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '5 oz. Milk (Homogenised)']
Making: Mix over ice a highball glass.

Name: Southern Schoolboy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '4 oz. Kool-Aid (Grape)']
Making: Pour grape Kool-Aid and Southern Comfort into a glass. Add ice and stir with finger. Sounds odd but its really good. A favorite introduced to me by my college roomie Bernadette.

Name: Southern Screw
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice into a highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Southern Style Mint Julep
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Makers Mark Bourbon', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Water Branch', '9 Mint Leaves Red Stemmed']
Making:
Muddle mint leaves, a small measure of bourbon and sugar in a tall glass tumbler, add small amount of cracked ice and stir, refill with remaining ice. Top with rest of the bourbon and branch water and re-stir. Garnish with fresh mint and a zest of lemon, dust with sugar.
Jim Hewes, Barman, Round Robin & Scotch Bar. These are from his Triple Crown series for you horse racing fans...

Name: Southern Surfer
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Amaretto']
Making: Combine all the ngredients except the Amaretto and stir. Splash in the Amaretto. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Southwest Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '2 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 part(s) Dekuyper Cactus Juice Margarita']
Making: Pour over ice in a highball or pint glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Soviet
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amontillado Sherry', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Soviet Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Sherry']
Making: Shake or blend over cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Twist a lemon peel over the drink and drop into the glass.

Name: Soylent Green
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Melon Liqueur', 'Kiwi Lime Soda Water']
Making: Must be served in a Tall Austrian beer Stein whilst watching the little known fourth episode of the Planet of the Apes series. Claude Atkins stars Remember, Ape must not Kill Ape

Name: Spanish Coffee - LockerRoom Style
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream', 'Coffee']
Making: Coat rim of glass with a cherry juice . Rim glass with cinnamon and sugar mixture. Pour in Grand Marnier and light with a match Keep glass tilted and rotate while flaming until rim is candied. Add Kahlua, Irish cream, brandy, half & half and chocolate liqueur. Add coffee to 1/2 inch below glass rim. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a cherry and a sprinkle of chocolate. Enjoy......Beware this one will sneak up on you!!!

Name: Spanish Fly
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Cuarenta Y Tres']
Making: Build in a lowball glass. Garnish with cinnamon.

Name: Spanish Milkmaid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Harveys Bristol Cream Sherry', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tsp. Brandy', '2 tsp. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Spanish Mojito
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Rosemary', 'Soda Water']
Making: Put sugar and rosemary into a highball glass and crush together. Add rum and stir to dissolve sugar. Add 2 or 3 ice cubes. Slowly fill with soda water allowing rosemary leaves to float. Serve with a straw.

Name: Spanish Reindeer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', 'Eggnog']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into an old-fashioned glass. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Variation 1: Rim glass with cinnamon. Variation 2: Use Kahlua instead of creme de cacao.

Name: Spanish Town Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 tsp. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Spank That Ass
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/3 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Spark In The Night
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '2 tsp. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sparkle
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka (Or tequila -which ever you prefer)', '1/2 bottle(s) Jones Soda (Your favourite flavour)', '1/2 can(s) Sprite']
Making: Blend with crushed ice.

Name: Sparkling Rose
Ingredients: ['3 oz. SENCE Traditional Rose Nectar', '3 oz. Champagne']
Making:
Pour into a champagne flute and garnish with a twist of fresh lemon .
Created by Francesco Lafranconi, Director of Mixology and Spirits Educator, Southern Wine & Spirits of America

Name: Sparkling Strawberry Mimosa
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Champagne (Chilled)', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Strawberries (Sliced and partially thawed)', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Syrup']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a cocktail glass. Add the champagne and garnish with a whole strawberry and an orange slice. Note: you can also use frozen strawberries in syrup, partially thawed if you don't have strawberry syrup.

Name: Sparkling Sugarplum
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 part(s) Zipang Sparkling Sake', '1/2 part(s) Gekkeikan Plum Wine', '1/2 package(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1 part(s) Passion Fruit Nectar']
Making:
Combine plum wine, ginger liqueur and passion fruit nectar in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Top with Zipang sparkling sake, stir gently and garnish.
Created by Tippling Bros.

Name: Spartin Special
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '2 oz. Apple Pucker', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour in a rocks glass over ice. Fill with the Sprite.

Name: Spearmint Lifesaver
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix alcohol in a collins glass, fill with Mountain Dew.

Name: Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 oz. Rye Whiskey', 'dash(es) Apricot Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Can be filled with soda also.

Name: Special Erotic Iced Coffee
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Baileys Irish Cream', 'Coffee']
Making: Mix in a coffee mug filled with crushed ice and add coffee.

Name: Special K
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cactus Juice any flavour', '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix Cactus Juice and tequila in a shaker with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Special Margarita
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Tequila', '2/3 oz. Calvados', '2/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '2/3 oz. Grenadine', '2/3 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake and pour into a cocktail glass. Add a slice of lemon and serve. Use cold grenadine and lemon juice.

Name: Special One Of Them
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. White Rum', '2/3 oz. Archers Peach Schnapps', 'dash(es) Gin', '1 1/3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Special Rough Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Apple Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Anisette']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Speed Queen
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Crown Royal', '2 part(s) Surge Energy Drink']
Making: Pour both into a tall glass at the same time. Enjoy

Name: Speedy Gonzales Bloody Mary
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce', '5 drop(s) Hot Sauce (Louisiana "Hot as Hell" Sauce)', 'dash(es) Salt', 'V 8 Juice (Spicy)']
Making: Mix in a highball and add a dash of garlic powder.

Name: Spencer Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake brandy, gin, orange juice, and Bitters with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel and a cherry.

Name: Spereator
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Spewdriver
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Peach Vodka (Or to taste)', '4 oz. Grape Juice (From concentrate)', '4 oz. Orange Juice (From concentrate)']
Making: Combine in a highball glass.

Name: Sphinx Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

Name: Spiced Banana Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 Banana']
Making: Blend with 8 oz. of ice until smooth. Pour into 14 oz. glass and garnish with a banana slice and a maraschino cherry.

Name: Spiced Ginger Ale
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '6 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Stir in tall glass with ice.

Name: Spiced Russian
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Kahlua Pumpkin Spice Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 part(s) Half and Half Cream']
Making: Build over ice in a rocks glass, and stir. Garnish with freshly-grated nutmeg.

Name: Spicy Ginger
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. 4 Copas Anejo', '1 oz. Ginger Syrup', '1 1/2 oz. 4 Copas Organic Agave Nectar', '2 slice(s) Ginger']
Making: Muddle ginger slices in lime juice, add all ingredients. Shake with ice and pour into a tall glass. Garnish with a ginger slice.

Name: Spicy Grand Margarita
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 3/4 oz. Tequila Reposado', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Partida Agave Nectar', '1/4 tsp. Pepper Red pepper flakes', '1 pinch(es) Pepper Chipotle chile pepper powder']
Making: Muddle pepper flakes and chile powder with agave nectar in a tall mixing glass. Add lime juice, Grand Marnier, and tequila, then fill with ice and shake vigorously. Strain through a tea strainer into a rocks glass with ice and garnish with a jalepeno or red chile pepper.

Name: Spicy Irish
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 part(s) Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Gingerbread Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Ginger Ale']
Making: Fill in a tall glass with ice. Pour ingredients as listed. Garnish with both a lemon and an orange wedge.

Name: Spicy Melon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tres Generaciones Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Cantaloupe (puree)', '1 oz. Tamarind Nectar', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 tsp. Red Pepper (jelly)']
Making: Shake all ingredients vigorously with ice and strain into a salt rimmed glass. Garnish with a melon ball and small piece of fresh dill.

Name: Spicy Sandstrom
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '3 oz. Scotch', '2 oz. Black Pepper', '1 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Combine the ingredients in a medium glass. Swirl around with spoon: the pepper will "appear" to swirl as if it were sand in a sandstorm! Enjoy it now by consuming it!

Name: Spike
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Passoa Passion Fruit', '1/2 oz. Safari', 'dash(es) Sprite', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend with ice and equal parts of juice. Pour into a sugar/sirop rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, a slice of lemon and some rum cherries.

Name: Spiked Strawberry Pineapple Smoothie
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Pineapple (crushed, with juice)', '1/2 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '10 oz. Strawberries (frozen)', '4 oz. Vodka']
Making: Place all ingredients in a blender with 5-6 ice cubes. Blend until it reaches your desired consistency.

Name: Spiker Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '2/3 oz. Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Spinster's Delight
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cream', '2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Spiritual Enlightenment
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Stir in a lowball glass.

Name: Spiritwalker
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Firewater']
Making: Mix all four in shot glass and hold on tight.

Name: Splankanator
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in a pint glass - shaken not stirred.

Name: Splash and Crash
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '6 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour into a collins glass and float rum. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Spooge's Papa Smurf
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Citrus Vodka', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '4 oz. Sprite', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Add all ingredients according to taste and strength. Stir and enjoy!!!

Name: Spootnik
Ingredients: ['7-Up', 'Vodka']
Making: 1. Fill a tall glass half with 7-Up and half with vodka. 2. Drink half of the glass. 3. Fill up the glass again with more vodka. Repeat steps 1- 3 until it goes Bip! Bip! Bip! in your head…You can reverse the steps and drink until you pass out on 7-Up.

Name: Spring Feeling Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Green Chartreuse', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Spritzer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Liquor', 'Club Soda']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with Club Soda.

Name: Sprizter Highball
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Rhine Wine', 'Seltzer Water']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with seltzer.

Name: Spunky's Munch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', 'Chocolate Milk']
Making: Mix and serve with drinking straw. Robyn's comment: Same as a Monkey's Lunch, but more chocolatey.

Name: Sputnik
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '1 1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake until frothy and pour into a wine glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh peach.

Name: Spyder
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix with ice in a highball glass and fill with ginger ale.

Name: Squashed Frog #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1 oz. Creme de Menthe', 'dash(es) Black Currant Cordial', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour the Pernod and the creme de menthe in together over ice. Pour in the ginger ale to virtually the top of the glass. Gently pour the blackcurrnet cordial down the side of the glass so it sits at the bottom, giving two layers.

Name: Squeeze Me Morgan
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Mix and add ice.

Name: Squicky
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Squirt', '1 oz. Grape Juice (Red - NOT White)']
Making: Mix whiskey and Squirt, pour over ice in a collins glass, then add the grape juice. Garnish with fruit of choice (grapes, pineapple, and lemon work best).

Name: Ssab Dream
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '4 oz. Cream', '7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass and fill with 7-Up.

Name: St-Germain and Champagne
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour ingredients into chilled flute glass. Stir lightly. To garnish, float half a strawberry.

Name: St-Germain Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '2 oz. White Wine Sauvignon Blanc', '2 oz. Soda']
Making: Add 3 ingredients to ice filled collins glass. Stir well, mixing completely.

Name: St-Germain French 77
Ingredients: ['1 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour first two ingredients into a chilled champagne flute. Top with Champagne. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: St. Charles Punch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '3 oz. Port', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except port) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Top with port and garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: St. Charles Punch {Brandy}
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '3 oz. Port', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake all except port and strain into a collins glass. Float port. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry.

Name: St. Patrick's Day
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '3/4 oz. Green Chartreuse', '3/4 oz. Irish Whiskey', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: St. Paulie Cola
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Beer (St Paulie Girl Beer)', '1/2 can(s) Pepsi Cola']
Making: Pour the Pepsi in a frosted mug and add a 12 oz. St. Paulie Girl Beer. Drink and enjoy.

Name: St. Petersburg
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1/4 tsp. Orange Bitters']
Making: Pour vodka and bitters into a mixing glass with several ice cubes. Stir until very cold and pour into a chilled old-fashioned glass. Score the peel of an orange wedge with the tines of a fork and drop into the drink.

Name: St. Petersburg Sundae
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto (Preferably Di Saronna Amaretto)', '1 scoop(s) Chocolate Ice Cream']
Making: Chill all ingredients and mix in a blender for about 10 seconds until smooth and creamy. Do not overmix. Pour into a chilled, stemmed glass and sprinkle chopped almonds over the top. Serve with a straw and an iced tea spoon.

Name: St. Zipaine
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Zipang Sparkling Sake', '1 1/2 part(s) St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '2 part(s) Soda Water']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass over ice and stir. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: St. Zipang
Ingredients: ['4 part(s) Zipang Sparkling Sake', '1 part(s) St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur']
Making: Pour in a champagne flute and garnish with a raspberry.

Name: Stab In The Back
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '2 oz. Almaden Dry White Wine', '2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Build in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Stag and Cola
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Red Stag Kentucky Bourbon', '10 oz. Cola']
Making: Pour Red Stag into a 16-oz glass half-filled with ice. Fill glass with cola, stir lightly, and serve.

Name: Stand Up-Sit Down
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Everclear', 'Water']
Making: Mix with ice in a 12 oz. glass, garnish with twist of citrus (your choice), sit and have a relaxing drink. Stand up-Sit down!

Name: Standard Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Tequila', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Triple Sec', '1 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake vigorously with ice and strain into a salt-rimmed rocks or margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Stanford Paloma Cardinal
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Light Rum', '4 oz. Lemonade (Hi-C pink lemonade)', '4 oz. Grape Juice', '3 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix in a large glass.

Name: Stanley Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. White Rum', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Stanley Senior
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Stanley Steamer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Brandy', 'Coffee', 'Grand Marnier']
Making: Pour ingredients into warm 12 oz. beer stein. Add coffee. Leave room to top with whipped cream. French Kiss with a drizzle of Grand Mariner. Add a long straw and enjoy.

Name: Star Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Brandy', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Star Daisy
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Apple Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Star Kiss
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Strawberry Schnapps', 'dash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Cream', '7-Up']
Making: Pour the schnapps into a highball glass and fill the glass almost to the top with 7-Up. Then add the cream and the grenadine.

Name: Starboard Light
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Starbucks Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Starbucks Cream Liqueur', '1 part(s) Peppermint Schnapps', '1 part(s) Heavy Cream', '1 part(s) Soda']
