Making: Mix all ingredients in a shaker. Coat a tall glass with red and blue sprinkles and dust the rim with red sugar. Pour mixture and serve.

Name: Starburst
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Strawberry Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Orange Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Pour the schnapps over ice into a highball glass. Add equal parts of orange juice and 7-Up and a splash of grenadine. Stir gently and serve.

Name: Stars and Stripes
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Heavy Cream', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Layer in a cordial glass.

Name: Starseeker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '4 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with the lemon wedge.

Name: Stately Wil
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Pisang Ambon', '2/3 oz. Vodka', 'Milk']
Making: Build in a highball glass filled with cracked ice. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Stay Up Late
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Club Soda', '2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Steaming Peach
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '4 oz. Water (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a brandy snifter. Float an orange slice as a garnish.

Name: Steel Bottom #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'Red Stripe Beer (Jamacian)']
Making: 1) Pour rum into the bottom of a large beer mug. Use 2 ounces for the more experienced and total memory loss! 2) Pour Red Stripe slowly into the mug, trying not to disturb the rum on the bottom. When done correctly you will see the rum separated from the beer on the bottom. Drink the beer slowly except for the last quarter, then chug it back...& Wow, that's a Steel Bottom !!! Can you stomach that?

Name: Steel Bottom #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Beer (Preferably Hairoun beer brewed in St.Vincent and the Grenadines)', '1/2 oz. Rum (Preferably Sunset Very Strong Rum -84.5%-)', '1 Lime']
Making: Cut the lime in two squeeze into a lowball glass and add the other ingredients.

Name: Steeles Club Raw Sour
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Smirnoff Citrus Twist Vodka', '1 dash(es) Sour Mix', '6 oz. Sprite']
Making: Shake twice with ice and pour into a large glass.

Name: Steelworks
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cola Tonic', '4 drop(s) Bitters', 'Ginger Beer', 'Soda Water']
Making: Fill a glass up to 3/4 with ice cubes. Add the soda water to the level of ice-cubes then pour the cola tonic. Fill to the top with ginger beer and add the bitters. Stir and enjoy.

Name: Stef's Smirnoff Sundance
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 bottle(s) Smirnoff Ice', 'Gatorade (Orange)']
Making: Pour into a tall glass over crushed ice and fill with the Gatorade.

Name: Stella's Groove
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 oz. Midori', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour Midori, Bacardi, and Absolut over ice. Add pineapple juice and shake, then pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Steve's Kahlua Kalypso
Ingredients: ['3 1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 cup(s) Whole Milk', '3 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend well until milkshake consistency is achieved. Then pour contents into a glass and enjoy. My favorite is to freeze what is left over and enjoy it as an ice cream delight.

Name: Stevie Ray
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '5 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake ingredients over ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Stiletto
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 tsp. Amaretto', '1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Pour all ingredients into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

Name: Stimulator
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Tuaca', 'Milk']
Making: Mix in a tall glass with ice cubes, milk to fill. If prepared correctly, it tastes like chocolate milk .

Name: Stinger #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a mint leaf.

Name: Stinger #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cognac', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe']
Making: Pour over ice into a rocks glass.

Name: Stirrup Cup
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Stock Exchange
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Make like a Godfather...just substitute Frangelico for Ameretto.

Name: Stockholm 75
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Citrus Vodka', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '5 oz. Champagne (Chilled)']
Making: Shake vodka, syrup, and juice and strain into an oversized cocktail glass with a sugared rim. Fill with champagne.

Name: Stoli Blitzer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', 'Club Soda']
Making: Pour Stolichnaya Vodka over ice in a rocks glass. Fill with club soda and garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Stoli-Boli - Russian Vodka And Champagne
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1 part(s) Bollinger Champagne']
Making: Just mix equal quantities in a champagne glass..

Name: Stolichnaya Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Gin', '8 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Shake or blend over cracked ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Stone Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Dry Sherry', '1/2 oz. White Rum']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Stone Fence
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '2 dash(es) Bitters', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice cubes. Add Scotch and Bitters and fill with carbonated water. Stir and serve.

Name: Stone Fence #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', 'Apple Cider']
Making:
Fill a rocks glass with ice cubes and add Bourbon. Fill with apple cider.
~ Adapted from "Imbibe!" By David Wondrich

Name: Stone Sour
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled sour glass, and serve.

Name: Stoned Smurf
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', 'Sprite', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Mix Southern Comfort, Blue Curacao and Rum together. Pour in a glass over ice. Fill with Sprite. Optional: top with sour mix.

Name: Stoner Delight
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Orange Juice', 'Sour Mix', '7-Up']
Making: Shake the alcohol with equal parts of orange juice, cranberry juice, Sour Mix and 7-Up. Pour in a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry. Dave's comment: This drink started out as a non-alcoholic drink for my wife. It has become quite popular in the Altoona PA area.

Name: Stop Light #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '5 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: PourVodka and Peach into a cocktail glass. Add the Orange Juice and pour the Blue Curaco quickly. Float the Sloe Gin on top. If done carefully it will be three layers.

Name: Stop Lights
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Midori', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Line up three shot glasses. Pour 1 shot of vodka into each glass. Add Midori to one, a orange juice to the next, and cranberry juice to the third. Make sure to drink in order.

Name: Stork Club Cocktail
Ingredients: ['dash(es) Lime Juice', '1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', 'dash(es) Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Stork Club Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Sugar', '1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '2 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Stormy Night
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Nut Power Reload Peanut Cream Rum', '1/3 oz. Cavalier Light Rum', '1/3 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Served in layers as a shot.

Name: Straight Law Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Sherry', '3/4 oz. Gin']
Making: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Straight Satan's Whiskers
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Mix together in a highball glass. Only drink when it's dark out! If you want a variation for the day, see Curled Satan's Whiskers. Club bartenders are very wary of this drink, so maybe you might want to offer it as the House Special. Sweet dreams!

Name: Strange Brew
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Stranger-In-Town
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Calvados', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, vermouth, Calvados, and a cherry brandy. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Stratosphere Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Creme Yvette', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour into a champagne flute and fill with champagne.

Name: Strawberries and Cream
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 1/2 tbsp. Sugar', '3 Strawberries']
Making: Place schnapps, half-and-half, sugar, and 2 cups of crushed ice in an electric blender and blend at a high speed. Add 2 of the strawberries and blend for 10 seconds. Pour into a parfait glass, top with the other strawberry, and serve with a straw.

Name: Strawberry Alexander
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Strawberries (Frozen and sliced in syrup)', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Brandy']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a stemmed glass. Garnish with whipped cream and chocolate curls.

Name: Strawberry Banana Colada
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Coconut Cream', '2 oz. Strawberries', '1 Banana']
Making: Blend with 8 oz. of crushed ice until smooth. Serve in specialty glass.

Name: Strawberry Banana Spritz
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 cup(s) Strawberries', '1 cup(s) Creme de Banane', '10 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with strawberries.

Name: Strawberry Blonde
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka (Or any other strawberry-flavoured vodka)', '1 oz. Lillet (White)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a fresh strawberry.

Name: Strawberry Camouflage
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Gin', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Tropicana Twister (Orange Strawberry Banana Juice)']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass. It takes like it's non-alcoholic, but it will get you plastered.

Name: Strawberry Colada
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '3 oz. Cream', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a thin hurricane glass. Garnish with fresh strawberries.

Name: Strawberry Cow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baja Rosa', '1 cup(s) Milk', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix together in a highball glass and top off with ice, grenadine (for colour) and a cherry. Ice cream could be substituted for the milk, if desired.

Name: Strawberry Cream
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Cream', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Milk']
Making: Shake ingredients, serve in a pilsner glass. Garnish with a split strawberry (optional: Top with whipped cream to make even creamier).

Name: Strawberry Daiquiri #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 oz. Strawberries']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Strawberry Daiquiri #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 3/4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '3 oz. Strawberries (Frozen)']
Making: Blend all ingredients with a scoop of crushed ice.

Name: Strawberry Daquiri
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Strawberry Daiquiri Mix', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Strawberries', '1/2 cup(s) Water']
Making: Blend 1/2 cup of ice cubes in a blender. Add the Strawberry Daquiri Mix, Water and Strawberries. Mix again and pour into a cocktail glass. Add the Vodka and stir.

Name: Strawberry Dawn
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1/3 cup(s) Strawberries (Frozen)']
Making: Blend all ingredients with 1 cup of crushed ice in an electric blender at a high speed. Pour into a cocktail glass and garnish with sprig of mint.

Name: Strawberry Dream
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/4 oz. Parfait Amour', '1/4 oz. Maple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '3 Strawberries Muddled', '2 dash(es) Bitters Peach']
Making: Shake all ingredients, and strain over ice into a rocks glass. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Strawberry Fields Forever
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brandy', '2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Pour brandy and schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Strawberry Fizz #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '5 Strawberries', '1/2 tsp. Sweet Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Dry Gin', 'Soda Water']
Making: Blend and pour into a highball glass and fill with soda water.

Name: Strawberry Fizz #2
Ingredients: ['1 Egg', '1 can(s) Lemonade', '1/2 cup(s) Half and Half Cream', '2 tbsp. 7-Up', '1 pound(s) Strawberries (Sweetend and frozen)']
Making: Pour all into a blender and fill with ice. Blend well and enjoy. Great for brunches.

Name: Strawberry Grape Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gold Rum (Or white rum)', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Grape Juice', 'Grapes (Red and seedless)']
Making: Blend and slowly add some ice to the blender. When smooth serve in a highball glass and add a garnish of your choice.

Name: Strawberry Heart
Ingredients: ['3 1/3 oz. Kahlua', '3 1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '3 1/3 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', 'Milk', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Build alcohol over ice and fill glass 3/4 full with milk. Swirl whipped cream on top, drizzle some more strawberry liqueur over the cream and serve.

Name: Strawberry Ice Cream
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Strawberry Schnapps', '1/4 oz. DeKuyper Mad Melon Watermelon Schnapps', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Half and Half Cream']
Making: Fill a glass with Ice and top with scoop of ice cream. Add Triple Sec, Schnapps and Mad Melon. Top off with half and half. Shake and serve with the ice in a tumbler.

Name: Strawberry Margarita
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Strawberries']
Making: Rub rim of cocktail glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Shake schnapps, tequila, Triple Sec, lemon juice, and strawberries with ice and strain into the glass.

Name: Strawberry Paradise
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila Rose', '1 Kiwi', '1 Peach', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Puree peach and kiwi in a blender. Add alcohol and about 1 cup ice. Blend. Makes about 1 tall cocktail glass or 2 average size glasses.

Name: Strawberry Passion
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Finlandia Vodka', '1 Strawberry', '6 oz. Passion Fruit Juice']
Making: Fill a cup with ice and add the Finlandia Vodka. Add passion fruit juice. Take one large strawberry, drop it in a separate glass and squash it with a spoon to extract the juice. Pour the strawberry juice in the drink and you'll have the best drink on earth. Enjoy it.

Name: Strawberry Quik Shot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Cream (Or half and half)', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake and chill well over ice then strain into lowball glasses. Katie's comment: It should be slightly pink, if not, add more cranberry juice. It tastes like Strawberry Quik. The guys used to call it a Strawberry Pussy.

Name: Strawberry Rose Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Rose', '2 oz. Strawberry Margarita Mix', '7-Up (To taste)']
Making: Blend and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Strawberry Shortcake #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Cream', '7-Up']
Making: Pour strawberry schnapps and grenadine in a glass with ice. Fill with 7-Up and splash cream on top.

Name: Strawberry Stripper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Strawberry Schnapps', '5 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Serve over ice in a 10 oz. glass, adding the grenadine last.

Name: Strawberry Sunrise
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with orange juice. Garnish with a fresh strawberry.

Name: Strawberry Surprise
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '3 oz. Vodka (100 proof)', '1/8 oz. Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Mix well the vanilla schnapps and the vodka and pour into a shot glass. Float the chocolate liqueur on top.

Name: Strawgasm
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Mix with ice in a lowball glass.

Name: Strega Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Strega', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '6 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Stir with ice in a tall glass.

Name: Strega Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 tsp. Orgeat Syrup', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Strega']
Making: Shake with cracked ice in a shakerand strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Strega Flip
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 1/2 oz. Strega', '1 Egg', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and pour into a chilled highball glass. Sprinkle with ground nutmeg.

Name: Strega Frappe
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Strega', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 tbsp. Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Mix in a tall glass.

Name: Strega Pink Witch
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Gin', '1 part(s) Strega', '4 part(s) Pink Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass.

Name: Strega Satin
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Strega', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth and pour into a chilled parfait or sherbet glass. Serve with a straw.

Name: Strega Smile
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Strega', '1 oz. Bitters', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a tall glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Strega Sour
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Strega']
Making: Combine with ice and shake well. Strain and serve straight up. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

Name: Strega Tropic
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Strega', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass.

Name: Strip and Go Naked
Ingredients: ['6 can(s) Beer', '12 oz. Lemonade (Concentrate)', '12 oz. Vodka']
Making: In a large pitcher, pour in 3 cans of beer, then the vodka and lemonade, then the last 3 beers. Mix gently and pour into a tall glasses over ice.

Name: Stroganoff Sling
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar (Or to taste)', 'Club Soda']
Making: Mix all ingredients except Club Soda, in a tall, chilled cooler glass. Add several ice cubes and fill with cold Club Soda. Stir gently and garnish with a maraschino cherry and orange slice.

Name: Stuck Shirley
Ingredients: ['1/3 cup(s) Raspberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Vodka (Optional)', '7-Up']
Making: Combine in a collins glass filled with ice.

Name: Stumble F**k #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Layer chilled in a tumbler.

Name: Stumplifter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Applejack', 'Orange Juice (To taste)', 'Lemon Juice (To taste)', 'Grenadine (To taste)']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Stupid Cupid
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Suave's
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', 'Strawberry Daiquiri Mix', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour the rums in a large margarita glass, fill with daiquiri mix and top with whipped cream. Garnish with real strawberries, cherries, a slice of lemon and a slice of lime.

Name: Suavecita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Partida Reposado Tequila', '1/2 oz. Aperol Orange Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist. – Jacques Bezuidenhout, San Francisco

Name: Submarine #1
Ingredients: ['1 Beer (Per person)', '151 Proof Rum', 'Amaretto']
Making: Take a few highball glasses (depending on how many people you are serving). Put the glasses in a row next to each other. Open one beer and pour into the glasses about 1oz. each. Then take the same number of shooter glasses and put them on the top of the other glasses carefully. Then pour slowly into them 1/2 oz. amaretto. Then put 1/2 oz. rum 151. Light up the shooters. Take another shot glass and hit the first shooter glass. The other shooter glasses will fall in the highball glasses. Serve to the customers. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Submarine #2
Ingredients: ['Orange Juice', 'Vodka']
Making: Pour the orange juice into a cocktail glass until half full. Place a clean rag over the glass and push a (clean!) quarter down until the rag touches the orange juice. Pour the vodka on the quarter until you get the desired amount. Lift the rag slowly and there should be a layer of orange juice and a layer of vodka. When shooting the drink let the orange juice touch your lips before downing it.

Name: Suck Me Beautiful
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Noyeaux', '1/2 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix over ice and strain into a rocks glass.

Name: Suck Me Sideways
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', "1/2 oz. Creme d'Almond", 'Pineapple Juice', "1/2 oz. Myer's Rum"]
Making: Mix all ingredients except pineapple juice and Myer's Rum over ice in a Hurricane glass. Fill with pineapple juice and float Myer's Rum on top. Garnish with a fruit flag or cherry.

Name: Sucker Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Sour Apple Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a highball glass over ice, stir and enjoy!

Name: Sue Riding High
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Hot Chocolate', '1 tsp. Heavy Cream']
Making: Let the hot chocolate cool to room temperature. In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum, creme de cacao, and hot chocolate. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Drop the cream into the centre of the drink.

Name: Sufer on Acid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a collins and drink with a straw.

Name: Suffering Bastard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Ginger Ale', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Pour all the ingredients with ice into a cocktail glass. John’s comment: The series of drinks, Suffering Bastard, Dying Bastard, Dead Bastard is from the _Rongovian Embassy to the USA_,a weird bar in Trumansburg, New York. Only a few have done the series and found their car. Generally you end up waking up on a golf course somewhere.

Name: Suffering Bastard - a slight variation
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Ginger Ale', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Pour all the ingredients with ice into a cocktail glass. This drink originated at the Shepherds Hotel in Cairo Egypt during the prolonged British visit there. The original name was "The long suffering bar steward." That is until the Americans got there and it was soon "bastardized" to Suffering Bastard. Variation (slight): add 2 or 3 slices of fresh cucumber cut the length of the cuke and serve it in the drink.

Name: Suffragette City
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sugar 'n Spice
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beachcomber Spiced Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice', 'Coca Cola', '7-Up']
Making: Fill with Coke or 7-Up. Serve over ice.

Name: Sugar Daddy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sugar Plum Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Russian Standard Vodka', '1 oz. Sugar Plum Reduction', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a martini shaker filled with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a medium sniffer. Garnish with a sprinkle of fresh ground cinnamon & 1 whole cinnamon stick.

Name: Sugar Syrup
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Sugar', '1 part(s) Water (Boiling)']
Making: Stir thoroughly until the sugar dissolves.

Name: Suicide
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', "1/2 oz. Light Rum (Preferably Bacardi's)", "1/2 oz. Myer's Rum (Preferably Myer's Dark Rum)", '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Strawberry Mix', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and serve in cocktail glass.

Name: Suicide Seven
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Absolut 100 Vodka', '7-Up']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass and top with 7-Up. Stir and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Suicide Solution
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon', '6 oz. Kool-Aid']
Making: Fill a Collins glass with ice. Add Jim Beam and top with pre-made Kool Aid mix. Any red color will do however Tropical and Fruit Punch work better than Cherry. Nobody can remember how they taste. Enjoy!

Name: Suissesse
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Pastis', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 Egg White', '1 splash(es) Soda Water']
Making: Shake with ice (except soda water) and strain into a lowball glass. Add a splash of soda water.

Name: Sukha Shin
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Lemonade', '1 can(s) Mello Yello', '2 oz. Everclear']
Making: Pour in half the Mello Yello then half of the lemonade. Add the Everclear then the rest of the lemonade and mello yello. Be sure to stir. Invented for Econ 200 at Ohio State

Name: Summer At Orchard Beach
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Rum (Light)', 'Tonic Water', '1 Lime']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice, add the Bacardi Light Rum. Squeeze into the glass the juice of 2 pieces of lime and fill the glass with tonic water. Garnish with a lime slice hanging on the glass rim.

Name: Summer Breeze
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a small melon ball.

Name: Summer Hummer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '3 oz. 7-Up', '3 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a collins glass and enjoy.

Name: Summer Passion
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. La Grande Passion Liqueur', 'Sparkling Water', 'Lime Juice']
Making: Pour in a highball glass and fill with equal amounts of water and juice.

Name: Summer Press
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 part(s) Tommy Bahama Golden Sun Rum', '1 3/4 part(s) Lemon Lime Soda', '1 3/4 part(s) Soda Water', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients and serve over ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Summer Scotch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '3 dash(es) Creme de Menthe', 'Soda Water']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with soda water.

Name: Summer Sensation
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Beer (Preferably pale beer)', '1 oz. Cointreau', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the beer into a pint glass leaving a big head. Then pour the orange juice and the Cointreau into a shaker with ice and shake until ice cold. Add the contents of the shaker to the beer and stir.

Name: Summer Shore
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Coconut Liqueur', '2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 Banana', '1 Kiwi', '1 Passion Fruit', '1 1/2 cup(s) Milk (Full cream milk)']
Making: Put the fruit in a blender and puree, add coconut liqueur and creme de cacao, pulse until combined. Pour in milk, pulse until combined. Pour into a cocktail glass and serve with a slice of banana and sprig of mint stuck on the rim of glass.

Name: Summer Soother
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'dash(es) Amaretto', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Orange Juice (To taste)']
Making: Shake the vodka, peach schnapps, amaretto and orange juice and strain into a highball glass. Add grenadine and serve with plenty of ice.

Name: Summer Splash
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) 7-Up', 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour the gin and the 7-Up in a highball glass and fill with lemonade.

Name: Summer Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', 'Sparkling Wine (White)']
Making: Combine in a collins glass. Add ice if you like.

Name: Summer Twist
Ingredients: ['1 wedge(s) Lemon', '1 wedge(s) Lime', '4 oz. Bacardi Limon', '10 oz. Sierra Mist']
Making: These directions apply to a 16oz glass. Squeeze lemon and lime wedges into glass before adding. Fill glass with crushed ice, then add the Bacardi Limon. Pour in Sierra Mist and serve.

Name: Summer's Cusp
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a tall glass.

Name: Summer's Strawberry Rose
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Tequila Rose', '1 1/2 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '3/4 cup(s) Strawberry Mix']
Making: Blend with ice until the consistency is smooth and creamy The colour should be a light pink resembling a strawberry milkshake. If not, add additional tequila Rose and/or Strawberry Mix. Serve in a chilled glass with a thick straw. Garnish with fresh strawberries and whipped cream. Note: Strawberry Mix can be substituted with Fresh or Frozen strawberries and sugar syrup.

Name: Summertime Blues
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Sun Kiss
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Stir in a collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Sun On The Rocks #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1/2 Orange', '1/2 Lemon']
Making: Shake and pour over ice.

Name: Sun On The Rocks #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 Lemon']
Making: Shake and pour over ice.

Name: Sunburn
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Triple Sec', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a collins glass filled with ice and enjoy.

Name: Sunday Afternoon
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Pink Lemonade (Sweetened)', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Stir in a highball glass. Ice is optional.

Name: Sundial
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Fill a glass with ice and pour in vodka, apricot brandy and Southern Comfort. Fill with orange juice and stir well.

Name: Sundowner
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Van Der Hum Liqueur', '4 dash(es) Lemon Juice', '4 dash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sunfire
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Noyeaux', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour the creme de noyaux first, over ice in a tall glass. Then add the Malibu and top up with pineapple juice. David's comments: Make sure the creme de noyaux goes in first, for the burst of color in a Sunfire Crushed ice works well.

Name: Sunnier Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1 1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '4 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Shake rum, lemon juice, sugar and grapefruit juice with ice until frosty. Strain over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with Club Soda. Stir. Garnish with a grapefruit wedge.

Name: Sunniest Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Shake rum, lemon juice, sugar and grapefruit juice with ice until frosty. Strain over ice cubes in a highball glass. Fill with Club Soda. Garnish with an orange wedge.

Name: Sunny Kongens Lyngby
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '1/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/3 oz. Black Currant Syrup', '4 2/3 oz. Sprite']
Making: Shake Absolut Kurant, lemon juice and syrup with ice. Strain into a longdrink glass with 2-3 icecubes. Fill up with Sprite and put a lemon slice on top or on the side.

Name: Sunny Parrot
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum (Or to taste)", '6 oz. Sunny Delight Orange Juice (Or to taste)']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Sunny Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Shake rum, lemon juice and sugar with crushed or shaved ice until frosty. Strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge and a cherry.

Name: Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Cream', '4 drop(s) Grenadine', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: SunRise Alberto
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Orange Juice Frozen', '8 oz. Tequila', '4 oz. Grenadine Red', '1 Lime']
Making: Blend frozen orange juice, tequila and grenadine. Strain and pour into highball glasses. Cut the lime into wedges, squeeze the juice into each drink, then drop in the wedge to serve.

Name: Sunscreen
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '4 oz. Root Beer']
Making: Stir in a glass with ice. It tastes like sunscreen smells!

Name: Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Cognac', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake the apricot brandy and cognac and pour into a Tom Collins glass filled with ice. Fill with orange juice and stir. Garnish with the works.

Name: Sunset Croyde
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake Malibu Rum, Cointreau and orange juice with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and drizzle cherry brandy on top.

Name: Sunset Delight
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Smirnoff Orange Twist Vodka', '8 oz. Sunny Delight Orange Juice']
Making: Mix vodka and Sunny Delight in a glass with ice. Stir and serve. Add more or less vodka to taste but be careful the Sunny Delight masks the taste of the vodka.

Name: Sunset Horizon
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Gin', '2/3 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 2/3 oz. Multivitamin Juice', 'Wine (Orange or Peach Flavoured)']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with wine.

Name: Sunset Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Vodka (Premium vodka)', '1 oz. Strawberry Margarita Mix', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Mix the ingredients in a highball glass and serve over ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a strawberry. This drink is definitely a lady pleaser.

Name: Sunset Spice
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beachcomber Spiced Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Serve over ice. Garnish with cherry.

Name: Sunshine
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Sunny Delight Orange Juice', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix the peach schnapps with the Sunny Delight in a glass with ice. Add the grenadine

Name: Sunshine Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel.

Name: Sunspot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka (Preferably orange vodka)', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '2 oz. Soda Water (Strawberry flavoured)', '5 oz. Club Soda (Or Sprite)']
Making: Mix over ice and pour in a cocktail glass.

Name: Sunstroke
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Grapefruit Juice', 'dash(es) Cointreau']
Making: Stir in a lowball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Suntan
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Fire and Ice', '1/4 cup(s) Beer (Preferably Birch Beer)', '1/2 cup(s) Pepsi Cola']
Making: Pour into a large glass and stir.

Name: Suntan #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kokocaribe Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Served in layers as a shot.

Name: Suntan Lotion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Cream or Milk']
Making: Fill glass with ice and add Malibu Rum and Amaretto. Fill with cream or milk. Great on a hot day and it smells and looks like suntan lotion!

Name: Super Beast
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '3 oz. Sour Mix', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Shake everything except the Coca Cola with ice. Strain into a cocktail glass and and fill the rest of the glass with Coca Cola.

Name: Super Brass Monkey
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Rum', '2 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 1/2 oz. Lemonade', '3 1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix with ice in a highball glass. Jo says you'll be wasted in a minute without knowing it.

Name: Super Monkey Ball
Ingredients: ['20 oz. Pepsi Cola Blue', '2 oz. Light Rum']
Making: Combine ingredients in a large glass over ice. Really good tasting and strong!

Name: Super Sour Apple Blow Pop
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Apple Pucker', '3 oz. Bacardi Limon', '9 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix Apple Pucker and Bicardi in a glass with ice. Add sprite to taste. Garnish with a cute little Hawiian umbrella!

Name: Super Surge
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 can(s) Surge Energy Drink']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass and enjoy.

Name: Superfruit Mojito - TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '2 wedge(s) Lime', '2 wedge(s) Lemon', '8 Mint Leaves', '1 splash(es) Sprite', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour liqueur, rum, Sprite and pineapple juice into a tall glass. Muddle lemon, lime and mint with ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Superstar
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Lemonade']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Surf City Lifesaver
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Ouzo', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', "1/2 oz. Ice Cream Bailey's Haagen Dazs"]
Making: Blend with lots of ice until smooth. Serve.

Name: Surf Rider
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Surf's Up
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '5 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Blend with 1/2 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Surfer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'Sprite Tropical', 'Lime Juice']
Making: Pour into a tall glass filling it with equal parts of Sprite Tropical and lime juice. Serve with ice and a lime slice.

Name: Surfer on Acid #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice. Get Soused!!!!!

Name: Surfer on Acid #3
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Jagermeister', '3/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Mix in a highball glass.

Name: Surfer On Acid #4
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Jagermeister', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Surfin Hawiian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'Hawaiian Fruit Punch ( Surfin Strawberry)', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the Vodka into a cocktail glass. Fill the rest of the glass with half Hawaiian Punch and half Orange Juice.

Name: Surgeon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '12 oz. Surge Energy Drink']
Making: Mix in a highball glass.

Name: Surgibu
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Surge Energy Drink', '1 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Mix and drink.

Name: Surputte
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Pour over ice in a highball glass and fill with 7-up.

Name: Surrey Slider
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the rum, peach schnapps, and orange juice into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Susan Littler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 tsp. Galliano', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour all of the ingredients into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Name: Susie Taylor
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '2 oz. White Rum', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour into a collins glass and fill with Ginger Ale.

Name: Swabby
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Spiced Rum", '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Serve over ice, garnish with orange slice.

Name: Swampwater
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Lime Vodka', '3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', 'Sprite']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with Sprite.

Name: Swashbuckler
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '3/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Fill a 16 oz. glass with ice, add the ingredients and top off with Hawaiian fruit punch.

Name: Swass Factory
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '2 1/2 oz. Firewater', '2 oz. Tabasco Sauce', '1 oz. Tonic Water', "1 tsp. Mayonnaise (Hellman's Fat Free)"]
Making: In an 8 oz. glass, mix the Beam and Firewater first. Then add the tonic water and mayonnaise. Top off with the Tabasco. Enjoy. (Note from the webmixer: given the potency of the Tabasco sauce, especially in large quantities, this is probably quite a dangerous drink. You have been warned).

Name: Sweat from a Mexican's Balls
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Southern Comfort', "3/4 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '3/4 oz. Amaretto (Preferably Disarrono Amaretto)', "3/4 oz. Myer's Rum (Dark)", '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a shaker except Myers. Shake and pour over ice and float the shot of Myers on top.

Name: Sweathog Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Pineapple Orange Juice']
Making: Fill a 16 oz. glass with ice. Pour in the alcohol and fill the glass with pinapple orange juice. Great summer party drink.

Name: Swedish Fish #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Swedish Massage
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '2 oz. Limeade']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lime. Alternatively, shoot.

Name: Swedish Onlooker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', 'Champagne', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice (White)']
Making: PourAbsolut Mandarin into an 8 oz. glass. Fill the glass 3/4 full with Champagne. Add the White Cranberry Juice. All the ingredients should be as cold as possible. The Cranberry Juice may also be frozen in ice cube trays and added in ice cube form. Because it's a clear drink no one expects those specific fruit flavors.

Name: Swee Tight Pussy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a collins glass.

Name: Sweet And Sour Melon
Ingredients: ['2 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', '1 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Salt the rim of a cocktail glass. Pour over ice and serve.

Name: Sweet and Sour Mix
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Sugar Syrup', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix.

Name: Sweet Astoria
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Pour all the ingredients into an ice-filled shaker. Shake vigorously and pour into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of orange. Make sure to use a high quality, preferably grain based vodka for this drink.

Name: Sweet Becky
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Seagram's Extra Dry Gin", '4 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Place gin, grenadine and ice in a cocktail glass, then add the lemon-lime soda (like Citra, Sprite, …) Originated at the University of Missouri-Columbia.

Name: Sweet Casa Noble
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Casa Noble Gold', 'Peach Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Fill a collins glass with ice cubes, add the tequila and top up with the peach juice. Add the grenadine and garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Sweet Danger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: Sweet Dreams
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Southern Comfort', '1 part(s) Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix to your taste the two sweetest beverages.

Name: Sweet Estelle
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila (Preferably Baja Rosa)', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Milk']
Making: Measure shots into glass over ice and then add the milk. Simple but delicious. My version of a Dirty Mother!

Name: Sweet Georgia Brown
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tangerine Juice', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Pour peach schnapps into chilled juice glass. Top with tangerine juice and stir. Garnish with a pineapple ring. Makes an excellent eye-opener in the morning!

Name: Sweet Ginger Jack
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '12 oz. A-Treat Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix well serve over ice.

Name: Sweet Heat
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 4 Copas Anejo', '1/2 Jalapeno Pepper with seeds removed', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. 4 Copas Organic Agave Nectar', '1 oz. Licor 43 or 1/2 oz. Grand Marnier and 1/2 oz. Navan']
Making: Muddle Jalapeno in lime and simple syrup, add ice and tequila, shake well and strain over fresh ice in a tall glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Sweet Jesus!
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Milk', 'Maple Syrup']
Making: Blend all ingredients except syrup with ice until smooth. Pour into a glass and drizzle with maple syrup.

Name: Sweet Lips
Ingredients: ['3 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour Malibu Rum into a cocktail glass. Fill the remainder of the glass with orange jiuce and pineapple juice to taste. Add a fruit garnish such as an orange slice and serve cold.

Name: Sweet Maria
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 tbsp. Light Cream']
Making: Shake all ingredients with cracked ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Sweet Memories
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Orange Curacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sweet Misery
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Cherry Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients with ice in a blender and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sweet Mud
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Rum', 'Lemonade (Preferably pink lemondade)', 'Surge Energy Drink (Or Mountain Dew)']
Making: Mix on the rocks and stir.

Name: Sweet N' Tasty
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Beer', '1 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Pour in a cocktail glass.

Name: Sweet Patootie #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sweet Patootie #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Triple Sec 1', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 slice(s) Orange']
Making: Pour over rocks and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Sweet Peach
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in a lowball glass over ice.

Name: Sweet Peach Tea
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', 'Iced Tea']
Making: Pour over ice in a tall glass and fill with iced tea.

Name: Sweet Porno
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '1 1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Mix all the liquors over ice in a 16 oz. beer glass and top off with sour mix. Garnish with a lemon wedge and a cherry.

Name: Sweet Sensation #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '7-Up']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with 7-Up. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Sweet Sensation #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Cazadores Blanco Tequila', 'Sprite', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix Bacardi 151 Proof Rum and Cazadores Tequila in a highball glass. Fill to 1/2 inch from top with Sprite. Add a touch of grenadine and a touch of orange juice. Shake or stir and enjoy.

Name: Sweet Solada
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '1 1/2 oz. Coconut puree', '1 oz. Pineapple puree', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Pour Mekhong and the rest of the ingredients into a mixing glass. Add Ice and shake vigorously for 7-8 seconds. Strain into a balloon glass over crushed ice and garnish with a pineapple spear, orange, cherry and pineapple leaves. Based on the Pina Colada.

Name: Sweet Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'Cherry Juice (Optional)']
Making: Pour vodka and sweet and sour in a shaker and shake with ice. Strain into a tall glass and fill with orange juice. Top with grendine and a cherry. If it's too sweet add cherry juice to taste.

Name: Sweet Tail
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Bulldog Gin', '3 Mint Leaves', '3 Vanilla Bean', '3/4 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Muddle mint and vanilla beans. Add simple syrup and Bulldog Gin and let sit for 15 seconds. Shake with ice and strain into a Champagne Flute. Gently pour in Creme de Cassis and garnish with mint sprigs. Add 7-Up if desired.

Name: Sweet Tangerine
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. White Rum']
Making: Stir and pour over ice into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sweet Tart #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Sweet Tart - TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 part(s) TY KU Soju', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 part(s) Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Sweet Tears
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Orange Juice', 'Grenadine']
Making: Shake hard with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Add drips of grenadine in the glass walls so that it slides through the drink and down the glass walls making the so called tears. Decorate with a cherry and its ready.

Name: Sweet Temptation
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Midori', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Pour all Ingredients into a pint glass over ice. Fill with equal parts cranberry and pineapple juice. Stir thouroughly. Garnish with A Cherry

Name: Sweet Thing
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Blue Curacao', '4 oz. Lemonade', '4 oz. Raspberries']
Making: Shake all the ingredients and pour over crushed ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Sweet Tooth #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Chocolate', '1 1/4 tsp. Honey']
Making: Heat the ingredients in a pan or a microwave, leave to cool and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Sweetheart Sparkler
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Sandeman Porto Founders Reserve', '3 part(s) Sparkling Wine']
Making: Pour into a champagne flute.

Name: Sweetness's Hat
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a mixing glass. Shake and strain into a highball glass. Add orange and cherry garnish.

Name: Swift Kick In The Nuts
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/10 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 splash(es) Red Bull Energy Drink', '2 Cherries']
Making: Mix together over ice in a cocktail glass. Garnish with two cherries.

Name: Swimming Pool
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Sweetened Cream', '3/4 oz. Coconut Milk', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3/4 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Pour into an exotic glass and float Curacao.

Name: Swiss Family Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Anis', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Swiss Miss TT's
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Kahlua', '2 part(s) Chocolate Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Drink. Repeat.

Name: Swiss Yodeler
Ingredients: ['1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Molasses', '1/2 tsp. Sugar', '1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: T & A Integration
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Juice', '3 oz. Dry Gin (Integration)', 'dash(es) Sprite', '3 Fruitopia (Integration)']
Making: Pour the lemon juice into a cup first, then continue in order of ingredients, swirling after each ingredient. Serve in a collins glass. Suitable for sipping.

Name: T and T
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with tonic water. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: T Bird
Ingredients: ['1 1/8 oz. Canadian Whisky', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '2 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: T N T #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Anisette']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: T N T Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cognac', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1 oz. Absinthe']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: T.a.p.s.
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 dash(es) Southern Comfort']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass over ice. Fill with pineapple juice and add the Southern Comfort. Garnish with a cherry(optional).

Name: T.H.O.N.G
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Hennessy Cognac VS', 'Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Creme de Noyeaux', '1/2 oz. Galliano']
Making: Mix alcohol in a collins glass and fill with orange juice..

Name: T.L.C (Taste-Liquor-Can't)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', '1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Built in a high ball glass.

Name: T.N.T
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Orange Curacao', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'dash(es) Pastis']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: T2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '3 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake and strain over ice. Actually a cocktail , but try shooting this one. A few of them will knock you off your stool.

Name: Tabard Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Milagro Reposado Tequila', '1/2 oz. Sherry (Lustau Amontillado)', '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters (Regans)']
Making: Stir all ingredients in chilled bar glass, strain into cocktail glass. Cut circular orange peel and lightly squeeze oils on top of drink then float upside down. Place sprig of fresh thyme on peel like a lily pad.

Name: Tahiti Club
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', '1 tbsp. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Tahoe
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Mix together in an old fashioned glass.

Name: Tailspin Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Green Chartreuse', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Tainted Love
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '4 oz. Root Beer']
Making: Mix over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Tais Malibu Express
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Bacardi White Rum', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Tajie's Cum
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', "1/2 oz. Peach Liqueur (Preferably Bol's)", '1 oz. Fruit Punch', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake and pour into a water goblet. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Tajies SourPuss
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Bombay Dry Gin', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Bols Peach Liqueur', '1 oz. Fruit Punch', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shave with ice and serve.

Name: Take Five
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Green Curacao', '2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Take It Bitch
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Makers Mark Bourbon', '3/4 oz. Bacardi Rum', 'Sprite']
Making: Combine in a large cocktail glass (approx. 10-12 oz.).

Name: Take Me Home #1
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Whiskey', '2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Take Me Home #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 dash(es) Grenadine', 'dash(es) 151 Proof Rum', 'Red Bull Energy Drink', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour the vodka and the peach schnapps in a highball glass filled with ice. Top with equal parts of Sprite and Red Bull and add the grenadine. Float the 151.

Name: Take me out to the Ballgame
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 pinch(es) Salt', '4 oz. Soda Water']
Making:
The Peanuts and Cracker Jack Cocktail
Rub half a lemon around the rim of a glass and place into crushed Cracker Jack to coat the rim. Combine Wild Turkey, Frangelico, Amaretto, lemon juice and salt in a shaker. Mix and strain into a glass with rocks and top with soda water.

Name: Tall and Dizzy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', 'Whipped Cream (canned)']
Making: Combine all the ingredients with ice in a shaker. Fill with whipped cream and shake vigorously. Pour into a highball glass, add a squeeze of lime and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Tall Blonde
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Aalborg Akvavit', '1/2 oz. Apricot Liqueur', 'Lemon Soda (Bitter)']
Making: Build in a highball glass and top with lemon soda. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Tall Gimp
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Sangria', '3 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Mix well and serve over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Tall Ship
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Tamandarin Smash
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cabana Cachaca', '2 wedge(s) Lime', '4 wedge(s) Mandarin Oranges', '1/2 oz. Tamarind Syrup', '2 drop(s) Orange Flower Water']
Making: Build in glass, muddle lime and mandarin orange and serve “messy”.

Name: Tamara Lvova
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka', '1 oz. Rum (Preferably Barbancourt)', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend for about 10 seconds until creamy. Do not overmix. Serve in a chilled stemmed glass. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a large strawberry.

Name: Tamaulipas Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Chinaco Blanco Tequila', '1 oz. Pages Vedrenne Pure Grape Sugar Syrup', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice, and strain into ice-filled margarita glass. Garnish with a lime wheel. Kosher salt rim optional. Designed to let the distinct Chinaco flavor shine.

Name: Tampa Bay Tampon
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Cream Soda', '1 oz. Raspberry Juice', '1 oz. Lime', '1 oz. Water (Preferably sea water)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Sailors used this to cure scurvy. Add the whipped cream to the BOTTOM of the glass, then pour the schnapps, lime, raspberry and cream soda all at the same time (they mix better this way). Add the bourbon last. The seawater is optional...but highly recommended...it distracts the taste buds (if you have no sea water, use palin water and throw in two pinches of salt).

Name: Tampa Titty Twister
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi O', '1 splash(es) Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Gin', "1 splash(es) Rose's Lime Juice", 'Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Fill with Sprite.

Name: Tangerine Dreams
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Isolabella (Or mandarine Napoleon)', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour liqueur and vodka into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add orange juice and garnish with a slice of orange and/or sugar coat the rim of the glass

Name: Tangerine Nightmare
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Isolabella (Or Mandarine Napoleon)', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Bitters (e.g. Suze)', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the alcohol over ice cubes in a highball glass, fill with orange juice and add 3-6 drops of bitter. Stir and drink slowly! :-)

Name: Tangerine Wet Dream
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Isolabella (Or Mandarine Napoleon)', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Heavy Cream', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake vigorously over ice to make a creamy mixture. Strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, a cherry and/or sugar coat rim of glass.

Name: Tangnerine Fantasy
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Orange Vodka', '1 part(s) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 part(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 part(s) Orgeat Syrup', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and then strain into a chilled martini glass. Add cranberry juice pouring down the side of the glass to create a layered look.

Name: Tango
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Orange Curacao', 'dash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Tango Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Tangotini
Ingredients: ["6 part(s) Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '4 part(s) Coconut Rum', '2 part(s) Banana Liqueur']
Making: Shake on the rocks and strain. Garnish the rim with coconut and a lemon twist.

Name: Tank
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', "1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Tanqarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '3 oz. Margarita Mix', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Tanqueray Red Snapper
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', 'Bloody Mary Mix']
Making: Pour Tanqueray Gin over ice in an old fashioned glass. Fill with Bloody Mary mix and serve.

Name: Tanya's Mad Fuzzy Melonade
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '8 oz. Lemonade', '1 oz. Sprite (Or to taste)']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass, adding Sprite last.

Name: Tap Dat Ass
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hennessy Cognac VS or cognac', '3 oz. Alize Red Passion', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients in highball glass filled with ice.

Name: Tap That Ass #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac (Preferably Hennessy)', '2 oz. Alize Gold Passion', '5 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour the ingredients in a cocktail glass and serve.

Name: Tap That Ass #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cognac', '1 1/2 oz. Alize Gold Passion (Yellow)', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix liquors in a collins glass and fill with half cranberry and pineapple juice. This cocktail has been brought to you by Christopher Mattheis "La Louisianne and The Townhouse in LA".

Name: Tarantula #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake well with ice. Serve cold in a highball glass.

Name: Tartan Swizzle
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '2 oz. Scotch', 'dash(es) Bitters', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine lime juice, sugar, Scotch, and Bitters. Shake well. Almost fill a collins glass with crushed ice. Stir until glass is frosted. Strain mixture in shaker into the glass and add the Club Soda.

Name: Tartantula
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Benedictine']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the Scotch, vermouth, and Benedictine. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Tarzan And Cheetah
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '3 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', '7-Up']
Making: Mix in a frosted glass. Fill with 7-Up. Stir and enjoy!!

Name: Tashkent Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Peach Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '6 oz. Orange Juice (Freshly squeezed)']
Making: Blend over ice and serve in a chilled highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Taste of Honey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Advocaat', '3/4 oz. Galliano', 'Lemonade']
Making: Shake and strain into a 10 oz. highball glass and fill with lemonade. Place slit a maraschino cherry on rim and add red drinking straw and red swizzle stick for contrast.

Name: Tasty
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cranberry Vodka', '1 oz. Grenadine', '8 oz. Mountain Dew', '1 Candy (Lemonhead)']
Making: Mix the Mountain Dew, vodka and grenadine. Add the Lemonhead. Do not eat the Lemonhead until finished with your drink. This drink is best served in a drinking horn but any glass will work.

Name: Tasty Kasee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', 'Fruitopia (Strawberry Passion)']
Making: Build over ice in a cocktail glass and will with Strawberry Passion Fruit Fruitopia.

Name: Tasty Tambre
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour in coconut rum, Chambord and fill with the pineapple juice. Garnish with a pineapple triangle.

Name: Tatooine Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Dr Pepper', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix the vodka and the orange juice as for a standard screwdriver, only use about 2/3 the normal amount of orange juice. Top it off with the Dr Pepper.

Name: Taurus
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '8 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Make a regular Redbull and vodka then top it off with a splash of cranberry.

Name: Tawny's Tipsy Sister
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', 'Strawberry Juice']
Making: Combine all except strawberry juice in a shaker with ice. Rub a lime wedge along rim of a cocktail glass filled with ice. Dip in sugar (optional). Strain over ice and fill to top with strawberry juice. (For serious sugar junkies ony!)

Name: TC Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Grand Marnier', '4 oz. Ginger Ale', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Mix in a shaker shake for 3 seconds and pour into a cocktail glass. Serve with ice

Name: Tea Forte Cosmo de Provence
Ingredients: ['1 Tea Forte Lavender Citrus Cocktail Infusion', '3 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Orange Liqueur', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Place infuser in glass. Pour vodka over infuser and steep for 2-3 minutes. Combine infused vodka, orange liqueur, lime juice and ice into shaker and shake vigorously. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with infuser if desired.

Name: Tea Forte Fizzy Forte Rita
Ingredients: ['1 Tea Forte Lavender Citrus Cocktail Infusion', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Orange Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Place infuser in glass. Pour tequila over infuser and steep for 2-3 minutes. Combine infused tequila, orange liqueur, and ice into shaker and shake vigorously. Salt rim of rocks glass. Pour mixture into glass and top off with lemon/lime soda.

Name: Tea Forte Lavender Fruit Soda
Ingredients: ['1 Tea Forte Lavender Citrus Cocktail Infusion', '2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Grapefruit Soda']
Making: Place infuser in highball glass. Pour vodka over infuser and steep to desired strength. Add grapefruit soda and ice.

Name: Tea Forte Lavender Lime Rickey
Ingredients: ['1 Tea Forte Lavender Citrus Cocktail Infusion', '2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Limeade', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Place infuser in glass. Pour vodka over infuser and steep for 2-3 minutes. Top with limeade, soda and ice.

Name: Tea Forte Lemon Lavender Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 Tea Forte Lavender Citrus Cocktail Infusion', '1 1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Orange Liqueur', '2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Place infuser in glass. Pour rum over infuser and steep to desired strength. Combine infused rum and orange liqueur in a shaker with ice, shake vigorously. Strain into a margarita glass, rim glass with a lime wedge and garnish with infuser.

Name: Tea Party
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1 1/2 oz. Tea Jasmine Green', '1 oz. Manzanilla Sherry', '1/2 oz. Creme de Peche', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Pour all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with violets.

Name: Tea-Ki Torch
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) DeKuyper Luscious Tropical Mango Liqueur', '1 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '3 part(s) Iced Tea Sweetened']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass.

Name: Teardrop
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Wine (Chardonnay)', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Serve in a Fiesta (tulip) glass over ice.

Name: Teaser
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shkae with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Tecate Mojito
Ingredients: ['6 sprig(s) Mint', '4 tsp. Simple Syrup', '2 tsp. Lime Juice', '2 tbsp. Light Rum', '12 oz. Tecate Light']
Making: To update this favorite drink, muddle together the fresh mint, simple syrup and lime juice in the bottom of a tall, frosted glass. Add light rum (optional) and stir. Pour chilled Tecate Light into the glass and enjoy!

Name: Teed Off
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Teen Steam
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sparkling Wine', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', 'dash(es) Cream']
Making: Pour the Southern Comfort into a champagne glass and add the sparkling wine. Squirt a little cream on top and place a cherry on the cream.

Name: Temptation Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 tsp. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1/2 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/2 tsp. Anis']
Making: Shake Blended Scotch whisky, Dubonnet, Triple Sec, and Anis with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with twists of orange and lemon peels and serve.

Name: Tempter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Ruby Port', '1 oz. Apricot Liqueur']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Tempter Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Port']
Making: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Ten Fuzzy Nuts
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '7-Up']
Making: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add Jack Daniel's, peach schnapps and amaretto. Splash with 7-up or fill to the customer's taste. Ten Fuzzy Nuts: Ten (Jack Daniel's/Ten-nessee Whiskey), Fuzzy (Peach Schnapps) and Nuts (Amaretto).

Name: Ten Quidder
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Triple Sec', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1 tsp. Blue Curacao']
Making: In an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, Triple Sec, and Bitters. Stir well. Pour the Curacao into the centre of the drink.

Name: Tennessee
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Rye Whiskey', '2 tbsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Stir with ice and pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice.

Name: Tennessee Buck
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Uncle Nearest 1856 Premium Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', 'Ginger Beer', '1 wedge(s) Lime']
Making:
Combine all ingredients into a wine or collins glass over ice. Top with ginger beer and a fresh lime wedge.
Image credit: Heidi Lee

Name: Tennessee Mud #2
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '3 oz. Kahlua', '3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Build in a highball glass and stir.

Name: Tennessee Tea
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Rum', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', "3/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Tennessee Waltz
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Passion Fruit Juice', '4 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a strawberry.

Name: Teq and Tea
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '8 oz. Iced Tea (Sweetend)']
Making: Mix tequila and iced tea over ice. Simple and good.

Name: Tequila Beaner
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Baked Bean Juice', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Pour tequila and lime juice into a rocks glass, stir. Drizzle the baked bean juice in so it settles on the bottom. Add one baked bean.

Name: Tequila Buddha
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Tequila', '3 part(s) Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Mix and serve in a cocktail glass. Enjoy as you contemplate the wheel of life.

Name: Tequila Caesar
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila Gold', 'Clamato Juice', 'Celery Salt', '1 wedge(s) Lime', 'Worcestershire Sauce', 'Salt', 'Pepper', 'Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Rim a highball glass with the lime wedge and dip the glass rim in celery salt. Add Tequila Gold, Worcestershire Sauce, salt and pepper and Tabasco Sauce to taste. Top up the glass with Clamato juice. Mix well and garnish with a celery stick.

Name: Tequila Canyon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/8 oz. Triple Sec', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour first 3 ingredients into a collins glass and stir gently. Top with pineapple and orange juice. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Tequila Cocktail #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '4 dash(es) Grenadine', '1/4 Egg White']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

Name: Tequila Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh - You can also use fresh lemon juice)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass rimmed with salt.

Name: Tequila Coffee Popper
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '7-Up']
Making: Pour Kahlua and tequila into rocks glass and fill with 7-Up. Cover glass with napkin, hold glass by rim, drop on counter and drink immediately.

Name: Tequila Collins #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 tbsp. Lemonade (Frozen Concentrate)', '3 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Stir in a collins glass.

Name: Tequila Collins #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Build in a collins glass.

Name: Tequila Fire
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Tequila', '2 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Tequila Fizz #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. Grenadine', '1 Egg White', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except Ginger Ale) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill with Ginger Ale, stir, and serve.

Name: Tequila Frost
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Tequila', '1 1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/4 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Honey', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '2 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Tequila Honeysuckle with Watermelon
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Partida Reposado Tequila', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup Actually Honey syrup. 2 parts honey, 1 part water and boil. Cool before using.', '3 piece(s) Watermelon the size of an ice cube']
Making:
Lightly muddle the watermelon and then add the Reposado Tequila, lime juice and honey syrup. Shake all the ingredients over ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.
The combination of citrus juice and honey syrup also creates what is called a honeysuckle cocktail which can be made with several different spirits. I've recently had tequila on my mind so I made a tequila honeysuckle and bumped it up a notch by adding a couple of chunks of watermelon. I found that the watermelon added another layer of flavor and paired well with the honey syrup and the richness of the Reposado Tequila. This cocktail was really amazing and I encourage anyone who is trying to build up their drink repertoire to add this one to their list! Enjoy – Navarro Carr, Trios, Atlanta

Name: Tequila Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake tequila, vermouth, and lime juice with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

Name: Tequila Matador
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a champagne flute, and serve.

Name: Tequila Mockingbird #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill tall rocks glass or tumbler with ice. Add tequila and Triple Sec, followed by orange juice and cranberry. Add blue Curacao. Do not mix. Garnish with a lemon or a cherry if desired.

Name: Tequila Mockingbird #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Tequila Old-Fashioned
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 splash(es) Carbonated Water', '1/2 tsp. Sugar', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Mix sugar, Bitters, and 1 Tsp. water in an old-fashioned glass. Add tequila, ice cubes, and carbonated water. Garnish with a stick of pineapple and serve.

Name: Tequila Paralyzer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 splash(es) Milk', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Build in a highball glass and add cream. Fill with Coca-Cola.

Name: Tequila Pink
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Tequila Rosie
Ingredients: ['3/4 cup(s) Tequila Gold', '1 1/8 cup(s) Half and Half Cream', "1/4 cup(s) Strawberry Syrup (Preferably Hershey's Strawberry Syrup)"]
