Making: Mix all the ingredients well and pour into a 75 cl. bottle. Will keep up to two weeks in refrigerator.

Name: Tequila Smoothee
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 Banana', '1 1/2 oz. Strawberry Mix']
Making: Blend and pour into a salt rimmed glass. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Tequila Sour
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry.

Name: Tequila Splash
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '5 oz. V 8 Juice (Splash)']
Making: Pour both ingredients in your glass and enjoy! A word of advice, make sure to use V8 Splash and not plain V8! Trust me!

Name: Tequila Sunrise
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '3/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making:
Build in a highball glass and add ice cubes. Pour in grenadine slowly and allow to settle before drinking. Stir to complete your sunrise.
When you hear the term Tequila Sunrise, there are several things that may come to mind. Maybe you think of the 1973 Eagles hit or the 1998 movie of the same name. Wrestling fans who follow wrestling may even know it as a certain wrestler’s finishing move.
But, drinkers know it as a cocktail that is oh so good.
The Tequila Sunrise was first served to customers at the Arizona Biltmore. It was given its name because, after it’s poured into a glass and the layers of its ingredients settle, it looks much like the colors you’d see in a beautiful morning sunrise.
The cocktail, which is often presented in a highball glass, can be made in one of two ways. The original concoction consists of club soda, lime juice, crème de cassis, and, of course, tequila. Today’s more popular version mixes up grenadine, orange juice, and tequila.
If you want to be adventurous and try something a little different, there are also a few variations on the Tequila Sunrise that are every bit as tasty as the original. For those of you watching your waistline, forget the grenadine and add cranberry juice instead.
Vodka lovers can make a Vodka Sunrise by nixing the Tequila and adding their favorite vodka. Don’t have grenadine on hand, but have some blackberry brandy? Then mix yourself up a Tequila Sunset. Even Tang lovers can have a drink to love. Add Tang instead of OJ and have yourself an Astronaut Sunrise.

Name: Tequila Sunrise - TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Tequila Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Blackberry Brandy', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour tequila into a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Fill with orange juice and stir well. Top with blackberry brandy and stir lightly. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Tequila Toilet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Tonic Water', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix and serve in a cokatil glass. Garnish with one Twix bar to give it that "toilet look and feel that we all love." This drink is also known as El Bano.

Name: Tequilini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Tequila Casa Noble Gold', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '4 drop(s) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice, strain and pour into cocktail glass. Add a lime twist.

Name: Tequilla Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour tequila over ice in a highball glass. Top with orange juice and add a splash of grenadine - just enough to change the colour to a pinkish orange. Stir and serve with a slice of orange.

Name: Tequini #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and an olive.

Name: Tequini #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Tequila Silver', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass, whose rim has been rubbed with a lemon peel. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Tequonic
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Build in an old-fashioned glass and add fruit juice. Fill with tonic water and stir.

Name: Terminator #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Layer in a cordial glass.

Name: Terminator #2
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Hoopers Hooch (Lemon)', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Blend with ice and serve in a salt-rimmed cocktail glass.

Name: Terminator #4
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Stir the Southern Comfort, orange and cranberry juice in a glass. Splash the grenadine for colour.

Name: Terminator X (or T-X For Short)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Lime Mix', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a Collins glass. Garnish with a lime squeeze if there is any room left in the glass. Nice and strong and very tasty too.

Name: Test Drink
Ingredients: ['200 drop(s) 1800 Anejo Tequila', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Test this drink!

Name: Texas Rose
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients and pour over ice.

Name: Texas Tea
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Rum', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Texas Tea #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sam Houston Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Pallini Raspicello', '3/4 oz. Numi Organic Berry Black Darjeeling Tea']
Making: Combine Sam Houston Bourbon, Pallini Raspicello and Numi Organic Berry Black Darjeeling Tea in a mixing glass with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled flute glass.

Name: TGV
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin', '4 oz. Tequila', '4 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix in a tall glass.

Name: Thady Boy Ballagh
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Mist', '1 oz. Calvados', '1/2 oz. Cointreau']
Making:
Mix with ice in a rocks glass.
One of my favorite novels has the main character pretending to be an Irish bard (Irish Mist) infiltrating the French court of Henri II (Calvados). He is later granted a comte in Sevigny (which would be the Cointreau).
I would call this drink the Thady Boy Ballagh after the faux Irish Bard.

Name: Thai One On
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '7 oz. Tomato Juice', '1/2 oz. Tabasco Brand Soy Sauce', '2 oz. Tabasco Sweet and Spicy Pepper Sauce', '1 tsp. Ginger (minced)', '1/2 tsp. Salt (sea)', '1/8 tsp. Pepper (cracked black)', '1/4 tsp. Sesame Oil', '1/2 tsp. Garlic Salt (or powder)', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Grass (grated)', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making:
Combine all ingredients. "Roll" ingredients back and forth from mixing glass to tin and back several times; mix well. Rim glass with lime and lemongrass salt.* Pour into ice- filled and rimmed pint glass. Garnish with lemongrass stalk and candied ginger.
**Lime and Lemongrass Salt
1/4 teaspoon grated lemongrass
1/4 teaspoon lime zest
1/2 tablespoon sea salt
1/2 tablespoon cane sugar
Combine all ingredients; mix well.

Name: Thai-Foon
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '1 1/2 oz. Coconut Puree', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', 'Nutmeg']
Making: Pour Mekhong and the rest of the ingredients into a mixing glass. Add Ice and shake vigorously for 7-8 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini-cocktail glass. Ground some nutmeg on top.

Name: Thailand Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Passion Fruit puree']
Making: Pour Mekhong and the rest of the ingredients into a mixing glass. Add Ice and shake vigorously for 7-8 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini-cocktail glass. Garnish with half orange wheel and a cherry. Based on the Daiquiri.

Name: Thanksgiving 101
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', 'Cranberries', 'Rosemary']
Making:
For turkey that you can't overcook. Serve in a rocks glass. Garnish with cranberries and a sprig of rosemary.
Get into the Thanksgiving spirit this year by bringing a different kind of turkey to the table.
Thanksgiving 101 is the quintessential classic American cock-tail, and is a sure-fire way to get you through another family affair that is bound to bring some drama. It's so easy to prepare, there's no need to learn how to cook - as long as you have a bottle of Wild Turkey 101, everyone can still get their fill of bird for the day and salute to the "American spirit." Cranberries and rosemary make great traditional "side-dishes," so you'll have a well-rounded Thanksgiving meal.

Name: Thanksgiving Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '3 drop(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Thanksgiving Special
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except a cherry) with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the a cherry and serve.

Name: That Rum Drink
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Lime Mix']
Making: Build over ice in tall cocktail glass. Serve with a sly grin.

Name: That Time of the Month
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: In a blender add spirit and juice. Add ice until desired consistency is achieved. Pour into a specialty glass and put grenadine on top.

Name: The 1776 Sipper
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) TY KU Soju', '1 part(s) Iced Tea']
Making: Mix in a rocks glass.

Name: The 3 Ladies
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Courvoisier Cognac', '1/2 part(s) Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 Lime Cut in half.', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 pint(s) Mint Loose Leaves', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1 splash(es) Soda Water']
Making: In an old fashioned glass, muddle the fresh mint, lime wedges, Angostura® Bitters and simple syrup. In a separate shaker, vigorously shake Courvoisier® VSOP, DeKuyper® Triple Sec and freshly squeezed lemon juice. Strain into glass on top of muddle and fill with crushed ice. Top with soda water and garnish with a sugar dusted sprig of fresh mint.

Name: The 56 Juelp
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '3 sprig(s) Mint (6-8 Mature Leaves)', '1 1/2 tsp. Brown Sugar']
Making:
In a traditional silver julep cup or double-old fashioned glass, muddle two sprigs of mint with the brown sugar and one ounce of Wild Turkey 101 for a few minutes, crushing the mint leaves with a spoon. Add 1/2 cup of crushed ice, the remaining bourbon, and garnish with sprig of mint. Enjoy!
This Derby Day, it’s not only the horses who get the hot walk. When the races heat up, look to a tried and true classic to cool you down.
Jimmy Russell, Master Distiller of Wild Turkey, knows that the only proper mint julep uses Wild Turkey 101—and with over 56 years in the industry, his word is in the money. The julep has been the classic beverage of the Kentucky Derby for nearly a century, and made with any other bourbon leaves much to be desired. The higher proof of Wild Turkey 101 produces a richer, deeper and fuller taste, making it a bigger, better tasting mint julep.
With 56 Derbies under his belt, Russell's julep has been precisely refined. As they say, practice makes perfect.

Name: The Absolut Celebration
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Absolut Ruby Red Vodka', '1 1/2 part(s) Champagne', '1/2 part(s) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a raspberry.

Name: The Absolut Jolly Red Giants (New York Giants)
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Absolut Ruby Red Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Maraska Maraschino Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a martini glass over a brandied cherry, or over ice into a rocks glass.

Name: The ABSOLUT Pear fect Season (New England Patriots)
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Absolut Pears Vodka', '10 Blueberries', '1/2 tbsp. Superfine Sugar', '1/4 part(s) Lemon Juice', '2 part(s) Lemon Lime Soda', '2 dash(es) Bitters Peach']
Making: Muddle blueberries and sugar/simple syrup in a mixing glass. Then add PEARS and lemon juice, shake and strain over ice in a highball. Top with Lemon lime soda, and optional dashes of bitters. Garnish with 3 blueberries and a mint sprig.

Name: The Absolut Ruby Gem
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Absolut Ruby Red Vodka', '3/4 part(s) Cranberries Muddled', '3/4 part(s) Clementine Muddled', '1 tbsp. Brown Sugar', '1 splash(es) Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake first three ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with the splash of ginger ale.

Name: The Absolut Ruby Riviera
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Ruby Red Vodka', '1 part(s) Wine Rose', '1 part(s) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making:
Build equal amounts of Absolut Ruby Red, wine and orange juice over ice in a wine glass. Add a splash of club soda. Garnish with a ruby red grapefruit wedge.
Now being served at Prey Bar & Lounge in NY
Prey
4 W. 22nd Street
New York City

Name: The Absolut Secretary
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 part(s) Orange Juice', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making:
Did you get the memo? This year Administrative Professionals’ Day is for anyone "working for the man" or woman.
Celebrate all nine to fivers with cocktails at COMPANY…just don't do anything you wouldn't want showing up at the next staff meeting….
Now being served at Company in New York

Name: The ABSOLUT Super Bowl Buster 42
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 tbsp. Superfine Sugar', '1 Egg White', '2 part(s) Club Soda']
Making: Add all ingredients except soda to a mixing glass, and shake vigorously, and then add ice and shake again. Strain shaker into a highball and top with Club soda. Garnish with an orange zest (optional).

Name: The Adjustable Rate
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Hornitos Plata Tequila', '1 part(s) Cruzan Black Cherry Rum', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Tropical Pineapple Schnapps', '5 part(s) Pineapple Juice Fresh', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making:
Bartender: Derek O’Neill Butler, Prime One Twelve Restaurant, Miami, FL
What once seemed a bargain came to claim its dues. Adjustable rates soar. The housing market plummets. Buyers beware!
Shake and serve over ice in a high ball glass with a pineapple garnish.

Name: The Afterlife
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Espolon Tequila Reposado', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Syrup (Chile Piquin-Cinnamon Syrup)', '2 dash(es) Wormwood (Bitters)']
Making:
Shake ingredients together and strain into a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Created by Jorge Guzman, Ofrenda, New York

Name: The Alan Parson’s Project
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sour Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Watermelon Pucker', "2 oz. White Rum Bacardi White or Captain Morgan's Private Reserve", '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Ginger Ale']
Making:
Combine the Puckers and the Rum in a 16 oz. glass. Fill the glass with ginger ale and close with the Grenadine. Mix thoroughly, but don’t over agitate the drink, or the ginger ale will go flat.
Much like the band, this drink was a sleeper hit that gained some new attention long after it came together. It is intended as a cocktail, but works very well when mixed punch style.
This drink has gained my personal rating of evil. When mixed correctly, it tastes like a Jolly Rancher candy and drinks as easy as water, making it very easy for an unsuspecting quaffer to get absolutely smashed in one or two glasses. A great drink for those who eschew the taste of alcohol, but still like to feel the buzz. As always, it is unkind and illegal (in many places) to get someone drunk without their knowledge. A good bartender knows how to keep a party going without knocking everyone out.

Name: The Alaskan Jungle Juice
Ingredients: ['Vodka', '1 Watermelon']
Making: Carve a watermelon out to take out the seeds. Fill with vodka and let sit for 2 days. Pour into a highball glass.

Name: The Alcoholic Girl Talk
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Triple Sec', '2 part(s) Jagermeister', '1/2 part(s) Vodka', '1 1/2 part(s) Sour Mix', '1 dash(es) Grenadine', 'Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass and fill with Red Bull. Enjoy.

Name: The Alex
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Orange Vodka', 'Ginger Ale', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a Collins glass with ice. Add vodka and fill with equal parts ginger ale and cranberry juice. Squeeze a lime and a lemon wedge on top - discard pulp. Garnish with an orange slice

Name: The All American Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blueberry Flavouring', '1 1/2 oz. White Rum or Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. Strawberry Mix', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Layer in a parfait glass. Garnish with a cherry. Blue layer: 3/4 oz. white rum, blueberry flavouring and Sour Mix. Red layer: 3/4 oz. white rum and Daiquiri Mix. White layer: Whipped cream and ice.

Name: The American Classic
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon', '12 oz. Root Beer']
Making: Mix in a rocks glass over ice.

Name: The Apricot Haunt
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Courvoisier Cognac VSOP', '1 part(s) Sour Mix', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Apricot Brandy', '4 part(s) Apple Cider']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon spiral twist and a dash of fresh ground cinnamon.

Name: The Average Joe
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Soju', '1 1/2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Build over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: The Bada Bing
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Dalmore 12 Year Old Highland Malt Whisky', '1 part(s) Drambuie Liqueur', '1 splash(es) DeKuyper Amaretto']
Making:
Madonn'! After six wildly successful seasons, The Sopranos® closed the books on June 10th. Authentic Jersey bartender, John Martella, from Hoboken's Gaslight has whipped up some liquid libations to toast Tony, Carmela and the family as this iconic chapter in American pop culture comes to a close. Raise a glass and toast to the first family of New Jersey. Salut to this thing of ours!
Save your singles and get ready to dance!
Tightly pack a rocks glass with ice and pour the Dalmore first, then the Drambuie. Top off with the Amaretto, and garnish with lemon zest. Serve.

Name: The Ballatore Ballatini
Ingredients: ['Ballatore Gran Spumante', '1 splash(es) Red Bull Energy Drink', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making:
The Holidays are approaching, and what better way to celebrate with family than with a glass of champagne - that is if you can make it until midnight. Ballatore Champagne has just the thing!
Simply mix the ingredients in a champagne flute and enjoy!
The drink is that simple and just as delicious. The drink available at TAO LAS VEGAS and MARQUEE in NEW YORK is already popular with tastemakers and celebrities such as Heath Ledger, Mark Wahlberg, Helena Christensen, Carmen Electra and Diane Kruger.

Name: The Barclay Bar - Apple Cin
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Van Gogh Wild Appel Vodka', '1 oz. Apple Juice', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Pomegranate Juice']
Making:
Shake all ingredients but the pomegranate juice and pour into prepared glass. Pour pomegranate juice slowly down the side of the cocktail glass, let settle. Garnish with apple slice and serve.
Glass Preparation:
Mix clear gelatin with water according to directions on box (for an extra kick, infuse the gelatin with Van Gogh Wild Appel Vodka the night before!)
Place cranberry in bottom of Martini Glass
Rim Martini glass with cinnamon and sugar mixture
Chill - should sit overnight to ensure everything has time to gel completely.
By Jose Torrella, Mixologist
The Barclay Bar at the InterContinental New York Barclay Hotel is renowned for their deliciously creative signature cocktails. Their latest libation, the Apple Cin, takes its sinfully irresistible apple flavor from both apple juice and Van Gogh Wild Appel Vodka, and is the perfect way to toast the changing seasons.
If you can’t make it to this classic midtown Manhattan bar however, fear not! This fall-friendly cocktail can be whipped up in the comfort of your own home with the below recipe. Patrons at The Barclay Bar are able to create their very own signature Apple Cin by choosing the type of apple juice that best suits their personal taste; at home, choose your favorite apple juice or apple cider to make the Apple Cin cocktail your own.

Name: The Baren Pear
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Barenjager Honey Liqueur', '1 part(s) Absolut Pears Vodka', '3/4 part(s) Triple Sec', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '10 leaf(leaves) Mint', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup']
Making: Press juice from 1/4 of a lemon into shaker filled with ice. Add remaining ingredients to shaker. Shake vigorously for at least 45 seconds. Strain into chilled martini glass. The mint leaves should float on the top of the drink.

Name: The Belmont
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Build drink in ice filled highball glass. Mix and serve with a fruit garnish.

Name: The Bern Special
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. DeKuyper Key Largo Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Vodka', '1 splash(es) Peach Schnapps', '7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a tall glass. Top up with 7-Up.

Name: The Best Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Grey Goose L'Orange Vodka", '2 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Shaken not stirred in a stainless steel shaker over ice. Strain into a Martini Glass.

Name: The Best Sex On The Beach
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Raspberry Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix Peach Schnapps and Raspberry Schnapps over ice in a highball glass. Add equal amounts of orange juice, pineapple juice and cranberry juice. Decorate with a slice of orange.

Name: The Big Apple
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Vox Green Apple Vodka', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Red Apple Liqueur', '3 part(s) Lemonade', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Shake all ingredients except the soda with ice and pour into a highball glass. Top with lemon lime soda and garnish with a lemon wedge and a cherry.

Name: The Big Blue Cahunna
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '8 oz. Kool-Aid', '1 Popsicle (Blue)']
Making: Mix vodka and Kool-Aid, pour into a highball glass and chill. When chilled, crush the popsicle and add it to the drink. The popsicle bits should fall to the bottom of the glass.

Name: The Big Red
Ingredients: ['1 Beer (Preferably Red Dog Beer)', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Combine in a beer mug and drink with a little umbrella. (This drink is best accompanied with a pack of parliament lights and a laptop for homework delight).

Name: The Billy Dee
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Kahlua', '1/2 cup(s) Cream']
Making: Combine the ingredients in a lowball glass and stir well until mixed.

Name: The Bits
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '2 oz. Club Soda', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice (Fresh)', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a generous orange slice and a cherry (optional).

Name: The Bloody Great Bloody Mary
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Skyy Vodka', '2 oz. Tomato Juice', '1 oz. Newcastle Brown Ale', '1/4 tsp. Horseradish', '1/4 tsp. Hot Sauce']
Making:
This isn't your grandfather's Bloody Mary
Fill a cocktail shaker 1/3 full with ice and add all the ingredients. Shake well then pour into a rocks glass over fresh ice. Add something cool, and I don't mean a celery stick - anything pickled will work really well, like a baby pickled tomato, green bean, asparagus or even pickled okra - really.

Name: The Bloody Jayde
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Pour all the ingredients in mixing glass with ice. Shake with ice and pour through a strainer. Serve cold.

Name: The Blue Raspberry
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake the vodka, the curacao and the sour mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with 7-Up.

Name: The Blue Woo
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass filled with ice.

Name: The Blues
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Island Blue Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'Sprite']
Making: Fill a Collins glass with ice. Add the ingredientsand fill with sprite. Stir and garnish with fruits.

Name: The BOCKer
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sprite']
Making: Mix in a rocks glass over ice and fill with Sprite.

Name: The Border Hopper
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1 1/4 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Blend with ice on high and pour into two glasses with the blended crushed ice. Add a splash of Coca-Cola to each drink. This drink was brought to you by Rob Contreras from Summer in El Paso.

Name: The Brazilian Sapphire
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '3/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '7-Up']
Making: Fill a collins glass with ice. Add Blue Curacao, Melon Liquor and Malibu. Fill glass to top with 7Up Enjoy the cool colour and better taste!

Name: The British Invasion
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Courvoisier Exclusif Cognac', '3/4 part(s) Starbucks Cream Liqueur', '3/4 part(s) Knob Creek 100 Proof Bourbon', '2 Orange Peel', 'Almond Cream']
Making:
Bartenders: Cocktail consultants Marcos Tello and Damian Windsor, Los Angeles, CA
Apple pie and baseball are out. Bangers and mash and the real football are in. We welcomed British celebrity royalty, a soccer superstar and his sassy singing wife to the United States and celebrated the Euro cool of this duo.
Pour the Courvoisier Exclusif into a sugar-rimmed brandy snifter. In a separate mixing glass, combine the Starbucks Coffee Liqueur and Knob Creek and stir. Ignite the cognac slowly turning the snifter and rotating it so as to caramelize all the sugars on the rim of the snifter. Express the two orange peels into the brandy snifter so as to coat the inside of the glass with the caramelized orange oils. (This should create quite a spark so be careful!) Discard the orange peels. Strain the coffee liqueur/bourbon mixture directly into the brandy snifter, putting out the flame. Layer the almond cream on top of the mixture. Allow to cool and enjoy carefully as the brandy snifter may be quite hot around the rim.

Name: The Broadway
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 dash(es) Cherry Juice']
Making: Pour cranberry juice over ice in a glass. Next add the gin. Stir the two together well. Finally add a dash of sweet cherry juice and place a single cherry into the drink. The drink was developed at the Broadway Grocery in Griffin Georgia. It has long been a hit in the area.

Name: The Brockton
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 can(s) Dr Pepper (Diet)']
Making: Pour Malibu over ice and add Diet Dr. Pepper. Garnish with a lime wedge. Enjoy your BROCKTON!

Name: The Brooklyn Lemon-Aid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cognac', '3 oz. Tonic Water', '2 oz. Lemonade', '2 oz. Cherry 7-Up']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass. Serve with a slice of lemon as garnish.

Name: The Brown Noser
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/4 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Blended 'The way the boss likes it (you know how)' and float over the Coca Cola.

Name: The Buck
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. Creme de Menthe', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass and fill with Ginger Ale. Garnish with a few seedless grapes.

Name: The Buffalo Old Fashioned
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '2 dash(es) Bitters', '1 Cherry', '1 slice(s) Orange', '1 wedge(s) Lemon', '1 piece(s) Sugar']
Making: Put sugar and 2 dashes of bitters in an old-fashioned glass and fill with ice. Let sugar dissolve. Add bourbon and fruit.

Name: The Bulleit Manhattan
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 tsp. Maraschino Cherry Juice']
Making: Fill a shaker 3/4 full with cracked ice. Add Bulleit, vermouth and cherry juice. Shake and strain into a rocks glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: The Burbs
Ingredients: ['1/6 oz. Midori (Lime)', '1/3 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Pour into a highball glass over ice and stir.

Name: The Bushthrasher
Ingredients: ["8 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass. (Note from the Webmixer: no, there is no error in the proportions…this is how it was submitted).

Name: The Cabana Brasilian Wax
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cabana Cachaca', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: In an ice-filled glass, add equal parts Cabana Cachaça and Pineapple juice, a splash of club soda, and stir. If desired, add passion fruit puree

Name: The Cabana Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cabana Cachaca', '1 tbsp. Sugar', '1 Lime Quartered', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: In a rocks glass, muddle 1 lime, quartered, and 1 tbsp granulated sugar. Add 2 oz Cabana Cachaca and ice. Shake and top with a splash of club soda

Name: The Caribbean Margarita
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Trader Jose's Silver Tequila", '1 oz. Elixir of Antillean Hibiscus', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients in blender with ice, pour into sugar-rimmed glass.

Name: The Carol Ann
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Amaretto', '2 cup(s) Skimmed Milk']
Making: Blend well with ice, then pour in a tall glass and use a super straw to drink.

Name: The Carribean
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build in a cocktail glass and fill with equal amounts of Pineapple and Cranberry Juice.

Name: The Checker Flag
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Rose', 'Milk']
Making: Combine over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: The Christmas Tree
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', 'Grape Juice', 'Pepsi Twist']
Making: Pour a shot of gin in a highball glass. Fill half the glass with grape juice and the other half with Pepsi Twist. ENJOY!! Merry Christmas!

Name: The Churro Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cabo Wabo Anejo Tequila', '1 oz. Licor 43', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Tuaca']
Making: Shake up liquid ingredients with ice. Strain cocktail over fresh ice into a rocks glass, rimmed with the cinnamon sugar mixture.

Name: The Clap
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Vanilla Vodka', '2 part(s) Ginger Ale', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream (Strawberry)']
Making: Throw in a glass and eat it with a spoon.

Name: The Clementina
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Drambuie Liqueur', '1 part(s) Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1 dash(es) Honey Syrup', '1 dash(es) Lemon Syrup', '1 splash(es) Grapefruit Juice', '1 dash(es) Fee Brothers Grapefruit Bitters']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and add ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: The Clit Or Nipple Twister
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Sprite', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tbsp. Lime Juice', 'Ice Cream (strawberry)', 'Fruit (frozen)']
Making: Mix tequila, sprite and orange juice in a rocks glass. Add lime juice. Drop in a couple pieces of frozen fruit. Add a spoon full of strawberry ice cream on top so it looks like a clit or a nipple.

Name: The Cobbler
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Sugar Syrup', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'dash(es) Curacao', '3 oz. Medium Sherry']
Making: Pour over ice into a wine glass in the given order. Stir until the drink looks frosted. Garnish with fresh seasonal fruits and a straw.

Name: The Cockville Concoction
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Gatorade Passionfruit', '3 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka']
Making: Pour the Passionfruit Gatorade into a pint glas. Add Absolut Currant Vodka and stir.

Name: The Cocolua
Ingredients: ['1 Coconut (young)', '1 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Dark Rum', '4 oz. Coconut Essence', '1/2 oz. Egg White', '1 splash(es) Soda']
Making:
Remove top of a young coconut by making 4-8 clean cuts with a cleaver. Transfer fresh coconut water into a clean container. Combine Kahlua, rum, egg whites and coconut water in a small shaker. Dry shake for 20-30 seconds until mixture is well incorporated.
Ice a pint glass to the top and transfer shaken mixture over ice. Cover pint glass with large metal shaker and shake vigorously for 15 seconds. Add a splash of soda to shaken mixture and strain back into the young coconut.
Garnish the cocktail with a stick of sugar cane that has had one end dipped in Chinese 5 Spice. Garnish additionally with a straw and small spoon for eating the flesh of the young coconut.
Created by Molecular Gastronomist Simone Bonelli of Perbacco

Name: The Coconut Monkey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix all the ingredients over ice with 1/2 oz. Club Soda. Serve in a large cocktail glass.

Name: The Cold Snap
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Hornitos Plata Tequila (clove-infused*)', '1/4 part(s) DeKuyper Hazelnut Liqueur', '1/4 part(s) DeKuyper Apricot Brandy', '1/4 part(s) Lemon Juice']
Making:
Combine ingredients and shake with ice and strain into a larger shot glass.
*Add one ounce (by weight) of cloves per 750ml bottle, let sit for 20-25 minutes.

Name: The Columbine
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Johnnie Walker Scotch (Blue Label)', '2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass.

Name: The Corleone
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Pour into rocks glass over ice and serve.

Name: The Corner Store
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Beefeater 24', '1 oz. Black and Brown Syrup', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 Black Mission Fig', '2 sprig(s) Thyme']
Making:
Muddle 2 sprigs worth of thyme leaves and 1 black mission fig. Shake ingredients heavily and double strain over ice in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with a smacked thyme sprig stuck in half a fig set on the rim of the glass.
Created by Preston Eckman of Philadelphia’s APO Bar & Lounge

Name: The Cricker Undertow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 splash(es) Cherry Brandy', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix liqueurs in a sling glass and fill with a 50/50 mixture of pineapple and orange juice. Top with a cherry brandy and garnish with three cherries. Makes a great drink with an awesome kick. Tastes great. Add splash of lemon juice for tangy taste.

Name: The Crown of Roses
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making:
Fill a cocktail shaker two-thirds full of ice and add all of the ingredients. Shake for approximately 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.
The Crown of Roses' deep color is inspired by the garland of roses presented in victory circle to the winner of the Kentucky Derby. The winning combination of Crown Royal, amaretto, pineapple and cranberry juices allows the Crown of Roses to marry notes of cinnamon with refreshing fruit sweetness, which is rounded out by the classic taste of Crown Royal whisky.

Name: The Dartmouth Green
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Midori', '2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Light Beer (Keystone or Bud)']
Making: Pour over ice in a tall glass.

Name: The Delegate
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hornitos Reposado Tequila', '1 tbsp. Partida Agave Nectar', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Cucumber Foam']
Making:
In a mixing glass dissolve the agave nectar into lime juice by stirring with a bar spoon. Add the Hornitos Reposado Tequila and shake and strain into a half salt-rimmed cocktail glass. Top with cucumber foam.
*Cucumber foam: 4 oz. each cucumber juice, sugar syrup, egg white and water. Add all to a .5 liter dessert whipper and charge with a cream bulb, shake vigorously and chill.
Bartenders: Marcos Tello and Damian Windsor, For Medicinal Purposes, Los Angeles, CA

Name: The Delt
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Cola']
Making: Mix the Amaretto, peach schnapps and grenadine in a large glass. Fill the rest of the glass with cola and serve cold.

Name: The Dirty Greek
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Ouzo', '6 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: The Doctor
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', 'Beer']
Making: Drop the shot of amaretto into the bottom of beer and stir slowly until it mixes with the beer. It should taste like Dr Pepper.

Name: The Doggystyle Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Tonic Water', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Mix well over ice and serve in a highball glass.

Name: The Dominic
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake and pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: The Don Draper
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Uncle Nearest 1856 Premium Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Ginger Cinnamon Syrup.', '2 dash(es) Bitters (Walnut)', '1 piece(s) Orange (Peel)', '1 stick(s) Cinnamon', '1 slice(s) Ginger']
Making:
Add Uncle Nearest 1856 Premium Whiskey, Bitters and Ginger Cinnamon Syrup to a mixing glass half full of ice. Stir with a bar spoon 15 times. Pour into a rocks or Double Old Fashioned glass with a large ice cube. Express the oils from the orange peel over the cocktail. Garnish with a fresh slice of ginger and cinnamon stick.
Created by California mixologist May Lee for Bedford & Burns in Beverly Hills. Photo by May Lee.

Name: The Donkey
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Knob Creek 100 Proof Bourbon', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Sugar', '6 sprig(s) Mint', '1 splash(es) DeKuyper Pucker Raspberry Schnapps']
Making:
Add sugar, bourbon and mint into an old-fashioned glass with crushed ice and muddle the fruit. Garnish with fresh raspberries, blueberries and mint.
Bartender: Jim Hewes, Round Robin Bar, Willard InterContinental, Washington, D.C.

Name: The Dubliner
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Knappogue Castle Whiskey', '1 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', '2 oz. Coffee Chilled and Black', '6 dash(es) Fee Brothers Old Fashioned Aromatic Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a 10 oz. snifter. Garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: The Duke Of Marlborough
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amontillado Sherry', '2 oz. Campari (Or any Italian sweet vermouth)', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Raspberry Syrup']
Making: Fill shaker with cubed ice. Add sherry, vermouth, lime and raspberry syrup, and shake well. Pour immediately into 4-6 oz chilled cocktail glass. Enjoy being refreshed! This recipe is from a cocktail book that was already in paper in 1945, which means it was a hardback earlier. Must be quite old…

Name: The Effen Vodka Beast
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Effen Black Cherry Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup (vanilla)', '2 part(s) Cranberry Juice (white)', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake and strain all ingredients over fresh ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with brandied cherries.

Name: The Eileen
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with lime.

Name: The Fever's Fury (revised)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake all together then serve over ice for a delicious tropical drink!

Name: The Final Whack
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Knob Creek 100 Proof Bourbon', '1 part(s) Sambuca', '1/2 part(s) Creme de Cacao', '2 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters']
Making:
Madonn'! After six wildly successful seasons, The Sopranos® closed the books on June 10th. Authentic Jersey bartender, John Martella, from Hoboken's Gaslight has whipped up some liquid libations to toast Tony, Carmela and the family as this iconic chapter in American pop culture comes to a close. Raise a glass and toast to the first family of New Jersey. Salut to this thing of ours!
The Final Whack is the perfect cocktail for fans to sip as they remember 'the final whack' - the last episode of Tony Soprano's epic journey.
Fill a snifter with ice and add the Sambuca. Swirl the Sambuca around to season and chill the snifter, and let sit. In an ice filled shaker add Knob Creek, Crème de Cacao and Peychaud's Bitters. Stir well. Empty the ice and Sambuca out of the snifter, the glass should be chilled and seasoned. Strain the Knob Creek mixture into the seasoned snifter. Serve.

Name: The Flaky Booger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gold Puerto Rican Rum', '10 oz. 7-Up (Upside Down)']
Making: Mix it all together. Fits nicely in a 16 oz Solo cup filled with ice.

Name: The Flaming Lemon
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Dry Vermouth (Extra dry would be best)', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 Ginger Root (peeled)']
Making: Peel and cut ginger root into a small piece (about one cubic centimeter in volume). Blend piece of ginger root with ingredients until pieces of ginger become unnoticeable, but do not make the ingredients hot with the blending. Shake mixture with ice and serve in a chilled cocktail glass. Rub the rim of the glass with raw ginger root and serve. The ginger root provides a very hot and "spicy" effect on the tongue, but tastes like lemon. The drink will burn the mouth and leave a citrus aftertaste. Use ginger root sparingly or as desired; it is very powerful.

Name: The Fluff's Oasis Brown Sugar
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Coffee Liqueur', 'Root Beer']
Making: Fill a rocks glass with ice. Pour Irish cream over the ice, then add a splash of coffee liqueur. Top with Root Beer and enjoy.

Name: The Foot Tapper Sting
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Canadian Club 6 Year Old', '1 part(s) DeKuyper White Creme de Mint', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Peppermint 40 Proof Schnapps']
Making:
Bartender: Pat M, Twin Cities, Minneapolis, MN
Airport restrooms have been forever changed by the notoriety a certain senator bestowed on a Minnesota terminal with a simple tap of the foot.
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice. Fill an old-fashioned glass with shaved ice, strain spirits over ice and serve with straw.

Name: The Formula 150
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut 100 Vodka', '2 part(s) Formula Fifty Grape Vitamin Water', 'splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Build ingredients over fresh ice into a tall glass, and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: The Forsman
Ingredients: ["1 1/3 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '2/3 oz. Creme de Banane', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir and serve in a tall slim glass on the rocks. Fill with orange juice.

Name: The Frank Lavin
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cognac', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: The Freestyle
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Schramm Vodka', '4 oz. Coffee **See recipe below']
Making:
Shake coffee and vodka together, strain over ice in a tall pilsner glass. Top with straw and Salted Coffee Brittle **See below.
Mixologist's Note: This one is meant as the "good morning" cocktail. It has all of the things that we humans should have first thing (well, the vodka too). Electrolytes in the coconut water, protein in the cream, caffeine in the coffee, vitamin c in the lemongrass.
Condensed Milk
2 litres local organic fresh 10% cream
2 cups fresh coconut water
1 cup raw turbinado sugar
1 branch lemongrass, bruised with back of knife, cut down the centre.
All of the above should be in a pot, reducing down for roughly 2 hours on medium heat, but be careful not to caramelize the sugar - constant stirring is a must. Remove from heat once the mixture reduces by half, let cool, place in refrigerator. Shelf life of 14 days.
Double Strength Coffee
2 branches Lemongrass
2 small pieces untreated American Oak
1 cup ground JJ Bean coffee beans (local, and sustainable coffee supply in Vancouver, but you can use anything)
2 litres purified water
In an insert, place wood and lemongrass on the bottom. In a fine mesh chinois on top, place the coffee beans. Cover securely with tin foil, place insert on BBQ or grill. Let smoke for at least 30 minutes. Grind coffee beans, and make a double batch of coffee in conventional drip coffeemaker using the measurements above. Combine the condensed milk and double strength coffee, whisk until well combined. Place in refrigerator. Shelf life of 7-10 days.
Salted Coffee Brittle
3 cups white sugar
1 tsp kosher salt
1/4 cup JJ Bean Coffee Beans (whole)
Over medium heat, without over stirrring, melt sugar and salt. Once it reaches the "hard crack" stage (300°), remove from heat, add coffee beans, swirl the pot around to coat each bean. Pour on to silpat non-stick pad (on baking sheet), and gently tip the tray around to move the sugar - DO NOT use utensils - finish with a slight sprinkling of salt. Let cool and dry out at room temperature for about 45 minutes, then break!

Name: The French Pearl
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Plymouth Gin', '1/4 part(s) Pernod Absinthe', '1 sprig(s) Mint', '3/4 part(s) Lime Juice', '3/4 part(s) Simple Syrup (Rock Candy Syrup)']
Making:
Muddle mint with the rest of ingredients in cocktail shaker
created by Audrey Saunders – New York City

Name: The Full Yard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Strawberry Mix', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'Grenadine']
Making: Blend ingredients with ice.

Name: The Fun Ship
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: The Fun Ship #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Mango Liqueur', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with equal parts of orange and pineapple juice. This recipe is from a Carnival Cruise.

Name: The Fun Ship #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '6 oz. Fruit Punch']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a cocktail glass. This recipe is from a Carnival Cruise.

Name: The Fuzzy Bunny
Ingredients: ['Nestle Quick Strawberry Mix', 'Milk', "Peach Schnapps (Dekuyper's Peachtree recommended)"]
Making: Mix Quik and milk to taste. Add 1-3 shots of schnapps, depending on taste. This is a great chick drink to whip out when the need arises. We cooked this cocktail up freshman year at Northeastern in our room; it quickly became the drink to host with.

Name: The Gaelic Splash
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Add Hendrick’s Gin, orange juice and apricot brandy to a shaker. Stir and strain into a martini glass. Slowly add grenadine and garnish with an apricot slice or an orange twist.

Name: The Gargoyle
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Beer (Honeybrown beer)', '1 bottle(s) Apple Cider', '1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Pour the cider into a beer mug then pour the beer in SLOWLY. Pour the Hot Damn into a shot glass and light. Drop the shot glass in the mug and drink immediately and quickly. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: The Garrett
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Shake over ice and pour into an old fashioned glass. If you desire it frozen - add ingredients over ice in a blender and blend. The name is now "Chilly Garrett".

Name: The Ghosty
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: The Gin Lifty
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', 'Orange Juice', '7-Up']
Making: In a tall glass with crushed ice pour in your gin. Fill glass 2/3 of the way to the top with orange juice. Top the glass up with fresh 7-Up. Make sure it's not flat. Squeeze in a wedge of lime and voila! Give it a stir and enjoy. We called it a 'Lifty' due to its ability to bring up your spirits after consecutive nights of partying. Absolute tropical paradise with a good bite to it.

Name: The Ginger Grouse
Ingredients: ['1 oz. The Famous Grouse Scotch Whisky', 'Ginger Beer']
Making:
Fill a glass with ice, squeeze a wedge of lime and drop into the glass. Add a measure of The Famous Grouse. Top up with ginger beer/ale, stir and serve.
Created by Wayne Collins in 2002

Name: The Global Warmer
Ingredients: ['6 Mint Leaves Torn', '1/4 part(s) DeKuyper Luscious Tropical Mango Liqueur', '1 1/2 part(s) Sour Mix Lime', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Triple Sec', '1 1/2 part(s) Basil Hayden Bourbon']
Making:
Build over ice, shake and strain into martini glass. Garnish with mint leaf and a lime twist.
Bartender: Michael Becker, Portland Steak and Chophouse, Portland, OR

Name: The Grand Canyon
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Archers Aqua Peach', 'Orange Juice', 'Lemonade']
Making: Mix Vodka and Archers together in a cocktail glass. Top with equal parts of orange juice and lemonade.

Name: The Grand Ole Party
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Canadian Club Classic Whisky', '1 part(s) DeKuyper White Creme de Mint', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Peppermint 100 Proof Schnapps']
Making:
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice. Fill an old-fashioned glass with shaved ice, strain spirits over ice and serve with straw.
Bartender: Pat M., Twin Cities, Minneapolis, MN

Name: The Grand Slam
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Gibson's Finest 12 Year Old Canadian Whisky", '3 oz. Ginger Ale', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Build ingredients over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: The Grapes Of Wrath
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '3 oz. Grape Pucker', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour Bacardi 151 Proof Rum and Grape Pucker into a pint glass. Top up with Sprite and prepare to feel the wrath.

Name: The Greeen Parrot
Ingredients: ["1 1/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/2 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix with ice in a rocks glass.

Name: The Green Beast
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Pernod Absinthe', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1 part(s) Lime Juice', '4 part(s) Water']
Making: Build in a Collins glass or punch bowl over ice. Garnish with thinly sliced cucumber wheels.

Name: The Green Desitny
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beefeater 24', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '3/4 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 leaf(leaves) Shiso']
Making:
Muddle shiso leaves in simple syrup. Shake ingredients & fine strain into a cocktail glass.
Created by Brad Farran of Brooklyn’s Clover Club

Name: The Green Frog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) White Creme de Menthe', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Blend with 12 oz. of ice until slushy.

Name: The Green Goddess
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '4 oz. Cucumber Juice', "1/2 oz. Demitri's Bloody Mary Seasoning"]
Making:
Mix and serve on the rocks in pint glass with a lemon and lime garnish
Recipe by Rob Pate at Peche in Austin Texas

Name: The Green Sneaker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', "2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '4 oz. Tropicana Twister White Grape Kiwi Wave']
Making: Mix the gin and Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum in a 10 oz. glass. Add the Tropicana White Grape Kiwi Wave Twister, stir and enjoy.

Name: The Greg Dulli
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cranapple Juice', '1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1 1/4 oz. White Rum', '1 1/4 oz. Gold Rum', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and pour unstrained into a goblet. Garnish with fresh fruit such as a small piece of strawberry or a fresh cherry.

Name: The Guacarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cabo Wabo Blanco Tequila', '1/2 Avocado (Skinned)', '1/4 oz. Agave Nectar', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '4 Cilantro Leaves']
Making: Place all ingredients and ice into a blender. Blend on high for 10 seconds and pour into a margarita glass. Garnish with a short cilantro sprig.

Name: The H Bomb
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Crown Royal', '3 oz. Grape Juice', '3 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Frost your glass well and chill the Crown Royal and both juices. Pour Crown into the frosted glass followed the juice. Enjoy. For a variation turn into a punch. Use one can of white grape frozen concentrate and one can of apple juice concentrate. Add in the crown and mix with a blender. Add a scoop of vanilla ice cream. Hope you all like. I've had great success with this drink on a personal level and the punch was a hit at parties.

Name: The Hammer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 oz. Raspberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '7-Up or Sprite']
Making: Mix all ingredients except 7-Up or Sprite over ice in a 12 oz. glass. Top up with 7-Up or Sprite. Mix and slam.

Name: The Heather Cameron
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Milk', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Shake Godiva, Parrot Bay, Bailey's and milk with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over fresh ice. Top with whipped cream. Must be served with a smile!

Name: The Hell-Bent Screamer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Gin', '1/2 oz. Rye Whiskey (Crown Royal works best)', '1 bottle(s) Dr Pepper (600 ml or 20 oz.)', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour the gin into a frozen mixing glass and add the rye. Stir with a candycane, then add the lemon juice and Dr Pepper according to taste. Cut 1/8 of a slice of a grapefruit cross-wise to the slice, and shake in salt, sugar, and pepper. Strain the drink into a collins glass, through the grapefruit. Stir with the candy cane, and leave in while drinking.

Name: The Herbie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Sour Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Sprite', '2 oz. Hi-C Ecto Cooler', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Fill old fashioned glass with ice. Add ingredients and stir.

Name: The Highland Berry
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '1/2 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Add Hendrick’s Gin, black raspberry liqueur and cranberry juice into a shaker. Stir and shake well. Strain into cocktail glass and top with tonic water and garnish with frozen cranberries. Add ice if desire.

Name: The Hollywoods Ice Cream Float
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Kahlua', '3 scoop(s) Ice Cream (Chocolate chip flavour)', "Root Beer (Preferably Barqs')"]
Making: Blend until smooth.

Name: The Hoosier
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Orange Curacao', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Sprite', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a large glass. Matt's suggestion: Add a drop of red food colouring if you're a Hoosier fan!

Name: The Hornito Lantern
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Hornitos Reposado Tequila', '1/6 part(s) Pumpkin Puree', '1/2 part(s) Hot Chocolate (Chilled with no marshmallows)']
Making: Pre-make hot chocolate and chill. Combine ingredients and shake with ice. Strain into a shot glass.

Name: The Horse That Kicked Back
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Uncle Nearest 1856 Premium Whiskey', '8 leaf(leaves) Mint', '1 oz. Simple Syrup (Jalapeno)', '1 sprig(s) Mint', '2 slice(s) Jalapeno Pepper']
Making:
In a pewter Julep cup, muddle mint leaves with jalapeno simple syrup. Half fill the cup with crushed ice and add Uncle Nearest Premium Whiskey. Stir the cocktail until the ice begins to dilute. Add more crushed until the cup is heaping. Garnish with a mint sprig and 2 slices of jalapeno.
Created by Louisville mixologist Shelby Higginbotham

Name: The Hospitalizer
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix the four shots in a large glass over rocks. Top off with the pineapple and orange juices.

Name: The Hulk
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '1 oz. Passoa Passion Fruit', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with lots of ice and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and a red cherry.

Name: The Illusion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Lemon Vodka', '2/3 oz. Lime Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake liquor with ice and strain into an ice filled Collins glass. Top glass with equal parts of Pineapple Juice and Orange Juice. Garnish with a fresh wedge of pineapple and/or a cherry.

Name: The Indian
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Pour into a rocks glass and stir.

Name: The Irish Happy Ending
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Irish Whiskey']
Making: Pour into a highball glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: The Iron Throne (Death in the Afternoon)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lucid Absinthe Superieure', 'Champagne']
Making:
Pour Lucid Absinthe into a champagne coupe or flute. Add iced champagne until it attains the proper opalescence.
With the Emmys just around the corner, it’s time to start thinking about how and where you’ll be spending the star-studded evening. Whether you’ll be throwing a Hollywood-worthy bash for your friends or be curled up on the couch, we’ve got the perfect cocktails to compliment your night. Each of the following creations pays homage to some of this year’s newcomers and also the staples; and assures that you’ll have the perfect drink in hand no matter which show gets your vote!
GAME OF THRONES
Described as the most awaited TV series of 2011, Game of Thrones delivered something for every type of viewer—magic and enchantment, violence, and dramatic power struggles. It is only appropriate to provide fans of this convoluted drama an equally mysterious and complex libation. Escape to another world with Lucid, the brand responsible for lifting the 100-year absinthe ban.

Name: The Key
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Seagram's Extra Dry Gin", '1 oz. 7-Up', "1 oz. Lime Soda (Stewart's Classic Key)"]
Making: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake for five seconds and pour over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: The King
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Cognac', '1 cup(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix ingredients and serve on the rocks.

Name: The Kiss on the Lips
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Peach Schnapps', '20 oz. Mango Juice (frozen mix)', '4 tbsp. Grenadine']
Making: The mango mix should be blended with crushed ice with the schnapps. Pour the schnapps and mango mix into a cocktail glass with the grenadine already placed at the bottom. Serves 4

Name: The Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Midori', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build in a rocks glass and fill with cranberry juice.

Name: The Lanesborough
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '2/3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2/3 oz. Passion Fruit Juice', '2 oz. Champagne Moet']
Making: In a mixing glass add Grand Marnier, cranberry juice, and passion fruit puree. Add ice, shake vigorously and strain into a chilled Champagne flute. Top with Moet White Star Champagne and garnish with an orange spiral twist.

Name: The Last Meow
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a tall glass and fill 3/4 with cranberry juice and 1/4 with pineapple juice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: The Lemon Peel
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1/2 oz. Pallini Limoncello', '1/4 oz. Strega', '3/4 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', "1 dash(es) Bitters Reagan's"]
Making: Pour all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake, and pour into a tall glass. Garnish with an orange daffodil and a sage sprig.

Name: The Lightning Lemonade
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Junior Johnson's Midnight Moon Lightning Lemonade", '1 splash(es) Tonic Water']
Making: Build in a rocks glass over ice.

Name: The Limonnaya Blush
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Lemon Vodka', '1/3 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine in a mixing glass, shake and pour over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: The Limonnaya Club
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Lemon Vodka', '3 oz. Club Soda (Can be 4 oz.)']
Making: Serve over ice in a tall glass..

Name: The Lion Gimlet
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Vodka', '2 part(s) Roaring Lion Energy Drink', '1 part(s) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Tonic Water']
Making: Build over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: The Little Man
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Guinness', '2 oz. Campari']
Making: Pour Campari into a pint glass and top with Guinness.

Name: The Liver Damage
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 pint(s) Beer']
Making: Put all 4 shots in an empty pint glass, and top it off with beer. Drink it all at once, using the rest of the beer as a chaser. Warning: this drink is dangerous, and is not for the faint hearted!!!

Name: The Load Box
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister', "1 1/2 oz. Whiskey (Preferably Kessler's)", 'Beer', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Combine in a beer mug and splash the Coke on top. This drink will sneak up on you and it burps like root beer.

Name: The Loco Coco Smash
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Partida Reposado Tequila', '3/4 oz. Yellow Chartreuse (Infused with Jalapeno)', '1 1/2 oz. Syrup (Key Lime, Fresh Pineapple and Coconut)', 'Cilantro Leaves', 'Cayenne Pepper']
Making:
Serve over crushed ice in a fresh cracked coconut. Mash Cilantro with a Swizzle Stick in bottom of a Coconut. Add all other ingredients. Swizzle and add crushed ice. Garnish with Cilantro and Cayenne.
Created by Michael Parish of Living Room at the W in Miami

Name: The LOFTy Swizzle
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Lavender Liqueur', '2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 dash(es) Bitters (optional)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime or orange wheel.

Name: The Lucky Pears Faux-jito
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Absolut Pears Vodka', '1/4 oz. Midori', '2 oz. Grape Juice White', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Brown Sugar']
Making:
Pour into a tall glass and garnish with mint leaves.
Being served this St. Patrick’s Day season exclusively at Nurse Bettie.
Nurse Bettie
106 Norfolk St.
(@ Delancey St.)
Manhattan

Name: The Macua
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Flor de Cana Gold Label Rum', '1 oz. Guava Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/3 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making:
Fill 3/4 of a cocktail shaker with ice and add Flor de Cana rum, guava juice, orange juice, lemon juice and simple sugar. Shake well for 30 seconds, serve in a Tom Collins glass with ice and decorate with an orange slice.
Raise your glass, hike through the rainforest, or surf down a volcano and celebrate Nicaragua's National Independence Day on September 15.
To mark the holiday, Nicaraguans from Managua to Miami, Madrid, Montreal, London and Paris will be hanging blue and white flags from their homes. Toast this occasion with the national drink of Nicaragua, the Flor de Cana Macua, and savor a hand rolled cigar or a handful of dark chocolate.
Flor de Cana is the only rum from Nicaragua, and the world's most awarded. The Macua's succulent lemon and orange juices bring a tart feel to the mouth, while the guava juice adds a refreshing and candid aroma.

Name: The Madxtrem
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '8 oz. Grape Juice (White)']
Making: Pour vodka in a tall glass and fill with white grape juice. Stir.

Name: The Mary Special
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass with ice.

Name: The Maxim
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Mix all ingredients except last two in a shaker with ice. Add cranberry juice slowly. You will reach a desired gray colour. Shake. Top off with a splash of Sprite. Garnish with a lemon peel (or a slice of liver).pg. 86 Maxim magazine # 59 November 2002

Name: The McBeal
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Wildberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice (To taste)']
Making: Add in the order listed above to see the pretty colors.

Name: The Metnick
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pineapple Rum (Preferably Cruzan Pineapple Rum)', '1 oz. 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Stir with ice into a cocktail glass.

Name: The Mikedaddy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '3/4 part(s) Mountain Dew', '1/4 part(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients over ice in a rocks glass. 3/4 Mountain Dew to orange juice ratio. (the orange juice is the key - it will taste bitter if there isn't enough).

Name: The Millenium #1
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Lemonchello', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice (Or less)', 'dash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Rim a glass with sugar, shake all the ingredients and pour into the glass. We serve either up on the rocks as the official Millenium drink of Le Caffe des Artistes in Naples, FL. We also make our own lemonchello as it is a littler thicker than the commercial variety.

Name: The Millenium #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Brandy', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Orange Juice (To taste)']
Making: Mix with ice and add the amount of orange juice desired. Strain into a highball glass and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: The Millington
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. 901 Silver Tequila', '1 oz. Orange Marmalade or Kumquat Marmalade', '1/2 oz. Cointreau Combier', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Rim a rocks glass with salt. Pour all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and pour into the rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: The Missik
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Margarita Mix', '1 oz. Crangrape Juice', '1 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass and enjoy.

Name: The Mongoose
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '6 oz. Tonic Water', '1 splash(es) Galliano']
Making: Mix on ice and drain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: The Monkey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Banana Rum', '1 oz. MD 20/20 Banana Red Wine', '1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1 oz. Strawberry Daiquiri Mix']
Making: This is simple, smooth but strong. You first crush your ice in a blender. Then add the ingredients and blend until smooth.

Name: The Monkey Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice (Preferably Ruby Red Grapefruit Juice)', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass. Stir well. Add ice if you want a cold drink.

Name: The Morning After
Ingredients: ['7 Raspberries', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Monin Gingerbread Syrup', '1/3 oz. Lime Juice', '1/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making:
Muddle raspberries in base of shaker. Add all other ingredients with ice; hard shake. Strain into martini glass. Zest orange peel over drink to garnish.
This anytime drink is fresh in flavor with a distinct warmth.
Created By Darren Geraghty
Darren Geraghty is the head mixologist at Dublin’s Exchequer Pub and winner of the first-ever Irish Open Cocktail Competition. A lifetime Dubliner, Darren’s creations are contemporary with an Irish twist.

Name: The Mud Pie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '3 oz. Instant Hot Chocolate Mix (Finished and Chileld)', '2 1/2 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Pour over ice in a tall glass and serve - tastes like an alcoholic Yoohoo!

Name: The Mule's Piss
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Rum', '3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Jagermeister', '3/8 oz. Tequila', "3/8 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Ericand Jay say: this may sound bad but it is really good. Try it.

Name: The Napacello Rangpur
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Napa Valley Limoncello XO', '2 oz. Tanqueray Rangpur Gin', '5 leaf(leaves) Mint', '3 Strawberries (sliced)', '2 oz. Tonic Water (Q-Tonic)']
Making:
Combine all the ingredients except the mint leaves and fruit in a martini shaker and shaker away until nice and cold.
Muddle the mint leaves in a tall collins glass. Pour the entire contents of the shaker into the glass, including the ice. Add the Tonic, toss in the fruit and enjoy.
Created by Arthur Hartunian - Master Cellist at the Napa Valley Limoncello Co.
NOTE: If you substitute any other Limoncello in place of Napacello XO, it will not taste the same.
The reason for this is that Tanqueray Rangpur is made with the rare and exotic Rangpur Lime. The flavor of this lime pairs perfectly with the fruity Meyer Lemon, which is the main ingredient used in Napa Valley Limoncello. If you use any other Limoncello in place of XO, forget it.. it won't work. The cocktail will taste too lemony and tart.

Name: The Nate Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1 1/4 oz. Amaretto (The best you can find)', '3/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. B and B Liqueur', '1 Lime', 'Orange Juice (To taste)', 'Sour Mix (To taste)']
Making: Shake over ice all the ingredients and strain into a salted glass. Squeeze a lime wedge onto the drink, garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

Name: The Natty Lion Ring-Toss
Ingredients: ['1/2 can(s) Beer', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Roaring Lion Energy Drink']
Making: Build over ice in a cocktail glass and fill with Roaring Lion

Name: The Natural - TY KU
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Club Soda', '1 squirt(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Build in a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: The Night Sky
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Mango Liqueur', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Lemonade']
Making: Blend Vodka, Blue Curacao, Mango Liqueur and Pineapple Juice with ice and pour into a resort glass garnished with a straw or umbrella. Top with the Lemonade.

Name: The Ninth Night
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Skyy Infusions Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice (white)', 'Lemon Lime Soda', 'Lime Juice']
Making:
Combine SKYY Infusions Citrus, Triple Sec and Cranberry Juice into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into tall rocks glass with fresh ice. Top with soda and lots of fresh lime juice. Garnish with blue ribbon or pipe cleaner around the glass.
You may think that you’re done celebrating once the candles burn out in the menorah, but The Ninth Night is the great way to conclude your Hanukkah festivities. A refreshing cocktail designed to commemorate a special (and unofficial) ninth night of Hanukkah.

Name: The NOR Gate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '8 oz. Beer']
Making:
Pour Yukon Jack into a shot glass, top off with Amaretto. Drop shot glass into beer and quickly consume.
Named because NOR is a logic function where two 0s output a 1. (Ok, well above my head - The Webmixer)

Name: The OBX
Ingredients: ['2 oz. DeKuyper Tropical Pineapple Schnapps', '2 oz. Smirnoff Orange Twist Vodka', "2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '3 oz. Sprite']
Making: Pour all liquor in a shaker and shake. Add Sprite. Stir with a spoon or shake gently. You don't want to kill the fizz in the Sprite. Pour of a BIG TALL glass of ice. Garnish with an orange wedge. ENJOY! Great Summer time drink.

Name: The Original Singapore Sling - Cherry Heering
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cherry Heering Liqueur', '2 part(s) Gin', '8 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 part(s) Cointreau', '1/2 part(s) Benedictine', '1/2 part(s) Grenadine', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making:
In 1819 Sir Thomas Stamford Raffles landed in Singapore and purchased a plot of land from the Sultan of Johor where he created a trading post for the British East Asian Trading Company. A hundred years later, in the lobby bar of the infamous Raffles Hotel, legendary bartender Mr. Ngami Tong Boon concocted the very first cocktail to achieve global fame.
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass. Add ice and shake. Strain over fresh ice into a sling glass. Garnish with fresh pineapple and a cherry.

Name: The Other Woman
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Admiral Nelson's Vanilla Rum", '1 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Arrow Amaretto', 'Soda']
Making: Pour vodka and rum over ice. Add white soda and stir. Add Amaretto (without stirring) and enjoy.

Name: The Paloma
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Riazul Silver Tequila', '3 slice(s) Orange', '3 Cherries', '1 drop(s) Grenadine', '4 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making:
In a shaker without ice pour Riazul and put the fresh orange slices and cherries without stems. Muddle until it’s like a stew. Then add one drop of grenadine. Pour 4 oz. of grapefruit juice and now add ice. Shake vigorously. Salt the rim of a glass. It is important to drink over the salted rim. It brings the drink together magically. Pour into your glass and enjoy a very refreshing unique Riazul Creation !
Todd @ Polo's Signature Houston

Name: The Papacito
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Hornitos Anejo Tequila', '1/2 part(s) Tawny Port', '1/4 part(s) Orange Liqueur (DeKuype 03 Premium Orange Liqueur)', '1 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making:
Stir ingredients briskly, and strain in to a shot glass. Bite in to an orange wedge and imbibe.
This June, go horns up to your original instigator - your dad. This is the guy who started it all, literally. Because without his instigation skills, there would be no you and what a world that would be.
This year, celebrate Dad’s day with a Papacito courtesy of Hornitos Premium Tequila. Who knows, maybe Dad will share some of his tricks of the trade with you over one of these citrusy and spicy drinks.

Name: The Paritda Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Partida Agave Nectar', '3/4 oz. Spring Water', '1 1/2 oz. Partida Blanco Tequila']
Making:
Partida Tequila introduced today the Partida Margarita, a new expression of America's most popular cocktail. "We've tested the Partida Margarita with our key accounts, cocktail enthusiasts, leading cocktail experts and bartenders - everybody has loved it," said Gary Shansby, chairman and CEO of Partida Tequila. "They all agree that it's the best Margarita they've ever tasted."
Said Jacques Bezuidenhout, noted San Francisco-based mixologist, "Bartenders will love the fact that this cocktail is so delicious and easy to make: you just shake over ice, taste to preference - no garnish, no salt, just pure agave taste." Anthony Dias Blue, former wine and spirits editor of Bon Appetit Magazine and one of the most respected spirits authorities in the US, added, "The Agave Nectar Margarita has everything going for it: fewer calories and less alcohol than the traditional margarita, a great tequila base, and it's all natural."
"We expect the Agave Nectar Margarita to create a new generation of cocktail drinkers because it is all natural, lower in calories and alcohol, and most importantly delicious," said Mr. Shansby.
The agave nectar used in the cocktail is an organic, natural fructose sweetener extracted from the blue agave plant. Sweeter than sugar, with a lower glycemic index rating than sugar, honey or maple syrup, agave nectar is water soluble and readily dissolves in cold beverages so it blends effortlessly in cocktails.

Name: The Party General
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 1/2 oz. Whiskey', '5 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Combine in a lowball glass.

Name: The Patriot
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Russian Standard Vodka', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '6 Tomato (Cherry)', '8 leaf(leaves) Basil', 'Salt (Kosher)', 'Black Pepper (Crushed)']
Making:
Muddle cherry tomatoes and basil with a dash each of salt and pepper. Add lime agave and Russian Standard Vodka. Shake vigorously with ice cubes and double strain into a coupe glass rubbed with lime and rimmed with equal parts salt and black pepper. Garnish with a basil leaf.
Created by: Emily Evans, Milwaukee, WI

Name: The Pavillion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix all together and serve over ice. For an extra kick, add a twist of lime to it.

Name: The Peach Screetch (good For Halloween)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. 7-Up', '4 oz. Hi-C peach', '1 oz. Sloe Gin']
Making: Mix Peach Schnapps, 7-up and Peach Hi-C over ice in a 12 - 16 oz. tumbler. Drizzle Sloe Gin over top.

Name: The Perfect Couple
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '3 oz. Strawberries (Pureed)', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '3 oz. Pina Colada Mix', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Blend 1st - 3rd ingredients with crushed ice until frozen. Blend 4th - 6th ingredients with crushed ice until frozen. Layer or marbleize the two together. Serve in hurricane or Poco Grande glass. Garnish with fresh strawberries.

Name: The Perfect Mint Julep
Ingredients: ['34 oz. Makers Mark Bourbon', 'Mint Leaves Spearmint', 'Water Distilled', 'Granulated Sugar', 'Powdered Sugar']
Making:
To prepare the mint extract, remove about 40 small mint leaves - wash and place in a small mixing bowl. Cover with 3 ounces of Maker's Mark. Allow the leaves to soak for 15 minutes. Then gather the leaves in a clean, soap-free piece of cotton cloth and vigorously wring the mint bundle over the bowl of whisky. Dip the bundle again and repeat the process several times. Then set aside.
To prepare the simple syrup, mix 1 cup of granulated sugar and one cup of water in a cooking pot. Heat to dissolve the sugar. Stir constantly so the sugar does not burn. Set aside to cool.
To prepare the mint julep mixture, pour 3 ½ cups of Maker's Mark into a large glass bowl or glass pitcher. (Pour the remaining whisky from the liter bottle into another container and save it for another purpose). Add 1 cup of the simple syrup to the Maker's Mark.
Now, begin adding the mint extract a tablespoon at a time to the julep mixture. Each batch of mint extract is different, so you must taste and smell after each tablespoon is added. You may have to leave the room a time or two to clear your nose. The tendency is to use too much mint. You are looking for a soft mint aroma and taste - generally about 3 tablespoons.
When you think it's right, pour the whole mixture back into the empty liter bottle and refrigerate it for at least 24 hours to "marry" the flavors.
To serve the mint julep, fill each glass (preferably a silver mint julep cup) half full with shaved ice. Insert a sprig of mint and then pack in more ice to about an inch over the top of the cup. Then, insert a straw that has been cut to one inch above the top of the cup so the nose is forced close to the mint when sipping the julep.
When frost forms on the cup, pour the refrigerated julep mixture over the ice and add a sprinkle of powdered sugar to the top of the ice. Then serve.

Name: The Perfect Storm
