Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Tonic Water', 'Grenadine']
Making: Combine all ingredients except grenadine in a highball glass with rocks and stir (shake for a colder mix). Float grenadine to the bottom and garnish with an orange slice or a long lemon twist.

Name: The Pinko
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Peach Vodka', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Chill a martini glass. Shake with ice and strain into the martini glass. Garnish with an orange slice and slice of peach.

Name: The Power Drill
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Pink Grapefruit Juice', '6 oz. Gatorade (Lemon-Ice)']
Making: Mix with ice in a 16 oz. glass.

Name: The Preacher
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 splash(es) Amaretto', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice.

Name: The President
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '2 1/2 oz. Double Cream']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: The Procession
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Espolon Tequila Blanco', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Ruby Port', '3/4 oz. Tea (Hibiscus, chilled)', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making:
Shake ingredients together with ice and strain into chilled cocktail glass. For garnish, twist a strip of orange peel over the top.
Created by Daniel Hyatt, The Alembic, San Francisco

Name: The Proven
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Rum', '5 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '7 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Everclear', '5 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 can(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Fill a blender with ice and add all ingredients. Blend until smooth and pour into a container and freeze. You should have a type of Italian ice with plenty of juice when it is all done.

Name: The Punisher
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Vodka', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Everclear', '1 splash(es) Cola', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix over ice in a collins glass and enjoy.

Name: The Purple States
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Courvoisier Exclusif Cognac', '3/4 part(s) Starbucks Coffee Liqueur', '3/4 part(s) Knob Creek 100 Proof Bourbon', '2 Orange Peels', 'Almond Cream']
Making:
Pour the Courvoisier Exclusif into a sugar-rimmed brandy snifter. In a separate mixing glass, combine the Starbucks Coffee Liqueur and Knob Creek and stir. Ignite the cognac slowly turning the snifter and rotating it so as to caramelize all the sugars on the rim of the snifter. Express the two orange peels into the brandy snifter so as to coat the inside of the glass with the caramelized orange oils. (This should create quite a spark so be careful!) Discard the orange peels. Strain the coffee liqueur/bourbon mixture directly into the brandy snifter, putting out the flame. Layer the almond cream on top of the mixture. Allow to cool and enjoy carefully as the brandy snifter may be quite hot around the rim.
*Almond Cream - Combine 2 oz. heavy whipping cream with 1/2 oz. Orgeat Syrup and shake vigorously in a glass and mixing tin for 20 slow seconds until sufficiently whipped.
Bartenders: Cocktail consultants Marcos Tello and Damian Windsor, Los Angeles, CA

Name: The REAL Brass Monkey
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cherry Juice']
Making: Shake well and serve over ice. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: The Real French Connection
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cognac', '1/2 oz. B and B Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Mix and pour into an old fashioned glass.

Name: The Real Original Stiff
Ingredients: ['3 1/3 oz. Crown Royal', '1 2/3 oz. Cherry Brandy', "4/5 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '4/5 oz. Dark Rum (Preferably Captain Morgan Dark Rum)', '1 3/4 cup(s) Coca Cola']
Making: Mix with ice in a small pitcher. Serve in lowball glasses.

Name: The Real Tropical Screw
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Sprite', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass with ice and serve.

Name: The Red Fetish
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Aguardiente', '2 part(s) Grenadine', '1 part(s) Cognac', '1 sprig(s) Mint']
Making: Mix aguardiente, grenadine and cognac on ice, strain into a coffee mug filled with ice, and add mint. Though it is traditionally served in a white coffee mug, I've seen it served in an old fashioned glass.

Name: The Red Pilot
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Beefeater 24', '3/4 oz. Aperol Orange Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Luxardo Marachino Liqueur', '1 tsp. Mezcal (preferably Del Maguey Minero)', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making:
Stir, strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.
Created by Sam Treadway of Boston’s Drink

Name: The Riker
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Rye Whiskey', '3 oz. Coca Cola', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Enjoy while watching your favorite Star Trek episodes (aka Red Alert).

Name: The Rio 16
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cabana Cachaca', '1 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 oz. Kiwi Juice (or puree)', '2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients together and serve over ice in a rocks glass

Name: The Rite Of Ashkente
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka (Peach flavoured)', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '6 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Heres one for all the terry Pratchett fans:- Blend with ice and serve in chilled highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: The Rodrigo
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', 'Iced Tea (Preferably Minute Maid Lemonade Iced Tea)', '1 Lemon']
Making: Fill an 8 oz. glass with ice. Squeeze one freshly-cut lemon wedge into the glass and leave in as garnish. Pour the Stoli Raspberry so that at least 1/2 the glass is filled (adjust to taste). Fill remainder of glass with Minute Made Lemonade Iced Tea.

Name: The Royal Gingersnap
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1 tsp. Orange Marmalade', '1 slice(s) Orange', '1 Maraschino Cherries', '2 dash(es) Ginger Syrup']
Making:
Prepare a rocks glass by frosting the rim with a mixture of powdered cinnamon and sugar. Muddle the fruits together with the marmalade and the syrup in the bottom of a mixing glass, and then add Crown Royal and ice. Shake well and strain the drink into the prepared rocks glass over ice. Garnish with a flamed orange zest.
Flamed Orange Zest
Hold a lit match over the top of the Royal Gingersnap. With the orange twist in the opposite hand, point the outside of the twist toward the drink and hold it over the match. Squeeze the twist to release the oils and watch as they jump through the flame onto the top of the drink. Add the orange twist to the drink.
The Royal Gingersnap, created by "King of Cocktails", Dale DeGroff. DeGroff is author of the 2002 book, The Craft of the Cocktail, and is best known for the cocktails he concocted at New York's famed Rainbow Room for decades.

Name: The Running Mate
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Makers Mark Bourbon', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup', '2 wedge(s) Lemon', '1 slice(s) Watermelon']
Making:
Muddle lemon and watermelon with simple syrup. Add Maker's Mark and ice. Shake and strain into a large old fashioned glass with fresh crushed ice. Garnish with a slice of watermelon and a lemon wheel.
Bartender: James Lee, West End Tavern, Boulder, CO

Name: The Sauza S’mores Margarita
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Sauza Silver Tequila', '1/2 cup(s) Chocolate Syrup', '4 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1/3 cup(s) Cream']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice. Pour into prepared glasses rimmed with Chocolate-Marshmallow Creme Sauce. Garnish with a skewer of mini marshmallows.

Name: The Scotchsicle
Ingredients: ['2 oz. The Glenrothes Select Reserve', "1 oz. Combier Liqueur d'Orange", '3/4 oz. Vanilla Syrup (Torani or Monin)']
Making:
Shake and strain neat into a cocktail glass, garnish with a light dusting of powdered cinnamon.
Following the close of The Met's biggest show, Alexander McQueen's 'Savage Beauty' exhibit, it seems that Americans can't get enough of the Scottish tartan and spirit of the highlands. Raise your glass this Labor Day and also kick-off the Fall Fashion season (through a nod to McQueen) with a delectable Scottish-inspired cocktail.
While scotch whisky may not be the first spirit of choice for the hot summer - this cocktail will prove differently, sharing a mix of refreshing summer-time ingredients with flavor touches for fall. The vanilla and apple hints from the whisky and the cinnamon garnish are the perfect reminder to your palate of flavors to come -- while the orange liqueur and 90's-inspired kick of vanilla syrup will take this cocktail right into September.

Name: The Scottish Pair
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '3/4 oz. Glenfiddich 12 Year Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky', '2 oz. Pear Juice (or pear nectar)', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients and shake well Serve up and garnish with a slice of pear.

Name: The Sex Pistol
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a highball glass over ice and fill with Cranberry Juice.

Name: The Shadiest One
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', "1 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '3/4 oz. Gatorade (Preferably lemon lime)', '1 splash(es) Sunny Delight Orange Juice']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice and drop a cherry in to eat at the end.

Name: The Shane
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 oz. Grenadine', '3 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Iced Tea']
Making: Mix with iced tea to your own liking.

Name: The Ship Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Mango Liqueur', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Grenadine', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with equal parts of orange and pineapple juice. This recipe is from a Carnival Cruise.

Name: The Shit
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Llords Melonaire', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 squirt(s) Orange Juice', '1 squirt(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 squirt(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 squirt(s) Sour Mix']
Making: Pour in a tall glass and shake well.

Name: The Shocker Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Combine all in am extra large cocktail glass. Load up with ice and fill with equal parts of cranberry and orange juice to taste.

Name: The Shocker Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka']
Making: Shake lightly with ice and strain into a large shot glass.

Name: The Shoot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Dry Sherry', '1 tsp. Orange Juice', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: The Shorney
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Iced Tea', '1 oz. Sprite (Diet)']
Making: Mix with ice in a rocks glass.

Name: The Silence
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Smirnoff Raspberry Twist Vodka', '3/4 cup(s) Lemonade']
Making: Mix. Serve over ice enjoy.

Name: The Six Thirty
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Galliano', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Mix in shaker, server in cocktail glass or sniffer.

Name: The Skinny Carlos
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Partida Blanco Tequila', '1 oz. Lillet Blanc', '3/4 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Champagne Brut']
Making:
First, add the champagne to a Collins Glass with ice. Shake the first four ingredients over ice and strain into a Collins Glass over ice and champagne. Garnish drink with a large grapefruit twist and enjoy!
“After experimenting, I realized that adding the champagne first helped create a more balanced taste with or without a straw.” – Navarro Carr, Trois, Atlanta

Name: The Sleepy Housecoat
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Irish Cream', '3/4 oz. Milk (Or cream)', '1 tsp. Instant Coffee (Vanilla flavoured)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Shake Kahlua, vodka, Irish cream, instant coffee, and milk/cream with ice. Serve cold and top with whipped cream. A smooth flavor with a sleepy effect. Get comfortable in your housecoat before drinking.

Name: The Sloe Motion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Plymouth Gin', '3 oz. Champagne', '3 Blueberries']
Making: Pour in the Sloe Gin, Top with Champagne and garnish with blueberries at the bottom of the glass.

Name: The Smoked Blossom
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) DeKuyper Elderflower Liqueur', '2 part(s) Connamarra Irish Whiskey', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making:
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Created by Dudley Delhagen, 2015 DeKuyper Cocktail Master

Name: The Smokey Mountain
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Lime Cordial', 'Almonds', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Rim a glass with lime cordial and dip into crushed almonds. Fill the glass with ice and add Bulleit and Amaretto. Fill with cranberry juice.

Name: The Smokey Scotsman
Ingredients: ['2 oz. The Macallan 10 Year Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky - Fine Oak Series', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '4 leaf(leaves) Sage']
Making: Muddle, add ice, shake and dirty pour into double rocks glass.

Name: The Smoking Cat
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1 1/2 oz. Bernheim Original Wheat Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 dash(es) Bitters Gorki Amaro']
Making:
Stir and strain into a coupe glass.
Created by Eben Freeman – Tailor

Name: The Snelly
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Apple Pucker', '1 part(s) Lemonade']
Making: Mix equally in any size glass and enjoy!

Name: The Sophisticate
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Courvoisier Cognac', '1 part(s) Starbucks Coffee Liqueur', '1 part(s) Starbucks Cream Liqueur', '2 squirt(s) Expresso', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake vigorously with extra ice and serve up. Garnish with a large lemon twist.

Name: The Southern Belle
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Deep Eddy Peach Flavored Vodka', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Mix first three ingredients in a cocktail glass, top with club soda.

Name: The ST-Germain Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sparkling Wine', '1 1/2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Fill a tall Collins glass with ice. Add Champagne first, then St-Germain, then Club Soda. Stir completely. Garnish with a lemon twist, making sure to squeeze essential oils into glass.

Name: The Suite
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix well and pour into 4 separate shot glasses. Make a toast to anything and drink with 3 other friends.

Name: The Sullivan
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Grey Goose Vodka', '1 dash(es) Water']
Making:
Pour into a shot glass and shoot.
Named for the pilot, Capt Chesley Sullenberger, whom saved all lives aboard hisAirbus 320 when he crashed landed in the Hudson River. The ingredients of this drink reflect the birgs he hit, causing the engine failure (Grey Goose for the Canadian Geese) and a dash of water for the Hudson River. Drink this with the thought of the heroics that happened January 15, 2009!

Name: The Summer Sour
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. L'Espirit de June", '1 1/4 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Sugar Syrup', '1/2 oz. Egg White', 'Bitters']
Making: Shake the ingredients with cold, hard, large ice-cubes for 10-15 seconds. Strain into the glass. Garnish with 3 dots of aromatic cocktail bitters such as Angostura or The Bitter Truth Aromatic.

Name: The Sun King
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Combier Rouge Cherry Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Beefeater Dry Gin', '3 dash(es) Bitters (chocolate mole)', '1 Sugar Cube', 'Lemon (peel)', 'Orange (peel)']
Making: In a mixing glass, muddle the sugar cube with the bitters and lemon peel. Add the Roi Rene Rouge and Gin with cracked ice and stir for approx. 20 seconds. Garnish with an orange peel.

Name: The Sunset Strip
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Los Angeles Vodka', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 chunk(s) Watermelon']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with Watermelon on a pick.

Name: The Suprema Sour
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Fantinel Suprema Grappa Tocai', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 Egg White', 'Angostura Bitters']
Making:
Combine all ingredients into a shaker and shake without ice vigorously. Add ice, shake again and strain into a coup glass. Garnish with 3 drops of Angostura bitters.
Courtesy of Gianfranco Verga (Louis 649)

Name: The Suzinator
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Pineapple Rum', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a collins glass with ice and blue curacao. Then add the of the liquor in a 'long Island' fashion. Fill with OJ and a splash of cranberry juice for color. Optional: Garnish with a cherry and a lemon wedge

Name: The Sweetness
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass and fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with an orange and a cherry.

Name: The Taga
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '5 oz. Sunny Delight Orange Juice']
Making: Stir into a cocktail glass.

Name: The Take-Over
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Crown Royal', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a rocks glass and see how this mixed drink takes over your tastebuds.

Name: The Teabag
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake and strain over ice into a Gibraltar glass (a type of pint glass). Garnish with a cherry.

Name: The Teef
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila (Or to taste)', 'Pepsi Cola']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Mat named the drink after his buddy Teef, who discovered it on the Canada Day weekend in 2000.

Name: The Tregea
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Grey Goose Vodka', 'Dry Vermouth']
Making: Fill a martini glass with ice and water. Let sit. Put the vodka into a shaker over ice. Shake. Pour out the ice water from the glass. Spray a slight mist of vermouth into the glass. Strain the vodka into the glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: The Trouble With Jeni
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sake', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Mix or blend over ice. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: The Twisted Rivoli
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Courvoisier Cognac VSOP', '1/2 part(s) Apricot Brandy', '1 splash(es) Brown Creme de Cacao', '2 tsp. Marmalade']
Making: Pour the Courvoisier VSOP, apricot brandy and dark cacao into a cocktail shaker before adding the marmalade. Stir briskly. Fill the shaker with ice cubes. Shake vigorously and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: The Ty Cobb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 Peach (frozen)', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Rim a cocktail glass with white sugar. Blend the ingredients with ice and pour into the glass. It's like a Peach Daiquiri. Garnish with a strawberry and a sprig of mint.

Name: The Ugly Irish Molly-o
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Ale (Amber)', '1 oz. Whiskey', '2 oz. Christian Brothers Brandy', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Pour into a large glass filled halfway with amber ale and garnish with cinnamon.

Name: The Ultimate Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Skyy Vodka (Citrus)', '1 oz. Finlandia Cranberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gran Gala', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1/4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: The Ultimate Holiday Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour Bulleit Bourbon into a rocks glass. Throw all other ingredients into the trash. Sit back, relax and enjoy.

Name: The Ultimate Zombie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '2 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Jamaica Rum', '1 oz. Passion Fruit Liqueur', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Grenadine', '2 package(s) Sugar (Sugar Twin Sweetener)']
Making: Mix all ingredients. Stir well. Pour over ice. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry. Serve with a straw.

Name: The Untitled
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Skyy Vodka', '3/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', 'Soda Water', '7-Up', 'splash(es) Cranberry Juice', 'Red Bull Energy Drink Float of']
Making: Build in a pint glass full of ice.

Name: The Vaccination
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila', '1 part(s) Orange Curacao']
Making: Store spirits in freezer compartment until well chilled. Mix equal parts and serve in a brandy snifter. Sip slowly and savor the refreshing aroma and smooth taste. Don't exceed your limit.

Name: The Vladimir
Ingredients: ["4 oz. Captain Morgan's Rum", '8 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Pour over 4 ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: The Voodoo Priestess
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut New Orleans', '1 part(s) Mango Puree', '1/4 part(s) DeKuyper Anisette Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup', '6 Mint Leaves']
Making: Muddle mango puree, mint and simple syrup in an old-fashioned glass for this concoction. Fill glass with ice and add vodka and DeKuyper Anisette Liqueur. Stir gently to blend and garnish with fresh mint sprig to ward off evil spirits.

Name: The Waborita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Cabo Wabo Reposado Tequila', '1 splash(es) Grand Marnier']
Making:
Salt the rim of a large margarita glass. Combine ingredients in a shaker over ice and strain into the glass. Serve with a lime wheel.
This signature margarita is served at Sammy Hagar’s new Las Vegas Cabo Wabo Cantina

Name: The Wallaby Darned
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Peaches (Frozen, sliced)', '2 oz. Champagne', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Peach Nectar']
Making: Combine all of the ingredients in a blender with 3 ice cubes and blend on high speed for approximately 30 seconds or until ice is completely crushed and the drink is smooth. Pour into a 12-ounce glass and serve with a straw.

Name: The Walpurgis Night
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac', '2 oz. Aguardiente', '3 dash(es) Bitters', 'Brown Sugar al gusto', 'Club Soda']
Making: Mix the first four ingredients in a mixing cup, and pour them into a tall glass full of ice. Add a lemon peel or sprigs of mint and top off with club soda.

Name: The What The Fuck?
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Orange Vodka', '3 oz. 7-Up', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Pour orange vodka and 7-UP into an ice filled Tom Collins glass. Top with Grand Marnier and stir gently. Decorate with an orange wheel, if desired.

Name: The Wibble
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Plymouth Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 dash(es) Gomme Syrup']
Making: Fill mixing glass with ice and add Plymouth Gin, grapefruit juice, juice from lemon and syrup de gomme. Shake well and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: The Wooly Mammoth
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Archers Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Lime Cordial', 'Lemonade']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Drink slowly through a straw.

Name: The Yard Shot
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/4 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Sambuca', '1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Polish Pure Spirit']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: The Yellow Bird
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Light Rum', '1/4 oz. Galliano', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice and stir.

Name: The Yellow Man
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps', '6 oz. Grape Juice (White)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with frozen halved grapes.

Name: The Yosca
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice in a shaker and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon rind.

Name: The Zozo
Ingredients: ["4 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", "4 oz. Root Beer (Preferably Barq's Rootbeer)"]
Making: Combine in a highball glass.

Name: The “Tequila llini”
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Riazul Silver Tequila', '1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Champagne', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making:
Blend with ice until a creamy texture and pour into an unsalted glass. You will forget about the bellini you used to love!!
Todd @ Polo's Signature Houston

Name: Theatre Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Carolans Irish Cream Liqueur', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', 'dash(es) Frangelico', 'dash(es) Brown Creme de Cacao', 'Coffee (Hot)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour the Irish cream and the white creme de cacao in a heated mug. Fill with coffee almost to the top. Add the other ingredients and top with whipped cream. Garnish with grated chocolate.

Name: Thin Blue Line
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. After Shock Blue Liqueur', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Mix ingredients in a tall glass over crushed ice and take a long cool drink!

Name: Thin Mint
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Mix in a small glass. This drink is seved at Murphy's Law - Chesterfield, Va.

Name: Third Degree Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Anisette']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Third-Rail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. White Rum', '3/4 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Apple Brandy', '1/4 tsp. Anis']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Thistle Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Thoroughbred Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour the Bourbon, the Sour Mix and the orange juice over ice in a highball glass. Top up with the soda, stir and add the grenadine. Garnish with an orange wedge.

Name: Three Amigos con Herradura
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '2 oz. Sangrita', '2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making:
Serve separately in tall shot glasses to create the colors of the Mexican flag.
This authentic Mexican drink embodies the three colors of the Mexican flag – green, white and red. It also represents the traditional style of enjoying tequila – straight! However, it’s not a shot; it’s for sipping. Three Amigos con Herradura consists of a shot glass of fresh lime juice, a shot glass of premium Tequila Herradura and a shot glass of fresh and flavorful sangrita, all enjoyed separately. What better way to celebrate Mexico’s Independence Day than with a traditional and patriotic Mexican beverage.

Name: Three Buffaloes
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Whiskey']
Making: Mix over ice in a lowball glass.

Name: Three Mile Island Ice Tea
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 1/2 oz. Bar Mix', 'Sprite']
Making: Long Island Ice Tea with Blue Curacao instead of triple sec and sprite instead of Coca Cola. This recipe gives you an electric green color appropriate for Three Mile Island Ice Tea. Mix in a Hurricane glass and fill with Sprite.

Name: Three Mile Island Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Cointreau (Or triple sec)', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Cola']
Making: Blend all ingredients with ice (except cola), then pour into a large hurricane glass, adding cola as you pour. Garnish with lemon and lime wheels.

Name: Three Miller Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '3/4 oz. Brandy', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Three Stooges
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Bundy Rum', 'Green Ginger Wine']
Making: Pour over ice in a 10 oz. glass and fill with green ginger wine.

Name: Three Stripes Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. This drink can also be layered.

Name: Three Wise Men and a Chicken
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Country Cocktail (Downhome Punch)", '1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Jose Cuervo', 'dash(es) Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes in a rocks glass.

Name: Three Wise Men Go Hunting
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Johnnie Walker Red Label Scotch (Or Jose Cuervo)', '1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Mix in a lowball glass and enjoy!

Name: Thriller
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Green Ginger Wine', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Throw Me Down And F**k Me #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Wilderberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur or Midori', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Compile in a highball glass. Shake and serve on ice. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

Name: Throw Me Down And F**k Me #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Wilderberry Schnapps', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix the liqueurs over ice in a highball glass. Fill with equal amounts of pineapple juice and orange juice. Shake and serve topped with a splash of grenadine.

Name: Thug Passion #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Alize Gold Passion (Red or Yellow)', '1 oz. Cognac (Preferably Hennessy V.S.)']
Making: Shake over ice and serve in a rocks glass.

Name: Thug Passion #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Alize Gold Passion (Red)', '2 oz. Alize Gold Passion (Orange)', '1 oz. Cognac (Preferably Hennesy)']
Making: Pour both Alize over ice in a rocks glass and flaot the cognac.

Name: Thug Passion #4
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Alize Gold Passion', '1 part(s) Louis Roederer Cristal Champagne']
Making: Although Cristal is highly expensive (between $200 - $500 a bottle in some places) this drink is well worth it. Popularized by the Tupac Shakur song of the same name it makes for a very tasty and very potent drink. Combine an equal amount of both in a glass and serve with or without ice but chilled.

Name: Thugged Out
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Baileys Irish Cream', '1 part(s) Hennessy Cognac VS']
Making: Depending on whether you want a shot or tall drink mix equal parts Bailey's Irish Cream with Hennesy Cognac.

Name: Thugs Passion
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Alize Gold Passion', '1 part(s) Crystal Light']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass.

Name: Thunder
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 pinch(es) Cayenne Pepper', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Thunder Cloud
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Noyeaux', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Layer in a parfait glass with ice. Whirl gently with a straw.

Name: Thunder-and-Lightning
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg Yolk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Thunderclap
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '3/4 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Thurston Howell
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Blend all except grenadine with 8 oz. crushed ice until slushy. Pour grenadine over and stir slightly.

Name: Thyme Out
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. 4 Copas Blanco', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. 4 Copas Organic Agave Nectar', '2 sprig(s) Thyme']
Making: Muddle lemon, simple syrup, and thyme Add Tequila, ice and strain into a sugar rimmed cocktail glass. Garnish with a thyme sprig.

Name: TI-MA's Black Jelly Bean
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Vandermint Minted Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Stir in a lowball glass with ice.

Name: Tia Alexander
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Cognac', '2 oz. Cream (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Tic Tac
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Red Bull Energy Drink', '1 part(s) Bacardi O']
Making: Pour into a pint glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Tich
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Galliano', 'Lemonade']
Making: Mix the gin and the lemonade in a cocktail glass then add the Galliano.

Name: Tickle Me Elmo #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour the schnapps into a highball glass and fill the rest with pineapple juice.

Name: Tickle Me Elmo #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix (ice optional, strain) and serve.

Name: Tickle Me Elmo #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Strawberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Cherry Pucker', '1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '7-Up']
Making: Serve over ice in a collins glass.

Name: Tidal Wave #2
Ingredients: ['12 oz. DNA Alcoholic Spring Water', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Pour DNA and Blue Curacao into a cocktail glass over ice. Stir and serve.

Name: Tidbit
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'dash(es) Dry Sherry']
Making: Blend all ingredients in an electric blender at a low speed for a short length of time. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

Name: Tidy Bowl #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. DeKuyper Blue Curacao', '1/8 oz. DeKuyper Spearmint Schnapps', '1/8 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a cordial glass.

Name: Tie Me To The Bed Post
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Skyy Infusions Citrus Vodka', '3/4 oz. Midori', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a 16 oz. glasss with ice. Add all of alchohol contents. Then top with sweet and sour and pineapple juice. (some people like it with more pineapple than sweet and sour).

Name: Tie Me To The Bedpost Naked
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine over ice into a highball glass.

Name: Tiger Lillet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lillet', '1 oz. Van Der Hum Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel.

Name: Tiger Tail
Ingredients: ["1 oz. TGI Friday's Ultimate Orange Dream", '1 oz. Black Sambuca']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass over ice. Tastes just like tiger tai ice cream.

Name: Tiger's Milk
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '3 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a collins glass.

Name: Tight Snatch #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with pineapple juice.

Name: Tight Snatch #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour in order into a highball glass.

Name: Tight Wet Bald Pussy
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Orange Juice', 'Ginger']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Stir well (very important).

Name: Tijuana Champagne
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Agave Tequila', '2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix Blue agave Tequila and Triple Sec over ice in a flute glass. Top off with ginger ale. Enjoy!

Name: Tijuana Crackwhore
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Syrup', '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix orange juice and strawberry syrup. Add tequila. Stir and down it.

Name: Tijuana Tart
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Tequila (Blanco)', '3/4 part(s) Hiram Walker Sour Apple Schnapps', '1/2 part(s) Hiram Walker Triple Sec', '2 part(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Combine tequila, sour apple schnapps, and triple sec in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake to blend and chill. Strain into a margarita glass or large cocktail glass over fresh ice. Top with ginger ale.

Name: Tijuana Taxi
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila Gold', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Tropical Fruit Schnapps', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with lemon lime soda. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Tijuanna Champagne
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blue Agave Tequila', '2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour Blue Agave Tequila and Triple Sec into a tall glass. Fill with ginger ale. Stir and served chilled or on ice. Enjoy!

Name: Tiki Nut
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over fresh ice. Fill with pineapple juice. Invented by D.J. Teek Phila PA.

Name: Tikki Dream
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '4 1/4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build in a sugar rimmed highball glass. Garnish with a wedge of watermelon.

Name: Tilt The Kilt
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 tsp. Water', '2 oz. Scotch', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass and float Triple Sec.

Name: Tim's Peanut Butter Cup
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '2 tsp. Peanut Butter (Smooth)', 'Heavy Cream']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with whipped cream and a cherry. Enjoy!!!

Name: Timpano Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cabana Cachaca', '1 oz. Strawberry (basil puree)', '1/2 oz. Honey (balsamic)', 'Lambrusco']
Making: Shake and strain into tall rocks glass. Top up with dry Lambrusco.

Name: Timshady
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Rum', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a shaker. Shake well and pour over ice in a collins glass. Should look like apple juice.

Name: Tin Rye
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Canadian Club Classic Whisky', '1 oz. Coca Cola', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Put ice in a highball glass. Pour Canadian Club, Coca Cola and lime juice in. Decorate with some limes and enjoy! (Its way better than a rye and coke!)

Name: Tipperary Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Irish Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Green Chartreuse']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Tipsy Pitfick
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps (Chilled)', '7 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix with 3 ice cubes in a pint glass.

Name: Tired pussy
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake over ice and pour into shot glass.

Name: Tito's Caipirosca
Ingredients: ["2 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", 'wedge(s) Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Brown Sugar']
Making: Stir in an iced filled rocks glass.

Name: Tito's Fresh Mint Lemon Drop
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lemon sugar rimmed cocktaill glass with ice and fresh mint. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: Tito's Mule
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '3 oz. Ginger Beer']
Making: Stir in an iced filled rocks glass.

Name: Tito's Passion
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '1 oz. Alize Red Passion', '3 oz. Watermelon Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass over ice and garnish with a Watermelon spear.

Name: Tito's Pimm's Cup
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", "1/2 oz. Paula's Texas Orange Liqueur", '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'Ginger Ale']
Making:
Fill a Collins or other tall glass with ice. Add Tito’s, orange liqueur, bitters, and lime. Top with ginger ale and stir. Garnish abundantly with fresh cut fruit such as lime wheels, orange wedges, or a cucumber spear; add a few sprigs of herbs from the garden, such as basil or mint.
Recipe from Texas by David Alan at tipsytexan.com

Name: Tito's Pool Side
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over ice. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Tito's Pool Time
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Tito's Stonewall Fizz
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", "1 oz. Paula's Texas Orange Liqueur", '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/4 cup(s) Peach Chunks', '2 oz. Club Soda']
Making:
In the bottom of a mixing glass, muddle peach chunks and simple syrup. Add spirits and lime juice and shake vigorously with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass or small rocks glass garnished with a fresh picked sprig of mint. Spritz with club soda.
Recipe from Texas by David Alan at tipsytexan.com

Name: Tito's Tea
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '3/4 oz. Orange Curacao', '1 dash(es) Honey', '3/4 oz. Sour Mix', '1 1/2 oz. Tea']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Tito's Yuzu Lemon Drop
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '3/4 oz. Yuzu Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Titty Twister
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum (Or Malibu Rum)", '5 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix with ice. Barry says: The twist of pineapple kills the rum flavor, but preserves the coconut and makes for a great tropical cocktail. Depending on how you mix it, this drink hits pretty hard.

Name: Titty Twister-rita
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Rum', '3 oz. Tropicana Twister (Orange and Passion)', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '3 oz. Daquiri Mix']
Making: Blend with 4 cups of crushed ice until you see the top of the mix stop moving. Pour into margarita glass and garnish with a lemon or lime slice.

Name: To Hell With Swords and Garter
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

Name: To Russia With Love
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 Egg White (1 for 2 drinks)']
Making: Mix or blend over ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Toast of the Town
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Effen Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Raspberry Liqueur', '1 part(s) Champagne']
Making: Mix EFFEN Raspberry Vodka and raspberry liquor in shaker with ice. Pour into a champagne flute and top with champagne. Garnish with fresh raspberries.

Name: Toasted Almond
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake, strain into highball glass.

Name: Toasted Almond And Cream
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '5 oz. Milk']
Making: Add ice to a 12 oz. glass until 3/4 full. Add the alcohol, top with milk and stir. Let stand for 1-2 minutes.

Name: Toasted Almond Fudge
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Goldenbarr Chocolate Vodka', '1 splash(es) Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake in a highball glass with crushed ice and fill with Club Soda.

Name: Toasted Vanilla Russian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Amaretto', '4 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass over ice.

Name: Toby Wallbanger
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dark Rum', 'Bitters', 'Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into two shot glasses. While mixing add the Bitters and Tabasco to taste.

Name: Todd
Ingredients: ["4 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '3 oz. Budweiser Beer', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a beer mug. Top with orange juice.

Name: Tokyo
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Pour all of your white liquors into a tall glass. Add Triple Sec and Sour Mix. Top with Midori.

Name: Tokyo Rose
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Strawberry Margarita Mix']
Making: Pour all into a blender with ice. Blend for 3 seconds and pour into a Poco Grande glass. Garnish with a slice of orange and a red cherry.

Name: Tokyo Tea
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Rum', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Midori', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Tokyo Tea - TY KU
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Sake', '4 oz. Iced Tea']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with lime.

Name: Tolchok
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Eggnog', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Banana Juice']
Making: Mix and drink!

Name: Tom and Jerry
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dark Rum', 'dash(es) Brandy', '1 Egg White (Beaten)', '1 Egg Yolk (Beaten)', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Beat the sugar into the egg yolk, add the rum and incorporate the egg white. Transfer into a mug and fill with boiling water. Add the brandy and garnish with grated nutmeg.

Name: Tom Boy
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Beer', '6 oz. Tomato Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Tom Bulleit's Mint Julep
Ingredients: ['15 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '40 Mint Leaves', 'Simple Syrup']
Making:
Wash mint leaves, pay dry and put them in a small mixing bowl. Cover with 3 ounces of Bulleit Bourbon and let soak for 15 minutes.
Remove mint, then place them in a clean cotton cloth and wring over bowl, bruising the leaves. Dip back into bourbon and wring again. Repeat several times to create mint extract. Set extract aside for 1 hour. You can also put the leaves back in the extract for a more contentrated mint flavor.
Combine mint extract (leaves included if preferred) with simple syrup in a covered glass jar and refrigerate over night.
Fill julep cups (10-12 oz., preferrably silver but glass will do) with crushed ice and insert a fresh mint srpig. Add 1.5 oz. Bulleit Bourbon to each cup. Add marinated extract to taste. Makes 8 servings.

Name: Tom Collins #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '3 oz. Club Soda']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin, lemon juice, and sugar. Shake well. Strain into a collins glass almost filled with ice cubes. Add the Club Soda. Stir and garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Tom Collins #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3 oz. Sour Mix', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Tom Collins #3
Ingredients: ['1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar', '2 oz. Gin', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass and fill with Club Soda.

Name: Tom Collins' Magical Disappearing - Reappearing Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Soda Water']
Making: Mix with ice. Drink.

Name: Tom Dow
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Vodka', '4 part(s) Lemonade', '4 part(s) Fresca']
Making: Fill tall glass with ice. Add vodka and fill the rest of the glass with half lemonade and half Fresca. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Tomahawk
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Myer's Rum", "1 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", 'dash(es) Triple Sec', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Fill with Sour Mix.

Name: Tomate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pastis', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Water']
Making: Pour the grenadine in a parfait glass, add the Pastis and fill with ice cold water. Note: This is a popular drink in France.

Name: Tomato Juice
Ingredients: ['Tomato Juice', 'dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce (Or to taste)', 'Celery Salt']
Making: Mix to taste and garnish with a celery branch.

Name: Tomboy
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Tomato Juice (Chilled)', '1/2 cup(s) Beer (Chilled)']
Making: Add the beer to the tomato juice in a highball glass.

Name: Tommy Bahama Crazy Cuban
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Tommy Bahama White Sand Rum', '1/2 part(s) Tommy Bahama Golden Sun Rum', '1 part(s) Coconut Rum', '1/2 part(s) Banana Liqueur', '3 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients over ice in a hurricane glass. Garnish with a pineapple, cherry and parasol.

Name: Tommy Bahama’s Coconut Cloud Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Tommy Bahama White Sand Rum', '1 1/2 part(s) Vanilla Vodka', '1 1/2 part(s) Coconut Rum', '1/2 part(s) Coconut Cream']
Making: Shake in a cocktail shaker and strain. Garnish with toasted coconut.

Name: Tommy’s Blue Hawaiian
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Tommy Bahama White Sand Rum', '1 part(s) Blue Curacao', '1 part(s) Coconut Cream', '2 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a blender with a scoop of crushed ice. Blend until smooth. Pour into a hurricane glass and garnish with a fresh pineapple slice and maraschino cherry.

Name: Tommy’s Valen-Tini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 part(s) Tommy Bahama White Sand Rum', '3/4 part(s) Orange Liqueur', '3/4 part(s) Sour Mix', '3/4 part(s) Raspberry Liqueur', 'Sugar']
Making: Mix the rum, orange liqueur and sour mix. Shake 20 times. Pour into a sugar in the raw rimmed martini glass. Slowly pour in raspberry liqueur so that it sinks to the bottom of the glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Tongue And Cheek
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Gatorade (Fruit punch flavour)']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a highball glass. Prepare for your tongue to hit your cheek with satisfaction.

Name: Tongue In Your Panties #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a cocktail glass and fill with orange juice. Splash the grenadine and 151 proof rum..

Name: Tongue Tornado
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Fill a glass with ice and add all alcohol. Then fill the rest of the glass with half orange and half pineapple. Add a splash of grenadine and shake.

Name: Tony's All-day Breakfast
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/3 oz. Raspberry Jam', '1/6 oz. Simple Syrup', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients into an ice-filled pint glass. Stir. Top with cranberry juice and garnish with raspberries and 2 long straws. One of these will last you all day!

Name: Tony's Hot Buttered Rum Batter
Ingredients: ['1 pound(s) Brown Sugar', '1/2 pound(s) Butter Unsalted and softened', '2 tsp. Cinnamon Ground', '2 tsp. Nutmeg Ground', '1/2 tsp. Allspice Ground', '2 tsp. Vanilla Extract']
Making:
In a mixing bowl beat together softened butter, brown sugar, vanilla extract and spices until well combined. Refrigerate in an airtight reusable container for up to a month, or place in your freezer until ready to use.
To make Hot Buttered Rum ­ In a pre-heated coffee mug combine 2 heaping tablespoons batter with 1 1/2 oz. Mount Gay Rum. Top with boiling water and stir well to mix. Serve with a spoon.
Hint: It is best to make the batter in advance so the spices have an opportunity to mingle. Be sure to remove batter from refrigerator at least 6 hours prior to serving to allow it to soften.

Name: Too Drunk To F**k
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Too Sweet Sex On The Beach
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pineapple juice is the dominant flavor followed very closely by peach schnapps. All should be mixed in a large glass and served with no ice but very cold.

Name: Toothless Jim Diccico
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon', '1 part(s) Sprite', '1 part(s) Canada Dry']
Making: Take a shot of Jim Beam and put it into any cup...mug..or shoe if you have to. Then split the rest of the remainder with Sprite and Ginger Ale in equal parts. Its called toothless because you can taste the Jim Beam but it has no teeth to bite you...Enjoy!!

Name: Tootsie Roll
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in a highball glass. You won't believe the taste.

Name: Tootsie Roll #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Creme de Cacao', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with orange juice..

Name: Tootsie Roll - TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) TY KU Soju', '1 part(s) Coffee Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Top with a splash of orange juice.

Name: Tootsie Rolled
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Cream Liqueur', '1 oz. Vodka', '7-Up (Diet)']
Making: Mix Godiva and Vodka over ice in a cocktail glass and fill with Diet 7-Up.

Name: Tootsie Screwed Quick
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Creme de Cacao', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in a collins glass and garnish with a Tootsie Roll and a cherry. Serve with the widest straw available.

Name: Top Banana
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Top Ten
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '2 oz. Cola', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of ice until smooth.

Name: Topless In Tantramarsh
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Sprite']
Making: Mix Banana Liqueur and Blue Curacao over ice in a rocks glass. Add cranberry juice until 3/4 filled. Stir. Top with Sprite but don't mix. Drink should have a purple bottom and the Sprite should easily layer on top.

Name: Toreador
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 tbsp. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a sprinkle of cocoa.

Name: Torridora Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 tsp. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Coffee Brandy', '1 1/2 tsp. Cream']
Making: Shake white rum, brandy, and cream with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Float 151-proof rum on top and serve.

Name: Toryshock
Ingredients: ['1 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '7-Up']
Making: Combine over ice into a highball glass.

Name: Toucan
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '7-Up', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a cocktail glass, fill half and half with 7-Up and orange juice. Marcel says: This drink kicks butt.

Name: Toucan Turtle
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Vanilla Liqueur', '1 oz. Cream', 'Soda Water']
Making: Fill a margarita glass with ice. Shake Midori, Malibu, vanilla liqueur, and cream and strain over ice. Add a splash of soda. Garnish with a cherry and a wedge of lime.

Name: Toucan's Tonic
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Country Time Lemonade', '1 oz. Iced Tea (Lipton, unsweetened)', '1 oz. Sprite', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Coca Cola', '2 oz. Long Island Iced Tea Mix', '1 oz. Smirnoff Vodka']
Making: Mix all parts in one glass...the smell will be interesting but it does taste great.

Name: Touchdown Tea
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Lemon', 'Iced Tea']
Making: Pour the peach schnapps and the lemon in a highball glass and top up with iced tea.

Name: Toungue In Your Panties
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', 'dash(es) 151 Proof Rum (Optional)']
Making: Build over ice in a hurricane glass.

Name: Tovarich
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kummel', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Tovarisch
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kummel', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a black olive.

Name: Toxic Waste #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '6 oz. Orange Juice (Tart)']
Making: Stir in a highball glass. Add dry ice if you happen to have some lying around the house.

Name: Toxic Waste #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice into an 8 oz. glass and fill with equal amounts of each juice. Can be shaken or stirred. Turns into a toxic green colour.

Name: Toxic Waste #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and serve in a collins glass.

Name: Toxic Water
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Surge Energy Drink', '1 oz. Jose Cuervo']
Making: Mix over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Trace Element
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 dash(es) Passion Fruit Syrup', '6 Mint Leaves', '1/2 oz. Syrup (spiced with bengal spice and vanilla syrup.)']
Making: Stir in an ice-filled highball glass. Coat the rim with Buffalo Trace and garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Trace it back to blue
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '8 Blueberries', '4 Cloves', '1 oz. Apple Juice', '1/3 oz. Vanilla Syrup']
Making: Muddle blueberries and cloves and shake all with ice. Strain into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Trace Tea
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1 dash(es) Lemon Juice', '5 1/2 oz. Iced Tea (sweetened)', '2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour into a Collins glass. Pour iced tea then lemon lime soda to fill. Stir and serve.

Name: Traces of Buffalo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/3 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 dash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass filled with ice. Garnish with a reaspberry and a mint leaf.

Name: Tracys Cream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Milk']
Making: Fill a rocks glass with ice and pour in Southern Comfort. Top with Milk and stir.

Name: Traffic Light #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Noyeaux', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur']
Making: Layer in a cordial glass.

Name: Traffic Light Cooler
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Melon Liqueur (Green)', '1 oz. Tequila Gold (Green)', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix (Yellow)', '2 oz. Orange Juice (Yellow)', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin (Red)']
Making: Layer in a cordial glass. Garnish with a cherry and lemon and lime slices.

Name: Trailblazer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Tran
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Pineapple Juice', 'splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Add Malibu Rum and vodka over ice in a cocktail glass. Fill with pineapple juice and add grenadine for colour. Serve with a cherry and pineapple slice.

Name: Transformer
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'Squirt', '1/4 oz. Sloe Gin']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass, fill with Squirt and float Sloe Gin. Garnish with a maraschino cherry and a pineapple section.

Name: Transient Woman
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. White Rum', 'Ginger Ale', 'Club Soda']
Making: Mix ingredients in a 10 oz. glass. Stir properly. Cool for 24hrs in a -3 C fridge and add ice just before serving.

Name: Transmission Fluid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', '1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 splash(es) Mountain Dew Code Red']
Making: Pour ingredients into a lowball over ice. Should be the color of transmission fluid. Enjoy!

Name: Trapped Under Ice - Metallica
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1 oz. Jagermeister', 'Fever Tree Indian Tonic Water']
Making:
Stir in a rocks glass with ice and top with tonic. Garnish with a lime wedge.
In honor of the Big 4 (Metallica, Slayer, Anthrax and Megadeth) playing Yankee Stadium, Jagermeister, a brand known for rocking the music scene, has come up with some metal cocktails….

Name: Trash Can
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Orange Juice', '1 part(s) Malibu Rum']
Making: Mix the two together. It's very simple. (Thanks for the recipe Bighouse.)

Name: Tree Climber
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sour Mix', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix over ice and strain in a cocktail glass. Float the cranberry juice.

Name: Tree Smacker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 dash(es) Rum', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour schnapps and triple sec into a Collins glass. Fill with equal parts orange juice and pineapple juice. Float rum on top.

Name: Triad
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Anejo Rum', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '4 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour the rum, vermouth, Amaretto, and Ginger Ale into a highball glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Trilby Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Trimarian Swamp Turtle
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Everclear', '1 tsp. Gatorade (Powdered)']
Making: Mix and enjoy.

Name: Trinadad Swizzle
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Amber Rum', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '2 dash(es) Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Mango Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry, a mint leaf and a slice of orange.

Name: Trinidad Punch
Ingredients: ['4 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1 oz. Sugar Syrup', '1 oz. Lime', '3 oz. Rum']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Trinidad Smash
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Light Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid (Mandarine-Tangerine)', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid (Tropical Punch)']
Making: Mix the two kool-aids together using the directions on the package. Pour the liquors into a shaker and fill the rest of it with the Kool-Aid mix and shake. Pour into a tall glass over ice. Garnish with a lime slice and a chunk of pineapple. Don't forget the little umbrellas.

Name: Trinity Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Gin']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Triple Citrus 24 and Tonic
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Beefeater 24', '2 part(s) Tonic Water']
Making: A spin off on the classic Gin and Tonic, decorated with thin slices of Lemon, Lime and Orange.

Name: Triple Crown Julep
Ingredients: ["2 1/4 oz. Jefferson's Reserve", '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 tsp. Water', '4 Mint Sprigs']
Making: Strip leaves from 2 mint sprigs and mash with water and sugar in a highball glass until sugar is dissolved. Fill with shaved ice and pour in Jefferson's Reserve. Stir until outside of glass is frosted. Garnish with 2 mint sprigs.

Name: Triple Rum
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Paso Fino', '1 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/4 oz. Bacardi Anejo']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and float Bacardi Anejo. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Trippin
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Pucker', '1 oz. Grenadine', '3 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch', 'Sprite']
Making: Stir to the left for 30 seconds and immediatley to the right for 35 seconds. While doing so stand on right foot jumping up and down (be careful not to fall!). Then enjoy!

Name: Tripple J
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Taboo', '1 oz. Archers Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Combine over ice into a cocktail glass.

Name: Trish's Strawberry Quick
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Baja Rosa', 'Milk']
Making: Pour vodka, amaretto and Baja Rosa into a tall glass. Top up with milk.

Name: Trish's Urine Sample
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Lime Juice', '1 oz. Sprite']
Making: Build in a highball glass.

Name: Troika
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Peach Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto (Preferably Di Saronna Amaretto)', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake or blend over cracked ice and serve in a chilled cocktail glass or an old- fashioned glass with ice cubes.

Name: Trois
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into a highball glass.

Name: Trojan Bomber
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 can(s) 7-Up', '1/2 Lemon Juice', 'Tabasco Sauce (Optional for flavour)']
Making: Pour the 7-Up over ice in a highball glass. In a shaker, shake the whisky and the tequila and pour into the highball. Stir in the lemon juice and serve.

Name: Trolley Car
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Strawberries', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Garnish with a fresh strawberry.

Name: Tropic Freeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Coconut Cream', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Blend with 12 oz. crushed ice until smooth. Serve in a specialty glass and garnish with a pineapple fruit flag.

Name: Tropica Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. White Rum', '5 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Stir in a collins glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Tropical Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Serve over rocks. Garnish with fresh mint.

Name: Tropical Breezes
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Strawberry Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Fill a Hurricane Glass with ice and add Coconut Rum, Strawberry Vodka, Peach Schnapps, Creme de Banane and Midori. Add Lime Juice then fill the remainder of the glass with equal parts Pineapple Juice and Orange Juice. Stir and garnish with an Orange Wheel. Both the ladies and guys loved this one in my bar!

Name: Tropical Bull
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Blue Chair Bay Coconut Spiced Rum', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Combine in a shaker and shake once. Pour into a tumbler glass and enjoy.

Name: Tropical Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '3/4 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Tropical Ecstasy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Creme de Coconut', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka']
Making: Shake all the ingredients (except the creme de coconut) and pour into a cocktail glass. Top off with the cream of coconut and place a green maraschino cherry on top of the drink. Serve immediately. A must try!!!

Name: Tropical Erotica
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', "Soda (Preferably Tahiti Treat C'Plus)"]
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass...stir and enjoy!

Name: Tropical Fart
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Beer', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a collins glass over crushed ice with equal parts of orange and pineapple juice. Splash a small amount of beer on top. The beer makes all the difference in the world! Not to mention, it is the fart.

Name: Tropical Fog
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tropical Fruit Schnapps', '1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Cream', 'Fruit Punch (Tropical or Hawaiin works best)']
Making: Pour schnapps in a glass with ice. Fill with Punch and add cream.

Name: Tropical Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Build in a collins glass and garnish with seasonal fruits.

Name: Tropical Island
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Pisang Ambon', '1/2 oz. Mango Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Pina Colada Mix', 'Milk (To taste)']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and serve into a cocktail glass.

Name: Tropical Itch
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Passion Fruit Juice', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'dash(es) Dark Rum']
Making: Build in order in a highball glass and garnish with 1/4 pineapple wheel, a cherry and a cocktail umbrella connecting the cherry to pineapple. And don't forget the bamboo Back Scratcher.

Name: Tropical Kiss #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Use a 14 oz. cocktail glass and mix it all together or blend with ice to make a frozen drink!

Name: Tropical Kiss #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', 'Pineapple Juice (To taste)', 'Cranberry Juice (To taste)']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a highball glass.

Name: Tropical Louie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients for about 20 seconds and pour into a tall glass filled with ice.

Name: Tropical Paradise
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 Banana', '2 oz. Coconut Cream', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Blend with 8 oz. crushed ice until smooth. Serve in a specialty glass and garnish with a pineapple fruit flag and a palm tree stirrer.

Name: Tropical Peach Colada
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps (Preferably Hiram Walker Peach Schnapps)', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane (Preferably Hiram Walker Crème de Banane)', "1/4 oz. Light Rum (Preferably Bacardi's)"]
Making: Blend with 5 oz. of ice until smooth.

Name: Tropical Pod Shriveler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka (Preferably Vox)', '1 oz. Beefeater Dry Gin', '1 oz. Light Rum', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Papaya Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 tbsp. Passion Fruit Syrup', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake ingredients and pour over ice into a highball glass. Garnish with two cherries and two raisins (hence the pod shriveling part)...enjoy!!

Name: Tropical Queens
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Sprite', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass (add the cranberry juice last). Garnish with cherries and a slice of lime.

Name: Tropical Screw
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '8 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine the orange juice and the rum in a tumbler with ice. Add a splash of grenadine and garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry. This is a definite pool side treat... ENJOY!!

Name: Tropical Sex
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Midori', '1 cup(s) Pineapple (In chunks)']
Making: Blend with ice until ice is crushed. Serve in a highball glass and garnish with a slice of kiwi fruit.

Name: Tropical Silk
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', 'Milk']
Making: Pour the liquor in a collins glass and mix with some crushed ice. Fill with milk and stir.

Name: Tropical Special
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Tropical Spiced Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '5 oz. Iced Tea', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients over ice in a highball glass. Stir. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Tropical Storm
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 Banana']
Making: Blend and serve in an exotic glass. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Tropical Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'dash(es) 151 Proof Rum', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Pineapple Juice (To taste)', 'Cranberry Juice (To taste)']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice -except 151 rum and grenadine-. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice, add the grenadine and float the 151. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a cherry.

Name: Tropical Tea (aka Linda's Drink)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Midori', '1 1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 can(s) Pineapple Juice (Or to taste)', '1/2 can(s) Orange Juice (Or to taste)', '1/2 can(s) Coconut Milk (Or to taste)']
Making: Blend with ice on high speed until smooth. Pour into a highball glass and garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Tropical Temper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Blend together and pour over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Tropical Twister
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Coconut Rum", "1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Raspberry Rum", '1/2 oz. Arrow Banana Cream Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Orange Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'splash(es) Soda Water', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix in a glass then shake and pour into a fresh cocktail glass over ice.

Name: Tropical Twister #2
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Midori', '1 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 part(s) Gin', '2 dash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '4 part(s) 7-Up or White Lemonade']
Making: I first made this poured but now prefer it shaken and strained into a chilled glass. Top with the 7-up.

Name: Tropical Watermelon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '2 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass and fill with sour mix. Float Malibu rum and garnish with a pineapple ring and a cherry flag.

Name: Tropical Wave
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Coconut Rum', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix in a shaker. Pour over ice in a tall glass.

Name: Tropical Wave #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a Gibraltar glass and garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry.

Name: Tropicana Screw
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '3/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix all the ingredients except the Amaretto. Pour over ice into a collins glass and then pour the Amaretto.

Name: Tropicano Curacao
Ingredients: ['1 Banana', '2 oz. Blue Curacao', '8 oz. Coconut Milk', '8 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Serves 2. Blend the juice with the banana and malibu and pour into 2 cocktail glasses. Pour blue curacao into each glass. It is denser so it will sink to the bottom to give the effect.

Name: Tropico Squeeze
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Rum (Preferably Tropico)', '1 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Tropico Turbotwist
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tropico Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Mango Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a in a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Truck 9
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice', '1 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Pour vodka into a cocktail glass. Fill near the top with orange juice and top with blue curacao.

Name: True Red Death
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Stir over ice in a tall glass.

Name: Trueman Treat
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Lemon Lime Soda', '1 splash(es) Cranapple Juice']
Making: Pour Vodka, Amaretto and Peach Schnapps over ice in a rocks glass. Fill with lemon lime soda and a splash of cranberry juice. Stir with a straw and enjoy!

Name: Tsunami
Ingredients: ["1/3 cup(s) Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", "1/3 cup(s) Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum or Malibu", '1/3 cup(s) Pepsi Cola']
Making: Fill highball glass with ice. Add ingredients and stir.

Name: Tu Tu Cherry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice in a glass. Stir.

Name: Tuesdays with Mole
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Gosling's Black Seal Rum", '3/4 oz. Averna Bitters - Amaro', '1/2 oz. El Dorado Rum Cream', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 Egg White']
Making:
Shake,shake,shake, strain into coupe, float 5 drops Xocolatl Mole Bitters.
Damon Dyer, Death & Company New York

Name: Tulip Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 tsp. Apricot Brandy', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Apple Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Tullamore Dew and Cola
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tullamore Dew Irish Whiskey', 'Cola']
Making: Serve in a tall glass over ice.

Name: Tullamore Dew and Ginger Ale
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tullamore Dew Irish Whiskey', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Serve in a tall glass over ice.

Name: Tumbleweed
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Hazelnut Liqueur', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
