Making: Blend until smooth and serve in a mug. If it is too thick add cream or milk and if it is too thin add ice or ice cream. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with shaved chocolate or sprinkles.

Name: Turbo Shandy
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Smirnoff Ice', 'Beer']
Making: Pour the bottle of Smirnoff Ice into a pint glass then top up with lager/beer.

Name: Turf Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Anis', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel and serve.

Name: Turkish Fart
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur', "1/4 oz. Creme d'Almond", '1/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Pour over ice, do not shake! Strain into any appropriate short, wide and small container.

Name: Turksarise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of orange, a cherry, a straw and an umbrella. For an extra twist pour some more rum in the drink directly into the straw. Curtis says: Remember, we in the Caribbean use big measures. ENJOY! From Turks and Caicos Islands, BWI. Come visit!

Name: Turned Tweentyone
Ingredients: ["1 part(s) Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 part(s) Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon', '1 part(s) Dry Gin', '1 part(s) After Shock Liqueur']
Making: Mix together in a large glass over ice.

Name: Turtle Club Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and serve into a collins glass. Add a twist of lime.

Name: Turtledove
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Blend with 16 oz. of crushed ice until the mixture is slushy.

Name: Tusken Raider
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Brandy', '2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '6 oz. Kahlua', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix the ingredients given in the order above in a tall glass and top off with the oraneg juice. Stir. It should look like coffe with cream, and is very smooth. Drink. Repeat until you start thinking you're on Tatooine. Yet another Star Wars themed drink from yours truly.

Name: Tuti Fruiti
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice', 'Grapefruit Juice', '1 splash(es) Strawberry Daiquiri Mix', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix vodka and peach schnapps over ice in a collins glass. Add equal amounts or pineapple, orange and grapefruit juices. Splash with Strawberry Daiquiri mix - it will sink to the bottom. Float 151 proof rum on top.

Name: Tuxedo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '4 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Tuxedo Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/4 tsp. Anis', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: TV Tower
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Sherry']
Making: Layer in a cocktail glass.

Name: TVR
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Stir over ice in a tall glass.

Name: Twentieth Century
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Lillet', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Twenty Thousand Leagues
Ingredients: ['2 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Pernod Absinthe']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with crushed ice, combine all of the ingredients. Stir well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Twidderpator
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Peach Juice', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Champagne']
Making: Pour light rum in a glass. Add peach schnapps and fill the glass with ice half way. Fill with equal amounts of peach juice and orange juice. Finish with a splash of Watermelon Pucker and a splash of champagne.

Name: Twilight Zone #1
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1/4 oz. Bacardi Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with pineapple slices and cherries for a tropical look.

Name: Twilight Zone #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', "1 oz. Myer's Rum (Light)", "1 oz. Myer's Rum (Dark)", 'Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Build over crushed ice in a big fat glass and enjoy.

Name: Twin Glock 40's
Ingredients: ['20 oz. Budweiser Beer', '20 oz. Smirnoff Ice']
Making: Mix in a pint glass.

Name: Twin Hills
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 tsp. Lime Juice', '2 tsp. Benedictine', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve.

Name: Twin Peach
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass and fill with cranberry juice. Garnish with a peach slice.

Name: Twist-N-Ginny-G
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Seagram's Extra Dry Gin", '6 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour Gin over cracked ice and add two thin slices of a lime. Pour Ginger Ale over the slices of lime. Enjoy a few!!

Name: Twisted Bellywash
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice (To taste)', 'Cranberry Juice (To taste)', 'Ginger Ale (To taste)']
Making: Mix the vodka and equal parts of the juices in a highball glass.

Name: Twisted Citrus
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Creme de Peche', '1 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '1 splash(es) Sourpuss Tangerine Liqueur', '1/5 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Twisted Driver
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Smirnoff Orange Twist Vodka', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build drink in a rocks glass and garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Twisted Nutz
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Brandy', "3/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Half and Half Cream']
Making: Chill glass and shaker. Mix ingredients into the chilled shaker. Shake and pour mix into glass filled with ice. Fill with half and half and serve. Note: The contents can be increased or decreased depending on drinker. But keep the amount of armaretto higher.

Name: Twisted Orchid
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Smirnoff Raspberry Twist Vodka', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '2 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shaken and served up with either a lime or pineapple garnish.

Name: Twisted Screw
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a 14 oz. glass with ice, pour the vodka and fill with pineapple juice until 1/4 inch from the top. Add the cranberry juice.

Name: Twisted Tropicana
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Smirnoff Citrus Twist Vodka', 'Tropicana Twister (Preferably Orange Cranberry)']
Making: Pour in a large glass or mason jar with 3 ice cubes and stir with a straw.

Name: Twister #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1/3 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour vodka and lime juice into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Fill with lemon lime soda, stir, and serve.

Name: Twister #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 tbsp. Sugar', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice. Stir well and enjoy!

Name: Twiztid JP
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Everclear', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 oz. Bacardi Light Rum', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Mix and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Two Alligators Screwing On A Log
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Everclear (If possible)']
Making: Mix with ice in a highball glass and put the cinnamon stick in for the log.

Name: Two Dub Special
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Fruitopia (Kiwiberry Rukus)', 'Lime Vodka']
Making: Drink 1/3 of the bottle of Kiwiberry Rukus Fruitopia, then fill the rest of the bottle with lime vodka. Shake gently and enjoy.

Name: Two Wheeler
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '6 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice in a glass. Garnish with a slice of orange or a mint sprig.

Name: TY KU Rocket’s Red Glare
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) TY KU Soju', '1 part(s) TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix in a rocks glass.

Name: TY KU Stars and Stripes
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) TY KU Soju', '1 part(s) Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Ginger Ale (diet)']
Making: Mix in a rocks glass.

Name: TY KU Torch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/2 oz. Cream', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making:
The Vancouver 2010 Winter Olympics are upon us, so light up some support for your country with the TY KU Torch. Burning brighter then the Olympic flame - this blazing hot cocktail is made with TY KU Premium Liqueur, an all-natural, low calorie, low sugar, low carb spirit that will heat up any winter night. Free of sulfites, you won't be late to cheer on your favorite athletes as they go for the gold.
Shake and strain the TY KU and Kahlua into a martini glass. Over a bar spoon, pour cream to float on top. Over the cream, float the Bacardi 151. Light the Bacardi 151 with a match. As flame burns, sprinkle some cinnamon onto flame. Clap your hands over the flame to put it out. Give a stir and serve.

Name: TY KU-sicle
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 tbsp. Vanilla Extract (or squirt of vanilla syrup)', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Blend with a cup of ice and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a kiwi slice.

Name: TY-Klover
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Club Soda', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Build on the rocks and garnish with a mint leaf.

Name: Tyler Durden
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Coca Cola', '1 splash(es) Cream']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Tyler Surprise
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Milk']
Making: Pour the ingredients over ice into a frosty cocktail glass.

Name: Typhoon
Ingredients: ['Champagne (Chilled)', '1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Anisette', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except champagne) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Fill glass with chilled champagne, stir lightly, and serve.

Name: Typhoon - TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an lime wedge.

Name: U.S. Mint
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Knob Creek 100 Proof Bourbon', '1 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Sugar', '6 sprig(s) Mint', '1 splash(es) DeKuyper Pucker Raspberry Schnapps']
Making: Add sugar, bourbon and mint into an old-fashioned glass with crushed ice and muddle the fruit. Garnish with berries and mint.

Name: Ugly
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. White Rum', '1/3 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Green Grenadine', '1 1/3 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix and pour over ice in a highball glass. Fill with Ginger Ale.

Name: Ugly Czech
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka (Well chilled)', '6 tbsp. Gatorade (Lemon-lime powder)', '1 tsp. Grenadine', 'Water']
Making: Mix thoroughly together and serve in a highball glass. Fill with water.

Name: Ulanda
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Ulanda Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Anis', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Ultimate Apple
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Smirnoff Apple Twist', '1 oz. 99 Apples Schnapps', '1 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Add alcohol over ice in a highball glass. Fill with sour mix.

Name: Ultimate Banana Smoothie
Ingredients: ['5 Bananas', '1 bottle(s) Spiced Rum', '1 bottle(s) 99 Bananas Schnapps', '2 splash(es) Vanilla Extract', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1/2 cup(s) Sugar', 'Milk']
Making: In a blender place the PEELED bananas, 1/2 cup sugar and two heavy splashes of vanilla extract. Next add two scoops of vanilla ice cream. Pour 99 Bananas until the blender is 1/4 full. Fill with rum to 1/2 way. Fill the rest with milk. Blend until smooth. Pour into a tall glass and top with whipped cream and a cherry.

Name: Ultimate Lights Of Havana
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour the Midori, the coconut rum and equal parts of orange juice and pineapple juice into a highball glass over ice. Garnish with a slice of orange or pineapple or coconut. Enjoy (really yummy)

Name: Ultimate Long Island
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Sour Mix (see recipe for Ultimate Sour Mix in non-alcoholic section)', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Build in a tall glass.

Name: Ultimate Lynchberg Lemonade
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '3/4 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Old Grandad Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Sour Mix', 'Sprite']
Making: In a LARGE glass mix all ingredients over ice and add sour mix and 7-up to taste!

Name: Ultimate Margarita
Ingredients: ['3 1/2 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Cointreau', '1 1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 Lime (juice of a ripe lime)', '1/2 Orange (juice of a ripe orange)']
Making: Strain the juices and mix all the ingredients in a shaker. Shake well. Run the peel of the juiced lime around the rims of two margarita glasses and dip the glasses in margarita salt. Fill the basins of the glasses with crushed ice and pour the mixture over the ice. Or put the mixture and ice in a blender whir until slushy and pour into the glasses. For best results use Reposado or Anejo Tequila (make sure the bottle says 100 percent Blue Agave). The best Reposado we've found so far is Sauza Galardon but Cuervo Tradicional is also very good. Don't use White or Gold Tequila as the sharpness will tend to overpower all the subtleties of the tequila.

Name: Ultimate Orgasm
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '6 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch', "1/2 can(s) Hanson's Energy Drink"]
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Ultimate Panty Remover
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '2 oz. Amaretto', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a tall glass over crushed ice and fill with equal parts of the fruit juices.

Name: Ultimate Punch
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Seagram's VO Whiskey", '12 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Pour Seagram's VO Whiskey over ice in a tall glass. Fill with Hawaiian Fruit Punch. Stir and garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Ultimate Red Bull
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Fill a glass with the vodka, add 1 piece of ice and top with the Red Bull.

Name: Ultimate Screw Driver
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour Triple Sec and Vodka into a 12 oz. glass filled with ice. Top with Orange Juice.

Name: Ultimate Suntan
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Light Rum', '1/4 oz. DeKuyper Creme de Banana', '1/4 oz. Dekuyper Blackberry Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Blend everything together and pour into a cocktail glass over ice. Float grenadine on top.

Name: Ultraviolet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '1 oz. Parfait Amour', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'Sprite']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with cranberries or a lemon twist.

Name: Uncle Al
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '1 splash(es) Peach Tree Schnapps']
Making: Pour vodka over ice in a small cocktail glass. Add a splash of Peach Tree.

Name: Uncle Fred's Used Bedpan
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', 'Chocolate Milk', 'Gatorade (Yellow)']
Making: Pour Kahlua and Creme de Banane in a shot glass and float in a glass with the rest of the ingredients...Shoot as fast as possible...Have a bucket nearby.

Name: Uncle John
Ingredients: ["1 part(s) Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 part(s) Root Beer']
Making: Half captain morgan and half root beer over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Uncle Wiggley
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill glass with a 50/50 mixture of cranberry juice and Sweet and Sour Mix. Serve.

Name: Under Current
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Chill over ice the curacao, the vodka and the sour. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. With a spoon, carefully add the lukewarm Chambord. It should layer to the bottom, looking very pretty!

Name: Undercurrant
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Chill in a shaker and serve in a martini glass. Sink the chambord in the bottom of the glass.

Name: Unforgettable Night
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 tbsp. Chocolate Liqueur', '1 oz. Coconut Milk', '1 tsp. Tabasco Sauce', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Pour all the ingredients into a chilled collins glass. Stir until they are mixed evenly. It's going to be a long, unforgetable night!!

Name: Union Jack #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Sloe Gin', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Build in a lowball glass.

Name: Union Jack #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. London Dry Gin', '1 tbsp. Creme Yvette']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Unsung Hero
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kirsch', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy', 'Lemonade (To taste)']
Making: Mix well with ice.

Name: Unsuspecting Victim
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Stir with ice and strain. (Don't shake!)

Name: Up Your Fuzzy
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Everclear', '7-Up', '1 splash(es) Strawberry Daiquiri Mix']
Making: Pour in a large wine glass and garnish with whip cream and a cherry.

Name: Upa U S
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Applejack', '4 oz. 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a highball glass.

Name: Upgraded Linux
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Vodka', '1 1/3 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and fill with Coca-Cola. Garnish with a lime peel.

Name: Upperhillsdale Fruity Pink Thing
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '3 1/2 oz. Lemonade', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and serve in a lowball glass. Use orange as garnish.Very classy drink. Gives aura of Upperhillsdale sunset.

Name: Upside-Down Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', "2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", 'Orange Juice']
Making: Pour a doubleshot of vodka in a glass. Almost top off with Orange Juice. Pour a doubleshot of coconut rum on top. Drink immediatly. Do not stir or mix.

Name: Urban Cowboy #2
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Pendleton Whisky', '1 splash(es) Sweet Vermouth', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Serve up or on the rocks.

Name: Urban Funk
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Midori', '1 oz. After Shock Liqueur']
Making: I ordered this in a bar once when I was wanting a double Midori then a double Aftershock but as there was only one shot of aftershock left and the barman would have to go to the store-room to complete my order I decided to have it all bunged into one. The results were quite pleasing!

Name: Urban Violence
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Tropicana Twister (Strawberry/orange/banana)']
Making: Put some ice in your favourite glass. Add liquor. Fill up with strawberry/orange/banana and stir.

Name: Urine Sample #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tea', '3 oz. Mountain Dew', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake and serve in a lowball glass, then find the two reasons why it's called urine sample!

Name: UV Lemonade
Ingredients: ['2 oz. UV Blue Raspberry Vodka', 'Lemonade']
Making: Pour UV Blue Raspberry Vodka into a cocktail glass and fill with lemonade.

Name: UW Lander 3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sour Apple Pucker', '2 oz. Southern Comfort', '3 oz. Beer']
Making: Build over ice in highball glass.

Name: V-56 Float
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Voyant Chai Cream Liqueur', '1 part(s) Jagermeister', 'Root Beer', 'Coca Cola']
Making: In a tall soda glass filled with ice, add in equal parts Voyant and Jagermeister and then top off with Coke (or Root Beer).Use a spoon to mix well and then top off with 1-scoop of Vanilla Ice Cream. Serve with a straw and enjoy.

Name: V.D.A.
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Serve chilled in a rocks glass.

Name: V8 Slammer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'V 8 Juice', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour vodka into a highball glass. Top with v8 Juice and add a light amount of lemon juice. Serve with a slice of lemon.

Name: Vagina Cleanser
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a collins glass with ice, add the vodka and the cranberry juice and enjoy!

Name: Vaginal Slurpee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 tsp. Honey']
Making: Pour the vodka into a shot glass, stir honey in. Tilt head back and slurp.

Name: Valcano
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tabasco Sauce', 'Beer']
Making: Pour the Tabasco into a shot glass. Drop the shot into a beer mug filled with your favourite beer. Let it foam over and drink. (Note from the webmixer: given the potency of the Tabasco, this is probably quite a dangerous drink. You have been warned).

Name: Valencia Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Valencia Smile
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '4 dash(es) Orange Bitters', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour in a lowball glass and fill with champagne.

Name: Valentine Vixen
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Ketel One Citroen', '1 splash(es) Passion Fruit Nectar', '1 splash(es) Pomegranate Juice', 'Prosecco']
Making:
In an ice filled cocktail shaker combine all ingredients except the prosecco and shake vigorously. Pour contents of the shaker into the flute first and top with prosecco.
Sip the Valentine Vixen exclusively at:
Olives (at the W Union Square)
201 Park Ave. South
New York, NY 10003

Name: Valentine's French 75
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '5 Raspberries', '1 tsp. Sugar Confectionary', 'Champagne Rose']
Making: Muddle 5 raspberries with the juice of half a lemon and 1 tsp confection sugar in a martini shaker. Add ice and pour in 1oz Bombay Sapphire. Shake vigorously. Double strain into a champagne flute half way up, top off with rose champagne. Garnish with a dark cherry.

Name: Valentine's Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', 'Soda']
Making: Serve in a collins glass and garnish with lime and a cherry. Top with Soda.

Name: Valentini Martini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka', '1 part(s) Triple Sec', '2 part(s) Strawberry Juice']
Making: Add all ingredients into a martini shaker filled with ice and shake well. Wet rim of a martini glass and line with sugar (pink if available). Strain into the martini glass. Garnish with a fresh strawberry.

Name: Valentino Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Orange Juice', '2 part(s) Strega', '2 part(s) Sparkling Wine']
Making: Serve chilled and garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Valium
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Vampire
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into your favourite glass filled with ice cubes.

Name: Vampire Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Smirnoff Orange Twist Vodka', '3 oz. Orange Juice', 'Sprite']
Making: Combine Smirnoff and orange juice over ice, top off with Sprite, and garnish with a black licorice swizzle stick.

Name: Vampire Voodoo
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Red Wine', 'Lemon Juice (To taste)', 'Lime Juice (To taste)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into your favourite glass filled with ice cubes. Garnish with a dash of red food colouring.

Name: Vampire's Embrace
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Combine over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Vampire's Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Cranberry Juice (To taste)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Vampiro
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Sauza Silver Tequila', '4 oz. Sangrita', '1 Lemon', 'Salt', 'Sour Mix (Lucas Mexican)']
Making: Mix together with ice and cover mouth of glass with a lemon and salt. Pour in some sour mix.

Name: Van Dusen
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Martini and Rossi Extra Dry Vermouth', 'drop(s) Grand Marnier']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: Van Gogh Caramel Latte
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Van Gogh Dutch Caramel Vodka', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Espresso', '1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Build in a tall glass with ice and mix thoroughly. Garnish with a Cholive.

Name: Van Gogh Dutch Caramel Zing
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Van Gogh Dutch Caramel Vodka', '3 oz. Ginger Ale', '1 squirt(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Pour Van Gogh Dutch Caramel and ginger ale into a tall glass filled with ice. Squeeze fresh lime juice and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Van Gogh Holiday Mojito
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Van Gogh Blue Triple Wheat Vodka', '1/4 cup(s) Pink Grapefruit Juice', '1 tbsp. Coriander', '1 tsp. Maple Syrup']
Making: In a shaker combine all ingredients above. Shake vigorously with ice. Strain into martini glass rimmed with maple flakes, drop in 2 coriander leaves, and garnish glass with pink grapefruit rind twist.

Name: Van Gogh Snickertini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Van Gogh Dutch Caramel Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Cream']
Making:
Drizzle a thin line of both caramel and chocolate sauce on the inside of a rocks glass and place in refrigerator to chill. Combine all ingredients into a shaker and shake over ice. Pour entire contents of shaker into glass and add straw.
Snickertini - stemless glass in the forefront of the photo.

Name: Van Vleet
Ingredients: ['3 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Maple Syrup', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Vancouver Island Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Light Rum', '4 oz. Coca Cola', '1 1/2 oz. Starbucks Coffee Liqueur']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass and float the Starbuck's Coffee Liqueur.

Name: Vanderbilt Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 tsp. Simple Syrup', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Vanil Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix or blend over ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Vanilia Coke
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Vanilia Vodka', 'Coca Cola', '1 dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making:
VANILIA (Chilled lounge)
The natural properties of vanilla help create a calming and soothing sensation, making it the ultimate flavor pick for a relaxing afterwork encounter. To keep it simple, try the “VANILIA COLA”. Created at Kelly’s Mission Rock, San Francisco.
Pour vodka over ice in a collins glass. Fill glass with your choice of cola.
ABSOLUT Vodka celebrates the 2005 summer by “creating” seven distinct moods for summer socializing based on the affects of its flavor ingredients. From free spirited to passionate and intense, this summer ABSOLUT tempts consumers with a variety of cocktails and flavors to help get them in the mood for fun during the time of year they are most socially active.
According to industry experts in the field of flavor and sensory science, flavors and fragrances affect daily experiences and can trigger certain moods and reactions. Each member of the ABSOLUT family, APEACH, RASPBERRI, VANILIA, MANDRIN, KURANT, CITRON and PEPPAR contain natural ingredients that evoke individual feelings and sensations that contribute to seven stimulating moods for summer socializing.
“Our flavors are as diverse and dynamic as the people who drink them,” said Tim Murphy, brand director of the ABSOLUT portfolio, The Absolut Spirits Company, Inc. “Each flavor has an individual taste and feeling that encourages nightlife patrons to experiment with new drinks and find the flavors that suit them, their moods and the various occasions that they socialize around,” he continues.
This summer, ABSOLUT has partnered with hot venues across the country to feature seven innovative cocktails inspired by each of the seven ABSOLUT flavors. The distinct taste of these flavors inspires the creation of smart, exciting and diverse cocktails while reflecting the seven hottest moods for summer socializing.

Name: Vanilla Bean
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Combine in a cocktail glass. It tastes just like cream soda.

Name: Vanilla Bucket
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', "1 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's French Kiss Vanilla Schnapps", '1 oz. DeKuyper Tropical Pineapple Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a tall glass over ice. Top with orange juice and a dash of grenadine.

Name: Vanilla Coke
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Combine over ice in a collins glass or blend with ice until smooth.

Name: Vanilla Coke Twist
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Smirnoff Vanilla Twist', '20 oz. Vanilla Cola']
Making: Mix in blender with ice. Pour in highball glass.

Name: Vanilla Dream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '10 oz. Milk', '2 tbsp. Sugar']
Making: Combine and mix well. Very smooth.

Name: Vanilla F* and Kup
Ingredients: ['20 oz. Vanilla Cola', '3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Mix well in a cocktail glass with ice.

Name: Vanilla Fudge
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 tsp. Vanilla']
Making: Shake with ice and serve in an old fashioned glass on the rocks.

Name: Vanilla HPNOTIQ
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Vanilla Ice Cream Flip
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 Egg']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Name: Vanilla Jesus
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '10 drop(s) Vanilla Extract']
Making: Pour into a blender with 2 cups of ice and vanilla extract. Blend on high and pour into a 12 oz. glass. Yeah, the road is paved with gold for you who seek the vanilla Jesus!!

Name: Vanilla Mocha Paradise
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1 1/2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '3 oz. Milk', '1 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup or to taste']
Making: Mix ingredients together in a blender and pour into a tall glass to serve.

Name: Vanilla Sex
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Amaretto di Soronno']
Making: Pour over ice in a highball glass. Shake and top with a cherry.

Name: Vanilla Summer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. Strawberry Schnapps', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour vanilla vodka and strawberry schnapps into a cocktail glass over ice and fill with the Sprite. Adjust to taste.

Name: Vanilla Twist
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka (Or any other vanilla-flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a vanilla bean).

Name: Vanillaka Sizzler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Vanilla Cola']
Making: Pour in a tall glass and fill with Vanilla Coke. Mix and serve.

Name: Vanya's Strawberry Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '6 Cranberries (Large)', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Shake or blend all ingredients over ice, except soda. When the mixture is smooth, pour into a chilled collins glass and fill with cold lemon-lime soda. Add ice cubes if necessary and garnish with a large strawberry.

Name: VCR
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Vanilla Cola', '1 oz. Rum']
Making: Made like a regular rum and coke but with vanilla coke. Very smooth.

Name: VeeV Brazilian Thyme
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '2 slice(s) Orange', '2 wedge(s) Lemon', '2 sprig(s) Thyme']
Making: Muddle 2 orange slices, 2 lemon wedges, and 2 fresh sprigs of thyme in a mixing glass. Add VeeV and ice in a cocktail shaker and shake. Pour into a glass and garnish with a fresh sprig of thyme.

Name: VeeV Eco Lemonade
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '4 wedge(s) Lemon', '4 sprig(s) Mint', 'Club Soda']
Making: Muddle 4 lemon wedges and 4 mint sprigs in a mixing glass. Add VeeV and ice in a cocktail shaker and shake. Pour into a glass, top with club soda and garnish with fresh mint.

Name: VeeV it Up
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: In a highball glass filled with ice, add VeeV and top with club soda. Squeeze 1 lime wedge into the cocktail and garnish with a fresh lime wedge.

Name: VeeV Rainforest on the Rocks
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '4 chunk(s) Watermelon', '6 sprig(s) Mint', '1 wedge(s) Lime', 'Partida Agave Nectar']
Making: Muddle the 4 fresh watermelon chunks, 6 mint sprigs and a lime wedge in a mixing glass. Add VeeV, a barspoon of agave nectar and ice in a cocktail shaker and shake. Pour into a Collins glass and fill with soda.

Name: VeeV Spa Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '3 slice(s) Cucumber', 'Club Soda']
Making: Muddle three slices of cucumber in a mixing glass. Add VeeV and ice in a cocktail shaker and shake. Pour into a glass and top with club soda.

Name: VeeV-ini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', 'Champagne']
Making: In a champagne glass, drop in a chilled shot of VeeV with champagne of choice and garnish with blueberries and raspberries.

Name: VeeV-ito
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '3 Mint Leaves', 'Club Soda']
Making: Muddle two lime wedges and 3 fresh mint sprigs in a mixing glass. Add VeeV and ice and shake ingredients well. Pour into a glass and top with club soda and garnish with a fresh sprig of mint.

Name: Velha Abelha
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sagatiba Velha', '1 tbsp. Honey', 'Champagne']
Making: Shake with honey and pour into a champagne flute. Garnish with a cube of fresh honeycomb.

Name: Velha Daiquiri Natural
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sagatiba Velha', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Gomme Syrup']
Making: Shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lime zest sprayed over the glass.

Name: Velha Espresso
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sagatiba Velha', '3/4 oz. Kahlua Especial Coffee Liqueur', '1 Espresso single or double shot', '1 dash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake vigarously to produce foam and pour into a cocktail glass. Garnish with 3 coffee beans, floating on the foam.

Name: Velha Five Boroughs Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sagatiba Velha', '1 oz. Martini and Rossi Rosso', '3 drop(s) Angostura Bitters', '2 tbsp. Cherry Syrup']
Making: Stir and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Velociraptor
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '4 tbsp. Chicken Broth', '3 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Shake and pour over ice into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of carrot.

Name: Velvet Crocodile
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Velvet Goldmine
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Midori', '1/2 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink', 'Cointreau (Reverse Measure)']
Making: Combine in a pint glass. Garnish with a slice of orange. David, since you did not give us your address and you've submitted this drink twice, I will try to get in touch with you via the database. I did not post your drink before because we could not figure what you meant by a "Reverse Measure Cointreau" ? Please let us know. Thanks, the Webmixer.

Name: Velvet Hammer
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Dry Champagne', '1/2 pint(s) Guinness']
Making: Fill a non-chilled glass half way with dry champagne(any variety). Pour guinessnext to fill the glass. Use a bent spoon to pour over to keep the drink from foaming up too fast. Best served for breakfast or funerals.

Name: Velvet Hammer #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 tbsp. Creme de Cacao', '1 tbsp. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Velvet Hammer #2
Ingredients: ['1 tbsp. Creme de Cacao', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '2 tbsp. Cream', '1/2 Banana', 'Sugar (To taste)']
Making: Put all ingredients in blender with ice. Puree until smooth.

Name: Velvet Hammer #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Velvet Kiss
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Gordon's Dry Gin", '1/2 oz. Bols Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Heavy Cream', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Velvet Peach Hammer
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Pour into an old-fashioned glass and stir. Float Sour Mix and garnish with a slice of fresh peach.

Name: Venusian Flame Water
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Grenadine', 'Wine (Pineapple Flavored)']
Making: Pour into a wine glass and stir.

Name: Verboten
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Forbidden Fruit Liqueur', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Verde Blue
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi O', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Kool-Aid (Berry Blue)', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a cocktail glass. Drink Up Verde Villains!

Name: Vermouth Cassis
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Creme de Cassis', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Stir vermouth and creme de cassis in a highball glass with ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water, stir again, and serve.

Name: Vermouth Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Very Berry
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Luksusowa Potato Vodka', '8 oz. Aronia Juice']
Making: Mix together in a tall glass and add a lemon twist.

Name: Very Berry Colada
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '3/4 oz. Wildberry Schnapps', '2 oz. Coconut Cream', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Blend with 12 oz. of crushed ice until smooth. Serve in specialty or wine glass and garnish with 3 berries on a toothpick or a strawberry.

Name: Very Berry Partida
Ingredients: ['5 Blueberries', '3 Blackberry (ies)', '1/2 oz. Partida Agave Nectar', '1 1/2 oz. Partida Blanco Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Cherry Juice', '1 splash(es) Sparkling Water Strawberry Flavored']
Making: Muddle berries in highball glass. Add agave, tequila and cherry juice, top with ice. Shake well. Top with strawberry soda. – Marita Leonard, Ortinaque on the Mile, Miami

Name: Very Dirty Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 tbsp. Olive Juice', '2 Olive(s)', '1 Banana Pepper (pickled, save the juice)', '1 tbsp. Banana Pepper (juice)']
Making: Put cocktail glasses in freezer. Fill a shaker with ice and add vodka, olive juice, banana pepper juice. Shake 3 or 4 times. Remove glasses from freezer and strain into glasses. Add olives and pepper. ENJOY. I usually stuff the olives with blue cheese and this is tremendous.

Name: Very Long John Silver
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Cruzan Banana Rum', '1/3 oz. Margarita Mix', '1/3 oz. Cola']
Making: In a tall ice-filled glass add all three ingredients. Cover shake slam repeat as needed.

Name: Vespa Jockey
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. London Dry Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Tuaca', '1/4 oz. Campari']
Making: Build over ice in rocks glass and stir. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Vesper
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Gordon's Dry Gin", '1 oz. Vodka', "1/2 oz. Lillet (Preferably Kina's)"]
Making: Shake until ice cold and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a large thin lemon peel. As seen in Ian Fleming's 'Casino Royale', from the character Vesper, who later killed herself.

Name: Vesuvio
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Veteran
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy']
Making: Pour the rum and a cherry brandy into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes. Stir well.

Name: Via Veneto
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Brandy (Italian)', '2 tsp. Sambuca', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Sugar Syrup', '1/2 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Viagra
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink', '2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice and add the alcohol. Top with Red Bull and stir with a straw.

Name: Viagra Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink', "dash(es) Blue Curacao (Prefeably Bols')"]
Making: Mix over ice in a collins glass. Add the dash of curacao last.

Name: Vicious Sid
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: In a shaker half-filled with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into an old-fashioned glass almost filled with ice cubes.

Name: Vick's 44
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Coat bottom of cocktail glass with grenadine. Add peppermint schnapps and apple pucker - then thank God for sick days.

Name: Vicki's Sweet Southern Tea
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Amaretto']
Making: Pour in a tall glass.

Name: Victor
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Victoria Secret
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Ojen', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a pink glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Victory
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Orange Juice', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine', '1 oz. French Vermouth', '1 oz. Italian Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Victory Collins
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Lemon Juice', '3 oz. Grape Juice (Unsweetend)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Garnish with a slice of orange and serve.

Name: Vile Green Stuff #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Soda Water', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Stir highball glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Vim and Vigor
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Rum', 'Cola']
Making: Combine over ice in a tumbler. Note from Doug: My wife's name is Vim. Honest! And it's not short for anything. That's what her weird parents named her.

Name: Vincow Somba
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Mix in a highball glass.

Name: Violent Ed's Circus Swill
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Everclear', 'dash(es) Watermelon Pucker', '1 can(s) Grape Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass and drink really fast.

Name: Violent F**k
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Everclear', '3/4 oz. Jolt Cola']
Making: Mix in a highball glass.

Name: Viper Venom
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix, swirl, shake...whatever. This is basically a Snakebite taken to the next level.

Name: Virgin
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Forbidden Fruit Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Virgin Breaker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Archers Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake the ingredients well and add the grenadine last.

Name: Virgin Islands Rum Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum', 'dash(es) Bitters', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice.

Name: Virgin Next-door
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cruzan Vanilla Rum', '1 splash(es) Cherry Juice', '1 Maraschino Cherries']
Making: Mix rum with a maraschino cherry and juice. Garnishwith whipped cream. Will make you do cart-wheels.

Name: Virgin on Prom Night #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix rum and triple sec in a collins glass, fill with pineapple juice, float 151 on top and stir gently.

Name: Virgin Surgeon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Apricot Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Virgin Toxic Iguana
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Midori', "Lemonade (Yellow and preferably Paul Newman's Virgin Lemonade)"]
Making: Mix alcohol in tall ice filled glass. Fill with lemonade and enjoy. May also be made in larger batches and served in a pitcher for all to enjoy.

Name: Virgin's Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a cherry and an umbrella.

Name: Virgins Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '3 oz. Cream (Fresh)']
Making: Shake vigorously over ice until the cream froths, serve over crushed ice in a 10 oz. highball glass

Name: Virtual Reality
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Gin', '2/3 oz. Calvados', '1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients in a shaker. Pour into glasses over ice. Top with mineral water or champagne. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Vitamin-C Canuck Style
Ingredients: ['Orange Juice', '2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass and fill with orange juice.

Name: Viva La France!
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Rouge)', '3/4 oz. Light Rum', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake and pour over ice while adding cranberry juice to fill glass.

Name: Viva Villa
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Rub rim of old-fashioned glass with lemon juice and dip in salt. Shake with ice, strain into the salt-rimmed glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Vladimir
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Raspberry Syrup', '1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Stir in a highball glass.

Name: VoDew
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Fill a 12 oz. glass with ice. Add vodka and then top with Mountain Dew. Stir vigorously...Enjoy.

Name: Vodka '7'
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Pour vodka and juice of lime into a collins glass over several ice cubes. Garnish with a lime wedge in the glass and fill with lemon-lime soda. Stir well and serve.

Name: Vodka 'n Tonic
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka citron', '8 oz. Tonic Water or Bitter Lemon']
Making: Chill citron vodka well in the freezer. Add vodka over an ice filled highball glass. Fill with tonic water (or Bitter Lemon) and stir. Serve with a slice of lime.

Name: Vodka And Apple Cider
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Apple Cider']
Making: Stir over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Vodka and Apple Juice
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Apple Juice']
Making: Pour vodka into a highball glass over two or three ice cubes. Fill with apple juice, stir, and serve.

Name: Vodka and Tonic
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Pour vodka into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with tonic water, stir, and serve.

Name: Vodka Bat
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake vodka and pinneapple juice with ice and pour into a tall glass(including ice). Pour chilled cranberry juice over liquid and garnish with 2 small black olives.

Name: Vodka Collins
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. Vodka', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with slices of lemon and orange and a cherry.

Name: Vodka Cooler
Ingredients: ['1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. Vodka', 'Club Soda']
Making: Dissolve sugar with 2 oz. of Club Soda in a collins glass. Add vodka and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with a lemon spiral over the rim of the glass.

Name: Vodka Daisy
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a beer stein or mug. Add ice cubes and garnish with seasonal fruit.

Name: Vodka Delight
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Raspberry Juice']
Making: Layer over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: Vodka Dog
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Hoopers Hooch']
Making: Pour over ice in a pint glass.

Name: Vodka Drop Ya
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut 100 Vodka', '3 oz. Gin', '4 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Fruit Punch']
Making: Pour all into measuring glass and shake. Pour contents into a pint glass and add some ice. Fill with fruit punch.

Name: Vodka Five
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Peach Vodka', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice', '7-Up']
Making: Fill a tall glass with ice and add each vodka. Fill the glass with equal parts of Orange Juice, Cranberry Juice and 7-Up. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Vodka Fruit
Ingredients: ['2/3 cup(s) Vodka', '1 Popsicle (Fozen - fruit flavour)', 'Sprite']
Making: Break up the frozen fruit popsicle into a cup and fill with vodka until the popsicle is covered. Fill the remainder of the cup with Sprite.

Name: Vodka Gimlet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Vodka Grasshopper
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '3/4 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Vodka On The Rocks
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Pour vodka into an old-fashioned glass with 2 or 3 cubes of ice. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Vodka Paralyzer
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Coca Cola', 'Milk']
Making: Fill a highball glass with 3/4 of Coca-Cola, add the alcohol and top up with milk. Stir and serve.

Name: Vodka Paulie
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Sprite', '2 tbsp. Sugar', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Simply add the liquids to a glass of ice then add the sugar. Stir well and serve.

Name: Vodka RedBull
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '7 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Pour Vodka in a highball glass over ice and add Red Bull.

Name: Vodka Salty Dog
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/4 tsp. Salt']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes, stir well, and serve.

Name: Vodka Sec
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 part(s) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 part(s) Water']
Making: Mix and serve with ice!

Name: Vodka Seven
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Stir in a highball glass and fill with soda. Garnish with a twist of lime.

Name: Vodka Sling
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Water']
Making: Dissolve powdered sugar in mixture of water and juice of lemon. Add vodka. Pour into an old-fashioned glass over ice cubes and stir. Garnish with a twist of orange peel and serve.

Name: Vodka Smoothy
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '4 oz. Kiwi Strawberry Juice', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mx until smooth in a blender and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: Vodka Sour
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with 1/2 a slice of lemon and a cherry.

Name: Vodka Splash
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Pour one or two ice cubes into a highball glass to chill, then add vodka, orange juice and lime juice. Mix well and serve. The taste of lime can be strong, so add more orange juice for a sweeter taste.

Name: Vodka Stinger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Vodka Strawberry Swirl
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Strawberries', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream (Strawberry)', '1 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix vodka, strawberries and strawberry ice cream in a blender until smooth but still thick. Mix vanilla ice cream and milk together till smooth. Using a large enough glass pour half of strawberry mix in bottom then all of the vanilla mixture. The rest of the strawberry mix goes on top. Stir once to give a swirl effect.

Name: Vodkaristini
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Dry Martini', '1 1/3 oz. Finlandia Vodka', '1 oz. Club Soda (preferably the Norwegian Farris)']
Making: Use a shaker to mix the vodka and vermouth. Then pour it into a highball glass over ice. Add the Club Soda and stir. Vila!

Name: Vodkatini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of lemon peel.

Name: Volcano
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '4 oz. Cherry Juice', 'Tabasco Sauce', 'Pepper (Chilli)']
Making: Pour vodka, tequila and juices into a shaker with ice and shake. Once shaken, strain into a highball glass and slowly add tobasco sauce to taste. Add the chilli pepper and cut a spring onion to use as a straw.

Name: Volcano #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '7-Up']
Making: In a quart jar, pour all liquors over ice. Add juice and grenadine. Fill the rest of the jar with 7-Up.

Name: Volga Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Shake or blend the ingredients over ice, except soda. Pour into a chilled cooler glass. Fill with soda and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Volga Volga
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'drop(s) Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Stir in a lowball glass.

Name: Voluptuous Boob
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 tbsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Mix well with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Vondka Twist
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Canadian Mist', '2 oz. Strawberry Daiquiri Mix']
Making: Blend together and with crused ice in a blender.

Name: Voodoo
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Vodka', '1 cup(s) Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix in highball glass over ice.

Name: Voodoo d'Anjou
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Pears Vodka', '3/4 oz. Absolut Vanilia Vodka', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making:
Try the winning recipe of the Official Sundance Cocktail Contest, which was served throughout the Festival at all participating Park City, Utah bars.
Shake vodka and lime juice with ice; strain. Pour into a highball glass over ice. Fill to top with lemon lime soda. Garnish with a lemon and lime wedge or a pear slice.
Submitted by: Layne Edwards
The Sidecar
333 Main Street
Park City, Utah

Name: Voodoo Hurricane
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Admiral Nelson's Spiced Rum", "1 oz. Admiral Nelson's Vanilla Rum", '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '3 oz. Orange Juice With Pulp', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice Unsweetened', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Combine all ingredients, mix well (shake or stir). Pour over crushed ice in Hurricane glass. Garnish with fruit wedge if desired and serve with a straw.

Name: Vorhees Special
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/3 oz. Sambuca', 'dash(es) Banana Liqueur', '2 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce (You can add up to 5 drops)', 'Orange Juice (Enough to top up a cocktail glass)']
Making: Add in order in a shaker. The amount of Tabasco all depends on you and how much you like the person that you are serving. Shake well and pour into a cocktail glass. Gary's comment: This drink is pretty evil, but if you like Tabasco sauce then there's no problem.

Name: Vouraste
Ingredients: ['Wine', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Combine in a wine glass. Garcia says: This drink is frequently used by my group of friends on full bottles. The name was invented by us and means nothing! We usually use "vinho de cheiro" which is the cheapest red wine there is and is Portuguese, and we use "Laranjada" which is Orange Soda! It will be impossible for most of you to find these ingredients, but you can use any cheap wine or orange soda to make it! It isn't strong, but it's so easy to drink, that you will get drunk without even knowing it!

Name: Voyager
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '8 oz. Apple Cider (Hot)']
Making: Pour the cider into a mug. Stir in the rum and the banana liqueur.

Name: Vuck Me Up
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Mountain Dew', '3 oz. Cranberry-Strawberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Vulcan Mind F**k
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: Waffle Dripper
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Fill with orange juice.

Name: Wah-Wah
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Cranberry Juice (To taste)']
Making: Fill a chilled collins or highball glass with the first two ingredients and top off with the desired amount of juice.

Name: Wahoo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Over ice add 151 and Amaretto. Fill with pineapple juice.

Name: Waikiki Beachcomber
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1 tbsp. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Waikiki Tease
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice in a glass. Stir.

Name: Wake Up As Madonna
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Mango Juice']
Making: Cover rim with lipstick by smudging grenadine or a crushed cherry. Shake and strain mango juice and Bacardi 151 seperately and pour into the glass. Float blue curaco on top.

Name: Wake Up Shake
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tuaca', '2 oz. Espresso', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1/2 cup(s) Milk']
Making: Blend and serve in a mug. Great for a hangover on a hot day.

Name: Walk Me Down
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Fill 12 oz. glass with ice. Shake all ingredients and pour over ice. If you like Long Island Ice tea you will love this!!

Name: Walk Me Home Sweet Jesus
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a cocktail glass and top off glass with pineapple juice.

Name: Walking With Jesus
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Raspberry Schnapps', '1 oz. DeKuyper Mad Melon Watermelon Schnapps', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice in a tall glass. Top with Sprite.

Name: Wall Crusher
Ingredients: ['1/4 part(s) Vodka', '1/4 part(s) Orange Juice', '1/4 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1/4 part(s) Gatorade (Glacier Frost)']
Making: Build over ice in a tall glass. A nice refreshing summer drink.

Name: Wallick Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Triple Sec']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Wallis Blue
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Gin', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Stir in a sugar rimmed old-fashioned glass.

Name: Wally Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Lime Juice', '1/3 oz. Peach Brandy', '1/3 oz. Applejack']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Walters
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Ward Eight
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Grenadine', '2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky']
Making: Shake and strain into a red wine glass filled with cracked ice. Add slices of orange and lemon and a cherry.

Name: Warden Dick
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Strawberry Mix', '2 oz. Cherry 7-Up']
Making: Add vodka and Cherry7-UP to a cocktail glass with ice. Then mix in strawberry mix.

Name: Warm Fuzzy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Warm Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum 3 o', '3 oz. Mello-Yellow']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Warsaw Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Washington Apple
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Serve chilled or on the rocks in a lowball glass.

Name: Washington Apple #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Schnapps', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain on the rocks in a highball glass.

Name: Washington Apple #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Serve chilled or on the rocks in a lowball glass.

Name: Washington Apple Drink
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Apple Pucker', 'splash(es) Orange Juice optional', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a glass with ice. Add apple pucker to the glass then fill the rest with cranberry juice. Top up with a splash of orange juice if you wish and mix.

Name: Washington Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Sugar Syrup', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Washington Watermelon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Midori', '3 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '3 1/2 oz. 7-Up (Or Sprite)']
Making: Shake and strain over ice in a hurricane glass.

Name: Wasp
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass and fill with Ginger Ale.

Name: Watchtower Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1 1/2 oz. Tuaca', '3/4 oz. Berentzen Apfel Korn', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 dash(es) Fee Brothers Whiskey Barrel-Aged Aromatic Bitters', '1 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a whole vanilla bean. (if you or your guests find it a tad too sweet, omit the simple syrup. )

Name: Water Moccasin
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Sweet and Sour Mix', '7-Up', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour in a shaker with equal parts 7-Up and sweet and sour mix. Splash grenadine and pour over ice.

Name: Water of Life
Ingredients: ['4 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka']
Making: Fill a shaker 2/3 with ice, then add Absolut and curacao. Shake until well chilled and serve in a cocktail glass. Optionally, you could layer a splash of Absolut Red on top and flame if the glass will handle it (ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE).

Name: Watermelon #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a collins glass over ice cubes, and serve.

Name: Watermelon #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Midori', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Watermelon Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. 4 Copas Anejo', '1 scoop(s) Ice Cream Organic Watermelon', '1/2 oz. 4 Copas Organic Agave Nectar']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and pour into a glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Watermelon Crawl #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Midori', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a 16 oz. pint glass with ice and pour in liqueurs. Add equal amounts of each juice. Garnish with cherries.

Name: Watermelon Crawl #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Watermelon Pucker', 'Sprite', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice and stir in the ingredients.

Name: Watermelon Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 part(s) 10 Cane Rum', '3 chunk(s) Watermelon', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Muddle the watermelon, add the other ingredients, shake and strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a watermelon slice (preferably with seeds!)

Name: Watermelon Jolly Rancher
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'Club Soda']
Making: Fill a highball glass 1/2 full with ice. Pour the pucker and the vodka. Add the club soda, then the grenadine and stir.

Name: Watermelon Kicker
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '6 oz. Crystal Light (Watermelon)']
Making: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice.

Name: Watermelon Slammer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Shake with ice (except soda) and strain into a collins glass. Top with soda. Yum! These are so good that you should just make them in double quantities to save you all that shaking.

Name: Watermelonrita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. DeKuyper Mad Melon Watermelon Schnapps', '1 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Pour all ingredients into a salted margarita glass.

Name: WAVElength Wonder
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Vodka', 'Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Add ingredients to a high ball glass. Add more Red Bull to taste if required.

Name: Wayne Kreuscher Brazilian Drink
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Coconut Milk', '2 tsp. Condensed Milk']
Making: Blend with 1 cup of crushed ice until smooth and pour into a chilled double old-fashioned glass.

Name: WB (WifeBeater)
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Malt Liquor', '3 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Everclear', '4 oz. Cola']
Making: Mix together and swig. Can cause violent behavior.

Name: Wealthy Bastard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dark Rum', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 oz. Curacao', '1 oz. Ginger Ale', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Pour all the ingredients with ice into a cocktail glass.

Name: Webster Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 tsp. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Wedding Belle Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '3/4 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 tsp. Cherry Brandy', '1 1/2 tsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Weed Killer
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Beer', '1 oz. Jeremiah Weed Southern Style Sweet Tea', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a beer mug over ice and fill with equal parts of pineapple juice and cranberry juice.

Name: Weep No More Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '3/4 oz. Brandy', '1/4 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Welburn's Travels
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Gold', '1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Dry Gin', '2 tbsp. Grenadine', '1 tbsp. Dry Vermouth', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', 'Sprite']
Making: Combine all alcoholic ingredients and lime juice with cracked ice in a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously. Strain over ice into a Collins glass and top with Sprite. Enjoy!

Name: Welches Grape Soda
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass.

Name: Well Heeled
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '5 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice in a glass. Stir.

Name: Wembly Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 tsp. Apple Brandy']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Werewolf
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: West Coast Paralyzer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Milk', 'Root Beer']
Making: Build with ice in a collins glass.

Name: Western Rose
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1/4 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Western-Kansas Red Beer
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Tomato Juice', '1 bottle(s) Beer (Your favourite)']
Making: Mix in a beer glass.

Name: Wet and Wild Juicy Berry
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. 99 Blackberries Schnapps', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Combine all ingredients and shake. Pour into a rock glass.

Name: Wet Dream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Apple Juice', '5 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix on the rocks.

Name: Wet Dream #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Wet Dream #5
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Wet Dream #6
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Cuarenta Y Tres', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', 'Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tumbler.

Name: Wet Dream #7
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Cuarenta Y Tres', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', 'Sprite', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a tumbler.

Name: Wet Ga.kiss
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Peach Pucker', '1/3 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/3 oz. Cherry Pucker', 'dash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix in a shot glass or serve over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Wet Kiss
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Melon Deoria (Or any other watermelon schnapps)', 'dash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', 'dash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass or over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Wet Kitty
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '6 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and serve.

Name: Wet Pussy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', 'Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Wet Spot
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Serve in a rocks glass over ice.

Name: Wet T-Shirt
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Sprite']
Making: Combine with ice in a highball glass.

Name: Whacked Russian
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '1 part(s) Starbucks Coffee Liqueur', '1 oz. Starbucks Coffee Liqueur', '1 squirt(s) Expresso']
Making:
Madonn'! After six wildly successful seasons, The Sopranos® closed the books on June 10th. Authentic Jersey bartender, John Martella, from Hoboken's Gaslight has whipped up some liquid libations to toast Tony, Carmela and the family as this iconic chapter in American pop culture comes to a close. Raise a glass and toast to the first family of New Jersey. Salut to this thing of ours!
A borgata twist on an old classic. You'll wonder where this drink went.
Shake the vodka, Starbucks Coffee Liqueur and espresso. Pour over a tall glass with ice and top with the Starbucks Cream Liqueur. Serve.

Name: Whacky Jacky
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Ginger Ale', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a peach slice and cherry.

Name: What The F**k
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Fill a tall glass with ice. Add liquers and sweet and sour. Splash the Sprite and stir.

Name: What The Hell
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Stir with ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass and serve.

Name: Whip Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 tsp. Triple Sec', '1/4 tsp. Anis']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Whischocsky #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Crown Royal', '7 oz. Chocolate Milk']
Making: Mix ingredients over ice, stir and enjoy.

Name: Whischocsky #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Kahlua', '7 oz. Chocolate Milk']
Making: Mix ingredients over ice, stir and enjoy.

Name: Whiskey Cobbler
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. Club Soda', '2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky']
Making: Pour sugar and Club Soda into a red wine glass and wait until the sugar dissolves. Fill with shaved ice and add blended Scotch whisky. Stir and garnish with seasonal fruit.

Name: Whiskey Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 tsp. Sugar Syrup', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Whiskey Collins
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Shake blended Scotch whisky, lemon juice and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a collins glass. Add several ice cubes, fill with carbonated water, and stir. Garnish with slices of orange and lemon and a cherry. Serve with a straw.

Name: Whiskey Daisy
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '4 dash(es) Grenadine', '1 1/2 oz. Whiskey', '1 splash(es) Seltzer Water']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and garnish with fruit.

Name: Whiskey Dew
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 can(s) Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour bourbon whiskey over ice into a highball glass. Stir in Mountain Dew.

Name: Whiskey Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg', '5 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Name: Whiskey Fix
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake lemon juice and powdered sugar with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Add blended Scotch whisky and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon and serve with a straw.

Name: Whiskey Flip
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '2 tsp. Light Cream', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Egg']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a sour glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Name: Whiskey Highball
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Pour blended Scotch whisky into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Whiskey Milk Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '8 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except nutmeg) with ice and strain into a collins glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Name: Whiskey Orange
Ingredients: ['1/2 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1/2 tsp. Anisette', '1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Garnish with slices of orange and lemon.

Name: Whiskey Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 splash(es) Seltzer Water']
Making: Pour into an old-fashioned glass and garnish with goblet of fruit.

Name: Whiskey Rickey
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Carbonated Water']
Making: Pour blended Scotch whisky and lime juice into a highball glass over ice cubes. Fill with carbonated water and stir. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Whiskey Sangaree
Ingredients: ['1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Water', '2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 splash(es) Club Soda', '1 tbsp. Port']
Making: Pour sugar and water into an old-fashioned glass and wait for the sugar to dissolve. Add Blended Scotch Whisky, ice cubes, and Club Soda and stir. Float port and sprinkle lightly with nutmeg.

Name: Whiskey Sling
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tsp. Water', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky']
Making: Pour the sugar, water and lemon juice into an old-fashioned glass. Add ice and wait for sugar to dissolve. Pour in blended Scotch whisky and stir. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel.

Name: Whiskey Smash
