Ingredients: ['1 Sugar Cube', '1 oz. Club Soda', '2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky']
Making: Put sugar and Club Soda into an old-fashioned glass and wait for sugar to dissolve. Add blended Scotch whisky and stir. Garnish with a slice of orange and a cherry.

Name: Whiskey Sour
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky']
Making: Shake and strain into a sour glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a cherry.

Name: Whiskey Sour On The Sweet Side
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'drop(s) Sugar Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into sour glass. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of orange.

Name: Whiskey Squirt
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 tbsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 tbsp. Grenadine', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Fill with Club Soda and ice cubes. Garnish with pineapple chunks and strawberries.

Name: Whiskey Swizzle
Ingredients: ['1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 oz. Club Soda', '2 dash(es) Bitters', '2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky']
Making: Pour lime juice, sugar and Club Soda into collins glass. Fill glass with ice and stir. Add Bitters and blended Scotch whisky. Fill with Club Soda.

Name: Whiskey the Pooh
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 tsp. Honey']
Making: Mix and serve.

Name: Whiskey Wise
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lord Calvert Canadian Whiskey', '3 oz. Coca Cola (diet)']
Making: Mix and serve.

Name: Whisky Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Orange Curacao', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Whisky Kiss
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Pendleton Whisky', '1 part(s) B and B Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Yellow Chartreuse', '2 dash(es) Bitters Fee Bros. Whiskey Bitters', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making:
Strain up into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a whisky soaked cherry.
Created by Matthew Palumbo, Steehead Diner in Seattle, WA

Name: Whisky Mac
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Green Ginger Wine']
Making: Pour both of the ingredients into a wine goblet with no ice.

Name: Whisper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. French Vermouth', '1 oz. Italian Vermouth']
Making: Pour over rocks into a highball glass and stir.

Name: Whispers Of The Frost Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '3/4 oz. Cream Sherry', '3/4 oz. Port', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with slices of lemon and orange.

Name: Whist Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Applejack', '3/4 oz. Italian Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a cocktail glass.

Name: White Buffalo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Hazelnut Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 dash(es) Cinnamon', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Stir with ice in a chocolate rimmed tall glass.

Name: White Cactus
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila (Premium)', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', 'Ginger Ale (To taste)']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass and top with a slice of lime. There, you have a very refreshing and tasty drink. Enjoy!!!

Name: White Chocolate Covered Almond
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Add ingredients to mixing glass. Shake and strain over ice.

Name: White Chocolate Stinger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. White Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake vigorously with ice, strain into a cocktail glass and serve with chocolate curl....very potent!

Name: White Dog
Ingredients: ['4 bottle(s) Yogurt (Korean Yogurt)', '2 can(s) Sprite', 'Soju']
Making: Put the yogurt in a liter plastic coke bottle and add the Sprite. Fill the rest up with Soju and shake. Enjoy!

Name: White Elephant
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', 'Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: White Guinea
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Romana Sambuca', 'Milk']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and serve in a cocktail glass.

Name: White Heart
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: White Heather
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Pastis (Optional)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: White Hot Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Chocolate Liqueur', '8 oz. Hot Chocolate']
Making: Combine in an Irish coffee glass. Top with whipped cream and shaved white chocolate.

Name: White House Russian
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Vox Vodka', '1 part(s) Starbucks Coffee Liqueur', '1 part(s) Starbucks Cream Liqueur', '1 part(s) Espresso']
Making:
Shake the vodka, Starbucks Coffee Liqueur and espresso. Pour over a tall glass with ice and top with the Starbucks Cream Liqueur. Serve.
Bartender: John Martello, Gaslight, Hoboken, NJ

Name: White Jew Boy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka']
Making: Garnish with a maraschino cherry and serve on the rocks.

Name: White Knight
Ingredients: ["2 part(s) Broker's London Dry Gin", '1 part(s) Galliano', '1 part(s) Cointreau', '1 part(s) Banana Juice', '3 part(s) Passion Fruit Juice', '1 part(s) Double Cream', '1 dash(es) Maple Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a tall glass.

Name: White Lady #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 Egg White', '1 oz. Light Cream', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: In a shaker half-filler with ice cubes, combine all of the ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: White Lady #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: White Lady #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 Egg White']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: White Lady #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: White Lily Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. White Rum', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 tsp. Anisette']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: White Lion Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: White Mexican
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', 'dash(es) Peppermint Schnapps', 'Half and Half Cream']
Making: Serve over ice in a highball glass and top with half and half.

Name: White Mountain
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sake', '2 oz. Pina Colada Mix', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Serve frappe style (over shaved ice) in an exotic glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: White Orchid
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Benedictine', 'Light Cream']
Making: Pour the Benedictine over ice in an old fashioned glass. Fill with light cream and serve.

Name: White Peach Paloma
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila (Gold)', '3/4 oz. Hiram Walker White Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice (Ruby Red)']
Making: Combine ingredients in shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into glass with ice and salt rim. Garnish with lime corkscrew and a frozen peach slice and serve.

Name: White Plush
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 cup(s) Milk', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a collins glass.

Name: White Prussian
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Vanilla Cola']
Making: Drop Kahlua into a chilled beer mug. Then the vodka. Fill with vanilla soda. Stir. Top with Ice as desired.

Name: White Rose
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Gin', '4 dash(es) Maraschino Liqueur', '4 dash(es) Orange Juice', '4 dash(es) Lemon Juice', '1 Egg White']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a wine glass.

Name: White Russian
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', '8 oz. Whole Milk']
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice in a highball glass and enjoy!

Name: White Russian #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', 'Light Cream']
Making: Pour vodka and coffee liqueur over ice cubes in an old-fashioned cocktail glass. Fill with light cream and serve. One of our users comments: the White Russian tastes slightly better with equal measures of Kahlua and vodka, and a tiny dash of Malibu.

Name: White Russian #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Kahlua', 'Coca Cola', 'Milk']
Making: Put a small amount of ice in a tall glass and add the vodka and the Kahlua. Then fill with equal amounts of Coca-Cola and Milk. (A dash of Malibu is sometimes nice.)

Name: White Sangria
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) White Wine Pinot Gris', '1 cup(s) Grapes', '2 Peaches pitted and cut into wedges', '1/2 cup(s) Grand Marnier', '1 Orange thinly sliced, not peeled', '1 Lime thinly sliced, not peeled']
Making: Combine all ingredients and refrigerate for 2-4 hours.

Name: White Satin
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Galliano', '1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Double Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: White Snake
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Light Beer', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix over ice and drink fast!

Name: White Threesome
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '6 oz. Milk (Homogenised)']
Making: Mix over ice a highball glass and alter proportions of alcohol according to taste.

Name: White Trailer Trash
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Serve over ice in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: White Virgin
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', 'Cherry Juice (To taste)', 'Ginger Ale (To taste)']
Making: Combine over ice into a highball glass and stir. Garnish with three cherries.

Name: White Way Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Whitefish
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Finlandia Cranberry Vodka', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix the spirits in a cocktail glass and top with Mountain Dew. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Whizz Bang
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Pastis', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '2 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Who's Ya Daddy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Mix together with ice in a cocktail glass. Drink slowly and enjoy!

Name: Who's Your Daddy
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Hiram Walker Gingerbread Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: WHOA
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 1800 Anejo Tequila', '1 oz. Alize Red Passion', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass. Add a slice of lime for garnish.

Name: Whoodyni
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pisang Ambon', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '2/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)', '1 2/3 oz. Club Soda', 'Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice, without the club soda. Rim the edge of a highball glass with grenadine and sugar, strain the mix into the glass and pour the club soda. Garnish with slice of lemon on the rim of the glass.

Name: Whoop Ass
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Everclear', '4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '4 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '4 oz. Absolut Peppar Vodka']
Making: Mix and drink in a pint glass. Hold on for dear life - this will kick your butt!!!

Name: Whopper
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Build over ice in a collins glass.

Name: Whore
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Whore's Paradise
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch (Strawberry flavoured)']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Why Not?
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Wicked Anti-freeze
Ingredients: ['1/4 cup(s) Grain Alcohol (PGA)', '2 cup(s) Gatorade (Lime)', '1 tbsp. Sugar']
Making: Combine in a pint glass, mix well and let sit for about 5 minutes before serving.

Name: Wicked Llama
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Canadian Whisky 8', '8 oz. Pepsi Cola']
Making: Pour Canadian whisky over ice in a tall glass. Add Pepsi Cola and stir. If desired, top with a cherry.

Name: Widget
Ingredients: ['1 1/8 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3/8 oz. Gin']
Making: Combine in a lowball glass.

Name: Widow Maker
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jagermeister', '1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Coffee Liqueur', '2 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Combine and shake all ingredients over ice. Strain into cocktail glass.

Name: Widow Woods' Nightcap
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '4 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Widow's Dream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Benedictine', '2 tbsp. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a delmonico glass.

Name: Widow's Kiss
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Benedictine', '1/2 oz. Yellow Chartreuse', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1 oz. Applejack']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Wife Beater
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Mix all ingredients. Serve in a tall glass over ice.

Name: Wiggle Wiggle
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Cream', '5 Strawberries']
Making: Blend with 3/4 scoop of ice and serve in a brandy snifter. Garnish with an open strawberry and a light sprinkle of chocolate

Name: Wiki Waki Woo
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients with ice and pour into a hurricane or parfait glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Wild Apple
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Zubrowka Vodka', 'Apple Juice']
Making: Stir over ice into a collins glass.

Name: Wild Banshee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1 1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1/2 Banana']
Making: Blend all ingredients in a blender with a scoop of crushed ice.

Name: Wild Berry Smash
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 4 Copas Blanco', '2 wedge(s) Lime', '2 tbsp. Berries Strawberries, raspberries and blackberries', '1 oz. 4 Copas Organic Agave Nectar']
Making: in a mixing glass, muddle nectar and fruit, add ice, tequila, shake and pour all into a glass.

Name: Wild Brew Yonder
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 tsp. Blue Curacao', 'Beer']
Making: Add alcohol to pilsner glass and fill with beer. beer will perform the stirring.

Name: Wild Cherry Aperitif
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Alchemy Wild Cherry Infused Vodka', '1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Pour into a snifter with ice. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

Name: Wild Cherry Mimosa
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Alchemy Wild Cherry Infused Vodka', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass, top with champagne and garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Wild Cherry Soda
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Alchemy Wild Cherry Infused Vodka', '1 splash(es) Soda Water']
Making: Pour in a snifter glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Wild Child
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Wildberry Schnapps', 'Tang Drink Mix (Orange-pineapple)']
Making: Stir over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Wild Cranberry Marmalade
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Alchemy Wild Cherry Infused Vodka', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a snifter with ice. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

Name: Wild Hibiscus Adam and Eve Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Apple Sauce', '1 oz. Wild Hibiscus Syrup', 'Wild Hibiscus Flower', 'Maraschino Cherries', 'Mint']
Making:
The Forbidden Fruit…The Wild Flower.
Stuff Wild Hibiscus Flower with the cherry and skewer from side to side with the chopstick. Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass and lay chopstick garnish across the glass. Insert sprig of mint into Wild Hibiscus Flower and cherry garnish.

Name: Wild Hibiscus Cu-Cu for You
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '1/2 oz. Giffard Lichi-Li', '1/4 oz. Wild Hibiscus Syrup', '2 wedge(s) Lime', '4 wedge(s) Cucumber (1 inch long)', '1 splash(es) Soda Water', '1 Wild Hibiscus Flower']
Making:
Muddle lime wedges, hibiscus syrup and lychee liqueur together. Add gin and cucumber wedges and shake with ice for 10 seconds. Strain over ice into a highball glass and top with soda water. Garnish with a hibiscus flower and a cucumber spear.
Created by: Danielle Tatarin

Name: Wild Hibiscus Fashionista
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Giffard Rose Syrup', '1 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters', '3 oz. Sparkling Wine', '1 Wild Hibiscus Flower (Seperated into petals.)']
Making:
Shake vodka, triple sec, rose syrup and Peychauds Bitters with ice and strain into a champagne flute. Add Lemon zests and top with sparkling wine. Lastly, drop in Hibiscus Petals.
Created by: Danielle Tatarin

Name: Wild Hibiscus Mandarin Bloom
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/4 oz. Wild Hibiscus Syrup', '4 piece(s) Mandarin Oranges', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '4 oz. Champagne', '1 Wild Hibiscus Flower']
Making:
Muddle the orange, Cointreau and Hibiscus Syrup together. Squeeze lime juice and add bitters. Shake everything with ice and double strain into a champagne flute with a hibiscus flower on the bottom. Top with champagne.
Created by: Danielle Tatarin

Name: Wild Hibiscus Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Wild Hibiscus Syrup', '1/2 oz. Egg White', '1 Wild Hibiscus Flower']
Making:
Shake vigorously for 30 seconds then strain over cracked ice into a highball glass with a salted rim. Garnish with a skewered hibiscus flower.
Created by: Danielle Tatarin

Name: Wild Hibiscus Motherly Love Mimosa Punch
Ingredients: ['5 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '5 oz. Pink Grapefruit Juice', '2 1/2 oz. Wild Hibiscus Syrup', '1 bottle(s) Champagne (Brut)', 'Wild Hibiscus Flower']
Making: Mix ingredients in punch bowl with large block of ice. Garnish each flute with Wild Hibiscus Flower and long grapefruit zest (for best results twist the grapefruit zest and roll in plastic wrap; store in the freezer before service to keep the twist shape. For a sweeter drink adjust the Wild Hibiscus Syrup to taste and try using a Rose Sparkling Wine or Champagne.

Name: Wild Hibiscus Rooibos Evolution
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Giffard Creme de Pamplemousse Rose / Pink Grapefruit', '1 oz. Tea (Rooibos)', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Wild Hibiscus Syrup', '1 Wild Hibiscus Flower']
Making:
Shake all liquid ingredients together with ice vigorously for 10 seconds, then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a wild hibiscus flower and lemon zests.
Created by: Danielle Tatarin

Name: Wild Hibiscus Royale
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Rose Water', '2/3 oz. Wild Hibiscus Syrup', 'Mint', 'Champagne', 'Wild Hibiscus Flower']
Making:
This drink was first served at the legendary Dorchester Hotel in London, England where it remains the most popular Champagne cocktail on the menu.
Muddle mint in the Champagne flute and discard mint (squash some leaves around inside the glass). Place Wild Hibiscus Flower in bottom of glass and stand upright. Add rose water and some bruised torn mint pieces. Top with Champagne. Lastly, carefully pour in the syrup which will graduate from crimson at the bottom to light pink at the top.

Name: Wild Hibiscus Sea Urchin Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Campari', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Soda Water', 'Honey (Foam)', 'Wild Hibiscus Syrup', 'Wild Hibiscus Flower']
Making:
Recipe courtesy of Danielle Tatarin.
Shake vodka, Campari, Blue Curacao and lime juice for 10 seconds and strain into a chilled martini glass. Top with soda water. Finish with honey foam and a drizzle of Wild Hibiscus Syrup. Garnish with a ‘Sea Urchin’ Garnish*.
*Twist a 1 inch piece of orange peel (pith removed) and insert into a Hibiscus Flower so that the top of the peel is sticking out and curled end is coming out at both ends of the flower. Place the flower upside down hanging on the side of the cocktail glass or place submerged in the cocktail to reveal itself as the cocktail is consumed.

Name: Wild Hibiscus Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3/4 oz. Wild Hibiscus Syrup', '1/2 oz. Egg White', '1 Wild Hibiscus Flower']
Making:
Shake vigorously for 30 seconds then strain over cracked ice into a highball glass. Garnish with a skewered hibiscus flower.
Created by: Danielle Tatarin

Name: Wild Hibiscus Sugar Daddy
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Framboise', '1/3 oz. Wild Hibiscus Syrup', 'Superfine Sugar', '1 Maraschino Cherries', 'Mint', 'Wild Hibiscus Flower']
Making: Muddle mint in a margarita glass. Rim glass with Wild Hibiscus syrup and fine sugar Shake gin, lime juice and Framboise with ice and strain into glass. Stuff Wild Hibiscus Flower with cherry and mint tip so that the mint is showing out the top of the flower. Skewer onto a short swizzle stick

Name: Wild Irish Rose
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1 1/2 tsp. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Fill a highball glass with ice, add Irish whiskey, grenadine, lime juice and stir. Fill with Club Soda.

Name: Wild Lesbian
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Zima', 'Candies (Skittles)']
Making: Empty a 1/4 cup Zima into a glass. Drop skittles into bottle to cover bottom. Let sit 5 minutes or so before consuming, as Skittles need time to disolve. Very tasty despite the appearance.

Name: Wild Mustang
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Wild Turkey American Honey', '6 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '1 sprig(s) Rosemary']
Making: Combine American Honey, grapefruit juice and bitters in a tumbler with ice and stir. Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with a sprig of rosemary.

Name: Wild Rum N' Coke
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum (Or to taste)', '1 oz. Wildberry Schnapps', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Combine with ice in a collins glass.

Name: Wild Russian Riptide
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Wildberry Schnapps', '4 oz. Gatorade (Riptide Rush)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Wild Sex
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake everything with ice (except grenadine). Pour into a Hurricane glass with ice and splash a bit of grenadine over the ice.

Name: Wild Slimmy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '8 oz. Pepsi Cola']
Making: Mix together and ENJOY!!!

Name: Wild Thanksgiving
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon (101)', '1 oz. Applejack', "1 splash(es) Rose's Lime Juice", 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a highball glass with cranberry juice and add the other ingredients. Serve over ice with mint leave garnish.

Name: Wild Thing
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Club Soda', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Pour over ice into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Wild Turkey Bourbon Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1 1/2 part(s) Sweet Vermouth', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making:
Stir well with cracked ice and strain into a Manhattan or chilled martini glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.
Last year, the U.S. Senate declared September as National Bourbon Heritage Month, which calls for the celebration of bourbon as America’s native spirit. Even if you can’t make it to the annual Kentucky Bourbon Festival to celebrate, you can still show your patriotism by making a traditional Manhattan with Wild Turkey Bourbon, a true American icon that embodies the highest quality of craftsmanship, making it the perfect addition to your cocktails this September. It’s tasty enough to serve to cocktail connoisseurs, but simple enough for even a novice to master.

Name: Wild Turkey Lawn Dart
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '4 oz. Limeade', '3 leaf(leaves) Mint (muddled)', '1 sprig(s) Mint']
Making: Muddle mint with ice in a tumbler, pour in Wild Turkey 101 and limeade and shake. Strain into a highball filled with ice. Garnish with a sprig of mint leaves.

Name: Wild Wendy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix all in shaker, strain into a cocktail glass and enjoy!

Name: Wildbill's Redneck Bushwacker
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Myer's Dark Rum", '1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '2 tbsp. Coco Lopez', '1/2 cup(s) Half and Half Cream']
Making: Add ingredients to ice filled blender and blend until slush, usually 1-2 minutes. Makes three 10 oz. servings.

Name: Wildflower Cocktail
Ingredients: ['dash(es) Grenadine', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Scotch']
Making: Serve frappe style (over shaved ice) in a champagne flute.

Name: Will Dew
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wildberry Schnapps (Or to taste)', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour the schnapps in a highball glass and top up with Mountain Dew. According to Tonya it tastes like Kool-Aid.

Name: Will Rogers
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Will's Hawaiian Treat
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '1 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Mix well and serve cold.

Name: Williams Explosion
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 Pear (Canned)', '1 1/3 oz. Pear Juice (Canned)', '7-Up']
Making: Mix pear half, vodka and juice until pear disintegrates. Pour in a large glass over ice and fill with 7-Up.

Name: Willy Stwer
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Whiskey', '2/3 oz. Pommac Soda']
Making: Stir in a tall glass over ice.

Name: Wind Jammer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Stir over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Windex #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Combine in a lowball glass.

Name: Windsor Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Windsor Canadian Whisky', '1 bottle(s) Martini and Rossi Dry Vermouth', 'Angostura Bitters']
Making: In a cocktail glass filled with ice, mix 3 parts Windsor to 1 part M and R. Add a dash of Angostura. Stir and sip.

Name: Windy Corner Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blackberry Brandy']
Making: Stir brandy with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and sprinkle a little nutmeg on top.

Name: Wine and Dine Margarita
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Tequila', '3 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sangria', '1 can(s) Margarita Mix (Preferably the frozen Bacardi Margarita Mixer)', '3 oz. Water']
Making: Blend all the ingredients (except the sangria) with ice. Pour the sangria in a cockatil glass rimmed with sugar and top with the blend mixture.

Name: Wine Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Wine', '5 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Mix wine and soft drink. Pour into glass. Add ice.

Name: Wine Cooler-from Hawaii
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Sangria', '4 oz. 7-Up', '1/2 Lime']
Making: Fill a large glass with ice. Pour in wine and 7-Up. Squeeze in lime.

Name: Wine Crush
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Red Wine', '5 oz. Orange Soda (Preferably Orange Crush Soda)']
Making: Pour over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Wine Spritzer
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Wine', '1 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Serve in a wine glass or a highball glass.

Name: Winter Dream
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Zubrowka Vodka', '2/3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/3 oz. Gin', '2/3 oz. Apple Juice', '1/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/6 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Stir over ice into a collins glass.

Name: Winter G'ubilee
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1/4 oz. Aperol Orange Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3/4 oz. Pom Wonderful', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making:
Pour all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and strain into a cocktail glass.
Courtesy of Junior Merino of the Liquid Chef

Name: Winter Highball
Ingredients: ['2 Mint Leaves', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '3 oz. Apple Cider sparkling', '1/4 oz. Green Chartreuse']
Making: In the bottom of a cocktail shaker muddle mint and syrup. Add ice and VeeV, shake vigorously until the outside of the shaker is frosted and beaded with sweat. Pour ice and all into highball glass and fill with sparkling cider. Garnish with Apple chip.

Name: Winter IS
Ingredients: ['1 oz. IS Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto di Soronno', '1 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake IS VODKA, Amaretto and heavy cream with ice until the combination is very well chilled. Pour over ice in a rocks glass and sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Winter Warmer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Cognac', 'Milk (Hot)', 'Maple Syrup']
Making: Combine in a coffee mug and stir.

Name: Winter’s Mark
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Makers Mark Bourbon', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Amaretto', '1 1/2 part(s) Cruzan Rum Cream']
Making:
Put ingredients in a cocktail shaker, fill with ice, and shake vigorously. Strain in to a rocks glass with no ice. (Cocktail should be frothy on top). Grate fresh nutmeg over the top.
created by Edgar Campbell of Bolsa Restaurant, Dallas

Name: Wipeout
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '7-Up']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Wisconsin's Summer Hummer
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Lime Vodka', '2 part(s) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix in a highball glass filled with ice.

Name: Witches TIT
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka (Chilled)', '1 oz. Kahlua (Chilled)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: In a margarita glass mix the vodka and the Kahlua. Float the Galliano on top and cover with whipped cream. Place a maraschino cherry without the stem in the center of the whipped cream et voila!

Name: Wobbler
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Black Currant Vodka', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Grape Juice', 'Schweppes Russian Water']
Making: Pour the vodka in a glass 1/4-full of ice. Fill two thirds of the glass with grape juice. Fill remainder with Russian Water. Add grenadine.

Name: Wolfy
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '7-Up', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Fill a rocks glass with ice and add the vodka. Fill with 7-Up and pour the sweet and sour around the inside edge of the glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Wonderful Night
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Gin', '2/3 oz. Zubrowka Vodka', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Galliano', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 1/3 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Stir over ice into a collins glass.

Name: Woo Woo
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Peach Schnapps', '1 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 part(s) Nassau Royale Rum', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass.

Name: Woo Woo #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a highball glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

Name: Woo-Woo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build Vodka, Schnapps and Lime Juice over Ice in a tall glass. Fill glass with Cranberry Juice and garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Woo-Woo #2
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) DeKuyper Peachtree Schnapps', '1 part(s) Vox Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup', '2 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Stir and serve over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Woodstock
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 tsp. Maple Syrup', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Woodward Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 tbsp. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Woof Pussy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cognac', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a cocktail glass.

Name: World's Best Caesar
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce (Optional)', '1/2 tsp. Horseradish (Or more if you like)', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice', 'Celery Salt (Or Rim-It)', "Clamato Juice (Mott's)"]
Making: This is a great Sunday morning drink! Use the Rim-It or celery salt around the rim of your glass. Add all the ingredients over lots of ice and stir well. The horseradish looks gross, but tastes great! Don't use the tobasco if you are looking for a hangover cure!

Name: Wrath Of Grapes
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '4 oz. Grape Juice', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Combine ingredients in ice cube filled collins glass. Shake well. Garnish with a lime wheel or fresh grapes.

Name: Wreath Maker
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Light Rum', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour rum over ice and top with Sprite. Stir and enjoy!

Name: Wrecking Crew
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Fill a glass with ice. Pour liquors in and fill with pineapple juice. Splash grenadine and shake. Garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Wrigley's Special
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', 'dash(es) Lime Juice', 'Soda Water', '3 drop(s) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Combine in a collins glass.

Name: WWF
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '4 oz. Fruit Punch', '1 can(s) Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix whiskey and fruit punch in a glass. Top with whipped cream.

Name: Wyly Coyote
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Vodka', '2 tbsp. Cherry Juice', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Build over ice cubes in a lowball glass. Garnish with three cherries.

Name: Wyoming Marguerita
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Tequila', '8 oz. Limeade (Frozen)', '4 tbsp. Sugar (Or to taste)', '1/4 cup(s) Water', '1 can(s) Beer']
Making: Start by blending all the ingredients (except the beer) with 10 ice cubes. Add the beer and blend again. Serve in margarita glass salted on the rim. Makes about 4 servings.

Name: X-Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '12 oz. Zima']
Making: Pour the Zima into a pint glass and the tequila into a shot glass. Drop the shot of tequila (glass and all) into the Zima. Chug the entire drink.

Name: X-Rated on the Beach
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 part(s) Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shaken over ice and served in a short glass with a lemon twist.

Name: X-Rated Passion
Ingredients: ['2 oz. X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '2 oz. Skyy Infusions Passion Fruit Vodka', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Serve on the rocks and garnish with a lime.

Name: X-Rated Pink Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '1 oz. X-Rated Vodka', '2 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Served in a highball filled with ice. Garnish with a lemon wedge

Name: X-Rita
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '1 part(s) Tequila', '2 part(s) Sweet and Sour Mix', "1 splash(es) Rose's Lime Juice", '7-Up']
Making: Blend X-Rated Fusion Liqueur, Tequila, Sweet and Sour and Rose's Lime Juice with ice. Pour into a Martini Glass, top with the 7-Up and garnish with a lime twist.

Name: X.Y.Z. Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Xanthia Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', '3/4 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Yellow Chartreuse']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Xeres Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dry Sherry', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir ingredients with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Xfour Basil Bash
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. XFour Vodka', 'Basil', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Angostura Bitters', 'Soda']
Making: Muddle basil in a rocks glass. Top with soda.

Name: Xfour BC Blueberry Blitz
Ingredients: ['Ginger', '8 Blueberries', '1 1/2 oz. XFour Vodka', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Soda']
Making: Muddle ginger and blueberries in a rocks glass. Top with soda.

Name: Xfour Summer Tody
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Tea (black, cold)', '1 1/2 oz. XFour Vodka', '1/2 oz. Scotch (Ileach)', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tbsp. Honey']
Making: Pour on ice, garnish with lemon wheels and a tan.

Name: Xfour The Greenist City
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. XFour Vodka', '1/4 oz. Green Chartreuse', '1/2 oz. Stones Original Green Ginger Wine', '1 dash(es) Cynar']
Making: Stir in a cocktail glass and garnish with mint.

Name: Xtreme Lemonade
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '6 oz. Lemonade Minute Maid']
Making: Combine in a pint glass over ice. Mix well and serve with a slice of lemon.

Name: XXXMas Orgasm
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Raspberry Schnapps (Preferably Raspberry Pucker)', 'dash(es) Cointreau', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into a highball glass.

Name: Yackin Dan
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Early Times Kentucky Whiskey', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola', '1 splash(es) Club Soda', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Dr Pepper', '1 splash(es) Ginger Ale', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Margarita Mix']
Making: Shake with ice about 10 times and strain into a highball glass. This will mess you up really quick so watch out or your new nickname will be Yackin Dan.

Name: Yak's Milk
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Mix in equal amounts in old fashioned glass with half and half last. Best served lightly chilled.

Name: Yale Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice, strain into a cocktail glass, and serve.

Name: Yazi Amore
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Yazi Ginger Flavored Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Soda Water']
Making: Serve over ice and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Ybor City Sweet Tea
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/4 oz. Cointreau', 'Red Bull Energy Drink', '1 splash(es) 7-Up or Coca Cola']
Making: Fill a 14 oz. glass with ice. Mix in alcohol and fill with Red Bull Energy Drink. Shake then top with a splash of 7-Up or Coca Cola. Garnish with lemon and lime slices.

Name: Yellow Bird #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Pour all the alcoholic ingredients in a collins glass. Fill the glass with Sour Mix.

Name: Yellow Bird #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/4 oz. Galliano', '1 1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Yellow Daisy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Yellow Dog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '2 oz. Mountain Dew', '2 oz. Pineapple Orange Juice (Frozen)']
Making: Pour juice (semi-frozen) into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the rest and stir.

Name: Yellow Fever
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Combine in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Yellow Fingers
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '2/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Galliano', '2 oz. Orange Juice', 'Sprite']
Making: Shake alcohol, combine with orange juice in collins glass over ice. Fill with Sprite.

Name: Yellow Jersey
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Martini and Rossi Rosso', '3 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour Martini Rosso over 3 ice cubes in a lowball glass and fill with Ginger Ale.

Name: Yellow Pages
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Half fill an Old Fashioned glass with crushed ice. Add Kahlua and Cointreau. Stir and serve.

Name: Yellow Parrot Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Anisette', '3/4 oz. Yellow Chartreuse', '3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Yellow Rattler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tbsp. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a cocktail onion and serve.

Name: Yellow Strawberry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '4 oz. Strawberries', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled sour glass. Garnish with a banana slice and serve.

Name: Yellowbird
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Galliano', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix and serve over Ice.

Name: Yellowbird (Faba Style)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '3/4 oz. Creme de Banane (Preferably Bols)', '6 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a 12 oz. glass.

Name: Yerandy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Milk', '1 squirt(s) Chocolate Sauce']
Making: Mix all ingredients over ice in a blender. Blend well and pour into a Hurricane glass. Sprinkle flakes of chocolate on top if desired. Serve with a straw.

Name: Yo Mama Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Orange Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', 'Soda Water']
Making: Pour vodka in a highball glass over ice, add soda and top of with orange juice.

Name: Yoda
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bols Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Bols Creme de Banane', '1 bottle(s) Hoopers Hard Orange Hooch']
Making: Fill a pint glass with ice and add ingredients. Serve with straws - magenta ones give a nice colour contrast.

Name: Yoda Soda
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin (Lemon flavoured)', 'Cream Soda']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Yolanda
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Anisette', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a twist of orange peel and serve.

Name: Yon-Goth
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Soju', '1 1/2 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '9 oz. Sprite', '6 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour in a sling glass filled with ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Yoohoo
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake with ice, strain and serve…it tastes just like a yoohoo!

Name: York Peppermint Pattie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix all the ingredients with ice. Then strain out ice and serve.

Name: Yorsh
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Beer', '3 oz. Vodka (Moskovskaya)']
Making: Mix in a highball glass and garnish with a slice of salted cucumber.

Name: You Bastard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Milk']
Making: Pour alcohol into a collins glass and fill with milk.

Name: You Forgot To Flush
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Galliano', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix the Galliano and Sprite in a white tea cup. Float a Tootsie Roll candy on top. Look familiar? Thought so... Cover with a white saucer and serve with a smile.

Name: You Only Live Once
Ingredients: ["5 oz. Dooley's Toffee Liqueur", '3 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 pint(s) Lemonade']
Making: Mix in a large glass with ice.

Name: You're a Peach
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lucid Absinthe Superieure', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '4 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making:
Because you finally realize that you only need yourself to be happy…treat yourself to You're a Peach, because you are one.
In a cocktail shaker, add ice Lucid Absinthe, peach schnapps and ginger ale. Shake and pour into a rocks glass. Garnish with a peach wedge.

Name: Ypioca Basil Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Oura', '4 wedge(s) Lime', '2 tbsp. Sugar (sugarcane)', '10 leaf(leaves) Basil']
Making: Mix the quarters of one lime and the basil leaves in a shaker and muddle. Add the Ypióca cachaça and top with ice. Shake the mixture and strain into a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with basil leaves.

Name: Ypioca Caipioriental
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Crystal', '2 oz. Lychee Juice', '2 Lychee Nuts', '2 Strawberries', '1/2 tsp. Ginger (freshly grated)']
Making: Muddle Lychee, Strawberries, ginger and sugar into a shaker. Add the ice, lychee syrup and the Ypióca cachaça. Shake vigorously over ice. Serve in a rocks glass and garnish with lychee fruit

Name: Ypioca Cantaloupinha
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Crystal', '2 wedge(s) Cantaloupe', '1 wedge(s) Lime', '2 tbsp. Simple Syrup']
Making: Mix all the ingredients together and muddle gently. Pour in a highball glass filled with ice and. Top with a splash of 7-Up.

Name: Ypioca Copacabana Gimlet
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Crystal', '2 wedge(s) Lime', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Tonic Water', '1/2 tsp. Simple Syrup', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix the Ypióca cachaça, lime wedges, limejuice in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain the mixture into a highball glass filled with ice and lime wedges. Top with equal splashes of tonic and 7-Up.

Name: Ypioca Cucumber Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Oura', '2 wedge(s) Lime', '4 slice(s) Cucumber (peeled)', '1/2 tsp. Ginger (grated)', '3 tbsp. Simple Syrup']
Making: Mix and muddle all the ingredients in a shaker. Add Cachaça Ypióca and ice. Shake and serve in rock glass and garnish with slices of cucumber and lime.

Name: Ypioca Ipanema Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Crystal', '1 oz. Strawberry Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Milk']
Making: Pour the Ypióca Cachaça de Strawberry Juice and de condensed Coconut milk in a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain and poor in to high ball glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Ypioca Ipanematini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Crystal', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Add into a shaker filled with ice the Ypióca cachaça, Cointreau, lime juice, and coconut milk. Shake vigorously, strain and serve in a chilled Martini glass.

Name: Ypioca Key Lime Pie Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Prata', '4 wedge(s) Lime', '3 tbsp. Condensed Milk (sweetened)', '1 tbsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Muddle the lime with the fine sugar in a cocktail shaker. Add the Ypióca cachaca and top with ice. Shake vigourosly. Add the two table spoons of condensed milk and shake some more. Pour into an on-the-rock glass. Garnish with a lime wedge

Name: Ypioca Mix Fruit Batida
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Crystal', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice', '4 oz. Passion Fruit Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients in a shaker glass filled with ice. Shake, strain into a highball glass over crushed ice and serve.

Name: Ypioca Passion Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Prata', '1/2 Passion Fruit (only the heart)', '2 wedge(s) Lime', '5 leaf(leaves) Mint', '3 tsp. Superfine Sugar (cane sugar)']
Making: Mix the passion fruit, sugar, lime and mint in a cocktail shaker and muddle. Add the Ypióca cachaça the ice and shake. Serve with a sugar cane stirrer in an on-the-rock-glass.

Name: Ypioca Pepper Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['4 wedge(s) Lime', '2 tbsp. Sugar (sugar cane)', '2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Oura', '1/2 Passion Fruit', '3 piece(s) Lemon Grass (hearts)', '1 pinch(es) Pepper (white)']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a cocktail tumbler and muddle gently. Fill with ice and Ypioca cachaça and shake hard. Serve in rocks glass garnished with mint leaves.

Name: Ypioca Pineapple-Mint Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Crystal', '1 wedge(s) Lime', '4 chunk(s) Pineapple', '10 leaf(leaves) Mint', '2 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Muddle the mint, Pineapple, wedge of lime and the sugar in a shaker. Add the Ypióca cachaça and top with crushed ice. Shake and pour into a rocks glass, decorate with mint leaves.

Name: Ypioca Pomegranate Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Oura', '1/2 Lime (sliced)', '1 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Mix the sliced lime and sugar in a shaker and muddle gently. Top the shaker with ice, and then pour in Ypióca Cachaça and Pomegranate Liquor. Shake vigorously. Serve in a rocks glass.

Name: Ypioca Strawberry-Ginger Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Oura', '3 Strawberries', '1 oz. Ginger', '3 tbsp. Sugar']
Making: Mix the strawberries, ginger, and sugar in a shaker and muddle gently. Add the Ypióca cachaça and ice, and shake. Pour contents into a rocks glass with a lime garnish.

Name: Ypioca Strawberry-Nectar Caipirinha
Ingredients: ['4 Strawberries', '3 leaf(leaves) Basil', '1 1/2 oz. Ypioca Cachaca Prata', '1 splash(es) Strawberry Juice']
Making: Add 4 fresh strawberries with 3 medium-size basil leaves in a shaker. Muddle gently. Fill shaker with crushed ice and add a splash of strawberry nectar. Add the Ypióca cachaça and shake vigorously. Pour into a rocks glass.

Name: Yucca
Ingredients: ['7 cup(s) Vodka', '8 Lemons', '8 Limes', '1 cup(s) Sugar']
Making: Cut up the eight lemons and eight limes. Put them into a Tupperware bowl. Add the vodka and the sugar, and fill the rest of the bowl with ice. Put on the lid of the Tupperware and duct tape it good! Put a towel around the bowl and duct tape it firmly in place. It is best to do this with about eight people. Shake the bowl vigorously for an hour. You will need more than one person, as it does get tiresome. But at the end of all this hard work and turmoil, you have a drink that taste just like lemonade, and it actually is straight vodka!

Name: Yucca Blossom
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Tequila', '6 oz. Limeade (concentrate)', '3 oz. Coconut Rum (or 3 tbsp. Coconut Snow)']
Making: Combine ingredients in a blende with ice. Blend until smooth.

Name: Yukon Velvet
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Yukon Jack', '1 oz. Black Velvet Canadian Whisky', 'splash(es) Cola']
Making: Mix ingredients over ice. Don't Drink and Drive.

Name: Yule Mule
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Ketel One Vodka', '1 oz. Ginger Beer', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Orange Bitters']
Making: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice Add Ketel One Vodka, Cranberry Juice, Fresh Lime Juice and Orange Bitters and shake vigorously. Strain into a highball glass filled with ice and top with ginger beer.

Name: Yum-yum
Ingredients: ['2 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 splash(es) Vodka', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry .

Name: Yurba Buena
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. 4 Copas Reposado', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. 4 Copas Organic Agave Nectar', '16 Mint Leaves Organic', 'Club Soda']
Making: Muddle mint, lime, and sugar. Add Tequila, ice, soda, and stir well. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Yvette
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '2 oz. Cream', 'Sprite']
Making: Mix in a highball glass and fill with Sprite.

Name: Yvette's Cherry
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '2 oz. Cherry Juice (Preferably Cherry Juicy Juice)', '7-Up']
Making: Combine in a highball glass filled with ice, give it a quick swirl, garnish with a cherry and serve.

Name: Z Twist
Ingredients: ['1/4 part(s) Absolut Vodka', "1/4 part(s) Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/4 part(s) Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1/4 part(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in an ordinary plastic Dixie cup and top with Orange Juice. Stir.

Name: Zachyl
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Light Rum', 'Grenadine', '7-Up']
Making: Mix all with ice in a 32 oz. Taco Bell cup and add grenadine and 7-Up to taste.

Name: Zaranes Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Zeke's Suprise
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/3 oz. Scotch', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Mix with 2 cubes of ice. Don't put in umbrellas or any of that stuff.

Name: Zephyr
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bulldog Gin', '4 piece(s) Cucumber', '4 sprig(s) Sage', '2 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Muddle cucumber pieces, sage leaves and sugar. Add Bulldog Gin in a rocks glass over ice.

Name: Zero Mist
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Water']
Making: Serve in a cocktail glass frappe style (over shaved ice)

Name: Zimatron
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', 'Zima']
Making: Pour over ice in a collins glass and garnish with a lemon wegde.

Name: Zinger
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Mix the two juices and vodka together. Pour into a tall glass and top with tonic water. Garnish with a little citrus zest.

Name: Zipper #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Layer in a lowball glass.

Name: Zipper #4
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Galliano', '1 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '1 wedge(s) Lime']
Making: Pour ingredients into a blender with 8 oz. of ice and pulse twice. Pour into a rocks glass, squeeze in a wedge of lime, then drop it in the glass. Refreshing after dinner!

Name: Zipper Head
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Club Soda']
Making: Fill an 8oz. glass with ice, add the Chambord and layer the vodka. Top up with club soda and garnish with a straw. Drink from the straw and as fast as possible.

Name: Zombie
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a Tom Collins glass with ice and add the Bacardi and Apricot Brandy. Top up with Orange and Pineapple juices. Drizzle the Blue Curacao around one side of the glass and the grenadine around the other. Add the Dark Rum, garnish with a pineapple flag and serve.

Name: Zombie #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Creme de Noyeaux', '1 1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake all ingredients (except 151-proof rum) with ice and strain into a collins glass over ice cubes. Float the 151-proof rum on top, add a cherry (if desired), and serve.

Name: Zombie #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix', "dash(es) Rose's Lime Juice", '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an exotic glass. Float 151 Proof rum.

Name: Zombie #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amber Rum', '1 oz. Silver Rum', '1 oz. Jamaica Rum', '4 dash(es) Cherry Brandy', '4 dash(es) Apricot Brandy', 'dash(es) Papaya Juice', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Stir in a tall glass and float 151 Proof rum. Garnish with a cherry and a slice of orange.

Name: Zombie 4 (green)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Gold Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour the ingredients in order into a large glass filled with ice .Swirl once with a straw. Add a green cherry (or red).

Name: Zoom
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/4 oz. Honey', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and serve in a wine glass.

Name: Zoomer
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '2 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Moonshine', 'Five Alive Tropical']
Making: Mix the alcohol over ice in a highball glass. Top up with Tropical Five Alive.

Name: Ztrawberry
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Zima', '1 1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur']
Making: Combine in a tall glass.

Name: ZYR Gimlet
Ingredients: ['4 oz. ZYR Vodka', '1 wedge(s) Lime']
Making: Pour into a shot glass with 1 ice cube. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: ZYR Jack-O-Lantern
Ingredients: ['1 oz. ZYR Vodka', '1 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Mango Nectar', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Pour into a cocktail glass and stir.

Name: African Queen
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1 cup(s) Coffee (Hot, freshly brewed and strong)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour the spirits in a mug, add the coffee and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with nutmeg and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Afternoon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Frangelico', '4 oz. Coffee (Hot)', 'Cream']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and add cream to taste.

Name: All Warm And Fuzzy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Butterscotch Ripple Schnapps', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '4 oz. Hot Chocolate or coffee', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix liqueurs into hot chocolate (or coffee). Top with whipped cream.

Name: Alpine Avenger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', 'Milk (Hot)']
Making: Fill a mug with steaming milk, add the alcohol then top with chocolate shavings.

Name: Amaretto Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '8 oz. Coffee (Hot)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Stir the Amaretto into the coffee. Garnish with whipped cream and sprinkle with ground coriander.

Name: Angie Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '3/4 cup(s) Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Mix the Bailey's and the Kahlua with the coffee and top off with the vodka.

Name: Apple Strudel
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', 'Apple Cider (Hot)']
Making: Fill a mug with hot apple cider and add the Rumple Minze.

Name: Apricot
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Apricot Brandy', '3 oz. Water (Boiling)']
Making: Combine in coffee mug with a dash of cinnamon and garnish with an orange or a lemon slice

Name: Autumn Mist
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Water boiling', '2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 Tea Bags', 'Lemon twist']
Making: Pour boiling water into a medium to large brandy snifter. Add Grand Marnier. Run the lemon twist around the glass rim, then drop into liquid. Place the tea bag into snifter. Serve.

Name: Bailey-Cino
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '4 oz. Coffee hot, strong', '3 tsp. Hot Chocolate Mix carnation or cadbury', 'Sugar', 'Cream']
Making: Mix hot chocolate mix and coffee in a mug. Add Bailey's Irish Cream. Add cream and sugar if desired.

Name: Baileys Hot Chocolate
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Milk', '1 oz. Chocolate (Dark)', '1 2/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Boil milk and pour half the milk into a jug with the dark chocolate. Leave to soften and whisk until smooth. Add the Baileys and the rest of the milk. Whisk again and pour in to two heatproof glasses. Top with whipped cream and chocolate curls

Name: Baileys Latte
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Espresso', '1 2/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Milk (Steamed)']
Making: Take your coffee mug or coffee glass and pour in 20ml of espresso coffee. Add 50ml of Baileys and fill with steamed milk. Decorate the top with froth and sprinkle over chocolate shavings

Name: Baileys Mint Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '3 oz. Coffee']
Making: Combine ingredients in a highball glass and top with fresh whipped cream.

Name: Baileys Peppermint Cream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys with a hint of Mint Chocolate', '4 oz. Hot Chocolate', 'Whipped Cream', 'Candy (Candy Cane)']
Making: Crush candy cane with the back of a spoon. Combine hot chocolate and Baileys by pouring into a coffee mug. Top with a dollop of whipped cream and sprinkle crushed candy cane on top. Garnish with mint leaf.

Name: Bavarian Blizzard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 oz. Cognac', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Fill a mug with coffee, add the alcohol then top with whipped cream.

Name: Belgian Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour in a pousse cafe glass and fill with coffee.

Name: Bella Notte
Ingredients: ['1 dash(es) Raspberry di Amore', 'Coffee']
Making: Top with whipped cream.

Name: Black Gold
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Coffee (Hot)', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Hazelnut Liqueur', 'dash(es) Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Mix everything but the coffee and cinnamon schnapps in an Irish coffee glass. Stir in coffee and schnapps. Garnish with whipped cream and shaved chocolate. Add a cinnamon stick to stir.

Name: Black Stripe Cold
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Molasses', '1 tsp. Honey', '1 oz. Water (Boiling)']
Making: Stir until the honey and molasses dissolve then pour into an old-fashioned glass filled with crushed ice.

Name: Blue Blazer #1
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Blended Scotch Whisky', '2 1/2 oz. Water (Boiling)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Use two large mugs. Put the whisky in one mug and the water in the other. Ignite the whisky and mix it several times with the water by pouring both of them 4 or 5 times from one mug to the other. Sweeten with the sugar and garnish with a twist of lemon peel. Serve in a punch cup. Note: If it is done well, it should have the appearance of a continuous stream of liquid fire. Use caution when handling the mugs. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Blue Blazer #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '3 oz. Water', '1 oz. Honey (Clear)', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients in a saucepan and heat until the honey has dissolved or is starting to boil. Pour into a rocks glass with a teaspoon in it (to stop the glass from cracking if the drink is too hot). Good remedy for colds and the like!

Name: Boston Caribbean Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Dark Rum', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: lime and sugar the rim of an Irish coffee glass. Mix liqueur and rum in the glass and fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with cinnamon. Garnish with a cinnamon stick for stirring.

Name: Buccaneer's Breakfast
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Cream Sherry (Or Harvey's Bristol Milk)", '6 oz. Coffee (Hot)', '1 tbsp. Cream (English Clotted Cream)', '1 tsp. Brown Sugar']
Making: Heat 2 oz. Harvey's Bristol Milk or Bristol Cream Sherry (do not cook) in a Irish coffee glass. Add hot coffee and sugar. Top with a heaped tablespoon English clotted cream (substitute whipped cream if unavailable).

Name: Bun Warmer
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '3/4 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Apple Cider']
Making: Heat alcohol gently and pour into a coffee mug. Top with heated apple cider and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Burnt Raybird
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with coffee. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Burnt Toasted Almond
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Kahlua', '3/4 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Pour the alcohol over ice in a highball glass. Stir the cream in and mix well.

Name: Buttercup
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 oz. Truffles Liqueur', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Heat gently and pour into a coffee mug. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Cafe Amaretto
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour in a coffee mug and fill with coffee. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Cafe au Lait
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Coffee (Hot)', '1/2 cup(s) Milk (Hot)', 'Sugar (optional)']
Making: Combine in a mug. A favourite for breakfast in France.

Name: Cafe Caribbean
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Rum', '4 oz. Coffee (Hot)', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Pour in a coffee mug and garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Cafe Chemineaud
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chemineaud Fine Brandy', '4 oz. Coffee (Hot)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Add Chemineaud Brandy to coffee. Top with whipped cream, Sprinkle with cocoa. mmmmm!

Name: Cafe D'olla
Ingredients: ['2/3 cup(s) Coffee', '1 quart(s) Water', '1/2 cup(s) Brown Sugar', '1 tsp. Molasses', 'Cinnamon', 'Anise']
Making: Heat ingredients and strain.

Name: Cafe Diable
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Dark Rum (Or Brandy)', '2 tbsp. Sugar', '5 cup(s) Coffee (Hot)', 'Cloves', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Heat ingredients gently and ignite. Add the coffee and garnish with an orange twist. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Cafe French
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour in a coffee mug and fill with coffee.

Name: Cafe L'Orange
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cognac', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '4 oz. Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a finely chopped orange rind.

Name: Cafe Pacifico
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Partida Blanco Tequila', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '4 oz. Coffee', '1 1/2 tsp. Sugar', '1 1/2 tsp. Cinnamon', 'Heavy Cream']
Making: Prepare small warm wine glass. Add Tequila & coffee. Mix in the cinnamon sugar. Float heavy cream on top of the coffee. Garnish with a sprinkle of cinnamon sugar mix on top of a cinnamon stick. Note: the cinnamon sugar mix is 4 parts granulated white sugar to 1 part ground cinnamon. Mix them together in a bowl.

Name: Cafe Royal
Ingredients: ['1 Sugar Cube', 'Brandy', 'Coffee (Hot)', 'Half and Half Cream (To taste)']
Making: Soak sugar cube in brandy and ignite. When flame is out add to a mug of coffee and float half and half on top. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Cafe Seasons
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Espresso', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Chocolate Milk']
Making: Pour all the ingredients in a mug, stir and enjoy.

Name: Cafe Sonia
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Metaxa 7 Star', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Tia Maria Chocolate Liqueur', '1/8 oz. Vanilla', '1/4 oz. Heavy Cream', 'Coffee (Hot)', 'Sugar']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream.

Name: Cafe Tuaca
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tuaca', '1/2 oz. Cream', '1 1/2 tbsp. Sugar', '1 cup(s) Coffee (Preferably SnickerDoodle Coffee)']
Making: Mix together in a mug and enjoy!!! Great for Sunday Brunch! Can also be topped with whipped cream.

Name: Café Polonaise De Lancut
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka (Preferably Polonaise Polish Vodka)', '1 cup(s) Coffee Hot', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '2 Sugar Cubes', 'Cream']
Making: Put the two sugar cubes in a heat-resistant tumbler or mug. Add the other ingredients (except cream) and stir. Float the cream (do not stir or mix) and drink through it, with a straw if you like, while still hot. Marek notes: I wouldn't recommend using more than one shot of the vodka as alcohol gets into your system much quicker if you heat it up.

Name: Caffe Di Amaretto
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a finely chopped orange rind.

Name: Canadian
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 oz. Maple Syrup', '1 tbsp. Brown Sugar', '1 tsp. Butter', '1 pinch(es) Allspice', '2 oz. Water']
Making: Heat butter, Allspice, brown sugar and maple syrup in the water until the sugar dissolves. Remove from the heat, stir in rum and pour into a mug. Serve with glowing coals of bonfire and cold mountain air.

Name: Candy Cane #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 cup(s) Hot Chocolate']
Making: Stir together and enjoy.

Name: Cappuccino & Irish Cream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 cup(s) Cappuccino (Preferably unsweetened - the real stuff is best)']
Making: Combine in a warm mug. Stir well. Great for relaxing on a cold winter night!

Name: Cappuccino Freeze
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 tsp. Instant Coffee', '2 tbsp. Sugar', '2 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Blend with 16 oz. crushed ice until smooth and creamy. Serve in a specialty glass and garnish with a dollop of whipped cream and a chocolate coffee bean.

Name: Cappuccino Sausalito
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 cup(s) Coffee', '1/2 cup(s) Hot Chocolate', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix in pousse cafe glass and top with whipped cream.

Name: Capriccio
Ingredients: ['1 tbsp. Sugar', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cafe', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Coat a rim of an Irish coffee mug with cinnamon and put the sugar in the bottom. Pour in the brandy and liqueurs and fill to 3/4's with coffee. Top with whipped cream, toasted almond slices and a cherry.

Name: Caribbean Warmer
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Admiral Nelson's Coconut Rum", '1 cup(s) Hot Chocolate']
Making: Mix the coconut rum and the hot chocolate in a warm mug. Add a dollop of whipped cream. Sprinkle with cinnamon or cocoa powder.

Name: CC and Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Canadian Club 100 Proof Whisky', '1 part(s) Starbucks Coffee Liqueur', '2 1/2 part(s) Coffee']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and top with whip cream. Garnish with chocolate shavings or powdered cinnamon.

Name: Celtic Toddy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', 'Water']
Making: Celtic Crossing and hot water garnished with lemon wedge.

Name: Channel Crosser
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch (Or to taste)', '1 cup(s) Coffee (Hot)', 'Coffee-mate']
Making: Mix in a warm mug.

Name: Chantilly Lace
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Courvoisier Cognac', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', 'Cinnamon', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix together and steam with anexpresso machine. Garnish with whipped cream and sprinkle cinnamon.

Name: Cherry Snowplow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Spice Rum', '3/4 oz. Amaretto (Preferably Di Saronna Originale)', '1/4 oz. B and B Liqueur', '1/2 cup(s) Hot Chocolate', '1/2 cup(s) Coffee (Hot)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix the rum and amaretto in a large mug. Add the coffee and the hot chocolate and top with whipped cream. Place a cherry on the top of the whipped cream, drizzle the B and B Liqueur. Garnish with chocolate shavings and a cinnamon stick.

Name: Chimney Fire
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Apple Cider']
Making: Pour Amaretto into an Irish Coffee mug. Fill remainder with heated cider. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Chip Shot
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '3/4 oz. Tuaca', '2 oz. Coffee']
Making: Add Bailey's Irish Cream and Tuaca to hot coffee in a snifter. Swirl. Excellent for after dinner and the aroma under the nose is incredible.

Name: Chocolate Coffee Kiss
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Brown Creme de Cacao', '1 splash(es) Grand Marnier', '1 1/2 oz. Chocolate Syrup', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and fill with coffee. Top with whipped cream and garnish with shaved chocolate and a cherry.

Name: Chocolate Raspberry Forest
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/4 oz. Vodka', 'Hot Chocolate', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Heat a footed mug with boiling water for 1 to 2 minutes. Empty the water and add the alcohol. Fill the rest of the mug with hot chocolate and top with whipped cream.

Name: Chocolate Russian
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Hot Chocolate']
Making: Pour Kahlua and vodka into a mug and fill with hot chocolate. Stir.

Name: Christmas Yule Egg Nog #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Whiskey', '2 oz. Rum', '6 Egg Whites (Beaten)', '6 Egg Yolks', '6 tbsp. Sugar', '1 quart(s) Heavy Cream', 'dash(es) Vanilla Extract']
Making: Mix the liquors, the sugar and the egg yolks and let it sit for approximately 15 minutes. Then slowly stir in the cream and fold in the egg whites. Add the dah of vanilla extract to cover the taste of the whiskey. Finish by topping off each glass with a sprinkle nugmeg and a cinnamon stick. Makes 6 servings.

Name: Circadian Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Zinamom Cinnamon Vodka', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 cup(s) Hot Chocolate', 'Cinnamon Stick', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: In a large, heated mug add Zinamon and Vanil vodkas and hot cocoa. Mix well, add cinnamon stick and top with whipped cream. Or, it may be served cold: chill cocoa in a highball glass in the refrigerator until cold. Remove; add vodkas and cinnamon stick; mix well and top with whipped cream.

Name: Clansman's Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '3/4 oz. Sambuca', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Dip the rim of a highball glass in brown sugar. Pour in alcohol and fill with coffee. Garnish with whipped cream and grated chocolate.

Name: Coco Bee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 cup(s) Water (Boiled)', '1 tsp. Honey']
Making: Pour the boiled water and the coconut rum into a cup. Stir in honey and enjoy.

Name: Coco Loco #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Flor de Cana 7 Year Old Rum', '1/2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1 slice(s) Pepper (Habanero Chili)', '1 dash(es) Cinnamon', '2 tsp. Brown Sugar', '2 oz. Milk']
Making: Pour the rum, chocolate liqueur and milk into a small pot, and add the slice of chili, cinnamon and sugar. Simmer on low to medium heat until hot. Pour the Hot Chocolate into an Irish coffee mug, and an optional topping of whipped cream. Garnish with grated pistachios.

Name: Cocoa Candy Cane
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) DeKuyper Peppermint 40 Proof Schnapps', '7 part(s) Hot Chocolate']
Making: Pour into a glass mug and garnish with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

Name: Cocoa Joe
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Canadian Mist', '3/4 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 cup(s) Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Combine in a glass mug and garnish with whipped cream. Sprinkle with chocolate shavings.

Name: Coffee Bustamante
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Courvoisier Cognac', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Benedictine', '7 oz. Coffee (Hot)', '1/2 oz. Mozart Liqueur']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and drizzle chocolate liqueur over other ingredients. Garnish with whipped cream and grated white chocolate.

Name: Coffee Fling
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', 'Coffee (Hot)', 'Sugar']
Making: Pour in a coffee mug and fill with coffee. Garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: Coffee Pucci
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 Egg White', '6 oz. Coffee (Freshly brewed)', 'Brown Sugar']
Making: Beat the egg white and cover the rim of an 8 oz. heat proof glass mug. Dip the edge of the mug in brown sugar then bake it in the oven or the microwave. Fill the hot mug with the ingredients listed above (don't burn your hands!) and top with whipped cream . Garnish with a spoon or a straw.

Name: Coffee-mate Spiked Coffee Nog
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Coffee', '1/3 cup(s) Coffee-Mate Eggnog Latte', '2 oz. Spiced Rum', 'Whipped Cream', 'Nutmeg']
Making: Divide coffee, Coffee-mate and rum between two mugs. Top each with whipped cream and sprinkle of nutmeg.

Name: Cold Winter's Night
Ingredients: ['Hot Chocolate', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Make the hot chocolate in a large mug. Pour in Amaretto then Baileys. Stir. Top with a sprinkle of cinnamon or a cinnamon stick. Cuddle with a loved one.

Name: Cossack Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Zinamom Cinnamon Vodka', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Coffee Vodka', '1 cup(s) Coffee (Strong and black)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix Stoli Kafya Vodka and Stoli Zinamon Vodka in a large, preheated mug. Fill with hot coffee and top with a generous dollop of whipped cream.

Name: Cozy By The Fire Place
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 package(s) Hot Chocolate (Preferably Swiss Mix Hot Chocolate)']
Making: Make the hot chocolate then add the schnapps and top with whipped cream.

Name: Cranapple TYLite
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Tea (Chamomile)', '1/2 oz. Vanilla Syrup (sugar free)']
Making: Serve warm and stir in a Irish Coffee Glass.

Name: Creme Caramel Baileys Latte
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Espresso', '1 2/3 oz. Baileys with a hint of Creme Caramel']
Making: Take your coffee mug or coffee glass and pour in espresso coffee. Add Baileys with a hint of Creme Caramel and fill with steamed milk. Decorate the top with froth and sprinkle over the chocolate shavings.

Name: Cruzan Hot Toddy
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Single Barrel Estate Rum', '1 tsp. Honey', '1 piece(s) Lemon (Peel)']
Making: Prepare a mug by rinsing it with boiling water and pouring the water out. Add the sugar or honey and the lemon peel, pour in an ounce of hot water and stir until the sweetener has dissolved. Add Cruzan Single Barrel Rum and top off with more boiling water.

Name: Cuppa Good Cheer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Skyy Infusions Cherry Vodka', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '4 oz. Hot Chocolate', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream', 'Whipped Cream']
Making:
Combine all ingredients into a holiday mug and top with whipped cream, red sprinkles and a Maraschino Cherry.
Whether you anticipate a “White Christmas” or a California “Endless Summer,” we all snuggle up with loved ones and a cup of warm hot cocoa at least once during the holiday season. Thick, frothy and decadent, a Cuppa Good Cheer featuring SKYY Infusions Cherry is a mature version of a holiday favorite and certain to keep spirits bright.

Name: Cure For What Ails Ya
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ginger Brandy', '1 cup(s) Tea (Lemon herbal tea)', '2 tsp. Honey']
Making: Brew the tea and use an extra tea bag. Fill a coffee mug with 3/4 tea, 1/4 brandy. Stir in the honey.

Name: Dirty Sanchez
Ingredients: ['Coffee', '1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Chocolate Syrup', '1/2 oz. Cream', 'Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Begin with a cup of coffee about 3/4 full. Add Kahlua and chocolate syrup. Stir. Drizzle cream into the mix over the back of a spoon. For a hint of cinnamon dip a spoon into cinammon schnapps, remove and stir the drink with the spoon.

Name: Dirty White Mexican
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 1/2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Mix in a collins glass.

Name: Don Denver
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Gin', 'Coffee']
Making: Pour coffee into a glass mug and add brandy and Gin. Stir.

Name: Double Bull
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bison Grass Vodka', '8 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Mix together in a tall glass. Add a lemon twist and serve.

Name: Dr. Daniels House Call
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Dr Pepper', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Warm the Dr Pepper and Jack Daniel's until hot. Pour into a mug and serve with a lemon wedge.

Name: Dr. Decadence
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's Fireball", '1 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1 cup(s) Coffee (Hot)', '1 splash(es) Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Mix in a warm mug, top with whipped cream and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Dr. Johnsons Choice
Ingredients: ['2 bottle(s) Red Wine', '10 oz. Orange Curacao', '10 oz. Brandy', '2 pint(s) Water (Boiling)', '24 Sugar', '12 Cloves']
Making: Mix the wine, the sugar and the cloves and bring almost to a boil. Add the other ingredients and serve in mugs. Garnish with grated nutmeg.

Name: Dreamy Winter Delight
