Ingredients: ["2 oz. Brady's Irish Cream", '1 splash(es) Celtic Crossing Liqueur', 'Hot Chocolate']
Making: Pour straight into a warm mug and fill with hot chocolate. Garnish with whip cream.

Name: Electric Coffee Aka B52 Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Coffee']
Making: Pour into a coffee glass and fill with hot coffee. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Eleni's Earl
Ingredients: ['2 tbsp. Brandy', '1 tbsp. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Honey', 'Earl Grey Tea (Hot)']
Making: Combine ingredients in a preheated coffee mug and stir.

Name: Ernest Perry
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Cappuccino', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Stir all in a large cappuccino mug. Make one for your lover on a cold night.

Name: Fat Man's Bliss
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Baileys Irish Cream', '2 tbsp. Butter (melted)', '3 tbsp. Sugar (raw)', '1 tsp. Cinnamon', '1 pinch(es) Nutmeg']
Making: Combine Baily's, sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg in a small saucepan. Heat slowly over low heat. Gently stir in melted butter. Serve with an apple pie garnish.

Name: Fernandina Beach
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Coffee', 'Cream (Preferably French vanilla cream)']
Making: Mix in a mug.

Name: Finlandia Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Finlandia Vodka', '1 oz. Cloudberry Liqueur', '5 oz. Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Firefly Cinnamon Fly
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Firefly Sweet Tea Vodka', "1 part(s) Dr. McGillicuddy's Fireball"]
Making: Mix in a coffee mug. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Firefly Honey-Lemon Tea
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Firefly Sweet Tea Vodka', '1 dash(es) Honey', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix in a coffee mug.

Name: Firefly Hot Apple
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Firefly Sweet Tea Vodka', '1 part(s) Apple Cider Hot']
Making: Mix in a coffee mug.

Name: Flirtini #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '5/8 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice fresh', 'Champagne']
Making: Pour all ingredients except champagne into an iced shaker. Shake vigorously and pour into a martini glass. Top with champagne.

Name: Flying Bomber
Ingredients: ['Coffee strong, very hot', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Whipped Cream', '1 splash(es) Creme de Cacao dark']
Making: Mix Bailey's Irish Cream, Kahlua and Amaretto with strong, very hot coffee in a mug. Top with whipped cream and dark Crème de Cacao.

Name: Fragoli Hot Love
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Toschi Fragoli Liqueur', '3 oz. Coffee', '1/4 tsp. Sugar', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix in a mug. Top with whipped cream and a fresh strawberry.

Name: Fuzzy Dick
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with coffee. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Gold Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) Hot Chocolate', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Mix hot chocolate as per package instructions. Pour in Goldschlager and stir.

Name: Gold Digger
Ingredients: ['Coffee', '2 oz. Goldschlager', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: This is great for the morning after a big party or if you just want something new. Pour coffee into your mug about 3/4 full and add Goldschlager. Add sugar to taste.

Name: Goldonaya Grog
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Zinamom Cinnamon Vodka', '6 oz. Apple Cider (Or apple juice)', '4 Cloves', '1 Cinnamon Stick', '1 Orange']
Making: Heat vodka, apple cider and orange peel in a saucepan, but do not boil. Pour into a preheated mug and garnish with cinnamon stick. To serve cold, after heating, pour into a container with a tight-fitting top and refrigerate. Serve in chilled highball glass with several ice cubes and garnish with cinnamon stick.

Name: Gorilla Sweat
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 tsp. Butter', '6 oz. Water']
Making: Heat gently and pour into an Irish coffee mug. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Grand Café Latte
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '6 oz. Milk (hot)', '1 oz. Espresso']
Making:
Grand Marnier takes this unctuous coffee to new heights with its subtle, oaked vanilla notes of aged cognac and its delicate orange flavour. A delectable yet subtle break!
Combine and serve in a tall glass
If you have a coffee machine with a steam nozzle, use it to heat the milk and spoon the foam delicately atop the coffee. For thick, unctuous foam, use whole milk rather than skimmed.

Name: Grand Cappuccino
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/3 oz. Milk (foam)', '1 Espresso']
Making:
Powerfull aromas of Grand Marnier with subtle notes of orange in a Cappuccino
Mix Grand Marnier and Coffee and top with milk foam.

Name: Grand Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grand Marnier warmed', '3 oz. Coffee', '2 tbsp. Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour coffee and warmed Grand Marnier into a coffee glass and stir. Spoon whipped cream on top to create a nice layered look. Note: If you want an even richer coffee drink add 3/4 oz. of brown sugar syrup (equal parts brown sugar and water)

Name: Grand French Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '3 1/3 oz. Coffee', 'Whipped Cream']
Making:
This gourmet coffee combines Grand Marnier liqueur's round notes of hazelnut and toffee with the intensity of coffee for added smoothness. The delicate flavour of orange gives this flavourful combination all of its uniqueness.
Combine Grand Marnier liqueur and coffee. Top lightly with whipped cream.
For an exceptional coffee: Use premium coffee for a richer, more aromatic combination. Pour in the heated liqueur first so that it becomes imbued with the flavours of the coffee.

Name: Grand Iced Cafe Latte
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Chocolate (dark)', '6 2/3 oz. Milk (hot)', '1 Espresso', 'Whipped Cream']
Making:
This gourmet coffee combines rich, harmonious flavours: the chocolate tempers the slight bitterness of the coffee, the cream adds an unctuous touch, and the delicate orange flavour of Grand Marnier liqueur lends this blend intensified aromatic richness.
In a tall glass, combine the hot espresso, Grand Marnier® liqueur, and hot milk with the melted dark chocolate. Decorate with whipped cream, or foamed milk if using the steam nozzle of your espresso machine, and chocolate shavings.
To make this recipe even easier, you can replace the melted chocolate with powdered cocoa combined with the hot milk.

Name: Handicapper's Choice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Amaretto', '5 oz. Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee glass and fill with hot coffee. Top with whipped cream.

Name: Hard Rocker Cider
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Cabo Wabo Reposado Tequila', '4 cup(s) Apple Cider', '1 cup(s) Cranberry Juice', '1/4 cup(s) Orange Liqueur', '1 tsp. Nutmeg', 'Cinnamon Stick']
Making: In a pot or crockpot, heat and stir cider, cranberry juice cocktail, and nutmeg on low just until hot for 2 hours. Do not boil. When ready to serve, turn on high for 10 minutes and stir in tequila and liqueur. Garnish with a cinnamon stick. Servings: 6

Name: Harvest Cider
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 cup(s) Apple Cider (Hot)']
Making: Combine in a warm mug. Ali says: You won't believe how good it tastes and it smells even better.

Name: Heat Wave #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Hot Chocolate', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour chambord into a mug and fill with hot choclate. Stir. Add whipped cream on the top.

Name: Heated Affair
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Partida Anejo Tequila', '6 oz. Apple Cider (Hot and spiced)', 'Heavy Cream']
Making: In a small warm wine glass add Tequila and hot apple cider. Float heavy cream. Garnish: grate fresh nutmeg over cream.

Name: Hennessy Hot Toddy
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hennessy Cognac VSOP', '1/2 oz. Maple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour into a glass coffee mug and fill with hot water. Stir and garnish with a cinnamon stick and freshly grated nutmeg.

Name: Herradura Apple-Cran Toddy
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Apple Cider', '1 cup(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 Cinnamon Stick', '4 oz. Herradura Reposado Tequila', '1 1/5 oz. Triple Sec']
Making:
Heat the apple cider, cranberry juice and cinnamon stick in a sauce pan just until boiling point. Remove from heat and add Herradura and triple sec. Pour into heat resistant mugs and garnish with orange peel.
Now that the weather is getting a bit colder, a delicious way to keep warm is the Herradura Apple-Cran Toddy. Going in par with apple harvest time, this cocktail incorporates traditional fall flavors: sweet apple and cranberry with cinnamon.

Name: Hiram Walker - Caramel Apple Macchiato
Ingredients: ['3/4 part(s) Hiram Walker Caramel Apple Liqueur', 'Espresso']
Making: Pour in a coffee mug and fill with hot espresso. Top with frothed milk.

Name: Hiram Walker - Hot Apple Toddy
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Hiram Walker Caramel Apple Liqueur', '1 part(s) Jameson Irish Whiskey', 'Apple Cider (Hot)']
Making: Build in a warm mug.

Name: Holiday Glogg
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Red Wine (dry, 750 ml.)', '1 1/2 tbsp. Mulling Spice', '1 tsp. Orange (zest)', '2 tbsp. Sugar', '2 tbsp. Almonds (blanched)', '4 tbsp. Raisins']
Making:
Wrap Mulling Spice in cheesecloth. In a large saucepan, combine the Wine, SKYY Vodka, cheesecloth with Mulling Spice, Orange Zest and Sugar. Allow to very lightly simmer over medium heat for at least 30 minutes (do not boil). Discard the mulling spices. Drop a few raisins and almonds at the bottom of each mug and top with the hot liquid.
Greet your guests in from the cold, winter weather with a traditional cup of Holiday Glogg, a Scandinavian take on mulled wine. Made in large batches and easily reheated time and time again, this recipe is a great one to have in your back pocket for any surprise guests.

Name: Hot Apple Cider
Ingredients: ['1/2 gallon(s) Apple Cider', '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', "1/32 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum"]
Making: Pour the Appler Cider into a crock pot and warm. When ready, fill a cocktail glass 3/4 full and add Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum and the Apple Pucker.

Name: Hot Apple Pie #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tuaca', '1 cup(s) Apple Cider (Hot)']
Making: Heat apple cider and pour into a mug. Add a cinnamon stick then pour in the Tuaca. Top with whipped cream.

Name: Hot Apple Pie - TY KU
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '4 oz. Apple Cider (hot)']
Making: Stir in a sugar rimmed martini glass and garnish with a cherry, whipped cream and a cinnamon stick.

Name: Hot Apple Rum
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Spiced Rum', 'Apple Cider (Hot)']
Making: Combine in a mixing tin and pour into a coffee mug. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with cinnamon.

Name: Hot Apple Xante
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Xante Liqueur', '3 part(s) Apple Cider', '1 stick(s) Cinnamon']
Making: Heat the freshly pressed apple juice together with the cinnamon stick. Add Xanté before serving. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Hot Brandy Alexander
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '4 oz. Milk (Steamed)']
Making: Pour into a heated mug and top with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

Name: Hot Brandy Toddy
Ingredients: ['1 Sugar Cube', '2 oz. Brandy', 'Water (Boiling)']
Making: Put sugar in coffee mug and fill 2/3 full with boiling water. Add brandy and stir. Garnish with a slice of lemon and a sprinkle of nutmeg.

Name: Hot Brick Toddy
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Butter', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '3 pinch(es) Cinnamon', '1 oz. Water (Hot)', '1 oz. Whiskey']
Making: Put all ingredients except whiskey into an Irish coffee mug and dissolve thoroughly. Add whiskey and fill with boiling water.

Name: Hot Butter Rum
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rum', '6 oz. Water (Hot)', '1 tsp. Butter']
Making: Combine until the butter melts and serve in a mug. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Hot Buttered Comfort
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '4 oz. Water (Hot)', '1 tsp. Butter']
Making: Stir in a coffee mug and float butter. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and a lemon slice.

Name: Hot Buttered Cranberry Punch
Ingredients: ['16 oz. Cranberry Sauce (Jellied)', '1/3 cup(s) Brown Sugar (Firmly packed)', '1/4 tsp. Cinnamon (Ground)', '1/4 tsp. Allspice (Ground)', '1/8 tsp. Cloves (Ground)', '1/8 tsp. Nutmeg (Ground)', '1/8 tsp. Salt', '2 cup(s) Water', '2 cup(s) Pineapple Juice (Unsweetend)', 'Butter Pats']
Making: Crush cranberry sauce with a fork. Mix with sugar, spices and salt. Add water and pineapple juice. Cover and simmer 2 hours. Ladle into mugs and float a pat of butter in each serving.

Name: Hot Buttered Rum #1
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Sugar', '1/2 tsp. Butter', '1 oz. Light Rum', '4 Cloves']
Making: In a mug, mix sugar, butter, rum and cloves. Fill with boiling water. Stir.

Name: Hot Buttered Rum #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 gallon(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 pound(s) Butter', 'Brown Sugar', 'Water (Hot)', 'Rum (To taste)']
Making: Mix ice cream until smooth and a little melted. Let the butter soften at room temperature and then gradually add to ice cream. Add the brown sugar until fully mixed. Add 2-3 tbsp. of batter to some hot water and rum. Mix well. You can store the batter in the freezer for up to 2 months.

Name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter #1
Ingredients: ['1 pound(s) Dark Brown Sugar', '1/2 pound(s) Salted Butter', '1 tsp. Nutmeg (Ground)', '1 tsp. Cinnamon (Ground)', '1 tsp. Cloves (Ground)', '1 tsp. White Cardamom (Ground)', '1 tsp. Vanilla', 'Dark Rum']
Making: Blend all ingredients in a and store in the fridge. To make a drink add a shot of dark rum along with 1 or 2 tbsp. of batter to a mug of very hot water.

Name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Brown Sugar', '1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '1/2 pound(s) Butter', '1 pint(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 oz. Rum']
Making: Blend all ingredients in a food processor or mixer and store in the fridge or freezer. To make a drink add a shot of good dark rum along with 1 or 2 tbsp. of batter to a mug of very hot water.

Name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter #4
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Water (Hot)', '1 tbsp. Butter (Real butter!)', '1 tbsp. Brown Sugar', '1/4 tsp. Vanilla', '1 1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1 sprinkle(s) Cinnamon', '1 sprinkle(s) Nutmeg']
Making: Blend well all the ingredients and add a cinnamon stick if you want.

Name: Hot Buttered Rum Mix
Ingredients: ['1/2 gallon(s) Vanilla Ice Cream (Preferably premium vanilla beam ice cream softened in the fridge)', '1 pound(s) Butter (Unsalted and cut in pads to soften at room temp.)', '1 pound(s) Brown Sugar', 'Cinnamon', 'Nutmeg']
Making: Mix soft the ice cream and the soft butter on low/medium speed and add the brown sugar. Add some cinnamon and a splash of nutmeg (to taste) . Store in the freezer and scoop and use!

Name: Hot Buttered Wine
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Muscat Wine', '1/4 cup(s) Water', '1 tsp. Butter', '2 tsp. Maple Syrup']
Making: Heat wine and water just to simmering; do not boil. Preheat an Irish coffee mug and pour heated wine mixture into glass. Add butter and maple syrup and stir. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Hot Cherry Pie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 tbsp. Whipped Cream']
Making: Melt the whipped cream and mix it with the two other ingredients.

Name: Hot Chocolate #3
Ingredients: ['1 pound(s) Cocoa Powder', '1 1/2 pound(s) Powdered Milk', '1/6 oz. Coffee-mate', '1/4 cup(s) Powdered Sugar']
Making: Mix milk, cocoa, sugar and Coffemate. For 1 serving place 1/3 cup dry mixture in cup, add boiling water and stir.

Name: Hot Chocolate #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey (IOr to taste)', 'Nestle Quick Chocolate Mix', 'Milk']
Making: Prepare the hot chocolate with the Nestle Quick Chocolate Mix and the milk and add as much whiskey as you like.

Name: Hot Chocolate Minze
Ingredients: ['1 splash(es) Rumple Minze', '1 cup(s) Hot Chocolate']
Making: Combine in a warm mug. Great for warming up a cold winter night!

Name: Hot Chocolate Mudslide
Ingredients: ['Hot Chocolate', 'TGI Fridays Mudslide', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Prepare Hot chocolate making it as hot as possible (as the mudslide mixture is cold and will cool it off). Add mudslide mixture to taste and top with whipped cream.

Name: Hot Chocolate Rasta
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '6 oz. Hot Chocolate', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Prepare hot chocolate (sweetened to taste) in a mug. Then add Kahlua and Coconut Rum. Top it off with whipped cream.

Name: Hot Cinnamon Anal Lube
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']

Name: Hot Cinnamon Cider Martini

Name: Hot Damn Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '8 oz. Hot Chocolate']
Making: Make hot chocolate according to the directions on the package. Add Hot Damn and stir. Good on a cold night.

Name: Hot Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Brandy', '1 Egg', '1 tsp. Sugar', '8 oz. Milk (Hot)']
Making: Mix all the ingredients, except the milk, in a tall glass. Add the milk. Stir and garnish with grated nutmeg.

Name: Hot Hard On
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', 'Coffee']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with hot coffee.

Name: Hot Honey Crisp
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) Apple Cider (mix)', '2 1/2 cup(s) Water (hot)', '3 oz. Barenjager Honey Liqueur', '2 oz. Jacques Cardin VSOP Apple Cognac']
Making: Mix in a Monte Cristo glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and whipped cream. Makes 2 servings.

Name: Hot Irish Nut
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with coffee.

Name: Hot Jala
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 tsp. Icing Sugar', '1 1/2 oz. Soda Water']
Making: Moisten the rim of the glass with a slice of lemon. Dip the rim into a dish of caster sugar. Pour the Cognac, Cointreau, Blue Curacao and icing sugar in a saucepan over a medium-high heat and heat until bubbling at the outer edges. Pour in a blender and add the soda water. Blend until frothy. Pour into the sugar-rimmed glass.

Name: Hot Kiss
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '6 oz. Coffee (Hot)', '1 oz. Irish Whiskey']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and add coffee. Top with whipped cream and garnish with chocolate covered mint.

Name: Hot Mamma
Ingredients: ['1 Espresso', '1 1/2 oz. Milk (Steamed)', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Using a cappacino machine, make an espresso and add the steamed milk. Then pour the Baileys, Frangelico and Peppermint Schnapps into the coffee.

Name: Hot Mexican Cider
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Kahlua Cinnamon Spice Liqueur', '3 part(s) Apple Cider', '1/4 part(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Lightly shake all ingredients and serve in glass mug. Garnish with dash of nutmeg or cinnamon.

Name: Hot Mist
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Canadian Mist', '1 oz. Irish Cream', '6 oz. Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Mix in a glass mug and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Hot NoChado
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut 100 Vodka Ginger Infused * see below', '1/2 part(s) Zen Green Tea Liqueur', '3 part(s) Tea Green', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice Squeezed']
Making:
Brew the tea to desired strength. Add ginger-infused ABSOLUT 100* and lemon juice.
Serve in a stylish mug, and garnish with a lemon wedge.
*To make the ginger-infused ABSOLUT 100, bake half cup of ginger (wrapped in tin foil) for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Allow the baked ginger to soak in the vodka for at least one day.
Served this holiday season at Aspen (30 W. 22nd Street, New York; 212-645-5040)
Whether you are the the belle of the ball or just a baller, tis' the season to "jingle bell rock" at hotspots Marquee and Tao.

Name: Hot Orgasm #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '2 oz. Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Mix and serve in a small mug.

Name: Hot Orgasm #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '2 oz. Water (Hot)']
Making: Mix and serve in a small mug.

Name: Hot Scotch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', 'Hot Chocolate']
Making: Pour butterscotch schnapps into an 8 oz. mug and fill with hot chocolate. (Optional: Garnish with whipped cream.)

Name: Hot Spiced Cider
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '8 oz. Apple Cider (Hot)']
Making: Combine in a wine glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Hot Totty
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Brandy', 'Lemon']
Making:
Heat the brandy until warm, pour into a coffee mug and add a lemon wedge.
A Hot Toddy, also sometimes referred to as a Hot Totty, is quite the versatile drink. While it is always served hot, its ingredients, as well as its uses, vary. Even the origin of its name is argued. Some say it is derived from a drink in India while others feel is it was it comes from a poem that describes a Scottish water well of a similar name.
Hot Toddy drinks have a history as being a cure for the flu and the common cold. Many would consume the warm beverage prior to going to bed when the weather was cold and wet in hopes of curing what ailed them or fighting off a new ailment. However, recent studies have shown that alcoholic beverages aren’t recommended to cure an illness, and can actually cause dehydration.
For those not worrying about cure-all, a Hot Toddy is the perfect drink to warm your bones when the weather is chilly.
Hot Toddies are often thought to be mulled cider. However, essential ingredients used with making a Hot Toddy can actually be a mixture of any hot beverage, such as coffee, tea, or cocoa, combined with a spirit of the drinker’s choosing and a sweetener of some sort.
Various other ingredients can also be added. Brown spices, such as cloves or cinnamon, citrus fruit, and even butter have been known ingredients. Even hot water and warmed lemonade have been used to create a tasty Toddy.

Name: Hot Tub
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 cup(s) Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Combine in a mug and top with whipped cream.

Name: Iced Coffee
Ingredients: ['1/4 cup(s) Instant Coffee', '1/4 cup(s) Sugar', '1/4 cup(s) Water (Hot)', '4 cup(s) Milk (Cold)']
Making: Mix together until coffee and sugar is dissolved. Add milk. Shake well. Using a blender or milk shake maker produces a very foamy drink.

Name: Inferno Of Pleasure
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '4 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '3 oz. Vodka', '1 tsp. Tequila', '1 tsp. Amaretto', '10 drop(s) Pineapple Juice', '10 drop(s) Orange Juice', '1 dash(es) Water']
Making: Heat to a moderate temperature and be sure that the alcohol does not evaporate. Pour into a plastic cup and drink it before it melts through the cup. Then enjoy the night in the INFERNO OF PLEASURE!

Name: Irish Coffee #1
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Coffee (Hot)', '2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Mix coffee and chilled Irish Creme and half & half. Add sugar and stir. Serve hot.

Name: Irish Coffee #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', "1 oz. Bushmill's Irish Whiskey", 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with coffee. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Irish Coffee #3
Ingredients: ['2 Sugar Cube', '1 1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '2 oz. Irish Whiskey', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with coffee. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Irish Coffee #4
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Irish Mocca Mint
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', 'Green Creme de Menthe', '1 package(s) Hot Chocolate Mix', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix hot chocolate mix with water (about 3/4 of glass - leave room for liqour). Add Jameson Irish Whiskey and top with whipped cream. Drizzle a little Creme De Menthe over top.

Name: IS Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. IS Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Tuaca', 'Coffee']
Making: Combine all ingredients in your favourite coffee mug, fill with freshly brewed, premium blend coffee and then top with whipped cream! A Delicious Adult Treat!

Name: Island Maided
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Vanilla Rum", '1 tsp. Sugar', '1/2 tsp. Butter', '4 Cloves']
Making: In a mug put sugar, butter, rum and cloves. Fill with boiling water. Stir.

Name: Italian Coffee
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 1/2 tbsp. Coffee Ice Cream', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and fill with hot coffee. Top with coffee ice cream and sprinkle with ground coriander.

Name: Jacques and Danny Surf Siberia
Ingredients: ['Coffee French Roast', '2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Whipped Cream optional']
Making: Fresh brew the French Roast Coffee. Add the Stolichnaya vodka, Kaluha and Bailey's Irish Cream. .Heat up a bit in the microwave if too cool. Optional - add whipped cream. Serve in a coffee mug or Irish coffee mug.

Name: Jager Milkshake

Making: In a rocks glass full of ice, pour in Jagermeister and Banana Liqueur. Fill with half-and-half.

Name: Jamaica Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coffee Brandy', '3/4 oz. White Rum', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with hot coffee. Sweeten to taste. Garnish with whipped cream and sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Jamaican Coffee #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. White Rum', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour in a coffee mug and fill with coffee. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Jamaican Coffee #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jamaica Rum', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a sugar rimmed coffee mug. Garnish with whipped cream and allspice.

Name: Javameister
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jagermeister', 'Coffee', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Add Jagermeister to a steaming hot cup of coffee or espresso. Top with whipped cream.

Name: Jeff's Hot Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Skimmed Milk', '1/10 oz. Vanilla', '4 tsp. Hot Chocolate Mix', '1/3 oz. Vodka', 'Water']
Making: Mix the hot chocolate mix, vodka, vanilla and skim milk together in a mug until it's a runny paste. Add boiling water to the paste and stir until dissolved.

Name: Joe Sheridan’s Original Irish Coffee
Ingredients: ['2 Sugar Cubes', '1 1/2 oz. Tullamore Dew Irish Whiskey', 'Coffee']
Making:
Fill an Irish coffee glass with very hot water to pre-heat, then empty. Pour hot coffee into hot glass until it is about ¾ full and drop in 2 cocktail sugar cubes; stir until sugar is thoroughly dissolved. Add full jigger of Tullamore Dew Irish Whiskey for proper taste and body. Top with a collar of lightly whipped cream by pouring gently over a spoon. Enjoy it while it’s hot.
Before there were double frappacinos and caramel macchiato, there was Irish Coffee, perhaps the first popular flavored coffee drink. Each year since this creamy concoction was invented new consumers discover it as a delicious way to warm up a cold winter day. In fact the drink was invented back in the 1930’s to welcome-and to warm up the first transatlantic travelers.
It was the dawn of transatlantic plane travel, when a trip from America across the Atlantic was only possible on an 18-hour flight by flying boat." On landing, passengers were ferried from these early seaplanes, arriving chilled and damp at Foynes Airport in County Limerick, Ireland. By 1942, a restaurant had been established at the airport to welcome the travelers, which by then included such VIP’s as Humphrey Bogart, Eleanor Roosevelt, Edward G. Robinson, Ernest Hemmingway and Douglas Fairbanks.
Legend has it that one night in 1942, a plane bound for the U.S. was turned back to Foynes due to bad weather. According to historians at the Foynes Museum, this was not an unusual occurrence. But on this night, as Chef Joe Sheridan was serving coffee, he thought a little something extra was needed to warm the tired travelers. He sweetened the hot coffee with sugar, added a dram of Irish whiskey and floated a dollop of rich, delicious, lightly-whipped cream on top. Irish Coffee was born – and it created a sensation.
By the time the new Shannon Airport opened in 1945, Sheridan had perfected his recipe. He took it to the new restaurant there, where more and more travelers would sample its delights – among them, a gentleman from San Francisco. Owner of the city’s Buena Vista Café, he made it his mission to bring the distinctive drink across the pond. In 1952, Buena Vista began serving the first Irish Coffees in America.
Today’s visitors to the northern California city, caught on a cold day with the wind coming across the Bay, still appreciate an authentic Irish Coffee, made Joe Sheridan’s way. Experts maintain that it takes a deft hand to make a true Irish coffee.
According to Buena Vista manager Michael Carden, it’s vital to use the traditional method. "You have to use actual heavy cream that is whipped to the perfect consistency and poured in just the right way to get it to float on top. That way, you get the coolness of the cream and the hot of the coffee. That’s real Irish Coffee."
Professional bartenders take pride in their ability to create the drink: pouring the cream over a spoon to make it float takes a bit of practice. In addition to the Buena Vista Café, consumers who’d like to try authentic Irish Coffee need to search out just such a skilled bartender.
Included in the ranks is Emily Snyder, bartender at T.S. McHugh’s Irish Pub and Restaurant in Seattle, where customers often drink Irish Coffee after dinner. They’re pleased that it’s made in the traditional manner. "Everything we make here is done the traditional way, and our customers like that." In Dallas, the Trinity Hall Irish Pub and Restaurant sees a pick-up in orders when the weather gets colder. According to bartender Israel Delgado, "Our customers love watching us make it behind the bar. We actually whip the heavy cream and layer it on, so the customer gets to see everything. They really like that – and the fact that we use real Irish – Tullamore Dew – in our drinks."
At New York City’s Kinsale Tavern, Irish Coffee is a year-round drink, always made in the traditional manner. Long Island’s Irish Coffee Pub makes the drink in the time-honored way, but substitutes brown sugar for the sugar cubes. According to Eric Lawton, the Pub’s Event Planner, customers "… definitely appreciate that we make it the right way."
To all those who will enjoy an Irish Coffee this winter – especially the 2,000 per day at Buena Vista Café – an Irish Toast is always appropriate. Slainte! (That’s "cheers" in Gaelic.)

Name: Jolly Rancher #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sour Apple Schnapps', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix well over ice.

Name: Kahlua #5
Ingredients: ['10 tbsp. Instant Coffee (Preferably good instant coffee)', '3 cup(s) Sugar', '3 cup(s) Water', '3 tbsp. Vanilla (Preferably "Watkin")', '1 quart(s) Vodka']
Making: Mix sugar and water. Simmer 1/2 hour. Add coffee then boil gently for 5 minutes. Add vanilla and vodka. May be served immediately.

Name: Kahlua and Club Soda
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Kahlua', '4 part(s) Club Soda']
Making: Pour Kahlua into a highball glass filled with ice. Add club soda. Top it with a lime and serve.

Name: Kahlua Hot Mexican Cider
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua Cinnamon Spice Liqueur', '3 oz. Apple Cider', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients and serve in a glass mug. Grate nutmeg on top to garnish

Name: Kahlua Peppermint Mocha Hot Cocoa
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua Peppermint Mocha Liqueur', '2 oz. Hot Chocolate', '4 oz. Milk']
Making: Bring milk to a simmer. Whisk in drinking chocolate. Simmer for 30 seconds while stirring. Add Kahlúa Peppermint Mocha. Garnish with peppermint stick and marshmallows.

Name: Kahlua Snow Cap
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua Peppermint Mocha Liqueur', '1 oz. Absolut Vanilia Vodka', '1 oz. Hot Chocolate']
Making: Mix ingredients together and top with whipped cream.

Name: Kaluha-Cino
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '4 oz. Coffee', '3 tsp. Hot Chocolate Mix', 'Sugar', 'Cream']
Making: Prepare coffee according to directions. When coffee reaches desired strength add hot chocolate mix. Stir until dissolved. Add Kaluha. Add sugar and cream to taste. Drink and enjoy.

Name: Kentucky Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Makers Mark Bourbon', '1 oz. Starbucks Cream Liqueur', 'splash(es) Frangelico', '5 part(s) Coffee']
Making: Pour Makers Mark and Starbucks Liqueur into an Irish coffee glass. Add Frangelico and fill the glass with hot coffee. Top off with a dollop of whipped cream.

Name: Kentucky Mulled Cider
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Makers Mark Bourbon', '5 part(s) Apple Cider Hot', '1 dash(es) Allspice']
Making: In a footed mug, add Maker's Mark. Fill mug with hot apple cider and the dash of allspice. Garnish with a tall cinnamon stick and a lemon slice.

Name: Kentucky Mulled Cider #2
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Makers Mark Bourbon', '4 cup(s) Apple Cider', '1 slice(s) Lemon with rind', '6 Cloves', '1/2 tsp. Allspice ground', '2 stick(s) Cinnamon']
Making: Heat to boiling and serve.

Name: Krupnik
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Honey', '2/3 cup(s) Water', '1 tsp. Vanilla Extract', '1/4 tsp. Nutmeg', '2 Cloves', '1 Lemon', '26 oz. Vodka']
Making: Combine honey, water, spices and 3 strips of lemon peel in a large sauce pan. Bring to a boil then cover and simmer for 5 mimutes. Add volka. Remove from heat. Serve hot or cooled. Makes 1 quart. Enjoy!!

Name: Lawrence Inc.
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', 'Espresso']
Making: Combine liquors and expresso in mixing tin. Shake and serve with whip cream on top.

Name: Ludmila's Cafe-Cocoa
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Coffee Vodka', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 cup(s) Hot Chocolate', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: In a large, heated mug add the vodkas and the hot chocolate. Mix well and top with a generous portion of whipped cream.

Name: Malibu Hot Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 cup(s) Hot Chocolate']
Making: Mix the Malibu and the hot chocolate in a warm mug. Add a dollop of whipped cream. Sprinkle with cinnamon or cocoa powder.

Name: Mayan Coffee
Ingredients: ['Coffee', 'Kahlua', 'Orange Juice', 'Sugar', '1 oz. Anisette', '4 pinch(es) Cinnamon', '2 dash(es) Orange Juice', '1 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: First pour some orange juice on a plate and sugar on another plate. Dip the rim of the glass into the orange juice and then dip in the sugar. Then crystallize the sugar on the glass over an open flame (Optional). Pourf anisette into the glass. Add about 3-4 pinches of cinnamon and two dashes of squeezed orange for zest. Add desired amount of coffee. Add about one full scoop of vanilla ice cream. Get a metal ladle and pour Kahlua into it. Hover the ladle of Kahlua over the open flame until it catches fire then add it to the drink. Stirring is optional and then...Enjoy!

Name: MexiCabo Hot Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cabo Wabo Blanco Tequila', '4 oz. Hot Chocolate', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a coffee cup. Stir well. Finish with dollop of whipped cream.

Name: Mexican Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '5 oz. Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Stir in a coffee mug and add coffee. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Mexitaly Coffee
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Dip the rim of an Irish coffee mug in a cherry juice and then in cinnamon sugar. Pour liqueurs into glass and add coffee. Garnish with whipped cream and shaved chocolate.

Name: Milano #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '8 oz. Coffee (Hot)', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Whipped Cream', 'Coffee Beans']
Making: Combine the coffee and the sambuca in a warm mug. Add the sugar, one coffee bean and a spoonful of whipped cream.

Name: Milano #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '8 oz. Earl Grey Tea (Hot)', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Combine in a warm mug.

Name: Mistbehavin Toddy
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Canadian Mist', '1 cup(s) Water (Hot)', 'dash(es) Honey', '3 Cloves', '1 slice(s) Lemon']
Making: Spike the lemon with the cloves and place in the cup of hot water. Stir in the Canadian Mist and the honey and enjoy.

Name: Mistical Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Canadian Mist', '2 tsp. Chocolate Syrup', '1 quart(s) Eggnog']
Making: Heat in a saucepan and pour into a mug. Garnish with whipped cream, a cinnamon stick and a maraschino cherry. Sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Mocha Brandy
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Milk', '3 tsp. Nestle Quick Chocolate Mix', '1/4 cup(s) Coffee', '1 1/2 oz. Brandy']
Making: Heat gently and pour into a coffee mug. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Mogul Masher
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Instant Hot Chocolate Mix', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Rumple Minze', '8 oz. Water (Hot)']
Making: Mix hot chocolate according to instructions in a 12 oz. glass and add liquors. Top with whipped cream.

Name: Monte Cristo
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Irish Cream', '3/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '5 oz. Coffee (Hot)', 'Sugar', 'Lemon']
Making: Rub a lemon peel along the rim of the cup, then dip in some sugar. Pour the alcohol in the cup first, then add the coffee.

Name: Mount Gay Holiday Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['1 Egg Large, Grade AA, seperated', '2 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1 oz. Heavy Cream', '1/2 tsp. Almond Extract', '1/2 tsp. Vanilla Extract', '1 1/2 oz. Mount Gay Eclipse Rum']
Making: Separate the egg into two bowls. Beat the yolk until stiff. Beat the white with 1 tsp. sugar until peaks form. Slowly fold the white and yolk together. Separately, beat the cream with the almond, vanilla, and 1tsp. sugar in a bowl until stiff. SLOWLY fold in the cream with the egg mixture. Add Mt. Gay Eclipse and stir gently. Refrigerate overnight, or serve immediately over ice in a punch glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg and cinnamon.

Name: Mulled Gin / Hot Gin Punch
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Beefeater 24', '2 part(s) Red Wine (Full bodied)', '1 tsp. Honey', '1 slice(s) Orange', '1 slice(s) Lemon', '1 piece(s) Orange (Just the peel, stuck with cloves)', '1 Cinnamon Stick']
Making:
Heat all ingredients in a saucepan and simmer till honey has dissolved. Pour into a toddy glass and drink whilst still warm.
Created by London mixologist Nick Strangeway

Name: New England Stone Fence
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Apple Cider (Warm)', "1 oz. Gosling's Black Seal Rum"]
Making: Combine in a warm mug. Garnish with a dash of nutmeg or cinnamon. This drink is sometimes called a Stone Wall or Stone Face, but what's in a name when you have this to curl up with on a cold night?

Name: Numi Dutch Tea
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Numi Chocolate Pu -erh Tea', '2 oz. Van Gogh Dutch Chocolate Vodka', '1 oz. Heavy Cream', 'Sugar']
Making:
Steep 1 Numi Chocolate Puerh tea bag at normal strength with freshly boiled water for 3 minutes, then remove bag. Add Vodka and stir. Whip cream with a little sugar and float on top. Dust with Powdered Cocoa to garnish.
Created by James Labe

Name: Numi Orange Spiced Cider
Ingredients: ['1 bag(s) Numi Orange Spice Tea', '8 oz. Apple Cider', '2 oz. Ron Abuelo Anejo Rum']
Making:
Heat Cider until very hot. Steep 1 Tea Bag directly in Cider for 5 minutes, covered. Uncover, add Rum and stir. Garnish with Cinnamon Stick.
Created by James Labe

Name: Nutty Irish Man
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour in a coffee mug and fill with coffee. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Pama Toddy
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Brandy', '1 1/2 oz. Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '3 oz. Tea Darjeeling with Cloven']
Making: Brew tea first. In an Irish coffee mug, pour brandy and pomegranate liqueur. Pour hot tea and stir. Garnish with cinnamon stick and orange peel.

Name: Papa Jacks Irish Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Whiskey', "1/4 oz. Creme de Cacao (Preferably DeKuyper's)", '1 cup(s) Coffee (Hot)', 'dash(es) Tia Maria']
Making: Pour the Creme de Cacao in the bottom of a coffee mug, add a shot of Irish Whiskey, fill to within 1/2 in of top with coffee. Add whip cream to fill, lace with more Creme De Cacao and with Tia Maria. Enjoy!

Name: Peach Cobbler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '6 oz. Apple Cider (Hot)']
Making: Mix the schnapps and cider in a hot drink glass. Garnish with cinnamon stick and serve hot.

Name: Peppermint Patty
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 package(s) Hot Chocolate Mix', 'Water (hot)']
Making: Add Rumple Minze to a cup. Pour in hot chocolate mix. Fill with hot water. Mix together. Top with whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles.

Name: Peppermint Perth
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. White Chocolate Liqueur (Preferably Godet White Chocolate Liqueur)', 'Hot Chocolate', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Fill a mug with hot chocolate, and the liquors. Top with whipped cream and shaved chocolate, then sprinkle with cocoa mix or cocoa powder.

Name: Pike's Peak
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '5 oz. Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and fill with coffee. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Polar Bear Hot Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 oz. Irish Cream', 'Hot Chocolate']
Making: Mix in a coffee mug and garnish with whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon.

Name: Portland Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Kahlua', '2 splash(es) Triple Sec', '3 dash(es) Cinnamon', '3 dash(es) Nutmeg', 'Sugar']
Making: Put sugar in a plate. Put 1 splash of Triple Sec in a bowl. First dip the rim of coffee cup in the bowl of Triple Sec, then in the sugar. Add 1 oz. each of rum (make sure it's 151 or it won't light) and Kahlua and 1 splash of Triple Sec. Light with a match (this crystallizes the sugar on rim). Add cinnamon & nutmeg. Add coffee (this should put the fire out) till cup is 3/4 full. Top with whipped cream. Enjoy! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Puff Adder
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Yukon Jack', '3/4 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour the Yukon and the Creme de Cacao into a cocktail glass. Float the 151 light. Light and let it burn about 15 seconds then extinguish and down it. This drink was created by Jason Boyd lead Bartender at the West Olympia WA Denny's restaurant.

Name: Pumpkin Spice Tequila Margarita
Ingredients: ['1/4 cup(s) Sauza Blue Silver Tequila', '1/2 cup(s) Cream', '2 tbsp. Syrup (Pumpkin Spice)', '2 tbsp. Sugar', '1 tbsp. Vanilla Extract', '1 tsp. Cinnamon', '1/2 tsp. Pumpkin Pie Spice', '1 1/2 cup(s) Coffee']
Making: In a saucepan, combine cream with pumpkin syrup, sugar, vanilla and spice. Brew your coffee and divide it between two mugs. To each mug add half of the Sauza Blue Tequila and the cream mixture and stir. Top with whipped cream and cinnamon.

Name: Rainbow Clown
Ingredients: ['3 Egg Whites', '1 cup(s) Whole Milk', '3 cup(s) Kirsch', '1 pinch(es) Coriander', '1 cup(s) Water']
Making: Mix water and milk. Purifywitha water purifer. Add Kirsch. Heat mixture with a curling iron so that the liquid becomes warm while the container remains at room temperature. Sprinkle coriander. Divide mixture into three glasses and layer one egg white on top of each.

Name: Raspberry Cappuccino
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '5 oz. Espresso (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and garnish with whipped cream and grated chocolate.

Name: Raspberry Hot Chocolate #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Creme de Framboise', 'Hot Chocolate']
Making: Make hot chocolate then add alcohol. Drop in some chocolate chips and stir to partially melt. Top with whipped creme and serve.

Name: Razzmatazz
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and fill with coffee. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Real Mexican Cafe
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '4 oz. Coffee']
Making: Pour into a mug and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle ground cinnamon on top.

Name: Real Pirates Grog (arrrrr!!)
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Spiced Rum', '2 can(s) Beer', '1 package(s) Oatmeal (Instant Quaker Oatmeal, Cinnamon and Spice preferred)', 'dash(es) Paprika (To taste)']
Making: Cook the oatmeal using beer instead of boiling water and stir in other ingredients.

Name: Red Hot Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Campari', '2 oz. Brandy', '3 oz. Whole Milk', '1/2 oz. Heavy Cream (optional)', '2 tbsp. Chocolate (chips, dark)']
Making:
Put milk, cream & chocolate in a milk frothing cup used for espresso. Froth milk as you would for cappuccino. When milk is hot remove frothing wand and whisk or stir vigorously until chocolate is completely melted. Add Campari and Brandy. Pour into heat-resistant cup. Can be garnished with 1 large hand-cut marshmallow or a red peppermint stick.
Originally served at 116 Crown in New Haven, CT, created by mixologist John Ginnetti

Name: Rich German Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', 'Hot Chocolate', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Fill a mug with hot chocolate, add the Rumple Minze. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Rodney Dangerpants
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Milk (warm)', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', "Hershey's Chocolate Syrup"]
Making: Mix milk and vodka in a Mason Jar. Splash in Kahlua and a squirt of Hershey's Chocolate Syrup. Garnish with a Hershey Kiss.

Name: Royal Cider Grog
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Crown Royal', '8 cup(s) Apple Cider', 'Cinnamon Stick']
Making: Mix whisky and apple cider in a large pot and heat until warm. Pour into 8 heat-proof mugs. Garnish each mug with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Ruedesheim Kaffe
Ingredients: ['3 Sugar Cubes', '1/2 oz. Asbach Uralt Brandy', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Place sugar cubes in a coffee mug and add brandy. Ignite and allow to burn for a good minute. Fill with coffee and garnish with whipped cream and a sprinkle of grated chocolate.

Name: Rumple Minze Patty
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', 'Coffee (Hot)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Fill a mug with coffee, add the alcohol then top with whipped cream.

Name: Russian Coffee
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Hazelnut Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Vodka', 'Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into an Irish coffee mug and fill with coffee. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Ryan's Triple Rum Cider
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Spiced Rum', '6 oz. Cider', '2 dash(es) Apple Pie Filling (spice)', '1 dash(es) Cinnamon']
Making: Heat cider until it gets very hot but not quite boiling. Next pour all three liquers into the cider. Add cinnamon and apple pie spices. For extra flavor add the spices before you heat the cider as well as after adding the rum. You can also make large batches of this easily just remember to keep a 3 to 1 liquer ratio.

Name: Saddle Warmer
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', 'Hot Chocolate']
Making: Mix Jack Daniel's Whiskey and Cinnamon Schnapps in a mug. Fill with hot chocolate. Sip and enjoy! Best on a cold winter day and you'll know why they call it a saddle warmer.

Name: Scottish Coffee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', 'Coffee']
Making: In a coffe mug pour in scotch and Drambuie. Fill the mug with coffee. Stir and top with whipped cream.

Name: Shot In The Dark #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', 'Coffee (Hot)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Fill a mug with coffee, add the alcohol then top with whipped cream and sprinkle with cinnamon.

Name: Single Malt Sangaree
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '2 oz. Wine Paumanok Cabernet Franc', '1 oz. Oban 14 Year Old Single Malt Scotch', '3/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 tsp. Sugar raw, or demerara syrup', '1 Cinnamon Stick']
Making: Add everything to a crock pot and heat until almost boiling. Pour into a heat-proof mug and twist an orange peel over the surface before serving. Garnish with a fresh cinnamon stick.

Name: Ski Lift
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 cup(s) Hot Chocolate']
Making: Mix and serve in a heated mug. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with chocolate shavings.

Name: Ski Lift #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 cup(s) Hot Chocolate']
Making: Mix and serve in a heated cup and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with shredded cocconut.

Name: Ski Slope
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'Hot Chocolate']
Making: Fill a mug 3/4 full with hot chocolate mix and water. Add Bailey's and Kahlua.

Name: Snortin’ Buffalo Cider
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '6 oz. Apple Cider', '3 Cloves']
Making: Pour into a Irish Coffee Mug and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Snow Plow
Ingredients: ['Cider (Hot Spiced)', '1 oz. Blackberry Brandy']
Making: Heat cider to desired temperature. Pour shot of blackberry brandy into a mug. Add hot cider. Serve with Cinnamon stick. Very warming!

Name: Snow Storm toddy
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 part(s) Red Stag Kentucky Bourbon', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Peachtree Schnapps', '2 part(s) Sour Mix', '2 part(s) Ginger Beer', 'Water (steaming hot)']
Making: Build in a pre heated coffee mug. Dust with fresh ground cinnamon. Serve with a stir stick.

Name: Snowball #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '5 oz. Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Snowberry
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '5 oz. Water', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Heat liquids and serve in a heated mug. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Snuggler
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Hot Chocolate', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Add the peppermint schnapps to the hot chocolate and top with whipped cream if desired.

Name: Sober Irishman
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Coffee', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer ingredients in an Irish Coffee Mug. Ignite or flame the 151 and enjoy.

Name: Southern Cocoa
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 cup(s) Hot Chocolate', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Combine in a mug and garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Spanish Coffee #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spanish Brandy', '5 oz. Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Spanish Coffee #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Kahlua', 'dash(es) Nutmeg', 'dash(es) Cinnamon', 'Coffee', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Rim coffee glass with cinnamon and sugar. Add 151 rum and ignite. Sprinkle nutmeg and cinnamon for effect and let heat for 10-20 seconds. The heat will caramelize the sugar rim. Keep it lit while adding the Triple Sec, Kahlua and coffee. Extinguish with whipped cream and garnish with cinnamon.

Name: Spanish Coffee #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '3/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Tia Maria', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'Whipping Cream (Preferably heavy)', 'Coffee']
Making:
Nothing is better on a cool day than a nice, steamy cup of coffee. That is, of course, unless you add something to the coffee to give it a little kick!
Next time you want something to take the chill off, and want it to include coffee and some of your favorite liquors, why not try creating a Spanish Coffee.
Making Spanish Coffee probably isn’t something you would do every day, considering the amount of ingredients required in the recipe. But, when you make the drink, it will definitely be worth your while.
One of the most common recipes calls for a high-proof rum, such as Bacardi 151, brandy, Kahlua or any type of coffee-flavored liquor, whipped cream or whipped heavy cream, cinnamon, and sugar.
Rim a snifter with sugar. Add 151 to glass and lay on its side. Light 151 and rotate glass until sugar is caramelized all the way around. Then stand glass up and add brandy, Kahlua, and Tia Maria (can be done while still flaming). Add coffee leaving about an inch and a half to the top. Blend whipping cream until slightly thickened and pour slowly on top allowing it to float. Top with a sprinkle of cinnamon and nutmeg. The cinnamon will spark if the flame is still burning. Sean's comment: It's a labor intensive drink, but well worth it (especially if you're getting tipped).
For a drink that is just as tasty, but requires less ingredients, try combining hot coffee, run, and Tia Maria. Top with whipped cream, and you’ll have a Spanish Coffee in no time!

Name: Spider Bite
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) Spiced Hot Cider Mix', '1 oz. Spiced Brandy', 'Water (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and stir. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Spiked Cocoa
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Milk', '1 tsp. Hot Chocolate Mix', '1 tsp. Cream', '1 tsp. Makers Mark Bourbon']
Making:
For each person, heat a cup of milk to steaming. Remove from heat before bubbles begin to form around edge of saucepan. Into cup or mug, measure chocolate mix, coffee creamer and bourbon. Add hot milk; stir until well mixed.
It’s never been a better time to drink Hot Chocolate, because this cocktail is no joke – the smoothness of handcrafted Maker’s Mark will have you coming back for more!

Name: Starbucks Liqueurs Peppermint Mocha
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Starbucks Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Peppermint 100 Proof Schnapps', 'Hot Chocolate']
Making: Serve in a peppermint candy-rimmed Irish coffee mug with whipped cream

Name: Steamy Apple
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Tequila Rose', '1 cup(s) Apple Cider (Hot)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Combine tequila and apple cider in a clear mug. Garnish with whipped cream and a cinnamon stick

Name: Stone Wall
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Apple Cider (Warm)', "1 oz. Gosling's Black Seal Rum"]
Making: Combine in a warm mug. Garnish with a dash of nutmeg or cinnamon. (This drink is also known as a New England Stone Fence)

Name: Stonewall
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 cup(s) Apple Cider (Warm)']
Making: Fill a mug with the warm apple cider and spike it with one shot of rum. This drink really hits the spot on a cold winter night.

Name: Sugar Island
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Cointreau', 'Coffee']
Making: Pour into a mug and fill with coffee.

Name: Tea & Sympathy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 cup(s) Tea Black']
Making: Combine in a brandy snifter, garnish with a lemon slice and enjoy.

Name: Tennessee Mud #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Whiskey', '5 oz. Coffee (Hot)']
Making: Pour into a coffee mug and garnish with whipped cream.

Name: The Gunner
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Coffee hot']
Making: Pour alcohol into a mug. Fill up with hot coffee, stir and top with whipped cream and a sprinkle of nutmeg.

Name: The Poor Russian
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Milk (hot)', '1/2 tsp. Instant Coffee', '1/2 tsp. Ovaltine', '1 drop(s) Vanilla Extract', 'Sugar', '1/2 cup(s) Water (boiling)']
Making: Combine everything except the vodka in a mug. Add vodka and stir. Sugar to taste.

Name: Tia-Maria
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Water', '1 cup(s) Brown Sugar', '4 tsp. Instant Coffee', '1 cup(s) Bundy Rum', '4 tsp. Vanilla Extract']
Making: Boil water, sugar and coffee for 10 minutes and let cool. Add rum and vanilla. Put in clean bottle(s) and leave for 1 week before using.

Name: Tokyo Tea - TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. TY KU Sake', '1 1/2 oz. Tea (green)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into an ice filled cocktail glass.

Name: Tom and Jerry (Hot New Year's Drink)
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Rum (Preferably Old Mr. Boston Imported Rum)', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 Egg', 'Baking Soda', 'Milk (Hot)', 'Superfine Sugar', 'Nutmeg']
Making: Preparing: first prepare the batter. Using a mixing bowl, separate the yolks and whites of 1 egg, beating each separately and thoroughly. Then combine both, adding enough superfine powdered sugar to stiffen. Add to this 1 pinch of baking soda and 1/4 oz. Old Mr. Boston Imported Rum to preserve the batter. Then add a little more sugar to stiffen. To Serve: Use hot Tom and Jerry mug. Using 1 tablespoon of above batter, dissolve in 3 tablespoons hot milk. Add 1 1/2 oz. rum. Then fill the mug with hot milk within 1/4 inch of top of mug and stir gently. Then top with 1/2 oz. brandy and grate a little nutmeg on top. The Secret of a Tom and Jerry is to have a stiff batter and a warm mug.

Name: Traditional Irish Coffee
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Irish Whiskey', '5 oz. Coffee', '2 tsp. Brown Sugar', '2 oz. Whipped Cream']
Making: Preheat an Irish Coffee Mug with hot water. Pour in Irish Whiskey. Add brown sugar and stir well making sure that the sugar is dissolved and the ingredients are well mixed. Add whipped cream by pouring it over a teaspoon and letting it flow onto the surface of the coffee. To obtain the true flavour of the Irish Coffee do not stir the drink after adding the cream. Simply drink it through the cream.

Name: Tullamore Dew Irish Coffee
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tullamore Dew Irish Whiskey', 'Coffee', '2 Sugar Cubes']
Making: Fill an Irish coffee glass with very hot water to preheat then empty. Pour hot coffee into hot glass until it is about 3/4 full. Drop in 2 cocktail sugar cubes; stir until sugar is thoroughly dissolved. Add full jigger of Tullamore Dew Irish Whiskey for proper taste and body. Top with a collar of lightly whipped cream by pouring gently over a spoon. Enjoy it while piping hot.

Name: Tullamore Toddy
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Tullamore Dew Irish Whiskey', '2 Sugar Cubes', '1 slice(s) Lemon']
Making: Fill a mug to top with hot water. Combine all ingredients and stir well. Serve in a glass mug and garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Turkey Gobbler
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) Hot Chocolate Mix', '2/3 cup(s) Water', '1 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Pour into a glass coffee mug. Top off with whipped cream.

Name: Vanilla-Coffee Liqueur
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Brown Sugar', '1 cup(s) Granulated Sugar', '2 cup(s) Water', '1/2 cup(s) Instant Coffee', '3 cup(s) Vodka', '1/2 Vanilla Bean']
Making: Combine sugars and water. Boil for 5 minutes. Gradually stir in coffee. Cool. Add vodka and vanilla and mix thoroughly. Cover and let ripen for 1 month. Remove vanilla bean.

Name: Vermont Coffee
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Coffee', '1 1/2 oz. Sapling Vermont Maple Liqueur', 'Cream']
Making: Pour Sapling into cup. Add hot coffee and stir. Float or mix cream if desired.

Name: Vin Chaud
Ingredients: ['2 bottle(s) Red Wine', '2 oz. Brandy', '4 2/3 cup(s) Water (Hot)', '2 can(s) Strawberries (Small cans)', '2 can(s) Pineapple (Small cans)', '4 tbsp. Sugar', '2 tbsp. Honey', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Dice the pineapple. Heat all the ingredients except the hot water and the pineapple cubes. Just before serving, add the water and the pineapple. Serve hot in goblets.

Name: Wake Up
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sambuca', '4 oz. Coffee']
Making: Mix together and wake up.

Name: Warm Apple Slider
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac (Preferably Hennesey)', '2 oz. Alize Gold Passion', '1 cup(s) Apple Juice']
Making: Heat the apple juice in a pot until a syrup-like liquid is formed. Pour into a large coffee mug and add Hennesy and Alize.

Name: Winter Warm-up #1
Ingredients: ['1/4 cup(s) Creme de Cacao', '1/4 cup(s) Creme de Menthe', '1 package(s) Hot Chocolate Mix', '1 1/2 cup(s) Milk']
Making: Warm milk. Add hot chocolate mix and mix well. Wait a minute and add both Creme De Cocoa and Creme De Menthe.Great hot but even better if you have a frothing machine. Perfect for cold New England winters!

Name: Winter Whipper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Don Lorenzo Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '12 oz. Water (boiling)', '2 tbsp. Hot Chocolate Mix', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: In a 14oz. mug add rum, Kahlua, Irish Cream and hot chocolate mix. Add hot water and mix well. Top with whipped cream.

Name: Wynter Wynde
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sea Wynde Rum', '1 tbsp. Maple Syrup', '2 sprinkle(s) Cinnamon']
Making: Fill a coffee mug with boiling water and other ingredients. Stir with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Xante Hot Apple
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Xante Liqueur', 'Apple Juice (freshly pressed)', '1 Cinnamon Stick']
Making: Heat the freshly pressed apple juice together with the cinnamon stick. Add Xante before serving.

Name: Zesty Appel Cider
Ingredients: ['Apple Cider', 'Apple Schnapps']
Making: Heat the apple cider. Add the schnapps to taste.

Name: Absolut Lime
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO Lime', '25 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 tbsp. Honey', '2 cup(s) Water boiling']
Making: Add boiling water to Jello and honey. Stir until mixed. Add 3 ice cubes. Add vodka and pour into 6oz. wineglasses. Place in freezer for about 1 hour or fridge until 'Jellified'. Remove and cut into squares.

Name: Bahama Mamas #1
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Rum', '2 cup(s) Coconut Rum', '2 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '3 package(s) JELLO (Orange)', '3 package(s) JELLO (Strawberry)', '3 package(s) JELLO (Pineapple)', '1 can(s) Orange Juice (Concentrate-undiluted)', '1 can(s) Strawberries (Frozen and in sugar)']
Making: Blend well the orange concentrate and the strawberries, then mix in the other ingredients. Makes approximately 72 JELL-O shots.

Name: Blue Margarita JELLO
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Tequila', '1/4 cup(s) Blue Curacao', '2 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '3/4 cup(s) Water (Cold)', '1/2 cup(s) Lime Juice', '2 package(s) JELLO (Lemon flavour)']
Making: Mix the ingredients, pour in 2 oz. shot glasses and refrigerate. The JELL-0 shots will be dark green.

Name: Caribbean Blue JELLO Shot
Ingredients: ['6 oz. JELLO (Berry Blue)', '16 oz. Water (Boiling)', '10 oz. Water (Cold)', '6 oz. Light Rum']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute part of the cold water with the light rum. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: Cherry Cuba Libre JELLO Shots
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) White Rum', '1 cup(s) Coca Cola (Boiling)', '1/2 cup(s) Coca Cola (Cold)', '1 package(s) JELLO (Cherry)']
Making: Mix the ingredients, pour in 2 oz. shot glasses and refrigerate.

Name: Cinnamon Cherry Jello
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO Wild Cherry', '1 cup(s) Water Boiling', '1 cup(s) Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Add Wild Cherry Jello to the boiling water in a bowl and mix well. Pour in Hot Damn and stir. Pour into small 1/2 or 1 1/2 oz. cups and put into refrigerator until firm. Then you are ready for your 'Cinnamon Cherry Jello'

Name: Electric JELLO
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO', '26 oz. Vodka']
Making: Substitute vodka for water in JELLO package instructions. Pour as liquid for shooters, put in fridge to gel. Tilt, suck and swallow!

Name: Electric Watermelon #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Vodka', '1/2 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '1 package(s) JELLO (Watermelon)']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute alcohol for cold water. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: Fruit Cake Jello Shots
Ingredients: ['2 package(s) JELLO (Mixed Fruit)', '1/3 cup(s) Triple Sec', '2/3 cup(s) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 cup(s) Peach Schnapps', '1/2 cup(s) Raspberry Schnapps']
Making: Mix 2 packages of mixed fruit jello mix with 2 cups boiling water. Stir until dissovled. Add Triple Sec, sweet and sour mix, peach schnapps and raspberry schnapps. Stir. Pour into shot glasses and refrigerate until contents gel.

Name: Fuzzy Navel Jello Shot
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Orange)', '1 cup(s) Peach Schnapps', '1 cup(s) Water (Boiling)']
Making: Stir boiling water into JELLO at least 2 minutes until dissolved. Stir in Peach Schnapps( room temp is ok). Pour into shot glasses and refrigerate. Makes approximately 16- 1 oz. shots or if you prefer you can make it into a jello mold.

Name: GawdDamn Good JELLO
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka (The oldest you can find)', '2 package(s) JELLO (Lime)']
Making: Follow the directions on the Jell-O package substituting vodka for water.

Name: HPNOTIQ JELL-O Shots
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Hpnotiq', '1 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '1 package(s) JELLO (Berry Blue or Lime)']
Making: Stir boiling water into JELL-O. Stir in HPNOTIQ. Chill in shot glasses until firm.

Name: Jed's Jell-o Shooters
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO any flavour', '1 cup(s) Water boiling', '3/4 cup(s) Everclear', '1/4 cup(s) Water cold']
Making: Add boiling water to Jello in bowl. Stir until all Jello is dissolved. Put into the freezer for a few minutes to cool. Add Everclear to Jello, then stir in the cold water. Put in refrigerator for 2 hours to cool.

Name: Jello Black Forest Cake
Ingredients: ['JELLO (Wild Cherry)', '2 cup(s) Water (hot)', '1/2 cup(s) Frangelico', '1/2 cup(s) Creme de Cacao', '2 tbsp. Sugar', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix hot water with Wild Cherry Jello. Add the Frangelico and Creme de Cacao. Stir in sugar. Pour into 1 oz. plastic shooter cups and chill. Top with whipped cream before serving. Makes about 25 shots.

Name: Jello Malibu Baybreeze
Ingredients: ['1/2 package(s) JELLO Cranberry', '1/2 package(s) JELLO Island Pineapple', '1 part(s) Malibu Rum']
Making: Add JELL-O to boiling water and substitute cold water with alcohol. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool

Name: Jello Pina Colada
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Pineapple)', "Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", 'Creme de Banane']
Making: Add Jello to boiling water. Substitute cold water for 1/2 Captain Morgan's and 1/2 Creme De Banane. Pour into plastic shot glasses and chill.

Name: Jello Shot
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO Black Cherry, small', '1 cup(s) Water boiling', "1 cup(s) Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Pour the small package of Black Cherry Jello into a heatproof bowl. Add the cup of boiling water and stir to dissolve Jello. Add the Jack Daniel's and pour into shot sized cups. Refrigerate until set. Makes 2 dozen shots.

Name: JELLO Shots - Cape Cods
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Cranberry)', '1 part(s) Vodka']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute alcohol for cold water. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: JELLO Shots - Gimlets
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Lime)', '1 part(s) Gin']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute alcohol for cold water. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: JELLO Shots - Lemonheads
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Yellow)', '1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Sour Mix']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute a 50/50 mix of vodka and Sour Mix for cold water. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: JELLO Shots - Malibu Blue
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Blue)', '1 part(s) Malibu Rum']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute cold water with the Malibu. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: JELLO Shots - Malibu Islands
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Island Pineapple)', '1 part(s) Malibu Rum']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute cold water with Malibu rum. Pour into shot glasses and refrigerate for 4 hrs.

Name: JELLO Shots - Margaritas
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Lime)', '1 part(s) Tequila']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute alcohol for cold water. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: JELLO Shots - Midori Sours
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Green)', '2 part(s) Midori', '1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Sour Mix']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute cold water with a mixture of 2 parts Midori and a 1 part each of vodka and Sour Mix. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: JELLO Shots - Peach Passion
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Peach flavour)', 'DeKuyper Peachtree Schnapps']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute alcohol for cold water. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: JELLO Shots - Purple Hooters
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Purple)', '1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 part(s) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute cold water with equal parts of vodka, Triple Sec and Chambord Raspberry Liqueur. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: JELLO Shots - Red Russians
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Strawberry or Cherry)', '1 part(s) Vodka']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute cold water with the vodka. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: JELLO Shots - Screwdrivers
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Cranberry)', '3 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Triple Sec']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute cold water with 3 parts vodka and 1 part Triple Sec. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: JELLO Shots - Strawberry Banana
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Banana Liqueur (Or banana schnapps)', '1 package(s) JELLO (Strawberry flavour)']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute alcohol for cold water. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: JELLO Shots - Strawberry Daquiris
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Red)', '2 part(s) Rum', '1 part(s) Strawberry Liqueur', '1 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute cold water with 2 parts rum and 1 part each of schnapps and lime juice. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: Long Island Iced Tea JELLO Shots
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 cup(s) Long Island Iced Tea Mix', '2 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '2/3 cup(s) Pepsi Cola', '1 package(s) JELLO (Lemon)']
Making: Dissolve JELL-O in boiling water. Add Pepsi and Long Island Iced Tea. Pour into disposable cups and chill till firm.

Name: Margarita JELLO Shots
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 cup(s) Tequila', '2/3 cup(s) Triple Sec', '2 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '1 package(s) JELLO (Lime)']
Making: Dissolve JELL-O in boiling water. Add triple sec and tequila. Pour into disposable cups and chill till firm.

Name: Midori Slime Ball
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Midori', '1 cup(s) Vodka', '1 package(s) JELLO (Lime)', '1 cup(s) Water (Boiling)']
Making: Add water, midori and vodka to JELLO. Mix well and chill until set. Cut into bite-sized cubes.

Name: Peach Slurpies
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Peach Schnapps', '1 package(s) JELLO (Peach)']
Making: Make JELLO as you normally would, but substitute 1 cup cold water with the peach schnapps. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool.

Name: Sex On The Beach JELLO Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Vodka', '6 1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '6 1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '2 package(s) JELLO (Peach)', '1 package(s) JELLO (Orange)']
Making: Mix the 3 packages of Jell-O with the boiling water. Add the vodka, the schnapps, and the triple sec and mix well. Pour into shot glasses and put in the refrigerator to cool. Watch out! You may have the best sex on the beach that you've ever had.

Name: Sweetest Bitch
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Kool-Aid (Grape)', '4 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Just mix and fix as you like! Enjoy!

Name: Wild Berry JELLO Shots
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) JELLO (Wildberry flavour)', "Gordon's Wildberry Vodka"]
Making: Add JELLO to boiling water and substitute cold water with vodka or water and vodka (depending on how strong you want them you can go full strength or half and half). Pour into shot glasses or small paper cups.

Name: 24 Martini
Ingredients: ['5 part(s) Beefeater 24', '1 part(s) Lillet', "2 dash(es) Orange Bitters Regan's"]
Making:
Stirred and served up with a grapefruit twist in a martini glass.
Adapted from a recipe by Sasha Petraske, Milk & Honey, New York

Name: 6-Spice Appletini
Ingredients: ['1/3 Apple (muddled)', '2 oz. Square One Organic Vodka', '1/2 oz. Aperol Orange Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Spice Syrup']
Making:
Mix in a cocktail glass.
. Mixologist’s Note: This cocktail is perfect for early fall and winter as the spice lends a warm note to the cocktail without being too heavy.
Credit: Allison Evanow

Name: A Lovely Pear
Ingredients: ['4 part(s) Absolut Pears Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Apple Juice', '1 part(s) Grape Juice White', '1 1/2 part(s) Peach Puree', '1 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients, shake and strain into 2 martini glasses. Garnish with a Pear slice.

Name: Absolut 100 Pumpkin Martini
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Absolut 100 Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Hiram Walker Pumpkin Spice Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making:
This Halloween, channel your favorite spirits minus the spook. Concoct a cocktail that you'll enjoy way into the witching hour.
Combine all ingredients over ice and shake. Strain in to martini glass, and garnish with a cinnamon stick.
Now being served exclusively at:
Mokai
235 23rd Street, Miami Beach
Sip on a cocktail with South Beach style and enjoy two of the season's newest spirits a bold, 100-proof vodka from ABSOLUT mixed with a delicious pumpkin pie liqueur.

Name: Absolut Boston Tea Party Martini
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Absolut Boston', '2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake ABSOLUT BOSTON, lemon Juice, and simple syrup with ice, strain into a martini glass, garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Absolut Chocolate Soufletini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '1 1/2 part(s) Chocolate Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Frangelico']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a powdered chocolate rim (optional).

Name: Absolut Mango Spice
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Absolut Mango Vodka', '1 part(s) Mango Juice', '2 slice(s) Jalapeno Pepper', '1/2 part(s) Partida Agave Nectar', '3/4 part(s) Lime Juice', '1 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Muddle jalapeno, agave syrup and mango nectar. Add remaining ingredients. Shake with ice and fine strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a jalapeno slice.

Name: Absolut Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Absolut Nut Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Absolut Pear Way to Heaven
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 part(s) Absolut Pears Vodka', '1 part(s) Condensed Milk', '1 part(s) Coffee Extract', '1/2 part(s) Amaretto']
Making: Combine all ingredients in shaker and add ice. Shake thoroughly. Strain over crushed ice into martini glass. Garnish with pieces of pear.

Name: ABSOLUT Raspberri Royal
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Raspberri Vodka', '3 part(s) Champagne', '3 Raspberries']
Making: Add all ingredients into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with raspberry.

Name: Absolut Ruby Red
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Ruby Red Vodka', '2 dash(es) Noilly Prat Dry', '2 dash(es) Creme de Peche', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 dash(es) Lime Cordial']
Making: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Absolut Smitten Pears
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 part(s) Absolut Pears Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Plum Diced', '3/4 part(s) Honey', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice', '3 slice(s) Ginger']
Making: Muddle the plum and ginger together. Add ABSOLUT® PEARS, honey syrup, a squeeze of lemon and ice. Shake and strain into martini glass.

Name: Absolut Spash #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', 'squirt(s) Lemon Bar Mix', 'squirt(s) Lime Bar Mix', 'squirt(s) Orange Juice', 'squirt(s) Cranberry Juice', 'squirt(s) Cherry Syrup']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a shaker over ice. Shake and strain into a large martini glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Absolut Swedish Fish
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a Swedish Fish Candy.

Name: Absolut Tropical Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 oz. DeKuyper Tropical Pineapple Schnapps']
Making: Pour over ice into a shaker. Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Acai Cranberry Cobbler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '10 Cranberries', '1 tsp. Quince Preserves or paste', '1 oz. Pomegranate Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: In the bottom of a shaker combine the fresh cranberries, quince paste and simple syrup (or sugar) and muddle and mash vigorously. Add VeeV, pomegranate liqueur and ice and shake vigorously. Strain and pour into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Alize Bleu Bling Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Alize Blue', '1 oz. Vodka Super-premium']
Making: Shake over ice, serve with a twist of lemon in a martini glass.

Name: Alize Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Alize Gold Passion', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix in a Martini glass.

Name: Amaretto Cosmic Bliss
Ingredients: ['3 Orange', '1 Lemon', '1 Lime', '4 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Squeeze all the fruit into a martini shaker. Add the amaretto. Add ice and shake vigorously for a very short time. Strain into rocks glasses with ice (or into martini glasses with no ice.) Makes 2 servings. Smile and enjoy!!

Name: American Relay
Ingredients: ["3 1/2 oz. Jefferson's Bourbon", '1 1/2 oz. Pallini Peachcello', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making:
Once every four years something amazing happens in the world of sports. For a few short weeks, over 10,000 athletes from 202 nations unite to compete in the greatest, most honorable sporting event in the world. Castle Brands invites you to get into the Olympic spirit with a few of their spirits. Enjoy their "international" cocktails inspired by the 2008 Summer Olympic Games.
Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Strain into a martini glass.

Name: An Apple a Day
Ingredients: ['1 1/5 oz. Partida Reposado Tequila', '1/2 oz. Apple Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Ginger Syrup', '1 1/2 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients and serve chilled in a martini glass. Garnish with Slice of Apple. – Marita Leonard, Ortinaque on the Mile, Miami

Name: ANDONG-TINI
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Soju Andong', '1 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '1/2 oz. Black Currant Syrup']
Making: Mix all ingredients in shaker. Pour into large Martini glass to serve.

Name: Anejo Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Partida Anejo Tequila', '1 oz. Amarula Cream Liqueur', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake and strain into a martini glass. Andre Cassagne, Ortinaque on the Mile, Miami

Name: Angel Island Martini
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Lime Juice Rose's", '1 1/2 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1 slice(s) Lime', 'Sugar']
Making: Line rim of glass with sugar crystals.. Mix ingredients in shaker. Strain and pour into sugar rimmed glass. Add slice of lime.

Name: Apeach Bellini Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Apeach Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Puree', '1 oz. Peach Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Champagne']
Making:
APEACH (Free spirited temptress)
Real peaches are proven to create a relaxing effect. For a calming cocktail, try the tempting “Bellini Martini”. Created at Balthazar, New York.
Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake, strain and pour into a chilled champagne flute. Add a splash of champagne and garnish with a fresh peach slice.
This drink is essential for getting “tickled peach” during a mellow afternoon with friends.
ABSOLUT Vodka celebrates the 2005 summer by “creating” seven distinct moods for summer socializing based on the affects of its flavor ingredients. From free spirited to passionate and intense, this summer ABSOLUT tempts consumers with a variety of cocktails and flavors to help get them in the mood for fun during the time of year they are most socially active.
