According to industry experts in the field of flavor and sensory science, flavors and fragrances affect daily experiences and can trigger certain moods and reactions. Each member of the ABSOLUT family, APEACH, RASPBERRI, VANILIA, MANDRIN, KURANT, CITRON and PEPPAR contain natural ingredients that evoke individual feelings and sensations that contribute to seven stimulating moods for summer socializing.
“Our flavors are as diverse and dynamic as the people who drink them,” said Tim Murphy, brand director of the ABSOLUT portfolio, The Absolut Spirits Company, Inc. “Each flavor has an individual taste and feeling that encourages nightlife patrons to experiment with new drinks and find the flavors that suit them, their moods and the various occasions that they socialize around,” he continues.
This summer, ABSOLUT has partnered with hot venues across the country to feature seven innovative cocktails inspired by each of the seven ABSOLUT flavors. The distinct taste of these flavors inspires the creation of smart, exciting and diverse cocktails while reflecting the seven hottest moods for summer socializing.

Name: Aperol Betty
Ingredients: ['4 part(s) Aperol Orange Liqueur', '4 part(s) Orange Juice', '2 part(s) Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Pour into a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Aperol Royal
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Champagne Spumante Brut', '1 oz. Aperol Orange Liqueur']
Making: Ensure that the Aperol and Champagne arre very cold. Mix together in a champagne flute.

Name: Aperol Sour
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Aperol Orange Liqueur', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain in a juice glass with plenty of ice. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Apple Blossom #2
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Yazi Ginger Flavored Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Amaretto', '4 part(s) Apple Juice']
Making:
Shake with ice and serve up in martini glass. Garnish with a sprinkle of cinnamon or an apple slice.
Created by Sungari's Restaurant in Portland, OR

Name: Apple Martini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Apple Mistletoe Tini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec']
Making: Pour in a martini glass.

Name: Apple Pie Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka (Or any other vanilla flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Calvados', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with thin slice of apple.

Name: APPLE TINI
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vox Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Apple Pucker']
Making: Shake Vox Vodka and Apple Pucker with ice. Strain and serve in a martini glass.

Name: Apple-tin
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Apple Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '4/5 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake all the ingredients with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a slice of apple.

Name: Appletini #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. 99 Apples Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Orange Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with apple peel.

Name: April's Violet
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '2 tsp. Blue Curacao', '3 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Mix over ice, stir and strain into a chilled Martini glass.

Name: Aqua-Marine
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Creme de Banane']
Making: Shake well, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice. Bill Creek, Omni Hotel – Dallas

Name: Armada Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Amontillado Sherry']
Making: Stir over cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Asian Fusion Martini
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Ocean Vodka', '2 oz. Limeade', '1 piece(s) Ginger 1/2 inches long', '1 piece(s) Lemon Grass sliced in half', '1 squirt(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Add all ingredients in a shaker with ice shake and pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Asian Paradise
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Moonstone Raspberry Sake', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix ingredients in shaker with ice. Shake and strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with orange twist.

Name: Asian Pear Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '2 part(s) Absolut Pears Vodka', '1 part(s) Pear Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake and serve up in a martini glass.

Name: Asian Sensation
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Malibu Rum', 'Sprite or 7-up']
Making: Shake pineapple juice and Malibu Rum with ice. Strain and serve with Sprite over ice in a highball glass or dress it up in a martini glass.

Name: Asian-Irish Cream
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Sake', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Irish Whiskey']
Making: Serve chilled in a martini glass.

Name: Astrono-TIQ
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Vodka', '8 drop(s) Campari']
Making: Shake well, strain into a martini glass. Add 8 drops of Campari and do not stir.

Name: Autumn Manhattan
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Applejack', '2 splash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake softly in shaker untill too cold to handle .Pour straight-up into martini glass.Add slice of fresh red apple.

Name: Avalanche
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Lychee Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lychee fruit. Signature drink of Ava at the Mirage Casino - Las Vegas

Name: AVE' Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Partida Reposado Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Averna Sambuca', '2 tbsp. Ice Cream Coffee']
Making:
Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with ground cinnamon.
Developed by NYC Mixologist Dalio Calada

Name: Avion G5
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Avion Silver Tequila', '1 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass over fresh ice. Garnish with a twist of lime.

Name: Babbling Brooke
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Shake raspberry vodka, blue curacao and desired amount of sour mix over ice. Strain and pour into a martini glass. Garnish with lime and/or cherries. Could also be served on the rocks in a highball glass.

Name: Babyface Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka (Or any other strawberry flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/4 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Bacardi Dragon Berry Grotto Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1 part(s) Bacardi Limon', '1/2 part(s) Di Saronno Oringinale Amaretto', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients into a mixing glass filled with ice. Shake for 10 seconds and strain into a chilled martini cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Bacardi O Chocolat Rendezvous
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Bacardi O', '1 part(s) Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled, chocolate-rimmed martini glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Bacardi Razz Truffle Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Razz Rum', '1 part(s) Creme de Cacao', '1 part(s) Grey Goose Vodka', '1 part(s) Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Bad Girl
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix in a shaker with ice. Serve straight up in a martini glass with a lightly sugared rim and a slice of lemon.

Name: Baileys Chocolatini
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Drop several ice cubes into a shaker and add Baileys, Smirnoff No.21® Vodka and Chocolate Liqueur. Shake and strain into a chilled Martini glass.

Name: Baileys Irish Martini
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', "2/3 oz. Bushmill's Irish Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Coffee (Strong and cold)']
Making: Drop some ice cubes into a shaker and pour over Baileys. Add Bushmills Original Irish Whiskey and strong cold coffee. Shake vigorously nad strain into a Martini glass. If you don’t have Bushmills Original Irish Whiskey why not try adding some Johnnie Walker Scotch Whisky? Its smoky undertones will mingle perfectly with the smooth creamy Baileys.

Name: Baked Apple Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Van Gogh Wild Appel Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sour Apple Pucker', '1/4 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake well and strain into a martini glass coated with a cinnamon sugar rim.

Name: BAM - Blue Angel Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Blue Angel Vodka', '1 dash(es) Vermouth']
Making: In a shaker combine vodka and vermouth together with several ice cubes. Shake vigorously, then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with olives or a lemon twist.

Name: Banana Coffee Cake Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 part(s) Rum Chata', '1/4 part(s) Van Gogh Double Espresso Vodka', '1/3 part(s) 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1/2 part(s) UV Chocolate Cake Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice, pour into martini glass, garnish with a banana slice.

Name: Banana Cream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', 'Milk']
Making: Shake and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Banana Nut Bread Martini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Rum Chata', '1/2 part(s) Banana Liqueur', '1 part(s) Frangelico']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass; float a few walnuts on top.

Name: Beachside Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake vodka and vermouth. Pour into two martini glasses and add 2 - 3 olives.

Name: Bellini Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Champagne', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 wedge(s) Peach']
Making: Cut one of the peach wedges away from the skin and muddle in the bottom of a Martini glass. Add vodka, champagne and peach schnapps together and shake thoroughly over ice. Pour into glass and garnish with second peach wedge. White peaches don't muddle well, don't have good flavor and lose some of the drinks color.

Name: Belvedere Afternoon Mar-tea-ni
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Belvedere Citrus Vodka', '1 tsp. Nectarine (Jam)', '2 oz. Tea (Earl Grey, chilled)', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with an edible flower.

Name: Belvedere Black Raspberry Shrub
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Belvedere Black Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Raspberry and Strawberry Shrub']
Making: Stir over ice and strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Berry Blue - TY KU
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Sake', '10 Blueberries']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with blueberries.

Name: Between the Sheets #3
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Jacques Cardin VSOP Jasmin Cognac', '1/2 part(s) Cointreau', '1/2 part(s) Tommy Bahama White Sand Rum', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Garnish with an orange twist in a chilled martini glass.

Name: Big Spender
Ingredients: ['2 1/4 oz. Partida Anejo Tequila', '1 oz. Tawny Port (Winter Spiced 10 year old)', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: In a mixing glass stir all ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with brandied cherries.

Name: Bikini Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Citrus Vodka', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake all ingredients except grenadine. Strain into a martini glass. Sink the grenadine to the bottom and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Bikini TY-Tini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. TY KU Soju', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice', '1 splash(es) Champagne']
Making: Shake liqueur, Soju and lemon juice with ice and strain into a martini glass. Add splash of champagne.

Name: Bitter Christina
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Martini', '1 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 splash(es) Pisang Ambon', 'Schweppes (Bitter Lemon)']
Making: Fill a high ball glass with ice and add martini, Sloe gin and Pisang Ambon. Fill with Bitter Lemon.

Name: Black and White Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka (Or any other vanilla flavoured vodka)', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with black and white licorice candies.

Name: Black Pearl Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pearl Black Vodka', '2 drop(s) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with two olives.

Name: Blackthorn
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '8 drop(s) Orange Bitters', '1 oz. Plymouth Sloe Gin', '3/4 oz. Plymouth Gin']
Making: Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add the Plymouth Gin, Plymouth Sloe Gin, vermouth and orange bitters. Stir until chilled and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with orange zest.

Name: Bloody-tini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '1 oz. Acai Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', 'Champagne']
Making:
Combine VeeV, Acai juice and fresh lime with fresh ice in a cocktail shaker and shake. Strain into a chilled martini glass and top with champagne. Serve with a fresh lime wedge .
Vampires are the talk of the town. Don’t miss your chance to take a bite/ or a sip of a thirst-quenching, bloody cocktail. Loaded up with a serious burst of antioxidants from the most talked about superfruit, acai – this cocktail will give you the strength you need to survive once the sun rises.

Name: Blue BAM
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Blue Angel Vodka', '1 dash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: In a shaker combine vodka and curacao together with several Ice cubes. Shake vigorously, then strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange or lemon twist.

Name: Blue Dolphin Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Shake all ingrediants and pour into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with two cherries.

Name: Blue Duck
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 dash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake vanilla vodka and Blue Curacao and pour into either a shot or martini glass. Float Chambord on top.

Name: Blue Moon #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Parfait Amour', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain and serve up in a martini glass.

Name: Blue Moon Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Stir well over ice cubes and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Blue Rain
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', "1 splash(es) Rose's Lime Juice", '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass

Name: Blue Skyy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Splash Blue Curacao in a martini glass. Pour the Vodka down the slope of the glass so that as little of the Curacao and Vodka mix as possible. Obviously you don't have to use Skyy Vodka but then it wouldn't be a Blue Skyy now would it?

Name: Blue-on-Blue Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with olive.

Name: Blueberry Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Lemon Vodka (Or Absolut Citron)', '1 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', 'dash(es) Cranberry Juice', 'Sugar']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Blueberry Martini
Ingredients: ['1 splash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao', '3 oz. Gin']
Making: Pour in a martini glass.

Name: Bomba Cosmo
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Bomba Black Energy Drink', '1 1/3 oz. Vodka', '2/3 oz. Triple Sec', '2/3 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake vodka, triple sec and lime juice together. Pour into chilled martini glass. Top with Black Magic Bomba Energy Drink.

Name: Boomerang Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth `', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'dash(es) Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Stir well over ice cubes and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a kiwi slice.

Name: Brazilian Blood Sour
Ingredients: ['4 piece(s) Orange (Blood orange)', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: In the bottom of a cocktail shaker, combine the blood orange sections and simple syrup and muddle thoroughly. Add VeeV, lemon juice, sweet vermouth, and ice, and shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a blood orange wedge.

Name: Broadway Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Broken Leg Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice or to taste', '2 stick(s) Cinnamon']
Making: Combine liquid ingredients in shaker with crushed ice and shake. Pour into a martini glass. Garnish with an orange slice and one whole stick and one broken stick of cinnamon..

Name: Bubbly Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Champagne']
Making: Stir gently in a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass and garnish with two olives. Note: the quality of the drink is proportional to the quality of the champagne used.

Name: Buckeye Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir (it is very important not to "shake" the gin, as a fussy Englishman commented!) with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a black olive.

Name: Buffalo Symphony
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '2 wedge(s) Pineapple (infused with port and caramelized)', '1 slice(s) Ginger', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Barenjager Honey Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Port']
Making: Muddle pineapple and ginger and shake all with ice. Strain into a cinnamon rimmed martini glass.

Name: Burnin' Love Martini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Rum Chata', '1/2 part(s) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Vampyre Red Vodka', '1/3 part(s) Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Layer over RumChata in a chilled glass with red sugar or cinnamon sugar on the rim.

Name: Burning Love
Ingredients: ['3 oz. TY KU Sake']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with cinnamon heart candies.

Name: Burnt Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dry Gin', '1 oz. Single Malt Scotch Whisky']
Making: Build in a cocktail glass rimmed with bourbon or scotch.

Name: Butterscotch Truffle Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Creme de Cacao']
Making: Blend with ice and serve in a chilled glass.....DECADENT! It tastes just like a butterscotch truffle.

Name: Cabaret Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Rouge)', '4 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '4 dash(es) Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Cable Car
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Rum", '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Goldschlager']
Making: Serve up in a well-chilled martini glass with a cinnamon-sugared rim.

Name: Cactus Juice
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '4 oz. Tropicana Twister Wild Strawberry - Dragonfruit flavor', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: In ice filled shaker add all ingredients. Shake well. Strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with orange wedge.

Name: Cajun Martini #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Pepper Vodka', 'dash(es) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir over cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an olive stuffed with jalapeno pepper.

Name: California Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Red Wine', '1 tbsp. Dark Rum', '4 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Campari Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Campari']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Candy Apple Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. 99 Apples Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into chilled, sugar-rimmed martini glass. Garnish with apple peel.

Name: Candy-Corn Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Russian Standard Vodka (* Candy-Corn infused)', '1/2 oz. Wine (Moscato sweet dessert wine)', '3/4 oz. Grenadine (**Citrus peel grenadine)']
Making:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake very well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
*to make candy corn-infused Russian Standard: for every 750ml bottle of Russian Standard, add in 1 cup cande corn and allow to infused in an airtight container for approx. 24 hrs. Fine strain candy corn and re-bottle. Store in fridge.
**to make grenadine syrup: for every 1 cup of POM wonderful pomegranate juice, dissolve 1 cup granulated sugar over stove top. Once dissolved, add in the skins of 1 orange and 1 lemon and simmer for 10 mins. Remove skins and chill syrup.

Name: Caramel Apple - TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Sake', '1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '4 oz. Apple Juice', '1 splash(es) Apple Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Caramel Liqueur (or 1 squirt Caramel Syrup)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an apple slice.

Name: Caramel Apple Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. 99 Apples Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into chilled, sugar-rimmed martini glass. Garnish with apple peel.

Name: Caramel Appletini - TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a green apple slice and a caramel candy.

Name: Caramel Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. Butter Shots', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a shaker and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled martini glass and drop in a cherry.

Name: Caribou Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Coffee Vodka (Or any other coffee flavoured vodka)', 'Champagne (Or dry sparkling wine)']
Making: Pour chilled vodka in a martini glass. Top up with champagne and stir gently. Garnish with a lemon twist and drop in a coffee bean.

Name: Caribou V Day-tini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Caribou Iced Vanilla Coffee', '1 oz. Absolut Apeach Vodka', '1 oz. Absolut Vanilia Vodka', '1 oz. White Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake and serve in martini glass.

Name: Carrot -Top
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Tree Schnapps', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine in a martini glass or on the rocks. Garnish with a slice of orange.

Name: Celtic Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Boru Vodka']
Making: Shaken over ice and served in a martini glass with a lemon twist.

Name: Chambord Dream Angel Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Chambord Flavoured Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with black raspberries.

Name: Chambrosia
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 squirt(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake vodka and Chambord with ice in cocktail shaker. Strain into a Martini glass. Serve with squeeze of fresh lime juice and a lime wedge.

Name: Cherry Ginger Blossom
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1 part(s) Vodka', '5 Cherries Black', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Muddle the black cherries and serve in a chilled martini glass.

Name: Cherry Pie ala Mode
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Travis Hasse's Cherry Pie Liqueur", '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice, shake vigorously and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with cherries.

Name: Cherry Popper
Ingredients: ['1/8 oz. Grand Marnier', '7/8 oz. Cherry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Chocolate Cappuccino
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Carolans Irish Cream Liqueur', '1/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake with ice until frothy. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with a chocolate ovation.

Name: Chocolate Chip Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shakewith ice and serve on the rocks in a large martini glass. Garnish with 3 choclolate chips at the bottom of the glass.This is a strong drink. Particluarly refreshing in the summer.

Name: Chocolate Choo-choo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Mix ingredients in a shaker with chipped ice. Shake well and pour into a martini glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a Hershey's Kiss.

Name: Chocolate Covered Cherry
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Pinky Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Maraschino Liqueur', '3/4 part(s) Creme de Cacao', '1 tbsp. Chocolate Sauce', '1 Cherry (Chocolate Covered)']
Making:
Swirl chocolate sauce around the inside of a martini glass and set aside. Pour Pinky, maraschino liqueur and crème de cacao into a cocktail shaker. Add ice, shake well and strain into chocolate swirled glass. Add a chocolate covered cherry, on a cocktail pick, for garnish.
Recipe created by Natalie Bovis-Nelsen, aka The Liquid Muse

Name: Chocolate Covered Cherry Bomb
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Rum Chata', '1 part(s) Chocolate Vodka', '1 part(s) Cherry Vodka']
Making: Shake all ingredients and serve over ice in a martini glass.

Name: Chocolate Cream Pie Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Rum Chata', '1 part(s) Vanilla Vodka', '1 part(s) Godiva Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a martini glass.

Name: Chocolate Dream Martini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Boru Vodka', '1/2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass rimmed with chocolate shavings. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Chocolate IS Decadence
Ingredients: ['1 oz. IS Vodka', '1 oz. Godiva Mocha Liqueur', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Combine all ingredients in shaker with a handful of ice. Shake and strain into a martini glass. Insert chocolate mint, stir and Tempt Your Palate with Pure Decadence!

Name: Chocolate Kiss Martini
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Pallini Raspicello', '2 oz. Boru Vodka', '3/4 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass rimmed with chocolate shavings. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Chocolate Martini
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur White', '2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur Dark', '2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka']
Making: Chill a Martini Glass. Shake ingredients with ice and strain into the glass. Top with chocolate flakes and decorate glass with chocolate syrup.

Name: Chocolate Martini #2
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Stir with ice cubes and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a chocolate curl.

Name: Chocolate Martini #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 splash(es) Creme de Banane', 'dash(es) Brown Creme de Cacao']
Making: Chill the Absolut, the white crème de cacao and the crème de banane. Strain into a martini glass and add the brown crème de cacaoa -that will settle for a great layered drink.

Name: Chocolate Martini #4
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Cream Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Shake with ice and pour in a Martini glass.

Name: Chocolate Martini (The Original)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix in a mixing glass. Stir and strain in a martini glass up. Garnish with a Hershey's Kiss.

Name: Chocolate Raspberry Martini
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur', '4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '3 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'Chocolate Syrup', 'Cocoa Powder']
Making: Freeze 2 martini glasses. Combine Chocolate liqueur, vanilla vodka and Chambord in an ice filled pint glass. Stir. Rim martini glasses with either the chocolate shell syrup (dip glass turn slowly until it sets) or dip in cocoa. Mix and strain into the martini glasses and serve. If you use the chocolate shell syrup try not to laugh when your guests lick the rim of their glass!

Name: Chocolate Viking Luv
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Juice the rim of a Martini glass with lime juice and dip into powdered sugar. Mix the vodka and Frangelico in a shaker over crushed ice. Pour into the Martini glass.

Name: Christmas Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a candy cane.

Name: Cielo Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Blanco Tequila', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill shaker with ice. Add all ingredients. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Cielo Grapefruit Squeeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Blanco Tequila', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 pinch(es) Salt', 'Grapefruit Soda']
Making: Combine tequila, sea salt grapefruit juice and lime juice in a martini glass filled with ice. Stir gently and top with grapefruit soda. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Cielo Jalisco Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Blanco Tequila', '2 tsp. Sugar', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 Egg White', 'Soda Water']
Making: Fill shaker with ice. Add tequila, sugar, lime juice, and egg white. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass and top with cold soda water.

Name: Cielo Passionate Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Anejo Tequila', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Passion Fruit Puree']
Making: Add ice and ingredients to shaker. Shake well. Strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Cielo Peachy Keen
Ingredients: ['2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Blanco Tequila', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 cup(s) Peach Puree', '1 slice(s) Peach']
Making: Fill a blender 1/4 of the way with ice. Add all of the ingredients except 4 slices of peach. Blend until frothy. Pour into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a slice of peach.

Name: Cielo Pomegranate Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Reposado Tequila', '8 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Fresca', '1 slice(s) Mango']
Making: Place first 5 ingredients in shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into chilled martini glasses. Top with Fresca. Garnish with a slice of mango.

Name: Cielo Raspberry Bliss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Blanco Tequila', '3/4 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 Raspberries', '1 splash(es) Peach Schnapps', 'Soda Water']
Making: Fill shaker with ice. Add all ingredients. Shake well. Strain into ice filled martini glass. Top with a splash of soda water. Garnish with fresh raspberriesBlanco

Name: Cielo Tequini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Reposado Tequila', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Orange Bitters']
Making: Fill shaker with ice and add all ingredients. Shake well. Strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with a twist of lime.

Name: Ciroc Carmeltini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. CIROC Vodka', '2 oz. Godiva Caramel Milk Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Shake and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Ciroc Truffletini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. CIROC Vodka', '1 oz. Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with Godiva Milk Chocolate Truffle or White Chocolate Shavings.

Name: Citron Mojito Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', 'sprig(s) Mint', '1 dash(es) Sugar Syrup', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making:
CITRON (Sun and surf)
Citrus fruits promote happiness and evoke the carefree spirit of summer. For a taste that captures these sweet and fleeting moments, try the “CITRON Mojito”. Created at Akairo, Miami.
Muddle the mint leaves with CITRON, sugar syrup and lime juice in a collins glass. Fill the glass with ice cubes and top off with soda water. Garnish with a mint sprig.
This drink will take you away faster than you can ask your boss for a three day weekend.
ABSOLUT Vodka celebrates the 2005 summer by “creating” seven distinct moods for summer socializing based on the affects of its flavor ingredients. From free spirited to passionate and intense, this summer ABSOLUT tempts consumers with a variety of cocktails and flavors to help get them in the mood for fun during the time of year they are most socially active.
According to industry experts in the field of flavor and sensory science, flavors and fragrances affect daily experiences and can trigger certain moods and reactions. Each member of the ABSOLUT family, APEACH, RASPBERRI, VANILIA, MANDRIN, KURANT, CITRON and PEPPAR contain natural ingredients that evoke individual feelings and sensations that contribute to seven stimulating moods for summer socializing.
“Our flavors are as diverse and dynamic as the people who drink them,” said Tim Murphy, brand director of the ABSOLUT portfolio, The Absolut Spirits Company, Inc. “Each flavor has an individual taste and feeling that encourages nightlife patrons to experiment with new drinks and find the flavors that suit them, their moods and the various occasions that they socialize around,” he continues.
This summer, ABSOLUT has partnered with hot venues across the country to feature seven innovative cocktails inspired by each of the seven ABSOLUT flavors. The distinct taste of these flavors inspires the creation of smart, exciting and diverse cocktails while reflecting the seven hottest moods for summer socializing.

Name: Citrus Martini
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Lemon Vodka', '1 tsp. Grand Marnier (Or orange liqueur)', '1 tsp. Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Classic Ginger Martini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Vodka', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Cloudy Red Flame Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Tangerine Juice']
Making: Put 2 ice cubes into a shaker. Add Absolut Citron Vodka and raspberry liqueur and stir. Add juices and shake until cocktail is chilled. Strain drink into a martini glass. Add lime wedge for garnish. Makes 2 drinks.

Name: Cockspur Cider
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cockspur Fine Rum', '2 oz. Apple Cider', 'Cinnamon', 'Sugar', '1 slice(s) Orange']
Making: Run orange slice over the rim of the martini glass and dip rim in cinnamon sugar. Combine Cockspur Rum and apple cider in a shaker with ice. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with the orange slice. Also can be served in a tall glass on the rocks.

Name: Coconut Cream Pie Martini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Rum Chata', '1 part(s) Smirnoff Whipped Cream Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Coconut Rum', '1 splash(es) Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a martini glass.

Name: Coffee Lover's Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Coffee Vodka (Or any other coffee-flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with coffee beans.

Name: Coffee-mate Cinnamon Bun-derful
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Coffee', '1 oz. Cinnamon Syrup', '3 tbsp. Coffee-Mate French Vanilla', 'Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Rim 10 oz. coffee mug or heat-proof glass with vanilla frosting. Add hot coffee and remaining ingredients; stir. Serve.

Name: Coffee-mate Gingerbread Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. DiVine Vodka', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '2 oz. Coffee-Mate Gingerbread Latte', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Shake all ingredients together with ice in a shaker and strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with cinnamon.

Name: Cold Comfort Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Lemon Vodka', '2 oz. Honey Vodka']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Colleeni Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Knob Creek 100 Proof Bourbon', '1 Candy (Truffle)']
Making: Put the vodka in a shaker with ice and shake. Put the truffle on a pick and place in the glass. Pour the bourbon into the glass. (I used Knob Creek but any decent bourbon should do). Stand around for a bit make witty remarks, look suave - anything to stall while the bourbon soaks into the truffle. Take the cold vodka and pour into the glass. Eat the truffle first and then enjoy the drink!

Name: Colony Club Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Pernod Absinthe', '4 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Cool Yule Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a candy cane.

Name: Corazon Angry Parrot
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Corazon Tequila Blanco', '1 part(s) Green Apple Pucker', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Corazon Cosmo
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Corazon Tequila Blanco', '1/2 part(s) Orange Liqueur', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Serve straight up in a martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Corey's Homemade Oatmeal Cookie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Add Bailey's, Butterscotch schnapps and a couple dashes of cinnamon in shaker filled with ice. Shake strain over ice, as a shot, or into a martini glass. Then shake cinnamon on top of the drink to garnish.

Name: Cosmopolitan Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Stir over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with a twist of lime.

Name: Courvoisier Cosmo
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Courvoisier Exclusif Cognac', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Triple Sec', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Fill shaker with ice cubes. Shake and strain into martini glass.

Name: Courvoisier Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Courvoisier Exclusif Cognac', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Triple Sec', '1 part(s) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Cozy Cafe Con Crema
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Partida Anejo Tequila', '1 oz. Espresso', '1 1/2 oz. Godiva Caramel Milk Chocolate Liqueur', '1 oz. Whipped Cream', '1 dash(es) Kahlua']
Making:
Shake thouroughly and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with 3 coffee beans.
Developed by NYC Mixologist Dalio Calada

Name: Cran BAM
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Blue Angel Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients with ice and shake well. Strain into martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Cranberry Spice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Wine Cabernet Sauvignon', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making:
Shake well with ice and strain into a martini glass. Use 3 cranberries for garnish on the rim of the glass.
Created by Dominik Chrzaszcz

Name: Cranberry TY-tini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Sake', '1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: CranBuffalo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 dash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a mint leaf and a raspberry.

Name: Creamy Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pallini Raspicello', "1 oz. Brady's Irish Cream", '1 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', '1 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a red sugar-rimmed martini glass.

Name: Creamy Lee #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Remy Martin Club Cognac']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Crimson Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Ruby Port', '2 tsp. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Cruzan Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Cruzan Single Barrel Estate Rum']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass with coffee/sugar rim. Squeeze an orange twist over the glass

Name: Crystal Head Pure Melon Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Crystal Head Vodka', 'Watermelon']
Making: Muddle fresh watermelon in a shaker, add Crystal Head Vodka and ice. Shake and strain into a martini glass, garnish with watermelon.

Name: Crystal Head Pure-tini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Crystal Head Vodka', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake vodka and vermouth together with ice in a shaker. Strain into a cocktail glass, garnish with an olive and serve.

Name: Cuban Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass rimmed with sugar. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Cupid's Kiss
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Smirnoff Vanilla Twist', '1/2 oz. Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a white chocolate rimmed martini glass.

Name: Danish Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Akvavit', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Daydream Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)', '1/4 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Stir well over cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Deep Sea Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Pernod Absinthe', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir well over cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Delicious Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Coffee Vodka (Or any other coffee-flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Deluxe White Chocolate Mmmartini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Creme de Cacao', '1 part(s) Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka']
Making: Drop 4 - 5 mini chocolate chips or mini white chocolate chips into a chilled martini glass. Shake equal parts Crème de Cacao and Stolichnaya Vanilla Vodka over ice. Strain into the chilled glass.

Name: Desert Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Gin', 'Dry Vermouth']
Making: Dip a toothpick into dry vermouth. Pour the gin in a martini glass and stir it with the toothpick for the driest martini in the world.

Name: Desperate Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Blackberry Brandy']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with fresh blackberries.

Name: Dirty Dog Dirty Martini
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Bulldog Gin', '1/2 oz. Olive Juice Kalamata', 'Olive(s) Kalamata']
Making: Shake Bulldog Gin and olive juice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with 3 olives. Splash vermouth if desired.

Name: Dirty Martini #1
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Vermouth', '1 1/4 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Olive Brine (A little more or less to taste)']
Making: Put all ingredients in a shaker with one cup of cracked ice and shake about 20 seconds and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with 2 olives.

Name: Dirty Martini #2
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tbsp. Olive Brine']
Making: Put all ingredients in a shaker with one cup of cracked ice and shake about 20 seconds and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with 3 olives.

Name: Dirty Vodka Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Olive Brine']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Domaine de Canton Sidecar
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '2 part(s) Cognac', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Double Fudge Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a chocolate straw.

Name: Douglas Martini
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', 'dash(es) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Pour the vermouth into a martini glass. Swirl it around until the glass is coated. Next put the glass in the freezer until thoroughly chilled. Shake the Stoli with ice for at least 20 seconds. Pour into the chilled martini glass and garnish with two grapes. Drink and enjoy. For Martini lovers who hate olives :)

Name: Down & Dirty Dry Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Olive Brine']
Making: Shake ingredients with crushed ice and and strain into a martini glass. Rub the rim with lemon twist and deposit it in the drink. Garnish with two cocktail onions.

Name: Drunken Virgin Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Godet White Chocloate Liqueur', 'Chocolate']
Making: Melt chocolate in a small saucer. Dip martini glass to coat rim with chocolate. Mix ingredients in martini shaker. Shake well. Pour into glass and garnish with a cherry. Serve to women only........they must give away their cherry before drinking.

Name: Dry Martini
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Gin', '1/3 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel or an olive.

Name: Dry Martini #2
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Dry Gin', '1/3 oz. French Vermouth']
Making: Stir in a martini glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Dusty Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir all ingredients over ice cubes in a chilled martini glass rimmed with scotch. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Earth Spirit
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 splash(es) Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Top with a splash of soda.

Name: Eat My Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Honey Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amontillado Sherry']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an almond-stuffed olive.

Name: Elvis the Pelvis
Ingredients: ['2 oz. NutLiquor Peanut Butter Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', 'Peanut Butter', 'Bacon Bits', 'Honey']
Making: In an ice-filled shaker, mix the Nutliquor, Bailey's Irish Cream and Creme de Banana. Spread a fair amount of peanut butter on a small plate and roll the rim of a chilled martini glass in the peanut butter to get a good, thick coating. On another small plate, spread the real bacon bits and roll & coat the peanut-buttered rim of the glass in them, making sure to coat it well. Drizzle the inside of the glass with honey, then add the cocktail. You have to suck the peanut butter along with the bacon bits off the rim for the full effect. The challenge is to make it all the way around the rim before you finish the drink. (Usually you can't do it, so you have to order another one!)It's a fun drink that definitely embodies the full essence of Elvis's favorite sandwich.

Name: Emerald Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Chartreuse']
Making: Stir well over cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon and a lime twist.

Name: Espresso Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '4 oz. Espolon Tequila Blanco', '4 oz. Milk (frothed)', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka (optional)']
Making: Combine all indredients and serve in 4 martini glasses. for an extra kick add 1 1/2 oz. vodka.

Name: Esspresso Bang Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Milk', '2 oz. Espresso']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice in a shaker. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with three esspresso beans.

Name: Exotica Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur']
Making: Shakel ingredients and pour into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with lemon zest.

Name: Extra Dry Vodka Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '4 drop(s) Dry Vermouth', '1/8 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Fallen Pear Martini
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '3/4 oz. Glenfiddich 12 Year Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky', '2 oz. Pear Juice', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '1 wedge(s) Lemon']
Making: Combine ingredients and shake well. Strain up into a martini glass. Garnish with a slice of pear. Pears must be cut a la minute otherwise they will turn brown, an alternative, easy garnish is a lemon wheel.

Name: Fare Thee Well Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Cointreau']
Making: Stir well over cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Farmer's Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '4 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: FDR's Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Vermouth', '1 tsp. Olive Brine']
Making: Shake with cracked ice. Rub a lemon twist around the rim of a chilled martini glass and strain the mix into the glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Fifty-Fifty Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir well over cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Fifty-Fifty Vodka Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir well over cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Fino Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Gin (or Vodka)', '1 1/2 tsp. Fino Sherry']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin or vodka and the sherry. Stir well. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Firefly Cosmo
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Firefly Raspberry Tea Vodka', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Firefly Mo-tea-to
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Firefly Mint Tea Vodka', '1 part(s) Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Flashberry
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '1 splash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and serve straight up in a martini glass with a lemon twist.

Name: Flirtini #4
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '1 part(s) X-Rated Vodka', '1 splash(es) Cointreau', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Serve straight-up in martini glass and garnish with lemon or lime.

Name: Flor Del Cielo
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. El Diamante del Cielo Reposado Tequila', '3 oz. Rose Water', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Add ice and ingredients to shaker. Shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a Dendrodium Orchid.

Name: Fluffy Belwah
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Midori', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Top with whipped cream and a cherry.

Name: Four-Leaf Cloverita
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cabo Wabo Reposado Tequila', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', "2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Pour all ingredients over ice in a tall mixing glass. Stir well and garnish with a clover (Four-Leaf if you’re lucky).

Name: Fragoli Martini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Toschi Fragoli Liqueur', '2 1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Combine vodka and Fragoli over lots of ice. Stir and pour into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Fraise Sauvage
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 dash(es) Gomme Syrup', '2 Strawberries']
Making: Place the strawberries in mixing glass and muddle. Add the Plymouth Gin, lemon juice (freshly squeezed) and syrup de gomme. Add ice to the mixing glass and shake vigorously. Strain into a martini glass and top with champagne. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Fran's Razmapolotin
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', "3/4 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 dash(es) Grand Marnier']
Making: Pour ingrendients into a mixing glass filled 3/4 with ice. Stir and pour into a chilled cocktail or Martini glass. Top with Grand Marnier and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Freedomtini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Chill a martini glass. Fill three pint glasses with ice. In the first glass pour the Stoli Raspberry and 1 1/2 oz. cranberry juice. In the second glass add the Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum and 1 oz. pineapple juice. In the third glass add the blue curaco. Mix each glass seperatly until they are chilled. Strain the third glass into the chilled martini glass to form the bottom blue layer. Next strain the second glass slowly over a layering spoon to form the middle white layer. Last strain the first glass over the layering spoon to form the top red layer. No garnish.

Name: French Apple Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka Green Apple', '2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a thin apple slice.

Name: French Cosmopolitan Martini
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Grey Goose L'Orange Vodka", '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: In a cocktail shaker shake the first three ingredients with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass that has been spritzed with lemon oil. Garnish with a twist of lemon.

Name: French Ginger Martini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '2 part(s) Vodka', '1 splash(es) Grand Marnier']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: French Martini #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: French Martini #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix (Optional)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. The sweet taste can be misleading, but then I guess that's the point (wink).

Name: French Pear Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Pears Vodka', '2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a thin apple slice.

Name: French Vanilla Passion-tini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Passion Fruit Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a fresh passion fruit wedge.

Name: Fresh Vanilla Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Combine ingredients and shake well. Strain up into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel. Alternative option for garnish would be an edible flower.

Name: Fretful Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Frostini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Starbucks Coffee Liqueur', '1 part(s) Starbucks Cream Liqueur', '1/4 part(s) Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Shake and strain into martini glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Frosty Lemon Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Boru Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Pallini Limoncello', '1 tbsp. Sugar', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour the sugar onto a plate. Rub the rims of the martini glass with a lemon wedge and roll the rims in the sugar. Add Boru Citrus, Pallini Limoncello, and lemon juice to ice in a shaker. Shake and strain into sugared martini glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.

Name: Frozen Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Place the alcohol, a shaker, a cocktail glass and 2 almond-stuffed olives in the freezer for approximately 4 hours. When all the elements are well chilled, shake the alcohol in the frozen shaker and serve in the chilled martini glass. Garnish with the 2 olives.

Name: Fruit and nut-ini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Frangelico', '2/3 oz. Vodka', '1/6 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Rolling shake all ingredients in a shaker until frosted and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a ripe raspberry.

Name: Fuji Apple - TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '4 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martinil glass. Garnish with a green apple slice.

Name: Fuzzy Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka (Or any other vanilla-flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Coffee Vodka (Or any other coffee-flavoured vodka)', '1 tsp. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Serve in a martini glass and garnish with a fresh peach slice.

Name: G'incarnation
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1/2 oz. Monin Pumpkin Spice Syrup']
Making: Put all the ingredients in a shaker, add ice, shake and serve in a martini glass. Garnish with a star anise.

Name: German Band
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Steinhaeger', '1/4 oz. Blackberry Liqueur', 'dash(es) Underberg']
Making: Stir with plenty of ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Gin-Berry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Fill a mixing glass with ice. Add the Plymouth Gin, Chambord, lime juice and cranberry juice. Shake well and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon zest.

Name: Ginger Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Alchemy Ginger Infusion Vodka', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Garnish with a lime twist and a cherry.

Name: Ginger Martini #2
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur']
Making: In a shaker add ice Vodka and Canton Ginger Liqueur. Shake and strain into 6 oz. chilled Martini glass. Garnish with candied ginger and a mint sprig.

Name: Gingerbread Lattetini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Starbucks Cream Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Butter Shots', '1/2 part(s) Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Serve in a martini glass and top with a dash of nutmeg.

Name: Gingerbread Man
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Avion Anejo Tequila', '1 part(s) Apple Liqueur', '1/4 part(s) Pear Juice', '1 splash(es) Egg White', '1 dash(es) Lemon Juice', '1 pinch(es) Cinnamon', '1 pinch(es) Nutmeg']
Making:
In a shaker add all ingredients over ice then shake and strain; can be served either straight up or on the rocks.
This libation isn’t for the kids, but we definitely recommend leaving one out for Santa!

Name: Gingerbread Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Boru Orange Vodka', '1 oz. Monin Gingerbread Syrup']
Making: Prior to mixing this cocktail, take equal parts of raw cane sugar and graham cracker crumbs and mix them together on a small plate. In a separate saucer, take a little Monin Gingerbread Syrup and use that to wet the rim of the martini glass. Next, dip the rim into your sugar and graham cracker mix so that the rim is evenly coated. Finally, shake the Boru Orange and 1 oz. of Monin with ice and strain.

Name: Gingersnap Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', "1/2 oz. Amaretto D'Saronno", '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 tsp. Molasses', 'Ginger 2 1/4 inch thick slice', '1 pinch(es) Cinnamon', '1 pinch(es) Clove', '1 pinch(es) Allspice']
Making: In a cocktail shaker place the ginger, molasses, simple syrup and spices, muddle well. Add VeeV, ice and the rest of the ingredients and shake vigorously until the outside of the shaker is frosted and beaded with sweat. Strain into a rocks glass and garnishes with a orange peel and cinnamon stick.

Name: Golf Martini
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '4 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Goodman Gold 'Double' Martini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Bombay Sapphire Gin', '2 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '2 Olive(s) (plated in edible gold)']
Making: Stir Bombay Sapphire and vermouth over ice until chilled, strain into a chilled martini glass, garnish with 2 gold olives on the rim of the glass.

Name: Goose Bump
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Skyy Vodka', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shaken with ice and strain into a martini glass with a sugar rim.

Name: Gorgeous Giselle’s Bluebird
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 1/2 oz. Rum', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a coconut-rimmed martini glass.

Name: Grand Marnier Chocolate Covered Strawberry Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Godiva Chocolate Cream Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake the vodka and strawberry liquor with cranberry juice and strain into a chilled martini glass with a chocolate rim. Sink the godiva to the bottom and then float the grand marnier on top. Garnish with sliced strawberries.

Name: Grand Pomegranate Martini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Wet rim of cocktail glass with lime juice and dip into sugar. Combine all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice, shake, then strain while pouring into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Great Caesar's Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an anchovy-stuffed olive.

Name: Great Gatsby
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Gin', '1 splash(es) Sweet Vermouth', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh - Or to taste)']
Making: Combine gin and vodka in a martini glass. Splash with sweet vermouth and add lemon juice from a fresh lemon (squeezing a couple of lemon wedges is perfectly fine). Garnish with a lemon twist. If the taste is too "lemony" for you, eliminate lemon juice or use less next time.

Name: Green / Sour Apple Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps', '1 oz. Midori', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake and pour into a chilled Martini glass.

Name: Green Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Green Chartreuse']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an almond-stuffed olive.

Name: Green Tea Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Alma De Agave Silver Tequila', '3 oz. Mango Juice', '1 pinch(es) Tea (Gun Powdered Green Tea)', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a shaker, shake vigorously, and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a pear slice.

Name: Guinness Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Expresso', '3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tia Maria', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Pour in order into a shaker, shake and serve into a martini glass. It should settle up like a Guinness "taste's great too".

Name: Gumdrop Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Lemon (Or any other lemon-flavoured rum)', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a sugar-rimmed chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon slice and gumdrops.

Name: Gypsy Martini
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Hairy Georgia Peach
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '3/4 oz. Peach Nectar', '1/2 oz. Peach Liqueur']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a peach slice and a sprig of mint.

Name: Haleakala Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Donna says she had this in Maui at Kea Lani Suites Resort Lobby Bar. Named after the volcano, Mt. Haleakala.

Name: Harvest Spice
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Montechristo Spiced Rum', '1/4 oz. Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '1 oz. Pear Juice']
Making: Drizzle caramel sauce in a martini glass. Mix all ingredients in a shaker and pour into the glass. Top with fresh whipped cream. Sprinkle with crushed candied pecans and serve.

Name: Hasty Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '4 dash(es) Pernod Absinthe', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Havana Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Shake like hell with ice in a martini shaker. Pour into a martini glass and drink.

Name: Hazelnut Chai Heaven
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Voyant Chai Cream Liqueur', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Orgeat Syrup', '1/2 oz. Rum (aged)']
Making: Dip martini glass in chocolate syrup then into saucer with crushed nuts (preferably hazelnuts). Combine ingredients with ice in a shaker. Shake well and strain into rimmed martini glass. Garnish with a little whipped cream and chocolate sprinkles.

Name: Hennessy Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac (Preferably Hennessy V.S. Cognac)', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Stir gently over ice and let stand for a few minutes. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a twist of lemon.

Name: Hennessy POM Sidecar
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hennessy Cognac VS', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Pour all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Henny Honey
Ingredients: ['6 Basil Leaves', '1 1/2 oz. Hennessy Cognac VS', '1/2 oz. Honey Syrup', '1 1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Bruise basil leaves in a shaker, add Hennessy, honey syrup and grapefruit juice. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with a fresh basil leaf.

Name: Herradura Brisa
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: In a shaker filled with ice, add ingredients, shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Herradura Calabatini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Reposado Tequila', '1/2 oz. Monin Pumpkin Spice Syrup', '3 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Add ice to shaker and the ingredients in the order listed above. Shake well and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with cinnamon.

Name: Herradura Green Agave
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '3/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making:
Shake tequila, melon liqueur and lime juice with ice for 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a shamrock carved lime.
Its bright green color, sweet flavor and Shamrock-carved lime is sure to bring everyone good luck.

Name: Herradura Stocking
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '3 oz. Pomegranate Juice']
Making:
In a shaker with ice, add tequila and pomegranate juice. Shake for 10 seconds. Pour into a chilled martini glass. Add 3 pomegranate seeds for garnish and serve.
A cocktail stuffed with cheer, the Herradura Stocking will help you and your friends/family unwind while introducing you to the hottest trend in tequila - sipping with style.

Name: Hiram Walker Key Lime Pie Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Hiram Walker Melon Liqueur', '2 part(s) Absolut Vanilia Vodka', '1 splash(es) Hiram Walker Amaretto', '1 part(s) Lime Juice', '2 part(s) Cream']
Making: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lime.

Name: Hiram Walker Pumpkin Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Vanilia Vodka', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Pumpkin Spice Schnapps']
Making: Rim cocktail glass with cinnamon-sugar. Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into prepared cocktail glass.

Name: Hoffman House Martini
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '4 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir well over cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Hollywood Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Goldwasser', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a blue cheese-stuffed almond.

Name: Homestead Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Stir well over ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Honest Broker
Ingredients: ["1 part(s) Broker's London Dry Gin", '1 part(s) Brown Creme de Cacao', '1 dash(es) Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Green Creme de Menthe', '2 part(s) Double Cream']
Making: Stir first 4 ingredients together over ice and strain into a martini glass. Stir the cream and menthe together and float onto the Broker’s mixture. Garnish with chocolate curls.

Name: Honest Kiss-tini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', "3 oz. Honest Tea's Honest Ade Cranberry Lemonade", '1 dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Honey Tea-ni
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Firefly Sweet Tea Vodka', '1 part(s) Barenjager Honey Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: In a shaker combine firefly, Bärenjäger, and squeeze the 3 lemon wedges in, shake with ice. Strain and serve. Lemon wheel garnish optional.

Name: Honeydew Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Horchata Martini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Rum Chata', '1 part(s) Vanilla Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Hot and Dirty Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Pepper Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Olive Brine']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an olive stuffed with pickled jalapeno pepper.

Name: Hot Lips Hoochie
Ingredients: ['2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Grenadine', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Served in a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: HPNO - Blue Sea
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake well, strain into a martini glass. Top with whipped cream and an orange wheel.

Name: HPNO - Tini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake well, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon, lime twist or star fruit slice.

Name: HPNOTIQ - O
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a floating orange wheel.

Name: HPNOTIQ Blue Goose Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Grey Goose Vodka', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: HPNOTIQ Blue Oasis
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', "1 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon slice. Lauren Fox, Oasis – L.A.

Name: HPNOTIQ Bonnie Blue
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Hpnotiq', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake well, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon slice. Alistair Code, Hilton - Grapevine, TX

Name: HPNOTIQ Caramel Appletini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. Sour Apple Pucker', '1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: HPNOTIQ Cosmo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice White']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon or lime twist.

Name: HPNOTIQ Cotton Candy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Sugar Water']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist. Touches OP - KS

Name: HPNOTIQ Deep Blue Sea
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '1/2 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange wheel or gummy fish. Vanessa Hayes, Hyatt Regency – Chicago

Name: HPNOTIQ Fuzzy Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist. Touches OP - KS

Name: HPNOTIQ Jazztini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grape Juice (White)']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a grape.

Name: HPNOTIQ Liquid Massage
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Vodka', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake HPNOTIQ and orange vodka well with ice and strain into a martini glass. Add a splash of pineapple juice and garnish with an orange twist. Chad Willis, The Grove Park Inn - Asheville, NC

Name: HPNOTIQ Melotini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori', '2 oz. Margarita Mix']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a sugar-rimmed martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel and cherry.

Name: HPNOTIQ Purple Haze Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '1/2 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange rind or apple slice.

Name: HPNOTIQ Sake
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. Sake (Cold)', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a pineapple sliceor starfruit.

Name: HPNOTIQ Sleeping Beauty
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry. Winning recipe in the Cocktail Competition 2004 held by N.B.A. – Japan

Name: HPNOTIQ Swiss Alps
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with white chocolate.

Name: HPNOTIQ Veronica
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Jagermeister']
Making: Layer raspberry liqueur on the bottom of a chilled martini glass. Shake HPNOTIQ and coconut rum with ice, strain into the martini glass and gently layer Jagermeister on top. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: HPNOTIQ Water Grace
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Gin', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice', '1 splash(es) Peach Nectar']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a peach slice. Winning recipe in the Cocktail Competition 2004 held by N.B.A. – Japan

Name: HPNOTIQ Wet
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Beefeater Wet Gin']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon and lime twist.

Name: Hpnotizer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice (White)']
Making: Shake well, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist. Keith Saunders, Hotel Captain Cook - Anchorage, AK

Name: Ice Blue HPNOTIQ
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a thin, floating lime wheel.

Name: Iceberg Cran-Ginger Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Iceberg Vodka', '1 oz. Ginger Beer', '3/4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 pinch(es) Ginger (ground)']
Making: Shake ingredients in cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a martini glass and garnish.

Name: Ideal Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Idol Aprytini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Idol Vodka', '1 splash(es) Marie Brizard Apry']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Idol Black Pinotini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blackberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Wine Pinot Noir', '2 oz. Idol Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Idol Chardini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Wine Chardonnay', '2 oz. Idol Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a grape.

Name: Idol Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Idol Vodka', '1 oz. Orange Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Idol Electric Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Idol Vodka', '2 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Shake with ice. Rim a martini glass with sugar. Strain into the martini glass and garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: Idol Martini
Ingredients: ['1 splash(es) Wine Chardonnay', '2 oz. Idol Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Idol Pinotini
Ingredients: ['1 splash(es) Wine Pinot Noir', '2 oz. Idol Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Idol Ultimate Grapetini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Idol Vodka', '1/2 oz. Honey', '1 oz. Grape Juice White', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Rim a martini glass with sugar. Shake with ice and strain into the martini glass. Garnish with a grape.

Name: Idol Zintini
Ingredients: ['1 splash(es) Wine Zinfandel', '2 oz. Idol Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Illy issimo Espresso Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Tia Maria', '3 oz. Illy Issimo Caffe']
Making: Pour into a martini glass and garnish with a coffee bean.

Name: Imperial Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '4 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: In and Out Martini
Ingredients: ['3 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Dry Vermouth']
Making: Pour the vermouth in a chilled martini glass. Swish it around and discard. Pour the vodka in the glass and garnish with 2 blue cheese-stuffed olives and a lemon twist.

Name: Insatiable Martini
