Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tia Maria', '1 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice pour into chilled martini glass and garnish with orange twist.

Name: Irish Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Zubrowka Vodka (Or any other bison grass vodka)', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'Irish Whiskey']
Making: Shake vodka and vermouth with cracked ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass rinsed with Irish Whiskey. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Irish Shield
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Clontarf Irish Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Berentzen Apfel Korn', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Champagne']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Top with Brut Champagne.

Name: IS Angel
Ingredients: ['1/3 part(s) IS Vodka', '1/3 part(s) Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 part(s) Jagermeister']
Making: Fill shaker with ice, add IS VODKA, Bailey's Irish Cream and Jagermeister, shake and pour into a martini glass decorated with chocolate swirls. This one will bring out the Devil in You!

Name: IS Green Apple
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. IS Vodka', '1/2 oz. DeKuyper Sour Apple', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients in shaker with a handful of ice. Shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a sugar dipped green apple slice and drop in a lovely sweet maraschino cherry... Truly Delicious!

Name: IS HQ
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. IS Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Hpnotiq']
Making: Fill shaker with ice, add IS VODKA, and HPNOTIQ, shake and pour into a martini glass. Pop in a maraschino cherry and Enjoy!

Name: IS Mascarade
Ingredients: ['1/3 part(s) IS Vodka', '1/3 part(s) Orange Juice', '1/3 part(s) Mascarade']
Making: Fill shaker with ice, add ÍS VODKA,, Mascarade & Orange Juice... shake and pour into a martini glass. Float a thin slice of lemon and Enjoy!

Name: Island Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gold Rum', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: ISopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. IS Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice White']
Making: Mix ingredients in a shaker with a handful of ice. Pour into a martini glass and enjoy! So very chic... so very good, so very, well you get the idea! Garnish with sugar dusted cranberries and a sprig of mint. Now try the Cocktail!

Name: Italian Job
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Wyborowa Pure Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Espresso (Preferably Illy espresso coffee)']
Making: Shake all the ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled 5 oz. martini glass.

Name: Itzi Bitzi Raspicello-tini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Pallini Raspicello', '1 part(s) Boru Vodka']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with 3 raspberries.

Name: Ivy's Poison
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', "2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 splash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Mix ingredients over ice. Strain and pour into a chilled oversized martini glass. Garnish with a cherry and orange slice.

Name: Jack London Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Black Currant Vodka (Or any other currant vodka)', '1 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Blanc)', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Jack-O-Tini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1 part(s) Apple Pucker', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake until well chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a spiced crab apple slice. Trick or treat!

Name: Jamaican Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Red Wine', '1 tbsp. Dark Rum', '4 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with cherry peppers.

Name: James Bond Martini #1
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Lillet (White)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: James Bond Martini #2
Ingredients: ["3 oz. Gordon's Dry Gin", '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Vermouth']
Making: Shaken, not stirred. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Jamie's Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)', '1/4 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: JC Rose Nectar
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Jacques Cardin VSOP Cognac', '1 1/2 part(s) SENCE Traditional Rose Nectar', 'Champagne (Rose)']
Making:
Shake Jacques Cardin and SENCE with ice; strain and serve in a martini glass. Fill with chilled Rose Champagne.
Created by Pascal Courtin, Brand Ambassador, Sidney Frank Importing Co. Inc.

Name: Jersey-tini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Sauza Tres Generaciones Anejo Tequila', '1/2 part(s) Triple Sec', '1/4 part(s) Mango Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making:
Madonn'! After six wildly successful seasons, The Sopranos® closed the books on June 10th. Authentic Jersey bartender, John Martella, from Hoboken's Gaslight has whipped up some liquid libations to toast Tony, Carmela and the family as this iconic chapter in American pop culture comes to a close. Raise a glass and toast to the first family of New Jersey. Salut to this thing of ours!
Sip this and you'll know there's more to the Garden State than its turnpike and w aste management industry.
Combine all ingredients and shake vigorously before serving up. Pour in a salt-rimmed martini glass, and garnish with an orange zest.

Name: Jet Fuel Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 dash(es) Vermouth']
Making: Keep gin in freezer (always). Pour a dash of vermouth in martini glass and swish it around then pour it out. Pour frozen gin into glass. Add 2-3 olives.

Name: Journalist Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '1 tsp. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Lime Juice (Fresh)', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Kahlua Espresso Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '1 part(s) Espresso']
Making:
Fill a shaker with ice, add Kahlua, Absolut Vodka and a fresh brewed espresso. Shake vigorously, and strain into a chilled martini glass.
Legend has it the Kahlua Espresso Martini was created in the 1980s by a London cocktail guru late one night for a famous supermodel. The mixologist had the brilliant idea of combining a shot of espresso and vodka with coffee and cane spirit to create a martini like no other. Perfect for a brunch with friends, an after-dinner cocktail or before a big night out.

Name: Kahlua Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Coffee']
Making: Combine over ice in a martini glass.

Name: Key Lime Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Serve with a lime twist.

Name: Key Lime Martini #2
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Absolut Vanilia Vodka', '1 part(s) Midori', '1/2 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making:
Combine all ingredients over ice, and shake vigorously.
Strain into a graham cracker-rimmed martini glass, and garnish with a lime slice.
Served this holiday season at David Burke at Bloomingdale's (159 E. 59th Street, New York; 212-705-3800)

Name: Kissed by an Angel
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vermeer Dutch Chocolate Cream Liqueur', '1 oz. Blue Angel Vodka', '1 splash(es) Half and Half Cream']
Making: Combine ingredients with ice and shake well. Strain into martini glass rimmed with shaved or powdered chocolate. Garnish with a strawberry, cherry or raspberry.

Name: Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Kryptonite Martini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Lime Vodka', '1 part(s) Limeade', '1 part(s) Triple Sec']
Making: Pour into a shaker filled with ice. Shake and strain into a well chilled martini glass. Wet rim of glass and sugar (optional). Garnish with one stick of green rock candy or small green glow stick. This gives the illusion of kryptonite.

Name: Kup's Indispensable Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Kurant Metropolitan
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec']
Making:
KURANT (Baroque industrial)
Currants, proven to create a refreshed feeling, dare you to break out of your normal routine. This summer, channel your adventurous side and try an eclectic cocktail. Created at Mynt, Denver.
Shake with ice and strain into a well-chilled martini glass.
ABSOLUT Vodka celebrates the 2005 summer by “creating” seven distinct moods for summer socializing based on the affects of its flavor ingredients. From free spirited to passionate and intense, this summer ABSOLUT tempts consumers with a variety of cocktails and flavors to help get them in the mood for fun during the time of year they are most socially active.
According to industry experts in the field of flavor and sensory science, flavors and fragrances affect daily experiences and can trigger certain moods and reactions. Each member of the ABSOLUT family, APEACH, RASPBERRI, VANILIA, MANDRIN, KURANT, CITRON and PEPPAR contain natural ingredients that evoke individual feelings and sensations that contribute to seven stimulating moods for summer socializing.
“Our flavors are as diverse and dynamic as the people who drink them,” said Tim Murphy, brand director of the ABSOLUT portfolio, The Absolut Spirits Company, Inc. “Each flavor has an individual taste and feeling that encourages nightlife patrons to experiment with new drinks and find the flavors that suit them, their moods and the various occasions that they socialize around,” he continues.
This summer, ABSOLUT has partnered with hot venues across the country to feature seven innovative cocktails inspired by each of the seven ABSOLUT flavors. The distinct taste of these flavors inspires the creation of smart, exciting and diverse cocktails while reflecting the seven hottest moods for summer socializing.

Name: Latin Sizzler
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Sauza Tres Generaciones Anejo Tequila', '3/4 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '3/4 part(s) Pomegranate Liqueur']
Making: Shake Sauza® Tres Generaciones Añejo Tequila, DeKuyper Triple-Sec, powdered sugar and lime juice vigorously and serve up in a salt-rimmed martini glass. Float DeKuyper® Pomegranate Liqueur and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Lauren's Pukey Martini
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 tsp. Vermouth', '1 oz. Vegimite', '1 oz. Maple Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain a martini glass.

Name: Lavender Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Lavender Liqueur', '3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Le Couchette
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 1/4 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist. Signature drink of Risqué at the Paris Casino - Las Vegas

Name: Leap Year Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Lemon Drop #2
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '2 Lemons (Juice of, fresh)', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice, then strain into 2 chilled martini glasses.

Name: Lemon Drop Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka (Or any other lemon-flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass, rimmed with sugar. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Lemon Istini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. IS Vodka', '2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 sprig(s) Mint', '1 tbsp. Sugar', '1 1/2 oz. Club Soda']
Making: In a shaker, muddle the fresh mint, sugar, lemon juice and IS VODKA. Shake, pour over ice. Add remaining ingredients, garnish with a lemon twist and fresh mint. Enjoy a Purely Refreshing Treat!

Name: Lemon Zinger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Mix well and pour into a sugar rimmed martini glass.

Name: Level Martini with Pineapple
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Level Vodka', '1 slice(s) Pineapple', '1 dash(es) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Fill a martini glass with ice and leave to chill. Gently crush the chosen fresh ingredient in a mixing glass. Pour Level into the mixing glass and stir for a few seconds without ice. Fill the mixing glass with lots of ice and stir again. Empty the ice from the cold martini glass. Double strain the liquid into the martini glass. Garnish with a small piece of pineapple leaf. Serve immediately.

Name: Level Startini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Level Vodka', '1 part(s) Cointreau', '1/2 part(s) Creme de Peche', '1 part(s) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making:
Combine all ingredients over ice. Shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with star fruit. Serve up and enjoy.
Being Served at:
Star Lounge
The Hotel Chelsea
222 W. 23rd Street
NYC

Name: Liberation Libation
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vermont Gold Vodka', '1/2 oz. Maple Syrup', '1 1/2 oz. Cider Sparkling, non-alcoholic']
Making: Chill over ice, strain and serve up in a cinnamon-sugar rimmed martini glass.

Name: Licorice Stick
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca (Black)', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass

Name: Limon Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', "1 splash(es) Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Shake all ingredients, strain and serve in a martini glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Little Red Hammer
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Level Vodka', '1 part(s) Blackberry Port', '1 part(s) Raspberry Juice']
Making: Shakey shakey with lots’o ice and strain into a martini glass. Float fresh or frozen blackberries or raspberries in glass.

Name: Loft Lavender Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Lavender Liqueur', '3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martinil glass.

Name: Loft Spicy Ginger Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Loft Spicy Ginger Liqueur', '3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: London Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 tsp. Maraschino Liqueur', '4 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1/2 tsp. Sugar']
Making: First stir in a mixing glass. Then shake well over cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Low Tide Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Clam Juice']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an olive stuffed with smoked clam and a lemon twist.

Name: Lychee TY Tini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '2 oz. Lychee Juice', '1 splash(es) Vodka', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Shake liqueur, vodka and lychee juice with ice and strain into a martini glass. Add splash of club soda. Garnish with fresh lychee fruit.

Name: L’Amour en Rose
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Tommy Bahama White Sand Rum', '2 part(s) SENCE Traditional Rose Nectar', '1/2 part(s) Triple Sec']
Making:
Shake all with ice and strain in a martini glass.
Created by Pascal Courtin, Brand Ambassador, Sidney Frank Importing Co. Inc.

Name: Made Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Makers Mark Bourbon', '1/2 part(s) Triple Sec', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making:
Madonn'! After six wildly successful seasons, The Sopranos® closed the books on June 10th. Authentic Jersey bartender, John Martella, from Hoboken's Gaslight has whipped up some liquid libations to toast Tony, Carmela and the family as this iconic chapter in American pop culture comes to a close. Raise a glass and toast to the first family of New Jersey. Salut to this thing of ours!
We can't promise entry into La Cosa Nostra, but you'll feel just as special with a Maker's Mark martini.
Shake bourbon, triple sec, lime and cranberry juice vigorously in a shaker with ice. Strain into a martini glass. Take an orange twist (French cut) and, with a match, flame over the drink. Discard the twist. Serve.

Name: Mama's Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka (Or any other vanilla-flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '4 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '4 dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Mambo Martini
Ingredients: ['4 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Coconut Rum', '1 part(s) Banana Liqueur']
Making: Shake on the rocks and strain. Garnish the rim with coconut and a lemon twist.

Name: Mandrin Summer Crush
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', 'Triple Sec', 'Orange Juice Fresh', 'Lime Juice Fresh']
Making:
MANDRIN (Juicy nightlife)
Mandarin oranges create a feeling of happiness and excitement. To get in touch with the blissful feeling of summer, try a “MANDARIN Crush”. Created at The Old Monk, Dallas.
Mix ingredients together in shaker with ice. Serve straight up in a martini glass.

According to industry experts in the field of flavor and sensory science, flavors and fragrances affect daily experiences and can trigger certain moods and reactions. Each member of the ABSOLUT family, APEACH, RASPBERRI, VANILIA, MANDRIN, KURANT, CITRON and PEPPAR contain natural ingredients that evoke individual feelings and sensations that contribute to seven stimulating moods for summer socializing.
“Our flavors are as diverse and dynamic as the people who drink them,” said Tim Murphy, brand director of the ABSOLUT portfolio, The Absolut Spirits Company, Inc. “Each flavor has an individual taste and feeling that encourages nightlife patrons to experiment with new drinks and find the flavors that suit them, their moods and the various occasions that they socialize around,” he continues.
This summer, ABSOLUT has partnered with hot venues across the country to feature seven innovative cocktails inspired by each of the seven ABSOLUT flavors. The distinct taste of these flavors inspires the creation of smart, exciting and diverse cocktails while reflecting the seven hottest moods for summer socializing.

Name: Mangini
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Sloe Gin', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Pour into a martini glass.

Name: Maritime Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an anchovy-stuffed olive.

Name: Martini #1
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 1/2 tsp. Dry Vermouth']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or an olive.

Name: Martini #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Dry Vermouth', '4 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or an olive.

Name: Martini (Auntie Mame Style)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 splash(es) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Splash the vermouth in a martini glass. Swirl to liberally coat the sides of the glass with the vermouth. Empty out the excess of vermouth. Add the gin. Serve with no garnish whatsoever.

Name: Martini (Dry) (5-to-1)
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Gin', '1/3 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir gin and vermouth with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with an olive.

Name: Martini (Elementary)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 bottle(s) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Pour the gin into a martini glass. Take cap off of vermouth and wave bottle over glass of gin without putting any vermouth in the gin. Place an olive in the glass.

Name: Martini (Sweet)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Stir gin and vermouth with ice and strain into a martini glass. Add an olive and serve.

Name: Martini (Traditional 2-to-1)
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir gin and vermouth over ice cubes in a mixing glass. Strain into a martini glass and add an olive.

Name: Martini Garlique
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Vermouth', '1 oz. Water (Distilled)']
Making: Pour gin, vermouth and water over ice cubes. Cut a garlic clove in half and rub the raw edge of the clove around the rim of a martini glass. Shake (do not stir), strain and pour into the glass. Garnish with an olive. Enjoy!

Name: Martini Meme
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 part(s) Rum Chata', '1/2 part(s) Coconut Rum', '1 1/4 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake and serve in a frosted martini glass.

Name: Martini Milano
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry White Wine', '1 tsp. Campari']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Martini Navratilova
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '4 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Martini Of Mass Destruction
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1 1/2 oz. Everclear']
Making: Shake gin and Everclear vigorously with ice. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with lemon peel.

Name: Martinis For Four
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Gin', '1 tbsp. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Pour the alcohol in a bowl with 1 cup of ice. Stir gently for a few seconds and strain into 4 chilled martini glasses. Add a pimento-stuffed olive to each glass and serve right away.

Name: Marvellaid
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Orange Liqueur', '1 3/4 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Mayflower Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Mix all ingredients briefly over ice in a mixing glass and strain into a cocktail glass. Add a lemon or orange twist if desired, and serve.

Name: Mayhem Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cockspur Fine Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a martini glass and garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Medici Margarita
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Margarita Mix', '1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Raspberry di Amore']
Making: Blend with ice, pour into margarita glass & garnish with lime.

Name: Mele Kalikimaka Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Skyy Infusions Pineapple Vodka', '3 oz. Eggnog', '1 splash(es) Coconut Cream', 'Nutmeg', 'Cinnamon']
Making:
Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into martini glass. Top with sprinkling of nutmeg and cinnamon and garnish with a cinnamon stick.
A creative twist on a Bing Crosby classic, the Mele Kalikimaka Martini is ”Hawaii's way to say Merry Christmas to you.” Turning a classic cocktail, contemporary using SKYY Infusions Pineapple and Coconut Cream, the martini adds a personal touch to your typical eggnog and is a surefire way to impress any partygoer.

Name: Merry Christi
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Christiania Vodka', '2 tbsp. Hot Chocolate Mix', '2 1/2 oz. Milk']
Making:
Shake well with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with dark chocolate shavings.
Developed by NYC Mixologist Dalio Calada

Name: Merry Melon Tini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', 'splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Pour into a martini glass.

Name: Merry-Mint Sambatini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cabana Cachaca', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 Egg White', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Stripe across the top of the glass a string of chocolate syrup.

Name: Mexican Hot Chocolate Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Partida Reposado Tequila', '1/2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. 1921 Tequila Cream Liqueur', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shaken well. Chocolate syrup swirling up to the lip of the glass. Chocolate syrup rimming the glass. Cinnamon the rim in a shaker tin. Garnish with a cinnamon stick. A pinch or two of chili powder (depending on the guest). – Jeret Richard Pena, San Antonio

Name: Mexican Leprechaun
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cabo Wabo Blanco Tequila', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", 'Ginger Beer']
Making: Stir Cabo Wabo over ice in a chilled glass. Top with ginger beer and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Mexican Martini #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a chunk of jalapeno pepper on a toothpick.

Name: Mexican Martini #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Riazul Anejo Tequila', '1 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making:
Shake vigorously with ice and strain into a salted martini glass. It’s Like a Margarita on steroids!
Todd @ Polo's Signature Houston

Name: Mexican Martini (Texas Style)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Silver', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '3 oz. Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Olive(s) Spear full']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice until cold, strain into a martini glass with salted rim. Serve with a spear full of olives.

Name: Mexitini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 Cilantro Leaves']
Making: Put cilantro into the bottom of a cocktail shaker and pour vermouth over it. Using the end of a wooden spoon muddle the cilantro, paying particular attention to the stalk (there's great flavor in there). Cover with ice and pour in the vodka. Shake for a minute or so till condensation forms then strain into a martini glass. Garnish with jalapeno-stuffed olives.

Name: Midnight Martini
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Seagram's Gin", '1 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a black olive.

Name: Midnight Skyy Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a cherry and lime on a swordpick.

Name: Mikhail's Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Coffee Vodka', '1/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka']
Making: Stir Stoli Kafya and Stoli Vanil Vodka with a generous amount of ice in a pitcher and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with coffee beans.

Name: Millennium Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Beefeater Dry Gin', "1 oz. Cherry Brandy (Preferably Meaghers')", '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake over ice, then strain into a well-chilled martini glass.

Name: Millennium Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 Sugar Cube', 'Blue Curacao', 'Champagne']
Making: Soak the sugar cube in some blue curacao. In a mixing glass, pour the champagme and count to 4. Add all the other ingredients to the mixing glass -except sugar-, mix and strain into a chilled martini glass. Drop in the sugar cube. Drink and enjoy!

Name: Minne Apple
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 splash(es) Cointreau']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a shaker glass and shake. Strain and serve as a martini or on the rocks.

Name: Minty IS Jave
Ingredients: ['1/3 part(s) IS Vodka', '1/3 part(s) Starbucks Coffee Liqueur', '1/3 part(s) Creme de Menthe']
Making: Combine all ingredients in shaker with a handful of ice. Shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with fresh mint!

Name: Mocha Blanca Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Coffee Vodka (Or any other coffee-flavoured vodka)', '1 oz. White Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Mix and pour in a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a chocolate curl.

Name: Mock Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. It's a sweet wonderful martini that looks like a Manhattan! Cherry optional.

Name: Mojave Green Rattlesnake
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. 1800 Anejo Tequila', '1 1/4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Add ingredients to an iced filled shaker. Mix and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a long twist of lemon.

Name: Monkey Business
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vermont White Vodka', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 slice(s) Banana (1 inch thick)', '2 tsp. Maple Syrup', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Chill martini glass and set aside. In a large mixing glass, add the banana and maple syrup and muddle until the banana is smoothly blended with the syrup. Add the Vermont Vodka, banana liqueur, half and half and 4 ice cubes. Shake hard until frosty. Strain into the martini glass, dust lightly with nutmeg and garnish with a slice of banana.

Name: Moochows Brown cow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Truffles Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka']
Making: Stir in a mixing tin with ice then strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Moon Mountain Blueberry Moon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Blueberry Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Moon Mountain Cinnamon Apple Moontini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '1 oz. Apple Schnapps', '1 oz. Apple Juice', '3/4 oz. Sour Mix', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a sugar-rimmed martini glass. Garnish with an apple slice.

Name: Moon Mountain Cucumber-tini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', '3 drop(s) Hot Sauce', 'Cilantro Leaves', '3 slice(s) Cucumber']
Making: Muddle cilantro, cucumber, syrup and lemon juice. Add vodka. Shake and double strain. Add hot pepper sauce. Garnish with a cilantro leaf and a cucumber slice.

Name: Moon Mountain Dirty Avalanche
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '1/2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass lined with chocolate syrup.

Name: Moon Mountain Moondance Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Moon Mountain Vodka', '3/4 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Moonshine Martini
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Junior Johnson's Midnight Moon Carolina Moonshine", '1 splash(es) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into martini glass. Garnish with lemon peel or olive.

Name: Moscow in Mexico
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '1 part(s) Espresso', '1/2 part(s) Nocello Walnut']
Making:
Combine all ingredients into metal cocktail shaker and add ice. Hard-shake for 10 seconds and double strain through tea strainer into martini glass. Using aerolatte milk frother, froth cold milk and spoon on top of cocktail. Top with cardamom powder.
Created by Mixologist Gregory Seider of Summit

Name: Mrs. White Buffalo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '3/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '2 tsp. Simple Syrup', '3/4 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and powdered cinnamon.

Name: Muddy Waters
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Muscovy Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Zinamom Cinnamon Vodka', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Stir over ice in a mixing glass and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish by twisting an orange peel over the drink and dropping it into glass. Finish by sprinkling a little powdered cinnamon over the drink.

Name: Naked Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin']
Making: Pour the gin in chilled martini glass and leave in the freezer until well-chilled. Garnish with an olive and serve immediately.

Name: Napa Valley Lemon Apple
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Napa Valley Limoncello XO', '2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps']
Making: Combine ingredients into a shaker and shake until ice cold. Pour into a martini glass and serve.

Name: Napacello Cran
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Napa Valley Limoncello XO', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients into a martini glass.

Name: Napacello Sparkle
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Napa Valley Limoncello XO', '4 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Combine ingredients into a rocks glass over ice.

Name: Natural Apple Pie Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 part(s) Chopin Vodka', '2 part(s) Apple Cider', '1 tsp. Cinnamon', '1 squirt(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice; strain into a martini glass. For a cold weather treat, warm apple cider and serve in a mug.

Name: Natural Chai Tea Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 part(s) Tea (Chai)']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice; strain into a martini glass.

Name: Natural Espresso Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 part(s) Coffee Liqueur', '1 part(s) Espresso']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice; strain into a martini glass.

Name: Natural Key Lime Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 part(s) Belvedere Vodka', '1 part(s) Lime Juice', '1 part(s) Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice; strain into a martini glass.

Name: Natural Lemon Meringue Pie
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Vanilla Vodka', '1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice and strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist (or a fresh orchid!)

Name: Natural Vanilla Cosmo
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 1/2 part(s) Belvedere Vodka', '3/4 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice; strain into a martini glass.

Name: Natural Vanilla Manhattan
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice; strain into a martini glass. For a cold weather treat, warm apple cider and serve in a mug.

Name: Naughty Dog
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bulldog Gin', '1/2 oz. Campari', '3/4 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '3/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Naughty Lemonade - TY KU
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '2 oz. Lemonade', '1 splash(es) Club Soda', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake liqueur, lemonade and lemon juice with ice and strain into a martini glass. Add splash of club soda.

Name: Naughty Leprechaun - TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Soju', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Navan Ile Rouge
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. Grapefruit Juice (Ruby Red)', '1 oz. Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 oz. Tequila', 'Pepper (Pink Peppercorns)']
Making:
In a mixing glass muddle 15 pepper corns, add remaining ingredients, add ice, shake and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with pink peppercorns.
Created by by Master Mixologist Aisha Sharpe

Name: Navan Orchid Martini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 oz. Belvedere Vodka', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Moet and Chandon Brut Imperial Champagne']
Making:
In a mixing glass combine all ingredients except champagne, add ice, shake and strain into a chilled martini glass. Top with Champagne. Garnish with a white orchid.
Created by by Master Mixologist Aisha Sharpe

Name: New Orleans Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka (Or any other vanilla-flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Pernod Absinthe', 'dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Night Shade
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Boru Crazzberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake all over ice and strain into a well chilled martini glass. Splash with Sprite. Garnish with fresh blueberries.

Name: Northern Exposure Moose Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Black Currant Vodka (Or any other currant vodka)', '1 tsp. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with juniper berries macerated in vermouth.

Name: Novarian Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Campari', '1 oz. Maple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Egg White', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker and dry shake. Add ice and shake again. Double strain into a martini glass and garnish with twist of lemon or orange.

Name: Nuts About Peanuts
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Russian Standard Vodka', '3/4 oz. Nocello Walnut', '3/4 oz. Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 scoop(s) Peanut Butter', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 1/2 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making:
Stir peanut butter with Russian Standard Vodka, simple syrup and heavy whipping cream until peanut butter dissolves. Add remaining ingredients and shake with ice in a shaker. Strain into a peanut butter rimmed chilled cocktail glass.
November is Peanut Butter Lover's Month
What do President Bill Clinton, Billy Joel, and Bill Cosby have in common? Aside from sharing the same first name, they're all members of the Peanut Butter Lovers' Fan Club! And since it is November, they're celebrating Peanut Butter Lover's Month with peanut butter fans around the world. But instead of your normal Peanut Butter and Jelly/Banana/Fluff sandwich, let's mix these legumes up with our favorite spirits and create some awesome Peanut Butter cocktails! Even the arachibutyrophobics, afraid of getting peanut butter stuck to the roof of their mouths, can enjoy these drinks without fear.

Name: Nutty Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Nutty-Tini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Combine all the ingredients in a shaker full of ice, shake and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Obituary Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '2/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into shaker over ice. Shake 2-4 times. Strain into a Martini glass

Name: OceanTrust Martini
Ingredients: ['1 slice(s) Orange', '1 slice(s) Mango', '2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 oz. Sour Mix', 'Pepper', '1/2 oz. Soda Water']
Making: Combine orange slice, mango wedge, Absolut Citron, and fresh sour mix in a shaker. MUDDLE WELL. Add ice. Take a peppercorn mill and give it 1 full turn. Shake 20 times. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Add soda water to the top of the glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Old Country Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Madeira', '1 oz. Cherry Brandy']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Olive Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dry Gin', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 oz. Olive Brine']
Making: Shake all the ingredients then pour into a martini glass.

Name: Opal Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Orange Juice (Fresh)', '1/4 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Opera Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Orange Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Ouellette Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Oyster Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a smoked oyster pinned on a toothpick.

Name: Paisley Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Stir all ingredients over ice cubes in a martini glass rimmed with scotch. Garnish with the twist of a lemon peel and serve.

Name: Pall Mall Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1 tsp. White Creme de Menthe', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir with ice cubes and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Palm Beach Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Sweet Vermouth', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: PAMA Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pama Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Monin Gingerbread Syrup']
Making: Shake all ingredients well with ice, strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with lemon zest.

Name: Panamanian Devil
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Ron Abuelo Anejo Rum', '1 oz. Espresso (chilled)', '3 drop(s) Liquid Smoke', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', 'Lucid Absinthe Superieure']
Making:
Shake first four ingredients with ice and strain into martini glass rimmed with smoked chili powder. Spray on top of drink some Lucid Absinthe. Garnish with a flamed orange peel.
*Created by The Cocktail Guru Jonathan Pogash

Name: Parisian Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Park Avenue Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: Parrothead Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Tequila Silver', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tsp. Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Patsy Stone-tini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Mix together with Ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Peach Blossom Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Peach Vodka (Or any other peach-flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Rouge)', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a peach slice.

Name: Peachy Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka (Or any other strawberry-flavoured vodka)', '1 oz. Peach Brandy']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: PeachyKeen
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Tommy Bahama Golden Sun Rum', '1 1/2 part(s) Peach Schnapps', '1/2 part(s) Passion Fruit Juice', '1 part(s) Mango Juice', '1 part(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Shake 20 times and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orchid.

Name: Pearl Appletini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pearl Black Vodka', '1 oz. Arrow Sour Apple Smackers', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an apple wedge.

Name: Pearl Blue Lagoon Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pearl Blueberry Vodka', '1 oz. Arrow Blue Curaco', '1 splash(es) Arrow Honeydew Melon Liqueur']
Making: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with three blueberries.

Name: Pearl Blue Pom Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pearl Blueberry Vodka', '1 oz. Pearl Pomegranate Vodka', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'squirt(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with three blueberries.

Name: Pearl Blue-tini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pearl Blueberry Vodka', '1 oz. Arrow Blue Curaco', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'squirt(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: Pearl Coconut Chocolatini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pearl Coconut Vodka', '1 oz. St. Brendans Irish Cream', '1 oz. Arrow Creme De Cacao White', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a chocolate swizzle stick.

Name: Pearl Cosmo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pearl Black Vodka', '1 oz. Arrow Triple Sec', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'squirt(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: Pearl Flirtini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pearl Pomegranate Vodka', '4 oz. Champagne', 'splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour Pearl Pomegranate Flavored Vodka into flute and add champagne to fill. Add a splash of grenadine for color.

Name: Pearl Lemon Drop Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pearl Black Vodka', '1/2 oz. Arrow Triple Sec', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Rim with sugar and garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Pearl Metropolitan
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pearl Pomegranate Vodka', '1 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Pink Grapefruit Juice', '1 squirt(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: Pearl Peacock Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pearl Black Vodka', '1 oz. Arrow Blue Curaco', 'splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Pearl Plum Saketini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pearl Plum Vodka', '1 oz. Sake', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a mini orchid.

Name: Pearl Pom Flirtini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pearl Pomegranate Vodka', '4 oz. Champagne']
Making: Pour Pearl Pomegranate Flavored Vodka into flute and add champagne to fill. Add a splash of grenadine for color.

Name: Pearl Pomegranate Truffle
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pearl Pomegranate Vodka', '1 oz. Arrow Creme De Cacao White', '1 oz. Cream', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a Maraschino cherry.

Name: Pearl-tini - The Original Pomegranate Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pearl Pomegranate Vodka', '1 oz. Arrow Triple Sec', '1 oz. Pomegranate Juice or Cranberry', 'squirt(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Peggy's Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine (Rouge)', '1/2 tsp. Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Peppermint IS
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. IS Vodka', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Fill shaker with ice and add IS VODKA, Peppermint Schnapps , simple syrup and cream... Shake, Shake, Shake! Rim a cosmo glass with festive colored sugar and fill with crushed ice before pouring. Garnish with a peppermint stick, lime wedge and enjoy!

Name: Peppermint Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Pepper Vodka', '1 oz. White Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Perfect Martini
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Dry Gin', '1/6 oz. French Vermouth', '1/6 oz. Italian Vermouth']
Making: Stir in a martini glass and garnish with an olive.

Name: Perfect Pearl Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pearl Black Vodka', '2 drop(s) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Pour Pearl Pomegranate Flavored Vodka into flute and add champagne to fill. Add a splash of grenadine for color.

Name: Peruvian Elder Sour
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Pisco Quebranta', '2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into an ice-filled Collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge. Recipe courtesy of Gary Regan through St-Germain.

Name: Phuket Bullet
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '3/4 oz. Green Chartreuse', '3/4 oz. Galliano', '3 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters']
Making: Pour Mekhong and the rest of the ingredients into a mixing glass. Add ice and stir for 35-40 revolutions. Strain into a chilled martini-cocktail glass. Garnish with a blood orange half wheel.

Name: Physcadelic Summer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Parfait Amour', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Grenadine']
Making: Blend with ice and serve frozen in a large sugar rimmed martini glass. Drizzle grenadine over the top and garnish with a lime or a lemon wheel.

Name: Picadilly Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 tsp. Pernod Absinthe', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Pina Colada Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cruzan Coconut Rum', '1 oz. Cruzan Pineapple Rum', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine the Cruzan Rums together into a mixing glass with ice, and add a splash of pineapple juice. Stir and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Pine-Apple Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. 99 Apples Schnapps', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with apple peel.

Name: Pink Fusion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '1 oz. Skyy Infusions Citrus Vodka', '1 splash(es) Lemonade', 'Champagne']
Making:
Top with Champagne, serve in martini glass with lemon twist.
Originally served at Carlucci Lombard, Chicago

Name: Pink Gin Martini
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Angostura Bitters']
Making: Pour the bitters into a martini glass and swirl it around until the inside of the glass is completely coated. Add the gin and serve (do not chill).

Name: Pink Silk Panties
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Chill a classic martini glass by filling with ice and water. Set aside. Combine ingredients in a shaker and stir well. Emply martini glass. Strain drink into the glass and garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Pink Thing #2
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Ocean Spray Juice (Ruby Red)']
Making: Use lots of ice. Shake, shake, shake and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Platinum
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Malibu Rum', '4 1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake withe ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Plaza Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Plymouth Aviation
Ingredients: ['1 dash(es) Gomme Syrup', '1 1/2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur']
Making: Fill a mixing glass with ice and add the Plymouth Gin, lemon juice (freshly squeezed), maraschino liqueur and syrup de gomme. Shake well and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a zest of lemon.

Name: Plymouth Dry Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Plymouth Gin', '1 splash(es) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Pour vermouth into a mixing glass over ice cubes and swirl or stir, making sure the ice is coated with the vermouth. Strain off excess vermouth, leaving only as much vermouth is desired for the level of dryness (the less vermouth in the drink, the drier it is). Add Plymouth Gin to the mixing glass and stir until extremely chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a lemon twist or unwashed olive.

Name: Plymouth Gin's White Lady
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tbsp. Egg White', '1 1/2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '3/4 oz. Cointreau']
Making:
A great New Years Cocktail created around 1929 at Harry´s New York Bar in Paris.
Fill mixing glass with ice. Add the Plymouth Gin, Cointreau, lemon juice (freshly squeezed) and egg white (optional). Shake well and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with Lemon Zest.

Name: Plymouth Silver Bronx
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1 dash(es) Sweet Vermouth', '1 tbsp. Egg White', '3/4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 dash(es) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Invented during the days of Prohibition when cocktails were named after the districts they were served in! Fill mixing glass with ice. Add the Plymouth Gin, vermouths, orange juice and whisked egg white (optional). Shake well and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Poison Apple Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cockspur Fine Rum', "1 oz. Laird's Applejack", '1 tsp. Cinnamon']
Making: Combine Cockspur, Applejack and cinnamon in a mixing glass. Add ice and stir to chill. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with an apple slice.

Name: Pom Squeeze-tini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) DeKuyper Peachtree Schnapps', '1 part(s) Dekuyper Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 part(s) Absolut Mandarin Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Pomegranate Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Pomegranate Juice', '2 part(s) Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 splash(es) Cointreau']
Making:
Shake ingredients in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a pomegranate fruit slice.
Recipe courtesy of the “Oprah Winfrey Show”

Name: Pompano Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice (Fresh)', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Poor Man's Vodka Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Powerpuff Girl
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Creme de Noyeaux', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '3/4 oz. Cream', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Shake Creme de Noyaux, White Creme de Cacao and cream with ice. Pour into a martini glass and add Bacardi 151and top with Goldschlager.

Name: Pretty Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Prince Edward Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Prince Elizabeth Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 tsp. Benedictine']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Pumpkin Eater
Ingredients: ['3/4 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '3/4 part(s) Hiram Walker Pumpkin Spice Schnapps', '1/2 part(s) Hiram Walker Amaretto', '3/4 part(s) Irish Cream']
Making: Fill tall glass with ice. Pour ingredients in as listed, tumble between shakers and serve.

Name: Pumpkin Martini - TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Sake', '1 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1 tbsp. Pumpkin Puree']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a cinnamon stick.

Name: Pumpkin Nog
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) 10 Cane Rum', '12 Eggs', '5 cup(s) Whole Milk', '1/2 pound(s) Superfine Sugar', '1 tsp. Vanilla Extract', '1/2 tsp. Cinnamon', '1/2 cup(s) Pumpkin Puree']
Making:
Separate eggs. Place egg whites in the refrigerator. In a mixing bowl, beat yolks until creamy. Gradually add ¼ lb. of sugar, beating at high speeds until thick. Stir in milk, 10 Cane, vanilla, cinnamon, and pumpkin puree. Place in refrigerator to chill for at least 2 hours. Remove egg whites from the refrigerator and beat until soft peaks form. Add remaining 1/4 lb. sugar, beating into stiff peaks. Fold the chilled 10 Cane mixture into egg whites. Serve in a martini glass.
Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg and a dollop of whipped cream. Serves 15.
Created by:
Tony Abou-Ganim, Master Mixologist

Name: Pure Guava Martini
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Guava Juice', '2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Blend with several ice cubes until completely smooth. Serve in a well chilled martini glass and garnish with fresh raspberries and sprigs of mint.

Name: Pure Is Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. IS Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: For the perfect IS Martini, fill shaker halfway with ice. Add a splash of Dry Vermouth and strain. Add IS VODKA... shaken, not stirred! Strain into a crystal clear martini glass & garnish with 2 olives for a Purely Luxurious Treat!

Name: Pure Lusciousness
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Alize Red Passion', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Purple Pussycat Martini
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry-Raspberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Mix all ingredients in martini shaker. Shake. Strain into a chilled 10 oz. martini glass. Garnish with a fresh raspberry or lime twist.

Name: Purple Rain #4
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bulldog Gin', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '3/4 oz. Pomegranate Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Quarterdeck Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Berry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: Queen Elizabeth Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '2 tsp. Benedictine']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Raspberry IStini
Ingredients: ['3 1/2 oz. IS Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 tsp. Honey']
Making: Combine all ingredients in shaker with a handful of ice. Shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a Raspberry. Before OR after dinner... truly a Sweet and Delicious Drink!

Name: Raspberry Lady Finger Martini
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Rum Chata', '1/2 part(s) Raspberry Vodka', '1/4 part(s) Van Gogh Dutch Caramel Vodka', '1/4 part(s) Van Gogh Espresso Vodka', '1/4 part(s) Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Combine into a martini glass and enjoy.

Name: Raspberry Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake the ingredients with ice (or stir if you prefer) until well chilled. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with a raspberry.

Name: Raspberry Tart
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Combine in shaker and shake. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Raspicello Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Pallini Raspicello', '1 1/2 oz. Boru Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with 3 raspberries.

Name: Razberry Tart
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Combine in shaker and shake. Pour into a chilled martini glass. No garnish.

Name: Ready FredIS
Ingredients: ['2 oz. IS Vodka', 'Tomato Juice', '3 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '4 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Season the rim of a highball glass with Celery salt and Sea salt and fill with ice. Add IS VODKA, Worcestershire and Tabasco; top with Tomato Juice. Stir with celery stalk; garnish with lemon... YUMMY!

Name: Really Dry Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', 'Dry Vermouth']
Making: Place 2 olives in a chilled Martini glass. Pour gin in mixer glass over ice. Holding the open bottle of vermouth, lean over mixer glass and exclaim, Vermouth! Vermouth!. Strain into Martini glass.

Name: Red Apple Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. DeKuyper Sour Apple', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Apple Juice (Preferably red apple juice)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Red Dawn
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Finlandia Cranberry Vodka', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', "1 splash(es) Rose's Lime Juice", 'Grenadine']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into a martini glass. Float grenadine on bottom for color.

Name: Red Dog Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Ruby Port', '2 tsp. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist.

Name: Red Dollar Bill
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cherry Juice', '2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Stir and served chilled in a martini glass with 2 cherries.

Name: Red Flame Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Put 2 ice cubes in a shaker. Add Absolut Citron Vodka, raspberry liqueur and the juices. Shake until cocktail is chilled. Strain and pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Red Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Alize Gold Passion (Red)', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Combine in a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Red, White, and HPNOTIQ Blue Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda', 'Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass and slowly add a touch of grenadine. Garnish with chopped coconut.

Name: Renaissance Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Fino Sherry']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with grated nutmeg

Name: Resolution Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Restless Hips
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Cherry Liqueur (Kirsberry)', '2 dash(es) Rose Water', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour ingredients over ice into a cocktail shaker and shake well. You want the melting ice to dilute the cranberry juice and rose water slightly. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with a cherry and/or rose petals.

Name: Rice Pudding Martini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Rum Chata', '1 part(s) Coconut Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass, dust with cinnamon.

Name: Road Runner Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Pepper Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Tequila Gold']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a jalapeno-stuffed olive.

Name: Rouge Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 tsp. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the gin and Chambord Raspberry Liqueur. Stir well. Strain into a martini glass.

Name: Royal Smile
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Lime Juice fresh', '2 part(s) Grenadine', '2 part(s) Applejack', '4 part(s) Gin']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice, strain and pour into a martini glass.

Name: Royal TY KU
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Champagne', '1 splash(es) Midori']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Ruby Chai Appletini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Square One Organic Vodka *(Infused with Numi Organic Ruby Chai Tea)', '1 1/2 oz. Apple Cider *(Infused with Numi Organic Ruby Chai Tea)', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar (Amber is preferred)', '1/4 Apple (Gala)']
Making:
Cut the apple in half, just of center leaving the stem on. Then slice the core out just to the other side of the stem. Reserve core slice for garnish. Cut one quarter of the apple into pieces, removing the seeds and core. In a mixing glass, muddle into apple sauce consistency. Add Agave Nectar Square One, Cider and ice. Shake for 10 seconds and Strain up into a chilled cocktail glass. Head should be frothy and creamy. Garnish with the apple core slice on the rim or floating.
To make this drink as a one-off at home, Use 1 bag of tea per each 6 ounces of liquid, infusing the vodka cold for an hour or two and heating the cider and infusing for 3-5 minutes.
Mixologist’s Note: I love chai and Numi’s Ruby Chai blend with Rooibos makes for a delicious infusion agent in cocktails. The warm rich spice blends superbly with the apple and by infusing we get intense flavor with no added water. The texture of the Gala apple when muddled into sauce consistency gives this drink a velvety, viscous mouthfeel with a creamy head like a pint of Guinness. If you batch prep the infusions and the apples and this drink is really easy to prepare and serve.
To Batch Prep for speedy service:
Ruby Chai- infused Square One: In a mason jar or other glass sealable container add 750ml bottle of Square One and 6 bags of Numi Ruby Chai Tea. Let infuse for 1-2 hours. Remove the bags and squeeze back excess vodka. Pour the infused vodka back into a Square One bottle that has had the labels removed (infusion bottles with brand labels on them may be a legal issue in your state; check with your ABC office). Use a labeler to mark your bottle.
Ruby Chai-infused Apple Cider: Pour cider into a sauce pan and heat (try not to boil). Turn off the heat and add 1 bag of Numi Ruby Chai Tea per 6 ounces of cider. Let steep for 3-5 minutes and remove the tea bags, squeezing back any remaining liquid. Pour spiced cider into a store ‘n’ pour or other bar speed bottle (another de-labled Square One bottle looks nice).
Credit: H. Joseph Ehrmann
Square One Brand Ambassador and Mixologist

Name: Rum Chata Apple Pie Martini
Ingredients: ['2/3 part(s) Rum Chata', '2/3 part(s) Apple Pucker', '1 1/3 part(s) Vanilla Vodka']
Making: Shake all ingredients and serve over ice in a martini glass.

Name: Rum Chata Gingerbread Martini
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Rum Chata', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Gingerbread Liqueur', '2 part(s) Cruzan Vanilla Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with gingerbread cookie crumbles.

Name: Rum Chata Pumpkin Pie Martini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Rum Chata', '1 part(s) Vanilla Vodka', '3 tbsp. Pumpkin Puree', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass; sprinkle with cinnamon.

Name: Rum Chata UltiMartini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Rum Chata', '1 part(s) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Frangelico']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Rum Martini #1
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an almond-stuffed olive.

Name: Rum Martini #2
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1 1/2 tsp. Dry Vermouth']
Making: In a mixing glass half-filled with ice cubes, combine the rum and vermouth. Stir well. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or an olive.

Name: Russian Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. White Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Sacramento Lemon Drop
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka (Chilled)', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '2 tbsp. Superfine Sugar', '5 Lemons (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a shaker. Shake at least 40 times with cracked ice. This will ensure perfection. Before pouring into a chilled martini glass, dip the rim into some Superfine Granulated Sugar. Pour strained liquor into your martini glass.

Name: Sagatiba Bikini Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sagatiba Pura Cachaca', '1/2 oz. Limoncello', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 Passion Fruit or puree', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and serve in a martini glass. Garnish with a passion fruit disc floating on top of drink.

Name: Sagatiba Maca Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sagatiba Pura Cachaca', '1/2 oz. Elderflower Syrup', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '2 1/2 oz. Apple Cider']
Making: Shake all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an apple disc and a mint sprig.

Name: Sagatiba Tropicalia
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sagatiba Pura Cachaca', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Papaya Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Combine all juices into a cocktail shaker, add ice and Sagatiba Pura Cachaça shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an orange wedge or starfruit.

Name: Sage Lady
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Mango Vodka', '3 piece(s) Sage', '3 slice(s) Cucumber', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1/2 part(s) Cointreau', '3/4 part(s) Lime Juice', '1 dash(es) Fee Brothers Peach Bitters']
Making: Muddle cucumber, simple syrup and sage. Shake with ice and fine strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a spanked sage leaf.

Name: Sake and Spice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '4 oz. Lychee Juice', '1 tsp. Honey', '1 dash(es) Cinnamon']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a dash of cinnamon.

Name: Sake Breezer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Sake', '4 slice(s) Cucumber']
Making: Shake Sake and 4 cucumber slices hard with ice and strain into a cocktail glass over ice. Garnish with fresh cucumber slices.

Name: Salt and Peppar Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Peppar Vodka', '1 dash(es) Olive Juice']
Making:
PEPPAR (Stimulating heat)
Pepper, a natural stimulator helps energize an evening. To add some spice to your nightlife try the “ABSOLUT Salt & PEPPAR” at “Cinch” LA.
Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake, strain and pour into a chilled martini glass with a salted rim. Garnish with pepper and olives.
ABSOLUT Vodka celebrates the 2005 summer by “creating” seven distinct moods for summer socializing based on the affects of its flavor ingredients. From free spirited to passionate and intense, this summer ABSOLUT tempts consumers with a variety of cocktails and flavors to help get them in the mood for fun during the time of year they are most socially active.
According to industry experts in the field of flavor and sensory science, flavors and fragrances affect daily experiences and can trigger certain moods and reactions. Each member of the ABSOLUT family, APEACH, RASPBERRI, VANILIA, MANDRIN, KURANT, CITRON and PEPPAR contain natural ingredients that evoke individual feelings and sensations that contribute to seven stimulating moods for summer socializing.
“Our flavors are as diverse and dynamic as the people who drink them,” said Tim Murphy, brand director of the ABSOLUT portfolio, The Absolut Spirits Company, Inc. “Each flavor has an individual taste and feeling that encourages nightlife patrons to experiment with new drinks and find the flavors that suit them, their moods and the various occasions that they socialize around,” he continues.
This summer, ABSOLUT has partnered with hot venues across the country to feature seven innovative cocktails inspired by each of the seven ABSOLUT flavors. The distinct taste of these flavors inspires the creation of smart, exciting and diverse cocktails while reflecting the seven hottest moods for summer socializing.

Name: San Martino Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Raspberry di Amore']
Making: Shake with ice & pour into martini glass.

Name: Sangriatini Or Be Careful How You Handle Bluefish
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '4 oz. Mango Juice', '1 oz. Port']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a slice of crytalized ginger.

Name: Santo Antonio A Brazilian Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cachaca Fazenda Mae de Ouro', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making:
Combine ingredients in a shaker with crushed ice. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Background: Santo Antonio is the Brazilian patron saint of single women and coincidently the favorite saint of the Sex and the City character Charlotte York From Lu Mussato, São Paulo Brazil

Name: Sapphire Solstice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '3 Strawberries diced', '3 chunk(s) Cucumber', '1/2 oz. Tea Green', '1 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Muddle the strawberries and cucumber in the bottom of a highball glass. Fill the glass with ice then build in the remaining ingredients. Stir well with a bar spoon and garnish with a slice of cucumber.

Name: Schizophrenic Kermit The Frog
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Grenadine', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake Midori, Malibu and Pineapple juice. Stain into a martini glass. Drop grenadine. Shake 151 and Blue Caraco. Layer on top.

Name: Secret Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Lillet (White)', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Sex And The City Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Alize Red Passion', '1 oz. Vodka premium', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a martini glass. A cosmo with a kick!

Name: Sex in the Sun
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake and serve over frapped ice in a large martini glass. Garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Sex On The Horizon
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Shake peach schnapps, banana liqueur and orange juice until well chilled. Pour into a martini glass and sink the Chambord Raspberry Liqueur. Float Jagermeister on top.

Name: Sexy Sleek
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '4 oz. Lemonade', '1 splash(es) Club Soda', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Top with a splash of soda.

Name: Shanghai Lemon Drop
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Yazi Ginger Flavored Vodka', '2 part(s) Limoncello', '3 splash(es) Bitters Peach']
Making:
Shake with ice and serve up in martini glass. Garnish with a thin peach slice or a lemon curl.
Created by Sungari's Restaurant in Portland, OR

Name: Sharky Pond
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '4 oz. Lemonade', '1 splash(es) Grenadine (for colour)']
Making: Stir gin and lemonade with ice in a shake. Strain into a martini glass. Add grenadine. Place a slice of lemon and a slice of lime on the rim of the glass. Enjoy.

Name: Siberian Express Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a raspberry.

Name: Silent Evening Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Rum Chata', '1 part(s) Amarula Cream Liqueur', '3/4 part(s) Black Beard Spiced Rum']
Making: Add all parts in shaker. Shake. Pour into martini glass and serve! Shake on cinnamon as garnish.

Name: Silver Blaze
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Beefeater Dry Gin', "2 oz. White Creme de Menthe (Preferably Meagher's)", "2 oz. Apricot Brandy (Preferably Meagher's)", '1 oz. Sauza Tres Generaciones Anejo Tequila (Blanco)', '2 oz. Light Cream', 'drop(s) Grenadine', 'Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake over ice then strain into a well-chilled martini glass. Garnish with sprig of mint.

Name: Simply Saskatoon
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Schramm Vodka', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Organic, fresh)', '1 oz. Honey Syrup (Wildflower honey)', '1/2 oz. Saskatoon Berry Juice']
Making:
Shake all ingredients with ice, strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with flamed orange peel. Enjoy!
Created by: Lorien Chilton
Notes for ingredients:
Homemade saskatoon berry juice, unsweetened (puree fruit and strain well)
Wildflower Honey syrup (2 cups honey to 1 cup water and heat over low stove to mix, similar to simple syrup.)
Flamed orange peel. Creates a nice orange aroma and subtle sweetness to the drink. Peel a tiny circle of orange zest, hold zest skin side down over drink, light a match under the peel and sqeeze gently over flame. The orange oils will flame the match and disperse oils lightly on just the surface of the drink.

Name: Single Ladies
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Domaine de Canton Ginger Liqueur', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice (White)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Skeletons in Your Closet
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Hornitos Plata Tequila', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Island Blue Schnapps', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 part(s) Mango Juice']
Making: Shake over ice until well blended and strain over ice in a salted margarita glass. Be careful what you reveal.

Name: SKYY Black Widow
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Skyy Infusions Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice', 'Raspberry Syrup']
Making: Draw a spider web on the inside of a chilled martini glass with raspberry syrup. Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with a plastic spider.

Name: SKYY Red Zombie
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Skyy Vodka', '3 oz. Tomato Juice', '1/2 oz. Horseradish (finely grated)', '1 tsp. Barbecue Sauce', '3 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '3 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '1 pinch(es) Salt', '1 pinch(es) Pepper', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice', '1 pinch(es) Celery Seeds', '2 Olive(s) (Large Green)', '2 Lychee Nuts', '1/2 tsp. Chipotles Peppers (en Adobo and Finely Chopped)', '1 stick(s) Celery']
Making:
Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into martini glass. Garnish with green eye balls, laid across the rim of the glass*.
*Cut the end of a stalk of celery so it measures 5-6 inches long and split the stick in half lengthwise. Slide the green olives into two lychee fruits to make eye balls and push the thin celery stick through both as garnish.

Name: SKYY Summer Palmer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Iced Tea (Sweetened)', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine SKYY Vodka, triple sec, unsweetened iced tea, lemon juice and ice into a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously and strain into a martini glass with sugar rim as garnish.

Name: SKYY Wilde Ginger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. SKYY Infusions Ginger Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Lemonade', '1/4 oz. Honey']
Making:
Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh ginger.
Inspired by Olivia Wilde in Butter
SKYY Vodka's specialty cocktails will be enjoyed at the 2011 Toronto Film Festival's official and additional buzz-worthy star-studded events including HELLO! Canada’s 5th Anniversary Red Carpet and Gala, NOW Magazine’s After Gala Party, Alliance Films Studio Party, OnexOne Concert, in partnership with DIESEL, Nikki Beach and Tribute Magazine’s Late Night Festival events

Name: Sleeping Booty
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Bacardi O', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake and strain into a stemmed glass. Float the Chambord.

Name: Sloe Gin Martini
