Ingredients: ['3 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '4 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Smashing Pumpkin Martini
Ingredients: ['3/4 part(s) Beefeater Dry Gin', '1 1/4 part(s) Hiram Walker Pumpkin Spice Schnapps', '3/4 part(s) Sour Mix']
Making: Combine ingredients in shaker with ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into cinnamon-sugar rimmed martini glass. Garnish and serve.

Name: Smoked Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Level Vodka', '1/4 oz. Laphroiag Scotch - 10 Year Old']
Making: Rinse a chilled martini glass with the scotch and pour into ice filled mixing tin. Twirl scotch with ice and strain scotch to discard. Now shake vodka with the seasoned ice and strain into the seasoned glass. Garnish with two blue cheese or smoked Gouda stuffed olives.

Name: Smokey Rose
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Lychee Juice', '1/2 oz. Wyborowa Dzika Rose', '1 dash(es) Rye Whiskey']
Making: Rinse a Boston glass with rye whiskey. Add Ice. Add other ingredients. Shake and pour into a martini glass filled with rose petals and shaved ice.

Name: Smoky Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Scotch']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Snowflake #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Celtic Crossing Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1 1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake with ice until a good froth has developed. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with almond slices and nutmeg on top of the froth.

Name: Sophisticate
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1 splash(es) Vermouth', '1/2 Lime']
Making: Shake Midori, vodka, vermouth and the juice of the lime with crushed ice. Strain into a martini glass.

Name: Sour Apple Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. DeKuyper Sour Apple', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cold martini glass. Garnish with a thin apple slice.

Name: Southern Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '4 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Soviet Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Black Currant Vodka (or any other current vodka)', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Fino Sherry']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Spice Night
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Mount Gay Eclipse Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Apple Juice Scented*', '1/2 oz. Carrot Juice', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Maple Syrup', '1 tsp. Ginger Juice']
Making:
Place all ingredients in cocktail shaker. Add ice and shake vigorously. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with whole allspice pods (they will float atop the cocktail).
* Scented Apple Juice: Overnight, combine 3-4 whole allspice pods with one cracked cinnamon stick to 2 cups of apple juice. Refrigerate.

Name: Spiced Treat Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Zinamom Cinnamon Vodka (Or any other cinnamon-flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a chocolate straw.

Name: Springtime Martini #1
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Zubrowka Vodka (Or any other bison grass vodka)', '1 oz. Lillet (White)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a pickled asparagus spear.

Name: Springtime Martini #2
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '1/4 oz. Aperol Orange Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Tangerine Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: Combine ingredients and shake well. Serve up in a martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: St-Germain and Pineapple Cosmo
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a wedge of pineapple, or lime wedge.

Name: St-Hubert
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) London Dry Gin', '1 part(s) Cherry Brandy']
Making: Shake well with ice until it all melts then serve in a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: St. Paddy Appletini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps', '1 part(s) Absolut Pears Vodka', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Staten Island Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Coffee Vodka (Or any other coffee-flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Steinbeck
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Club Soda', '6 Grapes']
Making: Combine vodka and club soda into a martini glass. Do not shake. Squeeze three grapes into the drink. Discard the grapes. Stir gently with a stir stick or straw--do not use a spoon. Squeeze three more grapes into drink and drop them into the glass.

Name: Strawberry Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '2 oz. Tequila Rose']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass and serve.

Name: Strawberry Shortchata
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Rum Chata', '1 part(s) Rum Chata', '1 part(s) Pinnacle Cake Vodka', '1 splash(es) DeKuyper Wild Strawberry Liqueur']
Making: Chill ingredients; shake; serve in martini glass! Garnish with fresh strawberries. Enjoy!

Name: Super Nova
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '3 drop(s) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a couple of Starburt Candies.

Name: Sweet and Spicy Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Zinamom Cinnamon Vodka (Or any other cinnamon-flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Orange Liqueur']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: Sweet Heat
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. SKYY Infusions Ginger Vodka', '1/2 oz. Pepper (Small, De-seeded Habanero Pepper Slice)', '3/4 oz. Agave Nectar', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', 'Ginger (Candied)']
Making:
Gently muddle pepper slice in cocktail shaker. Add the rest of the ingredients, with the exception of candied ginger, with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with candied ginger on rim of glass.
Created by Alex Straus of Suite 700 at the Hotel Shangri-La in Los Angeles

Name: Sweet Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', 'dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Sweetheart Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Boru Crazzberry Vodka', '2 oz. Pallini Raspicello']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with raspberries.

Name: Sweetie Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Sweet Vermouth']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Tadisms Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '3/4 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake the ingredients (except 7-Up) with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Add the splash of 7-Up, drop in a cherry and garnish with a rimmed lime wedge.

Name: Tahitian Pearl
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pearl Coconut Vodka', '1 oz. Arrow Blue Curaco', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Take Off Your Bra Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Coffee Vodka', '1 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Combine in a martini glass.

Name: Tanqueray Rouge
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Pomegranate Juice']
Making: Add Tanqueray London Dry, simple syrup, fresh lemon juice, and pomegranate juice. Shake with ice and strain into martini glass. Garnish with lemon peel spiral.

Name: Tea Forte Lavender Pear Martini
Ingredients: ['1 Tea Forte Lavender Citrus Cocktail Infusion', '2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Pear Nectar']
Making: Place infuser in glass. Pour vodka over infuser and steep for 2-3 minutes. Combine infused vodka and pear nectar in a shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with the infuser if desired.

Name: Tea Forte Violet Gin Sour
Ingredients: ['1 Tea Forte Lavender Citrus Cocktail Infusion', '2 oz. Gin', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 Egg White']
Making: Place infuser in glass. Pour gin over infuser and steep to desired strength. Combine infused gin, simple syrup, lemon juice and egg white in a shaker with ice, shake vigorously. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with the infuser if desired.

Name: Tea Forte Watermark Maiden
Ingredients: ['1 Tea Forte Lavender Citrus Cocktail Infusion', '1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Orange Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '3/4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 slice(s) Grapefruit']
Making: Place infuser in glass. Pour gin over infuser and steep to desired strength. Combine infused gin, orange liquor, lemon juice, and orange juice in a shaker with ice, shake vigorously. Strain into a martini glass and garnish with a slice of grapefruit, top with infuser if desired.

Name: Temptation
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Temptation Island
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients over ice and strain into a frozen martini glass.

Name: Thai Smile
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Mekhong Thai Spirit', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 Pomegranate(s)', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup']
Making: In a mixing glass muddle pomegranate (leaving over a bar spoon of seeds to garnish) and sugar syrup. Add remaining ingredients, fill with ice and shake vigorously for 7-8 seconds and strain into a Martini Glass. Garnish with remaining pomegranate seeds.

Name: That's Amore Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Raspberry di Amore', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain & pour into martini glass.

Name: The 'Lua-Leche
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '17 oz. Milk', '1/2 oz. Sugar', '1 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '2 part(s) Espresso']
Making:
Add 1/3 ounce of lemon juice to 17 ounces milk. Boil for 3-4 minutes and filter in a gauze to separate the curd. Drain from all the liquid, then add 1/2 ounce sugar. With the mixture, form little ricotta balls. These can be stored, covered, in the refrigerator for no longer than two days.
Soften the gelatin sheet in cold water for five minutes, then melt it in .88 ounces of warm water and add to the vodka and Kahlua mix. Set aside in the refrigerator for an hour to make it fluid.
Mix 1/32 ounce agar agar with two shots of espresso, bring to a boil, turn off the heat and pour onto a flat surface in order to get a thin espresso gelatin. When this is set, cut circles of the same diameter of the border of the glass the drink is going to be served in.
With an espresso machine steamer, foam up some whole milk for a thick, soft foam.
Put a small "ricotta" ball on the bottom of the serving glass. Add the vodka and Kahlua mixture, filling the glass up to .79 inches to the border. Fill the glass with the warm milk foam and top off with espresso gelatin "lid."
Created by Molecular Gastronomist Simone Bonelli of Perbacco

Name: The Absolut Trick-or-Tini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Ruby Red Vodka', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Apple Cider', '3/4 oz. Apricot Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Ruby Port']
Making:
Combine all ingredients, shake well and pour into chilled martini glass. Sink the ruby port to the bottom and garnish with a flamed orange peel, and freckle with nutmeg.
Being served this Halloween at BED New York.
BED
530 W. 27th Street
New York, NY

Name: The Alexander Nevsky Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '4 Raspberries (Fresh)']
Making: Blend vodka and gin with a generous quantity of ice in a mixing glass and strain into a chilled martini glass with fresh raspberries. Optional: Sprinkle a few drops of Framboise or Kirschwasser over the top of the drink.

Name: The Bada Bing Level Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Level Vodka', '1 part(s) Dry Vermouth']
Making:
Stir with ice in a mixing glass and strain into a well- chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a Mozzarella Stuffed Olive
Looking to put the Bada Bing back in your Sunday Night?
Now being served at South City Grill, Jersey City

Name: The Blue Fin Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice White']
Making: Shake with ice, pour into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a Swedish fish. The Blue Fin - W Hotel, NYC

Name: The Blue Grotto
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. Gin']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or starfruit.

Name: The Blue Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '4 oz. Lemonade (Tart)']
Making: Combine over ice in a mixing tin. Stir until chilled and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: The Blue Star
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Cointreau', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a star fruit. Vong’s Thai Kitchen – Chicago

Name: The Bombshell
Ingredients: ['1 spray(s) Espresso', '2 1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 dash(es) Kahlua', '1 dash(es) Frangelico']
Making: Shake well over ice. Serve up in a martini glass.

Name: The Brindle
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Bulldog Gin', '1 oz. Elderflower Syrup', '3/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cassis']
Making: Shake Bulldog Gin, elder flower syrup and simple syrup with ice and strain into a martini glass. Add Creme de Cassis and garnish with sage leaves.

Name: The Can-Can Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon or orange twist.

Name: The Chocolate Banana-tini
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Vodka Premium is best of course', '1 1/2 part(s) White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 part(s) 99 Bananas Schnapps']
Making:
Though I wish I could claim it, this one is not mine. This is a drink I picked up on a cruise ship and fell in love with. The best thing about this drink is that, made with the right ingredients, it is perfectly clear.
This is a classic martini as far as preparation is concerned. I think though you’d be best to follow 007’s lead and shake this one over ice. It is really important that you use white crème de cacao or the entire effect is lost. Be careful not to over pour the 99 Bananas or you’ll over power the rest of the drink. Though the flavors are amazing, this drink is not for lightweights. Its still a martini.

Name: The CinEspresso Martini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Van Gogh Double Espresso Vodka', '1 part(s) Rum Chata']
Making: Shake with ice and serve

Name: The Classic Saaga
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Saaga 1763 Vodka']
Making: Shake in a shaker with ice no more than 8 times. Pour into a martini glass and add olives.

Name: The Courvoisitini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Courvoisier Cognac', '1 part(s) Triple Sec', '1/2 part(s) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into martini glass. Garnish with a Cherry.

Name: The Cucumber Viper
Ingredients: ['3 slice(s) Cucumber 1/2 inches thick', '2 slice(s) Lime', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Partida Agave Nectar or 1 sugar cube', '1 1/2 oz. Partida Blanco Tequila', '1/4 oz. Gran Torres Orange Liqueur']
Making: Muddle the first four ingredients. Add the rest and top with ice. Shake and strain into martini or over rocks in old fashion glass. Dust with chili piquin. – Jonathan, Adobo Mexican Grill, Chicago

Name: The DramBOOie
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Hiram Walker Pumpkin Spice Schnapps', '1 part(s) Apple Schnapps', '1 1/4 part(s) Drambuie Liqueur', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick and whipped cream.

Name: The Floral Martini
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. L'Espirit de June", "1 1/2 oz. G'Vine Floraison Gin", '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '3 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making: Pre-stir the ingredients in an empty stirring glass Pour them over cold, hard, large ice-cubes and stir for 10-15 seconds. Strain into the glass. Spray the oils of a firm lemon's peel (peel side down) over the surface of the drink, rub the peel around the rim of the glass, and discard.

Name: The Fluffy Belwah
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 tbsp. Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix all ingriedients without ice in shaker then put ice on top. Shake fast and hard and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with lime twist.

Name: The Frank O'Hara
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dry Gin', '1/3 oz. Strega']
Making: Stir (not shake) with ice and strain. Pour into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: The Friend Me
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Hornitos Reposado Tequila', '1 part(s) Dekuyper Pomegranate Liqueur', '1 part(s) Lime Juice Freshly Squeezed', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup']
Making:
Bartender: Adam Geenen, Salud Tequila Lounge, Chicago, IL
Popularity takes on a whole new meaning with the rise of social networking. So have a sip and share with your virtual buddies.
Combine ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously for 5 seconds. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: The Gobbler
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Cranberry Sauce (Relish)']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with several dried cranberries or grated orange zest.

Name: The H Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Herradura Silver Tequila', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '1 splash(es) Olive Juice']
Making: In a shaker filled with ice, add ingredients, shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with olives.

Name: The HPNOTIQ Maria
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hpnotiq', '3/4 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a martini glass. Maria O’Reilly, Seaport Hotel – Boston

Name: The Kentucky Cutter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bulleit Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an orange slice and a cherry.

Name: The Londoner
Ingredients: ["2 part(s) Broker's London Dry Gin", '1 part(s) Pink Grapefruit Juice', '1 splash(es) Creme de Cassis', '2 wedge(s) Lime']
Making: Squeeze the lime wedges into a shaker and add the other ingredients. Fill the shaker with ice cubes and shake vigorously until the shaker is freezing. Strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: The Motini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Raspberry Vodka', '1 part(s) Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Banana Liqueur']
Making: Shake over ice and serve in a martini glass. Stir with a cinnamon stick. A variation on the raspberry martini - invented in the Burj Al Arab 7hotel in Dubai.

Name: The Perfect Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo (1800)', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice (Sweet)", '1 oz. Sugar Water']
Making: Shake all the ingredients for 2 minutes with 1/2 cup of ice. Strain into a martini glass. Garnish with 2 large green olives.

Name: The Perfect Vodka Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka (100 Proof)', '1 1/2 oz. Vermouth', '1 tsp. Olive Brine', '3 Olive(s) (Preferably Spanish olives)']
Making: Put a handful of ice into a shaker and add the vermouth. Shake, pour into a martini glass, swirl and discard. Pour the vodka into the shaker and the olive brine, and shake until you can't bare the chill. Pour into the martini glass, add three small or two large Spanish olives and serve.

Name: The Pink Ribbon - TY KU
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Sake', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '3 oz. Black Currant Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: The Pumpkin Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cabana Cachaca', '1 oz. Pumpkin Puree', 'Simple Syrup']
Making: Serve in a Martini glass. Garnish with whipped cream and cinnamon.

Name: The Real Flirtini - Sex In The City Style
Ingredients: ['4 Raspberries', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', 'Champagne']
Making: Muddle 4 raspberries in the bottom of a martini glass. Shake the vodka, triple sec, lime, cranberry and pineapple juice with ice. Strain into the martini glass. Top with champagne. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: The Rebel
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Johnnie Walker Black Label Scotch', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Apple Barrel Schnapps', '3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '4 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters', '1/4 oz. Maple Syrup', '1 splash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Combine all ingredients and shake vigorously before serving up. Garnish with a six inch slice of granny smith apple peel using a channel knife. The martini glass should be rimmed with a dusting of caramelized sugar, sea salt and cayenne pepper which has been crushed into a powder using a grinder.

Name: The Ricky Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rum (Puerto Rican)', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1 splash(es) Dry Vermouth', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime twist and a cherry. After a few of these you'll be living la vida drunka!

Name: The Romantic Saaga
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Saaga 1763 Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice', '1 squirt(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake in a shaker with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: The Salt Miner
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Wyborowa Pure Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Dry Vermouth', '3/4 part(s) Blackberry Liqueur', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice Fresh', '3 drop(s) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Half salt the rim of a chilled 6 oz. martini glass. Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake well. Strain into the glass and float 3 drops of Angostura bitters on top. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: The Sapphire Silk
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice and strain into martini glass. Garnish with a fresh halved strawberry on the rim.

Name: The Shamrock-tini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys with a hint of Mint Chocolate', '1/2 oz. Vanilla Vodka']
Making: Add Baileys with a hint of Mint Chocolate and vodka to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: The Shorn Identity
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 part(s) Makers Mark Bourbon', '1 oz. Lemon Juice Fresh', '2 oz. Lime Juice Fresh', '1 part(s) Simple Syrup', '4 drop(s) Orange Flower Water', '1 Egg White', 'Angostura Bitters']
Making:
Bartender: Marvin Allen, Carousel Lounge, New Orleans, LA
It was a day of infamy when a former pop sensation shaved her locks in a signal of desperation and despair. We watched her demise with intrigue in the hopes that she won't - oops, do it again.
Place all ingredients with the exception of the bitters into a cocktail shaker. Shake until well chilled and frothy. Strain into a sugar rimmed martini glass, sprinkle a few drops of bitters on top and swirl into a fun design.

Name: The Spiced Apple Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. 10 Cane Rum', '2 oz. Apple Juice', '1 splash(es) Amaretto', '2 pinch(es) Cinnamon Cinnamon/Superfine Sugar Mix']
Making: In a mixing glass, add 10 Cane, apple juice, Amaretto, ground cinnamon, and ice cubes. Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with superfine sugar and ground cinnamon. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

Name: The Thistle
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1 oz. Cynar', '1 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Orange Juice (Freshly squeezed)']
Making: Shake over ice then pour into 2 chilled martini glasses.

Name: The Tiramisu Martini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Rum Chata', '1 part(s) Van Gogh Espresso Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Sprinkle with shaved chocolate.

Name: The Top of the Pop
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Vanilia Vodka', '1 part(s) Absolut Kurant Vodka', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Wild Strawberry Liqueur', 'Champagne', '1/2 part(s) Raspberries Puree', '3 Blueberries', '2 Raspberries', '1 Black Currant Cordial']
Making: Neatly put Raspberry puree in the bottom of a martini glass. Then sink the fresh berries into the puree. Now shake Absolut Vanilla, Absolut Kurant and DeKuyper Wilderberry Schnapps and very gently layer on top of the puree making sure not to disturb it. Float Champagne on top of the martini. When you're ready to drink, pour a package of POP Rocks! Blue Raspberry Candy in and listen to the drink as it sings to you while changing the drink's color.

Name: The Ultimate Chai Espresso
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Voyant Chai Cream Liqueur', '1 oz. Van Gogh Double Espresso Vodka']
Making: Combine ingredients over ice in a shaker and shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a few coffee beans.

Name: The Vine and Wine Martini
Ingredients: ["1 oz. L'Espirit de June", '2 oz. White Wine (Dry)', '1 dash(es) The Bitter Truth Celery Bitters']
Making: Pre-stir Esprit de June and white wine in an empty stirring glass or shaker. Pour the ingredients over cold, hard, large ice-cubes and stir for 10-15 seconds. Strain into the glass. Garnish with 3 speared green grapes.

Name: The Wet Spot
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Plymouth Gin', '1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1 oz. Apple Juice', '1/2 oz. Elderflower Syrup', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making:
The First annual American cocktail awards took place on May the 13th (The date of the bicentenary of the first cocktail) in Las Vegas! And the winning drink was a Plymouth cocktail. The cocktail is from the New York restaurant Bed, the bartenders name is Willy Shine.
Shake ingredients and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a spiral lemon twist!

Name: Third Degree Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Pernod Absinthe']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a star anise.

Name: Tie Me To The Bedpost
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 part(s) Midori', '1 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Grand Marnier', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 Lime squeeze of']
Making: Build drink in a a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lime on the rim and a cherry.

Name: Tigress Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Orange Liqueur', '3 Mint Leaves']
Making: Muddle mint leaves in shaker, add HPNOTIQ, tequila and orange liqueur. Strain into chilled martini glass. Toni Parker, Hilton – Chicago

Name: Time for a Change
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 part(s) Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon', '1/4 part(s) DeKuyper Triple Sec', '1/2 part(s) Lemon Juice Fresh', '1/2 part(s) Blueberry Juice', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup Lavender Honey', '1 dash(es) Orange Bitters']
Making:
Bartender: Steve King and Owen Thomson, Bourbon, Washington, DC
Democrats and Republicans and Independents, oh my! His term is up and we wait with baited breath for what the next chief will bring.
Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Shake and serve in a sugar rimmed martini glass.

Name: Tirimusu Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Pour all over ice and shake. Strain into martini glass with chocolate syrup drizzled inside.

Name: Tito's After Five Martini
Ingredients: ["2 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '1 dash(es) Olive Juice']
Making: Stir in a martini glass and garnish with a blue cheese olive.

Name: Tito's Apertif Martini
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '3/4 oz. Campari', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '3/4 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Stir in a martini glass and garnish with a a burnt orange.

Name: Tito's Cinnamon Apple Martini
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '1 oz. Apple Schnapps', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cinnamon sugar rimmed martini glass. Garnish with an apple slice.

Name: Tito's Espresso Martini
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '3/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Espresso', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 dash(es) Cream', '1 splash(es) Sambuca']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with ground espresso.

Name: Tito's French Martini
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Tito's Lychee Martini
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '1/2 oz. Soho Lychee Liqueur', '3 oz. Watermelon Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martinil glass. Garnish with a watermelon spear.

Name: Tito's Pomegranate Martini
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '1 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: Tito's White Como
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Tito's Handmade Vodka", '3/4 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice (White)', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martinil glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: TiYani MarTini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Apple Pucker', '2 1/2 oz. Squirt', "1 1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Stirred Not Shaken. Stir in a medium size pitcher (do-not over stir - about 5 full circle stirs). Strain into a glass. Makes about 4 cocktails.

Name: Toblerone
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Frangelico', '2 oz. Cream', 'dash(es) Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Blend with a scoop of ice and pour into a honey rimmed large martini glass. Garnish with chocolate powder and syrup.

Name: Tongue Tied
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Skyy Infusions Cherry Vodka', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake X-Rated and SKYY Infusions Cherry over ice. Strain into a martini glass. Slowly add a dash of Grenadine so that it sinks to the bottom. Garnish with a cherry with a knotted stem.

Name: Tootsie Roll Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Top Dog
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bulldog Gin', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour Bulldog Gin and orange juice into a highball glass over ice. Fill with ginger ale and stir.

Name: Top Shelf Coconut Martini
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 oz. Grey Goose Vodka', '1 splash(es) Seltzer Water', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice until extra chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Drink and say 'Yummmmm!'

Name: Trace of Mango Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1/2 cup(s) Mango', '3 oz. Apple Juice', '1/3 oz. Apple Liqueur', '1 tsp. Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Muddle mango and shake with ice. Double strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a slice of mango.

Name: Tropical Dream
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour ingredients into shaker with ice, shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with pineapple wedge and drop a cherry in the bottom of glass. Enjoy the vacation!

Name: Tropical Peach Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Truffle Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka (Or any other strawberry-flavoured vodka)', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Turew-tini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wyborowa Pure Vodka', '1 oz. Zubrowka Vodka', '1 oz. Honey Vodka', '1 oz. Apple Juice Pressed (cloudy)']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a chilled 6 oz. martini glass. Garnish with 2 apple slices (Cox or Bramley)

Name: Turf Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '4 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an almond-stuffed olive.

Name: Twin Cities
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka']
Making: Layer ingredients in order in a martini glass. Enjoy.

Name: Ty Ginger Crush
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Sake', '4 Ginger Ale']
Making: Stir in a martini glass. Garnish with a heart shaped ginger snap cookie.

Name: TY KU Chocolate Spice Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Sake', '1 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: TY KU Cosmo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Sake', '1 splash(es) Vodka', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: TY KU Pear-fection
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Absolut Pears Vodka', '1 Pear (asian)', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Muddle asian pear and shake all with ice. Remove ice and pour into a martini glass. Garnish with a slice of asian pear.

Name: TY KU Tini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Sake', '1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a slice of lemon.

Name: Ty-Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Sake', '1 oz. TY KU Soju', '1 oz. White Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: TY-quila Sunrise
Ingredients: ['2 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Tequila', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a flower.

Name: TY-tini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 squirt(s) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Soda Water']
Making: Shake liqueur, vodka and lime with ice. Strain into a martini glass and add splash of soda.

Name: Ultimate Apple Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Van Gogh Wild Appel Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Berentzen Apfel Korn', '1 splash(es) Simple Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cinammon-sugar rimmed martini glass and garnish with a red apple slice notched onto the rim. This would be the ulimate of apple martinis because it is made with a top shelf apple liqueur. This is my award winning baby here in Tampa FL at a recent distributor drink contest.

Name: Ultimate Arctic Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Finlandia Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Stir and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an olive and a lemon peel.

Name: Ultimate Chocolate Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with chocolate square or chocolate twist.

Name: Undercurrent
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda', '1 splash(es) Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Mix all ingredients except raspberry liqueur and pour into a martini glass. Add raspberry liqueur and drink all at once. Don't get washed away by the undercurrent!!

Name: Valencia Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Amontillado Sherry']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Valentini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients and ice into martini shaker. Shake well and strain contents into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry or cinnamon heart candies. Great for Valentines Day Cheers!

Name: Van Gogh Almond Joy Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Van Gogh Dutch Caramel Vodka', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Hazelnut Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Liqueur']
Making:
Dip the rim of a chilled martini glass into chocolate syrup and roll in shaved coconut. Place glass into the refrigerator until ready to serve the cocktail. Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into chilled martini glass with chocolate-coconut rim.
Almond Joy Martini – Center in the background of the photo.

Name: Van Gogh Blue Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Van Gogh Blue Triple Wheat Vodka']
Making: Pour in a martini glass and garnish with 3 blue cheese stuffed olives.

Name: Van Gogh Blue Press
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Van Gogh Blue Triple Wheat Vodka', '1 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '1 oz. Club Soda', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour in a martini glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Van Gogh BLUEberry Lemon Drop
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Van Gogh Blue Triple Wheat Vodka', '1/2 Lemon', '7 Blueberries', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Muddle half of a lemon and 4 blueberries. Sink raspberry liqueur and garnish with 3 blueberries.

Name: Van Gogh Milky Way Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Van Gogh Dutch Chocolate Vodka', '1/2 oz. Van Gogh Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps']
Making: Combine all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and pour into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Van Gogh Peanut Butter Cup
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Van Gogh Dutch Caramel Vodka', '1 oz. Castries Creme Peanut Rum', '3/4 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making:
Drizzle chocolate syrup into the bottom of a martini glass. Place the glass into the refrigerator until ready to use. Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into the chilled martini glass and garnish with a peanut butter cup.
PeanutButter Cup - right of center

Name: Van Gogh PepperMint Pattini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Van Gogh Dutch Caramel Vodka', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a Peppermint Pattie candy wedge.
PepperMint Pattini - left of center (green cocktail)

Name: Van Gogh Starburst Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Van Gogh Wild Appel Vodka', '1/2 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '1/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with lemon wedge cutout in the shape of a star.

Name: VeeV Acai-tini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '2 tbsp. Partida Agave Nectar', '1 1/2 oz. Acai Juice']
Making: Combine VeeV, fresh lime juice, agave nectar, açaí juice and ice in a cocktail shaker and shake. Strain and pour into a martini glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: VeeV Global Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. VeeV Acai Spirit', '3 piece(s) Basil', '2 slice(s) Cucumber', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 dash(es) Partida Agave Nectar']
Making: Muddle 2 slices of cucumber and 3 basil leaves in a mixing glass. Add 2.0 oz VeeV, 0.75 fresh lemon juice, a dash of agave nectar and ice in a cocktail shaker and shake. Pour into a Collins glass and top with club soda and garnish with a floating cucumber.

Name: Venetian Pina Colada
Ingredients: ['4/5 oz. Koko Kanu', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Cream', '1 1/2 cup(s) Pineapple Juice (Freshly squeezed)']
Making: Shake all the ingredients with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Vesper Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Dry Gin', '3/4 oz. Lillet white']
Making: In a cocktail shaker half filled with cracked ice add the gin and then the Lillet. Stir then strain into a chilled martini glass and add a lemon twist. From 'Casino Royale' by Ian Fleming.

Name: Vodka Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Dry Vermouth (Or to taste)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an olive.

Name: Vodka Martini (Very Dry)
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka (Chilled in a freezer)', 'Vermouth']
Making: Chill glass with ice. If vodka is not freezer-cold, shake with ice in shaker. Discard ice in glass, shake to remove excess water droplets. Pour small amount of vermouth in glass, slosh around to coat sides of glass sparingly, then discard vermouth, shaking glass to remove excess. Rub a lemon peel julienne around glass rim. Pour chilled vodka in glass. Garnish with a lemon peel and add an olive. This method is foolproof, and if you start use good vodka this makes a great martini.

Name: Voyant Chaitini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Voyant Chai Cream Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. Coffee Liqueur']
Making: Combine ingredients over ice in a shaker and shake well. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a few coffee beans.

Name: Voyant Pumpkin Chai Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Voyant Chai Cream Liqueur', '2 dash(es) Cinnamon', '1 oz. Vanilla Vodka', 'Pumpkin Puree (if desired)']
Making: Dip martini glass in chocolate syrup then into orange sugar crystals and then chocolate sprinkles. Combine ingredients (including the ground cinnamon) with ice in a shaker. Shake Well and strain into the rimmed martini glass. Garnish with some ground cinnamon and a cinnamon stick.

Name: Waborita #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Cointreau', '2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a salt rimmed martini glass. Garnish with a slice of lime. Note: This drink was created by the Red Rocker Sammy Hagar, and I take no credit to its creation. I only wanted to share it with everyone that didn't buy his album.

Name: Waborita #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Tequila', '2/3 oz. Triple Sec', "2/3 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 splash(es) Grand Marnier', 'dash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: This is the one!! (Or as close to it as most of us will really get) Sammy Hagar invented it, I just want to share. Over fresh ice, pour all ingredients except blue curaco. Shake or stir well. Strain into a martini glass (with a kiss of salt on the rim). Add blue curaco gently and it will layer to the bottom of the glass. Garnish with lime.

Name: Waikiki Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Pineapple Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Lillet (White)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Warsaw Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka (With a potato base)', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1/2 oz. Blackberry Brandy']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: Washington Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Watermelon Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/6 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori', '2 1/2 oz. Watermelon Juice', '3 dash(es) Gomme Syrup', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake all the ingredients with ice and then strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a sliver of fresh watermelon.

Name: Watermelon Martini #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bulldog Gin', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice Fresh', '1 oz. Midori', '1 1/2 oz. Watermelon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: Wembly Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '1 tsp. Apricot Brandy', '1 tsp. Calvados']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: What is that Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Stir with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a licorice twist and some coffee beans.

Name: White Chocolate Bliss
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Navan Natural Vanilla Liqueur', '1 part(s) Godiva White Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice; strain into a martini glass.

Name: White Chocolate Martini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Stir and serve.

Name: White Chocolate Sake-tini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. White Chocolate Liqueur', '1 squirt(s) Vanilla Syrup']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with dark chocolate.

Name: White Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Ketel One Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Ocean Spray Juice (White Cranberry)']
Making: Combine in a shaker and strain into a chilled martini glass.

Name: White Gold
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: White Peach Blossom Martini
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker White Peach Schnapps', '1/2 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: White X-mas
Ingredients: ['2 tbsp. Sherbet Lemon', '3 oz. Partida Blanco Tequila', '1/2 oz. St-Germain Elderflower Liqueur', '1 dash(es) Lemon Juice', 'Partida Agave Nectar']
Making: Dip rim of glass in agave nectar and then in crushed short bread cookies, enough to coat the rim. Mix all ingredients in a shaker with a few cubes of ice and shake well. Serve in a short Martini glass. – Dalio Calado, New York

Name: Whore's Kiss
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 Lemon', '1 dash(es) Club Soda', '1 dash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Squeeze a 1/2 lemon into a shaker with the vodka. Drop the rinds in and shake well. Serve in a martini glass with a sugared rim.

Name: Wild Blue HPNOTIQ
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hpnotiq', '3/4 oz. Cranberry Juice (White)', '1/2 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Shake with ice, strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a cherry.

Name: Wild Hibiscus Embrace
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pinky Vodka', '2 oz. Pear Nectar', '1/4 oz. Wild Hibiscus Syrup', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '2 leaf(leaves) Basil', '1 splash(es) Soda Water', '1 Wild Hibiscus Flower', '1 piece(s) Pear']
Making:
Shake all the ingredients with ice, with the exception of the soda, hibiscus flower and pear spear. Strain over crushed ice in a martini glass and top with a splash of soda. Stuff a hibiscus flower with a long pear spear then place on the side of the glass to garnish.
Created by: Danielle Tatarin

Name: Will You Be My TY-tini
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. TY KU Soju', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a martini glass.

Name: Winter Sunshine Martini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Gingerbread Liqueur', '1 part(s) Hiram Walker Triple Sec']
Making: Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: Winter White Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Cranberi Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice White']
Making: Combine ingredients over ice in a shaker tin. Shake and strain into chilled martini glass. Float 3 or 4 frozen cranberries on top for garnish.

Name: Woo Woo Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Cranberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: World's Driest Martini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin (Chilled)', '1/2 oz. Vermouth']
Making: Remove chilled martini glass from fridge, place vermouth in glass, swirl and shake dry. Fill glass with gin (from freezer).

Name: Wot The Hell
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1 oz. Bols Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Martini and Rossi Extra Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Lime Juice fresh', '1/2 oz. Gomme Syrup']
Making: Shake and strain all ingredients with ice into a chilled 5oz martini glass….voila.

Name: Xante Ginger Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Xante Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', '1 piece(s) Ginger']
Making: Muddle the ginger. Add Xante, freshly pressed lemon juice and sugar syrup. Shake and double strain. Serve in a martini glass and garnish with fresh ginger.

Name: Xena Martini
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Honey Vodka', '1/2 oz. Zubrowka Vodka (Or any other bison grass vodka)', '1 tsp. Lillet (White)']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an asparagus spear.

Name: XXX Martini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake all with ice and strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a raspberry or lemon twist.

Name: Yazi Gingertini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Yazi Ginger Flavored Vodka', '1 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 part(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and serve up in martini glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Yazitini
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Yazi Ginger Flavored Vodka', '1 dash(es) Dry Vermouth']
Making: Shake with ice and serve up in martini glass. Garnish with a twist of lime.

Name: ZA ZA Zoom
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '4 Raspberries', '1 1/2 oz. Jacques Cardin VSOP Apple Cognac', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Muddle the Chambord and raspberries. Add the Jacques Cardin Cognac and Pineapple juice and shake with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with fresh raspberries.

Name: Zippy Martini
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dry Vermouth', '4 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with a jalapeno slice.

Name: ZYR Dirty Martini
Ingredients: ['4 oz. ZYR Vodka']
Making: Shake ZYR Vodka with ice and strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with 3-4 Martini Olives.

Name: 4 J's And A Cherry
Ingredients: ['Cherry Juice', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix all but the cherry juice in a blender with ice until it takes the form of slush. Pour in tall, slender, chilled, sugar rimmed glasses. Leave half an inch for the cherry juice. Garnish with a cherry. For extra fun add pineapple garnishes as well. Any of the Cran-juices can be used.

Name: Acapulco Gold
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 oz. Whipping Cream', '2 tbsp. Coconut']
Making: Put all ingredients in a blender and blend well. Serve. Sarah's comment: Although it sounds like it might curdle, for some reason it doesn't.

Name: Acid Sweeter
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lime Juice 1/2 lime', '1 1/2 tsp. Sugar', '2 drop(s) Vanilla Extract', 'Water']
Making: Combine lime juice, sugar and vanilla extract in a glass. Fill with water. Stir well and serve cold.

Name: Afterglow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grenadine', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix in a highball glass.

Name: Agua Loja
Ingredients: ['5 cup(s) Water', '12 oz. Molasses', '1 oz. Ginger (Ground)', '5 Cinnamon Sticks']
Making: Boil the ginger, the cinnamon and the water for 15 minutes then strain and let cool. When cool, mix in a punch bowl with the molasses until well blended. Chill before serving.

Name: Alice Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Orange Juice', '2/3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/3 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Almond Punch
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Almonds (Peeled)', '4 oz. Sugar', 'Water']
Making: Boil the almonds in 2 cups of water, strain and let cool. Make a pulp with the almonds and mix with a quart (95 cl.) of water. Strain into a bowl and stir in sugar. Mix until the sugar is dissolved and chill before serving.

Name: Angel Punch
Ingredients: ['2 quart(s) Grape Juice (White)', '1 quart(s) Tea (Green)', '1 pint(s) Lemon Juice', '8 oz. Sugar Syrup', '2 bottle(s) Club Soda (Chilled)']
Making: Stir well all the ingredients -except soda- and chill. Pour in a punch bowl over a large block of ice and add the soda. Serve in punch cups with a slice of lemon.

Name: Apple Berry Smoothie
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Berries (Strawberries, raspberries or any berry that you wish)', '2 wedge(s) Apple']
Making: Blend until smooth.

Name: Apple Cocktail
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Apples (Peeled and sliced)', '4 oz. Pineapple (Slices)', '8 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Lemon Juice', 'Sugar (To taste)']
Making: Mix the fruit juices with the sugar until it is dissolved. Add the slices of apple and pineapple and chill. Serve in collins glasses and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Apple Frazzle
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Apple Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar Syrup', '1/2 tsp. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Shake all the ingredients (except sparkling water) with cracked ice and strain into a highball glass over ice cubes. Top up with sparkling water.

Name: Apple Juice
Ingredients: ['12 Apples (Preferably baking apples)', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', 'Sugar (To taste)', 'Water']
Making: Slice the apples and boil until soft, with enough water to cover them. Strain the juice in a bowl and stir in sugar until it has dissolved. Chill. Before serving, stir in 2 tsp. of lemon juice for every pint of apple juice. Dilute with water and serve over ice cubes in old-fashioned glasses.

Name: Appleade
Ingredients: ['2 1/3 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '2 Apples (Large)', 'Sugar']
Making: Slice the apples and pour the boiling water on them. Strain and add sugar to taste. Chill and serve with ice.

Name: Apricot Shake
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Apricot Nectar', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1 oz. Cherry Syrup']
Making: Blend until slushy and pour into a collins glass.

Name: Apricot Sparkler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Apricot Nectar', '1 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Mix well nectar and juice with cracked ice and strain over ice cubes into a highball glass. Fill with sparkling water and garnish with the twist of a lemon peel so that the end dangles over the rim of the glass.

Name: Baby Bellini
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Nectar', '1 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', 'Cider (Chilled)']
Making: Mix the fruit juices in a champagne flute and stir in cider.

Name: Baby Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with pineapple slice.

Name: Banana Cantaloupe Smoothie
Ingredients: ['1/2 Cantaloupe (With skin and sliced)', '1 Banana']
Making: Juice the cantaloupe and pour into a blender with the banana. Liquefy.

Name: Banana Cream Pie #2
Ingredients: ['4 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '2 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1/2 Banana']
Making: Blend until smooth and serve in a collins glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a banana slice.

Name: Banana Milk Shake #1
Ingredients: ['1 Banana (Sliced)', '8 oz. Milk', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tbsp. Honey', '4 drop(s) Almond Extract']
Making: Blend and garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Banana Milk Shake #2
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Milk (Cold)', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '2 tsp. Sugar Syrup', '1/2 Banana']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a wine glass. Garnish with whipped cream and a piece of banana.

Name: Banana Orange Protien Smoothie
Ingredients: ['1 Banana', '2 Egg Whites', '1/2 can(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Milk']
Making: Blend until smooth and serve in a highball glass.

Name: Banana Paradise
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Milk', '1 1/2 Banana']
Making: Blend with a cup of ice and serve in a Parfait glass.

Name: Banana Shake
Ingredients: ['1 Banana sliced', '1 tbsp. Sugar', '1 cup(s) Milk', '10 drop(s) Vanilla Extract']
Making: Place all ingredients in blender. Liquify until smooth. Pour into a highball glass and serve.

Name: Banana Strawberry Shake
Ingredients: ['1/2 pound(s) Strawberries (Frozen)', '1 Banana (Frozen)', '1 cup(s) Yogurt (Plain)', '1 cup(s) Milk', 'Honey']
Making: Blend all together until smooth and serve. Add honey to taste.

Name: Banana Strawberry Shake (Daiquiri-type)
Ingredients: ['1/2 pound(s) Strawberries (Frozen)', '1 Banana (Frozen)', '2 cup(s) Apple Juice']
Making: Blend all together until smooth and serve.

Name: Barley Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Barley', '2 oz. Sugar', '1 Lime (You just need the peel)', '6 cup(s) Water']
Making: Boil and stir constantly until the barley is thoroughly cooked. Strain and chill. Serve in punch cups and garnish with slices of lime.

Name: Batman Cocktail
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine', 'Club Soda']
Making: Serve over lots of ice cubes in a collins glass and top up with soda. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Beach Blanket Bingo
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '3 oz. Grape Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Serve over ice in a highball glass and top up with soda. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Berry-Berry
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Berries (Your Choice)', '1 cup(s) Milk', '1 tbsp. Honey']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a tall glass.

Name: Bite of the Apple
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Apple Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 oz. Orgeat Syrup', '1 tbsp. Apple Sauce (Unsweetened)']
Making: Blend with crushed ice until smooth and pour into a pilsner glass. Sprinkle with cinnamon.

Name: Black and Blue Berries
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Blueberries (or Blackberries)', '1 cup(s) Soda Water', '2 tbsp. Honey (or Sugar)', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a highball glass.

Name: Black and Tan
Ingredients: ['Ginger Ale', 'Ginger Beer']
Making: Pour into a pilsner glass and garnish with a lime wedge. Do not stir.

Name: Black and White Milk Shake
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Milk', '2 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream', '2 oz. Chocolate Ice Cream']
Making: Blend until smooth and serve in a collins glass.

Name: Black Cow
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Sarsaparilla', '2 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Pour the Sasparella into a collins glass, and vigorously stir in the ice cream.

Name: Blueberry Shake
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Milk', '1/2 cup(s) Blueberries (Fresh)', '1 tbsp. Sugar']
Making: Blend with cracked ice until smooth and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with fresh blueberries.

Name: Bobbie's Best Triple Sec Slushie
Ingredients: ['1/2 can(s) Fruit Juice (Frozen Minute Maid Tropical Juice)', '1 oz. Lemon Juice (Realemon)', '1 can(s) Water (Or Sprite)', '1 Banana']
Making: Blend with a can of ice until the ice is crushed. Pour in a pitcher and serve in cocktail glasses.

Name: Bobby Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar Syrup', '1 1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a large cocktail glass.

Name: Bog Punch
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Cranberries', '1 pint(s) Water', '1 pint(s) Apple Juice', '8 oz. Cranberry Juice', '8 oz. Sugar', '8 oz. Pineapple (Chunks in juice)', '4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 bottle(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Bring the cranberries, the sugar and the water to the boil, then let simmer until the cranberries are soft and the sugar has dissolved. Strain and let the juice cool. Then mix the juice with the remaining ingredients and chill. Serve in punch cups and garnish with lemon slices.

Name: Bora Bora
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Passion Fruit Juice', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass over ice. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry.

Name: Boston Cream
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 pound(s) Sugar', '2 oz. Citric Acid', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice (Concentrated)', '3 pint(s) Water (Boiling)', 'Baking Soda']
Making: Mix well the citric acid, the sugar and the boiling water until the sugar has dissolved, then let cool. Stir in the lemon juice, chill, bottle and store. Note: Use as a tonic, mixing a pinch of baking soda and a teaspoon of the mixture for every glass of water.

Name: Brazilian Chocolate
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Coffee (Hot and strong)', '1 cup(s) Half and Half Cream (Hot)', '1 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '1/4 cup(s) Sugar', '1 oz. Chocolate (Solid and unsweetened)', '1 tsp. Vanilla Extract', '1/2 tsp. Cinnamon', 'dash(es) Salt']
Making: In a double boiler, melt the solid chocolate, the sugar and the salt. Stir in boiling water and continue to heat until the mixture is well blended and hot. Add the coffee, the cream and stir well. Finish by adding the vanilla and the cinnamon and pour into mugs. Makes 4 servings.

Name: Brown River
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Ginger Beer', '4 oz. Coca Cola', '1 oz. Lemonade', '1 oz. Grenadine red or green', '1/4 tsp. Sugar', '1/4 tsp. Cinnamon', '1/4 tsp. Ginger']
Making: Mix over ice in a Tom Colllins glass. Serve with a cherry and a lemon slice.

Name: Bubbletart
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '3 oz. Mineral water', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake the cranberry and the lime juice with ice and strain into a highball glass. Top up with mineral water and garnish with a lime wheel.

Name: Bubbly Orangeade
Ingredients: ['4 tsp. Orange Juice (Concentrate)', '3/4 cup(s) Club Soda']
Making: Stir with ice in a collins glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Buck's Nursery Fizz
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Serve chilled in champagne flutes.

Name: California Smoothie
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Strawberries (Fresh)', '1/2 cup(s) Dates (Pitted and chopped)', '1 Banana (Thinly sliced)', '1 1/2 oz. Honey']
Making: Blend fruits and honey until smooth, then add some cracked ice and the orange juice to the mixture and blend again until smooth. Serve in a chilled collins glass.

Name: Cape Cod Sunrise
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with crushed ice and strain into a wine glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and a fresh mint sprig.

Name: Carbonated Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Club Soda']
Making: Dissolve the sugar and the lemon in a collins glass, then add ice and fill with Club Soda. Garnish with a cherry and slice of lemon and orange. Serve with a straw.

Name: Carrot Cocktail
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/4 cup(s) Pineapple (Crushed)', '1 Carrot (Chopped)']
Making: Blend until slushy and serve in a highball glass.

Name: Carry Nation Punch
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Orange Juice', '3 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '1 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 cup(s) Sugar Syrup', '2 bottle(s) Ginger Ale (Chilled)']
Making: Mix well all the ingredients -except Ginger Ale- and chill for several hours. Combine with the Ginger Ale in a punch bowl and garnish with fruit of the season. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Cherry Bing
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Cherry Juice', '10 oz. Water', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a collins glass over ice cubes, stir, and serve.

Name: Cherry Cherry
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Cherry Cider (Unsweetened)', '2 oz. Sparkling Water', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Stir over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Cherry Toucan
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Coca Cola', '1 part(s) Root Beer (A and W)', '1 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix equal amounts of Coca Cola and Root Beer Top with grenadine. Enjoy!

Name: Cherry Water
Ingredients: ['2 pound(s) Cherries', '8 oz. Sugar', '1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Stone the cherries. Crush them and strain the juice into a pitcher. Add the sugar, the lemon juice and a little water. Stir well and let stand for a few hours. Strain in a punch bowl and serve in punch cups over crushed ice.

Name: Chicago Lemonade
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sugar Syrup', '1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 oz. Soda Water', '1 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Stir in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Chicken Shot
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Chicken Bouillon (Cold)', '2 oz. Beef Bouillon (Cold)', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', 'Tabasco Sauce (To taste)', 'Worcestershire Sauce (To taste)', 'Pepper (To taste)', 'Celery Salt (To taste)']
Making: Stir well with ice and pour into an old-fashioned glass.

Name: Chocolate Beverage
Ingredients: ['6 cup(s) Milk', '3 oz. Mexican Chocolate (or Dark Dutch)', '1 tsp. Cinnamon', '3 Eggs (Beaten)']
Making: Heat gently and pour into a coffee mug.

Name: Chocolate Drink
Ingredients: ['1/4 pound(s) Semi-Sweet Chocolate', '3 cup(s) Milk', 'Water']
Making: Melt the chocolate in a small amount of boiling water. Add milk. Cook over low heat, whipping gently until heated well. Don't let it boil!

Name: Christmas Juice Punch
Ingredients: ['2 quart(s) Apple Juice', '2 quart(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '1 cup(s) Sugar', '2 bottle(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix well all the ingredients -except Ginger Ale- in a punch bowl. Add ice cubes and the Ginger Ale and serve in punch cups.

Name: Cider Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Light Cream', '1 Egg', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Cider (Sweet)']
Making: Shake the sugar, the cream and the egg with ice. Strain over ice in 2 collins glasses, fill with cider and sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Cinderella
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Lemon Juice', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix and serve with ice.

Name: Clam Digger
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Clamato Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '4 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '4 dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '1/4 tsp. Horseradish', 'Pepper (To taste)', 'Celery Salt (To taste)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into a collins glass. Garnish with a celery stalk and a lime wedge.

Name: Coco Cola
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Coconut Milk', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', 'Cola']
Making: Shake milk and juice and pour over ice into a highball glass. Fill with the cola and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Coconut Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Coconut Milk', '2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Shake milk and juice and pour over ice cubes in a collins glass. Fill with the water and stir gently. Garnish with a fresh mint sprig.

Name: Coffee Almond Float
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Milk', '1/4 cup(s) Instant Coffee', '2 tbsp. Water', '2 tbsp. Brown Sugar', '1/4 tsp. Almond Extract', 'Chocolate Ice Cream']
Making: Dissolve the coffee with the water then add the other ingredients -except the ice cream-. Stir well and pour over ice cubes in parfait glasses. Top with a scoop of ice cream in each glass. This makes approximately 5 servings.

Name: Coffee Cola Cooler
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Water', '1 1/2 cup(s) Cola', '2 tbsp. Instant Coffee', '1 tbsp. Maple Syrup']
Making: Dissolve the coffee in the water, stir in the syrup then slowly stir in the cola. Serve over ice cubes in collins glasses. Garnish with lemon slices. This makes approximately 4 servings.

Name: Coladine
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Cola', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: In a mixing glass stir well the cola and the grenadine then pour over ice cubes in a highball glass. Garnish with a straw and a paper umbrella.

Name: Colastraw
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Cola', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Syrup']
Making: In a mixing glass stir well the cola and the syrup then pour over ice cubes in a highball glass. Garnish with a straw and a paper umbrella.

Name: Confetti
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Cherry Cider (Unsweetened)', '1 oz. Orgeat Syrup', '2 oz. Apples (Fresh and chopped)', '2 oz. Peaches (Fresh and chopped)', '2 oz. Pear (Fresh and chopped)']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with a straw and a cherry.

Name: Cool Collins
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '7 Mint Leaves', 'Sparkling Water']
Making: Pour the lemon juice and the sugar in a collins glass. Stir well, then add the mint leaves and crushed them with a bar spoon. Add ice cubes and fill with sparkling water. Garnish with a fresh mint sprig and a lemon slice.

Name: Cool Cow
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Milk', '1/2 tsp. Almond Extract', '4 tsp. Honey (or Maple Syrup)']
Making: Combine all ingredients in blender. Mix at medium speed until smooth. Serve.

Name: Cranberry Cream Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Apple Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 oz. Coconut Cream', '2 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and serve in large wine glass. Garnish with a straw.

Name: Cranberry Juice Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Cranberries', '1 quart(s) Water', '1/2 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '1 cup(s) Sugar']
Making: Boil the cranberries in the water until they are soft, then let cool. Strain the juice in a bowl and stir in sugar until it has dissolved. Just before serving, add the fruit juices and ice cubes. Serve in wine glasses.

Name: Cranberry Punch #2
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Pineapple Juice', '4 cup(s) Cranberry Juice', '4 cup(s) Water', '6 oz. Brown Sugar', '1 tsp. Butter (Or to taste)', '1/2 tsp. Allspice (Or to taste)', '1/2 tsp. Nutmeg (Or to taste)', '1/2 tsp. Salt (Or to taste)', '1/2 tsp. Cloves (Or to taste)', '1/2 tsp. Cinnamon (Or to taste)']
Making: Bring the sugar and the spices to the boil, with 1 cup of water. Add the pineapple and the cranberry juice with the remaining water and bring to another boil, then let simmer for 5 to 10 minutes. Top with the butter, stir well, and serve in mugs. Garnish each mug with 2 cinnamon sticks.

Name: Crazy Cow
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Apple Juice', '1 cup(s) Milk']
Making: Blend at medium speed until smooth, serve.

Name: Creamy Creamsicle
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Orange Juice', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend at low speed and pour into a highball glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Crow's Nest
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over lots of ice cubes into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lime slice.

Name: Cuddle With Todd
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Build over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Daniel's Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', '2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Daydream
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Passion Fruit Syrup', 'Orange Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Pour the passion fruit syrup into a collins glass filled with ice cubes then add the orange juice. Stir gently and sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Deadly Mannequin
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Water', '1 wedge(s) Lemon']
Making: Enjoy but take it slow

Name: Double Berry Punch
Ingredients: ['8 cup(s) Cranberry Juice (Chilled)', '3 cup(s) Raspberry Soda (Chilled)', '10 oz. Raspberries (Fresh or thawed)', '4 cup(s) Sherbet (Raspberry)']
Making: Gently stir the cranberry juice and the soda in a large chilled punch bowl. Pour into individual punch cups over small scoops of sherbet. Garnish with raspberries. This punch makes approximately 28 servings.

Name: Double Lemon On The Rocks
Ingredients: ['1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', 'Lemonade']
Making: Put about a scoop of crushed ice into the bottom of a highball glass. Squeeze the lemon juice into it, and fill up with lemonade.

Name: Dutch Treat
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Milk', '2 tbsp. Carob Powder (or Cacoa)', '1/2 tsp. Vanilla Extract', '2 tbsp. Honey', '1/2 tsp. Cinnamon']
Making: Blend all ingredients at medium speed until smooth.

Name: Earth Shake
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Pineapple (Crushed)', '1 Carrot (Peeled and chopped)']
Making: Blend on medium speed until smooth.

Name: Egg Cream
Ingredients: ['2 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup', '6 oz. Whole Milk', '6 oz. Seltzer Water']
Making: Mix syrup and milk in a fountain glass. Add Seltzer, serve with a straw.

Name: Egg Nog #2
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Milk (Cold)', '1 tbsp. Sugar', '1/4 tsp. Almond Extract', '1/4 tsp. Vanilla Extract', '1 Egg']
Making: Beat the egg well and pour in a shaker with the other ingredients. Shake well and pour into an Irish Coffee glass. Garnish with whipped cream and sprinkle with nutmeg.

Name: Egg Nog #4
Ingredients: ['12 Eggs', '1 1/3 cup(s) Sugar', '4 tsp. Vanilla Extract', '2 quart(s) Milk (Whole)', '2 quart(s) Half and Half Cream']
Making: Separate eggs. Mix the yokes and the other ingredients in a 1 1/2 gallon or a larger bowl. Just prior to serving, beat the egg whites until they peak and fold them into the mixture. That makes about 1 1/4 gallons. Garnish the glasses with nutmeg or cinnamon. You can spike the eggnog with brandy or rum.

Name: End Wrench
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Add ice. Tastes remarkably like a Screwdriver.

Name: Exit 13-E
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Loganberry Juice', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Stir well with ice and strain over ice cubes into a collins glass.

Name: Eye of the Hurricane
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Passion Fruit Syrup', '1 oz. Lime Juice (Fresh)', 'Lemon Soda (Bitter)']
Making: Mix syrup and juice with ice and strain over ice cubes into a highball glass. Fill with bitter lemon soda and garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Fairy Drink
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Strawberries (Fresh)', '2 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '2 cup(s) Sparkling Water', '1 cup(s) Pineapple (Diced)']
Making: Blend until smooth. Serve chilled in rocks glasses. (Serves 4)

Name: Flamingo
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Club Soda', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake the 3 juices with ice and strain into a highball glass. Top up with the soda and stir gently. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Florida Cocktail #2
Ingredients: ['3 1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Sugar Syrup', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 pinch(es) Salt', 'Club Soda']
Making: Shake the ingredients -except Club Soda- and strain over crushed ice in white wine glasses. Add 1 oz. of Club Soda to each glass and garnish with mint sprigs.

Name: Florida Punch #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 quart(s) Orange Juice', '1 1/2 quart(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1 1/2 quart(s) Ginger Ale', '1 1/2 cup(s) Lime Juice', '3 cup(s) Water', '2 cup(s) Powdered Sugar']
Making: Heat the water and the sugar and stir until the sugar has dissolved. Let cool. Once cooled, mix well with the fruit juices and pour in a punch bowl, over a block of ice. Add the Ginger Ale, stir, and serve in highball glasses. Garnish with a twist of orange.

Name: Fresh Fruit Punch
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1 cup(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 bottle(s) Ginger Ale', 'Sugar (To taste)']
Making: Mix the juices and the sugar until the sugar has dissolved. Chill. Just before serving, pour in a punch bowl, over a block of ice. Add the Ginger Ale, stir, and serve in punch cups. Garnish with fruit slices.

Name: Fresno Apricot Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Apricot Nectar', '6 oz. Orange Juice', '3 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Sugar', '1 pint(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix the juices and the sugar until the sugar has dissolved. Stir in the nectar and chill. Just before serving, pour in a punch bowl, over ice cubes. Add the Ginger Ale, stir, and serve in highball glasses. Garnish with a twist of orange.

Name: Frosted Apricot Special
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Milk', '1 cup(s) Apricots', '1 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Cook the apricots until they are soft, then remove the skins and the stones. Crush the pulp and blend with the milk. Put the ice cream in the bottom of a pitcher and top with apricot/milk mixture and stir until smooth. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Frosted Chocolate Shake
Ingredients: ['3 pint(s) Hot Chocolate (Chilled)', '1 1/2 pint(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend until smooth, then serve in tall glasses. Garnish with a straw.

Name: Frozen Cider
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Cider (Sweet)', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tbsp. Apple Sauce', '5 drop(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Blend with 3 oz. of ice and freeze until the mixture is thick enough to be eaten with a spoon. Then serve in a collins glass and garnish with a long straw.

Name: Frozen Pineapple and Banana Cooler
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Pineapple Juice (Not quite thawed)', '1/2 Banana', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Blend and pour in a collins glass. Garnish with a long straw and serve.

Name: Fruit Cocktail Punch
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Grape Juice (White)', '1 1/2 cup(s) Lime Juice', '1 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 bottle(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix the fruit juices and chill for a few hours. When thoroughly chilled, pour in a punch bowl over a large block of ice. Add the Ginger Ale, stir and garnish with mint sprigs. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Fruit Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Apple Juice (Frozen)', '1 cup(s) Strawberries (Sliced)', '2 tbsp. Sugar', '4 cup(s) Seltzer Water', 'Lemon Juice']
Making: Coat strawberries with sugar and add juice and Seltzer Water. Garnish with a lemon and an apple slice.

Name: Fruit Flip-Flop
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Yogurt', '1 cup(s) Fruit Juice (Your choice)']
Making: Blend together at medium speed until smooth.

Name: Fruit Juice Punch
Ingredients: ['3 quart(s) Grape Juice', '1 1/2 quart(s) Apple Juice', '1 quart(s) Water', '3 bottle(s) Ginger Ale', 'Sugar (To taste)']
Making: Mix the ingredients -except Ginger Ale- until the sugar has dissolved. Pour in a punch bowl over a block of ice. Add the Ginger Ale, stir and garnish with fruits. Serve in collins glasses.

Name: Fruit Shake
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Fruit Yogurt (Your choice)', '1 Banana', '4 oz. Orange Juice (Frozen)', '1/2 piece(s) Fruit (Apple, pear, pineapple, etc)']
Making: Blend with 6 ice cubes until smooth.

Name: Funshine Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Sherbet (Orange)', '2 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '2 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1 cup(s) Club Soda']
Making: Blend the 2 juices and the sherbet until smooth, pour into a pitcher and stir in the soda. Serve in collins glasses. This punch makes approximately 7 servings.

Name: Fuzzy Lemon Fizz
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Peach Nectar', '4 oz. Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Stir over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

Name: Ginger Mint Julep
Ingredients: ['Ginger Ale', 'Powdered Sugar', 'Sirop de Menthe (Or crushed mint leaves)']
Making: Rim as many highball glasses as you need with the sirop de menthe and the sugar. Divide out the rest of the sugar and add a few drops of sirop in each glass. Fill up with Ginger Ale and garnish with mint sprigs.

Name: Ginger Peach Cocktail
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Peach Nectar', '8 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 pint(s) Ginger Ale (Chilled)', 'Ginger (Cut in small pieces)']
Making: Stir well the first 3 ingredients and chill. Just before serving, pour into a pitcher and add the Ginger Ale. Serve in cocktail glasses and garnish each glass with a piece of ginger.

Name: Ginger Punch
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Ginger (Sliced)', '1 cup(s) Sugar', '1 cup(s) Water', '1/2 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '1 bottle(s) Club Soda']
Making: Bring the first 3 ingredients to the boil and cook for 15 minutes. Let cool. When cooled pour in a punch bowl and stir in the fruit juices. Add the Club Soda and ice cubes and serve in punch cups.

Name: Golden Glow Punch
