Ingredients: ['6 oz. Orange Juice (Concentrate)', '6 oz. Lemonade (Concentrate)', '1 quart(s) Apple Juice (Chilled)', '2 quart(s) Ginger Ale (Chilled)', '1 pint(s) Sherbet (Lemon)']
Making: Pour the concentrate and the apple juice into the punch bowl. Stir the gingerale into the bowl. Spoon in sherbet. Serve immediately.

Name: Golden Nectar
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 pint(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1 cup(s) Orange Juice', '2 oz. Honey', '4 Egg Yolks (Well beaten)', '4 Egg Whites (Beaten until stiff)', '1 pinch(es) Salt']
Making: Blend well the egg yolks with the fruit juices, then add the honey and the salt, and blend until the honey has dissolved. Carefully fold in the stiff egg whites and serve immediately in chilled wine glasses.

Name: Golden Punch
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Sugar', '1 1/2 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1 1/2 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '1 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '1/2 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 bottle(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Dissolve the sugar in the water and allow to cool. Pour in a punch bowl and stir in the fruit juices as well as 1 1/2 pints of water. Mix well, add the Ginger Ale and ice cubes. Serve in punch cups and garnish with fruit slices.

Name: Grape Flip
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 oz. Milk (Cold)', '1 1/2 oz. Grape Juice (Red)', '1 Egg Yolk', '2 tsp. Raspberry Syrup']
Making: Shake or blend very well, serve ice-cold in a burgundy glass.

Name: Grape Juice Punch
Ingredients: ['2 quart(s) Grape Juice', '1 bottle(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix over ice in a large punch bowl. Garnish with orange slices and mint leaves and serve in wine glasses.

Name: Grape Lemon Pineapple Smoothie
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Grapes', '1/4 Lemon (Peeled)', '1/2 Pineapple (Peeled)']
Making: Throw everything into a blender and liquefy.

Name: Grapeberry
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '3 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a large wine glass. Garnish with a wedge of lime and a straw.

Name: Grapefruit Ade
Ingredients: ['5 Grapefruits (Juice of, fresh)', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Dilute the juice extracted from the grapefruits with the same amount of Ginger Ale. Stir and serve over ice in collins glasses. Garnish with mint leaves.

Name: Grapefruit and Orange Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 3/4 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Mix and stir with ice in a mixing glass, strain off into a large cocktail glass.

Name: Grapefruit Lemonade
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Grenadine', '1 1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', 'Soda Water']
Making: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler, add grenadine syrup and grapefruit juice, top up with soda water. Stir a little and serve with a drinking straw.

Name: Grapple
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Grape Juice', '1 cup(s) Apple Juice', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1/4 tsp. Cinnamon']
Making: Mix and serve.

Name: Great Grapes
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Grape Juice', '1 cup(s) Soda Water', '1 tbsp. Honey', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Blend together at medium speed until smooth.

Name: Grenadine Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grenadine', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: The proportions are approximate, vary according to taste. Mix together, serve with lots of ice.

Name: Grenalime
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Limeade (Fozen concentrate)', '2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: In a pitcher, mix the limeade with water following the instructions on the can. Add the grenadine and some ice cubes. Stir well and enjoy this very refreshing drink.

Name: Gunner
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Ginger Ale', '1 part(s) Ginger Beer', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Serve over ice. A Gunner is the quintisential Hong Kong non-alcoholic drink.

Name: Hawaiian Passion Punch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Guava Juice (Concentrate)', '1 oz. Passion Fruit Juice (Concentrate)', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Water']
Making: Blend with ice until slushy. Serve in a cocktail glass or any weird shaped cup.

Name: Honey Lemonade
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Soda Water', '1/2 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '2 tbsp. Honey']
Making: Blend together at medium speed until smooth.

Name: Honey Milk Shake
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Milk', '1 1/2 oz. Vanilla Ice Cream', '1 tbsp. Honey']
Making: Blend until smooth and serve in a highball glass with a straw.

Name: Hot Buttered Rum Batter #3
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) French Vanilla Ice Cream (Softened)', '1 cup(s) Butter (Softened and NOT margarine)', '1 cup(s) Brown Sugar', '1 cup(s) Powdered Sugar', '1 tbsp. Nutmeg', '1 tbsp. Cinnamon']
Making: Mix all ingredients with hand mixer until well blended. You can freeze it in a plastic container.

Name: Hot Chocolate #2
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Powdered Milk', '3/4 cup(s) Cocoa Powder', '1 cup(s) Sugar', 'Salt']
Making: Combine sugar and cocoa, add milk and a dash of salt. Makes 8 servings. For 1 serving place 1/3 cup dry mixture in cup, add boiling water and stir.

Name: Hot Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '2 tbsp. Maple Syrup', 'Cayenne Pepper']
Making: Pour the lemon juice into a 10-oz. glass. Add maple syrup and a dash of cayenne pepper. Fill with ice water. Stir. Drink.

Name: Iced Mocha
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Milk', '1/3 cup(s) Chocolate Syrup', '1 tbsp. Instant Coffee', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix well and pour over crushed ice into a collins glass. Yop with whipped cream and chocolate shavings. This drink makes approximately 4 servings.

Name: Innocent Passion
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Passion Fruit Juice', 'dash(es) Cranberry Juice', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Mix in a highball glass filled with ice and top up with Club Soda. Stir well and garnish with a cherry and a long straw.

Name: Jungle Juice #1
Ingredients: ['1 Banana', '2 cup(s) Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Ginger']
Making: Blend together at medium speed until smooth.

Name: Just a Moonmint
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Milk', '1/4 tsp. Mint Flavouring', 'Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Blend together at medium speed until smooth.

Name: Kanaan
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Milk', '1 Egg', '2 tsp. Honey']
Making: Prepare in a blender with a little ice, serve in a long drink glass.

Name: Kidsicle
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Milk', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '1/2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Blend the milk, the ice cream and the orange juice until smooth and pour into a parfait glass. Add soda and top with whipped cream. Pour the grenadine slowly over the cream and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Kill the Cold Smoothie
Ingredients: ['1 slice(s) Ginger', '1/4 Lemon (With skin)', '1 cup(s) Water (Hot)']
Making: Juice ginger and lemon and add it to hot water. You may add cardamom.

Name: Kiwi Papaya Smoothie
Ingredients: ['3 Kiwi', '1/2 Papaya (Seeded and sliced)']
Making: Throw everything into a blender and liquefy.

Name: Lassi - Mango
Ingredients: ['2 Mango (Ripe)', '2 cup(s) Yogurt', '1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '1 cup(s) Water (Cold)']
Making: Take the pulp of the mangoes, blend it with the other ingredients and pour over crushed ice. You can also use other fruits like strawberries and bananas.

Name: Lassi - Sweet
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Yogurt', '2 cup(s) Water (Cold)', '4 tbsp. Sugar', '1 pinch(es) Salt', '2 tbsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Put all ingredients into a blender and blend until nice and frothy. Serve chilled.

Name: Lassi Khara
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Yogurt', '2 cup(s) Water (Cold)', '1 tsp. Salt', '1 pinch(es) Hing (Asafoetida)', '4 Curry Leaves']
Making: Blend (frappe) in blender until frothy. Add torn curry leaves and serve cold.

Name: Lava Flow
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Light Cream', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Coconut Cream', '1/2 Banana', '1/2 cup(s) Strawberries (Fresh or thawed)']
Making: Blend all the ingredients with ice -except strawberries- until smooth. Put the strawberries at the bottom of a parfait glass and add the blended mixture. Serve immediately.

Name: Lemon Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Stir orange juice and lemon juice with ice in a mixing glass. Strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Lemon Flip
Ingredients: ['1 Egg Yolk', '2 tsp. Sugar Syrup', '1 1/3 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Put several ice cubes in a shaker, add egg yolk, sugar syrup and lemon juice. Shake very well and strain into a long drink glass. Serve with a drinking straw.

Name: Lemon Squash #1
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Lemon Juice', '3 tsp. Sugar Syrup', 'Soda Water']
Making: Mix lemon juice with sugar syrup in a long drink glass, stir well and fill up with soda water. Serve with drinking straw.

Name: Lemon Squash #2
Ingredients: ['1 Lemon', '2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Club Soda']
Making: Peel and cut the lemon in quarters. Mix well with the sugar in a collins glass. Fill with ice and top up with Club Soda. Garnish with fruits of the season.

Name: Lime Cola
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', 'Cola']
Making: Stir over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a twist of lime.

Name: Lime Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 tbsp. Lime Juice', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Stir over ice in a collins glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Limeade
Ingredients: ['1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tbsp. Sugar', 'Seltzer Water']
Making: In a large glass, put the lime juice and sugar, and stir well. Add cold Seltzer Water to fill. Garnish with a lime peel.

Name: Little Engineer
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Pour over ice in a parfait glass and garnish with a pineapple flag.

Name: Mango Orange Smoothie
Ingredients: ['1 Mango (Pitted and sliced)', '2 Oranges (Peeled)']
Making: Throw everything into a blender and liquefy.

Name: Maple Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Eggnog (Dairy)', '1/2 cup(s) Maple Syrup']
Making: Stir in a pitcher and chill. Stir again before serving and garnish with nutmeg. This punch makes approximately 8 servings.

Name: Maple Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Maple Syrup']
Making: Serve in a shot glass and shoot!

Name: Martimmy
Ingredients: ['36 oz. Pink Lemonade (thawed or diluted)', '12 oz. Ginger Ale', '1 cup(s) Orange Juice (thawed or diluted)', '1 quart(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 Orange (sliced thinly into 12 pieces)']
Making: Combine the pink lemonade, ginger ale, orange juice and cranberry juice into a metal shaker and shake very well. Serve chilled with one slice of orange over the edge of each 'martimmy' glass. Serves 12.

Name: Milk Punch #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Milk', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a 12 oz. glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Miricle Drink
Ingredients: ['Ginger Ale', 'Fruitopia (Strawberry Passion Awareness)', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Mock Fuzzy Navel
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Peach Nectar', '4 oz. Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix and pour over ice

Name: Monster Slime Juice
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Kool-Aid (Berry Blue)', '12 oz. Orange Juice (Concentrate)', 'Water']
Making: Mix juice and Kool-Aid, add 1 gallon water, stir and watch it turn green!

Name: Mr. P. Nutt
Ingredients: ['1 tbsp. Peanut Butter', '1 oz. Chocolate Syrup', '3 oz. Milk', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Frappe in a highball glass. Garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Muddy Water #1
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Coca Cola (Non-diet!)', '1 bottle(s) Orange Juice (Preferably Britvic Orange Juice)']
Making: Fill 1/4 of a pint with ice. Pour over the orange juice, then the Coke. Stir gently to mix. Rolf's comments: You'll see where the name comes from. Refreshingly different. If you ask for this in a pub, don't make do with the awful cola from the gun!

Name: Mush Melon
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Melon', '2 cup(s) Water', '1 tbsp. Honey', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice']
Making: Blend and serve in a highball glass.

Name: Nuked Hot Chocolate
Ingredients: ['2 tsp. Cocoa Powder', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1/2 tsp. Vanilla Extract', '12 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix sugar, cocoa, and vanilla with a bit of milk (1 oz. or so) in mug. Microwave for about 30-50 seconds. Stir until cocoa dissolves. Fill with milk. Microwave for 1-2 minutes. Serve.

Name: Orangatang
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1 cup(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Blend together at medium speed until smooth.

Name: Orange and Grapefruit Cup
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '2 oz. Sugar', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix well over ice in a pitcher and garnish with sprigs of mint. You can add water to taste.

Name: Orange and Tonic
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Orange Juice', '4 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Orange At Ease
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Orange Juice', '5 tbsp. Sugar', '1 tbsp. Vanilla Extract', 'Milk']
Making: Blend then pour in a large glass over ice.

Name: Orange Cocktail
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Stir lemon juice and orange juice in a mixing glass, strain into a large cocktail glass.

Name: Orange Cooler
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 tsp. Simple Syrup', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Put several ice cubes in a large tumbler, add sugar syrup and orange juice, top up with Ginger Ale. Stir.

Name: Orange Flip
Ingredients: ['3 1/3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 Egg Yolk', '1 tbsp. Honey']
Making: Mix in a blender until smooth. Serve.

Name: Orange Julius #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Milk', '1/2 cup(s) Water', '1/4 cup(s) Sugar', '1/2 tsp. Vanilla Extract']
Making: Frappe in a cocktail glass.

Name: Orange Julius #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 cup(s) Orange Juice (frozen)', '1/2 cup(s) Milk', '1 1/2 cup(s) Water', '1/4 cup(s) Sugar']
Making: Mix in a blender on medium speed. Add 8 ice cubes blend on ice crush.

Name: Orange Smile
Ingredients: ['1 Egg', '2 tsp. Grenadine', '3 1/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake egg, grenadine syrup, orange juice, and several ice cubes well. Strain into a small tumbler, serve with a drinking straw.

Name: Orange Squash
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Juice', '3 1/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Put one ice cube in a large tumbler, add lemon juice and orange juice. Stir well. Serve sugar and cold water on the side, so the guest can modify the taste, and a drinking straw and a spoon.

Name: Orange Velvet
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Cream', '2/3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 2/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake cream, pineapple juice and orange juice with some ice. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

Name: Orangeade #1
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '5 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Simple Syrup', 'Soda Water']
Making: Place some ice cubes in a large tumbler or long drink glass, add lemon juice, orange juice, sugar syrup, and stir well. Top up with cold soda water, serve with a drinking straw.

Name: Orangeade #2
Ingredients: ['2 Oranges (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar', 'Water']
Making: Mix over ice cubes in a collins glass. Garnish with two cherries, two straws and lemon and orange slices.

Name: Orcha Juice
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '3 oz. Ginger Ale', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Place all ingredients in a blender. Blend and pour into a glass. Garnish with mint leaves.

Name: Orgeat Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 2/3 oz. Orgeat Syrup', 'Soda Water']
Making: Mix lemon juice and orgeat syrup in a tumbler with 2-3 small ice cubes. Fill up with soda water and stir.

Name: Pac Man
Ingredients: ['2 tsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine', 'dash(es) Bitters', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix over ice in a collins glass and garnish with an orange wheel.

Name: Parisette
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Grenadine', 'Milk']
Making: Pour grenadine syrup over some ice cubes in a large tumbler. Stir. Fill up with cold milk. Stir again, serve with a drinking straw.

Name: Passion Fruit Spritzer
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Passion Fruit Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Serve in a champagne flute and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Peach Melba #2
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Peach Nectar', '3 oz. Raspberries', '1/2 Peach (Sliced)', '2 scoop(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend at low speed and serve in a highball glass. Garnish with raspberries.

Name: Pine Float
Ingredients: ['Water']
Making: Fill a clear glass with cold water and add a toothpick!

Name: Pineapple Ginger Ale Smoothie
Ingredients: ['1 slice(s) Ginger (1/4 inch thick)', '1/2 Pineapple (Peeled and sliced)']
Making: Throw everything into a blender and liquefy.

Name: Pineapple Power
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Pineapple (Slices with juice)', '2 cup(s) Water', '1 tbsp. Honey', '1/4 tsp. Ginger']
Making: Blend together at medium speed until smooth.

Name: Plain Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['1 Egg', '1 tsp. Sugar', 'Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall glass. Fill with milk and garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Pregnancy Cocktail
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Club Soda', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', "1/4 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Fill a glass with ice. Add lime juice, grenadine then club soda. Top with a lime wedge and a cherry.

Name: Punchless Passion Colada
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Passion Fruit Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 tsp. Lime Juice']
Making: Blend with a cup of crushed ice and serve in a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of lime and a cherry.

Name: Punchless Pina Colada
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 tsp. Lime Juice']
Making: Blend with a cup of crushed ice and serve in a collins glass. Garnish with a slice of pineapple and a cherry.

Name: Pussy Foot #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1 1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 1/3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/3 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Shake or blend briefly, strain into a long drink glass. Garnish with fresh fruit, a cherry, and a drinking straw.

Name: Rail Splitter
Ingredients: ['2 tsp. Sugar Syrup', '2 tsp. Lemon Juice', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix sugar syrup with lemon juice in a tall glass. Fill up with Ginger Ale.

Name: Raspberry Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Raspberry Syrup', '2 tsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Stir with ice cubes in a collins glass. Garnish with fruit slices and straws.

Name: Rocky Mountain Cooler #2
Ingredients: ['1 Egg', '1 tsp. Sugar Syrup', '1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '6 oz. Apple Cider']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Rose de Mai Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 tsp. Raspberry Syrup', '2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake very well pineapple juice, raspberry fruit-syrup and cream with ice cubes. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

Name: Roy Rogers
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Coca Cola', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour into an ice filler cocktail glass.

Name: Rumless Rickey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'dash(es) Bitters', 'Club Soda']
Making: Stir with ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a twist of lime.

Name: Runner's Mark
Ingredients: ['4 oz. V 8 Juice', '2 drop(s) Lemon Juice', '2 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce', 'dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce']
Making: Stir with ice cubes in an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a celery stick.

Name: Salty Dog Without The Tail
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/4 tsp. Salt']
Making: Pour the grapefruit juice into a cocktail glass, add the salt (can substitute a salted rim depending on the glass used) and serve.

Name: Shirley Temple
Ingredients: ['6 2/3 oz. Ginger Ale', '1 oz. Grenadine', '3 1/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Build in a highball glass. Add Ginger Ale and orange juice over ice and sprinkle grenadine over it. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry.

Name: Shirley Temple Slush
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Sprite', '2 tbsp. Grenadine']
Making: Blend with one cup of crushed ice. Serve in a collins glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Smooth Caffeine
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Coca Cola', '1 oz. Coffee', '2 tsp. Grenadine', '1/2 tsp. Brown Sugar']
Making: Pour the Coca Cola into a glass mug, then add the hot coffee, grenadine and sugar. Stir until mixed.

Name: Southampton
Ingredients: ['Tonic Water', '3 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', 'Lime Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass and add a squeeze of lime.

Name: Spanish Chocolate
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Milk', '2 oz. Sweet Chocolate', '1/2 tsp. Cinnamon', '2 Egg Yolks (Beaten)']
Making: Stir the milk with the chocolate and the cinnamon over low heat until the chocolate dissolves. Add the eggs and beat the mixture until it becomes thick, taking care not to boil.

Name: St Clements
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Lemonade', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a highball glass. This drink is named from the old English rhyme based on London churches: Oranges and lemons say the bells of St Clement's / I owe you five farthings say the bells of St Martin's / When will you pay me say the bells of Old Bailey / When I grow rich, said the bells of Shoreditch / When will that be, said the bells of Stepney / I do not know, said the great bell of Bow. Thank you Margaret for bringing to our attention the origin of this drink!

Name: Strawberry Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)', '1 tbsp. Sugar', '10 Strawberries', '1 cup(s) Water']
Making: Throw everything into a blender and mix until fairly smooth. Serve over ice.

Name: Strawberry Pineapple MilkShake
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Strawberries', '1/2 can(s) Pineapple (Chunks)', '2 cup(s) Milk']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into a parfait glass.

Name: Strawberry Shake
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Milk', '1/2 cup(s) Strawberries (Fresh)', '1 tbsp. Sugar']
Making: Blend with cracked ice until smooth and pour into a collins glass. Garnish with fresh strawberries.

Name: Strawberry Shivers
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Strawberries', '4 tsp. Honey', '1/2 cup(s) Water']
Making: Blend together at medium speed until smooth.

Name: Strawberry Wonderland
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Coconut Cream', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. Strawberries (Frozen)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and serve in a snifter. Top with whipped cream and garnish with a strawberry.

Name: Summer Fruit Frenzy
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1 pint(s) Orange Mango Juice', '1 pint(s) Water', '1/2 Lemon Juice', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '1 Orange (Chopped)', '1 Apple (Chopped)', '1 Pear (Chopped)', '20 Raspberries']
Making: Mix over ice in a large punch bowl. Garnish with sprigs of mint and slices of lemon and lime and serve chilled in punch cups.

Name: Summertime Barbarian
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Pineapple', '1/2 cup(s) Strawberries']
Making: Blend with a cup of crushed ice until smooth and serve in two collins glasses. Garnish each glass with a kiwi wheel.

Name: Sunrise Fizz
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grenadine', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Serve in Collins Glass.

Name: Sunshine Splash
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Stir with ice in a parfait glass. Garnish with a pineapple slice.

Name: Sweet Bananas
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Milk', '1 Banana', '1 tbsp. Honey']
Making: Blend together at medium speed until smooth.

Name: Tea Forte Lavender Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 Tea Forte Lavender Citrus Cocktail Infusion', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Place infuser into glass. Fill glass with ice and ginger ale.

Name: Tea Forte Virgin Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 Tea Forte Lavender Citrus Cocktail Infusion', 'Orange Juice', 'Seltzer Water']
Making: Place infuser in glass. Fill a glass with ice and equal parts orange juice and seltzer. Garnish with a kiwi slice.

Name: Tea Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tea (Preferably aromatic tea, brewed and chilled)', '2 oz. Apple Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine and serve with ice. To make larger servings keep the same proportions.

Name: Thai Iced Tea
Ingredients: ['1/4 cup(s) Thai Tea (Strong)', '1/2 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '2 tsp. Sweetened Condensed Milk']
Making: Combine Thai tea (i.e., the powder), boiling water, and sweetened condensed milk, stir until blended. Pour into 2 tall glasses filled with ice cubes. Garnish with mint leaves. Makes 2 servings.

Name: Tomato Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/2 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce', '1 tsp. Lemon Juice', '3 1/3 oz. Tomato Juice']
Making: Stir in a mixing glass Worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, tomato juice, and a little salt and pepper over ice cubes. Strain off into a large cocktail glass.

Name: Tomato Cooler
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Tomato Juice', '2 tbsp. Lemon Juice (Or lime)', 'Tonic Water']
Making: Stir with ice in a highball glass. Garnish with a wedge of lime and a cucumber slice.

Name: Tomato Tang
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Tomato Juice', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Celery Salt']
Making: Blend together at medium speed until smooth.

Name: Tomatop
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Tomato Juice', '1 can(s) 7-Up']
Making: Pour the tomato juice over ice in a blender. Add the 7-Up after the process.

Name: Traditional Lesotho Drink
Ingredients: ['1 Lemon', '1 Lime', '1 cup(s) Orange Juice', '4 Egg Yolks', '4 Egg Whites', '2 tbsp. Salt']
Making: Juice lemon and lime and put in a blender with orange juice egg yolks and whites and salt. Mix togeher and serve.

Name: Trapper's Special
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Coca Cola', '1 part(s) Mountain Dew', '1 part(s) Ginger Ale', 'Cherries cleaned and halved']
Making: Mix the drink in a tall chilled glass. Add several cherries and serve.

Name: Tropical
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Grenadine', '2/3 oz. Sirop de Menthe', '3 1/3 oz. Milk (Cold)']
Making: Shake or build directly in the glass.

Name: Tropical Punch
Ingredients: ['14 oz. Sweetened Condensed Milk', '6 oz. Orange (Concentrate - thawed)', '6 oz. Pineapple (Concentrate - thawed)', '8 cup(s) Club Soda']
Making: Mix well the milk and the concentrates in a large punch bowl. Add the Club Soda and stir gently. Add ice cubes or a large block of ice and garnish with orange slices. Serve in punch cups. This punch makes approximately 22 servings.

Name: Tropical Slush
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Strawberry Mix', '1/2 Banana']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth.

Name: Ultimate Sour Mix
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Lemon Juice', '1 part(s) Granulated Sugar', '3 part(s) Orange Juice (no pulp)']
Making: Mix ingredients together to make a fresher tastier sour mix.

Name: Unfuzzy Navel
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Peach Nectar', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a wine glass. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: Virgin Mary
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Tomato Juice', '1/2 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice', '2 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce', 'Pepper (To taste)', 'Salt (To taste)']
Making: Stir with ice in a large wine glass. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

Name: Virgin Sex On The Beach
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Peach Juice (Squeezed)']
Making: Blend all juices and pour over cubed or crushed ice.

Name: Virgin Strawberry Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '4 oz. Strawberry Mix']
Making: Blend with 1 1/2 cups of ice for 15 seconds. Serve in a stemmed glass. Garnish with a strawberry slice.

Name: Virgin Strawberry Daquari
Ingredients: ['Strawberry Daiquiri Mix', 'Sprite']
Making: Fill a cocktail glass with ice. Add 1/2 to 3/4 of Strawberry Daquari mix then add the Sprite until full. Stir. Great for little kids. (You may vary amounts to desired taste and consistancy.)

Name: Wavebender
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Ginger Ale', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice -except Ginger Ale- and strain over ice cubes into a highball glass. Top with Ginger Ale and stir.

Name: Yellowjacket
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over ice cubes into an old-fashioned glass. Garnish with a lemon slice.

Ingredients: ['2 large bottle(s) Dr Pepper', '1 large bottle(s) DeKuyper Sour Apple', '1 large bottle(s) Grape Pucker', '1 large bottle(s) Watermelon Pucker', '1 pint(s) Everclear', '1 can(s) Cherries with Juice']
Making: Pour one bottle Dr. Pepper in a LARGE container. Add all alcoholic ingredients. Add second bottle Dr. Pepper. Pour in the cherries and cherry juice. Mix thouroughly.

Name: 99CranApples
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) 99 Apples Schnapps', '1 bottle(s) Cranapple Juice']
Making: Mix in a punch bowl, chill and serve.

Name: Adon's Ailing Fruit Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Raspberry Sourpuss', '1 bottle(s) Cherry Whiskey', '1 bottle(s) Triple Sec', '1 bottle(s) Coconut Rum', '1 bottle(s) Melon Liqueur', 'Juice Fruit Juice of Choice']
Making: Mix roughly equal portions of alcohol and fruit juice. Add more of anything to taste. The recipe is not set in stone and can be done with whatever fruit alcohol is on hand. You can mix as much or as little as you like.

Name: Adrenaline Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka 100 proof', '1 bottle(s) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 bottle(s) Gin Fruit Flavoured', '1 bottle(s) Peach Brandy', '3 1/2 gallon(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', 'Sugar']
Making: Mix everything except sugar in a 5 gallon drink cooler. After combining ingredients, sweeten to taste. Serve chilled or over crushed ice.

Name: Advocaat
Ingredients: ['26 oz. Vodka', '4 cup(s) Sugar', '4 tbsp. Vanilla', '24 Eggs']
Making: Heat gently and whip until smooth.

Name: Alchemist Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Benedictine (750 ml)', '17 oz. Mandarin Oranges (puree or nectar)', '12 oz. Lemon Juice', '16 slice(s) Lemon', '12 wedge(s) Tangerine', '1 2/3 oz. Honey', '10 oz. Water', 'Thyme']
Making:
Start by diluting the honey with hot water in a Punch bowl. Assemble all the other ingredients, stir to harmonize all the flavors, fresh fruits last. Macerate and refrigerate for at least 4 hours. Take the punch out. Serve in a cup/glass with ice cubes and garnish with a fresh Thyme sprig.
Serves 10-12

Name: All American Punch
Ingredients: ['15 oz. Southern Comfort', '60 oz. Coca Cola', '12 oz. Soda Water', '1 oz. Cherry Juice', '5 Oranges', '3 Lemons', '2 Limes', '12 Cherries']
Making: Stir in a punch bowl and add the fruit.

Name: Allie's Summer Breeze
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Mix ingredients, then pour over ice. One optional addition is Peach Schnapps.

Name: Aloha Fruit Punch
Ingredients: ['3/4 cup(s) Water', '2 tsp. Ginger Root (Chopped)', '2 cup(s) Guava Juice', '1 1/2 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 1/2 cup(s) Pineapple (Finely Chopped)', '1 cup(s) Sugar', '3 1/2 cup(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Add 1/4 cup water to ginger Root. Boil for 3 minutes and then strain. Add the liquid to the guava, lemon juice and pineapple juice. Make a syrup of sugar and remaining water and cool. Combine the syrup with juices and pineapple. Chill thoroughly.

Name: Alpha Omega Zeta's Presidential Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Fruit Punch', '1 bottle(s) 7-Up', '1 can(s) Mandarin Oranges', '1 can(s) Pineapple chunks']
Making: Soak mandarin oranges and pineapple chunks in one cup of vodka (perferably for 1 day before serving). Combine all ingrediants in a clean bucket. Drink directly from bucket (use of cups is prohibited). Bob for fruit.

Name: Ambassador's Morning Lift
Ingredients: ['32 oz. Eggnog (Already made)', '6 oz. Cognac (Or brandy or Bourbon)', '3 oz. Jamaica Rum', '3 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao']
Making: Mix in a large punchbowl, and serve in cups. Garnish each cup with grated nutmeg.

Name: Anegada Punch
Ingredients: ['5 can(s) Guava Juice', '1 can(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Grenadine', '7 oz. Coconut Liqueur', '2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Stir in pitcher or punch bowl. Garnish with nutmeg.

Name: Anti-Freeze #1
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Everclear', '1 bottle(s) Mountain Dew (One 2-litre bottle)', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid (Lemon-lime)']
Making: Mix well over crushed ice in a punch bowl or a large container and enjoy!

Name: Anti-freeze #2
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Southern Comfort', '1/5 gallon(s) Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1 pint(s) DeKuyper Sour Apple', '1 bottle(s) Mountain Dew (1 - 2 litre bottle)']
Making: Combine alcohol together in a gallon container then fill the remaining with the Mountain Dew. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Anti-Freeze #3
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Everclear', '1 bottle(s) Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '2 gallon(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix the ingredients over ice in a large bowl and enjoy.

Name: Antifreeze
Ingredients: ['1/5 oz. Everclear', '2 quart(s) Mountain Dew', '1 quart(s) Lemonade Mix dry']
Making: Mix Everclear, Mountain Dew and the lemonade mix in a gallon container. Add water to top off.

Name: Anything Goes
Ingredients: ["1/5 gallon(s) Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1 can(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 bottle(s) Squirt (1-2 litre bottle)']
Making: Mix all together let freeze until slushy. Then you can drink it and anything goes after you have had a few!

Name: Apple Almond Beverage
Ingredients: ['3 1/2 cup(s) Apple Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Almonds', '1 tsp. Coriander', '1/2 tsp. Anise (Sweet)', '1/4 tsp. Nutmeg']
Making: Blend until smooth.

Name: Apple Annie Fruit Punch
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Apple Brandy', '3 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1 1/2 cup(s) Orange Juice (Fresh)', '1 cup(s) Grapefruit Juice (Fresh)', '2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 quart(s) Lemon Lime Soda (Or sparkling water)', '1 quart(s) Ginger Ale', '1 Orange (Thinly sliced)', '1 Lemon (Thinly sliced)', '1 Apples (Thinly sliced)', '12 Raspberries (Fresh)']
Making: In a large punch bowl, mix the spirits and the fruit juices over a block of ice. Add the fruits to garnish and stir in the sodas just before serving. This punch makes approximately 20 servings.

Name: Apple Cider Punch
Ingredients: ['4 quart(s) Apple Cider', '1 cup(s) Brown Sugar (Packed)', '6 oz. Lemonade (Frozen)', '6 oz. Orange Juice (Frozen)', '6 Cloves (Whole)', '6 Allspice (Whole)', '1 tsp. Nutmeg (Ground)', '3 stick(s) Cinnamon']
Making: Tie the cloves and Allspice in cheesecloth and heat the mixture. Stir occasionally.

Name: Apple Treat
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Apple Juice', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Mix and serve over ice in a highball glass.

Name: Applesauce
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Lemonade frozen concentrate', '1/2 can(s) Sprite', '1/2 can(s) Whiskey']
Making: Pour frozen lemonade concentrate into a blender. Fill can half with Sprite and half with whisky - emply into blender. Fill blender with ice. Blend and pour into punch glasses. Garnish with a cherry if desired.

Name: Apricot Cream Spritz
Ingredients: ['3/4 cup(s) Milk', '1/2 cup(s) Apricot Nectar', '2 tbsp. Apricot Brandy', 'Sparkling Wine']
Making: Blend milk, nectar, ice and brandy until smooth. Pour into 6 red wine glasses and add equal amounts of wine into each glass.

Name: Apricot Mist Punch
Ingredients: ['20 oz. Dark Rum', '46 oz. Apricot Nectar', '46 oz. Pineapple Juice', '18 oz. Limeade (Frozen concentrate)', '24 cup(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix in a punch bowl and garnish with lime slices.

Name: Apricot Orange Fizz
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Light Rum', '1/4 cup(s) Apricot Brandy', '1 1/2 cup(s) Orange Juice', '2 tbsp. Lime Juice', 'Club Soda']
Making: Stir all the ingredients -except soda- and pour into collins glasses filled 2/3 up with ice. Top with Club Soda, stir and garnish with lime slices. This punch makes 6 servings.

Name: Artillery Punch
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Tea (Strong)', '1 quart(s) Rye Whiskey', '3 cup(s) Red Wine', '1 pint(s) Jamaica Rum', '1/2 pint(s) Brandy', '1 oz. Benedictine', '1 pint(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 pint(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 pint(s) Sugar Syrup']
Making: Combine all the ingredients in a large punch bowl with a block of ice. Garnish with twists of a lemon peel.

Name: Ashley
Ingredients: ['2 bottle(s) Beer (12 oz. bottles)', '1 1/2 cup(s) Rum', '1 can(s) Lemonade (Frozen concentrate)']
Making: Dilute the lemonade with 3 cans of water and pour over ice in a large punch bowl or pitcher. Add all the other ingredients and stir well. Serve in tall collins glasses and enjoy!

Name: Aztec Punch
Ingredients: ['2 quart(s) Tequila Silver', '1/2 cup(s) White Curacao', '2 quart(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1 quart(s) Tea (Strong and cold)', '1 cup(s) Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '3/4 cup(s) Orgeat Syrup', '1/2 oz. Orange Bitters', '2 tsp. Cinnamon (Ground)']
Making: Mix well all the ingredients in a punch bowl and add a large block of ice before serving. This punch makes approximately 40 servings.

Name: Bacardi Ciderific
Ingredients: ['7 1/2 cup(s) Apple Cider', '3 cup(s) Bacardi Dark Rum']
Making: Mix and garnish with lemon or lime slices and cinnamon cloves.

Name: Banana Punch #1
Ingredients: ['7 cup(s) Water', '3 1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '5 Bananas', '1 can(s) Orange Juice (Frozen)', '1 can(s) Lemonade (Frozen)', '46 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 quart(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Frappe all ingredients except Ginger Ale. Pour into a punch bowl and then add the Ginger Ale.

Name: Band Booster
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) Kool-Aid Moon Berry Blast', '3 can(s) Lemon Lime Soda', '1 cup(s) Sugar', '12 oz. Smirnoff Vodka']
Making: Combine ingredients in an ice cream pail. Stir and add 2 cups of crushed ice. Scoop out into punch glasses.

Name: Barney (I Love You - You Love Me)
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Melon Liqueur', '6 cup(s) 151 Proof Rum', '2 can(s) Lemonade (Concentrate)', '3 cup(s) Water']
Making: Blend the rum, the melon liqueur and the lemonade concentrate, then pour the mixture into a large punch bowl over a block of ice. Add the water and stir.

Name: Bas Ass Brooks Punch
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Everclear', '1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '1/5 gallon(s) White Rum', '2 bottle(s) Sprite', '2 bottle(s) Mountain Dew', '2 package(s) Lemonade Mix']
Making: Combine in a punch bowl, add ice and stir well.

Name: Basil Hayden's Tax Day Punch
Ingredients: ['1/2 bottle(s) Basil Hayden Bourbon', '5 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '4 oz. Maple Syrup', '5 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '5 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters', '1 large bottle(s) Club Soda']
Making: Add Basil Hayden's Bourbon, Pinapple Juice, Lemon Juice, Maple Syrup and bitters in a medium punch bowl. Stir bowl until maple syrup has fully dissolved. Add a few large ice cubes, sparkling water and float lemon and pineapple slices on top.

Name: Bathroom Juice
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Everclear', '1 gallon(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '1 bottle(s) Mountain Dew (1-2 litre bottle)']
Making: Mix the ingredients well in a punch bowl and allow to chill in refrigerator overnight. Serve cold in punch cups.

Name: Beer Cup
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Gin', '1 bottle(s) Lager', '1 bottle(s) Ginger Beer', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 splash(es) Soda Water']
Making: Pour the ingredients in a bowl with ice and stir slightly. Garnish with a sprig of mint and a slice of cucumber.

Name: Berry Deadly Punch
Ingredients: ['2 pint(s) Everclear', '3 cup(s) Boone Strawberry Hill Wine', '1/2 gallon(s) Orange Juice', '1 gallon(s) Kool-Aid (Tropical Berry)']
Making: Pour into a large bowl and stir. Serve chilled.

Name: Berry Juice
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka (Or Gordons wildberry vodka)', '8 oz. Kool-Aid (Wildberry flavour)']
Making: Mix over ice in a pitcher.

Name: Beta Punch
Ingredients: ['1/2 gallon(s) Everclear', '2 gallon(s) Kool-Aid (Your personal flavour)', 'Water']
Making: Mix and enjoy!

Name: Big Bob
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cyclone', '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker']
Making: Shake with ice, pour and serve.

Name: Big John Lemon Bath
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '3 wedge(s) Lemon', '3 package(s) Sugar', 'Sierra Mist', 'Water']
Making: Muddle the lemons with the sugar in a pint glass, fill with ice and add the vodka. Half fill the glass with Sierra Mist and water. Then shake the cocktail until the sugar is dissolved. Garnish with a lemon wedge. This also makes an awesome non-alcoholic drink.

Name: Black Cherry Lemon Drop
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Absolut Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Sour Mix', 'Kool-Aid (6 packets of Black Cherry Kool-Aid)', 'Sugar']
Making: Make Kool-Aid as directed, allowing it to chill. When ready, add vodka and Sour Mix. Stir in and chill. Serve over ice. Add Sour Mix and vodka to preference.

Name: Blairys
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Club Soda', '1 cup(s) Fruit Punch']
Making: Mix ingredients and serve in punch glasses.

Name: Blind Melon
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Midori', '9 oz. Vodka', '7 oz. Cointreau', '7 oz. Galliano', '4 cup(s) Orange Juice', '4 cup(s) Soda Water', '2 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '1 bottle(s) Champagne', 'Fruit']
Making: Dice some rock melon, some watermelon, some honey dew, cut some slices of lemon and strawberries. Pour all the liquids into punch bowl over crushed ice then add the fruit. Stir and drink. Dont forget to eat all of the fruit after the alcohol soaks into it.

Name: Bloody Mary #3
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Vodka', '1 can(s) Tomato Juice', '1 can(s) V 8 Juice', 'dash(es) Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', 'Seasoned Salt', 'Pepper', 'Dill Sauce']
Making: Stir ingredients and garnish with celery and pepper. Add spices to taste.

Name: Blue Hawaii
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Champagne', '1 bottle(s) Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Add both bottles of alcohol and then pineapple juice to taste.

Name: Blue Lagoon #5
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Cuervo Tequila', 'Kool-Aid (To taste)', 'Fruit (Of your choice)']
Making: Mix the tequila with Kool-Aid in a pitcher. You can make it with as many Kool-Aid packages as you like but I prefer my liquor strong. Then add the fruit. Let the fruit absorb the alcohol for a while. Drink and enjoy.

Name: Blue Orgy
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Gin', '1 part(s) White Rum', '2 part(s) Heublein Brass Monkey', '2 part(s) Blue Curacao', '4 part(s) Mountain Dew', '4 part(s) Fresca']
Making: In large container mix alcohol together then add equal amounts of Mountain Dew and Fresca until it suits your fancy. Serve on ice.

Name: Boar Piss
Ingredients: ['1/2 gallon(s) Southern Comfort', '1 gallon(s) Country Time Lemonade']
Making: Make sure the Southern Comfort and lemonade is cold before making! Mix together and enjoy! This makes a very strong batch so you might want to add a little bit more lemonade!

Name: Boillo
Ingredients: ['4 quart(s) Whiskey', '5 pound(s) Honey', '2 1/2 pound(s) Caraway Seeds', '4 Lemons', '4 Oranges', '2 Vanilla Sticks']
Making: Cut up oranges and lemons. Add caraway seeds, 2 vanilla sticks, 2 qt of whiskey. Put on high heat, stir. CAREFUL DO NOT OVER BOIL. After it boils for a while take off heat. Add rest of honey and whiskey. Stir and let it come to a boil. Simmer until oranges and lemons are cooked with lid on pot again. Strain out oranges, lemons, and seeds. Squeeze juice of oranges and lemons back into Boillo. Put vanilla sticks in bottles with Boillo. Enjoy.

Name: Bombay Punch #1
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Brandy', '4 cup(s) Sherry', '1/2 cup(s) Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 cup(s) Triple Sec', '4 bottle(s) Champagne (Chilled - 75cl. bottles)', '8 cup(s) Club Soda', '12 Lemons (Juice of, fresh)', 'Powdered Sugar (To sweeten the lemon juice)']
Making: Stir the lemon juice and the sugar in a large punch bowl. Add a block of ice then all the other ingredients. Stir vigorously. Garnish with fruit of the season, and serve in punch cups. This punch should make approximately 60 servings.

Name: Bombay Punch #2
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Cognac', '1 bottle(s) Dry Sherry', '1/2 cup(s) Maraschino Liqueur', '1/2 cup(s) Curacao', '4 bottle(s) Champagne', '1 bottle(s) Club Soda', '12 Lemons', 'Sugar']
Making: Squeeze the lemons and add the juice to the cognac, sherry, maraschino and curacao. Mix in a chilled punch bowl with a block of ice. Add sugar to taste. Add the champagne and club soda before serving.

Name: Boom Boom Punch
Ingredients: ['8 cup(s) Light Rum', '1 bottle(s) Sweet Vermouth (75 cl.)', '1 bottle(s) Champagne (75 cl. - chilled)', '4 cup(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the rum, the orange juice and the vermouth in a large punch bowl over a block of ice. Stir well, then add the champagne. Garnish with sliced bananas and serve in punch cups. This punch should make approximately 36 servings.

Name: Bourbon Street
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Bourbon Whiskey', '1 1/2 quart(s) Coffee (Cold)', '1 pint(s) Half and Half Cream', '4 oz. Amaretto', '1 quart(s) Ice Cream (Vanilla or Coffee)']
Making: Mix and pour into a large bowl. Garnish with bitter chocolate shavings.

Name: Box Of Booze
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Blush Wine', '1 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix together and serve.

Name: Brain Freeze #2
Ingredients: ["11 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '24 oz. Sprite', '12 oz. Mountain Dew', 'Iced Tea (Preferably Lipton Brisk lemon)']
Making: Mix over ice in a punch bowl and add a good splash of iced tea.

Name: Brandy Ice
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Brandy', '1/2 cup(s) Brown Creme de Cacao', '1 quart(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Blend till smooth and serve in cocktail glasses.

Name: Brendan's Punch of Happiness
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) White Rum', '3 cup(s) Vodka', '1 gallon(s) Berry Punch']
Making: Pour ingredients into large pot, stir, serve. As punch disappears continue to add more rum..

Name: Brown Betty
Ingredients: ['4 2/3 cup(s) Ale', '9 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 pint(s) Water', '4 oz. Brown Sugar', '1 slice(s) Lemon', 'Cloves', '1 pinch(es) Cinnamon (Or to taste)']
Making: First dissolve the sugar in the water. Add the lemon, the cloves and the cinnamon and stir well. Heat with the other ingredients, along with two pieces of toast sprinkled with nutmeg and ginger. Serve warm.

Name: Brunch Punch
Ingredients: ['12 cup(s) Tomato Juice (Chilled)', '4 cup(s) Rum (Dark or Light)', '5 oz. Lemon (Or lime)', '2 1/2 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce', 'Salt (To taste)', 'Pepper (To taste)']
Making: Stir all the ingredients, then pour them over a block of ice in a large punch bowl. Garnish with thin lemon (or lime) slices. This punch makes approximately 40 servings.

Name: Bucket Punch
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Vodka', '1 can(s) Orange Juice (Concentrate - thawed)', '1 can(s) Limeade (Concentrate - thawed)', '1 can(s) 7-Up']
Making: Combine all the ingredients with a bag of ice in a galvanized bucket. Mix well, cover with a towel until frost forms on the outside of the bucket. Serve in punch cups or fancy glasses.

Name: Buddha Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Champagne (Or sparkling wine)', '2 cup(s) Gewurztraminer (Or Riesling)', '1 cup(s) Light Rum', '4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 cup(s) Orange Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 cup(s) Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '5 dash(es) Orange Bitters', '1/2 oz. Sugar Syrup']
Making: All the ingredients must be chilled. Stir everything (except champagne) into a punch bowl and stir. Just before serving, add the champagne and a large block of ice. Stir again and garnish with a few lime slices. This punch makes approximately 20 servings.

Name: Budget Bool
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Sparkling Wine', '1 bottle(s) Sprite', '1 can(s) Fruit Cocktail', '3 tsp. Citric Acid']
Making: First pour the Fruit Coctail to a big bowl. Then Sparkling Wine VodkaSprite and Citric Acid (you can encrease the amount to give it even better fizz -just dont make it too sour). Finally add ice cubes(or even better a big piece of ice -you can use a small pot to make it) to make the whole thing cold. Enjoy.

Name: Buffalo Bowl
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Barton's Long Island Mix", '2 oz. Mr. Boston Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Mr. Boston Blackraspberry', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill 64 oz. bowl with ice. Pour in Barton's Long Island Mix, Mr. Boston Blue curacao, Mr. Boston Blackraspberry and Bacardi 151 Proof Rum. Fill with orange, cranberry and pineapple juice. Garnish with assorted fruit - cherries, limes, lemons and oranges (if desired.) Stir with straws and enjoy with friends. The idea is to drink it until it is gone without stopping if at all possible.

Name: Bug Juice
Ingredients: ['2 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) 50/50 Soda', '2 can(s) Lemonade', '4 Lemons (sliced)', '2 Limes (sliced)', '1 can(s) Maraschino Cherries (drained)']
Making: Pour in all ingredients into a 5 gallon cooler with ice. Wait 1 hour to properly chill and then consume.

Name: Bull Frogs
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '8 cup(s) Sprite', '2 can(s) Lemonade (Frozen)']
Making: Mix with ice in a punch bowl.

Name: Bullfrog #1
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Vodka', '1 quart(s) Lemonade']
Making: Shake well and serve.

Name: Bullfrog #2
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Bacardi Rum', '5 cup(s) Sprite', '1 1/2 package(s) Crystal Light (Lemonade)']
Making: Pour the Sprite and the Crystal Light in an empty 2 litre plastic bottle. Roll on the ground. Add the run and roll again. Store in the fridge and serve chilled in collins glasses. Dawn and Sam say it's great for all day drinking.

Name: Bullfrog #3
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Rum (Or vodka)', '4 cup(s) 7-Up', '32 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix over ice in a punch bowl with wedges of oranges and limes. Gather a few friends and enjoy!

Name: Burgundy Punch
Ingredients: ['2 bottle(s) Burgundy Wine (Red)', '1 cup(s) Kirsch', '1 cup(s) Port', '2 cup(s) Orange Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 cup(s) Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1 oz. Sugar Syrup']
Making: All the ingredients must be chilled. Pour the ingredients in a punch bowl over a block of ice. Stir well and garnish with orange slices. This punch makes approximately 20 servings.

Name: Busted Cherry #1
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '3 package(s) Candy (Cherry Jolly Ranchers)']
Making: Mix together and let sit for 2 weeks. Serve in shot glasses.

Name: C*nt Punch
Ingredients: ['2 bottle(s) Grain Alcohol (PGA)', '2 bottle(s) Sprite', '1 1/2 container(s) Country Time Lemonade']
Making: Mix with ice in a large container. Serve chilled in punch cups.

Name: Cabernet Cup
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Cabernet', '2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Cointreau', '3 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1 cup(s) Sparkling Water']
Making: Stir with ice cubes in a punch bowl or a pitcher and garnish with fresh mint sprigs. Serve in large wine glasses. This punch makes approximately 4 servings.

Name: Cabernet Punch
Ingredients: ['3 bottle(s) Cabernet', '2 cup(s) Brandy', '1 cup(s) Cointreau', '3 cup(s) Lemon Juice (Preferably fresh)', '1 cup(s) Superfine Sugar (Or to taste)']
Making: Stir in a punch bowl, then add a large block of ice. Garnish with sliced fruit of the season and serve in large wine glasses. This punch makes approximately 18 servings.

Name: Cafe Brulot
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Cognac', '2 oz. White Curacao', '1 quart(s) Coffee (Hot)', '2 Cinnamon Sticks', '12 Cloves', '4 Sugar Cubes', '2 Lemons', '2 Oranges']
Making: Peel the lemons and oranges and cut the peels in thin stripes then mash them with the cinnamon sticks and the cloves. Put them in a heat proof bowl and stir in the cognac and the curacao. Ignite and slowly stir in the coffee until the flames are out. Serve in mugs. Makes approximately 7 servings. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Cafe Diablo
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. White Curacao', '2 cup(s) Coffee (Hot)', '2 Cinnamon Sticks', '8 Cloves', '6 Coffee']
Making: Heat ingredients (except coffee) in a pan. When warn, ignite and slowly stir in the coffee until the flames are out. Serve in mugs. Makes approximately 4 servings. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Cajun Martini #1
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Beefeater Dry Gin', '2 Jalapeno Pepper', '1 Pepper (Red chili pepper)', "Dry Vermouth (preferably Stock's)"]
Making: Pour the Beefeater Gin in a large jug. Add 2 or 3 fresh jalapeno peppers (sliced, seeded and deveined) and a single red chili pepper. Let sit in the refrigerator for two days. Shake 1 oz. of the _peppered gin_ with 5 oz. of ice and 1 oz. of dry vermouth. Serve straight up or on the rocks (if too hot, dilute with more Beefeater Gin).

Name: Cali Style Frozen Margarita
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Tequila', '1/2 can(s) Triple Sec', '1 can(s) Limeade', 'Fresh Fruit (Chopped)']
Making: 1. Blend Limeade, tequila and triple sec (use the can of Limeade to measure the tequila and triple sec). 2. Empty about 1/2 of the mixture in to a separate container for later use. 3. In the remaining mix, add ice and fruit (example: mango, banana, strawberry, peach, …) if desired and tequila (if there is room). 4. Blend well and repeat step 3 with the batch you put aside. Enjoy in chilled cocktail glasses.

Name: Canadian Moose Juice
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka (40 oz.)', '1 bottle(s) Peach (1-2 litre bottle)', '2 can(s) Orange Juice (Frozen concentrate)', 'Oranges (Sliced)', 'Peaches (Sliced)']
Making: Mix the orange juice with 6 cans of water and pour in a large punch bowl. Add the other ingredients, mix well and serve in punch cups.

Name: Cape Codder Punch
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Vodka', '12 cup(s) Cranapple Juice', '2 cup(s) Orange Juice', '2/3 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '3 1/2 cup(s) Mineral water']
Making: Stir all the ingredients -except the mineral water- until the sugar has dissolved. Chill. Add the mineral water just before serving, stirring it in gently. This punch makes approximately 40 servings.

Name: Captain's Sunrise Punch
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Silver Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', '5 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Combine ingredients in order in a highball glass. Stir lightly and serve.

Name: Cardinal Punch
Ingredients: ['8 cup(s) Red Wine (Or Claret)', '2 cup(s) Brandy', '2 cup(s) Light Rum', '6 1/3 oz. Champagne (Chilled)', '1 oz. Sweet Vermouth', '4 cup(s) Club Soda', '12 Lemons (Juice of, fresh)', '2 cup(s) Tea (Optional)', 'Sugar (Enough to sweeten the lemon juice)']
Making: Mix the lemon juice and the sugar then pour over a large block of ice in a punch bowl. Stir well then add the other ingredients. Stir well again. Garnish with fruit. This punch makes approximately 40 servings.

Name: Caribbean Punch #2
Ingredients: ['12 Oranges (Juice of, fresh)', '12 Lemons (Juice of, fresh)', '3 cup(s) White Rum', '1/2 cup(s) Brown Sugar', '1 tsp. Cinnamon', '1 tsp. Cloves', '1 tsp. Nutmeg', '1 tsp. Ginger']
Making: Mix all ingredients and serve in glasses that have had their rims sugared. Garnish with orange slices.

Name: Champagne Cup #1
Ingredients: ['16 oz. Champagne (Chilled)', '2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '6 oz. Club Soda', '4 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Stir over ice cubes in a large pitcher. Garnish with fruit of the season, a sprig of mint and two rinds of cucumber. This punch makes approximately 6 servings.

Name: Champagne Punch #2
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Champagne (Chilled)', '1/2 cup(s) Cointreau', '1/2 cup(s) Brandy', '2 cup(s) Sparkling Water (Chilled)']
Making: Combine all of the ingredients and serve in punch cups.

Name: Champagne Punch #3
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Sugar', '1 1/2 cup(s) Brandy', '6 bottle(s) Champagne', '6 Oranges (Sliced)', '6 Lemons (Sliced)', '6 Limes (Sliced)', '1 Pineapple (Chunks)', 'Strawberries']
Making: Mix sugar, brandy and 5 bottles champagne in punch bowl. Stir in orange, lemon, lime, pineapple chunks and ice cubes until well mixed. Garnish with strawberries and pour final bottle of champagne on top.

Name: Champagne Punch #4
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Champagne (Chilled)', '1 1/2 oz. Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Maraschino Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Rum', '2 1/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/4 cup(s) Sugar Syrup', '1/2 quart(s) Soda Water']
Making: Stir in a punch bowl.

Name: Champagne Punch #5
Ingredients: ['2 bottle(s) Champagne (Or sparkling wine)', '1 cup(s) Cherry Liqueur', '1 cup(s) Cognac', '1 cup(s) Triple Sec', '1/2 cup(s) Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1/2 cup(s) Sugar Syrup']
Making: All the ingredients must be chilled. Pour all the ingredients (except champagne) in a large punch bowl over a block of ice. Stir well and before serving, add the champagne and stir gently. Garnish with a few lemon slices. This punch makes approximately 18 servings.

Name: Champagne Sherbet Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Champagne (Chilled)', '3 cup(s) Pineapple Juice (Chilled)', '1/4 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '4 cup(s) Sherbet (Pineapple)']
Making: Mix the lemon and the pineapple juice in a punch bowl. Just before serving add the sherbet scoop after scoop, then pour the champagne. Stir gently. This punch makes approximately 20 servings.

Name: Champagne Sorbet Punch
Ingredients: ['2 bottle(s) Champagne (Or sparkling wine)', '1 bottle(s) White Wine (Dessert wine)', '1 quart(s) Sherbet (Lemon)']
Making: Stir gently the champagne and the white wine into a punch bowl. Add a large block of ice and scoops of lemon sherbet. Garnish with frozen lemon slices. This punch makes approximately 22 servings.

Name: Cheapo Student Bevvy
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) White Lightning Cider', '11 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) Black Currant Squash']
Making: Mix in a pint glass. Down very quickly.

Name: Cherry Liqueur #1
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Brandy', '6 oz. Vodka (100 proof)', '1/3 cup(s) Sugar Syrup', '2 cup(s) Cherries (Ripe and preferably Bing cherries)', '2 tbsp. Powdered Sugar', '1 pinch(es) Mace']
Making: Pierce each cherry several times each, so that its flesh comes in contact with the alcohol mixture. Put the pricked cherries in a jar with the powdered sugar sprinkled over them. Add the brandy and the vodka - if the cherries are not covered, add a little more brandy until they are. Close the jar well, store in a warm place, about 27 C, and let the mixture set for about six weeks. Pour off the liquid, and extract any additional liquid you can from the cherries. Add the mace and the sugar syrup, shake well, and filter through a cloth if necessary to get any remaining fruit particles out.

Name: Cherry Popper #2
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Absolut Vodka', '1 pint(s) Peach Schnapps', '1/2 gallon(s) Sunny Delight Orange Juice', '3 tsp. Sugar', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid (Cherry)']
Making: Combine all the ingredients over ice in a punch bowl or the gallon of Sunny Delight. Mix well and enjoy!

Name: Chickadee
Ingredients: ['2 scoop(s) Sherbet rainbow', '4 oz. Coconut Rum', '2 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Sunny Delight Orange Juice']
Making: Add 2 scoops rainbow sherbet in highball glass. Pour in coconut rum, vodka and Sunny Delight Orange Juice. Do not stir. Decorate with a cherry.

Name: Christmas Yule Egg Nog #1
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Eggnog (Dairy)', '1 1/2 cup(s) Blended Scotch Whisky', '1 1/2 oz. Light Rum']
Making: Mix in a large punch bowl, and serve in cups. Garnish each cup with grated nutmeg. This punch makes approximately 12 servings.

Name: Cider Cup #1
Ingredients: ['4 2/3 cup(s) Cider (sweet)', '5 oz. Sherry', '2 1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 bottle(s) Soda Water', '1/2 Lemon Juice']
Making: Stir the ingredients in a bowl with the rind of 1/4 of a lemon. Add sugar to taste and flavour with nutmeg. Strain and chill. When ready to serve, garnish with verbena and borage.

Name: Cider Cup #2
Ingredients: ['16 oz. Apple Cider', '2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '6 oz. Club Soda', '4 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Stir over ice cubes in a large pitcher. Garnish with fruit of the season, a sprig of mint and two rinds of cucumber and serve in large wine glasses. This punch makes approximately 6 servings.

Name: Cider Cup #4
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Brandy', '2 oz. Cointreau', '2 cup(s) Apple Cider', '1 cup(s) Sparkling Water', '4 tsp. Superfine Sugar']
Making: Stir with ice cubes in a punch bowl and garnish with apple slices and fresh mint sprigs. This punch makes approximately 4 servings.

Name: Citrus Banana Flip
Ingredients: ['1 Banana', '10 oz. Club Soda', '2/3 oz. Orange Juice (Concentrate)', '2/3 cup(s) Milk', '1/2 cup(s) Dark Rum', '1/2 cup(s) Lime Juice', '3 tbsp. Brown Sugar']
Making: Blend with 1/2 cup crushed ice until smooth. Serve in a collins glass.

Name: Citrus Berry Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Canadian Mist', '5 cup(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '11 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Combine over ice in a pitcher and garnish with lime slices. Serve in collins glasses. Makes approximately 8 servings.

Name: Citrus F**ker
Ingredients: ['1/2 bottle(s) Spiced Rum', '2 bottle(s) 7-Up', '1 bottle(s) Ginger Ale', '1 can(s) Orange Juice', '1 can(s) Lemonade']
Making: Mix over ice in a punch bowl and serve chilled in punch cups.

Name: Citrus-Beer Punch
Ingredients: ['24 oz. Light Beer (Chilled)', '1 cup(s) Grapefruit Juice (Chilled)', '2 cup(s) Sugar', '2 cup(s) Water', '6 Lemons']
Making: Juice the lemons and thinly slice the peels. Stir the sugar and the water in a saucepan and bring to the boil. Add the lemon peels, remove from the heat and cover for 5 minutes. Then remove the peels and add the lemon juice and the grapefruit juice. Stir and transfer in a pitcher. Cover and chill for about 3 hours. Just before serving add the beer. Serve over ice in beer mugs and decorate with lemon slices. This punch makes approximately 8 servings.

Name: Claret Cup #1
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Claret', '2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '6 oz. Club Soda', '4 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Stir over ice cubes in a large pitcher. Garnish with fruit of the season, a sprig of mint and two rinds of cucumber and serve in large wine glasses. This punch makes approximately 6 servings.

Name: Claret Cup #2
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Claret', '2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Cointreau', '3 tsp. Superfine Sugar', '1 cup(s) Sparkling Water']
Making: Stir with ice cubes in a punch bowl or a pitcher and garnish with fresh mint sprigs. Serve in large wine glasses. This punch makes approximately 4 servings.

Name: Claret Punch #2
Ingredients: ['3 bottle(s) Claret', '2 cup(s) Brandy', '1 cup(s) Cointreau', '3 cup(s) Lemon Juice (Preferably fresh)', '1 cup(s) Superfine Sugar (Or to taste)']
Making: Stir in a punch bowl, then add a large block of ice. Garnish with sliced fruit of the season and serve in large wine glasses. This punch makes approximately 18 servings.

Name: Clog
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Sherry', '1 pint(s) Claret', '1/2 pint(s) Brandy', '2 oz. Bitters', '3/4 cup(s) Sugar']
Making: Heat gently and pour into a mug or old-fashioned glass.

Name: Cold Duck Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Champagne (Cold Duck)', '1 can(s) Lemonade (Thawed)', '8 cup(s) Ginger Ale', '1/2 gallon(s) Sherbet (Rainbow)']
Making: Mix all liquids in a large punch bowl. Float the sherbet on top.

Name: Colorado Punch
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Vodka', '1 cup(s) Apricot Brandy', '12 oz. Orange Juice (Frozen)', '12 oz. Lemonade (Frozen)', '1 can(s) Apricot Nectar (Large can)', '1 can(s) Pineapple Juice (Large can)', '7-Up']
Making: Mix everything together except the 7-Up and freeze. When ready to serve, put two scoops of slush in a collins glass and add some 7-Up.

Name: Combat Juice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Cherry Whiskey', '1 bottle(s) Beer', 'Orange Juice', 'Lemon Juice', 'Lime Juice', 'Cranberry Juice', '1 dash(es) Sprite']
Making: Pour vodka, scotch, rye, rum, gin, and cherry whiskey into a beer pitcher. Then pour in a bottle of beer. Add a cup of each juice. Top with a dash of sprite. Stir and serve.

Name: Commodore Bedroom
Ingredients: ["1 quart(s) Gordon's Dry Gin", '1 quart(s) Orange Flower Water']
Making: Shake with ice and serve in a lowball glass.

Name: Constable Shuffle
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Galliano', '1/2 bottle(s) West Coast Cooler', '1/2 pint(s) Bulmers Cider']
Making: Put everything into a pint glass with one ice cube. Serve with wheelchair. :-)

Name: Corazon Punch
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Corazon Tequila Reposado', '2 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '2 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and serve straight up or on the rocks and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Cough Medicine
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 quart(s) Berry Punch', '3/4 quart(s) Vodka']
Making: Mix together and enjoy.

Name: Country Russian
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 can(s) Country Time Lemonade', 'Water']
Making: Pour ingredients in a pitcher with water to settle down the lemon taste. Chill and then take it down with an even flow.

Name: Cove Punch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Hiram Walker Sour Apple Schnapps', '1 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', "1 oz. Myer's Dark Rum", '5 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a large glass.

Name: Cowboy Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ['2 gallon(s) Vodka', '12 can(s) Beer', '8 can(s) Lemonade (Fozen)', '8 cup(s) Water', 'Fruit Punch (Optional)']
Making: Mix all the ingredients over ice in a cooler. Serve chilled in punch cups.

Name: Cowboy Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Vodka (Or rum)', '2 can(s) Lemonade (Concentrate)', '2 can(s) Limeade (Concentrate)', '1 can(s) Water', '4 cup(s) 7-Up']
Making: Blend ingredients together and freeze overnight. To serve, scoop into glasses.

Name: Cranberry Cider Punch
Ingredients: ['8 cup(s) Cranberry Ginger Ale', '8 cup(s) Apple Cider', '1 can(s) Raspberry Juice (Frozen)', 'Lime Juice']
Making: Stir and garnish with lime slices. Serve in a collins glass.

Name: Cranberry Punch #1
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '4 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 tbsp. Almond Extract', '2 quart(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Combine first four ingredients. Stir until sugar is dissolved, chill. Add Ginger Ale just before serving. Add ice to keep punch cold.

Name: Crazy Freeman
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Goldschlager', '1 cup(s) Ice 101', '1 quart(s) Orange Juice', '10 Cherries', '6 Strawberries']
Making: Blend all the ingredients, chill over ice and serve in cocktail glasses.

Name: Creamy Gin Sour
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Gin', '1/2 cup(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Heavy Cream', '1/4 cup(s) Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Sugar', '10 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Blend with 3/4 cup of ice until frothy. Pour into a large red wine glasses.

Name: Creme de Cocoa
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Vodka', '1 cup(s) Sugar', '1/2 cup(s) Cocoa Powder (Or 6 oz. unsweetened liquid chocolate)', '1/2 cup(s) Water', '1 tsp. Vanilla Extract']
Making: Make sugar syrup with the sugar and water. In an aging container, mix well chocolate, vodka and vanilla extract, then add the cooled sugar syrup. Leave for 4 weeks, shaking the container weekly. After the 4th week, let the container sit undisturbed for an additional week then carefully pour off the liqueur. Discard the sediment left behind then strain and filter the liqueur. You may add 1/2 tsp. glycerin to give a nice texture to your cream. Then bottle the cream and age for one more month.

Name: Crimson Matador
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', 'Red Bull Energy Drink', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour vodka over ice in a Tom Collins glass. Fill with the Red Bull and float grenadine. Serve with a drink straw and stir well before drinking. Great sweet drink for ladies but has a good kick for the guys.

Name: Crip Juice (as In Crips And Bloods)
Ingredients: ['40 oz. Beer (Preferably very cold Old English 800)', '1 quart(s) Sunny Delight Orange Juice']
Making: Pour out the beer until the remaining brew meets the top of the label and slowly fill back up with Sunny D. I know this sounds gross but trust me, its great on a hot summer day.

Name: Cristobal Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Flor de Cana 21 Year Old Centenario Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice Puree', '1 oz. Five Spice Syrup', '3/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1 slice(s) Jalapeno Pepper']
Making:
Combine ingredients and shake. Serve on rocks in Collins glass, float 18 yr, splash soda. Garnish with pineapple leaf and floating whole star anise.
by Greg Seider
Named after the San Cristobal volcano. The volcano that appears on the Flor de Caña label (highest in Nicaragua) thus signifying the highest quality rum

Name: Daiquiri Slush
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Sugar Syrup', '1 can(s) Pineapple Juice', '2 cup(s) Vodka', '1/2 cup(s) Dry Gin', '1/2 cup(s) White Rum', '2 cup(s) Water (Cold)', '3 can(s) Limeade (Frozen)', '6 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Frappe and serve in collins glasses.

Name: Dasiy Jug
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Everclear', '1 cup(s) Gin', '1 cup(s) Vodka', 'Lemonade Mix (Powdered)', 'Lemons']
Making: Pour alcohol in large container (a pitcher or a cooler will work). Then slice up the lemons and add them to the mixture. Next add the powdered lemonade until there is just the hint of the taste of alcohol. Let sit for a couple of hours, stir occasionally. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Daves' Tropical Death Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Grain Alcohol (PGA)', '2 package(s) Kool-Aid (Fruit Punch)', '4 Apples', '4 Pears', 'Strawberries', 'Grapes', 'Watermelon']
Making: Mix Kool-Aid as directed in two 1 Gallon containers. Add equal amounts of grain to each container. Cut all of the large fruit into bite size pieces and toss them into the mix. Put both containers in the fridge. Let the fruit soak in the punch for about two hours. Serve in large glasses with spoons to eat the fruit. Women love this because the grain has very little flavor. All they can taste is the Kool-Aid! The fruit pieces are what packs the punch!

Name: Derf Punch
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Vodka', '1 cup(s) Tequila Silver', '1 cup(s) Gin', '1 cup(s) Triple Sec', '1 can(s) Fruit Punch (Thawed concentrate)', '1 bottle(s) 7-Up (A 2 litre bottle)', 'Sugar (To taste)']
Making: Combine over ice cubes in a large punch bowl. Add sugar to taste, stir well and serve in punch cups.

Name: Devil's Brew
Ingredients: ['14 cup(s) Vodka', '14 cup(s) Port', '4 cup(s) Gin', '4 cup(s) Whiskey', '2 cup(s) Tequila', '2 pint(s) Lager (Strong)', '10 bottle(s) White Wine (75 cl. bottles)', '7 bottle(s) Hoopers Hooch', '3 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink', '10 cup(s) Sprite', '4 cup(s) Fanta (See rest of ingredients in the instructions)']
Making: …rest of ingredients: 25 cups of apple cider, 10 cups of apple juice and 2 cups of Rio fruit drink. Good luck for measuring and finding all that! The rest is easy: Mix in a HUGE container with chunks of ice!

Name: Dew Weiser
Ingredients: ['3 bottle(s) Mountain Dew', '12 can(s) Budweiser Beer']
Making: Mix well and serve cold.

Name: Dianne's Grog
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Vodka (100 proof)', '1/2 gallon(s) Red Wine', '1 can(s) Beer', '1 quart(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Stir the ingredients (adding beer last) into a one gallon punch bowl. Add ice and stir again.

Name: Did You Get The Number Of That Truck
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Whiskey', '4 cup(s) Apple Schnapps', '2 cup(s) Cinnamon Schnapps', '8 cup(s) Squirt']
Making: Mix in a punch bowl and serve in a highball glass..

Name: Dirty Whore
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/2 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Raspberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. DeKuyper Mad Melon Watermelon Schnapps', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Serve in a pint glass over ice. Pour in the alcohol then use fill with the pineapple juice. Add a splash of 7-Up. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

Name: Dozer Punch
Ingredients: ['25 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '25 oz. Malibu Rum', '50 oz. Everclear', '68 oz. Squirt', '2 quart(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 gallon(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1 Pineapple (Fresh)', '1 quart(s) Strawberries', '1 bottle(s) Coconut Cream', '1 pound(s) Dry Ice']
Making: Cut fruit into bite size pieces and let them soak in the Everclear for 24 hours. Mix the remaining liquids into a large kettle and add 1/8 lb dry ice and the fruit. It will bubble like a witch's brew until it becomes like a slurpy. Keep adding 1/8 lb dry ice when the amount added before melts. It is called dozer punch in honor of the 42 Engineers from Berlin Germany that I made it for when I served 91-95...3 pieces of fruit will rock your world. Party on guys!!

Name: Dragon's Blood #1
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '1/5 gallon(s) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '2 bottle(s) Mountain Dew (2 - 2 litres bottles)', '3 package(s) Kool-Aid (Black Cherry)']
Making: Mix in a large punch bowl, add ice and serve in punch cups. Select Designated Driver!

Name: Ecto Cooler
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Vodka', '1/5 gallon(s) Apple Pucker', 'Hi-C (Ecto-cooler)']
Making: Combine with ice in a one gallon pitcher.

Name: Egg Nog #1
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Brandy', '1 1/2 quart(s) Milk', '1 pint(s) Whipped Cream (Heavy cream)', '1 cup(s) Sugar', '12 Egg Whites', '12 Egg Yolks']
Making: Beat the egg yolks with the sugar in a large punch bowl and stir in the milk and the whipped cream. Add the brandy and refrigerate (1 hour minimum). Just before serving, whip the egg whites stiff and gently incorporate them to the cold mixture. Sprinkle with nutmeg and serve in cups. Makes approximately 25 servings.

Name: Eighty Seven
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Bacardi Rum (8 years of age)', '1 bottle(s) 7-Up (1-2 litre bottle)']
Making: Pour over ice in a bucket. Serve in collins glasses with a twist of lime.

Name: Electric Lemonade #69
Ingredients: ['2 pint(s) Everclear', '20 oz. Country Time Lemonade', '10 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'Water']
Making: Get two one gallon pitchers and put half the lemonade mix in each one. Add 1 pint of everclear and 5 oz. of sweet and sour mix to each pitcher, fill with water and mix well. Enjoy this drink but be careful it will sneak up on you!!

Name: Emerson #2
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Gatorade (1 - 32oz. bottle of Fruit Punch Gatorade)', '12 oz. Vodka']
Making: Empty Gatorade down to indented ring below the lighting bolt under the word Gatorade. Fill remaining space with vodka, shake and discretely enjoy. Gatorade is engineered to go straight to your blood, so this drink will punch your liver the moment you drink it!

Name: Episcopal Punch
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Vodka', '2 cup(s) Ginger Ale', '2 cup(s) Grape Juice (White and sparkling)']
Making: Mix in a pitcher with a few ice cubes. Serve in the glass of your choice with ice cubes or crushed ice. If you prefer, you may use non-sparkling white grape juice.

Name: Extra Kick Punch
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Dark Rum', '1 cup(s) Brandy', '1/4 cup(s) Peach Brandy', '8 cup(s) Water', '1 cup(s) Brown Sugar', '1 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 cup(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Dissolve the sugar in the water then add the other ingredients and chill. Pour over a block of ice in a large punch bowl. Garnish with lemon slices. This punch makes approximately 28 servings.

Name: Face Eraser
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Watermelon Pucker (Or your favourite Pucker)', '4 oz. Vodka', 'Sprite']
Making: Combine in a pitcher filled with ice. Serve in collins glasses.

Name: Fish House Punch
Ingredients: ['6 cup(s) Brandy', '4 cup(s) Peach Brandy', '2 cup(s) Light Rum', '12 Lemons (Juice of, fresh)', '4 cup(s) Club Soda', '2 cup(s) Tea (Optional)', 'Sugar (Enough to sweeten the lemon juice)']
Making: Mix the lemon juice and the sugar then pour over a large block of ice in a punch bowl. Stir well then add the other ingredients. Stir well again. Garnish with fruit. This punch makes approximately 40 servings.

Name: Flavored Jet Fuel
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '4 cup(s) Vodka (100 proof)', '4 cup(s) Gin', '24 bottle(s) Cooler (Your favourite wine cooler flavour)']
Making: Combine the ingredients in a 4 gallon container. Serve in punch cups filled with ice.

Name: Flirtini #1
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Absolut Vodka', '3 cup(s) Sparkling Wine (Preferably Ballatore)', 'Pineapple Juice (To taste)']
Making: Stir the ingredients over ice into a pitcher. Serve in cocktail glasses. Alternatively you can blend the ingredients for a frosty drink in the summer.

Name: Flurry Of Snow
Ingredients: ['1/2 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Sparkling Wine', '2 cup(s) Peach Juice', '2 cup(s) Passion Fruit Juice', '4 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Put the juice and the vodka in a big vat, add the vanilla ice in small portions and stir it. When the ice is melted add the sparkling wine. Punch also known as Schneegestoeber.

Name: Frisky Sour
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Orange Grapefruit Juice (Frozen)', '6 oz. Lemonade (Frozen)', '1 1/2 cup(s) Whiskey', '1 1/2 cup(s) Water']
Making: Frappe and serve in a lowball glass.

Name: Frozen Hot Mint Chocolate
Ingredients: ['2 tsp. White Creme de Menthe', '1 pint(s) Milk', '3/4 cup(s) Sugar', '1/2 cup(s) Cocoa Powder (Unsweetened)', '1 oz. Milk (To be used later)']
Making: Combine creme de menthe, cocoa and sugar in a saucepan and add just enough milk to obtain a smooth paste. Stir in the milk. Heat on low, stirring until the sugar is dissolved and the mixture is warm. Pour in ice cube trays and freeze overnight or for at least 6 hours. When needed, blend with 1 oz. of milk, until thick. Serve in frosted goblets.

Name: Fruity Bitch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice and serve straight up in a lowball glass.

Name: Fucco's Punch
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Everclear', '1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '1 gallon(s) Sunny Delight Orange Juice', '2 gallon(s) Gatorade']
Making: Mix ingredients together in a punch bowl. Everyone will love this! When I first made it, it went so quick that I hardly even got to sample it. Now I put some away for myself.

Name: Full House Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Canadian Mist (1-75 cl. Bottle)', '6 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '6 oz. Lemonade (Fozen concentrate)', '6 oz. Orange Juice (Fozen concentrate)', '12 cup(s) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Stir over a block of ice into a punch bowl. Garnish with slices of lemon and orange. Serve in punch cups and enjoy.

Name: Fuzy Peach Pussy
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Peach Schnapps', '2 bottle(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix over ice in a punch bowl. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Get-n-Laid
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Gatorade (Kiwi/strawberry)', '5 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix together in a tall glass.

Name: Ghetto Redneck Punch
Ingredients: ["12 bottle(s) Beer (Preferably Milwaukee's Best Ice)", '15 cup(s) Vodka', '12 can(s) Pink Lemonade (Concentrate)']
Making: Combine over ice into a large container. Stir well and serve in beer mugs.

Name: Giddyup Punch
Ingredients: ['1 gallon(s) Fruit Punch', '1/5 gallon(s) Smirnoff Vodka', '1 pint(s) Grain Alcohol (PGA)', '1 pint(s) Southern Comfort']
Making: Pour the grain alcohol in a large punch bowl. Add the Southern Comfort and some fruit punch. Mix in alternatively the vodka and the fruit punch to get maximum alcoholic content while still having a refreshing taste.

Name: Gimlet #3
Ingredients: ['9 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', "1 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Stir into pitcher with ice and strain over ice cubes in lowball glasses. Serves 3-4.

Name: Gin & Wink
Ingredients: ['Gin', 'Orange Soda (Preferably Wink)']
Making: Combine over ice in a collins glass.

Name: Goombah Punch
Ingredients: ['7 cup(s) White Rum', '4 cup(s) Malibu Rum', '1 1/2 gallon(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '1 1/2 gallon(s) Hi-C (Orange)']
Making: Mix in punch bowl.

Name: Goombay Pete's Smash
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Single drink: Pour over ice in an 18 oz. glass. Parties: Make a gallon or more in a large thermos and pour over ice into large cups or glasses.

Name: Gram Drivers
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '6 can(s) Beer', '2 scoop(s) Country Time Lemonade (Powdered)', 'Water (To taste)', 'Sugar (To taste)']
Making: Throw all the ingredients over ice in an ice chest, add water and sugar to taste...Fill your cup and enjoy your "lemonade"!

Name: Green Dinosaurs
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Everclear', '2 gallon(s) Kool-Aid (Green)', '1 can(s) Pineapple Juice (Frozen concentrate)']
Making: Mix well in a large cooler and chill.

Name: Green God Damn
