Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Everclear', '1 bottle(s) Sprite (One 2 litre bottle)', '1 bottle(s) Citra (One 2 litre bottle)', '1 bottle(s) Mello-Yellow (One 2 litre bottle)', '2 package(s) Kool-Aid', '3 1/2 cup(s) Country Time Lemonade (Powdered)']
Making: Pour all the ingredients in a cooler or a very very large punch bowl...add a bag of ice and drink.

Name: Green Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1 gallon(s) Orange Juice', '1 bottle(s) White Rum']
Making: Stir in a punch bowl.

Name: Green Shit
Ingredients: ['2 can(s) Vodka', '1 can(s) Limeade']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth. Serve in cocktail glasses.

Name: Green-Eyed Monster
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Everclear', '2 package(s) Kool-Aid Lemon Lime (unsweetened)', '1 quart(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 large bottle(s) Mountain Dew', '2 Apple Granny Smiths or Kiwi fruit if you prefer']
Making: Combine kool-aid packages and Everclear in a punch bowl. Add the juice then the Mountain Dew. Cut the fruit and add to mixture. Let the punch chill and sit with the fruit in it. Later enjoy your drinks and eat the fruit for a MONSTER TRIP! Makes 1 gallon.

Name: Grog #2
Ingredients: ['1 small bottle(s) Vodka', '2 package(s) Crystal Light Your favorite flavor']
Making: In a 1 gallon container mix vodka with the crystal light powder mix and fill with water. Shake well and serve over ice.

Name: Grogschlager
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Rum', '1 bottle(s) Water', '12 Cloves', '12 Cinnamon Stick', '2 cup(s) Brown Sugar', '1 tsp. Vanilla Extract', '1 bottle(s) Goldschlager', 'Candies (Fizzies if possible)']
Making: Mix rum, water, cloves, cinnamon, brown sugar and vanilla in a boiling cauldron. Cook for half and hour to forty minutes. Curse the Goldschlager then pour while dropping fizzies tablets if possible. Drink warm with pirate hat parrot if possible. Garr!

Name: Grove Grinder
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Bacardi Rum', '1 bottle(s) Malibu Rum', '1 bottle(s) Gin', '2 bottle(s) Lemonade', '1 bottle(s) Orange Juice', '1 Lime']
Making: Mix the ingredients together and add the juice of the Lime. This punch grows on you after a while and eventually makes you grind your teeth hence the name. Enjoy!

Name: Hairy Buffalo
Ingredients: ['Varies (See Instructions)']
Making: The Hairy Buffalo is composed of the leftover drinks in the bartenders trough. This is also THE punch at colleges. Just mix everything lying around into one punch bowl. Usually free at bars so watch out if a buddy offers to buy you one.

Name: Hairy Buffalo Punch
Ingredients: ['2 gallon(s) Vodka', '2 gallon(s) Rum', '1 gallon(s) Grain Alcohol (PGA) (Optional)', '5 gallon(s) Orange Juice', '4 gallon(s) Kool-Aid (Once mixed)', '3 gallon(s) Fruit Punch', '2 gallon(s) Pineapple Juice', '2 gallon(s) Cranberry Juice', '6 Grapefruits (Diced)', '2 Pineapples (Diced)', 'Oranges (Sliced)']
Making: Put 5 lbs of ice in a 35-45 gallon (or larger) clean trash barrel. Prepare the Kool-Aid (your favourite flavour) in a five gallon water jug. Mix in all juices, vodka and rum at the same time. This will prevent the alcohol from either being at the top or the bottom of the barrel. Add the fruit and stir vigorously. Let sit in cool place for a day or so. Replace ice and serve in punch cups.

Name: Hairy Morgan
Ingredients: ['1/2 Lime (Key Lime)', '4 oz. Spiced Rum', '8 oz. Lemonade']
Making: Squeeze lime in a glass over ice. Add rum and lemonade. Stir. Garnish with lime.

Name: Hat Trick
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Beer', "2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", "2 oz. Captain Morgan's Rum"]
Making: Mix in a big plastic cup over ice and enjoy!

Name: Hawaiian Doody
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '8 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '6 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Stir over ice and serve in collins glasses.

Name: Hawaiian Spooge
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Triple Sec', '2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '2 oz. Coconut Rum', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice (Unsweetened)', '2 tsp. Sugar', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Sweetened)', '2 cup(s) Sprite']
Making: Blend all well except Sprite. Then blend in the Sprite until all the fizzing stops. Serve alone or on the rocks according to tastes...Enjoy! Let me know if you like this silly concoction!

Name: Hawaiian Voodoo Coconut Tosser
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 bottle(s) Zima', '7-Up', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill a 60 oz. pitcher half full of ice and pour in all of the alcohol. Nearly fill with equal parts of the juices and add a liberal splash of 7-Up. Stir and pour.

Name: Hawain Punch
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Amaretto', '1 cup(s) Southern Comfort', '1 cup(s) Sloe Gin', '1 cup(s) Vodka', 'Orange Juice (To taste)', 'Pineapple Juice (To taste)', 'Sweet and Sour Mix (To taste)']
Making: Blend with ice on low speed and serve over ice in a punch bowl. It makes a great tropical theme night punch.

Name: Henry Joose
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Bombay Sapphire Gin', "1 cup(s) Seagram's Extra Dry Gin", '1 bottle(s) 7-Up (1-2 litre bottle)', 'Cranapple Juice', 'Grape Juice (Or grape strawberry juice)']
Making: Use a large Dixie cup. Add equal parts of Bombay and Seagram's gin to where the lines start on the dixie cup. Fill with 7-Up till there is about 1/3 of the cup left and fill the rest with equal parts grape-strawberry and cranapple juice.

Name: Holiday Cheer
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Champagne', '1 can(s) Cranberry Juice (Frozen)']
Making: Mix champagne and frozen cranberry juice. Garnish with lime slices. Serve with breakfast to start the day right.

Name: Hop Skip And Go Naked
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Vodka', '5 can(s) Lemonade (Frozen concentrate)', '24 can(s) Beer']
Making: Combine with a bag of ice in a cooler and stir well. You can also shake it so it agitates the lemonade.

Name: Hop Skip And Go Naked Party Punch
Ingredients: ['12 can(s) Beer Light', '59 oz. Gin', '59 oz. Vodka', '12 can(s) Mountain Dew', '12 Lime', '12 wedge(s) Lime']
Making: Pour 2 bags of ice into an ice chest. Add the Beer, Gin, Vodka and Mountain Dew. Throwin the 12 Lime Wedges and Squeeze the rest of the limes into the mix. Stir it up and enjoy.

Name: Hop Skip and Go Naked Punch
Ingredients: ['6 can(s) Beer (American)', '1 bottle(s) Vodka (Small)', '3 can(s) Lemon Lime Mix (Frozen)']
Making: Take a Cooler and throw a bag of ice in it. Add beer, white liquor and frozen Lemon Lime Daiquiri Mix. Stir until Daiquiri Mix has liquefied.

Name: Hop-Skip and Go-Naked
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) White Rum', '1 bottle(s) Vodka', '12 can(s) Beer', '3 bottle(s) Lemon Lime Soda', '1 can(s) Lemonade Mix (Frozen, concentrate)']
Making: Combine first four ingredients in a medium sized cooler. Add 1/2 of concentrate and gradually add more as desired. Double recipe for ragers and use new 25 gallon sized trash can as a vat.

Name: Hot Apple Brandy
Ingredients: ['6 cup(s) Apple Juice', '1 1/2 cup(s) Apricot Brandy', '3 Cinnamon Sticks', '1/2 tsp. Cloves (Ground)']
Making: Heat over low heat for 30 mn, then serve in warm snifters. This punch makes approximately 7 servings.

Name: Hot Burgundy Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Burgundy Wine (75 cl.)', '1 1/2 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '1 cup(s) Apple Juice', '1/4 cup(s) Sugar', '1/2 tsp. Allspice', '1/2 tsp. Nutmeg', '1 Cinnamon Stick (About 8 cm. long)', '5 Cloves']
Making: First dissolve the sugar in the water in a large saucepan. Add the remaining ingredients, except the wine. Heat for 15 minutes then strain into another saucepan and add the wine. Simmer over low heat for a few minutes. Serve in mugs or heat-proof cups and top with a sprinkle of nutmeg. This punch makes approximately 16 servings.

Name: Hot Devilish Daiquiri
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Water (Hot)', '1/4 cup(s) Sugar', '2 stick(s) Cinnamon', '8 Cloves', '1 can(s) Lemonade (Frozen)', '1 can(s) Limeade (Frozen)', '1/2 cup(s) White Rum']
Making: Heat gently and pour into an Irish coffee mug.

Name: Hot Rum and Cider Punch
Ingredients: ['2 pint(s) Gold Puerto Rican Rum', '2 pint(s) Apple Cider', '4 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 tbsp. Maple Syrup', '2 tbsp. Sugar']
Making: Heat gently and garnish with lemon slices, cloves, and cinnamon.

Name: Hot Rummed Cider
Ingredients: ['6 cup(s) Apple Cider', '1 1/2 cup(s) Light Rum', '6 tbsp. Brown Sugar', '3 tbsp. Butter']
Making: Bring the cider and the sugar to the boil. Reduce the heat, add the butter and stir until it has melted, then add the rum. Serve in mugs or heat-proof cups. This punch makes approximately 7 servings.

Name: Hunch Punch
Ingredients: ['3 gallon(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch (Original flavour)', '16 oz. Orange Juice (Frozen)', '16 oz. Pineapple Juice', '8 cup(s) Sprite', '8 cup(s) Ginger Ale', '1/5 gallon(s) Everclear', '1/5 gallon(s) Vodka']
Making:
Mix all the ingredients on a 5 gallon spout cooler, serve over ice and enjoy!
The word punch probably makes you think of a fun and fruity drink, usually red in color, which is served up to larger crowds at parties and functions. So, that must be what Hunch Punch is, right?
Well, sort of. Hunch Punch is a punch, but it certainly isn’t for the kiddies. It’s a tasty concoction of juices, alcohol, and usually Kool-Aid that is definitely for an adults-only good time.
Hunch Punch is usually known by the more well known name Jungle Juice, while in some areas you may even hear it called Purple Jesus. Another name variation for Hunch Punch is Blog. However, it has nothing to do with online journals. The name is used for the drink when it is served to visitors at various science fiction conventions.
Hunch Punch is definitely a favorite found on college campuses across the country. It may take a lot of time and ingredients to make it, but it is definitely worth the time, effort, and money because it not only serves a lot of people, but tastes pretty darned good.
The blend is usually created by mixing massive amounts of alcohol with smaller amounts of fruit juiced and, in some instances, various fruit chunks. While brown alcohols can make the drink rather hard to drink, and beer can make it just plain disgusting, neutral and fruit-based alcohol make it a drink that no one can resist. Add what you like and invite others to do the same to make your Hunch Punch something that everyone will love.

Name: Hunch Punch #69
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Everclear (Large bottle)', '1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '3 gallon(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '20 oz. Sprite', '1 can(s) Fruit Cocktail (Large can)']
Making: Mix in a large cooler, stir and add some ice cubes. ENJOY!!!

Name: Hunch Punch (Gordo And Soul's Rebel Mix)
Ingredients: ['5 gallon(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '3 bottle(s) Everclear', '2 can(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 Orange (Navel)', '1 Tangerine', '1 Peach', '1 bottle(s) Cherries', '1 can(s) Pineapples (sliced)', '2 Kiwis', '2 can(s) Fruit (mixed)']
Making: Take a ten gallon cooler and pour everything in. Stir and drink and have fun!!

Name: Hunch Punch (real One)
Ingredients: ["25 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '25 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '25 oz. Everclear', '25 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '2 gallon(s) Cranberry Juice', 'Kool-Aid', 'Sugar']
Making: Mix everything then pour in enough koolaid and sugar to make the women like it. This will knock a party on its ass. Garnish with sliced fruit.

Name: I Fell Off My Bicycle
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Apple Pucker', '8 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice in a cocktail glass. Mix to taste but be careful because you may end up with a scraped knee or a boo-boo on your elbow before you can say 'Huffy!'

Name: Ice Bucket
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Bacardi Light Rum', '2 oz. Tequila (Silver)', '2 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Gin', '2 pint(s) Lager', '1 pint(s) Cider', '1/2 pint(s) Black Currant Juice', '1 oz. Tia Maria']
Making: For this punch you will need a very big bucket/bowl for mixing it. Add the ingredients in the order they are mentioned. You can add any other CLEAR spirit you want so long as you put in two shots. Putting anything that isn't clear into the mixture will destroy the taste. Should end up a pink colour. Should be enough for 5 people to have 2 drinks each. A good one for house parties.

Name: Iced TSC
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 quart(s) Iced Tea (Preferably Shopright Iced Tea)']
Making: Mix with ice and serve in punch cups. However Todd prefers drinking out of a tupperware container, one quart at a time.

Name: Icy Rummed Cacao
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '1/2 cup(s) Dark Rum', '1/2 cup(s) Brown Creme de Cacao']
Making: Blend until smooth and pour into parfait glass. Garnish with shaved chocolate.

Name: Imperial Egg Nog
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Eggnog (Dairy)', '10 oz. Brandy', '2 oz. Apricot Brandy']
Making: Mix in a large punch bowl, and serve in cups. Garnish each cup with grated nutmeg. This punch makes approximately 12 servings.

Name: Irish Cream
Ingredients: ['2 1/4 cup(s) Rye Whiskey', '1/4 cup(s) Milk', '1/2 pint(s) Heavy Cream', '1 can(s) Sweetened Condensed Milk', '2 1/2 tbsp. Chocolate Syrup', '1 1/2 tbsp. Coconut Cream', '3 Eggs (Large)']
Making: Blend and store in the refrigerator up to three months.

Name: Jack-o-Lantern Punch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Flor de Cana 7 Year Old Rum', '4 Sugar Cubes', '3 oz. Club Soda', '2 Clove (whole)', '1 pinch(es) Nutmeg', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Apple Juice']
Making:
Dissolve the sugar cubes in 1 oz. of club soda (this generally involves muddling to help process). Muddle the cloves with the sugar cubes. After the sugar cubes and cloves are muddled/dissolved, add the rest of the ingredients one at a time and stir as added. Add ice once all of the ingredients have been added and stirred. Stir the punch until it is chilled. Strain the punch into a glass, punch bowl, or carved out pumpkin depending on the size of the portion, top with 2 oz. club soda and garnish with apple slices, cinnamon sticks and pumpkin seeds.
No Halloween festivity is complete without a pumpkin jack-o-lantern. This year, impress your friends by serving up this delightful rum punch right inside a pumpkin! Make it at home, bring it over, serve it up, it’s as easy as pumpkin pie. Nicaragua’s best, Flor de Cana rum, is slow-aged and highly awarded for its flavor profile. Subtle hints of caramel and vanilla mesh perfectly with the fresh lemon juice, cloves and apple juice to make this drink that ultimate party punch.
Created by: Phil Ward, Mayahuel

Name: Jamaican Punch
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '3/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour over ice into a collins glass. Garnish with an orange slice, a cherry and a pineapple wedge. Mystic Man's comments: A true Jamaican punch is orange or peach in color, add dashes of grenadine and short shake until you get used to it (it doesn't take much grenadine).

Name: James Giant Peach
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) White Rum', '1 bottle(s) Gin', '1 Peach (per person)', '2 bottle(s) Juice (Tropical Fruit Juice)', '1 Lemon']
Making: Add all the alcohol and fruit juice into a suitable container. Squeeze the juice of the lemon into the punch. Place the peeled Peaches into the punch. Firstly enjoy the punch them proceed to each the peaches heavenly! (We normally used a full bottle of vodka and half bottles of Rum and Gin).

Name: Jamie's Inhibitionless Fruit Salad Punch
Ingredients: ['26 oz. Absolut 100 Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Champagne', '1 bottle(s) Sprite', '64 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '32 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'Fruit']
Making: Get a reaaaally big punch bowl. Add strawberries, oranges, grapefruit, canteloupe, watermelon and pineapple to bowl. Mix all ingredients except Sprite. (I like to mix everything in a gallon jug) Pour in the bowl with the Sprite and let chill and soak into fruit overnight.Serve and Enjoy! )

Name: Jay's Hunch Punch
Ingredients: ['3 bottle(s) Everclear', '1 bottle(s) Vodka', "1 bottle(s) Captain Morgan's Silver Spiced Rum", '1 bottle(s) Peach Schnapps', '1 bottle(s) Triple Sec', '3 bottle(s) Fruit Punch', '12 bottle(s) 7-Up']
Making: Pour all the ingredients in a 5 gallon watercooler. Place 1 bag of ice unopened in and mix. Let sit for 12 hours and enjoy.

Name: Jet Fuel
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Vodka', '1 pint(s) Rum', '2 quart(s) Lemonade']
Making: Mix the ingredients in a gallon jar made of glass. Fill to the top with ice. Place lid on tightly. Wrap a small bath towel around the jar and take turns shaking it until the towel is frozen to the glass jar. Serve in punch cups. Warning: If sitting down while consuming, stand up slowly.

Name: JM's Tequila Delight
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '7 oz. Strawberry Daiquiri Mix', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 oz. Maraschino Cherry Juice', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour theTequila into a blender. Add the Strawberry Daiquiri Mix, Pineapple Juice, Maraschino Cherry Juice and Orange Juice with ice. I personally like them like a frozen margarita so add as much ice as desired. Blend thououghly and pour into a 12 oz. glass and garnish with 2 cherries.

Name: Joe's-Town Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Rum', 'Minute Maid Strawberry Soda', 'Fruit Punch or powerade']
Making: Mix apple pucker and pineapple rum. Fill glass up with one half Minute Maid Strawberry Soda and one half fruit punch. Garnish with slices of fruit.

Name: Joey's Magic Juice
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Everclear', "1 cup(s) Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 cup(s) Vodka', '1 gallon(s) V 8 Juice', 'Apples (Diced)', 'Strawberries (Diced)']
Making: Mix well over ice in a punch bowl and serve in punch cups. You can also add different margarita mixers.

Name: Jordin's Killer Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ['7 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Jamaica Rum', '4 cup(s) Cranberry-Strawberry Juice']
Making: Mix, chill and serve over ice.

Name: Jugs Of Illusions
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Malibu Rum', '2 cup(s) Bacardi Rum', '1 cup(s) Midori', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine over ice in a pitcher. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Jungle Fruit
Ingredients: ['1 gallon(s) Everclear', 'Fruit']
Making: Fill a 2 gallon cooler up to the 2/3 mark with some diced peelable fruit (oranges, lemons, bananas, pineapple, etc.) . Add the everclear (it should fill the coller to the top - if not, add water), and let sit for 36 hours. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Jungle Juice #3
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '2 can(s) Fruit Punch (Concentrate)', '8 cup(s) 7-Up']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a punch bowl and chill. When cool, drink and have fun.

Name: Jungle Juice #4
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Everclear', '2 can(s) Fruit Punch (Concentrate)', '8 cup(s) Sprite']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a punch bowl and chill. When cool, drink and have fun.

Name: Jungle Juice #7
Ingredients: ['1 2/3 cup(s) Rum', '1 Beer (Miller Light)', '4 cup(s) Orange Juice (Preferably Tropicana)', '3 cup(s) Pineapple Juice (Preferably Dole)', '2 cup(s) Ocean Spray Juice (Ruby Red)', '1 splash(es) Banana Liqueur (For flavour)']
Making: Combine over ice in a large punch bowl and serve in punch cups.

Name: Jungle Juice #8
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Bacardi Limon', '1 bottle(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Combine over ice in a large punch bowl. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Jungle Juice - Mount Style
Ingredients: ['3 bottle(s) Everclear', '1 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Bacardi Rum', 'Fruit Juice (Concentrate)', 'Apples (To taste)', 'Limes (To taste)', 'Oranges (To taste)', 'Pears (To taste)']
Making: Cut up all of the fruit, peeling is optional. Place it in a large Rubbermaid tub. Add the alcohol while stirring. Add ice and stir some more. Cover for at least five hours. Peel back the lid, stir again and serve with a ladle in punch cups.

Name: Kamakazi With A Twist
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Triple Sec', '1 cup(s) Vodka', '1 cup(s) Lime Juice', 'Iced Tea Mix (To taste)', 'Grenadine']
Making: Mix the contents in a large sealed container (I use a five-gallon camping container with a spout). Add iced tea mix to taste. The weaker the stomach, the more the iced tea mix. This really masks the alcohol taste and makes for a quite delicious beverage.

Name: Kentucky Cooler
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Lager', '1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '2 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Mix and serve. To make this more of a punch lower the amount of bourbon. Great when made in huge batches for barbecues.

Name: Kentucky Punch
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Bourbon Whiskey', '1 1/2 cup(s) Lemonade (Concentrate)', '1 1/2 cup(s) Orange Juice (Concentrate)', '1 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '8 cup(s) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Thaw both concentrates but do not dilute. Then mix all the ingredients -except soda- in a large punch bowl and chill. When thoroughly chilled add a block of ice in the bowl and stir in the soda. Serve in punch cups and garnish with slices of lemon, lime or orange. This punch makes approximately 30 servings.

Name: Kerry's Drunk Strawberry Punch
Ingredients: ['24 Strawberries', '2 bottle(s) Brandy', '6 bottle(s) Sparkling Wine', 'Ginger Ale', 'Tea (cold)', 'Fruit Juice']
Making: Soak the Strawberries in the brandy for approximately 1-2 weeks (they will turn white) Then put the strawberries and brandy in a large bowl and add the sparkling wine Taste the punch then add a smallish random amount of Ginger Ale, Cold Tea and Fruit Juice to the mixture until you get the flavour you want. Be warned don't eat too many strawberries, they are a bit like the worm in Tequilla!

Name: Kevorkian Kocktail
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Vodka', '1 quart(s) Brandy (Your favourite flavour)', '1 quart(s) Gin', '1 quart(s) Light Rum', '1 quart(s) Lambrusco (Preferably Riunite Lambrusco)', '6 can(s) Beer (12 oz. cans)', '3 gallon(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch (Or your favourite fruit juice)']
Making: Mix well over ice in a punch bowl, adding beer last.

Name: Killer Peach Punch
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Peach Schnapps', '2 cup(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) White Wine (The fruitier, the better)', '8 cup(s) Sprite', '6 can(s) Peaches (Or 1 bag of frozen peach wedges)']
Making: Mix all ingredients over ice cubes (at least 2 trays) in a punch bowl or a cooler with nozzle. Ingredients can be added or reduced to taste.

Name: Kookoo Juice
Ingredients: ['3 bottle(s) Vodka', '2 bottle(s) Rum', '1 bottle(s) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 bottle(s) Tequila', '1 bottle(s) Peach Schnapps', '1 bottle(s) Watermelon Pucker', '2 gallon(s) Sour Mix', '30 package(s) Kool-Aid (Any flavours)', '10 pound(s) Sugar']
Making: Mix in a -very- large container, add ice and water if desired.

Name: Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ["5 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '5 oz. Southern Comfort', '5 oz. Amaretto', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake it with ice. Add cranberry juice to taste. Tastes just like Kool Aid with a BITE!!

Name: Kryptonite #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 quart(s) Kool-Aid (Lime)']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into cocktail glasses or shot glasses.

Name: Kryptonite #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '7-Up']
Making: Pour Apple Pucker and Black Haus into a tall glass filled with ice. Top with 7-Up. Garnish with a lemon or lime wedge.

Name: La Mamila
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Tequila', '5 Caguamas Tecate', '4 Lemons', '32 oz. Clamato Juice', '2 squirt(s) Tabasco Sauce', '2 pinch(es) Salt']
Making: Place beer, sliced lemons, Tabasco, and salt into large container. Add tequila and Clamato juice and stir. Serves four to eight depending on constitution…

Name: Lamb's Wool
Ingredients: ['8 Apples (Sliced)', '2 quart(s) Beer', '1/4 cup(s) Butter', '1 cup(s) Sugar', '1/2 tsp. Nutmeg', '1/2 tsp. Ginger']
Making: Heat gently and serve in a parfait glass.

Name: Las Vegas Rum Runner
Ingredients: ['2 oz. White Rum', '2 oz. Dark Rum', '2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1 oz. Blackberry Liqueur', '3/4 cup(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a large glass 2/3-4/5 full of small to medium sized ice cubes. (the size and amount of ice is crucial.) Mix in the bannana and blackberry liquer then add the rum. Once all the ice and alcohol are in the glass it should appear to be 2/3-3/4 full. It is very potent but it tastes like candy. Top the glass of with strained pinnapple juice and stir well ... Enjoy.

Name: Lemon-berry Punch
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Vodka', '1/3 can(s) Lemonade frozen', '1/4 can(s) Berry Punch frozen', '2 cup(s) Water']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a pitcher over ice. Stir until frozen lemonade and frozen berry punch are dissolved. Pour into chilled martini glasses.

Name: Lethal Injection
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Everclear', '1 pint(s) Southern Comfort', '1 pint(s) Crown Royal', '60 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Just mix all ingredients together and chill. If possible place in freezer for 1/2 hour before serving. WARNING…. Drinkers will not be able to know how much alcohol is in this drink if the right amount of juice is added. Please tell them before they drink too much.

Name: Light Sangria with Pineapple
Ingredients: ['2 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 bottle(s) Ginger Ale (Small)', '2 cup(s) Apple Juice', '1 bottle(s) Dry White Wine', '1 cup(s) Pineapple (Cubes)', '1 Crab Apple']
Making: Dissolve the sugar in the apple juice. Add pineapple (you can also add the liquid from the pineapple tin). Peel and cut the apple. Mix all the ingredients except the Ale. Pour into bowl and add Ginger Ale and ice cubes.

Name: Limeade Crusher
Ingredients: ['Limeade', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Vodka', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum"]
Making: Add 1 1/2 cups of ice to a blender. Follow with pre-made limeade juice, Malibu, vodka and Parrot Bay. Blend until all ice is crushed finely. Pour mixture into a tall glass and garnish with a slice of lime.

Name: Limoncillo
Ingredients: ['3/4 gallon(s) Water', '1/2 bottle(s) Bacardi Limon', '2 package(s) Crystal Light (Lemon powder)']
Making: Mix together and serve in cocktail glasses over ice.

Name: Liquid Crack #1
Ingredients: ['3 quart(s) Vodka', '6 can(s) Lemonade (Frozen concentrate)', '6 can(s) Beer (Cheap)']
Making: Fill a large plastic container with ice and vodka. Then add the lemonade concentrate. Blend these two and crack the cans of beer into the tub while stirring. Colin says : this may sound like crap but it tastes like a sparkling lemonade and will tear up a party of about 15.

Name: Liquid Panty Remover #1
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Everclear', '1 bottle(s) Sprite', '2 bottle(s) Tropicana Twister', '2 package(s) Kool-Aid']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a large Gatorade type cooler. Serve over ice. This punch is great for frat parties or high school kids. I came up with this drink in 11th grade and believe me the name its!!!

Name: Liquid Panty Remover #2
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Everclear', '1 bottle(s) Sprite', '2 bottle(s) Tropicana Twister', '2 package(s) Kool-Aid']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a large cooler.

Name: Love Juice
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '3 can(s) Beer (12 oz. cans)', '2 can(s) Fruit Punch (Frozen concentrate)', '3 Lemons (Sliced)', '3 Limes (Sliced)']
Making: Put 5 lb of ice in a cooler and dig a well in the middle of the ice. Pour the frozen concentrate in the well, add the vodka and the beer. Mix well then add the chopped fruit. Cover and let stand for 15 mn, then stir and serve in punch cups.

Name: Loving Cup
Ingredients: ['16 oz. Claret', '2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '6 oz. Club Soda', '4 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Stir over ice cubes in a large pitcher. Garnish with fruit of the season, sprigs of mint and two rinds of cucumber and serve in large wine glasses. This punch makes approximately 6 servings.

Name: LSC Ruby Electric Gelatin
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) Gelatin (Lemon lime flavour)', '2 cup(s) Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Mix and pour into 4 collins glasses. Chill for 1 1/2 hours then serve with a straw.

Name: Mad Hawaiian
Ingredients: ['9 oz. Tequila', '1 gallon(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '2 bottle(s) Mad Dog 20/20']
Making: Put some ice into a large punch bowl. Pour in Tequila and the Mad Dog 20-20. Briskly pour the gallon of Hawaiian Punch into the bowl so it mixes well. Add pineapple rings to garnish and serve over ice.

Name: Maddognoceanspray
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Sparkling Wine (Maddog 20/20)', '1 bottle(s) Ocean Spray Juice']
Making: Combine over ice and serve in wine glasses.

Name: Maidenhead Punch
Ingredients: ['2 bottle(s) Champagne (2 - 26oz. bottles)', '1 bottle(s) Gin (1 - 26oz. bottle)', '1 bottle(s) Strawberry Schnapps (1 - 13oz. bottle)', '1 bottle(s) 7-Up (1 - 2 litre bottle)', '2 can(s) Cranberry Juice (Concentrate - thawed)', '2 Lemons (Sliced)', '1 can(s) Maraschino Cherries']
Making: Mix the liquor in a punch bowl, stir in the 7-Up and the cranberry concentrate. Slice up the lemons, float the slices and the cherries in the punch. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Malibu Rum Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Malibu Rum', '1 bottle(s) Spiced Rum (Preferably spiced red rum)', '1 bottle(s) Grape Juice (Sparkling)', '1 can(s) Maraschino Cherries (Or one jar)', 'Orange Juice (To taste)', 'Pineapple Juice (To taste)', 'Peach Juice (To taste)']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a large container. Pour in a glass of ice, add just enough maraschino cherry juice to taste and stir well. Serve in punch cups and garnish every cup with a cherry.

Name: Malibu Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Malibu Rum', '1 bottle(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 bottle(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 bottle(s) Orange Juice', '1 bottle(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Combine the bottle of Malibu and the juices to taste in a large punch bowl. Top with the ginger ale and stir. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Malihini Punch
Ingredients: ['2 quart(s) Orange Juice', "1/2 cup(s) Lilikoi Syrup (Hawaiian Plantation's)", "1/2 cup(s) Guava Syrup (Hawaiian Plantation's)"]
Making: Combine orange juice, Lilikoi syrup and guava syrup, blend well. Chill. Serve over ice cubes.

Name: Mardi Gras Madness
Ingredients: ['40 oz. Grape Juice', '48 oz. Pineapple Juice (unsweetened)', '1 bottle(s) Lemon Lime Soda', '26 oz. Vodka']
Making: Place an ice ring in the bottom of a punch bowl. Add liquids in order given. Float slices of oranges and limes on top. Makes 8-9 quarts. Now you can party Louisiana style!

Name: Marks Matrix
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Spiced Rum', '1 bottle(s) Lemonade', '1 bottle(s) Archers Peach Schnapps', '1 large can(s) Coconut Milk', '1 Lime']
Making: Pour the alcoholic ingredients into a large punch bowl. Then add 2 parts spiced rum to 1 part Archers. Then add the Lemonade and the coconut milk. To finish add the juice of the lime and add some of the peel to add a tangy taste. Ideal for the summer.

Name: Mean Green
Ingredients: ['1 large bottle(s) Vodka', '2 can(s) Lime Mix', '12 can(s) Light Beer']
Making: Mix in a cooler and add ice. Drink or bottle.

Name: Midori Punch
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Midori', '1 bottle(s) Sparkling Wine (Brut)', '4 cup(s) Pineapple Juice (Unsweetened)', '2 cup(s) Fresh Fruit (Or canned and diced)', '5 Strawberries']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in punch bowl with lots of ice.

Name: Mike Gill's Grog
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Light Rum', '1 cup(s) Brandy', '1/2 cup(s) Kummel', '1/2 cup(s) Benedictine', '1/2 cup(s) Falernum', '1 pint(s) Orange Juice', '4 cup(s) Spring Water', '1/2 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '1 cup(s) Pineapple (In chunks)']
Making: Heat all the ingredients in a saucepan until simmering. Serve in warmed mugs with a pineapple cube.

Name: Miscarriage
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Cuervo Tequila', '1/5 gallon(s) Absolut Vodka', '1/5 gallon(s) Bacardi White Rum', "1/5 gallon(s) Seagram's Gin", '1 bottle(s) Long Island Iced Tea Mix', '4 cup(s) Coca Cola', '2 Lemons', 'Maraschino Cherries (In syrup with the stems)']
Making: Mix alcohol, collins brand Long-Island Iced Tea Mix, Coca-Cola, the juice of one lemon, and two or three tablespoons of a maraschino cherry syrup in a punchbowl or iced tea jar with a spigot. Cut the remaining lemon into thin slices and add to the punch. Mix ingredients. Serve over ice with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Mississippi Mudslide
Ingredients: ['1/3 cup(s) Kahlua', '1/4 cup(s) Baileys Irish Cream', '2 cup(s) Milk']
Making: Blend with 2 cups of ice until the mixture has an icy consistency (if you want to make it stronger, you can add 1/4 cup vodka or Everclear). Serve and drink before the ice waters down.

Name: Mock Pink Champagne #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '1 1/2 cup(s) Water', '1/2 cup(s) Orange Juice', '2 cup(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '2 bottle(s) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Boil sugar and water until sugar dissolves, cool. Stir cranberry, pineapple, orange juices. Chill. Just before serving, add carbonated beverage.

Name: Mock Pink Champagne #2
Ingredients: ['3 quart(s) Ginger Ale', '1 gallon(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '1 quart(s) Lemon Juice', '2 pound(s) Sugar', '1 quart(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine all but Ginger Ale and ice. Chill. Add Ginger Ale and ice before serving.

Name: Mock Pink Champagne #3
Ingredients: ['3 quart(s) Ginger Ale', '1 gallon(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '1 quart(s) Lemon Juice', '2 pound(s) Sugar', '1 quart(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix in a punch bowl.

Name: Moose Milk (November 11th Punch - Canada)
Ingredients: ["40 oz. Dark Rum (Preferably Lamb's)", '26 oz. Kahlua', '32 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', '2 tbsp. Nutmeg', '2 tbsp. Vanilla Extract', '24 cup(s) Milk']
Making: In large punch bowl or pail, mix the rum and the Kahlua with nutmeg and vanilla, and add the milk. Then start adding the ice cream, stir a bit and let melt. This is a Remembrance day special and it carries a punch.

Name: Mountain Screw Party Punch
Ingredients: ['144 gallon(s) Mountain Dew', '1 pint(s) Vodka', '2 gallon(s) Crystal Light (Lemon Lime)']
Making: Mix together in punch bowl with ice. Serves approx. 14 people.

Name: Mulled Wine
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Water', '1 cup(s) Sugar', '12 Cloves', '2 Cinnamon Sticks', '1 Lemon Peel', '3 cup(s) Red Wine', '1/4 cup(s) Brandy']
Making: Simmer 3 cups of water with sugar, cloves, cinnamon sticks and a lemon peel in a stainless steel pot for 10 minutes. Add wine heated to a 'coffee temperature' then add the brandy.

Name: MutherF**ker
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Everclear', '1 can(s) Five Alive (Concentrate)', '8 cup(s) Sprite', '32 oz. Gatorade (Lemon Ice)']
Making: Blend the Everclear, the frozen Five Alive concentrate and the Gatorade. Pour the mixture in a pitcher or a bowl and add the Sprite.

Name: Mysti Ice
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Strawberry Daiquiri Mix']
Making: Blend the alcohol with 10 cubes, then add the strawberry mix and blend again until the ice is crushed. Pour in 5 cocktail glasses.

Name: Nectarine Delight
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Whiskey', '3 Nectarines (Peeled and diced)', '2 1/2 tbsp. Sugar']
Making: Blend, add ice and blend some more until the ice is crushed. Serve in punch cups.

Name: New Zealand Shark Attack
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Champagne', '10 oz. Blue Curacao', '10 oz. Malibu Rum', '10 oz. Bacardi Rum', '10 oz. Green Ginger Wine (optional but recommended.)', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Nectarine (juice from canned fruit)']
Making: Mix in bowl with ice. Great for summer!

Name: Nicaraguan Negroni Punch
Ingredients: ['15 oz. Campari', '10 oz. Flor de Cana 7 Year Old Rum', '7 1/2 oz. Cinzano Rosso Vermouth', '10 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '2 1/2 oz. Honey']
Making:
Combine juice of ten lemons and 30 cloves in a tupperware container or cake mold and freeze. Combine all ingredients in a large punch bowl with flavored iced block.
Created by mixologist Jon Gasparini of Rye on the Road

Name: Nik's Mai Tai Punch
Ingredients: ['15 oz. Light Rum', '15 oz. Dark Rum (Or golden)', '3 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1 bottle(s) Collins Mix (1 - 33 oz. bottle)', '1 bottle(s) Lemon Juice (1 - 33 oz. Bottle and preferably bitter lemon)', 'Maraschino Cherry Juice']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a large punch bowl or pitcher. The cherry juice is mainly for colour, leave it out if you want. Adjust the rum, using more or less to taste.

Name: Ninja Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Southern Comfort', '1 bottle(s) Absolut Vodka', "1 bottle(s) Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 can(s) Fruit Punch (concentrate)', '1 bottle(s) Fruit Punch', '2 bottle(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a large mixing pot with ice. Serve and it is party time!

Name: Null & Void Punch
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Vodka', '2 cup(s) Wildberry Schnapps', '2 cup(s) Peach Schnapps', '1 cup(s) Southern Comfort', '8 cup(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Mix with ice in a Tupperware dish pan. Serve in 16 oz. glasses (with caution).

Name: Null and Void
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 pint(s) Wildberry Schnapps', '1 pint(s) Peach Schnapps', '1/2 bottle(s) Southern Comfort', '8 cup(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Mix and serve in a highball glass.

Name: Old Fashioned Rum Punch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 oz. Sugar', '3 oz. Rum', '4 oz. Water']
Making: Mix and serve in a highball glass. For a larger serving just keep the same ratio.

Name: On the Deck Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Canadian Mist (1-75cl. bottle)', '8 cup(s) Lemon Lime Soda', '2 cup(s) Grape Juice', '1 cup(s) Lime Juice (Fresh)', 'Ginger Ale']
Making: Combine Canadian Mist, grape juice and lemon juice in a punch bowl and chill. Before serving, add some ice, the lemon lime soda and the ginger ale. Garnish with lime slices

Name: One WayTrip To The Bathroom
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Scotch', '3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Spiced Rum', '2 drop(s) Strawberry Extract']
Making: Mix all together and serve.

Name: Orange Jewelius
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Vodka', '2 cup(s) Orange Juice', '2 cup(s) Milk', '1/2 cup(s) Sugar (Or to taste)', '1 splash(es) Vanilla Extract']
Making: Blend until frothy and serve with a straw.

Name: Original Mojo
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) 151 Proof Rum', '1 pint(s) Blackberry Brandy', '1 can(s) Budweiser Beer', '1 can(s) Coca Cola', '1 can(s) Orange Soda', '1 can(s) 7-Up', '2 can(s) Pineapple Juice (-16 oz. cans)']
Making: Chilled all the ingredients, then mix then well in a punch bowl or a large container. Serve in a tall glass with crushed ice and drink with a straw.

Name: Paint Can
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) 7-Up (1-2 litre bottle)', '1 can(s) Lemonade (Concentrate-thawed)', '1 can(s) Lime (Concentrate-thawed)']
Making: Combine over ice in a punch bowl and serve in punch cups.

Name: Paint Can Our Way
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '4 cup(s) 7-Up', '2 can(s) Limeade (Frozen concentrate)', 'Mint Leaves']
Making: Pour the ingredients in a clean paint can (one that has never been used!) and fill with ice. Put the lid on the can, wrap a Terry-cloth towel around it and shake. Shake util the towel sticks to the can (it will frost up). Pop the lid off of the can, it should literally shoot off of so be careful. Grab some straws and start drinking. Adam says it's a great party drink because everybody gets together to drink.

Name: Panty Dropper #3
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Everclear', '1/5 gallon(s) Rum (Clear)', '1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '2 gallon(s) Cranberry Juice', '2 gallon(s) Orange Juice', 'Fruit (Your favourite)']
Making: Mix it all together in a clean trash bucket, add lots of ice, throw in a little fruit and enjoy. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Paradise #3
Ingredients: ['3 1/2 cup(s) Sprite', '2 1/2 cup(s) Sunny Delight Orange Juice', '1 1/2 cup(s) Cranberry-Raspberry Juice (Or Cranberry-Strawberry Juice where available)', '1/2 oz. Pink Lemonade (Powder)', 'Vodka']
Making: In a 2 litres pitcher, pour the pink lemonade, then the other non-alcoholic ingredients. Serve in a cup with vodka to taste. You can also add Snapple Peach Iced Tea and root beer to the mix.

Name: Party Punch
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Pineapple Juice (Unsweetend and chilled)', '2 bottle(s) Ginger Ale (Chilled)', '3 quart(s) Sherbet (Raspberry - softened)']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.

Name: Party Slush Punch #1
Ingredients: ['46 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 bottle(s) Vodka', '46 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '4 cup(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Mix ingredients together, freeze to slush consistency and serve.

Name: Party Slush Punch #2
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Whiskey', '6 oz. Lemonade (Frozen)', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice (Frozen)', '6 oz. Orange Juice (Frozen)', '1 bottle(s) 7-Up']
Making: Put the ingredients into a container in the freezer (stir occasionally while freezing). To serve: Put 2/3 slush to 1/3 7-Up in collins glasses or the same ratio in a punch bowl.

Name: Party Slush Punch #3
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Strawberries (Frozen)', '7 cup(s) Water', '12 oz. Orange Juice (Frozen)', '2 cup(s) Tea', '12 oz. Lemonade (Frozen)', '1 1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '3 cup(s) White Rum', '7-Up']
Making: Mix the following ingredients together and freeze. When slushy, drink as is or mix with 7-Up.

Name: Passion Punch
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '1 part(s) Skyy Infusions Passion Fruit Vodka', '1/2 part(s) Passion Fruit Nectar', 'Champagne']
Making: Top with Champagne, serve in a flute.

Name: Passions Flames Punch
Ingredients: ['6 cup(s) Everclear', "3 cup(s) Jack Daniel's Whiskey", "6 oz. Jack Daniel's Country Cocktail (Blackberry Jack)", "6 oz. Jack Daniel's Country Cocktail (Tropical Punch Jack)", '2 bottle(s) Cooler (Seagrams wild strawberry daquiri wine cooler)', '2 bottle(s) Cooler (Seagrams wild berries wine cooler)', '1 bottle(s) Cooler (Seagrams wild berry pina colada wine cooler)', '2 can(s) Bacardi Rum Runner Drink Mix', '1 gallon(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch (Red)', 'Fruit (Apples, oranges, strawberries, watermelon, pineapple)']
Making: Slice the fruit and place the slices in a large, clean, cooler. Make sure the slices are not too small. Pour the everclear and other the alcoholic ingredients in and mix well with your hands. Then add the Hawaiian punch and rum runner drink mixes. Again mix well. Let sit for at least 2 days (if not more) in cool area. Good for up to three weeks if kept cool. Serve well chilled in punch cups, eat the fruit and get ready to feel passion's flames.

Name: Patriots Punch
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', 'Pink Lemonade']
Making: Pour Bacardi Limon into a punch glass. Add strawberry liqueur and fill with pink lemonade. Add a slice of lemon and a cherry. Enjoy. GO PATS!

Name: Paul's Mud Slide
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '5 oz. Irish Cream', '5 oz. Kahlua', '1 pint(s) Vanilla Ice Cream', 'Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Blend and serve in sundae glasses. Drizzle with chocolate syrup.

Name: PC Hunch Punch
Ingredients: ['7 cup(s) Everclear', '7 cup(s) Vodka', '4 gallon(s) Fruit Punch', '3 gallon(s) Strawberry Punch', '3 Oranges (Sliced)', '3 Apples (Sliced)', 'Sugar (1 small bag or to taste)']
Making: Mix ingredients in a large cooler starting with liquor first. When thoroughly mixed, add fruit and a bag of ice! Great for parties! You can add as much fruit as you like, and any type you prefer.

Name: Peachuila Sunrise
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Tequila Gold', '4 oz. Pina Colada Mix', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 oz. Strawberry Mix']
Making: Blend with 2 cups of ice until it slushes.

Name: Pepperidge Scorcher
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Tequila Gold', '12 oz. Strawberry Mix', '2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '4 dash(es) Salt', '4 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Blend ingredients with ice until slush., then serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with one cheese goldfish (cracker) and do not swallow until the last sip of the drink (very important).

Name: Peppermint Fizz
Ingredients: ['6 1/2 oz. 7-Up', '1 1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Pour over crushed ice in a highball glass.

Name: Phillippeans Mojo
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Rum', '4 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Amaretto', '4 oz. Gin (Optional)', '2 can(s) Beer', '1 can(s) Sprite', '8 oz. Orange Juice', '8 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix all the ingredients into a large pitcher, add ice and serve in punch cups. It tastes just like Kool-Aid, but knocks you on your ass.

Name: Pierce's Powerful Punch
Ingredients: ['7 cup(s) Vodka (Cheap vodka)', '4 cup(s) Everclear', '1 pint(s) Malibu Rum', '24 cup(s) Sprite', '12 cup(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '12 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '4 cup(s) Orange Juice (Of good quality)', '6 can(s) Mango Juice', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid (Tropical flavour)', "1 can(s) Berry Punch (Preferably Welch's)", 'Fruit (See details in "Instructions")']
Making: Fruit: cut 1 pineapple in chunks; peel and slice in wedges 4 limes, 4 lemons and 2 oranges; wash and pull of the stems 1 lb. of grapes. Place all the fruit in a an airtight container, add the everclear and refrigerate overnight. The next day, strain the everclear over ice in a large container and add all the other ingredients -except fruit. Stir well and seal tight. Put the macerated fruit in a punch bowl with some ice and add a little punch for snacks and garnishes.

Name: Piledriver
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Grain Alcohol (PGA)', '1 can(s) Five Alive']
Making: Mix with ice and serve in collins glasses.

Name: Pineapple Punch
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Red Wine', '5 oz. Tea (Strong)', '3 1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 2/3 oz. Rum', '1 Lemon Juice', '1/5 pound(s) Sugar', '2/5 pound(s) Pineapple (Chunks)', '1 2/3 oz. Sherry']
Making: Put the pineapple pieces in a punch bowl and pour the sherry over them. Chill for 2 hours. Put tea and sugar in a pot, add red wine, lemon juice and rum. Heat but do not boil the mixture. Pour over the pineapple pieces.

Name: Pink Elephant Punch
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Strawberry Juice', '1 1/2 cup(s) Coconut Milk unsweetened', '1 1/2 cup(s) Vodka', '3/4 cup(s) Amaretto', '3/4 cup(s) Grenadine']
Making: Fill large pitcher or punch bowl halfway with ice. Add all ingredients and stir well. Serve over ice in small glasses.

Name: Pink Fe Fe
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Absolut 100 Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Cherry 7-Up', '1 bottle(s) Country Time Lemonade']
Making: Jst mix, drink and enjoy!

Name: Pink Flash
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '6 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Triple Sec', '1 package(s) JELLO (Cherry Flavoured)', '1/4 cup(s) Sugar', '2 tbsp. Strawberry Jam (or Jelly)', '4 cup(s) Apple Juice', '4 cup(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a blender with some ice. Blend until smooth and pour into a glass.

Name: Pink Juice
Ingredients: ['Country Time Lemonade (Pink)', '2 oz. Smirnoff Vodka']
Making: Make a quart of Pink Lemonade. Chill with ice. Pour into chilled cocktail glasses. Add vodka and stir. Enjoy 'pink juice'!

Name: Pink Panther #2
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Everclear', '2 bottle(s) Tom Collins Mix', '1 bottle(s) Ginger Ale (1-2 litre bottle)', '2 quart(s) Pink Lemonade']
Making: Combine over ice in a large punch bowl. Makes 2 gallons. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Pink Panty
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum (Or to taste)', '2 cup(s) 7-Up', '1 can(s) Pink Lemonade (Frozen)']
Making: Blend with ice until slushy and serve in collins glasses.

Name: Pink Panty Dropper
Ingredients: ['1/2 gallon(s) Vodka', '12 can(s) Beer', '7 can(s) Pink Lemonade (Concentrate)']
Making:
Combine over half a bag of ice in a large clean cooler and stir with a ladle. Serve in punch cups.
Plan on having a crowd over this weekend and looking for a drink that will not only quench their thirst, but will also taste good and really loosen everyone up? Then why not try the Pink Panty Dropper.
The Pink Panty Dropper is a large punch-style libation that features an odd combination of ingredients that work surprisingly well together. As the name suggests, the Pink Panty Dropper, when consumed in large quantities, may just loosen you up--and could quite possibly make you and those around you lose some of those pesky inhibitions!
Before you flinch when you hear the ingredients, keep in mind that those who have tried this interesting punch enjoy it and have a hard time having just one cup. To make the Pink Panty Dropper, start with a large container and add in beer, vodka, and Pink Lemonade (either concentrate or pre-made liquid). Another variation of the recipe calls for tequila and Everclear instead of the vodka. But, the recipe you choose all depends on your personal taste.
You might think that the ingredients are enough to make a really great punch. But, if you want to enhance your Pink Panty Dropper experience, add some lemon slices for extra added flavor. Helpful hint when making a batch of Pink Pantry Dropper punch--make it a few hours ahead of time and let it sit so that the flavors really marry before you serve it to your thirsty crowd.

Name: Pink Panty Droppers
Ingredients: ['7 cup(s) Vodka', '7 cup(s) Gin', '7 cup(s) Rum', '3 cup(s) Vodka', '36 can(s) Beer', '10 quart(s) Pink Lemonade']
Making: Combine in a clean garbage can, pouring the beer first, then the liquor, then the pink lemonade. Mix well.

Name: Pink Panty Pull Down
Ingredients: ['1 package(s) Pink Lemonade (mix)', '4 cup(s) Vodka', '4 cup(s) Water']
Making: Make lemonade according to directions except substitute half the water necessary for vodka.

Name: Pink Panty Pull Downs
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sprite', '3 tsp. Pink Lemonade']
Making: Pour the vodka into a cup. Add ice. Add the Sprite. Add a little more ice. Add the pink lemonade. Mix well. Add more ice if needed.

Name: Pink Panty Pulldowns
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Sprite', '2 cup(s) Pink Lemonade Mix', '2 cup(s) Vodka']
Making: Mix well and serve.

Name: Pink Panty Remover
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Grain Alcohol (PGA)', '2 pinch(es) Pina Colada Mix', "1 pint(s) Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '2 gallon(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Mix together in big bucket pour over ice and ENJOY! Add crushed pineapple wedges for a garnish.

Name: Ponche de Pina (pineapple punch)
Ingredients: ['3 Pineapples', '3 cup(s) Water', '3 Cinnamon Sticks', '2 tsp. Cloves', '2 tsp. Allspice', '3/4 cup(s) Sugar', '1 cup(s) Coconut Milk', '1 quart(s) White Rum']
Making: Peel pineapples, chop or shred. Add water and let stand overnight. Put in large saucepan with spices, sugar, and coconut milk. Boil for 5 minutes. Strain liquid into large pitcher. Add rum and serve hot.

Name: Pond Water
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Everclear', '1 bottle(s) Ginger Ale', '1 gallon(s) Orange Juice', 'Candies (Assorted Starburst Chews)']
Making: Mix in a punch bowl and add Starburst Chews.

Name: Poor Man's Punch
Ingredients: ['6 2/3 oz. Tequila (Or vodka)', '2 cup(s) Fruit Juice', '2 cup(s) Lemonade', 'Red Wine (Optional)']
Making: Mix and pour over ice in a large punch bowl. If you are low on fruit juice, mix half fruit juice with 1 cup of cordial (which is great to change the colour), add extra lemonade or water to taste. The idea is not to be afraid of what you add, or what it looks like afterwards, because a punch which a standard base will taste great with any well thought additions.

Name: Poppa Cloud's Blender Drinks
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Vodka', '2 can(s) Limeade (Preferably Minute Maid Limeade)', '1 can(s) Sprite']
Making: Blend with ice and serve into collins glasses.

Name: Porch Climber
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Vodka', '1 can(s) Lemonade (Frozen concentrate)', '2 can(s) Beer (5% alcohol beer is best)']
Making: Mix well in a pitcher, fill collins glasses with ice and pour in the mixture.

Name: Powell Party Punch
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Orange Juice (frozen concentrate)', '1 can(s) Pineapple Juice (frozen concentrate)', '1 can(s) Rum', '1 can(s) Malibu Rum', '1/2 can(s) Banana Liqueur', '6 can(s) Water']
Making: Pourinto a punch bowl. Use on eof the frozen juice cans to measure the alcohol. Garnish with orange slices.

Name: Purple Cow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '6 oz. Cranberry Juice', '6 oz. Grape Juice']
Making: Mix and serve on the rocks in a tall glass.

Name: Purple Jesus
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Ginger Ale', '1 part(s) Grape Juice concord']
Making: Mix equal amounts in large punchbowl with ice block. Float lemon slices in punch.

Name: Purple Jesus #1
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Everclear', '1 quart(s) Grape Juice']
Making: Mix and serve at a party.

Name: Purple Jesus #3
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Ginger Ale (1-2 litre bottle)', '1 bottle(s) Grape Juice (Preferably Concord grape juice)']
Making: Mix over ice in a punch bowl. Stir well and serve in punch cups.

Name: Purple Passion #2
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Everclear', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid (Grape)']
Making: Mix Kool-Aid and water in a 2 quarts container and add the everclear. Shake well and serve cold.

Name: Purple Passion #3
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Smirnoff Vodka', '20 oz. Sprite', '20 oz. 7-Up', '1 quart(s) Orange Juice', '1 quart(s) Grape Juice', '1 can(s) Cherries (Or 1 jar - with the juice)', '1 Lemon (Sliced)', '1 Lime (Sliced)']
Making: Combine over ice in a large punch bowl, adding sodas last. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Queen's Blood Rush
Ingredients: ["1 bottle(s) Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '4 bottle(s) Grape Soda', '1 cup(s) Grenadine', 'Sherbet (Lemon)']
Making: Mix all the ingredients together in a large punch bowl, adding the lemon sherbert last. Stir vigourously.

Name: Quick Fix
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Malibu Rum', '1/5 gallon(s) Southern Comfort', '1/5 gallon(s) Peach Schnapps', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Combine in a pitcher and top off with orange juice and pineapple juice.

Name: Raspberry Sherbet Punch
Ingredients: ['1/2 gallon(s) Sherbet (Raspberry)', '8 cup(s) Ginger Ale', '33 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine all together and serve.

Name: Rattlesnake
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Yukon Jack', '4 cup(s) Sweet and Sour Mix', '5 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix and freeze until slushy. Serve in cocktail glasses or shot glasses.

Name: Red Rocket
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Seagram's Gin", 'Mountain Dew Code Red']
Making: Fill a highball glass half full with ice. Add the gin. Fill the rest of the glass with Code Red. Quite Tasty.

Name: Red Rooster
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Vodka', '1 1/2 quart(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 can(s) Orange Juice (Frozen concentrate- thawed)']
Making: Combine in a large container and freeze for several hours. It will not freeze solid, but rather achieve the consistency of a slushy. Scoop into punch cups or wine glasses and serve.

Name: Red Vodka Code
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Mountain Dew Code Red']
Making: Mix in a punch bowl with ice.

Name: Rhine Wine Cup
Ingredients: ['16 oz. White Wine', '2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '6 oz. Club Soda', '4 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Stir over ice cubes in a large pitcher. Garnish with fruit of the season, sprigs of mint and two rinds of cucumber and serve in large wine glasses. This punch makes approximately 6 servings.

Name: Rigor Mortis
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Malibu Rum', '1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '2 quart(s) Pineapple Juice', '2 quart(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Pour over ice into a large punch bowl and serve in cups. With such a fruity taste you will not realize what hit you.

Name: Royal Pomme Punch
Ingredients: ['3/4 bottle(s) Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine', '12 oz. Apple Brandy', '24 dash(es) Angostura Bitters', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '12 oz. Champagne']
Making: Add Dubonnet, apple brandy, orange juice and bitters to a pitcher filled with ice. Stir and strain into a chilled punch bowl. Garnish with a block of ice (use a small Tupperware container as the mold; pull the block out of the freezer 15 minutes before use to allow it to thaw sufficiently to remove it from the mold). Top with champagne and serve. Makes 12 servings.

Name: Royal Rumble
Ingredients: ['8 oz. Gin', '11 oz. Beer', '16 oz. Orange Soda', '1 Egg']
Making: Blend for 3 minutes and serve.

Name: Rum Punch #2
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Bacardi Dark Rum', '8 cup(s) Guava Juice', '12 wedge(s) Lime']
Making: Combine over ice into a punch bowl and stir well. Serve in punch cups and add 2 lime wedges in each cup.

Name: Russian Brunch
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Vodka', '8 cup(s) Orange Juice', '3 cup(s) Champagne']
Making: Mix vodka and orange juice in blender with ice. Add champagne and stir.

Name: Russian Slut
Ingredients: ['26 oz. Smirnoff Vodka (Preferably Smirnoff Black Label Vodka)', 'Soda (Preferably from a Seven-Eleven soda fountain)']
Making: Pour the vodka in a one gallon jug, then run to the Seven-Eleven down the street and fill it with a mix of whatever soda they have on tap. Put the lid on the jug and shake well. Serve chilled and over ice into punch cups.

Name: Russian Tea
Ingredients: ['8 cup(s) Water', '5 Tea Bags', '1 cup(s) Sugar', '16 oz. Orange Juice', '8 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Cloves (Whole)']
Making: First make tea in the water. Then add all the other ingredients. SIMMER at least 1/2 hour. Makes a nice smell in the kitchen at Christmas parties.

Name: Sake Sangria
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Sake cold', '1 1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '4 oz. Simple Syrup', '6 slice(s) Orange', '6 slice(s) Lemon', 'Club Soda or Lemon Lime']
Making: Squeeze the fruit into a sangria pitcher, then add the rinds. Pour in cold Sake, Triple Sec, Apricot Brandy and Simple Syrup. Add ice to fill to 3 inches from the top. Fill with Club Soda or Lemon Lime Soda. Gently stir with a wooden spoon. Pour into wine glasses and garnish with fresh fruit slices.

Name: San Juan Fresco
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '2 oz. Bacardi O']
Making: Pour over ice in a punch glass.

Name: Sangria #1
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Red Wine', '2 cup(s) Ginger Ale', '3 oz. Pink Lemonade (Frozen)', '1/4 cup(s) Brandy', '1/4 cup(s) Triple Sec', '1 Orange (Juice of, fresh)', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Mix in a punch bowl and serve in a collins glass. Garnish with lemons, limes and cherries.

Name: Sangria #2
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Red Wine', '1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '1 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1 cup(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix all together and put in the refrigerator till cold. Garnish with cloves and cinnamon sticks.

Name: Sangria #4
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Red Wine', '1 cup(s) Gin', '1 cup(s) Brandy', '1 cup(s) Triple Sec']
Making: Mix in a punch bowl with sliced apples, oranges and pears.

Name: Sangria #5
Ingredients: ['2 bottle(s) Red Wine (Chilled)', '2 cup(s) Brandy (Chilled)', '2 cup(s) Triple Sec (Chilled)', '6 cup(s) Orange Juice (Chilled)', 'Sugar (To taste)', 'Fruit']
Making: Dice fruit (apples, oranges, etc.) and place in a large punch bowl. Add all the ingredients and leave to chill for six hours. Serves 12-14 people.

Name: Sangria (Elena'a)
Ingredients: ['20 cup(s) White Wine (Or 5 -1 litre bottles)', '8 cup(s) Tequila (Or rum)', '6 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '4 cup(s) Lemon Soda', '4 Apples (Diced)', '4 Pears (Diced)', 'Sugar']
Making: Combine everything in a large container and place in the fridge for 2 or 3 days. Serve in wine glasses and drink to Elena's health!

Name: Satan's Urine (With Chunks Of Fruit In It)
Ingredients: ['8 cup(s) Southern Comfort', '7 cup(s) Vodka', '4 cup(s) Gin', '4 cup(s) Fruit Punch (Schnapps)', "dash(es) Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '24 cup(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '8 cup(s) Kool-Aid (Grape flavour)', 'Sugar (To taste)', 'Apples', 'Oranges']
Making: Mix ingredients in a large tub or punch bowl. Cut up oranges and apples. Add to punch. Daego's note: Crucial: put a pint of vodka between the punch bowl and some drunk guy at the party, and he usually will do the rest of the mixing for you (it's been tested). Can be drank or used to power farm equipment. (I waive all liability, proceed with caution)

Name: Sauterne Cup
Ingredients: ['16 oz. Sauterne', '2 oz. Brandy', '1 tbsp. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Curacao', '6 oz. Club Soda', '4 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Stir over ice cubes in a large pitcher. Garnish with fruit of the season, sprigs of mint and two rinds of cucumber and serve in large wine glasses. This punch makes approximately 6 servings.

Name: Sauterne Punch
Ingredients: ['5 Lemons (Juice of, fresh)', '2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Applejack', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '2 dash(es) Yellow Chartreuse', '2 quart(s) Sauterne', '2 quart(s) Sparkling Water', 'Sugar (To taste)']
Making: Stir and garnish with fruit.

Name: Schneegestoeber
Ingredients: ['1/2 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Sparkling Wine', '2 cup(s) Peach Juice', '2 cup(s) Passion Fruit Juice', '4 cup(s) Vanilla Ice Cream']
Making: Put the juice and the vodka in a big vat, add the vanilla ice in small portions and stir it. When the ice is melted add the sparkling wine. Punch also known as Flurry Of Snow.

Name: Schnider
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Apple Cider', '1 part(s) Gin', '1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Rum']
Making: Shake in a mason jar and serve. Garnish with a slice of apple.

Name: Screaming Go Naked
Ingredients: ['24 can(s) Light Beer', '7 cup(s) Vodka', '3 can(s) Pink Lemonade (Frozen)']
Making: Slowly empty the beer (so as not to release all carbonation) in a larger cooler. Add the vodka, chop the 3 cans of frozen pink lemonade and mix. ENJOY!

Name: Seven Deadly Sins
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '3/4 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Apple Pucker', 'Papaya Juice', 'Orange Juice', '7-Up', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Fill a 16 oz. glass with ice. Pour in the vodka, Razzmatazz, Watermelon Pucker and Apple Pucker. Fill the glass with equal parts papaya juice, orange juice and 7-Up (or sour mix, depending on how sweet you like your drink).

Name: Sex on Barbados
Ingredients: ["1 cup(s) Admiral Nelson's Raspberry Rum", '1 cup(s) Arrow Peach Schnapps', '1 cup(s) Melon Liqueur', '1 cup(s) Arrow Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1 1/2 quart(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 1/2 quart(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Makes 1 gallon of punch - mix rum and all 3 Liqueurs in a large pitcher or punch bowl, add ice and fill rest with pineapple and cranberry juice.

Name: Sex With Meredith
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Raspberry Schnapps', '4 oz. Fruit Punch']
Making: This is a flexable drink. Add all the liquor together and then add the fruit punch. Adjust amounts to make larger batches.

Name: Shawn's Purple God
Ingredients: ['2 package(s) Kool-Aid (Grape)', '2 cup(s) Sugar', 'Vodka']
Making: Make this drink like normal Kool-Aid but substitute 1/2 of the water for vodka. Makes about a gallon. Serve either in punch cups or shot glasses.

Name: Sherry Cobbler
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Sherry', '2 cup(s) Water', '1 cup(s) Sugar', 'Pineapples', 'Lemons', 'Oranges']
Making: Mix well the sugar in a punch bowl with shaved ice, pineapple wedges, slices of lemon and orange (preferably more orange than lemon). Then add the water and the sherry and stir well. Serve in lowball glasses or goblets.

Name: Sigma Pi Jungle Juice
Ingredients: ['2 gallon(s) Vodka', '1 gallon(s) Everclear', '1 gallon(s) Peach Schnapps', '1/5 gallon(s) Spiced Rum', '25 gallon(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch (From concentrate or powder unsweetened)', '10 pound(s) Sugar', '5 pound(s) Apples (Halved)', '5 pound(s) Oranges (Halved)']
Making: Pour all the alcohol and the fruit into a clean 50 gallon trash can. Let sit for 30 minutes, then add the fruit punch, the sugar, 6 bags of ice, and stir well with clean broom handle. Serve in punch cups. This punch serves more than 150 people.

Name: Skeeter's Punch
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Everclear', '8 oz. Fruit Punch (Preferably Hi-C)', '1 Lemon', '1 Lime', 'Strawberries (Optional)', 'Grapes (Optional)']
Making: The night before the party, dice and soak all the fruits in the Everclear. The night of the party: Strain the Everclear but keep the fruits. Pour the Everclear into a 12 oz. cup. Top up with Hi-C. Mix, then take a straw and blow in the drink for 5 seconds (not hard, you don't want an eruption). Add diced fruit into the punch. Be careful, this is a lethal drink. 1 cup per hour even for heavy drinkers. Have fun!

Name: Skip And Go Riot
Ingredients: ['2 gallon(s) Everclear (Or vodka or rum)', '8 can(s) Pink Lemonade (Frozen concentrate)', 'Beer']
Making: In a CLEAN plastic garbage can lined with plastic bags taped to the side, add the ice, liquor and pink lemonade concentrate. Add beer from a keg to taste (it will take a lot!). Stir thoroughly. This will get 35-50 people nicely lit and ready to riot naked through the streets. Great for a house party.

Name: Skip It And Get Naked
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Beer', 'Vodka', '1 can(s) Limeade']
Making: Pour beer into a pitcher. Fill beer can with vodka and add it as well. Mix in limeade concentrate over ice.

Name: Skylab
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Everclear', '1/5 gallon(s) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/5 gallon(s) Blue Curacao', '1/5 gallon(s) Apricot Brandy', '1/2 gallon(s) Pineapple Juice', '1/2 gallon(s) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Mix all ingredients and put in a large jug, with ice, if desired. Skylabs are neon green in color, approximately 126 proof, and taste great. You can serve it in punch cups or shot glasses.

Name: SKYY Wicked Witch Apple Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Skyy Infusions Passion Fruit Vodka (750 ml)', '1 bottle(s) Apple Cider (750 ml)', '1 bottle(s) Cranberry Juice (64 oz.)', '1 bottle(s) Ginger Ale (1 Liter)', '2 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', 'Apple (Red)']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a large black witch’s cauldron with ice and stir. Garnish with large slices of red apple floating on top and dry ice.

Name: Slammer #1
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Bacardi Rum', '1 can(s) Country Time Lemonade']
Making: Mix in a 5 gallon jug with water and ice. Comments from John: This drink is really a great party drink because it can be adjusted to the party. You can add as much rum as you like because the taste will be undetectable.

Name: Slow Screw With A Twist
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Vodka', '2 can(s) Beer', '4 tbsp. Lemonade Mix']
Making: Mix and serve.

Name: Smashed Pumpkin
Ingredients: ['6 Orange', '16 oz. Citrus Vodka', '32 oz. Orange Juice (with pulp)']
Making: Peel the oranges and put in bottom of punch bowl (plastic pumpkin if you have one) and mash them with a potato masher (if you dont have a potato masher a blender will work just don't totally liquify the oranges). Add vodka and orange juice (just like a screwdriver).

Name: Smitthy's Special Punch
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Tom Collins Mix', '2 package(s) Kool-Aid (Black cherry)', '1 bottle(s) Mountain Dew (A 2 litre bottle)', '1 can(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour the vodka and the Kool-Aid in an empty 1 gallon jug and shake well. Add the Tom Collins Mix and fill the jug with Mountain Dew half way up handle. Then fill the handle 3/4 way with pineapple juice. There should be 1/4 left of handle when done. Shake Well. Best when very cold, and sat overnight. Serve in punch cups. You can change Kool-Aid for different flavours and occasions.

Name: Smooth Tickle
Ingredients: ['3/4 pint(s) Beer', '1/4 pint(s) Iced Tea', 'Sugar']
Making: Pour iced tea into a pint glass and add sugar until it is way too sweet. Add beer, stir gently until the sugar is no longer sitting on the bottom of the glass.

Name: Smuggler's Brew
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Dark Rum', '1/2 cup(s) Brandy', '4 cup(s) Tea', '1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '3 tbsp. Butter', '1/2 tsp. Nutmeg']
Making: Bring all the ingredients -except the brandy- to the boil. Heat the brandy until lukewarm and add to the mixture. Serve in mugs or heat-proof cups. This punch makes approximately 8 servings.

Name: Soju Bowl
Ingredients: ['36 oz. Soju', '8 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Sloe Gin']
Making: Fill a large mixing bowl 3/4 full of ice. Pour ingredients in and stir. Stick straws (2 per person for big drinkers) in for the desired amount of people so that you can all chug at one time. CHUG-A-LUG CHUG-A-LUG!

Name: Sour Pussy #2
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Vodka', '1 cup(s) Rum', '1 cup(s) Tequila', '1 cup(s) Whiskey', '1 cup(s) Brandy', '1 cup(s) Sangria', '1 cup(s) Grenadine', '1 bottle(s) Margarita Mix', '1 bottle(s) Squirt (1-2 litre bottle)', '2 Lemons (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Combine over ice in a large punch bowl. Serve in punch cups.

Name: Southern Country Lemonade
Ingredients: ["1 cup(s) Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 cup(s) Triple Sec', '1 cup(s) Sweet and Sour Mix (Lemon flavour)', '4 cup(s) Sprite']
Making: Mix all the ingredients, stir and serve over ice.

Name: Southern Punch
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Southern Comfort', '8 cup(s) 7-Up', '1 can(s) Lemonade (Frozen)', '1 can(s) Orange Juice (Frozen)']
Making: Mix over ice in a punch bowl. Garnish with slices of orange and lemon. (A great party drink)

Name: Southern Saturday
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Finlandia Cranberry Vodka', '1 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Slice']
Making: Pour Finlanda Cranberry Vodka into a highball glass. Add Southern Comfort and fill almost to the top with orange juice. Top with just a splash of slice and serve.

Name: Sparkling Holiday Punch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Dragon Berry Rum', '1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'Martini and Rossi Rose']
Making: Build in an ice filled glass. Top with Martini and RossiI Rose. Garnish with orange slices.

Name: Spartan Bowl
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Barton's Long Island Mix", '2 oz. Mr. Boston Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Mr. Boston Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a 64 oz. bowl with ice. Pour Barton's Long Island Mix, blue curacao, Melone and Bacardi 151. Fill with pineapple juice and optional fruit garnishes. Stir with straws and enjoy with friends. The idea is to drink it until it is gone without stopping if at all possible.

Name: Sperm
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Malibu Rum', '2 cup(s) Whipped Cream (Or to taste)']
Making: Blend the rum with ice. Add the whipped cream and blend until the mixture is loose enough to drink. Serve in a lowball glasses.

Name: Spiced Peach Punch
Ingredients: ['46 oz. Peach Nectar', '20 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 cup(s) Brown Sugar', '3 Cinnamon Sticks', '1/2 tsp. Cloves', '2 tbsp. Lime Juice']
Making: Heat gently.

Name: Spodie Odie Punch
Ingredients: ['26 oz. Vodka', '26 oz. Rum', "26 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '26 oz. Triple Sec', '6 large bottle(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '2 large bottle(s) 7-Up']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a huge ice chest filled with 3 bags of ice. Drink with a straw if you are brave.

Name: Springwater
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '1/5 gallon(s) Light Rum', '1/5 gallon(s) Gin', '1 pint(s) Everclear', '4 bottle(s) Squirt (4 two litre bottles)', '2 bottle(s) Sprite (2 two litre bottles)', '2 bottle(s) Mountain Dew (2 two litre bottles)', '8 Oranges (Sliced)', '8 Lemons (Sliced)', '8 Limes (Sliced)', '1 pound(s) Sugar']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a large tub or cooler and add ice. Serve in punch cups. This punch does not taste like alcohol but definitely has the effect.

Name: Sprite Bomb
Ingredients: ['8 cup(s) Sprite', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid (Any flavour)', 'Vodka']
Making: Pour the Sprite into a pitcher until it is down to the top of the label. Next pour the Kool-Aid into the Sprite bottle and put the cap on and shake it for 3-4 min. Let it sit for a while then take the cap off and fill the rest of the bottle with vodka. Then shake it a little more and just serve it in cups over ice.

Name: St Columba Goon Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Gin', '1 bottle(s) White Rum', '3 bottle(s) Vodka', '3 bottle(s) Champagne', '4 bottle(s) Wine (Fruity White)', '4 bottle(s) Ginger Ale', '2 gallon(s) Lemonade', '1 gallon(s) Orange Juice', '1 gallon(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 cup(s) Tea (Brewed strongly with 8 tea bags)']
Making: Pour into a clean garbage can and stir. Add fruit for garnish if desired.

Name: Stanley Cup
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Barton's Long Island Mix", '2 oz. Sloe Gin', '2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Fill bowl with ice. Pour Barton's Long Island Mix, sloe gin, Southern Comfort and Bacardi 151. Fill with equal parts cranberry juice and lemon lime soda. Add optional fruit garnishes if desired. Stir with straws and enjoy with friends. The idea is to drink it until it is gone without stopping if at all possible

Name: StoryTeller
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Peach Schnapps', '1 bottle(s) Vodka', "1 bottle(s) Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 bottle(s) Wildberry Schnapps', '8 cup(s) Ginger Ale', '8 cup(s) Sprite', '2 Bananas', '2 Peaches', '2 Apples', '2 Oranges', '2 Kiwis']
Making: Cut the fruit in little pieces (you can also add cherries) and place in a new plastic garbage can. Add the alcohol and let sit for 6 hours. Just before serving add the Sprite and ginger ale. Serve chilled in punch cups.

Name: Strawberry Bolle
Ingredients: ['9 cup(s) Moselle Wine (Chilled)', '3 cup(s) Champagne (Chilled)', '2 1/5 pound(s) Strawberries (Sliced)', '8 tbsp. Sugar']
Making: Sprinkle strawberries with sugar, add the Moselle wine and chill for several hours. To serve, pour into large bowl with ice, add the rest of the Moselle. Serve in small wine glasses.

Name: Strawberry Kristin
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Strawberry Schnapps', '1 cup(s) Mountain Dew', '1 cup(s) Margarita Mix (Cranberry-orange)']
Making: Stir over a block of ice in a punch bowl. Also makes a great cocktail.

Name: Strawberry Punch #1
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Strawberries (Frozen)', '2 quart(s) Lemonade', '1 pint(s) Sherbet (Lemon Lime)', '1 quart(s) Ginger Ale']
Making: Stir.

Name: Strawberry Punch #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 gallon(s) Sherbet (Strawberry)', '8 cup(s) 7-Up']
Making: Put the sherbet in a bowl and pour the 7-Up over the sherbet. Stir until the sherbet is melted. This makes a pretty pink punch. You can use diet soda for a punch that is less sweet.

Name: Strawberry Zin
Ingredients: ['5 oz. White Wine (Preferably Zinfandel)', '3 oz. Strawberry Mix', 'dash(es) Lime Juice (Or lemon juice)']
Making: Blend the strawberry mix, the lime juice and some ice until smooth. Add wine and pulse lightly to mix. Serve in a highball glass on a hot summer afternoon. According to David, this is the only respectable way to drink white Zinfandel.

Name: Strawberry Zinger Punch
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Strawberry Daiquiri Mix', '1 can(s) Bacardi Rum', '1 can(s) Vodka', '1 can(s) Lemon Lime Soda']
Making: Prepare Daiquiri mix as directed on can. Pour in large punch bowl. Add remaining ingredients and stir. Serve in a chilled glass.

Name: Strip 'n' Go Naked
Ingredients: ['48 oz. Beer (Your favourite)', '12 oz. Vodka', '1 can(s) Fruit Punch (Frozen)']
Making: Mixed together in large container. Enjoy!

Name: Strip N' Go Naked
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Rum', '3 cup(s) Vodka', '12 can(s) Budweiser Beer', '8 bottle(s) Cooler (Wine coolers)', '8 cup(s) 7-Up', '2 can(s) Lemonade (Frozen concentrate)']
Making: Pour all the ingredients into a 5 gallon container and shake well. Best served in a punch bowl over ice.

Name: Strip N' Go Naked 2
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Lemonade frozen', '1 Vodka equal portion', '3 bottle(s) Molson Canadian']
Making: Mix ingredients in a punch bowl. Chill and serve.

Name: Sulzanti
Ingredients: ['5 cup(s) Citrus Vodka', '5 cup(s) Sprite', '5 Lemons (Juice of, fresh)', '5 Limes (Juice of, fresh)', '5 dash(es) Vanilla Extract']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a large, shallow bucket with ice and serve in punch cups.

Name: Summer Beer
Ingredients: ['3 bottle(s) Zima', '1 pint(s) Vodka', '1 can(s) Limeade (Fozen)']
Making: Pour all the ingredients into a pitcher and serve over ice. If too strong, you can add water. Beer can be substituted for Zima if you wish. ENJOY!

Name: Sunny Bocks On The Rocks
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Beer (Preferably Shiner Bock)', '2 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 1/2 cup(s) Orange Juice', '7 oz. 7-Up', '2 splash(es) Lemon Juice', '9 oz. Beer (Heineken)', '6 oz. Mountain Dew', '1 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Mix well ingredients 1 to 5 in a cooler, and ingredients 6 to 8 in a separate container. Then combine both mixtures and serve with crushed ice.

Name: Sunny Holiday Punch
Ingredients: ['46 oz. Pineapple Juice (Chilled)', '28 oz. Club Soda (Chilled)', '6 oz. Orange Juice (Concentrate, thawed)', '1 slice(s) Lemon', '2 cup(s) Berries', '4 cup(s) 7-Up']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a punch bowl.

Name: Super Pepper
Ingredients: ['15 oz. Light Rum', '8 cup(s) Dr Pepper']
Making: Mix and serve chilled with ice.

Name: Super Skrue
Ingredients: ['1 gallon(s) Vodka', '3 cup(s) Everclear', '1 gallon(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix with ice in a large punch and serve in collins glasses.

Name: Surfin' Russian Kool-Aid Punch
Ingredients: ['1/4 cup(s) Kool-Aid (Berry Blue)', '2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Swamp Water
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Vodka', '8 cup(s) Collins Mix', '8 cup(s) Ginger Ale', '10 oz. Maraschino Cherries']
Making: Mix all the ingredients and let stand overnight. Swamp Water is best if it has a chance to mellow. Serve over ice. A note from Jack: Warning: Swamp Water can breed quite interesting results!!!

Name: Sweet - Tart
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Sunkist (1-2 litre bottle)', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid (Cherry - sweetened)', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid (Grape - sweetened)']
Making: Empty the Sunkist to the top of the label, fill it back up with vodka, carefully put the Kool-Aid in the Sunkist bottle (it will fizz up). Replace the cap, shake carefully. Put in the freezer for 15 to 30 min. Girls love this drink.

Name: Sweet Captain
Ingredients: ["1 part(s) Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '2 part(s) Sunny Delight Orange Juice']
Making: Combine and enjoy!

Name: Sweet Tart #4
Ingredients: ['1/2 pint(s) Everclear', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid Grape', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid Cherry', '1 bottle(s) Sunkist']
Making: Empty Sunkist Bottle to the top of the label. Pour in Everclear, Grape and Cherry Kool-Aid in order. Shake and enjoy a drink with a candy kick.

Name: Tequila Punch
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Tequila (Chilled)', '3 cup(s) Champagne (Chilled)', '3 cup(s) Sauterne (Chilled)', '8 cup(s) Fresh Fruit (Cubes or balls)', 'Simple Syrup (To taste)']
Making: Stir over ice cubes in a large punch bowl. This punch makes approximately 40 servings.

Name: The Ben Chemical
Ingredients: ['4 bottle(s) Irn-Bru (Must actually be WKD, an alcoholic irn-bru)', '2 bottle(s) Cider (Diamond White Cider)', '6 oz. Vodka', '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Empty the content of the bottles into a pitcher, then add the vodka and the Red Bull. Top up with ice, stir. Serve in 33 cl. glass and enjoy, while you can remember!

Name: The Force
Ingredients: ['3 can(s) Budweiser Beer', '1 can(s) Vodka', '1 can(s) Pink Lemonade']
Making: Use the can of the pink lemonade to measure the can of vodka and the can of Bud. Mix in a pitcher. Big Head's note: Gets you wrecked and you can't taste the alcohol.

Name: The God Damn Waterbeetle
Ingredients: ['1 gallon(s) Vodka', '1/2 pint(s) Everclear', '1 bottle(s) Strawberry Hill', '1 gallon(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '1 quart(s) Orange Juice', '1 bottle(s) Mountain Dew']
Making: Just mix in a bucket and have fun! Youll Wuv It Too!

Name: The Love Connection
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Vodka', '8 cup(s) Pink Lemonade', 'Peach Schnapps (To taste)']
Making: Stir with ice in a large punch bowl.

Name: The Manic Depressive
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1 oz. Goldschlager', '2 oz. Gin (Optional)', 'Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour into a 32 oz. cup and add 1 cup of ice. Top with Mountain Dew.

Name: The Real Jungle Juice
Ingredients: ['2 cup(s) Bacardi Rum', '1/2 cup(s) Everclear', '4 can(s) Pineapple Juice', '3 can(s) Limeade (Diluted with 3 cans of water)', '3 Oranges (Diced)', '3 Limes (Diced)', '1 can(s) Pineapple (Chopped)']
Making: Combine over ice in a large punch bowl. Stir well, and serve in punch cups.
