Name: The Real Purple Jesus
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Everclear', '12 oz. Vodka', '1 quart(s) Fruit Punch', '1 bottle(s) 7-Up', '1 can(s) Cherries', '1 cup(s) Grapes', '1 cup(s) Apples']
Making: Add all ingredients. into a large punch bowl and refrigerate for 24 hrs. Then enjoy your drink. Refrigerating this drink for 24 hours prior it allows the fruit to absorb the alcohol. So be aware of how much fruit you eat.

Name: The Wok
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Archers Peach Schnapps', '1 bottle(s) Martini and Rossi Bianco (Optional)', '4 bottle(s) Hoopers Hooch (Lemon)', '3/4 pint(s) Pineapple Juice', '1/4 pint(s) Ribena (Blackcurrant and apple)', '1/4 pint(s) Coca Cola', '1 Apple (Or to taste - sliced)', '12 Strawberries (Or to taste - sliced)', '1 tbsp. Sugar']
Making: Pour all the ingredients in a wok and stir well. Drink in small cups.

Name: The Works
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Amaretto', '1/2 bottle(s) Vodka', '2 can(s) Fruit Juice (Frozen)', '1 can(s) Pineapple (chunks)']
Making: Make Frozen Fruit Juice like directed. Add Amaretto and vodka (of course to taste and preference). Then add pineapple chunks and let chill for about 30 minutes to an hour.

Name: Thug Passion#3
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Rum', '2 oz. Coconut Rum', '2 oz. Vodka', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill blender with ice. Add Rum, Coconut Rum and Vodka. Fill with equal amounts of Orange Juice and Pineapple Juice. Blend and pour into punch glasses.

Name: Tiger's Milk Punch
Ingredients: ['1 quart(s) Pineapple Juice', '1 quart(s) Grapefruit Juice', '1 quart(s) Gin']
Making: Mix in a punch bowl with ice. Serves 10 to 15 people.

Name: Tight Snatch
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 part(s) Midori', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix and serve cold. Options: Malibu Rum can be substituted with Vodka or clear Tequilla. Pineapple chuncks are also good to add.

Name: Tootsie Roll #3
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Kahlua', 'Sunny Delight Orange Juice (Florida Style)']
Making: Drink down at least 1/4 of the bottle of Flordia Style Sunny D. Then add the Khalua. Shake well and enjoy.

Name: Torch Lake Punch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Absolut 100 Vodka', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix in a blender with crushed ice. Hutch's comments: This drink looks like the beautiful waters of Torch Lake MI.(They're beautiful after you are wasted!)

Name: Trash Can Punch
Ingredients: ['2 bottle(s) Everclear', '2 bottle(s) Vodka (100 Proof)', '12 can(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '12 Oranges (Sliced)', '1 Watermelon (Sliced)', 'Strawberries (Lots!)', 'Grapes (Lots!)']
Making: Wash out a brand new trash can, mix the punch and the spirits together. Then cut the fruit up and add them to the mix. Let set for at least 1 hour (the longer it sits the more potent the fruit get). Serves a whole party.

Name: Tropical Delight
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Malibu Rum', '1 gallon(s) Pineapple Juice', 'Cherry Juice (Optional)']
Making: Combine the Malibu and the pineapple juice in a punch bowl. Serve over ice in collins glasses and garnish with cherry juice.

Name: Tropical Lemonade
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Vodka', '2 cup(s) Sprite', '1 cup(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 can(s) Country Time Lemonade']
Making: Mix in one gallon pitcher, add one lemon cut in wedges and top off with ice. Add more vodka to suit your taste.

Name: Truck Punch
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Bourbon Whiskey', '2 cup(s) Apple Schnapps', '2 cup(s) Cinnamon Schnapps', '8 cup(s) Squirt']
Making: Mix with ice in a punch bowl.

Name: Tubthumper
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Vodka', '1 1/2 cup(s) Peach Schnapps', '12 cup(s) Mountain Dew', '2 scoop(s) Gatorade (Orange Gatorade Powder)', '2 scoop(s) Gatorade (Fruit Punch Gatorade Powder)']
Making: Pour the Mountain Dew into a large pitcher. Slowly sprinkle the Gatorade powder into the pitcher (otherwise it will foam over). Enjoy the show as the Gatorade fizzes. Mix well. Then add the vodka and the peach schnapps. Add more or less alcohol to your liking. Chill or add ice.

Name: Tung Shing Dragon Scorpion Bowl
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Grenadine', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Fill a Scorpion Bowl half full of ice. Blend alcohol with a cup of ice and the juice. Garnish with a pineapple stick and cherries.

Name: Turquoise TaTa
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 cup(s) Vodka', '1 cup(s) Sugar', '1 package(s) Kool-Aid lemon-lime', 'Water', '2 Oranges sliced', '2 Lemons sliced', '2 Limes sliced']
Making: Add all ingredients to a 2 quart pitcher. Add ice and fill with water. Stir well.

Name: Turtle Blaster
Ingredients: ['26 oz. Vodka', '26 oz. Melon Liqueur', '8 cup(s) Cooler (Tropic-kiwi flavour or any other fruit flavour)', '8 cup(s) 7-Up (Or Sprite)']
Making: Mix all the ingredients over ice in a cooler or a large container.

Name: Tuve Nightmare
Ingredients: ['20 cup(s) Cider', '12 cup(s) Ginger Ale', '6 cup(s) Sprite', '2 cup(s) Pisang Ambon', '3 cup(s) Vodka']
Making: Mix the vodka with the cider/wine in a punch bowl. Drop sliced cucumber and sliced lemon or lime into the bowl. Add the Sprite and Ginger Ale. Carefully pour the Pisang Ambon.

Name: Twang
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Everclear', 'Tang Drink Mix', 'Water']
Making: In a 2 quart container mix Everclear and Tang. Fill rest of the way with water.

Name: Twisted Hawiian Punch
Ingredients: ['25 oz. Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', 'Cherries']
Making: Mix in a punch bowl with ice. Garnish with cherries

Name: Uinta Mountain Special
Ingredients: ['1 gallon(s) Vodka', 'Popsicles (Frozen)']
Making: My pops invented this surprisingly tasty drink when we were having a hoe down with the hippies up in the Uintas. First, take a 1 gallon jug, and fill it up with your vodka, then dump all the popsicles in, leave in a place that is room temperature until the popsicles melt, then store in a cool place until use. Great for a "pass-a-round" drink... But uh, just don't swallow the popsicle sticks, mmm kay?

Name: Ukranian Peaches
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Vodka', '15 Peaches (Large)']
Making: Put the diced peaches in an airtight container and add the whole bottle of vodka. Let it sit in the fridge for at least a week (or longer if you want). Stir at least once daily. When ready to drink, stir and put mix into a cup. Drink away.

Name: Ultimate Jungle Juice
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Everclear', '1 bottle(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '1 bottle(s) Sprite', '1/2 gallon(s) Sherbet (Rainbow)', 'Fruit (Assorted)']
Making: Cut up frui t(apples oranges grapes strawberries watermelon honeydew cherries pineapple) and put in a large container. Pour everclear over the fruit and let soak for several hours. Add Hawaiian punch, sprite and sherbet. Thats it! Awesome. Keep in mind that this is very strong stuff. You may not taste the alcohol but its in there. Dont throw the whole bottle of alcohol in at once. Taste it and do it to your liking. Bon Appetit!

Name: Urine Luck
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Sloe Gin', '13 oz. Southern Comfort', '34 oz. Cherry Cola', '12 oz. Iced Tea (Mint flavoured)', '10 oz. Melon Liqueur', '16 oz. Tomato Juice', '5 oz. Strawberry Milk', '16 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '9 oz. After Shock Liqueur']
Making: My family has used this recipe for years and it has NEVER let a guest down. Each measurement is approximate so use your best judge to see whats best for your party.

Name: Van Gogh Pomagrenade Punch
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Van Gogh Pomegranate Vodka', '1 Chipotles Peppers (red hot, seeded and sliced paper thin)', '2 Pomegranate(s)', '1/2 cup(s) Pomegranate Juice', '1 bottle(s) Champagne', '4 Mandarin Oranges (finely sliced)', '1/4 cup(s) Maple Syrup (optional - depending on desired sweetness)']
Making: In a large bowl combine pomegranate vodka, chili, and pomegranate seeds. Cover and marinate in fridge for 30 minutes. Add the rest of ingredients when ready to serve.

Name: Van Goghst Punch
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Van Gogh Dutch Chocolate Vodka', '12 oz. Orange Juice', '12 oz. Pomegranate Juice', '12 oz. Club Soda']
Making:
Pour ingredients into large punch bowl or pitcher filled with ice and stir to chill and dilute. Ladle or pour out into small punch glasses. Garnish with sliced orange wheels.
*Created by The Cocktail Guru Jonathan Pogash

Name: Vile Green Stuff #2
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '4 cup(s) White Rum', '1 gallon(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Stir and serve in a highball glass.

Name: Vile Green Stuff (original Formula)
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Southern Comfort', '1 bottle(s) Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) White Rum', '2 gallon(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Mix together in a large container. Add ice to taste

Name: Vodka Lemonade Shake Up
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Citrus Vodka', '4 cup(s) Lemonade (Concentrate)', '1 cup(s) Sugar']
Making: Blend with ice and serve garnished with lemon or lime. (Liquid-ReaLemon mix works well for the frozen lemonade concentrate)

Name: Vodka Watermelon
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka (One 1.14 litre bottle)', '1 Watermelon (Large)']
Making:
Cut a hole into the top of the watermelon. Put the vodka into the hole and let it soak in the watermelon. Cut the top off the watermelon and get ready to be hammered.
When you host a party, there are several things you need to have to ensure that your guests have a great time. Even if you don’t want to go overboard on all the little details, it is still important to remember that the key ingredients that make any adult party a blast are food and alcohol.
If you plan on having a lot of guests at your party, buying food and alcohol to accommodate everyone can be a bit pricey. Do you really want to impress the crowd and save a little green in the process? Then, why not combine the two and make a Vodka Watermelon?!
A Vodka Watermelon is quite possibly one of the best party accoutrements ever created, especially when it’s being served on a hot summer day. Guests can partake in a slice, satiate their hunger, and also start working on a tasty buzz.
Creating a Vodka Watermelon is simple. All you need is a few items, and you’ll be ready to go in no time.
The four items needed to create a Vodka Watermelon are a watermelon, vodka, a knife, and a funnel. A mini watermelon works well with a 375 ml vodka bottle. However, if you buy a large watermelon, you will need a larger bottle, or even an additional bottle.
To begin, puncture the watermelon with the knife and create a hole on the top that is deep enough so that you can see the pink fruit, and is big enough to hold a funnel.
Next, insert the funnel and begin pouring in the vodka. Make sure to pure slowly, because the vodka needs time to absorb. You may have to start and stop several times until the vodka will no longer absorb into the fruit.
Once you’re done, the watermelon is ready to be served. Simply slice and let your guests have at it. While it really doesn’t get much easier than that, there are some additional tips that you may find helpful when creating a Vodka Watermelon:
Some people feel that a Vodka Watermelon tastes best after it has had a chance to rest for a day or two in a refrigerator. Others think that placing the watermelon in the freezer for a short amount of time before serving it gives it a colder, more refreshing flavor.
Slicing it isn’t the only way to serve it. If you really want to get fancy, halve the melon and use a melon baller to scoop out the fruit. Serve the scoops in the empty rind for a more impressive presentation.
Another way is to try the previous technique, but take the scooped out fruit and serve it in glasses or bowls, while using the watermelon shell as a decorative punchbowl. You can also use the scoops to create frozen blender drinks.
If you really want to get fancy with the watermelon, try adding different alcohols to create fun flavor options. Run, tequila, and champagne work well, as do many other liquors. To really make a good impression on your guests, create several watermelons, each containing a different alcoholic beverage.

Name: Volcron 2
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Cranberry-Raspberry Juice (frozen concentrate)', 'Water', 'Vodka']
Making: Mix can of frozen cranberry-raspberry concentrate with two cans of water and 1 can of vodka in a large container. Add some ice.

Name: Walking Zombie
Ingredients: ['18 oz. Tequila', '9 oz. Orange Juice', '9 oz. Lemonade Mix']
Making: Mix in a 36 oz. glass.

Name: Wapatula
Ingredients: ['1 gallon(s) Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Tom Collins Mix', '2 can(s) Pineapple (Diced)', '2 Apples (Diced)', '2 Kiwis (Sliced)', '1 Lime (Sliced)', 'Fruit Punch (To taste)', 'Sugar (To taste)']
Making: Mix well in a large cooler. Let it sit for a day or two if possible and the more fruit the better. Be sure to stir it, and taste test so that you can improve it as you go. Serve in punch cups and don't forget to add fruit to every cup :)

Name: Wassail #1
Ingredients: ['1 gallon(s) Apple Cider', '8 Cinnamon Sticks', '1 Lemon (Sliced)', '1 Orange (Sliced)', '1 tbsp. Cloves (Whole)', '1 tbsp. Allspice', '1 gallon(s) White Wine', '2 cup(s) Rum']
Making: Simmer the non-alcoholic ingredients together for 1-2 hours, then add the wine and rum about 10 minutes before serving (hot).

Name: Wassail #2
Ingredients: ['2 gallon(s) Apple Cider', '1 gallon(s) Orange Juice', '1/2 gallon(s) Cranberry Juice', '4 Cinnamon Sticks', '24 Allspice (Whole)', '36 Cloves (Stuck into 1/2 a large orange)', '1 cup(s) Brown Sugar (Or to taste)']
Making: Bring all to a vigorous boil for 5 or so minutes then reduce to low simmer for 45 minutes to 1 hour. Sprinkle ground nutmeg and cinnamon on top of the finished Wassail. This is much better the next day when spices have blended and mellowed.

Name: Watermelon Margarita
Ingredients: ['2 1/2 cup(s) Tequila', '3/4 cup(s) Orange Liqueur (Or orange flavoured liqueur)', '3 cup(s) Watermelon (Pureed and seedless)', '1 1/2 cup(s) Lime Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Blend all ingredients with ice and pour into margarita glasses. Garnish with orange and lime slices. Serves 12.

Name: Well Water
Ingredients: ['1/3 cup(s) Gin', '1/3 cup(s) Sprite', '1/3 cup(s) Citra (Or Mountain Dew)', '1 1/2 Lemon Juice (Fresh and sliced)', '1 1/2 Lime Juice (Fresh and sliced)']
Making: Stir over crushed ice into a meatal bucket. Drink directly from the bucket. The metal bucket makes it icy cold!!! Share with friends by passing the bucket. Flip the handle on the bucket before you pass it on to immobilize any germs. Alternate drink method for the germ phobic: Use metal soup cans to make individual serving containers.

Name: West Indian Punch
Ingredients: ['8 cup(s) Light Rum', '3 cup(s) Creme de Banane (Or a 75 cl. bottle)', '4 cup(s) Lemon Juice', '4 cup(s) Orange Juice', '4 cup(s) Pineapple Juice', '3/4 cup(s) Sugar', '1 tsp. Nutmeg (Grated)', '1 tsp. Cinnamon', '1/2 tsp. Cloves (Grated)', '6 oz. Club Soda']
Making: Dissolve the sugar and the spices in the club soda and pour into a large punch bowl over a block of ice. Add the remaining ingredients, garnish with fruit slices and serve in punch cups. This punch makes approximately 48 servings.

Name: Whiskey Sour Punch
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Bourbon Whiskey', '3 cup(s) Orange Juice', '1 1/2 cup(s) Lemonade Concentrate - thawed)', '8 cup(s) Club Soda (Chilled)']
Making: Stir over an ice block in a punch bowl. Garnish with oranges slices. This punch makes approximately 32 servings.

Name: White Cadillac
Ingredients: ['1/4 cup(s) Galliano', '1/4 cup(s) Triple Sec', '1/4 cup(s) Dry Gin', '1/4 cup(s) Milk', '1/4 cup(s) Sugar']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into cocktail glasses. It tastes like a vanilla milkshake.

Name: White Zinfendel Sangria
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Wine (White Zinfendel)', '1/4 cup(s) Tequila', '1/4 cup(s) Brandy', '1/4 cup(s) Triple Sec', '2 cup(s) Orange Juice', 'Fruit (Oranges, lemons, limes, cherries etc.)']
Making: Wash and slice fruit with the rhinds left on. Mix all ingredients...I use a Shaker Container. Chill overnight for best flavor.

Name: Wild Hibiscus Peppered Petal Punch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Cognac', '1/4 oz. Lychee Liqueur', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice (Pink)', '1/4 oz. Wild Hibiscus Syrup', '1 tsp. Pepper (Pink Peppercorns)', '1 dash(es) Peychaud Bitters', 'Soda', '1 Wild Hibiscus Flower', '1 Lychee Nuts']
Making:
Crush peppercorns at the bottom of a mixing glass with a muddler. Add all liquid ingredients with the exception of the soda water and shake vigorously for 10 seconds. Double strain into a punch cup and top with soda water. Garnish with a Wild Hibiscus Flower stuffed with Lychee fruit on a skewer.
Created by: Danielle Tatarin

Name: Wine Punch
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Red Wine', '2 Lemons (Sliced)', '1 cup(s) Orange Juice', '3 Oranges (Sliced)', '1 cup(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine all of the ingredients and pour over a block of ice.

Name: Winter Cider
Ingredients: ['1 gallon(s) Apple Cider', '1 1/2 cup(s) Rum', '1 cup(s) Peach Brandy', '3/4 cup(s) Peach Schnapps', '6 Cinnamon Sticks']
Making: Bring cider and cinnamon to the boil over medium heat. Reduce heat and stir in all the other ingredients until hot. Serve in Irish coffee glasses and garnish with cinnamon sticks and an apple slice. This punch makes approximately 18 servings.

Name: Winter Punch
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Hendrick's Gin", '1/2 oz. Bols Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Agave Nectar', '4 leaf(leaves) Mint', '2 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Combine ingredients and shake well. Serve over ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a fresh, spanked sprig of mint. The Orange Curacao and angostura bitters keep this punch on the spicy side (perfect for winter) the use of pineapple keeps it flavorsome.

Name: Wiskey Sour Slush
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Bourbon Whiskey', '6 oz. Orange Juice (Frozen)', '6 oz. Lemonade (Frozen)', '1 cup(s) Tea (Strong)', '1/2 cup(s) Sugar', '3 can(s) Water', '7-Up']
Making: Mix together in a freezer safe container. Continue stirring every six hours until slushy. When finished spoon into collins glasses and add a little 7-Up. Enjoy!!!

Name: Witch's Brew #1
Ingredients: ['5 cup(s) Midori', '8 cup(s) Vodka', '20 cup(s) Ginger Ale', '2 cup(s) Water']
Making: All measurements are approximate. Adjust to your own taste. Mix well. Pour into your cauldron, preferably with chunks of dry ice to create the bubbling steam effect. (Be careful NOT to drink or eat or in any way come in direct contact with skin with any chunks of dry ice - you can get burned by the extreme cold!).

Name: Witch's Brew #2
Ingredients: ['4 cup(s) Vodka', '4 1/2 cup(s) Apple Juice (Unsweetened - thawed)', '1/2 gallon(s) Sherbet (Lime - softened)', '8 cup(s) Club Soda', '5 cup(s) Water', '1/2 cup(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Combine apple juice, water, vodka, and lime juice in a large bowl. Cover and chill. Just before serving, spoon sherbet into a large punch bowl; slowly pour apple juice mixture and club soda over sherbet, stirring gently.

Name: Womper
Ingredients: ['26 oz. Vodka', '3 Beer', '1 can(s) Fruit Juice (Frozen)']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a large bowl/clean trash can. Serve chilled (before beer goes flat).

Name: Wonderland
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Spiced Rum', '5 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '5 oz. Scotch', '5 oz. Marasquin', '10 oz. Slice', 'Squirt (To taste)']
Making: Combine over ice in a large punch bowl.

Name: Woop Juice
Ingredients: ['24 cup(s) Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '4 cup(s) Vodka', '1 pint(s) Everclear', '1/5 gallon(s) Malibu Rum', 'Pineapple (Diced)', 'Oranges (Diced)', 'Apples (Diced)']
Making: Mix all the ingredients 24 hours before a party, and add the diced fruits. Refrigerate, serve chilled and watch all your buddies get "wooped by the juice"!

Name: Wopatuli
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 cup(s) Tequila Silver (Or Gold)', '3 Lemons (Quartered)', '3 Limes (Quartered)', '1 cup(s) Sugar']
Making: Fill a glass jar with ice, add all the ingredients, cap the jar and wrap a bath towel around it. Sit with 4-8 friends and each take turns shaking the jar until the outside of the jar is frosty and the towel is stuck to it. Then remove the towel, drink from the jar passing it in the same direction that it was passed while shaking and enjoy! After all the tequila is gone eat the fruit for a real kick in the head !

Name: Yank me Crank me
Ingredients: ['1 gallon(s) Skyy Vodka', '12 can(s) Beer (Bush Light)', '1 bottle(s) Sprite (2 litre bottle)', '1 can(s) Lemonade Mix (Countrytime Lemonade Dry Powder)']
Making: Mix well in a large container and serve in punch cups.

Name: Yellow Goddammits
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Everclear', '1 bottle(s) Mountain Dew (2 litres bottle)', '1 can(s) Lemonade (Concentrate)', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 Lime (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Mix in a punch bowl or Gatorade-type container. Serve with caution.

Name: Yucka
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka', '6 Limes (Juice of, fresh)', '6 Lemons (Juice of, fresh)', '1 cup(s) Sugar']
Making: Squeeze the juice of the lemons and the limes into a pitcher and fill it with ice. Add the sugar and fill the pitcher with vodka. Stir well, and serve in shot glasses. Shoot.

Name: Yukka
Ingredients: ['1/5 gallon(s) Absolut Vodka', '10 Lemons']
Making: Slice the lemons and put them in a pitcher. Add the vodka and stir well. Pour into sugar rimmed glasses.

Name: Yukka (South Africa)
Ingredients: ['4 bottle(s) Vodka', '20 Lemons', '6 1/2 cup(s) Sugar']
Making: Cut Lemons in to quaters and squeeze into a container. Place the squeezed lemons into the container. Pour in the vodka and add the sugar. Fill with ice and mix all the ingredients. Leave for 12 hours. Taste test. Add extra sugar or Ice.

Name: Zambizi Punch
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Vodka', '12 oz. Lemonade (Frozen concentrate)', '4 can(s) Budweiser Beer']
Making: A cooling prescription for a hot summer afternoon. Empty the frozen lemonade into a pitcher and use the empty can to measure the vodka. Stir the concentrate and vodka until liquefied. Carefully, add the beer to the pitcher to minimise the beer "head". Serve in tall glasses over ice.

Name: Zippers' Australian Sippers
Ingredients: ['2 bottle(s) Smirnoff Vodka (2x75 cl.)', '8 bottle(s) Sparkling Wine (Preferably Passion Pop)', '2 bottle(s) Sweet Sherry (2x75 cl.)', '1 bottle(s) Ginger Wine (Preferably Green Ginger wine)', '2 1/2 cup(s) Blackberry Liqueur', '7 bottle(s) Fruit Juice (7X100 cl.)', '3 bottle(s) Lemonade (3X100 cl.)', '3 bottle(s) Ginger Beer (3X100 cl.)']
Making: Combine all the ingredients in a bucket, mix well and add cracked ice. Comment: The Lads at Red Rugby CSU Wagga Wagga found it quite enjoyable to drink through a funnel joined to three feet of garden hose.

Name: 'Coon Dog
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Crown Royal', '3/4 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: 'Curb' Shot
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Firewater (Or Hot Damn)', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze (Or Peppermint Schnapps)', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Just pour it in!! DONT SNIFF IT ..CHUG IT Down!! Serve chilled. The ONE-Drink MESS UP !!!

Name: 1-900-F**k-Me-Up
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '1/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix all the ingredients with ice then pour into shot glasses.

Name: 19 - Duke Drive
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Chocolate Mint Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/3 oz. Creme de Banane']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: 2-5 Wester'
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/2 oz. Old Grandad Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour into a shaker with Ice. Strain into a Rocks glass.

Name: 24 Karat Nightmare
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Mix and pour into a shot glass.

Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: 2Borg Special
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. White Rum', '1/3 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Cherry Heering Liqueur']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: 3 Layer Chocolate Cake
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Shake and strain over ice. Serve with a sugar dipped lemon.

Name: 3 Wise Men #1
Ingredients: ["1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/3 oz. Jose Cuervo']
Making: Mix all ingrediants in a shot glass.

Name: 3 Wise Men And A Spick
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Johnnie Walker Black Label Scotch', "1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and serve.

Name: 3 Wise Men Hunting Turkeys In Mexico
Ingredients: ["1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Johnnie Walker Scotch', '1/4 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Jose Cuervo']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and serve

Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shoot! If someone is crazy enough to take the shot, more power to them…

Name: 4 Horsemen
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum']
Making: Layer in a shooter glass in the given order.

Name: 4 Horsemen #2
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Johnnie Walker Scotch', '1/4 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', "1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Jose Cuervo']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and serve.

Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/4 oz. Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Yukon Jack']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: 4th Estate Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. French Vermouth', '1/3 oz. Italian Vermouth', '1/3 oz. Gin', '4 dash(es) Absinthe']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: 4th Of July
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Layer in a shot glass, starting with the grenadine.

Name: 5 Sins at 40 percent + Extra
Ingredients: ['1/5 oz. Tequila', '1/5 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/5 oz. Vodka', '1/5 oz. Cognac', '1/5 oz. Goldschlager', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Layer in a shot glass, starting with the grenadine.

Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 tbsp. Black Currant Cordial']

Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Varies', '1/3 oz. Varies', '1/3 oz. Varies']
Making: The Bartender stands facing the bar and counts off the bottles. 6th from right, 4th from left and 9th from right. Pour 1/3 of each and shoot.

Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/3 oz. Anisette', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']

Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: 7 Deadly Sins
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Sambuca', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Layer over the back of a spoonin the given order. All should float on each other. It tastes like bubble gum then it burns. The 7th deadly sin is to drink it!

Name: 7 Goat Sluggers
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: 7 Shot

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Serve with a lime wedge.

Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Rum Cream Liqueur']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Sambuca', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']

Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Frangelico']

Name: 8 Ball

Making: Pour the Red Bull into a beer mug. Pour the Jagermeister in a shot glass. Drop the shooter glass into the mug and drink at once.

Name: 8 Feet Under
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Pour in the given order into a shot glass.

Name: 9 Millimeter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Ice 101', '1/2 oz. Firewater']

Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Light the 151 if desired.

Ingredients: ['1 oz. DeKuyper Sour Apple', '1 oz. DeKuyper Rasberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: 99 Roses
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Tequila Rose']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: A Bedrock #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Pour both ingredients in a shot glass and enjoy!

Name: A Canuck Who Got F**ked
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Labatt Blue', '1/2 oz. Canadian Whisky']
Making: Layer in order of ingredients in a shot glass.

Name: A Kick In The Crotch
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix together in a shot glass.

Name: A Raspberry Shot
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '1 splash(es) Lemonade']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: A S S
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/3 oz. Spearmint Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: A.A.
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absinthe', '1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur']
Making: Pour the Aftershock into a shot glass and chill. Once the shot is chilled, slowly pour the Absinthe over the Aftershock, then slam it.

Name: A.S.S.
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Abba Nugget

Making: Pour vodka into a shot glass. Layer in soy sauce.

Name: ABC
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Cognac']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Abortion #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Abortion #2
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Strawberry Schnapps (Clear)', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Fill the shot glass with the strawberry liqueur then slowly pour in the Bailey's.

Name: Abortion #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Abortion #6
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. Comes out as a gooey white mess with that hint of red.

Name: Absinthe Sour
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Absinthe', '3/4 oz. Lemon Juice', '1/2 tbsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Absolut Bitch
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Tuaca', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Absolut Death
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Absolut Vodka', '4 oz. Absolut Peppar Vodka', '12 oz. Prune Juice']
Making: Mix with ice in pitcher. Pour into shooter glasses.

Name: Absolut Dew

Making: Pour into a shaker. Shake and serve in a shooter glass.

Name: Absolut Heaven
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake, strain, pour and serve.

Name: Absolut Legspreader

Name: Absolut Mind-F*ck

Making: Shake in mixer with ice. Strain into a shooter glass.

Name: Absolut Royalty
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', 'Sour Mix', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients in shaker with ice. Shake and strain into shot glasses.

Name: Absolutly Wild
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Wildberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka']
Making: Mix in a shaker over ice. Shake and serve in a shooter glass.

Name: Acapulco Bay

Making: Combine vodka, blue curacao and chambord in a shaker. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Topup with triple sec.

Name: Acid Rain
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Curacao', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Combine curacao and triple sec in a shooter glass. Add irish cream to topup. Wait until colour becomes uniform, then shoot.

Name: Acid Tab
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/2 oz. Port', '1/2 oz. Absinthe']
Making: Layer apricot brandy, port and absinthe in a shot glass.

Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Making: Mix and serve in shot glass.

Name: After Birth
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: After Dinner Mint
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'splash(es) Green Creme de Menthe']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Afterburner #2

Making: Mix well, then pour in a shooter glass. (Intended as a shooter, but good on the rocks).

Name: Afterburner #3

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Or increase the proportions and serve in a large cup garnished with fresh range slices.

Name: Alabama Slamma

Name: Alabama Slammer #7
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. This is the Alabama Slammer as I have learned from native alabamians.

Name: Alabama Slammer #8
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Sloe Gin', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Albertan Asshole

Making: Layer in shot glass. Shoot!

Name: Alcoolica
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Pour the Sambuca into a shot glass, and light it. You should see a small blue flame. Quickly place your palm over the glass. You should feel the suction (it will put the flame out). Remove your hand and mix the creme de menthe with the Sambuca when it is not on fire and drink. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Making: Mix in shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass.

Name: Alien Secretion #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Alien Secretion #3

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Alligator Pie
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Alligator Piss
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a shot glass. Alligator Piss is the name because of the color not the taste!

Name: Alligator Tail
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Jagermeister', '1/2 part(s) Midori', 'splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Layer Jagermeister and Midori. Add a splash of grenadine. This shot starts with a bite and ends with sweetness.......

Name: Almond Joy Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Altered State
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Golden Pear', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Alternate Mudslide
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1 splash(es) Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Pour the Bailey's first. Then tilt the glass and pour the Kahlua in so it slides under the Baileys and forms a distinct separate layer. Finally pour the Peppermint Schnapps in last and let settle out on top. If done correctly there will be three distinct color layers and the concoction will taste like a peppermint patty.

Name: Amanda
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/2 oz. Ketel One Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'splash(es) Pineapple Juice']

Name: Apple Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Apple Juice', 'Cinnamon', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Tilt your head back and open your mouth. Pour in a shot of vodka and a shot of apple juice simultaneously. Add a tap or two of cinnamon. Then top it off with a squirt of whipped cream and swallow.

Name: Apple F**ker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Apple Jacks
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker']
Making: Mix in shot glass. Drink up.

Name: Apple Pie #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 oz. Sour Apple Pucker']
Making:
Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.
In the pic, I've got the drink in a separated shot glass. It's a fun way to drink this, but by no means the only way. When you smell the drink, you might as well be smelling mom's Hot Apple Pie. This shot makes the grade as "girlfriend approved" (and incidentally makes pants come off.) Great for rounds with friends.

Name: Apple Pie Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Apple Juice', 'dash(es) Cinnamon']
Making: Pour vodka then apple juice into a shot glass. Garnish with cinnamon and mix by placing palm of one hand on the top and tipping over. Shoot.

Name: Apple Pie Shooters
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Apple Juice', 'dash(es) Cinnamon', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: You need two partners for this (great at frat parties!). Have your partner sit down and hold his/her head back, pour in vodka, then juice, spray whipped cream and sprinkle with cinnamon. Have your partner sit up, shake head to mix and SWALLOW!!!

Name: Apple Pie Shot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Apple Cider', 'Cinnamon', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour the vodka and the cider in two different shot glasses. Sprinkle some cinnamon on the back of your hands, lick it, shoot the vodka, shoot the cider and top it off with a squirt of whipped cream in your mouth.

Name: Apple Pie Shots
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Apple Juice', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Mix the Southern Comfort and apple juice together in a shot glass. Sprinkle cinnamon on top of the shot and then cover the shot with your hand. With your other hand grab the shot and then quickly slam it on the counter so the cinammon goes to the bottom of the shot glass. Then shoot.

Name: Apple Pucker F**ker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/2 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Apple Slammer
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sprite', '1 oz. Apple Schnapps']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. To drink, cover the top of the shot glass with palm, raise glass, slam it on the bar and the swallow quickly.

Name: Apple Stroke-o-nut
Ingredients: ['1/3 Apple Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/3 Strawberry Liqueur', '1/3 Coconut Rum']
Making: Layer as listed and SHOOT!

Name: Apple Turnover
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Apple Juice', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Take the shot of apple juice in your mouth, then take the shot of vodka in mouth, open wide and have someone squirt whipped cream in on top. Swallow. A variation is to make the whipped cream a floater on one of the two shots.

Name: Area 51
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Midori', 'splash(es) Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum']
Making: This is a layered shot. Add Midori on bottom. Top slowly with Jagermeister. Top with 151. Light and serve.

Name: Arkansas Slammer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wine', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Beer']
Making: Mix and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Arkansas Snowshoe
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Ice 101']
Making: Pour in order into a shot glass and shoot. Set on fire if you are from the South! (ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.)

Name: Armageddon #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Mezcal', '1/3 oz. Hot Sauce (The hottest you can find)']
Making: Mix and shoot. Made for customers who say tabasco drinks are not hot enough.

Name: Armenian Knockout
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Water', 'Vodka']
Making: Combine the Bacardi, the everclear and the water in a shot glass and shoot. Wait 4 min then shoot 2 shots of vodka, one after the other.

Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']

Name: Assisted Suicide

Name: Asthma Attack
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Everclear', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Andrew says: By the Way...If an asthma attack occurs, quickly follow with a Purple Motherf..ker! Ha Ha!

Name: Astro Pop
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/4 oz. Jagermeister']
Making:
Layer in the order given above. It should look like an Astro Pop popsicle.
Many know an Astro Pop as a tasty, layered candy that was once produced by the Spangler Candy Company. When others hear the name, the first thing that probably comes to mind is the layered, frozen treat that was messy to eat, but pretty darned good on a hot summer day.
But here, you won’t find either of those confections. Instead, you’ll find a more adult version of the layered treat that will remind you of your childhood while helping you work on a buzz.
The Astro Pop is a shooter that is created using the layering technique so that the end result looks and tastes much like the pop you might have had when you were a child. There are several recipes for creating an Astro Pop, and each has its own set of ingredients and instructions.
A typical version uses 1/4 oz. each of Blue Curacao, Cinnamon Schnapps, Goldschlager, Jagermeister, Midori, and Rumple Minze. Each ingredient should be layered in this specific order into a shooter glass and then consumed by the lucky drinker. Another version calls for 1/4 oz. each of Grenadine, Crème de Banana, Melon Liqueur, Vodka, and Rum (preferably 151 proof). This version sees the ingredients slowly and carefully layered into a cocktail glass. The reason for pouring the ingredients into such a large glass is for what comes next--lighting the drink on fire using a long match. This version should be consumed once the flame has extinguished.

Name: Astro Pop 2
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer ingredients in a shot glass. Light and blow out fire. Be sure that the rim is cool before drinking.

Name: Astronaut

Making: Coat the slice of lime 1/2 with coffee and 1/2 with sugar, suck it and down the shot. You'll see Saturn and beyond.

Name: Backdraft
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grand Marnier (Room temperature)']
Making: Pour 1 oz. of Grand Marnier in the shot glass. Light it, let it burn for about 10 seconds, then cover it with your hand for about 10 more seconds. You should feel it suck your hand. Uncover it, slam it, then cover it again for another 10 seconds. You should feel it suck your hand again. Uncover it and inhale the fumes. This gives a slight high.

Name: Belfast Carbomb #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1/2 pint(s) Guinness']
Making:
Pour Bailey's, Kahlua and Jamesons' in order in a shot glass (Bailey's at the bottom). Drop or slide the shot into a half pint of Guinness Stout. The shot, if dropped in carefully, looks like a Guinness inside a Guinness. The Carbomb is to be consumed in one long swallow. Mind your teeth as the shot slides forward. The incredible taste is worth the risk.
The CARBOMB: The Creation of An Historic Cocktail
Charles Burke Cronin Oat
Master of Mixology 1967-2008
This incredibly tasty drink was invented in 1979 as a follow up to the shot the IRA which I created in 1977 on St. Patrick's Day.
Drink History
NOTE: Before you start; understand that this was a carefully thought out "Cocktail", a Recipe!!! To you naysayers on the Kahlua because it is not Irish.. remember a Margarita has Cointreau and it is French. The Carbomb is a recipe, and a great tasting one.
Originally the shot was called a Grandfather- 1/2 oz. give or take of Baileys and 1/4 oz.or so of Kahlua The name Grandfather lasted through the first hour of its life and many, many toasts to our grandfathers were made. I put it together for my brothers who were visiting my pub, Wilson's Saloon, 76 Franklin St. Norwich, Ct. Est. 1886, that St. Patrick’s Day afternoon.
Being St. Patrick’s Day heavy toasting was in order. However, after consuming a few "Grandfathers" along with Pints of Guinness, the true drink of "The Day"; we all realized something was missing. The taste was incredible!!! (Kahlua was key to this) but, couldn't quite get the buzz going. I knew immediately what it was, and with a laugh at our stupidity, I yelled for a bottle of Jameson.
As I poured the whiskey into the shot of Baileys and Kahlua I commented that “the IRA just showed up. This oughta work now!” (As you add the Jameson to the Baileys and Kahlua, the shot boils up like an explosion, hence the IRA.) Others at the bar joined in to the toasting , “Give us some of those IRA shots they’re drinking ” was the call up and down the bar. And the name Grandfather disappeared and the IRA was born.(In its early days the use of Scotch and American whiskeys was used in place of Jameson throughout the area, because so very few establishments had an Irish Whiskey. An ugly thought.}
Two years later, drinking IRAs and Guinness with my manager, I got the crazy idea as we were toasting to drop the shot in my half finished Guinness. The look in his eyes as I held the shot over the Guinness said it all. "Bombs Away " was the call. We called it the Belfast Carbomb, Irish Carbomb in other company, and “Carbomb?” when we were looking for a fellow reprobate to join us in celebrating the fact that we had survived another day.
The drink languished in Ct. and was slowly spread across America by the many Navy personnel who frequented Wilson's Saloon. World renown for this drink did not come until many years later. The marketing blitz by the Guinness corporation late 80's early 90's got things rolling. The popularity explosion of Guinness in America that resulted made all things created with Guinness popular too.
The Carbomb is fun to drink, tastes great, women love them equally as well as men!
A final note: If you invent a drink such as the Carbomb, as I did so long ago, beware! You never know if it might become famous, so pick the name carefully. IRA and Carbomb are "cool" in the bar scene, but in the reality of today NOT.

Name: Bloody Brain #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream (Chilled)', '1/3 oz. Strawberry Schnapps']
Making: Pour the Bailey's into a rocks glass then very very slowly add the strawberry schnapps.

Name: Bloody Frog Cum
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Layer in order starting with the Midori, then pour the Bailey's along the side of the glass (this will cause it to clump up, hence the cum part) and finally add the grenadine. Serve into a shooter glass and watch for tadpoles!

Name: Bloody Ghostbuster
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Ke Ke Beach Key Lime Cream Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Sprite', '3 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and drop in grenadine.

Name: Bloody Hell
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Chartreuse']
Making: Layer in the order listed in a shot glass.

Name: Bloody Mexican
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Mezcal', '1 oz. Crème de Strawberry']
Making: Shake with ice, then strain into a shooter glass.

Name: Bloody Muff Diver
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour the amaretto into a wing boat, cover with whipped cream and a splash of grenadine. Place the wing boat on the bar, with napkins elevating one end, and drink with no hands!

Name: Bloody Orange
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Citrus Vodka', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', '2 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Pour a shot of orange vodka. Add a splash of 7up and a couple drops of grenadine. Best chilled!

Name: Bloody Tampon #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Apple Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour in order in a shot glass. The Bailey's should form a ball.

Name: Bloody Tampon #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tomato Juice', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and drink by covering the glass with a napkin.

Name: Bloody Twat
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Surge Energy Drink']
Making: Pour vodka into a shot glass and add Surge, slam on table and drink.

Name: Bloody Vagina
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Red Wine', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Mix in a shot glass and drink up!

Name: Bloody Virgin
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/3 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Pour in order in a shot glass, drink and slam it on the table. Girls like it.

Name: Blow Job #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour in a shot glass and top with whipped cream. Drink with hands behind your back in one smooth motion.

Name: Blow Job #2
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Irish Cream', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour Irish Cream into a shot glass and top with whipped cream. Without using your hands, grab the glass with your teeth and shoot.

Name: Blow Job #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Float the whiskey on top of the Bailey's in a shot glass. Then put your hands behind your back, grab the drink with your lips, tilt your head back and drink!

Name: Blow Job #4
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Serve in a shot glass and top with the whipped cream.

Name: Blow Job #6
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Hot Sex', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour a shot of Hot Sex and top with a bit of whipped cream. To shoot, place shot on a table, hold your hands behind your back, grab the shot glass with your mouth and tilt your head back to slam it home.

Name: Blow Job (Expert)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Whipped Cream', 'Cherry']
Making: Float the Baileys on top of the Kaluha top with whipped cream and cherry. Kneel on the bar stool with your hands behind your back take shot using mouth and come up with the cherry in your teeth.

Name: Blow Job (Jenna Jameson)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Cherry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Irish Cream', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix ingredients and pour into a shot glass. Top with whipped cream.

Name: Blow Job (Skilled)
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and top with whipped cream. To drink: Place hands behind back, wrap lips over the rim of the glass, tip your head back, and swallow. Look Mom : No Hands !!!

Name: Blow Job Cancun Style
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Coconut Cream', '1 part(s) Kahlua', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix vodka and coconut cream in a shot glass. Add kahlua and then the whipping cream.

Name: Blowjob
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '3/4 oz. Kahlua', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Combine the Bailey's Irish Cream and Kahlua in a chilled shot glass. Top off with whipped cream.

Name: Blue 32
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/3 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon (101)', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Blue Ballz
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Blue Curacao', '1 part(s) Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila', '1 part(s) Sour Mix']
Making: Mix equal parts of each ingredient and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Blue Bastard
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 wedge(s) Orange']
Making: Mix in shot glass. Shoot. Follow with an orange wedge.

Name: Blue Bayou Marble Special
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Sambuca (Blue)', '1/4 oz. Stroh Rum (Stroh 80)', '1/4 oz. Amarula Cream Liqueur', '1/8 oz. Gin']
Making: Pour in sequence into a shooter glass. Will give a blue marble look.

Name: Blue Eyed Blonde #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in shooter glass.

Name: Blue Eyed Blonde #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass in the given order.

Name: BLUE FIRE
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Pour in the given order in a shooter glass. Light it up and add cinnamon. Drink it while still burning!!

Name: Blue Flame
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Pour the peppermint schnapps into a large shot glass. Layer the Southern Comfort on top of it. Light the Southern Comfort on fire but blow it out before you drink it! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Blue Heaven
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Cream', '1 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Light the Drambuie and Sambuca in a martini glass. Drink with a straw. Pour the Curaco as the glass empties, then the cream. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WHEN USING FIRE.

Name: Blue Hooper
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Chill Jagermeister in the freezer, then layer Goldschlager.

Name: Blue Hooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Island Blue Schnapps']
Making: Serve chilled in a shot glass.

Name: Blue Lagoon #3
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps']
Making: Shake and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Blue Lagoon #4
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Blue Marlin
Ingredients: ['1 oz. White Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Blue Moon #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Blue Murder
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/3 oz. Galliano', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Layer into a shot glass.

Name: Blue Nipple
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Sambuca', '1/3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Blue Northern
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Pour into shot glass, shoot and shiver!

Name: Blue Nyquil
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 Amaretto', '1 dash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 dash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake over ice, then strain into a shot glass.

Name: Blue Razzberry Shotz
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sourpuss Apple Liqueur', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Sprite', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix Sour Apple Sour Puss and Blue Curacao in a large shot glass. Mix Sprite and Cranberry Juice in an old fashioned glass, then drop the shot inside and enjoy the purple party.

Name: Blue Silk Panties
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Blue Suicide
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Everclear', '2/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '2/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and stain into a shot glass.

Name: Blue Waterfall
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Pour Sambuca and Blue Curacao in a wine glass. Light on fire and sprinkle the Cinnamon on the flames.

Name: Blue X Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '1 part(s) Full Throttle Blue Demon']
Making: Pour into a shooter glass and shoot.

Name: Blueberry Bitch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sour Apple Schnapps green apple', '1 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Blueberry Kamikaze
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass.

Name: Blurricane
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager', '1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/3 oz. Ouzo']
Making: Layer in a 2 oz. shot glass in the given order.

Name: Blushing Nipple
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila Rose', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer Tequila Rose on the bottom and Bailey's on top in a shooter glass.

Name: Bob Marley
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Light Rum', '1 splash(es) 151 Proof Rum']
Making: In a double shot glass layer (starting on the bottom with) grenadine, crème de banana, crème de menthe and light rum. Put a small layer of 151 on the top and light. While lit drink it with a straw. II learned this drink while at a bar in Jamaica. The layers make up the Jamaican colors. Definitely an impressive party shot.

Name: Bob Marley #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Layer in a 2 oz. shot glass.

Name: Bob Marley #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Mint Brandy', '1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Amarula Cream Liqueur (Or similar)']
Making: Layer in order (mint at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass.

Name: Bobbi's Peaches
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Squirt']
Making: Shake the peach schnapps and triple sec with ice, pour into a shot glass, top with Squirt, smile and think of boobs:)

Name: Boccie Ball Jiggle Shots
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Amaretto', '1 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '2 package(s) JELLO (Orange)']
Making: Mix the ingredients, pour in 2 oz. shot glasses and refrigerate.

Name: Body Bag
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Layer in order (Jagermeister at the bottom) in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Body Shot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka (Or tequila)', '1/4 Lime', 'dash(es) Salt']
Making: This is a drink that requires a partner. Lick and place salt on your partner's body (where you would like to lick). Squeeze lime juice on his/her body (where you care to suck). Hold the vodka/tequila in your mouth for 10 seconds. The one who can hold it in his/her mouth for the 10 seconds gets to lick and suck.

Name: Boiler Maker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 pint(s) Beer']
Making: Drop the shot into the beer and chug.

Name: Boiler Maker #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka (or any other hard alcohol)', '1 pint(s) Beer']
Making: Pour one full shot of vodka and drop it into the full beer mug. Shoot!

Name: Boiler Maker #2
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", 'Beer']
Making: Drop the shot glass of Jack Daniel's into a mug of beer and slam back.

Name: Boiling Culdron
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Expresso', '3/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Pour into a 2 !/2 oz. shot glass and drink while hot.

Name: Boilmaker #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '1 pint(s) Beer']
Making: Fill a shot glass with everclear, light it and drop the full shot glass into the mug of beer. Drink immediately. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Bomb Pop
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Chill vodka. Pour into a champagne glass. Tilt glass and slowly pour in grenadine. Bring glass slightly back to vertical and pour in blue curacao slowly. Should come out blue, white, red from top to bottom.

Name: Bonono
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Bonzai Pipeline
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tropical Fruit Schnapps']
Making: Stir and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Booby Sundae
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butterscotch Ripple Schnapps', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer Butterscotch Ripple Schnapps and Bailey's Irish Cream in a shot glass.

Name: Booger
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', 'drop(s) Irish Cream']
Making: Layer the three alcohol then add the Irish cream.

Name: Booger In The Grass
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', 'dash(es) Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour the Midori into a shot glass and float a bit of Bailey's on top. Tweak to taste preference. Enjoy!!!

Name: Boomer
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', '1/2 oz. White Tequila', '7-Up']
Making: Pour raspberry sourpuss and tequila into a shot glass. Drop into a tall glass of 7-Up and drink up.

Name: Boot To The Head
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: Border Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: Borg Blaster
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Lemonade', '1/3 oz. Whiskey']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass.

Name: Bottle Cap Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', 'Lime Juice']
Making: Pour the amaretto and root beer schnapps into a shot glass. Then take a beer glass and fill it with enough lime juice to hide the shot glass. Drink same way as a gladiator - drop and shoot. Pucker up and enjoy!

Name: Bottlecap
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', '1/2 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', 'Sprite', 'Lime Juice']
Making: In a shot glass mix the Raspberry Sourpuss (sourz) and the Rootbeer Schnapps. Then in a rocks glass mix Sprite and lime juice to rim height of shot glass when submerged. Drop shoot enjoy.

Name: Bottom Bouncer
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Butter Shots', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour butter shots into a shot glass. Float the Bailey's Irish Cream on top. Best way to float it is to tip the cup and poor the Irish Cream down the side.

Name: Bounty Bar
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 oz. Creme de Cacao dark', '1 splash(es) Chocolate Syrup', 'Whipping Cream']
Making: Mix in a shaker and pour into shot glasses. Should make about 12 - 14 shooters.

Name: Bowel Banger
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Prune Juice']
Making: Pour in order into a shot glass.

Name: Bra-buster
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 tbsp. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Add Tabasco sauce to vodka in a shot glass and stir with spoon. Add Triple Sec and drink away!

Name: Brain Cell
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Pour Peach Schnapps in a shot glass. Float Bailey's on top. Drop the teaspoon of granadine. Salud!

Name: Brain Drain(b52#3)
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Sambuca', '1/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass starting with the After Shock.

Name: Brain Freeze #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Grenadine']
Making: Chill the alcohol then layer, top up with grenadine and consume through a straw in a shot glass.

Name: Brain Haemorage #3
Ingredients: ['2/5 oz. Midori', '2/5 oz. Sambuca', '1/5 oz. Irish Cream', '4 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: lLayer liqueurs in listed order then drop the grenadine on top so it drains through the Irish cream.

Name: Brain Haemorrhage #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 tsp. Irish Cream', '1/2 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Pour the peach schnapps and then slowly pour the Irish creme without mixing. The creme will clump together and settle at the bottom of the schnapps. Pour the grenadine over the creme to complete the drink.

Name: Brain Haemorrhage #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Irish Cream', '1 tsp. Kahlua', '4 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Pour the peach schnapps into a shot glass. Add a little Kahlua, then carefully pour the Irish cream so it balls up on top to form a brain shape. Pour a few small drops of grenadine on top of the Irish cream to give the haemorrhage effect.

Name: Brain Heamorrage
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Sambuca', '1 package(s) Baileys Irish Cream', '2 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Pour Sambuca and Bailey's Irish Cream into a shot glass. Drip the grenadine over top.

Name: Brain Hemmorage
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Brain Hemmorhage
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Tequila Rose', 'Grenadine']
Making: Half fill shot glasss with peach schnapps. Slowly pour tequila rose in centre of glass so it balls up like a brain. Drop grenadine over the "Brain".

Name: Brain Teaser
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sambuca', '3/4 oz. Irish Cream', '1/8 oz. Advocaat']
Making: Layer as follows: Irish cream, then Sambuca, then Advocaat (should sit in middle of other two. Use a straw to suck up Advocaat then shoot the rest and suck the fumes up through the straw.

Name: Brain Torch
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/3 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix After Shock and Vodka in a tall shot glass. Layer 151 on top. Ignite and shoot.Turn the second tall shot glass upside down pour the leftover drink in the divot on the bottom of the glass ignite and snort the flaming residue with the straw. Not for the faint hearted.

Name: Brains
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Light Rum']
Making: Pour the Irish cream into a shooter glass. Tilt glass and slowly pour in the light rum. Should look like brains.

Name: Brainstorm #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'dash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Pour the peach schnapps into a shot glass. Float the Bailey's on top using the back of a spoon, and add the dash of curacao through the Bailey's to create a blue brainstorm!

Name: Brass Balls
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake, strain, pour and shoot!!

Name: Brass Monkey #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Orange Juice', '1/3 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Brave Bull #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour Tabasco into bottom of shot glass and fill with tequila.

Name: Brave Bull Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Break
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/3 oz. Anisette']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Breakfast Shot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', 'Red Bull Energy Drink', 'Absolut Mandarin Vodka']
Making: Pour the Jagermeister into a shot glass. Place in whiskey glass. Fill whiskey glass with Red Bull to top of shot glass. Top off with Absolut Mandarin.

Name: Breyers Ice Cream Shot Or Just Breyers
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', "1 part(s) Dr. McGillicuddy's French Kiss Vanilla Schnapps", '1 part(s) Half and Half Cream']
Making: Chill - then shake and serve. Yummy like ice cream.

Name: Broken Down Golf Cart
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Just mix ingredients evenly into shot glass. Tastes like a multi-color striped candy cane.

Name: Broken Down Golf Cart #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Layer into shot glass.

Name: Broken Down Golf Cart #3
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Broken Down Golf Cart #4
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a shooter glass and serve.

Name: Broken Down Golf Kart (the Best One)
Ingredients: ['3/5 oz. Melon Liqueur', '2/5 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and slam.

Name: Brown Death
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix in a shot glass with the 151 on top.

Name: Brown Noser
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Creme de Cacao dark', '1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe green']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and serve.

Name: Bubble Gum Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: First shake the spirits over ice, then add the fruit juices and shake again. Strain into shot glasses.

Name: Bubblegum
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Tia Maria', "1/4 oz. Banana Liqueur (Preferably Bols')", "1/4 oz. Blue Curacao (Preferably Bols')", '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass (Tia Maria at the bottom) and shoot.

Name: Buckcherry
Ingredients: ['1/3 part(s) Whiskey', '1/3 part(s) Vodka', '1/3 part(s) Tequila']
Making: Mix and shoot fast. This is a hardcore drink named after the all-night partying drink 'till I die rock band Buckcherry. This shot is not for the once a month drinker that would rather watch movies on the weekend. Only those who can party like rockstars should try this because it kicks your ass all the way down!

Name: Buckshot #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Root Beer']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Buckshot #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Root Beer Schnapps']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: BuckWheat
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Champagne (Chilled)', '1/4 oz. Stout (Chilled)']
Making: Pour stout into a shot glass, layer champagne and top off with amaretto.

Name: Buffalo Ball Sweat #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Buffalo Ball Sweat #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey (Preferably Kentucky Bourbon)', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '5 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Buffalo Fart
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Tabasco Sauce', '1 splash(es) Half and Half Cream']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. The cream should curdle up instantly. Shoot.

Name: Buffalo Sweat
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tabasco Sauce', '3/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix both ingredients in shot glass. This is a usual rite of passage drink for someone turning 21. If you want to make it a lowball its typical to have the same ingredients and add 1.5 oz bar rag juice ) This is what we give customers who ask for something 'different'

Name: Buffalo, Sweat and Tears
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Buffalo Trace Bourbon', '1/5 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Stir in a shot glass.

Name: Bug Shit

Name: Buldge

Name: Bull Blaster
