Making: Place the shot glass of Ketel One Vodka at the bottom of a highball glass. Fill the glass with Red Bull Energy Drink. Chug all at once.

Name: Bull Piss
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Orange Vodka', '3/4 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink', '2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Mix the Orange Vodka and Red Bull Energy Drink in a large glass. Fill a shot glass with Jagermeister and drop it into the Orange Vodka and Red Bull Energy Drink mixture and shoot.

Name: Bull Shoot
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. White Rum', '1/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Bull's Sweat
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Everclear', '1/4 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Layer Tabasco on top of Everclear in a shot glass, slam and hit the floor.

Name: Bulldozer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', 'Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Add a shot glass of Jagermeister to a Lowball glass half filled with Red Bull Energy Drink.

Name: Bullet To The Back Of The Head
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '2 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 Cherry']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. Bite into cherry at end of shot.

Name: Bulls Sweat
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 splash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '1 tsp. Worcestershire Sauce']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a shot glass, shoot it and keep something cold handy.

Name: Bumblebee
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stroh Rum', '1 oz. Cape Velvet Cream Liqueur', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Start with the Stroh Rum and layer in a shot glass.

Name: Bumpers
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 1/2 oz. Amaretto', '6 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into shot glasses. Makes 6 shots.

Name: Bundy Zapper
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka']
Making: Layer in order (Kahlua at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass.

Name: Bung Slinger
Ingredients: ["1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Orange Juice', '1/3 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: Bunker Buster Bomb
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 splash(es) 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour one half Kahlua and one half Hot Damn in a shot glass. Top with a splash of 151 and ingnite. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Burgarello Alter Boy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Scotch']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and top off with whipped cream. Drink without using your hands.

Name: Burning Bush
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Tequila', 'Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour the tequila into a rocks glass and add Tabasco until the drink turns pinkish in colour.

Name: Burning Cherry
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. George Dickel Tennessee Sour Mash', "1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine the George Dickel, Jack Daniels, and Jim Beam into a 2 oz. shot glass. Splash in the grenadine. Give a quick stir-spin with a straw or stir rod. Slam fast and hard. Exhale.

Name: Burning Cross
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Everclear']
Making: Add Hot Damn and Everclear to a shot glass. Ignite and quickly insert a straw and drink the shot through it. DON'T suck too hard on the straw as it is possible to suck up the flame once the alcohol is gone. BE VERY CAREFUL WITH FIRE.

Name: Burnt Liver
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 splash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour the Bacardi in a shot glass and add the Tabasco.

Name: Bushmaster
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Pina Colada', '2 oz. Pisang Ambon', '1 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and pour into two shot glasses.

Name: Busted Up Cart
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Butter Baby
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '3/4 oz. Butter Nips Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake all ingredients over ice, strain and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Butter F**ker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Butter Shots']
Making: Mix in shot glass, DON'T SNIFF, over the lips, past the gums, LOOK OUT TUMMY HERE IT COMES!

Name: Butterfly
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer the Butterscotch Schnapps, then the Bailey's Irish Cream in a shot glass.

Name: Butterscotch Sundae
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1 splash(es) Half and Half Cream', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix Butterscotch Snapps, Vanilla Vodka and half and half cream in a shot glass. Top with whipped cream and one half maraschino cherry.

Name: Buttery Jager Ripple
Ingredients: ['1/3 part(s) Jagermeister', '1/3 part(s) Irish Cream', '1/3 part(s) Butterscotch Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Buttery Nipple
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 Cherry stemless']
Making: Place the cherry at the bottom of a rocks glass. Mix and chill alcohol. Strain and pour over the cherry.

Name: Buttery Nipple # 3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', 'Half and Half Cream as desired']
Making: This can be a drink or shooter. Adjust amounts accordingly. Shake ingredients and serve over ice.

Name: Buttery Nipple #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making:
Pour schnapps into glass then slowly pour Bailey's Irish Cream against side of glass.
A Buttery Nipple is a very popular, very tasty shooter. If you aren’t familiar with what a shooter is, it is a small drink, usually between one and four ounces in size, that is meant to be consumed in one gulp. It can contain either one type of alcohol, or a combination of several that are presented either stirred, shaken, layered, or blended. The Buttery Nipple shooter is of the layered variety.
The name of a shooter can vary, and some are given fun, naughty names that are meant to shock the drinker. Case in point—the Buttery Nipple, which is also sometimes referred to as the even more vulgar Cocksucking Cowboy, or CS Cowboy.
The Buttery Nipple shooter has been quite popular for the last few years. In fact, as of 2004, it was among the most popular selections in clubs and pubs in Australia. So popular, in fact, that pre-made, sealed shot glasses, as well as kits filled with bottles of the drink’s ingredients, were made available under the CS Cowboy name.
As it was mentioned above, a Buttery Nipple is a layered shooter. In order to make the drink, you’ll need a shot glass, Butterscotch Schnapps, and your favorite type of Irish Cream.

Name: Buttery Nipple #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butter Shots', '1 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Shake well then pour over ice in a lowball glass.

Name: Buttery Nipple 43
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bols Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Cuarenta Y Tres', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in the given order and shoot.

Name: Buttery Nipples
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Fill bottom half of a shot glass with Butterschotch schnapps. Fill remaining half with vodka. Then shoot! A few of these and you'll be feeling right.

Name: Buttery Witch
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Buzzard's Breath
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur']
Making: Stir and strain into a shot glass.

Name: BVK
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Poor equal parts in a shot glass with the Kahula on the bottom. Smooth - rich - and you'll want more. Or enjoy over ice.

Name: Byrd Drop
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: C-4
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Curacao', '1/2 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1/2 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Pour the chocolate liqueur in shot glass, mix the other ingredients and pour them on top.

Name: C.o.y.t. (Come On Your Tits)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake in a shaker half-filled with ice until it is frosted, then strain into 5 shot glasses. This is a party and house pleaser.

Name: C.s.cowboy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour the schnapps into a shot glass and add the Bailey's using the back of a spoon (be careful not to mix).

Name: Caipiroska
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Lime Juice', 'Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Cajun Buzzard
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Margarita Mix']
Making: Fill a shot glass a little over half with Southern Comfort. Top with mix. It tastes like sweettarts candy.

Name: California Lemondrop
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'Sugar']
Making: Chill a shot of your favorite vodka and strain into a shot glass. Coat a lemon wedge in sugar. Shoot the vodka and suck the lemon. Unless you like vodka, this tastes like hell at first. But once you taste that lemon it goes down like candy.

Name: Calvin's Trip
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Calvados', '2 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Ignite and add cinnamon after extinguishing.

Name: Cam2 Racing Fuel Hell
Ingredients: ["2/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '2/3 oz. Everclear', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Mix the spirits and pour into a shot glass. Chase with Coca-Cola.

Name: Camel Driver

Making: Pour the Sambuca into a shot glass, then layer the Bailey's Irish Cream over a spoon into the same glass.

Name: Camels Snot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Red Wine', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour each into a separate shot glass. Shoot the Bailey's Irish Cream and hold it in your mouth. Then shoot the red wine and swish them together like you would mouthwash. Then chew and swallow. This is guaranteed to make any lady sick. See also the 'Cement Mixer'

Name: Canadian Crippler

Making: After warming Canadian Mist for 30 seconds in a microwave, immediately pour in Mountain Dew. The mixture of hot and cold will create your fog. Knock it back all at once.

Name: Canadian Ice

Making: Pour all four whiskeys into a shot glass then add the crème de menthe.

Name: Canadian Sunrise
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Rye Whiskey']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Candy Apple
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cabana Boy Cherry Rum', '3/4 oz. Apple Pucker', '3 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Shake over ice, strain and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Candy Apples

Making: Pour in order (butterscotch schnapps first) in a shot glass. Savour the taste of these sweet and simple shots.

Name: Candy Cane #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Candy Cane Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Grenadine', 'Tequila']
Making: Mix in a shooter glass then float tequilla on top.

Name: Candyshots
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Candyshot Syrup (Your favourite flavour)', '5 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix ingredients well and chill. Serve ICE cold as a shooter.

Name: Canitas

Making: In a small shot or juice glass add 10 Cane and espresso. Add sugar, if using. Garnish with fresh whipped cream, if desired.

Name: Cannonball #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Cannonball #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass (Midori at the bottom) and shoot.

Name: Capitan Coke
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Rum", '1/2 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Cappuccino Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Coconut Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass starting with Kahlua.

Name: Captain Jack
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", 'Beer (Coors Light)']
Making: Pour ingredients in an iced shot glass and chase with a cold Coors Light.

Name: Captain Louie
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '2 drop(s) Vanilla Extract']
Making: Mix in order: Rum, drop, Kahlua, drop

Name: Captain On Acid

Making: Mix Rum, Blue Curacao and Pineapple juice. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Layer grenadine at bottom of glass.

Name: Captain's Longshot
Ingredients: ["1/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/4 oz. Butter Shots', '1/4 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Tuaca', '1/4 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Car Bomb #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 pint(s) Guinness']
Making: Layer the Jameson's and Bailey's in a shot glass and drop it into the Guiness, then drink.

Name: Car Bomb #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Cream', '12 oz. Guinness']
Making: Drop Irish Cream into the Guinness and drink.

Name: Car Bomb (not Irish)
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Guinness']
Making: Layer the Bailey's over the Kahlua in a shot glass and drop it into the glass of Guinness.

Name: Car Crash
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and slam it back.

Name: Caramel Apple
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']

Name: Caramel Apple #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Apple Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a large shot glass.

Name: Carberator Cleaner
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Fill shot glass with Everclear. Add a splash of grenadine.

Name: Carbomb
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1/2 pint(s) Guinness']
Making: Pour Bailey's, Kahlua and Jamesons' in order in a shot glass (Bailey's at the bottom). Drop or slide the shot into a half pint of Guinness Stout. The shot, if dropped in carefully, looks like a Guinness inside a Guinness. The Carbomb is to be consumed in one long swallow. Mind your teeth as the shot slides forward. The incredible taste is worth the risk.

Name: Caribbean Shooter
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Spiced Rum', '1/2 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake over rocks. Strain.

Name: Carmel Apple
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Apple Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps']
Making: Shake with cracked ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Carmel F**king Apple
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butterscotch Ripple Schnapps', '1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in order in a martini glass and enjoy. This is not a sipping drink

Name: Carolina Blue Bitch
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Cheer for UNC Chapel Hill.

Name: Carpenters Nightmare
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 dash(es) Baileys Irish Cream']

Name: Carrot Cake #1

Name: Carrot Cake #3

Making: Layer in the given order. Marvel in its delight!

Name: Carry Me Home
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Butterscotch Ripple Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Milk', 'dash(es) Kahlua']
Making: Build in a shot glass. It tastes just like a Caramilk bar.

Name: Cassie And Lauras Striptease
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix together starting with the tequila and finishing with the scnhapps. Great tasting suprise.

Name: Cat's Tongue
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chocolate Brandy', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Mint Brandy']
Making: Layer in order and shoot.

Name: Catholic School Girl
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Layer Rumple Minze over the Blue Curacao and Peach Schnapps in a shot glass.

Name: Cellulite Shot
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Whiskey', "1/4 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", "1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Irish Cream', "1/4 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", 'dash(es) Sugar (Optional)']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a shot glass and add the sugar. The Irish Cream should look like a blob of fat. This tastes a lot better than it looks.

Name: Cement Mixer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Pour the Bailey's and lime juice into separate jiggers. Take the Bailey's in your mouth and without swallowing pour in the lime juice. The result is the feeling of cement growing in your mouth. You will want to spit out but when you swallow the taste is great.

Name: Cement Mixer #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Lemon Juice (Or lime)']
Making: Swish lemon juice in your mouth then swallow. Take the shot of Irish Cream and let it sit in your mouth. Swallow when you can't stand it anymore!

Name: Cement Mixer #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Do not mix! Serve in two separate shot glasses. Hold Bailey's shot in your mouth while preparing the vodka shot. Swish. It becomes a cottage-cheesy type texture. A great shot for birthdays!

Name: Cement Mixer #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shoot and mix in the mouth. Swollow after 10 count. Will become like cottage cheese. Enjoy!

Name: Cement Mixer 4#
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Lime Liqueur']
Making: Pour the Bailey's into your mouth. Follow with the line, swish and swallow.

Name: Cerebral Hemorrhage
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour Kahlua and Peach Schnapps into a shot glass. Drop in the Bailey's Irish Cream and add a splash of grenadine.

Name: Cerveau

Making: Pour the schnapps in a shooter glass and then add the Bailey's. Add the drop of grenadine. The curdled Bailey's will look like a brain floating in the schnapps.

Name: Chair Shot

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Light (optional), drink, fall down. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Channel 64
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Advocaat']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Charlie Brown
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/32 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Chattham Connection
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot!

Name: Cheech Kiss
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1/3 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Milk']
Making: Mix ingredients in shaker with ice. Strain into a shooter glass.

Name: CheeChee Wanga
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum"]
Making: Pour equal parts into a shot glass. Drink as a shot.

Name: Cheerleader Rum
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine in a shot glass and let it settle. Nice aftertaste.

Name: Cheese Cake Shot

Making: Mix in a shot glass and devour.

Name: Chemical Reaction
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Layer ingredients, in order given in a shot glass.

Name: Cherry Blossom #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/3 oz. Sherry', '1/3 oz. Rum Cream Liqueur']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Cherry Bomb

Making: In stemmed martini glass place a Maraschino cherry without the stem. Layer Cherry liquer and Strawberry Cream Liquer. Drip Fresh Cream. Sprinkle with Rainbow Vermicelli. Drip Cherry Syrup on Cream.

Name: Cherry Bomb #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Canadian Club 6 Year Old', '1/2 oz. Cherry Whiskey']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Cherry Bombs
Ingredients: ['Everclear', 'Maraschino Cherries', 'Beer']
Making: Drain liquid from bottle of cherries and fill the bottle with Everclear. Let sit 1 day to a week depending on desired strength. When cherries are ready, fill a 2 oz. Shooter glass 3/4 full of beer and drop cherry in. Slam whole thing down. Chew the cherry and enjoy.

Name: Cherry Cheesecake
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1 1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into two shot glasses.

Name: Cherry Cheesecake #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour the ingredients in order into a shot glass.

Name: Cherry F**k
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Everclear', '1/2 oz. Vodka (Preferably 100 proof vodka)', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Layer with grenadine at bottom then add the Everclear then the vodka and finish with another layer of grenadine.

Name: Cherry Hutch
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '4 oz. Trop Twister Cherry Berry Blast']
Making: Mix then drink as fast as you can.

Name: Cherry Key Lime Pie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Ke Ke Beach Key Lime Cream Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Cream', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake all the ingredients with ice (except the grenadine) and pour into shot glasses. Add the grenadine until the bottom of the shot is light pink.

Name: Cherry Limeade #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cherry Pucker', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Cherry Limeade #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cherry Pucker', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '7-Up (Or Sprite)']
Making: Shake the alcohol with ice and strain over ice into a collins glass. Fill with 7-Up, stir and drink.

Name: Cherry Nipples
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca (Red)', '1 splash(es) Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Float Bailey's on Sambuca and shoot.

Name: Cherry Popper #4
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. 7-Up (Cherry flavoured)']
Making: Combine over ice in a shot glass. Slam on table and drink before fizz goes down.

Name: Cherry Screwdriver
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Grenadine', 'dash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the vodka first in a shot glass, then the orange juice and slowly add the grenadine. Wait until it separates in 3 layers.

Name: Cherry Shake #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Cherry Whiskey', '1/3 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Cherry Smurf
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '2 3/4 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink (The Red Edition)']
Making: Pour into a two part shot glass.

Name: CherryBomb
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Coffee Liqueur', '2 part(s) Cherry Liqueur', '4 part(s) Cognac']
Making: Measure into jug and mix well then pour into shooter glasses - delicious!

Name: Cherrybuster
Ingredients: ['1/2 bottle(s) Rumple Minze']
Making: Fill the bottle of Rumple Minze with Maraschino cherries and chill overnight. Serve in a shot glass with a maraschino cherry.

Name: Chheranoble
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. An awesome drink from the Long Branch, Saskatoon. Thanks to a guy named Rick.

Name: Chi Phi
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Chick-lit
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spearmint Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Mix over ice and strain into a shot glass. Robin's comment: It tastes like the gum!

Name: Chicken With Lips
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Serve in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Chillie Willy
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Amaretto', '1 dash(es) Triple Sec', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Chill ingredients and pour in order into a shot glass.

Name: Chilly Willy
Ingredients: ['1 tsp. Vodka (Chilled)']
Making: Use a shot glass with a concave base. Flip glass upside down and snort. Yes, through your nose.

Name: China White
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and dust with cinnamon. Shoot.

Name: Chlorinated Spa
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Choclate Cake Shot
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Pour in a shot glass. After taking the shot suck on a lemon wedge and it will taste exactly like a choclate cake.

Name: Chocolate Cake
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Shake with ice then bit into a lemon wedge dipped in powered sugar. Hold juice in mouth then shot.

Name: Chocolate Cake #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '3/4 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Coat rim of a shot glass with sugar. Fill with vodka and Frangelico. Coat a lemon slice in sugar. Take the shot and then bite the lemon.

Name: Chocolate Cake Shots
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. Dip a lemon wedge into sugar and bite into the lemon keeping some of the juices in your mouth. Take the shot. Tastes just like Chocolate Cake!!!

Name: Chocolate Candy Cane
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chocolate Milk', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Mix together in a shot glass and slam.

Name: Chocolate Cherry
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass (Kahlua first then Amaretto, float Baileys on top). For an extra kick drop in a cherry!

Name: Chocolate Chip
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/3 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Chocolate Chip Oatmeal Cookie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps']
Making: Shake over ice, strain and pour into a large shot glass.

Name: Chocolate Covered Almond
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. White Cacao', '1 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Chocolate Covered Banana
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1 oz. Coquila Tequila Cream Liqueur']
Making: Pour in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Chocolate Covered Banana #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Mix over ice in a mixer, serve and enjoy.

Name: Chocolate Covered Cherry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Using a shot glass, layer in order - starting with Grenadine, Kahlua and finally, Irish Cream.

Name: Chocolate Covered Cherry #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Mix liqueurs with ice to chill. Strain into a shot glass and add grenadine.

Name: Chocolate Covered Cherry #4
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Layer in order (grenadine at the bottom of the glass) in a chilled shot glass.

Name: Chocolate Creamed Cherry
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', 'Grenadine', 'Whipped Cream', 'Maraschino Cherries']
Making: Place a cherry in the bottom of a shot glass. Pour in enough grenadine to cover the cherry. Then layer the whipped cream(aerosol type) to cover the cherry and grenadine. Then top with Godiva. Then shoot it!

Name: Chocolate Hurricane
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Pour the coconut rum into a shot glass. Add the Godiva next so it swirls through the thicker rum. If poured from a slight height, the Godiva swirls nicely. We have found our tall/skinny shot glasses look cooler. HINT: Keeping the rum in the freezer ensures a thicker liquid, and thus a slower swirl. (It will NOT get slushy or frozen, however :-} ) ENJOY!!

Name: Chocolate Jelly Ring
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Godiva Chocolate Cream Liqueur', '2/3 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Raspberry Schnapps']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass. Enjoy!

Name: Chocolate Kiss
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's French Kiss Vanilla Schnapps", '1/4 oz. Frangelico', '1 wedge(s) Lemon']
Making: Suck the lemon juice out of the lemon and drink (with juice still in the mouth). Swish if you like and swallow!

Name: Chocolate Macedamia
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1 splash(es) Cream']
Making: Shake until ice cold then pour into a shot glass.

Name: Chocolate Martini #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shooter glass. Shoot!

Name: Chocolate Milk #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chocolate Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Milk']
Making: In large shot glass, put the milk in the bottom, then the liqueur, and add Amaretto. Do not mix. Shoot.

Name: Chocolate Monk
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice.

Name: Chocolate Orange
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Creme de Cacao dark', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', 'Cream or whipping cream']
Making: Mix Crème de Caco and Triple Sec in a shot glass and top with thin layer of cream.

Name: Chocolate Sundae
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Layer and top with a dab of whipped cream. Shoot!

Name: Chocolate Topper
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Creme de Cacao white']
Making: Layer in order - Kahlua, Irish Cream and white Crème de Cacao in a shot glass.

Name: Chpok
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Champagne', '2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Pour vodka then champagne with care into a shot glass. Put your hand on top of the glass and shake fast. Shoot!

Name: Christian's Kamikazi
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Mix and strain into a shot glass. This goes down easy so mix as much as you want. Hell, go buy a bottle!

Name: Christmas Kiss
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Fill a shot glass halfway with Kahlua and top off with Chambord. Sit back and enjoy.

Name: Christmas Tree
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe green', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in order listed in a shot glass..

Name: Chunkmeisteretto
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto (Preferably Di Saronna)', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Layer them carefully in a shot glass, or whatever, and drink up!

Name: Chunky Monkey
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '3/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1 splash(es) Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Chill with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Cinna Burst
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Goldschlager', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Shannon says: It tastes like a Cinnaburst chewing gum, but hotter than hell. Oh and it gives you good breath.

Name: CinnaBee Sting Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Barenjager Honey Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Carefully layer in a tall shot glass or shooter glass in the order given (Barenjager at the bottom).

Name: Cinnamon Apple Pie
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Spiced Rum', '1 part(s) Apple Cider', '1 sprinkle(s) Cinnamon', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Fill shot glass 2/3 full with spiced rum fill the rest of the way with apple cider and sprinkle cinnamon on top. Follow with a mouthful of whipped cream either sprayed directly into your mouth or licked from a body part (yours or someone else's) of your choice.

Name: Cinnamon Starf**ks
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Layer in order (Kahlua at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass.

Name: Cirrus Cooler
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi Light Rum', '1/3 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake ingredients over ice. Strain into a 7 oz. rocks glass Serve as a shot.

Name: Citron 40
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Metz', '1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '3 drop(s) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and add a few drops of bitters. Very refreshing!

Name: CJ's Chocolate Covered Cherry
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Clam Shot
Ingredients: ['3 part(s) Rolling Rock Beer', '2 tsp. Cocktail Sauce (Seafood)', '1 Clam (Frsh and Raw)']
Making: Fill a martini glass 3/4's with beer. Stir in 2 teaspoons of cocktail sauce and drop in raw clam. Try to swallow without chewing!!!

Name: Classical Rabbit
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Mix and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Clay Pigeon
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and serve. Jason's comment: This drink is fun. Have someone fix the drink, then tell them to _pull_! The server will slide the shooter across the counter, then you catch it and shoot it.

Name: Cleveland Steamer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into no less than two shot glasses. Enjoy!!

Name: Clint's Socioeconomic Background #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '5 drop(s) Beer']
Making: Mix liquors equally, and sprinkle beer on top of shot glass.

Name: Clint's Socioeconomic Background #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Mad Dog 20/20 (Grape)', '2 drop(s) Malt Liquor (OE if available)']
Making: Combine in order in a shot glass. This is basically a shot when liquor is low and drunkenness is high.

Name: Clitty Litter
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass (vodka at the bottom of the glass). The Bailey's will curdle a bit to provide the litter. This is a variation of the Violet Thong which is a variation of the Silk Panty.

Name: Cluster F*ck
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Southern Comfort', '1 part(s) Peach Schnapps', '1 part(s) Apple Schnapps', '1 part(s) Midori', '1 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 part(s) White Rum', '1 part(s) Amaretto', 'Orange Juice', 'Pineapple Juice', 'Grenadine']
Making: Mix equal parts of all liquors. Add orange juice and pineapple juice to taste. Add just enough grenadine to turn the drink pinkish red. Shake and pour into shot glasses.

Name: Cobleskill Badass
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix and shoot fast.

Name: Cocaine Cocktail
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Cocaine Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Cocao Brain
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', 'Chocolate Sauce']
Making: This is just like a bloody brain or brain hemorage but substitute grenadine for chocolate sauce!l Layer Irish Cream on Peach schnapps. Pour the chocolate sauce in the center. ( The sauce pulls some of the Irish Cream to the bottom to make it look like a Brain stem!!)

Name: Cock Sucking Cowboy
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Fill a shot glass with the butterscotch schnapps and then float the Bailey’s on top with a teaspoon.

Name: Cock-sucking Cowboy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour the schnapps into a shot glass and then float the Bailey's over the back of the spoon. Shoot! Yes it's a rude name...But very popular especially down-under

Name: Cockroach
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Combine over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Cockroach Killer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Cactus Juice']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and shoot!

Name: Cocoa Puff
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: Coconut Cream Pie
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and garnish with whipped cream.

Name: Code Red Storm
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1/2 oz. Mountain Dew Code Red']
Making: Mix together in shot glass. Slam back. It's awesome.

Name: Cointreau Gargler
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Pour the Cointreau directly into your mouth, gargle for 5 seconds, swallow and then immediately take a deep breath through teeth (jaw closed). WOW! who needs energy drinks?!

Name: Cokuhalua
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Coca Cola', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Layer and shoot.

Name: Cold Bitchy Blonde
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto (Chilled)', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort (Chilled)']
Making: Shake with ice then pour into a shot glass.

Name: Cold Coochie
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Southern Comfort', '1 part(s) Milk']
Making: Fill a glass with ice and half fill with Southern Comfort. Top up with milk. Mix and serve chilled.

Name: Collegian Stress Solution
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Just put in shot glass confess sins and drink. Avoid flame. Used by members of the Massachusetts Daily Collegian to deal with stress.

Name: Coma
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Sambuca (Black)', '1/3 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Comfortable F**k
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker']
Making: Mix together (cold is better).

Name: Cool Aid Shooter
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', '1 1/4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix well in shaker tumbler over ice and serve in large shooter glass.Happy Trails!

Name: Cool Grand
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Consuming Grand Marnier straight as a shot is a ritual to embrace. Chilling Grand Marnier adds smoothness and brings forth the orange notes in the spirit.

Name: COOTER BROWN
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Pour in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: CopaBanana
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake well and pour into shot glasses.

Name: Copper Camel
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass (use a spoon to add the Bailey's). Goes down nice and smooth!

Name: Copper Mine
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. Tia Maria', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass - Frangelico, Tia Maria , Bailey's Irish Cream.

Name: Copperhead
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Combine in a rock glass and serve. Enjoy! Got this recipe from a couple of Oklahoma boys. Thanks guys!

Name: Corazon Snake Bite
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Corazon Tequila Anejo', '1 part(s) Irish Whiskey Michael Collins', '4 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Corazon Tequila Sunrise
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Corazon Tequila Blanco', '1 part(s) Seltzer Water', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1/2 part(s) Creme de Cassis', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix in a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with a cherry and an orange twist.

Name: Cosmopolitan #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Cotton Candy #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butterscotch Ripple Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Cream (Or milk)', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Cotton Candy Shooters
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka (Ice cold)', '1 Candy (1 batch of flavored cotton candy. Yes, the kind in a bag works fine)']
Making: Pour the chilled vodka into a lowball glass. Tear off a walnut sized piece of cotton candy and toss in the vodka, then swirl until dissolved, a few seconds. Shoot. Repeat.

Name: Cough Drop
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Pour butterscotch schnapps in shot glass and build with creme de menthe.

Name: Cowboy Cocksucker
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Goldschlager']
Making: Blend in shot glass. Serve.

Name: Cowboy Cocksucker #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass.

Name: Cowboy Creeper
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass - enjoy!

Name: Cowboy Killer
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Butter Shots', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Cowboy Killer 2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', 'Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour the Yukon Jack and Wild Turkey into a shot glass. Lace the top with Tabasco Sauce. Bring to the customer and light it up. Be careful not to spill though. Blow out flame and drink.

Name: Coyote
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix in shaker with ice, shake well, and strain into a shot glass. Should be a bright teal color, and very smooth.

Name: Crackhouse
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: Cranberry Delight
Ingredients: ['5 oz. Vodka', '5 oz. Cranberry Ginger Ale']
Making: Pour over ice into a blender. Add a little sugar for extra sweetness.

Name: Crazy Astronaut
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 tsp. Tang Drink Mix']
Making: Mix in stolen dining hall glass and shoot.

Name: Crazy Comet
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Crazy Jamaicans
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wray & Nephew Overproof Rum', '1 oz. Appleton Estate Extra 12 Year Old Jamaica Rum']
Making: Mix the rums and shoot! You might want to chase with a Red Stripe beer unless you like your throat on fire! Learned this while on spring break in Negril.

Name: Crazy Kearns
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Midori', '1 part(s) Banana Liqueur', '1 part(s) Frangelico', '1 part(s) Tequila', '1 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 part(s) Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and let ingredients mix on their own.

Name: Crazy Train
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. 7-Up', '1 oz. Crown Royal']
Making: Pour each ingredient in a different shot glass and shoot one shot after the other in order. If you like this drink, please email Brett.

Name: Creamy Blue Balls
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Creamy Joe
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/4 oz. Butter Shots', '1/8 oz. Kahlua', '1/8 oz. Godiva Chocolate Cream Liqueur']
Making: Add ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake for 7 seconds and pour into a 1 1/2 oz. shot glass. Enjoy!

Name: Creature Of The Night
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 tsp. Instant Coffee', '1/3 oz. Water (Hot)']
Making: Put the hot water in a heatproof shooter glass and add the instant coffee. Mix well until the instant coffee is liquid. Pour over the vodka. Serve. A few of these will truly make you a Creature of the Night. Make sure you don't use coffee without caffeine.

Name: Creeper
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', "1/2 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Combine in shaker w/ ice and swirl. Best chilled.

Name: Creeping Death
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. White Rum', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Mix the peach and the vodka in one shot glass, and the rum and Kahlua in another. Slam both of them in order and quickly.

Name: Creme Your Jeans
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. Put your thumb and index finger around the shot glass, lick the rim and suck it down!

Name: Crescent Creamer
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Creme de Cacao', "1/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Prepare in a shot glass. Layer each ingredient in the order listed. It should be consumed as a full shot (don't sip it). It is very smooth and has a nice aftertaste. Proper etiquette is to pour out at least 5 or 6 at a time and have everybody take a shot after an appropriate toast. This drink was created (well it evolved out of B-52) at a camping trip at Crescent Lake, Oregon roughly around 1990. In our crowd it is still a party favorite.

Name: Crispy Crunch
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Mix half and half in a shot glass.

Name: Crispy Crunch #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a shot glass. Greg's comment: If done properly a _crisp_ will form around the edges of the shot glass, the longer you shake over ice the more _crisp_ you'll get.

Name: Crispy Crunch #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Crocodile Cooler #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Cross-Cultural Black Russian
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Tia Maria', '1/3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Crown Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Crown Royal', 'Sugar']
Making: Coat the rim of a shot glass with sugar. Pour amaretto and Crown Royal into a shaker and shake with ice. Strain into the shot glass and enjoy.

Name: Crown Hooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a tall shot glass.

Name: Crown Smoothie
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Crown Royal', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake in shaker until frothy and srain into a rocks glass.

Name: Cruzan Caribbean Dream
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 part(s) Cruzan Blueberry Lemonade Rum', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', '1/2 part(s) Cream']
Making: Combine all ingredients over ice in a cocktail shaker. Shake vigorously for 10 seconds and double strain into a fluted shot glass. Garnish with freshly grated cinnamon and a speared Maraschino cherry.

Name: Crystal Head Headstone
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Crystal Head Vodka', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Combine both in a shot glass and garnish with a lemon slice.

Name: Crystal Virgin
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Yukon Jack', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix with ice and then strain into shot glasses.

Name: Cuban Cocktail Jiggle Shots
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Rum', '1 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '1 package(s) JELLO (Lemon)', '1 package(s) JELLO (Lime)']
Making: Mix the ingredients, pour in 2 oz. shot glasses and refrigerate.

Name: Cuban Tropicano
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Midori', '1/6 oz. Beer', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/5 oz. Lemonade', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix and shoot away on a hot summers day.

Name: Cucaracha
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Kahlua', '3/4 oz. Tequila Gold', '1 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and ignite. Blow out flame and drink.

Name: Cuervo Green Ghoul
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur']
Making: In shot glass, pour Tequila and fill with Melon Liqueur.

Name: Cuervomeister
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cuervo Tequila', '1 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot. I guarantee that it'll kick!!

Name: Cum F**k Me
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass, light up and shoot. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Cum In A Hot Tub
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Orange Juice', '3/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour Bailey's Irish Cream into the middle of orange juice in a shot glass.

Name: Cum On My Tits
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Fill one shot glass with creme de cacao and the other with the cream. With this shooter, it's all in how it's done. Get your partner... (preferably Female) to tilt their head back and open their mouth. Take both shot glasses and pour them into your partners mouth at the same time...The drink gets it's name from the fact that it can sometimes get a little messy, and the spillage looks kinda like cum running down your neck and chest... Hence, Cum on my Tits…

Name: Cyclone #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Amarula Cream Liqueur (Or any other cream liqueur)']
Making: Mix in a double shot glass. Keep the liquid in your mouth for 30 seconds and swallow slowly.

Name: Cyclone #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Amarula Cream Liqueur (Or any other cream liqueur)']
Making: Mix in a double shot glass. Keep the liquid in your mouth for 30 seconds and swallow slowly.

Name: D-Day
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into a shaker full of ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass. Warning.......After the first shot, your legs should start to tingle from the knees down.

Name: D.O.A.
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Barenjager Honey Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Rumple Minze', '3/4 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Pour liqueur in order listed and layer. Serve and shoot.

Name: Dagger
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao']
Making: Layer and shoot.

Name: Dallas Stars
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Dam Im F**kedUp
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin']
Making: Mix in shot glass in exact order listed. Take 2-3 shots and you'll be saying "DamImF**kedUp!".

Name: Dam Jager!
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Damiana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Pour the Damiana into a shot glass. While tilting the glass slightly (or using the back of a barspoon) slowly pour in the Jagermeister so it floats on top.

Name: Damn Brewsky
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 oz. Lambrusco (Riunite)']
Making: Pour in shot glass and drink quickly. Make sure you have a friend to tell you what you look like.

Name: Damn Jose
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Damn Rose
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila Rose', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Damned If You Do
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Pour into shot glass. Shoot!

Name: Dana's Bottle Cap
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', '1/2 oz. 7-Up', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Drop a shooter glass with schnapps and sourpuss into a glass with 7-Up and lime juice. Slam.

Name: Darby O'Gill
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', "1/4 oz. Lime Juice (Preferably Rose's)"]
Making: Mix in a shot glass smeared inside and on its lip with real lime and reuse!

Name: Dark Nightmare
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/8 oz. Goldschlager', '1/8 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix milk last. Stir.

Name: DC-3
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Sambuca', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer and shoot

Name: DC-9
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Sambuca', '1/3 oz. Rum Cream Liqueur']
Making: Layer and shoot

Name: Dead Bird
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Jagermeister', '2/3 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Combine in shot glass and enjoy (btw. a chaser of anything is recommended...)

Name: Dead Jellyfish
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Curacao', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 dash(es) Advocaat', '2 drop(s) Raspberry Cordial or Grenadine']
Making: Layer in order - Midori, Curacao and Bailey's Irish Cream in a shot glass. Add a dash of Advocaat and a few drops of Raspberry Cordial (or Grenadine) - optional.

Name: Dead Mexican Goat
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Milk', '1 dash(es) Tabasco Brand Garlic Pepper Sauce']
Making: Mix in shot glass and enjoy.

Name: Dead Nazi #1
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '2/3 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Pre-chill the liqueurs. Pour Rumple Minze into shot glass and add Jagermeister.

Name: Dead Nazi #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', "1 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's Fireball"]
Making: Build in lowball glass. Shoot.

Name: Dead Nazi At Stalingrad
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka']
Making: Mix into a shot glass.

Name: Dead Rabbit
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '3 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour in a shot glass.

Name: Dead Rose
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila Rose', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Deadly Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cuervo Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Mix Cuervo Tequila and Peach Schnapps over ice. Strain into a shot glass. Float cream on top.

Name: DeAnza
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up (Or Sprite)']
Making: Pour the melon liqueur, the Grand Marnier, the pineapple juice, and the Sweet and Sour Mix over ice in a shaker. Shake well and strain into a shot glass. Top with splash of 7-Up or Sprite.

Name: Death By Axe
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Death By Sex
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into shot glasses.

Name: Death Drink
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Everclear', '2 oz. Whiskey', '2 oz. Absinthe', '2 Beer']
Making: Mix together, pour into shot glasses and shoot whenever you don't want to remember the rest of your night. Believe us, our pledges know.

Name: Death From Above
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Death is only the Beginning
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 oz. Gin (Preferably Sapphire Gin)', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Sprite', '1/2 oz. Fruit Punch']
Making: Mix with ice in a pitcher and serve in shot glasses. Shoot.

Name: Death on Ice
Ingredients: ['1/4 part(s) Everclear', '1/4 part(s) Jagermeister', "1/4 part(s) Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 part(s) Southern Comfort']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Death Row
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Death Row #2
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 splash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Death To A Bouncer
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. E & J VS Brandy', '1/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Rumple Minze', 'Beer']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and chase with a glass of beer.

Name: Death To The Drinker
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Mix together in a shot glass.

Name: Death Wish
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', "1 oz. Boodle's Gin", '1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1 tsp. Grenadine']
Making: Add the Everclear then the rum followed by the gin and Jagermeister. Then gently pour the grenadine over the top. Must be served in a tall shooter glass while humming the tune from Deliverance. Get ready to Squeal..

Name: Death Wish On ACID
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Grenadine', '1 part(s) Midori', '1 part(s) Rumple Minze or peppermint schnapps', '1 part(s) Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1 part(s) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer each ingredient proportionately in order given in a shot glass.

Name: Deathwish
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Decadence
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in order (Kahlua at the bottom of the glass).

Name: Deep Cool
Ingredients: ['1 oz. After Shock Liqueur']
Making: Pour a shot of After Shock and put it in your mouth but don't swallow it. Then swish it around for 1 minute. Gargel it in your mouth without swallowing. Repeat this 5 times and swallow immediatley. Take a DEEP BREATH...............Burn baby burn!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Name: Deep Throat
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Top with whipped cream. Serve.

Name: DeesNuts
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Mad Melon Watermelon Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', "1/3 oz. Fruit Juice (Nantucket Nectar's Orange Pinapple Guava juice)"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Deez Nutz
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Jack says : when the person asks you what they're drinking, grab your crotch, point, and say …deez nutz!

Name: Demotivator
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '2 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Combine Midori, Malibu and Sweet and Sour. Shake and strain into a martini glass. Carefully pour a couple of drops of Grenadine into bottom of the glass. Combine 151 and Blue Caracao. Shake and float on top. Insert a straw into the bottom of the glass and suck it down like a Mind Eraser. Everyone loves this drink. It may take some practice but it is worth it.

Name: Dennis The Menace
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Sambuca (Black)']
Making: Pour the After Shock into the shot glass. Then (very carefully!) pour in the sambuca. The two should stay separate. Named after the red and black t-shirted cheeky chap, this cheeky shooter will fight back!

Name: Depp Charge
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Beer', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Drop shot glass with Kahlua into beer and drink. Do not pour.

Name: Depth Charge #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Chartreuse', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Depth Charge #2
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Beer', '1 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Very slowly place a full shot glass of Drambuie into full pint glass. Wait till glass of Drambuie sinks to the bottom of pint. Clear an area 2 metres around yourself and down the pint in a oner. (GOOD LUCK) The record I know of so far is 3.5.

Name: Depth Charge #4
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Beer', '1 oz. Root Beer Schnapps (Chilled)']
Making: Drop the shot glass of chilled root beer schnapps into a glass of beer, shoot and smile!

Name: Depth Charge #5
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 pint(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Pour the Jagermeister into a shot glass. Drop the shot glass in the pint glass filled with Red Bull and chug. It's a great shot. You get a buzz from the alcohol and you get plenty of energy from the Red Bull so you can party all night!!! This is definitely a locals favorite!!

Name: Desert Skies #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/3 oz. Rum Cream Liqueur']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Desperate Times
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '2 oz. Sunny Delight Orange Juice']
Making: Pretend its a Tequilla shot. Lick your hand or wrist and pour salt on it. Next take 2 shot glasses and fill one with the Brandy and the other with the Sunny delight Orange Juice. Lick the salt, drink the Brandy then the Sunny Delight Orange Juice.

Name: Destiny
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Devil Shot
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Martini and Rossi Bianco', '1/3 oz. Vodka', "1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Pour the very cool Martini in a shot glass. Then add chilled vodka over the back of a spoon. Do the same with the Jack Daniels! At the end take a lighter and make that the Jack burn. Webmixer's Note: Make sure flame is out before drinking. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Devil's Blow Job
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Devils Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '3 Coffee Beans']
Making: Put the coffee beans in the bottom of a shooter glass and add the sambuca. Light the sambuca on fire and swirl the contents. Place a hand firmly over the top of the flaming glass to put the fire out (the glass should be vacuum sealed to your hand). Place the glass to your mouth and huff the alcohol fumes. Drown the extremely hot sambuca. Leave the beans in the glass. 7 of these will put you out! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Devo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Blackberry Brandy']
Making: Serve in a shot glass in the order given above. Shoot!

Name: Diablo #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Green Chartreuse', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'Beer (Optional)']
Making: Mix in a shot glass, shot and chase with a beer (or not!).

Name: Diamondback Rattlesnake
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 1/2 tsp. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in order (Kahlua on the bottom) in a shot glass. Bradd explains: This drink is very similar to the Rattlesnake number 2 listed in the shooters guide. However, some bartenders in Louisville, KY, used to float a small amount (1 - 1.5 teaspoons) of Bacardi 151 on top; hence the "Diamondback" added onto the name.

Name: Dick In The Dirt
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in order given in a shot glass. Ignite the Bacardi 151 Proof Rum and enjoy. It will live up to it's name. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE!!!

Name: Dick Slap
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 oz. Apple Schnapps', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Shake and strain into shot glass .. top with whipped cream.

Name: Diesel Fuel
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Jagermeister', '1/2 part(s) Rum']
Making: Combine and shake ingredients over ice. Strain into a shot glass.

Name: Dildo Bashers
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sambuca', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Fill a shot glass with the Sambuca and then float the Bailey’s on top with a teaspoon.

Name: Dilemma
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Cherry Brandy (Or Cherry Whiskey)']
Making: Layer in order (raspberry first) in a shot glass.

Name: Dilly Bar
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Tastes just like a Dairy Queen Dilly Bar!

Name: Dinner Mint
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Green Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Dirty Banana
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Shaken hard on ice in a mixer. Strain into a shooter glass.

Name: Dirty Banana #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Mix over ice, serve and enjoy.

Name: Dirty Blonde
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Lemon', '1 oz. Sprite']
Making: Mix in shot glass and relax. It will hit you when you aren't expecting it.

Name: Dirty Bong Water #2
Ingredients: ["1/3 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/3 oz. Peach', '1/3 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', 'dash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. To make it a drink, serve over ice and top off with 7-Up.

Name: Dirty Butt
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass (Southern Comfort at the bottom).

Name: Dirty Butthole
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1 tsp. Corn nuts (Ground)']
Making: Combine all the ingredients in a wine glass. Must be shot lukewarm.

Name: Dirty Cement Mixer
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Lemon Juice', '2/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', "1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Take the 2/3 oz. of Baileys mix in a shot glass with the 1/3 oz. of lemon juice. In another shot glass mix the 151 rum, Jack Daniel's and tequila. Take the first shot and hold in your mouth. Then take the second shot and mix together and swallow. Then watch your frat brother run for the bathroom. Shout out to the Theo's gang! Elvis

Name: Dirty Cowboy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer, Bailey's on top.

Name: Dirty German
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Dirty Girl Scout
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe green']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass...and enjoy!

Name: Dirty Girl Scout #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour in a shot glass, mix (it'll look a cool greenish color) and slam.

Name: Dirty Girl Scout Cookie
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1 dash(es) Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Pour the choclolate syrup on top. Shoot.

Name: Dirty Hairy Snatch
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '3/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', "3/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum (Silver)", '1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka']
Making: Mix and shoot. Devo adds: Just like going down on one, plug your nose and take it like a man.

Name: Dirty Hooker # 2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/3 oz. Lime Juice', '1/3 oz. Creme de Banane']
Making: Shake in a tin with ice and enjoy. Very fruity taste.

Name: Dirty Kirmit
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1 1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', 'Milk']
Making: Add liqueurs and milk to ice in shaker and shake. Strain into a shooter glass.

Name: Dirty Navel
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Dirty Nipple
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Sambuca', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer into shot glass. Bailey's on top.

Name: Dirty Old Fruit
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Chocolate Milk']
Making: Shake well without ice. Use cold milk. Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Dirty Panty
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Sambuca', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix in a cocktail glass and sprinkle with parmesan cheese.

Name: Dirty Referee
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Scotch (J&B)', '1/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Layer the scotch at the bottom of a shot glassa and float the creme on top.

Name: Dirty Rollie Fingers
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Pickle Juice (from a pickled egg jar)', 'Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix vodka and pickled egg brine in a shot glass. Add a dash of Tabasco and garnish with a slice of jalapeno.

Name: Dirty Tuauca
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tuaca', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Fill a mixing glass with ice then add Tuaca, tequila, Apple Pucker and sour mix. Shake well and pour into a shot glass.!

Name: Dirty Whores Bath Water
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '1/4 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 tsp. Lemonade Mix (Powder)']
Making: Shake the vodka and the apple pucker with ice and strain into a shot glass. Add a spoonful of lemonade mix, and enjoy the sweet taste of gritty bathwater…

Name: Disney on Ice
Ingredients: ['1 1/3 oz. Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps', '1 1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1 1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'drop(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix in a shot glass then light the 151 Proof rum. Blow out fire and drink. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Diva Shot
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', 'drop(s) Apple Pucker', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour tequila into a shot glass, add the apple pucker and top with the whipped cream.

Name: Doe Piss
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Cider', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour ingredients together....this ain't no sipping drink.

Name: Doggy Man
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Spiced Rum', '1 splash(es) Vanilla Cola']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Doggy Style
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Country Cocktail", '1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe']
Making: Combine in a shot glass. Bottoms up!

Name: Door Boy
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Mix this as either a shot or on the rocks in a low ball glass. It tastes like Big red chewing gum

Name: Double Dragon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tanqueray Gin (Dry)', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Shake over ice, strain into highball glass. Garnish with a lime twist, serve.

Name: Double Gold
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila']
Making: Combine in shot glass, shoot.

Name: Double Jack
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Yukon Jack']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Double Sour Ball
Ingredients: ['1 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', '1 oz. Midori', '2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice strain into a shot glass.

Name: Downhome Ditch Digger
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tequila', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Vodka', 'drop(s) Lemon Juice', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: Dr Pepper #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Beer (Preferably Molson Canadian)', '1 1/2 oz. Coca Cola', '1 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Fill a collins class with the beer and the coke. Then fill a shot glass with Amaretto. Drop and shoot. It really tastes like a Dr Pepper!

Name: Dr. Goo
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '5 drop(s) Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Chill vodka and Schnapps. Pour into a shot glass. Drip Bailey's slowly into the glass. Enjoy! It is a pretty funny looking shot.

Name: Dr. Goose
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grey Goose Vodka', "1 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's French Kiss Vanilla Schnapps"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Alternatively keep both bottle in the freezer and pour chilled.

Name: Dr. J
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Pour the Jagermeister into a shot glass and top with the schnapps.

Name: Dr. Jack
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Dr. Pepper #1
Ingredients: ['1/4 pint(s) Beer', '1/4 pint(s) Cola', '1 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Mix beer and pop in a beer mug, drop shot glass with Amaretto into mug, chug.

Name: Dr. Pepper #3
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and drink.

Name: Dr. Pepper From Hell
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', 'Beer']
Making: Fill a beer mug 1/2 full of beer and a shot glass with the Jagermeister. Drop the shot into the mug and shoot the whole thing.

Name: Dr. Ruth
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Hot Sex', "1/2 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's"]
Making: Pour in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Dr. Swallow
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Boone Strawberry Hill Wine', '1/4 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Layer in shot glass and drop a dime in. Swallow fast and try not to swallow the dime.

Name: Dragon Fly
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Green Chartreuse', '6 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour Green Chartreuse into a shot glass. Add a good belt of Tabasco sauce. Shoot. Breath out. Enjoy having breath like car exhaust. A great drink to energise you before a big night or to put the icing on the cake late in a bender.

Name: Dragon Piss #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '4 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix and shoot. Note from the webmixer: I know it's a VERY large shooter, but it's a "punishing shot"…for the one who looses at cards for instance.

Name: Dragon Piss #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Mountain Dew (Chilled)']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot!

Name: Dragon's Breath
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Ice 101', '1 oz. Firewater', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Dragon's Breath #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Firewater', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour Firewater first then layer the Bacardi 151 rum on top and light. See the dragon's breath and then blow out the flame. Shoot it down and become the dragon. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: DragonLord's Breath
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps (100 proof)', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. A few of these, and you might just breath fire!

Name: Dragons Breath
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 tsp. Hot Sauce (Red)']
Making: Mix in a shot glass until reddish in colour. (Note from the webmixer: given the potency of the hot sauce, this is probably quite a dangerous drink. You have been warned).

Name: Dream Team
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Strawberry Tequila', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a shot glass. Tastes like a strawberry/banana milkshake.

Name: Dreamer Special #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'dash(es) Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Dreinke 2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Smirnoff Citrus Twist Vodka', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Lemon', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Country Cocktail (Lynchburg Lemonade)"]
Making: Mix in a shooter glass. Great way to get sloppy REAL quick!!

Name: Drive-By Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao white', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Layer the liqueurs in a shot glass. Add the grenadine last for a bold effect.

Name: Drunk Monkey #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps']
Making: Make sure the liquors are at room temperature. Pour into a shot glass and set afire. Admire the blue flame for presentation, and blow out before drinking. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Drunk Redneck
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Pour in a shot glass and throw it back.

Name: Duck Blaster
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the orange juice in the bottom of a shot glass. Pour the Jagermeister over a spoon on top of the juice. Drink and enjoy!

Name: Duck Fart
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Crown Royal', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer and shoot.

Name: Duck Fart #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Layer the Kahlua, creme de cacao and Bailey's Irish Cream in a shot glass.

Name: Duck Fart #3
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Kahlua', '3/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '3/4 oz. Canadian Club 6 Year Old']
Making: Layer from bottom to top: Kahlua, Bailey's Irish Cream and CC.

Name: Duck Turd
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butter Shots', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/5 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Add Irish Cream last to create the effect.

Name: Duck's Ass
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass. Good to sip or take as a shot.

Name: Duckfart
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Crown Royal']
Making: Make sure all ingredients are ice cold. It makes it easier to layer for presentation. I put them in the freezer 1 hour prior to pouring. Pour the Kahlua first then the Baileys (slowly so you don't mix) then top with Crown Royal.

Name: E.T.
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Midori']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Earthquake Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Sambuca', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Eat Hot Death
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '10 drop(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix in a rocks glass. Find a room with a soft floor and consume very fast.

Name: Ebony Nipple
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca (Black)', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour the sambuca into a shot glass and top with Bailey's. Light on fire...if you want, toss some cinnamon on for a sparkle effect. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Eclipse
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Grenadine', '1 oz. Rum']
Making: Pour grenadine into a shot glass then carefully pour rum into the glass, keeping it from mixing. Once settled carefully place a cherry in glass on top of the grenadine. The a cherry should float in between the grenadine and the rum.

Name: Eddys Purple Death
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. After Shock Blue Liqueur', '1 1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '2 tsp. Creme de Cassis']
Making: Shake with crushed ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Edmonton Oiler
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Golden Pear', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Edward's Purple Medicine
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur']
Making: Layer Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps and After Shock in a shot glass. Take the shot, swallow and take a deep breath. You may want to be sitting down unless you are a VERY experienced drinker.

Name: Eel Skin
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Coconut Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Ego Trip
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Cointreau', '5 drop(s) Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass (Midori at the bottom) then add the drops of Bailey's Irish Cream. This will make it go all "marbly". Enjoy!

Name: Eh Bomb
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/4 oz. Ouzo', '1/4 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. To drink: Shoot and say Eh! like a Canuck.

Name: Eight Second Ride
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1/4 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Crown Royal', '1/4 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/4 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1/4 oz. Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Eight Seconds
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. Slam and enjoy.

Name: El Mono Loco
