Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Seco Herrerano', '3/4 oz. Creme de Banane']
Making: Stir with ice and srain into a shot glass.

Name: El Revolto
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Elaine's Flaming Heart
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps (100 Proof)', '1 splash(es) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour into shot glass....light on fire.....think of your ex.....blow out......shoot. Guaranteed to make you forget him. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Electric Banana
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'drop(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Layer, add lime juice, shoot.

Name: Electric Kamikaze
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into large shot glass.

Name: Electric Popsicle
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Parfait Amour', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, pour into shooter glass and serve. Very Yummy!

Name: Elephant Gun
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Eliphino
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Elvis Presley
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour ingredients in a shaker half filled with ice and shake hard. Then strain into a shot glass. Laura's comment: This drink gets its name because Elvis loved peanut-butter and banana sandwiches.

Name: Empty Belly
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Old Crow Bourbon']
Making: Mix all in a cup, spin around 35 times and drink really fast.

Name: Enamel Remover
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/3 oz. Gin', '1/3 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour in this order into a shot glass: tabasco, gin, Wild Turkey, and Bacardi 151 then light and let it fly. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: End of the Rainbow
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cointreau', 'Roaring Lion Energy Drink']
Making: Fill a glass with Roaring Lion Energy drink and drop a shot of cointreau into it.

Name: English Mingler
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/4 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Erection #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Eskimo Green and Gold
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Golden Pear']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Eskimo Joe
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1/4 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Milk']
Making: Layer in a shot glass: Bailey's Irish Cream, milk, creme de menthe, schnapps.

Name: Eskimo Kiss
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/3 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Layer and top with a dab of whipped cream. Shoot!

Name: Eskimo Pussy
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Popsicle (Or any raspberry flavoured crushed ice drink)']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: Estonian Forest Fire
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka (Chilled)', '12 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce', '1 Kiwi (Slice)']
Making: This is a painful drink. Mix vodka and Tabasco in shot glass. Shoot. Eat kiwi.

Name: Ethyl Glycol
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Midori']
Making: Layer Midori over tequila in a shot glass.

Name: Everdeath
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Everclear', '2 oz. Vinegar (red wine)']
Making: Pour the Everclear and Red Wine Vinegar (or other tasty vinegar) into separate shot glasses. Drink the Everclear and chase with the vinegar immediately to cover up the alcohol burn with a different tasty burn. You can also mix the Everclear and vinegar in a shot glass.

Name: Evil Woman
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Shake and shoot!

Name: Exploding Woody
Ingredients: ["1/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Pour in a shot glass, place lid over shot and slam on the bar. Drink fast!

Name: Extacy
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Butterscotch Ripple Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Extender
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Mix then down it. This shooter will let you win any bet with your freinds. While they're passed out on the floor after their 15th shot you'll still be ready for another round. )

Name: Exxon Valdez
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '3/4 oz. Rumple Minze', '3/4 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass (curacao at the bottom).

Name: EyE PoPer
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Long Island Iced Tea Mix', '1/3 oz. Johnnie Walker Black Label Scotch', '1/3 oz. Johnnie Walker Red Label Scotch', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and let it go.

Name: F**k Me Running
Ingredients: ["1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Blackberry Brandy']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: F**k Me Silly #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Wildberry Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '7-Up', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Mix the spirits in a shot glass and fill up the glass with an even amount of 7-Up and orange juice.

Name: F**k Me Silly #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Banana Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: F**k Santa Claus
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Everclear (Chilled)', '3/4 oz. Rumple Minze (Chilled)']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. Shoot and beware!

Name: Fab Five And Special Guest
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Romana Sambuca', '1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 splash(es) 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix all ingredients over ice and strain into a shooter glass. Hold on.…

Name: Face Off
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1/4 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/4 oz. Parfait Amour', '1/4 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Fade to Black - Metallica
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Green Chartreuse']
Making:
Stir with ice and strain into a shot glass.
In honor of the Big 4 (Metallica, Slayer, Anthrax and Megadeth) playing Yankee Stadium, Jagermeister, a brand known for rocking the music scene, has come up with some metal cocktails….

Name: Fahrenheit 5000
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Firewater', '1/2 oz. Absolut Peppar Vodka', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Cover bottom of shot glass with Tabasco and then add alcohol. Be warned…

Name: Falix
Ingredients: ['2/5 oz. Dark Rum', '2/5 oz. Strawberry Mix', '1/5 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour the Bacardi into the shot glass. Add the Margarita Mix. Top it with lemon juice.

Name: False Alarm
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Fargus
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Lime', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shooter glass.

Name: Fat Bastard
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister (Chilled)']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and drink but try not to orgasm!

Name: Fat Stinky Wife
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Ouzo', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass rimmed with salt.

Name: Fatheaded Jackass
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Everclear', '1/3 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and slam.

Name: Father Time's Spankin
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Pour Jack Daniel's whiskey, Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey and Yukon Jack into a triple shot glass. Gently top off with tequila and kick it back.

Name: Father Xmas
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sour Apple Pucker', '1/2 oz. XUXU', '1 dash(es) Cream']
Making: Fill shooter glass in order. Float the dash of cream.

Name: Feefissy
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Layer and shoot.

Name: Feltzy Special!
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass...No Chaser!

Name: Festering Wound
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Starbucks Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Tequila Rose', '2 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Once someone gives you a Festering Wound - you will ask for another one. Pour into a shot glass and use a stir stick to drag streaky lines up the side of the glass.

Name: Fianna Pucker F**ker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Green Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', "Guinness (Or Killian's Irish Red)"]
Making: Chill the first two ingredients and strain through ice into a shot glass. Shoot and slam the entire chaser afterwards.

Name: Fiery Balls Of Death
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Everclear', '1/3 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Mix together in a shot glass and set on fire. Slam and enjoy. Webmixer's Note: Make sure flame is out before drinking. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Fiery Banana
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Warm a shot glass up first so lighting will be easier. Layer in the above order and light the sambuca. Wait a few seconds then blow it out. Shoot the drink. **Warning: The glass might be a bit hot so be careful not to burn your mouth.

Name: Fiery Tounge
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '1 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. Watch your lips when drinking.

Name: Fighting Bull
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Fire and Ice #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Fire and Ice #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Mix and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Fire And Ice #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Firewater', '1 oz. Ice 101']
Making: Serve in a shot glass.

Name: Fire And Ice #4
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Fire Bomb
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', "1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Fire Breather
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Pour Sambuca into mouth, hold, and don't swallow. Wipe your lips, then sit down with your head tilted back and allow someone to light it with a match. Hold for a couple seconds then swallow.

Name: Fire Cracker #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 oz. Everclear']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Fire Cracker #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and drink.

Name: Fire Hydrant
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Everclear', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Fire in Heaven
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Fill up shot glass with 151 proof rum. Then add a dash of Tabasco into the glass. Allow a few seconds to settle. Drink fast and stand back.

Name: Fire In The Hole
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '2 tsp. Hot Sauce (Red)']
Making: Mix in a shot glass until reddish in colour. (Note from the webmixer: given the potency of the hot sauce, this is probably quite a dangerous drink. You have been warned).

Name: Fire in the Hole #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. Light with a match for a good show. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Fire-Tini Hunter
Ingredients: ['1 splash(es) Vermouth', 'Pepper Vodka']
Making: Pour in a shot glass and fill with pepper vodka. Garnish with garlic.

Name: FireBall
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '151 Proof Rum']
Making: Fill a shot glass lwith the Hot Damn. Lace the top with 151 and light. Drink with a long straw. CAUTION DON'T GET TO CLOSE TO THE FLAME!

Name: Fireball #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Fireball #5
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Fireside
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Ginger Wine', '2 part(s) Dark Rum', '1 dash(es) Benedictine']
Making: Mix well in a jug and pour into shooter glasses - a winter warmer.

Name: Firestorm
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Firewater', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Firestorm #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Everclear', '1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '4 drop(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Pour Everclear then After Shock in a shot glass. Drop no more than 4 drops of orange juice (for effect). Serve with a lime wedge if necessary (lime kills the power of Cinnamon).

Name: Firey Green Dragon
Ingredients: ['5/6 oz. Vodka', '1/6 oz. Lime Juice', '1/3 oz. Tequila', '2/3 oz. Rum', 'Food Colouring (Green)', 'Food Colouring (Red)']
Making: You will need 2 shot glasses for this drink. In the first shot glass, combine the vodka, the lime juice and the green food colouring. In the second shot glass, combine the tequila, the rum and the red food colouring and garnish with a cherry. Drink the red shot first and immediately follow with the green. Comments from Bolum: if you don't vomit, good job! A few of those and you might feel drunk.

Name: Fisherman's Wharf
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/3 oz. Courvoisier Cognac', '1/3 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Five Star General
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum (Or any other 151 proof rum)', '1/4 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Tequila']
Making: There are two methods to make this shooter: 1. Shake with ice, strain and pour in shot glass. 2. Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Flambe
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and light. Drink through a straw.

Name: Flame Pops
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Midori', '2 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Pour the Midori into a shot glass. Heat the Southern Comfort and the sugar. Once hot, pour the mixture over the Midori and light. Enjoy the flames!! Sweet! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flame Thrower
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/4 oz. Benedictine', '1/4 oz. Brandy']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Flamin Fro
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Combine in a shot glass, flame for 7 seconds and shoot.

Name: Flaming Apple
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Schnapps', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 splash(es) Everclear']
Making: Pour in a shot glass, the Everclear on top. Ignite and shoot. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Armadillo
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer and float 151 rum. Light and drink.

Name: Flaming Asshole
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and ignite.

Name: Flaming Baby G(uinness) (English Style)
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Tia Maria', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Mix the Tia Maria and the Kahlua into a wine glass. Pour the Bailey's slowly over the back of a teaspoon onto the top of the other two, so that it floats on the top. Repeat this with the Drambuie. Light the Drambuie (it helps to tilt the glass), place your hand on the glass to extinguish the flame and create a vacuum in the glass...which should now stick to your hand. Slide your hand off slowly, inhale the fumes and shoot the drink. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE!

Name: Flaming Bee
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Barenjager Honey Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and let settle. Pour a drop of Sambuca down a straw and light it. Use this to ignite the top of the drink, blow it out and enjoy.

Name: Flaming Blue F**k
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and light. Drink through a straw.

Name: Flaming Blue Jesus
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/3 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Layer in a shot glass, ignite and enjoy! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Blue Smurf
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and light for about 4 seconds. Blow out the flame and shoot it. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming British Sheep Shagger
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in order (Bailey's at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass.

Name: Flaming Buzzard
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Firewater', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Flaming Chocolate Monkey
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix with ice. Strain into a shot glass. Float 151 and light. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE!

Name: Flaming Christmas Bastard
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', 'Peppermint Schnapps (Preferably 100 proof)']
Making: Layer the creme de menthe and the Hot Damn, top with the Peppermint Schnapps and light on fire. Blow out the flame, rub an ice cube over the rim of the glass and drink!!! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Courage
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Midori', 'Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and float Bacardi. Ignite and drink.

Name: Flaming Currie
Ingredients: ['1/5 oz. Everclear', '1/5 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/5 oz. Jagermeister', '1/5 oz. Goldschlager', '1/5 oz. Jose Cuervo', "1/5 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/5 oz. Yukon Jack', "1/5 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/5 oz. Crown Royal', '1/5 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Mix together in a double shot glass. Light on fire then extinguish after 5 seconds. Add a small amount of sweet and sour mix then drink.

Name: Flaming D
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Whiskey', '8 oz. Beer', 'dash(es) Everclear']
Making: Pour in Amaretto and whiskey in a shot glass. Top shot with Everclear. Light on fire and drop in the glass of beer. Drink fast! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Davidian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Whiskey', '2 oz. Everclear']
Making: Combine 1 oz. of each in a 4 oz. shot glass. Add last oz. of Everclear and ignite. Tell them if they can keep more than 4 down they will think they are God.

Name: Flaming Death
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister chilled', '1 splash(es) Everclear']
Making: Pour the shot of Jagermeister. Pour a splash of Everclear over the back of a spoon so that it floats on top of the Jagermeister and light. Blow out before drinking (Caution glass can be very hot). ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE!!!

Name: Flaming Depth Charge
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '6 oz. Beer']
Making: Pour the beer into a mug and pour the rum into a shot glass. Ignite the rum then drop into the mug and shoot. Chris's comment: Great visual with flames and then foam explosion. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Diamond
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Flaming Dr Pepper #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'Beer']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and ignite. Drop the shot glass into a mug of beer and finish the whole thing.

Name: Flaming Dr Pepper #3
Ingredients: ['Beer', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour Amaretto into shot glass and top with 151 Proof rum and drop shot into glass of beer. Chug both at once. It honestly tastes like Dr Pepper.

Name: Flaming Dr Pepper #7
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Everclear', '1/2 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Pour in Dr Pepper first then the Everclear. Light for 7 seconds, blow out, then slam. Don't let it burn too long or you'll having a flaming lip! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Dr Pepper #8
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', 'Beer']
Making: Mix Amaretto and coconut rum in a shot glass, ignite and drop in a glass of beer. Chug away! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Dragon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Green Chartreuse', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix together and light on fire. Let the drink sit for about 10 sec. Blow out (optional). Swallow down. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Fernando
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Pour Tequila and Kahlua into a shot glass and shake up. Then warm the contents by holding a lighter around the glass. Once sufficiently heated then ignite. Drink quickly with a straw before the straw melts. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Fish
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Grenadine', '1 part(s) Blue Curacao', '1 part(s) 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer each part starting with red then blue then 151. Ignite and drink with a straw. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE!!!

Name: Flaming Haitian
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 151 Proof Rum (White rum)', '1 splash(es) Brown Creme de Cacao']
Making: Pour in a shot glass and put in the microwave for about 15 to 20 seconds. Take out and light on fire. Blow out and shoot. Oh yeah, its a burner! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Hoochie Mamma
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum (Tropical flavour)', '1/2 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in order (tropical rum at the bottom) in a shot glass. Light it up and let it warm up . Be sure flame is out before shooting. This one tastes like a warm orange creamsicle. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Jellybean
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Anisette', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Yukon Jack']
Making: Pour the ingredients into a shot glass in the order listed (make sure the Yukon is on top). Ignite and when the flame turns yellow at the tip place a long straw in the shot glass. Drink quickly and throw the straw fast or it will melt. This drink tastes like a black jellybean…ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Jellybeans
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Anisette', '1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour in order in a shot glass (triple sec at the bottom). Light on fire and let warm for app. 30 seconds. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Jesus
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Everclear (190 Proof)']
Making: Build in shot glass. Ignite. Shoot.

Name: Flaming Lamborghini
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Galliano', '1 1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour the Galliano into a cocktail glass and float Sambuca on top. Pour the Bailey's and blue Curacao into two separate shot glasses. Light the Sambuca and suck the Galliano from the bottom with a straw. Whilst doing this, pour the Bailey's and the blue curacao, at the same time, into glass until finished in one suck.

Name: Flaming Lamborghini (the Real Thing)
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 pinch(es) Cinnamon']
Making: Measure all liquour into separate shot glasses to have ready as needed. Pour rum over the inside rim of a martini glass. Add sambuca and light on fire. Quickly add the galliano and blue curaco. Sprinkle with a pinch of cinnamon. Person drinking it should insert a straw to the bottom of the martini glass while on fire and at the same time the pourer should pour the baileys and creme de cacao. While these last two are being poured the one drinking sucks it into the straw. Ensure the flame burns out before reaching that level.

Name: Flaming Lemon Drop #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka (Preferably Chopin)', '1/4 oz. Sambuca', '1 Lemon', 'Sugar']
Making: 1. Sugar the rim of the shot glass. 2. Slice the lemon into wedges. 3. Pour Vodka into shot glass, and put lemon on rim 4. Put Sambuca into glass and light on fire (be careful here). 5. Pour flaming Sambuca directly over shot & counter (don't do this if you have really nice counters). 6. Don't worry about starting a massive fire, it goes out with very little blowing. 7. Blow out the shots. 8. Take like a lemon drop now. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Lemon Drop #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'dash(es) Lime Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 slice(s) Lemon']
Making: Pour the vodka in a shot glass with a squirt of lime juice, place the round lemon slice over the shot glass and put the teaspoon of sugar on the lemon. Then pour the 151 over the lemon and light, the sugar will melt. When through burning, squeeze the lemon into the shot, slam the shot and bite lemon. You'll feel it after just one. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Meth-Tical
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Mix and pour into a shooter glass. Light it, wait for the flame to go out and drink.

Name: Flaming Mikey
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Cognac']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Cognac first then Goldschlager and 99 Bananas. Top with the 151. Light the 151 on fire before serving. Webmixer's Note: Make sure flame is out before drinking. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Moe
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Syrup (Robitussin Cherry Cough)']
Making: Add cough syrup first, Captain Morgan's next then the 151. Light and shoot it. Webmixer's Note: Make sure flame is out before drinking. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Nazi
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '5 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Flaming Orgy
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1/4 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/4 oz. Brandy', '1/4 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Flaming Ozzy
Ingredients: ['3 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Everclear']
Making: Build in order and ignite the everclear on top. Blow it out and pound it.

Name: Flaming Praire Dog
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila', '5 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '151 Proof Rum']
Making: Fill a shot glass 3/4 with Tequila. Put 4-5 dashes of tabasco sauce. Float Bacardi 151 on top. Ignite to start fire. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Pumpkin #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: A version of the original. Layer Bailey's, Kahlua, and Goldschlager, in that order. Stir very slightly. Light on fire and serve. Note 1: Use warm Goldschlager. Note 2: There are two different levels of Goldschlager, depending on the area you are from. Some are 85 proof, and some are 120. If possible, use the 120.

Name: Flaming Pumpkin #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 sprinkle(s) Cinnamon']
Making: Layer in first Bailey's then Goldschlager and top with a sprinkle of cinnamon. Ignite and sprinkle more cinnamon for sparks (make sure the alcohol is warm or you won't get a nice flame). Shoot. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Rasta Man
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Grenadine', 'Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in shot glass then light on fire. Jim's comment: Get a bunch of people together for this one. Everybody gets a drink and then they are lit on fire. The object is to drink the drink through a straw, before the straw melts. The first person to finish wins. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Sambuca
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Pour the Sambucca into a shot glass, and light it. You should see a small blue flame. Quickly place your palm over the glass. You should feel the suction (it will put the flame out). Remove your hand and quickly inhale the fumes from the glass. Immediately shoot down. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flaming Sambuca #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Pour the sambuca and kahlua into a brandy snifter. Place the glass sideways on top of an old fashioned glass. Light a match and place in the middle of the brandy snifter and turn the glass. It will turn a blue colour. Pour it into the old fashioned glass and the flame will go out. Shoot the drink while its still warm. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE!!!

Name: Flaming Sambuca And Beans
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sambuca', '4 Coffee Beans']
Making: Shotglass should be of good quality to take the heat. Pour the Sambuca and add the coffee beans to your shotglass and ignite. Wait until the outside of the glass begins to 'sweat'. Blow out the flame and shoot it back, swallowing the liquer but retaining the beans in your mouth. Chop down on the beans and get ready for a unique taste experience. As the top of the glass gets quite hot hold the shot lower down and put your thumb against your lip NOT the glass. Enjoy....

Name: Flaming Toad
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/3 oz. Pickle Juice']
Making: Pour 151 proof rum into shot glass. Light the rum on fire. Put the fire out with pickle juice and shoot quickly after fire is out. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE!!!

Name: Flaming Waterfall
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tuaca', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum']
Making: Mix Tuaca and 151 into a snifter and light it on fire. Elevate snifter above a pint glass and pour the flaming concotion into the pint (so it looks like a flaming waterfall). Cover pint with snifter until the flame goes out. Finally remove snifter inhale the fumes (which should be built up in the snifter) then slam the drink out of the pint. One should be enough for just about anyone

Name: Flamming Beamer
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Mix together and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Flamming Bitch
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Ouzo', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Layer in order into a shot glass (brandy at the bottom). Ignite and drink though a straw. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Flamming Jack
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps (100 Proof)']
Making: Combine in shot glass. Lighting it on fire is optional. Then shoot (it tastes like a candy heart).

Name: Flamming Sambuca
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Pour Sambuca into a shot glass. Light with a lighter and drink. ****Webmixer Note**** Please read the tips section on flaming drinks.

Name: Flanders
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka (Preferably Kettle One vodka)', '1 oz. Apple Pucker']
Making: Chill over ice and strain into a double shot glass.

Name: Flat Liner
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '3 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour the peach schnapps in a shot glass, place the end of a teaspoon into it and gently pour a few drops of Tabasco sauce down it until a thin red line appears on top of the peach schnapps. Then slowly fill the remainder of the shot glass with the vodka, using the teaspoon.

Name: Flatliner
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 splash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '1/2 oz. Polish Pure Spirit']
Making: Float the Tabasco Sauce over the tequila in a shot glass. Layer the Polish Pure Spirit on top of the Tabasco Sauce. The Tabasco Sauce should form a flat line between the two clear spirits. Knock it back quickly and feel the burn!

Name: Flatliner #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '2 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour Sambuca just above halfway in a shooter glass. Then slowly float the tequila. Add the Tabasco. If done correctly the Tabasco should sit right in the middle.

Name: Floater
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 oz. Crown Royal']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Floridian Paradise
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice (Chilled)']
Making: Pour into a shot glass in the order given, mix and shoot.

Name: Foreplay
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', '1/3 oz. Baja Rosa']
Making: Shake ingredients vigorously and pour into a shot glass. Perfect for impressing the ladies.

Name: Fornication
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Irish Cream (Preferably Dunphy's Cream)", '1/2 oz. Tia Maria Chocolate Liqueur']
Making: Layer in shot glass.

Name: Four Corners
Ingredients: ["1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/4 oz. Johnnie Walker Black Label Scotch']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. \

Name: Four Horsemen
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Jose Cuervo', "3/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '3/4 oz. Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon', '3/4 oz. Johnnie Walker Scotch']
Making: Combine in a large shot glass. Shoot and enjoy!

Name: Four Horsemen Of The Apocalypse
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Layer in a shot glass over the back of a spoon and enjoy the end of the world.

Name: Four Leaf Clover
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Orange Juice', "1/3 oz. Bushmill's Irish Whiskey", "1/3 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Mix over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Fourth Reich
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Barenjager Honey Liqueur']
Making: Layer all in a shot glass and hand it to someone else. I had to submit this correction to the 'Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse'. The liquors come from countries that were occupied by Germany during WWII.

Name: Foxxx Tail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. Cup hand over top of glass and give it one quick shake. Slam it.

Name: Fragoli Red Devil
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Toschi Fragoli Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Freak Accident
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Combine in a shot glass and serve. It tastes like 'candy.'

Name: Freak Shot
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. 7-Up', '1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. It tastes like candy!

Name: Freakin' Flamin' Fruit
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/4 oz. Golden Pear', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix Midori, banana and pear and then layer 151 on top. Light and shoot. Mmmmmm fruitylicious!!

Name: Freddie's Naughty Neopolitan
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Baja Rosa (Cannot be substitutes)']
Making: This is a layered shooter, prepared in the same fashion as a B-52. In a shot glass first pour the Kahlua over the back of a spoon, followed by the white cacao and top with the Baja Rosa (be careful not to mix the layers). Enjoy!!!!

Name: Freddy Kruger
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Freight Train
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Pour ingredients into 1 oz. shot glass.

Name: French F**k
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Kahlua', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Pour ingredients over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: French Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Drink quickly before Bailey's Irish Cream settles.

Name: Fresh Apple Pie
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sour Apple Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Mix and shoot!

Name: Friar Tuck
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a shot glass. Garnish with cinnamon.

Name: Friggin' Willie
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Frog Stomper
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Frogs In The Mud
Ingredients: ['Baileys Irish Cream', 'Midori']
Making: Pour the Midori into a shot glass to within 1/2' of the top. Slowly pour the Baileys so it is floatingt on top of the Midori. Enjoy. RIBIT RIBIT

Name: Front Bumper
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Frost Bite
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Brandy']
Making: Serve chilled in a shot glass.

Name: Frosted Pain
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Sambuca', "1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Mix in a shot glass.. Gives a frosted look and has a bite.

Name: Frosty Villain
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Vanilla Vodka', '1 part(s) Peach Schnapps', '7-Up']
Making: Pour in a shot glass and top with 7-Up.

Name: Frozen Rope
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake and chill. Pour into shot glasses.

Name: Fruit Loop #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Fruit Loop #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Fruit Loops
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into two shot glasses.

Name: Fruity Booty
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Pour in a shot glass. Use no hands and take the shot....

Name: Fruity Mexican Bastard
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix, pour into a shot glass, shoot!

Name: Fruity Pebbles Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix ingredients with ice in shaker and strain into a shot glass. Shoot. Tastes just like the milk from Fruity pebbles.

Name: Fruty Irishman
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Chill and pour in shot glass.

Name: Fudoo Killer
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Gentleman Jack Rare Tennessee Whiskey', '1 oz. Budweiser Beer or Bud Light']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Funk Master Furby
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grain Alcohol (PGA)', '1/3 oz. Everclear', '1/3 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour into your mouth all at once and then allow to drip down throat without swallowing. Make sure you are close to a bed because you are going to fall!

Name: Funkadelic
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brandy', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake the ingredients vigorously and strain into a chilled martini glass. Great as a "dessert" shot.

Name: Funky Kold Madena
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sour Apple Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Shake gently to chill and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Fuqua Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Fill shaker 1/4 full of ice and add ingredients. Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Furnace
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Ginger Brandy', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '3 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Add the ingredients in order as listed. Light the top afire. Drink it down while lit. The flames will extinguish quickly and the flames should not burn. Do not let it burn for longer than a few seconds as the glass will get hot. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Fuzz Ball
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Chill and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Fuzzy Astronaut
Ingredients: ['1/2 tsp. Tang Drink Mix', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Mix together and pour into shot glass.

Name: Fuzzy Cherry
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Mix and pour into a chilled shot glass.

Name: Fuzzy F**k
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into shot a glass.

Name: Fuzzy Jack
Ingredients: ["2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Fill a shaker with ice and pour in ingredients. Shake and Serve. Makes about 2-3 shots.

Name: Fuzzy Leprachaun #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: Fuzzy Smurf
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Apricot Liqueur']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: G's Easyrider
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Yukon Jack', "1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. DeKuyper Peachtree Schnapps']
Making: Pour in a shot glass.

Name: G-Force
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Green Chartreuse', '1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo']
Making: Layer in order (Galliano at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass and serve with a slice of orange to suck on afterwards.

Name: G-Spot
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1 oz. DeKuyper Wilderberry Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Sprite', '1 dash(es) Cordial (coloured)']
Making: Mix the Captain Morgan's, Wilderberry Schnapps, sour mix and Sprite in a shaker with ice. Strain and layer a colored cordial to the bottom. Blue Curacao, Green Creme de Menthe, Grenadine and Black Raspberry work the best for a colorful round of shooters.

Name: G-Spot #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Mix and shoot!

Name: G-Spot #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Rose', '1 oz. Blackberry Brandy']
Making: Combine in a rocks glass filled with ice.

Name: G.H.B. (Good Hard Banana)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. Float the 99 Bananas over the Creme de Cacao. Top with whipped cream.

Name: G99
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Sambuca', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Gently layer by pouring over an upside down spoon into a shot glass..

Name: Gagger's Delight
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Galactic Ale
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Vodka', '1 1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into two shot glasses.

Name: Gangrene
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Jagermeister', '1/2 part(s) Midori']
Making: Combine and shake ingredients over ice. Strain into a shot glass.

Name: Garnet Grit Betty Shot
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Smirnoff Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 oz. 7-Up', '2 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Gaschamber
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Sambuca', '1 can(s) Beer']
Making: 1) Pour Sambuca into a 2cl. glass. DON'T EVER LIGHT THE FIRE IN THIS GLASS!!! 2) Pour just a few drops in a saucer... 3)... and light the Sambuca in the saucer. You might pour some extra drops in to keep it on fire. 4) While burning, hold a glass of beer over the 2 cl. glass for about 10 seconds - the gas will get caught in the beer glass. 5) DO THE FOLLOWING STEPS QUICKLY: Put the beer glass - bottom up - on the table. 6) Blow out the fire. 7) Drink Sambuca in little glass with the wrong end of straw in one sip. 8) Suck out gas from beer glass with straw....take a good long draw! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Gasoline #2
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Gasoline Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Gin']
Making: Mix thoroughly and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Gatorade #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Gatorade #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Gecko
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/3 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Making: Pour the brandy and whiskey into a shot glass. Fill a cup or mug with the cider. Drop the shot glass in and drink quickly. Best if served cold (but not iced).

Name: Genth
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Iced Tea Mix', '1/3 oz. Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a shot glass. Shoot.

Name: George's Puke
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Root Beer Schnapps']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Georgia Freightrain
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Chill and serve in a large shot glass. Make train noises before you drink it.

Name: Georgia Peach #4
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', 'drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Layer equal amounts of liqueurs into a shot glass and add a drop of grenadine.

Name: Georgia Snake Bite
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Whiskey (Preferably CLC Whiskey)', '1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']

Making: Shake all ingredients, strain and pour into shot glasses.

Name: Georgia Sunset
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Bacardi O', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 squirt(s) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shooter glass. Drizzle Chambord just enough to give the drink a purple sunset haze.

Name: German Burritto
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: German Chocolate Cake
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Jagermeister', '1/2 part(s) Chocolate Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Coconut Rum', '1 splash(es) Butterscotch Schnapps']

Making: Sugar the rim of a shot glass. Pour the liquor into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into the shot glass. Top with the lemon wedge. Lick the sugar, suck the lemon and down the shot.

Name: German Death
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Layer in a shot glass, Rumple Minze first.

Name: German Nipples
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Butter Shots', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass (Butter Shots at the bottom) and slam.

Name: German Turkey
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Float Wild Turkey over Rumple Minze in a shot glass.

Name: Get Laid #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 3/4 oz. Fruit Punch']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Ghetto Blaster
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Metaxa', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Rye Whiskey']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Ghostbuster #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Tia Maria', '1/3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Gildo

Making: Mix the alcohol in a shot glass and top off with almonds.

Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a Tom Collins glass and enjoy.

Name: Gin and Bear It
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Gilbey's Gin", '1/2 oz. Beer']
Making: Mix in shot glass.

Name: Gingerbread Man #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Goldschlager', '3/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice until the tin is frosty and strain into a shooter glass. Enjoy!!

Name: Gingerbread Vodka

Making: Shake with ice and strain into an iced shooter glass.
