Making: Layer in order (Kahlua at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass.

Name: Gladiator #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Sprite', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix orange juice and Sprite in cocktail glass. Mix Amaretto and peach schnapps in shooter glass. Drop shot into orange juice mix and swing back.

Name: Gladiator #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Pour the first three ingredients in a shooter glass and pour the orange juice and the 7-Up in a highball glass. Drop the shooter glass into the highball glass and slam. Enjoy!!

Name: Gladiator #3
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', 'Orange Juice', 'Sprite']
Making: Pour the schnapps and the Southern Comfort into a shot glass. Pour equal parts of orange juice and Sprite into a highball glass. Drop the shot glass into the highball and bottoms up!

Name: Glasnost
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Serve chilled in a shot glass.

Name: Glassy-winged Sharpshooter
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Grappa freezer temperature', '1/4 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Use freezer temperature Grappa then mix with Crème de Menthe in a shot glass.

Name: Glitterbox
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca (Gold)', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Pour in a shot glass.

Name: Glucose Down Under
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Vodka', "Candies (Glucose frogs and/or snakes -it's Australian)"]
Making: Place the lollies on an oven tray and cover them in a film vodka. Leave in the fridge. The frogs absorb the vodka giving you vodka filled frogs. WARNING the frogs become very sticky and this is often a messy procedure.

Name: GMC
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Go Go Godzilla
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Mountain Dew (Chilled)', '4 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix vodka and Mountain Dew in a shot glass and then add tobasco. Mix and shoot. Add more tobasco to increase the fire.

Name: Gobblenut
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Chill and strain into a shot glass and gobble gobble.

Name: God's Own
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Gin', '2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 Lime (Juice of, fresh)', '2 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Shake, then chill a cocktail glass in ice cold water, dry and pour the drink over crushed ice.

Name: Godchild Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Milk or half and half']
Making: Layer amaretto, vodka in a shot glass and top with a splash of milk or half and half.

Name: Godfather Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Scotch']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Godfather Southern Style
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Pour ingredients into shaker and add ice. Shake and stain into a shot glass - and say hello to the rest of a great night!

Name: Godmother Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Layer the vodka over the amaretto in a shot glass.

Name: Godzilla
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '3/4 oz. Sake', '1/4 oz. Everclear', '1 pint(s) Beer (Japanese)']
Making: Pour the beer into a glass and add the Midori. In a shot glass, layer the everclear on top of the sake. Light the shot glass and drop it into the beer. Drink quickly and battle Gamera. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Gold and Spicey
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tequila Gold', '3/4 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Gold F**ker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Combine in a shot glass

Name: Gold Furnace
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '2 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour into shot glass, add Tabasco, shoot.

Name: Gold Member
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Pour in a shot glass.

Name: Gold Rush
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Yukon Jack']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Gold Snake
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Yukon Jack', '3/4 oz. Goldschlager', "1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a large shooter glass.

Name: Goldberg
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon (Chilled)', '1 oz. Goldschlager (Chilled)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a 2 oz. shot glass.

Name: Golden Flash
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Sambuca', '1/3 oz. Cointreau', '1/3 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Golden Mule
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Triple Sec', "1 part(s) Rose's Lime Juice", '1 part(s) Jose Cuervo Reserva', '1 part(s) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake with ice in a shaker and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Golden Night
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Layer and shoot

Name: Golden T
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila Gold', '1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: GoldenTooth
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Pour into a chilled shot glass and shoot.

Name: Golf Cart
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour equal parts Midori and Amaretto over ice add a 'splash' of cranberry juice - strain into shot glass and enjoy.

Name: Gonchii
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Rum', 'dash(es) Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Malibu Rum']
Making: Combine in order in a shot glass.

Name: Good and Plenty #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Good and Plenty #3
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Sambuca', "1/3 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum"]
Making: Pour sambuca and layer the rum on top of it.

Name: Goodnite Kiss
Ingredients: ['1 oz. E & J VS Brandy', "1 oz. Irish Cream (Preferably Branden's Irish Cream)"]
Making: Pour the brandy into a shot glass and slowly add the Irish cream. Stir and enjoy.

Name: Gorilla Fart
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum']
Making: Served as a chilled shot.

Name: Gorilla Fart #2
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '2/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Combine ingredients into a shot glass.

Name: Gorilla Fart #3
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Rum', 'Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour the rum into a shot glass, top off with Tabasco Sauce, allow to settle for a few seconds, then enjoy!

Name: Gorilla Tit
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour Kahlua first then layer the Wild Turkey. Float Bacardi 151 and light it. Blow out the flame and shoot.

Name: Gorilla's Puke
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '3/4 oz. Wild Turkey Straight Rye Whiskey']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Gothic
Ingredients: ['2/5 oz. Blue Curacao', '2/5 oz. Cherry Whiskey', '1/5 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Pina Colada Mix']
Making: Mix Blue Curaco, Cherry Whisky and Lemon Juice in a shot glass. Add a blob of Pina Colada drink mix in the center of the drink (it will sink to the bottom). Enjoy!

Name: Gothic Death
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Everclear']
Making: Mix in a 2 oz. shot glass.

Name: Graham Cracker Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1 splash(es) Cream (Or milk)']
Making: Mix over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Grand Bailey's
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Grand Slam #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Grande Banana
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', 'dash(es) Grenadine (Optional)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Kyle says: I like to serve it with a Banana from "Runts" candy in the glass.

Name: Grandma's Hot Apple Pie Shot
Ingredients: ['Vodka', '1 tbsp. Brown Sugar', 'Granulated Sugar', 'Cinnamon', '2 Apples (red, sliced)', 'Whipped Cream', 'Apple Cider']
Making: Fill a 12 oz. cup 3/4 full of vodka and the rest with apple cider (or apple juice). Add brown sugar. Mix the granulated sugar and cinnamon together to the desired amount. If you like sweet and prefer better results add a lot. Shake the container and let sit for a minute. Note: If you add a slice of fresh apple and add it, it brings out more flavour. While your drink is resting, cut small cube peices of fresh apple and add a piece into 8 shot glasses. Pour your drink into each shot glasse. Top with a dab of whipped cream and sprinkle cinnamon and sugar on top. Drink and wait until you've finished to chew and swallow the fresh apple bite. Tastes just like grandmas!

Name: Grandma's Peach Pussy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Grandmothers' Slippers
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Cream', '1 oz. Licorice Liqueur']
Making: Mix well, pour in glass, add an ice cube or two and drink with a straw. (If you can't find licorice liqueur, mix 1 oz. Irish cream liqueur and a few soft licorice sweets in a blender until smooth.)

Name: Granny Smith Apple Shots
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/2 oz. Apple Juice (Concentrated not diluted)']
Making: Salt the rim of a double shot glass then pour the apple juice concentrate. Slowly pour the apple pucker to the rim. It should separate. Lick the rim and shoot. Enjoy

Name: Grape Ape #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Fill shaker 1/4 full of ice and add ingredients. Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Grape Ape #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/2 oz. Grape Pucker']
Making: Serve chilled or on ice.

Name: Grape Crush
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Grape Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake and strain. It is a large shot.

Name: Grapefruit Juice
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Grey Goose Vodka', '2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '2 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into 1 1/2 oz. shot glasses. You should add just enough grenadine to make it look like grapefruit juice. Not too strong a taste but it packs a punch.

Name: Grapeshot Bomber
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Brandy', '1/4 oz. Sloe Gin']
Making: Combine ingredients in shaker and shake once or twice. Strain into a pony or tube shot glass. Wally says: It has a very grape-like aftertaste, and after a few of these, you WILL be bombed...Enjoy!

Name: Grapevine Special
Ingredients: ['1/5 oz. Brandy', '1/5 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/5 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/5 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/5 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Grass Skirt #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '3/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake, pour and shoot.

Name: Gravedigger #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Gravity Wave
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Root Beer Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and pour in a shot glass. It tastes like a root beer float.

Name: Greased Lightning
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Condensed Milk', '1/2 oz. White Lightning - Ole Smoky Tennessee Moonshine', '1 drop(s) Olive Oil', '1 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Combine condensed milk and White Lightning in a shot glass Then add the olive oil and tobasco sauce on top. For a variation replace condensed milk with egg. For Greased Lightning Mayo use 2 tbsp. of mayo1 tbsp of olive oil 1/2 oz of White Lightning dash of tobasco sauce. Blend well. Spread on Crackers.

Name: Greasy Mexican
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Mayonnaise']
Making: Mix well and pour into a shot glass. Shoot!

Name: Greasy Pirate
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butter Shots', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum"]
Making: Combine in a shot glass. Take a shot and give your lover one also, after you both have taken your shot give each other a long PASSIONATE kiss.

Name: Great Balls Of Fire!
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Cherry Brandy']
Making: Layer in shot glass, shoot.

Name: Great White North
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Anisette']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Great White Shark
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Tequila', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix all ingredients in shaker with ice and pour into a shot glass. Yum!

Name: Green Aftermath
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Ice 101', '1/2 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and cover the mouth of the shot glass with the palm of your hand. Slam onto a table and drink quick.

Name: Green and Blue Monster
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka']
Making: Layer in order (Midori at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass.

Name: Green Booger
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', 'Lime Juice']
Making: Fill shot glass with Bailey's Irish Cream and creme de menthe. Mix until a nice green mint appears. Fill with the lime juice and wait a minute. Shoot.

Name: Green Dizzy
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Green Dragon Shot
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Midori']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Green Emerald
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Green Goblin Snot Shot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice (Squeezed)', '1 tsp. Granulated Sugar']
Making: Pour vodka and lime juice into a shot glass and add sugar. Allow sugar to settle on bottom on glass and serve with a straw. Slurp down the shot through the straw while sucking up the sugar.

Name: Green Grass
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Jose Cuervo', '3/4 oz. Sour Apple Pucker', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. Follow with a shot of pineapple juice on the side.

Name: Green Haus
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Midori']
Making: Serve chilled in a shot glass.

Name: Green Jamaican
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Bacardi Spice Rum', '1 part(s) Midori']
Making: Pour ingredients into a shot glass.

Name: Green Kryptonite
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. Mountain Dew', '1/4 oz. Midori']
Making: Add to shot glass in order. Drink in 1 swallow.

Name: Green Lizard
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Chartreuse', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Green Machine
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Absinthe', '1/4 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps (Preferably Golden Stryke)', '1/4 oz. Pisang Ambon']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Green Meany
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Green Chartreuse', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Yellow Chartreuse']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Green Monkey
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Green Ni
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Pour into a shotglass in any order. Big nerds may choose to impersonate 'The Knights who say NI!' from Monty Python's Holy Grail (since that was the movie on TV when the drink was created)

Name: Green Orgasm
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 dash(es) Whipped Cream']
Making: Shake the liquors and mixes vigorously, strain into a shot glass. Add the whipped cream.

Name: Green Wave
Ingredients: ["1/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', 'Absolut Citron Vodka']
Making: Combine all ingredients in a shaker over ice. Shake well. Strain into a 7 oz. glass. Enjoy! 1/4 oz. of Absolut Citron can be added for a 'kick'.

Name: Green-52
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Tia Maria', '1/4 oz. Absinthe']
Making: First pour the Bailey's, then the Tia Maria, and then the Absinthe (carefully!). Put the shot on fire and drink it with a straw. Or, when the shot is on fire blow on it to extinguish and then down it in one. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Grenade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Triple Sec', '3/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix together in shot glass.

Name: Ground Zero
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Guardian Angel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix in a rocks glass.

Name: Gummy Bear
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Apple Liqueur']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Gurkey
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: H Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Barenjager Honey Liqueur', '1/2 pint(s) Honey Brown Lager']
Making: Drop a shot of Barenjager into a half pint of Honey Brown and chug just like an Irish Car Bomb.

Name: Hairy Palm
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Hairy Tongue
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Rum']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: Hang Glider
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '3 drop(s) Blue Curacao']
Making: Chill orange vodka and blue curacao in a shaker. Combine coffee liqueur and Irish cream at room temperature. Pour into a large shot glass. Carefully layer the orange vodka mix on top. Add 2 or 3 dollops whipped cream (for the clouds) and mint leaf tip (that's the hang glider)A refined cousin of the B-52. Obviously an incredibly gorgeous shot.

Name: Hans & Franz
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Pour Goldschlager first, then Jagermeister so they mix; if reversed will layer (much better mixed, tastes like Cinnamon Gum).

Name: Happy Black Man
Ingredients: ['1 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Watermelon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into 2 shot glasses.

Name: Harbour Light #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Cuervo Tequila', '1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in order (do not mix). Iignite with match when served. (Should be extinguished before drinking) ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE!!!

Name: Harbour Lights
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Hard Berlin Wall
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Hard On
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Harley Davidson #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', "1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass.

Name: Harley Davidson #3
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '3/4 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Harley Davidson With R.I. Plates
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Yukon Jack', "1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Harsh
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Mix ingredients and serve in shot glass.

Name: Hawaii 5-0
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a shot glass halfway with the whiskey and immediately pour in pineapple juice. Tangy!

Name: Hawaiian Hoe
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Hawaiian Punch from Hell
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour all over ice then shake and strain into a large shot glass.

Name: Head Butt
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Mix in a double shot glass. I usually use a little less rum and a little more Irish cream, and only high quality stuff, or it tastes funny. This drink tastes like a chocolate mint, and it catches up with you fast!

Name: Head F**k
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chartreuse', '1 oz. Tia Maria']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Heart Breaker
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Heartburn
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Absolut 100 Vodka']
Making: Stir in a shooter glass and shoot.

Name: Heaven and Hell
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. After Shock Blue Liqueur', '1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur']
Making: Mix In Shot Glass and Shoot!

Name: Heavenly Body
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Golden Pear', '1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Heavy Harry Testicle
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. American Cream Liqueur', 'Milk', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Layer the liquors, float the milk and sprinkle with cinnamon. Tastes like a chocolate covered a cherry!!

Name: HedkrAvin
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Lillet', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 dash(es) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Pour in order into a shot glass.

Name: Hell On Earth (Birthday Drink)
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Hell's Breath
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Absolut Peppar Vodka', '1/3 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager', '2 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour liquor. Mix. Drop in Tobasco, but don't stir.

Name: Hellfire
Ingredients: ['2/5 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '2/5 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/5 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour Tabasco sauce into a shot glass and then pour in Bourbon and rye. Shoot.

Name: Hemlock
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Mix in a shot glass, start with Jagermeister.

Name: Her
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Champagne', '3 drop(s) Grenadine (Or to taste)']
Making: Mix the champagne with a few drops of grenadine, then top with the Jack Daniel's and shoot.

Name: Heroin
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca (Black)', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Stephani's comment: Shoot this and see why you should never do heroin…

Name: Hershey Squirts
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Butter Shots', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', "1 tbsp. Hershey's Chocolate Syrup", '1 tsp. Peanut Butter']
Making: Mix Butter Shots and Bailey's Irish Cream in a shot glass. Add Hershey's Chocolate Syrup and shake well. Add peanut butter and suck down.

Name: Highlands Haze
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 slice(s) Banana']
Making: Mix all three liquids and then drop a banana slice in. Shoot it with the banana slice.

Name: Highway
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Hillbilly Hell Cat
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 oz. Everclear']
Making: Put your hand over the glass, shake well, then shoot it!

Name: Hiram Walker - Peach Lemon Drop
Ingredients: ['1/2 part(s) Hiram Walker Peach Schnapps', '1/2 part(s) Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1 squirt(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Combine ingredients in shaker w/ ice. Shake vigorously. Strain into chilled shot glass.

Name: Hiram Walker - Sex on the Beach
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Hiram Walker Peach Schnapps', '1 part(s) Absolut Vodka', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice', '1 part(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Serve chilled as a shot.

Name: Hit From The Bong
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Pisang Ambon']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and dip two fingers in the glass. Take them out, shoot and put your wet fingers into your mouth. Now take a deep breath. Blows yours lungs out…

Name: Hit-n-Run
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Hodgieshiek
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Blue Curacao', '1 part(s) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: equall parts of all spiritssplash of cran/sourshake over rocksstrain into shot glass.

Name: Hollandbury
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Starbucks Double Shot Espresso', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour Starbucks Double Shot into a double old-fashioned glass. Drop shot glass with Bailey's Irish Creme into double old-fashioned glass. Chug.

Name: Hollowpoint
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's", '1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka']
Making: Chill and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Hollywood
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Chill and serve in shot glass.

Name: Holy Water
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Makers Mark Bourbon', "1/4 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '1/4 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a shaker with ice and add all eight liquors and four mixers. Shake well. Makes a great drink or 4-5 shots. Can't really make one shot but who cares. Should taste like Hawaiian Punch.

Name: Home Run Shot
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Whiskey']
Making: Directions are simple. Pour four shots and line them up like a baseball diamond. First base is a Kamikaze (Vodka, Triple Sec and lime juice), second base is the Jagermeister, third is Goldschlager and the home run is the whiskey.

Name: Homecoming
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Pour Bailey's Irish Cream into a glass and top with Amaretto. Damn tasty!

Name: Homemade Apple Pie
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Apple Juice', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: First mix the vodka and the apple juice in a shot glass. Then add a pinch of cinnamon. Next, put some whipped cream in your mouth (the more the better) and take the shot. Tastes just like an apple pie.

Name: Honey Dew Me
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Honey Jagermeister', '1 oz. Midori', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Chill and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Hong Kong Hooor
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Inferno Pepper Vodka', "1/2 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's Fireball"]
Making: Mix Inferno with Fireball and top with whipped cream.

Name: Hopscotch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Scotch']
Making: Layer and shoot.

Name: Horney Bull
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Rum', '1/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Hornitos Horn-ucopia
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Hornitos Reposado Tequila', '1/2 part(s) Pear Brandy', '1/4 part(s) Simple Syrup', '1/2 part(s) Lime Juice', 'Blueberries']
Making: Muddle bluenerris, shake and strain in to a shot glass.

Name: Horny Bastard
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka (You can also use gin or rum)', '1/2 oz. Caramel Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Horny Mohican
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Free pour each ingredient into a test tube.

Name: Horny Monkey
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Peppermint Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Banana Ramazotti']
Making: Layer in a shot glass, the bailey's at the bottom

Name: Horny Pucker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hornitos Plata Tequila', '1 oz. Apple Pucker']
Making: Pour into separate shot glasses. Chase the tequila with the Apple Pucker.

Name: Horny Southerner
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Swirl and strain into a shot glass. ENJOY!!!!

Name: Horsemen of the Apocalypse
Ingredients: ["1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/3 oz. Jose Cuervo', "1/3 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum"]
Making: Spread the shots out in front of you, take the first one, slam it, then the next and so on down the line. No chaser, no pause. When all four are down, guess which one was which.

Name: Hot Apple Pie #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Hot Bitch
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: Hot Cherry
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown", '1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Mix whiskey and amaretto in a shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass and garnish with a cherry.

Name: Hot F**k
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Stir with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Hot Flash
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Hot Haus
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Serve chilled in a shot glass.

Name: Hot Jizz
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Everclear', '1/4 oz. 7-Up (Or Sprite)']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Hot Jose
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps (Chilled)', '1/2 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila']
Making: Pour in a shot glass and serve. Note: The Hot Damn should be chilled.

Name: Hot Lesbian Sex
Ingredients: ['1 splash(es) 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1 oz. Peach Brandy', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Add both brandys and the peach schnapps in a shot glass. Top with 151 and set fire to it. Blow out the flame and drink.

Name: Hot Lick
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Pour the sambuca into a shot glass and place in the microwave for 10-15 seconds. Carefully light the alcohol fumes. Blow out the flame and shoot. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Hot Mexican Hooker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/2 oz. Tabasco Sauce', '1 splash(es) Tuna Fish Juice']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and top with the tuna fish juice.

Name: Hot Monkey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Skyy Vodka']
Making: Shake the banana liqueur with the vodka and ice. Strain into a shot glass and top off with the Grand Marnier. It's a tropical favorite from Maui, Hawaii! Alohas!

Name: Hot Oatmeal Cookie
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Goldschlager', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer the first two ingredients and then float the 151 on top. Light the 151 until it warms the top of the shot. Blow out and drink!

Name: Hot Peach Pie
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '2/3 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Mix the rum and schnapps in a shot glass and light on fire. Blow out and drink quickly. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Hot Pucker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 splash(es) Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Fill shot glass half with apple pucker, then a splash of hot damn - easy cheesy.

Name: Hot Rod
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/3 oz. Cherry Liqueur']
Making: Layer and serve.

Name: Hot Shot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Galliano', '1 oz. Coffee (Hot)', 'Whipped Cream (Hand whipped)']
Making: Put the chilled Galliano into a shot glass and float the hot coffee. Top with cool whipped cream and shoot.

Name: Hot Spot

Name: Irish Carbomb
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1/2 pint(s) Guinness']
Making:
Pour Bailey's, Kahlua and Jamesons' in order in a shot glass (Bailey's at the bottom). Drop or slide the shot into a half pint of Guinness Stout. The shot, if dropped in carefully, looks like a Guinness inside a Guinness. The Carbomb is to be consumed in one long swallow. Mind your teeth as the shot slides forward. The incredible taste is worth the risk.
An Irish Carbomb is perhaps one of the oddest drinks ever concocted. Also called a Peacemaker, an IRA car bomb, a Belfast carbomb, or just plain carbomb, this drink contains a strange pairing of alcoholic beverages that people either love or hate.
If you’ve never had one, an Irish carbomb is actually a boilermaker that contains stout, Irish Cream, and an Irish whiskey of your choice. To make it, the stout is placed in a glass, while the whiskey is layered on top of the Irish cream in a shot glass. The shot glass is dropped into the glass of stout, and the whole drink is quickly consumed before the beer can curdle the cream. The concoction isn’t the only thing that’s odd. To some, the drink’s name may sound festive and fun, and the perfect drink for paying tribute to Irish Heritage on holidays such as St. Patrick’s Day. However, it is actually a homage to a horrific event that occurred on July 21, 1972.
Also known as Bloody Friday, the unfortunate day consisted of 22 car bombs that were unleashed by the IRA, or Irish Republican Army, on Northern Ireland. Both parties were quite damaged by the bombings. The day will always be remembered as one of the worst in history, so it seems rather strange that a drink would be dubbed an Irish carbomb since many would rather forget the day than celebrate with a libation.

First the apple juice is poured in their mouth, followed by the vodka, followed by one more layer of each. Then a little whipped cream and a dash a cinnamon. No one is allowed to swallow until the cinnamon is dashed!! Men seem to enjoy watching women doing this one. We did it at parties in college and I ruined several of my favorite dresses. :-)
