Name: Joe Punch
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Joe Sakic (Stanley Cup)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Mix and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Joe's Blade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Ice 101', '1 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a rocks glass and shoot it down. Be carefu,l too many of these will get you good but they are very tasty.

Name: Johhny Appleseed
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Smirnoff Apple Twist Vodka']
Making: Mix all three and enjoy.

Name: John Watts' Puke Juice
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cuervo Tequila', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Pour the four first ingredients into a shot glass, shoot and chase with Wild Turkey. This is guaranteed to make even the biggest man puke his guts up.

Name: Johnny On The Beach
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Stir and strain into a shot glass. Makes more than one serving.

Name: Johnny's Tonic
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Smirnoff 100 Vodka', '1/8 oz. Tropical Fruit Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice', '1/8 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Mix gently and shoot.

Name: Joller
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Eine Kleine Nachtmusik Chocolate Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Amarula Cream Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Peppermint Liqueur']
Making: Layer in order given. Pick up shooter glass in mouth turn around in mouth without dropping glass. If you fail...have another go!

Name: Jolly Rancher
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Sprite', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix well and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Jolly Rancher #5
Ingredients: ['1 oz. DeKuyper Sour Apple', '2 oz. 7-Up', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into two shot glasses or in a collins glass over ice.

Name: Jolly Rancher #6
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Jose Pache
Ingredients: ["1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Brandy (Preferably J&B)', '1/3 oz. Absolut Vodka']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Jose Pache Sombrero
Ingredients: ["1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Brandy (Preferably J&B)', '1/3 oz. Jose Cuervo']
Making: Mix and shoot

Name: Jose's Panties
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Build in a mixing tin filled with ice, shake and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Juan the Drunken Monkey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rum', 'Nescafe French Vanilla Instant Coffee']
Making: Lick your wrist then pour some Nescafe on it. Drink the shot then lick your wrist again.

Name: Judgement Day
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Everclear']
Making: Mix one after the other in a large shot glass. Proportions can be altered for taste. It should taste like a peppermint patty so you might want to err in favor of the Rumple Minze.

Name: Juicy Pussy #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Jumper Cable
Ingredients: ['Red Bull Energy Drink', '1 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Fill a tall glass about half with Red Bull. Pour the Jagermeister into a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the glass of Red Bull and drink Fast. Tastes like bubble gum.

Name: June Bug
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Peach Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Jungle Love F**k
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Crown Royal', '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Junior Caesar
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Clamato Juice', '1 wedge(s) Lemon']
Making: Mix the vodka and clamato juice in a shot glass. Suck lemon wedge, down shooter.

Name: Junior Mint
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao light']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Jus' Ginger
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Ginger Brandy', '1/2 oz. Cape Velvet Cream Liqueur']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Kaluah Bomb Shell
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Mix in a 2 oz. shot glass and bombs away.

Name: Kamakazi #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', "1 splash(es) Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Mix vodka and triple sec in a shot glass, add a splash of lime juice for the taste and shoot.

Name: Kamakazi Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Kamikaze #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', 'dash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', 'dash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Kamikaze Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Kandi's Chocolate Kiss
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Frangelico']
Making: Layer in shot glass in order and shoot away!

Name: Kane's Tombstone
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Everclear', '1/4 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', "1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Country Cocktail (Downhome Punch)"]
Making: Mix the first three ingredients in a shot glass and the last four ingredients in another shot glass. Slam both of them in order and quickly.

Name: Kare Bear
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Banana Ramazotti']
Making: Pour the Amaretto and the banana ramazzoti in a shot glass, then add the blue Curacao.

Name: Kentucky Bow-Legged Woman
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'dash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Keremiki
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Mix together in shot glass and shoot.

Name: Kermit Piss
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and shoot….it looks weird in the shot glass.

Name: Kevorkian
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's Fireball", "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Pour into a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Key Lime
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'Lime Juice (To taste)', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour lime juice to taste in a 2 oz. shot glass, add the vodka and fill with whipped cream. Lick off the whipped cream even with the top and shoot. (Optional: Garnish with a Gummy Bear). Charlie who invented this drink as a signature drink for his floor says: It's a nice drink, seemed to go over well, if I am ripping anyone off, please let me know.

Name: Key Lime Pie
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's Fireball", '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake over ice or just use lime juice as a topper. It REALLY does taste like the real thing!

Name: Key West Rootbeer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Mix together with ice, pour into a shot glass and drink.

Name: Keywest Root Beer
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Swirl with ice and strain into a shot glass... Taste just like root beer (no alchohol taste).

Name: Kick In The Balls
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', "3/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Yukon Jack']
Making: served as a shot .....no ice.....

Name: Kick In The Cahonies
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Rose', '1 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Kickin Chicken #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Layer Wild Turkey on the bottom, 151 proof rum in the middle and Hot Damn on top. Catch your breath and shoot it!!

Name: Kickin' Chicken
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Rim a shot glass with Tabasco sauce and pour the Wild Turkey. Shoot!

Name: Kickstarter
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Firewater', '2 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: Kill Yourself
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', "1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1 splash(es) Everclear']
Making: Mix liquors and get a paper bag ready

Name: Killdozer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Everclear', '1 splash(es) Malibu Rum']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Killer Bee #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Barenjager Honey Liqueur']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Killer Bee #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Honey Jagermeister']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. The Jaegers will separate due to their thickness and look like a bee.

Name: Killer Kool-Aid #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour directly into a shot glass but pour cranberry juice at the end for nicer effect…

Name: Killer Kotton Kandy
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1/3 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '1/3 oz. Orange Vodka', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Kilo
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Amarula Cream Liqueur']
Making: Fill the bottom half of a shot glass with Malibu and add the Amarula on top.

Name: Kilted Mexican
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Scotch', '3/4 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: King Of Hearts
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Crown Royal', '2/3 oz. Tequila Rose', '1 splash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Chilled and strained into a shot glass.

Name: Kit Kat Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Creme de Cacao dark', '1 part(s) Frangelico', '1 part(s) Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: As much as you like but equal amounts of each…..serve in shot glasses.

Name: Klondike
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/4 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake well and serve up in a rocks glass.

Name: Klondike Bar
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Milk', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Tastes just like a Klondike Bar but with a kick and oh so yummy. I prefer it as a shooter although it can be poured over ice and served. Either way it should be well-chilled for the Klondike Bar effect

Name: KneeTrembler
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kirsch', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix and knock back - wait for those knees to start trembling!

Name: Knock Me Down And F**k Me
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Knock Out
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Absinthe', '1/3 oz. Dry Gin', '1/3 oz. French Vermouth', '1 tsp. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Knockout Punch
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Everclear', '1 splash(es) Gatorade']
Making: Shake and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Koetje
Ingredients: ['4 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Sambuca']
Making: Fill a shotglass with the Kahlua then finish it with Sambuca.

Name: KOOKYNIE KILLER
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Cointreau', '1 oz. Galliano', '1 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer Vodka, Tequila, Cointreau, Galliano and Drambuie in a 5 oz. Glass. Pour the Bailey's Irish Cream into a shot glass. Light the 5 oz. glass and drink through a straw. Then shoot the Bailey's Irish Cream. ***Webmixer's Note*** Please see the Tips section for information on preparing flaming drinks.

Name: Kool-Aid
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Amaretto', '1 part(s) Southern Comfort', '2 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Put in pitcher and stir. Pour into shot glasses.

Name: KOS Round (T'N'T Shot)
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka (Preferably Kettel One Vodka)']
Making: Fill three shot glasses in row and top off the bottom of a flipped over shot glass. Shoot the three shots then end with a chilly willy (snorting vodka).

Name: Krack Pipe
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tequila', 'Iced Tea']
Making: Pour the alcohol into a shot glass. Shoot. Chase with a glass of Iced Tea.

Name: Kro-Magnum
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1/3 oz. Crown Royal', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Serve chilled in a shot glass.

Name: Kryptonite
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Mountain Dew cold']
Making: Mix in rocks glass and kill it.

Name: Kryptonite #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Kumoniwannalaya
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: No layering. Just mix together and enjoy

Name: Kung Fu Fighter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Blueberry Schnapps']
Making: Pour in order in a shot glass.

Name: L.A. Riot
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca (Black)', '1/4 oz. Chartreuse', '1/4 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Layer in order (sambuca at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass. The Cointreau should slide under the Chartreuse, lifting it and settle on the black sambuca

Name: La Bandera Mexicana
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Tequila Gold', '1 oz. Sangria (Sweet and sour)']
Making: Pour each ingredient in a different shot glasses and shoot in order (lime first).

Name: Lactating Hermaphrodite
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: In a rocks glass, pour Kahlua then layer tequila rose followed by cream.

Name: Lake Michigan
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Chill both in the freezer. Pour the vodka into a shot glass then SLOWLY pour in the Avalanche. The blue should settle out on top. It tastes as cool as it looks!

Name: Lake Of Fire
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pepper Vodka', '3 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '1 Pepper (Extremely hot jalepeno, chilli etc. in its juice.)']
Making: Pour a shot of peppered vodka in a shot glass then add 3 dashes of tabasco sauce. Take the pepper out of the juice and rub it around the top rim of the shot glass making sure the juice flows from the top down into the vodka. You can also cut a piece of the pepper in the juice and put it in the shot or just take a small amount of pepper juice and put it into the shot. You can vary the juice amount depending on how hot you want the drink.

Name: Lamb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'dash(es) Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Sour Mix', 'dash(es) Soda Water', 'dash(es) Lemon Juice (Fresh)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: LamilaMortczynski
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass: the Frangelico goes in first, then the Bailey's and then you just sprinkle the top with some ground coffee or grated chocolate.

Name: Landslide #1
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Landslide #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/3 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Landslide #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 oz. Rum Cream Liqueur', '1 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Laser Beam #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Galliano', '2/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Late Bloomer
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/3 oz. White Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Launcher
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Chill a rocks glass with ice and water. Shake with ice and strain into the chilled rocks glass.

Name: Lava Java
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lava Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Pour the Kahlua into a shot glass. Then slowly pour the Lava on top of the Kahlua. It will layer automatically.

Name: Lava Lamp
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Galliano', '1/4 oz. Bacardi White Rum', '1/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', 'dash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Pour in order in a double shot glass, adding lightly the dash of blue curacao last, so it falls through the other ingredients giving the appearance of a lava lamp.

Name: Lawnmower
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Juice (Wheatgrass juice)']
Making: Shake gently over ice then strain into tall shot glass.

Name: Lazer Beam
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Lazy Canuck
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Chill and mix all ingredients together. Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Le Degeu
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Clamato Juice']
Making: Just shake and drink...excellent for someone you wanna see get sick

Name: Le Montrealais
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Leather and Lace #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/2 oz. Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Leather and Lace #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Leather Whip
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', "1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. Shoot!

Name: LeatherNeck
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Left Hook
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: Leg Spreader #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tuaca', '3/4 oz. Butter Nips Liqueur']
Making: Mix well with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Leg Spreader #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: One shot of each liquor….and then a splash of sour mix and some pineapple juice….then stir or shake.

Name: Leggs
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1 oz. Jagermeister', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. Enjoy!!

Name: Lemon Bomb
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Absolut Vodka', '3/4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Sugar the rim of a shot glass and add a splash of Chambord Raspberry liqueur. Mix the Absolut Vodka and sweet and sour and pour over Chambord.

Name: Lemon Drop
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila premium brand, chilled', '1/2 oz. Vodka premium brand, chilled']
Making: Use a lemon slice to moisten the inside of a shot glass. Coat the inside with sugar. Pour in chilled tequila and vodka.

Name: Lemon Drop #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'drop(s) Lemon Juice']
Making: Drop lemon juice on vodka. Coat the rim of a shot glass with lemon and sugar. Pour vodka in and add the drop of lemon juice. Shoot!

Name: Lemon Drop #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Add the vodka to the shot glass then the lemon juice. Put the sugar in the back of your mouth and shoot the drink. It should taste like a lemon drop.

Name: Lemon Drop #4
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Powdered Sugar']
Making: Add the vodka to the shot glass then the lemon juice. Put the sugar in the back of your mouth and shoot the drink. It should taste like a lemon drop.

Name: Lemon Drop (flaming)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '2 wedge(s) Lemon', '1 splash(es) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 package(s) Sugar']
Making: Put the packet of sugar in the bottom of a shot glass. Squeeze one lemon so the juice mixes with the sugar. Add the Absolute Citron. Place the other lemon wedge splashed with the Bacardi 151 on top of the shot glass. Light. Wait for it to die out. Take the lemon off - slam and suck! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE!!!

Name: Lemon Drop Shooter (Only The Best)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka (Or just Absolut vodka)', '1 Lemon', 'Sugar']
Making: Pour the vodka in a shot glass. Cut the lemon into wedges. Rub on lemon wedge in sugar. Shoot Absolut, then suck your sugar coated lemon! Make sure you get all the juices!!!!!

Name: Lemon Drop Shots
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka', '1 Lemon', 'Sugar']
Making: Cut the lemon into small pieces so they will fit into your mouth. Dip a piece of lemon into a bowl of sugar, then fill a shot glass full of vodka. Drink the shot then eat the lemon with sugar on it. It's a real party favourite.

Name: Lemon Drop Supreme
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', "1/2 oz. Lemon Lime Juice (preferably Rosas')", '1 bottle(s) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum (Small bottle)', '1 slice(s) Lemon', 'Granulated Sugar']
Making: Mix the vodka and the juice in a shot glass. Sprinkle a lemon slice with sugar and 151 rum, enough to get the sugar slightly wet. The place the lemon slice on top of the shot glass. Light on fire for just a few seconds and blow out. Remove the lemon slice, drink the shot, suck the lemon! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Lemon Head
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 piece(s) Lemon', 'Sugar']
Making: Dip the lemon wedge in sugar, coating it thoroughly. Drink the shot of vodka and then suck the lemon.

Name: Lemon Shots #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', 'Powdered Sugar', 'Lemon']
Making: Cut the lemon into slices. Coat one lemon slice in sugar and shoot the vodka, then suck on lemon slice. Repeat with the other slices, using another shot of vodka each time.

Name: Lemon Shots #2
Ingredients: ['1 cup(s) Everclear', '1/2 can(s) Lemonade (Frozen concentrate)']
Making: Blend with ice until smooth and pour into shot glasses.

Name: Leprachaun Lube
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Crown Royal']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Leprechaun Lynch
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Scotch', '1 tbsp. Kool-Aid (Lime)']
Making: Pour Scotch into a shot glass and add the Kool-Aid. Let the Kool-Aid dissolve and shoot.

Name: Leprechaun Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour into shaker over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Let's Tango
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. White Rum', '1/3 oz. Sambuca', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Lethal Injection #2
Ingredients: ["1/3 oz. Admiral Nelson's Coconut Rum", "1/3 oz. Admiral Nelson's Spiced Rum", '1/3 oz. Dark Rum']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Lethal Injection #3
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager', '1/3 oz. Everclear']
Making: In a double-shot glass, add Jagermeister, Goldschlager and Everclear. Cover the glass with your hand, slam on bar (to 'mix'). Do the shot.

Name: Lethal Weapon
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Layer in order (Midori at the bottom) and shoot.

Name: Lexi Special
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Layer in order (Kahlua at the bottom of the glass) over the back of a spoon in a shot glass.

Name: Lick Sip and Suck
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Tequila', '1 Lemon', 'Salt']
Making: Pour the tequila into a shot glass. Sprinkle some salt on your wrist and then lick it off. Shoot the tequila then quickly suck on a slice of lemon.

Name: Licorice Heart
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Sambuca (Black)', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Licorice Whip
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Mix in a shooter glass then shoot it. Then say "crack that whip! licorice whip!"

Name: Life Flight
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Layer in order (Bacardi at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass.

Name: Life in Hell
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Tabasco Sauce', '1 Jalapeno Pepper']
Making: Layer Tabasco and tequila in a large shot glass. Drop in a small slice of jalapeno. Shoot and then eat the slice of jalapeno. Have water ready!

Name: Life Preserver
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 Breakfast Cereal (Preferably Cheerios)']
Making: Layer with blue on top and place Cheerio in blue Curacao. Shoot it!!!

Name: Light Green
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Green Chartreuse']
Making: Ingredients can be shaken with ice or poured directly into a shot glass.

Name: Light House
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Lighthouse
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in order (Kahlua at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass. Lighting is an option. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Lightning
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peppermint Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Licorice Liqueur']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and drink.

Name: Lil' Sheila
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Rum Cream Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Limon Drop
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Pour Bacardi Limon and Sweet and Sour in a shot glass. Coat a Lemon in sugar and serve.

Name: Limonizer
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. London Dry Gin', '1/3 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Limp Banana
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Banana Rum', '1/4 oz. Mountain Dew', '1/4 oz. Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Lion's Blood
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Roaring Lion Energy Drink', '1 part(s) Vodka', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a shooter glass and add a splash of grenadine.

Name: Lipstick Ring
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '1 oz. Kool-Aid (Cherry)']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Liquid Asphault
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sambuca', '3/4 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Chill alcohol, layer Jagermeister on top of Sambuca in shot glass. Serve.

Name: Liquid Cocaine #1
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Combine 4 alcohol and pineapple juice in cocktail mixer with ice. Shake well. Strain into shot glass.

Name: Liquid Cocaine #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Best served when Jagermeister is chilled. Layer Jagermeister... Enjoy.

Name: Liquid Cocaine ( Uzi )
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Chill liquor. Shake over ice and strain into a chilled shot glass.

Name: Liquid Cocaine (revised)
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Liquid Cocaine (Southern California Style)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze or peppermint schnapps', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1 splash(es) Cream']
Making: Mix over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Liquid Cocaine (XXX)
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Rumple Minze', '2 oz. Goldschlager', '2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Mix and drink fast.

Name: Liquid Cocaine Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer ingredients

Name: Liquid Crack #2
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Yukon Jack', "1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Crown Royal']
Making: Mix over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Liquid Heroin #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Liquid Heroin #2
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and slam!!

Name: Liquid Mentos
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Banana Liqueur']
Making: Pour into a shot glass in the given order and do not stir....tilt, swallow, enjoy!

Name: Liquid Panty Remover #4
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Place juice and grenadine into tumbler half-full of ice and shake. Add remaining ingredients to mix and shake again. Strain intoa shot glass. Enjoy!

Name: Liquid Steak
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'Worcestershire Sauce']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and add a drizzle of the Worcestershire Sauce.

Name: Liquid Valium
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Crown Royal', '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Pour Crown Royal and peach schnapps into a shot glass. Fill close to top with the cranberry juice and top with orange juice. Shoot.

Name: Liquid Viagra
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Club Soda']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Liquid X
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Iced Tea (Preferably Bluesberry Iced Tea)', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into two shot glasses.

Name: Liquid XTC
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '1 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Lit City
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'dash(es) Goldschlager']
Making: Pour the ingredients slowly in a shot glass in the given order. Light it and shoot. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Litherland's Amaretto Sour Jiggle Shots
Ingredients: ['1/2 cup(s) Amaretto', '1 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '1 tbsp. Lemon Juice', '2 package(s) JELLO (Lime)']
Making: Mix the ingredients, pour in 2 oz. shot glasses and refrigerate.

Name: Little Beer
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Licor 43', '1/4 oz. Cream']
Making: Pour the Licor 43 into a shot glass and top with a layer of cream to make it look like a little beer.

Name: Little Bitch
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Little Purple Men
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Mix both in a shooter glass. By the end of the night you should see little purple men.

Name: Little Red Dangler
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Crown Royal']
Making: Mix over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Loaded
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Raspberry Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Add ingredients in a mixing tin with ice. Shake then strain into a shot glass. Down shot and then follow instructions again until you can't feel your feet.

Name: Loch Ness Monster #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Lonestar
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Parfait Amour', '1/3 oz. Cherry Whiskey', '1/3 oz. Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Lord Jose's Cream
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Lord Calvert Canadian Whiskey', '1 part(s) Jose Cuervo', '1 part(s) Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour each equally in a 12 oz. glass. Easy to make, a little tougher to drink. It starts off with a Canadian Whisky taste. Then chokes your throat with a bit of that tequila kick. It then finishes off with the smooth after taste of Baileys Irish Cream. It's three cultures mixed into one.

Name: Louisiana Leg Spreader
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Skyy Vodka (Citrus)', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '1/4 oz. Simple Syrup', '1/4 oz. Cherry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain over a cherry into a rocks glass previously filled with 1/4 oz of cherry juice. Drop the cherry in the glass. Instruct imbiber to not choke on the aforementioned garnish, and let the "leg spreading" begin!

Name: Love On Your Head
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Love Potion No. 9
Ingredients: ['2/5 oz. Tia Maria', '2/5 oz. Galliano', '1/5 oz. Cream (Fresh)']
Making: Layer in order (Tia Maria at the bottom) in a shot glass.

Name: LSD
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lemon Vodka', '1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Lumberjack
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Gin']
Making: Pour in shot glass and hold on tight.

Name: Lumpy Laidley
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix and shoot. This is a rather disgusting shooter - but fun to force on your friends!

Name: Lunch Box
Ingredients: ['1 can(s) Beer', '1 oz. Amaretto', 'Orange Juice']
Making: In a frosty mug pour enough beer in mug to fill half way. Drop in shooter glass of Amaretto, then fill to top of mug with orange juice. SLAM IT!

Name: Lunch Box #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', 'Beer', 'Orange Juice']
Making: Put shooter of root beer schnapps in a highball glass. Then fill the glass to top of shooter glass with orange juice, cover with beer to top of glass. Chug it back.

Name: Lunch Box #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '4 oz. Beer', '4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Put the beer and the orange juice in a 12 oz. beer mug. Pour the Amaretto in a shot glass and drop it into the mug and slam.

Name: Lunchbox
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Beer', '6 oz. Orange Juice', '2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Mix beer and orange juice together in a pint glass. Drop in the shot glass of amaretto and chug. Very light and tasty.

Name: Lycanthropy
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Mezzaluna Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tuaca', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 dash(es) Bitters']
Making: Shake over IceStrain into shot glasses.Measurements given will make about 4-6 shots. (Depending on ice meltage)

Name: M and M Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Put both ingredients into a small mixer with one scoop of ice. Swirl shaker 10 or 12 times and strain contents into a shot glass.

Name: Mach 5
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Layer and drink fast. Take out the Crown Royale and you've got a 4 horseman.

Name: Machine Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice chilled', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka chilled']
Making: Pour orange juice into a shot glass. Using the back of a small spoon, float the vodka on top of the orange juice. Do not mix before serving.

Name: Machine Shot
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Mountain Dew', '1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Mad Iguana
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Mad Melon Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Mad Melon Watermelon Schnapps', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Mafia Boss
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Layer the drinks in order then shoot.

Name: Mages Fire
Ingredients: ['6 cup(s) Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '3 cup(s) Blue Curacao', '3 cup(s) Skyy Vodka']
Making: Mix the entire contents of the 4 bottles into a large container then pour into individual bottles (I prefer empty and delabelled Arbor Myst wine bottles due to their frosted appearance). Let set for a while so the colour looks nice. Chill and serve into shot glasses. Note: the longer they age the smoother the colour and taste.

Name: Maiden's Prayer #3
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Gordon's Dry Gin", '1/2 oz. Lillet', '1/2 oz. Calvados']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Main Street
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Dr Pepper', '1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Pepsi Cola', '1 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Put all the ingredients in separate shot glasses and line the glasses up. The participant goes down the road (row of shots) and drinks the shots. Whatever is left in the glasses is poured into an empty shot glass. If the amount exceeds the size of 1 shot glass then the participant must repeat the trip. Well now that you have gone down Main Street you must go back to where you started. This time the series is repeated in reverse starting with the lemon juice and ending with the vodka. DRINK UP!!!!

Name: Malibu Mindolai
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Yummy, refreshing, and locally famous. You'll love it!

Name: Malibu Stacy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Milk']
Making: Shake well over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: MaliHi
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Hawaiian Fruit Punch', '1 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Mix and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Mango Delight
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tropico Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', 'Tropico Liqueur']
Making: Shake well and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Maple Kiss
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1/3 oz. Raspberry Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Maple Syrup (Canadian)']
Making: Pour in order and shoot. It is so good! And truly Canadian!!

Name: Marajuana Milkshake
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Midori', 'Milk']
Making: Pour white creme de cacao then Midori and finally top gently with milk into a shot glass.

Name: Martian Secretion
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Martian Urine Sample
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a 2 oz. shot glass.

Name: Marzipan
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Advocaat', '1/4 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Shake with ice until chilled and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Massachussetts Snake Bite Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Yukon Jack', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', "1 splash(es) Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Chill ingredients with some ice. Strain and serve.

Name: Massilon Gravel
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Master Polar Bear
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass. (It tastes like After-Eight)

Name: Masturbating Mosquito
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a highball glass.

Name: Mattawoman Mooner
Ingredients: ['2 part(s) Kahlua', '1 part(s) Baileys Irish Cream', '1 part(s) Southern Comfort']
Making: Chill over ice…..strain into a shot glass….shoot!

Name: Matts Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. Cover top of drink with your palm and slam the glass down on the table and drink it. Slamming it makes it foam up.

Name: Matts Shooter #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Skyy Vodka', '1/4 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Maui Popper
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps', 'Sprite']
Making: Combine in a shot glass. Place the palm of your hand over the top of the shot and make sure it is covered completely. Raise the shot glass to around shoulder level, slam down on the counter top (or any hard surface) and as it starts to fizz everywhere shoot it down. It goes down very smoothly and tastes really yummy :) They aren't very strong either which is good for all the lightweights out there, and also good as a starting drink!

Name: Maupin Mountain Dew
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sour Apple Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', 'dash(es) Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix sweet and sour mix and the alcohol together, top with a dash of Mountain Dew, and shoot!

Name: Max Factor
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Mayan Sacrafice
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Sambuca', '1 splash(es) Tequila']
Making: Layer in the order given above, ignite and suck the mixture up with a straw while on fire. Excellent party shooter. I found this combo down in the Yucatan while on vacation, definitely my favourite. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Maybe Later
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Mel Fisher Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and cover with a napkin. Slam the shot on the bar and drink at once. Bite into a slice of lime.

Name: Melon Ball
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Meloncholy Baby
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Meloretto
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. A really sweet drink for the ladies.

Name: Menage A Trois Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Menstrual Cycle
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '2 tsp. Strawberry Jam', 'dash(es) Lemonade']
Making: Mix together in a shot glass then devour.

Name: Mental Breakdown
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum preferably high proof', '1 1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix and pour into shotglasses.

Name: Mental Clearity
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Everclear', '1/4 oz. Tequila Silver', '1/4 oz. Gin', 'dash(es) 7-Up (Or Sprite)', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Mexican Asshole
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '3 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce', '5 drop(s) Worcestershire Sauce']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Mexican Berry
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Mexican Breeze
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Mexican Burning Village
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '2/3 oz. Tequila', 'dash(es) Hot Sauce']
Making: Cover the bottom of a shot glass with pepper flakes (like the ones you put on pizza), then add the rum followed by the tequila, after that add a dash of hot sauce. To finish, put your left hand over the top so it won't spill, flip it so that the pepper flakes swirl around (like a Swiss snowing village), put it right side up lick your left hand then shoot.

Name: Mexican Christmas
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Cream or milk']
Making: Pour tequila into the shot glass and layer the milk on top. No garnish, no lemon or salt. Make sure you drink before the milk curtles too much! And have a Merry Mexican Christmas.

Name: Mexican Cola Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '2/3 oz. Kahlua', 'Coca Cola']
Making: Pour into a 2 oz. shooter glass and add a splash of coke. Cover and bang on bar. Drink fast.

Name: Mexican Flag
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Tequila Gold']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Mexican Gunman
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1 oz. Kahlua', '2 oz. Espresso']
Making: Pour ingredients into a rocks glass over ice and serve.

Name: Mexican Hillbilly
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jose Cuervo', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Mexican Leprechaun
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Mexican Margarita
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo Tequila Tradicional', '1/2 oz. Margarita Mix', '2 drop(s) Midori']
Making: Mix in a shot glass with a slice of lemon.

Name: Mexican Mother F**ker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a large shot glass.

Name: Mexican Mouthwash
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila', '3/4 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Pour into chilled shaker, gently swirl together. Pour into large shot glass.

Name: Mexican Pumper
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Mexican Snowshoe
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Mexican Tequila Popper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Pour the tequila into a shot glass and then add the 7-Up. Place your hand over the shot glass and slam down on the counter or table. This will make it fizz. Shoot it back. In Mexico, they have you do the shooter and then the server shakes your head while blowing a whistle. It has quite the effect!

Name: Mexican Thanksgiving
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tequila', '3/4 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Mix together in a shot glass.

Name: Mexican Toilet Bowl
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1 oz. Chocolate Milk']
Making: Fill a shot glass with the Bacardi 151 then fill a second shot glass with the chocolate milk. First, take the shot of chocolate milk and hold in mouth. Follow with the shot of 151. Swish the two together and taste the milk curdle! *only give to people you don't like…

Name: Mexican Water
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Sprite', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Put in shot glass, slam and drink. This shot is the specialty at La Valentino's Bar in Cancun.

Name: Mgooo!
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/2 oz. Tequila', 'Beer']
Making: Pour the spirits in a shot glass and drop the shot glass in a draft glass filled halfway with beer. Chug-a-lug. (Note the longer it sits, the worse it gets)

Name: Miami Beach Love Potion
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Coffee Brandy', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Miami Ice #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into shooter glass. Shoot.

Name: Midnight Kiss
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tequila Rose', '1/4 oz. Bols Blue Curacao']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Midnight Madness
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Brandy']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Midnight Moon Champion
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Junior Johnson's Midnight Moon Carolina Moonshine"]
Making: Pour chilled Midnight Moon into a shooter glass. Enjoy.

Name: Midnight Moon High Octane
Ingredients: ["1 part(s) Junior Johnson's Midnight Moon Carolina Moonshine", '1 part(s) Roaring Lion Energy Drink']
Making: Pour into a shooter glass.

Name: Midnight Moon Last Lap
Ingredients: ["1 part(s) Junior Johnson's Midnight Moon Carolina Moonshine", '1 part(s) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Pour into a shooter glass.

Name: Midnight Moon Pole Sitter
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Junior Johnson's Midnight Moon Carolina Moonshine"]
Making: Pour Midnight Moon into a shooter glass. Enjoy and then suck on a sugar coated lemon wedge.

Name: Midnight Pussy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake it and strain into a shooter glass.

Name: Midori Illusion #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Cointreau', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Midoski
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Lemon Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: Mild Jizz
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. 7-Up (Or Sprite)']
Making: Layer on top of each other in a shot glass.

Name: Miles of Smiles
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Rye Whiskey']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Milk Of Amnesia
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Pour Jagerermeister into a shot glass. Add Kahlua. Wait for the Kahlua to settle to the top, drink, enjoy.

Name: Milky Magic
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and enjoy!

Name: Milky Way
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Mind Eraser #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Fill 1/3 of the glass with 151. Pour the Kahlua over the back of the spoon slowly to keep the liqueur's separate. Then do the same with the tonic/soda water. Place the straw at the bottom of the glass and drink it all in one suck. The 151 and Kahlua will tear your stomach up, but the tonic water will settle it back down. This is why it is important to drink it all at once. They also taste pretty good mixed.

Name: Mind Eraser #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 1/2 oz. Vodka', 'Soda Water']
Making: Pour the alcohol over ice in an 8 to 10 oz. glass and top up with soda water. Shoot through several straws.

Name: Mind Eraser #4
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Copa de Ora']
Making: Fill a shot glass halfway with ice, layer in order (Kahlua at the bottom) and slam through a straw.

Name: Mind Fuk
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1 splash(es) Soda']
Making: Served in a rocks glass on ice. Drink through a straw.

Name: Mind Racer
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Layer in a lowball glass over ice. Then place a straw in the glass all the way to the bottom and drink as fast as you can.

Name: Minger
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Mini Guinness
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour the Chambord in a shot glass…..layer the Bailey's on top……should look like a "Mini Guinness"... …get it?

Name: Mint Chocolate Chip
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '2/3 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Mix together in a shot glass. A very good tasting shot that will still get real sloppy!!

Name: Mint Flip
Ingredients: ['dash(es) Creme de Menthe', 'Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour a dash of creme de menthe into a shooter glass and top up with Bailey's. Tastes like Mint Aero.

Name: Mint Monkey F**ker
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Mix together well in a shot glass.

Name: Mint Sandwich
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/3 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Minty Melon
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Layer in a shoot glass. Tastes and smells like toothpaste so it is a great last shot of the night before going home with a special someone.

Name: Misplaced Mexican
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Mix and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Missle
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', "dash(es) Jack Daniel's Whiskey", 'dash(es) Amaretto', 'dash(es) Southern Comfort', 'dash(es) Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila', 'dash(es) Bacardi Limon', 'dash(es) Absolut Citron Vodka', 'dash(es) Gran Gala', 'dash(es) Cointreau', 'dash(es) Bacardi Rum (Silver)', 'dash(es) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour a dash of pineapple juice and a dash of sour mix into a shaker. Add all the other ingredients, as well as ice, and shake vigorously. Strain into 2 shot glasses.

Name: Mistake
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', '1 oz. Lime Mix', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix over ice and pour into a shooter glass.

Name: Mocha Cappuccino Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Godiva Chocolate Liqueur', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum']
Making: Layer the shot in the order given.

Name: Model T
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/3 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Any colour you want as long as it's black.

Name: Money Shot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Honey Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Coconut Cream']
Making: Mix ingredients in shaker and strain into shot glass

Name: Mongolian Clusterf**k
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'dash(es) Lime Juice', 'dash(es) Pineapple Juice', 'dash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Mongoose
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Monica Lewinsky
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Brandy (Preferably Presidente)', '2 oz. Hot Sex']
Making: Mix together and slam.

Name: Monica's Stained Blue Dress
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '2 drop(s) Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Create in shot glass

Name: Monkey Ball Dropper
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Monkey Bite
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Banana Creme Liqueur', '2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Mix all three ingredients together and then drink up!

Name: Monkey Boy
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Monkey Brain
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Kahlua (Chilled)', '1/4 oz. Advocaat', '4 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Pour Kahlua in glass, swirl Advocaat onto top to form the brain. Then add drops of grenadine for blood.

Name: Monkey F**ker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Mix into a shot glass. This drink is designed to take a little bite out of old Jagermeister.

Name: Monkey Squirts
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Light Rum', '1/4 oz. 7-Up', '1/4 oz. Johnnie Walker Black Label Scotch', '1/4 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix. Shoot. Mix. Shoot. Repeat.

Name: Monkey's Punch
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Montana #3
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Mix well in a shot glass.

Name: Montana Stump Puller
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1 oz. White Creme de Cacao']
Making: Stir and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Montreal Grasshopper
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake with ice in a shaker. Strain into a shot glass.

Name: Moon Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur']
Making: Pour the Baileys first, then the melon liqueur in a shot glass.

Name: Moose River Hummer
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Put Frangelico in bottom of a shot glass. Add Rumple Minze, then Bacardi 151 proof rum. Ignite, then smother the flame. Shoot. Tastes like an after dinner mint!! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE!!!

Name: Morning Sex
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and drop in a chocolate covered espresso bean.

Name: Morrocan Soccer Riot
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Brandy', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Moscow Mule Var
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Scotch', '1/3 oz. Ginger Beer (Strong)']
Making: Mix and shoot!

Name: Mother In Law
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Bitters', '6 oz. Stout']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Mother's Milk
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Chill and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Motion Potion #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Di Saronno Oringinale Amaretto', '1 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Motor Oil
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager', '1/3 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Pour the Jagermeister into large a shot glass. Add the peppermint schnapps then the Goldschlager. Top with Malibu.

Name: Motor Oil #2
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Jagermeister', '1 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps']
Making: Mix and serve in a shot glass. Photo courtesy of DeKuyper USA.

Name: Mouse Brains
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '3 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Chill the schnapps and warm the Bailey's Irish Cream. Pour both into a rocks glass and you will form the brain. Pour in the grenadine to be the blood. The grenadine should stick to the 'brain'.

Name: Mozzie Bite
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', 'drop(s) Grenadine', 'drop(s) Creme de Cassis']
Making: Pour schnapps and Absolut into shooter. Drop in grenadine and cassis. Slam.

Name: Mr. Stinky Pants
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Pickle Juice', 'Beer']
Making: Pour the vodka and the juice in a shot glass, shoot and chase with the beer. This one hurts...bad.

Name: Ms. Jaskson
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix in a shot glass, ignite, blow out and shoot. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Mud Slide Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Measure all ingredients into shot glass.

Name: Muff Dive
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour the alcohol into a shot glass. Place the shot glass inside a short glass. Fill the short glass with the whipped cream and put your hands behind your back and your mouth around the shot glass. Pick up the shot glass with your mouth only and tilt your head back and down shot. Cindy's comment: The outer portion of your mouth will be sticky with whipped cream. Use your imagination!

Name: Muff Dive #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour the Raspberry Sourpuss into a shot glass. Put shooter into a short glass with a stem fill to the top with whipped cream. To take shot have someone hold the bottom of the glass. Don't use your hands! Grip the shot glass with your lips and down the shot.

Name: Muff Diver #2
Ingredients: ['Vodka', '1 can(s) Whipped Cream', '1 Cherry']
Making: Fill a martini glass with vodka and drop in a cherry. Pour the entire can of whipped cream onto the glass and "eat your way to the cherry".

Name: Muff Diver #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix in shaker and serve.

Name: Mulligan's Foreplay
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sailor Jerry Spiced Navy Rum', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Mulligan's Twister
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Ciclon', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Murski Shot
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice (Or cranberry juice)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Mushroom
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Orange Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Mustache Sally
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/6 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', 'Coconut Cream', '1 splash(es) Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake Absolute Vodka, Malibu Rum, Bailey's Irish Cream and pineapple juice over ice and strain into shot glasses. Then layer with coconut cream and a splash of half and half cream to top. Garnish with a cherry

Name: NAA (Nicole And Allison)
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Apple Pucker', "1/3 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Napalm
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Fire and Ice', '1 splash(es) Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour into shot glass putting the 151 in last. Light the 151 and serve.

Name: Narkotik's Fizz
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Iced Tea Lemon Nestea', '1 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Mix Bacardi Limon and iced tea in 5oz glass. Add 7-up. Put your hand on top of the glass and hit it on the table. Shoot it all the way down before foam overflows. NOTE - Don't let bubbles go up your nose!

Name: Nasty Bitch
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Pour over ice and strain into a shot glass

Name: Nasty Girl Scout
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 splash(es) Vodka', 'Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: In bar tin mix Kahlua, Rumple Minze and Vodka. Pour into a shot glass and float Bailey's on top.

Name: Nasty Pierre
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dewars White Label Scotch', '1/2 oz. Whiskey', '2/3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Mountain Dew']
Making: Stir and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Natural Disaster
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Naughty Banana
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Banana Rum', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum"]
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Do not stir. Gives a banana blast with a punch.

Name: Naughty Priest
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Chilled and 'Shaken' to the church's foundation!

Name: Nazi F**k
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Slam it and say goodnight.

Name: Nazi From Hell
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Nazi Hellfire
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Firewater']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and slam away!

Name: Nazi Hummer
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Nazi Taco
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Neck Ache
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butter Shots', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Absolut 100 Vodka', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: This is a very special body shot. Mix together Butter Shots, Baileys and Vodka and pour into a shot glass. Adminster whipped cream to the neck of the body of your choice. Lick the cream and down the shot(or vice versa if you so desire).

Name: Neo-Nazi
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jagermeister', '2 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Pour over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Neon Blue Balls
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Neon Green Dream
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kiwi Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: In a shot glass pour the kiwi liqueur first, then the lime and top off with vodka.

Name: Neon Popsicle
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 splash(es) Tonic Water', '1 splash(es) Lime Cordial']
Making: Mix in a shooter glass and serve.

Name: Neopolitan
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Tequila Rose']
Making: Try to layer (they don't layer too well) in the order given in a shot glass.

Name: Nervous Condition
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/3 oz. Hiram Walker Peppermint Schnapps', "1/3 oz. Captain Morgan's Silver Spiced Rum"]
Making: Mix in a shot glass and enjoy. Serve is as is.

Name: Neutron Bomb
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Neville Norseman
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Green Chartreuse', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. Mix well and shoot.

Name: Night Prowler
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Sourpuss Apple Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao (Or Blue Lagoon)']

Name: Nini's Candy Land
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. 99 Apples Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Stir in a shot glass and slam.

Name: Ninja Turtle
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Try and Layer as best as possible.

Name: Nitro
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Midori']

Name: No Mess Blowjob
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Place shot glass on bar. Lean in and pick glass up using only your lips. Tilt your head back and swallow. She or he who has no cream left on face wins!

Name: No Respect
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Root Beer Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Norwegian Prairie Fire
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tabasco Sauce', '1 oz. Tequila Gold']
Making: Pour ingredients into a shot glass. Be sure to have a chilled beer beside you. Have a nice heartburn!

Name: Nose Candy
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Tabasco Sauce', 'Powdered Sugar']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and sprinkle powdered sugar on top.

Name: Nuclear Accelerator
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1 Beer (For chaser)']
Making: Pour both liqueurs into a chilled double shot glass and shoot. Chase with a beer.

Name: Nuclear Blue #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Nuclear Kamikaze
Ingredients: ['1 3/4 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Midori']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a highball glass. Shoot!

Name: Nuclear Meltdown
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Firewater', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Pour half of shot glass of Firewater and the other half with Goldschlager. Then take and feel the BURN!!

Name: Nuclear Waste #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. If you look at a light through it, it glows.

Name: Nuclear Waste #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Triple Sec', "dash(es) Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Nude Bomb
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Creme de Banane']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Nuetron Bomb
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Butter Shots', '1/3 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Layer in a shot glass starting with Baileys.

Name: Nuke Waste

Name: Number 3
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/3 oz. Bacardi O', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec']
Making: Serve in a shot glass. Has the tequila bite with a smooth orange hint.

Name: Number One Turkey
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1 tsp. A-1 Steak Sauce']
Making: Fill a shot glass up with the turkey add the A-1 and shoot it. Repeat if necessary.

Name: Nushka's A Bitch
Ingredients: ['5/8 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/4 oz. Coffee (Black)', '1/8 oz. Condensed Milk']
Making: Mixed together and shoot as you like it! Enjoy!

Name: Nutmeg
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Gold', '1/2 oz. Absolut Peppar Vodka', '1/2 oz. Smirnoff Bloody Spiced Pepper Vodka']
Making: Mix and down!

Name: Nuts 'n' Nipples
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Shake with ice then strain into a shot glass.

Name: Nutty Buddy
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Nutty Colada #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice, put some Jimmy Buffett on, and bottoms up.

Name: Nutty Irishman #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Nutty Irishman #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey']
Making: Layer in order (Bailey's at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass.

Name: NUTTY MORGAN
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Frangelico', "1 part(s) Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum"]
Making: Serve chilled in a shot glass or also could be served as a hot coffee drink.

Name: Nutty Professor
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Hazelnut Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Stir and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Nutty Puerto Rican
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Frangelico', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum"]
Making: Layer and shoot.

Name: O Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/2 cup(s) Everclear']
Making: Pour Everclear into a plastic cup. Drop shot glass with Absolut Mandarin into the cup and shoot.

Name: O Mountain Do
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi O', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Mix and strain into a shot glass.

Name: O.P.P.
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi O', '1 part(s) Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Oatmeal Cookie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into 5 shot glasses. (Drink could also be strained into 2 cocktail glasses and topped up with milk if desired.)

Name: Oatmeal Cookie #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Goldschlager', '1/3 oz. Butter Shots', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Mix, pour into shot glass, and enjoy.

Name: Oatmeal Cookie #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a shaker. Serve in a double shot glass, or add milk and make a mixed drink.

Name: Oatmeal Cookie #3
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Chill, mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Oatmeal Cookie Shot #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Butter Shots']
Making: Pour into a shooter glass. Stir and shoot!!!

Name: Oatmeal Cookie Shot #2
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Oatmeal Cookie Shot #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', "1/2 oz. Butter Shots (Preferably De Kuyper's)", '1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Pour all the ingredients into a mixing cup with rocks. Shake and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Oatmeal Cookie Shot #4
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Butter Shots']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Oatmeal Coookie #5
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 splash(es) Goldschlager']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Octane
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo']
Making: Mix and Shoot... Tastes like it sounds...

Name: Oh Mama
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Brandy', '2/3 oz. Dark Rum', '2/3 oz. Amaretto di Soronno']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shooter glass.

Name: Oh My Gosh
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Stir and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Oil Slick #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Tim’s comment: All ingredients must be kept in the freezer to accomplish the full effect!

Name: Oil Slick #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '3 drop(s) Blue Curacao']
Making: Add Rumple Minze and Curacao to mixing tin and shake lightly. Strain into a shot glass. Layer the Jagermeister on top. Sean's comment: Like oil floating on light blue water.

Name: Oil Slick #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Pour the Goldschlager into a shot glass and layer the Jagermeister on top.

Name: Oil Slick #4
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Ice 101']
Making: Pour over the back of a spoon into a shot glass.

Name: Oil Slick Backdraft
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Sambuca', '3/4 oz. Sambuca (Black)']
Making: Warm up a medium wine glass and add Sambuca. Ignite and after a couple of seconds place your hand over the glass. This snuffs out the flame and creates fumes. Move hand enough to insert a straw and suck up fumes. When done, shoot and suck fumes again. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Oilslick
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Chill a rocks glass with ice and water. Shake with ice and strain into the chilled rocks glass.

Name: Okanagan
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/3 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Blueberry Liqueur']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Old Dubliner
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: One Night Stand
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Pour the Triple Sec, Amaretto and Melon Liqueur into a shot glass. Pour the remaining ingredients into a rocks glass. Drop the shot into the rocks glass and enjoy.

Name: Orangasm
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Tropico Liqueur']
Making: Combine in a shot glass and serve.

Name: Orange Crush
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Smirnoff Orange Twist Vodka', '7-Up']
Making: Chill orange vodka and pour into a shot glass. Pour 7-Up into a seperate shot glass. Drink the orange vodka BUT DO NOT SWALLOW. Now drink the 7-Up and swoosh both together in your mouth.

Name: Orange Crush #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Soda Water']
Making: Shake with ice (except 7-up and Soda Water) and strain into a shot glass. Top with 7-Up and Soda.

Name: Orange Crush #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Beer', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Combine orange juice and beer in a mug, and pour the amaretto into a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the mug and chug before it fizzes over.

Name: Orange Drop
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Vodka', '1 slice(s) Orange', '1 sprinkle(s) Sugar']
Making: Pour vodka into a shot glass. Lick wrist and sprinkle with sugar…(quickly). Lick wrist, take shot, bite into orange slice....YUM!

Name: Orange Tic-Tac
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1/4 oz. Sunny Delight Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with a small amount of ice 8-10 times. Place a cherry into a shot glass and strain into that glass.

Name: Orangesicle
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Creme de Cacao', '1 part(s) Creme de Menthe', '1 part(s) Frangelico', '1 part(s) Orange Juice', '1 part(s) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mixed equal parts of liquor with splashes of orange and cranberry.

Name: Oreo
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Orgasm
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Layer in order (Kahlua at the bottom) in a shot glass.

Name: Orgasm #9
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Make sure all ingredients are ice cold. It makes it easier to layer for presentation. I put them in the freezer 1 hour prior to pouring. Pour the Kahlua first then the Baileys (slowly so you don't mix) then top with Amaretto.

Name: Original Buttery Nipple
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps']
Making: Mix and serve in a small cordial (or shot) glass.

Name: Original Good N Plenty
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Sambuca', '1/3 oz. Tampico Punch']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Original Oatmeal Cookie
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Half and Half Cream', '1 splash(es) Goldschlager', '1 splash(es) Frangelico']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Original Slippery Dick
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane']
Making: Mix and serve in a small cordial glass. (A shot glass would work)

Name: Original Slippery Nipple
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Mix and serve in a small cordial glass. (A shot glass would do.)

Name: Oyster Floater
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Clamato Juice or Spicy V-8', '2 splash(es) Worcestershire Sauce', '2 splash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '1 squirt(s) Lime Juice Fresh', '1/2 oz. Absolut Peppar Vodka']
Making:
Add a fresh oyster to a 3 oz. shot glass. Add the Clamato and a couple of shakes of Tabasco and Worchestershire Sauce. Squeeze a fresh lime and float the Absolut. Now shoot it!
from Kelley's bar in Antigua Guatemala.

Name: Oyster Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Pepper Vodka', '1 tsp. Cocktail Sauce', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice', 'Oyster (Raw)']
Making: Served in a small rocks glass, it calls for a dash of horseradish too, for those who dare. Take a deep breath, down the hatch.

Name: P.H.
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Layer and top with juices. Shoot!

Name: P.O.W
Ingredients: ['1/5 oz. Tequila', '1/5 oz. Vodka', '2/5 oz. Peach Schnapps', "1/5 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and top with 151 proof rum. Light 151 and suck through straw quickly. Webmixer's Note: Make sure flame is out before drinking. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Pain Killer #3
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Panama
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cognac', '1/2 oz. Tia Maria', '1 splash(es) Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour the cognac and the Tia Maria in a shot glass and let a splash of Bailey's slide in the middle of the glass.

Name: Pancake
