Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Amarula Cream Liqueur']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and sprinkle with cinnamon.

Name: Pancho Villa
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 1800 Silver Tequila', '1 splash(es) Creme de Noyeaux', '1 tsp. Sugar', '1 splash(es) 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Fill a shot glass with the 1800. Splash creme de noyeux in until slight a red tinge is noticeable. Put lime slice over glass and a heap of sugar on the lime then douse with a 1/4 capfull of 151 rum. Light and let burn until sugar begins to bubble. Blow out fire toss shot and put whole warm lime in your mouth.

Name: Panther #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Serve in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Panty Dropper #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Dubonnet Rouge Aperitif Wine']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Panty Dropper #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon (100 proof)', '3/4 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Shake with ice until the tin is frosty and strain into a shooter glass. Enjoy!!

Name: Panty Man
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into shot glasses.

Name: Pap Smear
Ingredients: ['12 oz. Beer', '1 1/2 oz. Smirnoff 100 Vodka']
Making: Drop shot glass into the mug of beer and swallow all at once.

Name: Papa Smurf
Ingredients: ['1 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps']
Making: Mix in shot glass.

Name: Papa Smurf #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Raspberry Vodka', '2 3/4 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Pour into a two part shot glass.

Name: Papaya Shot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila (Chilled)', '1/6 oz. Papaya Juice (Chilled)']
Making: Pour tequila into a shot glass and top with a thin layer of papaya juice.

Name: Par 4
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Midori', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Shake well with ice and strain into a shot glass. Top off with whipped cream.

Name: Parental Disapproval
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Absolut Vodka']
Making: Mix well and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Parrots In The Skyy
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/2 oz. Skyy Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Partybar Schuffel
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Pasedena Lady
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Brandy']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Passed Out At The Beach
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into ashot glass. Top with grenadine. Enjoy and try to pass out in the shade.

Name: Passed Out Naked on the Bathroom Floor
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour in a shot glass in the order given above, the rumple Minze at the bottom of the glass.

Name: Passed Out Naked On The Floor
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Create in shot glass.

Name: Patagonian Black Bush
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Gin (Preferably Dutch gin)', '1 tsp. Fernet Branca', 'dash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Patriot
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Pour the creme de cacao into a shot glass, then slowly add the grenadine at the side of the glass. It will sink at the bottom of the shot. Gently add the curacao. You will have an evenly layered red, white and blue shot that tastes like chocolate covered cherries.

Name: Patty Wacker
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Butter Shots', '1/4 oz. Vanilla Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Yukon Jack']
Making: Pour into a shot glass in any order, but finish with the Yukon Jack. The first schnapps you our will be how the drink tastes.

Name: Pauls Elbow Titties
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Everclear', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort (Black Label)', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '2 Red Pepper']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a shot glass, then eat the peppers and see how long you last!

Name: Peach Dazzler
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Dr Pepper']
Making: Pour the schnapps into a shot glass and add the Dr Pepper. Stir, don't shake. You may add more schnapps for a more potent drink.

Name: Peach Schlager
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a shot glass. The more peach used, the sweeter it is.

Name: Peachy Maple Kiss
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Whiskey', '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Maple Syrup']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Peanut Butter and Jelly #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Frangelico', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Fill shaker 1\4 full of ice and add Frangelico and cranberry juice. Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Peanut Butter and Jelly #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Frangelico', '1 splash(es) Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Fill shaker 1\4 full of ice and add Frangelico and Chambord. Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Peanut Butter and Jelly #5
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Pecker Head
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a double shoot glass.

Name: Pedro's Ultimate Tequila Shot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '2 slice(s) Jalapeno Pepper', '2 slice(s) Lime', '1 slice(s) Lemon']
Making: Shake well with ice. Strain and serve.

Name: Peer Pressure
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Tequila', 'Beer']
Making: Shake spirits with ice and strain into a shot glass. Shoot and chase it with the beer while your friends are pressuring you.

Name: Peirced Nuts
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Cola']
Making: Pour into a shot glass in order given - Goldschlager on bottom.

Name: Peltikatto
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 Lemon (Juice of, fresh)']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Penalty Kick
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps (Or watermelon schnapps)', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Creme de Cacao (Optional)', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Fill a shaker with ice and add all the ingredients except the grenadine. Shake and strain into a shot or a rocks glass. Add a dash of grenadine.

Name: Penalty Shot
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Tia Maria', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Pepperita
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Silver', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice (Fresh)', '4 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', 'Salt']
Making: Rub the rim of a shot glass with lemon juice and dip rim in salt. Shake the tequila and the lemon juice with ice then strain into the salt-rimmed glass. Add the Tabasco and serve.

Name: Peppermint Cream Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/4 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/4 oz. Frangelico', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Milk']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Peppermint Pattie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Stir in a shot glass and serve.

Name: Peppermint Pattie #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rumple Minze', 'Brown Creme de Cacao']
Making: Fill shot glass with Rumple Mintz and top with creme de cacao.

Name: Peppermint Patty #1
Ingredients: ['9 oz. Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps', "1 oz. Hershey's Chocolate Syrup"]
Making: Mix until the syrup stays suspended in the Avalanche.

Name: Pepto Bismol
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/4 oz. Ke Ke Beach Key Lime Cream Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Cuarenta Y Tres', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Perfexion
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Beer', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Perverted Irishman
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour in order into a shot glass.

Name: Petroleum
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', 'dash(es) Maggi Seasoning (From Mexico)', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. It looks like used motor oil and tastes even worse.

Name: Phil Six
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/3 oz. Wildberry Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Phister
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Phlegm
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'drop(s) Irish Cream', 'dash(es) Creme de Menthe']
Making: Pour schnapps into a shot glass and layer Irish Cream. Slowly layer the creme de menthe over the back of a spoon into the glass so it drips through the Irish Cream and the schnapps. Let it sit on your tongue for a second to get the full phlegm effect.

Name: Pickled Brains
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '5 drop(s) Advocaat']
Making: (Works best when drinking with friends). Pour the crème de menthe and the kahlua into a shot glass, and then carefully add several drops of advokaat. With a straw, carefully suck up the drops of advokaat, then as quickly as possible knock down the drink. As soon as you've finished, put your straw back into the shot glass and with your hand cupped over, suck in the 'fumes' left behind and try not to choke!!

Name: Piece of Ass #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Chill, shake and pour!

Name: Piece of Ass #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Piece of Ass #3
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', "1/3 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Pierced Navel
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', "1 1/2 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Mix in shot glass and bottoms up! This is a great shooter to do a body shot with!

Name: Pierced Nipple
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Pigskin Shot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a chilled shot glass.

Name: Pile Driver #2
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Yukon Jack', "1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Lemon Juice', '2 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce', '1 package(s) Sweet and Sour Sauce']
Making: Mix and pour into a shot glass and enjoy.

Name: Pimp Juice #2
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Blue Curacao', '1 part(s) Creme de Banane', '1 part(s) Malibu Rum', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Pimple
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour Grenadine into a shot glass. Then pour Baileys slowly over the back of a spoon to layer. Top with whipped cream. Looks real. Enjoy.

Name: Pineapple Bomber
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '2 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Pineapple Bumpers
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Amaretto', '3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake ovr ice and strain into shot glasses.

Name: Pineapple Paradise
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. DeKuyper Tropical Pineapple Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Coconut Rum', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Chill ingredients and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Pineapple Upside Down Cake #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Pink Floyd
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Pour into a shot glass with equals parts of juice. Shoot it. (Hope the $20 was worth it John!)

Name: Pink Jellybean
Ingredients: ['1 oz. DeKuyper Mad Melon Watermelon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Shake and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Pink Lemonade #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Try different amounts of the ingredients till you find optimal taste. Enjoy!

Name: Pink Lemonade Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/3 oz. Sour Mix', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice (Sweetend)']
Making: Mix ingredients together and serve in a chilled shot glass. Make sure you keep that bottle of Absolut cold too! Tastes just like pink lemonade, but has a MUCH stronger effect! Best consumed while watching Smokey and the Bandit.

Name: Pink Panties #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Cherry Whiskey', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Pink Panties #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Pink Lemonade', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix the vodka and lemonade in a shot glass. Put the whipped cream on top and shoot.

Name: Pink Pee
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1/2 oz. Pink Lemonade']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Good summer shot.

Name: Pink Pussy #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila Rose', "1/2 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's Fireball"]
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Pink Titty
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Tequila Rose']
Making: Pour cinnamon schnapps in a shot glass and layer the Tequila Rose on top.

Name: Pipeline
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Pirate
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Pirates Blood
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Piss Ant
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka (Preferably 80 proof)', '2/3 oz. Mountain Dew', '3 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and slam it.

Name: Piss In The Snow
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Coat the rim of a shot glass with suga. Combine both schnapps and squeeze a lemon wedge into the drink.

Name: Pit Bull On Hard Crack
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Ouzo', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Best when all alcohol is chilled and mixed instead of cutting with ice.

Name: Pitbull On Crack #
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Plasma Mary
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. Serve with a lime wedge.

Name: Platnium Blonde
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 Vodka', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix Malibu Rum and vodka in a shot glass. Fill with pineapple juice and serve chilled.

Name: Please Slam!
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Martini and Rossi Extra Dry Vermouth', '1/4 oz. Bourbon Whiskey']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and slam!

Name: Plockton Sunset
Ingredients: ["1/3 oz. Blue Curacao (Preferably Bols')", '1/3 oz. Advocaat', '1/3 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Combine in a shot glass.

Name: Plowman's Potted Meat
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', "1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Coca Cola (Or Mellow Yellow)']
Making: Mix in shot glass, chase with Zima, Zima Citrus, or DNA.

Name: PMS
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Cherry Schnapps']
Making: Mix together, pour into a shot glass and shoot.

Name: PMS #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Tabasco Sauce', 'dash(es) Salt']
Making: Shake the tequila and the Tabasco with ice and strain into a shot glass. Dash some table salt on top. The little dash of table salt impresses the chicks :) .

Name: Poison Apple
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/8 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Poisonberry
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Blue Raspberry Sourball Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Sambuca (Black)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass..

Name: Polar Bear
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Vodka - Chilled']
Making: Shake Creme de Menthe with lots of ice. Strain into a shooter glass. Add the vodka.

Name: Polar Bear Bite
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe', '5 drop(s) Hot Sauce']
Making: Mix in a shooter glass and top with a shake of pepper. An icy chill before the bite hits you.

Name: Polish My Knob
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Knob Creek 100 Proof Bourbon', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Get on your knees and polish it off...

Name: POM Pilot
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Hpnotiq', '3/4 oz. Pomegranate Juice']
Making: Serve in a shot glass. - Dale DeGroff

Name: Ponderosa
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Everclear (190 Proof)', '4 oz. Orange Soda']
Making: Mix in any size glass, put lemon wedge on side of glass, shoot as fast as possible. Bite into a lemon wedge (no chasers). Wimps need not apply!!

Name: Poo Punching Hippies
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Lime Cordial concentrated', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Layer in order by ingredient in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Poo Punching Pirates
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca black', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Coconut Milk']
Making: Mix the black sambuca, Bailey's Irish Cream, Bacardi Rum, Malibu Rum and pour into a shot glass. Top with coconut milk.

Name: Pop Ya Cherry
Ingredients: ['1 Cherry', '3/4 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Soak the cherry in the cherry brandy in a shot glass and layer the Bailey's Irish Cream on top. Shoot.

Name: Popper #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', 'Beer']
Making: Pour the amaretto into a shot glass. Drop the shot glass in a glass/mug of beer and shot.

Name: Popsicle
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Porkchop Shot
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. UV Blue Raspberry Vodka', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Pour ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake until frothy. Strain into shooter glasses. Bottoms up! The name came from a drunken evening when friend #1 asked me and friend #2 if the bartender 'should pour us a shot?' Friend # 2 asked 'Do I want a pork chop?' and my reply was 'Yes! make us a pork chop shot..and use the blue stuff!

Name: Porn King
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Dry Gin', '1/4 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Vodka (Preferably Black Vodka)']
Making: Pour in a shot glass, adding rum last. Do ten of these and all the ladies at the party will know that you fear no taste...

Name: Porn Star
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Sourpuss Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake in a shaker with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Pornstar
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '3/4 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Porto Covo
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absinthe', '1/2 oz. Coconut Liqueur (Preferably Batida de Coco)', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur (Preferably Pisang Ambon)', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix well and serve in a shooter glass and enjoy it as I did in Porto Covo, Portugal.

Name: Poudre
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Mix ingredients together and shoot.

Name: Poundcake
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Das Komet Vanilla Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Powderpuff This
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Island Blue Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Midori', '1 dash(es) 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Grenadine, Island Blue Schnapps then the Midori. Float the 151 proof rum. Light the drink, blow it out and drink with a straw.

Name: Power Driver
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Everclear', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Add Everclear first then the orange juice. Let the orange juice settle then shoot it.

Name: Power Haus
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Serve chilled in a shot glass.

Name: Pra
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Pisang Ambon', '1/4 oz. Absinthe', '1/4 oz. White Rum', '1/4 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Prairie Chicken #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 tbsp. Tabasco Sauce', '1 Egg']
Making: Mix the liquids and drop in the egg. Shoot…and run to the nearest bathroom.

Name: Prairie Dog #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '3 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Build contents in a shot glass. Guaranteed night-ender for 21st birthday outings! Invented at 901 Club, Los Angeles.

Name: Prairie Dog #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', 'Tabasco Sauce (Or hot sauce)']
Making: In shot glass, pour in a few dashes of tabasco sauce then carefully pour in the tequila so as not to disturb the sauce. The tequila should float so when you take the shot you get the tequila then a tabasco chaser.

Name: Prairie Fire
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Gold', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour ingredients into shot glass and serve.

Name: Prairie Wildfire
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '2 tbsp. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Add Tabasco to tequila in a shot glass. Consume with caution.

Name: Prarie Oyster
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bourbon Whiskey', '1 Egg Raw', '1 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour ithe bourbon at room temperature nto a highball glass. Crack the egg and drop in raw. Pour a dash of Tabasco on top to finsh it off.

Name: Pretty Confused
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Blue Curacao', '1 part(s) Melon Liqueur', '1 part(s) Goldschlager']
Making: Chill all three liquers in the freezer. Layer them in equal parts in a double shot glass. Bottom - Goldschlager Middle - Melon Liquer Top Blue Caracau.

Name: Pretty Pink Pussy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour vodka and peach schnapps into a shot glass. Add a splash of grenadine for colour.

Name: PRMF (Puerto Rican Monkey F**k)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/8 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix Kahlua and creme de banane in a shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass. Float the 151 on top.

Name: Prospect Bomb
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 7-Up', '1 oz. Lime Juice', '1 oz. Bols Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss']
Making: Fill a 4 oz. glass with 7-Up, Lime Juice and Bols Blue. Fill a shot glass with the Raspberry Sourpuss. Drop the Raspberry Sourpuss shot glass into the 4 oz. glass and shoot.

Name: Pucker F**ker #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker (Or your favourite flavour of Pucker)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Pucker F**ker Upper
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Everclear', '1/2 oz. Sour Apple Schnapps']
Making: Pour in order and shoot.

Name: Pucker Up
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/2 oz. Watermelon Pucker', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake in a shaker 1/4 full of ice and strain into a shot glass. Ron says: taste this drink, it will be your favorite from then on!!!

Name: Pull The Pin
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Lemon Bar Mix']
Making: Shake all ingredients and pour into a rocks glass over ice. Insert straw and stir. Drink and pull out straw. Throw over your shoulder. Shoot it down. Last one done buys the next round!

Name: Pumpkin Pie
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'dash(es) Goldschlager']
Making: Shake Butterscotch and Bailey's with ice and strain into a rocks glass. Top with Goldschlager. Enjoy!

Name: Purdue Ghostbuster
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Ke Ke Beach Key Lime Cream Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Purdue Ghostbuster (or Just Ghostbuster)
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Ke Ke Beach Key Lime Cream Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Shake over ice for several seconds. Strain into a shot glass.

Name: Pure Gold
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Everclear']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Pure Hell
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1 oz. Hot Sauce']
Making: Mix together in a 2 oz. shot glass and drink. Feels like Pure Hell

Name: Purple Banana Dildo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Grape Juice']
Making: Mix, drink and enjoy. Note the banana popsicle flavor.

Name: Purple Cheetah
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '8 oz. Grape Juice']
Making: Drop shot in glass of grape juice and chug it fast!!! Very yummy!!!

Name: Purple Dinosaur
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Purple F**k #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Pour each liquor into a separate shot glass. Sip Sambuca through a straw and have a friend refill your glass with the Tequila from the other glass. Goes from 100 percent sweet to 100 percent ugly.

Name: Purple F**k #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca (Black)', '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Pour a shooter of black sambuca, light on fire, use a straw to drink and as the glass empties out, pour in a shot of tequila. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Purple F**k #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Or can be served as a cocktail on the rocks with a cherry garnish.

Name: Purple Frog
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Purple Haze
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Grape Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Mix together and strain into shot glasses …repeat.

Name: Purple Headed Yogurt Slinger
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Grape Pucker', '3/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Purple Heart
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Crown Royal']
Making: Combine with ice, shake well and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Purple Hooter #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. 7-Up', '1/3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Pour into shot glass and serve.

Name: Purple Hooter #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Stir and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Purple Hooter #3
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'dash(es) Sour Mix', 'dash(es) 7-Up (Or soda)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Purple Hooter #4
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/8 oz. Vodka', '1/8 oz. Triple Sec', '1/8 oz. Lime Juice (Sweetened)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Purple Hooter #5
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/3 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass..

Name: Purple Hooter Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Purple JimBob Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Purple Kamikazie
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Purple Motherf**ker #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix all ingredients, shake and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Purple Motherf**ker #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Purple Mushroom
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '1 dash(es) Grenadine', '1 dash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.... wait ten minutes, repeat if necessary.

Name: Purple Nasty With A Depth Charge
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1 oz. Black Currant Liqueur', '1 oz. Brandy', 'Lager', 'Cider']
Making: Pour blackcurrant and Pernod into a pint glass and fill the rest with equal amounts of cider and lager. Fill a small sherry glass with brandy and drop into the pint. Tadaah…..Shoot it.

Name: Purple Nurple
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', "1/3 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum"]
Making: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into a shot glass and enjoy.

Name: Purple Pecker Wrecker
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Malibu Rum', '3 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '2 splash(es) Lime Juice', 'Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix all together in a strainer or a pitcher with ice. Add as much cranberry juice as you like.

Name: Purple Rodney
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Sprite']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. Slam the shot on the bar so the Sprite fizzles, then imediately shoot.

Name: Purple Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Purple Velvet
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Port', 'Guinness']
Making: Pour the port into a beer mug and fill with Guinness.

Name: Purple Viper
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Chambord Flavoured Vodka', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Chill and serve in a shooter glass.

Name: Puss Ball
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 tsp. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 tsp. Creme de Menthe (Or green grenadine)']
Making: Pour the peach schnapps in a shot glass, then pour the Bailey's over a cold spoon. DO NOT mix but allow to cloud up, then drizzle in the creme de menthe or the green grenadine.

Name: Pussy Juice #1
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Sambuca', '1 splash(es) Lime']
Making: Pour into a shooter glass and shoot. Excellent to get drunk fast.

Name: Q.F. (Quick F**k)
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in order (Midori at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass.

Name: Quad T
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Tabasco Sauce', '1/3 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/3 oz. Tanqueray Gin']
Making: Don't smell it just shoot it.

Name: Queens Juice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1/3 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Quick Bang
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Smirnoff Black Vodka']
Making: Mix, pour and shoot.

Name: Quick Check
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. Jeffrey's comment: Also makes a good rocks or frozen drink.

Name: Quick F**k (or QF) #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass with Bailey's Irish Cream floating on top.

Name: Quick F**k (or QF) #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tia Maria', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in order using a shot glass.

Name: Quick F**k (or QF) #3
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Midori', '1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Baileys Irish Cream', '1 part(s) Kahlua']
Making: Mix together to make a shot and enjoy. Yummy!

Name: Quick Flange
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Kahlua followed by Midori and top with Frangelico. I discoverd this shooter by chance when the Baileys was indisposed. Tested on myself and friends and it goes down nice and smooth. Great for people who just hate Baileys.

Name: Quick Silver
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Quiver
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Blue Curacao', "3 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain in to shot glasses.

Name: R & R #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass. Enjoy!

Name: Raging Bull #2
Ingredients: ['10 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink', '2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Pour Jagermeister in a shot glass. Pour red bull in a pint glass about 4/5 of the way full. Drop shot in the glass and drink all in one shot like an Irish Car bomb.

Name: Raider
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/3 oz. Cointreau']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Rainbow Cookie
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Creme de Cacao']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. This shooter has been brought to you by: Jennie, Jenn, Debbie, Denise, Bobbi Jo, Vinny and Justin.

Name: Rampage #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Vodka (150 proof)', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Ramsee II
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '2 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Mix and serve.

Name: Ranger Shot
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo (1800)']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. Set of 3 of these shots and after drinking the first one do ten push-up's, repeat until all three shots are gone.

Name: Rascals Drunk Guy
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sourpuss Apple Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Ke Ke Beach Key Lime Cream Liqueur']
Making: Pour in a shot glass then down the hatch it goes. Mmmmmm good.

Name: Raspberry Donut
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Pour cinnamon schnapps and Bailey's Irish Cream in a shot glass. Add grenadine and drink.

Name: Raspberry Ice Cream
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/3 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/32 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Mix ingredients in shaker with ice. Shake vigorously and strain into shot glass.

Name: Raspberry Lemondrop
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', 'dash(es) 7-Up', 'dash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Raspberry Lime Smasher
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Absolut Kurant Vodka', "1/4 oz. Rose's Lime Juice"]
Making: Lay Chambord on bottom of glass and float vodka on top of it. Drip the lime juice in the middle of the vodka and shoot. Johnny's comment: Very deceitful drink, drink slowly, it catches you very quick.

Name: Raspberry Sandwich
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka (Preferably 101 proof or Everclear)', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Heavy Cream']
Making: Pour Chambord into a shot glass. Using a spoon, carefully pour the vodka on top to create a 2nd layer. Again using a spoon, float cream on top of vodka. Shoot!

Name: Raspberry Tootsie Roll Pop
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Vodka', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Cola']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Rastaman Vibration
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 1/2 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Mix and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Rats Brain
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix in order in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Rattlesnake #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Layer the Kahlua and Rumple Minze. The reason it is called a Rattlesnake is that the Bailey's Irish Cream is chilled and poured last. The Bailey's Irish Cream coils to the bottom and looks like a rattlesnake.

Name: Rattlesnake #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in order (Kahlua on the bottom) in a shot glass.

Name: Rattlesnake #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Pour and enjoy!

Name: Raven
Ingredients: ['1 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1 oz. Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Shoot. Larry says: named after the Baltimore Ravens with its purple color, this drink will bring you down faster than watching the Ravens play.

Name: Raven Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake well with ice. Strain into your favorite shooter glass and enjoy.

Name: Razor Blade
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and enjoy.

Name: Razzberry Guiness
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 pint(s) Guinness']
Making: Layer Chambord and Guiness. Enjoy!

Name: Red Bull Blaster
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', 'Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Fill a highball glass half full with Red Bull. Pour the Jagermeister into a shot glass and drop the shot into the Red Bull. Drink.

Name: Red Bull Boom Boom
Ingredients: ['1 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Pour the alcohol into a slim jim or straight glass of about 250 ml.. Pour in the Red Bull. As soon as the glass is full, place a hand over the glass covering the top and pick up the glass. Slam it down 2 times on the table then finish the drink.

Name: Red Cross
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour into a shot glass in the given order.

Name: Red Daddy's Fire
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Combine ingredients over ice and shake very well. Strain and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Red Death #4
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Firewater', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka (100 Proof)']
Making: Shake with ice, strain and pour. Now pray!!!

Name: Red Death #5
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Everclear', '1/2 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix in a shot glass, shoot and try not to vomit!

Name: Red Devil
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Red Diseal
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Pour in order into a shot glass.

Name: Red Eyed Turtle
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and add the drop of Tabasco. From the owner of Chief's Place in Sedalia Mo 'Home of the Red Eyed Turtle'.

Name: Red Fury
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Polar Ice Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila', '5 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour ingredients into a shot glass and shake gently so the drink has a red tinge - shoot.

Name: Red Headed Irishman
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Dr. McGillicuddy's Fireball", '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey']
Making: Mix all ingredients into a 1 1/2 oz. shot glass.

Name: Red Headed Princess
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Jagermeister', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and then pour into a shooter glass.

Name: Red Headed Slug
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Pour in order into a shot glass.

Name: Red Hot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 oz. Tequila', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Red Hot Texan
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Everclear', 'Candies (Red Hots)']
Making: Fill a shot glass about half full of everclear and put red hots (cinnamon candies) in until the everclear comes to the top of the glass. A good WHOOA after you drink it will sooth the fire in your throat.

Name: Red Hots
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', 'dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '1 splash(es) Rumple Minze']
Making: Serve chilled in a shot glass.

Name: Red Light Green Light
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Tabasco Sauce', '1/3 oz. Jalapeno Juice (Or Jalapeno Sauce)']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot. (Note from the webmixer: given the potency of the Tabasco -especially mixed with jalapeno!- this is probably quite a dangerous drink. You have been warned).

Name: Red Light Yellow Light Green Light
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker']
Making: Pour each liquor into separate shot glasses in the order above. Then proceed to shoot each one after another until done.

Name: Red Lion #2
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '1 oz. Gin', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1/3 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making:
This fresh, subtle blend of lemon, orange, and gin is taken to new heights by the oaked notes of Grand Marnier liqueur.
Shake with ice and strain.

Name: Red Lobster
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain, rocks optional.

Name: Red Panties
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Cherry Pucker']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and shoot

Name: Red Raider #2
Ingredients: ['1/8 oz. Grenadine', 'dash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Everclear']
Making: Layer in order (grenadine at the bottom) in a shot glass. Light and shoot. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Red Royal
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Red Skittle
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butterscotch Ripple Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Red Snapper #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Pam says it tastes taste like a tootsie roll pop.

Name: Red White and Blue
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Layer in order (grenadine at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass.

Name: Red White And Blue (American Flag)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Rum', 'Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: 3 double shot glasses are needed for this drink. In the first glass, mix Blue Curacao, rum and pineapple juice. Vodka is the only ingredient in the second glass. In the third, mix Crown Royal, Amaretto and the grenadine. Stack the glasses on top of each other and shoot them in order.

Name: Red Witch
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1/2 oz. Black Currant Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cider']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Red-Headed Step-Child
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Apple Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Resurected Flaming Blue Jesus
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour both Rumple Minze and Chambord in a shot glass. Float 151-Proof Rum and ignite! ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Resurrected Slave
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager', '1/3 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Pour in a shot glass.

Name: Rick Flair
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Mix in a chilled shot glass.

Name: Rickey's
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Anisette', '1/3 oz. Parfait Amour', '1/3 oz. Cognac']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Riehl Gross
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Liqueur', '1 oz. Lemonade', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix and enjoy.

Name: Rigodon
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Limoncello']
Making: Keep your Limoncello bottle in the freezer so that it is completely cold when you use it. Pour the Limoncello first and the peach schnapps over it.

Name: Rim Job
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', "1/3 oz. Scotch (Preferably Dewar's Scotch)", '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/8 oz. Heavy Cream', '1 pinch(es) Salt', 'Sugar (Coarse crystallized sugar)']
Making: Place a shot glass in the freezer and let sit till frosty. When it comes time to make the drink, remove it from the freezer. Next combine salt, scotch and vodka in glass. Stir until well mixed. Add the heavy and Irish creams to the mixture, stirring until they are partially mixed (you can see swirls). Wet the glass' rim and line in it with crystalline sugar. To drink: Till your head back and lick the sugar in a single swoop. Then enjoy in the drink in a single gulp.

Name: Ripened Banana
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Antica Banana Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Black Sambuca']
Making: Mix ingredients in shot glass.

Name: Ripped Van-Nipple
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Butter Nips Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Road Rage
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/4 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shotglass.

Name: Road Trippin'
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', '1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass in the given order.

Name: Roadkill
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Float Baily's on top of the Schnapps with a bar spoon in a shot glass. Gently drip enough Grenadine (it will sink to bottom) to just cover the bottom of the shot glass. My female patrons love this concoction.

Name: Roadrunner
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Float the Grand Marnier over the Kahlua in a shot glass. Light it up and drink with a straw. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE!!!

Name: Roaring Lion Irish Eyes
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blue Curacao', 'Everclear', 'Roaring Lion Energy Drink']
Making: Pour Blue Curacao into a shot glass and top with everclear. Light on fire and drop into a glass filled with Roaring Lion.

Name: Roaring Lion Jagerbomb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', 'Roaring Lion Energy Drink']
Making: Fill a shot glass with Jagermeister and drop into a glass filled with Roaring Lion.

Name: Roaring Lion MOAB (Mother of all Bombs)
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1 part(s) 99 Apples Schnapps', '1 part(s) 99 Oranges Schnapps', '1 part(s) Roaring Lion Energy Drink', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a tall shot glass and shoot.

Name: Roaring Lion O-Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi O', 'Roaring Lion Energy Drink']
Making: Fill a shot glass with Bacardi O and drop into a glass filled with Roaring Lion.

Name: Roaring Lion Roaring Baja
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 part(s) Roaring Lion Energy Drink', '1 part(s) Orange Juice']
Making: Pour tequila into a shot glass. Drop shot into a glass filled with Roaring Lion and Orange Juice. Shout 'Ole'.

Name: Roaring Lion The Haunted Apple
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Roaring Lion Energy Drink', '1 part(s) Goldschlager', '1 part(s) Apple Juice']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Roaring Lion Tuaca Bomb
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tuaca', 'Roaring Lion Energy Drink']
Making: Fill a shot glass with Tuaca and drop into a glass filled with Roaring Lion.

Name: Roast Beef Curtains
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Black Sambuca', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix Together. Smells like Grandma on a sweaty day

Name: Rock Lobsta
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Rock Lobster
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Mix equally in shot glass. Shot and hold on!

Name: Rock Lobster #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. White Cacao']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Rock Lobster #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Rocket Fuel #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Rocket Sauce
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka']
Making: Shake with ice and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Rocky Mountain #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Rocky Mountain #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Amaretto', '2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Mix.

Name: Rocky Mountain Bear F**k
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Sambuca', "1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Rocky Mountain Bear F**ker #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Rum', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort']
Making: Mix in shot glass.

Name: Rocky Mountain Bear F**ker #2
Ingredients: ["1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Rocky Mountain Bear F**ker #3
Ingredients: ['1/5 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/5 oz. Yukon Jack', "1/5 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/5 oz. Tequila', '1/5 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Pour all ingredients into a shot glass and slam it.

Name: Rocky Mountain Butterfly #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Rocky Mountain Butterfly #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 splash(es) Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Rocky Mountain Mother F**ker
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass and enjoy!

Name: Rocky Mountain Mother F**ker #2
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Rolling Out Of A Strippers Truck
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager', '1/3 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Add equal amounts in shot glass and shoot.

Name: Rolston Special
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Bourbon Whiskey']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and serve.

Name: Romona Banana
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Ron Grants Dr. Pepper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '151 Proof Rum', 'Beer']
Making: Fill a shot glass halfway with rootbeer shnapps and then float the Amaretto, kahlua and top with 151 proof rum. Light it and drop the glass in a beer mug 3/4 full of beer. Drink it all in one go. Webmixer's Note: Make sure flame is out before drinking. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Rooster Tail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 oz. Tomato Juice', '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Pour each into a separate shot glass. Make a decision as to what you like the best Start with the tequila and finish with the flavour you like, either the orange or tomato.

Name: Root Beer
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Beer', '2 oz. Root Beer Schnapps']
Making: Pour schnapps into a shot glass then drop it in a mug of beer. Down it all at once.

Name: Root Beer #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Galliano', 'Soda Water']
Making: Layer and top with soda. Shoot!

Name: Root Beer Explosion
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Mix and serve VERY cold in a shot glass. (You'll find out why!)

Name: Root Shooter
Ingredients: ['Beer', '1 oz. Root Beer Schnapps']
Making: Drop a shot glass filled with root beer schnapps into a glass of beer and chug.

Name: Rootbeer Bottle Cap
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', '1 oz. 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and serve.

Name: Rootbeer Float #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Coca Cola', '1/2 oz. Cream (Or whipped cream)']
Making: Mix really well and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Rootbeer Grenade
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Root Beer', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Rum Chata']
Making: Pour rootbeer in a glass and the Jagermeister and Rum Chata into their own shot glasses. Slam the Rum Chata, drop the jagermeister in the glass of rootbeer and slam that as well.

Name: Rotten Apple
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Apple Pucker']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Rotten Apple #2
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '3/4 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Rotten Melon
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amarula Cream Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Pour the Amarula in a shot glass. Then pour the melon liquer in and watch it swirl around. Drink.

Name: Rotten Peach
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Roy Hob Special
Ingredients: ["1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Royal Carribean F**k
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Crown Royal', '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Royal F**k
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Crown Royal', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix in shaker with ice then strain into a shot glass.

Name: Royal Flush #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1 1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into 3 shot glasses.

Name: Royal Kamikazi
Ingredients: ['7 oz. Triple Sec', '5 oz. Vodka', '3 oz. Grape Pucker']
Making: Shake with ice, then pour into shot glasses.

Name: Royal Palm
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Chill in shaker with ice and serve in a chilled shot glass.

Name: Rozi's Bloody Brain
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'drop(s) Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour peach schnapps into a shot glass and add a drop of grenadine so it sinks to the bottom of the glass. Then take half a cap of Bailey's Irish Cream and slowly pour it down the side of the shot glass so it forms a brain like figure on top of the peach schnapps. There you have my bloody brain...hope it works. .the first couple can be a little tricky...enjoy!

Name: Ruby Slipper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '3 dash(es) Grenadine', '7-Up']
Making: Fill a shot glass with Crown Royal and place it in an empty lowball glass. Fill the lowball glass with 7-Up just up to the top of the shot glass, then add a few dashes of grenadine to make it red and shoot!

Name: Rudolph's Nose
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Rumple Meister
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Serve chilled in a shot glass.

Name: Rumplestiltskin
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. Tim says: " Watch out, this one will sneak up on you and will have you trying to guess your own name!"

Name: Russia Qualude
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Frangelico', '1 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Mix in a shaker with ice and strain into shot glasses. Makes about 8 shots.

Name: Russian Fire
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour the ingredients into a shot glass. Serve.

Name: Russian Ice
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 oz. Smirnoff Vodka']
Making: Serve over ice in a rocks glass.

Name: Russian Qualude
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Mix over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Russian Roulette
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Galliano', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1 slice(s) Lemon', 'Sugar']
Making: Layer the vodka and the Galliano. Dip the lemon slice in some sugar and place on half of the shooter glass. Flame the sambuca and pour CAREFULLY onto shooter. Drink and suck. Are you up for the challenge? ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Russin Lortab
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Combine all ingredents in a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a shooter glass.

Name: Rusty Navel
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Rusty Spike
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Scotch']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Ryan's Rush
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. White Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: S and W
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Should taste like the chocolate mints from Fannie Mae. The best shot I have ever had.

Name: S H I T
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Haagen Dazs Cream Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Irish Mist', '1/4 oz. Tequila']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Sabbath #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Orange Liqueur', '1 oz. Whiskey']
Making: Shake well, pour into a shot glass and lit up just before serving. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Sabbath #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake well, pour into a shot glass and lit up just before serving. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Saddle Tramp
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Raspberry Vodka', '1/2 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', 'Cranberry Juice', 'Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. This shooter has been brought to you by Suzanne Conner of the Saddle Club in Whaleysville, Maryland

Name: Sailor Mars
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cinnamon Schnapps', '1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Grenadine', '1 splash(es) 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake Cinnamon and Peppermint Schnapps with the Grenadine in a shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass and top with a splash of 151 proof rum.

Name: Saint Stupid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Frangelico', '1/2 oz. Banana Rum (Preferably Cruzan Banana Rum)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Saitens Water
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Rebel Yell 101', 'Bacardi Limon', 'Budweiser Beer', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Pour the Rebel Yell and the Bacardi into a shot glass. Fill a mug halfway with the beer and add a splash of Coca-Cola. Drop the shooter in a the mug and chug like you are doing a Dr Pepper.(This shot will kick your ass!).

Name: Sake Bomb
Ingredients: ['6 oz. Beer (Preferably Kirin)', '1 oz. Sake hot']
Making: Pour the sake into a rice wine cup. Drop the little cup of sake into half glass of beer and drink immediately (like a boilermaker). Warm and sweet, but with a kick!

Name: Saladtosser
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila (Preferably Black Death Tequila)', '1/3 oz. Absolut Peppar Vodka', '1/3 oz. A-1 Steak Sauce', 'Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Garnish the rim of the glass with chocolate syrup and top with corn kernels. Drink and happy tossing!

Name: Sam's Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Rum', '1 oz. Scotch', '1 oz. Whiskey']
Making: Mix in a cup and slam.

Name: Sambuca Slide
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Light Cream']
Making: Stir and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Sambuca Volcano
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Take the shot of sambuca and hold it in your open mouth with your head tilted back. Light the sambuca with a match and then sprinkle some cinnamon over the flame into your mouth. Watch the cinnamon sparkle like a volcano as it catches on fire! - may require two people (but if you are drinking by yourself you have a problem anyway). ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Sample
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Everclear', '1 oz. Gatorade (Yellow)']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Samuri
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix ingredients in a shaker with ice and strain into shot glasses.

Name: Samuri Jack
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sake', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Inspired by the Cartoon Cartoonshot.

Name: Sand Bag
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '2/3 oz. Jagermeister', 'Salt']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and add a splash of salt on top. Take the shot quickly. Created in memory of flood victims.

Name: Sand In Your Butt
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Sangria De Satan
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tabasco Sauce', '1 oz. Tequila (Preferably Dos Equis Tequila)', '1 Lemon']
Making: Cut a wedge out of the lemon and really tear into it, sucking all the juice out of it. Then shoot the Tabasco, and hold it in your mouth for 10 seconds. Then swallow and put the fire out with the tequila. Repeat as necessary.

Name: Santa Shot
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. Green Creme de Menthe', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Tastes like a candy cane.

Name: Sara's Cherry Chuckle
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cherry Pucker', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Pour Grand Marnier in shot glass. Top off with Cherry Pucker and throw it back... tastes like Cherry-Lemon Sundrop!

Name: Satan's Breath
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Pour sambuca into a snifter and swirl around, coating the glass. Light sambuca with a lighter. Pour sambuca from snifter into a rocks glass very slowly. Raise the snifter higher and it will stay on fire as you pour. Snuff out the flames by putting snifter upside down on the rocks glass. Remove snifter. Do the shot and smell the empty snifter. Then pick yourself up from the floor!!!

Name: Satan's Piss
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Layer in order (grenadine at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass.

Name: Saturday Night Fever
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Shake Sambuca and the splash of lime juice over ice. Pour into a shot glass and top up with Jack Daniel's Whiskey.

Name: Saucy Little F**k Bunny
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Mix over ice, pour and shoot.

Name: Scarface
Ingredients: ['12 can(s) Beer']
Making: Rent the movie Scarface. Every time the word "f**k" is said, take a sip/shot/glass of beer (trust me, you probably won't even last the first tape).

Name: Schoolbus
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Chambord Flavoured Vodka', '1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: ScoJay
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Mix Stolichnaya Vanilla Vodka and Frangelico in a shot glass. Coat a lemon with sugar and bite into it.(not unlike doing shot of tequila) Chase with the shot. It will taste like a bite of a fresh German chocolate cake.

Name: Scoobie Snack
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Milk']
Making: Pour over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Scooby Snack #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Banana Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Scooby Snack (MN Style)
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 tbsp. Half and Half Cream']
Making: Mix with ice, shake and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Scooby Snack (The Real Deal)
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. DeKuyper Tropical Pineapple Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/4 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Scooby Snacks
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Milk']
Making: Shake until frothy and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Scotch With Doom
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '2 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce', '1 oz. Scotch']
Making: Pour vodka into a shot glass and add a dash or two of tabasco (aka a Snakebite). Prepare a scotch on ice. Take the shooter and follow it with the scotch as a chaser. After the Snakebite the scotch is quite soothing.

Name: Scotties Little Softy
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer Drambue first Kahlua second and Irish Cream last.

Name: Scottish Backdraft
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Sambuca', '1/3 oz. Absinthe', 'Cinnamon']
Making: Put the shot glass in the middle of a plate and pour the sambuca in. Then pour the absinthe in and overflow it onto the plate. Light it and let it burn for a few seconds. Throw some cinammon powder into the flames(watch what happens). Now put the glass over the shot and blow out round the edges and leave the shot glass to go out. Careful the glass might stick to the plate. Take the glass off and very quickly put ice in the glass. Cover and shake. The glass should fill with smoke. Take the straw and suck the smoke from the glass then take the shot. Drink the leftovers on the plate with the straw. Do this quickly and it should knock you on your arse. Enjoy.

Name: Screamin' Green Lizard
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/2 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Pour into a 2 oz. shot glass and slam it back. If that doesn't make your lizard scream I don't know what will!

Name: Screamin' Mark
Ingredients: ["1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Screaming Arshole
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 1/2 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix in a large shot glass. A note of warning from the Webmixer: This is a potentially dangerous shooter. Tabasco is a VERY hot sauce, so be extra careful. (One of us tried something similar and his comment is: you start immediately secreting from all of your orifices and some that you might not even know about!)

Name: Screaming Blue Messiah #1
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Build in a large shot glass.

Name: Screaming Blue Messiah #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Pour into a shooter glass. Sherri's comment: The blue really makes the gold bits stand out.

Name: Screaming Chicken
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Shake well and shoot.

Name: Screaming Dark Puerto Rican
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Myer's Dark Rum", '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Shakewith ice and strain into a shot glass. Dedicated to Alex the Puerto Rican Chef at the Wynkoop Brewing Company.

Name: Screaming Green Lizard
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Scotch', '1/2 oz. Gin (Lemon flavoured)', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix into a shot glass. I would strongly advise that you slam this shooter back because it tastes like s_ _ _. Be prepared to feel no pain after you have 2 of these.

Name: Screaming Lizard
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Chartreuse']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Screaming Moose
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Mix and pour in a shot glass.

Name: Screaming Multiple Orgasm
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Galliano', '1/3 oz. Cointreau', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Screaming Mussolini
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Screaming Nazi
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Chill and pour into shot glass.

Name: Screaming Nazi #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Chill all ingredients and stir.

Name: Screaming Nazi #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Screaming Orgasm
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix alcohol in a shot glass. Top with whipped cream and drink with both hands behind your back.

Name: Screaming Orgasm Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1 splash(es) Amaretto']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass. Shoot!

Name: Screaming Snatch
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Soda Water']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into shot glasses.

Name: Screaming White Puerto Rican Panel Truck
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Chill, mix, shake well, serve in a shot glass and …run!

Name: Screaming Yoda
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Sea Monkey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Goldschlager', '1 splash(es) Blue Curacao']
Making: Combine in shot glass, shoot.

Name: Sean's Blue Light Special
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Apricot Brandy', '1/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Seduction
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Serbian Slammer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Slivovitz', '1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1 Lime']
Making: Pour the sambuca into a shot glass and add a twist of lime. Then add the Serbian moonshine. This shooter is best slammed.

Name: Serrano
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Banana Creme Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Mix with ice and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Seventh Heaven #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Sex At My Friend's House
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix, chill and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Sex At My House
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Amaretto', '1 1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Serve chilled in a shot glass.

Name: Sex In A Shot-glass
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. 7-Up', '1 pinch(es) Salt']
Making: This makes exactly one shot. First you take the 151 Proof Rum and 7-Up and mix them together in a shot glass. Then take a pinch of salt and put it in the shot glass. Then take an un-used non-lubricated condom and stretch it over the top of the shot-glass. Poke a hole in the tip of the condom to make a nipple. Make sure it is tight and then tip it over and suck the contents through the hole.

Name: Sex In The Orchard
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/3 oz. Green Apple Pucker', '1/3 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Sex In the Parking Lot
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Apple Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a large shot glass.

Name: Sex In The Snow
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager', 'Cinnamon', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Mix in a chilled shot glass or small highball glass. Add the whipped cream. Sprinkle with a small amount of cinnamon. Shoot and share the whipped cream.

Name: Sex Me Up Cowboy
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Butter Shots', '1/3 oz. Tequila Rose']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Sex On A Elephant
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Golden Pear', '1 oz. Amarula Cream Liqueur']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into shot glasses. Or you can layer in in order into a shotglass. YUMMY!!!! A must if you go to Limelight Niteclub in TORONTO!!!

Name: Sex On Acid
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Crown Royal', '1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Sour Mix']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into 2 shot glasses.

Name: Sex On The Beach #3
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a large shot glass.

Name: Sex On The Beach Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake ingredients with ice, pour into shot glass.

Name: Sex On the Lake
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '3/4 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', 'dash(es) White Rum', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a large shot glass.

Name: Sex With A Redhead
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Bombay Sapphire Gin', '1/2 oz. Tequila Rose']
Making: Layer the Hot Damn and Bombay Sapphire in a shot glass. Carefully pour in the Tequila Rose. It will sink to the bottom leaving creamy tendrils through the upper layers. This shooter will make you weak in the knees!

Name: Sex With An Alligator
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 dash(es) Raspberry Schnapps', '1 dash(es) Jagermeister', '1 Cherry']
Making: Mix first 3 ingredients in a tin with ice. Pour into a shot glass. Run spout of rasberry schnapps around the shot glass until you see it at the bottom of the glass. Drop in the cherry. Pour Jagermeister over the cherry until you see a thin layer on top. Now take the shot and eat the cherry.

Name: Sex With An Alligator #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister (Chilled)', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Shake the Midori and the sour mix and pour into a shot glass. Add the Chambord to the shot with the back of a spoon. It should sink to the bottom. Float the Jagermeister on top. It's a great colourful shot!

Name: Sex With An Alligator #3
Ingredients: ['1 1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1 splash(es) Jagermeister', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix Malibu, Midori and pineapple juice together with ice. Pour chilled into a maritini glass. Slowly add the blue curacao alongthe side of glass to a layer at the bottom. Slowly add the grenadine along the side to make another layer which will be on top of the Midori. Finish with a light layer of Jagermeister. Should make a 6 oz SHOT. Must be drunk like a shot or will not taste good.

Name: Sex with Rose
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/2 oz. Tequila Rose']
Making: Layer in order in a shot glass (Midori at the bottom).

Name: Sex With The Captain
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a large shot glass.

Name: Sexoholic
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Lemon Juice']
Making: Mix, pour and shoot.

Name: Sexual Alligator
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake the Midori and pineapple juice over ice. Strain into a small rocks glass. Layer Chambord on bottom using a spoon if you are not talented enough to pour slowly down the inside of the glass. Layer Jaggermeister on top. You now have a three layered shooter all the ladies will have to have. Purple on the bottom, neon green middle and brown on top. Drink up!!

Name: Sexy Alligator
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Framboise', '1 tsp. Jagermeister', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake Midori with a splash of pineapple juice and pour into a shot glass. Then carefully pour the Framboise so it sinks to the bottom. Finally, float the Jagermeister on top. If done correctly, it should have three layers. Purple-Green-Purple.

Name: Sexy Jessie
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 oz. Crown Royal', '3/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '3/4 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Shakie Shakie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', '1 oz. Creme de Menthe', 'Sambuca']
Making: Pour a small amount of sambuca into a shot glass. By turning the glass while on its side get the sambuca to cover the insides of the glass. Pour in the Crème de Menthe and float the sambuca. Leave room at the top of the glass. Light and while burning, cup palm of hand over allow a vacuum to form then shake hand with the glass stuck in place. Remove and shoot. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Shampoo
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2/3 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps']
Making: Pour, mix, and enjoy!

Name: Shamrock Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Shane Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss', '1/3 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur']
Making: Shake over ice strain and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Shark Bite
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Shark Bite #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Fill shaker 1/4 full of ice and add ingredients. Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Shark Bite #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Orange Juice', '1 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix Bacardi 151 Proof Rum and orange juice in a large shot glass. Add a dash of Tabasco Sauce and serve.

Name: Shearer Special
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Lemon Liqueur', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Shellshock
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. After Shock Blue Liqueur']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Shit Disturber
