Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', "1/3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Mix in a test tube and shoot. If mixed in this order, any person can drink it, even if they don't like the taste of hard liquor. Enjoy, after a few or these it will make you feel nothing!

Name: Shit Kicker
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Grenadine', '1/4 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/4 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Shit on the Grass
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Chill the Midori then pour into a shot glass and layer with the Bailey's. James' comment: It tastes like a banana split.

Name: Shiver
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 wedge(s) Lime', 'Salt']
Making: This should be done to a woman. First you lick the other persons neck and splash on the salt. Then stick the lime between her breasts. Then lick the salt from her neck, take the shot, and fetch that lime. You get the shot and she gets the shiver.

Name: Shivy Juice
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/3 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix together in a shooter glass. Great for getting drunk with a girlfriend.

Name: Shocker
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. White Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: 1. Layer in a shot glass 2. Put hand (with ring finger down) in the air (this is the shocker hand sign) 3. Yell "Shocker!!!" 4. Slam it.

Name: Shoot Caller
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon (101 Proof)', 'Cola']
Making: Pour Bacardi 151 rum first and then the Wild Turkey 101 Proof. Serve with any dark coloured soft drink (optional).

Name: Shoot The Root #1
Ingredients: ['1 pint(s) Beer', '1 oz. Root Beer Schnapps']
Making: Pour schnapps into a shot glass and drop into the mug of beer. Swallow all at once.

Name: Shoot the Root #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '12 oz. Lager']
Making: Fill a shot glass with schnapps and place against inside edge of a low-ball glass. Fill the glass with beer until just below the rim of the shot . Drink from the edge touching the shot glass as fast as humanly possible.

Name: Shooting Star
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '2 oz. Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila', '1/2 Lemon', 'Sugar']
Making: Mix Bacardi 151 and with Jose Cuervo Especial. Support 1/2 a lemon with toothpicks on top of glass. Sprinkle the lemon with sugar and Bicardi 151. Light the 151 and let the sugar melt without carmelizing. Blow the flame out when the sugar starts to melt. Shoot the liquid and then bite the lemon.

Name: Shot -o- Happiness

Peach Schnapps', '1/8 oz. Dekuyper Razzmatazz', '1/8 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/8 oz. Blackberry Brandy', '1/8 oz. Banana Liqueur See more ingredients in the instructions!!!']

Name: SoCo
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making:
Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.
Southern Comfort, also referred to as SoCo, is a common liquor that you will most likely see behind any good bar, or even in someone’s private stock.
Although the liquor is made by combining whiskey with sweet ingredients, such as sugar, peach, vanilla, cinnamon, and orange, it has a strong flavor that you either love or hate.
While some may not enjoy the liquor straight up, others find it lends a wonderful taste to certain mixed beverages, such as the Crash and Burn, Alabama Slammer, and SloScrew.
One of the most popular ways to enjoy Southern Comfort is in a SoCo and Lime.
The SoCo and Lime, which, as you guessed it, mixes Southern Comfort and lime juice, was created at the Duck-In, which was once a popular eatery in Virginia Beach, Virginia. Patrons there began consuming the beverage and really liked it. So, it’s no surprise that it wasn’t long before the recipe made its way from Virginia to other states, and people nationwide began to also enjoy the concoction.
Should you decide that you want to try your hand at making a SoCo and Lime, but don’t have limes or lime juice on hand, you can use Rose’s Lime Cordial if you happen to have that. To create the drink, simply mix equal parts of each ingredient together. Want a lot? Then make it in a standard drink glass. Want just a taste? Then use the same 50/50 technique to create a SoCo and Lime shot.

Making: Shake over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Swedish Fish #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix']
Making:
Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass.
Let’s say you’re being given a quiz and the questions are all about candy. Should you be asked to compile a list containing your favorite confections, whether you choose those that you loved as a child or what you like now, would Swedish Fish be on it? We bet they would. That is, of course, unless you’ve been living under a rock for the past few decades and have no clue what the candy is.
If you are that person, you really don’t know what you’re missing. The gummy, chewy, sweet treats are like nothing you’ve ever tried before and, as the name suggests, they are shaped like little fish.
When first created, Swedish fish came in red and had a flavor all its own. Today, you can find still find the yummy red fishes, but now they are joined by green, orange, and yellow, and each has its own unique flavor.
It isn’t just the color and flavor of Swedish Fish that’s changing. It’s also the way that adults can enjoy the sweet treat.
You love the candy and want to incorporate them on a night out, but you might feel a little silly sitting at the bar munching on Swedish fish instead of peanuts or stale bar mix. So, get your candy fix by asking for a Swedish Fish shooter. Order one the next time you’re out or create your own by mixing equal parts of Black Haus, Cranberry Juice, and Sour Mix.

Name: Sweet Tooth #2
Ingredients: ['Absolut Citron Vodka', 'Lemon Juice (To taste)', 'Sugar']
Making: Pour a glass size of your choice of vodka for the evening, add lemon juice to taste, and sweeten (per tooth) with sugar. Shake well and enjoy :)

Name: Sweetest Taboo
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake all the ingredients vigorously until chilled, strain into a short rock glass; then shoot it!

Name: Swiss and Whoosh
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tia Maria', '1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Swiss Hiker
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: T N T #2
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Tonic Water']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: T N T #3
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '8 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix and pour into a shot glass. Garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: T.G.V.
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix and shoot. Alternatively can be a cocktail if you add cola or soda. The name is not only a reference to the spirits it contains but also to the French fast speed train (Train a Grande Vitesse).

Name: T.K.O. #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Ouzo']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: T.K.O. #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and shoot!

Name: Tabuie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tuaca', '1 oz. Drambuie Liqueur']
Making: Chill, strain and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Taft Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Mix Peppermint Schnapps and Southern Comfort in a shot glass. Top off with Wild Turkey and shoot.!

Name: Taj Mahal
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Apple Juice']
Making: Serve in shot glass.

Name: Take Me Away
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Peach Brandy']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Takedown
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Takillya
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Smirnoff Vodka', 'dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Serve in a shot glass.

Name: Tang
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Tanya Shottt
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka (Preferably Kettle One)', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Tarantula #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 tsp. Crown Royal']
Making: Layer Amaretto and Bailey's Irish Cream and with a bar spoon top with Crown Royal.

Name: Tarheel
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Pour kahlua in the bottom of a shot glass. Mix Baileys and blue curaco together and float on top of Kahlua. GO CAROLINA!!

Name: Tasty Orgasm
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Tatum Special
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Raspberry Sourpuss']
Making: Layer in order (Malibu at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass. Invented at Taps Nightclub in Spruce Grove, AB.

Name: Tea Forte Bergamot Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 Tea Forte Lavender Citrus Cocktail Infusion', '3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Place infuser in glass. Pour vodka over infuser and steep for 2-3 minutes. Combine infused vodka in a shaker with ice, shake vigorously and strain into 2 shot glasses. Follow shot with a bite into an orange wedge.

Name: Technical Knock Out
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Ouzo', '1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass in the given order. If it's available in your area I suggest purchasing a home bar companion called Shooters made Easy. A small tray with 4 shooter glasses, another tray fits on top of glasses. Small holes in the top tray allow layering perfect every time. Regardless of order.

Name: Teddy Bear
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Cola', '1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Tee One Up
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Coca Cola', '1/2 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix together, shake until frothy and serve in a shot glass. Note from Debbie : for those who don't like Jager let them taste this....an all time favorite at the cantab lounge in Cambridge, Ma.

Name: TeffyBobs Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Kool-Aid (you pick the flavour)']
Making: Mix vodka and Kool-Air and go. Line up several for the full effect. They are great tasting and low priced to make. Enjoy!!

Name: Tennesse Boiler Maker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey', '1 pint(s) Beer']
Making: Pour one full shot of whiskey. Drop into full beer mug. Drink as fast as possible. Repeat as many times as possible.

Name: Tequila Boom Boom
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Soda Water']
Making: Pour into a shot glass, cover with a coaster and bang the shot on a table really hard, twice: It will turn blue. Then lift the coaster and shoot.

Name: Tequila F**k Face
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Whiskey (Malt)', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Martini and Rossi Dry Vermouth', '1 oz. Gin']
Making: Layer and light then finish with a suck of lemon. Drink as a shooter.

Name: Tequila Fizz #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila (White)', '1 oz. 7-Up (Or Sprite)']
Making: Put enough 7-Up to cover a shooter glass (1 oz.), plop in the tequila, put your hand over the glass, shake a little and drink Great drink.

Name: Tequila Mockingbird Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Tequila Popper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Mix in a shot glass, then drink.

Name: Tequila Shitter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 Jalapeno Pepper']
Making: Pour tequila into shot glass. Shoot. Suck the juice from the jalapeno. DO NOT follow with a chaser or water!

Name: Tequila Shrinker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 tsp. Sugar']
Making: Pour in a shot glass.

Name: Tequila Slammer
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Tequila Smash
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Place hand over top of glass and bang down on table. When it begins to fizz, shoot it.

Name: Tequila Tabasco
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', 'Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Put Tabasco on the side of your hand. Lick it and drink the tequila.

Name: Tequila Texas
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Lemon Juice', '1 oz. Tequila', "1 oz. Mott's Clamato Juice"]
Making: Pour each ingredient into a separate shot glass. Drink one after the other - lemon juice first, then tequila and finally the Mott's Clamato Juice.

Name: Teradactal
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Mix and shoot. Olde Port Inn comment: After you take the shot you flap your arms and scream like a seagull. Example (Ka Ka Ka Ka)

Name: Terminator #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. 7-Up']
Making: Mix Chambord and tequila in a shot glass, and add 7-Up until it becomes light purple. Shoot but go easy its a little unsettelling if your not prepared.

Name: Test Tube Baby #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Tequila', 'drop(s) Cream']
Making: Layer and add drop of cream to top. Shoot!

Name: Test Tube Baby #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Anisette', 'drop(s) Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Add drop of Irish Cream. Serve. Be sure to attain the right visual effect for this. If you have test tubes, use them.

Name: Test Tube Baby #3
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: In a shooter glass pour in schnapps. Gently float Bailey's Irish Cream on the surface. Drop in a dash of grenadine which should sink to though them both. Shoot!

Name: Test Tube Baby #4
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Strawberry Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Fill a test tube shot glass with the Strawberry Schnapps. Layer the Bailey's Irish Cream on top. Drop in a Gummy Bear Candy for that test tube baby effect!

Name: Tetanus Shot
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Rye Whiskey']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. This is a play on words for the Rusty Nail mixed drink.

Name: Texas Chainsaw Massacre
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Strawberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Texas Flag
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Layer in order (After Shock at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Texas Heroin
Ingredients: ['1/5 oz. Kahlua', '1/5 oz. Sambuca', '1/5 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/5 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/5 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix together in a shot glass and slam it down... it has a kick and like real Heroin is HIGHLY addictive

Name: Texas Prarie Fire
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 tbsp. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and drink. Not for the meek hearted - may want to follow with water to put out the fire.

Name: Texas Roadkill
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Gin', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 splash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. It's used as an initiation shot for those who have just turned 21. It's guaranteed punishment!

Name: Texas Two Step
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', "3 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Pour the Barcardi and Southern Comfort into a shot glass. Pour the Jack Daniel's into a second shot glass. Drink the Barcardi and Southern Comfort first folllowed by the Jack Daniles. Sit back and enjoy.

Name: Tha Big Hoot #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 oz. Black Raspberry Liqueur', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Chill and strain into a shooter glass.

Name: Tha Big Hoot #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absolut Citron Vodka', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Chill and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Thanksgiving Dinner
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Microwave 10 seconds and shoot!

Name: The 'Bojo' Shooter
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Faygo (Rock and Rye)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass. Down the shot, slam a table and repeat as necessary. As far as I know, Faygo brand soda pop is only available in the Midwest U.S.

Name: The Abbey
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Creme de Menthe green', '1/4 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix ingredients in a chilled shot glass and serve.

Name: The Antichrist
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Everclear', '1/3 oz. Bacardi Rum', '1/3 oz. Absolut Peppar Vodka', '3 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Create in ashot glass. Add Tabasco on top.

Name: The Blackout
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Pour into a shot glass. I call it the Blackout simply because the shot goes down way too smooth, so you want another one and before you know it your blacked out.

Name: The Bloodshot Bill
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1 dash(es) Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Pour in a shot glass. This drink is named after a local band - Bloodshot Bill and the Hubcaps.

Name: The Boys And Me
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon']
Making: Mix in a shooter glass and enjoy.

Name: The BW
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Southern Comfort', '1 oz. Vodka', '9 oz. Mountain Dew (Cold)']
Making: This shot is to be shared with a group of people. Mix then pour into shot glasses.

Name: The Captain's Panties
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. Sambuca']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: The Checker Dr Pepper
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Pepsi Cola', 'Lager']
Making: Pour the amaretto and the Pepsi into a shot glass. Drop the shot glass into the glass of beer and drink up!

Name: The Chocolate Doobie
Ingredients: ['1 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', 'Chocolate Syrup']
Making: Pour desired amount of chocolate syrup in your mouth. Without swallowing take a shot of 99 bananas. Mix in your mouth and swallow.

Name: The Clit Splitter
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Amaretto', "1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '3/4 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: The Crush
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', 'drop(s) Grenadine', 'drop(s) Lime Juice']
Making: Mix and shoot!

Name: The David Preston Special
Ingredients: ['1/4 part(s) Sambuca', '3/4 part(s) Mountain Dew']
Making: Mix in a glass. Toss it back and repeat as necessary!

Name: The Dirty Sanchez
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Sambuca', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Tequila']
Making: Add each ingredient one by one to shot glass.

Name: The Donkey Punch
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi O', '1/3 oz. Midori', '1/3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka']
Making: Pour ingredients into a metal shaker with ice and shake. Strain into a shotglass. Extend your left arm palm out make fist with right hand and punch back of left hand whilst yelling 'HEE-HA.' Take shot. Works really well on a first date.

Name: The Doughall Is A Pansy Shot
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. Creme de Banane', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Shake vigorously and strain into a shot glass. Enjoy!

Name: The Dragonball
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Everclear', '1/4 oz. Honey', '1/4 oz. Sriracha Sauce']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: The Eggermeister
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1 Egg Pickled']
Making: Pour into a highball glass and drop the pickled egg in. Shoot and chew the egg before swallowing.

Name: The Firecracker
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Hornitos Plata Tequila', '3/4 part(s) Blueberry Flavouring', '1/2 part(s) DeKuyper Pucker Raspberry Schnapps', '1/4 part(s) Campari', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Layer ingredients as listed above in shot glass. Drink and enjoy!

Name: The Four Horsemen
Ingredients: ["1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Jose Cuervo', "1 oz. Captain Morgan's Spiced Rum"]
Making: Spread the shots out in front of you, take the first one, slam it, then the next and so on down the line. No chaser, no pause. When all four are down, guess which one was which. Also known as _Horsemen of the Apocalypse_.

Name: The Gator
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/2 oz. Midori', '3/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Shake until chilled, strain and pour into a shot glass.

Name: The Grinch Who Stole X-mas
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Ice 101', '1/2 oz. DeKuyper Sour Apple']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: The Hespeler Shamrock
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '2/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1 oz. Beer (Preferably from the East coast, such as Alexander Keiths or Moosehead)']
Making: Mix the Bailey's and the creme de menthe in a shot glass, shoot it back and chase with the beer.

Name: The Horny Canadian
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and have the drinker yell at the top of their lungs "I AM A HORNY CANADIAN!".

Name: The Hurl Hurl
Ingredients: ['1 splash(es) Melon Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Creme de Banane', '1 splash(es) Raspberry Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Peach Schnapps', '1 splash(es) Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Southern Comfort', '1 splash(es) Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Triple Sec', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Add a splash of all the ingredients into a shaker cup filled with ice. Shake until very cold. Serve as a shot or in a cocktail glass.

Name: The Hydraulic Vest
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Pernod Absinthe', '1/3 oz. After Shock Liqueur']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. Must be drank extremely fast, with a large intake of breath just after swallowing. Lovely! (A bucket can be used for emergencies)

Name: The Inferno
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Canadian Whisky', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: The Irish Flag
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Brandy']
Making: Poor creme de menthe into shot glass first.Then layer the baileys on top of it then layer the brandy on top of the baileys

Name: The Irish Funeral
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix all ingredients into a bottle with a funnel. Pour heavy ingredients in the following order: Bailey's, Kahlua, Amaretto,Jameson, Vodka. Stir ingredients in the bottle. The reason for pouring in heavy ingredients first is two fold. It mixes better and won't separate once mixed and the lighter ingredients will wash the heavier ingredients down the funnel when pouring. Mix and Enjoy. One word of warning. This is probably one of the best shots you will ever have. It tastes like a cookie and you will probably feel like you could drink one hundred of them.

Name: The Irish Lutheran
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Barenjager Honey Liqueur', '1 splash(es) Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and fFloat a bit of Irish Cream on top.

Name: The Jack Nicholson
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Caramel Liqueur']
Making: Mix over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: The Jewel
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Root Beer Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Chocolate Liqueur (Preferably Godet White Belgian Choclate Liquor)', 'dash(es) Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps']
Making: Layer in order (root beer at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass and shoot. Repeat as needed!

Name: The Kings Downfall
Ingredients: ["1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/4 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/4 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Crown Royal', '1/4 oz. Yukon Jack']
Making: Combine in shot glass and shoot! We got the name for this drink because a guy said he was the king of the bar so we made him 4 of these and he passed out. Ttherefore we called the drink the kings downfall.

Name: The Madd Hatter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sprite', '1/4 oz. Barenjager Honey Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 1/2 splash(es) Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum']
Making: Chilled and strained into a shot glass.

Name: The Matrix
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Falernum', '2 oz. Vodka', '3 dash(es) Salt']
Making: Mix and shoot. You'll see how far the rabbit hole goes. Enjoy.

Name: The Oh Zone Layer
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao']
Making: Layer in a shot glass in the following order: Sweet and Sour first, then Triple Sec and ending with blue Curacao. Very Environmentally Smooth!

Name: The Original Oatmeal Cookie
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Goldschlager', '1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: The Original Test Tube Baby
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 tsp. Irish Cream']
Making: Pour the Kahlua, then the vodka into a shot glass. The vodka should settle on the top. Add the Irish cream, light the surface of the vodka, and drink from straw. Make sure you suck the whole shot at once, or the flame will travel up the straw. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: The Otis Nixon
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Blueberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Maui Tropical Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Blend ingredients in a drink tumbler over ice. Shake well! and serve in a large glass over crushed ice. Garnish with an orange slice.

Name: The Polish Pounder
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Polish Potato Vodka (Or any other Vodka)']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Shoot!

Name: The Pumpkin Smash
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Irish Cream', 'Soda', 'Food Colouring (Red and Yellow)']
Making: Mix some red and yellow food coloring into the peach schnapps to make it orange. This gives you the "Essence of the Evil pumpkin". Then make some of the lime juice red, with the red food coloring. This gives you the "Virgin Blood". Then pour 1/2 oz. of the "Essence of the Evil pumpkin" into a shot glass. Fill 1/4 with the Irish cream (the "Milk of the three day dead goat"). Finally put a few drops of the "Virgin Blood" into the shot and top it off with the soda ("Bubbling Water"). Slam the shot down, smash the evil pumpkin and drink.

Name: The Purple Mother F**ker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice', '1/4 oz. Sour Mix']
Making: Chill and serve in a shot glass. *Put just enough Blue Curacao to make it purple. Usually no more than 1/4 oz.

Name: The Raging Bull
Ingredients: ['Red Bull Energy Drink', 'Tanqueray Gin']
Making: Fill the bottom half of a fluted shot glass with Red Bull and the top with Tanqueray Gin.

Name: The Real Blow Job
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '3/4 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass and top with whipped cream. Shoot it with your arms behind your back.

Name: The Real Dead Nazi
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Mix and drink.

Name: The Real Incredible Hulk
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Hpnotiq', '1/2 oz. Hennessy Cognac VS']
Making: Pour Hpnotiq into a tshot glass. Fill the rest with Henessy. It's best done in a clear cup so you can see the color change from blue to green. Hence the real Incredible Hulk.

Name: The Real Mind Eraser
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: The Real Root Beer Float
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Root Beer']
Making: Shaken over ice and strained into a shot glass.

Name: The Red Bush
Ingredients: ["1 1/2 oz. Bushmill's Irish Whiskey", '1 can(s) Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Put ice in a small glass and pour in Red Bull to about 3/4 full. Add Bushmill's and stir.

Name: The Reidos
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Iceberg Vodka', '2/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 oz. Sprite']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and stir. Tastes like blue sprite.

Name: The Rover
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Powers Irish Whiskey', '1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. Maxim Magazine pg. 92 #63 March 2003

Name: The Salad Tosser
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Crown Royal', '3/4 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Shake with ice and serve in a shot glass.

Name: The Spitfire
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Mezcal', '1/3 oz. Green Chartreuse', '10 drop(s) Tabasco Sauce (The hotter, the better)']
Making: Pout the Tabasco in a shot glass, then add the alcohol. Ignite and shoot. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: The Squirrel Lick
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Chocolate Syrup', 'Almonds (roasted)']
Making: Fill a shot glass with Irish Cream and Amaretto. Pour chocolate syrup in a little pool on your wrist and have an almond at the ready. Lick the chocolate, take the shot, then eat the almond right away. Decadent and delicious! Great for parties!

Name: The Stump
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Sprite', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Place all ingredients into a shot glass then bang it on the table to stir.

Name: The Tapeworm
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tabasco Sauce', 'Black Pepper', '1 tsp. Mayonnaise']
Making: Pour into a shot glass, shake pepper and finally top with a thin film of mayonnaise.

Name: The Terminator
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Johnnie Walker Black Label Scotch', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum']
Making: Pour in a glass and shoot. Warning This is not really a good tasting drink but more for a joke on a 21er's night out. If the person has been drinking this may induce vomiting.

Name: The Thailander
Ingredients: ['3 oz. Absolut Vodka', '5 oz. Orange Juice (With pulp)', '10 oz. Coca Cola']
Making: Combine in a highball glass and garnish with some Swedish lingonberry. (The orange juice with pulp is extremely important for the consistency and the colour of the drink).

Name: The Toaster
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Expresso']
Making: Layer all ingredients in a shot glass. If done correctly, the expresso should look like it's floating on air.

Name: The True Irish Carbomb
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1 pint(s) Guinness']
Making: Layer the spirits in a shot glass, the Jameson's Irish Whiskey at the bottom. Drop the shot glass in the beed and shoot! Matt says: Smooth but STRONG!!!

Name: The Vibrator
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Pour in order into a shot glass.

Name: The Viper
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Light Rum', '1 oz. Midori', '1 oz. Coconut Rum']
Making: Dump into a pint glass. Raise your glass and salute the Jet Fighter Pilots for creating such a wonderful drink!

Name: The Wente
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Shake, chill, serve and shoot.

Name: The Wiped-Out
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cuervo Gold Tequila', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '4 drop(s) Angostura Bitters']
Making: Layer each ingredient starting with the Wild Turkey, vodka, etc. I got the idea for this one while listening to an Ace Frehley solo album. There's a song called "Wiped-out" on there that, well, describes a night with Ace out on the town. What fun,huh? Please, drink this one at home, believe me.

Name: Thermonuclear Napalm
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Everclear', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Pour into a shaker. Then serve in shot glasses. This is supposed to be the world's strongest shot. So be careful.

Name: Thin Mint Cookie
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '3/4 oz. Creme de Cacao', '1/4 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Build in a shot glass. Drink and enjoy.

Name: Third Degree Murder
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Sloe Gin', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/4 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Das Komet Vanilla Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Lime Juice', '1 dash(es) Orange Juice', '1 dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Build on ice. Shake. Strain into Shot Glasses. It's a Red Death with a bite!

Name: Third Reich
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Thorny Love
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila Rose', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Half and Half Cream', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix together with ice in shaker. Shake well!! Strain into shot glasses.

Name: Thorny Rose
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tia Maria', '1/3 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Tequila Rose']
Making: In a shot glass pour Tia Maria. Layer Peppermint Schnapps and carefully pour Tequila Rose down side of shot glass so it layers between Tia Maria and Peppermint Schnapps. Should resemble a rose when done properly.

Name: Three Hicks And A Spic
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', "2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '2 oz. Johnnie Walker Scotch', '2 oz. Jose Cuervo']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Three Legged Monkey
Ingredients: ['1 1/5 oz. Crown Royal', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola', 'splash(es) Sprite']
Making: Chill and strain into a rocks glass.

Name: Three Nazis
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Serve in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Three Wise Men #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Johnnie Walker Scotch', '1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Three Wise Men #2
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Three Wise Men #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Dark Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Tim's comments: All ingredients must be stored in the freezer to accomplish the full effect of this drink. The drink goes right along with the Biblical story of the Three Wise Men as one was Asian, one was African and one was European.

Name: Three Wise Men #4
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager', '1/3 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Mix in a rocks glass and slam.

Name: Three Wise Men - Original
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Yukon Jack']
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Three Wise Men and a Dirty Mexican
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Johnnie Walker Black Label Scotch', '1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo']
Making: Pour over ice, shake, and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Three Wise Men Gone Hunting
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/2 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Pour in a shot glass and pray boys and girls. The wise men have gone hunting, but you'll be hunting for the closest bathroom.

Name: Three Wise Men Searching For Gold
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Mix in a rocks glass and slam.

Name: Three Wisemen Chasing A Wild Turkey
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', "1 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1 oz. Yukon Jack']
Making: Pour each ingredient in a separate shot glasses. Slam the Wild Turkey followed by the three other shots. This one will hurt you real fast.

Name: Three's Company
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Courvoisier Cognac', '1/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/3 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Three-legged Monkey
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Threesome
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Frangelico', '1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: Shake and pour into a shot glass.

Name: Threesome Sweetness
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) 1921 Tequila Cream Liqueur', '1 part(s) Brandy', '1 part(s) Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Mix all ingredients in a shaker with an ice cube , and serve in a shooter glass. Enjoy !

Name: Throat Charmer
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Thug Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Alize Gold Passion', '1 oz. Crystal Light']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Thunder and Lightning
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Mix evenly in a shooter or a sherry glass.

Name: Thunder F*ck
Ingredients: ["1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1/4 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Crown Royal', '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake over ice and strain into a cocktail glass. Should be a dark red in color when finished.

Name: Thunder-n-Lightning
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Mix over ice and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Thundercloud
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butter Shots', '1/4 oz. Black Sambuca', '1/4 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Mix Butter Shots and Black Sambuca in a shot glass. Add Irish Cream last as it creates the cloud.

Name: Tidal Wave #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Sambuca', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Tidal Wave #3
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Admiral Nelson's Spiced Rum", '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Tidal Wave (mean version)
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '2 oz. Water']
Making: Shake and strain all ingredients into shot glass EXCEPT for the water. Fill a second shot glass with water. After they shoot the Tidal Wav, splash them with the water!

Name: Tidal Wave Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1 1/2 oz. Water']
Making: Let friend take blue caracobefore they can grab the watersplash in their face. Great for 21st power hour.

Name: Tidey Bowl
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix and pour into a shot glass. Add 2-3 raisins for a comical effect.

Name: Tidy Bowl #2
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/4 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Tie Dyed Mind Fuck
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Blue Curacao', '3/4 oz. Jose Cuervo', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Pour the Blue Curacao in the shot glass. Layer the Jose Cuervo on top of the blue curacao then layer the Grenadine on top of the Jose Quervo. Since they are layered in opposite order of weight the Grenadine goes to the bottom and the Blue Curacao goes to the top making a tie dyed look with blue yellow red orangegreen and purple hence the Tie Dyed Mind Fuck.

Name: Tie Me To A Bedpost
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Canadian Club Classic Whisky', '1/2 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '4 oz. Orange Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Mix everything in shaker. And strain into 2 cocktail glasses over ice.

Name: Tiger's Eye
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jagermeister', '1 oz. Rumple Minze', '1 oz. Kahlua']
Making: Pour Kahlua into the bottom of a small cocktail glass. Then slowly pour the Rumple Minze in next and finally the Jagermeister. It should look like a tiger's eye when finished.

Name: Timber Wolf
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Layer or mix in a shot glass.

Name: Tina Maria
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka']
Making: Mix and shoot!

Name: Tip Of The Rickberg
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Maui Blue Hawaiian Schnapps']
Making: Layer in a shot glass, Rumple Minze at the bottom of the glass.

Name: TKO
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Inferno Pepper Vodka', '1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum']
Making: Pour in listed order. Enjoy!

Name: TLA
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Lime Mix']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: To The Moon
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Coffee Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Stir and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Toe Tag
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Mix in a shot glass.

Name: Tommy Knocker
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', "1 splash(es) Rose's Lime Juice", '1 splash(es) 7-Up', '1 splash(es) Bar Mix', '1 splash(es) Beer (Draft)']
Making: Pour into a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a rocks glass.

Name: Tonya Harding
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/4 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer each ingredient in a shot glass. After your first shot of this, wipe the sweat from your forehead. Order your second one and double over at your knees!

Name: Tootsie Roll #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tia Maria', '1/3 oz. Brown Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Pour together into shot glass.

Name: Top Gun
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka (Preferably Russian)', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream', '1/6 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/6 oz. Cherry Brandy', '1/6 oz. Milk']
Making: Layer curacao, brandy and milk in a shot glass then pour in the Irish cream and vodka.

Name: Topless Nun
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', 'drop(s) Sambuca (Black)']
Making: Pour the schnapps and the Bailey's into a shot glass and with a straw place a drop of sambuca in the centre, making small nipple-like dot.

Name: Tornado
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/6 oz. Advocaat', '4 drop(s) Grenadine', '1/6 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in order (butterscotch at bottom of the glass) and watch the tornado appear. It's yummy too!!

Name: Toronto Maple Leafs
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. This shot represents the Leafs' team colours - blue and white.

Name: Toxic Waste
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vodka', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Apple Pucker', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Track Star
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Absolut Vodka', '3/4 oz. Powerade']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass. Make sure to use a good brand of vodka like Absolut or it will taste terrible.

Name: Traditional Irish Flag
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe green', '1/3 oz. Irish Mist', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer each ingredient in order in a shot glass. The liqueurs should not mix and the colours will resemble the colours of Ireland's flag. I learned this shooter in Germany at a bar called the Irish Castle (run by Irishmen of course). It's as authentic as it gets.

Name: Traffic Light #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Cranberry Vodka', '1 oz. Peach Schnapps (Couloured)', '1 oz. Melon Deoria']
Making: Pour all the liqueurs in separate glasses and line them up. Quickly shoot one after the other.

Name: Train Derailer
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/3 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1/3 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Pour over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Train Wreck
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Tequila Rose']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Transfussion
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Grape Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Trap Door
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Swiss Chocolate Almond', '1/2 oz. Rum Cream Liqueur']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Trashman's Sack Of Garbage
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 oz. Whiskey', '1 oz. Cognac', '1 oz. Vodka', '1 bottle(s) Beer']
Making: Mix the liqueurs. Down it in one zip. Rinse the taste with beer. Tastes like the name hits you like a falling piano. Max 2 per person.

Name: Trial of the Century
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Goldschlager', '1/4 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Tricky Chicky
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tequila', '1 splash(es) Orange Juice']
Making: Pour Tequila into a shot glass then splash the orange juice on top.

Name: Trifexion
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Melon Liqueur', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Grenadine']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: TRIO
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila Rose', '1/3 oz. Mozart Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Whipped Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass - Mozart Liqueur, Tequila Rose , then whipped cream on top.

Name: Triple B
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Butterscotch Schnapps', '1 part(s) Baileys Irish Cream', '1 part(s) Banana Liqueur']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Triple Crown
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Sour Mix', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Soda Water']
Making: Mix in a shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass.

Name: Triple Irish Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jameson Irish Whiskey', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Irish Mist']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Tripple Ripple Bannana Banger
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Dark Rum', '1/3 oz. Butterscotch Ripple Schnapps']
Making: Shake ingredients over ice and strain into a shot glass. Invented at The Backstreet Bar, Calgary AB.

Name: Trix
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Gin', '3 oz. Passoa Passion Fruit', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix all the ingredients in a jug, and pour it in shot glasses. Then drink it and keep pouring and drinking until the jug is empty. Best enjoyed with a group of friends… Webmixer's Note: Change the 'oz's' to 'parts' to make the larger portion.

Name: Tropical Lifesaver
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Midori', '1/4 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Orange Ohranj Vodka', '1/4 oz. Sour Mix', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Build in shooter glass.

Name: Tropical Titty
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: Tropical Trance
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Absolut Mandarin Vodka', '1/2 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 splash(es) Malibu Rum']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and enjoy!

Name: True Canadian
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Maple Syrup (warm)']
Making: Pour the maple syrup into the vodka then shoot quickly before the syrup cools down.

Name: True Mind-Eraser
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Club Soda']
Making: Build over ice in a collins glass. First Kahlua then vodka and finally fill with the soda. Insert a straw (with finger over the end) into drink, when at the bottom, release it. Drink as fast as possible because this is a shot not a regular mixed drink.

Name: Tucker
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Mix over ice and strain into a large shot glass. Serve as a double shot.

Name: Tumor
Ingredients: ['1/5 oz. Cherry Liqueur', '3/5 oz. Sambuca black', '2/5 oz. Kahlua']
Making: In a shot glass - layer in order - Cherry Liqueur, Black Sambuca then Kahlua.

Name: Turbo #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Anisette', '1/2 oz. Tequila']
Making: Mix and shoot. (Just try it if you dare!)

Name: Turbo #2
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Vodka', '1/4 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Turbo Kamakazie
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', "1/8 oz. Rose's Lime Juice", '1 splash(es) 7-Up']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into 4 shot glasses. It tastes like a blue raspberry snowcone!

Name: Turbo Wolf
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Rumple Minze', '1 part(s) Jagermeister', '1 part(s) Goldschlager or Firewater']
Making: Layer or mix in shot glass.

Name: Turbocharger
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Mix into a shot glass and shoot!

Name: Turd On The Grass
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making: Lyer midori on the Irish Cream in a shot glass.

Name: Turkey Dong
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Wild Turkey 101 Proof Bourbon', '1 oz. Jagermeister']
Making: Pour in a shot glass.

Name: Turkey Shoot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1 oz. 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Mix and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Turkeyball
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1 oz. Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a shot glass. The more Amaretto used, the sweeter it is.

Name: Turkish Delight
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Parfait Amour', '1/3 oz. Galliano', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in order in a shooter glass then shoot.

Name: Twanger
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Twat Shot
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tuaca', '1 wedge(s) Lemon', 'Sugar']
Making: Place lemon wedge on top of the shot glass. Cut a slit in the lemon from end to end. Squeeze ends of wedge to open slit. Pour Chilled Tuaca over lemon allowing excess to fall into shot glass below. Sprinkle sugar on top. To drink... lean over lemon wedge and put your mouth over the lemon, sucking out lemon juice Tuaca and sugar... take rest of the shot and swallow. Lots of work but worth it!

Name: Twisted Monk
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. White Creme de Cacao', '1/3 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Straight up mixing in a shot glass or shaken over ice. Try it both ways and you decide! Enjoy.

Name: Twister #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Drambuie Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Green Chartreuse']
Making: Layer in order (Drambuie at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass. Flame the Chartreuse, sprinkle with cinnamon then blow out the flame and down the hatch.

Name: Twister Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Vodka']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Two Sluts
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Coconut Rum', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into 'two' shot glasses. (This drink is meant to be taken with a friend.)

Name: Ty - Rone
Ingredients: ['1 oz. TY KU Premuim Liqueur', '1 oz. Patron Silver Tequila']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Tycoon's Special
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Black Haus Blackberry Schnapps', '1 oz. Absolut Vodka', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Add all ingredients in a jigger and shake. Pour into a rocks glass and shoot.

Name: U.F.O. Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Peppermint Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Cape Velvet Cream Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Brandy']
Making: Layer in order (peppermint liqueur at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass and slam back.

Name: Ukrainian Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Canadian Club 6 Year Old (Or Crown Royal)']
Making: Pour the shot into a shot glass. Then shoot it back and chase it with a dill pickle just like from the farm.

Name: ULTIMATE BLOWJOB
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Vodka', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Layer in order given and top with whipped cream. Drink using no hands. Whipped cream must be the last to leave the glass. Enjoy.

Name: Ultimate Boiler Maker
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '12 oz. Beer']
Making: Fill a shot glass with Wild Turkey and drop it into a full glass of beer…….shoot.

Name: Un-goua
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', 'dash(es) Lime Juice (Sweetend)']
Making: Pour the tequila, then the 151 rum and finally the lime juice. Shoot and hope for the best because this one hurts bad.

Name: Undertakers Tombstone
Ingredients: ["1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/4 oz. Jim Beam Bourbon Whiskey', '1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/4 oz. Everclear', '1/4 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix the first three ingredients in a shot glass and the last three ingredients in another shot glass. Slam both of them in order and quickly.

Name: Unleaded
Ingredients: ['2 oz. 1800 Anejo Tequila', '2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '2 oz. Grey Goose Vodka', '1 splash(es) Coca Cola']
Making: Layer first three ingredients over ice. Add just a splash of Coca Cola for colour.

Name: Upper Cut #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Pour the vodka in a double shot glass and the juice in a regular shot glass. Drop the juice shot glass in the vodka shot glass and shoot! Josie reminds you not to forget to hold the regular shot glass in place while downing this shooter!

Name: Upper Cut #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Grapefruit Juice']
Making: Pour the vodka in a double shot glass and the juice in a regular shot glass. Drop the juice shot glass in the vodka shot glass and shoot! Josie reminds you not to forget to hold the regular shot glass in place while downing this shooter!

Name: Upper Cut #3
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', "1/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Country Cocktail (Downhome Punch)", '1 1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Put liquor in shooter glass then pour the orange juice in another, small, glass. Put the shooter glass in the orange juice glass and head's up, Enjoy…

Name: Uppercut
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Mix and drink. Have fun!

Name: Uppercut #4
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', 'Triple Sec', '2 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour orange juice into an old fashioned glass. Pour the Southern Comfort and Amaretto into a shooter glass and layer a small amount of Triple Sec on top. Drop the shooter glass in the old fashionned glass and enjoy the best shot you'll ever have.

Name: Upside Down Margarita
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Tequila', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Lime Juice']
Making: Pour tequila and Triple Sec into one shot glass, the lime into another. Lie back against bar with a towel on your chest and have a friend pour them both into your mouth at once. Stand up and swallow.

Name: Upside Down Naked On The Bathroom Floor
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Tequila', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1 splash(es) Amaretto', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice', '1 splash(es) Cranberry Juice']
Making: Chill all ingredients over ice. Strain and serve.This receipe makes 2 shots.

Name: Upside Down Pineapple Cake
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto di Soronno', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice', '5 drop(s) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shooter glass. If you really want to go all out add a fresh wedge of pineapple coated with sugar. Then enjoy the drink!!!

Name: Upside-Down
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Goldschlager', '1/3 oz. Vodka', '1/3 oz. Galliano', '1 drop(s) Orange Juice (Preferably with pulp)']
Making: Pour Goldschlagger, Vodka and Galliano in a shotglass. Then with a teaspoon drop in some orange juice. You'll see it go to the bottom. Then Down The Hatch! )

Name: Urban Cowboy
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Southern Comfort (To take the edge off)']
Making: layer in a shot glass in the given order and serve.

Name: Urine Sample
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Rye Whiskey', '1 oz. Pickle Juice']
Making: Pour both in a 2 oz. shot glass. Has the look and consistency of the real thing. I always use it when I'm supposed to surprise someone with a birthday shot.

Name: Urine Sample #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Banana Ramazotti', '1/2 oz. Vodka']
Making: Layer vodka then banana Ramazotti.

Name: Urine Sample #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Sambuca', '1/2 oz. Creme de Banane']
Making: Mix and drink...fairly simple...enjoy

Name: V-2 Schnieder
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Vaccination
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Jose Cuervo Especial Tequila', '1 oz. Orange Curacao']
Making: Pour the Jose Cuervo Gold Tequila into a small brandy-type snifter and add the Orange Curacao. Sip it slowly and enjoy the fragrance and the icy taste rolling over your tongue.

Name: Vagina's Delight
Ingredients: ['4 oz. Cranberry Juice', '3 oz. Orange Juice', '3 oz. Lemon Lime Soda', '1 1/2 oz. Tequila', '2 oz. Grapefruit Juice', '1 dash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Just mix all ingredients together and serve over ice. A good weak drink to give to your girlfriend if you don't want her getting too messed up and making out with your best-friend. Also good for little brothers/sister friends from church and any one who is not good at holding their alcohol. Tastes pretty good too.

Name: Vaginal Secreations
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager', '1/3 oz. After Shock Liqueur', 'Sour Mix']
Making: Mix and serve in a shot glass. Shoot without using your hands.

Name: Van Gogh Candy Corn Shooter
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Van Gogh Classic 80 Proof Vodka', '2 oz. Banana Liqueur', '2 oz. Coconut Rum', '2 oz. Orange Curacao', '2 oz. Cream', 'Grenadine']
Making: Combine Oranje Van Gogh Vodka and Banana Liqueur into a mixer with ice. Shake and pour into the bottom of the shot glass. Then combine Coconut Rum, Orange Curacao, Cream and a dash of Grenadine (for color). Shake in shaker with ice and gently layer on top using a spoon. Top with whipped cream.

Name: Vanilla Dreams
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Black Bat Rum', '1/2 oz. Vanilla Cola']
Making: Straight forward mix-n-shoot. Sweet dreams.

Name: Vanilla Masturbation
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vanilla Vodka', '3/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Chocolate Syrup', '1/2 oz. Milk']
Making: Mix well and enjoy!!

Name: Vanilla Pleasure
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dr Pepper', '1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '2 drop(s) Vanilla Extract']
Making: Pour into a shot glass.

Name: Vanilla Qualude
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Frangelico']
Making: Shake over ice, strain a into rocks glass and serve. Trent says: NOT TOO MANY BETTER!!!!

Name: Vapor Lock
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Chartreuse']
Making: Place the shot glass on a dish and fill with Chartreuse until it spills on to the dish. Light it. After a few seconds place the glass over the fire to put it out. Lift the glass and immediately cover with a beer coaster- (it should have a straw sticking through it). Take the shot, then the dish, then suck the vapors through the straw if you can...This one is a real ass kicker. ALWAYS USE CAUTION WITH FIRE.

Name: Varicose Veins
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe']
Making: Mix well and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Venom #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Yukon Jack', '1 splash(es) Lime Juice']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Venom #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Tequila', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey"]
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Vibrator #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Vibrator #2
Ingredients: ['1 oz. After Shock Liqueur', '1 oz. Avalanche Peppermint Schnapps', '1 oz. Bacardi Spice Rum', '1 splash(es) Ginger Ale']
Making: Layer the three liqueurs, add the Ginger Ale, then slam.

Name: Vic's Carrot Cake
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/2 oz. Butter Nips Liqueur', '1/4 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Shake the Goldschlager with 4 oz. of ice until the ice has almost melted, then add the other ingredients and strain into a lowball glass.

Name: Viet-nam
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jose Cuervo', "1/2 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/2 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Tabasco Sauce']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Viking Funeral
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/3 oz. Jagermeister', '1/3 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Mix in a shooter glass. This is a good Birthday Day drink. Makes a 3 wise men look like a Shirley Temple.

Name: Violently Ill
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Milk', '1 splash(es) Lime']
Making: Mix the lime and the milk in a shot glass, then add the vodka. Shoot, and try not to vomit...

Name: Violet Crumble
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Butterscotch Schnapps', "1 oz. Cadbury's Chocolate Liqueur"]
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Violet Thong
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur']
Making: Mix in a shot glass. Essentially a Silk Panty with the Chambord. Very nice!

Name: Viper Bite
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon', '1/2 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps']
Making: Exhale, shoot then inhale quickly.

Making: Salt the rim of a shot glass and pour in the Tequila, Vodka and Midori. Top with the Lime Juice and shoot.

Name: Virgin Foreplay
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1 Cherry']
Making: Place a cherry in a shot or cordial glass. Fill with 1oz. peach schnapps and inform the customer that they must suck the fuzz before they can take the cherry.

Name: Virgin on Prom Night #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Dark Rum', '1/4 oz. Triple Sec', '1/8 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix in a shot glass and shoot.

Name: Virgin Smurf

Making: Layer Blue Curacao on top of the Baja Rosa in a shot glass.

Name: Vodka Slammer
Ingredients: ['1 bottle(s) Vodka']
Making: Leave the vodka in the freezer overnight then pour yourself ice cold shots.

Name: Volcano #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Kahlua', '1/3 oz. Ouzo', '1/3 oz. White Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Volley Ball
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) Vodka', '1 part(s) Blue Curacao', '1 part(s) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Shake well, strain and serve in a shot glass.

Name: Vomit

Making: Mix well then drink it through a straw.

Name: Voodoo #1
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Vodka', '3/4 oz. Bacardi Limon', '1 oz. Mountain Dew', 'dash(es) Sugar']

Name: Voodoo #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Malibu Rum', '1/4 oz. Butter Shots', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Kahlua', '1/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/4 oz. Midori']
Making: Layer in order (Kahlua at the bottom of the glass) in a shot glass.

Name: Vulcan Death Grip
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Ouzo', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Vulcan Mind Meld
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Ouzo', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Pour ingredients into a double shot glass. Drink quickly.

Name: Vulcan Mind Probe
Ingredients: ['1 1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/2 oz. Baileys Irish Cream']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and serve.

Name: Vulcan Mind Probe #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Ouzo', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Wild Turkey 80 Proof Bourbon']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Vulcan Mind Probe #2
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/4 oz. Rum', '1/4 oz. White Tequila', '1/4 oz. Gin', '1/4 oz. Vodka', '1 splash(es) Pineapple Juice']

Name: Vulcan Mind Probe #3

Making: Mix together, serve, drink, fall over.

Name: Walk In The Park

Making: Shake with ice and strain into two shot glasses.

Name: Walk The Plank
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Blue Curacao', "1/2 oz. Captain Morgan's Parrot Bay Coconut Rum", '1/2 oz. Vodka']

Name: Walla Walla Apple
Ingredients: ["3/4 oz. Jack Daniel's Whiskey", '1/4 oz. DeKuyper Pucker Sour Apple Schnapps']
Making: Pour in a shot glass.

Name: Wam Bas
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Scotch']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Warm Blonde
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Amaretto']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Warm Puke
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Banane', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Coconut Liqueur']

Making: Mix in a shaker with ice. Strain into a shot glass.

Name: Water
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Vodka']
Making: The next time you're bartending and you're slammed and some cheap asshole comes up to you and whines, _Can I have some water_, serve him a double shot of cheap vodka and tell him, _There, you pussy_. That's how we serve water around here!

Name: Water Macusun
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Water Mocasin
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Crown Royal', '1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', 'dash(es) Sweet and Sour Mix', 'dash(es) 7-Up', 'dash(es) Grenadine', 'dash(es) Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Pineapple Juice']
Making: Mix with ice and strain into shot glasses.

Name: Water Moccasin #1
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Dekuyper Hot Damn 100 Proof Cinnamon Schnapps', "1 oz. Seagram's 7 Crown"]
Making: Mix and shoot.

Name: Water Moccasin #2
Ingredients: ['1/4 oz. Crown Royal', '1/4 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/4 oz. Pineapple Juice', '1/4 oz. Orange Juice', 'dash(es) Grenadine']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Waterfall

Making: Mix in a shooter glass.

Name: Watermelon Crawl

Name: Watermelon Jollyrancher
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Apple Pucker', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake and strain into a shot glass and enjoy.

Name: Watermelon Shooter #1
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Southern Comfort', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into shot glass - shoot! Tastes & smells like the real thing.

Name: Watermelon Shooter #2

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Making: Mix all with ice. Shake and strain into a shot glass. This is.a sweeter version of the Blowjob.

Name: West Side Special

Making: Mix in a shot glass. Tom's comment: This was a very popular drink on the west side of Buffalo, New York, during the 1970s.

Name: Wet Dream #2

Making: Mix ingredients -except creme de cassis- with ice. Stain into a cocktail glass and top with the creme de cassis.

Making: Layer in a shot glass. Pick up the shot glass and spin the liquid. Shoot it, slam it.

Name: Whisper Of Death

Name: White Lightning

Name: White Pussy

Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: White Rocket
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Tanqueray Gin', '1 oz. Seltzer Water', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and top with whipped cream.

Name: White Spider

Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: White Spider #2
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. I Spirit Vodka', '1/2 oz. White Creme de Menthe']

Name: Windex #2

Name: Wisconsin Lunch Pail
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '5 oz. Beer', '5 oz. Orange Juice']
Making: Pour the amaretto into a shot glass. Pour the beer and the orange juice into a highball glass. Drop the shot glass into the highball glass and shoot.

Name: Wise Man
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Midori', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze']
Making: Layer in a shot glass. Fabulous!

Name: Wize man
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Rumple Minze', '1/4 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum']
Making: Serve in a chilled shot glass.

Name: Woa Sh*t
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Jagermeister', '1/2 oz. Green Chartreuse']
Making: Pour into a shot glass and drink. Then say 'Woa Shit'.

Name: Women's Revenge
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Cape Velvet Cream Liqueur (Or Amarula Cream Liqueur)', '1/2 oz. Lime Cordial']
Making: First put the Cape Velvet in your mouth. Don't swallow!! Now put the lime in your mouth. Mix in your mouth. Eeeooo..

Name: Woo Woo #2
Ingredients: ['3 cup(s) Vodka', '3 cup(s) Peach Schnapps', '2 cup(s) Water (Boiling)', '3 package(s) JELLO (Grape)', '3 package(s) JELLO (Cranberry/Raspberry)', '3 package(s) JELLO (Strawberry)', '1 can(s) Grape Juice (Frozen-undiluted)', '1 can(s) Cranberry-Raspberry Juice (Frozen-undiluted)']
Making: Blend the frozen juice and mix in the other ingredients. Makes approximately 72 JELL-O shots.

Name: Woo Woo Shooter
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Peach Schnapps', '1/2 oz. Vodka', '1 oz. Cranberry Juice']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Woodstock Shooter
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Amaretto', '1 oz. Bacardi 151 Proof Rum', '1 oz. Sweet and Sour Mix']
Making: Mix over ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: Woof
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Blue Curacao', '1/3 oz. Amaretto', '1/3 oz. Parfait Amour']
Making: Pour into a shooter glass.

Name: Woops
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Vodka', '1/2 oz. Amaretto', '1/2 oz. Rum', '1/2 oz. Brandy']
Making: Mix the rum and the vodka together in a shot glass and let sit for a minute. Then add the brandy and the amaretto (don't mix) and shoot.

Name: World's Best Tequila
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Tres Generaciones Tequila']
Making: It should be a crime to mix this tequila with anything. Straight up with a small lime chunk to follow. In fact this tequila is so smooth you don't really need the lime or the traditional salt.

Name: Wounded Dragon
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Grenadine', '1/2 oz. 151 Proof Rum', '1/2 oz. Midori']
Making:
Layer in order (grenadine at the bottom) in a shot glass.
Apparetnly the Wounded Dragon was was created in 1981 by Bob Yarbrough from Fredericksburg ,Va. He was experimenting with the molecular density of liquers and happened upon this combination. At first it was derived from the Green Lizard, but after he mixed it up, he thought "damn this is badder than a lizard (151)Gotta be a "Dragon" " Since he was relatively new at layering, sometimes the grenadine bled into the Midori-hence the Wounded Dragon!

Name: Wrigley's Doublemint Blowjob
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Kahlua', '1/2 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', '1 1/2 oz. Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: X Boyfriend Shot
Ingredients: ['1 part(s) X-Rated Fusion Liqueur', '1 part(s) Vanilla Vodka']
Making: Pour into a shooter glass. Move on.

Name: X-ray Vision
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Absinthe', '1 oz. Vodka']
Making: Mix in shot glass. Shoot!

Name: Xmas Kiss
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grenadine', '1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Melon Liqueur']
Making: Layer in order into a shot glass (grenadine at the bottom).

Name: XXX
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Triple Sec', '1/3 oz. Tequila Rose', '1/3 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Strawberry Vodka']
Making: Shake it Baby! Shake it and strain! Garnish with a dab of whipped cream.

Name: Yager Bomber
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Jagermeister', '8 oz. Red Bull Energy Drink']
Making: Pour the Jagermeister into a shot glass. Fill a cocktail glass half full with Red Bull, drop the shot glass in and shoot.

Name: Yellow Cake
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Stolichnaya ( Stoli ) Vanilla Vodka', '1 oz. Triple Sec', '1 oz. Pineapple Juice']
Making: Fill a mixer glass with ice. Add ingredients and stir. Strain into a shot glass, smell and then slam it.

Name: Yellow Flamelicker
Ingredients: ['splash(es) Grenadine', '1 oz. Vodka', 'Lemon Juice']
Making: Pour grenadine on bottom of a shotglass. Layer the Vodka and then drop in about 5 or 6 drops of lemon juice. It will settle above the grenadine and look like yellow flames.

Name: Yellow Jacket
Ingredients: ['2/3 oz. 99 Bananas Schnapps', '1/3 oz. Sambuca (Black)']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shot glass.

Name: York Peppermint Patty
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Peppermint Schnapps', "dash(es) Hershey's Chocolate Syrup"]
Making: Pour syrup directly into mouth then shoot the schnapps. (This is extra special if you actually do it in York, PA.)

Name: Your Place Or Mine?
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. 1921 Tequila Cream Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Ke Ke Beach Key Lime Cream Liqueur', '1 oz. Cream']
Making: Shake and strain into two shot glasses. One for you and one for your friend.

Name: Yukon Cornelius
Ingredients: ['2 oz. Yukon Jack', '1/4 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: In a shot glass pour the Yukon Jack to just below the rim. Add Goldschlager, filling the glass to full. Enjoy.

Name: Yukon Gold
Ingredients: ['1 oz. Yukon Jack', '1 oz. Goldschlager']
Making: Shake with ice and strain into a shooter glass.

Name: Yukon Jackoff
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '3/4 oz. Yukon Jack', 'Whipped Cream']
Making: Layer the two first ingredients in a shot glass and top off with whipped cream. Ladies say it goes down real smooth!!!!

Name: Z-28
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Creme de Menthe', '1/3 oz. Banana Liqueur', '1/3 oz. Tequila']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Zach Attack
Ingredients: ['2 tsp. Tequila', '2 tsp. Vodka', '1 tsp. Sour Mix', '1 tsp. Tabasco Sauce', '1 Blackberry (ies)']
Making: Mix Vodka, Tequila, Sour Mix and Tabasco and pour into a shot glass. Drop in the blackberry and serve.

Name: Zipper #1
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Grand Marnier', '1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Irish Cream']
Making: Layer in a shot glass.

Name: Zipper #3
Ingredients: ['1/3 oz. Tequila', '1/3 oz. Baileys Irish Cream', '1/3 oz. Grand Marnier']
Making: As in Zipper #1, layer in a shot glass but Chris... how can you not describe one of the sexiest shooter to experience with friends...Guy sitting on a chair, unzipped, place shot glass carefully, then a thirsty female volunteer kneel before you and, hands in her back, do the B.J. thing get it!!! Have fun and enjoy

Name: Zipper #5
Ingredients: ['1/2 oz. Chambord Raspberry Liqueur', '1/2 oz. Vodka', 'dash(es) Soda']
Making: Layer in a shot glass (Chambord at the bottom of the glass) and shoot it like a Mind Eraser.

Name: Zipperhead
Ingredients: ['3/4 oz. Raspberry Liqueur', '3/4 oz. Vodka']
Making: Chill the vodka, then layer in a shot glass.
